engChrName: For general mob character checks. There is a possibility that events will not function correctly if used, so please be careful. [Station transplant] *If unneeded, please delete.
engSearchText:
For general mob character checks. There is a
possibility that events will not function correctly if
used, so please be careful.
[Station transplant] *If unneeded, please delete.
jpnChrName: 一般・モブ確認用です。こちらを使用した場合、イベントが 正常に進行しなくなる場合がありますのでご注意ください。 【駅前分移植】※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
一般・モブ確認用です。こちらを使用した場合、イベントが
正常に進行しなくなる場合がありますのでご注意ください。
【駅前分移植】※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select one character to patrol the city together. (Note: This can be changed at any time via the Travel menu, etc.)
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Select one character to patrol the city together.
(Note: This can be changed at any time via the Travel menu, etc.)
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：市内を巡回するメンバーを一人選んで下さい。 （※移動メニュー等でいつでも変更できます）
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：市内を巡回するメンバーを一人選んで下さい。
（※移動メニュー等でいつでも変更できます）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Agnès, Feri, and Aaron have entered the party. Select two additional members.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Agnès, Feri, and Aaron have entered the party.
Select two additional members.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：アニエス、フェリ、アーロンがパーティに入りました。 追加のメンバーを２名選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエス、フェリ、アーロンがパーティに入りました。
追加のメンバーを２名選んでください。

engChrName: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
engSearchText: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
jpnChrName: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）
jpnSearchText: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）

engChrName: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
engSearchText: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
jpnChrName: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）
jpnSearchText: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Agnès/Risette.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you
in addition to Van/Agnès/Risette.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：ヴァン・アニエス・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・アニエス・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select 1 accompanying character. (This can be changed later.)
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select 1 accompanying character. (This can be changed later.)
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：同行メンバーを一人選んでください。 （後で変更も可能です。）
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：同行メンバーを一人選んでください。
（後で変更も可能です。）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Set the location liberation status. The order of locations liberated changes the party lineup.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Set the location liberation status.
The order of locations liberated changes the party lineup.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：解放している順番によってパーティー構成が変化します。 解放状況を選択してください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：解放している順番によってパーティー構成が変化します。
解放状況を選択してください。

engChrName: Temporary placement to check event progression. Once night activities and quests have been officially added, please delete.
engSearchText:
Temporary placement to check event progression.
Once night activities and quests have been officially
added, please delete.
jpnChrName: イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。 ※夜行動やクエストが正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。
※夜行動やクエストが正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: Inspect the garage, then please head to the expressway.
engSearchText:
Inspect the garage, then please head to
the expressway.
jpnChrName: ガレージの車を調べて、首都高へ向かってください。
jpnSearchText: ガレージの車を調べて、首都高へ向かってください。

engChrName: I had a lot of fun checking in on the other students earlier. The city is so alive today!
engSearchText:
I had a lot of fun checking in on the other
students earlier. The city is so alive today!
jpnChrName: ふふ、街中が活気にあふれていて 生徒の見回りも楽しかったですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、街中が活気にあふれていて
生徒の見回りも楽しかったですよ。

engChrName: Of course, I'm here to help you and everyone else with any work that comes up, too.
engSearchText:
Of course, I'm here to help you and everyone else
with any work that comes up, too.
jpnChrName: 勿論、ヴァンさん達のお仕事の お手伝いもさせてもらいますから。
jpnSearchText:
勿論、ヴァンさん達のお仕事の
お手伝いもさせてもらいますから。

engChrName: If you need to bring me in, that's okay. Just come talk to me anytime.
engSearchText:
If you need to bring me in, that's okay. Just come talk
to me anytime.
jpnChrName: 交替する時は遠慮なく声をかけて下さいね。
jpnSearchText: 交替する時は遠慮なく声をかけて下さいね。

engChrName: Got'cha. Will do. Thanks for being so flexible, Agnès.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Will do. Thanks for being so
flexible, Agnès.
jpnChrName: ああ、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、了解だ。

engChrName: So this is where you snuck off to?
engSearchText: So this is where you snuck off to?
jpnChrName: アニエスはここにいやがったのか。
jpnSearchText: アニエスはここにいやがったのか。

engChrName: Yes. I had a quick errand to attend to.
engSearchText: Yes. I had a quick errand to attend to.
jpnChrName: はい、出かける前に少し用事が……
jpnSearchText: はい、出かける前に少し用事が……

engChrName: Are all your preparations squared away?
engSearchText: Are all your preparations squared away?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの方は準備は済みましたか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんの方は準備は済みましたか？

engChrName: Preparations? Uh, heh... Feels like a bit of a stretch to call 'em that, but yeah. I'm ready.
engSearchText:
Preparations? Uh, heh... Feels like a bit of a stretch to
call 'em that, but yeah. I'm ready.
jpnChrName: いや、準備って程のもんでもねえがな。
jpnSearchText: いや、準備って程のもんでもねえがな。

engChrName: We still got plenty of time, so no need to rush.
engSearchText: We still got plenty of time, so no need to rush.
jpnChrName: 出発までまだ時間がある、 お前も慌てなくていいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
出発までまだ時間がある、
お前も慌てなくていいぜ。

engChrName: Well, there's rushing, and then there's being efficient. Heehee!
engSearchText:
Well, there's rushing, and then there's being efficient.
Heehee!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、分かりました。 それじゃあ手早くやってしまいますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、分かりました。
それじゃあ手早くやってしまいますね。

engChrName: (Guess she's in the middle of somethin'... I'll bug her later after my stuff's done.)
engSearchText:
(Guess she's in the middle of somethin'... I'll bug her
later after my stuff's done.)
jpnChrName: （何かの支度中みてえだが……   ま、お互いとっとと片付けるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（何かの支度中みてえだが……
ま、お互いとっとと片付けるか。）

engChrName: It's quite lovely out today. The sun feels wonderful...
engSearchText: It's quite lovely out today. The sun feels wonderful...
jpnChrName: 今日はいいお天気ですよね。 日差しも暖かくて……
jpnSearchText:
今日はいいお天気ですよね。
日差しも暖かくて……

engChrName: It's been some time since I last made the rounds. I think it's getting me excited!
engSearchText:
It's been some time since I last made the rounds.
I think it's getting me excited!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、街巡りも久しぶりになりますし 気合を入れていかないとですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、街巡りも久しぶりになりますし
気合を入れていかないとですね。

engChrName: I was thinking of going over some old case files while I still have the chance.
engSearchText:
I was thinking of going over some old case files while
I still have the chance.
jpnChrName: 今のうちに過去の事件ファイルを 整理しておこうかと……
jpnSearchText:
今のうちに過去の事件ファイルを
整理しておこうかと……

engChrName: If anyone contacts the office while I'm here, I'll forward them to you.
engSearchText:
If anyone contacts the office while I'm here, I'll
forward them to you.
jpnChrName: あ、事務所に連絡が入った時は ヴァンさんの方にお繋ぎしますね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、事務所に連絡が入った時は
ヴァンさんの方にお繋ぎしますね。

engChrName: Best of luck on your end!
engSearchText: Best of luck on your end!
jpnChrName: ふふ、そちらも頑張ってください。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そちらも頑張ってください。

engChrName: Ahh... I don't usually bathe during the day. It's kinda...luxurious!
engSearchText:
Ahh... I don't usually bathe during the day.
It's kinda...luxurious!
jpnChrName: えへへ、昼間からお風呂に入るなんて やっぱり少し贅沢な感じがしますねっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、昼間からお風呂に入るなんて
やっぱり少し贅沢な感じがしますねっ。

engChrName: That felt really nice—I'm in tip-top shape now! If you need me for anything, lemme know!
engSearchText:
That felt really nice—I'm in tip-top shape now!
If you need me for anything, lemme know!
jpnChrName: サッパリして気合十分なので、 必要な時はいつでも呼んでくださいねっ！
jpnSearchText:
サッパリして気合十分なので、
必要な時はいつでも呼んでくださいねっ！

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I got Fie's number before she left.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. I got Fie's number before she left.
jpnChrName: フィーさんと連絡先を交換したので、 通信をしてた所だったんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
フィーさんと連絡先を交換したので、
通信をしてた所だったんですよ。

engChrName: We were talking about doing the rounds together during the festival. Guess I know what I'm doing for the day!
engSearchText:
We were talking about doing the rounds together
during the festival. Guess I know what I'm doing for
the day!
jpnChrName: 記念祭の日も一緒に回ろうって話してまして。 これで当日の待ち合わせもバッチリです！
jpnSearchText:
記念祭の日も一緒に回ろうって話してまして。
これで当日の待ち合わせもバッチリです！

engChrName: It's kinda weird, heehee. We're not really friends, but we're more than acquaintances now.
engSearchText:
It's kinda weird, heehee. We're not really friends, but
we're more than acquaintances now.
jpnChrName: えへへ、普通のお友達とは ちょっと違うかもしれませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、普通のお友達とは
ちょっと違うかもしれませんけど。

engChrName: She knows a lot about Aida, too, so I wanna get to know her better!
engSearchText:
She knows a lot about Aida, too, so I wanna get to
know her better!
jpnChrName: アイーダさんの妹分同士、 これからも仲良くさせてほしいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんの妹分同士、
これからも仲良くさせてほしいですっ。

engChrName: It's made me think about what else I can do—besides just going back home and being a warrior...
engSearchText:
It's made me think about what else I can do—besides
just going back home and being a warrior...
jpnChrName: 里に帰って“戦士”になる事だけが 選択肢じゃないんですね……
jpnSearchText:
里に帰って“戦士”になる事だけが
選択肢じゃないんですね……

engChrName: Mmm... I think I'm confusing myself about it. There are just so many options...
engSearchText:
Mmm... I think I'm confusing myself about it.
There are just so many options...
jpnChrName: う～ん……考えた事も無かったので 混乱しちゃいますけど……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん……考えた事も無かったので
混乱しちゃいますけど……

engChrName: So I wanna take the time to really think it through. Thanks for all the help along the way, Van!
engSearchText:
So I wanna take the time to really think it through.
Thanks for all the help along the way, Van!
jpnChrName: 落ち着いて考えてみたいと思います。 ありがとうございます、ヴァンさんっ！
jpnSearchText:
落ち着いて考えてみたいと思います。
ありがとうございます、ヴァンさんっ！

engChrName: I think I might go out and gather some intel after this. Is that okay?
engSearchText:
I think I might go out and gather some intel
after this. Is that okay?
jpnChrName: この後わたしの方でも 情報収集しに出かけようかと思います。
jpnSearchText:
この後わたしの方でも
情報収集しに出かけようかと思います。

engChrName: A always seems to be one step ahead of us...but I wanna get the jump on them this time!
engSearchText:
A always seems to be one step ahead of us...but I
wanna get the jump on them this time!
jpnChrName: いつも後手に回ってますけど…… 《Ａ》の動向を掴んで先手を打ちたい所ですね。
jpnSearchText:
いつも後手に回ってますけど……
《Ａ》の動向を掴んで先手を打ちたい所ですね。

engChrName: Brr... How is it November already? It started getting really cold all of a sudden...
engSearchText:
Brr... How is it November already? It started
getting really cold all of a sudden...
jpnChrName: ふぅ、気付けばもう１１月ですし、 夜の屋上はちょっと寒いですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、気付けばもう１１月ですし、
夜の屋上はちょっと寒いですね。

engChrName: How about you head back inside, then? I don't do paid sick leave, so don't you go catchin' a cold on me.
engSearchText:
How about you head back inside, then? I don't do
paid sick leave, so don't you go catchin' a cold on me.
jpnChrName: それなら中に戻ったらどうだ。 風邪を引いても手当は出さねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
それなら中に戻ったらどうだ。
風邪を引いても手当は出さねえぞ。

engChrName: Fiiine, heehee...
engSearchText: Fiiine, heehee...
jpnChrName: えへへ……
jpnSearchText: えへへ……

engChrName: I've just been thinking to myself a lot... My brother's words are floating around in my head.
engSearchText:
I've just been thinking to myself a lot... My brother's
words are floating around in my head.
jpnChrName: でもなんだか、お兄ちゃんに言われた事が いまだに頭の中をグルグルしてしまって。
jpnSearchText:
でもなんだか、お兄ちゃんに言われた事が
いまだに頭の中をグルグルしてしまって。

engChrName: That stuff about 'having what it takes'?
engSearchText: That stuff about 'having what it takes'?
jpnChrName: お前さんが“戦士”に向いてるかどうかってやつか。
jpnSearchText: お前さんが“戦士”に向いてるかどうかってやつか。

engChrName: Yeah... But I'm not gonna let it get me down.
engSearchText: Yeah... But I'm not gonna let it get me down.
jpnChrName: はい……でも悩んでいる訳ではないんです。
jpnSearchText: はい……でも悩んでいる訳ではないんです。

engChrName: I know I have the heart of a real Kruga warrior... Nothing anyone says can change that.
engSearchText:
I know I have the heart of a real Kruga warrior...
Nothing anyone says can change that.
jpnChrName: 誰に何と言われようと、わたしは クルガの戦士として誇りをもっていますから。
jpnSearchText:
誰に何と言われようと、わたしは
クルガの戦士として誇りをもっていますから。

engChrName: I just have to be strong enough that even my brother respects me.
engSearchText:
I just have to be strong enough that even my brother
respects me.
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんに認めてもらえるくらい、 わたしが強くなればいいんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
お兄ちゃんに認めてもらえるくらい、
わたしが強くなればいいんですよね。

engChrName: If I keep working hard and getting stronger, like I'm already doing, I'll be that full-fledged warrior. Just you watch!
engSearchText:
If I keep working hard and getting stronger, like I'm
already doing, I'll be that full-fledged warrior.
Just you watch!
jpnChrName: だから……やる事は今までと変わりません。 一人前の戦士になる為に努力するだけですっ！
jpnSearchText:
だから……やる事は今までと変わりません。
一人前の戦士になる為に努力するだけですっ！

engChrName: That's the spirit, kiddo.
engSearchText: That's the spirit, kiddo.
jpnChrName: ああ、その意気だろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その意気だろ。

engChrName: Ain't always bad to have a chip on your shoulder. Just don't go pushin' yourself too hard over it, yeah?
engSearchText:
Ain't always bad to have a chip on your shoulder.
Just don't go pushin' yourself too hard over it, yeah?
jpnChrName: ……ま、外の風をあびるのもいいが 程々にして切り上げろよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、外の風をあびるのもいいが
程々にして切り上げろよ。

engChrName: Mhm! Yeah.
engSearchText: Mhm! Yeah.
jpnChrName: えへへ……はいっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ……はいっ。

engChrName: Oh, what are FIO and Étoile up to?
engSearchText: Oh, what are FIO and Étoile up to?
jpnChrName: そういえば、ＦＩＯさんとエトワールは 何をやってるんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、ＦＩＯさんとエトワールは
何をやってるんでしょうか？

engChrName: It's really neat seeing a drone and cat talking to each other.
engSearchText:
It's really neat seeing a drone and cat talking to
each other.
jpnChrName: ドローンとネコでコミュニケーションが とれるだなんて、不思議な光景ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ドローンとネコでコミュニケーションが
とれるだなんて、不思議な光景ですよね。

engChrName: They're gonna flip back home when I write about it. Heehee!
engSearchText:
They're gonna flip back home when I write about it.
Heehee!
jpnChrName: ふふ、この事を家族の手紙に書いても いいかもしれませんねっ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、この事を家族の手紙に書いても
いいかもしれませんねっ。

engChrName: Yo. Helpin' out in the kitchen today?
engSearchText: Yo. Helpin' out in the kitchen today?
jpnChrName: おっ、今日はこっちの手伝いか？
jpnSearchText: おっ、今日はこっちの手伝いか？

engChrName: Yup! Risette and Agnès handled the office work, so I figured I'd cover the kitchen.
engSearchText:
Yup! Risette and Agnès handled the office work, so I
figured I'd cover the kitchen.
jpnChrName: はいっ、事務仕事はリゼットさんや アニエスさんが片付けて下さったので。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、事務仕事はリゼットさんや
アニエスさんが片付けて下さったので。

engChrName: It's nice to learn more about Western-style cuisine while I'm at it!
engSearchText:
It's nice to learn more about Western-style cuisine
while I'm at it!
jpnChrName: 西方風の料理を勉強させてもらいつつ 厨房のお手伝いをしてるんですよ！
jpnSearchText:
西方風の料理を勉強させてもらいつつ
厨房のお手伝いをしてるんですよ！

engChrName: Right now, they have me doing garnishes and stuff. Starting simple, of course.
engSearchText:
Right now, they have me doing garnishes and stuff.
Starting simple, of course.
jpnChrName: 付け合わせとか、簡単なものは 任せてもらえるようになりました！
jpnSearchText:
付け合わせとか、簡単なものは
任せてもらえるようになりました！

engChrName: Quick learner, huh? Pops can be pretty strict about it, though, so be careful.
engSearchText:
Quick learner, huh? Pops can be pretty strict about it,
though, so be careful.
jpnChrName: すげえじゃねえか。 おやっさんの評価は厳しいのによ。
jpnSearchText:
すげえじゃねえか。
おやっさんの評価は厳しいのによ。

engChrName: Well, I used to help Umi a lot back at home.
engSearchText: Well, I used to help Umi a lot back at home.
jpnChrName: えへへ、里ではよくお母さん（アマ）の お手伝いもしてましたから。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、里ではよくお母さん（アマ）の
お手伝いもしてましたから。

engChrName: Though all I ever made was rations, feels like...
engSearchText: Though all I ever made was rations, feels like...
jpnChrName: 一番よく作っていたのは 携帯糧食（レーション）なんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
一番よく作っていたのは
携帯糧食（レーション）なんですけど……

engChrName: I wanna get good at Western cooking, so that I can go back home and make something really nice for everyone.
engSearchText:
I wanna get good at Western cooking, so that I can
go back home and make something really nice
for everyone.
jpnChrName: いつか西方風の料理を身に付けて 家族や里の皆に振舞ってあげたいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
いつか西方風の料理を身に付けて
家族や里の皆に振舞ってあげたいですっ。

engChrName: Thinking back, there was just so much new stuff I had to get used to when I came to the city...
engSearchText:
Thinking back, there was just so much new stuff I
had to get used to when I came to the city...
jpnChrName: 首都に来たばかりの頃は、 見慣れない食材や調味料ばっかりでしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
首都に来たばかりの頃は、
見慣れない食材や調味料ばっかりでしたけど……

engChrName: ...but I think I've got my head wrapped around it now! Even the cooking is really cool!
engSearchText:
...but I think I've got my head wrapped around
it now! Even the cooking is really cool!
jpnChrName: 色々と分かるようになって来たので お料理も楽しいですよっ！
jpnSearchText:
色々と分かるようになって来たので
お料理も楽しいですよっ！

engChrName: 'Sup? You writing a letter?
engSearchText: 'Sup? You writing a letter?
jpnChrName: おっ、手紙を書いてんのか？
jpnSearchText: おっ、手紙を書いてんのか？

engChrName: Mhm! I figured I'd let everybody back home know how I'm doing.
engSearchText:
Mhm! I figured I'd let everybody back home know
how I'm doing.
jpnChrName: はい、クルガの里にいる家族に 近況を伝えようと思いましてっ。
jpnSearchText:
はい、クルガの里にいる家族に
近況を伝えようと思いましてっ。

engChrName: We've written back and forth a few times, but man, there's just so much to talk about now! I dunno where to start.
engSearchText:
We've written back and forth a few times, but man,
there's just so much to talk about now! I dunno where
to start.
jpnChrName: もう何通かやりとりはしてるんですけど。 今回も書きたい事が沢山あって悩んでいました。
jpnSearchText:
もう何通かやりとりはしてるんですけど。
今回も書きたい事が沢山あって悩んでいました。

engChrName: My first time in the Blacklight District, for one... though Abi might already know what that place is like.
engSearchText:
My first time in the Blacklight District, for one...
though Abi might already know what that place
is like.
jpnChrName: 例えば、初めて行った黒芒街の事とか…… お父さん（アブ）なら存在を知ってたかもしれませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
例えば、初めて行った黒芒街の事とか……
お父さん（アブ）なら存在を知ってたかもしれませんけど。

engChrName: Wouldn't surprise me. Might as well be on the jaeger bucket list.
engSearchText:
Wouldn't surprise me. Might as well be on the jaeger
bucket list.
jpnChrName: かもな、共和国で活動した事がある猟兵なら 立ち寄っていても不思議じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
かもな、共和国で活動した事がある猟兵なら
立ち寄っていても不思議じゃねえ。

engChrName: I might've gone there as a jaeger myself, if I'd stayed there.
engSearchText:
I might've gone there as a jaeger myself, if I'd
stayed there.
jpnChrName: 里にいたら、わたしも猟兵として 黒芒街に出入りしてたのかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
里にいたら、わたしも猟兵として
黒芒街に出入りしてたのかもしれませんね。

engChrName: But I like learning about stuff this way. Working with you has really opened my eyes to all these new things.
engSearchText:
But I like learning about stuff this way. Working with
you has really opened my eyes to all these new things.
jpnChrName: でも、事務所に来たからこそ “地上”の首都を沢山知る事が出来ました。
jpnSearchText:
でも、事務所に来たからこそ
“地上”の首都を沢山知る事が出来ました。

engChrName: So I was, umm...I was gonna write to them about it. Every day out here is super exciting!
engSearchText:
So I was, umm...I was gonna write to them about it.
Every day out here is super exciting!
jpnChrName: だから……えっと…… 毎日が充実してるって手紙に書こうと思います！
jpnSearchText:
だから……えっと……
毎日が充実してるって手紙に書こうと思います！

engChrName: I say go for it. I can tell you've really liked the time.
engSearchText: I say go for it. I can tell you've really liked the time.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そうかよ。 お前さんらしくていいんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そうかよ。
お前さんらしくていいんじゃねえか。

engChrName: Just, I'm doing so much stuff now... I gotta pick something to write about, but what? Hmm...
engSearchText:
Just, I'm doing so much stuff now... I gotta pick
something to write about, but what? Hmm...
jpnChrName: 毎日色んな事があって…… 何を書くか悩んじゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
毎日色んな事があって……
何を書くか悩んじゃいます。

engChrName: I wanna write to my little brother and sisters, but then, there's so much I wanna tell Umi!
engSearchText:
I wanna write to my little brother and sisters, but
then, there's so much I wanna tell Umi!
jpnChrName: 弟や妹たちにも一言添えたいですし お母さん（アマ）にも伝えたい事、沢山あります！
jpnSearchText:
弟や妹たちにも一言添えたいですし
お母さん（アマ）にも伝えたい事、沢山あります！

engChrName: Oookay, sooo...the expense reports go here, these papers go there...
engSearchText:
Oookay, sooo...the expense reports go here, these
papers go there...
jpnChrName: うーん……経費の報告書がここだから、 この書類はこっちに…………
jpnSearchText:
うーん……経費の報告書がここだから、
この書類はこっちに…………

engChrName: You good there? Don't dive in over your head, or you'll just make a mess of things.
engSearchText:
You good there? Don't dive in over your head, or
you'll just make a mess of things.
jpnChrName: 苦戦してるみてえだが大丈夫か？ あんま事務所を散らかすんじゃねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
苦戦してるみてえだが大丈夫か？
あんま事務所を散らかすんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: S-Sorry. This is just kinda tough...
engSearchText: S-Sorry. This is just kinda tough...
jpnChrName: た、確かにちょっと難しいですけど……
jpnSearchText: た、確かにちょっと難しいですけど……

engChrName: ...but I wanna get good at the orbal net, so I'll keep working at it!
engSearchText:
...but I wanna get good at the orbal net, so I'll keep
working at it!
jpnChrName: 将来的には導力ネットを 使いこなせるようになりたいと思ってるので！
jpnSearchText:
将来的には導力ネットを
使いこなせるようになりたいと思ってるので！

engChrName: So if at first I don't succeed, I'll try and try again!
engSearchText: So if at first I don't succeed, I'll try and try again!
jpnChrName: このくらいでへこたれてちゃ駄目ですよね！ まずは書類整理から頑張りますっ……！
jpnSearchText:
このくらいでへこたれてちゃ駄目ですよね！
まずは書類整理から頑張りますっ……！

engChrName: Haha! I'm sure you'll have it down pat in no time.
engSearchText: Haha! I'm sure you'll have it down pat in no time.
jpnChrName: ハッ、それじゃ成長ぶりに期待だな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、それじゃ成長ぶりに期待だな。

engChrName: Man...filing documents is way harder than it sounds.
engSearchText: Man...filing documents is way harder than it sounds.
jpnChrName: 書類の整理って、 簡単そうなのに難しいですね……
jpnSearchText:
書類の整理って、
簡単そうなのに難しいですね……

engChrName: But everyone else can do it, so I should learn it, too! Just gotta keep at it.
engSearchText:
But everyone else can do it, so I should learn it, too!
Just gotta keep at it.
jpnChrName: でも、皆さんの事務仕事を見てきましたから。 頑張ればわたしにも出来るはずです……！
jpnSearchText:
でも、皆さんの事務仕事を見てきましたから。
頑張ればわたしにも出来るはずです……！

engChrName: Whew... It rained on me a little, so I hopped in for a quick shower.
engSearchText:
Whew... It rained on me a little, so I hopped in for a
quick shower.
jpnChrName: ふうっ、少し降られてしまったので 手早くシャワー頂いちゃいましたっ！
jpnSearchText:
ふうっ、少し降られてしまったので
手早くシャワー頂いちゃいましたっ！

engChrName: I'm feeling way better now that I'm warmed up!
engSearchText: I'm feeling way better now that I'm warmed up!
jpnChrName: やっぱり温まるとスッキリしますね！
jpnSearchText: やっぱり温まるとスッキリしますね！

engChrName: ...Hold up. Fast? Shower?
engSearchText: ...Hold up. Fast? Shower?
jpnChrName: ……ちょいと待ちな。 シャワーで済ませただと？
jpnSearchText:
……ちょいと待ちな。
シャワーで済ませただと？

engChrName: Ferida, you're killin' me here. Quickies don't cut it for bathing. You gotta savor it, let it warm you up all the way through!
engSearchText:
Ferida, you're killin' me here. Quickies don't cut it
for bathing. You gotta savor it, let it warm you up all
the way through!
jpnChrName: いいかフェリーダ、肩まで浸かる事で 初めて身体を芯から温める事がだな──
jpnSearchText:
いいかフェリーダ、肩まで浸かる事で
初めて身体を芯から温める事がだな──

engChrName: If you ain't got the time, then make some! Ideally at a bathhouse, but failing that, anything but an in-and-out.
engSearchText:
If you ain't got the time, then make some! Ideally at a
bathhouse, but failing that, anything but
an in-and-out.
jpnChrName: そこは横着せずに公衆浴場に通うべきだろ！
jpnSearchText: そこは横着せずに公衆浴場に通うべきだろ！

engChrName: (Oh, right... Van gets really picky when it comes to baths.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, right... Van gets really picky when it comes
to baths.)
jpnChrName: （そうでした……ヴァンさんは   お風呂にこだわりがあるんでしたね。）
jpnSearchText:
（そうでした……ヴァンさんは
お風呂にこだわりがあるんでしたね。）

engChrName: What's done is done, but make time for proper baths going forward, got it?
engSearchText:
What's done is done, but make time for proper baths
going forward, got it?
jpnChrName: ──っつう訳だが、今日の所は仕方ねえ。 次からはちゃんと身体を温めるようにな！
jpnSearchText:
──っつう訳だが、今日の所は仕方ねえ。
次からはちゃんと身体を温めるようにな！

engChrName: Y-Yes, sir!
engSearchText: Y-Yes, sir!
jpnChrName: は、はいっ！
jpnSearchText: は、はいっ！

engChrName: After this, I've got homework to do for tomorrow...
engSearchText: After this, I've got homework to do for tomorrow...
jpnChrName: この後は明日の宿題を片付けないといけませんね。
jpnSearchText: この後は明日の宿題を片付けないといけませんね。

engChrName: Agnès is busy today, so I have to figure this out myself.
engSearchText:
Agnès is busy today, so I have to figure this
out myself.
jpnChrName: 今日はもうアニエスさんに教えてもらえませんし 自力で頑張らないといけません。
jpnSearchText:
今日はもうアニエスさんに教えてもらえませんし
自力で頑張らないといけません。

engChrName: Hmm... I wonder if Aaron's good at this kinda thing?
engSearchText: Hmm... I wonder if Aaron's good at this kinda thing?
jpnChrName: ……そういえばアーロンさんって 勉強の方はどうなんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……そういえばアーロンさんって
勉強の方はどうなんでしょうか？

engChrName: Beats me. Why not ask him yourself?
engSearchText: Beats me. Why not ask him yourself?
jpnChrName: さてな……本人に聞いてみたらどうだ？
jpnSearchText: さてな……本人に聞いてみたらどうだ？

engChrName: Good idea! Maybe he's really smart!
engSearchText: Good idea! Maybe he's really smart!
jpnChrName: そうですね！ 見かけによらないかもしれませんし！
jpnSearchText:
そうですね！
見かけによらないかもしれませんし！

engChrName: (Pfft. I know she ain't TRYING to diss him, but...)
engSearchText: (Pfft. I know she ain't TRYING to diss him, but...)
jpnChrName: （これで悪気はねえんだよな……）
jpnSearchText: （これで悪気はねえんだよな……）

engChrName: I wanna try finishing it all by myself first!
engSearchText: I wanna try finishing it all by myself first!
jpnChrName: まずは自力で宿題を頑張りたいと思います！
jpnSearchText: まずは自力で宿題を頑張りたいと思います！

engChrName: *yaaawn* Oh, geez. I have to stay awake.
engSearchText: *yaaawn* Oh, geez. I have to stay awake.
jpnChrName: うっかり寝ちゃわないように 気を付けないと……っ！
jpnSearchText:
うっかり寝ちゃわないように
気を付けないと……っ！

engChrName: I've been in the city for three whole weeks, now. I can handle errands just fine!
engSearchText:
I've been in the city for three whole weeks, now. I can
handle errands just fine!
jpnChrName: 首都に来てもう３週間── お使いくらいお手の物です！
jpnSearchText:
首都に来てもう３週間──
お使いくらいお手の物です！

engChrName: Right, so there are three brands here... The one I need is...
engSearchText:
Right, so there are three brands here... The one I
need is...
jpnChrName: ええと、３種のコーヒー豆…… 銘柄はと……
jpnSearchText:
ええと、３種のコーヒー豆……
銘柄はと……

engChrName: I-I'm fine! I made sure to write it all down!
engSearchText: I-I'm fine! I made sure to write it all down!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫です！ バッチリメモを取りましたから！
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫です！
バッチリメモを取りましたから！

engChrName: Oh, hi! Welcome to my room.
engSearchText: Oh, hi! Welcome to my room.
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさん！ えへへ、わたしの部屋にようこそです！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンさん！
えへへ、わたしの部屋にようこそです！

engChrName: Yo. Haven't been in here since I helped you carry your stuff in.
engSearchText:
Yo. Haven't been in here since I helped you carry
your stuff in.
jpnChrName: ああ、荷物の運び入れを手伝って以来か。
jpnSearchText: ああ、荷物の運び入れを手伝って以来か。

engChrName: Looks like you've settled in nicely.
engSearchText: Looks like you've settled in nicely.
jpnChrName: へえ、大分整ってきたみたいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: へえ、大分整ってきたみたいじゃねえか。

engChrName: Yeah, thanks to everyone helping me buy my groceries.
engSearchText:
Yeah, thanks to everyone helping me buy
my groceries.
jpnChrName: 生活用品の買い出しを手伝ってもらった おかげでもありますけど。
jpnSearchText:
生活用品の買い出しを手伝ってもらった
おかげでもありますけど。

engChrName: And the guys at Montmart were really kind. They let me borrow a bunch of their old furniture and stuff!
engSearchText:
And the guys at Montmart were really kind. They let
me borrow a bunch of their old furniture and stuff!
jpnChrName: モンマルトの方々が古い家具を 貸してくれたおかげで充実してきましたっ！
jpnSearchText:
モンマルトの方々が古い家具を
貸してくれたおかげで充実してきましたっ！

engChrName: Wow. Ain't that nice?
engSearchText: Wow. Ain't that nice?
jpnChrName: ハッ、そいつは良かった。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そいつは良かった。

engChrName: Just lemme know if there's anything I can get'cha, or if you need help with whatever.
engSearchText:
Just lemme know if there's anything I can get'cha, or
if you need help with whatever.
jpnChrName: こっちでの生活も慣れて来ただろうが、 困ったら誰かに相談しろよ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちでの生活も慣れて来ただろうが、
困ったら誰かに相談しろよ。

engChrName: Uh-huh! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Uh-huh! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: はい、ありがとうございますっ！
jpnSearchText: はい、ありがとうございますっ！

engChrName: I still get a little homesick every now and then, but I'm having so much fun here!
engSearchText:
I still get a little homesick every now and then, but
I'm having so much fun here!
jpnChrName: ちょっぴり里が恋しくなる時もありますけど、 毎日が新鮮で、とっても楽しいですよ！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっぴり里が恋しくなる時もありますけど、
毎日が新鮮で、とっても楽しいですよ！

engChrName: I'll have so much to tell everyone when I get back home. I wanna really rock their socks off!
engSearchText:
I'll have so much to tell everyone when I get
back home. I wanna really rock their socks off!
jpnChrName: この機会に沢山勉強して、帰った時に 家族や里の皆を驚かせちゃいますからっ！
jpnSearchText:
この機会に沢山勉強して、帰った時に
家族や里の皆を驚かせちゃいますからっ！

engChrName: Ahh... Nothing beats kicking back and binging with the boys. But the thought of work is killing my buzz...
engSearchText:
Ahh... Nothing beats kicking back and binging with
the boys. But the thought of work is killing my buzz...
jpnChrName: あー、ダチと食って遊んで最高だな。 仕事に戻るのが怠くなっちまいそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
あー、ダチと食って遊んで最高だな。
仕事に戻るのが怠くなっちまいそうだ。

engChrName: Well, at the very least, doing the rounds lets me suss out a new watering hole or two.
engSearchText:
Well, at the very least, doing the rounds lets me suss
out a new watering hole or two.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、街を回って次の遊び場を チェックしとくのも必要か。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、街を回って次の遊び場を
チェックしとくのも必要か。

engChrName: So I guess, just lemme know when you need me to do my sweep.
engSearchText:
So I guess, just lemme know when you need me to do
my sweep.
jpnChrName: ま、巡回で俺様が必要な時は呼んでくれや。
jpnSearchText: ま、巡回で俺様が必要な時は呼んでくれや。

engChrName: Still drinking?
engSearchText: Still drinking?
jpnChrName: なんだ、まだ残って飲んでたのか。
jpnSearchText: なんだ、まだ残って飲んでたのか。

engChrName: Hell yeah, I am. We've still got some of the booze from that Heiyue stash to work through.
engSearchText:
Hell yeah, I am. We've still got some of the booze
from that Heiyue stash to work through.
jpnChrName: ああ、アシェンが手土産に持って来た 黒月お抱えの蔵の酒がまだ残ってたんでな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アシェンが手土産に持って来た
黒月お抱えの蔵の酒がまだ残ってたんでな。

engChrName: And I think there's still some of that meat left from the party we had with the prince. That should still be plenty tasty leftover.
engSearchText:
And I think there's still some of that meat left from
the party we had with the prince. That should still be
plenty tasty leftover.
jpnChrName: エルザイムの公太子が持って来た 高級な肉もまだ残ってるらしいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムの公太子が持って来た
高級な肉もまだ残ってるらしいぜ？

engChrName: Huh. Nice... Man, that party really was somethin' else, thinkin' back on it.
engSearchText:
Huh. Nice... Man, that party really was somethin'
else, thinkin' back on it.
jpnChrName: そうか……つうか、改めて聞いても とんでもねえ打ち上げだったな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……つうか、改めて聞いても
とんでもねえ打ち上げだったな。

engChrName: Tell me about it. Just a ragtag band of misfits having the time of their lives together.
engSearchText:
Tell me about it. Just a ragtag band of misfits having
the time of their lives together.
jpnChrName: クク、どいつもこいつも 噛み合わねえ連中ばっかだったしな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、どいつもこいつも
噛み合わねえ連中ばっかだったしな。

engChrName: But y'know, I don't mind parties like that. Me and the boys back in Langport, we lived to party and partied to live. Good times, those were.
engSearchText:
But y'know, I don't mind parties like that. Me and
the boys back in Langport, we lived to party and
partied to live. Good times, those were.
jpnChrName: だが、どんちゃん騒ぎをすんのは嫌いじゃねえ。 煌都でも仲間内でよくやってたしな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、どんちゃん騒ぎをすんのは嫌いじゃねえ。
煌都でも仲間内でよくやってたしな。

engChrName: What do you say? Wanna round up some folks for round two? C'mon, you've still got some youth left in you, right?
engSearchText:
What do you say? Wanna round up some folks for
round two? C'mon, you've still got some youth left in
you, right?
jpnChrName: ……そうだ、二次会でもおっぱじめるか？ 声をかけりゃそれなりに集まるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
……そうだ、二次会でもおっぱじめるか？
声をかけりゃそれなりに集まるだろ。

engChrName: Yeah, no. I get'cha, but it ain't happenin'.
engSearchText: Yeah, no. I get'cha, but it ain't happenin'.
jpnChrName: やらねえよ！ 気持ちは分からなくもねえがな。
jpnSearchText:
やらねえよ！
気持ちは分からなくもねえがな。

engChrName: Well, fine, killjoy, have it your way. I'll just drink by my lonesome.
engSearchText:
Well, fine, killjoy, have it your way. I'll just drink by
my lonesome.
jpnChrName: チッ、仕方ねえ。 一人で飲み直すとするか。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、仕方ねえ。
一人で飲み直すとするか。

engChrName: ...But do I have to, though? I've got a lucky lady or two on the mind... Maybe I'll hit up my favorite joint.
engSearchText:
...But do I have to, though? I've got a lucky lady or
two on the mind... Maybe I'll hit up my favorite joint.
jpnChrName: ……いや折角だしな。 オキニの店の連中でも呼んでみるか？
jpnSearchText:
……いや折角だしな。
オキニの店の連中でも呼んでみるか？

engChrName: Well, whoever you bring over, you better not cause any trouble together, got it?
engSearchText:
Well, whoever you bring over, you better not cause
any trouble together, got it?
jpnChrName: 誰を呼ぶつもりか知らねえが 店に迷惑かけるんじゃねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
誰を呼ぶつもりか知らねえが
店に迷惑かけるんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: Who died and made you my grandpa?
engSearchText: Who died and made you my grandpa?
jpnChrName: ったく……妙な気を遣いやがってウゼエんだよ。
jpnSearchText: ったく……妙な気を遣いやがってウゼエんだよ。

engChrName: Go read the kids a bedtime story or something.
engSearchText: Go read the kids a bedtime story or something.
jpnChrName: オレよりもお子ちゃま共の所に 行ってやったらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
オレよりもお子ちゃま共の所に
行ってやったらどうだ？

engChrName: Just lemme do my thing, yeah? Got some booty calls I wanna make.
engSearchText:
Just lemme do my thing, yeah? Got some booty calls I
wanna make.
jpnChrName: 長引きそうならそれで構わないぜ。 オキニのトコにしけ込んで来るからよ。
jpnSearchText:
長引きそうならそれで構わないぜ。
オキニのトコにしけ込んで来るからよ。

engChrName: I hit up some of my newer contacts to try and get a lead...
engSearchText:
I hit up some of my newer contacts to try and get
a lead...
jpnChrName: 首都に来てから出来たツテに 連絡をとってる所だ。
jpnSearchText:
首都に来てから出来たツテに
連絡をとってる所だ。

engChrName: ...but everywhere's kind of a mess right now. There's nothing concrete tipping us off to A's next move.
engSearchText:
...but everywhere's kind of a mess right now.
There's nothing concrete tipping us off to A's
next move.
jpnChrName: どこも混乱してるみてえだが 今の所《Ａ》に繋がりそうな情報はねえな。
jpnSearchText:
どこも混乱してるみてえだが
今の所《Ａ》に繋がりそうな情報はねえな。

engChrName: I dunno what they're planning next, but no way in Gehenna I'm letting them do it.
engSearchText:
I dunno what they're planning next, but no way in
Gehenna I'm letting them do it.
jpnChrName: チッ……次に何を企んでやがるか知らねえが これ以上好きにさせてたまるかよ……！
jpnSearchText:
チッ……次に何を企んでやがるか知らねえが
これ以上好きにさせてたまるかよ……！

engChrName: I was dicking around with nothing to do when Paulette asked me to run an errand for her.
engSearchText:
I was dicking around with nothing to do when
Paulette asked me to run an errand for her.
jpnChrName: ヒマしてたらポーレットの奴に 買い出しを頼まれちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
ヒマしてたらポーレットの奴に
買い出しを頼まれちまってな。

engChrName: Didn't feel like it, but eh, there was something I wanted to grab, too. And it makes me look good, I guess.
engSearchText:
Didn't feel like it, but eh, there was something I
wanted to grab, too. And it makes me look good,
I guess.
jpnChrName: ま、ついでに見繕いたい物もあったし ブラつきに来たワケだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ついでに見繕いたい物もあったし
ブラつきに来たワケだ。

engChrName: Y'know, this place has a pretty good lineup. Color me impressed.
engSearchText:
Y'know, this place has a pretty good lineup. Color
me impressed.
jpnChrName: しかしこの店、 意外と品揃えのセンスがいいんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
しかしこの店、
意外と品揃えのセンスがいいんだよな。

engChrName: Maybe I'll pick up a little something for Syd now that he's better.
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll pick up a little something for Syd now that
he's better.
jpnChrName: シドの快気祝い用にも 何か買っていってやるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
シドの快気祝い用にも
何か買っていってやるとするか。

engChrName: Guy said he was gonna drop by for the festival.
engSearchText: Guy said he was gonna drop by for the festival.
jpnChrName: シドのやつ、記念祭をやる頃には 首都に顔を出すとか言ってたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
シドのやつ、記念祭をやる頃には
首都に顔を出すとか言ってたぜ。

engChrName: Heh, he brings the rest of those jackoffs along and this place'll get real noisy, real fast.
engSearchText:
Heh, he brings the rest of those jackoffs along and
this place'll get real noisy, real fast.
jpnChrName: ハッ、他の連中も付いて来ちまったら 随分煩くなりそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、他の連中も付いて来ちまったら
随分煩くなりそうだな。

engChrName: Can you get grandpa over there to nix the daggers? Man's gonna give himself a stroke at this rate.
engSearchText:
Can you get grandpa over there to nix the daggers?
Man's gonna give himself a stroke at this rate.
jpnChrName: 冗談抜きで殺気を放ちやがるとは。 どんだけ子煩悩なんだよ……
jpnSearchText:
冗談抜きで殺気を放ちやがるとは。
どんだけ子煩悩なんだよ……

engChrName: I figure we can talk some more once he's out of earshot.
engSearchText:
I figure we can talk some more once he's out
of earshot.
jpnChrName: 話の続きはあのオヤジがいない時にしとくか。
jpnSearchText: 話の続きはあのオヤジがいない時にしとくか。

engChrName: Huh. Credit where it's due—you're actually pretty tidy in here.
engSearchText:
Huh. Credit where it's due—you're actually pretty
tidy in here.
jpnChrName: 部屋の方は片付いたみてえだな。 意外とすっきりしてるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
部屋の方は片付いたみてえだな。
意外とすっきりしてるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Chicks dig a clean room. I got me my basic supplies, and that's all I need.
engSearchText:
Chicks dig a clean room. I got me my basic supplies,
and that's all I need.
jpnChrName: 部屋がだらしねえ男はモテねえからな。 最低限の物だけで十分だろ。
jpnSearchText:
部屋がだらしねえ男はモテねえからな。
最低限の物だけで十分だろ。

engChrName: ...Couldn't be bothered to open the rest of my boxes, though. Nothing in them, really.
engSearchText:
...Couldn't be bothered to open the rest of my
boxes, though. Nothing in them, really.
jpnChrName: ……ま、途中で面倒になって 段ボールから荷物を開けてねえってのもあるが。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、途中で面倒になって
段ボールから荷物を開けてねえってのもあるが。

engChrName: Uh-huh...
engSearchText: Uh-huh...
jpnChrName: オイ……
jpnSearchText: オイ……

engChrName: Well, you do you. It's your room. All I ask is you keep it clean.
engSearchText:
Well, you do you. It's your room. All I ask is you
keep it clean.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、お前さんの部屋なんだ。 汚さねえ限り好きにすりゃあいいさ。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、お前さんの部屋なんだ。
汚さねえ限り好きにすりゃあいいさ。

engChrName: Works for me.
engSearchText: Works for me.
jpnChrName: おう。
jpnSearchText: おう。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Told a friend of mine back in Langport that I was gonna call him.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Told a friend of mine back in Langport
that I was gonna call him.
jpnChrName: っと……そういやこの後、 煌都のダチと通話する約束をしてたんだっけな。
jpnSearchText:
っと……そういやこの後、
煌都のダチと通話する約束をしてたんだっけな。

engChrName: Still got the beer and munchies in the fridge? Heh, don't mind if I do.
engSearchText:
Still got the beer and munchies in the fridge?
Heh, don't mind if I do.
jpnChrName: 後で冷蔵庫から酒とツマミでも 持って来るとするか。
jpnSearchText:
後で冷蔵庫から酒とツマミでも
持って来るとするか。

engChrName: Man, didn't you only just turn twenty? You drink way too much like a regular.
engSearchText:
Man, didn't you only just turn twenty? You drink way
too much like a regular.
jpnChrName: ったく、この前成人したばっかだっつーのに しょっちゅう飲みやがって。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、この前成人したばっかだっつーのに
しょっちゅう飲みやがって。

engChrName: Bet you could get the old man to throw a little party for you.
engSearchText:
Bet you could get the old man to throw a little party
for you.
jpnChrName: むしろおやっさんに言えば 料理も豪華なモンを出してくれるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
むしろおやっさんに言えば
料理も豪華なモンを出してくれるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Nah. I shot the shit over the net with my buddies back home. That was a good time.
engSearchText:
Nah. I shot the shit over the net with my buddies
back home. That was a good time.
jpnChrName: 煌都のダチから通信で祝ってもらったし そういうのは間に合ってるが……
jpnSearchText:
煌都のダチから通信で祝ってもらったし
そういうのは間に合ってるが……

engChrName: Food here's pretty good, though. Maybe I'll bug the old man for a dinner.
engSearchText:
Food here's pretty good, though. Maybe I'll bug the
old man for a dinner.
jpnChrName: ま、あそこの料理は悪くねえし 興味はあるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あそこの料理は悪くねえし
興味はあるかもな。

engChrName: Nice that I get the corner. I can be as loud as I want without bugging the neighbors.
engSearchText:
Nice that I get the corner. I can be as loud as I want
without bugging the neighbors.
jpnChrName: 角部屋だと煩くしても 気を遣わなくて済むからいいよな。
jpnSearchText:
角部屋だと煩くしても
気を遣わなくて済むからいいよな。

engChrName: Think I'll help myself to the beer and snacks in the fridge later.
engSearchText:
Think I'll help myself to the beer and snacks in the
fridge later.
jpnChrName: どれ、後で冷蔵庫から 酒とツマミでも持って来るとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
どれ、後で冷蔵庫から
酒とツマミでも持って来るとすっか。

engChrName: Just keep yourself in check, yeah?
engSearchText: Just keep yourself in check, yeah?
jpnChrName: だからってあんまり騒ぐんじゃねえぞ。
jpnSearchText: だからってあんまり騒ぐんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: You got a lot of guts slackin' off on the clock, bud.
engSearchText: You got a lot of guts slackin' off on the clock, bud.
jpnChrName: オイ……働いてるフリすらしねえとは いい度胸じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
オイ……働いてるフリすらしねえとは
いい度胸じゃねえか。

engChrName: Oh, get off my back. I'll be done with my work by the time you get back.
engSearchText:
Oh, get off my back. I'll be done with my work by the
time you get back.
jpnChrName: ハッ、アンタが帰ってくるまでには やる事はやっとくから安心しとけ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、アンタが帰ってくるまでには
やる事はやっとくから安心しとけ。

engChrName: Oh, right. Almost forgot.
engSearchText: Oh, right. Almost forgot.
jpnChrName: おっと……そういや言っとかねえとな。
jpnSearchText: おっと……そういや言っとかねえとな。

engChrName: I hit twenty the other day, so don't toss that booze in the fridge, all right? I'll help myself.
engSearchText:
I hit twenty the other day, so don't toss that booze in
the fridge, all right? I'll help myself.
jpnChrName: この前二十歳になったからよ。 冷蔵庫にある酒は捨てんじゃねーぞ？
jpnSearchText:
この前二十歳になったからよ。
冷蔵庫にある酒は捨てんじゃねーぞ？

engChrName: Well, works for me. You're an adult.
engSearchText: Well, works for me. You're an adult.
jpnChrName: ああ、そういやそうだったか。 ま、成人したってんなら文句はねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そういやそうだったか。
ま、成人したってんなら文句はねえよ。

engChrName: Maybe you could ask the old man to throw a little somethin' for you.
engSearchText:
Maybe you could ask the old man to throw a little
somethin' for you.
jpnChrName: それなら、おやっさんに言えば 料理も豪華なモンを出してくれるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
それなら、おやっさんに言えば
料理も豪華なモンを出してくれるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Nah. I shot the shit over the net with my buddies back home. That was a good time.
engSearchText:
Nah. I shot the shit over the net with my buddies
back home. That was a good time.
jpnChrName: 煌都のダチから通信で祝ってもらったし そういうのは間に合ってるが……
jpnSearchText:
煌都のダチから通信で祝ってもらったし
そういうのは間に合ってるが……

engChrName: Food here's pretty good, though. Maybe I'll bug the old man for a dinner.
engSearchText:
Food here's pretty good, though. Maybe I'll bug the
old man for a dinner.
jpnChrName: ま、あそこの料理は悪くねえし 興味はあるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あそこの料理は悪くねえし
興味はあるかもな。

engChrName: I know how to budget my time. I'll have this stuff done by EOD, promise.
engSearchText:
I know how to budget my time. I'll have this stuff
done by EOD, promise.
jpnChrName: もう少し遊んだら 仕事もしてやっから安心しとけ。
jpnSearchText:
もう少し遊んだら
仕事もしてやっから安心しとけ。

engChrName: Oh, that reminds me—those cans I put in the fridge should be cold by now...
engSearchText:
Oh, that reminds me—those cans I put in the fridge
should be cold by now...
jpnChrName: さて……冷蔵庫の酒はそろそろ冷えた頃か？
jpnSearchText: さて……冷蔵庫の酒はそろそろ冷えた頃か？

engChrName: Save it for when you're off the clock! Can't work for shit when you're drunk.
engSearchText:
Save it for when you're off the clock! Can't work for
shit when you're drunk.
jpnChrName: 昼間っから飲むんじゃねえぞ。 つうか今は仕事中だろうが！
jpnSearchText:
昼間っから飲むんじゃねえぞ。
つうか今は仕事中だろうが！

engChrName: Fine, fine, geez.
engSearchText: Fine, fine, geez.
jpnChrName: へいへい、分かってるっつの。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、分かってるっつの。

engChrName: The air at the meeting is quite amicable, as far as I can tell.
engSearchText:
The air at the meeting is quite amicable, as far as I
can tell.
jpnChrName: 様子を見るに、あの会合では 和やかな交流が行われているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
様子を見るに、あの会合では
和やかな交流が行われているようですね。

engChrName: The attendants, however, are rather adept at putting on appearances, so I suppose I shouldn't jump to any conclusions.
engSearchText:
The attendants, however, are rather adept
at putting on appearances, so I suppose I
shouldn't jump to any conclusions.
jpnChrName: ですが、あの方々ならば どうとでも見せかける事が出来るでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、あの方々ならば
どうとでも見せかける事が出来るでしょう。

engChrName: I will be keeping tabs on the situation until you require my assistance.
engSearchText:
I will be keeping tabs on the situation until you
require my assistance.
jpnChrName: 交替するまでの間、 もう少し様子を探らせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
交替するまでの間、
もう少し様子を探らせて頂きます。

engChrName: The office is bound to face heavy traffic on the day of the festival.
engSearchText:
The office is bound to face heavy traffic on the day of
the festival.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭の当日は、 役所も慌ただしくなる事でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭の当日は、
役所も慌ただしくなる事でしょう。

engChrName: As such, I plan to organize our submission documents and perform other clerical work in advance.
engSearchText:
As such, I plan to organize our submission documents
and perform other clerical work in advance.
jpnChrName: ですので、今の内に先々の書類整理と 提出書類の整理を行っておこうかと。
jpnSearchText:
ですので、今の内に先々の書類整理と
提出書類の整理を行っておこうかと。

engChrName: Feel free to entrust me with this work and devote your attention elsewhere.
engSearchText:
Feel free to entrust me with this work and devote
your attention elsewhere.
jpnChrName: こちらの事はわたくしに任せて、 お気をつけて行ってらっしゃいませ。
jpnSearchText:
こちらの事はわたくしに任せて、
お気をつけて行ってらっしゃいませ。

engChrName: I don't believe I've ever divulged how I spend my savings, in retrospect.
engSearchText:
I don't believe I've ever divulged how I spend my
savings, in retrospect.
jpnChrName: ふふ、わたくしの貯金の用途を 誰かにお話したのはこれが初めてです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、わたくしの貯金の用途を
誰かにお話したのはこれが初めてです。

engChrName: I'm not sure what my job responsibilities will entail after next month's maintenance...
engSearchText:
I'm not sure what my job responsibilities will entail
after next month's maintenance...
jpnChrName: 来月以降のメンテナンス後の業務体系が どのような形になるかは分かりませんが……
jpnSearchText:
来月以降のメンテナンス後の業務体系が
どのような形になるかは分かりませんが……

engChrName: ...but I believe I'll continue to explore my transfer options. They do seem quite attractive.
engSearchText:
...but I believe I'll continue to explore my
transfer options. They do seem quite attractive.
jpnChrName: 現在の出向形態を継続できるのなら 魅力的な選択肢だと考えています。
jpnSearchText:
現在の出向形態を継続できるのなら
魅力的な選択肢だと考えています。

engChrName: Marduk is continuing their efforts to decipher A's next move.
engSearchText:
Marduk is continuing their efforts to decipher A's
next move.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社の方でも《Ａ》の今後の動向に関する 分析を続けていますが……
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社の方でも《Ａ》の今後の動向に関する
分析を続けていますが……

engChrName: The company is also investigating Ikaruga, albeit with little success.
engSearchText:
The company is also investigating Ikaruga, albeit
with little success.
jpnChrName: 《斑鳩》に動きがあったという件に関しては 動向不明──分析が追い付いていないようですね。
jpnSearchText:
《斑鳩》に動きがあったという件に関しては
動向不明──分析が追い付いていないようですね。

engChrName: The situation does unnerve me...but I will continue to investigate to the best of my ability.
engSearchText:
The situation does unnerve me...but I will continue to
investigate to the best of my ability.
jpnChrName: 不穏なものを感じます…… 他の勢力の調査も行ってみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
不穏なものを感じます……
他の勢力の調査も行ってみましょう。

engChrName: I freed up some of my time, so I thought I might help clean the kitchen.
engSearchText:
I freed up some of my time, so I thought I might help
clean the kitchen.
jpnChrName: 解析の合間に手が空いていたので 厨房の片付けの手伝いに来ていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
解析の合間に手が空いていたので
厨房の片付けの手伝いに来ていたのですが……

engChrName: Were you discussing something with Montmart's staff?
engSearchText:
Were you discussing something with
Montmart's staff?
jpnChrName: 何やらモンマルトの方々と 相談事をされていたようですね？
jpnSearchText:
何やらモンマルトの方々と
相談事をされていたようですね？

engChrName: Yeah. Nothing bad, though. I plan on tellin' everyone tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Nothing bad, though. I plan on tellin'
everyone tomorrow.
jpnChrName: まあな、別にやましい事じゃねえし、 明日にでも全員に話すつもりだが。
jpnSearchText:
まあな、別にやましい事じゃねえし、
明日にでも全員に話すつもりだが。

engChrName: Well, I look forward to hearing the details, then.
engSearchText: Well, I look forward to hearing the details, then.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでは詳しいお話は 明日の楽しみにさせて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それでは詳しいお話は
明日の楽しみにさせて頂きましょう。

engChrName: I must say, these utensils and cutlery are very well kept. Montmart keeps itself wonderfully clean.
engSearchText:
I must say, these utensils and cutlery are very
well kept. Montmart keeps itself wonderfully clean.
jpnChrName: モンマルトの道具はどれも こまめな手入れが行き届いているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
モンマルトの道具はどれも
こまめな手入れが行き届いているようですね。

engChrName: I will need to help maintain that spotless reputation. Heehee.
engSearchText:
I will need to help maintain that spotless reputation.
Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふ、水垢を残さないよう わたくしも綺麗に磨かせて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、水垢を残さないよう
わたくしも綺麗に磨かせて頂きましょう。

engChrName: I've finished filing the new documents, so I took the liberty of refactoring your computer in my spare time.
engSearchText:
I've finished filing the new documents, so I took the
liberty of refactoring your computer in my spare time.
jpnChrName: 書類整理が一段落しましたので、 事務所の端末の最適化を行っていました。
jpnSearchText:
書類整理が一段落しましたので、
事務所の端末の最適化を行っていました。

engChrName: The Kitty Engine was updated as well—I've installed the new revision for you.
engSearchText:
The Kitty Engine was updated as well—I've installed
the new revision for you.
jpnChrName: 例の『キティエンジン』がアップデートされて いましたので、そちらもインストール済みですよ。
jpnSearchText:
例の『キティエンジン』がアップデートされて
いましたので、そちらもインストール済みですよ。

engChrName: The Kitty Engine...? I've never heard of that. What exactly is it?
engSearchText:
The Kitty Engine...? I've never heard of that.
What exactly is it?
jpnChrName: キティエンジン……？ 初めて聞くけど、それってどういう……
jpnSearchText:
キティエンジン……？
初めて聞くけど、それってどういう……

engChrName: It is an independent search engine that allows access to the Dark Web in a safe and controlled environment.
engSearchText:
It is an independent search engine that allows access
to the Dark Web in a safe and
controlled environment.
jpnChrName: ええ、ダークウェブに安全に アクセスできる独自の検索エンジンですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ダークウェブに安全に
アクセスできる独自の検索エンジンですね。

engChrName: Its creator remains unknown—though with its name comes speculation that it was created by the infamous black-hat hacker, Kitty.
engSearchText:
Its creator remains unknown—though with its name
comes speculation that it was created by the infamous
black-hat hacker, Kitty.
jpnChrName: 製作者は不明ですが、噂では スーパーハッカーの《仔猫》という話も……
jpnSearchText:
製作者は不明ですが、噂では
スーパーハッカーの《仔猫》という話も……

engChrName: Does sound fishy, but I've used it a fair bit, and it works just as advertised.
engSearchText:
Does sound fishy, but I've used it a fair bit, and it
works just as advertised.
jpnChrName: ま、怪しげに聞こえるかもしれんが 看板に偽りねえ性能だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、怪しげに聞こえるかもしれんが
看板に偽りねえ性能だぜ。

engChrName: Actually, I've used it before, too. Renne recommended it to me, if I recall.
engSearchText:
Actually, I've used it before, too.
Renne recommended it to me, if I recall.
jpnChrName: そういえば私もお世話になりましたね。 確かレン先輩に勧められて……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば私もお世話になりましたね。
確かレン先輩に勧められて……

engChrName: ...Huh. That would make a lot of sense, actually.
engSearchText: ...Huh. That would make a lot of sense, actually.
jpnChrName: それって……ふう、 色々な意味で納得がいったかも。
jpnSearchText:
それって……ふう、
色々な意味で納得がいったかも。

engChrName: Maybe I should give it a look later. Learning how to use that would be a valuable skill.
engSearchText:
Maybe I should give it a look later. Learning how
to use that would be a valuable skill.
jpnChrName: まあようは使いようみたいだし、 後で僕も触ってみようかな？
jpnSearchText:
まあようは使いようみたいだし、
後で僕も触ってみようかな？

engChrName: Rumors allege that Kitty was also involved in the creation of the social media aggregator that we use.
engSearchText:
Rumors allege that Kitty was also involved in the
creation of the social media aggregator that we use.
jpnChrName: キティエンジンの他にも 例の“まとめサイト”も有用ですね。
jpnSearchText:
キティエンジンの他にも
例の“まとめサイト”も有用ですね。

engChrName: It's proven quite useful, potential origins notwithstanding.
engSearchText:
It's proven quite useful, potential
origins notwithstanding.
jpnChrName: こちらも《仔猫》が関わっているという 噂もありますが……
jpnSearchText:
こちらも《仔猫》が関わっているという
噂もありますが……

engChrName: As always, I will collect and forward any relevant information I find.
engSearchText:
As always, I will collect and forward any relevant
information I find.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ともかく耳よりな情報があれば 後でまとめてお伝えしますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ともかく耳よりな情報があれば
後でまとめてお伝えしますね。

engChrName: Is it just me, or did you bring back some more plants?
engSearchText: Is it just me, or did you bring back some more plants?
jpnChrName: おっ、いつの間にか 部屋に植物が増えてやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、いつの間にか
部屋に植物が増えてやがるな。

engChrName: Indeed I did. I was perusing the flower shop in Old Town and happened upon some wonderful plants.
engSearchText:
Indeed I did. I was perusing the flower shop in Old
Town and happened upon some wonderful plants.
jpnChrName: ええ、旧市街の花屋を見ていたら 素敵な植物が見つかりまして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、旧市街の花屋を見ていたら
素敵な植物が見つかりまして。

engChrName: Are you off to patrol the city?
engSearchText: Are you off to patrol the city?
jpnChrName: ヴァン様はこれから街の巡回ですか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン様はこれから街の巡回ですか？

engChrName: Do let me know if you need my assistance—I would be happy to help.
engSearchText:
Do let me know if you need my assistance—I would
be happy to help.
jpnChrName: 必要とあらば連絡をくださいね。 駆け付けられるよう備えてありますので。
jpnSearchText:
必要とあらば連絡をくださいね。
駆け付けられるよう備えてありますので。

engChrName: Thanks, but it ain't that big a deal, really.
engSearchText: Thanks, but it ain't that big a deal, really.
jpnChrName: 気遣いはありがてえが、 そこまで気を張らなくてもいいぞ。
jpnSearchText:
気遣いはありがてえが、
そこまで気を張らなくてもいいぞ。

engChrName: More like a late night walk than a patrol.
engSearchText: More like a late night walk than a patrol.
jpnChrName: ただの夜の散歩みてえなモンだしな。
jpnSearchText: ただの夜の散歩みてえなモンだしな。

engChrName: We got plenty to do tomorrow, so we'd best take it easy and rest up tonight.
engSearchText:
We got plenty to do tomorrow, so we'd best take it
easy and rest up tonight.
jpnChrName: 明日も朝からバリバリ働いてもらうし 夜くらいは休んどけ。
jpnSearchText:
明日も朝からバリバリ働いてもらうし
夜くらいは休んどけ。

engChrName: Understood.
engSearchText: Understood.
jpnChrName: ふふ、承知しました。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、承知しました。

engChrName: Perhaps I can do some reconnaissance preceding our trip to Basel, then.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I can do some reconnaissance preceding our
trip to Basel, then.
jpnChrName: それでは来週のバーゼル行きに備えて 情報収集をさせて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それでは来週のバーゼル行きに備えて
情報収集をさせて頂きましょう。

engChrName: Professional obligations notwithstanding, I do look forward to the trip.
engSearchText:
Professional obligations notwithstanding, I do look
forward to the trip.
jpnChrName: 仕事を抜きにしても、 楽しみにさせて頂いていますから。
jpnSearchText:
仕事を抜きにしても、
楽しみにさせて頂いていますから。

engChrName: Basel offers quite the array of scenery and architecture.
engSearchText:
Basel offers quite the array of scenery
and architecture.
jpnChrName: バーゼルは街の景観だけでも 見応えがあるようですね。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルは街の景観だけでも
見応えがあるようですね。

engChrName: It's not often I have the privilege of traveling both for business and for pleasure... Heehee.
engSearchText:
It's not often I have the privilege of traveling both for
business and for pleasure... Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふ、依頼の件もふまえつつ 楽しみにさせて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、依頼の件もふまえつつ
楽しみにさせて頂きましょう。

engChrName: The East's desertification is always a pretty heavy discussion topic, but everyone seems rather casual about it right now.
engSearchText:
The East's desertification is always a pretty heavy
discussion topic, but everyone seems rather casual
about it right now.
jpnChrName: 大陸東部の不毛化の問題── 議題は重いけど、皆どこか楽しそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
大陸東部の不毛化の問題──
議題は重いけど、皆どこか楽しそうだな。

engChrName: They built the foundation of this day and age themselves, so it stands to reason that they'd get along well.
engSearchText:
They built the foundation of this day and age
themselves, so it stands to reason that they'd get
along well.
jpnChrName: やっぱり時代を築き上げて来た 同世代同士で仲が良いみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり時代を築き上げて来た
同世代同士で仲が良いみたいだ。

engChrName: I'm involved in the discussion as well, but if you need anything from me, don't hesitate to ask.
engSearchText:
I'm involved in the discussion as well, but if you need
anything from me, don't hesitate to ask.
jpnChrName: あ、僕も話に混ぜてもらってるけど、 必要な時は声をかけてよね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、僕も話に混ぜてもらってるけど、
必要な時は声をかけてよね。

engChrName: *sigh* Esmeray really can't handle her liquor. You'd think she'd STOP, but alas...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Esmeray really can't handle her liquor.
You'd think she'd STOP, but alas...
jpnChrName: はぁ……エレ姉ってお酒強くないのに いつも調子に乗って飲み過ぎるんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……エレ姉ってお酒強くないのに
いつも調子に乗って飲み過ぎるんだよね。

engChrName: Here, have some water. Geez... Can you get home by yourself, at least?
engSearchText:
Here, have some water. Geez... Can you get home by
yourself, at least?
jpnChrName: ほらエレ姉、水だよ。 まったく……ちゃんと一人で帰れるの？
jpnSearchText:
ほらエレ姉、水だよ。
まったく……ちゃんと一人で帰れるの？

engChrName: Heeeeeheehee... Of coursh! No proooblem!
engSearchText: Heeeeeheehee... Of coursh! No proooblem!
jpnChrName: えへへぇ～～…… らいじょーぶらいじょーぶ～！
jpnSearchText:
えへへぇ～～……
らいじょーぶらいじょーぶ～！

engChrName: But home, though? Naaah, I'm shtayin' at YOUR place, Quatre! ♪
engSearchText:
But home, though? Naaah, I'm shtayin' at YOUR
place, Quatre! ♪
jpnChrName: 今夜はカトル君のおへやに 泊まるもぉ～ん♪
jpnSearchText:
今夜はカトル君のおへやに
泊まるもぉ～ん♪

engChrName: Stop it, seriously! Van's here, too...!
engSearchText: Stop it, seriously! Van's here, too...!
jpnChrName: ってエレ姉、やめてよそういうの～！ ヴァンさんの前なのに……
jpnSearchText:
ってエレ姉、やめてよそういうの～！
ヴァンさんの前なのに……

engChrName: No, I'm not.
engSearchText: No, I'm not.
jpnChrName: いや、俺は別に構わねえぞ。
jpnSearchText: いや、俺は別に構わねえぞ。

engChrName: I say let her crash at your place—better than tryin' to find a hotel.
engSearchText:
I say let her crash at your place—better than tryin' to
find a hotel.
jpnChrName: ホテルまで送るのも大変だし それこそお前さんの部屋でいいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ホテルまで送るのも大変だし
それこそお前さんの部屋でいいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: That...really doesn't help.
engSearchText: That...really doesn't help.
jpnChrName: も、もう……ヴァンさんまでやめてよね。
jpnSearchText: も、もう……ヴァンさんまでやめてよね。

engChrName: Come on, Esmeray, you can walk! Let's move!
engSearchText: Come on, Esmeray, you can walk! Let's move!
jpnChrName: ほらエレ姉、いい加減 酔いを醒ましてよ。
jpnSearchText:
ほらエレ姉、いい加減
酔いを醒ましてよ。

engChrName: Hold me nishe and tighty, ammaybe I'll make it! Hic!
engSearchText: Hold me nishe and tighty, ammaybe I'll make it! Hic!
jpnChrName: ヒック……カトル君がだきしめてくれたら かんがえてもいーけどォ～？
jpnSearchText:
ヒック……カトル君がだきしめてくれたら
かんがえてもいーけどォ～？

engChrName: Aidios almighty, you're a handful sometimes...
engSearchText: Aidios almighty, you're a handful sometimes...
jpnChrName: もう……本当に世話が焼けるんだから。
jpnSearchText: もう……本当に世話が焼けるんだから。

engChrName: I've heard that the orbal net is experiencing a lot more overhead with the festival nearing.
engSearchText:
I've heard that the orbal net is experiencing a lot more
overhead with the festival nearing.
jpnChrName: 記念祭が近いせいか、導力ネットも 負荷が大きくなってるみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭が近いせいか、導力ネットも
負荷が大きくなってるみたいでね。

engChrName: And on top of that, they've started testing for compliance with the new range protocols. That might be throttling the network a little, too.
engSearchText:
And on top of that, they've started testing for
compliance with the new range protocols. That might
be throttling the network a little, too.
jpnChrName: それとも実証実験が始まった 長距離無線通信規格のせいかな？
jpnSearchText:
それとも実証実験が始まった
長距離無線通信規格のせいかな？

engChrName: I'll have to adjust our network settings so that our service doesn't get interrupted.
engSearchText:
I'll have to adjust our network settings so that our
service doesn't get interrupted.
jpnChrName: なんにせよ、今後の解決業務に支障が出ないように ネットワークの設定を調整しておくよ。
jpnSearchText:
なんにせよ、今後の解決業務に支障が出ないように
ネットワークの設定を調整しておくよ。

engChrName: Oh, that reminds me... I found some weird lines in FIO and XEROS' activity logs. Evidently they started communicating with animals?
engSearchText:
Oh, that reminds me... I found some weird lines in
FIO and XEROS' activity logs. Evidently they started
communicating with animals?
jpnChrName: ちなみにＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳなんだけど…… 最近変わった活動記録があってさ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳなんだけど……
最近変わった活動記録があってさ。

engChrName: I never expected them to develop those kinds of routines, but I'm interested to see what comes of it.
engSearchText:
I never expected them to develop those kinds of
routines, but I'm interested to see what comes of it.
jpnChrName: 動物相手のコミュニケーションなんて予想外だけど どんなデータが集まるのか、僕も楽しみかな。
jpnSearchText:
動物相手のコミュニケーションなんて予想外だけど
どんなデータが集まるのか、僕も楽しみかな。

engChrName: I did want to mention: don't feel obligated to shoulder my workload.
engSearchText:
I did want to mention: don't feel obligated to
shoulder my workload.
jpnChrName: ……とにかく、仕事の手伝いに関して 変に遠慮なんてしなくていいからね。
jpnSearchText:
……とにかく、仕事の手伝いに関して
変に遠慮なんてしなくていいからね。

engChrName: I appreciate it, but solving problems myself helps me learn more about the bigger picture. You never know when that knowledge base may come in handy.
engSearchText:
I appreciate it, but solving problems myself helps me
learn more about the bigger picture. You never know
when that knowledge base may come in handy.
jpnChrName: 解決業務も社会勉強になるし、 思いがけず研究者として役立てたりもするから。
jpnSearchText:
解決業務も社会勉強になるし、
思いがけず研究者として役立てたりもするから。

engChrName: Knowing that my research can save people in the real world...it really puts my mind at ease.
engSearchText:
Knowing that my research can save people in the real
world...it really puts my mind at ease.
jpnChrName: 助かった人がいるって知れて 少しだけ気持ちが救われるけど。
jpnSearchText:
助かった人がいるって知れて
少しだけ気持ちが救われるけど。

engChrName: I can't begin to imagine the grief running through their heads... It's difficult trying to face them at all.
engSearchText:
I can't begin to imagine the grief running through
their heads... It's difficult trying to face them at all.
jpnChrName: この人の悲しみも計り知れないだろうね。 ……合わせる顔がないよ。
jpnSearchText:
この人の悲しみも計り知れないだろうね。
……合わせる顔がないよ。

engChrName: ...But I can't sit idly by and do nothing about it. I'll make what intelligence inroads I can.
engSearchText:
...But I can't sit idly by and do nothing about it.
I'll make what intelligence inroads I can.
jpnChrName: とにかく……そっちも情報収集頑張ってね。 僕の方も他のツテを当たってみるよ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく……そっちも情報収集頑張ってね。
僕の方も他のツテを当たってみるよ。

engChrName: I actually just finished analyzing Mare's data.
engSearchText: I actually just finished analyzing Mare's data.
jpnChrName: 今ちょうどメアの情報を解析してた所だよ。
jpnSearchText: 今ちょうどメアの情報を解析してた所だよ。

engChrName: Yang seemed quite interested in how holo cores worked as well.
engSearchText:
Yang seemed quite interested in how holo cores
worked as well.
jpnChrName: ホロウコアについてはヤン兄も それなりに興味があった事もあったりしてね。
jpnSearchText:
ホロウコアについてはヤン兄も
それなりに興味があった事もあったりしてね。

engChrName: I thought I had an idea of typical construction and assembly, but Mare's is a framework I've never seen before.
engSearchText:
I thought I had an idea of typical construction and
assembly, but Mare's is a framework I've never
seen before.
jpnChrName: 構造は僕も一通り理解してるつもりなんだけど。 こんな特殊な構造のデータは見た事がないな……
jpnSearchText:
構造は僕も一通り理解してるつもりなんだけど。
こんな特殊な構造のデータは見た事がないな……

engChrName: Sorry to take up all your time with that. I really owe you one.
engSearchText:
Sorry to take up all your time with that. I really owe
you one.
jpnChrName: 手間を取らせちまって悪いな…… マジで助かってるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
手間を取らせちまって悪いな……
マジで助かってるぜ。

engChrName: Oh, no problem. Learning more about her and holo cores in general fascinates me. This project was well worth my time.
engSearchText:
Oh, no problem. Learning more about her and holo
cores in general fascinates me. This project was well
worth my time.
jpnChrName: ううん、勉強になるし興味深いから。 早速こっちに来た甲斐があるって所かな。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、勉強になるし興味深いから。
早速こっちに来た甲斐があるって所かな。

engChrName: You're taking the nightly rounds again tonight?
engSearchText: You're taking the nightly rounds again tonight?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの方は…… 今日も夜の街を見て回ってるんだよね？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんの方は……
今日も夜の街を見て回ってるんだよね？

engChrName: You know, you're markedly different from how I imagined you'd be. You're more...serious, I suppose.
engSearchText:
You know, you're markedly different from how I
imagined you'd be. You're more...serious, I suppose.
jpnChrName: 最初のイメージと違って 真面目っていうか、なんて言うか……
jpnSearchText:
最初のイメージと違って
真面目っていうか、なんて言うか……

engChrName: Nah. I just like waitin' till night to start screwin' around.
engSearchText:
Nah. I just like waitin' till night to start
screwin' around.
jpnChrName: なに、ただの習慣ってだけだ。
jpnSearchText: なに、ただの習慣ってだけだ。

engChrName: 'Sides, night is when they show all the juicy shit in the theaters you can't see during the day. Heh...
engSearchText:
'Sides, night is when they show all the juicy shit in
the theaters you can't see during the day.
Heh...
jpnChrName: それに夜ならオトナの映画を 楽しめたりするしな。
jpnSearchText:
それに夜ならオトナの映画を
楽しめたりするしな。

engChrName: ...Aaand I take back what I just said.
engSearchText: ...Aaand I take back what I just said.
jpnChrName: ふーん……前言撤回だね。
jpnSearchText: ふーん……前言撤回だね。

engChrName: At any rate, I should have Mare fully analyzed tonight. That's still right on schedule.
engSearchText:
At any rate, I should have Mare fully
analyzed tonight. That's still right on schedule.
jpnChrName: とにかく、メアの解析は 予定通り今夜中にでも終わると思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、メアの解析は
予定通り今夜中にでも終わると思うよ。

engChrName: I'll have the report ready tomorrow morning.
engSearchText: I'll have the report ready tomorrow morning.
jpnChrName: 明日の報告を楽しみにしてて。
jpnSearchText: 明日の報告を楽しみにしてて。

engChrName: Activating bodyguard mode, in case of unexpected events. Now scanning perimeter for suspicious persons.
engSearchText:
Activating bodyguard mode, in case of
unexpected events. Now scanning perimeter for
suspicious persons.
jpnChrName: 念ノ為、今日モ警護モードヲ発動中。 不審者ガイナイカサーチスル。
jpnSearchText:
念ノ為、今日モ警護モードヲ発動中。
不審者ガイナイカサーチスル。

engChrName: FIO and XEROS shall protect the professor!
engSearchText: FIO and XEROS shall protect the professor!
jpnChrName: 博士ノ護衛ハＦＩＯト ＸＥＲＯＳニオ任セアレ！
jpnSearchText:
博士ノ護衛ハＦＩＯト
ＸＥＲＯＳニオ任セアレ！

engChrName: As a result of gross alcohol consumption, Esmeray cannot walk unassisted.
engSearchText:
As a result of gross alcohol consumption, Esmeray
cannot walk unassisted.
jpnChrName: エスメレー、泥酔状態ニツキ 正常ナ歩行ガ不可能。
jpnSearchText:
エスメレー、泥酔状態ニツキ
正常ナ歩行ガ不可能。

engChrName: Probability of a hangover the following morning: 90%. FIO recommends drinking one liter of water tonight.
engSearchText:
Probability of a hangover the following
morning: 90%. FIO recommends drinking one liter of
water tonight.
jpnChrName: 明日ノ二日酔イガ発生スル確率、約９０％。 今日ノウチニ水１Ｌヲ取ル事ヲ推奨スル。
jpnSearchText:
明日ノ二日酔イガ発生スル確率、約９０％。
今日ノウチニ水１Ｌヲ取ル事ヲ推奨スル。

engChrName: FIO shall assist. Activating support program.
engSearchText: FIO shall assist. Activating support program.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯモ手伝ウ。 雑務ノ支援プログラムヲ実行。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯモ手伝ウ。
雑務ノ支援プログラムヲ実行。

engChrName: FIO can now process five individual accounts within 0.1 seconds, thanks to recent refactoring.
engSearchText:
FIO can now process five individual accounts within
0.1 seconds, thanks to recent refactoring.
jpnChrName: ……最適化ニヨリ０.１秒デ ５人ノ会計処理ガ可能。
jpnSearchText:
……最適化ニヨリ０.１秒デ
５人ノ会計処理ガ可能。

engChrName: Well, damn. How're we supposed to compete with that?
engSearchText:
Well, damn. How're we supposed to compete
with that?
jpnChrName: 客（こっち）の方が追い付かねえわ！
jpnSearchText: 客（こっち）の方が追い付かねえわ！

engChrName: You look satisfied, Quatre.
engSearchText: You look satisfied, Quatre.
jpnChrName: カトル楽シソウ。
jpnSearchText: カトル楽シソウ。

engChrName: FIO shall assist you, Quatre.
engSearchText: FIO shall assist you, Quatre.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯモカトルヲ応援スル。
jpnSearchText: ＦＩＯモカトルヲ応援スル。

engChrName: High-sensitivity sensors deployed.
engSearchText: High-sensitivity sensors deployed.
jpnChrName: 高感度センサーヲ展開中……
jpnSearchText: 高感度センサーヲ展開中……

engChrName: FIO will contact Quatre in the event of suspicious activity, or if persons of interest are detected.
engSearchText:
FIO will contact Quatre in the event of suspicious
activity, or if persons of interest are detected.
jpnChrName: 近隣デ不審ナ人物ヤ指名手配犯ヲ 感知シタ場合、カトルニ報告スル。
jpnSearchText:
近隣デ不審ナ人物ヤ指名手配犯ヲ
感知シタ場合、カトルニ報告スル。

engChrName: You said somethin' about a bodyguard mode, right? That's pretty cool.
engSearchText:
You said somethin' about a bodyguard mode, right?
That's pretty cool.
jpnChrName: 確か警護モードとか言ってたか。 中々頼もしいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
確か警護モードとか言ってたか。
中々頼もしいじゃねえか。

engChrName: Indeed. With A's next move a mystery, I thought it best to err on the side of caution.
engSearchText:
Indeed. With A's next move a mystery, I thought it
best to err on the side of caution.
jpnChrName: うん、《Ａ》の動向が分からない以上 警戒しておくに越したことは無いからね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、《Ａ》の動向が分からない以上
警戒しておくに越したことは無いからね。

engChrName: We don't know what A's gonna do next, so best to stay on our toes.
engSearchText:
We don't know what A's gonna do next, so best to
stay on our toes.
jpnChrName: まあ、《Ａ》の動向が分からねえ以上 警戒しとくに越したことは無いしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、《Ａ》の動向が分からねえ以上
警戒しとくに越したことは無いしな。

engChrName: Suffered greater than expected time loss while collecting laundry.
engSearchText:
Suffered greater than expected time loss while
collecting laundry.
jpnChrName: 洗濯モノノ収納ニ 想定以上ノたいむろすガ発生……
jpnSearchText:
洗濯モノノ収納ニ
想定以上ノたいむろすガ発生……

engChrName: Now updating 'cat' database entry with metadata tag 'sensitive'...
engSearchText:
Now updating 'cat' database entry with metadata
tag 'sensitive'...
jpnChrName: 生物・猫ノ特性データニ “せんしてぃぶ”ヲ追記……
jpnSearchText:
生物・猫ノ特性データニ
“せんしてぃぶ”ヲ追記……

engChrName: ...I mean, yeah. Cat sees some weird robot thing in its neighborhood, cat flips out.
engSearchText:
...I mean, yeah. Cat sees some weird robot thing in its
neighborhood, cat flips out.
jpnChrName: ま、猫からしちゃ見慣れねえヤツに 縄張りを荒らされた形だろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、猫からしちゃ見慣れねえヤツに
縄張りを荒らされた形だろうしな。

engChrName: But hey, maybe they'll get used to you.
engSearchText: But hey, maybe they'll get used to you.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、上手くやってけるといいんだが。
jpnSearchText: だがまあ、上手くやってけるといいんだが。

engChrName: FIO? What are you doing here?
engSearchText: FIO? What are you doing here?
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯちゃん、こんな所で何を……？
jpnSearchText: ＦＩＯちゃん、こんな所で何を……？

engChrName: Oh, don't tell me...
engSearchText: Oh, don't tell me...
jpnChrName: あー、まさかとは思うが……
jpnSearchText: あー、まさかとは思うが……

engChrName: Currently executing Paulette's request to dry laundry.
engSearchText: Currently executing Paulette's request to dry laundry.
jpnChrName: ポーレットノ依頼ニヨリ 洗濯物ヲ干ス任務ヲ遂行。
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットノ依頼ニヨリ
洗濯物ヲ干ス任務ヲ遂行。

engChrName: Is the laundry satisfactorily dry?
engSearchText: Is the laundry satisfactorily dry?
jpnChrName: 綺麗ニ干セテル？
jpnSearchText: 綺麗ニ干セテル？

engChrName: Hmm... Yup, this looks good. Thank you, FIO.
engSearchText: Hmm... Yup, this looks good. Thank you, FIO.
jpnChrName: うん、十分だと思うよ。 お疲れ、ＦＩＯ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、十分だと思うよ。
お疲れ、ＦＩＯ。

engChrName: Aha, good. This mission log will be added to training datasets.
engSearchText:
Aha, good. This mission log will be added to
training datasets.
jpnChrName: エッヘン。 有用ナ活動データヲ取得、後ホド確認ヲ。
jpnSearchText:
エッヘン。
有用ナ活動データヲ取得、後ホド確認ヲ。

engChrName: FIO really does it all!
engSearchText: FIO really does it all!
jpnChrName: う～ん、何度見ても凄いですね…… ＦＩＯちゃんは優秀ですっ！
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、何度見ても凄いですね……
ＦＩＯちゃんは優秀ですっ！

engChrName: Man, it's scary how capable that thing is. How'd it learn so much?
engSearchText:
Man, it's scary how capable that thing is. How'd it
learn so much?
jpnChrName: ハッ、何度見ても万能すぎんだろ。 一体どうなってやがんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、何度見ても万能すぎんだろ。
一体どうなってやがんだ？

engChrName: FIO never ceases to amaze. I'm impressed.
engSearchText: FIO never ceases to amaze. I'm impressed.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、何度見てもお見事です。 お手伝いも捗りますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、何度見てもお見事です。
お手伝いも捗りますね。

engChrName: Mission accomplished. Now reporting to Paulette.
engSearchText: Mission accomplished. Now reporting to Paulette.
jpnChrName: 任務達成──次ハポーレットニ報告。
jpnSearchText: 任務達成──次ハポーレットニ報告。

engChrName: XEROS is currently carrying out another mission outside.
engSearchText:
XEROS is currently carrying out another
mission outside.
jpnChrName: ナオＸＥＲＯＳハ外デ 別ノ任務ヲ遂行シテイル模様。
jpnSearchText:
ナオＸＥＲＯＳハ外デ
別ノ任務ヲ遂行シテイル模様。

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！　ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！　ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: Well, he sounds happy.
engSearchText: Well, he sounds happy.
jpnChrName: おっ、心なしか嬉しそうにしてんな。
jpnSearchText: おっ、心なしか嬉しそうにしてんな。

engChrName: Maybe he's happy to see the professor again. Been a while, hasn't it?
engSearchText:
Maybe he's happy to see the professor again. Been a
while, hasn't it?
jpnChrName: コイツも久しぶりに 博士に会えて嬉しいのかね。
jpnSearchText:
コイツも久しぶりに
博士に会えて嬉しいのかね。

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！　ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！　ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: Oho! You excited, boy?
engSearchText: Oho! You excited, boy?
jpnChrName: おお、元気が有り余ってんな。
jpnSearchText: おお、元気が有り余ってんな。

engChrName: Still hyped up from the party, I imagine.
engSearchText: Still hyped up from the party, I imagine.
jpnChrName: ハッ、コイツもまだ打ち上げの余韻が 抜けねえんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、コイツもまだ打ち上げの余韻が
抜けねえんじゃねえか？

engChrName: WOOF...
engSearchText: WOOF...
jpnChrName: ＷＯＦＷＯＦ……
jpnSearchText: ＷＯＦＷＯＦ……

engChrName: GRRRRR...
engSearchText: GRRRRR...
jpnSearchText: …………ＧＲＲＲＲ…………

engChrName: So what's he doing now, sleeping? Or a standby mode, I guess?
engSearchText:
So what's he doing now, sleeping? Or a standby
mode, I guess?
jpnChrName: 寝てやがる…… いや、休止モードってヤツか？
jpnSearchText:
寝てやがる……
いや、休止モードってヤツか？

engChrName: Well, no point waking him up. Sleep tight.
engSearchText: Well, no point waking him up. Sleep tight.
jpnChrName: まあいい、しばらく放っといてやるか。
jpnSearchText: まあいい、しばらく放っといてやるか。

engChrName: *SNIFF* RUFF!
engSearchText: *SNIFF* RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＳｎＳｎ……ＷＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＳｎＳｎ……ＷＯＷ！

engChrName: Huh? Is it keeping watch over the kids or something?
engSearchText: Huh? Is it keeping watch over the kids or something?
jpnChrName: この子、もしかして子供たちを 見守ってるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
この子、もしかして子供たちを
見守ってるのかしら？

engChrName: Yeah, just in case. Good work, XEROS.
engSearchText: Yeah, just in case. Good work, XEROS.
jpnChrName: うん、念のためだけどね。 ……ありがとう、ＸＥＲＯＳ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、念のためだけどね。
……ありがとう、ＸＥＲＯＳ。

engChrName: Yeah, Quatre programmed him to do that. Who's a good boy?
engSearchText:
Yeah, Quatre programmed him to do that. Who's a
good boy?
jpnChrName: ああ、カトルが設定したみてえだな。 ……ありがとよ、ＸＥＲＯＳ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、カトルが設定したみてえだな。
……ありがとよ、ＸＥＲＯＳ。

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: RUFF...
engSearchText: RUFF...
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ……
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ……

engChrName: Ah, XEROS is charging right now.
engSearchText: Ah, XEROS is charging right now.
jpnChrName: あ、ＸＥＲＯＳだったらチャージ中だよ。
jpnSearchText: あ、ＸＥＲＯＳだったらチャージ中だよ。

engChrName: Huh. Could've fooled me. He looks like he's just sitting there.
engSearchText:
Huh. Could've fooled me. He looks like he's just
sitting there.
jpnChrName: へぇ、座ってるだけに見えるが こうやってチャージしてんのか。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、座ってるだけに見えるが
こうやってチャージしてんのか。

engChrName: GRR... RUFF.
engSearchText: GRR... RUFF.
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ．

engChrName: Just along for the ride, is he?
engSearchText: Just along for the ride, is he?
jpnChrName: されるがままになってんな……
jpnSearchText: されるがままになってんな……

engChrName: I told the press I'd be lying low for the time being, mainly with Nina and the others.
engSearchText:
I told the press I'd be lying low for the time being,
mainly with Nina and the others.
jpnChrName: インタビューには、ニナ達と ゆっくり過ごすつもりって答えたけど。
jpnSearchText:
インタビューには、ニナ達と
ゆっくり過ごすつもりって答えたけど。

engChrName: But I think I'm gonna tag along with you today, so let me know if there's anything you need me for.
engSearchText:
But I think I'm gonna tag along with you today, so let
me know if there's anything you need me for.
jpnChrName: 今日も貴方達に付き合うつもりだから、 必要とあらば呼びに来なさいよね。
jpnSearchText:
今日も貴方達に付き合うつもりだから、
必要とあらば呼びに来なさいよね。

engChrName: So this is where you snuck off to, huh? You blend right in already.
engSearchText:
So this is where you snuck off to, huh? You blend
right in already.
jpnChrName: おっ、こんな所にいたのかよ。 しれっと客に混ざりやがって。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、こんな所にいたのかよ。
しれっと客に混ざりやがって。

engChrName: I gotta say, this place nails both the food and the vibe. I think it's growing on me!
engSearchText:
I gotta say, this place nails both the food and the vibe.
I think it's growing on me!
jpnChrName: ふふ、モンマルト（ここ）の料理は勿論だけど 店の雰囲気も好きなのよね～。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、モンマルト（ここ）の料理は勿論だけど
店の雰囲気も好きなのよね～。

engChrName: Oh, by the way, I heard the Edith Girls' Collection is the night of the festival.
engSearchText:
Oh, by the way, I heard the Edith Girls' Collection is
the night of the festival.
jpnChrName: ……そういえば、記念祭の夜には ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）が待ってるのよね。
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば、記念祭の夜には
ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）が待ってるのよね。

engChrName: I've been scaling back my work ever since the festival, but the EGC is one stage I can't ditch. It's very near and dear to my heart.
engSearchText:
I've been scaling back my work ever since the festival,
but the EGC is one stage I can't ditch. It's very near
and dear to my heart.
jpnChrName: 映画祭以来、受ける仕事は減らしてるけど ＥＧＣにはあたしも思い入れがあるから。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭以来、受ける仕事は減らしてるけど
ＥＧＣにはあたしも思い入れがあるから。

engChrName: I plan to at least give the opening remarks—oh, that reminds me, I need to pick out a dress!
engSearchText:
I plan to at least give the opening remarks—oh, that
reminds me, I need to pick out a dress!
jpnChrName: オープニングの挨拶くらいは登壇するつもりよ。 今年トレンドのドレスも用意しておかないとね。
jpnSearchText:
オープニングの挨拶くらいは登壇するつもりよ。
今年トレンドのドレスも用意しておかないとね。

engChrName: I'll still be around if you need me for anything, though. Just let me know!
engSearchText:
I'll still be around if you need me for
anything, though. Just let me know!
jpnChrName: あたしの手を借りたかったら いつでも言いなさいよ？
jpnSearchText:
あたしの手を借りたかったら
いつでも言いなさいよ？

engChrName: It'll give me some food for thought about my other job...though the whole aftershock thing does have me kind of anxious.
engSearchText:
It'll give me some food for thought about my other
job...though the whole aftershock thing does have me
kind of anxious.
jpnChrName: あっちの仕事の参考にもなるし “揺れ戻し”ってヤツも気がかりだからね。
jpnSearchText:
あっちの仕事の参考にもなるし
“揺れ戻し”ってヤツも気がかりだからね。

engChrName: But uh, enough about me!
engSearchText: But uh, enough about me!
jpnChrName: と、とにかく私の事はいいのよ！
jpnSearchText: と、とにかく私の事はいいのよ！

engChrName: I get why you draw that line where you do.
engSearchText: I get why you draw that line where you do.
jpnChrName: アンタがそうやって一線を引く気持ちも 分からなくはないけど……
jpnSearchText:
アンタがそうやって一線を引く気持ちも
分からなくはないけど……

engChrName: But the way I see it...or the way THEY see it, I think it's fine.
engSearchText:
But the way I see it...or the way THEY see it, I think
it's fine.
jpnChrName: 事務所の子達の気持ちも 少しは汲んであげた方がいいんじゃないの。
jpnSearchText:
事務所の子達の気持ちも
少しは汲んであげた方がいいんじゃないの。

engChrName: I, too, am curious to see how this match ends.
engSearchText: I, too, am curious to see how this match ends.
jpnChrName: 私も勝負の行く末に 興味がないという訳でもないが。
jpnSearchText:
私も勝負の行く末に
興味がないという訳でもないが。

engChrName: If things do get out of hand, I will step in and calm them down.
engSearchText:
If things do get out of hand, I will step in and calm
them down.
jpnChrName: 度が過ぎるようであれば 私がなんとか諫めるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
度が過ぎるようであれば
私がなんとか諫めるとしよう。

engChrName: Go ahead and do the rounds—I'll handle the rest.
engSearchText: Go ahead and do the rounds—I'll handle the rest.
jpnChrName: おぬしらは安心して街を回って来るといい。
jpnSearchText: おぬしらは安心して街を回って来るといい。

engChrName: Ahh, Van. Care to join us?
engSearchText: Ahh, Van. Care to join us?
jpnChrName: おおヴァンか。 おぬしも参加してみるか？
jpnSearchText:
おおヴァンか。
おぬしも参加してみるか？

engChrName: Nah, I'm good. I'd just drag you down.
engSearchText: Nah, I'm good. I'd just drag you down.
jpnChrName: はは、止めときますよ。 俺が混ざった所で白けちまいそうですから。
jpnSearchText:
はは、止めときますよ。
俺が混ざった所で白けちまいそうですから。

engChrName: (I knew the old guy enjoyed chess, but I never pegged Master the type.)
engSearchText:
(I knew the old guy enjoyed chess, but I never pegged
Master the type.)
jpnChrName: （しかしおやっさんのチェス好きは知ってたが   こんな事になるとはな……）
jpnSearchText:
（しかしおやっさんのチェス好きは知ってたが
こんな事になるとはな……）

engChrName: I count myself lucky to have found so worthy an opponent.
engSearchText:
I count myself lucky to have found so worthy
an opponent.
jpnChrName: これほどの腕前の方と 巡り合えるとは縁に恵まれましたな。
jpnSearchText:
これほどの腕前の方と
巡り合えるとは縁に恵まれましたな。

engChrName: Now, then...what say you to this gambit?
engSearchText: Now, then...what say you to this gambit?
jpnChrName: さて、次の手は どう打って出られるおつもりか？
jpnSearchText:
さて、次の手は
どう打って出られるおつもりか？

engChrName: Keepin' your bike in shape? Nice.
engSearchText: Keepin' your bike in shape? Nice.
jpnChrName: 師父（せんせい）は導力バイクの手入れですか？
jpnSearchText: 師父（せんせい）は導力バイクの手入れですか？

engChrName: Indeed. I had some free time on my hands, so I thought I might tune her up a little.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I had some free time on my hands, so I
thought I might tune her up a little.
jpnChrName: うむ、少し手が空いたのでな。 チューニングも含めて済ませた所だ。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、少し手が空いたのでな。
チューニングも含めて済ませた所だ。

engChrName: I've been meaning to test her out. Let me know the next time you need to go out, and I'll give you a ride.
engSearchText:
I've been meaning to test her out. Let me know the
next time you need to go out, and I'll give you a ride.
jpnChrName: どれ、試乗がてら買い出しの 手伝いでもするとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
どれ、試乗がてら買い出しの
手伝いでもするとしようか。

engChrName: Lucky son of a... You'd better lemme at her again some time, capisce?
engSearchText:
Lucky son of a... You'd better lemme at her again
some time, capisce?
jpnChrName: チッ、やっぱいいよな…… また今度貸してくれや、ジーサン。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、やっぱいいよな……
また今度貸してくれや、ジーサン。

engChrName: Heh. You would be more than welcome now that you have a license.
engSearchText:
Heh. You would be more than welcome now that you
have a license.
jpnChrName: フフ、いいとも。 そなたも大型二輪の免許を取ったようだしな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、いいとも。
そなたも大型二輪の免許を取ったようだしな。

engChrName: (You know, Bergard's kinda...)
engSearchText: (You know, Bergard's kinda...)
jpnChrName: （前から思ってましたけど、   ベルガルドさんって……）
jpnSearchText:
（前から思ってましたけど、
ベルガルドさんって……）

engChrName: (Heehee. He has this way of keeping Aaron in check.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. He has this way of keeping Aaron
in check.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、アーロンさんの事も   うまく見守ってくださってますよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、アーロンさんの事も
うまく見守ってくださってますよね。）
