engChrName: That takes care of the cleaning... I suppose I have the time for a quick ride.
engSearchText:
That takes care of the cleaning... I suppose I have the
time for a quick ride.
jpnChrName: フム、清掃も済んだ故 少し走らせて来るとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
フム、清掃も済んだ故
少し走らせて来るとしよう。

engChrName: I do want to see your work done. If you need my help, you need only ask.
engSearchText:
I do want to see your work done. If you need my help,
you need only ask.
jpnChrName: もっともそちらの用事を優先するつもりだ。 手を借りたい時は声を掛けるようにな。
jpnSearchText:
もっともそちらの用事を優先するつもりだ。
手を借りたい時は声を掛けるようにな。

engChrName: I have said my piece... All that's left is for you to look within yourself and make your decision.
engSearchText:
I have said my piece... All that's left is for you to look
within yourself and make your decision.
jpnChrName: 私から伝えたい事は伝えた。 後は己自身で見つめ直してみる事だな。
jpnSearchText:
私から伝えたい事は伝えた。
後は己自身で見つめ直してみる事だな。

engChrName: Now, then... I'll need something to pass the time. Perhaps a bike magazine or two will help...
engSearchText:
Now, then... I'll need something to pass the time.
Perhaps a bike magazine or two will help...
jpnChrName: さて……それでは出立の時が来るまで 導力バイクの雑誌でも読むとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
さて……それでは出立の時が来るまで
導力バイクの雑誌でも読むとしようか。

engChrName: A special feature...? 'Heart-Pounding Courses with Heart-Stopping Views'? Color me intrigued...
engSearchText:
A special feature...? 'Heart-Pounding Courses with
Heart-Stopping Views'? Color me intrigued...
jpnChrName: 景観の良いツーリングコース特集など 参考になるのでな。
jpnSearchText:
景観の良いツーリングコース特集など
参考になるのでな。

engChrName: If you're back safely...then we can try and find Yumé and Paulette next!
engSearchText:
If you're back safely...then we can try and find Yumé
and Paulette next!
jpnChrName: お前らが無事だったんなら ユメやポーレットも──
jpnSearchText:
お前らが無事だったんなら
ユメやポーレットも──

engChrName: There's only one thing a crotchety old fool like me can do...
engSearchText:
There's only one thing a crotchety old fool like me
can do...
jpnChrName: ハッ、だったら俺のやる事は１つだ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、だったら俺のやる事は１つだ。

engChrName: ...and that's believe in you! Get back here in one piece, you got me?!
engSearchText:
...and that's believe in you! Get back here in one
piece, you got me?!
jpnChrName: お前らを信じて待っててやる。 ──必ず全員無事に戻ってきやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
お前らを信じて待っててやる。
──必ず全員無事に戻ってきやがれ！

engChrName: That's the plan!
engSearchText: That's the plan!
jpnChrName: ああ……！　任せてくれ！
jpnSearchText: ああ……！　任せてくれ！

engChrName: We'll find them and bring them back, we promise!
engSearchText: We'll find them and bring them back, we promise!
jpnChrName: 絶対に見つけ出して 一緒に戻ってきますから！！
jpnSearchText:
絶対に見つけ出して
一緒に戻ってきますから！！

engChrName: Get'cher stuff all set while you still can. Only got one chance!
engSearchText:
Get'cher stuff all set while you still can. Only got
one chance!
jpnChrName: 今のうちに支度を整えておけよ。 しくじったら承知しねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
今のうちに支度を整えておけよ。
しくじったら承知しねえからな。

engChrName: Get back here in one piece, you got me?!
engSearchText: Get back here in one piece, you got me?!
jpnChrName: お前らを信じて待っててやる。 ──必ず全員無事に戻ってきやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
お前らを信じて待っててやる。
──必ず全員無事に戻ってきやがれ！

engChrName: It's spreading all over the city, now... What the hell is going on?
engSearchText:
It's spreading all over the city, now... What the hell is
going on?
jpnChrName: どうやら首都中で 同じ“異変”が起きてるようだな……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら首都中で
同じ“異変”が起きてるようだな……

engChrName: I can't help worrying about them... Of course they're out at the festival right now...
engSearchText:
I can't help worrying about them... Of course they're
out at the festival right now...
jpnChrName: チッ……祭りを見に行っちまってた あいつらが心配だが───
jpnSearchText:
チッ……祭りを見に行っちまってた
あいつらが心配だが───

engChrName: Yumé and Paulette were at Vantail, yeah? (They were on that screen, weren't they? Coulda sworn...)
engSearchText:
Yumé and Paulette were at Vantail, yeah?
(They were on that screen, weren't they?
Coulda sworn...)
jpnChrName: ユメとポーレットはヴァンタイユだったか…… （映像にもチラッと映ってたが……）
jpnSearchText:
ユメとポーレットはヴァンタイユだったか……
（映像にもチラッと映ってたが……）

engChrName: I think we can leave them to Maxim. With his reflexes, they should be all right.
engSearchText:
I think we can leave them to Maxim. With his
reflexes, they should be all right.
jpnChrName: あの様子ならとりあえず無事だろう。 レーサーの反射神経も信用できそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
あの様子ならとりあえず無事だろう。
レーサーの反射神経も信用できそうだしな。

engChrName: ...Fine. No point rushing in and making things worse.
engSearchText: ...Fine. No point rushing in and making things worse.
jpnChrName: ……仕方ねえ、この状況じゃ 闇雲に動くわけにもいかねえしな……
jpnSearchText:
……仕方ねえ、この状況じゃ
闇雲に動くわけにもいかねえしな……

engChrName: Now go and get Feri. We'll figure things out from there!
engSearchText:
Now go and get Feri. We'll figure things out
from there!
jpnChrName: ともかくお前らはフェリ坊を迎えに行きやがれ！ 先の話はそれからだ！
jpnSearchText:
ともかくお前らはフェリ坊を迎えに行きやがれ！
先の話はそれからだ！

engChrName: Got it. Y'all hold down the fort!
engSearchText: Got it. Y'all hold down the fort!
jpnChrName: ああ、こっちは頼んだぜ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、こっちは頼んだぜ！

engChrName: Tch... I can't just sit around here, but everything's a mess right now. Walking out won't do me any good...
engSearchText:
Tch... I can't just sit around here, but everything's a
mess right now. Walking out won't do me any good...
jpnChrName: ……居ても立っても居られねえが…… チッ、この状況じゃ出歩くのもままならねえ……
jpnSearchText:
……居ても立っても居られねえが……
チッ、この状況じゃ出歩くのもままならねえ……

engChrName: Go and get Feri. We'll figure things out from there!
engSearchText: Go and get Feri. We'll figure things out from there!
jpnChrName: ともかくお前らはフェリ坊を迎えに行きやがれ！ 先の話はそれからだ！
jpnSearchText:
ともかくお前らはフェリ坊を迎えに行きやがれ！
先の話はそれからだ！

engChrName: Gonna be busy as hell today, but I can tackle the morning on my own and go from there.
engSearchText:
Gonna be busy as hell today, but I can tackle the
morning on my own and go from there.
jpnChrName: 今日はテンテコ舞いだが なに、午前中くらい一人で回してやる。
jpnSearchText:
今日はテンテコ舞いだが
なに、午前中くらい一人で回してやる。

engChrName: Gotta let Paulette and Yumé have the day to themselves! Gets me nice and motivated!
engSearchText:
Gotta let Paulette and Yumé have the day
to themselves! Gets me nice and motivated!
jpnChrName: ポーレットとユメがゆっくり祭りを 見て回れるようになぁ～！
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットとユメがゆっくり祭りを
見て回れるようになぁ～！

engChrName: And as for HIM... He so much as lays a finger on Paulette, after what he did?
engSearchText:
And as for HIM... He so much as lays a finger on
Paulette, after what he did?
jpnChrName: ……だがあのレーサー、奴だけは別だ。 もしポーレットに手を出しやがったら……
jpnSearchText:
……だがあのレーサー、奴だけは別だ。
もしポーレットに手を出しやがったら……

engChrName: THE END.
engSearchText: THE END.
jpnChrName: ──　許　さ　ん。
jpnSearchText: <S5>──　許　さ　ん。

engChrName: Place is packed today, huh, pops?
engSearchText: Place is packed today, huh, pops?
jpnChrName: おやっさんも忙しいな……
jpnSearchText: おやっさんも忙しいな……

engChrName: I know your back's been buggin' you. Don't push yourself, yeah?
engSearchText:
I know your back's been buggin' you. Don't push
yourself, yeah?
jpnChrName: ま、腰痛もあんだから無理すんなよ？
jpnSearchText: ま、腰痛もあんだから無理すんなよ？

engChrName: And you can mind your own business, sonny. You gonna order something, or what?
engSearchText:
And you can mind your own business, sonny.
You gonna order something, or what?
jpnChrName: ハン、余計なお世話だ。 注文ならとっととしやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、余計なお世話だ。
注文ならとっととしやがれ。

engChrName: If you're looking for Paulette and Yumé, they should be over in Vantail.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for Paulette and Yumé, they should
be over in Vantail.
jpnChrName: ……ポーレットたちなら ヴァンタイユ地区を回ってるハズだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……ポーレットたちなら
ヴァンタイユ地区を回ってるハズだぜ。

engChrName: Check in on them for me, yeah?
engSearchText: Check in on them for me, yeah?
jpnChrName: ──お前ら、こっそり様子を見てきやがれ。
jpnSearchText: ──お前ら、こっそり様子を見てきやがれ。

engChrName: Van, go sneak a look at how they're doing for me.
engSearchText: Van, go sneak a look at how they're doing for me.
jpnChrName: ──ヴァン、お前こっそり様子を見てきやがれ。
jpnSearchText: ──ヴァン、お前こっそり様子を見てきやがれ。

engChrName: Oh, relax. I'm sure they're just fine.
engSearchText: Oh, relax. I'm sure they're just fine.
jpnChrName: いや、ちっとは放っておいてやれよな。
jpnSearchText: いや、ちっとは放っておいてやれよな。

engChrName: Hmm... This might be the turning point of the whole match.
engSearchText:
Hmm... This might be the turning point of the
whole match.
jpnChrName: ふむ……ここが勝負の分かれ目ですかな。
jpnSearchText: ふむ……ここが勝負の分かれ目ですかな。

engChrName: I can play it safe, or I can make a big push...
engSearchText: I can play it safe, or I can make a big push...
jpnChrName: 慎重にいくか、それとも 裏をかいて逆転の一手に出るか──
jpnSearchText:
慎重にいくか、それとも
裏をかいて逆転の一手に出るか──

engChrName: The festival menu's always a big hit, but I can't get complacent. Gotta give it a hundred percent every year—no exceptions!
engSearchText:
The festival menu's always a big hit, but I can't
get complacent. Gotta give it a hundred percent every
year—no exceptions!
jpnChrName: 毎年記念祭メニューは人気があってな。 今年も手を抜くわけにはいかねえ。
jpnSearchText:
毎年記念祭メニューは人気があってな。
今年も手を抜くわけにはいかねえ。

engChrName: Make sure you guys get back early. Need some folks to taste test some new dishes I'm working on.
engSearchText:
Make sure you guys get back early. Need some folks
to taste test some new dishes I'm working on.
jpnChrName: ……お前らも今日は早めに帰れ。 いくつか試作を食べ比べさせてやる。
jpnSearchText:
……お前らも今日は早めに帰れ。
いくつか試作を食べ比べさせてやる。

engChrName: Really? Yay! I can't wait, your cooking is always so good!
engSearchText:
Really? Yay! I can't wait, your cooking is always
so good!
jpnChrName: わぁっ！　ホントですか！？ う～んヤル気が湧いてきましたっ！
jpnSearchText:
わぁっ！　ホントですか！？
う～んヤル気が湧いてきましたっ！

engChrName: That got your attention real fast, huh, small fry? Now me, I'm interested in the adult munchies—got anything that goes well with a cold one?
engSearchText:
That got your attention real fast, huh, small fry?
Now me, I'm interested in the adult munchies—got
anything that goes well with a cold one?
jpnChrName: ガキンチョは単純だねぇ。 ──あ、ウマい酒のつまみもあんだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
ガキンチョは単純だねぇ。
──あ、ウマい酒のつまみもあんだろうな？

engChrName: You can find out when you DO YOUR JOB, you little brat! Quit slackin'!
engSearchText:
You can find out when you DO YOUR JOB, you
little brat! Quit slackin'!
jpnChrName: チッ……仕事しやがれ、仕事を！
jpnSearchText: チッ……仕事しやがれ、仕事を！

engChrName: (Haha... He does like to chew Aaron out, but something tells me he'll have some snacks for him anyway.)
engSearchText:
(Haha... He does like to chew Aaron out, but
something tells me he'll have some snacks for
him anyway.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……何だかんだいいながら   用意してくれそうですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……何だかんだいいながら
用意してくれそうですけど……）

engChrName: (The gang's really settling in, aren't they? Aaron's already drinkin' the place dry...)
engSearchText:
(The gang's really settling in, aren't they?
Aaron's already drinkin' the place dry...)
jpnChrName: （アーロンも毎晩のように飲みやがって……   こいつら馴染みすぎだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（アーロンも毎晩のように飲みやがって……
こいつら馴染みすぎだな。）

engChrName: Can't rest on my laurels here—there's always pressure to come up with new stuff.
engSearchText:
Can't rest on my laurels here—there's always pressure
to come up with new stuff.
jpnChrName: ご近所の手前、記念祭メニューは 手を抜くわけにはいかねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ご近所の手前、記念祭メニューは
手を抜くわけにはいかねえ。

engChrName: Make sure you get home early today. I've got some work-in-progress dishes I want you to taste test.
engSearchText:
Make sure you get home early today. I've got some
work-in-progress dishes I want you to taste test.
jpnChrName: お前らも今日は早めに帰れ。 いくつか試作を食べ比べさせてやる。
jpnSearchText:
お前らも今日は早めに帰れ。
いくつか試作を食べ比べさせてやる。

engChrName: Listen up. No slacking off, got it?
engSearchText: Listen up. No slacking off, got it?
jpnChrName: ……いいか、サボんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText: ……いいか、サボんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: About damn time you lot showed up.
engSearchText: About damn time you lot showed up.
jpnChrName: ……お前らはようやく仕事か？ いつもチンタラしやがって……
jpnSearchText:
……お前らはようやく仕事か？
いつもチンタラしやがって……

engChrName: It's almost noon! Move your lazy asses!
engSearchText: It's almost noon! Move your lazy asses!
jpnChrName: そろそろ昼だぞ、とっとと働きやがれ！！
jpnSearchText: そろそろ昼だぞ、とっとと働きやがれ！！

engChrName: (Yeah, he's not in a good mood... Guess I'll just head out and keep myself busy.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, he's not in a good mood... Guess I'll just head
out and keep myself busy.)
jpnChrName: （やっぱ機嫌が悪ィな……   ま、一回りしたら出かけるかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（やっぱ機嫌が悪ィな……
ま、一回りしたら出かけるかね。）

engChrName: Hmph. I can't stand even talking about that sleazebag...
engSearchText:
Hmph. I can't stand even talking about
that sleazebag...
jpnChrName: ったく、あの馬の骨の扱いについて 娘と話し合ったばかりだってのに……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、あの馬の骨の扱いについて
娘と話し合ったばかりだってのに……

engChrName: ...but I gotta look past him for now. I'll leave him for later.
engSearchText:
...but I gotta look past him for now. I'll leave him
for later.
jpnChrName: とてもそんな空気じゃねえな。 取りあえず、しばらくは後回しか。
jpnSearchText:
とてもそんな空気じゃねえな。
取りあえず、しばらくは後回しか。

engChrName: My sweet Paulette... Gah! That little weasel! He comes around here again, he's getting a face full of skillet!
engSearchText:
My sweet Paulette... Gah! That little weasel!
He comes around here again, he's getting a face full
of skillet!
jpnChrName: しかしポーレットはどうするつもりで…… ええい、今度顔出したらまずは締め上げてやる！
jpnSearchText:
しかしポーレットはどうするつもりで……
ええい、今度顔出したらまずは締め上げてやる！

engChrName: Is he, uhh, okay there?
engSearchText: Is he, uhh, okay there?
jpnChrName: えっと、どうしたのかしら……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、どうしたのかしら……？

engChrName: Well...let's just say it's a family affair.
engSearchText: Well...let's just say it's a family affair.
jpnChrName: あはは……ちょっとした 家庭の事情があると言いますか。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……ちょっとした
家庭の事情があると言いますか。

engChrName: (Judith doesn't know about that, does she...?)
engSearchText: (Judith doesn't know about that, does she...?)
jpnChrName: （……マクシムさんが関わっているのを   ジュディスさんは知らないんですよね？）
jpnSearchText:
（……マクシムさんが関わっているのを
ジュディスさんは知らないんですよね？）

engChrName: (At this rate, only a matter of time before she finds out.)
engSearchText:
(At this rate, only a matter of time before she
finds out.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、まあ機会があれば   そのうち知っちまいそうだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、まあ機会があれば
そのうち知っちまいそうだが。）

engChrName: (Oh, right. Didn't she get wrapped up with that Maxim guy?)
engSearchText:
(Oh, right. Didn't she get wrapped up with that
Maxim guy?)
jpnChrName: （……そういや一応、残念レーサーの   スキャンダルの相手にはなるのか。）
jpnSearchText:
（……そういや一応、残念レーサーの
スキャンダルの相手にはなるのか。）

engChrName: (Not surprised that she and her dad don't care for him.)
engSearchText:
(Not surprised that she and her dad don't care
for him.)
jpnChrName: （ポーレットもおやっさんも   全然気にしてねぇのは流石だが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ポーレットもおやっさんも
全然気にしてねぇのは流石だが。）

engChrName: (Well, the whole thing got swept under the rug because of all the other stuff at the time.)
engSearchText:
(Well, the whole thing got swept under the rug
because of all the other stuff at the time.)
jpnChrName: （……ま、あのスキャンダル自体、   事件で掻き消えちまったからな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ま、あのスキャンダル自体、
事件で掻き消えちまったからな。）

engChrName: (And that article smelled like BS anyway. They probably figured out it was a misunderstanding.)
engSearchText:
(And that article smelled like BS anyway.
They probably figured out it was
a misunderstanding.)
jpnChrName: （記事も嘘くせぇ感じだったし   誤解っつーのは判ってんだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（記事も嘘くせぇ感じだったし
誤解っつーのは判ってんだろ。）

engChrName: (It effectively got buried beneath all the other news from the incident.)
engSearchText:
(It effectively got buried beneath all the other news
from the incident.)
jpnChrName: （……まあ、あのスキャンダル自体、   事件で掻き消えたみたいだし。）
jpnSearchText:
（……まあ、あのスキャンダル自体、
事件で掻き消えたみたいだし。）

engChrName: (Not to mention the article itself was quite...disingenuous. I imagine they took it with a grain of salt.)
engSearchText:
(Not to mention the article itself was
quite...disingenuous. I imagine they took it with a
grain of salt.)
jpnChrName: （記事も信憑性が薄そうだったから   誤解なのは判ってるんじゃないかな？）
jpnSearchText:
（記事も信憑性が薄そうだったから
誤解なのは判ってるんじゃないかな？）

engChrName: (The scandal itself was effectively buried during the greater incident.)
engSearchText:
(The scandal itself was effectively buried during the
greater incident.)
jpnChrName: （……まあ、あのスキャンダル自体、   事件で流れてしまったようですし。）
jpnSearchText:
（……まあ、あのスキャンダル自体、
事件で流れてしまったようですし。）

engChrName: (The article failed to provide evidence for its claims— I'm sure they saw its lack of credibility.)
engSearchText:
(The article failed to provide evidence for its claims—
I'm sure they saw its lack of credibility.)
jpnChrName: （記事の信憑性も薄そうでしたから   誤解なのはお判りなのでしょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（記事の信憑性も薄そうでしたから
誤解なのはお判りなのでしょう。）

engChrName: Hmph. Bastard went home, did he?
engSearchText: Hmph. Bastard went home, did he?
jpnChrName: フン、あの野郎は帰ったか……
jpnSearchText: フン、あの野郎は帰ったか……

engChrName: (There's no way...is there?)
engSearchText: (There's no way...is there?)
jpnChrName: （……いやしかし…………   …………まさかンなこたぁ…………）
jpnSearchText:
（……いやしかし…………
…………まさかンなこたぁ…………）

engChrName: (Not a good look he's wearing... Probably best to leave him be right now.)
engSearchText:
(Not a good look he's wearing... Probably best to
leave him be right now.)
jpnChrName: （おやっさん、苦悩がにじみ出てんな……   今は話しかけねえ方がいいか？）
jpnSearchText:
（おやっさん、苦悩がにじみ出てんな……
今は話しかけねえ方がいいか？）

engChrName: I did train at a restaurant, for the record—I'm not self taught. Just racked up a lot of experience over the years.
engSearchText:
I did train at a restaurant, for the record—I'm not
self taught. Just racked up a lot of experience over
the years.
jpnChrName: 俺は一応レストランで修行した身なんでな、 こうして昔ながらのビストロをやっちゃいるが……
jpnSearchText:
俺は一応レストランで修行した身なんでな、
こうして昔ながらのビストロをやっちゃいるが……

engChrName: I don't wanna force this on Paulette and Yumé, though.
engSearchText:
I don't wanna force this on Paulette and
Yumé, though.
jpnChrName: それをポーレットやユメに 押し付けるつもりはサラサラねえ。
jpnSearchText:
それをポーレットやユメに
押し付けるつもりはサラサラねえ。

engChrName: I figure I'll change it up when I retire, remodel it into something they might like more. A café, maybe...
engSearchText:
I figure I'll change it up when I retire, remodel it into
something they might like more. A café, maybe...
jpnChrName: 俺が引退したら、カフェに改装すんのもいいかもな。 ポーレットにはそっちの方が合ってるだろうよ。
jpnSearchText:
俺が引退したら、カフェに改装すんのもいいかもな。
ポーレットにはそっちの方が合ってるだろうよ。

engChrName: Consider this advance notice: when that time comes, I'm gonna need a certain slacker upstairs to pitch in.
engSearchText:
Consider this advance notice: when that time comes,
I'm gonna need a certain slacker upstairs to pitch in.
jpnChrName: ……そん時の改装費は家賃で賄うからな。 しっかり稼いどけよ、解決屋。
jpnSearchText:
……そん時の改装費は家賃で賄うからな。
しっかり稼いどけよ、解決屋。

engChrName: You're really gonna try to stick that on my rent?
engSearchText: You're really gonna try to stick that on my rent?
jpnChrName: あー、まさか賃料が上がったりなんかは……
jpnSearchText: あー、まさか賃料が上がったりなんかは……

engChrName: Harumph! Depends, of course.
engSearchText: Harumph! Depends, of course.
jpnChrName: ハン、状況に寄りけりだな。
jpnSearchText: ハン、状況に寄りけりだな。

engChrName: Have mercy on my wallet, I beg you...
engSearchText: Have mercy on my wallet, I beg you...
jpnChrName: クッ、俺の小遣い（パーツ代）が…… お手柔らかに頼むぜ、マジで……
jpnSearchText:
クッ、俺の小遣い（パーツ代）が……
お手柔らかに頼むぜ、マジで……

engChrName: (I didn't realize he actually had savings. Hopefully he can keep them...)
engSearchText:
(I didn't realize he actually had savings. Hopefully he
can keep them...)
jpnChrName: （……この人、ちゃんと貯金とかしてるのかな。   微妙に不安を覚えるんだけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（……この人、ちゃんと貯金とかしてるのかな。
微妙に不安を覚えるんだけど。）

engChrName: (Van is the type who lives for his hobbies. If his rent gets raised...)
engSearchText:
(Van is the type who lives for his hobbies. If his rent
gets raised...)
jpnChrName: （ど、どうでしょう……ヴァンさんは   趣味に生きている所がありますから……）
jpnSearchText:
（ど、どうでしょう……ヴァンさんは
趣味に生きている所がありますから……）

engChrName: Rgh! Ahh... Really killing me tonight.
engSearchText: Rgh! Ahh... Really killing me tonight.
jpnChrName: いつつ……今夜は痛みやがるな……
jpnSearchText: いつつ……今夜は痛みやがるな……

engChrName: Your back again? You really oughta take a break.
engSearchText: Your back again? You really oughta take a break.
jpnChrName: おやっさん、腰痛か？ ちょいと辛そうだが……
jpnSearchText:
おやっさん、腰痛か？
ちょいと辛そうだが……

engChrName: It isn't that—oof! Damn it, I hate this aging thing...
engSearchText: It isn't that—oof! Damn it, I hate this aging thing...
jpnChrName: ああ、大した事はねえんだが…… ……ったく歳は取りたくねえぜ……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、大した事はねえんだが……
……ったく歳は取りたくねえぜ……

engChrName: Gah! Pull yourself together, Victor! Long as Yumé's still small enough to fit in my arms, I gotta keep this bistro going.
engSearchText:
Gah! Pull yourself together, Victor! Long as Yumé's
still small enough to fit in my arms, I gotta keep this
bistro going.
jpnChrName: いや、まだまだ負けてられるか！ この手でユメを抱き上げてやるためにも──
jpnSearchText:
いや、まだまだ負けてられるか！
この手でユメを抱き上げてやるためにも──

engChrName: (Well, with an attitude like that, he's set for life.)
engSearchText: (Well, with an attitude like that, he's set for life.)
jpnChrName: （……この調子なら   もう何年かは大丈夫そうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……この調子なら
もう何年かは大丈夫そうだな。）

engChrName: Nights are getting colder, that's probably what it is. Makes my back act up.
engSearchText:
Nights are getting colder, that's probably what it is.
Makes my back act up.
jpnChrName: フン、近頃は日が落ちると冷えるからな。 きっとその所為だろうよ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、近頃は日が落ちると冷えるからな。
きっとその所為だろうよ。

engChrName: ...But I can sleep when I'm dead. Gotta care for Yumé until she can take care of herself!
engSearchText:
...But I can sleep when I'm dead. Gotta care for
Yumé until she can take care of herself!
jpnChrName: ……まだまだ倒れるわけにはいかねえ。 ユメが成人するまではな──！
jpnSearchText:
……まだまだ倒れるわけにはいかねえ。
ユメが成人するまではな──！

engChrName: You sure you got that much left in the tank?
engSearchText: You sure you got that much left in the tank?
jpnChrName: ってさすがに欲張りすぎだろ！
jpnSearchText: ってさすがに欲張りすぎだろ！

engChrName: If you're looking for Yumé, she's out. She's on delivery duty, just for today.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for Yumé, she's out. She's on
delivery duty, just for today.
jpnChrName: ……ユメのやつなら出かけてるぜ。 今日限定で“出前サービス”中でな。
jpnSearchText:
……ユメのやつなら出かけてるぜ。
今日限定で“出前サービス”中でな。

engChrName: She wanted to help out, so I got her to go deliver the lunches Paulette made.
engSearchText:
She wanted to help out, so I got her to go deliver
the lunches Paulette made.
jpnChrName: お使いをやりたいってんで、折角だから注文を取って ポーレットの弁当を届けさせてるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
お使いをやりたいってんで、折角だから注文を取って
ポーレットの弁当を届けさせてるんだが……

engChrName: I just hope she doesn't trip, or get lost, or something...
engSearchText: I just hope she doesn't trip, or get lost, or something...
jpnChrName: クッ……途中で転んだりしてねえか……？ 届け先は間違えてねえだろうな……？
jpnSearchText:
クッ……途中で転んだりしてねえか……？
届け先は間違えてねえだろうな……？

engChrName: Oh, but she was just sooo precious! ♪ Had her little basket and everything...
engSearchText:
Oh, but she was just sooo precious! ♪ Had her little
basket and everything...
jpnChrName: ……だが可愛いかったなぁ～♪ バスケットを持って出かけるユメの姿……㈱
jpnSearchText:
……だが可愛いかったなぁ～♪
バスケットを持って出かけるユメの姿……㈱

engChrName: Place is packed today, huh, pops?
engSearchText: Place is packed today, huh, pops?
jpnChrName: おやっさんも忙しいな……
jpnSearchText: おやっさんも忙しいな……

engChrName: ...Word of advice, gramps: don't make that face in public.
engSearchText:
...Word of advice, gramps: don't make that face
in public.
jpnChrName: つーかキモ顔やめろっつの。
jpnSearchText: つーかキモ顔やめろっつの。

engChrName: Ooh, Yumé's running errands? That's pretty exciting!
engSearchText: Ooh, Yumé's running errands? That's pretty exciting!
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんのお使い── ちょっとドキドキですねっ！
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃんのお使い──
ちょっとドキドキですねっ！

engChrName: If you see Yumé, make sure she doesn't get into trouble, got it?
engSearchText:
If you see Yumé, make sure she doesn't get into
trouble, got it?
jpnChrName: お前らもユメを見かけたら しっかり影から見守りやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
お前らもユメを見かけたら
しっかり影から見守りやがれ。

engChrName: Any shady-looking fellow gets within ten arge, you knock 'em into next week for me.
engSearchText:
Any shady-looking fellow gets within ten arge, you
knock 'em into next week for me.
jpnChrName: でもって妙な男が近づきやがったら 速攻で排除しろ、いいな──！？
jpnSearchText:
でもって妙な男が近づきやがったら
速攻で排除しろ、いいな──！？

engChrName: Ehh, she'll be fine. You don't get guys like that around here much.
engSearchText:
Ehh, she'll be fine. You don't get guys like that
around here much.
jpnChrName: 心配せずとも、この辺りに そんなヤツはそうそう出ねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
心配せずとも、この辺りに
そんなヤツはそうそう出ねえよ。

engChrName: Hmph. Never can be too careful. This place isn't like it used to be. Heard Messeldam's getting pretty sketchy, too... Something about terrorists.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Never can be too careful. This place isn't like
it used to be. Heard Messeldam's getting pretty
sketchy, too... Something about terrorists.
jpnChrName: フン、ここの所キナ臭い話が増えてきたな。 メッセルダムでもテロがどうとか言いやがるし……
jpnSearchText:
フン、ここの所キナ臭い話が増えてきたな。
メッセルダムでもテロがどうとか言いやがるし……

engChrName: Been hearing stuff about 'keeping the outsiders out' and crap... Used to hear that a lot when I was young, too.
engSearchText:
Been hearing stuff about 'keeping the outsiders out'
and crap... Used to hear that a lot when I was
young, too.
jpnChrName: 一時期の民族排斥運動みてえなのが 盛り返してきてるのかもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
一時期の民族排斥運動みてえなのが
盛り返してきてるのかもしれん。

engChrName: Don't get today's youngsters falling for that BS, got it?
engSearchText:
Don't get today's youngsters falling for that BS,
got it?
jpnChrName: ……あんま若い者を巻き込むんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText: ……あんま若い者を巻き込むんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: I know, I know. But you keep worryin' about 'em so much and all your hair's gonna fall out.
engSearchText:
I know, I know. But you keep worryin' about 'em so
much and all your hair's gonna fall out.
jpnChrName: ああ、わーってるよ。 おやっさんもあんま気に病むと禿げるぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、わーってるよ。
おやっさんもあんま気に病むと禿げるぜ？

engChrName: Harumph! Watch it, kid. Just be smart out there, you hear me?
engSearchText:
Harumph! Watch it, kid. Just be smart out there, you
hear me?
jpnChrName: ハン……余計なお世話だ。 ともかく気を付けてやれ、いいな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……余計なお世話だ。
ともかく気を付けてやれ、いいな。

engChrName: I've seen that slippery slope. People get caught up in some damned awful stuff.
engSearchText:
I've seen that slippery slope. People get caught up in
some damned awful stuff.
jpnChrName: ……この国じゃ昔から、ちょくちょく 妙に陰湿な事件が起きやがる。
jpnSearchText:
……この国じゃ昔から、ちょくちょく
妙に陰湿な事件が起きやがる。

engChrName: Hate crimes, demon cults, terrorists... Hmph. Can't help worryin' about the way things are going.
engSearchText:
Hate crimes, demon cults, terrorists... Hmph.
Can't help worryin' about the way things are going.
jpnChrName: 民族テロだの、悪魔を崇拝する教団だの…… ハン、いつまでも気が休まらねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
民族テロだの、悪魔を崇拝する教団だの……
ハン、いつまでも気が休まらねえぜ。

engChrName: Hey, Red. You make a move on Paulette again, and I find out about it? You're gone.
engSearchText:
Hey, Red. You make a move on Paulette again, and I
find out about it? You're gone.
jpnChrName: ……おい赤毛、テメエ次にポーレットに ちょっかいかけやがったら承知しねェからな。
jpnSearchText:
……おい赤毛、テメエ次にポーレットに
ちょっかいかけやがったら承知しねェからな。

engChrName: Oh, don't be such a prude. She's twenty-seven! This is the prime of her life, you get what I mean?
engSearchText:
Oh, don't be such a prude. She's twenty-seven!
This is the prime of her life, you get what I mean?
jpnChrName: そう睨むなよオヤジ。 まだ２７なんだろ？　勿体ねえじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
そう睨むなよオヤジ。
まだ２７なんだろ？　勿体ねえじゃねえか。

engChrName: I've seen some real bombshells at my local haunts, and y'know, she'd fit right in. But I get her to myself and I think I'd make all three of us happy!
engSearchText:
I've seen some real bombshells at my local haunts, and
y'know, she'd fit right in. But I get her to myself and
I think I'd make all three of us happy!
jpnChrName: オレ様もイイ感じの店を開拓中だしよ、 ここは一石二鳥ってヤツじゃね？
jpnSearchText:
オレ様もイイ感じの店を開拓中だしよ、
ここは一石二鳥ってヤツじゃね？

engChrName: YOU ARE A DEAD MAN.
engSearchText: YOU ARE A DEAD MAN.
jpnChrName: ── 摘 ま み だ す ぞ 、 小 僧 ──
jpnSearchText: <S5>── 摘 ま み だ す ぞ 、 小 僧 ──

engChrName: (As if dealing with just one of 'em wasn't bad enough... And here I thought they might find some common ground.)
engSearchText:
(As if dealing with just one of 'em wasn't
bad enough... And here I thought they might find
some common ground.)
jpnChrName: （ったくこの二人は……   しかも微妙に噛み合ってねえしよ……）
jpnSearchText:
（ったくこの二人は……
しかも微妙に噛み合ってねえしよ……）

engChrName: You. Make yourself useful and keep Red over there in check, got it?
engSearchText:
You. Make yourself useful and keep Red over there in
check, got it?
jpnChrName: ……おい不良店子、あの赤毛だが…… 手綱はしっかり握っておけよ。
jpnSearchText:
……おい不良店子、あの赤毛だが……
手綱はしっかり握っておけよ。

engChrName: I'm teaching that brat a lesson. He talks to her, he even LOOKS at her again, and I'm gonna—
engSearchText:
I'm teaching that brat a lesson. He talks to
her, he even LOOKS at her again, and
I'm gonna—
jpnChrName: 特に次ポーレットにちょっかいかけやがったら 叩き出すからな、よく言い含めておけ──
jpnSearchText:
特に次ポーレットにちょっかいかけやがったら
叩き出すからな、よく言い含めておけ──

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, I know. You could really stand to calm down a little, pops.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah, I know. You could really stand to calm
down a little, pops.
jpnChrName: へいへい……おやっさんも もうちょい落ち着いてくれっての。
jpnSearchText:
へいへい……おやっさんも
もうちょい落ち着いてくれっての。

engChrName: (Victor looks like he's about to explode...)
engSearchText: (Victor looks like he's about to explode...)
jpnChrName: （ビクトルさんも気が気じゃなさそうですね……）
jpnSearchText: （ビクトルさんも気が気じゃなさそうですね……）

engChrName: (Hmm... Maybe I should leave. It's getting really rowdy in here.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... Maybe I should leave. It's getting really
rowdy in here.)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、これから賑やかに   なりそうかもです。）
jpnSearchText:
（う～ん、これから賑やかに
なりそうかもです。）

engChrName: That red-haired punk. Shot his shot while I wasn't looking...
engSearchText:
That red-haired punk. Shot his shot while I
wasn't looking...
jpnChrName: 赤毛風情が……今日もポーレットに ちょっかいかけやがって……
jpnSearchText:
赤毛風情が……今日もポーレットに
ちょっかいかけやがって……

engChrName: ...but I'm gonna catch him next time, and when I do, his scrawny little ass is GRASS! You hear me?!
engSearchText:
...but I'm gonna catch him next time, and
when I do, his scrawny little ass is GRASS!
You hear me?!
jpnChrName: 次やりやがったら叩き出すからな、 よく覚えておきやがれ──！
jpnSearchText:
次やりやがったら叩き出すからな、
よく覚えておきやがれ──！

engChrName: What, you going out? Doesn't look like you're hitting the bathhouse.
engSearchText:
What, you going out? Doesn't look like you're hitting
the bathhouse.
jpnChrName: なんだ、出かけんのか？ ひとっ風呂浴びてくるって風でもなさそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、出かけんのか？
ひとっ風呂浴びてくるって風でもなさそうだが……

engChrName: Hmph, just come back quickly. Damned delinquents running around doing as they please...
engSearchText:
Hmph, just come back quickly. Damned delinquents
running around doing as they please...
jpnChrName: フン、この不良店子が……早めに戻れよ。
jpnSearchText: フン、この不良店子が……早めに戻れよ。

engChrName: Easy there. I won't be long—trust me.
engSearchText: Easy there. I won't be long—trust me.
jpnChrName: ああ、わーってるっての。 今日はほどほどで戻るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、わーってるっての。
今日はほどほどで戻るぜ。

engChrName: Thank you so much for the lunch, Victor! It was delicious as always!
engSearchText:
Thank you so much for the lunch, Victor! It was
delicious as always!
jpnChrName: ビクトルさん、ランチご馳走様でしたっ！ 今日も美味しかったです！
jpnSearchText:
ビクトルさん、ランチご馳走様でしたっ！
今日も美味しかったです！

engChrName: Heh heh. Glad you liked it, kiddo!
engSearchText: Heh heh. Glad you liked it, kiddo!
jpnChrName: 口に合ったみてえで何よりだぜ。
jpnSearchText: 口に合ったみてえで何よりだぜ。

engChrName: Tonight I've got some Central Eastern seasoning I'm gonna use, so leave some room for dinner, all right?
engSearchText:
Tonight I've got some Central Eastern seasoning I'm
gonna use, so leave some room for dinner, all right?
jpnChrName: 今夜は中東風の味付けも出してやる。 あまり遅くならねえようにな。
jpnSearchText:
今夜は中東風の味付けも出してやる。
あまり遅くならねえようにな。

engChrName: Oooh, sounds good! I can't wait!
engSearchText: Oooh, sounds good! I can't wait!
jpnChrName: はいっ！　楽しみです！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！　楽しみです！

engChrName: Y'know, you really spoil Feri, don'tcha?
engSearchText: Y'know, you really spoil Feri, don'tcha?
jpnChrName: ……おやっさん、フェリには微妙に甘いよな？
jpnSearchText: ……おやっさん、フェリには微妙に甘いよな？

engChrName: ...Huh? Hell are you on about?
engSearchText: ...Huh? Hell are you on about?
jpnChrName: ああ？　お前何言ってやがる……
jpnSearchText: ああ？　お前何言ってやがる……

engChrName: She's living in another country, her parents aren't around, she's never been here before... What kinda jackass WOULDN'T be nice to her?!
engSearchText:
She's living in another country, her parents aren't
around, she's never been here before... What kinda
jackass WOULDN'T be nice to her?!
jpnChrName: こんな歳の娘っこが、親元を離れて異国暮らし── 親が心配しねえわけがねえだろうが！
jpnSearchText:
こんな歳の娘っこが、親元を離れて異国暮らし──
親が心配しねえわけがねえだろうが！

engChrName: If Yumé or Paulette were living like that, I... Oh, forget it! Come now, little lady, eat up! What'd you like?
engSearchText:
If Yumé or Paulette were living like that, I...
Oh, forget it! Come now, little lady, eat up!
What'd you like?
jpnChrName: これがユメやポーレットだったらと思うと俺は…… ……へっ、何でも注文していきやがれってんだ！
jpnSearchText:
これがユメやポーレットだったらと思うと俺は……
……へっ、何でも注文していきやがれってんだ！

engChrName: (Heh. Big ol' papa bear.)
engSearchText: (Heh. Big ol' papa bear.)
jpnChrName: （親バカが発動してんじゃねーかよ。）
jpnSearchText: （親バカが発動してんじゃねーかよ。）

engChrName: (He's not so bad of a landlord, now, is he?)
engSearchText: (He's not so bad of a landlord, now, is he?)
jpnChrName: （あはは……   本当にいい大家さんですよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……
本当にいい大家さんですよね。）

engChrName: I've got plenty of good eats for you, so you ever get hungry, just lemme know.
engSearchText:
I've got plenty of good eats for you, so you ever get
hungry, just lemme know.
jpnChrName: メシの方は作ってやる。 腹が減ったら遠慮なく声をかけろ。
jpnSearchText:
メシの方は作ってやる。
腹が減ったら遠慮なく声をかけろ。

engChrName: And this is just the dad in me talking, but don't worry your folks at home, all right?
engSearchText:
And this is just the dad in me talking, but don't worry
your folks at home, all right?
jpnChrName: それと──親に心配かけねえようにな。
jpnSearchText: それと──親に心配かけねえようにな。

engChrName: Make sure to write them every now and then. They wanna know what their little girl's up to.
engSearchText:
Make sure to write them every now and then.
They wanna know what their little girl's up to.
jpnChrName: たまには手紙くらい出してやりな。 何だかんだ言っても喜んでくれるだろうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
たまには手紙くらい出してやりな。
何だかんだ言っても喜んでくれるだろうぜ。

engChrName: Heehee! Will do!
engSearchText: Heehee! Will do!
jpnChrName: えへへ、はいっ！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、はいっ！

engChrName: Hmph. Heading out again?
engSearchText: Hmph. Heading out again?
jpnChrName: フン……出かけんのか。
jpnSearchText: フン……出かけんのか。

engChrName: As your landlord, I can't help taking notice.
engSearchText: As your landlord, I can't help taking notice.
jpnChrName: こちとら大家をやってる手前、 無関心ってワケにもいかなくてな。
jpnSearchText:
こちとら大家をやってる手前、
無関心ってワケにもいかなくてな。

engChrName: I won't ask what you're doing—just be smart out there, you get me?
engSearchText:
I won't ask what you're doing—just be smart out
there, you get me?
jpnChrName: 事情は聞かねえが、 ──くれぐれも無茶はすんなよ？
jpnSearchText:
事情は聞かねえが、
──くれぐれも無茶はすんなよ？

engChrName: Of course. Thank you for your concern.
engSearchText: Of course. Thank you for your concern.
jpnChrName: はい……！ お気遣いありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
はい……！
お気遣いありがとうございます。

engChrName: Don't worry about me, though. I know what I need to do.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about me, though. I know what I need
to do.
jpnChrName: ですが大丈夫です。 これも自分で決めたことですから。
jpnSearchText:
ですが大丈夫です。
これも自分で決めたことですから。

engChrName: Good answer.
engSearchText: Good answer.
jpnChrName: いい返事だ。
jpnSearchText: いい返事だ。

engChrName: Van, she comes back with so much as a scratch on her and I'm personally burying you. Mark my words.
engSearchText:
Van, she comes back with so much as a scratch on her
and I'm personally burying you. Mark my words.
jpnChrName: ──ヴァン、この嬢ちゃんに何かあったら 叩き出すからな、よく覚えておきやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
──ヴァン、この嬢ちゃんに何かあったら
叩き出すからな、よく覚えておきやがれ。

engChrName: All right, I get it! Don't pop a blood vessel.
engSearchText: All right, I get it! Don't pop a blood vessel.
jpnChrName: わーってるっての。 そう心配すんなよ、おやっさん。
jpnSearchText:
わーってるっての。
そう心配すんなよ、おやっさん。

engChrName: Hmph. I wouldn't worry about her if you didn't gimme a reason to.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I wouldn't worry about her if you didn't
gimme a reason to.
jpnChrName: フン、てめえってヤツは 基本的にルーズだからな。
jpnSearchText:
フン、てめえってヤツは
基本的にルーズだからな。

engChrName: Anyhow, you've been eating properly, right?
engSearchText: Anyhow, you've been eating properly, right?
jpnChrName: そもそもちゃんとしたモン、食ってんのか？
jpnSearchText: そもそもちゃんとしたモン、食ってんのか？

engChrName: More or less. Sometimes Yumé dumps the leftover veggies on me.
engSearchText:
More or less. Sometimes Yumé dumps the leftover
veggies on me.
jpnChrName: たまにユメが、この店の 余り物の野菜を押し付けてくるからな。
jpnSearchText:
たまにユメが、この店の
余り物の野菜を押し付けてくるからな。

engChrName: And I do cook for myself a lot.
engSearchText: And I do cook for myself a lot.
jpnChrName: そんときゃ一応、自炊してるぜ。
jpnSearchText: そんときゃ一応、自炊してるぜ。

engChrName: Really? I didn't realize you could cook!
engSearchText: Really? I didn't realize you could cook!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんも料理とかするんですね。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんも料理とかするんですね。

engChrName: ...Why is that surprising?
engSearchText: ...Why is that surprising?
jpnChrName: ……何、意外そうな顔してやがる。
jpnSearchText: ……何、意外そうな顔してやがる。

engChrName: I make a mean sweet omelet, I'll have you know.
engSearchText: I make a mean sweet omelet, I'll have you know.
jpnChrName: 言っておくが、 俺のスイートオムレツは絶品だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
言っておくが、
俺のスイートオムレツは絶品だぜ。

engChrName: Sweet...omelet?
engSearchText: Sweet...omelet?
jpnChrName: 甘いオムレツなんですね。
jpnSearchText: 甘いオムレツなんですね。

engChrName: Still rotting your teeth with that stuff, eh?
engSearchText: Still rotting your teeth with that stuff, eh?
jpnChrName: 相変わらず、度を越した甘党ぶりだな。
jpnSearchText: 相変わらず、度を越した甘党ぶりだな。

engChrName: Here, make some better stuff.
engSearchText: Here, make some better stuff.
jpnChrName: そらよ、こいつを持ってけ。
jpnSearchText: そらよ、こいつを持ってけ。

engChrName: Obtained Ingredient Set.
engSearchText: Obtained Ingredient Set.
jpnChrName: 食材セットを受け取った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>食材セットを受け取った。

engChrName: Oh, thanks.
engSearchText: Oh, thanks.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、おやっさん。
jpnSearchText: 悪いな、おやっさん。

engChrName: Are you sure it's okay to give us so much?
engSearchText: Are you sure it's okay to give us so much?
jpnChrName: こんなに頂いていいんですか？
jpnSearchText: こんなに頂いていいんですか？

engChrName: They're just leftovers from this morning, no worries.
engSearchText: They're just leftovers from this morning, no worries.
jpnChrName: 今朝出た余りモンだ、 別に構いやしねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
今朝出た余りモンだ、
別に構いやしねえよ。

engChrName: You get hungry, whip something up for yourselves.
engSearchText: You get hungry, whip something up for yourselves.
jpnChrName: 腹が減ったら、 そいつで何か作って食べな。
jpnSearchText:
腹が減ったら、
そいつで何か作って食べな。

engChrName: The office's kitchen is now available for cooking.
engSearchText: The office's kitchen is now available for cooking.
jpnChrName: 事務所のキッチンで料理ができるようになった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>事務所のキッチンで料理ができるようになった。

engChrName: The Achievements section of the main menu is now unlocked.
engSearchText:
The Achievements section of the main menu is
now unlocked.
jpnChrName: メインメニュー『アチーブメント』が解放された。
jpnSearchText: <C1>メインメニュー『アチーブメント』が解放された。

engChrName: You can ask Paulette, she'll make something nice for you...
engSearchText:
You can ask Paulette, she'll make something nice
for you...
jpnChrName: ポーレットに声をかけりゃ ある程度のモンは作ってやるが……
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットに声をかけりゃ
ある程度のモンは作ってやるが……

engChrName: ...but don't slack on cooking for yourself, got it?
engSearchText: ...but don't slack on cooking for yourself, got it?
jpnChrName: 自炊もサボんじゃねえぞ。 分かったな？
jpnSearchText:
自炊もサボんじゃねえぞ。
分かったな？

engChrName: And don't you dare slack on the job, either.
engSearchText: And don't you dare slack on the job, either.
jpnChrName: フン、仕事の方もきっちりこなしてきやがれ。
jpnSearchText: フン、仕事の方もきっちりこなしてきやがれ。

engChrName: Damn kids today...
engSearchText: Damn kids today...
jpnChrName: ったく不良店子が……
jpnSearchText: ったく不良店子が……

engChrName: Listen up. You know where the bad neighborhoods are—you'd better not be taking her to them.
engSearchText:
Listen up. You know where the bad neighborhoods
are—you'd better not be taking her to them.
jpnChrName: ──いいか、くれぐれも 怪しい界隈に連れ回すんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
──いいか、くれぐれも
怪しい界隈に連れ回すんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: You cause any problems and I BECOME the problem, you hear me?
engSearchText:
You cause any problems and I BECOME the
problem, you hear me?
jpnChrName: 問題を起こしやがったら 承知しねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
問題を起こしやがったら
承知しねえからな。

engChrName: (Aww, heehee. He's got a heart of gold beneath that exterior.)
engSearchText:
(Aww, heehee. He's got a heart of gold beneath
that exterior.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、本当にいいご主人ですね。）
jpnSearchText: （ふふっ、本当にいいご主人ですね。）

engChrName: (Pretty good chef, too. Just ask him if you're hungry and he'll whip somethin' up for you.)
engSearchText:
(Pretty good chef, too. Just ask him if you're hungry
and he'll whip somethin' up for you.)
jpnChrName: （これで料理の腕も中々でな。   ま、機会がありゃあ頼んでみろよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（これで料理の腕も中々でな。
ま、機会がありゃあ頼んでみろよ。）

engChrName: Well, I'll be damned... I knew you were hiding something. You're pretty good.
engSearchText:
Well, I'll be damned... I knew you were
hiding something. You're pretty good.
jpnChrName: ほう、これはこれは……！ やはり想像以上にお強いようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ほう、これはこれは……！
やはり想像以上にお強いようだ。

engChrName: I used to be top eight in amateurs, and you've got me on the back foot... It's been a while since I had a match this good.
engSearchText:
I used to be top eight in amateurs, and you've got me
on the back foot... It's been a while since I had a
match this good.
jpnChrName: アマチュアリーグ・ベスト８の私が防戦一方とは ……久々に好敵手に巡り合えたようです。
jpnSearchText:
アマチュアリーグ・ベスト８の私が防戦一方とは
……久々に好敵手に巡り合えたようです。

engChrName: Don't sell yourself short, Sir Victor. You would put many a knight to shame.
engSearchText:
Don't sell yourself short, Sir Victor. You would put
many a knight to shame.
jpnChrName: フフ、ビクトル殿こそ大したものだ。 騎士団でもここまでの使い手は稀有でしょうな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ビクトル殿こそ大したものだ。
騎士団でもここまでの使い手は稀有でしょうな。

engChrName: You may even be able to hold your ground against the commander.
engSearchText:
You may even be able to hold your ground against
the commander.
jpnChrName: あるいは総長とも 良い勝負が繰り広げられるやも──
jpnSearchText:
あるいは総長とも
良い勝負が繰り広げられるやも──

engChrName: Really, now? I'd love to sit down with them some day.
engSearchText: Really, now? I'd love to sit down with them some day.
jpnChrName: ほう、それはそれは……！ 一度お会いしてみたいものですが。
jpnSearchText:
ほう、それはそれは……！
一度お会いしてみたいものですが。

engChrName: (Just how high is he rated?!)
engSearchText: (Just how high is he rated?!)
jpnChrName: （ってどんだけハイレベルなんだっつの……！？）
jpnSearchText: （ってどんだけハイレベルなんだっつの……！？）

engChrName: (...Well, at least they're havin' a good time.)
engSearchText: (...Well, at least they're havin' a good time.)
jpnChrName: （……ま、二人とも楽しそうでいいけどよ。）
jpnSearchText: （……ま、二人とも楽しそうでいいけどよ。）

engChrName: has been added to the menu.
engSearchText: has been added to the menu.
jpnChrName: 「{CC_ITEM=itemId}」が メニューに追加された
jpnSearchText:
「{CC_ITEM=itemId}」が
メニューに追加された

engChrName: Damn it all... Why? Why'd this have to happen...?
engSearchText: Damn it all... Why? Why'd this have to happen...?
jpnChrName: クソ……まさか こんな事になっちまうとはな。
jpnSearchText:
クソ……まさか
こんな事になっちまうとはな。

engChrName: I saw Hans just the other day... He always came down to sell their vegetables...
engSearchText:
I saw Hans just the other day... He always came down
to sell their vegetables...
jpnChrName: ええ……いつも野菜を 卸しに来てくれていたハンス君……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……いつも野菜を
卸しに来てくれていたハンス君……

engChrName: Annie would always stop by to eat... Sister Belicia, too...
engSearchText:
Annie would always stop by to eat... Sister
Belicia, too...
jpnChrName: ウチにも食べに来てくれたアニーちゃんや シスターのベルシアさんなんかも……
jpnSearchText:
ウチにも食べに来てくれたアニーちゃんや
シスターのベルシアさんなんかも……

engChrName: (That's right... They sourced their vegetables from Creil Village...)
engSearchText:
(That's right... They sourced their vegetables from
Creil Village...)
jpnChrName: （そういえばこちらはクレイユ村から   直接野菜を仕入れていたって……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういえばこちらはクレイユ村から
直接野菜を仕入れていたって……）

engChrName: (I had no idea...)
engSearchText: (I had no idea...)
jpnChrName: （！　そうだったの……）
jpnSearchText: （！　そうだったの……）

engChrName: (Yeah... This place was a popular spot for 'em whenever they'd stop by.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah... This place was a popular spot for 'em
whenever they'd stop by.)
jpnChrName: （ああ……ついでに首都に来た村人が   立ち寄ることも多かったみてぇだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ……ついでに首都に来た村人が
立ち寄ることも多かったみてぇだな。）

engChrName: You're heading out to work already...?
engSearchText: You're heading out to work already...?
jpnChrName: お前らか…… もう、仕事に出るのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
お前らか……
もう、仕事に出るのかよ？

engChrName: With the state of emergency, it's gotten quite chaotic out there... Will you be all right?
engSearchText:
With the state of emergency, it's gotten quite chaotic
out there... Will you be all right?
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言が出ているけど…… 大丈夫なのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言が出ているけど……
大丈夫なのかしら？

engChrName: Should be. They're restricting the roads in and out of the city, but we're already inside, so we're just sorta stuck here.
engSearchText:
Should be. They're restricting the roads in and out of
the city, but we're already inside, so we're just sorta
stuck here.
jpnChrName: ああ、首都への出入りは制限されてるが 首都内だったら今のところ制限はねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、首都への出入りは制限されてるが
首都内だったら今のところ制限はねぇ。

engChrName: Might as well get some work done while we're here— Aidios knows there's gonna be plenty of requests comin' in.
engSearchText:
Might as well get some work done while we're here—
Aidios knows there's gonna be plenty of requests
comin' in.
jpnChrName: こんな状況だからこその需要もありそうだし、 せいぜい稼ぎながら探ってくるさ。
jpnSearchText:
こんな状況だからこその需要もありそうだし、
せいぜい稼ぎながら探ってくるさ。

engChrName: I see... Just, please be careful out there.
engSearchText: I see... Just, please be careful out there.
jpnChrName: そう…… でもくれぐれも気をつけてね。
jpnSearchText:
そう……
でもくれぐれも気をつけてね。

engChrName: Yumé and I were awfully worried about you...but we weren't the only ones.
engSearchText:
Yumé and I were awfully worried about you...but we
weren't the only ones.
jpnChrName: ユメもそうだけど、貴方たちが無事に 帰ってくるか本当に心配だったんだから。
jpnSearchText:
ユメもそうだけど、貴方たちが無事に
帰ってくるか本当に心配だったんだから。

engChrName: In truth, Dad was worried sick, too.
engSearchText: In truth, Dad was worried sick, too.
jpnChrName: 私はもちろん、お父さんもね。
jpnSearchText: 私はもちろん、お父さんもね。

engChrName: Damn. Was he, now?
engSearchText: Damn. Was he, now?
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: I knew he had a heart of gold.
engSearchText: I knew he had a heart of gold.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Hmph. I'm not heartless. Once I knew Yumé was okay, I started wondering about you. Nothin' to it.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I'm not heartless. Once I knew Yumé was
okay, I started wondering about you. Nothin' to it.
jpnChrName: ハン、てめぇ（ヴァン）については ユメと助手共のついでくらいだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、てめぇ（ヴァン）については
ユメと助手共のついでくらいだがな。

engChrName: ...Just be smart out there, like I always say. Now especially...yeah?
engSearchText:
...Just be smart out there, like I always say.
Now especially...yeah?
jpnChrName: だが……こんな状況でも動くんなら せいぜい慎重に立ち回るこった。
jpnSearchText:
だが……こんな状況でも動くんなら
せいぜい慎重に立ち回るこった。

engChrName: Don't let that writer's work go to waste.
engSearchText: Don't let that writer's work go to waste.
jpnChrName: あの記者の青二才がやってきた事を 無駄にしないためにもな。
jpnSearchText:
あの記者の青二才がやってきた事を
無駄にしないためにもな。

engChrName: ...Yeah. I'll make sure of it.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. I'll make sure of it.
jpnChrName: ！　……ああ。 そこは肝に銘じてるつもりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
！　……ああ。
そこは肝に銘じてるつもりだぜ。

engChrName: (Dingo was a regular here, too?)
engSearchText: (Dingo was a regular here, too?)
jpnChrName: （……そっか、ディンゴさんも   この店の馴染みだったみたいね？）
jpnSearchText:
（……そっか、ディンゴさんも
この店の馴染みだったみたいね？）

engChrName: (Yes. He and Van would frequent this place together.)
engSearchText:
(Yes. He and Van would frequent this
place together.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、ヴァンさんとの付き合いで   たまに利用されてたそうです。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、ヴァンさんとの付き合いで
たまに利用されてたそうです。）

engChrName: (He had only just eaten here for Marielle's celebration...)
engSearchText:
(He had only just eaten here for
Marielle's celebration...)
jpnChrName: （……あのマリエルさんへのお祝いに   こちらでご馳走したばかりらしくて……）
jpnSearchText:
（……あのマリエルさんへのお祝いに
こちらでご馳走したばかりらしくて……）

engChrName: (...Rotten pieces of shit, all of 'em.)
engSearchText: (...Rotten pieces of shit, all of 'em.)

engChrName: (How could they have done this...? Why...?)
engSearchText: (How could they have done this...? Why...?)
jpnChrName: （…………本当に………………   ……何てことをしてくれたんだ……）
jpnSearchText:
（…………本当に………………
……何てことをしてくれたんだ……）

engChrName: (...I'm lost for words. This situation just has no compare...)
engSearchText:
(...I'm lost for words. This situation just has
no compare...)
jpnChrName: （……危機管理に関わってきた者として   改めて言葉もありませんね……）
jpnSearchText:
（……危機管理に関わってきた者として
改めて言葉もありませんね……）

engChrName: Thank you, Paulette. Truly. I really had a great time.
engSearchText: Thank you, Paulette. Truly. I really had a great time.
jpnChrName: きょ、今日は楽しかった。 ありがとう、ポーレット。
jpnSearchText:
きょ、今日は楽しかった。
ありがとう、ポーレット。

engChrName: Well, I'm glad you enjoyed yourself, even if the food wasn't mine.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm glad you enjoyed yourself, even if the food
wasn't mine.
jpnChrName: ふふ、楽しんでもらえて良かったわ。 料理を用意したのは私ではないけれど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、楽しんでもらえて良かったわ。
料理を用意したのは私ではないけれど。

engChrName: I-Is that so?! That's, uh, too bad, haha! I would've loved some of your cooking...
engSearchText:
I-Is that so?! That's, uh, too bad, haha! I would've
loved some of your cooking...
jpnChrName: そそ、そうだったのかぁ～！ それは惜し──じゃなかった、アハハ！
jpnSearchText:
そそ、そうだったのかぁ～！
それは惜し──じゃなかった、アハハ！

engChrName: Ahem! S-So, umm...
engSearchText: Ahem! S-So, umm...
jpnChrName: コホン！　そ、その……
jpnSearchText: コホン！　そ、その……

engChrName: A-About the festival!
engSearchText: A-About the festival!
jpnChrName: き、記念祭の日なんだが──！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>き、記念祭の日なんだが──！！

engChrName: I mean, umm... Do you wanna, maybe, go with me? W-With Yumé, too, of course!
engSearchText:
I mean, umm... Do you wanna, maybe, go with me?
W-With Yumé, too, of course!
jpnChrName: 僕と……一緒に見て回らないか。 ……もも、もちろんユメ君も一緒に……
jpnSearchText:
僕と……一緒に見て回らないか。
……もも、もちろんユメ君も一緒に……

engChrName: M-May I have this date?!
engSearchText: M-May I have this date?!
jpnChrName: 貴女をデートに誘わせて下さいッ──！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>貴女をデートに誘わせて下さいッ──！！

engChrName: ...I'm afraid I can't, sorry.
engSearchText: ...I'm afraid I can't, sorry.
jpnChrName: デートをお受けする事はできないけれど……
jpnSearchText: デートをお受けする事はできないけれど……

engChrName: (GARGH?!)
engSearchText: (GARGH?!)
jpnChrName: （グサァ──ッ！？）

engChrName: But I wouldn't mind if you showed Yumé around at the festival...
engSearchText:
But I wouldn't mind if you showed Yumé around at
the festival...
jpnChrName: もしかして、ユメに記念祭を 案内してくださるというなら──
jpnSearchText:
もしかして、ユメに記念祭を
案内してくださるというなら──

engChrName: ...and I might just come along with you.
engSearchText: ...and I might just come along with you.
jpnChrName: 私も同行するのがいいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText: 私も同行するのがいいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Oh, geez. Haha...
engSearchText: Oh, geez. Haha...
jpnChrName: ハ、ハハ……
jpnSearchText: ハ、ハハ……

engChrName: W-Well, that's fine by me!
engSearchText: W-Well, that's fine by me!
jpnChrName: グスッ……どうかそれで よろしくお願いしますっ！！
jpnSearchText:
グスッ……どうかそれで
よろしくお願いしますっ！！

engChrName: (Wow. He actually had the balls to ask. And she AGREED...sorta.)
engSearchText:
(Wow. He actually had the balls to ask. And she
AGREED...sorta.)
jpnChrName: （あーあ、ついに誘いやがったか。   ポーレットも条件付きとはいえ……）
jpnSearchText:
（あーあ、ついに誘いやがったか。
ポーレットも条件付きとはいえ……）

engChrName: (He's got a real marathon ahead of him. I'll have to keep an eye on how he does.)
engSearchText:
(He's got a real marathon ahead of him. I'll have to
keep an eye on how he does.)
jpnChrName: （ま、とはいえ道は長そうだがな。   精々見守らせてもらうとするかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、とはいえ道は長そうだがな。
精々見守らせてもらうとするかね。）

engChrName: *sniffle* Thank you, Paulette. I'll make it the best day of her life!
engSearchText:
*sniffle* Thank you, Paulette. I'll make it the best day
of her life!
jpnChrName: グスッ、ありがとうポーレット── 誠心誠意、案内させてもらうよ！
jpnSearchText:
グスッ、ありがとうポーレット──
誠心誠意、案内させてもらうよ！

engChrName: Aww, don't go crying just yet.
engSearchText: Aww, don't go crying just yet.
jpnChrName: ふふ、いつも泣いてばかりなんですから。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、いつも泣いてばかりなんですから。

engChrName: You'd better not pass that habit on to Yumé, okay?
engSearchText: You'd better not pass that habit on to Yumé, okay?
jpnChrName: ……ユメに変な癖が 移らないといいのだけれど。
jpnSearchText:
……ユメに変な癖が
移らないといいのだけれど。

engChrName: R-Right! I'll make sure of it!
engSearchText: R-Right! I'll make sure of it!
jpnChrName: きっ、きっ、きっ……気を付けマスッ！！
jpnSearchText: きっ、きっ、きっ……気を付けマスッ！！

engChrName: (Can't blame her for being wary of him. Dude's got a lotta ground to make up.)
engSearchText:
(Can't blame her for being wary of him. Dude's got a
lotta ground to make up.)
jpnChrName: （ポーレットに許される日が来んのか……   ま、精々見守らせてもらうとするかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ポーレットに許される日が来んのか……
ま、精々見守らせてもらうとするかね。）

engChrName: I'm relieved to see you're all back home safe.
engSearchText: I'm relieved to see you're all back home safe.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ともかく 無事に帰ってきてくれてほっとしたわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ともかく
無事に帰ってきてくれてほっとしたわ。

engChrName: Yumé's energetic as ever, so you can't just leave her without someone to play with, no?
engSearchText:
Yumé's energetic as ever, so you can't just leave her
without someone to play with, no?
jpnChrName: ユメも遊びたがっていたし、 これからもよろしくね？
jpnSearchText:
ユメも遊びたがっていたし、
これからもよろしくね？

engChrName: You got it.
engSearchText: You got it.
jpnChrName: ああ……了解だ、ポーレット。
jpnSearchText: ああ……了解だ、ポーレット。

engChrName: Ah, that reminds me.
engSearchText: Ah, that reminds me.
jpnChrName: あ、そういえば……
jpnSearchText: あ、そういえば……

engChrName: Are you all right with your room, Judith?
engSearchText: Are you all right with your room, Judith?
jpnChrName: ──ジュディスさん、 お部屋の方は不便ないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
──ジュディスさん、
お部屋の方は不便ないかしら？

engChrName: Huh? Oh! Yeah, it's perfectly fine. You even got me furniture and everything!
engSearchText:
Huh? Oh! Yeah, it's perfectly fine. You even got me
furniture and everything!
jpnChrName: ！　……ええ、それはもう。 家具も用意してもらっちゃって。
jpnSearchText:
！　……ええ、それはもう。
家具も用意してもらっちゃって。

engChrName: I just wasn't expecting you to recognize me off-screen.
engSearchText:
I just wasn't expecting you to recognize
me off-screen.
jpnChrName: ……それにしてもこの格好で よくあたしだって判りましたね？
jpnSearchText:
……それにしてもこの格好で
よくあたしだって判りましたね？

engChrName: Well, as the landlady, I know a thing or two about my tenants. Heehee.
engSearchText:
Well, as the landlady, I know a thing or two about
my tenants. Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そこは大家ですから。 店子のことは何となく、かしら。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そこは大家ですから。
店子のことは何となく、かしら。

engChrName: I-I see... (...It's like she's giving me stage fright.)
engSearchText:
I-I see...
(...It's like she's giving me stage fright.)
jpnChrName: な、なるほど…… （只者じゃないわね、この人も。）
jpnSearchText:
な、なるほど……
（只者じゃないわね、この人も。）

engChrName: (She's quite astute, yes.)
engSearchText: (She's quite astute, yes.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……   さすがはポーレットさんですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……
さすがはポーレットさんですね。）

engChrName: (Brings me back to when I first moved in.)
engSearchText: (Brings me back to when I first moved in.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、な。   俺が入った時のことを思い出すぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、な。
俺が入った時のことを思い出すぜ。）

engChrName: It does worry me sometimes, how late Yumé stays out playing...
engSearchText:
It does worry me sometimes, how late Yumé stays
out playing...
jpnChrName: ユメは子供たちと一緒にいるみたい。 少し心配だけれど……
jpnSearchText:
ユメは子供たちと一緒にいるみたい。
少し心配だけれど……

engChrName: ...but with all that energy, being cooped up inside is just torture for her.
engSearchText:
...but with all that energy, being cooped up inside is
just torture for her.
jpnChrName: ずっと店内にいるのは あの子も辛いみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
ずっと店内にいるのは
あの子も辛いみたいで。

engChrName: If you see her while you're out and about, make sure to say hello, okay?
engSearchText:
If you see her while you're out and about, make sure
to say hello, okay?
jpnChrName: もし見かけたら気にかけておいてね。 よろしくお願いするわ。
jpnSearchText:
もし見かけたら気にかけておいてね。
よろしくお願いするわ。

engChrName: Thank you, Van. I'll talk to Yumé about your offer.
engSearchText: Thank you, Van. I'll talk to Yumé about your offer.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、ヴァンさん。 さっきの話、ユメに話してみるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、ヴァンさん。
さっきの話、ユメに話してみるわ。

engChrName: I'm sure she'll chomp at the bit for an opportunity to take a vacation.
engSearchText:
I'm sure she'll chomp at the bit for an opportunity to
take a vacation.
jpnChrName: ユメも喜んでくれそうだし、 ご厚意に甘えさせてもらうかも。
jpnSearchText:
ユメも喜んでくれそうだし、
ご厚意に甘えさせてもらうかも。

engChrName: Don't sweat it. I always like to go the extra selge on a job, you get me?
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. I always like to go the extra selge on a
job, you get me?
jpnChrName: ああ、気にしないでくれ。 依頼のアフターサービスみたいなもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、気にしないでくれ。
依頼のアフターサービスみたいなもんだ。

engChrName: Three days is a bit on the long side, but I think she'll be all right.
engSearchText:
Three days is a bit on the long side, but I think she'll
be all right.
jpnChrName: 旅程は二泊三日── ちょいと長旅だが何とかなんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
旅程は二泊三日──
ちょいと長旅だが何とかなんだろ。

engChrName: I think she's about the age for a trip like that. She can handle herself.
engSearchText:
I think she's about the age for a trip like that. She can
handle herself.
jpnChrName: ええ、あの子ももう６歳だし── 丁度いいタイミングなのかもしれないわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、あの子ももう６歳だし──
丁度いいタイミングなのかもしれないわ。

engChrName: And she'll be in your care! Heehee.
engSearchText: And she'll be in your care! Heehee.
jpnChrName: ……その時はよろしくね♪
jpnSearchText: ……その時はよろしくね♪

engChrName: Yumé just can't get enough of XEROS, heehee. They're still outside playing with the other kids.
engSearchText:
Yumé just can't get enough of XEROS, heehee.
They're still outside playing with the other kids.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ユメったら張り切っちゃって。 ＸＥＲＯＳ君を連れだして、まだ戻らないみたい。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ユメったら張り切っちゃって。
ＸＥＲＯＳ君を連れだして、まだ戻らないみたい。

engChrName: I hope that's not a problem, Quatre?
engSearchText: I hope that's not a problem, Quatre?
jpnChrName: ごめんなさいね、カトル君。
jpnSearchText: ごめんなさいね、カトル君。

engChrName: Oh, no, it's perfectly fine. I'm sure he'll get some interesting data for the trouble.
engSearchText:
Oh, no, it's perfectly fine. I'm sure he'll get some
interesting data for the trouble.
jpnChrName: いえ、構いませんよ。 お陰で面白いデータも取れそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、構いませんよ。
お陰で面白いデータも取れそうですし。

engChrName: I don't believe XEROS has interacted with a group of children at once before. It's always good to broaden his horizons like that.
engSearchText:
I don't believe XEROS has interacted with a group of
children at once before. It's always good to broaden
his horizons like that.
jpnChrName: ……子供相手の多人数コミュニケーション…… 今まで機会がなかったし、これは貴重かも……
jpnSearchText:
……子供相手の多人数コミュニケーション……
今まで機会がなかったし、これは貴重かも……

engChrName: I see. I'm glad she's being helpful, at any rate!
engSearchText: I see. I'm glad she's being helpful, at any rate!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、よく分からないけど 力にもなれそうで良かったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、よく分からないけど
力にもなれそうで良かったわ。

engChrName: FIO is always helping me out, too, so I'll have to reward them later.
engSearchText:
FIO is always helping me out, too, so I'll have to
reward them later.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯちゃんも良く手伝ってくれているし あとでご褒美をあげないとね♪
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯちゃんも良く手伝ってくれているし
あとでご褒美をあげないとね♪

engChrName: Ah... W-Well, thank you very much. (Man, I have no idea how to approach her.)
engSearchText:
Ah... W-Well, thank you very much.
(Man, I have no idea how to approach her.)
jpnChrName: え、ええ……ありがとうございます。 （う～ん、なんだか調子が狂うけど……）
jpnSearchText:
え、ええ……ありがとうございます。
（う～ん、なんだか調子が狂うけど……）

engChrName: (She has quite the presence, doesn't she? No drone can quite match her.)
engSearchText:
(She has quite the presence, doesn't she? No drone
can quite match her.)
jpnChrName: （あはは、ポーレットさんにかかれば   最新のドローンも形無しですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは、ポーレットさんにかかれば
最新のドローンも形無しですね。）

engChrName: Yumé should be home soon...
engSearchText: Yumé should be home soon...
jpnChrName: ユメもほどほどで帰ってくると思うけど……
jpnSearchText: ユメもほどほどで帰ってくると思うけど……

engChrName: But time flies when she's having fun—I wouldn't be surprised if she runs a little late. Not that there's anything wrong with that, of course!
engSearchText:
But time flies when she's having fun—I wouldn't be
surprised if she runs a little late. Not that there's
anything wrong with that, of course!
jpnChrName: あの様子だと、ちょっと遅くなるかもね。 気が済むまで好きにさせておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
あの様子だと、ちょっと遅くなるかもね。
気が済むまで好きにさせておきましょうか。

engChrName: Oh, good to see you, Van.
engSearchText: Oh, good to see you, Van.
jpnChrName: あら、ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: あら、ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Care to join Yumé for some playtime? I'm sure she'd be delighted.
engSearchText:
Care to join Yumé for some playtime? I'm sure she'd
be delighted.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、一緒に聞いていく？ ユメも喜ぶと思うけど♪
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、一緒に聞いていく？
ユメも喜ぶと思うけど♪

engChrName: I'm good. Kiddo'll have me here all night. I got work to do.
engSearchText:
I'm good. Kiddo'll have me here all night. I got work
to do.
jpnChrName: ま、遠慮しとくぜ。 つい長居しちまいそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、遠慮しとくぜ。
つい長居しちまいそうだしな。

engChrName: Heehee. Aaron is such a sweet young man. I can tell that he really cares about his friends.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Aaron is such a sweet young man. I can
tell that he really cares about his friends.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、なんだかんだ言っても アーロン君は仲間想いよね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、なんだかんだ言っても
アーロン君は仲間想いよね。

engChrName: Good luck at work! I'll have dinner ready for when you get back.
engSearchText:
Good luck at work! I'll have dinner ready for when
you get back.
jpnChrName: お仕事も頑張って。 美味しい夕食を作って待ってるから♪
jpnSearchText:
お仕事も頑張って。
美味しい夕食を作って待ってるから♪

engChrName: I imagine you're exhausted. Has work been treating you okay?
engSearchText:
I imagine you're exhausted. Has work been treating
you okay?
jpnChrName: ご苦労様、午後のお仕事は順調かしら。
jpnSearchText: ご苦労様、午後のお仕事は順調かしら。

engChrName: Do let me know if I can give you any help or advice, Risette—that goes for professional and private concerns both.
engSearchText:
Do let me know if I can give you any help or advice,
Risette—that goes for professional and private
concerns both.
jpnChrName: リゼットさん、足りない物があれば言ってね？ 事務所の事でも、プライベートでも。
jpnSearchText:
リゼットさん、足りない物があれば言ってね？
事務所の事でも、プライベートでも。

engChrName: Heehee. Thank you. I appreciate the offer, though you've helped me more than enough already.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Thank you. I appreciate the offer, though
you've helped me more than enough already.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ありがとうございます。 ですがもう十分ご配慮頂いているかと。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ありがとうございます。
ですがもう十分ご配慮頂いているかと。

engChrName: You've given me not only a room, but full furnishings as well.
engSearchText:
You've given me not only a room, but full furnishings
as well.
jpnChrName: お陰様で私室の調度品も 譲っていただきましたし。
jpnSearchText:
お陰様で私室の調度品も
譲っていただきましたし。

engChrName: Oh, I had that lying around in storage anyway. It was the least I could do...and I should be thanking you for all your clerical help, myself.
engSearchText:
Oh, I had that lying around in storage anyway. It was
the least I could do...and I should be thanking you for
all your clerical help, myself.
jpnChrName: 物置に眠っていた家具だから気にしないで。 こちらこそ、事務仕事を手伝ってもらって。
jpnSearchText:
物置に眠っていた家具だから気にしないで。
こちらこそ、事務仕事を手伝ってもらって。

engChrName: Think nothing of it—I owe you as much for your hospitality. It's quite the good learning experience for me as well.
engSearchText:
Think nothing of it—I owe you as much for
your hospitality. It's quite the good learning
experience for me as well.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、当然の事をしたまでです。 わたくしも勉強になりましたし……
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ、当然の事をしたまでです。
わたくしも勉強になりましたし……

engChrName: It's always fun learning new things, isn't it? Oh, speaking of new things, I've been meaning to try that black tea...
engSearchText:
It's always fun learning new things, isn't it?
Oh, speaking of new things, I've been meaning to try
that black tea...
jpnChrName: ふふっ、とっても捗って楽しかったわよね。 そうそう、美味しい紅茶の銘柄があるんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、とっても捗って楽しかったわよね。
そうそう、美味しい紅茶の銘柄があるんだけど……

engChrName: (Now, these two...)
engSearchText: (Now, these two...)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、このお二人って……）
jpnSearchText: （う～ん、このお二人って……）

engChrName: (Like they were made for each other.)
engSearchText: (Like they were made for each other.)
jpnChrName: （気が合いすぎだっつの。   まあ分からなくもねえが……）
jpnSearchText:
（気が合いすぎだっつの。
まあ分からなくもねえが……）

engChrName: (But damn, here I was, waiting all this time to hear why Paulette left her husband, and she goes and spills the tea to the maid?)
engSearchText:
(But damn, here I was, waiting all this time to hear
why Paulette left her husband, and she goes and
spills the tea to the maid?)
jpnChrName: （俺だってまだポーレットの出戻り話を   聞き出してねえっつーのに、早くねーか？）
jpnSearchText:
（俺だってまだポーレットの出戻り話を
聞き出してねえっつーのに、早くねーか？）

engChrName: (Ain't a competition, bud. And don't let me catch you askin' her stuff like that.)
engSearchText:
(Ain't a competition, bud. And don't let me catch
you askin' her stuff like that.)
jpnChrName: （そこは競う所じゃねえだろ……   あと悪い事は言わねえからやめとけ。）
jpnSearchText:
（そこは競う所じゃねえだろ……
あと悪い事は言わねえからやめとけ。）

engChrName: I can't thank you enough for all your clerical help.
engSearchText: I can't thank you enough for all your clerical help.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、リゼットさんには 事務仕事も手伝ってもらって助かってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、リゼットさんには
事務仕事も手伝ってもらって助かってるわ。

engChrName: How about I treat you to this black tea I bought the other day? It's the least I can do to repay you.
engSearchText:
How about I treat you to this black tea I bought the
other day? It's the least I can do to repay you.
jpnChrName: この前美味しい紅茶を頂いたから またご一緒しましょうね♪
jpnSearchText:
この前美味しい紅茶を頂いたから
またご一緒しましょうね♪

engChrName: It would be my pleasure. I do look forward to it.
engSearchText: It would be my pleasure. I do look forward to it.
jpnChrName: ええ、ぜひとも。 楽しみにしておりますね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ぜひとも。
楽しみにしておりますね。

engChrName: Yumé's been helping us out, so I'd like to do my fair share while I have the time.
engSearchText:
Yumé's been helping us out, so I'd like to do my fair
share while I have the time.
jpnChrName: ユメもお手伝いしてくれているし 今のうちに帳簿の整理をね。
jpnSearchText:
ユメもお手伝いしてくれているし
今のうちに帳簿の整理をね。

engChrName: Oh, right. Van? If you'd be so kind, your rent from last month is due.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. Van? If you'd be so kind, your rent from
last month is due.
jpnChrName: そうそう──ヴァンさん、 先月の家賃の支払いもよろしくね？
jpnSearchText:
そうそう──ヴァンさん、
先月の家賃の支払いもよろしくね？

engChrName: (Shit, I forgot...) Oh, right. Sorry. I'll get you the cash before we head out.
engSearchText:
(Shit, I forgot...)
Oh, right. Sorry. I'll get you the cash before we
head out.
jpnChrName: （うっ、そういや……） ──悪ぃな、出発前には払うからよ。
jpnSearchText:
（うっ、そういや……）
──悪ぃな、出発前には払うからよ。

engChrName: Heehee, thank you.
engSearchText: Heehee, thank you.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、助かるわ。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、助かるわ。

engChrName: I know it must be hectic up there in your office.
engSearchText: I know it must be hectic up there in your office.
jpnChrName: でもヴァンさんも大変ね、 一人で事務所を切り盛りするのも。
jpnSearchText:
でもヴァンさんも大変ね、
一人で事務所を切り盛りするのも。

engChrName: Wages, taxes, utilities... You do have a lot on your plate.
engSearchText:
Wages, taxes, utilities... You do have a lot on
your plate.
jpnChrName: 公共料金の支払いやお給料の計算、納税…… 事務仕事もそれなりに溜まっていそうだし。
jpnSearchText:
公共料金の支払いやお給料の計算、納税……
事務仕事もそれなりに溜まっていそうだし。

engChrName: Ain't that the truth... (Y'know, I really could use a secretary.)
engSearchText:
Ain't that the truth...
(Y'know, I really could use a secretary.)
jpnChrName: そうなんだよな、ったく…… （本気で秘書が欲しくなってくるぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
そうなんだよな、ったく……
（本気で秘書が欲しくなってくるぜ。）

engChrName: I know Agnès has been helping you with the mail.
engSearchText: I know Agnès has been helping you with the mail.
jpnChrName: 郵便物の対応はアニエスちゃんが 頑張ってくれてるみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
郵便物の対応はアニエスちゃんが
頑張ってくれてるみたいだけど……

engChrName: If there's anything else you could use a hand with, do let me know. I'm sure I could be of use.
engSearchText:
If there's anything else you could use a hand with, do
let me know. I'm sure I could be of use.
jpnChrName: 手伝える事があれば言ってね？ 私も力になれると思うから。
jpnSearchText:
手伝える事があれば言ってね？
私も力になれると思うから。

engChrName: I owe you for that, thanks. (That's...kinda the problem, though. I owe her a lotta things already. Tch...)
engSearchText:
I owe you for that, thanks.
(That's...kinda the problem, though. I owe her a lotta
things already. Tch...)
jpnChrName: ああ、あんがとな、ポーレット。 （とはいえこれ以上世話になんのもなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あんがとな、ポーレット。
（とはいえこれ以上世話になんのもなぁ……）

engChrName: Hard at work as always, I see.
engSearchText: Hard at work as always, I see.
jpnChrName: そっちもお仕事、頑張ってるみたいね。
jpnSearchText: そっちもお仕事、頑張ってるみたいね。

engChrName: I would appreciate some help with my errands, but I doubt you have the time...
engSearchText:
I would appreciate some help with my errands, but I
doubt you have the time...
jpnChrName: もし手が空いていたら お使いを頼もうかと思ったのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
もし手が空いていたら
お使いを頼もうかと思ったのだけど……

engChrName: Oh, no, I can help out now! I've gotten used to the city.
engSearchText:
Oh, no, I can help out now! I've gotten used to
the city.
jpnChrName: あ、でしたら後でわたしがっ！ そろそろ首都にも慣れましたし！
jpnSearchText:
あ、でしたら後でわたしがっ！
そろそろ首都にも慣れましたし！

engChrName: Hell, doubles as free experience, too.
engSearchText: Hell, doubles as free experience, too.
jpnChrName: ま、研修がてらに丁度いいかもな。
jpnSearchText: ま、研修がてらに丁度いいかもな。

engChrName: I see! I might take you up on your offer, then—when you're free, of course.
engSearchText:
I see! I might take you up on your offer, then—when
you're free, of course.
jpnChrName: あらあら、じゃあ手が空いたタイミングで お願いしようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
あらあら、じゃあ手が空いたタイミングで
お願いしようかしら。

engChrName: All right! I'll stop by for the details in a bit.
engSearchText: All right! I'll stop by for the details in a bit.
jpnChrName: はい、また詳しく伺いに来ますねっ！
jpnSearchText: はい、また詳しく伺いに来ますねっ！

engChrName: It's wonderful to see everyone helping the restaurant along like this.
engSearchText:
It's wonderful to see everyone helping the restaurant
along like this.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、みんなが手伝ってくれて お店も助かってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、みんなが手伝ってくれて
お店も助かってるわ。

engChrName: Today's another busy day, so I'll need to do my part, too.
engSearchText:
Today's another busy day, so I'll need to do my
part, too.
jpnChrName: さて、今日はお客さんも多そうだし 私も気合を入れないと♪
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日はお客さんも多そうだし
私も気合を入れないと♪

engChrName: By the way, Yumé is off at Sunday School. She'll probably be playing with her friends afterward.
engSearchText:
By the way, Yumé is off at Sunday School.
She'll probably be playing with her friends afterward.
jpnChrName: ちなみにユメは日曜学校に行っているわ。 帰りはお友達と遊んでくるんじゃないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにユメは日曜学校に行っているわ。
帰りはお友達と遊んでくるんじゃないかしら。

engChrName: Our regulars fill up the place for our evening shift. I do wish they'd take it easier on the spirits, though...
engSearchText:
Our regulars fill up the place for our evening shift.
I do wish they'd take it easier on the spirits, though...
jpnChrName: うちは夕方からの営業も人気なのよね。 とはいえお酒は程々にしてほしい所だけれど。
jpnSearchText:
うちは夕方からの営業も人気なのよね。
とはいえお酒は程々にしてほしい所だけれど。

engChrName: Oh, that reminds me. You'll be up early tomorrow, right?
engSearchText:
Oh, that reminds me. You'll be up early
tomorrow, right?
jpnChrName: ……そういえば、明日は早いみたいね？
jpnSearchText: ……そういえば、明日は早いみたいね？

engChrName: Yeah. Out around 6:30. I'll wake Yumes up if you need me to.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Out around 6:30. I'll wake Yumes up if you
need me to.
jpnChrName: ああ、６時半頃に出れたらと思ってる。 ……ユメ坊はまだ夢ン中だろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、６時半頃に出れたらと思ってる。
……ユメ坊はまだ夢ン中だろうな。

engChrName: Thank you. I'm sure she'll try to wake up on her own, but you know her.
engSearchText:
Thank you. I'm sure she'll try to wake up on her own,
but you know her.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、起きるって言ってぐずりそうだけど。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、起きるって言ってぐずりそうだけど。

engChrName: How about I cook you breakfast tomorrow in exchange?
engSearchText:
How about I cook you breakfast tomorrow
in exchange?
jpnChrName: ともかく朝食を用意しておきましょうか。 また持ち運びのいい物でも♪
jpnSearchText:
ともかく朝食を用意しておきましょうか。
また持ち運びのいい物でも♪

engChrName: That'd be really nice. Sorry for all the trouble.
engSearchText: That'd be really nice. Sorry for all the trouble.
jpnChrName: そいつは助かるぜ。 いつもすまねえな、ポーレット。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは助かるぜ。
いつもすまねえな、ポーレット。

engChrName: Oh, don't worry about it. Just make sure you get plenty of rest yourself, okay?
engSearchText:
Oh, don't worry about it. Just make sure you get
plenty of rest yourself, okay?
jpnChrName: どういたしまして。 ヴァンさんも夜更かしせず、早めに休んでね？
jpnSearchText:
どういたしまして。
ヴァンさんも夜更かしせず、早めに休んでね？

engChrName: Yumé looks awfully tired, so I think I'll put her to bed early today.
engSearchText:
Yumé looks awfully tired, so I think I'll put her to bed
early today.
jpnChrName: ユメも眠そうだし 今日は早めに寝かしつけましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ユメも眠そうだし
今日は早めに寝かしつけましょうか。

engChrName: I recommend you do the same, with your big morning tomorrow. Don't keep yourself up all night!
engSearchText:
I recommend you do the same, with your big
morning tomorrow. Don't keep yourself up all night!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、明日も早いんだから 夜更かしせず、早めに休んでね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、明日も早いんだから
夜更かしせず、早めに休んでね？

engChrName: Goodness, how time flies. I can't help it, though—it's just so exciting to hear about what you've been up to.
engSearchText:
Goodness, how time flies. I can't help it, though—it's
just so exciting to hear about what you've been up to.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、みんなの活躍ぶりが聞けるだなんて。 つい長話してしまったわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、みんなの活躍ぶりが聞けるだなんて。
つい長話してしまったわね。

engChrName: I really owe Hans for his help. Perhaps I'll make him lunch today.
engSearchText:
I really owe Hans for his help. Perhaps I'll make him
lunch today.
jpnChrName: ハンスさんにはお世話になっている事もあるし、 今日はお昼を食べていってもらおうかしら♪
jpnSearchText:
ハンスさんにはお世話になっている事もあるし、
今日はお昼を食べていってもらおうかしら♪

engChrName: Good work, you two. Your faces tell me you were really working hard out there.
engSearchText:
Good work, you two. Your faces tell me you were
really working hard out there.
jpnChrName: 二人ともお疲れ様、いい仕事ができたみたいね。 顔を見れば分かるわ。
jpnSearchText:
二人ともお疲れ様、いい仕事ができたみたいね。
顔を見れば分かるわ。

engChrName: I'll whip up some food for you, so you can come inside to wait for it.
engSearchText:
I'll whip up some food for you, so you can come
inside to wait for it.
jpnChrName: 食事もすぐに用意できるから 中で待っていてちょうだいね？
jpnSearchText:
食事もすぐに用意できるから
中で待っていてちょうだいね？

engChrName: (Maybe I'll go pick up some sweets from the florist first.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe I'll go pick up some sweets from the
florist first.)
jpnChrName: （ま、先に花屋で   スイーツを調達しておくかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、先に花屋で
スイーツを調達しておくかね。）

engChrName: (Right... If I remember correctly, it's just ahead.)
engSearchText: (Right... If I remember correctly, it's just ahead.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……   確かこの通りの先でしたよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ……
確かこの通りの先でしたよね。）

engChrName: Er, right! (Van, do we...?)
engSearchText:
Er, right!
(Van, do we...?)
jpnChrName: は、はい……！ （ヴァンさん、えっと……）
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……！
（ヴァンさん、えっと……）

engChrName: (Yeah. Let's go around the back, just to be safe.)
engSearchText: (Yeah. Let's go around the back, just to be safe.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、迷惑にならねえように   一旦裏口に回んぞ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、迷惑にならねえように
一旦裏口に回んぞ。）

engChrName: Goodness, I never expected you would take up a part-time job with Van.
engSearchText:
Goodness, I never expected you would take up a
part-time job with Van.
jpnChrName: まさかアニエスちゃんが アルバイトをする事になるなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
まさかアニエスちゃんが
アルバイトをする事になるなんてね。

engChrName: To think Arkride Solutions would actually get an extra pair of hands... Heehee. It warms my heart to see it.
engSearchText:
To think Arkride Solutions would actually get an
extra pair of hands... Heehee. It warms my heart
to see it.
jpnChrName: それに解決事務所にお手伝いが入るなんて ……ふふっ、私も感慨深いかも。
jpnSearchText:
それに解決事務所にお手伝いが入るなんて
……ふふっ、私も感慨深いかも。

engChrName: I'll treat you two to dinner tonight, so make sure to leave some room!
engSearchText:
I'll treat you two to dinner tonight, so make sure to
leave some room!
jpnChrName: 今日の夕食は二人分用意しておくから、 ちゃんと元気に帰ってくること。
jpnSearchText:
今日の夕食は二人分用意しておくから、
ちゃんと元気に帰ってくること。

engChrName: Good luck on your first job! Oh, I'm just so excited for you! ❤
engSearchText:
Good luck on your first job! Oh, I'm just so excited
for you! ❤
jpnChrName: 初仕事、頑張ってね❤
jpnSearchText: 初仕事、頑張ってね❤

engChrName: R-Right! (Why does she have me so flustered?)
engSearchText:
R-Right!
(Why does she have me so flustered?)
jpnChrName: は、はい──！ （う～ん、同性でもドギマギしちゃいますね……）
jpnSearchText:
は、はい──！
（う～ん、同性でもドギマギしちゃいますね……）

engChrName: (They don't call her the diva of the diner for nothin'. Her smile is the real deal.)
engSearchText:
(They don't call her the diva of the diner for nothin'.
Her smile is the real deal.)
jpnChrName: （旧市街のマドンナの微笑みは   伊達じゃねえってトコだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（旧市街のマドンナの微笑みは
伊達じゃねえってトコだな。）

engChrName: You two take care, now!
engSearchText: You two take care, now!
jpnChrName: 二人とも、気を付けていってらっしゃい。
jpnSearchText: 二人とも、気を付けていってらっしゃい。

engChrName: Do keep Agnès safe, okay?
engSearchText: Do keep Agnès safe, okay?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、アニエスちゃんをよろしくね？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、アニエスちゃんをよろしくね？

engChrName: You bet. A scratch on her's a scratch on my rep.
engSearchText: You bet. A scratch on her's a scratch on my rep.
jpnChrName: 了解だ、とっとと片付けてくるぜ。
jpnSearchText: 了解だ、とっとと片付けてくるぜ。

engChrName: Right. I'm ready to go!
engSearchText: Right. I'm ready to go!
jpnChrName: はいっ……どうかよろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……どうかよろしくお願いします！

engChrName: Wait a minute... Oh, you're the guys who helped us out at the village!
engSearchText:
Wait a minute... Oh, you're the guys who helped us
out at the village!
jpnChrName: あれ……？　皆さんもしかしてこの前 クレイユ村に来てくれていた方ではないですか？
jpnSearchText:
あれ……？　皆さんもしかしてこの前
クレイユ村に来てくれていた方ではないですか？

engChrName: I didn't get to talk with you at the time, but I saw your truck pulled up out there.
engSearchText:
I didn't get to talk with you at the time, but I saw
your truck pulled up out there.
jpnChrName: はは、お話は出来ませんでしたが、 トラックで来るのを見ましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、お話は出来ませんでしたが、
トラックで来るのを見ましたよ。

engChrName: Yeah, that was us. I think I remember seein' you, too... General store, right?
engSearchText:
Yeah, that was us. I think I remember seein'
you, too... General store, right?
jpnChrName: ああ、俺もアンタを見かけたきがするぜ。 確か雑貨屋にいたっけか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、俺もアンタを見かけたきがするぜ。
確か雑貨屋にいたっけか。

engChrName: So what brings you...? Oh, that's right. Montmart sources veggies from Creil, yeah?
engSearchText:
So what brings you...? Oh, that's right.
Montmart sources veggies from Creil, yeah?
jpnChrName: そういや、モンマルトの食材は結構 クレイユ村から仕入れてるって話だったが……
jpnSearchText:
そういや、モンマルトの食材は結構
クレイユ村から仕入れてるって話だったが……

engChrName: We do. Hans here drops by every few days for delivery.
engSearchText:
We do. Hans here drops by every few days
for delivery.
jpnChrName: ええ、彼が週に何度か届けに来て下さっているの。
jpnSearchText: ええ、彼が週に何度か届けに来て下さっているの。

engChrName: You had quite the eventful stop out there, from what he told me. It makes me proud to be your landlady!
engSearchText:
You had quite the eventful stop out there, from what
he told me. It makes me proud to be your landlady!
jpnChrName: 村の方でみんなが活躍した事も聞かせて もらったわ、大家として誇らしいわね。
jpnSearchText:
村の方でみんなが活躍した事も聞かせて
もらったわ、大家として誇らしいわね。

engChrName: I didn't get the chance to properly thank you before. We really owe it to you. We're finally settling back into our rhythm out there.
engSearchText:
I didn't get the chance to properly thank you before.
We really owe it to you. We're finally settling back
into our rhythm out there.
jpnChrName: ええ、皆さんにはお礼を言い損ねましたが お陰様で村もすっかり落ち着きましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、皆さんにはお礼を言い損ねましたが
お陰様で村もすっかり落ち着きましたよ。

engChrName: You're welcome anytime, if you wanna stop by!
engSearchText: You're welcome anytime, if you wanna stop by!
jpnChrName: まあ、是非ともまた村にいらしてください、 その時は改めておもてなししますので。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、是非ともまた村にいらしてください、
その時は改めておもてなししますので。

engChrName: That would be lovely!
engSearchText: That would be lovely!
jpnChrName: はい、喜んで……！
jpnSearchText: はい、喜んで……！

engChrName: Oh, hey, it's you guys! You remember me, right? I'm from Creil Village.
engSearchText:
Oh, hey, it's you guys! You remember me, right?
I'm from Creil Village.
jpnChrName: あっ、皆さんは解決屋の……！ ほら僕ですよ僕、クレイユ村の──
jpnSearchText:
あっ、皆さんは解決屋の……！
ほら僕ですよ僕、クレイユ村の──

engChrName: Oh, Hans! Funny seeing you all the way out here.
engSearchText: Oh, Hans! Funny seeing you all the way out here.
jpnChrName: 雑貨屋のハンスさん！ 首都にいらしてたんですね！
jpnSearchText:
雑貨屋のハンスさん！
首都にいらしてたんですね！

engChrName: You're on a delivery run, I take it?
engSearchText: You're on a delivery run, I take it?
jpnChrName: そういやモンマルトに 野菜を卸してるって言ってたか。
jpnSearchText:
そういやモンマルトに
野菜を卸してるって言ってたか。

engChrName: Mhm. He comes by every few days to deliver us produce.
engSearchText:
Mhm. He comes by every few days to deliver
us produce.
jpnChrName: ええ、週に何度か来て下さっているの。
jpnSearchText: ええ、週に何度か来て下さっているの。

engChrName: He did fill us in on what happened out there. Heehee... It warms my heart to have such upstanding tenants!
engSearchText:
He did fill us in on what happened out there.
Heehee... It warms my heart to have such
upstanding tenants!
jpnChrName: 先週のみんなの活躍も聞かせてもらったわ。 大家としても誇らしいわね㈱
jpnSearchText:
先週のみんなの活躍も聞かせてもらったわ。
大家としても誇らしいわね㈱

engChrName: Yeah, we're finally getting back to normal at home, and we've got you guys to thank.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we're finally getting back to normal at home,
and we've got you guys to thank.
jpnChrName: はは、今ではすっかり落ち着きまして。 皆さんが村を守ってくださったお陰ですよ！
jpnSearchText:
はは、今ではすっかり落ち着きまして。
皆さんが村を守ってくださったお陰ですよ！

engChrName: The guild and the police are working things out... They said the whole case is really weird, though.
engSearchText:
The guild and the police are working things out...
They said the whole case is really weird, though.
jpnChrName: ギルドや警察の話では まだ不明瞭な事もあるそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
ギルドや警察の話では
まだ不明瞭な事もあるそうですが……

engChrName: But it's nice that they're helping us out—and thanks for your help, too! You're always welcome at the village.
engSearchText:
But it's nice that they're helping us out—and thanks
for your help, too! You're always welcome at
the village.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、本当にありがとうございました！ どうかまた何時でもいらしてください！
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、本当にありがとうございました！
どうかまた何時でもいらしてください！

engChrName: It would be our pleasure! Give them our regards when you get back.
engSearchText:
It would be our pleasure! Give them our regards when
you get back.
jpnChrName: はい……！ 村の皆さんにもよろしくお伝えください。
jpnSearchText:
はい……！
村の皆さんにもよろしくお伝えください。

engChrName: It's nothing urgent, but I would greatly appreciate the help. Here's my shopping list...
engSearchText:
It's nothing urgent, but I would greatly appreciate
the help. Here's my shopping list...
jpnChrName: ええ、急ぎでなくていいのだけど 買っておいてもらえると助かるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、急ぎでなくていいのだけど
買っておいてもらえると助かるわ。

engChrName: Oh, and if you have the chance, over at Centre Marché...
engSearchText:
Oh, and if you have the chance, over at
Centre Marché...
jpnChrName: それから余裕があれば《中央市場（セントルマルシェ）》で……
jpnSearchText: それから余裕があれば《中央市場（セントルマルシェ）》で……

engChrName: Affirmative! So, Centre Marché, that's, umm...
engSearchText: Affirmative! So, Centre Marché, that's, umm...
jpnChrName: わかりましたっ！ ……中央市場の場所は、えっと……
jpnSearchText:
わかりましたっ！
……中央市場の場所は、えっと……

engChrName: Goin' shopping? Don't get lost, now.
engSearchText: Goin' shopping? Don't get lost, now.
jpnChrName: フェリは買い物か。 ……迷子になったりすんなよ？
jpnSearchText:
フェリは買い物か。
……迷子になったりすんなよ？

engChrName: I'll be fine, trust me! I've already been here three weeks!
engSearchText:
