I'll be fine, trust me! I've already been here
three weeks!
jpnChrName: な、なりませんっ！ 首都に来てもう３週間ですから！
jpnSearchText:
な、なりませんっ！
首都に来てもう３週間ですから！

engChrName: That's big talk, there! You'd better back it up, itty-bit.
engSearchText: That's big talk, there! You'd better back it up, itty-bit.
jpnChrName: どうだかなァ。 まあせいぜい励めや、チビ。
jpnSearchText:
どうだかなァ。
まあせいぜい励めや、チビ。

engChrName: Hang in there, Feri! I'll give it my best, too!
engSearchText: Hang in there, Feri! I'll give it my best, too!
jpnChrName: あはは……お互い頑張りましょう、 フェリちゃん！
jpnSearchText:
あはは……お互い頑張りましょう、
フェリちゃん！

engChrName: Seven years single, huh? Damn shame.
engSearchText: Seven years single, huh? Damn shame.
jpnChrName: へえ、もう７年になんのか。 前の男と別れてよ。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、もう７年になんのか。
前の男と別れてよ。

engChrName: Your man had a rockin' wife and a kid on the way, and he was still thirsty?
engSearchText:
Your man had a rockin' wife and a kid on the way,
and he was still thirsty?
jpnChrName: てえとガキが出来てすぐってトコか？ ハッ、ロクでもねえ男だったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
てえとガキが出来てすぐってトコか？
ハッ、ロクでもねえ男だったみたいだな。

engChrName: Talk about blowing a lead, the dumbass.
engSearchText: Talk about blowing a lead, the dumbass.
jpnChrName: ……だからってよ、やっぱ勿体なくねーか？
jpnSearchText: ……だからってよ、やっぱ勿体なくねーか？

engChrName: Lady like you shouldn't have to settle for that. You thought about opening up again, finding yourself a real big fish?
engSearchText:
Lady like you shouldn't have to settle for that.
You thought about opening up again, finding yourself
a real big fish?
jpnChrName: その器量ならイイ男も寄ってくんだろ。 今からでももっと人生楽しんでいいんじゃね？
jpnSearchText:
その器量ならイイ男も寄ってくんだろ。
今からでももっと人生楽しんでいいんじゃね？

engChrName: Well, well, heehee. I appreciate your concern, but I'm quite content with where I am now.
engSearchText:
Well, well, heehee. I appreciate your concern, but I'm
quite content with where I am now.
jpnChrName: あらあら、ご心配ありがとう。 でも私は十分幸せよ㈱
jpnSearchText:
あらあら、ご心配ありがとう。
でも私は十分幸せよ㈱

engChrName: Down, boy. That's her business and hers alone.
engSearchText: Down, boy. That's her business and hers alone.
jpnChrName: つーかアーロン、ポーレットの事情に 無遠慮に踏み込んでんじゃねーよ。
jpnSearchText:
つーかアーロン、ポーレットの事情に
無遠慮に踏み込んでんじゃねーよ。

engChrName: I'll tell you right now, if you don't—
engSearchText: I'll tell you right now, if you don't—
jpnChrName: ……でねえと───
jpnSearchText: ……でねえと───

engChrName: (Oh, this little bastard's got a death wish.)
engSearchText: (Oh, this little bastard's got a death wish.)
jpnChrName: （赤毛……死にてえのか……？）
jpnSearchText: <C2>（赤毛……死にてえのか……？）

engChrName: What the...?! It's like somebody's got a sight on me! Aidios almighty...
engSearchText:
What the...?! It's like somebody's got a sight on me!
Aidios almighty...
jpnChrName: ……ッ……殺気だと……！？ チッ、なんつー気当たりだっつの……！
jpnSearchText:
……ッ……殺気だと……！？
チッ、なんつー気当たりだっつの……！

engChrName: (It's nice to see this place so lively. I'm quite the lucky lady to have such wonderful company. ♪)
engSearchText:
(It's nice to see this place so lively. I'm quite the lucky
lady to have such wonderful company. ♪)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ……本当に賑やかになって。   皆と出会えて、私は本当に幸せよ♪）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ……本当に賑やかになって。
皆と出会えて、私は本当に幸せよ♪）

engChrName: Three days until the festival... We've got one last big push.
engSearchText:
Three days until the festival... We've got one last
big push.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭まであと３日…… 準備も大詰めよね。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭まであと３日……
準備も大詰めよね。

engChrName: Taste-testing the special menu, ordering enough ingredients, managing reservations...
engSearchText:
Taste-testing the special menu, ordering enough
ingredients, managing reservations...
jpnChrName: 特別メニューの試作に食材の発注、 ご近所さんの予約管理……
jpnSearchText:
特別メニューの試作に食材の発注、
ご近所さんの予約管理……

engChrName: There's a lot of work to be done, so time to roll up my sleeves and put my back into it!
engSearchText:
There's a lot of work to be done, so time to roll
up my sleeves and put my back into it!
jpnChrName: 何かと忙しいし、気合を入れて行かないとね。
jpnSearchText: 何かと忙しいし、気合を入れて行かないとね。

engChrName: FIO shall assist. Activating support program.
engSearchText: FIO shall assist. Activating support program.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯモ手伝ウ。 雑務ノ支援プログラムヲ実行。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯモ手伝ウ。
雑務ノ支援プログラムヲ実行。

engChrName: Man, having FIO around is a huge help!
engSearchText: Man, having FIO around is a huge help!
jpnChrName: えへへ……ＦＩＯもいてくれたら 百人力ですねっ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……ＦＩＯもいてくれたら
百人力ですねっ！

engChrName: Agreed. And we'll help whenever we have the chance, too. Let's make this Revolution Festival the best it can be!
engSearchText:
Agreed. And we'll help whenever we have the
chance, too. Let's make this Revolution Festival the
best it can be!
jpnChrName: はい、私たちも合間で手伝いますから。 一緒に記念祭を盛り上げましょう！
jpnSearchText:
はい、私たちも合間で手伝いますから。
一緒に記念祭を盛り上げましょう！

engChrName: Oh, thank you all so much! Expect some tasty treats as thanks.
engSearchText:
Oh, thank you all so much! Expect some tasty treats
as thanks.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、頼らせてもらうわね。 その分、賄（まかな）いは期待していて頂戴♪
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、頼らせてもらうわね。
その分、賄（まかな）いは期待していて頂戴♪

engChrName: (Place is really boomin' now, ain't it?)
engSearchText: (Place is really boomin' now, ain't it?)
jpnChrName: （ったく賑やかになったもんだぜ……）
jpnSearchText: （ったく賑やかになったもんだぜ……）

engChrName: Wooow! I dunno how to play, but you two look like you're really good at it!
engSearchText:
Wooow! I dunno how to play, but you two look like
you're really good at it!
jpnChrName: おお～っ！　よくわかんないけど 二人ともスゴイ！！
jpnSearchText:
おお～っ！　よくわかんないけど
二人ともスゴイ！！

engChrName: Oh! Is it your turn, Grandpa? Umm, umm... If I were the King, I'd do that!
engSearchText:
Oh! Is it your turn, Grandpa? Umm, umm... If I were
the King, I'd do that!
jpnChrName: つぎおじーちゃんのバン！！ んっとね～、ユメだったらね～……
jpnSearchText:
つぎおじーちゃんのバン！！
んっとね～、ユメだったらね～……

engChrName: Well, that is hardly fair. You have a general assisting you.
engSearchText:
Well, that is hardly fair. You have a general
assisting you.
jpnChrName: フフ、良い軍師が付いているようですな。
jpnSearchText: フフ、良い軍師が付いているようですな。

engChrName: Heh heh... She's got a good head on her shoulders. I'm excited to play against her when she grows up.
engSearchText:
Heh heh... She's got a good head on her shoulders.
I'm excited to play against her when she grows up.
jpnChrName: ええ……ユメともいずれ本気で 打てるようになるといいんですが。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……ユメともいずれ本気で
打てるようになるといいんですが。

engChrName: I dunno how you play this game, but it looks cool!
engSearchText: I dunno how you play this game, but it looks cool!
jpnChrName: おじーちゃんたちのショウブ、 よくわかんないけどスッゴイよ！！
jpnSearchText:
おじーちゃんたちのショウブ、
よくわかんないけどスッゴイよ！！

engChrName: Mom is sooooo slooow. She said she was gonna see him off, but...
engSearchText:
Mom is sooooo slooow. She said she was gonna see
him off, but...
jpnChrName: ……そういえば、ママおそいな～。 ミオクリって言ってたけど……
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば、ママおそいな～。
ミオクリって言ってたけど……

engChrName: Hmm... What's taking her so long?
engSearchText: Hmm... What's taking her so long?
jpnChrName: ん～、どこまでいっちゃったのかなぁ？
jpnSearchText: ん～、どこまでいっちゃったのかなぁ？

engChrName: Oh! Grandpa told me about that!
engSearchText: Oh! Grandpa told me about that!
jpnChrName: あっ、ユメもおじーちゃんに 聞いた事あるーっ！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、ユメもおじーちゃんに
聞いた事あるーっ！

engChrName: So, umm, Mommy was telling me about...rivers she wants to buy? What does 'rivers I'd market' mean?
engSearchText:
So, umm, Mommy was telling me about...rivers she
wants to buy? What does 'rivers I'd market' mean?
jpnChrName: あのねー、ウオガシいちばって ばしょがあってね～！
jpnSearchText:
あのねー、ウオガシいちばって
ばしょがあってね～！

engChrName: You mean 'riverside market,' little lady.
engSearchText: You mean 'riverside market,' little lady.
jpnChrName: ああ、魚河岸市場の事だね。
jpnSearchText: ああ、魚河岸市場の事だね。

engChrName: Mhm. Centre Marché came around about the same time. Nowadays, it's split up into these nine districts.
engSearchText:
Mhm. Centre Marché came around about the same
time. Nowadays, it's split up into these nine districts.
jpnChrName: そうそう、中央市場（セントルマルシェ）が作られたのもその頃さ。 今は９区に区分されてるねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、中央市場（セントルマルシェ）が作られたのもその頃さ。
今は９区に区分されてるねぇ。

engChrName: Ms. Gin tells some really cool stories! Wanna hear 'em?
engSearchText:
Ms. Gin tells some really cool stories! Wanna
hear 'em?
jpnChrName: おばーちゃんのお話、オモシロイよ？ ヴァンたちもきいてく～！？
jpnSearchText:
おばーちゃんのお話、オモシロイよ？
ヴァンたちもきいてく～！？

engChrName: We'd love to, but we're in the middle of work.
engSearchText: We'd love to, but we're in the middle of work.
jpnChrName: そうしたいのは山々だが 仕事中だしな。
jpnSearchText:
そうしたいのは山々だが
仕事中だしな。

engChrName: You'll have to share them with us later. Be a good girl and listen closely for us, okay?
engSearchText:
You'll have to share them with us later. Be a good girl
and listen closely for us, okay?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ユメちゃんがしっかり聞いて あとで教えてくださいね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ユメちゃんがしっかり聞いて
あとで教えてくださいね？

engChrName: Okie dokie!
engSearchText: Okie dokie!
jpnChrName: うん、わかったーっ！
jpnSearchText: うん、わかったーっ！

engChrName: Were you talking about Maxim? He's funny, in a lame way. Heehee! ♪
engSearchText:
Were you talking about Maxim? He's funny, in a
lame way. Heehee! ♪
jpnChrName: マクシムおじさんの話ー？ カッコ悪くて面白いよねー♪
jpnSearchText:
マクシムおじさんの話ー？
カッコ悪くて面白いよねー♪

engChrName: Harsh. Don't let him hear that, okay?
engSearchText: Harsh. Don't let him hear that, okay?
jpnChrName: ……ユメ坊、おやっさんの近くで その話はしねえようにな。
jpnSearchText:
……ユメ坊、おやっさんの近くで
その話はしねえようにな。

engChrName: Doo, doo dee doo. Sweep, sweep it up! ♪
engSearchText: Doo, doo dee doo. Sweep, sweep it up! ♪
jpnChrName: るんたった、るんたった♪ おっかたづけっ、おっかたづけっ☆
jpnSearchText:
るんたった、るんたった♪
おっかたづけっ、おっかたづけっ☆

engChrName: I think I saw that weird guy before... Where, though?
engSearchText: I think I saw that weird guy before... Where, though?
jpnChrName: そーいえばあのヘンなオジサン、 ユメ、なんだか見たコトあるよーな……
jpnSearchText:
そーいえばあのヘンなオジサン、
ユメ、なんだか見たコトあるよーな……

engChrName: Uhh... Umm...
engSearchText: Uhh... Umm...
jpnChrName: んーと、んーと……
jpnSearchText: んーと、んーと……

engChrName: Oh, yeah! There was a guy in the Tyrell Times! He looked like him!
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! There was a guy in the Tyrell Times!
He looked like him!
jpnChrName: そーそー、タイレルつーしんに のってたヒトににてるかも～っ！
jpnSearchText:
そーそー、タイレルつーしんに
のってたヒトににてるかも～っ！

engChrName: You're somethin' else—saw right through his disguise, didn't you?
engSearchText:
You're somethin' else—saw right through his
disguise, didn't you?
jpnChrName: さすがユメ坊だぜ、あの程度の 変装じゃ見破れちまうか。
jpnSearchText:
さすがユメ坊だぜ、あの程度の
変装じゃ見破れちまうか。

engChrName: (No way she'd remember what he looks like—they broke up before she was born.)
engSearchText:
(No way she'd remember what he looks like—they
broke up before she was born.)
jpnChrName: （別れたのはユメ坊が産まれる前──   当然覚えてるわけねーよな、ったく……）
jpnSearchText:
（別れたのはユメ坊が産まれる前──
当然覚えてるわけねーよな、ったく……）

engChrName: He was super weird! He kept crying all the time... Why was he so sad?
engSearchText:
He was super weird! He kept crying all the time...
Why was he so sad?
jpnChrName: ヘンなオジサンだったね～。 なんで泣いてたのかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
ヘンなオジサンだったね～。
なんで泣いてたのかなぁ？

engChrName: I should try and cheer him up next time! Maybe he needs a pat on the back.
engSearchText:
I should try and cheer him up next time! Maybe he
needs a pat on the back.
jpnChrName: こんど見かけたらユメが ハッパかけてあげよっかな～！
jpnSearchText:
こんど見かけたらユメが
ハッパかけてあげよっかな～！

engChrName: (Talk about rubbin' salt in the wound... Can't say he didn't have it comin', though.)
engSearchText:
(Talk about rubbin' salt in the wound... Can't say he
didn't have it comin', though.)
jpnChrName: （傷口に塩を塗りそうだが……   ま、あいつの自業自得か。）
jpnSearchText:
（傷口に塩を塗りそうだが……
ま、あいつの自業自得か。）

engChrName: Heeey! Come on and line up if you wanna give head pats!
engSearchText:
Heeey! Come on and line up if you wanna give
head pats!
jpnChrName: はーい、ナデナデしたいひとは ちゃんとならんでね！
jpnSearchText:
はーい、ナデナデしたいひとは
ちゃんとならんでね！

engChrName: Don't pat him all at once, or he'll get tired! One at a time, okay?
engSearchText:
Don't pat him all at once, or he'll get tired! One at a
time, okay?
jpnChrName: みんないっぺんだとＸＥＲＯＳも つかれちゃうだろうし、一人ずつだよ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
みんないっぺんだとＸＥＲＯＳも
つかれちゃうだろうし、一人ずつだよ～っ！

engChrName: Well, I appreciate your concern, but he doesn't exactly get tired like a real dog would.
engSearchText:
Well, I appreciate your concern, but he doesn't
exactly get tired like a real dog would.
jpnChrName: 本物の犬じゃないから その配慮はいらないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
本物の犬じゃないから
その配慮はいらないんだけど……

engChrName: That said, it's important to treat him with care. You have my thanks.
engSearchText:
That said, it's important to treat him with care.
You have my thanks.
jpnChrName: うん、でも大事に扱ってくれてありがとう。
jpnSearchText: うん、でも大事に扱ってくれてありがとう。

engChrName: I AM the landlady, after all! Ahaha!
engSearchText: I AM the landlady, after all! Ahaha!
jpnChrName: えっへん、オーヤとして トウゼンだも～ん！
jpnSearchText:
えっへん、オーヤとして
トウゼンだも～ん！

engChrName: (Aww. She's imitating her mom.)
engSearchText: (Aww. She's imitating her mom.)
jpnChrName: （あはは、ポーレットさんの真似   ……なんでしょうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは、ポーレットさんの真似
……なんでしょうか。）

engChrName: (Doesn't really have the presence for it yet, but no need to rain on her parade.)
engSearchText:
(Doesn't really have the presence for it yet, but no
need to rain on her parade.)
jpnChrName: （色々違うが突っ込まないでおいてやるか。）
jpnSearchText: （色々違うが突っ込まないでおいてやるか。）

engChrName: Mhm! Don't worry! I'll take good care of XEROS for you!
engSearchText:
Mhm! Don't worry! I'll take good care of XEROS
for you!
jpnChrName: えっへん、ＸＥＲＯＳのことはユメが ちゃーんとメンドー見ておくから！
jpnSearchText:
えっへん、ＸＥＲＯＳのことはユメが
ちゃーんとメンドー見ておくから！

engChrName: Good luck at work, everyone!
engSearchText: Good luck at work, everyone!
jpnChrName: みんなもおシゴト、がんばってねーっ！
jpnSearchText: みんなもおシゴト、がんばってねーっ！

engChrName: Wolves don't scare me! If I find any, I'll whoop their butts!
engSearchText:
Wolves don't scare me! If I find any, I'll whoop
their butts!
jpnChrName: ユメ、オオカミなんてコワくないもん！ 見つけたらタイジしてやるんだもん！！
jpnSearchText:
ユメ、オオカミなんてコワくないもん！
見つけたらタイジしてやるんだもん！！

engChrName: Hah! You're pretty spunky, ain'tcha? Don't let me down!
engSearchText:
Hah! You're pretty spunky, ain'tcha? Don't let
me down!
jpnChrName: おーおー、こりゃ頼もしいな。 期待してるぜ、ユメ坊。
jpnSearchText:
おーおー、こりゃ頼もしいな。
期待してるぜ、ユメ坊。

engChrName: Heehee! I can do errands all by myself now, 'cause I'm a big girl!
engSearchText:
Heehee! I can do errands all by myself now,
'cause I'm a big girl!
jpnChrName: えっへん、ユメもう 一人でお使いできるもんね～！
jpnSearchText:
えっへん、ユメもう
一人でお使いできるもんね～！

engChrName: Oh, Anya, Anya! Lemme sing my walking song for you! It's called 'Yumé's Song'!
engSearchText:
Oh, Anya, Anya! Lemme sing my walking song
for you! It's called 'Yumé's Song'!
jpnChrName: そーだアーニャ、『ユメの歌』うたってあげるー！ おさんぽにちょーどいいんだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
そーだアーニャ、『ユメの歌』うたってあげるー！
おさんぽにちょーどいいんだよ～！

engChrName: Oh, yeah, the one we made together! Sure! Just don't get distracted while you're singing it, okay? We have to remember where we're going!
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah, the one we made together! Sure! Just don't
get distracted while you're singing it, okay? We have
to remember where we're going!
jpnChrName: うんうん、この前一緒に作ったやつだよね。 夢中になって次の配達先を忘れないようにね～。
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、この前一緒に作ったやつだよね。
夢中になって次の配達先を忘れないようにね～。

engChrName: Hey, come on! Stop drinking so much! You smell!
engSearchText: Hey, come on! Stop drinking so much! You smell!
jpnChrName: もー！　オジサンのみすぎ！ これいじょ～はメッ！
jpnSearchText:
もー！　オジサンのみすぎ！
これいじょ～はメッ！

jpnSearchText:
（ポーレットとユメは絵本を読んでんのか……
マドンナを通り越して、もはや女神っつーか。）

engChrName: (She can read me a bedtime story anytime.)
engSearchText: (She can read me a bedtime story anytime.)
jpnChrName: （オヤジたちが次々陥落するワケだぜ。）
jpnSearchText: （オヤジたちが次々陥落するワケだぜ。）

engChrName: You're telling me you put Sheena and Mark on your bike and got out of there? Man... That was real bold of you.
engSearchText:
You're telling me you put Sheena and Mark on your
bike and got out of there? Man... That was real bold
of you.
jpnChrName: 自転車にシーナとマークを乗せて 逃げ回ってただって！？　そんな無茶な……
jpnSearchText:
自転車にシーナとマークを乗せて
逃げ回ってただって！？　そんな無茶な……

engChrName: I'm damn proud of you, bud. I'm glad you three made it out okay.
engSearchText:
I'm damn proud of you, bud. I'm glad you three made
it out okay.
jpnChrName: だが流石は俺の息子だぜ！ こうして無事でいてくれたんだからな！
jpnSearchText:
だが流石は俺の息子だぜ！
こうして無事でいてくれたんだからな！

engChrName: Of course we did, heh heh! I'm happy you're safe, too, Dad.
engSearchText:
Of course we did, heh heh! I'm happy you're safe,
too, Dad.
jpnChrName: へっへー！　トーゼン！！ てか父ちゃんこそ怪我無くて良かったぜ！
jpnSearchText:
へっへー！　トーゼン！！
てか父ちゃんこそ怪我無くて良かったぜ！

engChrName: I was worried you were kinda out of shape because you work so much.
engSearchText:
I was worried you were kinda out of shape because
you work so much.
jpnChrName: 最近仕事ばっかだし体がナマってないかって ハラハラしたんだからな～！？
jpnSearchText:
最近仕事ばっかだし体がナマってないかって
ハラハラしたんだからな～！？

engChrName: Hey, cut me some slack! Your papa's fit as a fiddle, promise!
engSearchText:
Hey, cut me some slack! Your papa's fit as a
fiddle, promise!
jpnChrName: おいおい、失敬な！ 父さんはまだまだ現役だぞっ！
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、失敬な！
父さんはまだまだ現役だぞっ！

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Guess who's eating a ton of festival food? This guy!
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! Guess who's eating a ton of festival food?
This guy!
jpnChrName: よっしゃー！　今日は食べ歩きだぜ～っ！！
jpnSearchText: よっしゃー！　今日は食べ歩きだぜ～っ！！

engChrName: I promised Sheena we'd go through the Riverside stalls together.
engSearchText:
I promised Sheena we'd go through the Riverside
stalls together.
jpnChrName: シーナんちと一緒に リバーサイドの屋台を回る約束なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
シーナんちと一緒に
リバーサイドの屋台を回る約束なんだ。

engChrName: Man, Dad's been talking to people this whole time. He's sooo slow!
engSearchText:
Man, Dad's been talking to people this whole time.
He's sooo slow!
jpnChrName: にしても父ちゃんたち 立ち話ばっかして、おっせーなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
にしても父ちゃんたち
立ち話ばっかして、おっせーなぁ……

engChrName: Maybe I should go ahead and grab a spot...
engSearchText: Maybe I should go ahead and grab a spot...
jpnChrName: こうなったら先に行って 場所取りしとくか～？
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら先に行って
場所取りしとくか～？

engChrName: Dad's been working so much lately... I wonder if he can even keep up with me.
engSearchText:
Dad's been working so much lately... I wonder if he
can even keep up with me.
jpnChrName: 父ちゃん最近忙しそうだから ダメかと思ったけど……
jpnSearchText:
父ちゃん最近忙しそうだから
ダメかと思ったけど……

engChrName: Heh heh. I gotta tell Mark and Sheena!
engSearchText: Heh heh. I gotta tell Mark and Sheena!
jpnChrName: へへっ、マークとシーナにも 知らせてやんねえと！
jpnSearchText:
へへっ、マークとシーナにも
知らせてやんねえと！

engChrName: They're probably gonna tag along, too, aren't they? We didn't tell them about it, but, well...
engSearchText:
They're probably gonna tag along, too, aren't they?
We didn't tell them about it, but, well...
jpnChrName: あいつらも一緒に来るよな……？ そーいやちゃんと約束してねえけど……
jpnSearchText:
あいつらも一緒に来るよな……？
そーいやちゃんと約束してねえけど……

engChrName: Hey, so the Revolution Festival is coming up, right?
engSearchText: Hey, so the Revolution Festival is coming up, right?
jpnChrName: なーなー、そういえば革命記念祭も もうすぐじゃん？　あれって──
jpnSearchText:
なーなー、そういえば革命記念祭も
もうすぐじゃん？　あれって──

engChrName: The Revolution Festival?!
engSearchText: The Revolution Festival?!
jpnChrName: ──革命記念祭だってェ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>──革命記念祭だってェ！？

engChrName: Of course it is, ya little brats! Remember the date!
engSearchText:
Of course it is, ya little brats!
Remember the date!
jpnChrName: いいかいガキども！ そもそも民主化革命ってのはねェ！
jpnSearchText:
いいかいガキども！
そもそも民主化革命ってのはねェ！

engChrName: (Uh, what's up with her?)
engSearchText: (Uh, what's up with her?)
jpnChrName: （あれ……なんか本気っぽいの   始まっちまったぞ……？）
jpnSearchText:
（あれ……なんか本気っぽいの
始まっちまったぞ……？）

engChrName: Every hero needs a special move, or something like that. I gotta think of one... I can't just mope around when I could be thinking up my super move!
engSearchText:
Every hero needs a special move, or something
like that. I gotta think of one... I can't just mope
around when I could be thinking up my super move!
jpnChrName: ヒーローには必殺技が必要── じゃなかった、とにかく暗い顔してらんないぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ヒーローには必殺技が必要──
じゃなかった、とにかく暗い顔してらんないぜ！

engChrName: Dad has it tough. He's too tired to save Yumé and Mark if things get bad.
engSearchText:
Dad has it tough. He's too tired to save Yumé and
Mark if things get bad.
jpnChrName: 父ちゃんも大変そうだし、ユメやマークだって いざとなったら守ってやらなきゃ……
jpnSearchText:
父ちゃんも大変そうだし、ユメやマークだって
いざとなったら守ってやらなきゃ……

engChrName: But maybe I can use my bike to save them in a pinch! That'll be my superhero move! Yeah!
engSearchText:
But maybe I can use my bike to save them in a pinch!
That'll be my superhero move! Yeah!
jpnChrName: そーだ、自転車でみんなを逃がす レンシューでもしとくかな！
jpnSearchText:
そーだ、自転車でみんなを逃がす
レンシューでもしとくかな！

engChrName: Hey, Daaad? You eat dinner?
engSearchText: Hey, Daaad? You eat dinner?
jpnChrName: そーだ父ちゃん、晩メシ食ったのか～？
jpnSearchText: そーだ父ちゃん、晩メシ食ったのか～？

engChrName: Want me to make you an omelet?
engSearchText: Want me to make you an omelet?
jpnChrName: ハラ減ってたらオレが オムレツ作ってやるぜっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ハラ減ってたらオレが
オムレツ作ってやるぜっ！？

engChrName: A wha—well, goodness, Harry! Since when did you learn to cook?!
engSearchText:
A wha—well, goodness, Harry! Since when did you
learn to cook?!
jpnChrName: な、なにっ！　お前 料理ができるようになったのか……！？
jpnSearchText:
な、なにっ！　お前
料理ができるようになったのか……！？

engChrName: I leave for a month and my boy's all grown up... I've missed so much.
engSearchText:
I leave for a month and my boy's all grown up...
I've missed so much.
jpnChrName: こりゃあ驚いた…… ははっ、長期出張して正解だったかな？
jpnSearchText:
こりゃあ驚いた……
ははっ、長期出張して正解だったかな？

engChrName: Wow, this is so cool! Can I really play with him?!
engSearchText: Wow, this is so cool! Can I really play with him?!
jpnChrName: くうっ……こんなカッチョイイやつと 遊べるなんて……！！
jpnSearchText:
くうっ……こんなカッチョイイやつと
遊べるなんて……！！

engChrName: Hey, no fair, Yumé! Why didn't you tell me sooner?!
engSearchText: Hey, no fair, Yumé! Why didn't you tell me sooner?!
jpnChrName: ずるいぜユメ！！　もっと早く 教えてくれてもいいじゃんかよーっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ずるいぜユメ！！　もっと早く
教えてくれてもいいじゃんかよーっ！！

engChrName: Kid's gettin' himself all worked up, sounds like. Just can't handle himself.
engSearchText:
Kid's gettin' himself all worked up, sounds like.
Just can't handle himself.
jpnChrName: 興奮のあまりテンションが おかしくなってんな。
jpnSearchText:
興奮のあまりテンションが
おかしくなってんな。

engChrName: (I wasn't expecting my assistants to prove so popular with children... Not that I mind.)
engSearchText:
(I wasn't expecting my assistants to prove so popular
with children... Not that I mind.)
jpnChrName: （思った以上に人気、みたいだね……   まあ悪い気はしないかな。）
jpnSearchText:
（思った以上に人気、みたいだね……
まあ悪い気はしないかな。）

engChrName: Oh, I almost forgot! Dad's coming back from his big trip today!
engSearchText:
Oh, I almost forgot! Dad's coming back from his big
trip today!
jpnChrName: そーいや、今日は父ちゃんが 長期出張から戻ってくるんだ！
jpnSearchText:
そーいや、今日は父ちゃんが
長期出張から戻ってくるんだ！

engChrName: I'm gonna tell him all about XEROS when he gets back!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna tell him all about XEROS when he
gets back!
jpnChrName: へへっ、“ぜろす”だっけ？ あとで父ちゃんに自慢してやるしかねーぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
へへっ、“ぜろす”だっけ？
あとで父ちゃんに自慢してやるしかねーぜ！！

engChrName: I've been living with Sheena's family for about a month now.
engSearchText:
I've been living with Sheena's family for about a
month now.
jpnChrName: 父ちゃんが長期出張に行っちまって 今はシーナんちの世話になってるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
父ちゃんが長期出張に行っちまって
今はシーナんちの世話になってるんだ。

engChrName: It's so fun being able to play with her every day! And we get to do the shopping on the way home, too.
engSearchText:
It's so fun being able to play with her every day!
And we get to do the shopping on the way home, too.
jpnChrName: 昼間は一緒に遊んで、帰りに 買い物ってのが定番になっちまったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
昼間は一緒に遊んで、帰りに
買い物ってのが定番になっちまったぜ。

engChrName: Sheena's got a really good memory. She always remembers what we need to get after we're done playing.
engSearchText:
Sheena's got a really good memory. She always
remembers what we need to get after we're
done playing.
jpnChrName: ……にしてもシーナ、よく覚えてるよな～。 あんなに遊びまくった後なのによ。
jpnSearchText:
……にしてもシーナ、よく覚えてるよな～。
あんなに遊びまくった後なのによ。

engChrName: Sergeant! I would like permission to use my trusty steed, Calibur 1, for this mission!
engSearchText:
Sergeant! I would like permission to use my trusty
steed, Calibur 1, for this mission!
jpnChrName: 軍曹どの！　今回の任務、我が愛車 キャリバー号の使用をご許可頂きたい！
jpnSearchText:
軍曹どの！　今回の任務、我が愛車
キャリバー号の使用をご許可頂きたい！

engChrName: You have my permission! Just be careful when riding with two people!
engSearchText:
You have my permission! Just be careful when riding
with two people!
jpnChrName: 良かろう！　二人乗りには 十分注意するように！
jpnSearchText:
良かろう！　二人乗りには
十分注意するように！

engChrName: Yes, ma'am!
engSearchText: Yes, ma'am!
jpnChrName: はっ！　承知いたしました！！
jpnSearchText: はっ！　承知いたしました！！

engChrName: As long as I've got Calibur 1, there's nothing I can't do! Woohoo, haha!
engSearchText:
As long as I've got Calibur 1, there's nothing I
can't do! Woohoo, haha!
jpnChrName: これで勝てるぜッ！！　キャリバー号さえあれば 不可能な任務などない！！　うおおおおお！！
jpnSearchText:
これで勝てるぜッ！！　キャリバー号さえあれば
不可能な任務などない！！　うおおおおお！！

engChrName: Private Harry, are you listening? Be careful, this is a search and rescue mission. Don't screw up!
engSearchText:
Private Harry, are you listening? Be careful, this is a
search and rescue mission. Don't screw up!
jpnChrName: 新兵ハリー、ちゃんと話聞いてたか？ 捜索任務だぞ？　間違えるなよ？
jpnSearchText:
新兵ハリー、ちゃんと話聞いてたか？
捜索任務だぞ？　間違えるなよ？

engChrName: I can't just leave you alone for a whole month. You can't even cook for yourself!
engSearchText:
I can't just leave you alone for a whole month.
You can't even cook for yourself!
jpnChrName: さすがに一ヶ月も１人にさせられんだろ。 大体お前、料理もできないしなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
さすがに一ヶ月も１人にさせられんだろ。
大体お前、料理もできないしなぁ……

engChrName: ...Wait, so you mean I'm staying with Sheena and Mark? R-Really?!
engSearchText:
...Wait, so you mean I'm staying with Sheena
and Mark? R-Really?!
jpnChrName: ……オレ、おじさんちに泊んの？ シーナとマークと一緒に？？　……マジ！？
jpnSearchText:
……オレ、おじさんちに泊んの？
シーナとマークと一緒に？？　……マジ！？

engChrName: I get to play with them EVERY DAY?! Yeah, I can totally do that!
engSearchText:
I get to play with them EVERY DAY?! Yeah, I can
totally do that!
jpnChrName: へ～、面白そうじゃん！ これならオレにもできそうだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
へ～、面白そうじゃん！
これならオレにもできそうだぜ！

engChrName: If we're gonna make music, I wanna make a really cool song! We can call it, uh...uhh, Harry's Song! Yeah!
engSearchText:
If we're gonna make music, I wanna make a really
cool song! We can call it, uh...uhh, Harry's Song!
Yeah!
jpnChrName: 作るならぜってーカッコイイ曲だな！！ 題もえっと、『ハリーの歌』で決まりだろ？
jpnSearchText:
作るならぜってーカッコイイ曲だな！！
題もえっと、『ハリーの歌』で決まりだろ？

engChrName: I wanna make it about my cool new bike! Let's try to fit that in, okay?
engSearchText:
I wanna make it about my cool new bike! Let's try to
fit that in, okay?
jpnChrName: あとはそうだな～、自転車に乗れるようになったから 『自転車』って言葉は使いたいよな～！
jpnSearchText:
あとはそうだな～、自転車に乗れるようになったから
『自転車』って言葉は使いたいよな～！

engChrName: *snore* Gah... Take...this... How d'ya like... that...? Zzz...
engSearchText:
*snore* Gah... Take...this... How d'ya like...
that...? Zzz...
jpnChrName: ぐがぁ～……ぐごぉ～…… ………へへ……どーだ驚いたかぁぁ………
jpnSearchText:
ぐがぁ～……ぐごぉ～……
………へへ……どーだ驚いたかぁぁ………

engChrName: Hey, Feri! This time I'll get my revenge.
engSearchText: Hey, Feri! This time I'll get my revenge.
jpnChrName: よっ、フェリじゃん！ 今日はリベンジ、受けてくれんのかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
よっ、フェリじゃん！
今日はリベンジ、受けてくれんのかっ！？

engChrName: Sorry, I'm working today. I don't have the time for that.
engSearchText:
Sorry, I'm working today. I don't have the time
for that.
jpnChrName: いえ、残念ながらお仕事の日なんです。 すみません、ハリー。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、残念ながらお仕事の日なんです。
すみません、ハリー。

engChrName: Okay. I just... I wanna beat you! You're so much better than me at everything...
engSearchText:
Okay. I just... I wanna beat you! You're so much
better than me at everything...
jpnChrName: いいんだけどよ～、かけっこも木登りも パチンコ銃もオレより上手いなんて……
jpnSearchText:
いいんだけどよ～、かけっこも木登りも
パチンコ銃もオレより上手いなんて……

engChrName: When you get some free time, I wanna play with you again!
engSearchText:
When you get some free time, I wanna play with
you again!
jpnChrName: うらやまケシカラン！！ また時間ができたら一緒に遊ぼーぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
うらやまケシカラン！！
また時間ができたら一緒に遊ぼーぜ！！

engChrName: I'm gonna practice super DUPER hard, so I can beat you next time! Just you wait!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna practice super DUPER hard, so I can
beat you next time! Just you wait!
jpnChrName: オレもれんしゅーしとくし、 みんなだってぜってー盛り上がるしさ～！！
jpnSearchText:
オレもれんしゅーしとくし、
みんなだってぜってー盛り上がるしさ～！！

engChrName: Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it, too.
engSearchText: Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it, too.
jpnChrName: わかりました、 わたしも楽しみにしてますね！
jpnSearchText:
わかりました、
わたしも楽しみにしてますね！

engChrName: (Sounds like she's getting along well with the kids.)
engSearchText: (Sounds like she's getting along well with the kids.)
jpnChrName: （フェリちゃん、子供たちと   仲良くなったみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（フェリちゃん、子供たちと
仲良くなったみたいですね。）

engChrName: (Doesn't surprise me—she's got two younger siblings back home. I imagine it comes from experience.)
engSearchText:
(Doesn't surprise me—she's got two younger siblings
back home. I imagine it comes from experience.)
jpnChrName: （ま、弟妹がいるらしいし   遊んでやるのは得意みてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、弟妹がいるらしいし
遊んでやるのは得意みてえだな。）

engChrName: Man, Yumé's too good at kick the can... Not even the no running rule works on her!
engSearchText:
Man, Yumé's too good at kick the can... Not even the
no running rule works on her!
jpnChrName: にしても、ユメもカンケリ強くなったよなぁ…… “走らない”ハンデだけじゃ無理があるぜ……
jpnSearchText:
にしても、ユメもカンケリ強くなったよなぁ……
“走らない”ハンデだけじゃ無理があるぜ……

engChrName: ...Wait, I have an idea! If I use Sheena as a distraction...
engSearchText:
...Wait, I have an idea! If I use Sheena as
a distraction...
jpnChrName: そーだ、どーにかシーナを囮にすれば……
jpnSearchText: そーだ、どーにかシーナを囮にすれば……

engChrName: So I caught a newt this morning, right? Now, what if I were to slip this down Sheena's back...? Heh heh. How high would she jump?
engSearchText:
So I caught a newt this morning, right? Now, what if
I were to slip this down Sheena's back...? Heh heh.
How high would she jump?
jpnChrName: そういや今朝イモリを捕まえたんだよな～。 こいつをシーナの背中に突っ込んでやれば……♪
jpnSearchText:
そういや今朝イモリを捕まえたんだよな～。
こいつをシーナの背中に突っ込んでやれば……♪

engChrName: Should I...not have heard that?
engSearchText: Should I...not have heard that?
jpnChrName: な、なにか不穏な話を聞いた気が……
jpnSearchText: な、なにか不穏な話を聞いた気が……

engChrName: He's a little troublemaker, haha.
engSearchText: He's a little troublemaker, haha.
jpnChrName: あはは……ハリーはやんちゃですね。
jpnSearchText: あはは……ハリーはやんちゃですね。

engChrName: Agh, dang it! I swear, this bike hates me.
engSearchText: Agh, dang it! I swear, this bike hates me.
jpnChrName: ぐはっ……ダメだぁ…… きっとオレはこの自転車に嫌われてるんだぁぁ……！！
jpnSearchText:
ぐはっ……ダメだぁ……
きっとオレはこの自転車に嫌われてるんだぁぁ……！！

engChrName: Let's just go home for today... You really took a tumble, there.
engSearchText:
Let's just go home for today... You really took a
tumble, there.
jpnChrName: はいはい、分かったからもう帰るわよ。 ……っていうか、よくそれだけ派手に転んだわね……
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、分かったからもう帰るわよ。
……っていうか、よくそれだけ派手に転んだわね……

engChrName: I'll get that cleaned up, okay? Let's hurry on back, now. The sun's gonna set soon.
engSearchText:
I'll get that cleaned up, okay? Let's hurry on
back, now. The sun's gonna set soon.
jpnChrName: ホラ、手当してあげるから起きなさいよ。 もたもたしてると日が暮れちゃうわよ～？
jpnSearchText:
ホラ、手当してあげるから起きなさいよ。
もたもたしてると日が暮れちゃうわよ～？

engChrName: Ow, ow...! Man, you can be really harsh sometimes...
engSearchText: Ow, ow...! Man, you can be really harsh sometimes...
jpnChrName: ……お前ってけっこー容赦ねえよな～……
jpnSearchText: ……お前ってけっこー容赦ねえよな～……

engChrName: Man... I thought I was pretty strong, but... *sniffle* It really hurts...
engSearchText:
Man... I thought I was pretty strong, but... *sniffle*
It really hurts...
jpnChrName: オレ、運動シンケーはいいと思ってたんだ…… ………ぐすんっ…………
jpnSearchText:
オレ、運動シンケーはいいと思ってたんだ……
………ぐすんっ…………

engChrName: Oh, one of your buttons is falling off! Lemme put that back on. Can you gimme your pants?
engSearchText:
Oh, one of your buttons is falling off! Lemme put
that back on. Can you gimme your pants?
jpnChrName: あ、ズボンのボタン取れかかってるじゃない。 ついでに付けてあげるから、ちゃっちゃと脱いで。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ズボンのボタン取れかかってるじゃない。
ついでに付けてあげるから、ちゃっちゃと脱いで。

engChrName: Wha—hey! Are you crazy?! I can't just take my pants off here!
engSearchText:
Wha—hey! Are you crazy?! I can't just take my pants
off here!
jpnChrName: は、話聞けよっ！ つーかここじゃ恥ずかしいっての！
jpnSearchText:
は、話聞けよっ！
つーかここじゃ恥ずかしいっての！

engChrName: Carrots, potatoes, artichoke... What else was there?
engSearchText: Carrots, potatoes, artichoke... What else was there?
jpnChrName: ニンジン、ジャガイモ、アーティチョーク ……あと何がいるんだっけか？
jpnSearchText:
ニンジン、ジャガイモ、アーティチョーク
……あと何がいるんだっけか？

engChrName: Can you hold more for me, Harry? I was gonna buy some milk and a baguette for breakfast.
engSearchText:
Can you hold more for me, Harry? I was gonna buy
some milk and a baguette for breakfast.
jpnChrName: ハリー、まだ持てる？　朝食用に バゲットとミルクも買っておこっかな。
jpnSearchText:
ハリー、まだ持てる？　朝食用に
バゲットとミルクも買っておこっかな。

engChrName: Hey, c'mon, Mark, let's go! What're you doing over there?
engSearchText:
Hey, c'mon, Mark, let's go! What're you doing
over there?
jpnChrName: ──ほらマーク、何してるの！？ そろそろ行くわよ！
jpnSearchText:
──ほらマーク、何してるの！？
そろそろ行くわよ！

engChrName: Dinner's soon! We're gonna leave you behind if you don't catch up!
engSearchText:
Dinner's soon! We're gonna leave you behind if you
don't catch up!
jpnChrName: いくぞマーク！ 夕飯食い損ねちまうぞーっ！
jpnSearchText:
いくぞマーク！
夕飯食い損ねちまうぞーっ！

engChrName: All the grown-ups have been nervous about something... I think we're okay, though?
engSearchText:
All the grown-ups have been nervous
about something... I think we're okay, though?
jpnChrName: 大人たちも落ち着かなさそうだよな～。 今すぐどうこうって感じでもねーけど……
jpnSearchText:
大人たちも落ち着かなさそうだよな～。
今すぐどうこうって感じでもねーけど……

engChrName: We are...but I heard on the radio that Creil Village is...gone...
engSearchText:
We are...but I heard on the radio that Creil Village
is...gone...
jpnChrName: うん……でもクレイユ村の人たちは 死亡と断定されたってラジオで………
jpnSearchText:
うん……でもクレイユ村の人たちは
死亡と断定されたってラジオで………

engChrName: I... I'll keep everyone here safe. I promise! I won't let all that bad stuff happen here.
engSearchText:
I... I'll keep everyone here safe. I promise! I won't let
all that bad stuff happen here.
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫だっつーの！！ みんなはオレがぜってー守ってやっからさ！
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫だっつーの！！
みんなはオレがぜってー守ってやっからさ！

engChrName: That just made me think of a new super move!
engSearchText: That just made me think of a new super move!
jpnChrName: そーだ、オレちょーど必殺技考えたんだよな！
jpnSearchText: そーだ、オレちょーど必殺技考えたんだよな！

engChrName: I call it the Flash Calibur! I take my bike, and then I jump off it, and I kick 'em in the face!
engSearchText:
I call it the Flash Calibur! I take my bike, and then I
jump off it, and I kick 'em in the face!
jpnChrName: その名も『キャリバー号フラッシュ』！！ 自転車から飛び蹴りをかますウルトラ技だぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
その名も『キャリバー号フラッシュ』！！
自転車から飛び蹴りをかますウルトラ技だぜ！！

engChrName: ...Heehee. You read too many comic books, Harry.
engSearchText: ...Heehee. You read too many comic books, Harry.
jpnChrName: クスクス……なにそれ。 ハリーったらコミックに影響されすぎよ。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……なにそれ。
ハリーったらコミックに影響されすぎよ。

engChrName: (Thanks... I think that made me feel a little better.)
engSearchText: (Thanks... I think that made me feel a little better.)
jpnChrName: （でもちょっと気が楽になったかも……   ありがとね、ハリー。）
jpnSearchText:
（でもちょっと気が楽になったかも……
ありがとね、ハリー。）

engChrName: Oh, hi, Mom! Hi, Dad! I'm feeling a lot better now!
engSearchText: Oh, hi, Mom! Hi, Dad! I'm feeling a lot better now!
jpnChrName: おとーさんとおかーさんだ～っ！！ えへへっ、ぼく元気でたよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
おとーさんとおかーさんだ～っ！！
えへへっ、ぼく元気でたよ～っ！！

engChrName: It's still kinda scary outside, but we'll wait right here!
engSearchText: It's still kinda scary outside, but we'll wait right here!
jpnChrName: おそとはまだコワイから、 ぼくたちここで待ってるね！！
jpnSearchText:
おそとはまだコワイから、
ぼくたちここで待ってるね！！

engChrName: Make sure you guys come by again, too. Okay?
engSearchText: Make sure you guys come by again, too. Okay?
jpnChrName: みんなもまた会いにきてね～っ！！
jpnSearchText: みんなもまた会いにきてね～っ！！

engChrName: Woohoo! I get to play with Harry all day!
engSearchText: Woohoo! I get to play with Harry all day!
jpnChrName: わあ～い！　きょうは一日 ハリーといっしょにあそべるんだ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
わあ～い！　きょうは一日
ハリーといっしょにあそべるんだ～っ！！

engChrName: And Sheena worked super hard to make lunch for him!
engSearchText:
And Sheena worked super hard to make lunch
for him!
jpnChrName: おねーちゃんもね、ハリーにわたそ～って おべんとうガンバってつくってきたし！
jpnSearchText:
おねーちゃんもね、ハリーにわたそ～って
おべんとうガンバってつくってきたし！

engChrName: Hey, zip it, Mark!
engSearchText: Hey, zip it, Mark!
jpnChrName: こらっ、マーク！　その話は禁止！
jpnSearchText: こらっ、マーク！　その話は禁止！

engChrName: O-Oops! I didn't know it was a surprise...
engSearchText: O-Oops! I didn't know it was a surprise...
jpnChrName: そ、そうなの～！？ ぼく、よくわかんないけど……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうなの～！？
ぼく、よくわかんないけど……

engChrName: Sheena's in a bad mood... I wonder why?
engSearchText: Sheena's in a bad mood... I wonder why?
jpnChrName: おねーちゃんはなんだか キゲンがいまいちだけど……
jpnSearchText:
おねーちゃんはなんだか
キゲンがいまいちだけど……

engChrName: But it's okay. I get to play all day! And Mom and Dad are here, too!
engSearchText:
But it's okay. I get to play all day! And Mom and
Dad are here, too!
jpnChrName: でも一日あそべるんだよ～っ！！ おとーさんたちもいっしょにね！！
jpnSearchText:
でも一日あそべるんだよ～っ！！
おとーさんたちもいっしょにね！！

engChrName: Harry looks super happy. He gets to play with Mr. Hawker all day!
engSearchText:
Harry looks super happy. He gets to play with Mr.
Hawker all day!
jpnChrName: えへへっ、ハリーうれしそう！ きねんさい、ホーカーおじさんと遊ぶんだ～！
jpnSearchText:
えへへっ、ハリーうれしそう！
きねんさい、ホーカーおじさんと遊ぶんだ～！

engChrName: But then, does that mean he's not playing with us? I kinda wanted to play with him, too...
engSearchText:
But then, does that mean he's not playing with us?
I kinda wanted to play with him, too...
jpnChrName: ……ぼくたちとはいっしょじゃないのかなぁ？ ハリーがうれしいと、ぼくもうれしいけど……
jpnSearchText:
……ぼくたちとはいっしょじゃないのかなぁ？
ハリーがうれしいと、ぼくもうれしいけど……

engChrName: I, umm... I wanna go to the festival with Harry...
engSearchText: I, umm... I wanna go to the festival with Harry...
jpnChrName: ぼく、ぼく…… きねんさいもハリーといっしょがいいなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ぼく、ぼく……
きねんさいもハリーといっしょがいいなぁ……

engChrName: I, umm... I wanna go to the festival with Harry...
engSearchText: I, umm... I wanna go to the festival with Harry...
jpnChrName: ぼく、ぼく…… きねんさいもハリーといっしょがいいなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ぼく、ぼく……
きねんさいもハリーといっしょがいいなぁ……

engChrName: Tomorrow, I'll invite him to go with me!
engSearchText: Tomorrow, I'll invite him to go with me!
jpnChrName: ……あしたハリーにたのんでみよっと……！ きねんさいもいっしょに遊んでって……！
jpnSearchText:
……あしたハリーにたのんでみよっと……！
きねんさいもいっしょに遊んでって……！

engChrName: Oh, Ms. Gin? I have a question.
engSearchText: Oh, Ms. Gin? I have a question.
jpnChrName: はいっ、しつも～ん！ えっとえっと……
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、しつも～ん！
えっとえっと……

engChrName: Have you always been running a candy shop?
engSearchText: Have you always been running a candy shop?
jpnChrName: おばあちゃんは昔から ダガシ屋さんだったの～！？
jpnSearchText:
おばあちゃんは昔から
ダガシ屋さんだったの～！？

engChrName: I sell tobacco, not candy! It ain't for kids, y'hear?
engSearchText: I sell tobacco, not candy! It ain't for kids, y'hear?
jpnChrName: 駄菓子屋じゃないよ、タバコ屋だよっ！
jpnSearchText: 駄菓子屋じゃないよ、タバコ屋だよっ！

engChrName: Back then, though... Well, can't get too deep into that. I was pretty popular, is all I'll say...
engSearchText:
Back then, though... Well, can't get too deep
into that. I was pretty popular, is all I'll say...
jpnChrName: だがいい質問さね──詳しくは言えないが アタシも若い頃は引く手あまたでねェ～……
jpnSearchText:
だがいい質問さね──詳しくは言えないが
アタシも若い頃は引く手あまたでねェ～……

engChrName: Oh! Mr. Hawker's back!
engSearchText: Oh! Mr. Hawker's back!
jpnChrName: あのね！　ホーカーおじさんが かえってきたんだ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
あのね！　ホーカーおじさんが
かえってきたんだ～っ！

engChrName: Harry and Sheena are really having fun!
engSearchText: Harry and Sheena are really having fun!
jpnChrName: えへへっ、ハリーもおねーちゃんも うれしそうだよ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへっ、ハリーもおねーちゃんも
うれしそうだよ！

engChrName: I love when everyone's smiling! It makes me happy.
engSearchText: I love when everyone's smiling! It makes me happy.
jpnChrName: ……ぼく、みんながわらってるのが大好き！
jpnSearchText: ……ぼく、みんながわらってるのが大好き！

engChrName: I wanna play with them tomorrow, and the day after that, and then, and then...!
engSearchText:
I wanna play with them tomorrow, and the day after
that, and then, and then...!
jpnChrName: あしたもあさっても、ずっとずっと みんなでいっしょに遊ぶんだ～！！
jpnSearchText:
あしたもあさっても、ずっとずっと
みんなでいっしょに遊ぶんだ～！！

engChrName: We're taking turns giving head pats!
engSearchText: We're taking turns giving head pats!
jpnChrName: あのねー！　こーたいで ナデナデすることにしたんだ～！
jpnSearchText:
あのねー！　こーたいで
ナデナデすることにしたんだ～！

engChrName: But when Sheena's turn came, she got really excited and kinda freaked out.
engSearchText:
But when Sheena's turn came, she got really excited
and kinda freaked out.
jpnChrName: でもおねーちゃん…… じゅんばんが来たらコーフンしすぎて……
jpnSearchText:
でもおねーちゃん……
じゅんばんが来たらコーフンしすぎて……

engChrName: I've never seen her like that before, heehee!
engSearchText: I've never seen her like that before, heehee!
jpnChrName: あはは！　こんなおねーちゃん はじめて見たかも～！？
jpnSearchText:
あはは！　こんなおねーちゃん
はじめて見たかも～！？

engChrName: Sheena and Harry have been going to the grocery store all by themselves lately!
engSearchText:
Sheena and Harry have been going to the grocery
store all by themselves lately!
jpnChrName: さいきんね～、ゴハンの買いものは ハリーとおねーちゃんでやってるんだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
さいきんね～、ゴハンの買いものは
ハリーとおねーちゃんでやってるんだよ～！

engChrName: They kinda remind me of Mom and Dad! Heehee...
engSearchText: They kinda remind me of Mom and Dad! Heehee...
jpnChrName: ……ハリーとおねーちゃんって、なんだか…… おとーさんとおかーさんみたいだね！　えへへ！
jpnSearchText:
……ハリーとおねーちゃんって、なんだか……
おとーさんとおかーさんみたいだね！　えへへ！

engChrName: I wonder if they'll buy some candy, too...
engSearchText: I wonder if they'll buy some candy, too...
jpnChrName: ついでにオカシも 買ってくれないかなぁ～♪
jpnSearchText:
ついでにオカシも
買ってくれないかなぁ～♪

engChrName: Oh, so, umm, Harry's living at my house right now!
engSearchText: Oh, so, umm, Harry's living at my house right now!
jpnChrName: あのねあのね～っ！ ハリーね、いまぼくの家にすんでるんだよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
あのねあのね～っ！
ハリーね、いまぼくの家にすんでるんだよ～！！

engChrName: So every day we get to play! It's the best thing ever!
engSearchText: So every day we get to play! It's the best thing ever!
jpnChrName: だから毎日た～っくさんあそんでくれるんだ！ ……ぼくしあわせ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
だから毎日た～っくさんあそんでくれるんだ！
……ぼくしあわせ～っ！！

engChrName: (Mark, you're supposed to be a new recruit, remember?)
engSearchText:
(Mark, you're supposed to be a new
recruit, remember?)
jpnChrName: （おいマーク！　今のお前は   新兵だって言ったろ？）
jpnSearchText:
（おいマーク！　今のお前は
新兵だって言ったろ？）

engChrName: (Oh, shoot! I forgot! I gotta go. See you guys later!)
engSearchText: (Oh, shoot! I forgot! I gotta go. See you guys later!)
jpnChrName: （はっ、そうだった！   ……みんな、またね～っ！）
jpnSearchText:
（はっ、そうだった！
……みんな、またね～っ！）

engChrName: (Have fun!)
engSearchText: (Have fun!)
jpnChrName: （はいっ、また今度！）
jpnSearchText: （はいっ、また今度！）

engChrName: (Don't break a leg, kiddo.)
engSearchText: (Don't break a leg, kiddo.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、怪我のねえように遊べよ？）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、怪我のねえように遊べよ？）

engChrName: Harumph! What is it, citizen? I don't have any business with you today.
engSearchText:
Harumph! What is it, citizen? I don't have any
business with you today.
jpnChrName: ……なんだね？　今回のにんむ、 キミたちにはかんけーのないハナシだ。
jpnSearchText:
……なんだね？　今回のにんむ、
キミたちにはかんけーのないハナシだ。

engChrName: Don't get in my way, or I'll arrest you for treason!
engSearchText: Don't get in my way, or I'll arrest you for treason!
jpnChrName: ジャマをするようなら こっかハンギャクじゃいでタイホするが？
jpnSearchText:
ジャマをするようなら
こっかハンギャクじゃいでタイホするが？

engChrName: (What an upstanding young soldier he is. Heehee.)
engSearchText: (What an upstanding young soldier he is. Heehee.)
jpnChrName: （クスクス……可愛らしい新兵さんですね。）
jpnSearchText: （クスクス……可愛らしい新兵さんですね。）

engChrName: Oh! Daddy brought an umbrella! Daddy!
engSearchText: Oh! Daddy brought an umbrella! Daddy!
jpnChrName: あ、パパが傘持ってきてくれたみたい～！ ……パパぁ～！！
jpnSearchText:
あ、パパが傘持ってきてくれたみたい～！
……パパぁ～！！

engChrName: Huh, looks like he's talking to Sheena.
engSearchText: Huh, looks like he's talking to Sheena.
jpnChrName: ん～、なんだかシーナと 話し込んでるみたいだね～。
jpnSearchText:
ん～、なんだかシーナと
話し込んでるみたいだね～。

engChrName: I guess he wants to talk to her about something. Let's leave them alone for now!
engSearchText:
I guess he wants to talk to her about something.
Let's leave them alone for now!
jpnChrName: ちょっと邪魔しない方がいいかも。 お姉ちゃんとお喋りでもしてよっか～。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと邪魔しない方がいいかも。
お姉ちゃんとお喋りでもしてよっか～。

engChrName: Really? Okay, then.
engSearchText: Really? Okay, then.
jpnChrName: そうなの～？ ……うん、いいけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうなの～？
……うん、いいけど……

engChrName: I got really muddy when I was playing today. The rain made everything all yucky!
engSearchText:
I got really muddy when I was playing today.
The rain made everything all yucky!
jpnChrName: あのね～、お外であそんでたら 雨でドロだらけになっちゃったんだ～！
jpnSearchText:
あのね～、お外であそんでたら
雨でドロだらけになっちゃったんだ～！

engChrName: So I went to the bath with Sheena to get myself clean.
engSearchText:
So I went to the bath with Sheena to get
myself clean.
jpnChrName: だからおねーちゃんと お風呂はいってたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
だからおねーちゃんと
お風呂はいってたんだけど……

engChrName: But what's she talking with Dad about now?
engSearchText: But what's she talking with Dad about now?
jpnChrName: おとーさんとおねーちゃん、 何はなしてるんだろ～？？
jpnSearchText:
おとーさんとおねーちゃん、
何はなしてるんだろ～？？

engChrName: So, I was thinking...
engSearchText: So, I was thinking...
jpnChrName: あのねあのね～！　ぼくはねー……
jpnSearchText: あのねあのね～！　ぼくはねー……

engChrName: What kind of song should we make next? Hmm...
engSearchText: What kind of song should we make next? Hmm...
jpnChrName: ………んーと、えーっと……… どんな歌がいいのかなぁ……？
jpnSearchText:
………んーと、えーっと………
どんな歌がいいのかなぁ……？

engChrName: I wish I were as good at it as Yumé. She's really good at making songs.
engSearchText:
I wish I were as good at it as Yumé. She's really good
at making songs.
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんみたいに ぱぱーって思いついたらいいんだけど～。
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃんみたいに
ぱぱーって思いついたらいいんだけど～。

engChrName: Maybe I should ask Father Nikolai for help.
engSearchText: Maybe I should ask Father Nikolai for help.
jpnChrName: えっと、えっと……… 教区長さまにそーだんしてみようかなぁ～？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、えっと………
教区長さまにそーだんしてみようかなぁ～？

engChrName: Zzz... Harry, lemme play, too...
engSearchText: Zzz... Harry, lemme play, too...
jpnChrName: むにゃむにゃ……ハリィ～……♪ ……あしたもあそぼーねぇ～……
jpnSearchText:
むにゃむにゃ……ハリィ～……♪
……あしたもあそぼーねぇ～……

engChrName: Oh, no! Yumé caught me...
engSearchText: Oh, no! Yumé caught me...
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんに捕まっちゃった……
jpnSearchText: ユメちゃんに捕まっちゃった……

engChrName: Harry, Sheena, help! Hurry up and save me!
engSearchText: Harry, Sheena, help! Hurry up and save me!
jpnChrName: ふぇぇん……　ハリー！　おねーちゃあん！ はやく助けてよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
ふぇぇん……　ハリー！　おねーちゃあん！
はやく助けてよ～！！

engChrName: I see their mission has taken a turn.
engSearchText: I see their mission has taken a turn.
jpnChrName: あはは……なんだか 白熱してるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……なんだか
白熱してるみたいですね。

engChrName: They're rescuing a hostage, huh? Now that's exciting!
engSearchText: They're rescuing a hostage, huh? Now that's exciting!
jpnChrName: ──そして捕虜の救出任務！ これは燃えますね！！
jpnSearchText:
──そして捕虜の救出任務！
これは燃えますね！！

engChrName: Yeah. We got our own job to do, though. Let's get rollin'.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We got our own job to do, though. Let's
get rollin'.
jpnChrName: あー、俺らも仕事するぞ バイト二号。
jpnSearchText:
あー、俺らも仕事するぞ
バイト二号。

engChrName: Oh, no! Harry just fell!
engSearchText: Oh, no! Harry just fell!
jpnChrName: ふええぇぇぇぇん……！！ ハリーが……ハリーが転んじゃったぁ！！
jpnSearchText:
ふええぇぇぇぇん……！！
ハリーが……ハリーが転んじゃったぁ！！

engChrName: Ouch, that looks like it hurt! You okay?
engSearchText: Ouch, that looks like it hurt! You okay?
jpnChrName: い～た～そぉぉぉ～っ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>い～た～そぉぉぉ～っ！！

engChrName: Well, it hurt for him, he's the one that fell. It doesn't hurt for you, 'cause you were just watching.
engSearchText:
Well, it hurt for him, he's the one that fell. It doesn't
hurt for you, 'cause you were just watching.
jpnChrName: いやだから、転んだのはハリーであって あんたは見てただけでしょ……
jpnSearchText:
いやだから、転んだのはハリーであって
あんたは見てただけでしょ……

engChrName: Keep your voice down, okay? It freaks me out a little...
engSearchText:
Keep your voice down, okay? It freaks me out
a little...
jpnChrName: 紛らわしいから泣き止みなさいよね。 お姉ちゃん、うるさい子は嫌いよ。
jpnSearchText:
紛らわしいから泣き止みなさいよね。
お姉ちゃん、うるさい子は嫌いよ。

engChrName: Van, shh! She's gonna find us!
engSearchText: Van, shh! She's gonna find us!
jpnChrName: ヴァン兄ちゃん、シーッ！！ 見つかっちまうじゃんか……！！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン兄ちゃん、シーッ！！
見つかっちまうじゃんか……！！

engChrName: Yeah, shh! We gotta hide from Sheena!
engSearchText: Yeah, shh! We gotta hide from Sheena!
jpnChrName: シーッ！！ おねーちゃんに見つかっちゃう～！
jpnSearchText:
シーッ！！
おねーちゃんに見つかっちゃう～！

engChrName: My bad. Didn't realize you guys were playin' hide and seek again.
engSearchText:
My bad. Didn't realize you guys were playin' hide and
seek again.
jpnChrName: 悪ぃ悪ぃ、また隠れんぼしてるみたいだな。
jpnSearchText: 悪ぃ悪ぃ、また隠れんぼしてるみたいだな。

engChrName: I'll get outta your hair, then. Just don't get yourselves into trouble, yeah?
engSearchText:
I'll get outta your hair, then. Just don't get yourselves
into trouble, yeah?
jpnChrName: ヤンチャもいいが、怪我しねえようにな。 ……ま言っても無駄かもしれんが。
jpnSearchText:
ヤンチャもいいが、怪我しねえようにな。
……ま言っても無駄かもしれんが。

engChrName: Heh heh! No problem! She'll never catch me!
engSearchText: Heh heh! No problem! She'll never catch me!
jpnChrName: へっへー！　大丈夫だっての！ このオレがシーナなんかに捕まるワケねーし！！
jpnSearchText:
へっへー！　大丈夫だっての！
このオレがシーナなんかに捕まるワケねーし！！

engChrName: Mhm! She always catches me instead, and then she makes me a hostage!
engSearchText:
Mhm! She always catches me instead, and then she
makes me a hostage!
jpnChrName: うんうん！　いっつもボクがつかまって ヒトジチにされちゃうパターンだよね！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん！　いっつもボクがつかまって
ヒトジチにされちゃうパターンだよね！

engChrName: C'mon, Mark, be positive! We're gonna win today, I know it!
engSearchText:
C'mon, Mark, be positive! We're gonna win today, I
know it!
jpnChrName: っておいマーク！　縁起でもないコト言うなよ～！ 今日こそは二人で逃げ切るんだっての！！
jpnSearchText:
っておいマーク！　縁起でもないコト言うなよ～！
今日こそは二人で逃げ切るんだっての！！

engChrName: O-Okay! Sorry, Harry! I'll run as fast as I can!
engSearchText: O-Okay! Sorry, Harry! I'll run as fast as I can!
jpnChrName: わ、わかったハリー！　ボクがんばる！！
jpnSearchText: わ、わかったハリー！　ボクがんばる！！

engChrName: Oho! Good luck with that.
engSearchText: Oho! Good luck with that.
jpnChrName: おー、ガンバレガンバレ。
jpnSearchText: おー、ガンバレガンバレ。

engChrName: Ah...haha...
engSearchText: Ah...haha...
jpnChrName: あははは……
jpnSearchText: あははは……

engChrName: Today's the day we escape Sheena's deadly claws!
engSearchText: Today's the day we escape Sheena's deadly claws!
jpnChrName: 今日こそシーナの魔の手から 二人で逃げ切ってみせるぜっ！！
jpnSearchText:
今日こそシーナの魔の手から
二人で逃げ切ってみせるぜっ！！

engChrName: Are you guys going out to play, too?
engSearchText: Are you guys going out to play, too?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァン兄ちゃんたちも どっか遊びに行くのか～？
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァン兄ちゃんたちも
どっか遊びに行くのか～？

engChrName: Wait, are you playing with her?!
engSearchText: Wait, are you playing with her?!
jpnChrName: えーっ！？　そのおねーちゃんと 遊びに行くのーっ！？
jpnSearchText:
えーっ！？　そのおねーちゃんと
遊びに行くのーっ！？

engChrName: Ah, no, umm...
engSearchText: Ah, no, umm...
jpnChrName: ええと、その……
jpnSearchText: ええと、その……

engChrName: Nah, just work. You kids stay safe out there, all right?
engSearchText: Nah, just work. You kids stay safe out there, all right?
jpnChrName: 仕事だ仕事。 お前らもあんまヤンチャすんじゃねーぞ？
jpnSearchText:
仕事だ仕事。
お前らもあんまヤンチャすんじゃねーぞ？

engChrName: Mark! Look!
engSearchText: Mark! Look!
jpnChrName: マーク、見ろよこいつを──！！
jpnSearchText: マーク、見ろよこいつを──！！

engChrName: It's a...!
engSearchText: It's a...!
jpnChrName: じ、じ、じ……
jpnSearchText: じ、じ、じ……

engChrName: IT'S A BIKE!
engSearchText: IT'S A BIKE!
jpnChrName: 自転車ああああ──っ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>自転車ああああ──っ！！

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Dad bought it for me yesterday.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah! Dad bought it for me yesterday.
jpnChrName: ニシシッ！　昨日 父ちゃんが買ってくれたんだ！！
jpnSearchText:
ニシシッ！　昨日
父ちゃんが買ってくれたんだ！！

engChrName: Whaddaya think? Super cool, isn't it?
engSearchText: Whaddaya think? Super cool, isn't it?
jpnChrName: どーだマーク、カッコイイだろ！？
jpnSearchText: どーだマーク、カッコイイだろ！？

engChrName: Super DUPER cool! It's awesome!
engSearchText: Super DUPER cool! It's awesome!
jpnChrName: カッコイイ！　ちょ～カッコイイ！！
jpnSearchText: カッコイイ！　ちょ～カッコイイ！！

engChrName: Can I ride it with you? Pretty please?!
engSearchText: Can I ride it with you? Pretty please?!
jpnChrName: ねえハリー、ボクをのせて 走ってみてよ！！
jpnSearchText:
ねえハリー、ボクをのせて
走ってみてよ！！

engChrName: Sure! I wanna show you just how cool this thing is.
engSearchText: Sure! I wanna show you just how cool this thing is.
jpnChrName: おうよ！！　こいつのイカした走りを マークにも……
jpnSearchText:
おうよ！！　こいつのイカした走りを
マークにも……

engChrName: ...Wait, how DO you ride it again? I pushed it here from the house, so, uh...
engSearchText:
...Wait, how DO you ride it again? I pushed it here
from the house, so, uh...
jpnChrName: ……ってあれ、どうやって乗るんだろな？ 家からここまでは押して来ちまったし……
jpnSearchText:
……ってあれ、どうやって乗るんだろな？
家からここまでは押して来ちまったし……

engChrName: C'mon, Harry! Hurry up, let's go!
engSearchText: C'mon, Harry! Hurry up, let's go!
jpnChrName: ねえハリー！　はやくはやく～っ！！
jpnSearchText: ねえハリー！　はやくはやく～っ！！

engChrName: I-I know!
engSearchText: I-I know!
jpnChrName: お、おう……！　ちょっと待ってろな！！
jpnSearchText: お、おう……！　ちょっと待ってろな！！

engChrName: (Ah... I can't imagine he'll get very far without knowing how to ride it.)
engSearchText:
(Ah... I can't imagine he'll get very far without
knowing how to ride it.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……自転車はちゃんと   練習しないと難しいと思いますけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……自転車はちゃんと
練習しないと難しいと思いますけど……）

engChrName: (Cycling's startin' to catch on in the capital, but a lotta folks still dunno how to ride a bike.)
engSearchText:
(Cycling's startin' to catch on in the capital, but a
lotta folks still dunno how to ride a bike.)
jpnChrName: （ま、首都じゃ結構増えてきてるが   まだ乗れないヤツも多いよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、首都じゃ結構増えてきてるが
まだ乗れないヤツも多いよな。）

engChrName: Hey, Van, can you teach me how to ride a bike?
engSearchText: Hey, Van, can you teach me how to ride a bike?
jpnChrName: ──ヴァン兄ちゃん！！ 自転車の乗り方、教えてくれ！！
jpnSearchText:
──ヴァン兄ちゃん！！
自転車の乗り方、教えてくれ！！

engChrName: Yeah, teach us! Teach us!
engSearchText: Yeah, teach us! Teach us!
jpnChrName: おしえてくれーっ！！
jpnSearchText: おしえてくれーっ！！

engChrName: Why, certainly. Cycling lessons for two come out to, lemme see here...thousand an hour. Sound good?
engSearchText:
Why, certainly. Cycling lessons for two come out to,
lemme see here...thousand an hour. Sound good?
jpnChrName: あいよ、二人纏めて １時間１０００ミラな。
jpnSearchText:
あいよ、二人纏めて
１時間１０００ミラな。

engChrName: No way! That's too much...
engSearchText: No way! That's too much...
jpnChrName: ガーン！！　お高い……
jpnSearchText: ガーン！！　お高い……

engChrName: Ah...haha... (You are just ruthless, you know that?)
engSearchText:
Ah...haha...
(You are just ruthless, you know that?)
jpnChrName: あははは…… （そこは子供相手でも変わらないんですね。）
jpnSearchText:
あははは……
（そこは子供相手でも変わらないんですね。）

engChrName: Mom and Dad said a lot of people died... I don't really get it.
engSearchText:
Mom and Dad said a lot of people died... I don't
really get it.
jpnChrName: よくわからないけど、 ヒトがいっぱい死んじゃったんだって……
jpnSearchText:
よくわからないけど、
ヒトがいっぱい死んじゃったんだって……

engChrName: I'm kinda scared...
engSearchText: I'm kinda scared...
jpnChrName: ユメちゃん、ぼく…… ……なんだかコワイよ……
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃん、ぼく……
……なんだかコワイよ……

engChrName: Yeah. Me, too...
engSearchText: Yeah. Me, too...
jpnChrName: うん、ユメもコワイ、けど……
jpnSearchText: うん、ユメもコワイ、けど……

engChrName: But we can't stay sad!
engSearchText: But we can't stay sad!
jpnChrName: へこたれちゃ、ダメ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>へこたれちゃ、ダメ！

engChrName: Grandpa always says that laughter is the best medicine!
engSearchText:
Grandpa always says that laughter is the
best medicine!
jpnChrName: おじーちゃん言ってたもん！ ヤマイはキからって！
jpnSearchText:
おじーちゃん言ってたもん！
ヤマイはキからって！

engChrName: If you're too sad, you might get sick! You have to at least try and be happy, okay?
engSearchText:
If you're too sad, you might get sick! You have to at
least try and be happy, okay?
jpnChrName: マークもずっとカナシイと、 ビョーキになっちゃうかもだよ！
jpnSearchText:
マークもずっとカナシイと、
ビョーキになっちゃうかもだよ！

engChrName: Really? I guess... Yeah, my chest has been kinda heavy lately...
engSearchText:
Really? I guess... Yeah, my chest has been kinda
heavy lately...
jpnChrName: そっかあ……そういえばぼく、 さいきんムネがいたいんだ～。
jpnSearchText:
そっかあ……そういえばぼく、
さいきんムネがいたいんだ～。

engChrName: Maybe I should go to the chapel for a check-up.
engSearchText: Maybe I should go to the chapel for a check-up.
jpnChrName: 教会にいってきょうくちょうさまに みてもらおうかなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
教会にいってきょうくちょうさまに
みてもらおうかなぁ……

engChrName: Sure! We can pray there, too! Lemme come along with you.
engSearchText:
Sure! We can pray there, too! Lemme come along
with you.
jpnChrName: うん！　オイノリもできるし…… ユメもイッショにいくっ！
jpnSearchText:
うん！　オイノリもできるし……
ユメもイッショにいくっ！

engChrName: Oh, but Mommy said we shouldn't go out alone.
engSearchText: Oh, but Mommy said we shouldn't go out alone.
jpnChrName: あ、ユメたちだけででかけないよーにって ママに言われてるんだった……
jpnSearchText:
あ、ユメたちだけででかけないよーにって
ママに言われてるんだった……

engChrName: So let's invite Sheena and Harry, too!
engSearchText: So let's invite Sheena and Harry, too!
jpnChrName: シーナとハリーもさそおっか！
jpnSearchText: シーナとハリーもさそおっか！

engChrName: Oooh, good idea!
engSearchText: Oooh, good idea!
jpnChrName: うんっ！　さんせ～！！
jpnSearchText: うんっ！　さんせ～！！

engChrName: I can't thank you enough for helping Harry and the others.
engSearchText:
I can't thank you enough for helping Harry and
the others.
jpnChrName: ハリーたちを連れてきてくれて 本当に感謝する！
jpnSearchText:
ハリーたちを連れてきてくれて
本当に感謝する！

engChrName: I know it's not much, but please take this as my thanks.
engSearchText:
I know it's not much, but please take this as
my thanks.
jpnChrName: ささやかな物なんだが…… どうかこれを受け取ってくれないか？
jpnSearchText:
ささやかな物なんだが……
どうかこれを受け取ってくれないか？

engChrName: Received 4  .
engSearchText:
Received 4
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_HP_02}を４個手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_HP_02}を４個手に入れた。

engChrName: Gladly. I'll file that under official comp.
engSearchText: Gladly. I'll file that under official comp.
jpnChrName: ああ、正当な報酬として 受け取らせてもらうぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、正当な報酬として
受け取らせてもらうぜ！

engChrName: Oh, haha. Rest assured, I'll pay you properly once I can.
engSearchText:
Oh, haha. Rest assured, I'll pay you properly once
I can.
jpnChrName: はは、正当な報酬は、この事態を 切り抜けてからのつもりだったんだが──
jpnSearchText:
はは、正当な報酬は、この事態を
切り抜けてからのつもりだったんだが──

engChrName: Now, you be careful and come back in one piece, all right?
engSearchText:
Now, you be careful and come back in one piece,
all right?
jpnChrName: ともあれ、君たちも重々気を付けて！ 無事に帰ってきてくれよ！
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、君たちも重々気を付けて！
無事に帰ってきてくれよ！

engChrName: I really appreciate all you've done for the kids.
engSearchText: I really appreciate all you've done for the kids.
jpnChrName: 子供たちの事……本当に感謝する。
jpnSearchText: 子供たちの事……本当に感謝する。

engChrName: Now, you be careful and come back in one piece, all right?
engSearchText:
Now, you be careful and come back in one piece,
all right?
jpnChrName: 君たちも重々気を付けて！ 無事に帰ってきてくれよ！
jpnSearchText:
君たちも重々気を付けて！
無事に帰ってきてくれよ！

engChrName: Harry and the others... They went off to Riverside on their own!
engSearchText:
Harry and the others... They went off to Riverside on
their own!
jpnChrName: ハリーたちは先に子供たちだけで リバーサイドに向かってしまったんだ……！
jpnSearchText:
ハリーたちは先に子供たちだけで
リバーサイドに向かってしまったんだ……！

engChrName: And with those damned monsters running about... Please, please be okay...!
engSearchText:
And with those damned monsters running about...
Please, please be okay...!
jpnChrName: あの化け物どもさえいなければ── ……ハリー、それにシーナ、マークも……
jpnSearchText:
あの化け物どもさえいなければ──
……ハリー、それにシーナ、マークも……

engChrName: Daddy's coming for you! Don't you worry!
engSearchText: Daddy's coming for you! Don't you worry!
jpnChrName: どうか無事でいてくれ！ 父さんたち、すぐに駆け付けるからな！！
jpnSearchText:
どうか無事でいてくれ！
父さんたち、すぐに駆け付けるからな！！

engChrName: (Should I, uhh...let him know they're fine? Or is that not the right move?)
engSearchText:
(Should I, uhh...let him know they're fine? Or is that
not the right move?)
jpnChrName: （無事を伝えてやりたいが……   今は逆効果か……？）
jpnSearchText:
（無事を伝えてやりたいが……
今は逆効果か……？）

engChrName: (If Old Town were back to normal, I could just go with that, but...)
engSearchText:
(If Old Town were back to normal, I could just go
with that, but...)
jpnChrName: （せめて旧市街が落ち着けば   手はありそうだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（せめて旧市街が落ち着けば
手はありそうだが……）

engChrName: I was off on business for quite a long while. I've needed this break to decompress—all that constant work just isn't good for me, you know?
engSearchText:
I was off on business for quite a long while.
I've needed this break to decompress—all that
constant work just isn't good for me, you know?
jpnChrName: ま、長期出張なんかもしたんでな。 多少無理しつつだが、休みを取る事にしたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、長期出張なんかもしたんでな。
多少無理しつつだが、休みを取る事にしたぜ。

engChrName: It's been some time since I've seen Harry—I'm sure he has much to tell me, and I, him.
engSearchText:
It's been some time since I've seen Harry—I'm sure
he has much to tell me, and I, him.
jpnChrName: はは、久々にハリーと のんびり過ごすとするかねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
はは、久々にハリーと
のんびり過ごすとするかねぇ～。

engChrName: It was a fine month in Oración, but I'm glad to be back home.
engSearchText:
It was a fine month in Oración, but I'm glad to be
back home.
jpnChrName: 一ヶ月ほどオラシオンに 出張しててな、ようやく戻ったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
一ヶ月ほどオラシオンに
出張しててな、ようやく戻ったんだが。

engChrName: It feels like the kids grow up faster while I'm away...
engSearchText: It feels like the kids grow up faster while I'm away...
jpnChrName: しばらく見ないうちに子供たちも 成長した気がするんだよな……
jpnSearchText:
しばらく見ないうちに子供たちも
成長した気がするんだよな……

engChrName: It's good to get time to relax again—work is finally smoothing out.
engSearchText:
It's good to get time to relax again—work is finally
smoothing out.
jpnChrName: ははっ、仕事もイイ感じに成果が出せたし たまにはこういうのも悪くなかったか。
jpnSearchText:
ははっ、仕事もイイ感じに成果が出せたし
たまにはこういうのも悪くなかったか。

engChrName: I realized I couldn't work myself too hard as a single father—not when I had a kid to come home to.
engSearchText:
I realized I couldn't work myself too hard as a single
father—not when I had a kid to come home to.
jpnChrName: シングルファーザーになってから バリバリ仕事すんのは諦めてたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
シングルファーザーになってから
バリバリ仕事すんのは諦めてたんだが……

engChrName: But now that Harry's getting older, I don't feel quite as much pressure anymore.
engSearchText:
But now that Harry's getting older, I don't feel quite
as much pressure anymore.
jpnChrName: ハリーも大きくなったしな、 全部諦めなくてもいいのかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
ハリーも大きくなったしな、
全部諦めなくてもいいのかもしれない。

engChrName: I really owe it to Robinson for helping me look after him. Real lifesaver, haha!
engSearchText:
I really owe it to Robinson for helping me look
after him. Real lifesaver, haha!
jpnChrName: はは、いずれにせよ世話を引き受けてくれた ロビンソンには感謝、感謝だぜ！
jpnSearchText:
はは、いずれにせよ世話を引き受けてくれた
ロビンソンには感謝、感謝だぜ！

engChrName: He's been playing all day? Haha! That's good to hear.
engSearchText: He's been playing all day? Haha! That's good to hear.
jpnChrName: ははっ、今日も存分に 遊びまくったようで結構、結構！
jpnSearchText:
ははっ、今日も存分に
遊びまくったようで結構、結構！

engChrName: Old Town's always had these peppy, colorful characters, and my boy's no exception.
engSearchText:
Old Town's always had these peppy, colorful
characters, and my boy's no exception.
jpnChrName: ちょいとワンパクすぎる気もするが、 旧市街（ここいら）じゃ昔からこんなもんさ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょいとワンパクすぎる気もするが、
旧市街（ここいら）じゃ昔からこんなもんさ。

engChrName: I'm deeply grateful to Sheena as well...
engSearchText: I'm deeply grateful to Sheena as well...
jpnChrName: しかし、シーナにはホント 感謝してもしきれんなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、シーナにはホント
感謝してもしきれんなぁ……

engChrName: She really has her stuff together. She's almost like a second mom to Harry, at this point!
engSearchText:
She really has her stuff together. She's almost like a
second mom to Harry, at this point!
jpnChrName: しっかりしてる分、ハリーの 母親代わりみたいな所あるぜ、ははは！
jpnSearchText:
しっかりしてる分、ハリーの
母親代わりみたいな所あるぜ、ははは！

engChrName: Being honest, you two splitting up really blindsided me...but I'm glad you're doing all right for yourself now.
engSearchText:
Being honest, you two splitting up really blindsided
me...but I'm glad you're doing all right for
yourself now.
jpnChrName: お前たちが離婚するとは思わなかったが…… ま、今のお前はよくやってるよ。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちが離婚するとは思わなかったが……
ま、今のお前はよくやってるよ。

engChrName: First Paulette, and then you, too... It always takes me by surprise.
engSearchText:
First Paulette, and then you, too... It always takes me
by surprise.
jpnChrName: しかしポーレットといい、 旧市街には苦労人が多いよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしポーレットといい、
旧市街には苦労人が多いよなぁ。

engChrName: And I think Brenda, too... Yeah, she's a widow. Her husband passed a while ago.
engSearchText:
And I think Brenda, too... Yeah, she's a widow.
Her husband passed a while ago.
jpnChrName: そういやブレンダさんもひとり親だったか？ 確か旦那さん亡くなってたよな。
jpnSearchText:
そういやブレンダさんもひとり親だったか？
確か旦那さん亡くなってたよな。

engChrName: Quite some time, yes... He really was the light in her life. It's been hard for her...
engSearchText:
Quite some time, yes... He really was the light in
her life. It's been hard for her...
jpnChrName: ああ、大分前だったが…… あの人は俺以上に苦労してると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、大分前だったが……
あの人は俺以上に苦労してると思うぜ。

engChrName: I always come home at around this time so I can make dinner.
engSearchText:
I always come home at around this time so I can
make dinner.
jpnChrName: 夕食の支度があるからな、 いつもこのくらいの時間には帰ってくるんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
夕食の支度があるからな、
いつもこのくらいの時間には帰ってくるんだよ。

engChrName: I used to be the type of guy who put work before everything else. I wanted to kick into high gear and ride the fast lane in my career...
engSearchText:
I used to be the type of guy who put work before
everything else. I wanted to kick into high gear and
ride the fast lane in my career...
jpnChrName: ……俺も昔はバリバリの営業マンで、 出世街道まっしぐらって感じだったんだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
……俺も昔はバリバリの営業マンで、
出世街道まっしぐらって感じだったんだけどな。

engChrName: ...but then, life happened. I had to cut back my hours to raise Harry.
engSearchText:
...but then, life happened. I had to cut back my hours
to raise Harry.
jpnChrName: 離婚して、ハリーの面倒を見ないと いけなくなってから時短勤務を選んだってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
離婚して、ハリーの面倒を見ないと
いけなくなってから時短勤務を選んだってわけだ。

engChrName: They responded by docking my salary. I just can't climb the ladder like I used to...
engSearchText:
They responded by docking my salary. I just can't
climb the ladder like I used to...
jpnChrName: 給料も減ったし、出世も望めなくなったが……
jpnSearchText: 給料も減ったし、出世も望めなくなったが……

engChrName: I can't say I didn't have it coming, though. I put family before work, and that's what I get.
engSearchText:
I can't say I didn't have it coming, though. I put
family before work, and that's what I get.
jpnChrName: ……ま、家族を大事にできなかった 俺の自業自得なんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、家族を大事にできなかった
俺の自業自得なんだよな。

engChrName: ...I think I'll make us some stew tonight.
engSearchText: ...I think I'll make us some stew tonight.
jpnChrName: ふむ、今夜はシチューにでもするか。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、今夜はシチューにでもするか。

engChrName: If nothing else, I'm a better cook than young me used to be. Hahaha!
engSearchText:
If nothing else, I'm a better cook than young me used
to be. Hahaha!
jpnChrName: 離婚してから料理の腕だけは 上手くなったぜ、ははは！
jpnSearchText:
離婚してから料理の腕だけは
上手くなったぜ、ははは！

engChrName: I'm heading out for work in the afternoon. It's good that I get the mornings to myself—that way, I can do all the housework before I leave.
engSearchText:
I'm heading out for work in the afternoon. It's good
that I get the mornings to myself—that way, I can do
all the housework before I leave.
jpnChrName: 今日も午後出社でな。 家事を片付けてから出れるのはありがたいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
今日も午後出社でな。
家事を片付けてから出れるのはありがたいぜ。

engChrName: Oh yeah, I bought Harry a bike yesterday.
engSearchText: Oh yeah, I bought Harry a bike yesterday.
jpnChrName: ……そうそう、昨日ハリーに 自転車を買ってやったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
……そうそう、昨日ハリーに
自転車を買ってやったんだが……

engChrName: But then, I realized: does he even know how to ride a bike?
engSearchText:
But then, I realized: does he even know how to ride
a bike?
jpnChrName: そういやあいつ、自転車に乗れたっけか……？
jpnSearchText: そういやあいつ、自転車に乗れたっけか……？

engChrName: It's hard to learn how to ride a bike before you actually have one, you know? So I think I'll need to teach him.
engSearchText:
It's hard to learn how to ride a bike before you
actually have one, you know? So I think I'll need to
teach him.
jpnChrName: 初めてなのにそれは無いか…… うーん、練習にも付き合ってやらんとなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
初めてなのにそれは無いか……
うーん、練習にも付き合ってやらんとなぁ。

engChrName: He's been begging for some playtime with his papa for ages now... I couldn't help it. I splurged.
engSearchText:
He's been begging for some playtime with his papa
for ages now... I couldn't help it. I splurged.
jpnChrName: 前からハリーにはねだられててな。 最近遊んでやれてないし、奮発したんだが……
jpnSearchText:
前からハリーにはねだられててな。
最近遊んでやれてないし、奮発したんだが……

engChrName: But, well, I can't complain. I'll show him the ropes somewhere safe when I get the chance.
engSearchText:
But, well, I can't complain. I'll show him the ropes
somewhere safe when I get the chance.
jpnChrName: ま、こうなったら腹をくくって どこかで練習に付き合ってやるかね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こうなったら腹をくくって
どこかで練習に付き合ってやるかね。

engChrName: Ahh... These mornings before work are so relaxing.
engSearchText: Ahh... These mornings before work are so relaxing.
jpnChrName: ふう、午後出勤の日は のんびりできていいよな～。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、午後出勤の日は
のんびりできていいよな～。

engChrName: And when it comes to pre-work coffee, no one does it better than Montmart.
engSearchText:
And when it comes to pre-work coffee, no one does it
better than Montmart.
jpnChrName: そして出勤前のコーヒーは モンマルトに限るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そして出勤前のコーヒーは
モンマルトに限るぜ。

engChrName: You can say that again—Paulette's brews just hit all the right notes.
engSearchText:
You can say that again—Paulette's brews just hit all
the right notes.
jpnChrName: はは、特にポーレットに淹れてもらうと テンション上がるよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、特にポーレットに淹れてもらうと
テンション上がるよなぁ。

engChrName: And don't tell Margaret I said this, but the sight of her serving me just brightens up my day, every time.
engSearchText:
And don't tell Margaret I said this, but the sight of
her serving me just brightens up my day, every time.
jpnChrName: 家庭を持つ身になっても美人に 接客してもらえるのはいいもんだ、うんうん。
jpnSearchText:
家庭を持つ身になっても美人に
接客してもらえるのはいいもんだ、うんうん。

engChrName: Don't tell her? Now, what's a friend of hers to do...?
engSearchText: Don't tell her? Now, what's a friend of hers to do...?
jpnChrName: コラコラ、マーガレットに言いつけるぞ？
jpnSearchText: コラコラ、マーガレットに言いつけるぞ？

engChrName: Hey, cut me some slack, man!
engSearchText: Hey, cut me some slack, man!
jpnChrName: ははっ、そいつは勘弁してくれ！
jpnSearchText: ははっ、そいつは勘弁してくれ！

engChrName: That Sheena and the gang I hear outside? Sounds like somebody's havin' a good time.
engSearchText:
That Sheena and the gang I hear outside? Sounds like
somebody's havin' a good time.
jpnChrName: そういや、外から シーナたちの声が聞こえるような──
jpnSearchText:
そういや、外から
シーナたちの声が聞こえるような──

engChrName: Oh, Harry, the menace. He'd better not be causing trouble...
engSearchText:
Oh, Harry, the menace. He'd better not be
causing trouble...
jpnChrName: あースマン、うちのハリーが また馬鹿をやってるのかもしれん……
jpnSearchText:
あースマン、うちのハリーが
また馬鹿をやってるのかもしれん……

engChrName: I can't blame him, I've been too tired to play with him as of late. I just wish I had the energy...
engSearchText:
I can't blame him, I've been too tired to play with him
as of late. I just wish I had the energy...
jpnChrName: 最近遊んでやれてなくてな。 ……ふう、何か考えてやりたいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
最近遊んでやれてなくてな。
……ふう、何か考えてやりたいんだが。

engChrName: Ah, don't beat yourself up over it. You're a good dad—and a far cry from the goon I tore up the town with when I was young.
engSearchText:
Ah, don't beat yourself up over it. You're a good
dad—and a far cry from the goon I tore up the town
with when I was young.
jpnChrName: はは、お前も立派な父親だねぇ。 一緒にやんちゃしてた頃が懐かしいよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、お前も立派な父親だねぇ。
一緒にやんちゃしてた頃が懐かしいよ。

engChrName: To think it's been seven years already... I'd say you're doing pretty good, bud.
engSearchText:
To think it's been seven years already... I'd say you're
doing pretty good, bud.
jpnChrName: もう７年か…… ま、お前はよくやってるよ。
jpnSearchText:
もう７年か……
ま、お前はよくやってるよ。

engChrName: You've had a lot to work through over the years...and you did it all while working and raising Harry. That's nothin' to scoff at.
engSearchText:
You've had a lot to work through over the years...and
you did it all while working and raising Harry.
That's nothin' to scoff at.
jpnChrName: 離婚の経緯はともかく、働きながらハリーを 育てて、毎日飯だって作ってるんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
離婚の経緯はともかく、働きながらハリーを
育てて、毎日飯だって作ってるんだろ？

engChrName: Just, you need to take care of yourself, too, y'know? You keep forgetting to pack your own lunches and you're gonna rack up a debt to Montmart.
engSearchText:
Just, you need to take care of yourself, too, y'know?
You keep forgetting to pack your own lunches and
you're gonna rack up a debt to Montmart.
jpnChrName: たまに自分の弁当は忘れて モンマルトに来てるけどな。
jpnSearchText:
たまに自分の弁当は忘れて
モンマルトに来てるけどな。

engChrName: Oh, I don't forget that often! Cut me some slack, I'm running a one-man operation.
engSearchText:
Oh, I don't forget that often! Cut me some slack, I'm
running a one-man operation.
jpnChrName: はは、たまにはいいだろ。 単身育児（ワンオペ）に完璧なしってな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、たまにはいいだろ。
単身育児（ワンオペ）に完璧なしってな。

engChrName: ...But for real, I don't think I could've done it if you guys weren't next door to help me.
engSearchText:
...But for real, I don't think I could've done it if you
guys weren't next door to help me.
jpnChrName: ……実際の所、お前が隣ん家だったから やってこれたようなもんだしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
……実際の所、お前が隣ん家だったから
やってこれたようなもんだしなぁ。

engChrName: You guys taught me how to deal with food, fevers...diapers. You've raised him just as much as I have!
engSearchText:
You guys taught me how to deal with food,
fevers...diapers. You've raised him just as much as
I have!
jpnChrName: オシメの替え方指南から、急な熱の対応まで ──ホント世話になりっぱなしだよ。
jpnSearchText:
オシメの替え方指南から、急な熱の対応まで
──ホント世話になりっぱなしだよ。

engChrName: Oh, stop. That's just what good neighbors do, y'know? Don't sweat it!
engSearchText:
Oh, stop. That's just what good neighbors
do, y'know? Don't sweat it!
jpnChrName: 言うなよ、ホーカー。 もっと頼ってくれてもいいんだぞ？
jpnSearchText:
言うなよ、ホーカー。
もっと頼ってくれてもいいんだぞ？

engChrName: Sheena and Mark are really happy to have him, too. He's like a brother to them both.
engSearchText:
Sheena and Mark are really happy to have him, too.
He's like a brother to them both.
jpnChrName: うちのシーナとマークだって ハリーを本当の兄弟みたいに思ってる。
jpnSearchText:
うちのシーナとマークだって
ハリーを本当の兄弟みたいに思ってる。

engChrName: We're one big family here, I feel like. Don't feel like you need to go it alone, okay?
engSearchText:
We're one big family here, I feel like. Don't feel like
you need to go it alone, okay?
jpnChrName: だからあまり抱え込みすぎるな。
jpnSearchText: だからあまり抱え込みすぎるな。

engChrName: Yeah... Thanks again, Robinson.
engSearchText: Yeah... Thanks again, Robinson.
jpnChrName: ああ……ありがとな、ロビンソン。
jpnSearchText: ああ……ありがとな、ロビンソン。

engChrName: Wait, WHAT?! They're putting you in charge of the Oración branch?
engSearchText:
Wait, WHAT?! They're putting you in charge of the
Oración branch?
jpnChrName: オラシオン支部立ち上げの プロジェクトリーダーに……！？
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン支部立ち上げの
プロジェクトリーダーに……！？

engChrName: I... Just, holy shit! That's your big break, right there!
engSearchText: I... Just, holy shit! That's your big break, right there!
jpnChrName: なんだよホーカー、大出世じゃないか！
jpnSearchText: なんだよホーカー、大出世じゃないか！

engChrName: Well...it's an offer I can't accept.
engSearchText: Well...it's an offer I can't accept.
jpnChrName: いやいや……さすがに断るつもりだぜ。 ……だってなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
いやいや……さすがに断るつもりだぜ。
……だってなぁ……

engChrName: ...Ohh, because you'd have to pack your bags and move there with Harry?
engSearchText:
...Ohh, because you'd have to pack your bags and
move there with Harry?
jpnChrName: ふう、ハリーのことか…… 確かにオラシオンじゃ、引っ越すしかないよな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ハリーのことか……
確かにオラシオンじゃ、引っ越すしかないよな。

engChrName: I would...and I don't think that would be best for him.
engSearchText:
I would...and I don't think that would be best
for him.
jpnChrName: ああ……でもハリーには 旧市街（ここ）の環境の方があってる気がするんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……でもハリーには
旧市街（ここ）の環境の方があってる気がするんだよ。

engChrName: I can't just turn his life upside down like that. My time with him is far more valuable than any job offer.
engSearchText:
I can't just turn his life upside down like that.
My time with him is far more valuable than any
job offer.
jpnChrName: 今の俺には、昇進より あいつとの時間の方が大切だしな。
jpnSearchText:
今の俺には、昇進より
あいつとの時間の方が大切だしな。

engChrName: I get'cha... I just wish they could compromise, somehow.
engSearchText:
I get'cha... I just wish they could
compromise, somehow.
jpnChrName: そうか……惜しい気もするが……
jpnSearchText: そうか……惜しい気もするが……

engChrName: ...Y'know, maybe there is a way.
engSearchText: ...Y'know, maybe there is a way.
jpnChrName: ……いやまてよ、別の方法もあるんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText: ……いやまてよ、別の方法もあるんじゃないか？

engChrName: Oh? What are you thinking?
engSearchText: Oh? What are you thinking?
jpnChrName: “別の方法”……？ 何かいい案でもあるのか……？
jpnSearchText:
“別の方法”……？
何かいい案でもあるのか……？

engChrName: Well, they're not saying you have to bring Harry with you, right?
engSearchText:
Well, they're not saying you have to bring Harry with
you, right?
jpnChrName: 別に単身赴任しろって 言われてるわけじゃないんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
別に単身赴任しろって
言われてるわけじゃないんだろ？

engChrName: Surely they're more flexible than that—it's just office work you do, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Surely they're more flexible than that—it's just office
work you do, isn't it?
jpnChrName: 保険屋といっても事務方なんだし、 だったら……
jpnSearchText:
保険屋といっても事務方なんだし、
だったら……

engChrName: Man, since when did you learn so much about my job...? Do I really bellyache about it that much?
engSearchText:
Man, since when did you learn so much about my
job...? Do I really bellyache about it that much?
jpnChrName: お前って、俺の仕事に詳しいよな。 まあいつも相談してるのは俺なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
お前って、俺の仕事に詳しいよな。
まあいつも相談してるのは俺なんだが……

engChrName: But yeah, being an insurance company, we have our customer service hotline open seven days a week. It really wears me down...
engSearchText:
But yeah, being an insurance company, we have our
customer service hotline open seven days a week.
It really wears me down...
jpnChrName: ああ、ウチは保険会社だからな。 休み返上で顧客対応さ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ウチは保険会社だからな。
休み返上で顧客対応さ。

engChrName: I can slip away on my lunch breaks, at least, but Harry really misses me when I have to crunch... I'd hate to leave him alone for an entire month.
engSearchText:
I can slip away on my lunch breaks, at least, but Harry
really misses me when I have to crunch... I'd hate to
leave him alone for an entire month.
jpnChrName: 昼休みくらいは抜けられるが…… 残業でハリーに負担を掛けちまってるな。
jpnSearchText:
昼休みくらいは抜けられるが……
残業でハリーに負担を掛けちまってるな。

engChrName: I'd be happy to have him stay with us. He comes over to our place for dinners anyway!
engSearchText:
I'd be happy to have him stay with us. He comes over
to our place for dinners anyway!
jpnChrName: 子供の事なら大丈夫さ、 夕食はうちにも来てもらってるしな。
jpnSearchText:
子供の事なら大丈夫さ、
夕食はうちにも来てもらってるしな。

engChrName: I'm more worried about you, honestly. Don't burn yourself out, you get me? Being in charge of a whole branch is a pretty big deal.
engSearchText:
I'm more worried about you, honestly. Don't burn
yourself out, you get me? Being in charge of a whole
branch is a pretty big deal.
jpnChrName: それより身体を大事にしろよ？ オラシオン支部の面倒も見てるんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
それより身体を大事にしろよ？
オラシオン支部の面倒も見てるんだろ？

engChrName: I only ever planned on being their point of contact to the main office, but it's been real hectic over there. They need backup.
engSearchText:
I only ever planned on being their point of contact to
the main office, but it's been real hectic over there.
They need backup.
jpnChrName: まあ本社窓口くらいのつもりだったんだが 向こうもテンパってるからなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ本社窓口くらいのつもりだったんだが
向こうもテンパってるからなぁ……

engChrName: We're in some pretty dire straits, financially. We need things to clear up soon, or we'll start having to make cuts.
engSearchText:
We're in some pretty dire straits, financially. We need
things to clear up soon, or we'll start having to
make cuts.
jpnChrName: 会社の支払総額も相当なもんだ。 これ以上非常事態宣言が長引くとキツイぜ……
jpnSearchText:
会社の支払総額も相当なもんだ。
これ以上非常事態宣言が長引くとキツイぜ……

engChrName: How's your office holding up? You're in construction, right?
engSearchText:
How's your office holding up? You're in
construction, right?
jpnChrName: そういやロビンソン、お前の所はどうなんだ？ 結構ルーズにやってるが、建設関係だろ？
jpnSearchText:
そういやロビンソン、お前の所はどうなんだ？
結構ルーズにやってるが、建設関係だろ？

engChrName: Architectural firm, yeah. We don't do the actual constructing, which is nice, but...
engSearchText:
Architectural firm, yeah. We don't do the actual
constructing, which is nice, but...
jpnChrName: デザイン会社な。 施工主じゃないからまだ気楽だが──
jpnSearchText:
デザイン会社な。
施工主じゃないからまだ気楽だが──

engChrName: ...top brass is saying this construction boom's bound to wear off. And where the market shrinks, layoffs follow.
engSearchText:
...top brass is saying this construction boom's bound
to wear off. And where the market shrinks,
layoffs follow.
jpnChrName: 景気が冷え込んで、仕事が減るとヤバいかもな。 ここ２年は調子も良かったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
景気が冷え込んで、仕事が減るとヤバいかもな。
ここ２年は調子も良かったんだが……

engChrName: A whole MONTH?! But that's so long!
engSearchText: A whole MONTH?! But that's so long!
jpnChrName: え、一ヶ月出張！？　父ちゃんが！？
jpnSearchText: え、一ヶ月出張！？　父ちゃんが！？

engChrName: It is... I'm still considering the offer, though—I haven't accepted it. It's a very big promotion, so I want to think it through.
engSearchText:
It is... I'm still considering the offer, though—I
haven't accepted it. It's a very big promotion, so I
want to think it through.
jpnChrName: ああ、まだ正式に請けた訳じゃないんだが オラシオン支部の立ち上げを頼まれてな……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、まだ正式に請けた訳じゃないんだが
オラシオン支部の立ち上げを頼まれてな……

engChrName: I know I work a lot, so, umm... I only want to take the job if you're okay with it. I promise I'll be back in a month.
engSearchText:
I know I work a lot, so, umm... I only want to take
the job if you're okay with it. I promise I'll be back in
a month.
jpnChrName: ……必ず一ヶ月で戻ってくる。 その、もしハリーが嫌じゃなきゃだが……
jpnSearchText:
……必ず一ヶ月で戻ってくる。
その、もしハリーが嫌じゃなきゃだが……

engChrName: It's okay, Dad!
engSearchText: It's okay, Dad!
jpnChrName: ──い～んじゃね？
jpnSearchText: ──い～んじゃね？

engChrName: I'm not a kid anymore, so a month is no biggie.
engSearchText: I'm not a kid anymore, so a month is no biggie.
jpnChrName: オレも子供じゃないし、 そのくらい余裕だっつの。
jpnSearchText:
オレも子供じゃないし、
そのくらい余裕だっつの。

engChrName: It's okay that you're working hard. It helps me, too!
engSearchText: It's okay that you're working hard. It helps me, too!
jpnChrName: 父ちゃんには全力で仕事してほしいしなっ！！
jpnSearchText: 父ちゃんには全力で仕事してほしいしなっ！！

engChrName: Haha... That's my boy. You're a good kid.
engSearchText: Haha... That's my boy. You're a good kid.
jpnChrName: ハリー…… ははっ、ありがとな。
jpnSearchText:
ハリー……
ははっ、ありがとな。

engChrName: You'll be staying with Robinson's family while I'm gone. Be nice to Sheena and Mark, okay?
engSearchText:
You'll be staying with Robinson's family while I'm
gone. Be nice to Sheena and Mark, okay?
jpnChrName: じゃあ明後日からロビンソン家の厄介になってくれ。 シーナやマークとも仲良くな。
jpnSearchText:
じゃあ明後日からロビンソン家の厄介になってくれ。
シーナやマークとも仲良くな。

engChrName: ...Huh? What do you mean?
engSearchText: ...Huh? What do you mean?
jpnChrName: …………ん？　ドユコト？？
jpnSearchText: …………ん？　ドユコト？？

engChrName: DAD!
engSearchText: DAD!
jpnChrName: 父ちゃん……！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>父ちゃん……！！

engChrName: I'm home! Oh, it's so good to see you again! How've you been, bud?
engSearchText:
I'm home! Oh, it's so good to see you again!
How've you been, bud?
jpnChrName: ははっ！　ただいまだ、ハリー！ 一ヶ月ぶりか……元気にしてたか！？
jpnSearchText:
ははっ！　ただいまだ、ハリー！
一ヶ月ぶりか……元気にしてたか！？

engChrName: Yeah, I've been okay. Ooh, but check out XEROS, though! They're this AI and they can speak, and they're super amazing!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I've been okay. Ooh, but check out
XEROS, though! They're this AI and they can speak,
and they're super amazing!
