jpnChrName: うんうん、それよりＸＥＲＯＳがさーっ！！ “エーアイ”で喋って凄いんだぜ父ちゃん！！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、それよりＸＥＲＯＳがさーっ！！
“エーアイ”で喋って凄いんだぜ父ちゃん！！

engChrName: I-I see! Haha. I've got a lot to catch up on, from the sound of it.
engSearchText:
I-I see! Haha. I've got a lot to catch up on, from the
sound of it.
jpnChrName: お、おう……はは、よく分からんが 色々あったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
お、おう……はは、よく分からんが
色々あったみたいだな。

engChrName: I want to hear all about it, Harry! Let's hit the baths, okay?
engSearchText:
I want to hear all about it, Harry! Let's hit the
baths, okay?
jpnChrName: じっくり聞かせてくれ、ハリー。 一緒に風呂でも入りながらな！
jpnSearchText:
じっくり聞かせてくれ、ハリー。
一緒に風呂でも入りながらな！

engChrName: You got it!
engSearchText: You got it!
jpnChrName: うんっ！！　もちろんだぜ！！
jpnSearchText: うんっ！！　もちろんだぜ！！

engChrName: Wait, really?! You got time off for the Revolution Festival?!
engSearchText:
Wait, really?! You got time off for the
Revolution Festival?!
jpnChrName: えっ、マジで！？ 父ちゃん記念祭に休み取ったのかよ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
えっ、マジで！？
父ちゃん記念祭に休み取ったのかよ～っ！

engChrName: Yes, I did! Work is still plenty busy, but I pulled some strings to get the festival off.
engSearchText:
Yes, I did! Work is still plenty busy, but I pulled some
strings to get the festival off.
jpnChrName: ああ、仕事の方は まだゴタついてるが、なんとかな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、仕事の方は
まだゴタついてるが、なんとかな。

engChrName: So, what do you say, Harry? Wanna hit the town with Dad?
engSearchText:
So, what do you say, Harry? Wanna hit the town
with Dad?
jpnChrName: ……どうだハリー、一緒に祭りを回るか？
jpnSearchText: ……どうだハリー、一緒に祭りを回るか？

engChrName: Yeah! For sure! I wanna hit the food stalls!
engSearchText: Yeah! For sure! I wanna hit the food stalls!
jpnChrName: いくいくーっ！！ 屋台で食べ歩きしようぜ、父ちゃんっ！！
jpnSearchText:
いくいくーっ！！
屋台で食べ歩きしようぜ、父ちゃんっ！！

engChrName: I can't thank you enough for everything... You guys are lifesavers, man!
engSearchText:
I can't thank you enough for everything... You guys
are lifesavers, man!
jpnChrName: 君たち、本当にありがとう！！ 感謝してもしきれないよ！！
jpnSearchText:
君たち、本当にありがとう！！
感謝してもしきれないよ！！

engChrName: Doesn't look like this'll let up soon, but as long as my family's okay, I can manage!
engSearchText:
Doesn't look like this'll let up soon, but as long as my
family's okay, I can manage!
jpnChrName: まだこの“異変”は収まりそうにないが…… 家族が無事なら、きっと乗り越えられるさ！
jpnSearchText:
まだこの“異変”は収まりそうにないが……
家族が無事なら、きっと乗り越えられるさ！

engChrName: I know Paulette and Yumé are okay, too... They HAVE to be. You guys be careful out there, too, all right?!
engSearchText:
I know Paulette and Yumé are okay, too...
They HAVE to be. You guys be careful out there,
too, all right?!
jpnChrName: ポーレットとユメちゃんも、きっと…… ……君たちもどうか、慎重に進んでくれ！
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットとユメちゃんも、きっと……
……君たちもどうか、慎重に進んでくれ！

engChrName: Gah... Busted myself up a bit back there.
engSearchText: Gah... Busted myself up a bit back there.
jpnChrName: マーガレットを庇った時に 少し怪我をしてしまってね……
jpnSearchText:
マーガレットを庇った時に
少し怪我をしてしまってね……

engChrName: But I got Margaret outta there, which is the important part. It's just, the kids...
engSearchText:
But I got Margaret outta there, which is the
important part. It's just, the kids...
jpnChrName: なに、かすり傷さ。 それより子供たちが心配だ──
jpnSearchText:
なに、かすり傷さ。
それより子供たちが心配だ──

engChrName: ...No, don't think about that. Harry's with 'em... they've gotta be okay.
engSearchText:
...No, don't think about that. Harry's with 'em...
they've gotta be okay.
jpnChrName: シーナ、マーク…… ハリーが一緒なら無事だと信じたいが……
jpnSearchText:
シーナ、マーク……
ハリーが一緒なら無事だと信じたいが……

engChrName: Hawker's been busy lately. Can't even get away on his lunch anymore.
engSearchText:
Hawker's been busy lately. Can't even get away
on his lunch anymore.
jpnChrName: ホーカーのやつ、あれ以来忙しいらしくてな。 昼休みに抜けてくる余裕もないみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
ホーカーのやつ、あれ以来忙しいらしくてな。
昼休みに抜けてくる余裕もないみたいだ。

engChrName: They're saying all that mafia business has been put to bed, but the insurance company he works at is still buried in claims...
engSearchText:
They're saying all that mafia business has been put to
bed, but the insurance company he works at is still
buried in claims...
jpnChrName: マフィアの件は解決したとはいえ、 保険会社は色々あるらしくてなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
マフィアの件は解決したとはいえ、
保険会社は色々あるらしくてなぁ……

engChrName: I can only hope stuff settles down by the time the festival rolls around. If not, kids are gonna lose it.
engSearchText:
I can only hope stuff settles down by the time the
festival rolls around. If not, kids are gonna lose it.
jpnChrName: ま、記念祭までには落ち着くだろ── でなきゃ子供たちに突き上げられそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、記念祭までには落ち着くだろ──
でなきゃ子供たちに突き上げられそうだ。

engChrName: I was thinking I'd take it easy with the wife today.
engSearchText: I was thinking I'd take it easy with the wife today.
jpnChrName: 今日は妻とゆっくりしようかと思ってね。
jpnSearchText: 今日は妻とゆっくりしようかと思ってね。

engChrName: Hope Hawker's holding up okay at work...
engSearchText: Hope Hawker's holding up okay at work...
jpnChrName: ホーカーのヤツは出張先で 頑張っているかねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
ホーカーのヤツは出張先で
頑張っているかねぇ……

engChrName: He SHOULD be home soon, but the man's a workaholic through and through. Who knows what he's dealing with over there.
engSearchText:
He SHOULD be home soon, but the man's a
workaholic through and through. Who knows what
he's dealing with over there.
jpnChrName: そろそろ帰ってくるはずだが、 根が仕事人間だけに心配だな。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ帰ってくるはずだが、
根が仕事人間だけに心配だな。

engChrName: He's been takin' care of himself and his kid better since the divorce, though. It was like a wake-up call for him.
engSearchText:
He's been takin' care of himself and his kid better
since the divorce, though. It was like a wake-up call
for him.
jpnChrName: ま……あいつも離婚してからは 変わったし大丈夫だと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま……あいつも離婚してからは
変わったし大丈夫だと思うけどな。

engChrName: He's right next door, so Harry and Sheena have grown up really close.
engSearchText:
He's right next door, so Harry and Sheena have
grown up really close.
jpnChrName: うちとホーカー家は隣同士でね。 ハリーとシーナは一緒に育ったんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
うちとホーカー家は隣同士でね。
ハリーとシーナは一緒に育ったんだよ。

engChrName: He comes over pretty much every day to play with her. We have dinner together a lot, too.
engSearchText:
He comes over pretty much every day to play
with her. We have dinner together a lot, too.
jpnChrName: 今だって毎日のように遊びに来てるし ご飯だってよく一緒に食べるし……
jpnSearchText:
今だって毎日のように遊びに来てるし
ご飯だってよく一緒に食べるし……

engChrName: So him coming to live with us for the month is kinda just business as usual.
engSearchText:
So him coming to live with us for the month is kinda
just business as usual.
jpnChrName: 一緒に暮らす事になったって そう変わらない気がするんだけどなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
一緒に暮らす事になったって
そう変わらない気がするんだけどなぁ……

engChrName: (Feel like he's had something on his mind lately...)
engSearchText: (Feel like he's had something on his mind lately...)
jpnChrName: （ホーカーのやつ、最近ちょっと   悩んでるみたいだな……）
jpnSearchText:
（ホーカーのやつ、最近ちょっと
悩んでるみたいだな……）

engChrName: (He's a tough nut to crack sometimes, but I'll get it out of him one way or another.)
engSearchText:
(He's a tough nut to crack sometimes, but I'll get it
out of him one way or another.)
jpnChrName: （ふう、こいつも不器用だからなぁ。   そのうち聞き出してやるかねぇ……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふう、こいつも不器用だからなぁ。
そのうち聞き出してやるかねぇ……）

engChrName: Hmm... What in the world is happening now?
engSearchText: Hmm... What in the world is happening now?
jpnChrName: う～ん、う～～～～ん…… この人たちは何をしているのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、う～～～～ん……
この人たちは何をしているのかしら……

engChrName: The sky's taken on a ghastly color, and these eldritch horrors are wandering the streets...
engSearchText:
The sky's taken on a ghastly color, and these eldritch
horrors are wandering the streets...
jpnChrName: 空はおかしな色だし、 その上“悪魔”みたいなのも……
jpnSearchText:
空はおかしな色だし、
その上“悪魔”みたいなのも……

engChrName: Alas, I don't think anyone will believe me if I tell them... I've cried wolf too many a time.
engSearchText:
Alas, I don't think anyone will believe me if I
tell them... I've cried wolf too many a time.
jpnChrName: うーん、これは知らない人に話しても 絶対信じてくれなさそうねぇ……残念だわぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、これは知らない人に話しても
絶対信じてくれなさそうねぇ……残念だわぁ。

engChrName: This feels like some kind of nightmare...
engSearchText: This feels like some kind of nightmare...
jpnChrName: まるで悪夢の中に迷い込んだみたい……
jpnSearchText: まるで悪夢の中に迷い込んだみたい……

engChrName: ...but I fear no one will believe what I say. That's really a shame...
engSearchText:
...but I fear no one will believe what I say.
That's really a shame...
jpnChrName: こんな事が起きてるのに、 誰も信じてくれなさそうなのは残念だわぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
こんな事が起きてるのに、
誰も信じてくれなさそうなのは残念だわぁ～。

engChrName: I plan on taking the festival nice and slow. I like to savor it at my own pace, heehee.
engSearchText:
I plan on taking the festival nice and slow. I like to
savor it at my own pace, heehee.
jpnChrName: うふふ、革命記念祭はゆっくりじっくり 舐めるように見て回らないとねぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、革命記念祭はゆっくりじっくり
舐めるように見て回らないとねぇ♪

engChrName: Actually, I had quite the bizarre dream this morning.
engSearchText: Actually, I had quite the bizarre dream this morning.
jpnChrName: そういえば、今朝ヘンな夢を見たのだけど……
jpnSearchText: そういえば、今朝ヘンな夢を見たのだけど……

engChrName: I recall some grand mystery had unfolded in town...
engSearchText: I recall some grand mystery had unfolded in town...
jpnChrName: う～ん、とっても不思議な事があったような……
jpnSearchText: う～ん、とっても不思議な事があったような……

engChrName: ...but what lay beyond? That, I can't remember! Perhaps I was just too lost in the moment, heehee.
engSearchText:
...but what lay beyond? That, I can't remember!
Perhaps I was just too lost in the moment, heehee.
jpnChrName: ……でもなんだか忘れちゃったわ♪ うふふっ、私ったら浮かれすぎなのかしらね？
jpnSearchText:
……でもなんだか忘れちゃったわ♪
うふふっ、私ったら浮かれすぎなのかしらね？

engChrName: Now, I plan on taking the festival nice and slow. I like to savor it at my own pace.
engSearchText:
Now, I plan on taking the festival nice and slow.
I like to savor it at my own pace.
jpnChrName: さあさあ、革命記念祭をゆっくりじっくり 舐めるように見て回るとしましょうか♪
jpnSearchText:
さあさあ、革命記念祭をゆっくりじっくり
舐めるように見て回るとしましょうか♪

engChrName: I'll have each and every stall wrapped around my finger when all's said and done. ♪
engSearchText:
I'll have each and every stall wrapped around my
finger when all's said and done. ♪
jpnChrName: 今日中にイーディス中の 屋台を制覇しましょっ♪
jpnSearchText:
今日中にイーディス中の
屋台を制覇しましょっ♪

engChrName: Oh, you little tease, Étoile. You keep playing hard to get, and that only makes me want to tail you more!
engSearchText:
Oh, you little tease, Étoile. You keep playing hard to
get, and that only makes me want to tail you more!
jpnChrName: エトワールったら、いつもあの調子なの。 ついつい付いて行きたくなってしまうわ♪
jpnSearchText:
エトワールったら、いつもあの調子なの。
ついつい付いて行きたくなってしまうわ♪

engChrName: You're better at leading people on than I could ever hope to be.
engSearchText:
You're better at leading people on than I could ever
hope to be.
jpnChrName: うふふっ、私なんかよりよっぽど 人を惑わせるわよねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
うふふっ、私なんかよりよっぽど
人を惑わせるわよねぇ～。

engChrName: Teach me your ways, Master Étoile! I beg you!
engSearchText: Teach me your ways, Master Étoile! I beg you!
jpnChrName: ……今度から“師匠”って呼ぼうかしら！？
jpnSearchText: ……今度から“師匠”って呼ぼうかしら！？

engChrName: Oh, it's just terrible! Terrible news! The Revolution Festival has been delayed...
engSearchText:
Oh, it's just terrible! Terrible news! The Revolution
Festival has been delayed...
jpnChrName: ねえ聞いた！？　大変よ！！ 今年の革命記念祭は延期になったらしいわ！
jpnSearchText:
ねえ聞いた！？　大変よ！！
今年の革命記念祭は延期になったらしいわ！

engChrName: You serious?
engSearchText: You serious?
jpnChrName: ええええ──っ！？
jpnSearchText: ええええ──っ！？

engChrName: ...because a ghost from 130 years past has risen from the grave and rent the Vantail District asunder!
engSearchText:
...because a ghost from 130 years past has risen from
the grave and rent the Vantail District asunder!
jpnChrName: なんでも百三十年前の亡霊が蘇って ヴァンタイユ地区を占拠したんですって！！
jpnSearchText:
なんでも百三十年前の亡霊が蘇って
ヴァンタイユ地区を占拠したんですって！！

engChrName: No way!
engSearchText: No way!
jpnChrName: へええ～！？
jpnSearchText: へええ～！？

engChrName: It's taken the president hostage! The government has sent Judith to negotiate!
engSearchText:
It's taken the president hostage! The government has
sent Judith to negotiate!
jpnChrName: 大統領が人質になってしまって あのジュディスが交渉に当たってるらしいわ！
jpnSearchText:
大統領が人質になってしまって
あのジュディスが交渉に当たってるらしいわ！

engChrName: ...What.
engSearchText: ...What.

engChrName: (Uhh... First I've heard of it.)
engSearchText: (Uhh... First I've heard of it.)
jpnChrName: （え？　てかあたし？）
jpnSearchText: （え？　てかあたし？）

engChrName: (This is, well...yeah.)
engSearchText: (This is, well...yeah.)
jpnChrName: （……なんだかすっかり……）
jpnSearchText: （……なんだかすっかり……）

engChrName: (Not these bogus stories again...)
engSearchText: (Not these bogus stories again...)
jpnChrName: （慣れたよね、このお婆さんの作り話には。）
jpnSearchText: （慣れたよね、このお婆さんの作り話には。）

engChrName: (Man, these stories are getting kinda old.)
engSearchText: (Man, these stories are getting kinda old.)
jpnChrName: （慣れちゃいましたね、   このお婆さんの作り話には。）
jpnSearchText:
（慣れちゃいましたね、
このお婆さんの作り話には。）

engChrName: (Ever thought about writing a book, grandma? You're good at fiction.)
engSearchText:
(Ever thought about writing a book, grandma?
You're good at fiction.)
jpnChrName: （ハナから騙される気がしねーけどな。）
jpnSearchText: （ハナから騙される気がしねーけどな。）

engChrName: Oh, did my story not land? I thought I would get more of a rise out of you than that.
engSearchText:
Oh, did my story not land? I thought I would get
more of a rise out of you than that.
jpnChrName: あらぁ、冷静すぎてつまらないわ～！ パンチが足りなかったかしら～？
jpnSearchText:
あらぁ、冷静すぎてつまらないわ～！
パンチが足りなかったかしら～？

engChrName: Yeah, you learn to pick up on it. I know that stuff is fun for you, but don't go overboard, okay?
engSearchText:
Yeah, you learn to pick up on it. I know that stuff is
fun for you, but don't go overboard, okay?
jpnChrName: いつもの事だが、婆さんもほどほどにな。
jpnSearchText: いつもの事だが、婆さんもほどほどにな。

engChrName: *sigh* I'll just have to think of something more impactful next time. Something more up-front shocking!
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'll just have to think of something more
impactful next time. Something more
up-front shocking!
jpnChrName: ふう、私としたことが やっぱりパンチが足りなかったかしら～。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、私としたことが
やっぱりパンチが足りなかったかしら～。

engChrName: I'd better polish my skills before the festival, lest I sully the Big Mum's good name!
engSearchText:
I'd better polish my skills before the festival, lest I
sully the Big Mum's good name!
jpnChrName: 本番の記念祭までにもっと腕を磨かないと、 《ビッグ・マム》の二つ名が廃るわねぇ～！
jpnSearchText:
本番の記念祭までにもっと腕を磨かないと、
《ビッグ・マム》の二つ名が廃るわねぇ～！

engChrName: (Good for you, granny. I'll steer well clear of that.)
engSearchText: (Good for you, granny. I'll steer well clear of that.)
jpnChrName: （突っ込まない……突っ込まないぞ……）
jpnSearchText: （突っ込まない……突っ込まないぞ……）

engChrName: O Aidios, You who extend Your divine charity to us humans below...
engSearchText:
O Aidios, You who extend Your divine charity to us
humans below...
jpnChrName: ああ、空の女神（エイドス）よ…… 慈悲とともに人の世を見守りし者よ……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、空の女神（エイドス）よ……
慈悲とともに人の世を見守りし者よ……

engChrName: Please, forgive us and our foolishness, for we have sown conflict and hatred among ourselves...
engSearchText:
Please, forgive us and our foolishness, for we have
sown conflict and hatred among ourselves...
jpnChrName: いつまでも憎しみあい、いがみ合い、 愚かな人間をお許しください……
jpnSearchText:
いつまでも憎しみあい、いがみ合い、
愚かな人間をお許しください……

engChrName: I pray that the good people of Creil may join You at Your holy side...
engSearchText:
I pray that the good people of Creil may join You at
Your holy side...
jpnChrName: そしてどうか……クレイユの民たちを 清浄なる御許へとお導きください……
jpnSearchText:
そしてどうか……クレイユの民たちを
清浄なる御許へとお導きください……

engChrName: (She's much more solemn than usual today...)
engSearchText: (She's much more solemn than usual today...)
jpnChrName: （何時になく真剣に祈られてますね……）
jpnSearchText: （何時になく真剣に祈られてますね……）

engChrName: (...Well, that's different. Usually her head's up in the clouds.)
engSearchText:
(...Well, that's different. Usually her head's up in
the clouds.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、いつものホラ吹きは   どこへやらって感じだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、いつものホラ吹きは
どこへやらって感じだが……）

engChrName: (Remember hearin' from somebody that she lost her family in a terrorist attack...)
engSearchText:
(Remember hearin' from somebody that she lost her
family in a terrorist attack...)
jpnChrName: （………この婆さん、テロで家族を失ったと   誰だったかに聞いた事があるな……）
jpnSearchText:
（………この婆さん、テロで家族を失ったと
誰だったかに聞いた事があるな……）

engChrName: (Maybe that's part of the reason why she's otherwise so jovial...)
engSearchText:
(Maybe that's part of the reason why she's otherwise
so jovial...)
jpnChrName: （普段は陽気に振舞ってるのも   そいつが原因なのかもな……）
jpnSearchText:
（普段は陽気に振舞ってるのも
そいつが原因なのかもな……）

engChrName: Oh, dearie me. I nod off to sleep just for a little bit and the whole day slips away. I'd best head on home now.
engSearchText:
Oh, dearie me. I nod off to sleep just for a little bit
and the whole day slips away. I'd best head on
home now.
jpnChrName: うたた寝をしていたら、もうこんな時間なのね。 うふふ、そろそろ行くとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
うたた寝をしていたら、もうこんな時間なのね。
うふふ、そろそろ行くとしましょうか。

engChrName: Nights like these are when I feel the loneliest...but then, winter is on the horizon, too.
engSearchText:
Nights like these are when I feel the loneliest...but
then, winter is on the horizon, too.
jpnChrName: こんな夜はつい寂しさが沁みるけれど…… ………いえ、もう冬も近いものねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
こんな夜はつい寂しさが沁みるけれど……
………いえ、もう冬も近いものねぇ。

engChrName: Perhaps I should warm myself back up with some hot borscht from Montmart, heehee.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I should warm myself back up with some hot
borscht from Montmart, heehee.
jpnChrName: うふふっ、早くモンマルトに行って 温かいボルシチでも頼みましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
うふふっ、早くモンマルトに行って
温かいボルシチでも頼みましょうか。

engChrName: It's nights like these where I can't help thinking back... On a lot of things, really...
engSearchText:
It's nights like these where I can't help
thinking back... On a lot of things, really...
jpnChrName: うふふっ、こんな夜はつい…… ……思い出してしまうわねえ………
jpnSearchText:
うふふっ、こんな夜はつい……
……思い出してしまうわねえ………

engChrName: But perhaps it's best I take my mind off those things. I'll take a quick nap and then head to Montmart— their borscht is lovely this time of year.
engSearchText:
But perhaps it's best I take my mind off those things.
I'll take a quick nap and then head to Montmart—
their borscht is lovely this time of year.
jpnChrName: 少し休んだら、モンマルトに行って 温かいボルシチでも頼みましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
少し休んだら、モンマルトに行って
温かいボルシチでも頼みましょうか。

engChrName: Goodness, who could have imagined he'd find himself with Judith?
engSearchText:
Goodness, who could have imagined he'd find
himself with Judith?
jpnChrName: ふう、まさかジュディス・ランスターが あの彼とだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、まさかジュディス・ランスターが
あの彼とだなんて……

engChrName: As a fan of both, I'm rather conflicted.
engSearchText: As a fan of both, I'm rather conflicted.
jpnChrName: 両ファンクラブの会員としては複雑ねぇ……
jpnSearchText: 両ファンクラブの会員としては複雑ねぇ……

engChrName: Judith has this charismatic aura about her...and then Maxim is just a total charmer.
engSearchText:
Judith has this charismatic aura about her...and then
Maxim is just a total charmer.
jpnChrName: ジュディスの圧倒的なスター性も 彼のナルなイケメン感も好きだけど──
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスの圧倒的なスター性も
彼のナルなイケメン感も好きだけど──

engChrName: But together? Hrm... I just don't see it, myself.
engSearchText: But together? Hrm... I just don't see it, myself.
jpnChrName: 二人が一緒になるのは、ちょっと…… うーん、何かしらこの食い合わせの悪さは～。
jpnSearchText:
二人が一緒になるのは、ちょっと……
うーん、何かしらこの食い合わせの悪さは～。

engChrName: (It seems the rumors are making the rounds already...)
engSearchText: (It seems the rumors are making the rounds already...)
jpnChrName: （えっと、なにか噂に   なってるみたいですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（えっと、なにか噂に
なってるみたいですね……）

engChrName: (Why DO fools fall in love?)
engSearchText: (Why DO fools fall in love?)
jpnChrName: （ま、ポンコツとポンコツじゃあな。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、ポンコツとポンコツじゃあな。）

engChrName: (Aww, be nice, Van.)
engSearchText: (Aww, be nice, Van.)
jpnChrName: （もう、ヴァンさんったら……）
jpnSearchText: （もう、ヴァンさんったら……）

engChrName: (The rumor's causing quite a stir...not that it matters much, in the grand scheme of things.)
engSearchText:
(The rumor's causing quite a stir...not that it matters
much, in the grand scheme of things.)
jpnChrName: （どうでもいいけど、世間を騒がせてる   みたいだね、そのゴシップネタ。
jpnSearchText:
（どうでもいいけど、世間を騒がせてる
みたいだね、そのゴシップネタ。

engChrName: I went to catch a movie for the first time in a while, and my goodness, it shook me to my core!
engSearchText:
I went to catch a movie for the first time in a while,
and my goodness, it shook me to my core!
jpnChrName: 久々に映画館に行ったら、中々ワイルドで 刺激的なタイトルが上映されていたの。
jpnSearchText:
久々に映画館に行ったら、中々ワイルドで
刺激的なタイトルが上映されていたの。

engChrName: Heehee... My heart is still racing. I've worked up an appetite, even! Steak sounds quite nice to me...
engSearchText:
Heehee... My heart is still racing. I've worked up an
appetite, even! Steak sounds quite nice to me...
jpnChrName: うふふ、思わず血が騒いじゃったわ～！ 今夜は極厚ステーキでも頼んじゃおうかしら♪
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、思わず血が騒いじゃったわ～！
今夜は極厚ステーキでも頼んじゃおうかしら♪

engChrName: I heard last week's film festival in Tharbad turned into quite the fiesta.
engSearchText:
I heard last week's film festival in Tharbad turned
into quite the fiesta.
jpnChrName: 先週サルバッドであった映画祭…… なんでも大変だったそうね？
jpnSearchText:
先週サルバッドであった映画祭……
なんでも大変だったそうね？

engChrName: Spontaneous dancing in the streets... A massive improv that saw an entire hotel occupied...
engSearchText:
Spontaneous dancing in the streets... A massive
improv that saw an entire hotel occupied...
jpnChrName: 街中を踊り歩くイベントがゲリラ開催されたり、 豪華ホテルが占拠されるアドリブショーがあったり……
jpnSearchText:
街中を踊り歩くイベントがゲリラ開催されたり、
豪華ホテルが占拠されるアドリブショーがあったり……

engChrName: It does bring me back. You know, I was an actress, in a previous life.
engSearchText:
It does bring me back. You know, I was an actress, in
a previous life.
jpnChrName: ちなみに私、こう見えて 銀幕女優をやっていた事もあるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに私、こう見えて
銀幕女優をやっていた事もあるのよ。

engChrName: Perhaps I should have gone there and lived it up anyway, my back be damned.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I should have gone there and lived it up
anyway, my back be damned.
jpnChrName: うーん、今や腰痛持ちの身だけど 無理してでも参加しておくべきだったかしら～？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、今や腰痛持ちの身だけど
無理してでも参加しておくべきだったかしら～？

engChrName: Oh, hello, dear. Good to see you here.
engSearchText: Oh, hello, dear. Good to see you here.
jpnChrName: あら、解決事務所の……
jpnSearchText: あら、解決事務所の……

engChrName: I found myself a bit discomposed tonight, so I decided to pay my respects.
engSearchText:
I found myself a bit discomposed tonight, so I
decided to pay my respects.
jpnChrName: ふふ、今夜はどうも心がざわついてしまってね。 こっそり祈りに来てしまったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、今夜はどうも心がざわついてしまってね。
こっそり祈りに来てしまったわ。

engChrName: I just hope we can find peace again, in spite of all that's wrong with the world.
engSearchText:
I just hope we can find peace again, in spite of
all that's wrong with the world.
jpnChrName: ……これからも安らかな日々が 送れるといいのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
……これからも安らかな日々が
送れるといいのだけど……

engChrName: O Aidios, guide our wayward souls...
engSearchText: O Aidios, guide our wayward souls...
jpnChrName: 女神エイドスよ…… どうか私たちの魂をお導きください……
jpnSearchText:
女神エイドスよ……
どうか私たちの魂をお導きください……

engChrName: I read in this magazine that criminal activity is on the rise—and the mafia is to blame.
engSearchText:
I read in this magazine that criminal activity is on the
rise—and the mafia is to blame.
jpnChrName: そうそう、ゴシップ誌で読んだのだけど…… 最近またマフィアが世間を騒がせているみたいねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、ゴシップ誌で読んだのだけど……
最近またマフィアが世間を騒がせているみたいねぇ。

engChrName: I nearly brought a certain criminal empire toppling down, back in my SID days...
engSearchText:
I nearly brought a certain criminal empire toppling
down, back in my SID days...
jpnChrName: 実は私、特捜課にいた頃に とあるマフィアのボスを捕まえ損ねた事があってね。
jpnSearchText:
実は私、特捜課にいた頃に
とあるマフィアのボスを捕まえ損ねた事があってね。

engChrName: If I just had the strength to finish the job, perhaps I could have prevented this resurgence in crime. It does weigh heavy on me...
engSearchText:
If I just had the strength to finish the job, perhaps I
could have prevented this resurgence in crime. It does
weigh heavy on me...
jpnChrName: もしあの時逮捕していれば何かが違ったのかしら…… ……ふう、責任を感じちゃうわ～。
jpnSearchText:
もしあの時逮捕していれば何かが違ったのかしら……
……ふう、責任を感じちゃうわ～。

engChrName: (Does it? I couldn't tell, sorry. Performance wasn't very convincing.)
engSearchText:
(Does it? I couldn't tell, sorry. Performance wasn't
very convincing.)
jpnChrName: （反省の色なしだな、これは……）
jpnSearchText: （反省の色なしだな、これは……）

engChrName: Oh, dear... I forgot to buy my medication. Father Time is taking me to task, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
Oh, dear... I forgot to buy my medication.
Father Time is taking me to task, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: 持病の薬を買い忘れてしまってねぇ。 うふふ、さすがの私も歳には勝てないわぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
持病の薬を買い忘れてしまってねぇ。
うふふ、さすがの私も歳には勝てないわぁ～。

engChrName: I've found it difficult falling asleep, too... Perhaps I should start taking some sleeping pills. I could stand to take some vitamins as well...
engSearchText:
I've found it difficult falling asleep, too... Perhaps I
should start taking some sleeping pills. I could stand
to take some vitamins as well...
jpnChrName: あと最近寝付きも悪くてねぇ、 軽い睡眠薬にビタミン剤……
jpnSearchText:
あと最近寝付きも悪くてねぇ、
軽い睡眠薬にビタミン剤……

engChrName: ...is what a quitter would say! I'd much rather stick to protein—I've gotten into weight lifting recently, and old age can't stop me!
engSearchText:
...is what a quitter would say! I'd much rather stick to
protein—I've gotten into weight lifting recently, and
old age can't stop me!
jpnChrName: ──と見せかけてやっぱりプロテインにしようかしら。 実は最近、重量上げにハマっているのよねぇ～♪
jpnSearchText:
──と見せかけてやっぱりプロテインにしようかしら。
実は最近、重量上げにハマっているのよねぇ～♪

engChrName: ...Well, no, but your back can.
engSearchText: ...Well, no, but your back can.
jpnChrName: 婆さん、それマジでやったら腰痛めるからな？
jpnSearchText: 婆さん、それマジでやったら腰痛めるからな？

engChrName: Oh, I'll be fine! But thanks anyway!
engSearchText: Oh, I'll be fine! But thanks anyway!
jpnChrName: うふふ、大丈夫よぉ。 ありがとうね～！
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、大丈夫よぉ。
ありがとうね～！

engChrName: There's this gray cat who roams Old Town. Have you seen it? Its name is Étoile.
engSearchText:
There's this gray cat who roams Old Town. Have you
seen it? Its name is Étoile.
jpnChrName: 旧市街に住み着いている灰猫がいるでしょう？ あの子はエトワールっていうのよ。
jpnSearchText:
旧市街に住み着いている灰猫がいるでしょう？
あの子はエトワールっていうのよ。

engChrName: It's a very skittish cat, you see...and I believe I know why. The cat hides a special secret.
engSearchText:
It's a very skittish cat, you see...and I believe I
know why. The cat hides a special secret.
jpnChrName: 全然人に懐かないのだけど、それもそのはず。 エトワールには特別なヒミツがあるの。
jpnSearchText:
全然人に懐かないのだけど、それもそのはず。
エトワールには特別なヒミツがあるの。

engChrName: I saw it, under the light of the full moon... It transformed into a human and leapt out of sight!
engSearchText:
I saw it, under the light of the full moon...
It transformed into a human and leapt out of sight!
jpnChrName: この前の満月の夜、あの子が人間の姿になって 駆け抜けていくのを見ちゃったのよ～！
jpnSearchText:
この前の満月の夜、あの子が人間の姿になって
駆け抜けていくのを見ちゃったのよ～！

engChrName: It's Grimcat, I'm sure of it! Mweheehee... That prize money will soon be mine!
engSearchText:
It's Grimcat, I'm sure of it! Mweheehee... That prize
money will soon be mine!
jpnChrName: そう、きっとあれこそが── うふふ、これで“懸賞金”は頂きねぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
そう、きっとあれこそが──
うふふ、これで“懸賞金”は頂きねぇ♪

engChrName: (I'm having a hard time believing any of this...)
engSearchText: (I'm having a hard time believing any of this...)
jpnChrName: （うーん、流石に信じがたいですけど……）
jpnSearchText: （うーん、流石に信じがたいですけど……）

engChrName: (Yeah, 'cause it's total BS. Just ignore her.)
engSearchText: (Yeah, 'cause it's total BS. Just ignore her.)
jpnChrName: （つーか１００パーデタラメだろ。   スルーだスルー。）
jpnSearchText:
（つーか１００パーデタラメだろ。
スルーだスルー。）

engChrName: (No way... Could that be Grimcat's true identity?!)
engSearchText: (No way... Could that be Grimcat's true identity?!)
jpnChrName: （もしやグリムキャッツの正体は……！）
jpnSearchText: （もしやグリムキャッツの正体は……！）

engChrName: (No, no. A hundred percent no. Just ignore her.)
engSearchText: (No, no. A hundred percent no. Just ignore her.)
jpnChrName: （いやいや、１００パーデタラメだろ。   スルーだスルー。）
jpnSearchText:
（いやいや、１００パーデタラメだろ。
スルーだスルー。）

engChrName: At any rate, one thing's for certain: that cat is special.
engSearchText: At any rate, one thing's for certain: that cat is special.
jpnChrName: うふふ、ともかくあの子が 特別な猫なのは確かよ～？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、ともかくあの子が
特別な猫なのは確かよ～？

engChrName: If you happen to run across it, treat it well, okay? It might repay the favor. ♪
engSearchText:
If you happen to run across it, treat it well, okay?
It might repay the favor. ♪
jpnChrName: 見つけたら仲良くしてあげて頂戴な♪
jpnSearchText: 見つけたら仲良くしてあげて頂戴な♪

engChrName: Well, hello there, dear.
engSearchText: Well, hello there, dear.
jpnChrName: あら、あなたたち……
jpnSearchText: あら、あなたたち……

engChrName: The unease on your face... The dark shadow creeping along your back... I see what ails you, young lady.
engSearchText:
The unease on your face... The dark shadow creeping
along your back... I see what ails you, young lady.
jpnChrName: ……その顔に浮かぶ焦燥感…… 背後から迫る夕日と影の気配……もしかして──
jpnSearchText:
……その顔に浮かぶ焦燥感……
背後から迫る夕日と影の気配……もしかして──

engChrName: Could it be you...forgot to buy ingredients for supper? Mweheehee! I can sympathize.
engSearchText:
Could it be you...forgot to buy ingredients for supper?
Mweheehee! I can sympathize.
jpnChrName: 夕食の買い出しを忘れたのね？ うふふ、私と同じだわ～。
jpnSearchText:
夕食の買い出しを忘れたのね？
うふふ、私と同じだわ～。

engChrName: (*sigh* She was really starting to unnerve me there...)
engSearchText: (*sigh* She was really starting to unnerve me there...)
jpnChrName: （はぁ、ドキドキして損しました……）
jpnSearchText: （はぁ、ドキドキして損しました……）

engChrName: (Yeah, that's her usual song and dance. Don't let her bother you.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, that's her usual song and dance. Don't let her
bother you.)
jpnChrName: （どうせそんな事だろうと思ったが……   ともかく気を抜かねえようにな。）
jpnSearchText:
（どうせそんな事だろうと思ったが……
ともかく気を抜かねえようにな。）

engChrName: Oh, hey...
engSearchText: Oh, hey...
jpnChrName: おっと、アンタは……
jpnSearchText: おっと、アンタは……

engChrName: Ah! Good day to you, dear.
engSearchText: Ah! Good day to you, dear.
jpnChrName: あら、確か解決事務所の。
jpnSearchText: あら、確か解決事務所の。

engChrName: And the young lady with you... My, how adorable she is.
engSearchText:
And the young lady with you... My, how adorable
she is.
jpnChrName: それにそちらのお嬢さんは…… うふふ、とっても可愛らしい子ねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
それにそちらのお嬢さんは……
うふふ、とっても可愛らしい子ねぇ。

engChrName: A-Ah, thank you.
engSearchText: A-Ah, thank you.
jpnChrName: あはは、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: あはは、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: I'm starting my part-time job at Arkride Solutions today.
engSearchText:
I'm starting my part-time job at Arkride
Solutions today.
jpnChrName: 私、今日から《アークライド解決事務所》で アルバイトをさせてもらう事になりまして。
jpnSearchText:
私、今日から《アークライド解決事務所》で
アルバイトをさせてもらう事になりまして。

engChrName: Is that so? You're quite the go-getter for your age!
engSearchText: Is that so? You're quite the go-getter for your age!
jpnChrName: あらまあ、そうだったの～！ まだ若いのに大変ねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あらまあ、そうだったの～！
まだ若いのに大変ねぇ。

engChrName: I used to run a little oddjob business, myself. Only recently did I retire.
engSearchText:
I used to run a little oddjob business, myself.
Only recently did I retire.
jpnChrName: 実は私もね、この前まで一風変わった 解決屋をしていたのよ。
jpnSearchText:
実は私もね、この前まで一風変わった
解決屋をしていたのよ。

engChrName: In my heyday, they called me the Legend of the Eighth District! I had no shortage of work, heehee!
engSearchText:
In my heyday, they called me the Legend of the
Eighth District! I had no shortage of work, heehee!
jpnChrName: あまりの腕前に“八区のレジェンド”なんて 呼ばれて、毎日大忙しだったわねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
あまりの腕前に“八区のレジェンド”なんて
呼ばれて、毎日大忙しだったわねぇ～。

engChrName: Oh, wow. Really?
engSearchText: Oh, wow. Really?
jpnChrName: そ、そうだったんですか……！？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうだったんですか……！？

engChrName: Nah. Stretchin' the truth is her real pastime. You get used to her.
engSearchText:
Nah. Stretchin' the truth is her real pastime. You get
used to her.
jpnChrName: んなワケねえだろ…… 簡単に信じすぎだ。
jpnSearchText:
んなワケねえだろ……
簡単に信じすぎだ。

engChrName: Make sure to take it easy, all right? Don't wanna throw out your back again.
engSearchText:
Make sure to take it easy, all right? Don't wanna
throw out your back again.
jpnChrName: 婆さんもこの前 腰痛めたばっかだろ、大事にな。
jpnSearchText:
婆さんもこの前
腰痛めたばっかだろ、大事にな。

engChrName: Oh, I'll be fine. But thank you for your concern, young man. Heehee.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'll be fine. But thank you for your concern,
young man. Heehee.
jpnChrName: うふふ、嫌だわぁ。 でもありがとうねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、嫌だわぁ。
でもありがとうねぇ。

engChrName: (So, she was lying back there...?)
engSearchText: (So, she was lying back there...?)
jpnChrName: （え、えっと……嘘だったんですか……？）
jpnSearchText: （え、えっと……嘘だったんですか……？）

engChrName: (*sigh* This is not your ordinary neighborhood.)
engSearchText: (*sigh* This is not your ordinary neighborhood.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、先が思いやられるな。）
jpnSearchText: （やれやれ、先が思いやられるな。）

engChrName: Oh, I'll be fine. But thank you for your concern, young man. Heehee.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'll be fine. But thank you for your concern,
young man. Heehee.
jpnChrName: うふふ、嫌だわぁ。 でもありがとうねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、嫌だわぁ。
でもありがとうねぇ。

engChrName: I'd be pleased as punch if we could chat again some time. ♪
engSearchText:
I'd be pleased as punch if we could chat again
some time. ♪
jpnChrName: またお話してくれると嬉しいわ♪
jpnSearchText: またお話してくれると嬉しいわ♪

engChrName: Ah, well, haha... It would be my pleasure.
engSearchText: Ah, well, haha... It would be my pleasure.
jpnChrName: あはは、はい…… こちらこそよろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、はい……
こちらこそよろしくお願いします。

engChrName: Ahh, breakfast was simply wonderful this morning. Montmart never disappoints...
engSearchText:
Ahh, breakfast was simply wonderful this morning.
Montmart never disappoints...
jpnChrName: ふふ、今日のモーニングも美味しかったわねぇ～。 さすがはモンマルトだわ♪
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、今日のモーニングも美味しかったわねぇ～。
さすがはモンマルトだわ♪

engChrName: ...but dessert is my real craving!
engSearchText: ...but dessert is my real craving!
jpnChrName: でも本題はデザートよねぇ。
jpnSearchText: でも本題はデザートよねぇ。

engChrName: Will their treats be enough to satisfy my sweet tooth?
engSearchText: Will their treats be enough to satisfy my sweet tooth?
jpnChrName: うふふ、果たして この私を満足させられるかしら～？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、果たして
この私を満足させられるかしら～？

engChrName: Looks like the monsters got cleared out.
engSearchText: Looks like the monsters got cleared out.
jpnChrName: どうやら化け物どもも 粗方いなくなったようだね。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら化け物どもも
粗方いなくなったようだね。

engChrName: I did the rounds, and it looks like everybody's okay. Wouldn't hurt for you to give the neighborhood a check, too.
engSearchText:
I did the rounds, and it looks like everybody's okay.
Wouldn't hurt for you to give the neighborhood a
check, too.
jpnChrName: 軽く一回りしてきたが、住民たちも無事のようだ。 ……気になるなら見てきちゃどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
軽く一回りしてきたが、住民たちも無事のようだ。
……気になるなら見てきちゃどうだい？

engChrName: Good to hear—I think I'll go ahead and double check. Gotta get my equipment in order, too.
engSearchText:
Good to hear—I think I'll go ahead and
double check. Gotta get my equipment in order, too.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そいつは何よりだぜ。 そうだな、軽く準備も整えたいし……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そいつは何よりだぜ。
そうだな、軽く準備も整えたいし……

engChrName: Don't go wanderin' around too much, okay? Ain't all clear just yet.
engSearchText:
Don't go wanderin' around too much, okay? Ain't all
clear just yet.
jpnChrName: つーか婆さんも、 あんまウロウロすんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
つーか婆さんも、
あんまウロウロすんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. The same goes for you, young'uns—use your heads out there!
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah. The same goes for you, young'uns—use
your heads out there!
jpnChrName: ああ、アンタたちも気を付けて行きな。 ヘマすんじゃないよ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アンタたちも気を付けて行きな。
ヘマすんじゃないよ！

engChrName: Mhm! Roger that!
engSearchText: Mhm! Roger that!
jpnChrName: えへへ……はいっ！！
jpnSearchText: えへへ……はいっ！！

engChrName: Ain't no tellin' what those mafia bastards are up to...
engSearchText: Ain't no tellin' what those mafia bastards are up to...
jpnChrName: あのマフィアどもが 何を企んでるのか知らないが……
jpnSearchText:
あのマフィアどもが
何を企んでるのか知らないが……

engChrName: ...but if they think they can mess with the festival, they're in for a whoopin'.
engSearchText:
...but if they think they can mess with the festival,
they're in for a whoopin'.
jpnChrName: 記念祭を台無しにしようってんなら 放ってはおけないだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭を台無しにしようってんなら
放ってはおけないだろうさ。

engChrName: There's gotta be a fix for all this! Keep yer wits about you, young'un, you got it?
engSearchText:
There's gotta be a fix for all this! Keep yer wits about
you, young'un, you got it?
jpnChrName: ──必ず突破口があるはずだ。 目ェ凝らしていきな、解決屋ども！
jpnSearchText:
──必ず突破口があるはずだ。
目ェ凝らしていきな、解決屋ども！

engChrName: That's the plan! You stay safe, okay?
engSearchText: That's the plan! You stay safe, okay?
jpnChrName: ああ、婆さんも気を付けてな！
jpnSearchText: ああ、婆さんも気を付けてな！

engChrName: We'll fix this mess, we promise!
engSearchText: We'll fix this mess, we promise!
jpnChrName: きっと解決してみせますから！！
jpnSearchText: きっと解決してみせますから！！

engChrName: You're late. Where the hell've you been?
engSearchText: You're late. Where the hell've you been?
jpnChrName: ──遅かったじゃないかい、《裏解決屋》。 マッタクどこをほっつき歩いてたんだか。
jpnSearchText:
──遅かったじゃないかい、《裏解決屋》。
マッタクどこをほっつき歩いてたんだか。

engChrName: Just leave the kids to me and get goin', got it?! I won't let 'em scratch a hair on their heads!
engSearchText:
Just leave the kids to me and get goin', got it?! I won't
let 'em scratch a hair on their heads!
jpnChrName: この子らは任せてとっとと行きな。 あの化け物どもには指一本触れさせないよ！
jpnSearchText:
この子らは任せてとっとと行きな。
あの化け物どもには指一本触れさせないよ！

engChrName: (Oho... Quite the aura she's got.) Who's this lady?
engSearchText: (Oho... Quite the aura she's got.) Who's this lady?
jpnChrName: （へえ、中々の貫禄──） この御仁は……？
jpnSearchText:
（へえ、中々の貫禄──）
この御仁は……？

engChrName: Oh? Who would this be?
engSearchText: Oh? Who would this be?
jpnChrName: フム、この御仁は……
jpnSearchText: フム、この御仁は……

engChrName: My... And she is?
engSearchText: My... And she is?
jpnChrName: おや、この御仁は……？
jpnSearchText: おや、この御仁は……？

engChrName: She runs the tobacco kiosk across from my office. Surprised to see her spring into action like that.
engSearchText:
She runs the tobacco kiosk across from my office.
Surprised to see her spring into action like that.
jpnChrName: 向かいのタバコ屋の婆さんだ。 ちょっとやそっとじゃ動じねえとは思ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
向かいのタバコ屋の婆さんだ。
ちょっとやそっとじゃ動じねえとは思ってたが。

engChrName: 'Preciate it, Gin. Just don't get in over your head!
engSearchText: 'Preciate it, Gin. Just don't get in over your head!
jpnChrName: すまねえ、お言葉に甘えさせてもらうぜ。 婆さんも無茶だけはすんなよ！
jpnSearchText:
すまねえ、お言葉に甘えさせてもらうぜ。
婆さんも無茶だけはすんなよ！

engChrName: Hmph, of course! Who do you take me for? Worry about yourself first, young'un!
engSearchText:
Hmph, of course! Who do you take me for?
Worry about yourself first, young'un!
jpnChrName: ハン、誰に向かって言ってるんだい！ ヒヨッコが余計な気を回すんじゃないよ！
jpnSearchText:
ハン、誰に向かって言ってるんだい！
ヒヨッコが余計な気を回すんじゃないよ！

engChrName: Can't just leave everything to the youngsters—not when I'm still up and kickin'!
engSearchText:
Can't just leave everything to the youngsters—not
when I'm still up and kickin'!
jpnChrName: 小娘たちばかりに背負わせちゃ 年寄りの沽券にかかわるってもんさね。
jpnSearchText:
小娘たちばかりに背負わせちゃ
年寄りの沽券にかかわるってもんさね。

engChrName: Just leave the kids to me and get goin', got it?! I won't let 'em scratch a hair on their heads!
engSearchText:
Just leave the kids to me and get goin', got it?! I won't
let 'em scratch a hair on their heads!
jpnChrName: この子らは任せてとっとと行きな。 あの化け物どもには指一本触れさせないよ！
jpnSearchText:
この子らは任せてとっとと行きな。
あの化け物どもには指一本触れさせないよ！

engChrName: I'm sure you already know the Revolution Festival is the turnin' point of the year.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you already know the Revolution
Festival is the turnin' point of the year.
jpnChrName: ──お前たちも分かってるだろうが、 《革命記念日》は一年の節目だ。
jpnSearchText:
──お前たちも分かってるだろうが、
《革命記念日》は一年の節目だ。

engChrName: You gotta welcome the new year right! Now's the time to celebrate and shake off all the baggage from the year before.
engSearchText:
You gotta welcome the new year right! Now's the
time to celebrate and shake off all the baggage from
the year before.
jpnChrName: こいつを祝わないと年を越せないよ。 今日はしっかり回ってきな！
jpnSearchText:
こいつを祝わないと年を越せないよ。
今日はしっかり回ってきな！

engChrName: We'll make sure of it! Thank you! (Goodness, she's excited about it.)
engSearchText:
We'll make sure of it! Thank you!
(Goodness, she's excited about it.)
jpnChrName: はい、ありがとうございます。 （ふふっ、随分張り切ってらっしゃいますね。）
jpnSearchText:
はい、ありがとうございます。
（ふふっ、随分張り切ってらっしゃいますね。）

engChrName: Heehee! I'm really excited for the festival, too! Thanks, ma'am!
engSearchText:
Heehee! I'm really excited for the festival, too!
Thanks, ma'am!
jpnChrName: えへへ、わたしも楽しみにしてました！ ありがとうです、お婆さんっ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、わたしも楽しみにしてました！
ありがとうです、お婆さんっ！

engChrName: Well, you've changed your tune, haven't you? You sound nice for once.
engSearchText:
Well, you've changed your tune, haven't you?
You sound nice for once.
jpnChrName: クク、いつも小うるせえクセに 案外推し推しかよ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、いつも小うるせえクセに
案外推し推しかよ？

engChrName: This year's will be my first Revolution Festival as well. I do look forward to it.
engSearchText:
This year's will be my first Revolution Festival as well.
I do look forward to it.
jpnChrName: わたくしも実際に参加するのは初めてです。 ふふっ、楽しませて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしも実際に参加するのは初めてです。
ふふっ、楽しませて頂きますね。

engChrName: We had a fair in Basel, but nothing on this scale. It does pique my interest.
engSearchText:
We had a fair in Basel, but nothing on this scale.
It does pique my interest.
jpnChrName: バーゼルでもちょっとしたお祝いをするけど 首都ほどじゃないし、確かに興味深いかもね。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルでもちょっとしたお祝いをするけど
首都ほどじゃないし、確かに興味深いかもね。

engChrName: Yeah... I remember my grammy felt the same way about the festival.
engSearchText:
Yeah... I remember my grammy felt the same way
about the festival.
jpnChrName: はいはい……ってなんかウチのお祖母ちゃんも 似たようなことを言ってたような……？
jpnSearchText:
はいはい……ってなんかウチのお祖母ちゃんも
似たようなことを言ってたような……？

engChrName: I don't see the harm in letting loose for the holidays—that is what they are for, after all.
engSearchText:
I don't see the harm in letting loose for the
holidays—that is what they are for, after all.
jpnChrName: フフ、年の瀬の大切な行事のようだ。 ゆるりと楽しませてもらうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、年の瀬の大切な行事のようだ。
ゆるりと楽しませてもらうとしよう。

engChrName: She gets like this around the holiday season. Maybe it means somethin' different to her generation, I dunno.
engSearchText:
She gets like this around the holiday season. Maybe it
means somethin' different to her generation, I dunno.
jpnChrName: なぜか毎年この調子なんだよな…… 年寄りは記念祭に思い入れでもあんのかね？
jpnSearchText:
なぜか毎年この調子なんだよな……
年寄りは記念祭に思い入れでもあんのかね？

engChrName: This year, I've got a new flavor: Rainbow Candy.
engSearchText: This year, I've got a new flavor: Rainbow Candy.
jpnChrName: …………今年は新味、 レインボーキャンディもあるよ？
jpnSearchText:
…………今年は新味、
レインボーキャンディもあるよ？

engChrName: RAINBOW Candy?! Gimme a dozen, stat.
engSearchText: RAINBOW Candy?! Gimme a dozen, stat.
jpnChrName: げ、限定味かよ！？ 仕方ねえ──１ダースくれ！
jpnSearchText:
げ、限定味かよ！？
仕方ねえ──１ダースくれ！

engChrName: Heh. Sweet tooth as always.
engSearchText: Heh. Sweet tooth as always.
jpnChrName: ハァ、相変わらずだね……お前も。
jpnSearchText: ハァ、相変わらずだね……お前も。

engChrName: For the festival, it's tradition to go around and greet your neighbors, so make sure ya do the rounds today.
engSearchText:
For the festival, it's tradition to go around and greet
your neighbors, so make sure ya do the rounds today.
jpnChrName: 記念祭には近所で挨拶し合う風習もある。 今日はしっかり回ってきな。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭には近所で挨拶し合う風習もある。
今日はしっかり回ってきな。

engChrName: And give the kids a little somethin' for the trouble. Candy works—or roasted chestnuts, if you got 'em.
engSearchText:
And give the kids a little somethin' for the trouble.
Candy works—or roasted chestnuts, if you got 'em.
jpnChrName: 未成年の子にはお駄賃でもやって、 焼き栗の一つでも買ってやるんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
未成年の子にはお駄賃でもやって、
焼き栗の一つでも買ってやるんだよ！

engChrName: Now, this part looks great, dunnit?
engSearchText: Now, this part looks great, dunnit?
jpnChrName: そうさね、この辺りが 見栄えもいいんじゃないかい？
jpnSearchText:
そうさね、この辺りが
見栄えもいいんじゃないかい？

engChrName: The decoration people're really draggin' their feet. If they take any longer, I'm lightin' a fire under somebody's ass!
engSearchText:
The decoration people're really draggin' their feet.
If they take any longer, I'm lightin' a fire under
somebody's ass!
jpnChrName: 今年の飾りつけはいつ届くんだい。 ……あんまり遅いとケツに火をつけるよ？
jpnSearchText:
今年の飾りつけはいつ届くんだい。
……あんまり遅いとケツに火をつけるよ？

engChrName: I-It'll be fine, I'm sure! We still have three more days!
engSearchText: I-It'll be fine, I'm sure! We still have three more days!
jpnChrName: ま、まあまあ！ あと３日もあるんですから！
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあまあ！
あと３日もあるんですから！

engChrName: You really don't have to be so much of a slave driver about it.
engSearchText:
You really don't have to be so much of a slave driver
about it.
jpnChrName: 婆さんたちは記念祭の相談か？ あんまオッサンたちを虐めんなよな。
jpnSearchText:
婆さんたちは記念祭の相談か？
あんまオッサンたちを虐めんなよな。

engChrName: Hmph. Can't help it. It's either them or the neighborhood association, and those guys are even worse.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Can't help it. It's either them or the
neighborhood association, and those guys are
even worse.
jpnChrName: フン、町内会に任せておいたんじゃ いつまで経っても纏まらないからね。
jpnSearchText:
フン、町内会に任せておいたんじゃ
いつまで経っても纏まらないからね。

engChrName: Van, you help later! You young folks gotta do your part.
engSearchText:
Van, you help later! You young folks gotta do
your part.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、お前も後で手伝いな。 『若い者は労働で奉仕すべし』さ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、お前も後で手伝いな。
『若い者は労働で奉仕すべし』さ。

engChrName: I'm not takin' more work for free, lady!
engSearchText: I'm not takin' more work for free, lady!
jpnChrName: って勝手に条項を増やすんじゃねーよ！！
jpnSearchText: って勝手に条項を増やすんじゃねーよ！！

engChrName: Well, I need help, and it's either you or the neighborhood association. Can't trust THEM for nothin', so you it is!
engSearchText:
Well, I need help, and it's either you or the
neighborhood association. Can't trust THEM for
nothin', so you it is!
jpnChrName: フン、町内会に任せておいたんじゃ いつまで経っても纏まらないからね。
jpnSearchText:
フン、町内会に任せておいたんじゃ
いつまで経っても纏まらないからね。

engChrName: I know you ain't got nothin' else to do, Van. Can't talk your way outta this one.
engSearchText:
I know you ain't got nothin' else to do, Van.
Can't talk your way outta this one.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、お前も後で手伝いな。 どうせヒマしてるんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、お前も後で手伝いな。
どうせヒマしてるんだろう？

engChrName: I mean, I didn't even say no—just—can you get off my ass first?
engSearchText:
I mean, I didn't even say no—just—can you get off
my ass first?
jpnChrName: 手伝わないとは言ってねーけどな。 横暴も程々にしてもらえませんかねェ？
jpnSearchText:
手伝わないとは言ってねーけどな。
横暴も程々にしてもらえませんかねェ？

engChrName: Oh, before I forget: Curtis' family got things worked out. That's all good now.
engSearchText:
Oh, before I forget: Curtis' family got things
worked out. That's all good now.
jpnChrName: おっとそうだ……カーチスの件だが、 ひとまず丸く収まったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おっとそうだ……カーチスの件だが、
ひとまず丸く収まったぜ。

engChrName: Hmph. Good for them.
engSearchText: Hmph. Good for them.
jpnChrName: フン、そうかい。
jpnSearchText: フン、そうかい。

engChrName: Ain't never my problem, anyway. They're the ones who got all pissed about it.
engSearchText:
Ain't never my problem, anyway. They're the ones
who got all pissed about it.
jpnChrName: 詳しい事情は分からないが、 後は家族の問題だろう。
jpnSearchText:
詳しい事情は分からないが、
後は家族の問題だろう。

engChrName: They'd better get their heads screwed on straight before they come yowlin' at me again.
engSearchText:
They'd better get their heads screwed on straight
before they come yowlin' at me again.
jpnChrName: また大騒ぎするまえに、 家族で何とかしてほしいモンだけどねえ。
jpnSearchText:
また大騒ぎするまえに、
家族で何とかしてほしいモンだけどねえ。

engChrName: Honestly, what's the point gettin' their panties in a twist over 'foul language' and 'bad influences'?
engSearchText:
Honestly, what's the point gettin' their panties in a
twist over 'foul language' and 'bad influences'?
jpnChrName: タバコ味のタブレットやら暴言やら、 その程度で大騒ぎするとは情けないねえ。
jpnSearchText:
タバコ味のタブレットやら暴言やら、
その程度で大騒ぎするとは情けないねえ。

engChrName: Every kid gets a rebellious phase! And she ain't got nobody to blame but herself for how her kid grows up.
engSearchText:
Every kid gets a rebellious phase! And she ain't got
nobody to blame but herself for how her kid
grows up.
jpnChrName: 反抗期にしたって可愛いモンじゃないか。 母親がどっしり構えてないでどうすんだろうねえ。
jpnSearchText:
反抗期にしたって可愛いモンじゃないか。
母親がどっしり構えてないでどうすんだろうねえ。

engChrName: So back when they had to re-zone everything, they gave each area a number.
engSearchText:
So back when they had to re-zone everything, they
gave each area a number.
jpnChrName: つまりさね、昔に区画整理をした際に １区、２区……と番号を付けたワケさ。
jpnSearchText:
つまりさね、昔に区画整理をした際に
１区、２区……と番号を付けたワケさ。

engChrName: At the time, the main way of gettin' around was by horse and carriage, so the numbers made everything easier to understand.
engSearchText:
At the time, the main way of gettin' around was by
horse and carriage, so the numbers made everything
easier to understand.
jpnChrName: その頃は乗合い馬車なんてのがあってね、 ルートが分かりやすくなって好評だったねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
その頃は乗合い馬車なんてのがあってね、
ルートが分かりやすくなって好評だったねぇ。

engChrName: And that's why Vantail, with all the government offices, was given the number 'one.'
engSearchText:
And that's why Vantail, with all the government
offices, was given the number 'one.'
jpnChrName: どうして１区・ヴァンタイユ地区に 官公庁街があるのか、これで分かっただろう？
jpnSearchText:
どうして１区・ヴァンタイユ地区に
官公庁街があるのか、これで分かっただろう？

engChrName: Oooh, so the numbers were added later!
engSearchText: Oooh, so the numbers were added later!
jpnChrName: そーか、番号をあとから付けたんだなっ！！
jpnSearchText: そーか、番号をあとから付けたんだなっ！！

engChrName: That makes sense!
engSearchText: That makes sense!
jpnChrName: 言われてみれば納得かも～！
jpnSearchText: 言われてみれば納得かも～！

engChrName: (Huh. Pretty good with kids for a spinster.)
engSearchText: (Huh. Pretty good with kids for a spinster.)
jpnChrName: （へ～え、婆さん案外   人気あんじゃねえか？）
jpnSearchText:
（へ～え、婆さん案外
人気あんじゃねえか？）

engChrName: (What's that supposed to mean, sonny?)
engSearchText: (What's that supposed to mean, sonny?)
jpnChrName: （マッタク、他人事だと思って   からかってるね？）
jpnSearchText:
（マッタク、他人事だと思って
からかってるね？）

engChrName: (Go on, scram! Don'tcha got better things to do?)
engSearchText: (Go on, scram! Don'tcha got better things to do?)
jpnChrName: （シッシッ、お前たちはお呼びじゃないんだ。   とっとと帰りな！）
jpnSearchText:
（シッシッ、お前たちはお呼びじゃないんだ。
とっとと帰りな！）

engChrName: (Yeesh... How'd I end up babysitting a bun'cha kids?)
engSearchText: (Yeesh... How'd I end up babysitting a bun'cha kids?)
jpnChrName: （ハァ、どうしてこんな事に   なっちまったんだろうね……）
jpnSearchText:
（ハァ、どうしてこんな事に
なっちまったんだろうね……）

engChrName: (Well, whatever. I'll just ramble on for a bit and send 'em home.)
engSearchText:
(Well, whatever. I'll just ramble on for a bit and send
'em home.)
jpnChrName: （まあいいさ、今日は適当に話して   程々で店に帰らせてもらうよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあいいさ、今日は適当に話して
程々で店に帰らせてもらうよ。）

engChrName: Bah. Radio and the rags are all sayin' the same things.
engSearchText: Bah. Radio and the rags are all sayin' the same things.
jpnChrName: ったく、ラジオでもニュース誌でも 似たような話ばかりだねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、ラジオでもニュース誌でも
似たような話ばかりだねぇ……

engChrName: Just nothin' else going on. Them politicians had better not be sittin' on their asses and twiddlin' their thumbs.
engSearchText:
Just nothin' else going on. Them politicians had
better not be sittin' on their asses and
twiddlin' their thumbs.
jpnChrName: あれからロクな発表もないじゃないかい。 政治家どもが平和ボケしてんじゃないだろうね。
jpnSearchText:
あれからロクな発表もないじゃないかい。
政治家どもが平和ボケしてんじゃないだろうね。

engChrName: Guess they did do the state of emergency, at least. You young'uns be careful out there, got it?
engSearchText:
Guess they did do the state of emergency, at least.
You young'uns be careful out there, got it?
jpnChrName: ……ま、一応非常事態宣言が出てるんだ。 お前たちも気を付けな。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、一応非常事態宣言が出てるんだ。
お前たちも気を付けな。

engChrName: We will, thank you.
engSearchText: We will, thank you.
jpnChrName: はい、お気遣いありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: はい、お気遣いありがとうございます。

engChrName: And you, new girl. You stand out in those clothes! Don't go showin' off too much skin!
engSearchText:
And you, new girl. You stand out in those clothes!
Don't go showin' off too much skin!
jpnChrName: そっちの新顔も、あんまり 目立った事をするんじゃないよ！
jpnSearchText:
そっちの新顔も、あんまり
目立った事をするんじゃないよ！

engChrName: Err, me?! Umm, right!
engSearchText: Err, me?! Umm, right!
jpnChrName: へっ！？　え、ええ…… もちろん分かってるわよっ！
jpnSearchText:
へっ！？　え、ええ……
もちろん分かってるわよっ！

engChrName: (Scared the pants off me for a second there—I thought she figured me out!)
engSearchText:
(Scared the pants off me for a second there—I
thought she figured me out!)
jpnChrName: （ババ、バレてないわよね？   一瞬ビビっちゃったじゃないのっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（ババ、バレてないわよね？
一瞬ビビっちゃったじゃないのっ！）

engChrName: (Don't go spacin' out on me, miss A-lister.)
engSearchText: (Don't go spacin' out on me, miss A-lister.)
jpnChrName: （オイオイ……   ボーっとしてんなよ、名女優。）
jpnSearchText:
（オイオイ……
ボーっとしてんなよ、名女優。）

engChrName: Government's draggin' their feet and their knuckles, as usual. Maybe all the peace made 'em forget how to run things.
engSearchText:
Government's draggin' their feet and their knuckles,
as usual. Maybe all the peace made 'em forget how to
run things.
jpnChrName: ちっとも進展がありゃしない── 軍も政治家どもも平和ボケしてんじゃないだろうね。
jpnSearchText:
ちっとも進展がありゃしない──
軍も政治家どもも平和ボケしてんじゃないだろうね。

engChrName: And kids these days, I swear... Bah, whatever. You folks be careful out there, got it?
engSearchText:
And kids these days, I swear... Bah, whatever.
You folks be careful out there, got it?
jpnChrName: ……マッタク、近頃の若いのは…… まあいい、お前たちも気を付けて行きな。
jpnSearchText:
……マッタク、近頃の若いのは……
まあいい、お前たちも気を付けて行きな。

engChrName: The little runt from the church's been followin' me everywhere. Didn't even have the chance to buy groceries 'cause she was tailin' me.
engSearchText:
The little runt from the church's been followin'
me everywhere. Didn't even have the chance to buy
groceries 'cause she was tailin' me.
jpnChrName: 今日は教会の小娘に付きまとわれてね。 夕飯の材料を買い逃しちまったよ。
jpnSearchText:
今日は教会の小娘に付きまとわれてね。
夕飯の材料を買い逃しちまったよ。

engChrName: And I get the feelin' she'll be back tomorrow. What am I gonna do with her...?
engSearchText:
And I get the feelin' she'll be back tomorrow.
What am I gonna do with her...?
jpnChrName: あの調子じゃ明日も来そうだ。 やれやれ、どうしたもんだかねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
あの調子じゃ明日も来そうだ。
やれやれ、どうしたもんだかねぇ……

engChrName: ...Least Brenda's gotten herself sorted out.
engSearchText: ...Least Brenda's gotten herself sorted out.
jpnChrName: ……それはそうと、ブレンダも 少しは吹っ切れたみたいだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……それはそうと、ブレンダも
少しは吹っ切れたみたいだねぇ。

engChrName: Hmph. I've got that other boy to babysit, too, in all likelihood.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I've got that other boy to babysit, too, in
all likelihood.
jpnChrName: フン、あのハナタレのことは アタシも気に掛けておいてやるかね。
jpnSearchText:
フン、あのハナタレのことは
アタシも気に掛けておいてやるかね。

engChrName: Why don'tcha do somethin' about it, Van?
engSearchText: Why don'tcha do somethin' about it, Van?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァン、この子を何とかしておくれ。
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァン、この子を何とかしておくれ。

engChrName: Aww, have a heart, grandma! Just tell them some stories from back in the day or somethin'.
engSearchText:
Aww, have a heart, grandma! Just tell them some
stories from back in the day or somethin'.
jpnChrName: ハハ、たまにはいいんじゃねえか？ 婆さんの身の上話を聞かせるってのもよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、たまにはいいんじゃねえか？
婆さんの身の上話を聞かせるってのもよ。

engChrName: Tch. You like watchin' me suffer, don'tcha? You keep laughin' and I ain't sellin' you candy no more!
engSearchText:
Tch. You like watchin' me suffer, don'tcha? You keep
laughin' and I ain't sellin' you candy no more!
jpnChrName: お前……面白がってるね？ 次からキャンディ売ってやらないよ！
jpnSearchText:
お前……面白がってるね？
次からキャンディ売ってやらないよ！

engChrName: (I can't help but feel like they secretly don't mind each other... Heehee. Vitriol is a funny thing.)
engSearchText:
(I can't help but feel like they secretly don't mind
each other... Heehee. Vitriol is a funny thing.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……   喧嘩するほど何とやら、ですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……
喧嘩するほど何とやら、ですね。）

engChrName: That Victor's a whiny ol' coot. Ain't even broke sixty and he's bellyachin' about his back, the li'l ninny.
engSearchText:
That Victor's a whiny ol' coot. Ain't even broke sixty
and he's bellyachin' about his back, the li'l ninny.
jpnChrName: マッタク、ビクトルもだらしがないねェ。 まだ６０前だってのに腰痛だって？
jpnSearchText:
マッタク、ビクトルもだらしがないねェ。
まだ６０前だってのに腰痛だって？

engChrName: And youngsters these days are all so lazy. It's all cars and trains and 'public transportation' for them!
engSearchText:
And youngsters these days are all so lazy. It's all cars
and trains and 'public transportation' for them!
jpnChrName: そもそも近頃の若いのはたるんでるよ。 どこに行くにも車だの地下鉄だの。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも近頃の若いのはたるんでるよ。
どこに行くにも車だの地下鉄だの。

engChrName: Back in my day, we walked and we liked it! Was good exercise and you didn't need no road or subway line to get where you wanted.
engSearchText:
Back in my day, we walked and we liked it! Was good
exercise and you didn't need no road or subway line to
get where you wanted.
jpnChrName: アタシの若い頃は皆もっと歩いていたもんさ。 ６区でも１区でもね。
jpnSearchText:
アタシの若い頃は皆もっと歩いていたもんさ。
６区でも１区でもね。

engChrName: Oh, sure, lemme just walk to Vantail from here. Not impractical at all when a car can get me there in minutes.
engSearchText:
Oh, sure, lemme just walk to Vantail from here.
Not impractical at all when a car can get me there
in minutes.
jpnChrName: １区は流石に遠いだろ…… ……それに車にはロマンってもんがだな。
jpnSearchText:
１区は流石に遠いだろ……
……それに車にはロマンってもんがだな。

engChrName: You kids and your cars... Bah! Bun'cha softie drivel turnin' yer legs to mush.
engSearchText:
You kids and your cars... Bah! Bun'cha softie drivel
turnin' yer legs to mush.
jpnChrName: ハン！　またそれかい。 全く理解できないね。
jpnSearchText:
ハン！　またそれかい。
全く理解できないね。

engChrName: You keep drivin' everywhere and the kids'll be able to outrun you.
engSearchText:
You keep drivin' everywhere and the kids'll be able to
outrun you.
jpnChrName: ……そのうちお前たちの足が 退化しやしないか、あたしゃ心配だよ。
jpnSearchText:
……そのうちお前たちの足が
退化しやしないか、あたしゃ心配だよ。

engChrName: ...You, in the maid getup.
engSearchText: ...You, in the maid getup.
jpnChrName: ……………………………… そこのメイド服の子、あんた……
jpnSearchText:
………………………………
そこのメイド服の子、あんた……

engChrName: Look, grandma, it's not what you think.
engSearchText: Look, grandma, it's not what you think.
jpnChrName: ──まあ待て婆さん、これは そういう話じゃねえからな？
jpnSearchText:
──まあ待て婆さん、これは
そういう話じゃねえからな？

engChrName: I ain't said nothin' yet! Shut your trap!
engSearchText: I ain't said nothin' yet! Shut your trap!
jpnChrName: まだ何も言ってないよ！！　マッタク……
jpnSearchText: まだ何も言ってないよ！！　マッタク……

engChrName: I just see her cleanin' out here in the mornin', so I wanted to chat with her a bit.
engSearchText:
I just see her cleanin' out here in the mornin', so I
wanted to chat with her a bit.
jpnChrName: アタシはただ、よく早朝から掃除しているのを 見かけるから話を聞きたかっただけさね。
jpnSearchText:
アタシはただ、よく早朝から掃除しているのを
見かけるから話を聞きたかっただけさね。

engChrName: Oh, that's simply an old habit of mine. Please, pay me no mind.
engSearchText:
Oh, that's simply an old habit of mine. Please, pay me
no mind.
jpnChrName: ふふ、以前より習慣にしておりまして。 大したことでは……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、以前より習慣にしておりまして。
大したことでは……

engChrName: I hold your own routine in much higher regard, Ms. Gin. Your professionalism and diligence is truly inspiring.
engSearchText:
I hold your own routine in much higher regard,
Ms. Gin. Your professionalism and diligence is
truly inspiring.
jpnChrName: それよりギン様も毎朝お早い仕事始めで。 その凛とした佇まい──尊敬申し上げております。
jpnSearchText:
それよりギン様も毎朝お早い仕事始めで。
その凛とした佇まい──尊敬申し上げております。

engChrName: Eh, I've just been doing this for some eighty years. Ain't nothin'.
engSearchText:
Eh, I've just been doing this for some eighty years.
Ain't nothin'.
jpnChrName: なに、あたしゃ８０年やってるってだけさね。 それこそ褒められるほどのものじゃないさ。
jpnSearchText:
なに、あたしゃ８０年やってるってだけさね。
それこそ褒められるほどのものじゃないさ。

engChrName: You sound like you got a good head on yer shoulders, though. Real beauty, too—brings me back to my youth.
engSearchText:
You sound like you got a good head on yer
shoulders, though. Real beauty, too—brings me back
to my youth.
jpnChrName: しかし出来た子だねぇ…… おまけに別嬪で、アタシの若い頃にそっくりさね。
jpnSearchText:
しかし出来た子だねぇ……
おまけに別嬪で、アタシの若い頃にそっくりさね。

engChrName: Your...youth? Such a thing existed? Are we sure she isn't yanking our chains?
engSearchText:
Your...youth? Such a thing existed? Are we sure she
isn't yanking our chains?
jpnChrName: オイオイ、日中から怪談かなんかかよ……！？
jpnSearchText: オイオイ、日中から怪談かなんかかよ……！？

engChrName: ...Anybody else feel a chill just now?
engSearchText: ...Anybody else feel a chill just now?
jpnChrName: ゾゾッ……恐ろしい事を言うなよ、婆さん……
jpnSearchText: ゾゾッ……恐ろしい事を言うなよ、婆さん……

engChrName: QUIET, all of you! Freakin' kids...
engSearchText: QUIET, all of you! Freakin' kids...
jpnChrName: ええい、外野がごちゃごちゃウルサイよ！！
jpnSearchText: ええい、外野がごちゃごちゃウルサイよ！！

engChrName: Heehee...
engSearchText: Heehee...
jpnChrName: クスクス……
jpnSearchText: クスクス……

engChrName: Another...peaceful day in Old Town?
engSearchText: Another...peaceful day in Old Town?
jpnChrName: きょ、今日も平和ですね。
jpnSearchText: きょ、今日も平和ですね。

engChrName: I ain't aged all that gracefully, but I used to be a real looker. They called me the Old Town diva.
engSearchText:
I ain't aged all that gracefully, but I used to be a
real looker. They called me the Old Town diva.
jpnChrName: あたしゃこれでもね、 旧市街のマドンナって呼ばれてたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしゃこれでもね、
旧市街のマドンナって呼ばれてたんだよ。

engChrName: ...I saw that. I ain't pullin' your leg like that Natalia, just so you know!
engSearchText:
...I saw that. I ain't pullin' your leg like that Natalia,
just so you know!
jpnChrName: ……今ウサン臭そうな顔をしたね？ 言っておくがナターリャの小娘とは違うんだよ！！
jpnSearchText:
……今ウサン臭そうな顔をしたね？
言っておくがナターリャの小娘とは違うんだよ！！

engChrName: So, if Paulette's the diva now...
engSearchText: So, if Paulette's the diva now...
jpnChrName: 今はポーレットさんが “まどんな”だそうなので……
jpnSearchText:
今はポーレットさんが
“まどんな”だそうなので……

engChrName: ...then that makes you the original one, right?
engSearchText: ...then that makes you the original one, right?
jpnChrName: 婆様は“元祖まどんな”ですねっ！
jpnSearchText: 婆様は“元祖まどんな”ですねっ！

engChrName: ...Heh. Your girls are all sweethearts. Shame about the rest of you.
engSearchText:
...Heh. Your girls are all sweethearts. Shame about
the rest of you.
jpnChrName: ……娘たちは素直で いい子ばかりなんだがねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
……娘たちは素直で
いい子ばかりなんだがねぇ……

engChrName: Ouch, haha.
engSearchText: Ouch, haha.
jpnChrName: ハハ、当てつけはやめてくれや。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、当てつけはやめてくれや。

engChrName: Now then...what do I make for dinner tonight? Could always do curry...
engSearchText:
Now then...what do I make for dinner tonight?
Could always do curry...
jpnChrName: さて、今晩はカレーにでもするかねぇ。
jpnSearchText: さて、今晩はカレーにでもするかねぇ。

engChrName: ...What? You ain't getting none of it. I like my curry spicy.
engSearchText:
...What? You ain't getting none of it. I like my
curry spicy.
jpnChrName: ……なんだい、お前にゃやらないよ。 アタシは辛口なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……なんだい、お前にゃやらないよ。
アタシは辛口なんだ。

engChrName: That's okay, I never asked.
engSearchText: That's okay, I never asked.
jpnChrName: いや、そもそも頼んでねーからな？
jpnSearchText: いや、そもそも頼んでねーからな？

engChrName: Heard the film festival over in Messeldam got called off for terror threats...and then the killings over in Langport. It's just despicable, all of it.
engSearchText:
Heard the film festival over in Messeldam got called
off for terror threats...and then the killings over
in Langport. It's just despicable, all of it.
jpnChrName: メッセルダム映画祭はテロ予告で中止── ラングポートでの殺人事件ってのも酷い話じゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダム映画祭はテロ予告で中止──
ラングポートでの殺人事件ってのも酷い話じゃないか。

engChrName: How long's it gonna take for these stupid dogs to stop barkin'?
engSearchText:
How long's it gonna take for these stupid dogs to
stop barkin'?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、いつになっても 平和にはならないモンだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、いつになっても
平和にはならないモンだねぇ。

engChrName: You headin' out? The weather's supposed to get bad today, so bundle up.
engSearchText:
You headin' out? The weather's supposed to get bad
today, so bundle up.
jpnChrName: ──出かけるのかい？ 今日は天気が崩れそうだ、気に留めておきな。
jpnSearchText:
──出かけるのかい？
今日は天気が崩れそうだ、気に留めておきな。

engChrName: Thank you! See you later, Ms. Gin!
engSearchText: Thank you! See you later, Ms. Gin!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます。 行ってきますね、ギン婆さん！
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます。
行ってきますね、ギン婆さん！

engChrName: Roger that, ma'am!
engSearchText: Roger that, ma'am!
jpnChrName: はい（ウーラ）ですっ、お婆さん！
jpnSearchText: はい（ウーラ）ですっ、お婆さん！

engChrName: Heh. When a shriveled old spinster's telling you the weather's bad, that's how you KNOW it's bad.
engSearchText:
Heh. When a shriveled old spinster's telling you the
weather's bad, that's how you KNOW it's bad.
jpnChrName: クク、妖怪ババアが言うと 説得力があんな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、妖怪ババアが言うと
説得力があんな。

engChrName: Hey! I may be old, but I can still kick yer ass, brat! Now beat it!
engSearchText:
Hey! I may be old, but I can still kick yer ass, brat!
Now beat it!
jpnChrName: 誰が妖怪だい！　このクソガキが！！
jpnSearchText: 誰が妖怪だい！　このクソガキが！！

engChrName: Pick your fights, man. Let's just go.
engSearchText: Pick your fights, man. Let's just go.
jpnChrName: 面倒くせえから絡むな、行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: 面倒くせえから絡むな、行くぞ。

engChrName: Victor's really come into his own across the street, here.
engSearchText:
Victor's really come into his own across the
street, here.
jpnChrName: ビクトルも立派になって、 いい店を持ったもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ビクトルも立派になって、
いい店を持ったもんだよ。

engChrName: Wish he wouldn't run that big mouth of his so much, but I like how he's kept true to himself. It all tastes the same as it did decades ago.
engSearchText:
Wish he wouldn't run that big mouth of his so much,
but I like how he's kept true to himself. It all tastes
the same as it did decades ago.
jpnChrName: ちょいと小ウルサイのが玉にキズだけどね。 昔から変わらない味を出すってのがいい。
jpnSearchText:
ちょいと小ウルサイのが玉にキズだけどね。
昔から変わらない味を出すってのがいい。

engChrName: Used to be a li'l brat like you, actually. But he's grown up, now that he's got a good family.
engSearchText:
Used to be a li'l brat like you, actually. But he's grown
up, now that he's got a good family.
jpnChrName: お前とそう変わらないハナタレ小僧だったが…… ま、いい家族も持って幸せなんじゃないかい？
jpnSearchText:
お前とそう変わらないハナタレ小僧だったが……
ま、いい家族も持って幸せなんじゃないかい？

engChrName: Cops ain't found nothin' new on the mafia? The hell're we givin' 'em our tax mira for?
engSearchText:
Cops ain't found nothin' new on the mafia?
The hell're we givin' 'em our tax mira for?
jpnChrName: 結局、マフィアどもの続報はナシかい。 ……マッタク警察も情けないねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
結局、マフィアどもの続報はナシかい。
……マッタク警察も情けないねぇ。

engChrName: ...Y'know.
engSearchText: ...Y'know.
jpnChrName: それにしても──
jpnSearchText: それにしても──

engChrName: For a lone wolf 20-something, you've got an awfully young assistant, there.
engSearchText:
For a lone wolf 20-something, you've got an awfully
young assistant, there.
jpnChrName: あの一匹狼を気取ってたハナタレ小僧が 助手を取るなんざ、おかしいと思っちゃいたが……
jpnSearchText:
あの一匹狼を気取ってたハナタレ小僧が
助手を取るなんざ、おかしいと思っちゃいたが……

engChrName: And now yer draggin' a kid around, too? You'd better explain yourself, or I'm ringin' your ass up.
engSearchText:
And now yer draggin' a kid around, too? You'd better
explain yourself, or I'm ringin' your ass up.
jpnChrName: 次はいよいよ子供までかい。 ──何かあったら通報するからね。
jpnSearchText:
次はいよいよ子供までかい。
──何かあったら通報するからね。

engChrName: Okay, I, uhh...heh. I can tell you that's NOT what it is. You're misunderstanding, Gin.
engSearchText:
Okay, I, uhh...heh. I can tell you that's NOT what
it is. You're misunderstanding, Gin.
jpnChrName: ハハハ、婆さんよ…… なんか誤解があるみてえだな？
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、婆さんよ……
なんか誤解があるみてえだな？

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: えっと……？
jpnSearchText: えっと……？

engChrName: Let's, umm... Let's move on from this topic, shall we?
engSearchText: Let's, umm... Let's move on from this topic, shall we?
jpnChrName: と、とりあえず私たちは 気にしないでおきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
と、とりあえず私たちは
気にしないでおきましょうか。

engChrName: I've got my eye on you... You do anything funny, they're throwin' your ass in the clink.
engSearchText:
I've got my eye on you... You do anything funny,
they're throwin' your ass in the clink.
jpnChrName: ハナタレ小僧が…… 何かあったら通報するからね。
jpnSearchText:
ハナタレ小僧が……
何かあったら通報するからね。

engChrName: I'm gonna have to clear this up with you later.
engSearchText: I'm gonna have to clear this up with you later.
jpnChrName: 婆さんとは一度白黒付けねえとな……
jpnSearchText: 婆さんとは一度白黒付けねえとな……

engChrName: Hmph. Meet me at the bowling alley and then we'll talk.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Meet me at the bowling alley and then
we'll talk.
jpnChrName: ハン、ボウリングなら受けて立つよ！
jpnSearchText: ハン、ボウリングなら受けて立つよ！

engChrName: (Another peaceful day in Old Town...)
engSearchText: (Another peaceful day in Old Town...)
jpnChrName: （旧市街は今日も平和ですね……）
jpnSearchText: （旧市街は今日も平和ですね……）

engChrName: Huh? Who're you...?
engSearchText: Huh? Who're you...?
jpnChrName: アアン……？
jpnSearchText: アアン……？

engChrName: Oh, just you. Thought I saw someone shady slinkin' around. You done with work for the day?
engSearchText:
Oh, just you. Thought I saw someone shady
slinkin' around. You done with work for the day?
jpnChrName: 妙な人影があった気がしたが……お前たちかい。 フン、そろそろ仕事上がりのようだね。
jpnSearchText:
妙な人影があった気がしたが……お前たちかい。
フン、そろそろ仕事上がりのようだね。

engChrName: I'm about to close up shop, too. I gotta do my shopping for the day.
engSearchText:
I'm about to close up shop, too. I gotta do my
shopping for the day.
jpnChrName: ウチも店じまいの時間だよ。 買い物なら早くしな。
jpnSearchText:
ウチも店じまいの時間だよ。
買い物なら早くしな。

engChrName: When'd it get so late? The sun sets so early now...
engSearchText: When'd it get so late? The sun sets so early now...
jpnChrName: もう夕方かい。 日が暮れるのも早くなったもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
もう夕方かい。
日が暮れるのも早くなったもんだ。

engChrName: I'd best close up soon, too. Gotta get my shoppin' done before it gets too dark.
engSearchText:
I'd best close up soon, too. Gotta get my shoppin'
done before it gets too dark.
jpnChrName: ウチもそろそろ閉める時間だよ。 買い物なら早くしな。
jpnSearchText:
ウチもそろそろ閉める時間だよ。
買い物なら早くしな。

engChrName: Get'cher Tyrell Times, a hundred mira.
engSearchText: Get'cher Tyrell Times, a hundred mira.
jpnChrName: タイレル通信最新号、１００ミラ。
jpnSearchText: タイレル通信最新号、１００ミラ。

engChrName: Hurry yer ass up. I ain't got all day.
engSearchText: Hurry yer ass up. I ain't got all day.
jpnChrName: 早くしな、こっちも暇じゃないんだ。
jpnSearchText: 早くしな、こっちも暇じゃないんだ。

engChrName: *sigh* Always so kind.
engSearchText: *sigh* Always so kind.
jpnChrName: ふう、相変わらず愛想がねえっつーか……
jpnSearchText: ふう、相変わらず愛想がねえっつーか……

engChrName: One copy of the paper...and some candy, I take it?
engSearchText: One copy of the paper...and some candy, I take it?
jpnChrName: タイレル通信を１部と──あとヴァンさんは キャンディも買っていきますよね……？
jpnSearchText:
タイレル通信を１部と──あとヴァンさんは
キャンディも買っていきますよね……？

engChrName: Oh, would you happen to have any new flavors, ma'am?
engSearchText:
Oh, would you happen to have any new
flavors, ma'am?
jpnChrName: すみませんお婆さん、 なにか新味って出てませんか？
jpnSearchText:
すみませんお婆さん、
なにか新味って出てませんか？

engChrName: ...Matter of fact, I do. Melon soda flavor.
engSearchText: ...Matter of fact, I do. Melon soda flavor.
jpnChrName: ……あるよ、メロンソーダ味。
jpnSearchText: ……あるよ、メロンソーダ味。

engChrName: The he—you readin' my mind?!
engSearchText: The he—you readin' my mind?!
jpnChrName: ってオイ！　いつの間に俺の 新味チェック（ル　ー　テ　ィ　ー　ン）を把握してやがる！？
jpnSearchText:
ってオイ！　いつの間に俺の
新味チェック（ル　ー　テ　ィ　ー　ン）を把握してやがる！？

engChrName: E-Err, hardly, haha! It's just a habit I picked up on. Should I...not have?
engSearchText:
E-Err, hardly, haha! It's just a habit I picked up on.
Should I...not have?
jpnChrName: あはは、見ていたら分かるというか。 もしかして、ご迷惑でしたか……？
jpnSearchText:
あはは、見ていたら分かるというか。
もしかして、ご迷惑でしたか……？

engChrName: Uhh... Well, no, that ain't the problem.
engSearchText: Uhh... Well, no, that ain't the problem.
jpnChrName: そういう話じゃなくてだな……
jpnSearchText: そういう話じゃなくてだな……

engChrName: Hey, quit yer yowlin' and buy somethin', already!
engSearchText: Hey, quit yer yowlin' and buy somethin', already!
jpnChrName: ええい、何をゴチャゴチャ言ってるんだい！ 買うならとっととしな……！
jpnSearchText:
ええい、何をゴチャゴチャ言ってるんだい！
買うならとっととしな……！

engChrName: Sorry, sorry!
engSearchText: Sorry, sorry!
jpnChrName: す、すみません……
jpnSearchText: す、すみません……

engChrName: Ain't gotta tell me twice.
engSearchText: Ain't gotta tell me twice.
jpnChrName: へいへい、そうさせてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、そうさせてもらうとするか。

engChrName: ...You better not make that lady cry, sonny.
engSearchText: ...You better not make that lady cry, sonny.
jpnChrName: ……………………………… あまり若い女を泣かせるんじゃないよ？
jpnSearchText:
………………………………
あまり若い女を泣かせるんじゃないよ？

engChrName: Look, we're not like that, okay?
engSearchText: Look, we're not like that, okay?
jpnChrName: 言っとくがそういう話じゃねえからな？
jpnSearchText: 言っとくがそういう話じゃねえからな？

engChrName: (I think she has the wrong idea...)
engSearchText: (I think she has the wrong idea...)
jpnChrName: （あははは……   何か誤解されているような……？）
jpnSearchText:
（あははは……
何か誤解されているような……？）

engChrName: Well, whatever. I don't have all day, so get to it.
engSearchText: Well, whatever. I don't have all day, so get to it.
jpnChrName: まあいい、こっちも暇じゃないんだ。
jpnSearchText: まあいい、こっちも暇じゃないんだ。

engChrName: Hell are you two yowlin' about? I ain't got all day, buy somethin'!
engSearchText:
Hell are you two yowlin' about? I ain't got all day,
buy somethin'!
jpnChrName: ゴチャゴチャ言ってないで 買うならとっととしな……！
jpnSearchText:
ゴチャゴチャ言ってないで
買うならとっととしな……！

engChrName: I'll have the usual, please. If you got any new flavors, I'll take some of those.
engSearchText:
I'll have the usual, please. If you got any new flavors,
I'll take some of those.
jpnChrName: よおバアさん、いつもの頼むわ。 ──新味が出てたらそいつも追加な。
jpnSearchText:
よおバアさん、いつもの頼むわ。
──新味が出てたらそいつも追加な。

engChrName: Listen here.
engSearchText: Listen here.
jpnChrName: アアン……？
jpnSearchText: <S5>アアン……？

engChrName: I run a tobacco joint! You hear me? To-BACCO! All you buy is yer damn candies and paper! Buy somethin' else, already!
engSearchText:
I run a tobacco joint! You hear me? To-BACCO! All
you buy is yer damn candies and paper! Buy
somethin' else, already!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、お前はいつもキャンディばかりだね。 ウチはタバコ屋だよ、タバコを買いな！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、お前はいつもキャンディばかりだね。
ウチはタバコ屋だよ、タバコを買いな！

engChrName: Not my fault I don't smoke, ma'am. Now, what else do I need...?
engSearchText:
Not my fault I don't smoke, ma'am. Now, what else
do I need...?
jpnChrName: つっても俺は吸わねえしな。 ……他に必要なモンはと……
jpnSearchText:
つっても俺は吸わねえしな。
……他に必要なモンはと……

engChrName: You listen to me when I'm talkin' to you! Freakin' kids these days...!
engSearchText:
You listen to me when I'm talkin' to you!
Freakin' kids these days...!
jpnChrName: 年寄りの話を流すんじゃないよ！ マッタクこの子は……！
jpnSearchText:
年寄りの話を流すんじゃないよ！
マッタクこの子は……！

engChrName: Well...hmm. (Are they always like this?)
engSearchText:
Well...hmm.
(Are they always like this?)
jpnChrName: あ、あはは…… （いつもこんな調子なのかな……？）
jpnSearchText:
あ、あはは……
（いつもこんな調子なのかな……？）

engChrName: You workin' with him? ...Whatever. Just make sure you do the job right.
engSearchText:
You workin' with him? ...Whatever. Just make sure
you do the job right.
jpnChrName: そっちは依頼人かい？ ……ま、何だっていいがしっかり働いてきな。
jpnSearchText:
そっちは依頼人かい？
……ま、何だっていいがしっかり働いてきな。

engChrName: No work, no eat! That's how it goes.
engSearchText: No work, no eat! That's how it goes.
jpnChrName: 働かざる者食うべからずだよ！
jpnSearchText: 働かざる者食うべからずだよ！

engChrName: I know, I know. No time to slack off when you're self-employed.
engSearchText:
I know, I know. No time to slack off when
you're self-employed.
jpnChrName: へいへい、今日も勤労に励むとするかね。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、今日も勤労に励むとするかね。

engChrName: Thank you. I'll make sure to do my best work!
engSearchText: Thank you. I'll make sure to do my best work!
jpnChrName: あはは…… どうかよろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
どうかよろしくお願いします。

engChrName: I-It's like time just stopped... I didn't wanna go outside to look, but...
engSearchText:
I-It's like time just stopped... I didn't wanna go
outside to look, but...
jpnChrName: じ、時空の停止……気になりすぎて 少しだけ外に出ちゃったけど……
jpnSearchText:
じ、時空の停止……気になりすぎて
少しだけ外に出ちゃったけど……

engChrName: ...this is blowing my mind. I think I'm...I'm too curious to be scared of the outside! Just what IS this phenomenon?
engSearchText:
...this is blowing my mind. I think I'm...I'm too
curious to be scared of the outside! Just what IS
this phenomenon?
jpnChrName: 無我夢中であんまり怖くなかったっていうか…… ……物理現象の方が興味深すぎて……
jpnSearchText:
無我夢中であんまり怖くなかったっていうか……
……物理現象の方が興味深すぎて……

engChrName: N-No, I can't get distracted! I have to try and help!
engSearchText: N-No, I can't get distracted! I have to try and help!
jpnChrName: って今はそれどころじゃないよね…… 何とかできないか、探ってみないと……
jpnSearchText:
って今はそれどころじゃないよね……
何とかできないか、探ってみないと……

engChrName: Huh? I can't use the orbal net, but the network says I'm still connected...
engSearchText:
Huh? I can't use the orbal net, but the network says
I'm still connected...
jpnChrName: あれ？　導力ネットは使えないけど 基本プロトコルは生きてるみたい……？
jpnSearchText:
あれ？　導力ネットは使えないけど
基本プロトコルは生きてるみたい……？

engChrName: Networks aren't really my field, but I'll take a look and see if I can figure something out.
engSearchText:
Networks aren't really my field, but I'll take a look
and see if I can figure something out.
jpnChrName: あんまり専門じゃないけど、 ちょっと探ってみる……！
jpnSearchText:
あんまり専門じゃないけど、
ちょっと探ってみる……！

engChrName: Got'cha, thanks. Best of luck.
engSearchText: Got'cha, thanks. Best of luck.
jpnChrName: そうか……よろしく頼んだぜ！
jpnSearchText: そうか……よろしく頼んだぜ！

engChrName: Be careful out there!
engSearchText: Be careful out there!
jpnChrName: くれぐれも無理はしないで下さいね！
jpnSearchText: くれぐれも無理はしないで下さいね！

engChrName: I can't use the orbal net, but the network itself says I still have a connection...
engSearchText:
I can't use the orbal net, but the network itself says I
still have a connection...
jpnChrName: 導力ネットは使えないけど 基本プロトコルは生きてるみたい……？
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットは使えないけど
基本プロトコルは生きてるみたい……？

engChrName: There was this weird transmission I got, right before everything went all screwy—like someone overrode the network or something...
engSearchText:
There was this weird transmission I got, right before
everything went all screwy—like someone overrode
the network or something...
jpnChrName: そういえば異変の前に ヘンな通信が強制介入してたし……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば異変の前に
ヘンな通信が強制介入してたし……

engChrName: This isn't my area of expertise, but I'll take a look and see what I can do. If there's anything else I can help with, let me know!
engSearchText:
This isn't my area of expertise, but I'll take a look and
see what I can do. If there's anything else I can help
with, let me know!
jpnChrName: 専門じゃないけどちょっと探ってみる……！ 他にもできる事があったら言ってね！
jpnSearchText:
専門じゃないけどちょっと探ってみる……！
他にもできる事があったら言ってね！

engChrName: Whoa, this... This clock here goes all the way back to the middle ages! It's got a lot of parts missing, but...
engSearchText:
Whoa, this... This clock here goes all the way back to
the middle ages! It's got a lot of parts missing, but...
jpnChrName: こ、これは中世のカラクリ時計……！ 大半のパーツが失われてるけど……
jpnSearchText:
こ、これは中世のカラクリ時計……！
大半のパーツが失われてるけど……

engChrName: ...Heh heh. I think I can fix you up. You sit tight, my antique little friend! ♪
engSearchText:
...Heh heh. I think I can fix you up. You sit tight, my
antique little friend! ♪
jpnChrName: でへ、でへへへ…… だいじょ～ぶ、わたしがなおしてあげるからぁ～♪
jpnSearchText:
でへ、でへへへ……
だいじょ～ぶ、わたしがなおしてあげるからぁ～♪

engChrName: (Go figure she'd find somethin' completely unrelated to the festival. Not knockin' it, though.)
engSearchText:
(Go figure she'd find somethin' completely unrelated
to the festival. Not knockin' it, though.)
jpnChrName: （祭りに沸く世間とは   全く関係ねえが、幸せそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（祭りに沸く世間とは
全く関係ねえが、幸せそうだな。）

engChrName: (She does march to the beat of her own drum.)
engSearchText: (She does march to the beat of her own drum.)
jpnChrName: （実にレベッカさんらしいですよね……）
jpnSearchText: （実にレベッカさんらしいですよね……）

engChrName: (Wow, she's really having fun!)
engSearchText: (Wow, she's really having fun!)
jpnChrName: （はいっ、とっても楽しそうです！）
jpnSearchText: （はいっ、とっても楽しそうです！）

engChrName: (Why make friends with real people when you can cozy up to a clock?)
engSearchText:
(Why make friends with real people when you can
cozy up to a clock?)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、引きこもりらしくていいんじゃね？）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、引きこもりらしくていいんじゃね？）

engChrName: (Fulfillment takes many forms... Heehee. I'm happy for her.)
engSearchText:
(Fulfillment takes many forms... Heehee. I'm happy
for her.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、幸せの形は人それぞれ……   レベッカ様らしくていいと思います。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ、幸せの形は人それぞれ……
レベッカ様らしくていいと思います。）

engChrName: (I remember that same giddiness from when I showed her XEROS... Well, there's nothing wrong with being passionate, I suppose.)
engSearchText:
(I remember that same giddiness from when I showed
her XEROS... Well, there's nothing wrong with
being passionate, I suppose.)
jpnChrName: （この前ＸＥＲＯＳを見せてあげた時も   同じ笑い声を漏らしてたかな……まあいいけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（この前ＸＥＲＯＳを見せてあげた時も
同じ笑い声を漏らしてたかな……まあいいけど。）

engChrName: (Quite the interesting lass... She'd make a good character study, I think!)
engSearchText:
(Quite the interesting lass... She'd make a good
character study, I think!)
jpnChrName: （かなり独特な子よね……   役作りの参考になるかも……）
jpnSearchText:
（かなり独特な子よね……
役作りの参考になるかも……）

engChrName: (She appears to be in a world of her own. It would be best not interrupt her.)
engSearchText:
(She appears to be in a world of her own. It would be
best not interrupt her.)
jpnChrName: （フフ、邪魔をせぬよう   用件は手早く済ませるとしようか。）
jpnSearchText:
（フフ、邪魔をせぬよう
用件は手早く済ませるとしようか。）

engChrName: Now this is the stuff! Antiques! Rare parts! Supremity! JUSTICE! I want ALL the techies!
engSearchText:
Now this is the stuff! Antiques! Rare parts!
Supremity! JUSTICE! I want ALL the techies!
jpnChrName: レアパーツ！！　至高！！　正義！！ 早く触りたい……！！
jpnSearchText:
レアパーツ！！　至高！！　正義！！
早く触りたい……！！

engChrName: She, uhh... Think she mighta forgotten how to speak.
engSearchText: She, uhh... Think she mighta forgotten how to speak.
jpnChrName: うん、興奮のあまり 片言になってんな？
jpnSearchText:
うん、興奮のあまり
片言になってんな？

engChrName: Kaina dropped by recently, and we got to catch up for a little while.
engSearchText:
Kaina dropped by recently, and we got to catch up for
a little while.
jpnChrName: この前カイナが来てくれてね、 ゆっくり話ができたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
この前カイナが来てくれてね、
ゆっくり話ができたんだけど……

engChrName: Now that things have finally settled down, she's continuing her studies over at Sylvie's place.
engSearchText:
Now that things have finally settled down, she's
continuing her studies over at Sylvie's place.
jpnChrName: やっと落ち着いて、シルヴィさんの所で 本格的な修行も始めたみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
やっと落ち着いて、シルヴィさんの所で
本格的な修行も始めたみたいで……

engChrName: I'm glad for her... She really is strong willed.
engSearchText: I'm glad for her... She really is strong willed.
jpnChrName: ……良かった…… カイナ、強くていい子……
jpnSearchText:
……良かった……
カイナ、強くていい子……

engChrName: I'd love to go and visit her, but umm...umm...
engSearchText: I'd love to go and visit her, but umm...umm...
jpnChrName: よ、様子を見に行きたい気もするけど……
jpnSearchText: よ、様子を見に行きたい気もするけど……

engChrName: I-I can't. Not outside... *sigh* I'm such a mess.
engSearchText: I-I can't. Not outside... *sigh* I'm such a mess.
jpnChrName: 外は怖いし…… ……はぁ、私ってやっぱりダメダメ……
jpnSearchText:
外は怖いし……
……はぁ、私ってやっぱりダメダメ……

engChrName: Kaina's such a strong girl...
engSearchText: Kaina's such a strong girl...
jpnChrName: カイナ、強くていい子……
jpnSearchText: カイナ、強くていい子……

engChrName: She handles the outside just fine... *sigh* But then look at me.
engSearchText:
She handles the outside just fine... *sigh* But then
look at me.
jpnChrName: それに比べて私って…… ……はぁ、でも外は怖いし……
jpnSearchText:
それに比べて私って……
……はぁ、でも外は怖いし……

engChrName: Well, u-um... According to my calculations, it was SUPPOSED to be safe outside, but...
engSearchText:
Well, u-um... According to my calculations, it was
SUPPOSED to be safe outside, but...
jpnChrName: もしかしたら無事かもって…… いっぱい調べたし、確率も計算したけど……
jpnSearchText:
もしかしたら無事かもって……
いっぱい調べたし、確率も計算したけど……

engChrName: ...but I never expected something like this. Just, why...?
engSearchText:
...but I never expected something like this. Just,
why...?
jpnChrName: …………っ…………… ホントにこんなコワイ事、起きるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
…………っ……………
ホントにこんなコワイ事、起きるなんて……
