engChrName: *sniffle* What do I say to her...after that? I just... I don't know what to do...
engSearchText:
*sniffle* What do I say to her...after that? I just...
I don't know what to do...
jpnChrName: カイナにもなんて……声掛けたらいいのか…… ……グス、もう分かんないよっ………
jpnSearchText:
カイナにもなんて……声掛けたらいいのか……
……グス、もう分かんないよっ………

engChrName: I think about the Basel Institute a lot... How cool it would be to study there.
engSearchText:
I think about the Basel Institute a lot... How cool it
would be to study there.
jpnChrName: バーゼル大にはずっと前から行きたくて…… ……何度も考えたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル大にはずっと前から行きたくて……
……何度も考えたんだけど……

engChrName: I wish I could just pack my bags and go right now... but then I'd have to SEE people and TALK to them and... And...
engSearchText:
I wish I could just pack my bags and go right now...
but then I'd have to SEE people and TALK to
them and... And...
jpnChrName: すごく行きたいのに、周りの人と うまくやっていかないとって思うと……
jpnSearchText:
すごく行きたいのに、周りの人と
うまくやっていかないとって思うと……

engChrName: Gaaah, it's not happening! Just thinking about it makes me wanna curl up and hide!
engSearchText:
Gaaah, it's not happening! Just thinking about it
makes me wanna curl up and hide!
jpnChrName: ううっ、やっぱり考えただけで無理………
jpnSearchText: ううっ、やっぱり考えただけで無理………

engChrName: These materials... The orbal system... What's all this for...?
engSearchText:
These materials... The orbal system... What's all this
for...?
jpnChrName: あの素材……導力系統…… ぶつぶつ、一体どうなってるの……
jpnSearchText:
あの素材……導力系統……
ぶつぶつ、一体どうなってるの……

engChrName: Shard tech is one thing, but LOOK at this! An honest-to-goodness mech! In front of my very eyes!
engSearchText:
Shard tech is one thing, but LOOK at this!
An honest-to-goodness mech! In front of my
very eyes!
jpnChrName: シャード技術も面白かったけど、 ………メカ………生体メカ………！！
jpnSearchText:
シャード技術も面白かったけど、
………メカ………生体メカ………！！

engChrName: This is so exciti—gah?! E-Ew, why is my nose bleeding?!
engSearchText:
This is so exciti—gah?! E-Ew, why is my
nose bleeding?!
jpnChrName: ゴフッ……こ、興奮したら鼻血が──！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>ゴフッ……こ、興奮したら鼻血が──！？

engChrName: Whoa! Easy there. Don't get too worked up, now.
engSearchText: Whoa! Easy there. Don't get too worked up, now.
jpnChrName: おいおい、大丈夫かよ？ 大分混乱してるみてえだが……
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、大丈夫かよ？
大分混乱してるみてえだが……

engChrName: Well...would you be interested in taking a look at FIO and XEROS, perhaps? I wouldn't mind.
engSearchText:
Well...would you be interested in taking a look at
FIO and XEROS, perhaps? I wouldn't mind.
jpnChrName: えっと、ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳに興味があるなら 今度連れてきましょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳに興味があるなら
今度連れてきましょうか……？

engChrName: R-Really?!
engSearchText: R-Really?!

engChrName: Sure. I imagine I'll be dropping by this store often anyway.
engSearchText:
Sure. I imagine I'll be dropping by this store
often anyway.
jpnChrName: ええ……このお店には僕も 何かとお世話になりそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……このお店には僕も
何かとお世話になりそうですし。

engChrName: (He works with mechs AND he's attractive?! Aidios, give me the strength...!)
engSearchText:
(He works with mechs AND he's attractive?!
Aidios, give me the strength...!)
jpnChrName: （なな、なんていい子……！！   ……しかも美少年……きゅうぅ～……）
jpnSearchText:
（なな、なんていい子……！！
……しかも美少年……きゅうぅ～……）

engChrName: Uhh... Are you okay? You look really woozy. Do you need some water?
engSearchText:
Uhh... Are you okay? You look really woozy. Do you
need some water?
jpnChrName: 今度は意識が飛びそうですけど ホントに大丈夫ですか……？
jpnSearchText:
今度は意識が飛びそうですけど
ホントに大丈夫ですか……？

engChrName: What no vitamin D does to a girl.
engSearchText: What no vitamin D does to a girl.
jpnChrName: ハッ、白目剥いてるが大丈夫かよ？
jpnSearchText: ハッ、白目剥いてるが大丈夫かよ？

engChrName: Ah... I admire your enthusiasm, but I implore you to mind your health.
engSearchText:
Ah... I admire your enthusiasm, but I implore you to
mind your health.
jpnChrName: ふふ……よかったですね、レベッカ様。 どうかお身体もご自愛くださいませ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……よかったですね、レベッカ様。
どうかお身体もご自愛くださいませ。

engChrName: Oh, this is it. Everything's going white...
engSearchText: Oh, this is it. Everything's going white...
jpnChrName: ……い、いけない意識が……
jpnSearchText: ……い、いけない意識が……

engChrName: ...No! Not yet! Not until I get to explore every nook and cranny of those beautiful machines!
engSearchText:
...No! Not yet! Not until I get to explore every nook
and cranny of those beautiful machines!
jpnChrName: まだ、死ぬわけには…… ……あのメカたちを愛でるまでは……っ！
jpnSearchText:
まだ、死ぬわけには……
……あのメカたちを愛でるまでは……っ！

engChrName: That's the spirit, kiddo!
engSearchText: That's the spirit, kiddo!
jpnChrName: ハハ、いつになく根性見せるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、いつになく根性見せるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Whenever something gets me curious, I can look it up on the orbal net.
engSearchText:
Whenever something gets me curious, I can look it
up on the orbal net.
jpnChrName: 知りたい事はこうやって 導力ネットで調べてるの……
jpnSearchText:
知りたい事はこうやって
導力ネットで調べてるの……

engChrName: It's so ridiculously useful! I've got tons and tons of papers and articles all at my fingertips.
engSearchText:
It's so ridiculously useful! I've got tons and tons of
papers and articles all at my fingertips.
jpnChrName: 今は論文だって読めるし、便利だよね…… ふふ、これでどこにも行かなくったって……
jpnSearchText:
今は論文だって読めるし、便利だよね……
ふふ、これでどこにも行かなくったって……

engChrName: But the net doesn't cover everything... Some topics come up that I just can't find any dirt on.
engSearchText:
But the net doesn't cover everything... Some topics
come up that I just can't find any dirt on.
jpnChrName: ……でも……もっと知りたいのに 全然物足りないってことも多くて……
jpnSearchText:
……でも……もっと知りたいのに
全然物足りないってことも多くて……

engChrName: *sigh* There's one article I wish I could learn more about. If only I could ask the author.
engSearchText:
*sigh* There's one article I wish I could learn
more about. If only I could ask the author.
jpnChrName: ……はぁ、論文を書いた人に 直接聞けたらいいのにな………
jpnSearchText:
……はぁ、論文を書いた人に
直接聞けたらいいのにな………

engChrName: WHOA! R-R-R-R-Risette?!
engSearchText: WHOA! R-R-R-R-Risette?!
jpnChrName: リリリ──リゼットひゃん……！
jpnSearchText: <S5>リリリ──リゼットひゃん……！

engChrName: (Wow. She really stuttered there.)
engSearchText: (Wow. She really stuttered there.)
jpnChrName: （あ、噛んだ……）
jpnSearchText: （あ、噛んだ……）

engChrName: (Hey, DJ, your record's broken.)
engSearchText: (Hey, DJ, your record's broken.)
jpnChrName: （クク……噛みやがった。）
jpnSearchText: （クク……噛みやがった。）

engChrName: (Is she...all right?)
engSearchText: (Is she...all right?)
jpnChrName: （噛みましたね……）
jpnSearchText: （噛みましたね……）

engChrName: I much enjoyed our dialogue on applied shard theory. Thank you very much.
engSearchText:
I much enjoyed our dialogue on applied shard theory.
Thank you very much.
jpnChrName: レベッカ様、先日はシャードの応用理論を 熱心に聞いて下さってありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
レベッカ様、先日はシャードの応用理論を
熱心に聞いて下さってありがとうございました。

engChrName: N-N-Not at all! I-I should be thanking you for putting up with all of my questions.
engSearchText:
N-N-Not at all! I-I should be thanking you for
putting up with all of my questions.
jpnChrName: そそ、そんなっ！ こちらこそ根掘り葉掘り質問しちゃって……！
jpnSearchText:
そそ、そんなっ！
こちらこそ根掘り葉掘り質問しちゃって……！

engChrName: Could I, umm... Could I ask you about it some more, some time? There's still some stuff I can't wrap my head around.
engSearchText:
Could I, umm... Could I ask you about it some more,
some time? There's still some stuff I can't wrap my
head around.
jpnChrName: あ、あのう……また話聞いてもいいですか……？ シャードのマクロな挙動がまだ理解しきれてなくて……
jpnSearchText:
あ、あのう……また話聞いてもいいですか……？
シャードのマクロな挙動がまだ理解しきれてなくて……

engChrName: It would be my pleasure. I'll answer whatever questions I can.
engSearchText:
It would be my pleasure. I'll answer whatever
questions I can.
jpnChrName: ええ、私に分かる範囲であれば喜んで。
jpnSearchText: ええ、私に分かる範囲であれば喜んで。

engChrName: (No. Freaking. WAAAAAY, that's AWESOME!)
engSearchText:
(No. Freaking. WAAAAAY, that's
AWESOME!)
jpnChrName: （や、やったあああっ……！！）
jpnSearchText: <S5>（や、やったあああっ……！！）

engChrName: Ain't that nice? It's, uhh...okay to actually voice your excitement, though. Don't have to bottle it up like that.
engSearchText:
Ain't that nice? It's, uhh...okay to actually voice your
excitement, though. Don't have to bottle it up
like that.
jpnChrName: 良かったな。 つーか声出して喜んでもいいんだぞ？
jpnSearchText:
良かったな。
つーか声出して喜んでもいいんだぞ？

engChrName: We do have a Xipha tuning device here, but I don't really know much about applied shard theory.
engSearchText:
We do have a Xipha tuning device here, but I don't
really know much about applied shard theory.
jpnChrName: ザイファの調整装置はウチにもあるけど…… ……シャードの応用理論は詳しくなくて……
jpnSearchText:
ザイファの調整装置はウチにもあるけど……
……シャードの応用理論は詳しくなくて……

engChrName: I want to try and make a shard device all on my own. I'm gonna give myself until, umm...until next week.
engSearchText:
I want to try and make a shard device all on my own.
I'm gonna give myself until, umm...until next week.
jpnChrName: い、いつかシャード関連デバイスが 自作できるようになりたい……できれば来週にでも……
jpnSearchText:
い、いつかシャード関連デバイスが
自作できるようになりたい……できれば来週にでも……

engChrName: Goodness, that's...quick.
engSearchText: Goodness, that's...quick.
jpnChrName: ら、来週……随分早いような……
jpnSearchText: ら、来週……随分早いような……

engChrName: My. If you can deliver a proof-of-concept that quickly, Marduk might have an engineering position in your future.
engSearchText:
My. If you can deliver a proof-of-concept that
quickly, Marduk might have an engineering position
in your future.
jpnChrName: ふふ、もし実現すればＭＫ社の 開発スタッフより優秀かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、もし実現すればＭＫ社の
開発スタッフより優秀かもしれませんね。

engChrName: Kaina's been getting a lot better... She says she might go out to study in Basel.
engSearchText:
Kaina's been getting a lot better... She says she might
go out to study in Basel.
jpnChrName: カイナ、またちょっと腕を上げたみたい…… そのうち修行しにバーゼルに行くかもって……
jpnSearchText:
カイナ、またちょっと腕を上げたみたい……
そのうち修行しにバーゼルに行くかもって……

engChrName: It must be so nice for her to travel like that...
engSearchText: It must be so nice for her to travel like that...
jpnChrName: い、いいな……自由に外に出れるって……
jpnSearchText: い、いいな……自由に外に出れるって……

engChrName: I wish I could be more like her. I just...don't get people. They scare me.
engSearchText:
I wish I could be more like her. I just...don't
get people. They scare me.
jpnChrName: ……わたしには……無理…… だって人間って全然分かんないし、怖い……
jpnSearchText:
……わたしには……無理……
だって人間って全然分かんないし、怖い……

engChrName: If I could just take a step outside... I'd learn about so many new things, meet so many new people...
engSearchText:
If I could just take a step outside... I'd learn about so
many new things, meet so many new people...
jpnChrName: 外出できたら、新しいものに沢山会えるし いいなって思うけど………
jpnSearchText:
外出できたら、新しいものに沢山会えるし
いいなって思うけど………

engChrName: P-People... Gah, no! Happy thoughts! Happy thoughts!
engSearchText:
P-People... Gah, no! Happy thoughts!
Happy thoughts!
jpnChrName: ……わたしには……無理…… ……人間怖いんだもん……
jpnSearchText:
……わたしには……無理……
……人間怖いんだもん……

engChrName: I'm glad Kaina's doing all right.
engSearchText: I'm glad Kaina's doing all right.
jpnChrName: カイナ、元気そうでよかった……
jpnSearchText: カイナ、元気そうでよかった……

engChrName: I love Kaina. She's just adorable, and she makes good stuff, to boot.
engSearchText:
I love Kaina. She's just adorable, and she makes good
stuff, to boot.
jpnChrName: カイナは好き……カワイイし…… いつも手製のお土産くれる……
jpnSearchText:
カイナは好き……カワイイし……
いつも手製のお土産くれる……

engChrName: Ooh, you've got lots of interesting stuff in here. What more will I find once I take you apart? Heh heh heh...
engSearchText:
Ooh, you've got lots of interesting stuff in here.
What more will I find once I take you apart?
Heh heh heh...
jpnChrName: ……このパーツ面白そう、早速分解して…… でへ、でへへへへ…………♪
jpnSearchText:
……このパーツ面白そう、早速分解して……
でへ、でへへへへ…………♪

engChrName: We had too many customers today... I'm out of social points. But they all gave me some really fun jobs.
engSearchText:
We had too many customers today... I'm out of
social points. But they all gave me some really
fun jobs.
jpnChrName: 今日は来客が多くてしんどかったけど…… 直しがいがあって楽しかったなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
今日は来客が多くてしんどかったけど……
直しがいがあって楽しかったなぁ……

engChrName: Somebody brought in this wristwatch that got run over by a car. I pretty much had to rebuild it from scratch.
engSearchText:
Somebody brought in this wristwatch that got run
over by a car. I pretty much had to rebuild it
from scratch.
jpnChrName: 特にあの車に轢かれた腕時計…… ほとんどパーツ自作して組み直しちゃった……
jpnSearchText:
特にあの車に轢かれた腕時計……
ほとんどパーツ自作して組み直しちゃった……

engChrName: I love machines with all the really precise bits... Heh heh.
engSearchText:
I love machines with all the really precise bits...
Heh heh.
jpnChrName: 精密キカイさいこう…… でへ、でへへへ……
jpnSearchText:
精密キカイさいこう……
でへ、でへへへ……

engChrName: Smilin' up a storm, there... You're kinda cute when you're tinkerin' with stuff.
engSearchText:
Smilin' up a storm, there... You're kinda cute when
you're tinkerin' with stuff.
jpnChrName: 相変わらずのメカ愛っつーか。 顔が緩みまくってんな。
jpnSearchText:
相変わらずのメカ愛っつーか。
顔が緩みまくってんな。

engChrName: Wha—don't stare at me like that!
engSearchText: Wha—don't stare at me like that!
jpnChrName: あ、あんまりジロジロみないで…… ……ヴァンのイジワル……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、あんまりジロジロみないで……
……ヴァンのイジワル……！

engChrName: I can't help it... You know how I get when I start tinkering with stuff.
engSearchText:
I can't help it... You know how I get when I start
tinkering with stuff.
jpnChrName: わ、わたしスイッチ入ると ヘンな笑い声が出ちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
わ、わたしスイッチ入ると
ヘンな笑い声が出ちゃって……

engChrName: I said stop staring, you...you jerk! Gah, why can't I just be invisible?!
engSearchText:
I said stop staring, you...you jerk! Gah, why can't I
just be invisible?!
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンのバカ……！ うう、見られたくないよぉ……
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンのバカ……！
うう、見られたくないよぉ……

engChrName: (I can't think straight when there are people around! J-Just stop looking at meee!)
engSearchText:
(I can't think straight when there are people around!
J-Just stop looking at meee!)
jpnChrName: （ひ、人が来てると集中できなくて……   ……うぅ……こっち見ないでぇ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（ひ、人が来てると集中できなくて……
……うぅ……こっち見ないでぇ……！）

engChrName: (I really should clean up my room and move my workstation in there...but I can't even walk on the floor. There's too much junk in there.)
engSearchText:
(I really should clean up my room and move my
workstation in there...but I can't even walk on
the floor. There's too much junk in there.)
jpnChrName: （やっぱり部屋、片付けて作業場移そうかな……   でもジャンクパーツ山積みで入れないくらいだし……）
jpnSearchText:
（やっぱり部屋、片付けて作業場移そうかな……
でもジャンクパーツ山積みで入れないくらいだし……）

engChrName: (I can't even sleep in my own bed... *sniffle* I'm such a wreck...)
engSearchText:
(I can't even sleep in my own bed... *sniffle* I'm such
a wreck...)
jpnChrName: （ベッドもクリスのを借りてるの……   ……ぐすっ、わたしってダメ人間……）
jpnSearchText:
（ベッドもクリスのを借りてるの……
……ぐすっ、わたしってダメ人間……）

engChrName: (She's actually really pretty... There's just something weird about her.)
engSearchText:
(She's actually really pretty... There's just something
weird about her.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、よく見たら綺麗な女性（ひと）なのに   随分頼りない雰囲気というか……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、よく見たら綺麗な女性（ひと）なのに
随分頼りない雰囲気というか……）

engChrName: (Poor brother's got his hands full with her.)
engSearchText: (Poor brother's got his hands full with her.)
jpnChrName: （弟がいないとマトモに   生きていけないってのだけは分かるな。）
jpnSearchText:
（弟がいないとマトモに
生きていけないってのだけは分かるな。）

engChrName: (Now, now... Her smarts just manifest in ways we don't quite understand. I'm...sure that's it.)
engSearchText:
(Now, now... Her smarts just manifest in ways we
don't quite understand. I'm...sure that's it.)
jpnChrName: （まあまあ……天才って呼ばれる人は   きっとそんな感じですよ、多分……）
jpnSearchText:
（まあまあ……天才って呼ばれる人は
きっとそんな感じですよ、多分……）

engChrName: EYAAAGH?!
engSearchText: EYAAAGH?!
jpnChrName: ひいいっ──！？
jpnSearchText: ひいいっ──！？

engChrName: ...Oh, Van! Don't scare me like that! I thought my heart was gonna jump right out of my chest...
engSearchText:
...Oh, Van! Don't scare me like that! I thought my
heart was gonna jump right out of my chest...
jpnChrName: って、ヴァ、ヴァン……？ し、心臓が止まるかと思った……
jpnSearchText:
って、ヴァ、ヴァン……？
し、心臓が止まるかと思った……

engChrName: Yo. Pullin' another all-nighter?
engSearchText: Yo. Pullin' another all-nighter?
jpnChrName: ようレベッカ、また徹夜明けか？
jpnSearchText: ようレベッカ、また徹夜明けか？

engChrName: If you're that jumpy, you're probably better off just goin' to bed.
engSearchText:
If you're that jumpy, you're probably better off just
goin' to bed.
jpnChrName: つーか、どんだけ驚いてんだよ。
jpnSearchText: つーか、どんだけ驚いてんだよ。

engChrName: I-I just thought...you might've been a customer...
engSearchText: I-I just thought...you might've been a customer...
jpnChrName: だだ、だって お客さんかと思ったから……
jpnSearchText:
だだ、だって
お客さんかと思ったから……

engChrName: And THAT'S how you greet a customer?
engSearchText: And THAT'S how you greet a customer?
jpnChrName: 客と分かっててその反応かよ。
jpnSearchText: 客と分かっててその反応かよ。

engChrName: Well...yes. Customers are scary. People are scary. Outside of a few of the regulars here, I just can't handle them.
engSearchText:
Well...yes. Customers are scary. People are scary.
Outside of a few of the regulars here, I just can't
handle them.
jpnChrName: たとえ客でも人は苦手…… 一部のお得意さんを除いて。
jpnSearchText:
たとえ客でも人は苦手……
一部のお得意さんを除いて。

engChrName: Wh-Wh-Who's that? That girl, over there...
engSearchText: Wh-Wh-Who's that? That girl, over there...
jpnChrName: あれ……そ、そっちの人は……？
jpnSearchText: あれ……そ、そっちの人は……？

engChrName: Er, don't mind me! I'm like Van's assistant.
engSearchText: Er, don't mind me! I'm like Van's assistant.
jpnChrName: えっと、お邪魔してます。 ヴァンさんの助手みたいなもので……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、お邪魔してます。
ヴァンさんの助手みたいなもので……

engChrName: O-Okay.
engSearchText: O-Okay.
jpnChrName: そ、そう……なんだ……
jpnSearchText: そ、そう……なんだ……

engChrName: (Wait, she's not scaring me? That's...weird.)
engSearchText: (Wait, she's not scaring me? That's...weird.)
jpnChrName: （あれ、この人は   怖くないかも……不思議……）
jpnSearchText:
（あれ、この人は
怖くないかも……不思議……）

engChrName: So, erm...
engSearchText: So, erm...
jpnChrName: あの、えっと……？
jpnSearchText: あの、えっと……？

engChrName: O-Oh, sorry. Just thinking.
engSearchText: O-Oh, sorry. Just thinking.
jpnChrName: う、ううん、なんでもない……
jpnSearchText: う、ううん、なんでもない……

engChrName: I don't envy you. Being Van's assistant sounds tough...
engSearchText:
I don't envy you. Being Van's assistant
sounds tough...
jpnChrName: それにしても大変だね、 ヴァンの助手なんて……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても大変だね、
ヴァンの助手なんて……

engChrName: Having to go out in the sun and...and TALK to people... Do you have to WORK with them, too?
engSearchText:
Having to go out in the sun and...and TALK
to people... Do you have to WORK with them, too?
jpnChrName: ……明るい太陽、人の視線、 その上ハードな仕事……
jpnSearchText:
……明るい太陽、人の視線、
その上ハードな仕事……

engChrName: I could never do that... D-Don't push yourself too hard out there, okay? It's hard work!
engSearchText:
I could never do that... D-Don't push yourself too
hard out there, okay? It's hard work!
jpnChrName: ううっ、わたしには絶対ムリ……！ ……じ、自分を大切にしなきゃダメだよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、わたしには絶対ムリ……！
……じ、自分を大切にしなきゃダメだよ！？

engChrName: I...appreciate the concern. I'll keep myself in check.
engSearchText: I...appreciate the concern. I'll keep myself in check.
jpnChrName: お、お気遣いありがとうございます……
jpnSearchText: お、お気遣いありがとうございます……

engChrName: (I feel as though she's a bit TOO worried about me.)
engSearchText: (I feel as though she's a bit TOO worried about me.)
jpnChrName: （なんだか必要以上に   心配されているような。）
jpnSearchText:
（なんだか必要以上に
心配されているような。）

engChrName: (Projection. She speaks machine—real genius like that. But she can't handle people to save her life.)
engSearchText:
(Projection. She speaks machine—real genius
like that. But she can't handle people to save her life.)
jpnChrName: （ま……こんなのだが   修理にかけちゃ天才的でな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま……こんなのだが
修理にかけちゃ天才的でな。）

engChrName: At any rate, can I count on you to keep her Xipha spick and span?
engSearchText:
At any rate, can I count on you to keep her Xipha
spick and span?
jpnChrName: とにかくだ、助手ともども ザイファの調整は頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくだ、助手ともども
ザイファの調整は頼んだぜ。

engChrName: Roger that.
engSearchText: Roger that.
jpnChrName: ……任せておいて。
jpnSearchText: ……任せておいて。

engChrName: We have this Xipha-exclusive tuning device from the Verne Company.
engSearchText:
We have this Xipha-exclusive tuning device from the
Verne Company.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ社からザイファ専用の 調整装置も取り寄せてあるから。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ社からザイファ専用の
調整装置も取り寄せてあるから。

engChrName: You can have this... It's, umm, a token of our partnership.
engSearchText:
You can have this... It's, umm, a token of
our partnership.
jpnChrName: お近づきの印に……どぞ。
jpnSearchText: お近づきの印に……どぞ。

engChrName: Received  .
engSearchText:
Received
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_QUARTZ_T_040}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_QUARTZ_T_040}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Oh! Are you sure?
engSearchText: Oh! Are you sure?
jpnChrName: い、いいんですか。
jpnSearchText: い、いいんですか。

engChrName: Uh-huh. I just happened to make a few, and we don't have them here yet anyway.
engSearchText:
Uh-huh. I just happened to make a few, and we don't
have them here yet anyway.
jpnChrName: ちょうど……試しに合成してたの。 店ではまだ扱ってないやつだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど……試しに合成してたの。
店ではまだ扱ってないやつだけど。

engChrName: There's not much you can do with them, but they should still help you out.
engSearchText:
There's not much you can do with them, but they
should still help you out.
jpnChrName: 嵌められるラインは制限されるけど、 なかなか使えると思う……
jpnSearchText:
嵌められるラインは制限されるけど、
なかなか使えると思う……

engChrName: Oh, but before you can use them, you'll probably need to unlock some slots.
engSearchText:
Oh, but before you can use them, you'll probably need
to unlock some slots.
jpnChrName: あ、でもその前に…… “スロット開封”が必要かも……
jpnSearchText:
あ、でもその前に……
“スロット開封”が必要かも……

engChrName: Slots?
engSearchText: Slots?
jpnChrName: スロットの開封……ですか？
jpnSearchText: スロットの開封……ですか？

engChrName: You need an open slot to install an orbment in. The more slots you've unlocked, the more orbments you can use.
engSearchText:
You need an open slot to install an orbment in.
The more slots you've unlocked, the more orbments
you can use.
jpnChrName: うん……オーブメントのスロットを開封すれば クオーツをセットする数を増やせるの。
jpnSearchText:
うん……オーブメントのスロットを開封すれば
クオーツをセットする数を増やせるの。

engChrName: Wanna give it a shot?
engSearchText: Wanna give it a shot?
jpnChrName: せっかくだから……やっていく？
jpnSearchText: せっかくだから……やっていく？

engChrName: Sure, sounds good.
engSearchText: Sure, sounds good.
jpnChrName: だな、ここいらで改造しとくか。
jpnSearchText: だな、ここいらで改造しとくか。

engChrName: Oh, right, you need sepith to open slots.
engSearchText: Oh, right, you need sepith to open slots.
jpnChrName: スロットの開封には……セピスが必要。
jpnSearchText: スロットの開封には……セピスが必要。

engChrName: Here, lemme give you back some of the sepith I borrowed.
engSearchText:
Here, lemme give you back some of the sepith
I borrowed.
jpnChrName: あ、前にヴァンに借りたセピス…… 返しておくね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、前にヴァンに借りたセピス……
返しておくね。

engChrName: Received 30 each of various types of sepith.
engSearchText: Received 30 each of various types of sepith.
jpnChrName: 各属性のセピス×３０を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>各属性のセピス×３０を手に入れた。

engChrName: Oh, you sure? You don't have to if you needed that.
engSearchText: Oh, you sure? You don't have to if you needed that.
jpnChrName: 別に返してもらわなくてもよかったんだがな。
jpnSearchText: 別に返してもらわなくてもよかったんだがな。

engChrName: But if you're okay with it, that works out nicely. Let's get crackin'.
engSearchText:
But if you're okay with it, that works out nicely.
Let's get crackin'.
jpnChrName: まあだが丁度いい、さっそく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: まあだが丁度いい、さっそく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Select [Open Slot], then find an unopened slot and unlock it.
engSearchText:
Select [Open Slot], then find an unopened slot and
unlock it.
jpnChrName: 「スロット開封」から未開封スロットを１箇所開封してください。
jpnSearchText: <C1>「スロット開封」から未開封スロットを１箇所開封してください。

engChrName: Really appreciate it, Rebecca.
engSearchText: Really appreciate it, Rebecca.
jpnChrName: すまねえなレベッカ、助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: すまねえなレベッカ、助かるぜ。

engChrName: Oh, it's no big deal... You're always helping me out, anyway. I needed to return the favor.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's no big deal... You're always helping me
out, anyway. I needed to return the favor.
jpnChrName: ヴァンにはいつもお世話に なってるから……気にしないで。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンにはいつもお世話に
なってるから……気にしないで。

engChrName: If you ever need work done on your Xipha, or you just need some new quartz, feel free to drop by.
engSearchText:
If you ever need work done on your Xipha, or you just
need some new quartz, feel free to drop by.
jpnChrName: また、オーブメントの調整とか クオーツ合成が必要だったらいつでも来て……
jpnSearchText:
また、オーブメントの調整とか
クオーツ合成が必要だったらいつでも来て……

engChrName: It's nice having someone I can talk to... I can handle you and Van just fine.
engSearchText:
It's nice having someone I can talk to... I can handle
you and Van just fine.
jpnChrName: わたしがちゃんと話せる人……少なくて…… クリスとかヴァンとかは、大丈夫なんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
わたしがちゃんと話せる人……少なくて……
クリスとかヴァンとかは、大丈夫なんだけど……

engChrName: But not the outside world. There are too many p-people out there... Here is where it's safe.
engSearchText:
But not the outside world. There are too many
p-people out there... Here is where it's safe.
jpnChrName: それ以外の人間、って……こ、怖い…… あと外に出るのもゼッタイ無理………
jpnSearchText:
それ以外の人間、って……こ、怖い……
あと外に出るのもゼッタイ無理………

engChrName: Eh, don't beat yourself up over it. Everybody's built different. Long as it makes you happy, I don't see a problem with it.
engSearchText:
Eh, don't beat yourself up over it. Everybody's
built different. Long as it makes you happy, I don't
see a problem with it.
jpnChrName: 人より機械（メカ）と触れ合ってる方が幸せなんだったか。 ……ま、人それぞれだし別に構わんと思うが。
jpnSearchText:
人より機械（メカ）と触れ合ってる方が幸せなんだったか。
……ま、人それぞれだし別に構わんと思うが。

engChrName: To think it's been a decade since I started taking projects... I still get giddy when I find something new to shine up nice and pretty...
engSearchText:
To think it's been a decade since I started
taking projects... I still get giddy when I find
something new to shine up nice and pretty...
jpnChrName: う、うん……ずっとメカの声を聴いてたい…… キレーにしてあげたい……そんな感じで早十年かな……
jpnSearchText:
う、うん……ずっとメカの声を聴いてたい……
キレーにしてあげたい……そんな感じで早十年かな……

engChrName: (...Wait, it's been ten YEARS since she went outside? Uh... Okay, that kind of is a problem, actually.)
engSearchText:
(...Wait, it's been ten YEARS since she went outside?
Uh... Okay, that kind of is a problem, actually.)
jpnChrName: （もしかして十年間、外出すら……？   世の中には色んな方がいらっしゃいますね……）
jpnSearchText:
（もしかして十年間、外出すら……？
世の中には色んな方がいらっしゃいますね……）

engChrName: Oh, thank Aidios you're all okay!
engSearchText: Oh, thank Aidios you're all okay!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたち……！ ご無事みたいですね、良かった！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたち……！
ご無事みたいですね、良かった！

engChrName: We've been stockpiling up whatever we can find, just in case we need it around the neighborhood.
engSearchText:
We've been stockpiling up whatever we can find, just
in case we need it around the neighborhood.
jpnChrName: 僕らもご近所の力になれるよう、 使えそうな物をかき集めている所です！
jpnSearchText:
僕らもご近所の力になれるよう、
使えそうな物をかき集めている所です！

engChrName: We haven't been able to get back in contact with Dad...
engSearchText:
We haven't been able to get back in contact
with Dad...
jpnChrName: 父さんと連絡がつかないのも心配だけど……
jpnSearchText: 父さんと連絡がつかないのも心配だけど……

engChrName: ...but I know he's safe. He has to be! He's too tough for this to take him out.
engSearchText:
...but I know he's safe. He has to be! He's too tough
for this to take him out.
jpnChrName: あれで常識外れにタフですしね、 きっとどこかで無事だと信じてますよ。
jpnSearchText:
あれで常識外れにタフですしね、
きっとどこかで無事だと信じてますよ。

engChrName: We'll make sure Old Town is safe and secure. Just leave it to us!
engSearchText:
We'll make sure Old Town is safe and secure.
Just leave it to us!
jpnChrName: ともかく、旧市街の事はお任せください！ 皆さんと守り切ってみせますよ！
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、旧市街の事はお任せください！
皆さんと守り切ってみせますよ！

engChrName: Sounds good. Just don't bite off more than you can chew! We're here if you need us.
engSearchText:
Sounds good. Just don't bite off more than you
can chew! We're here if you need us.
jpnChrName: ああ、くれぐれも無茶はすんなよ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、くれぐれも無茶はすんなよ！

engChrName: We'll keep an eye out for your father, don't worry!
engSearchText: We'll keep an eye out for your father, don't worry!
jpnChrName: お父さんのこと、気にかけておきますね！
jpnSearchText: お父さんのこと、気にかけておきますね！

engChrName: I still haven't been able to get in touch with Dad, but...I know he's somewhere out there! He's gotta be okay!
engSearchText:
I still haven't been able to get in touch with Dad,
but...I know he's somewhere out there! He's gotta
be okay!
jpnChrName: 父さんと連絡がつかないのも心配ですけど…… きっとどこかで無事なはずですよ！
jpnSearchText:
父さんと連絡がつかないのも心配ですけど……
きっとどこかで無事なはずですよ！

engChrName: Stay safe, guys!
engSearchText: Stay safe, guys!
jpnChrName: 皆さん、どうかご武運を──！
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、どうかご武運を──！

engChrName: Geesh, Dad finally comes home, and he just dumps off parts and bounces right back out!
engSearchText:
Geesh, Dad finally comes home, and he just dumps
off parts and bounces right back out!
jpnChrName: 先日父が帰ってきたと思ったら、 またどこかに行ってしまったんです……！
jpnSearchText:
先日父が帰ってきたと思ったら、
またどこかに行ってしまったんです……！

engChrName: I swear, he treats his own house like a storage shed. News flash: we live here, too!
engSearchText:
I swear, he treats his own house like a storage shed.
News flash: we live here, too!
jpnChrName: まったく父さんは……！　実家を パーツ置き場くらいにしか考えてないんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
まったく父さんは……！　実家を
パーツ置き場くらいにしか考えてないんじゃ……

engChrName: I wanna track him down and get him to clean up after himself, but I'm up to my neck in festival work...
engSearchText:
I wanna track him down and get him to clean up after
himself, but I'm up to my neck in festival work...
jpnChrName: 記念祭で忙しいので探しにも行けないし……
jpnSearchText: 記念祭で忙しいので探しにも行けないし……

engChrName: E-Er, sorry! Don't mind me, I'm just...venting my frustrations a little.
engSearchText:
E-Er, sorry! Don't mind me, I'm just...venting my
frustrations a little.
jpnChrName: ……コホン、失礼しました。 ともかく家族の事も考えてほしいですね。
jpnSearchText:
……コホン、失礼しました。
ともかく家族の事も考えてほしいですね。

engChrName: This time, he went from the free cities all the way to the Molujia Archipelago, just to get his hands on some vintages.
engSearchText:
This time, he went from the free cities all the way to
the Molujia Archipelago, just to get his hands on
some vintages.
jpnChrName: 父さん、今回は自由都市圏から モルジア諸島まで足を運んでいたみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
父さん、今回は自由都市圏から
モルジア諸島まで足を運んでいたみたいで……

engChrName: He's really committed, I'll give him that.
engSearchText: He's really committed, I'll give him that.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、レアパーツ集めの道楽も ここまで来ると感心してしまいますよね。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、レアパーツ集めの道楽も
ここまで来ると感心してしまいますよね。

engChrName: I guess I can't complain—now we get to eat dinner together for the first time in ages.
engSearchText:
I guess I can't complain—now we get to eat dinner
together for the first time in ages.
jpnChrName: ともかく久々に家族で食事が取れそうです。 ……お小言は置いて、夕食にしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく久々に家族で食事が取れそうです。
……お小言は置いて、夕食にしましょうか。

engChrName: All right, what've we got here... Burned-out lights in the 10th District high street...
engSearchText:
All right, what've we got here... Burned-out lights in
the 10th District high street...
jpnChrName: ええと、１０区の商店街から イルミネーションの修理依頼……
jpnSearchText:
ええと、１０区の商店街から
イルミネーションの修理依頼……

engChrName: District 2 has a building with faulty HVAC... Go figure I'd have to trudge all the way out there. I'll tackle that after lunch.
engSearchText:
District 2 has a building with faulty HVAC...
Go figure I'd have to trudge all the way out there.
I'll tackle that after lunch.
jpnChrName: こんな時に限って２区のビルの空調修理まで ……１４時には伺わないとなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
こんな時に限って２区のビルの空調修理まで
……１４時には伺わないとなぁ……

engChrName: This time of year is always a mess. All the holidays and celebrations bring in ALL the jobs...
engSearchText:
This time of year is always a mess. All the holidays
and celebrations bring in ALL the jobs...
jpnChrName: 毎年この時期はドタバタで。 ふう、年越しも楽じゃないですよ。
jpnSearchText:
毎年この時期はドタバタで。
ふう、年越しも楽じゃないですよ。

engChrName: It'd sure be nice if Rebecca could help with festival prep out in the field, but...
engSearchText:
It'd sure be nice if Rebecca could help with festival
prep out in the field, but...
jpnChrName: せめて姉さんが記念祭の準備に 回ってくれれば助かるんですが……
jpnSearchText:
せめて姉さんが記念祭の準備に
回ってくれれば助かるんですが……

engChrName: ...well, that's a no go, for obvious reasons.
engSearchText: ...well, that's a no go, for obvious reasons.
jpnChrName: まあ対人が壊滅的にダメですからね…… 僕の高望みなのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
まあ対人が壊滅的にダメですからね……
僕の高望みなのかもしれません。

engChrName: She can at least talk to people once she feels comfortable around them...
engSearchText:
She can at least talk to people once she feels
comfortable around them...
jpnChrName: 姉さんも、気を許せる相手なら まだ話もできるみたいなんですが……
jpnSearchText:
姉さんも、気を許せる相手なら
まだ話もできるみたいなんですが……

engChrName: ...but when she meets someone for the first time, it's like she's seeing a ghost.
engSearchText:
...but when she meets someone for the first time, it's
like she's seeing a ghost.
jpnChrName: 初めて会う人とかだとパニックに なっちゃうんですよね、ふぅ……
jpnSearchText:
初めて会う人とかだとパニックに
なっちゃうんですよね、ふぅ……

engChrName: Why did this have to happen...? Those were people we knew, people we worked with at the workshop over there...
engSearchText:
Why did this have to happen...? Those were people
we knew, people we worked with at the workshop
over there...
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の工房とは付き合いがありまして…… ……それがまさかこんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の工房とは付き合いがありまして……
……それがまさかこんな事に……

engChrName: Just... Thank Aidios Kaina made it. She was here in Edith at the time...but I can't imagine how she feels.
engSearchText:
Just... Thank Aidios Kaina made it. She was here in
Edith at the time...but I can't imagine how she feels.
jpnChrName: カイナさんは偶然首都に来ていて 難を逃れたようなんですが……
jpnSearchText:
カイナさんは偶然首都に来ていて
難を逃れたようなんですが……

engChrName: And there's still no word from Dad...
engSearchText: And there's still no word from Dad...
jpnChrName: ……こんな時なのに父さんも音沙汰ないし……
jpnSearchText: ……こんな時なのに父さんも音沙汰ないし……

engChrName: I don't think he was in Creil, so I'm hoping he's okay, but... I just feel terrible.
engSearchText:
I don't think he was in Creil, so I'm hoping he's
okay, but... I just feel terrible.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村には行っていないと思うので 無事だと信じてはいますが……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村には行っていないと思うので
無事だと信じてはいますが……

engChrName: So Rebecca took this online entrance exam thing for Basel University...
engSearchText:
So Rebecca took this online entrance exam thing for
Basel University...
jpnChrName: 姉さん、実はバーゼル大学の オンライン模試を受けた事があるんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
姉さん、実はバーゼル大学の
オンライン模試を受けた事があるんですよね。

engChrName: ...and she got a perfect score. Which is a waste, because she's never GOING to Basel University.
engSearchText:
...and she got a perfect score. Which is a waste,
because she's never GOING to Basel University.
jpnChrName: ほぼ満点だったんですが…… うーん惜しいなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ほぼ満点だったんですが……
うーん惜しいなぁ。

engChrName: That would require setting foot outside her house, and she hasn't done that in ten years.
engSearchText:
That would require setting foot outside her
house, and she hasn't done that in ten years.
jpnChrName: まあそもそも十年以上 家から出たことが無いんですけどね……
jpnSearchText:
まあそもそも十年以上
家から出たことが無いんですけどね……

engChrName: Haha... She's really turned over a new leaf.
engSearchText: Haha... She's really turned over a new leaf.
jpnChrName: あはは……こんな姉さんは 僕も初めて見ますよ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……こんな姉さんは
僕も初めて見ますよ。

engChrName: The other day, she was looking out her window with some binoculars and just taking in the sights.
engSearchText:
The other day, she was looking out her window with
some binoculars and just taking in the sights.
jpnChrName: 昨日も魔改造した双眼鏡で 窓からつぶさに観察してましたし──
jpnSearchText:
昨日も魔改造した双眼鏡で
窓からつぶさに観察してましたし──

engChrName: I can't thank you enough, Quatre. You've really helped her out.
engSearchText:
I can't thank you enough, Quatre. You've really
helped her out.
jpnChrName: なんというか、カトルさん。 色々とありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
なんというか、カトルさん。
色々とありがとうございます。

engChrName: Er, no need to thank me. I'm just happy to see her so interested in my work.
engSearchText:
Er, no need to thank me. I'm just happy to see her so
interested in my work.
jpnChrName: い、いえ……僕も興味をもって もらえるのは嬉しいですから。
jpnSearchText:
い、いえ……僕も興味をもって
もらえるのは嬉しいですから。

engChrName: As you should be!
engSearchText: As you should be!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そう言っていただけると。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、そう言っていただけると。

engChrName: I hope this helps bring her out of her shell, if only a little bit.
engSearchText:
I hope this helps bring her out of her shell, if only a
little bit.
jpnChrName: これを機に姉さんの世界が 広がるといいんですが……
jpnSearchText:
これを機に姉さんの世界が
広がるといいんですが……

engChrName: I hope this helps bring her out of her shell, if only a little bit.
engSearchText:
I hope this helps bring her out of her shell, if only a
little bit.
jpnChrName: これを機に姉さんの世界が 広がるといいんですが……
jpnSearchText:
これを機に姉さんの世界が
広がるといいんですが……

engChrName: Feel free to drop by anytime!
engSearchText: Feel free to drop by anytime!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、カトルさんも どうかまた遊びに来てくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、カトルさんも
どうかまた遊びに来てくださいね！

engChrName: Rebecca's been talking about trying to get over her anxiety... Maybe this is the year she finally gets some fresh air.
engSearchText:
Rebecca's been talking about trying to get over
her anxiety... Maybe this is the year she finally gets
some fresh air.
jpnChrName: 姉さん、最近あの調子で…… やっぱり引きこもりを卒業したいのかな……
jpnSearchText:
姉さん、最近あの調子で……
やっぱり引きこもりを卒業したいのかな……

engChrName: To think it's been ten years since she went outside... I can barely remember it. I really worry for her, sometimes.
engSearchText:
To think it's been ten years since she went outside...
I can barely remember it. I really worry for
her, sometimes.
jpnChrName: もう十年以上、まともに外出してないし 僕としても心配なんですが……
jpnSearchText:
もう十年以上、まともに外出してないし
僕としても心配なんですが……

engChrName: It's just, that anxiety makes it hard for her to interact with people. That's the big thing...
engSearchText:
It's just, that anxiety makes it hard for her to interact
with people. That's the big thing...
jpnChrName: 姉さんが人前でうまく やっていける想像がつかないというか──
jpnSearchText:
姉さんが人前でうまく
やっていける想像がつかないというか──

engChrName: I just don't know what to do. I don't wanna coddle her too much, but all the same, she really can't carry on like this...
engSearchText:
I just don't know what to do. I don't wanna coddle
her too much, but all the same, she really can't carry
on like this...
jpnChrName: う～ん、僕が過保護なんでしょうか…… でも姉さんが傷つくのは見たくないし……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、僕が過保護なんでしょうか……
でも姉さんが傷つくのは見たくないし……

engChrName: *sigh* But maybe I'm just getting too worked up about it myself.
engSearchText:
*sigh* But maybe I'm just getting too worked up
about it myself.
jpnChrName: ふう、あまり悩んでも 仕方ないかもしれませんけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、あまり悩んでも
仕方ないかもしれませんけどね。

engChrName: Oh, right! Almost forgot, that new Kitty Engine update drops today. I'd better get that installed.
engSearchText:
Oh, right! Almost forgot, that new Kitty Engine
update drops today. I'd better get that installed.
jpnChrName: そうそう、例のキティエンジンが バージョンアップしたので更新しておかないと。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、例のキティエンジンが
バージョンアップしたので更新しておかないと。

engChrName: It has this secret mode you can toggle, and it lets you do some really nifty stuff.
engSearchText:
It has this secret mode you can toggle, and it lets you
do some really nifty stuff.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ちょっとした裏モードも搭載されてて 使いようによっては便利ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ちょっとした裏モードも搭載されてて
使いようによっては便利ですよね。

engChrName: Oh, Van, Risette? Thanks for the other day.
engSearchText: Oh, Van, Risette? Thanks for the other day.
jpnChrName: やあヴァンさん、それにリゼットさんも。 先日はありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
やあヴァンさん、それにリゼットさんも。
先日はありがとうございました。

engChrName: I'm not too familiar with Xiphas and those kinds of machines, so thanks a bunch for tuning it for me!
engSearchText:
I'm not too familiar with Xiphas and those kinds of
machines, so thanks a bunch for tuning it for me!
jpnChrName: ザイファ関連の装置は僕も詳しくなくて…… 調整して下さって助かりましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ザイファ関連の装置は僕も詳しくなくて……
調整して下さって助かりましたよ。

engChrName: My pleasure. I do appreciate opportunities to discuss these devices in-depth.
engSearchText:
My pleasure. I do appreciate opportunities to discuss
these devices in-depth.
jpnChrName: ふふ、とんでもございません。 こちらこそ細かい解説を聞いていただいて。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、とんでもございません。
こちらこそ細かい解説を聞いていただいて。

engChrName: Shard engineering especially is very esoteric in nature, so it can be difficult to digest. I'd be happy to help you, should you find things unclear.
engSearchText:
Shard engineering especially is very esoteric in nature,
so it can be difficult to digest. I'd be happy to help
you, should you find things unclear.
jpnChrName: 特にシャード関連は特殊なプロセスが多いので 不明点などあればいつでもお声掛けください。
jpnSearchText:
特にシャード関連は特殊なプロセスが多いので
不明点などあればいつでもお声掛けください。

engChrName: And whatever I can't answer is a main office call away.
engSearchText:
And whatever I can't answer is a main office
call away.
jpnChrName: わたくしに答えられないものは 本社に問い合わせますので、どうかお気兼ねなく。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしに答えられないものは
本社に問い合わせますので、どうかお気兼ねなく。

engChrName: Thanks...! Man, I knew Marduk was high tech, but that's just something else.
engSearchText:
Thanks...! Man, I knew Marduk was high tech, but
that's just something else.
jpnChrName: ……はは……マルドゥック社については 色々噂を耳にしていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
……はは……マルドゥック社については
色々噂を耳にしていましたが……

engChrName: Guess you can't judge a book by its cover, huh?
engSearchText: Guess you can't judge a book by its cover, huh?
jpnChrName: コホン、やはり実際にお会いしてみないと 分からないものですね。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、やはり実際にお会いしてみないと
分からないものですね。

engChrName: I can't wait to learn more! And I appreciate you getting along with my sister. Stop by every now and then, yeah?
engSearchText:
I can't wait to learn more! And I appreciate you
getting along with my sister. Stop by every now and
then, yeah?
jpnChrName: こちらこそよろしくお願いします。 あと、姉さんとも仲良くして頂けると。
jpnSearchText:
こちらこそよろしくお願いします。
あと、姉さんとも仲良くして頂けると。

engChrName: Of course. It would be my pleasure.
engSearchText: Of course. It would be my pleasure.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、勿論です。 どうか頼りにさせて下さいませ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、勿論です。
どうか頼りにさせて下さいませ。

engChrName: Man, Marduk is just something else. They're way ahead of the curve with their new shard tech...
engSearchText:
Man, Marduk is just something else. They're way
ahead of the curve with their new shard tech...
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社の技術力は凄まじいですね。 最新のシャード技術にもお詳しいとは……
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社の技術力は凄まじいですね。
最新のシャード技術にもお詳しいとは……

engChrName: Now that I think about it, your primary core is a Marduk make, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, your primary core is a
Marduk make, isn't it?
jpnChrName: そういえば、ヴァンさんの 専用ホロウコアもＭＫ社製だとか。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、ヴァンさんの
専用ホロウコアもＭＫ社製だとか。

engChrName: I probably don't have access to the documentation for that, but I can take a look at it and see what I can do.
engSearchText:
I probably don't have access to the documentation for
that, but I can take a look at it and see what I can do.
jpnChrName: うーん、機密事項なども多そうですが…… お力になれる事もあるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、機密事項なども多そうですが……
お力になれる事もあるかもしれません。

engChrName: By all means, swing by if you get the chance!
engSearchText: By all means, swing by if you get the chance!
jpnChrName: 機会があれば、ぜひうちにいらして下さいね！
jpnSearchText: 機会があれば、ぜひうちにいらして下さいね！

engChrName: Feel free to check out our inventory. We buy spare parts and other junk, so we might have something you like.
engSearchText:
Feel free to check out our inventory. We buy
spare parts and other junk, so we might have
something you like.
jpnChrName: うちも一応仕入れとかありまして、 定期的にジャンク品を買い付けてるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
うちも一応仕入れとかありまして、
定期的にジャンク品を買い付けてるんですよ。

engChrName: People sell their old, defective stuff for cheap all the time—but they're not defective for long after Rebecca and I get our hands on 'em.
engSearchText:
People sell their old, defective stuff for cheap all the
time—but they're not defective for long after Rebecca
and I get our hands on 'em.
jpnChrName: かなり安く買えますし 修理は僕と姉さんなら問題ありません。
jpnSearchText:
かなり安く買えますし
修理は僕と姉さんなら問題ありません。

engChrName: It just makes the checkbook a pain. Sometimes we just harvest parts without fixing the whole thing, and then we have nothing to show for the purchase.
engSearchText:
It just makes the checkbook a pain. Sometimes we
just harvest parts without fixing the whole thing, and
then we have nothing to show for the purchase.
jpnChrName: ……でも、直さずに分解してしまったり パーツだけ抜く事もあるので、経理は大変でして……
jpnSearchText:
……でも、直さずに分解してしまったり
パーツだけ抜く事もあるので、経理は大変でして……

engChrName: I have to do a lot of the heavy lifting, especially dealing with customers. Rebecca's really difficult to manage.
engSearchText:
I have to do a lot of the heavy lifting, especially
dealing with customers. Rebecca's really difficult
to manage.
jpnChrName: 姉さんはあの通りコントロール不可能な人ですし…… ふう、僕がしっかりしないとですね。
jpnSearchText:
姉さんはあの通りコントロール不可能な人ですし……
ふう、僕がしっかりしないとですね。

engChrName: Rebecca's a mechanical whiz, bless her heart, but she just doesn't know how to work with actual people. It's like she speaks a different language.
engSearchText:
Rebecca's a mechanical whiz, bless her heart, but she
just doesn't know how to work with actual people.
It's like she speaks a different language.
jpnChrName: 姉さんは気ままだし、指先は器用でも 性格は不器用なので……
jpnSearchText:
姉さんは気ままだし、指先は器用でも
性格は不器用なので……

engChrName: So I get stuck with the front-facing repair work...that is to say, most of our jobs. *sigh*
engSearchText:
So I get stuck with the front-facing repair work...that
is to say, most of our jobs. *sigh*
jpnChrName: 大体６～７割の修理は僕が担当してますね。 ふう、しっかり売り上げも回していかないと。
jpnSearchText:
大体６～７割の修理は僕が担当してますね。
ふう、しっかり売り上げも回していかないと。

engChrName: Dad's been good friends with Goddard over in Creil Village for a while now.
engSearchText:
Dad's been good friends with Goddard over in Creil
Village for a while now.
jpnChrName: うちの父と、クレイユ村のゴダード親方は 古くからの知り合いでして……
jpnSearchText:
うちの父と、クレイユ村のゴダード親方は
古くからの知り合いでして……

engChrName: That's how we got to know Kaina. She's a good girl.
engSearchText: That's how we got to know Kaina. She's a good girl.
jpnChrName: その縁でカイナさんとは 時々やり取りさせてもらってるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
その縁でカイナさんとは
時々やり取りさせてもらってるんですよ。

engChrName: I hear her training's going well, to boot. It makes me wanna get good myself!
engSearchText:
I hear her training's going well, to boot. It makes me
wanna get good myself!
jpnChrName: ふふ、修行の方も順調みたいですね。 僕らもいい刺激になりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、修行の方も順調みたいですね。
僕らもいい刺激になりますよ。

engChrName: Oh, actually, we got a letter from Dad the other day.
engSearchText: Oh, actually, we got a letter from Dad the other day.
jpnChrName: そういえば先日、父から手紙が届いたんですよね。
jpnSearchText: そういえば先日、父から手紙が届いたんですよね。

engChrName: He says that he's about ready to come home, but I dunno... I'll believe him when I see him.
engSearchText:
He says that he's about ready to come home, but
I dunno... I'll believe him when I see him.
jpnChrName: そろそろ帰るつもりって書いてあったけど ちっとも姿を見せないなぁ……うーん……
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ帰るつもりって書いてあったけど
ちっとも姿を見せないなぁ……うーん……

engChrName: He opened up the shop himself, didn't he? I don't think I've ever actually met the guy.
engSearchText:
He opened up the shop himself, didn't he? I don't
think I've ever actually met the guy.
jpnChrName: 親父さん……確かこの店を開いた人だったか。 俺も会った事がないが……
jpnSearchText:
親父さん……確かこの店を開いた人だったか。
俺も会った事がないが……

engChrName: Yeah. He's always out on some trip somewhere, so it's not often you see him around.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He's always out on some trip somewhere, so it's
not often you see him around.
jpnChrName: ええ、父は店をほっぽりだして しょっちゅう旅に出てまして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、父は店をほっぽりだして
しょっちゅう旅に出てまして。

engChrName: And then my sister... *sigh* The two of them just do whatever they want and there's no talking them out of it.
engSearchText:
And then my sister... *sigh* The two of them just
do whatever they want and there's no talking them
out of it.
jpnChrName: ふう、姉さんといい うちはどうも自由奔放な血筋みたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、姉さんといい
うちはどうも自由奔放な血筋みたいですね。

engChrName: The old man should be fine out there, it's just...really frustrating when he stops sending letters.
engSearchText:
The old man should be fine out there, it's just...really
frustrating when he stops sending letters.
jpnChrName: まあ父のことなので 心配はいらないと思うんですが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ父のことなので
心配はいらないと思うんですが……

engChrName: *sigh* Where's he gallivanted off to now? I wish he'd keep in touch instead of just dropping off the radar all the time.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Where's he gallivanted off to now? I wish he'd
keep in touch instead of just dropping off the radar all
the time.
jpnChrName: ふう、今回はどこに行ってるんだろう。 もう少しマメに連絡してほしいんですが。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、今回はどこに行ってるんだろう。
もう少しマメに連絡してほしいんですが。

engChrName: That's the guy who dropped by the other week. Always nice to see a satisfied customer!
engSearchText:
That's the guy who dropped by the other week.
Always nice to see a satisfied customer!
jpnChrName: こちらは２週間ほど前にいらした方で。 はは、喜んでもらえたみたいで良かったですよ。
jpnSearchText:
こちらは２週間ほど前にいらした方で。
はは、喜んでもらえたみたいで良かったですよ。

engChrName: I reckon we're about the only place in the capital that can fix this much damage.
engSearchText:
I reckon we're about the only place in the capital that
can fix this much damage.
jpnChrName: このレベルの破損を直せるのなんて 首都中探してもウチくらいでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
このレベルの破損を直せるのなんて
首都中探してもウチくらいでしょうし。

engChrName: I wish Rebecca could handle those customers directly, but, well...yeah. I gotta be the middleman.
engSearchText:
I wish Rebecca could handle those customers directly,
but, well...yeah. I gotta be the middleman.
jpnChrName: ホントは姉さんが直接やり取りできるといいんですが ……あの調子ですからね、僕がしっかりしないと。
jpnSearchText:
ホントは姉さんが直接やり取りできるといいんですが
……あの調子ですからね、僕がしっかりしないと。

engChrName: Yo, Van! What brings you by today?
engSearchText: Yo, Van! What brings you by today?
jpnChrName: やあ、ヴァンさんじゃないですか。 今日は何の御用ですか？
jpnSearchText:
やあ、ヴァンさんじゃないですか。
今日は何の御用ですか？

engChrName: 'Sup. I got me a part-timer, so I'm here to bring her up to speed on resources.
engSearchText:
'Sup. I got me a part-timer, so I'm here to bring her
up to speed on resources.
jpnChrName: ああ、バイトが入ったんでな。 研修がてら立ち寄らせてもらったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、バイトが入ったんでな。
研修がてら立ち寄らせてもらったぜ。

engChrName: This place is super useful, Agnès. You come here if you need any technical work done.
engSearchText:
This place is super useful, Agnès. You come here if
you need any technical work done.
jpnChrName: アニエス、この《スタンリー工房》は 使えるから覚えとけ。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、この《スタンリー工房》は
使えるから覚えとけ。

engChrName: Ah, so this is the shop you mentioned before. I see.
engSearchText: Ah, so this is the shop you mentioned before. I see.
jpnChrName: なるほど、ここが先ほど 仰っていた中古修理屋さんですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、ここが先ほど
仰っていた中古修理屋さんですね。

engChrName: Does the workshop service orbments, too?
engSearchText: Does the workshop service orbments, too?
jpnChrName: オーブメント工房でもあるんですか？
jpnSearchText: オーブメント工房でもあるんですか？

engChrName: Yup! Me and my sister, Rebecca, are orbment technicians.
engSearchText:
Yup! Me and my sister, Rebecca, are
orbment technicians.
jpnChrName: ええ、僕とそこにいる姉さんが ２人ともオーブメント技師でして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、僕とそこにいる姉さんが
２人ともオーブメント技師でして。

engChrName: She's way better at it than I am, though, so you can leave that work to her.
engSearchText:
She's way better at it than I am, though, so you can
leave that work to her.
jpnChrName: 姉さんの方が優秀なので、 ほとんど任せきりですけどね。
jpnSearchText:
姉さんの方が優秀なので、
ほとんど任せきりですけどね。

engChrName: I'm more the shop's manager than anything, really.
engSearchText: I'm more the shop's manager than anything, really.
jpnChrName: その代わり、お店の経営なんかは 僕の方で仕切らせてもらっています。
jpnSearchText:
その代わり、お店の経営なんかは
僕の方で仕切らせてもらっています。

engChrName: This place is your bargain bin outlet for mechanical stuff. They'll repair 'em, too.
engSearchText:
This place is your bargain bin outlet for
mechanical stuff. They'll repair 'em, too.
jpnChrName: この店は修理品の販売もそうだが、 珍しい“掘り出し物”なんかもあってな。
jpnSearchText:
この店は修理品の販売もそうだが、
珍しい“掘り出し物”なんかもあってな。

engChrName: And not just machines. We buy and sell just about anything we can get our hands on.
engSearchText:
And not just machines. We buy and sell just about
anything we can get our hands on.
jpnChrName: 機械に限らず、色んな種類の中古品を 買い取ったりもしていますからね。
jpnSearchText:
機械に限らず、色んな種類の中古品を
買い取ったりもしていますからね。

engChrName: Feel free to take a look around, if you're interested!
engSearchText: Feel free to take a look around, if you're interested!
jpnChrName: 興味があれば覗いて行ってください。
jpnSearchText: 興味があれば覗いて行ってください。

engChrName: Certainly!
engSearchText: Certainly!
jpnChrName: はい、ぜひ。
jpnSearchText: はい、ぜひ。

engChrName: Admittedly my sister's kinda...out there, so I handle customers, payment, that stuff.
engSearchText:
Admittedly my sister's kinda...out there, so I handle
customers, payment, that stuff.
jpnChrName: ちなみに姉さんは変わり者で…… 工房の受付も僕が担当しているんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに姉さんは変わり者で……
工房の受付も僕が担当しているんですけど。

engChrName: But you'll probably be fine with her. She's used to you, Van, so she'll take your work on, no prob.
engSearchText:
But you'll probably be fine with her. She's used to
you, Van, so she'll take your work on, no prob.
jpnChrName: 馴染みのヴァンさんたちなら、直接 声をかけてもらった方が早いかと思います。
jpnSearchText:
馴染みのヴァンさんたちなら、直接
声をかけてもらった方が早いかと思います。

engChrName: Good to know.
engSearchText: Good to know.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Wait, you know Yimai, too? Hah, I had no idea!
engSearchText: Wait, you know Yimai, too? Hah, I had no idea!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん達もイーマイさんの お知り合いだったんですね！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん達もイーマイさんの
お知り合いだったんですね！

engChrName: Yimai's a little pushy at times, not gonna lie...
engSearchText: Yimai's a little pushy at times, not gonna lie...
jpnChrName: あの人、ちょっと強引な所がありますけど……
jpnSearchText: あの人、ちょっと強引な所がありますけど……

engChrName: ...but they're always coming in and buying the stuff nobody else would, so I can't complain.
engSearchText:
...but they're always coming in and buying the stuff
nobody else would, so I can't complain.
jpnChrName: 誰が買うか分からないような物でも 買い取ってくれるので助かってるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
誰が買うか分からないような物でも
買い取ってくれるので助かってるんですよ。

engChrName: Oh, by the way, I heard you were talking business or something earlier. What was that all about?
engSearchText:
Oh, by the way, I heard you were talking business or
something earlier. What was that all about?
jpnChrName: あっ、そういえばヴァンさん達も さっきは商談のようなお話をしていましたよね？
jpnSearchText:
あっ、そういえばヴァンさん達も
さっきは商談のようなお話をしていましたよね？

engChrName: Yeah, we were talking about the old man. He was an odd fellow, but my assistant here pieced his puzzle together for me.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we were talking about the old man. He was an
odd fellow, but my assistant here pieced his puzzle
together for me.
jpnChrName: ああ、曲者の爺さんだったが コイツが上手く商談をまとめてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、曲者の爺さんだったが
コイツが上手く商談をまとめてな。

engChrName: Oh, don't sell yourself short, heehee.
engSearchText: Oh, don't sell yourself short, heehee.
jpnChrName: あはは……ヴァンさんに フォローして頂きつつ、ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……ヴァンさんに
フォローして頂きつつ、ですけど。

engChrName: Wow. That's Arkride Solutions for you, huh?
engSearchText: Wow. That's Arkride Solutions for you, huh?
jpnChrName: 商談も上手くまとめちゃうなんて さすが《アークライド相談事務所》ですね！
jpnSearchText:
商談も上手くまとめちゃうなんて
さすが《アークライド相談事務所》ですね！

engChrName: I gotta keep studying and getting better—sometimes Rebecca gets overloaded with stuff. I gotta pick up the slack!
engSearchText:
I gotta keep studying and getting better—sometimes
Rebecca gets overloaded with stuff. I gotta pick up
the slack!
jpnChrName: 姉さんの為にも 僕ももっと勉強しないと……！
jpnSearchText:
姉さんの為にも
僕ももっと勉強しないと……！

engChrName: I can tackle your simple jobs, so drop on in whenever you need work.
engSearchText:
I can tackle your simple jobs, so drop on in whenever
you need work.
jpnChrName: 簡単な工房仕事も請け負えますし いつでもいらして下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
簡単な工房仕事も請け負えますし
いつでもいらして下さいね。

engChrName: You've probably seen how, umm...unique my sister is. It's kinda hard to miss it.
engSearchText:
You've probably seen how, umm...unique my sister is.
It's kinda hard to miss it.
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに姉さんはちょっと変わり者…… というかあの調子ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみに姉さんはちょっと変わり者……
というかあの調子ですけど……

engChrName: But she's impossibly talented with machines. She'll do good work for you, you just gotta look past her quirks.
engSearchText:
But she's impossibly talented with machines. She'll do
good work for you, you just gotta look past her quirks.
jpnChrName: 腕前だけは確かですから その、どうか大目に見てあげてくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
腕前だけは確かですから
その、どうか大目に見てあげてくださいね。

engChrName: ...Wait, what?! You wanna go to Basel? Seriously?!
engSearchText: ...Wait, what?! You wanna go to Basel? Seriously?!
jpnChrName: ええっ！？　姉さんがバーゼルに……？
jpnSearchText: ええっ！？　姉さんがバーゼルに……？

engChrName: I do! I wanna go to the Basel Institute! I wanna do the kind of work that Quatre's doing!
engSearchText:
I do! I wanna go to the Basel Institute! I wanna do
the kind of work that Quatre's doing!
jpnChrName: うん、バーゼル大に行きたい──！ カトル君に負けないような研究がしたい……！
jpnSearchText:
うん、バーゼル大に行きたい──！
カトル君に負けないような研究がしたい……！

engChrName: I can learn more about engineering, and, and take classes with professors, and make new things, and...!
engSearchText:
I can learn more about engineering, and, and take
classes with professors, and make new things, and...!
jpnChrName: 毎日教授たちと議論して、 とことん研究して、新しい発明をして──
jpnSearchText:
毎日教授たちと議論して、
とことん研究して、新しい発明をして──

engChrName: I can sell the stuff I make, then the...the Verne Company will hire me. Then I'll have to do...INTERVIEWS.
engSearchText:
I can sell the stuff I make, then the...the Verne
Company will hire me. Then I'll have to
do...INTERVIEWS.
jpnChrName: そしたらそのうち製品化とか、 ヴェルヌ社に呼ばれたり、メディアの取材とか……
jpnSearchText:
そしたらそのうち製品化とか、
ヴェルヌ社に呼ばれたり、メディアの取材とか……

engChrName: On second thought, scratch that. I'm too far gone. I can't talk with normies like that, I'll just... I'll DIE.
engSearchText:
On second thought, scratch that. I'm too far gone.
I can't talk with normies like that, I'll just... I'll DIE.
jpnChrName: ……ゴフッ……や、やっぱり無理……… そんなリア充生活……想像しただけで死ぬ……
jpnSearchText:
……ゴフッ……や、やっぱり無理………
そんなリア充生活……想像しただけで死ぬ……

engChrName: Baby steps, here, baby steps. Just focus on the smaller things for now.
engSearchText:
Baby steps, here, baby steps. Just focus on the smaller
things for now.
jpnChrName: 気持ちは分かったけど…… とりあえず無理しないでね、姉さん。
jpnSearchText:
気持ちは分かったけど……
とりあえず無理しないでね、姉さん。

engChrName: I finally got in touch with Kaina. She said she doesn't know anything about the explosion, though...
engSearchText:
I finally got in touch with Kaina. She said she doesn't
know anything about the explosion, though...
jpnChrName: うん、ようやくカイナと連絡が取れたけど…… 爆発については何もわからないって……
jpnSearchText:
うん、ようやくカイナと連絡が取れたけど……
爆発については何もわからないって……

engChrName: Oh, you two...
engSearchText: Oh, you two...
jpnChrName: ヴ、ヴァンさん、それにカトル君……
jpnSearchText: ヴ、ヴァンさん、それにカトル君……

engChrName: Correct me if I'm wrong, but you were gathering intel, if memory serves?
engSearchText:
Correct me if I'm wrong, but you were gathering
intel, if memory serves?
jpnChrName: ……確か技師関係の界隈で 情報を集めてくれていたんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
……確か技師関係の界隈で
情報を集めてくれていたんですよね。

engChrName: Yeah. We got in touch with Kaina, she was here in the capital at the time...
engSearchText:
Yeah. We got in touch with Kaina, she was here in
the capital at the time...
jpnChrName: ええ、首都に来ていたカイナさんとは なんとか連絡が取れたんですが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、首都に来ていたカイナさんとは
なんとか連絡が取れたんですが……

engChrName: ...but she said she didn't have any leads. We're just...stumped.
engSearchText:
...but she said she didn't have any leads. We're
just...stumped.
jpnChrName: 爆発については何もわからないと……
jpnSearchText: 爆発については何もわからないと……

engChrName: I see... Thank heavens there were at least some survivors.
engSearchText:
I see... Thank heavens there were at least
some survivors.
jpnChrName: そうですか……村を離れていて 助かった人がいるのは不幸中の幸いだけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうですか……村を離れていて
助かった人がいるのは不幸中の幸いだけど……

engChrName: If I remember correctly, she's an acquaintance of yours?
engSearchText:
If I remember correctly, she's an acquaintance
of yours?
jpnChrName: ……確か、こちらの工房とも 縁があったんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
……確か、こちらの工房とも
縁があったんですよね？

engChrName: Yeah. Goddard, over in Creil Village... He helped us out a bunch over the years.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Goddard, over in Creil Village... He helped us
out a bunch over the years.
jpnChrName: はい、クレイユ村のゴダード親方── 父の代から良くしてもらっていて。
jpnSearchText:
はい、クレイユ村のゴダード親方──
父の代から良くしてもらっていて。

engChrName: But...
engSearchText: But...
jpnChrName: でも……
jpnSearchText: でも……

engChrName: *sniffle* I just don't get it... Why...?
engSearchText: *sniffle* I just don't get it... Why...?
jpnChrName: グスッ……どうして…… ……どうしてこんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
グスッ……どうして……
……どうしてこんな事に……

engChrName: (Rebecca... Chris...)
engSearchText: (Rebecca... Chris...)
jpnChrName: （レベッカさん……クリスさんも……）
jpnSearchText: （レベッカさん……クリスさんも……）

engChrName: (We must... We WILL stop them. I won't rest until that weapon is dead and buried!)
engSearchText:
(We must... We WILL stop them. I won't rest until
that weapon is dead and buried!)
jpnChrName: （……やっぱり放ってはおけない……   “反応兵器”だけは、絶対に──！！）
jpnSearchText:
（……やっぱり放ってはおけない……
“反応兵器”だけは、絶対に──！！）

engChrName: Wh-What happened? Did time really just stop?!
engSearchText: Wh-What happened? Did time really just stop?!
jpnChrName: ホ、ホントに時間が止まってる……！？
jpnSearchText: ホ、ホントに時間が止まってる……！？

engChrName: What the hell is THAT?!
engSearchText: What the hell is THAT?!
jpnChrName: 一体どうなってるんだ…… ……それにあの化物は……！？
jpnSearchText:
一体どうなってるんだ……
……それにあの化物は……！？

engChrName: Okay, good! There you are!
engSearchText: Okay, good! There you are!
jpnChrName: ──レベッカ、クリス！ ここにいたのか！
jpnSearchText:
──レベッカ、クリス！
ここにいたのか！

engChrName: Van! Thank Aidios you're here. Is everybody okay?
engSearchText: Van! Thank Aidios you're here. Is everybody okay?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！ 良かった、皆さんも無事だったんですね！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……！
良かった、皆さんも無事だったんですね！

engChrName: I-I'd been hiding, but I just got so curious about this phenomenon...
engSearchText:
I-I'd been hiding, but I just got so curious about
this phenomenon...
jpnChrName: ……い、一応隠れてたんだけど どうしても外が気になっちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
……い、一応隠れてたんだけど
どうしても外が気になっちゃって……

engChrName: A-And now I'm... I'm outside! I-I-I can't move!
engSearchText: A-And now I'm... I'm outside! I-I-I can't move!
jpnChrName: ううっ、そういえば思わず出てきちゃったけど 家から出るとか……やっぱり怖いかも……！
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、そういえば思わず出てきちゃったけど
家から出るとか……やっぱり怖いかも……！

engChrName: Now really ain't the time for walkin' and gawkin'.
engSearchText: Now really ain't the time for walkin' and gawkin'.
jpnChrName: 諸々含めて無理すんな……
jpnSearchText: 諸々含めて無理すんな……

engChrName: Gettin' real dicey out here. Shack up and ride it out for now!
engSearchText:
Gettin' real dicey out here. Shack up and ride it out
for now!
jpnChrName: 今は危険な状況でもある、 しばらくは家に入って隠れていてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
今は危険な状況でもある、
しばらくは家に入って隠れていてくれ！

engChrName: O-Okay!
engSearchText: O-Okay!
jpnChrName: わ、わかりました！
jpnSearchText: わ、わかりました！

engChrName: Be careful, everyone!
engSearchText: Be careful, everyone!
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちも気を付けて……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンたちも気を付けて……！

engChrName: Oh, right! Take this with you! I just remembered I had this on me.
engSearchText:
Oh, right! Take this with you! I just remembered I
had this on me.
jpnChrName: そうだ……これ使って！ 手持ちの分しかないけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうだ……これ使って！
手持ちの分しかないけど……

engChrName: Obtained ◆〇〇〇〇〇.
engSearchText: Obtained ◆〇〇〇〇〇.
jpnChrName: ◆〇〇〇〇〇を受け取った。
jpnSearchText: ◆〇〇〇〇〇を受け取った。

engChrName: Much thanks!
engSearchText: Much thanks!
jpnChrName: すまねえな、恩に着るぜ！
jpnSearchText: すまねえな、恩に着るぜ！

engChrName: Well, shall we?
engSearchText: Well, shall we?
jpnChrName: フフ、それじゃあお互い行くとしようか。
jpnSearchText: フフ、それじゃあお互い行くとしようか。

engChrName: Don't be hasty, here.
engSearchText: Don't be hasty, here.
jpnChrName: くれぐれも勝手な行動は慎むようにな。
jpnSearchText: くれぐれも勝手な行動は慎むようにな。

engChrName: Do exercise caution.
engSearchText: Do exercise caution.
jpnChrName: フフ、お互い気を付けて参りましょう。
jpnSearchText: フフ、お互い気を付けて参りましょう。

engChrName: Oh? Now, didn't I see you on my last trip...?
engSearchText: Oh? Now, didn't I see you on my last trip...?
jpnChrName: おや、君は確かこの前 旅先で会った……
jpnSearchText:
おや、君は確かこの前
旅先で会った……

engChrName: Oh, hey. Didn't think you were from the neighborhood.
engSearchText:
Oh, hey. Didn't think you were from
the neighborhood.
jpnChrName: どうも、まさかご近所だったとは 思いませんでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
どうも、まさかご近所だったとは
思いませんでしたが。

engChrName: Indeed I am. I've actually heard about you in the letters my kids send me.
engSearchText:
Indeed I am. I've actually heard about you in the
letters my kids send me.
jpnChrName: はは、そういえば子供たちからの 手紙で読んだことがあったなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、そういえば子供たちからの
手紙で読んだことがあったなぁ。

engChrName: You're a spriggan, yes? I hope they're not too big a thorn in your side, haha.
engSearchText:
You're a spriggan, yes? I hope they're not too big a
thorn in your side, haha.
jpnChrName: 解決屋さん……だったかな。 どうか今後とも子供たちと仲良くしてやってくれ！
jpnSearchText:
解決屋さん……だったかな。
どうか今後とも子供たちと仲良くしてやってくれ！

engChrName: To live and breathe metal—that is the way of the repairman.
engSearchText:
To live and breathe metal—that is the way of
the repairman.
jpnChrName: メカを愛し、メカに生きる。 それが“修理屋（ぼくら）”の生き方でねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
メカを愛し、メカに生きる。
それが“修理屋（ぼくら）”の生き方でねぇ。

engChrName: I turn my back for one second, and my kids are full-fledged tradesmen! Or...well, I guess I turned my back for a year, actually. Wahaha!
engSearchText:
I turn my back for one second, and my kids are
full-fledged tradesmen! Or...well, I guess I turned my
back for a year, actually. Wahaha!
jpnChrName: いつの間にやらこの子達にもしっかり 受け継がれてるみたいだね、はっはっは！
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にやらこの子達にもしっかり
受け継がれてるみたいだね、はっはっは！

engChrName: (Huh? Didn't I bump into this guy in Longlai? Oración, too, actually...)
engSearchText:
(Huh? Didn't I bump into this guy in Longlai?
Oración, too, actually...)
jpnChrName: （ん？　このオッサンは   龍來やオラシオンでも見かけた……）
jpnSearchText:
（ん？　このオッサンは
龍來やオラシオンでも見かけた……）

engChrName: (Hmm? Didn't I run into this ol' fart in Oración?)
engSearchText: (Hmm? Didn't I run into this ol' fart in Oración?)
jpnChrName: （ん？　このオッサンは   オラシオンでも見かけた……）
jpnSearchText:
（ん？　このオッサンは
オラシオンでも見かけた……）

engChrName: I'm hooome! How've you kids been doing?
engSearchText: I'm hooome! How've you kids been doing?
jpnChrName: やあ、レベッカにクリス。 ただいま、元気にしてたかい？
jpnSearchText:
やあ、レベッカにクリス。
ただいま、元気にしてたかい？

engChrName: D-D-Dad?!
engSearchText: D-D-Dad?!
jpnChrName: お、お、お……お父さん──！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>お、お、お……お父さん──！？

engChrName: ...Wait, did you always look like that?
engSearchText: ...Wait, did you always look like that?
jpnChrName: ……て、こんな人だっけ？
jpnSearchText: ……て、こんな人だっけ？

engChrName: I...I'm hurt! How could you forget your dear father's face? I-It hasn't been that long, has it?
engSearchText:
I...I'm hurt! How could you forget your dear
father's face? I-It hasn't been that long, has it?
jpnChrName: ガクッ……父さんの顔を 忘れるなんてひどいなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ガクッ……父さんの顔を
忘れるなんてひどいなぁ……

engChrName: Well, you WERE gone for a whole year, Dad.
engSearchText: Well, you WERE gone for a whole year, Dad.
jpnChrName: かれこれ１年以上帰ってこない父さんにも 非があると思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
かれこれ１年以上帰ってこない父さんにも
非があると思うけど……

engChrName: You sent that letter saying you'd be home soon...three months ago. Where the heck were you?
engSearchText:
You sent that letter saying you'd be home soon...three
months ago. Where the heck were you?
jpnChrName: あと『帰る』って手紙を寄こしてから もう３か月近く経つよね、どうなってるの？
jpnSearchText:
あと『帰る』って手紙を寄こしてから
もう３か月近く経つよね、どうなってるの？

engChrName: Would it really have killed you to keep in touch more often? I mean, seriously, three months of nothing, as if you just died or... *grumble*
engSearchText:
Would it really have killed you to keep in touch
more often? I mean, seriously, three months of
nothing, as if you just died or... *grumble*
jpnChrName: そもそも連絡の頻度が……ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText: そもそも連絡の頻度が……ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: (My boy's wise beyond his years. He sounds like a parent already...)
engSearchText:
(My boy's wise beyond his years. He sounds like a
parent already...)
jpnChrName: （ああ、クリスはお説教モードに   入っちゃったかぁ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、クリスはお説教モードに
入っちゃったかぁ。）

engChrName: Maybe if you got us some souvenirs, that'd sweeten the deal. Or let us keep some of your loot, maybe.
engSearchText:
Maybe if you got us some souvenirs, that'd sweeten
the deal. Or let us keep some of your loot, maybe.
jpnChrName: というわけで旅の収穫品を提供するなら 許してあげなくもない……
jpnSearchText:
というわけで旅の収穫品を提供するなら
許してあげなくもない……

engChrName: My word... You kids are harsh. But I suppose I do owe it to you for being away so long. C'est la vie!
engSearchText:
My word... You kids are harsh. But I suppose I do
owe it to you for being away so long. C'est la vie!
jpnChrName: やれやれ……まあお前たちには 見せびらかすつもりだったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……まあお前たちには
見せびらかすつもりだったんだが。

engChrName: Now, gather round for Papa Filenkov's Show and Tell! I've got quite the assortment for you today, curated from my year-long trip!
engSearchText:
Now, gather round for Papa Filenkov's Show
and Tell! I've got quite the assortment for you today,
curated from my year-long trip!
jpnChrName: では見せるとしよう！　大陸中を回って ゲットしてきたレア部品（パーツ）の数々を！！
jpnSearchText:
では見せるとしよう！　大陸中を回って
ゲットしてきたレア部品（パーツ）の数々を！！

engChrName: WHOOOOOA!
engSearchText: WHOOOOOA!
jpnChrName: おおおおおおおお～っ！！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>おおおおおおおお～っ！！！

engChrName: (Apples didn't fall far from that tree, huh?)
engSearchText: (Apples didn't fall far from that tree, huh?)
jpnChrName: （何だかしらんが……   どうやら似た者家族らしいな。）
jpnSearchText:
（何だかしらんが……
どうやら似た者家族らしいな。）

engChrName: Mom, Dad! I thought I'd never see you again!
engSearchText: Mom, Dad! I thought I'd never see you again!
jpnChrName: お父さんとお母さん……！ はあ、もう会えないかと思った……！
jpnSearchText:
お父さんとお母さん……！
はあ、もう会えないかと思った……！

engChrName: Thank you...! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Thank you...! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、皆さん！ 本当にありがとうございました！！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、皆さん！
本当にありがとうございました！！

engChrName: This is like one big nightmare...but I know you can fix it! Be careful out there, okay?!
engSearchText:
This is like one big nightmare...but I know you can
fix it! Be careful out there, okay?!
jpnChrName: ……なんだか悪夢みたいな状況ですけど…… この先も気を付けてくださいね！！
jpnSearchText:
……なんだか悪夢みたいな状況ですけど……
この先も気を付けてくださいね！！

engChrName: Oh, Harry... You're just now telling me you wanna get lunch at the stalls?!
engSearchText:
Oh, Harry... You're just now telling me you wanna
get lunch at the stalls?!
jpnChrName: も～、今日はお弁当作ってきたのに 屋台の食べ歩きですって！？
jpnSearchText:
も～、今日はお弁当作ってきたのに
屋台の食べ歩きですって！？

engChrName: Why didn't you tell me that sooner? You big... dummy head!
engSearchText:
Why didn't you tell me that sooner? You big...
dummy head!
jpnChrName: そのくらい昨日のうちに 説明しときなさいよね、馬鹿ハリー！！
jpnSearchText:
そのくらい昨日のうちに
説明しときなさいよね、馬鹿ハリー！！

engChrName: Sorry! But I swear I can eat enough for two!
engSearchText: Sorry! But I swear I can eat enough for two!
jpnChrName: わりわり、でもオレ２人前食うからよ～！
jpnSearchText: わりわり、でもオレ２人前食うからよ～！

engChrName: (I know that... That's why I made extra for you...)
engSearchText: (I know that... That's why I made extra for you...)
jpnChrName: （それくらい知ってるわよ……   だから多めに用意してきたのに……）
jpnSearchText:
（それくらい知ってるわよ……
だから多めに用意してきたのに……）

engChrName: (It was supposed to be a gift for the Revolution Festival... I worked so hard on it!)
engSearchText:
(It was supposed to be a gift for the
Revolution Festival... I worked so hard on it!)
jpnChrName: （一応記念祭の贈り物だし……   やり始めたら凝っちゃって頑張ったのに……）
jpnSearchText:
（一応記念祭の贈り物だし……
やり始めたら凝っちゃって頑張ったのに……）

engChrName: Well, heehee. Have as much food as you want, then. Eat until you can't walk. I insist!
engSearchText:
Well, heehee. Have as much food as you want, then.
Eat until you can't walk. I insist!
jpnChrName: ふふ……まあいいわ、お腹破裂するまで 食べてもらうからね？（ニッコリ）
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……まあいいわ、お腹破裂するまで
食べてもらうからね？（ニッコリ）

engChrName: Wh-What's gotten into you?!
engSearchText: Wh-What's gotten into you?!
jpnChrName: なな、なんか怒ってんな、シーナ！？
jpnSearchText: なな、なんか怒ってんな、シーナ！？

engChrName: She's really scary when she smiles like that...
engSearchText: She's really scary when she smiles like that...
jpnChrName: でた……おねーちゃんのコワイ笑顔……
jpnSearchText: でた……おねーちゃんのコワイ笑顔……

engChrName: *sigh* Harry had to go and ruin everything. Why can't he just... *grumble*
engSearchText:
*sigh* Harry had to go and ruin everything.
Why can't he just... *grumble*
jpnChrName: ふう、ハリーったら相変わらず 雑で考え無しなんですから、ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ハリーったら相変わらず
雑で考え無しなんですから、ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: But I guess the food won't go to waste, at least, if everyone will be there to eat it.
engSearchText:
But I guess the food won't go to waste, at least, if
everyone will be there to eat it.
jpnChrName: ……まあお母さんたちもくるし、 無駄にはならないだろうけど……
jpnSearchText:
……まあお母さんたちもくるし、
無駄にはならないだろうけど……

engChrName: It's just, can you blame me? I worked so hard to make it for him...!
engSearchText:
It's just, can you blame me? I worked so hard to make
it for him...!
jpnChrName: ちょっと悔しいじゃないですか。 せっかく色々頑張ったお料理なのに～……！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと悔しいじゃないですか。
せっかく色々頑張ったお料理なのに～……！

engChrName: History is just... I dunno, I don't like it.
engSearchText: History is just... I dunno, I don't like it.
jpnChrName: 歴史、か…… ……私、歴史は嫌いなんです……
jpnSearchText:
歴史、か……
……私、歴史は嫌いなんです……

engChrName: But then, my mom and dad named me after Sheena Dirke, of all people!
engSearchText:
But then, my mom and dad named me after Sheena
Dirke, of all people!
jpnChrName: だって私の『シーナ』って名前！！ シーナ・ディルクにあやかったらしいですけど！
jpnSearchText:
だって私の『シーナ』って名前！！
シーナ・ディルクにあやかったらしいですけど！

engChrName: How am I supposed to fill her shoes? I just wanna be an ordinary girl...
engSearchText:
How am I supposed to fill her shoes? I just wanna be
an ordinary girl...
jpnChrName: 別に偉人とかそういうの 目指してないですから！！
jpnSearchText:
別に偉人とかそういうの
目指してないですから！！

engChrName: Why did Mom and Dad have to name me after her?
engSearchText: Why did Mom and Dad have to name me after her?
jpnChrName: もうっ、お父さんもお母さんも なんでこんな名前にしたのかな～っ……
jpnSearchText:
もうっ、お父さんもお母さんも
なんでこんな名前にしたのかな～っ……

engChrName: You'll stick with that name and you'll LIKE it, you ungrateful little...!
engSearchText:
You'll stick with that name and you'll LIKE it, you
ungrateful little...!
jpnChrName: コラそこっ！　黙って聞きな！
jpnSearchText: コラそこっ！　黙って聞きな！

engChrName: Eep! S-Sorry!
engSearchText: Eep! S-Sorry!
jpnChrName: は、はあ～い！！
jpnSearchText: は、はあ～い！！

engChrName: (*sigh* I wish I had a name like a book character, not some old history thing.)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* I wish I had a name like a book character, not
some old history thing.)
jpnChrName: （はぁ、私も小説のヒロインみたいな   名前が良かったのに……）
jpnSearchText:
（はぁ、私も小説のヒロインみたいな
名前が良かったのに……）

engChrName: (But Gin makes history really interesting. Her stories don't feel like a class at all.)
engSearchText:
(But Gin makes history really interesting. Her stories
don't feel like a class at all.)
jpnChrName: （あ、でもギン婆さんのお話は   歴史っぽくなくて面白いかも……）
jpnSearchText:
（あ、でもギン婆さんのお話は
歴史っぽくなくて面白いかも……）

engChrName: (I'll try and pay attention today.)
engSearchText: (I'll try and pay attention today.)
jpnChrName: （今日はじっくり聞いてみようかな～？）
jpnSearchText: （今日はじっくり聞いてみようかな～？）

engChrName: Harry's a real big dummy...but sometimes that's a good thing. Heehee!
engSearchText:
Harry's a real big dummy...but sometimes that's a
good thing. Heehee!
jpnChrName: ふふっ……こんな時はハリーの おバカさに救われてる気がします。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……こんな時はハリーの
おバカさに救われてる気がします。

engChrName: Hmm... Is it just me, or have I seen you before?
engSearchText: Hmm... Is it just me, or have I seen you before?
jpnChrName: ところで、えっと…… そちらの方、どこかで見た事あるような……
jpnSearchText:
ところで、えっと……
そちらの方、どこかで見た事あるような……

engChrName: You look really familiar, but... Nah, I think I'm just remembering wrong.
engSearchText:
You look really familiar, but... Nah, I think I'm just
remembering wrong.
jpnChrName: ……うーん、気のせいかなぁ……
jpnSearchText: ……うーん、気のせいかなぁ……

engChrName: I...can't say I've met you before, haha! (Man, this girl's sharp!)
engSearchText:
I...can't say I've met you before, haha!
(Man, this girl's sharp!)
jpnChrName: え、ええっ！？　なんのことぉ～？？ （意外に鋭いわね、この子……！）
jpnSearchText:
え、ええっ！？　なんのことぉ～？？
（意外に鋭いわね、この子……！）

engChrName: (That's... That's a new face. I've never seen anything like that before.) Yeah, I think I'm just mixing you up with someone else.
engSearchText:
(That's... That's a new face. I've never seen anything
like that before.) Yeah, I think I'm just mixing you up
with someone else.
jpnChrName: （み、見た事もない変顔……） ……えっとすみません、人違いかも……
jpnSearchText:
（み、見た事もない変顔……）
……えっとすみません、人違いかも……

engChrName: (You kinda phoned it in there, felt like.)
engSearchText: (You kinda phoned it in there, felt like.)
jpnChrName: （女優にしちゃ残念すぎな躱（かわ）し方だな。）
jpnSearchText: （女優にしちゃ残念すぎな躱（かわ）し方だな。）

engChrName: (Ah, haha...)
engSearchText: (Ah, haha...)
jpnChrName: （あはは……）
jpnSearchText: （あはは……）

engChrName: I feel like Harry's made me...calmer? Older? He's so hyper, I sorta balance him out.
engSearchText:
I feel like Harry's made me...calmer? Older? He's so
hyper, I sorta balance him out.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……ハリーのお陰で ちょっと落ち着いた気がします。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……ハリーのお陰で
ちょっと落ち着いた気がします。

engChrName: He just goes on and on about everything...but that's okay! I'll talk with him some more today.
engSearchText:
He just goes on and on about everything...but
that's okay! I'll talk with him some more today.
jpnChrName: おバカな事ばっかり言ってるけど…… 今日はもう少しお喋りしていこうかな。
jpnSearchText:
おバカな事ばっかり言ってるけど……
今日はもう少しお喋りしていこうかな。

engChrName: Mr. Hawker! It's been forever since I saw you!
engSearchText: Mr. Hawker! It's been forever since I saw you!
jpnChrName: ホーカーおじさん、お久しぶりですっ！
jpnSearchText: ホーカーおじさん、お久しぶりですっ！

engChrName: Heya, Sheena! Sorry I had to saddle you folks with Harry for that whole month.
engSearchText:
Heya, Sheena! Sorry I had to saddle you folks with
Harry for that whole month.
jpnChrName: やあシーナちゃん、ハリーを１ヶ月も 預かってもらって済まなかったなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
やあシーナちゃん、ハリーを１ヶ月も
預かってもらって済まなかったなぁ！

engChrName: It's okay! We got along fine.
engSearchText: It's okay! We got along fine.
jpnChrName: いーえ、大したことは。
jpnSearchText: いーえ、大したことは。

engChrName: It got kinda tough sometimes...but I'm a big girl now, so I could handle it!
engSearchText:
It got kinda tough sometimes...but I'm a big girl now,
so I could handle it!
jpnChrName: まあ大変なこともありましたけど、 私の方がちょっとだけ大人ですから。
jpnSearchText:
まあ大変なこともありましたけど、
私の方がちょっとだけ大人ですから。

engChrName: (I leave for a month, and Sheena's a completely different girl.)
engSearchText:
(I leave for a month, and Sheena's a completely
different girl.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、シーナちゃんも   しばらく見ないうちに立派になって……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、シーナちゃんも
しばらく見ないうちに立派になって……）

engChrName: (Kids these days... Haha. They grow up so fast.)
engSearchText: (Kids these days... Haha. They grow up so fast.)
jpnChrName: （はは、子供の成長ってのは   ホントにあっという間なんだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（はは、子供の成長ってのは
ホントにあっという間なんだな。）

engChrName: Oh, right! Guess who's got some souvenirs for you?
engSearchText: Oh, right! Guess who's got some souvenirs for you?
jpnChrName: そうそう、ちゃあんとお土産も 用意してあるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、ちゃあんとお土産も
用意してあるんだ。

engChrName: Let's head on back, okay? I'll walk you home.
engSearchText: Let's head on back, okay? I'll walk you home.
jpnChrName: シーナちゃんたちも送って行くから 一緒に帰るとしようぜ！
jpnSearchText:
シーナちゃんたちも送って行くから
一緒に帰るとしようぜ！

engChrName: Okay! I'm sure my mom and dad wanna say hi, too.
engSearchText: Okay! I'm sure my mom and dad wanna say hi, too.
jpnChrName: はいっ！　お父さんとお母さんも きっと会いたがってますし、ぜひ！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！　お父さんとお母さんも
きっと会いたがってますし、ぜひ！

engChrName: O-Oh, my goodness! It's... It's...!
engSearchText: O-Oh, my goodness! It's... It's...!
jpnChrName: はわわわわぁぁぁぁっ……！！ かっ、かっ、かっ──
jpnSearchText:
はわわわわぁぁぁぁっ……！！
かっ、かっ、かっ──

engChrName: Cool, right?!
engSearchText: Cool, right?!
jpnChrName: ね～、かっこいーよね～！！
jpnSearchText: ね～、かっこいーよね～！！

engChrName: It's so CUUUTE!
engSearchText: It's so CUUUTE!
jpnChrName: カ ワ イ イ ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>カ ワ イ イ ！！

engChrName: Wait, cute? What?
engSearchText: Wait, cute? What?
jpnChrName: えっ、おねえちゃん、 かっこいいじゃなくて～！？
jpnSearchText:
えっ、おねえちゃん、
かっこいいじゃなくて～！？

engChrName: I've always wanted to become a witch! And what's a witch without a familiar?
engSearchText:
I've always wanted to become a witch! And what's a
witch without a familiar?
jpnChrName: 私、魔女になって使い魔を 使役するのが密かな夢だったの！！
jpnSearchText:
私、魔女になって使い魔を
使役するのが密かな夢だったの！！

engChrName: Oh, this pupper's just perfect—strong, clever, and loyal, too!
engSearchText:
Oh, this pupper's just perfect—strong, clever, and
loyal, too!
jpnChrName: そう丁度こんな理想の黒犬で 強くて何より利口で従順で私の無二の──！！
jpnSearchText:
そう丁度こんな理想の黒犬で
強くて何より利口で従順で私の無二の──！！

engChrName: ...I think she's broken.
engSearchText: ...I think she's broken.
jpnChrName: お、おねーちゃんがこわれた……
jpnSearchText: お、おねーちゃんがこわれた……

engChrName: Hey, c'mon, lemme have a turn! I wanna pet the dog, too!
engSearchText:
Hey, c'mon, lemme have a turn! I wanna pet the
dog, too!
jpnChrName: おいシーナ、大丈夫かよっ！？ つーか満足したなら早く代われよなっ！！
jpnSearchText:
おいシーナ、大丈夫かよっ！？
つーか満足したなら早く代われよなっ！！

engChrName: Heehee... Oh, I can't stand the cuteness. It'd be nice to have a fluffier one, but this'll do just fine!
engSearchText:
Heehee... Oh, I can't stand the cuteness. It'd be nice
to have a fluffier one, but this'll do just fine!
jpnChrName: はぁぁ～カワイイ……… 妄想だと毛並みフサフサだったけど案外これも……
jpnSearchText:
はぁぁ～カワイイ………
妄想だと毛並みフサフサだったけど案外これも……

engChrName: Harry to Sheena! Are you listening?!
engSearchText: Harry to Sheena! Are you listening?!
jpnChrName: おいシーナ、聞いてんのかよっ！？
jpnSearchText: おいシーナ、聞いてんのかよっ！？

engChrName: Harry and I have been getting the groceries together recently.
engSearchText:
Harry and I have been getting the groceries
together recently.
jpnChrName: 食材の買い出し、最近は 私とハリーでやってるんです。
jpnSearchText:
食材の買い出し、最近は
私とハリーでやってるんです。

engChrName: He's really strong, so he carries most of the bags. *sigh* I'm kinda jealous.
engSearchText:
He's really strong, so he carries most of the bags.
*sigh* I'm kinda jealous.
jpnChrName: ふう、やっぱり男の子は力持ちだなぁ…… ちょっと悔しいかも。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、やっぱり男の子は力持ちだなぁ……
ちょっと悔しいかも。

engChrName: But I make up for it in smarts. He always forgets what to buy at the store, so I've got that on him!
engSearchText:
But I make up for it in smarts. He always forgets
what to buy at the store, so I've got that on him!
jpnChrName: おバカだから付き添わないと 買い忘ればっかりで、ヒドイんですけどね。
jpnSearchText:
おバカだから付き添わないと
買い忘ればっかりで、ヒドイんですけどね。

engChrName: Listen up, newbies! I have a mission for you!
engSearchText: Listen up, newbies! I have a mission for you!
jpnChrName: 喜べ、新兵ども！ 貴様らに任務をくれてやる！
jpnSearchText:
喜べ、新兵ども！
貴様らに任務をくれてやる！

engChrName: We have a, uh...a deserter in our midst! Your orders are to find them and bring them to me!
engSearchText:
We have a, uh...a deserter in our midst! Your orders
are to find them and bring them to me!
jpnChrName: 残念なことに我が軍から脱走者が出た。 とっとと見つけ出して私の前にしょっぴけ！！
jpnSearchText:
残念なことに我が軍から脱走者が出た。
とっとと見つけ出して私の前にしょっぴけ！！

engChrName: Their punishment: we'll TICKLE them to death! Mwahahahaaa!
engSearchText:
Their punishment: we'll TICKLE them to death!
Mwahahahaaa!
jpnChrName: 逃亡罪は？　そうだ重罪だ！ クククッ、死ぬまでくすぐり尽くしてやるわ……！
jpnSearchText:
逃亡罪は？　そうだ重罪だ！
クククッ、死ぬまでくすぐり尽くしてやるわ……！

engChrName: Your target's name is Étoile! Don't let them get away!
engSearchText: Your target's name is Étoile! Don't let them get away!
jpnChrName: 標的の名は『エトワール』！ いいな、絶対に逃がすなよっ！！
jpnSearchText:
標的の名は『エトワール』！
いいな、絶対に逃がすなよっ！！

engChrName: Yes, ma'am!
engSearchText: Yes, ma'am!
engHtmlText: 新兵ハリー＆新兵マーク
jpnChrName: おーっ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>おーっ！！

engChrName: Wow, you guys're really gettin' into the roles, huh? Like little movie stars.
engSearchText:
