Wow, you guys're really gettin' into the roles, huh?
Like little movie stars.
jpnChrName: おー、今日の演技は気合入ってんなぁ。
jpnSearchText: おー、今日の演技は気合入ってんなぁ。

engChrName: (Shh! The best part's coming up!)
engSearchText: (Shh! The best part's coming up!)
jpnChrName: （シーッ！　今いい所なんですから！）
jpnSearchText: （シーッ！　今いい所なんですから！）

engChrName: (You're quite the actress, Sheena! Heehee.)
engSearchText: (You're quite the actress, Sheena! Heehee.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……シーナちゃんって時々   びっくりするくらいなりきりますよね……）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……シーナちゃんって時々
びっくりするくらいなりきりますよね……）

engChrName: (Honestly, I'm kinda tired of running around... We've been playing sooooo much lately.)
engSearchText:
(Honestly, I'm kinda tired of running around...
We've been playing sooooo much lately.)
jpnChrName: （実をいうと、最近二人の遊びに   朝から晩まで付き合わされて、くたくたで……）
jpnSearchText:
（実をいうと、最近二人の遊びに
朝から晩まで付き合わされて、くたくたで……）

engChrName: (And the next book in my favorite series just came out! Now I can sneak away and read it while they're out playing.)
engSearchText:
(And the next book in my favorite series just
came out! Now I can sneak away and read it while
they're out playing.)
jpnChrName: （これで二人が猫探しに出かけたら   久々に新刊の小説でも読もうかな～♪）
jpnSearchText:
（これで二人が猫探しに出かけたら
久々に新刊の小説でも読もうかな～♪）

engChrName: (I see... So this 'mission' is little more than a front.)
engSearchText: (I see... So this 'mission' is little more than a front.)
jpnChrName: （成程、この作戦の真意は   そこにあったのですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（成程、この作戦の真意は
そこにあったのですね。）

engChrName: (Huh, you make it make sense when you say it like that.)
engSearchText:
(Huh, you make it make sense when you say it
like that.)
jpnChrName: （新手のあしらい方だな。   ……ＳＣ殿が言うと冗談に聞こえんが。）
jpnSearchText:
（新手のあしらい方だな。
……ＳＣ殿が言うと冗談に聞こえんが。）

engChrName: Dad! You can be so useless sometimes. I'll talk to Mom, she'll know what to do!
engSearchText:
Dad! You can be so useless sometimes. I'll talk
to Mom, she'll know what to do!
jpnChrName: も～、お父さんじゃ話になんない…… お母さんに相談しないと……！
jpnSearchText:
も～、お父さんじゃ話になんない……
お母さんに相談しないと……！

engChrName: I know Harry can't just be by himself, and I hang out with him a lot already, but still...
engSearchText:
I know Harry can't just be by himself, and I hang out
with him a lot already, but still...
jpnChrName: ……ハリーの面倒見るのは慣れてるし、 一人暮らしできないのもわかるけど……
jpnSearchText:
……ハリーの面倒見るのは慣れてるし、
一人暮らしできないのもわかるけど……

engChrName: I-It just doesn't feel right!
engSearchText: I-It just doesn't feel right!
jpnChrName: そ、それとこれとは話が別なんだってばーっ！！
jpnSearchText: そ、それとこれとは話が別なんだってばーっ！！

engChrName: 'A word I learned recently,' huh...? I wonder what to pick!
engSearchText:
'A word I learned recently,' huh...? I wonder what
to pick!
jpnChrName: “最近覚えた言葉”かぁ…… 迷っちゃうな～♪
jpnSearchText:
“最近覚えた言葉”かぁ……
迷っちゃうな～♪

engChrName: I pick up a lot of new words from books, so that's easy. But maybe I should go with something different? Maybe more romantic? Hmm...
engSearchText:
I pick up a lot of new words from books, so
that's easy. But maybe I should go with
something different? Maybe more romantic? Hmm...
jpnChrName: 小説で読んだ言葉もいいし…… 花言葉もロマンチックでステキかも～！
jpnSearchText:
小説で読んだ言葉もいいし……
花言葉もロマンチックでステキかも～！

engChrName: Your song's kinda hard to sing... It makes my teeth all weird.
engSearchText:
Your song's kinda hard to sing... It makes my teeth
all weird.
jpnChrName: なんかシーナの歌って、歯が浮いて 歌いにくそうだな～？
jpnSearchText:
なんかシーナの歌って、歯が浮いて
歌いにくそうだな～？

engChrName: Can you be quiet, Harry?
engSearchText: Can you be quiet, Harry?
jpnChrName: ……ハリーは黙ってて。
jpnSearchText: ……ハリーは黙ってて。

engChrName: Harry hasn't had a mom since he was really little...
engSearchText: Harry hasn't had a mom since he was really little...
jpnChrName: ハリーには小さい頃からお母さんがいなくて……
jpnSearchText: ハリーには小さい頃からお母さんがいなくて……

engChrName: And Mr. Hawker always has work, so it's hard for them both...
engSearchText:
And Mr. Hawker always has work, so it's hard for
them both...
jpnChrName: ホーカーおじさんも仕事があるから 結構大変なんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ホーカーおじさんも仕事があるから
結構大変なんですよね。

engChrName: I guess compared to that, I have it easy...so I shouldn't complain about having to look after him.
engSearchText:
I guess compared to that, I have it easy...so I
shouldn't complain about having to look after him.
jpnChrName: 私もよく知ってるから……まあお子様な ハリーの世話くらい、してあげなくもないです。
jpnSearchText:
私もよく知ってるから……まあお子様な
ハリーの世話くらい、してあげなくもないです。

engChrName: Heehee, they both look so happy when they're asleep...
engSearchText:
Heehee, they both look so happy when
they're asleep...
jpnChrName: それにしても二人して 幸せそうな顔で寝ちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても二人して
幸せそうな顔で寝ちゃって……

engChrName: *sigh* What makes boys so carefree?
engSearchText: *sigh* What makes boys so carefree?
jpnChrName: ふう、男の子ってどーしてこう 自由気ままな生き物なのかなぁ～？
jpnSearchText:
ふう、男の子ってどーしてこう
自由気ままな生き物なのかなぁ～？

engChrName: Oh, hi, Feri! Wait, if you're here, does that mean...?
engSearchText: Oh, hi, Feri! Wait, if you're here, does that mean...?
jpnChrName: あ、フェリさんだ！　こんにちは～！ もしかして今日は……
jpnSearchText:
あ、フェリさんだ！　こんにちは～！
もしかして今日は……

engChrName: Yup! I'm officially working part time!
engSearchText: Yup! I'm officially working part time!
jpnChrName: はいっ、本格的なお仕事です！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、本格的なお仕事です！

engChrName: First objective: scouting Edith's terrain and chokepoints. Sniper spots are big in these close quarters—gotta check for those, too!
engSearchText:
First objective: scouting Edith's terrain
and chokepoints. Sniper spots are big in these close
quarters—gotta check for those, too!
jpnChrName: イーディスの主要な地形と重要拠点…… あと狙撃ポイントもチェックしておかないと！
jpnSearchText:
イーディスの主要な地形と重要拠点……
あと狙撃ポイントもチェックしておかないと！

engChrName: Umm, maybe you could relax a little bit...
engSearchText: Umm, maybe you could relax a little bit...
jpnChrName: えっとその、もう少し 肩の力を抜いた方が……
jpnSearchText:
えっとその、もう少し
肩の力を抜いた方が……

engChrName: (She's so cool, though! A real life warrior!)
engSearchText: (She's so cool, though! A real life warrior!)
jpnChrName: （でもフェリさんは本物の“戦士”   なんですよね……うーんカッコイイ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（でもフェリさんは本物の“戦士”
なんですよね……うーんカッコイイ……！）

engChrName: Are you guys playing hide and seek? Cool, heehee! Just be careful, okay?
engSearchText:
Are you guys playing hide and seek? Cool, heehee!
Just be careful, okay?
jpnChrName: シーナたちは隠れんぼですか？ ふふ、怪我のないようにしてくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
シーナたちは隠れんぼですか？
ふふ、怪我のないようにしてくださいね！

engChrName: Uh-huh, we will! You guys take care, too!
engSearchText: Uh-huh, we will! You guys take care, too!
jpnChrName: あはは、大丈夫です！ フェリさんもどうかお気をつけて！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、大丈夫です！
フェリさんもどうかお気をつけて！

engChrName: *sigh* Yumé's just too strong... I have to pull out my ace in the hole!
engSearchText:
*sigh* Yumé's just too strong... I have to pull out my
ace in the hole!
jpnChrName: ふう、ユメちゃんも中々隙がないっていうか…… ……仕方ない、こうなったら……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ユメちゃんも中々隙がないっていうか……
……仕方ない、こうなったら……

engChrName: Harry, let's team u... Wait, where'd he go? He's gone!
engSearchText:
Harry, let's team u... Wait, where'd he go?
He's gone!
jpnChrName: ハリー、同時に仕掛けるわよ……！ ──ってあれ、姿が見えなくなったけど……？
jpnSearchText:
ハリー、同時に仕掛けるわよ……！
──ってあれ、姿が見えなくなったけど……？

engChrName: He's up to something, I can just tell... I have a bad feeling about this.
engSearchText:
He's up to something, I can just tell... I have a bad
feeling about this.
jpnChrName: なんだか嫌な予感がする…… ……何か企んでるんじゃないでしょーね……
jpnSearchText:
なんだか嫌な予感がする……
……何か企んでるんじゃないでしょーね……

engChrName: Hi, Van! Who's the girl with you?
engSearchText: Hi, Van! Who's the girl with you?
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさんこんにちは！ ……えっと、そっちの人は……
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンさんこんにちは！
……えっと、そっちの人は……

engChrName: Yo. She's my new part-timer.
engSearchText: Yo. She's my new part-timer.
jpnChrName: ああ、ウチの新米のバイトでな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ウチの新米のバイトでな。

engChrName: My name is Agnès Claudel. Pleased to meet you!
engSearchText: My name is Agnès Claudel. Pleased to meet you!
jpnChrName: アニエス・クローデルといいます。 よろしくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス・クローデルといいます。
よろしくお願いしますね。

engChrName: Huh?! Agnès?!
engSearchText: Huh?! Agnès?!
jpnChrName: ア──“アニエス”！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>ア──“アニエス”！？

engChrName: U-Umm, yes? That's my name.
engSearchText: U-Umm, yes? That's my name.
jpnChrName: え、ええ……そうですけど……
jpnSearchText: え、ええ……そうですけど……

engChrName: This! Right here! I was just re-reading 'Sunshine Agnès'!
engSearchText:
This! Right here! I was just re-reading
'Sunshine Agnès'!
jpnChrName: これですこれ……！！　丁度いま読み返してる 小説『陽溜りのアニエス』！！
jpnSearchText:
これですこれ……！！　丁度いま読み返してる
小説『陽溜りのアニエス』！！

engChrName: You have the same name as her!
engSearchText: You have the same name as her!
jpnChrName: その主人公と同じ名前じゃないですか～！！
jpnSearchText: その主人公と同じ名前じゃないですか～！！

engChrName: Oh, yeah. That book really blew up a few years back.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. That book really blew up a few years back.
jpnChrName: そういや、何年か前に そんな本が流行ったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや、何年か前に
そんな本が流行ったな。

engChrName: Ahh, that takes me back. I quite enjoyed that novel myself, growing up.
engSearchText:
Ahh, that takes me back. I quite enjoyed that novel
myself, growing up.
jpnChrName: あはは、懐かしいですね…… 私も愛読していました。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、懐かしいですね……
私も愛読していました。

engChrName: She's a girl with an icy exterior, but she's strong and dashing all the same...
engSearchText:
She's a girl with an icy exterior, but she's strong and
dashing all the same...
jpnChrName: 主人公のアニエスがそっけないけど 芯が強くて、カッコ良くて……
jpnSearchText:
主人公のアニエスがそっけないけど
芯が強くて、カッコ良くて……

engChrName: ...and I still remember the ending well. It really stays with you.
engSearchText:
...and I still remember the ending well. It really stays
with you.
jpnChrName: 切ない終わり方も 胸に残る物があるんですよね……
jpnSearchText:
切ない終わり方も
胸に残る物があるんですよね……

engChrName: Right?! And her whole backstory is just sooo cool!
engSearchText: Right?! And her whole backstory is just sooo cool!
jpnChrName: そうそう！　それにこの『魔法使い』の 設定もたまらないっていうか……！
jpnSearchText:
そうそう！　それにこの『魔法使い』の
設定もたまらないっていうか……！

engChrName: I just love how, umm...ambiguous! That's the word! I love how ambiguous her story is.
engSearchText:
I just love how, umm...ambiguous! That's the word!
I love how ambiguous her story is.
jpnChrName: むふー！！　あたしこういう ちょっと謎めいた話が大好きで！！
jpnSearchText:
むふー！！　あたしこういう
ちょっと謎めいた話が大好きで！！

engChrName: They don't really talk about the ending much, like... What happens on the bus at the end? It's so mysterious!
engSearchText:
They don't really talk about the ending much, like...
What happens on the bus at the end? It's
so mysterious!
jpnChrName: だって色々想像する余地があるじゃないですか～！ もしかすると別の結末だって……！！
jpnSearchText:
だって色々想像する余地があるじゃないですか～！
もしかすると別の結末だって……！！

engChrName: (Hah. Went and flipped her switch, Agnès.)
engSearchText: (Hah. Went and flipped her switch, Agnès.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、なんかスイッチが   入っちまったみたいだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、なんかスイッチが
入っちまったみたいだな。）

engChrName: (Reading is a wonderful hobby to have at her age. I think we'll get along just fine!)
engSearchText:
(Reading is a wonderful hobby to have at her age.
I think we'll get along just fine!)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、本が大好きなんですね。   なんだか仲良くなれそうな気がします。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ、本が大好きなんですね。
なんだか仲良くなれそうな気がします。）

engChrName: I was just finishing Sunshine Agnès, and then I meet someone with the same name? What are the odds?!
engSearchText:
I was just finishing Sunshine Agnès, and then I meet
someone with the same name? What are the odds?!
jpnChrName: まさか愛読書の主人公と 同じ名前なんて……驚いちゃいました！
jpnSearchText:
まさか愛読書の主人公と
同じ名前なんて……驚いちゃいました！

engChrName: I wish I could chat more, but I can feel a tantrum coming on. Harry gets cranky right about now.
engSearchText:
I wish I could chat more, but I can feel a tantrum
coming on. Harry gets cranky right about now.
jpnChrName: 色々お話ししたいですけど、たぶん そろそろハリーが騒ぎ始めそうな予感が……
jpnSearchText:
色々お話ししたいですけど、たぶん
そろそろハリーが騒ぎ始めそうな予感が……

engChrName: *sigh* Harry lives next door to me.
engSearchText: *sigh* Harry lives next door to me.
jpnChrName: ふう、ハリーとは 家が隣同士で腐れ縁なんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ハリーとは
家が隣同士で腐れ縁なんです。

engChrName: He's a big dummy, but he's not BAD... Just, he's had it kinda rough. I help Mr. Hawker look after him.
engSearchText:
He's a big dummy, but he's not BAD... Just, he's had
it kinda rough. I help Mr. Hawker look after him.
jpnChrName: おバカだけど、悪い奴じゃないし…… まあホーカーおじさんにも頼まれてますから～。
jpnSearchText:
おバカだけど、悪い奴じゃないし……
まあホーカーおじさんにも頼まれてますから～。

engChrName: Harry's a real bonehead, but I know it's been rough for him. And we ARE next-door neighbors, after all.
engSearchText:
Harry's a real bonehead, but I know it's been rough
for him. And we ARE next-door neighbors, after all.
jpnChrName: ハリーはおバカだけど、隣同士だし ……家の事情も知ってるから……
jpnSearchText:
ハリーはおバカだけど、隣同士だし
……家の事情も知ってるから……

engChrName: He really gets along with Mark, so I see him a lot anyway.
engSearchText:
He really gets along with Mark, so I see him a
lot anyway.
jpnChrName: あと弟のマークの相手もしてくれるし、 しょーがないから気にかけてやらなくもないです。
jpnSearchText:
あと弟のマークの相手もしてくれるし、
しょーがないから気にかけてやらなくもないです。

engChrName: ...But if he tries anything funny with me, I'm gonna wreck him.
engSearchText:
...But if he tries anything funny with me, I'm gonna
wreck him.
jpnChrName: ……まあくだらないイタズラを仕掛けてきたら 容赦なくこらしめますけどね～。
jpnSearchText:
……まあくだらないイタズラを仕掛けてきたら
容赦なくこらしめますけどね～。

engChrName: Oh! Hi, Van!
engSearchText: Oh! Hi, Van!
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさんこんにちは～！
jpnSearchText: あ、ヴァンさんこんにちは～！

engChrName: Yo... Err, wait. What are you doin' here?
engSearchText: Yo... Err, wait. What are you doin' here?
jpnChrName: おう、……ってこんな所で何してるんだ？
jpnSearchText: おう、……ってこんな所で何してるんだ？

engChrName: Oh, heehee, nothing at all! Just looking for Harry.
engSearchText: Oh, heehee, nothing at all! Just looking for Harry.
jpnChrName: うふふ、なんでもないんですよ？ ちょ～っとハリーを探してるだけで♪
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、なんでもないんですよ？
ちょ～っとハリーを探してるだけで♪

engChrName: I went to go read my favorite novel, but there was a little comic book there instead! I just wanna talk to him about it, I promise! ♪
engSearchText:
I went to go read my favorite novel, but there was a
little comic book there instead! I just wanna talk to
him about it, I promise! ♪
jpnChrName: 今朝愛読書を読もうとしたら、中身がくだらない コミックにすり替えられてたからその件で☆
jpnSearchText:
今朝愛読書を読もうとしたら、中身がくだらない
コミックにすり替えられてたからその件で☆

engChrName: Hoo, boy. Don't terrorize him TOO much, 'kay?
engSearchText: Hoo, boy. Don't terrorize him TOO much, 'kay?
jpnChrName: やれやれ……ま、仕返しもほどほどにな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ……ま、仕返しもほどほどにな。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah! Heehee!
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah! Heehee!
jpnChrName: はぁ～い、わかってますってば！
jpnSearchText: はぁ～い、わかってますってば！

engChrName: (Van seems quite popular with the children here... Interesting.)
engSearchText:
(Van seems quite popular with the children here...
Interesting.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……近所の子供たちにも   懐かれてるみたいですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……近所の子供たちにも
懐かれてるみたいですね……）

engChrName: Harry? Come on out!
engSearchText: Harry? Come on out!
jpnChrName: ハリー？　出てきなさーい！
jpnSearchText: ハリー？　出てきなさーい！

engChrName: C'mon, pleeease? You don't want me to start tearing up your comic book, do you? ♪
engSearchText:
C'mon, pleeease? You don't want me to start tearing
up your comic book, do you? ♪
jpnChrName: うふふ、早く出てこないと アンタのコミック、破り捨てるわよ～っ？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、早く出てこないと
アンタのコミック、破り捨てるわよ～っ？

engChrName: So, Harry was up to his old pranking games again, huh?
engSearchText:
So, Harry was up to his old pranking games
again, huh?
jpnChrName: ハリーのやつ、今日はそんなイタズラを……
jpnSearchText: ハリーのやつ、今日はそんなイタズラを……

engChrName: Then after pulling one over you, he flew the coop on his bike? Hahaha! That kid's got no shame!
engSearchText:
Then after pulling one over you, he flew the coop
on his bike? Hahaha! That kid's got no shame!
jpnChrName: そのうえ女の子相手に自転車で逃走なんざ 太いヤツだな、はっはっは！
jpnSearchText:
そのうえ女の子相手に自転車で逃走なんざ
太いヤツだな、はっはっは！

engChrName: I know, right?! I wasn't about to take that lying down, so I threw a bucket at him. And it landed clean on his head!
engSearchText:
I know, right?! I wasn't about to take that lying
down, so I threw a bucket at him. And it landed
clean on his head!
jpnChrName: でしょ～！？　だからバケツを投げつけてやったら 頭にスポーンってハマっちゃって。
jpnSearchText:
でしょ～！？　だからバケツを投げつけてやったら
頭にスポーンってハマっちゃって。

engChrName: But get this: He STILL got away—even though he couldn't see where he was going! Like, how?!
engSearchText:
But get this: He STILL got away—even though he
couldn't see where he was going! Like, how?!
jpnChrName: ……よくあんな状態で自転車こげるな～って 思いますけどね、もう！
jpnSearchText:
……よくあんな状態で自転車こげるな～って
思いますけどね、もう！

engChrName: Hahaha! I'm not even sure who the victim is anymore!
engSearchText: Hahaha! I'm not even sure who the victim is anymore!
jpnChrName: はっはっは！　もはや誰が鬼だか分からんな！
jpnSearchText: はっはっは！　もはや誰が鬼だか分からんな！

engChrName: In all seriousness, though, thanks for keeping him company. You're the whole reason Harry doesn't feel lonely.
engSearchText:
In all seriousness, though, thanks for keeping him
company. You're the whole reason Harry doesn't
feel lonely.
jpnChrName: しかしまあなんだ……今日もありがとな。 ハリーが寂しがらないのは、シーナ達のお陰だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあなんだ……今日もありがとな。
ハリーが寂しがらないのは、シーナ達のお陰だぜ。

engChrName: Oh, umm... Don't mention it, sir! You can always count on me to keep an eye on him and Mark!
engSearchText:
Oh, umm... Don't mention it, sir! You can always
count on me to keep an eye on him and Mark!
jpnChrName: あはは……ど～いたしまして！ まあどうせマークの面倒を見るついでですから～。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……ど～いたしまして！
まあどうせマークの面倒を見るついでですから～。

engChrName: Sorry I'm late. I was talkin' to Hawker about some stuff.
engSearchText:
Sorry I'm late. I was talkin' to Hawker about
some stuff.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、迎えに来るのが遅れて。 ちょっとホーカーと話し込んでてさ。
jpnSearchText:
悪いな、迎えに来るのが遅れて。
ちょっとホーカーと話し込んでてさ。

engChrName: So, he's actually goin' on a business trip soon. He's gonna be in Oración for a month.
engSearchText:
So, he's actually goin' on a business trip soon.
He's gonna be in Oración for a month.
jpnChrName: ……実はあいつ、一ヶ月ほど 出張することになりそうなんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
……実はあいつ、一ヶ月ほど
出張することになりそうなんだよ。

engChrName: Really? A whole month?
engSearchText: Really? A whole month?
jpnChrName: え、一ヶ月出張？　ホーカーおじさんが？
jpnSearchText: え、一ヶ月出張？　ホーカーおじさんが？

engChrName: Yup. So, Harry will be living with us while his dad's away. You don't mind that, do you?
engSearchText:
Yup. So, Harry will be living with us while his
dad's away. You don't mind that, do you?
jpnChrName: そうそう、でもってその一ヶ月、 ハリーがうちで暮らす事になりそうなんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、でもってその一ヶ月、
ハリーがうちで暮らす事になりそうなんだ。

engChrName: Wha...? HUUUH?!
engSearchText: Wha...? HUUUH?!
jpnChrName: え゛……… ええええええええ～～～っ！？
jpnSearchText:
え゛………
ええええええええ～～～っ！？

engChrName: B-B-But we only have one kid's room! What're we gonna do?!
engSearchText:
B-B-But we only have one kid's room! What're we
gonna do?!
jpnChrName: どど、どうするのよお父さん～！！ うち子供部屋だって１つしかないんだよ！？
jpnSearchText:
どど、どうするのよお父さん～！！
うち子供部屋だって１つしかないんだよ！？

engChrName: Oh, don't be so shy about it. You two are always having sleepovers anyway!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't be so shy about it. You two are always
having sleepovers anyway!
jpnChrName: はは、何を恥ずかしがってるんだシーナ。 ハリーとはよく一緒に雑魚寝してるじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
はは、何を恥ずかしがってるんだシーナ。
ハリーとはよく一緒に雑魚寝してるじゃないか。

engChrName: We might as well be family at this point. Now that I think about it, do you two still take baths together?
engSearchText:
We might as well be family at this point. Now that I
think about it, do you two still take baths together?
jpnChrName: 風呂だって一緒に入ってるんだし とっくに家族みたいなもんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
風呂だって一緒に入ってるんだし
とっくに家族みたいなもんだろう？

engChrName: That's not the same! And we stopped doing that years ago!
engSearchText:
That's not the same! And we stopped doing that
years ago!
jpnChrName: お、お風呂は２年前までだから！！ 小さい頃と一緒にしないでよ、も～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
お、お風呂は２年前までだから！！
小さい頃と一緒にしないでよ、も～っ！！

engChrName: My word, this is incredible! It's good as new!
engSearchText: My word, this is incredible! It's good as new!
jpnChrName: いや～素晴らしい！ ぺしゃんこだった腕時計が新品同然じゃないか～！
jpnSearchText:
いや～素晴らしい！
ぺしゃんこだった腕時計が新品同然じゃないか～！

engChrName: This watch was a memento from my father... I couldn't bear to part with it.
engSearchText:
This watch was a memento from my father...
I couldn't bear to part with it.
jpnChrName: これは父の形見でね、 どうしても諦めたくなかったんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
これは父の形見でね、
どうしても諦めたくなかったんだよ。

engChrName: Is the young lady over there to thank? Might I offer a word of gratitude to her?
engSearchText:
Is the young lady over there to thank? Might I offer a
word of gratitude to her?
jpnChrName: もしかして向こうにいる娘さんが 直してくれたのかい？　ぜひ一言お礼を──
jpnSearchText:
もしかして向こうにいる娘さんが
直してくれたのかい？　ぜひ一言お礼を──

engChrName: She's got her head buried in another project right now, but I'll pass that on to her.
engSearchText:
She's got her head buried in another project right
now, but I'll pass that on to her.
jpnChrName: では、お気持ち伝えておきますね！ 姉は別の仕事に取り掛かっておりますので……
jpnSearchText:
では、お気持ち伝えておきますね！
姉は別の仕事に取り掛かっておりますので……

engChrName: I see, she must be quite busy. At any rate, you two have my gratitude!
engSearchText:
I see, she must be quite busy. At any rate, you two
have my gratitude!
jpnChrName: おっとそうか、忙しいみたいだね…… それじゃあそうしてもらえるかな？
jpnSearchText:
おっとそうか、忙しいみたいだね……
それじゃあそうしてもらえるかな？

engChrName: I must say, I'm shocked that they accepted my request so quickly.
engSearchText:
I must say, I'm shocked that they accepted my
request so quickly.
jpnChrName: 腕時計の修理、まさか 二つ返事で引き受けてもらえるなんてね……！
jpnSearchText:
腕時計の修理、まさか
二つ返事で引き受けてもらえるなんてね……！

engChrName: I had feared that this watch was a lost cause after it got ran over by that car...
engSearchText:
I had feared that this watch was a lost cause after it
got ran over by that car...
jpnChrName: 導力車に轢かれて見るも無残なのに、 いやはや大したものだよ！
jpnSearchText:
導力車に轢かれて見るも無残なのに、
いやはや大したものだよ！

engChrName: I know it'll take time, but I'll wait as long as I need to. Anything to see that watch fixed!
engSearchText:
I know it'll take time, but I'll wait as long as I need to.
Anything to see that watch fixed!
jpnChrName: 時間は掛かっちゃうらしいけど 期待して待ってるとしようかな！
jpnSearchText:
時間は掛かっちゃうらしいけど
期待して待ってるとしようかな！

engChrName: I heard there was this shop in Old Town that could repair just about anything.
engSearchText:
I heard there was this shop in Old Town that
could repair just about anything.
jpnChrName: 旧市街に、なんでも修理できる店が あるって聞いてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
旧市街に、なんでも修理できる店が
あるって聞いてねぇ。

engChrName: I wonder if they can fix my watch. It got run over by a car the other day...
engSearchText:
I wonder if they can fix my watch. It got run over by a
car the other day...
jpnChrName: ……導力車に踏み潰された腕時計でも 直せたりするのかな？
jpnSearchText:
……導力車に踏み潰された腕時計でも
直せたりするのかな？

engChrName: Well, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to ask.
engSearchText: Well, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to ask.
jpnChrName: はは、まあダメ元で訪ねてみるとしようかな。
jpnSearchText: はは、まあダメ元で訪ねてみるとしようかな。

engChrName: I came here on a friend's recommendation—they told me there was a shop here that could fix just about anything.
engSearchText:
I came here on a friend's recommendation—they told
me there was a shop here that could fix just
about anything.
jpnChrName: 旧市街に、なんでも修理できる店が あるって聞いて訪ねてきたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
旧市街に、なんでも修理できる店が
あるって聞いて訪ねてきたんだよ。

engChrName: Now that I'm here, though, I dare say this place has me charmed! Most old streets aren't preserved quite this well. Maybe I'll look around for a bit.
engSearchText:
Now that I'm here, though, I dare say this place has
me charmed! Most old streets aren't preserved quite
this well. Maybe I'll look around for a bit.
jpnChrName: しかし今時珍しいくらい古い町並みだよねぇ。 一回り見物してから向かおうかな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし今時珍しいくらい古い町並みだよねぇ。
一回り見物してから向かおうかな。

engChrName: We've got food here, so if need be, we can make the rounds and keep the neighborhood stocked up.
engSearchText:
We've got food here, so if need be, we can make the
rounds and keep the neighborhood stocked up.
jpnChrName: うちには食料もあるし、いざとなったら ご近所に配らせてもらうさ。
jpnSearchText:
うちには食料もあるし、いざとなったら
ご近所に配らせてもらうさ。

engChrName: You folks best be careful, okay? Come back in one piece!
engSearchText:
You folks best be careful, okay? Come back in
one piece!
jpnChrName: ……あんたたちも気をつけるんだよ！ きっと無事に戻ってきておくれ！
jpnSearchText:
……あんたたちも気をつけるんだよ！
きっと無事に戻ってきておくれ！

engChrName: Aye, welcome! The festival's made us all busy bees here.
engSearchText:
Aye, welcome! The festival's made us all busy
bees here.
jpnChrName: あいよ、いらっしゃい！ 今日は記念祭だけあって大忙しだねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
あいよ、いらっしゃい！
今日は記念祭だけあって大忙しだねぇ！

engChrName: You doing the rounds, too? I imagine you're buzzing around town for work.
engSearchText:
You doing the rounds, too? I imagine you're buzzing
around town for work.
jpnChrName: アンタたちも見て回ってるのかい？ アハハ、どうせ仕事半分なんだろうけど。
jpnSearchText:
アンタたちも見て回ってるのかい？
アハハ、どうせ仕事半分なんだろうけど。

engChrName: Make sure you find time to take a breather! Hang in there!
engSearchText:
Make sure you find time to take a breather! Hang
in there!
jpnChrName: たまには息抜きもするんだよ？ 張り切って行ってきな！
jpnSearchText:
たまには息抜きもするんだよ？
張り切って行ってきな！

engChrName: Montmart was completely booked tonight, I heard.
engSearchText: Montmart was completely booked tonight, I heard.
jpnChrName: 今晩のモンマルトは 貸し切りだったんだってねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
今晩のモンマルトは
貸し切りだったんだってねぇ。

engChrName: I'm glad you guys get to relax, now that the mafia's died down a bit.
engSearchText:
I'm glad you guys get to relax, now that the mafia's
died down a bit.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、マフィアの件も一件落着したし アンタたちが羽を伸ばせたのなら良かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、マフィアの件も一件落着したし
アンタたちが羽を伸ばせたのなら良かったよ。

engChrName: I get the feeling this year's festival is gonna be a real barn burner, so you gotta rest up and recharge your batteries while you can!
engSearchText:
I get the feeling this year's festival is gonna be a real
barn burner, so you gotta rest up and recharge your
batteries while you can!
jpnChrName: 今年の記念祭は賑わいそうな気がするし、 今のうちに英気を養っておくんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
今年の記念祭は賑わいそうな気がするし、
今のうちに英気を養っておくんだよ！

engChrName: Now then, that should get me through the festival.
engSearchText: Now then, that should get me through the festival.
jpnChrName: さて、記念祭の仕入れは こんな所かねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さて、記念祭の仕入れは
こんな所かねぇ。

engChrName: ...What IS Eddy up to, actually?
engSearchText: ...What IS Eddy up to, actually?
jpnChrName: ……そういやエディは どこで何をしてるんだか……
jpnSearchText:
……そういやエディは
どこで何をしてるんだか……

engChrName: He's been going out a lot recently. He said he had some kind of idea, but he wouldn't tell me what.
engSearchText:
He's been going out a lot recently. He said he had
some kind of idea, but he wouldn't tell me what.
jpnChrName: 何か考えがあるって言って 最近よく出かけていくんだけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
何か考えがあるって言って
最近よく出かけていくんだけどねぇ……

engChrName: Eddy came back home the other day, but he told me he's 'just crashing here.' Turned his nose up to helping out around the house.
engSearchText:
Eddy came back home the other day, but he told me
he's 'just crashing here.' Turned his nose up to
helping out around the house.
jpnChrName: この前から息子が戻ってるんだけど…… 家の手伝いはしたくないって言ってねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
この前から息子が戻ってるんだけど……
家の手伝いはしたくないって言ってねぇ。

engChrName: What's the boy thinking? He's just roaming the streets without a thought in that head of his.
engSearchText:
What's the boy thinking? He's just roaming the
streets without a thought in that head of his.
jpnChrName: なにか一人でウロウロしてるんだけど、 ……一体何を考えてるんだか。
jpnSearchText:
なにか一人でウロウロしてるんだけど、
……一体何を考えてるんだか。

engChrName: *sigh* Well, I've tried all I can. I guess I have to just let him be.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Well, I've tried all I can. I guess I have to just
let him be.
jpnChrName: ふう、まあいいさ。 しばらくは好きにさせておこうかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、まあいいさ。
しばらくは好きにさせておこうかねぇ。

engChrName: Anyhow, if there's anything you need, I can ring you up here!
engSearchText:
Anyhow, if there's anything you need, I can ring you
up here!
jpnChrName: さあさあ、入用な物があれば 買って行っておくれよ！
jpnSearchText:
さあさあ、入用な物があれば
買って行っておくれよ！

engChrName: With the festival coming up, it's a good idea to buy your gifts and other stuff early. You never know when the rush will hit.
engSearchText:
With the festival coming up, it's a good idea to buy
your gifts and other stuff early. You never know when
the rush will hit.
jpnChrName: 記念祭も近いし、近しい人に 贈り物を買うのもいいかもしれないよ？
jpnSearchText:
記念祭も近いし、近しい人に
贈り物を買うのもいいかもしれないよ？

engChrName: So the mafia were behind all that, were they? Aidios alive, what is this world coming to...?
engSearchText:
So the mafia were behind all that, were they?
Aidios alive, what is this world coming to...?
jpnChrName: 例の事件、マフィアがしでかしたんだって……？ 本当に世の中どうなってるんだか……
jpnSearchText:
例の事件、マフィアがしでかしたんだって……？
本当に世の中どうなってるんだか……

engChrName: Don't let your guard down. I know you deal with a lot of those types.
engSearchText:
Don't let your guard down. I know you deal with a lot
of those types.
jpnChrName: あんたたちも気を付けるんだよ？ 裏の連中と関わる事もあるみたいだし──
jpnSearchText:
あんたたちも気を付けるんだよ？
裏の連中と関わる事もあるみたいだし──

engChrName: And I worry for the girls in your group, out on those streets. You folks be careful, all right?
engSearchText:
And I worry for the girls in your group, out on
those streets. You folks be careful, all right?
jpnChrName: 女子もいるから心配だよ。 無茶だけはするんじゃないよ？
jpnSearchText:
女子もいるから心配だよ。
無茶だけはするんじゃないよ？

engChrName: We'll be fine, don't worry.
engSearchText: We'll be fine, don't worry.
jpnChrName: ああ──分かってるさ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──分かってるさ。

engChrName: (Hmm? Van?)
engSearchText: (Hmm? Van?)
jpnChrName: （？　ヴァンさん……？）
jpnSearchText: （？　ヴァンさん……？）

engChrName: I'm so sorry... I wish I could get him to stop causing so much trouble.
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry... I wish I could get him to stop causing
so much trouble.
jpnChrName: すまないねえ、また息子が 騒がしくしちまってて。
jpnSearchText:
すまないねえ、また息子が
騒がしくしちまってて。

engChrName: He's not as destructive as he used to be, at the very least...
engSearchText:
He's not as destructive as he used to be, at the
very least...
jpnChrName: でもまあ……前よりは落ち着いたよ。
jpnSearchText: でもまあ……前よりは落ち着いたよ。

engChrName: Now if only he'd listen to what his old lady says, I could rest easy at night.
engSearchText:
Now if only he'd listen to what his old lady says, I
could rest easy at night.
jpnChrName: 親の言う事を聞いてくれれば もう少し安心できるんだけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
親の言う事を聞いてくれれば
もう少し安心できるんだけどねぇ。

engChrName: I heard Eddy left that gang he was roaming around with. That's a good start...
engSearchText:
I heard Eddy left that gang he was roaming around
with. That's a good start...
jpnChrName: 息子がロクデナシのチームから 抜けたらしくてね、それは良かったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
息子がロクデナシのチームから
抜けたらしくてね、それは良かったんだけど……

engChrName: ...but he's still dinking around Aidios knows where. Just what is that boy up to?
engSearchText:
...but he's still dinking around Aidios knows where.
Just what is that boy up to?
jpnChrName: ちっとも帰ってくる気配がないのさ。 まったく何をしてるんだか……
jpnSearchText:
ちっとも帰ってくる気配がないのさ。
まったく何をしてるんだか……

engChrName: The next time I see him, I'm gonna screw that head of his back on straight!
engSearchText:
The next time I see him, I'm gonna screw that head
of his back on straight!
jpnChrName: 次に会ったら、今度こそキッチリ説教して 真っ当な人間に更生させなくちゃねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
次に会ったら、今度こそキッチリ説教して
真っ当な人間に更生させなくちゃねぇ！

engChrName: (That doesn't really motivate him to come home, does it?)
engSearchText:
(That doesn't really motivate him to come home,
does it?)
jpnChrName: （そうなるとますます   帰りづらそうですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（そうなるとますます
帰りづらそうですけど……）

engChrName: (Not much we can do but be an ear for their troubles.)
engSearchText:
(Not much we can do but be an ear for
their troubles.)
jpnChrName: （ま、見守るしかねえだろ。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、見守るしかねえだろ。）

engChrName: *sigh* What's Eddy gone and got himself into now? I heard he was in some kind of incident!
engSearchText:
*sigh* What's Eddy gone and got himself into now?
I heard he was in some kind of incident!
jpnChrName: さっき噂で聞いたんだけど…… エディが何か事件に巻き込まれたらしくてねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
さっき噂で聞いたんだけど……
エディが何か事件に巻き込まれたらしくてねぇ！

engChrName: How much does he want to make his poor mom worry? I just wish he'd come back home and talk to me, for once in his life...
engSearchText:
How much does he want to make his poor
mom worry? I just wish he'd come back home and
talk to me, for once in his life...
jpnChrName: はぁ、まったく心配でならないよ…… 無事なら顔くらい見せなさいっての、バカ息子が……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、まったく心配でならないよ……
無事なら顔くらい見せなさいっての、バカ息子が……

engChrName: ...though I know he wouldn't listen to a damn thing I have to say.
engSearchText:
...though I know he wouldn't listen to a damn thing I
have to say.
jpnChrName: どうせいくら言ったって 聞きやしないんだろうけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
どうせいくら言ったって
聞きやしないんだろうけどねぇ……

engChrName: I hate to ask, but if he gets himself into trouble again...
engSearchText:
I hate to ask, but if he gets himself into
trouble again...
jpnChrName: もしもエディがまた馬鹿な事を やらかそうとしてるなら……
jpnSearchText:
もしもエディがまた馬鹿な事を
やらかそうとしてるなら……

engChrName: ...can you set him straight for me? I just can't get through to him anymore.
engSearchText:
...can you set him straight for me? I just can't get
through to him anymore.
jpnChrName: アンタ達が止めてやってくれないかい？ どうか息子を頼むよ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタ達が止めてやってくれないかい？
どうか息子を頼むよ。

engChrName: *sigh* Where did I go wrong...?
engSearchText: *sigh* Where did I go wrong...?
jpnChrName: はあ……どこで間違っちまったのかねぇ……
jpnSearchText: はあ……どこで間違っちまったのかねぇ……

engChrName: Oh, sorry, it's nothing. Just thinking about that child of mine...
engSearchText:
Oh, sorry, it's nothing. Just thinking about that child
of mine...
jpnChrName: いや、なんでもないんだよ。 ちょっと息子の事を思い出してねえ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、なんでもないんだよ。
ちょっと息子の事を思い出してねえ。

engChrName: If I hear he's causing trouble, I'm finding him and dragging him back home myself.
engSearchText:
If I hear he's causing trouble, I'm finding him and
dragging him back home myself.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、どこかで人様に 迷惑かけてなきゃいいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
……ふう、どこかで人様に
迷惑かけてなきゃいいんだけど……

engChrName: (Brenda's son seems to be quite the handful...)
engSearchText: (Brenda's son seems to be quite the handful...)
jpnChrName: （ブレンダさんの息子さんって、確か……）
jpnSearchText: （ブレンダさんの息子さんって、確か……）

engChrName: (Yeah, he's had issues for a while now. Not our place to butt in, though.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, he's had issues for a while now. Not our place
to butt in, though.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、ちょいと素行がな。   まあ俺たちの出る幕じゃないだろうが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、ちょいと素行がな。
まあ俺たちの出る幕じゃないだろうが。）

engChrName: (I understand her concerns... I can only hope they resolve their troubles.)
engSearchText:
(I understand her concerns... I can only hope they
resolve their troubles.)
jpnChrName: （そうでしたか……お世話になっている   だけに少々気がかりですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（そうでしたか……お世話になっている
だけに少々気がかりですね。）

engChrName: My husband died when the boy was still young, so I had to raise him all on my own.
engSearchText:
My husband died when the boy was still young, so I
had to raise him all on my own.
jpnChrName: ウチは主人を早くに亡くしたから、 女手一つで育てるしかなくてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチは主人を早くに亡くしたから、
女手一つで育てるしかなくてねぇ。

engChrName: I know it was tough for him, but I just don't understand what led him to all this...
engSearchText:
I know it was tough for him, but I just don't
understand what led him to all this...
jpnChrName: あの子にも苦労を掛けたつもりだけど…… どうしてああなっちまったのか……
jpnSearchText:
あの子にも苦労を掛けたつもりだけど……
どうしてああなっちまったのか……

engChrName: Bah, I'm thinking too much! I've got work to do, damn it! Just gotta get it off my mind... You need anything, let me know!
engSearchText:
Bah, I'm thinking too much! I've got work to do,
damn it! Just gotta get it off my mind... You need
anything, let me know!
jpnChrName: ──なんて言ってられないね！ さ、仕事仕事！　欲しい物があれば言っとくれ！
jpnSearchText:
──なんて言ってられないね！
さ、仕事仕事！　欲しい物があれば言っとくれ！

engChrName: It's about time for my fall stock to come in, so I'm getting my hotpot specials ready in advance.
engSearchText:
It's about time for my fall stock to come in, so I'm
getting my hotpot specials ready in advance.
jpnChrName: そろそろ秋物が売れる季節だねぇ。 鍋ものなんかも仕入れ始めてと……
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ秋物が売れる季節だねぇ。
鍋ものなんかも仕入れ始めてと……

engChrName: Oh, Van! Doing your rounds even in the rain? That's a good backbone you've got.
engSearchText:
Oh, Van! Doing your rounds even in the rain?
That's a good backbone you've got.
jpnChrName: おやヴァン、また夜の見回りかい？ 雨も降ってるのにご苦労だねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
おやヴァン、また夜の見回りかい？
雨も降ってるのにご苦労だねぇ！

engChrName: I'm happy to have you looking out for us all, but take care of yourself, too, yeah?
engSearchText:
I'm happy to have you looking out for us all, but take
care of yourself, too, yeah?
jpnChrName: 気を使ってくれるのは嬉しいけど、 あんたも自分の事を大切にするんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
気を使ってくれるのは嬉しいけど、
あんたも自分の事を大切にするんだよ？

engChrName: Don't worry, I will. Thanks.
engSearchText: Don't worry, I will. Thanks.
jpnChrName: へいへい、あんがとよ。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、あんがとよ。

engChrName: (Got a couple orders I wanna get squared away, but they can wait. I've got time.)
engSearchText:
(Got a couple orders I wanna get squared away, but
they can wait. I've got time.)
jpnChrName: （……ま、色々気になる事はあるが   今の所は問題ないだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ま、色々気になる事はあるが
今の所は問題ないだろ。）

engChrName: I'm sorry you had to see that, folks...
engSearchText: I'm sorry you had to see that, folks...
jpnChrName: さっきは見苦しい所を 見せちまって悪かったね。
jpnSearchText:
さっきは見苦しい所を
見せちまって悪かったね。

engChrName: Eddy's just too much of a handful for me these days. He's all in on this rebellious phase.
engSearchText:
Eddy's just too much of a handful for me these days.
He's all in on this rebellious phase.
jpnChrName: エディに反抗期が来たかと思えば どんどん調子に乗っちまってねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
エディに反抗期が来たかと思えば
どんどん調子に乗っちまってねぇ……

engChrName: That boy needs to pull himself together. He hangs with the wrong crowd and he's gonna learn a hard lesson.
engSearchText:
That boy needs to pull himself together. He hangs
with the wrong crowd and he's gonna learn a
hard lesson.
jpnChrName: いつまでもフラフラしてないで 早い所しっかりしてほしいものだよ。
jpnSearchText:
いつまでもフラフラしてないで
早い所しっかりしてほしいものだよ。

engChrName: I'm sorry about my son...
engSearchText: I'm sorry about my son...
jpnChrName: ……すまないねぇ、うちの息子が………
jpnSearchText: ……すまないねぇ、うちの息子が………

engChrName: I'll make sure to give him an earful later. Just...please, try to ignore him for now.
engSearchText:
I'll make sure to give him an earful later.
Just...please, try to ignore him for now.
jpnChrName: アタシから言って聞かせるから 今日の所は許してやっておくれ。
jpnSearchText:
アタシから言って聞かせるから
今日の所は許してやっておくれ。

engChrName: If anything strikes your fancy, I'll ring you up in a jiffy.
engSearchText:
If anything strikes your fancy, I'll ring you up in
a jiffy.
jpnChrName: 買い物も遠慮なく 声を掛けてくれていいからね？
jpnSearchText:
買い物も遠慮なく
声を掛けてくれていいからね？

engChrName: Right, time to close up shop. I gotta take inventory and then put everything away.
engSearchText:
Right, time to close up shop. I gotta take inventory
and then put everything away.
jpnChrName: さてさて、店じまいの時間だね。 テキパキ片付けちまわないと。
jpnSearchText:
さてさて、店じまいの時間だね。
テキパキ片付けちまわないと。

engChrName: *sigh* Just what does that boy get up to? Night after night, he's out doing Aidios knows what...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Just what does that boy get up to? Night after
night, he's out doing Aidios knows what...
jpnChrName: ……ふう、それにしてもあの子は 毎晩どこで何をやってるんだか………
jpnSearchText:
……ふう、それにしてもあの子は
毎晩どこで何をやってるんだか………

engChrName: Oh! Hah, uhh, don't mind me. If you find something you like, lemme know!
engSearchText:
Oh! Hah, uhh, don't mind me. If you find something
you like, lemme know!
jpnChrName: あはは、何でもないんだよ。 必要な物があれば早めに言っとくれ！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、何でもないんだよ。
必要な物があれば早めに言っとくれ！

engChrName: Cool, thanks.
engSearchText: Cool, thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: (If I recall, her kid's eighteen-ish... Probably best for me to keep my nose outta that.)
engSearchText:
(If I recall, her kid's eighteen-ish... Probably best for
me to keep my nose outta that.)
jpnChrName: （確か１７～８の息子だったか……   ま、他人が口出しする事じゃねえけどな。）
jpnSearchText:
（確か１７～８の息子だったか……
ま、他人が口出しする事じゃねえけどな。）

engChrName: Hello, ma'am!
engSearchText: Hello, ma'am!
jpnChrName: おばさん、こんにちはです！
jpnSearchText: おばさん、こんにちはです！

engChrName: Well, hello, Feri! You look chipper today.
engSearchText: Well, hello, Feri! You look chipper today.
jpnChrName: はいフェリちゃん、いらっしゃい！ 今日も元気だねえ！
jpnSearchText:
はいフェリちゃん、いらっしゃい！
今日も元気だねえ！

engChrName: Oh, right, I was meaning to tell you. So I went and ordered some of that Central Eastern spice you told me about the other day—that za'atar stuff.
engSearchText:
Oh, right, I was meaning to tell you. So I went and
ordered some of that Central Eastern spice you told
me about the other day—that za'atar stuff.
jpnChrName: そうそう、フェリちゃんが言ってた 中東の香辛料、さっそく取り寄せてみたよ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、フェリちゃんが言ってた
中東の香辛料、さっそく取り寄せてみたよ。

engChrName: I gave some to Victor, too. It'll be neat to see what he does with it!
engSearchText:
I gave some to Victor, too. It'll be neat to see what he
does with it!
jpnChrName: “ザータル”だっけねぇ、ビクトルさんにも 融通しておいたから楽しみにしておきな！
jpnSearchText:
“ザータル”だっけねぇ、ビクトルさんにも
融通しておいたから楽しみにしておきな！

engChrName: Whoa, really? Thank you so much! I kinda miss home cooking, so I'm really looking forward to that.
engSearchText:
Whoa, really? Thank you so much! I kinda miss home
cooking, so I'm really looking forward to that.
jpnChrName: わ、ありがたいです！ やっぱり故郷の味が懐かしくなってきて。
jpnSearchText:
わ、ありがたいです！
やっぱり故郷の味が懐かしくなってきて。

engChrName: I totally get that. At your age, especially, it's easy to miss home.
engSearchText:
I totally get that. At your age, especially, it's easy to
miss home.
jpnChrName: あはは、無理もないさ。 あんたくらいの歳じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、無理もないさ。
あんたくらいの歳じゃねえ。

engChrName: If you're ever feeling lonely, drop on by. I'd be more than happy to chat with you!
engSearchText:
If you're ever feeling lonely, drop on by. I'd be more
than happy to chat with you!
jpnChrName: 寂しくなったらいつでも来な。 あたしでよけりゃ話し相手になるからね！
jpnSearchText:
寂しくなったらいつでも来な。
あたしでよけりゃ話し相手になるからね！

engChrName: Roger, heehee!
engSearchText: Roger, heehee!
jpnChrName: えへへ、はいっ！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、はいっ！

engChrName: (Man. I thought you two might take a while to fit in, but you're like chameleons.)
engSearchText:
(Man. I thought you two might take a while to fit in,
but you're like chameleons.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ……お前といい   馴染むのが早くねえか？）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ……お前といい
馴染むのが早くねえか？）

engChrName: (Well, can you blame us? The townsfolk are just so amiable here.)
engSearchText:
(Well, can you blame us? The townsfolk are just so
amiable here.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、旧市街って   親しみやすい方が多いですよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ、旧市街って
親しみやすい方が多いですよね。）

engChrName: You sure are a tough cookie, going out and working on a holiday, Agnès!
engSearchText:
You sure are a tough cookie, going out and
working on a holiday, Agnès!
jpnChrName: アニエスちゃんも祝日だってのに ご苦労さんだねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスちゃんも祝日だってのに
ご苦労さんだねぇ！

engChrName: Just be careful, okay? Make sure they don't get too tuckered out, Van!
engSearchText:
Just be careful, okay? Make sure they don't get too
tuckered out, Van!
jpnChrName: 気を付けて行くんだよ？ ヴァン、二人の事は頼んだよ！
jpnSearchText:
気を付けて行くんだよ？
ヴァン、二人の事は頼んだよ！

engChrName: Don't sweat it.
engSearchText: Don't sweat it.
jpnChrName: あいよ、わーってるっての。
jpnSearchText: あいよ、わーってるっての。

engChrName: Of course. Take care, Brenda!
engSearchText: Of course. Take care, Brenda!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、行ってきますね、 ブレンダおばさん！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、行ってきますね、
ブレンダおばさん！

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Van! I really do owe you for your help.
engSearchText: Well, if it isn't Van! I really do owe you for your help.
jpnChrName: おや、ヴァンじゃないかい。 この前は世話になっちまったねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
おや、ヴァンじゃないかい。
この前は世話になっちまったねぇ！

engChrName: Thanks to you, I haven't been gouged a single mira! It's such a relief, seriously.
engSearchText:
Thanks to you, I haven't been gouged a single mira!
It's such a relief, seriously.
jpnChrName: お陰で悪質な値上げ問屋も見かけなくなって、 アタシも大助かりさね！
jpnSearchText:
お陰で悪質な値上げ問屋も見かけなくなって、
アタシも大助かりさね！

engChrName: Good to hear. Nothin' gets by the ol' Van.
engSearchText: Good to hear. Nothin' gets by the ol' Van.
jpnChrName: そいつは良かった、常連としての 義理は果たせたみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは良かった、常連としての
義理は果たせたみてえだな。

engChrName: You run into anything else, lemme know. I'll give you the neighborhood discount.
engSearchText:
You run into anything else, lemme know. I'll give you
the neighborhood discount.
jpnChrName: また何かあれば言ってくれ。 近所の誼（よしみ）で安くしとくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
また何かあれば言ってくれ。
近所の誼（よしみ）で安くしとくぜ。

engChrName: Haha! You really know how to keep your customers loyal!
engSearchText:
Haha! You really know how to keep your
customers loyal!
jpnChrName: アハハ、アンタもしっかりしてるねぇ！
jpnSearchText: アハハ、アンタもしっかりしてるねぇ！

engChrName: Oh, before I forget! I told myself I'd hand this to you the next time you dropped by. Here, take it!
engSearchText:
Oh, before I forget! I told myself I'd hand this to you
the next time you dropped by. Here, take it!
jpnChrName: そうそう、次会ったら渡そうと思ってたんだ。 ほらこれを持っていきな！
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、次会ったら渡そうと思ってたんだ。
ほらこれを持っていきな！

engChrName: Received two  s.
engSearchText:
Received two
s.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_HP_01}を２個手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_HP_01}を２個手に入れた。

engChrName: Hey, thanks for the tip! These definitely won't go to waste.
engSearchText:
Hey, thanks for the tip! These definitely won't go
to waste.
jpnChrName: 追加報酬か、サンキュー。 ありがたく使わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
追加報酬か、サンキュー。
ありがたく使わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Good! Oh, and would this lady here be your new part-timer? I've heard a good deal about her already.
engSearchText:
Good! Oh, and would this lady here be your
new part-timer? I've heard a good deal about
her already.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうしておくれ。 ……そっちは噂に聞いた“新しいバイト”かい？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうしておくれ。
……そっちは噂に聞いた“新しいバイト”かい？

engChrName: Isn't she just adorable? Now, I'm not sure how your paths crossed, young lady, but I wish you the best of luck under his wing!
engSearchText:
Isn't she just adorable? Now, I'm not sure how your
paths crossed, young lady, but I wish you the best of
luck under his wing!
jpnChrName: えらく可愛い子じゃないかい！ 事情は知らないけど、頑張るんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
えらく可愛い子じゃないかい！
事情は知らないけど、頑張るんだよ！

engChrName: Er, thank you! I'll do my best!
engSearchText: Er, thank you! I'll do my best!
jpnChrName: は、はい！ どうかよろしくご指導ください！
jpnSearchText:
は、はい！
どうかよろしくご指導ください！

engChrName: I'm your one-stop shop for groceries and general goods. You want it, I've got it!
engSearchText:
I'm your one-stop shop for groceries and
general goods. You want it, I've got it!
jpnChrName: うちは食料品や雑貨全般を扱っててね。 大体の物は揃うはずさ。
jpnSearchText:
うちは食料品や雑貨全般を扱っててね。
大体の物は揃うはずさ。

engChrName: I imagine I'll be seeing you pretty often, now that you're working at his office.
engSearchText:
I imagine I'll be seeing you pretty often, now that
you're working at his office.
jpnChrName: ヴァンの事務所で働くなら ちょくちょく来ることもあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンの事務所で働くなら
ちょくちょく来ることもあるだろう。

engChrName: You're always welcome here! Drop on by whenever you need anything.
engSearchText:
You're always welcome here! Drop on by whenever
you need anything.
jpnChrName: またいつでも顔を出しておくれ。 歓迎させてもらうからねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
またいつでも顔を出しておくれ。
歓迎させてもらうからねぇ！

engChrName: Just, umm...l-leave the old lady to me! And the rest of the neighborhood, too.
engSearchText:
Just, umm...l-leave the old lady to me! And the rest of
the neighborhood, too.
jpnChrName: そ、その……お袋の事は任せとけよなっ！ あと近所の連中の事も……
jpnSearchText:
そ、その……お袋の事は任せとけよなっ！
あと近所の連中の事も……

engChrName: I'm actually in pretty good shape, so...d-don't write me off! I'll keep the neighborhood safe, okay?!
engSearchText:
I'm actually in pretty good shape, so...d-don't write
me off! I'll keep the neighborhood safe, okay?!
jpnChrName: こ、こう見えてもオレは戦えるんだからな！ 絶対に守ってやるっての！！
jpnSearchText:
こ、こう見えてもオレは戦えるんだからな！
絶対に守ってやるっての！！

engChrName: Hah! You're young and fit, I trust ya!
engSearchText: Hah! You're young and fit, I trust ya!
jpnChrName: ハハッ……ああ、任せたぜ！
jpnSearchText: ハハッ……ああ、任せたぜ！

engChrName: Wassup, wassup! Come get'cher—GAH! You?!
engSearchText: Wassup, wassup! Come get'cher—GAH! You?!
jpnChrName: らっしゃいらっしゃ～い！！ ──って、ゲッ！？
jpnSearchText:
らっしゃいらっしゃ～い！！
──って、ゲッ！？

engChrName: Yo, my sweet tooth's tingling. You got yourself a stand now?
engSearchText:
Yo, my sweet tooth's tingling. You got yourself a
stand now?
jpnChrName: なんだ、屋台を始めたのか？ 甘くていい匂いをさせてんじゃねーか♪
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、屋台を始めたのか？
甘くていい匂いをさせてんじゃねーか♪

engChrName: It's—you—no! It's just like a...street...vendor, sorta thing!
engSearchText:
It's—you—no! It's just like a...street...vendor,
sorta thing!
jpnChrName: ……屋台じゃない、これはその、 テキヤ的なやつなんだっつーの！
jpnSearchText:
……屋台じゃない、これはその、
テキヤ的なやつなんだっつーの！

engChrName: Don't have to be shy about it. Little while ago, you were some punk crawlin' the streets.
engSearchText:
Don't have to be shy about it. Little while ago, you
were some punk crawlin' the streets.
jpnChrName: なに固まってんだよ。 ヤンチャしてた雑貨屋の所の息子だろ？
jpnSearchText:
なに固まってんだよ。
ヤンチャしてた雑貨屋の所の息子だろ？

engChrName: And now look at you: you've got an honest job! No shame in that.
engSearchText:
And now look at you: you've got an honest job!
No shame in that.
jpnChrName: 屋台とはいえ、真面目に働く気に なったようで何よりじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
屋台とはいえ、真面目に働く気に
なったようで何よりじゃねえか。

engChrName: D-Don't mock me, you piece of shit!
engSearchText: D-Don't mock me, you piece of shit!
jpnChrName: なっ、なんで上から目線なんだよ！！
jpnSearchText: なっ、なんで上から目線なんだよ！！

engChrName: And it's NOT a stand! It's just like a vendor thing!
engSearchText: And it's NOT a stand! It's just like a vendor thing!
jpnChrName: ……というか屋台じゃない、これはその、 テキヤ的なやつなんだっつーの！
jpnSearchText:
……というか屋台じゃない、これはその、
テキヤ的なやつなんだっつーの！

engChrName: Don't lump me in with the rest! I'm savin' up money so I can finally move out of that old hag's house! Give her some...peace and quiet, I guess.
engSearchText:
Don't lump me in with the rest! I'm savin' up money
so I can finally move out of that old hag's house!
Give her some...peace and quiet, I guess.
jpnChrName: ヌルイ一般人と一緒にすんなよ！ オレは稼いで、お袋から独立すんだよ！！
jpnSearchText:
ヌルイ一般人と一緒にすんなよ！
オレは稼いで、お袋から独立すんだよ！！

engChrName: Heehee... That's admirable of you.
engSearchText: Heehee... That's admirable of you.
jpnChrName: あら、そうだったんですね。 ふふっ、それは立派な心掛けかと。
jpnSearchText:
あら、そうだったんですね。
ふふっ、それは立派な心掛けかと。

engChrName: Really? That's kinda nice of you!
engSearchText: Really? That's kinda nice of you!
jpnChrName: そうでしたか……！ それは立派な心掛けですっ！
jpnSearchText:
そうでしたか……！
それは立派な心掛けですっ！

engChrName: Aww, ain't that cute. He's got a bit of good left in him, after all.
engSearchText:
Aww, ain't that cute. He's got a bit of good left in
him, after all.
jpnChrName: ハン、思ったより立派な 心掛けじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、思ったより立派な
心掛けじゃねーか。

engChrName: Is that so? You've set an admirable goal for yourself.
engSearchText: Is that so? You've set an admirable goal for yourself.
jpnChrName: あら、そうでしたか。 それは立派な心掛けですね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、そうでしたか。
それは立派な心掛けですね。

engChrName: Huh. That's...quite mature of you, actually.
engSearchText: Huh. That's...quite mature of you, actually.
jpnChrName: へえ、そうなんだ。 案外立派な心掛けというか……
jpnSearchText:
へえ、そうなんだ。
案外立派な心掛けというか……

engChrName: Well, that's a great idea! You're doing your mom proud.
engSearchText:
Well, that's a great idea! You're doing your
mom proud.
jpnChrName: あら、そうなの。 いいんじゃない？　実家からの独立って。
jpnSearchText:
あら、そうなの。
いいんじゃない？　実家からの独立って。

engChrName: I see. You've set yourself a goal and committed to it... Impressive.
engSearchText:
I see. You've set yourself a goal and committed to it...
Impressive.
jpnChrName: フム、そうであったか。 それは良い心がけだな。
jpnSearchText:
フム、そうであったか。
それは良い心がけだな。

engChrName: Wha...? It's not like that! Shut up!
engSearchText: Wha...? It's not like that! Shut up!
jpnChrName: ──ってしまったぁぁ～～！？ ついポロッと話しちまった！！
jpnSearchText:
──ってしまったぁぁ～～！？
ついポロッと話しちまった！！

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Hey, can I get two bags, please?
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Hey, can I get two bags, please?
jpnChrName: どうでもいいが、２袋くれ！
jpnSearchText: どうでもいいが、２袋くれ！

engChrName: H-Hey! You even listening?!
engSearchText: H-Hey! You even listening?!
jpnChrName: アンタもマイペースだよな！？ つーかオレの話聞いてたのかよォ！？
jpnSearchText:
アンタもマイペースだよな！？
つーかオレの話聞いてたのかよォ！？

engChrName: D-Don't you DARE tell my old lady! Got it?!
engSearchText: D-Don't you DARE tell my old lady! Got it?!
jpnChrName: お、お袋には内緒にしとけよな！？
jpnSearchText: お、お袋には内緒にしとけよな！？

engChrName: Oh, and they're hot, too. Don't come cryin' to me if you burn yourself!
engSearchText:
Oh, and they're hot, too. Don't come cryin' to me if
you burn yourself!
jpnChrName: ……あと熱いから気を付けろよ？ 火傷しても知らねーからな！！
jpnSearchText:
……あと熱いから気を付けろよ？
火傷しても知らねーからな！！

engChrName: D-Don't get all high and mighty just because!
engSearchText: D-Don't get all high and mighty just because!
jpnChrName: さ、さっき良くしてやったからって 調子に乗るんじゃねーぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
さ、さっき良くしてやったからって
調子に乗るんじゃねーぞ！？

engChrName: I get it, okay? You helped me out a couple times, and I do live in this neighborhood with you... My stand and the old lady's shop are here, too...
engSearchText:
I get it, okay? You helped me out a couple times, and
I do live in this neighborhood with you... My stand
and the old lady's shop are here, too...
jpnChrName: アンタには色々と借りがあって、 お袋の店もオレの店も近所だからって……
jpnSearchText:
アンタには色々と借りがあって、
お袋の店もオレの店も近所だからって……

engChrName: So we're neighbors, but we're NOT friends, got it?!
engSearchText: So we're neighbors, but we're NOT friends, got it?!
jpnChrName: 慣れ合うつもりはねーんだからな！
jpnSearchText: 慣れ合うつもりはねーんだからな！

engChrName: (Heh. So it IS a stand.) Yeah, I know. Don't worry.
engSearchText: (Heh. So it IS a stand.) Yeah, I know. Don't worry.
jpnChrName: （オレの店……？） ああ、分かってるから安心してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
（オレの店……？）
ああ、分かってるから安心してくれ。

engChrName: Tch...
engSearchText: Tch...
jpnChrName: チッ……
jpnSearchText: チッ……

engChrName: (This is the part where you kiss up, you...you jackass!)
engSearchText: (This is the part where you kiss up, you...you jackass!)
jpnChrName: （そこはもう少し残念がったりしろよな……！）
jpnSearchText: （そこはもう少し残念がったりしろよな……！）

engChrName: (Kids his age, man.)
engSearchText: (Kids his age, man.)
jpnChrName: （相変わらず難しい年頃だな……）
jpnSearchText: （相変わらず難しい年頃だな……）

engChrName: Tch. Figures this is the hot spot...
engSearchText: Tch. Figures this is the hot spot...
jpnChrName: チッ、やっぱこの場所になっちまったか……
jpnSearchText: チッ、やっぱこの場所になっちまったか……

engChrName: All the traffic just had to run right by the old lady's shop... Tch. Nothin' I can do about that.
engSearchText:
All the traffic just had to run right by the old
lady's shop... Tch. Nothin' I can do about that.
jpnChrName: お袋の店に近ぇけど 一番売れそうだし、仕方ねえよな……
jpnSearchText:
お袋の店に近ぇけど
一番売れそうだし、仕方ねえよな……

engChrName: Y-Yeah? You again? What do you want?
engSearchText: Y-Yeah? You again? What do you want?
jpnChrName: な、なんだよ、またアンタかよ……
jpnSearchText: な、なんだよ、またアンタかよ……

engChrName: Hmph. You're not the boss of me. I can do whatever I want, so get lost!
engSearchText:
Hmph. You're not the boss of me. I can do whatever
I want, so get lost!
jpnChrName: フン、何をしようがオレの勝手だぜ。 口出しすんじゃねーぞ！
jpnSearchText:
フン、何をしようがオレの勝手だぜ。
口出しすんじゃねーぞ！

engChrName: Hmm... Wish I could find a darker spot. Too much light here...
engSearchText:
Hmm... Wish I could find a darker spot. Too much
light here...
jpnChrName: うーん、ここも悪くねえけど…… もっとハデな場所の方がいいのか……？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ここも悪くねえけど……
もっとハデな場所の方がいいのか……？

engChrName: H-Huh? What? You got a problem?!
engSearchText: H-Huh? What? You got a problem?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだよ…… オレは別にやましい事なんざしてねーぜ！
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだよ……
オレは別にやましい事なんざしてねーぜ！

engChrName: I ain't doing anything wrong, so piss off!
engSearchText: I ain't doing anything wrong, so piss off!
jpnChrName: 言い掛かり付けんなよな！
jpnSearchText: 言い掛かり付けんなよな！

engChrName: Y-You again?! Get off my back, bitch!
engSearchText: Y-You again?! Get off my back, bitch!
jpnChrName: まっ、またアンタかよっ……！ いい加減しつこいっての！！
jpnSearchText:
まっ、またアンタかよっ……！
いい加減しつこいっての！！

engChrName: What's your deal, dude? This is my neighborhood, too. You sayin' I ain't got a right to be here?
engSearchText:
What's your deal, dude? This is my
neighborhood, too. You sayin' I ain't got a right to
be here?
jpnChrName: そう言われても近所なんでな。 まあ諦めてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
そう言われても近所なんでな。
まあ諦めてくれや。

engChrName: (Urrgh...! He's right and I freakin' hate it! He's killing my vibe here...)
engSearchText:
(Urrgh...! He's right and I freakin' hate it! He's killing
my vibe here...)
jpnChrName: （くぅぅ～～～っ！！　言い返せねえ！   なんか調子狂うんだよな、この人……）
jpnSearchText:
（くぅぅ～～～っ！！　言い返せねえ！
なんか調子狂うんだよな、この人……）

engChrName: What is WITH you old hags? Wish adults would just shut up and leave me alone... *grumble*
engSearchText:
What is WITH you old hags? Wish adults would just
shut up and leave me alone... *grumble*
jpnChrName: オ、オレに構うなっつーの！！ これだから大人ってのは、ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
オ、オレに構うなっつーの！！
これだから大人ってのは、ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: Not like I can go home anyway...unless I wanna deal with HER.
engSearchText:
Not like I can go home anyway...unless I wanna deal
with HER.
jpnChrName: いまさら家に帰んのもな…… お袋に合わせる顔がないっていうか……
jpnSearchText:
いまさら家に帰んのもな……
お袋に合わせる顔がないっていうか……

engChrName: But I ain't got anything left on me... Urrgh! What am I supposed to do?!
engSearchText:
But I ain't got anything left on me... Urrgh! What am
I supposed to do?!
jpnChrName: ……でももう手持ちもねえし…… はぁ、どーしたらいいんだろな……
jpnSearchText:
……でももう手持ちもねえし……
はぁ、どーしたらいいんだろな……

engChrName: Y-You?! Can you just leave me alone, you pricks?!
engSearchText: Y-You?! Can you just leave me alone, you pricks?!
jpnChrName: なっ、なんだよアンタら……！ ほっとけよなっ！！
jpnSearchText:
なっ、なんだよアンタら……！
ほっとけよなっ！！

engChrName: He really could stand to be more honest with himself.
engSearchText: He really could stand to be more honest with himself.
jpnChrName: う～ん、素直じゃないですね。
jpnSearchText: う～ん、素直じゃないですね。

engChrName: Hey, word of advice: don't touch my car if you wanna keep your kneecaps.
engSearchText:
Hey, word of advice: don't touch my car if you wanna
keep your kneecaps.
jpnChrName: つーかそこの車には触んなよ？ いいな？
jpnSearchText:
つーかそこの車には触んなよ？
いいな？

engChrName: Aidios alive, you're glaring at him like he just kicked a puppy.
engSearchText:
Aidios alive, you're glaring at him like he just kicked
a puppy.
jpnChrName: えっとヴァンさん……？ 目が本気なんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
えっとヴァンさん……？
目が本気なんだけど。

engChrName: You lookin' for Simon? He's probably over at the basketball court in Seiden.
engSearchText:
You lookin' for Simon? He's probably over at the
basketball court in Seiden.
jpnChrName: サイモンなら、 サイデンのバスケコートにいるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
サイモンなら、
サイデンのバスケコートにいるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Tch... Not a single mira from the old lady.
engSearchText: Tch... Not a single mira from the old lady.
jpnChrName: チッ……つうか、結局５０００ミラ 貸してもらえなかったじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……つうか、結局５０００ミラ
貸してもらえなかったじゃねえか。

engChrName: I told her I'd come back for a bit, but...now I gotta beg for money, too, 'cause I'm freakin' BROKE.
engSearchText:
I told her I'd come back for a bit, but...now I gotta
beg for money, too, 'cause I'm freakin' BROKE.
jpnChrName: あの子と遊ぶ予定があんのに、 金がねえとかかっこ悪すぎだろ……
jpnSearchText:
あの子と遊ぶ予定があんのに、
金がねえとかかっこ悪すぎだろ……

engChrName: Huh? The hell you want, old timer? Keep your nose outta other people's business!
engSearchText:
Huh? The hell you want, old timer? Keep your nose
outta other people's business!
jpnChrName: アン？　なんだよオッサン。 ヒトん家の事情に首ツッコんでんじゃねーよ！
jpnSearchText:
アン？　なんだよオッサン。
ヒトん家の事情に首ツッコんでんじゃねーよ！

engChrName: *sigh* You finally come home and this is how you talk to me?
engSearchText:
*sigh* You finally come home and this is how you talk
to me?
jpnChrName: まったく、たまに顔を出したと思ったら あんたって子は……！！
jpnSearchText:
まったく、たまに顔を出したと思ったら
あんたって子は……！！

engChrName: No one asked you how you feel, old hag! Just gimme my allowance!
engSearchText:
No one asked you how you feel, old hag! Just gimme
my allowance!
jpnChrName: ウルセーよ、ババアが口出しすんな！ 黙ってミラだけ渡せっつの！！
jpnSearchText:
ウルセーよ、ババアが口出しすんな！
黙ってミラだけ渡せっつの！！

engChrName: Huh? The hell you want, old timer? Keep your nose outta other people's business!
engSearchText:
Huh? The hell you want, old timer? Keep your nose
outta other people's business!
jpnChrName: アン？　なんだよオッサン。 ヒトん家の事情に首ツッコんでんじゃねーぞ！
jpnSearchText:
アン？　なんだよオッサン。
ヒトん家の事情に首ツッコんでんじゃねーぞ！

engChrName: Sir, yes, sir.
engSearchText: Sir, yes, sir.
jpnChrName: へいへい。
jpnSearchText: へいへい。

engChrName: (Little shit could really use a good roasting, but that ain't my business.)
engSearchText:
(Little shit could really use a good roasting, but that
ain't my business.)
jpnChrName: （前からちょいちょい見かけるが……   ここで灸を据えるのも大人げねぇか。）
jpnSearchText:
（前からちょいちょい見かけるが……
ここで灸を据えるのも大人げねぇか。）

engChrName: You can't eat if you don't work! If you're not gonna help out with the store, then don't bother coming back home!
engSearchText:
You can't eat if you don't work! If you're not gonna
help out with the store, then don't bother coming
back home!
jpnChrName: フン、帰ってくるなら店を手伝いな！ 働かざる者食うべからずだよっ！
jpnSearchText:
フン、帰ってくるなら店を手伝いな！
働かざる者食うべからずだよっ！

engChrName: ...Tch, fine! I'll go and live my life all by myself! There!
engSearchText:
...Tch, fine! I'll go and live my life all by myself!
There!
jpnChrName: だっ、誰がンなことっ！ オレは好きに生きてくんだっつの！
jpnSearchText:
だっ、誰がンなことっ！
オレは好きに生きてくんだっつの！

engChrName: I know you don't want me around anyway...
engSearchText: I know you don't want me around anyway...
jpnChrName: だいたいお袋だって…… オレがいない方が……
jpnSearchText:
だいたいお袋だって……
オレがいない方が……

engChrName: What was that?! This 'old hag' can't hear you!
engSearchText: What was that?! This 'old hag' can't hear you!
jpnChrName: ん？　何か言ったかい！？
jpnSearchText: ん？　何か言ったかい！？

engChrName: N-Nothing! Hmph!
engSearchText: N-Nothing! Hmph!
jpnChrName: な、何でもねーよ！！　フンッ！
jpnSearchText: な、何でもねーよ！！　フンッ！

engChrName: W-Wait, Eddy! Don't! We need to stay here!
engSearchText: W-Wait, Eddy! Don't! We need to stay here!
jpnChrName: ま、待ちなエディ！？ 外に出るんじゃないよっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ま、待ちなエディ！？
外に出るんじゃないよっ！！

engChrName: Well, we're not helping just twiddling our thumbs here! I've gotta go out and figure out how to stop this—
engSearchText:
Well, we're not helping just twiddling our
thumbs here! I've gotta go out and figure out how to
stop this—
jpnChrName: けどラチが明かねーだろ！？ どうにか探ってくるから、お袋はここで──
jpnSearchText:
けどラチが明かねーだろ！？
どうにか探ってくるから、お袋はここで──

engChrName: No, your old lady's right.
engSearchText: No, your old lady's right.
jpnChrName: いや、お袋さんの言う通りだぜ。
jpnSearchText: いや、お袋さんの言う通りだぜ。

engChrName: Van! Oh, thank heavens you're all okay!
engSearchText: Van! Oh, thank heavens you're all okay!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、あんたたち── 無事だったんだねぇ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、あんたたち──
無事だったんだねぇ！？

engChrName: Wha...? Did you already clear out the monsters?!
engSearchText: Wha...? Did you already clear out the monsters?!
jpnChrName: ま、まさか外のバケモノどもを どうにかしたのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさか外のバケモノどもを
どうにかしたのかよ！？

engChrName: We did a sweep, but there might be more monsters lurking around. You guys stay inside for now!
engSearchText:
We did a sweep, but there might be more monsters
lurking around. You guys stay inside for now!
jpnChrName: ええ……でもまた湧いてこないとも限りません。 外の事はわたしたちに任せてください！
jpnSearchText:
ええ……でもまた湧いてこないとも限りません。
外の事はわたしたちに任せてください！

engChrName: We're tryna figure out how to put a stop to this.
engSearchText: We're tryna figure out how to put a stop to this.
jpnChrName: どうにか元に戻す手掛かりも 探ってみるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
どうにか元に戻す手掛かりも
探ってみるつもりだ。

engChrName: We're headin' back out. You guys mind keeping tabs on Old Town, making sure everybody's okay?
engSearchText:
We're headin' back out. You guys mind keeping tabs
on Old Town, making sure everybody's okay?
jpnChrName: ──代わりと言っちゃなんだが、 旧市街の連中の事は頼んだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
──代わりと言っちゃなんだが、
旧市街の連中の事は頼んだぜ？

engChrName: You sure...?
engSearchText: You sure...?
jpnChrName: アンタたち……
jpnSearchText: アンタたち……

engChrName: (How is he so cool...?!)
engSearchText: (How is he so cool...?!)
jpnChrName: （カ、カッケー……！）
jpnSearchText: （カ、カッケー……！）

engChrName: Er, I mean, okay. You guys handle the rest!
engSearchText: Er, I mean, okay. You guys handle the rest!
jpnChrName: じゃなかった、その…… わ、わかったよ、アンタらに任せるよっ！
jpnSearchText:
じゃなかった、その……
わ、わかったよ、アンタらに任せるよっ！

engChrName: We've got food here, so if need be, we can make the rounds and keep the neighborhood stocked up.
engSearchText:
We've got food here, so if need be, we can make the
rounds and keep the neighborhood stocked up.
jpnChrName: うちには食料もあるし、いざとなったら ご近所に配らせてもらうさ。
jpnSearchText:
うちには食料もあるし、いざとなったら
ご近所に配らせてもらうさ。

engChrName: You folks best be careful, okay? Come back in one piece!
engSearchText:
You folks best be careful, okay? Come back in
one piece!
jpnChrName: ……あんたたちも気をつけるんだよ！ きっと無事に戻ってきておくれ！
jpnSearchText:
……あんたたちも気をつけるんだよ！
きっと無事に戻ってきておくれ！

engChrName: You have our word!
engSearchText: You have our word!
jpnChrName: ええ──お約束いたします！
jpnSearchText: ええ──お約束いたします！

engChrName: Damn straight!
engSearchText: Damn straight!
jpnChrName: ああ、勿論だ！！
jpnSearchText: ああ、勿論だ！！

engChrName: Welcome, welcome! 200 mira for a dip!
engSearchText: Welcome, welcome! 200 mira for a dip!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃ～い。 入浴していくなら200ミラだよ～。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃ～い。
入浴していくなら200ミラだよ～。

engChrName: It's always good to see you! One bath will be 200 mira, please.
engSearchText:
It's always good to see you! One bath will be 200
mira, please.
jpnChrName: ふふ、いつも来てくれて嬉しいわ。 入浴していくなら200ミラよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いつも来てくれて嬉しいわ。
入浴していくなら200ミラよ。

engChrName: Damn it. Fresh outta cash.
engSearchText: Damn it. Fresh outta cash.
jpnChrName: っと、手持ちがなかったな……
jpnSearchText: っと、手持ちがなかったな……

engChrName: I think everybody's settling down now! Phew... Everyone was panicking just a little bit ago.
engSearchText:
I think everybody's settling down now! Phew...
Everyone was panicking just a little bit ago.
jpnChrName: 最初はみんなパニックだったけど やっと収まってくれたんだ～！
jpnSearchText:
最初はみんなパニックだったけど
やっと収まってくれたんだ～！

engChrName: I don't really get this whole time freezing thing... The 'phenomenon,' or whatever you call it...
engSearchText:
I don't really get this whole time freezing thing...
The 'phenomenon,' or whatever you call it...
jpnChrName: さすがに物理現象が“停まって”るのは 意味不明すぎるけど……
jpnSearchText:
さすがに物理現象が“停まって”るのは
意味不明すぎるけど……

engChrName: ...but what matters is that everyone's okay! I know you guys'll find a way to stop it!
engSearchText:
...but what matters is that everyone's okay! I know
you guys'll find a way to stop it!
jpnChrName: みんなが無事でホントに良かった！ 突破口の方も期待させてよね！
jpnSearchText:
みんなが無事でホントに良かった！
突破口の方も期待させてよね！

engChrName: Whew! We got way more customers than I expected!
engSearchText:
Whew! We got way more customers than
I expected!
jpnChrName: いや～、今日は想像以上に お客さんが来てくれててビックリだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、今日は想像以上に
お客さんが来てくれててビックリだよ～！

engChrName: The Tyrell Times wrote up an article about us, and that gave us a big bump.
engSearchText:
The Tyrell Times wrote up an article about us, and
that gave us a big bump.
jpnChrName: この前タイレル通信で紹介されたけど、 宣伝効果ってこんなにあるんだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
この前タイレル通信で紹介されたけど、
宣伝効果ってこんなにあるんだねぇ。

engChrName: We've gotten a lot of business through word of mouth, too.
engSearchText:
We've gotten a lot of business through word of
mouth, too.
jpnChrName: あと口コミで興味を 持ってくれてた人も多いみたい。
jpnSearchText:
あと口コミで興味を
持ってくれてた人も多いみたい。

engChrName: Not gonna lie, I'm pleased as punch. Hope you guys are having fun, too!
engSearchText:
Not gonna lie, I'm pleased as punch. Hope you guys
are having fun, too!
jpnChrName: なんだか嬉しいよねぇ。 うんうん、みんな楽しんでいってね～！
jpnSearchText:
なんだか嬉しいよねぇ。
うんうん、みんな楽しんでいってね～！

engChrName: We're still just a bathhouse, y'know? There's not a whole lot we can do to celebrate the festival outside of just...doing the usual.
engSearchText:
We're still just a bathhouse, y'know? There's not a
whole lot we can do to celebrate the festival outside of
just...doing the usual.
jpnChrName: ウチは風呂屋だからねぇ、お祭りだからって 何をするつもりも無かったけど……
jpnSearchText:
ウチは風呂屋だからねぇ、お祭りだからって
何をするつもりも無かったけど……

engChrName: That Tyrell Times reporter gave us a glowing review! That should help in the short-term.
engSearchText:
That Tyrell Times reporter gave us a glowing review!
That should help in the short-term.
jpnChrName: この前来たタイレル通信の記者さんが 記事で紹介してくれたみたいでね～。
jpnSearchText:
この前来たタイレル通信の記者さんが
記事で紹介してくれたみたいでね～。

engChrName: We just might need to prepare for a big rush of customers as a result. I should probably get on that.
engSearchText:
We just might need to prepare for a big rush of
customers as a result. I should probably get on that.
jpnChrName: ふらっと訪ねてくるお客さんがいるかもね。 準備だけはしておこうかな～？
jpnSearchText:
ふらっと訪ねてくるお客さんがいるかもね。
準備だけはしておこうかな～？

engChrName: Gin, huh? All I really know about her is that she's stubborn as a mule.
engSearchText:
Gin, huh? All I really know about her is that she's
stubborn as a mule.
jpnChrName: ギン婆さんか～、偏屈ってくらいで あんまり詳しく知らなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
ギン婆さんか～、偏屈ってくらいで
あんまり詳しく知らなかったけど……

engChrName: But she's pretty fun to listen to! She's lived a lot and seen a lot, so she's got plenty of stories to tell.
engSearchText:
But she's pretty fun to listen to! She's lived a lot and
seen a lot, so she's got plenty of stories to tell.
jpnChrName: 話を聞いてみると面白いねぇ。 時代を生き抜いてきた人の言葉は違うよ～！
jpnSearchText:
話を聞いてみると面白いねぇ。
時代を生き抜いてきた人の言葉は違うよ～！

engChrName: And then my hat's off to Sister Myria, too—she planned the whole thing!
engSearchText:
And then my hat's off to Sister Myria, too—she
planned the whole thing!
jpnChrName: 企画したシスター・ミリアのことも ちょっと見直しちゃったかな～？
jpnSearchText:
企画したシスター・ミリアのことも
ちょっと見直しちゃったかな～？

engChrName: Oh, hey, Van! Looks like you've got Judi...er, Judy with you too?
engSearchText:
Oh, hey, Van! Looks like you've got Judi...er, Judy
with you too?
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンたち～。 それにジュデ……さんも一緒なんだ～。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンたち～。
それにジュデ……さんも一緒なんだ～。

engChrName: H-Hello, Anya! Thank you for yesterday.
engSearchText: H-Hello, Anya! Thank you for yesterday.
jpnChrName: ハ、ハァイ、アーニャちゃん。 昨日もありがとね。
jpnSearchText:
ハ、ハァイ、アーニャちゃん。
昨日もありがとね。

engChrName: Oh, don't tell me...
engSearchText: Oh, don't tell me...
jpnChrName: えっと、もしかして……
jpnSearchText: えっと、もしかして……

engChrName: Did you seriously get ID'd by Anya? Let it slip in the bath or somethin'?
engSearchText:
Did you seriously get ID'd by Anya? Let it slip in the
bath or somethin'?
jpnChrName: アーニャには身バレしてんのかよ。 ……風呂上がりに油断でもしてたのか？
jpnSearchText:
アーニャには身バレしてんのかよ。
……風呂上がりに油断でもしてたのか？

engChrName: Urgh... I, er... I would not possibly.
engSearchText: Urgh... I, er... I would not possibly.
jpnChrName: ギクッ……ナ、ナンノコト？
jpnSearchText: ギクッ……ナ、ナンノコト？

engChrName: You were any easier to read, you'd be a nursery rhyme.
engSearchText:
You were any easier to read, you'd be a
nursery rhyme.
jpnChrName: クク、分かりやすすぎじゃね？
jpnSearchText: クク、分かりやすすぎじゃね？

engChrName: (She really is an open book.)
engSearchText: (She really is an open book.)
jpnChrName: （ホントに分かりやすい人だなぁ……）
jpnSearchText: （ホントに分かりやすい人だなぁ……）

engChrName: Heehee, I can read your face!
engSearchText: Heehee, I can read your face!
jpnChrName: えへへ……顔に書いてありますね！
jpnSearchText: えへへ……顔に書いてありますね！

engChrName: Hey, I'll never complain about more regulars coming in! I'll keep you posted on when our calmer hours tend to be.
engSearchText:
Hey, I'll never complain about more regulars
coming in! I'll keep you posted on when our calmer
hours tend to be.
jpnChrName: まあ常連さんが増えるのは嬉しいし、 なるべく人とかち合わない時間帯で案内するよ～。
jpnSearchText:
まあ常連さんが増えるのは嬉しいし、
なるべく人とかち合わない時間帯で案内するよ～。

engChrName: If it's just you, I can see about renting out a private space for you when you come in. Just let me know!
engSearchText:
If it's just you, I can see about renting out a private
space for you when you come in. Just let me know!
jpnChrName: 狭くてよければ貸切風呂も 用意できるし、声掛けてねー。
jpnSearchText:
狭くてよければ貸切風呂も
用意できるし、声掛けてねー。

engChrName: I really appreciate that. Thank you...
engSearchText: I really appreciate that. Thank you...
jpnChrName: 配慮ありがと、マジ助かるわ……
jpnSearchText: 配慮ありがと、マジ助かるわ……

engChrName: There's just no better way to recharge. I need my bath fix to stay fit and fresh, or I get all cold and creaky.
engSearchText:
There's just no better way to recharge. I need my bath
fix to stay fit and fresh, or I get all cold and creaky.
jpnChrName: やっぱり熱いお湯に浸からないと 疲れが取れなくてさ～……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり熱いお湯に浸からないと
疲れが取れなくてさ～……

engChrName: (I agree, but man, it sounds like she's over the hill when she says it like that.)
engSearchText:
(I agree, but man, it sounds like she's over the hill
when she says it like that.)
jpnChrName: （ビミョーに年寄り臭いな、コイツ……）
jpnSearchText: （ビミョーに年寄り臭いな、コイツ……）

engChrName: (Mr. Arkride, I suggest you keep such observations to yourself.)
engSearchText:
(Mr. Arkride, I suggest you keep such observations
to yourself.)
jpnChrName: （ヴァン様、それは禁句かと。）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァン様、それは禁句かと。）

engChrName: (Actually, I think Jadi—my grandpa—said the same thing last year...)
engSearchText:
(Actually, I think Jadi—my grandpa—said the same
thing last year...)
jpnChrName: （そういえば、去年祖父（ジャッド）も   同じことを言ってたような……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういえば、去年祖父（ジャッド）も
同じことを言ってたような……）

engChrName: (Well, I suppose the bathhouse wouldn't mind her patronage...even if she does make a habit out of it.)
engSearchText:
(Well, I suppose the bathhouse wouldn't mind her
patronage...even if she does make a habit out of it.)
jpnChrName: （この分だと毎日欠かさず通ってそうだね。   ……まあいいんだけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（この分だと毎日欠かさず通ってそうだね。
……まあいいんだけど。）

engChrName: We're a public bathhouse, so we're always around whenever you need to chill out.
engSearchText:
We're a public bathhouse, so we're always around
whenever you need to chill out.
jpnChrName: ま、うちは風呂屋だし いつも通りにゆっくりしていってよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、うちは風呂屋だし
いつも通りにゆっくりしていってよ。

engChrName: People are kinda on edge, and I don't blame them...
engSearchText: People are kinda on edge, and I don't blame them...
jpnChrName: 常連のみんなも 流石に落ち着かなさそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
常連のみんなも
流石に落ち着かなさそうだけど……

engChrName: Even ol' Huck hasn't popped in for a while now.
engSearchText: Even ol' Huck hasn't popped in for a while now.
jpnChrName: ……あのハック爺さんですら しばらく顔を出してないけど……
jpnSearchText:
……あのハック爺さんですら
しばらく顔を出してないけど……

engChrName: But worrying isn't going to fix things. This place is for relaxing! Come on in however often you need to.
engSearchText:
But worrying isn't going to fix things. This place is
for relaxing! Come on in however often you need to.
jpnChrName: 心配してどうなるものでもないだろうし。 せめて英気を養っていってよね～。
jpnSearchText:
心配してどうなるものでもないだろうし。
せめて英気を養っていってよね～。

engChrName: Next month is looking... Oof. That's tight, there. The fuel price hikes are really gonna bite us...
engSearchText:
Next month is looking... Oof. That's tight, there.
The fuel price hikes are really gonna bite us...
jpnChrName: 来月の予算は、と…… ふう、冬場は燃料費がかさむよねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
来月の予算は、と……
ふう、冬場は燃料費がかさむよねぇ～。

engChrName: I wonder how much a trip to Remiferia would run me?
engSearchText:
I wonder how much a trip to Remiferia would
run me?
jpnChrName: 本場のレミフェリアに行ったら どれくらいかかるんだろ～？
jpnSearchText:
本場のレミフェリアに行ったら
どれくらいかかるんだろ～？

engChrName: You've been plannin' that for a while, haven't you?
engSearchText: You've been plannin' that for a while, haven't you?
jpnChrName: そういやお前、レミフェリアに 行ってみたいんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
そういやお前、レミフェリアに
行ってみたいんだったか？

engChrName: Yup! My grandpa and his family immigrated from there some time ago. I'd love to see the country for myself.
engSearchText:
Yup! My grandpa and his family immigrated from
there some time ago. I'd love to see the country
for myself.
jpnChrName: うんうん、お祖父ちゃんたちの故郷だからねぇ。 この目で見てみたいっていうか。
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、お祖父ちゃんたちの故郷だからねぇ。
この目で見てみたいっていうか。

engChrName: My job as a clerk is well and good, but it doesn't give me much vacation time. I'd love to go on a trip or two...
engSearchText:
My job as a clerk is well and good, but it doesn't give
me much vacation time. I'd love to go on a trip
or two...
jpnChrName: ……番頭の仕事は好きだけど、 旅行とか行けないのが辛いよねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
……番頭の仕事は好きだけど、
旅行とか行けないのが辛いよねぇ～。

engChrName: Got'cha. (She's a character for sure.)
engSearchText:
Got'cha.
(She's a character for sure.)
jpnChrName: なるほどな。 （コイツもどっか不器用っつーか……）
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな。
（コイツもどっか不器用っつーか……）

engChrName: Well, just gotta keep at it. You'll get your time in the sun one day, I'm sure.
engSearchText:
Well, just gotta keep at it. You'll get your time in the
sun one day, I'm sure.
jpnChrName: まあハナから諦めずとも、お前なら 方法は色々あんじゃねーのか？
jpnSearchText:
まあハナから諦めずとも、お前なら
方法は色々あんじゃねーのか？

engChrName: Thanks for the vote of confidence, heehee.
engSearchText: Thanks for the vote of confidence, heehee.
jpnChrName: あはは、そうだねぇ～。
jpnSearchText: あはは、そうだねぇ～。

engChrName: But yeah, I've wanted to go for a while now. Maybe I should give it some thought.
engSearchText:
But yeah, I've wanted to go for a while now. Maybe I
should give it some thought.
jpnChrName: ……うん、ずっと前から行きたかったし ちょっと考えてみようかな？
jpnSearchText:
……うん、ずっと前から行きたかったし
ちょっと考えてみようかな？

engChrName: Grandpa and his family immigrated from Remiferia quite some time ago.
engSearchText:
Grandpa and his family immigrated from Remiferia
quite some time ago.
jpnChrName: お祖父ちゃんたちはレミフェリアからの 移民だったんだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
お祖父ちゃんたちはレミフェリアからの
移民だったんだよね～。

engChrName: He would always tell us about how beautiful of a place it was—how blue the water was, how clear the glaciers were... And he loved the people there.
engSearchText:
He would always tell us about how beautiful of a
place it was—how blue the water was, how clear the
glaciers were... And he loved the people there.
jpnChrName: 綺麗な湖、透き通る氷河──暮らしてる人も 理知的でステキだってよく話してくれたなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
綺麗な湖、透き通る氷河──暮らしてる人も
理知的でステキだってよく話してくれたなぁ。

engChrName: ...I really would like to go there someday. Maybe one of these summers, I can plan a trip.
engSearchText:
...I really would like to go there someday. Maybe one
of these summers, I can plan a trip.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりいつか行ってみたいよね～。 うん、ちょっと考えてみようかな？
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱりいつか行ってみたいよね～。
うん、ちょっと考えてみようかな？

engChrName: (I just wanted to say, umm... Thank you for accommodating me. I feel much more comfortable now.)
engSearchText:
(I just wanted to say, umm... Thank you for
accommodating me. I feel much more
comfortable now.)
jpnChrName: （えっとその、配慮ありがとう。   お陰でくつろげたよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（えっとその、配慮ありがとう。
お陰でくつろげたよ。）

engChrName: (Happy to hear it! Just lemme know what else you need and I'll get it for you, no prob!)
engSearchText:
(Happy to hear it! Just lemme know what else you
need and I'll get it for you, no prob!)
jpnChrName: （よかった、またいつでも貸すから   気兼ねなく来てよ～。）
jpnSearchText:
（よかった、またいつでも貸すから
気兼ねなく来てよ～。）

engChrName: (Thank you.)
engSearchText: (Thank you.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、そうさせてもらうよ。）
jpnSearchText: （ああ、そうさせてもらうよ。）

engChrName: (Heh. The baths'll win him over eventually, I'm sure of it.)
engSearchText:
(Heh. The baths'll win him over eventually, I'm sure
of it.)
jpnChrName: （……ま、風呂嫌いじゃなさそうで   良かったぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ま、風呂嫌いじゃなさそうで
良かったぜ。）

engChrName: Relax to the max, that's our motto! If you ever need to unwind, drop on by and have a soak.
engSearchText:
Relax to the max, that's our motto! If you ever need to
unwind, drop on by and have a soak.
jpnChrName: ウチはリラックスできるって評判なんだよ。 興味があったらいつでもどうぞ～。
jpnSearchText:
ウチはリラックスできるって評判なんだよ。
興味があったらいつでもどうぞ～。

engChrName: Oh, so that uh, orbal drone thing of yours? I wonder if we could, like...advertise it. Get people to come see it.
engSearchText:
Oh, so that uh, orbal drone thing of yours? I wonder
if we could, like...advertise it. Get people to come
see it.
jpnChrName: ……そうだ、あの導力ドローン、だっけ？ 珍しくて見に来る人もいそうだし……
jpnSearchText:
……そうだ、あの導力ドローン、だっけ？
珍しくて見に来る人もいそうだし……

engChrName: Tell you what: you lend it to us for the day, and I'll lend the bath to you for the whole day! Free of charge!
engSearchText:
Tell you what: you lend it to us for the day, and I'll
lend the bath to you for the whole day! Free
of charge!
jpnChrName: 店番に一日貸し出してくれたら その日は入り放題にしてあげるよ～！
jpnSearchText:
店番に一日貸し出してくれたら
その日は入り放題にしてあげるよ～！

engChrName: Conniving little girl, aren't you? (Hard to argue with a free day pass, though...)
engSearchText:
Conniving little girl, aren't you?
(Hard to argue with a free day pass, though...)
jpnChrName: ったくいつもちゃっかりしやがって…… （入り放題か、悪くねえ──）
jpnSearchText:
ったくいつもちゃっかりしやがって……
（入り放題か、悪くねえ──）

engChrName: (...She caught him hook, line, and sinker. I worry for him sometimes.)
engSearchText:
(...She caught him hook, line, and sinker. I worry for
him sometimes.)
jpnChrName: （……この人、時々チョロいけど   大丈夫なのかな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……この人、時々チョロいけど
大丈夫なのかな。）

engChrName: Old Huck has a ton of stories to tell... He's kinda like a grandpa.
engSearchText:
Old Huck has a ton of stories to tell... He's kinda like
a grandpa.
jpnChrName: ハック爺さんも困った人だよね～。 いろいろ面白い話をしてくれるのはいいけど……
jpnSearchText:
ハック爺さんも困った人だよね～。
いろいろ面白い話をしてくれるのはいいけど……

engChrName: But then, he's the president of that big investment company, too. He's kinda weird like that...
engSearchText:
But then, he's the president of that big investment
company, too. He's kinda weird like that...
jpnChrName: こんなのが共和国有数の投資会社の 社長で大丈夫なのかな～？
jpnSearchText:
こんなのが共和国有数の投資会社の
社長で大丈夫なのかな～？

engChrName: Yumé's gotten really good at running errands, hasn't she?
engSearchText:
Yumé's gotten really good at running errands,
hasn't she?
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんのお使いも 中々サマになってるよね～。
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃんのお使いも
中々サマになってるよね～。

engChrName: Oh, I know! I should teach her about tipping! I bet she could rack up a ton of tips with that smile of hers.
engSearchText:
Oh, I know! I should teach her about tipping! I bet
she could rack up a ton of tips with that smile of hers.
jpnChrName: そうだ、じゃあ“チップ”を教えてあげよう～。 ユメちゃんの笑顔なら稼げそうだしね～♪
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、じゃあ“チップ”を教えてあげよう～。
ユメちゃんの笑顔なら稼げそうだしね～♪

engChrName: Slippery slope, there. Better not go overboard.
engSearchText: Slippery slope, there. Better not go overboard.
jpnChrName: ……お前もあんま マセた事ばっか仕込むんじゃねーぞ？
jpnSearchText:
……お前もあんま
マセた事ばっか仕込むんじゃねーぞ？

engChrName: (Yeah, okay. This might be what I think it is.)
engSearchText: (Yeah, okay. This might be what I think it is.)
jpnChrName: （うんうん、これはひょっとすると   ひょっとするかもだねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（うんうん、これはひょっとすると
ひょっとするかもだねぇ。）

engChrName: (I mean, Sheena and Harry are friends, yeah, but beyond that, I dunno what to make of them...)
engSearchText:
(I mean, Sheena and Harry are friends, yeah, but
beyond that, I dunno what to make of them...)
jpnChrName: （まあシーナとハリーって、   幼馴染なのにハッキリしない所あったし……）
jpnSearchText:
（まあシーナとハリーって、
幼馴染なのにハッキリしない所あったし……）

engChrName: (Maybe this'll be a good chance to find out. I'll have to keep a close eye on 'em.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe this'll be a good chance to find out. I'll have
to keep a close eye on 'em.)
jpnChrName: （イイ機会になるかもねぇ。   ふふ、わたしも見守らせてもらおっかな～？）
jpnSearchText:
（イイ機会になるかもねぇ。
ふふ、わたしも見守らせてもらおっかな～？）

engChrName: (Don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong, 'kay? Might get cut off.)
engSearchText:
(Don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong, 'kay?
Might get cut off.)
jpnChrName: （ったく、お節介もほどほどにな。）
jpnSearchText: （ったく、お節介もほどほどにな。）

engChrName: Oh, don't worry! At the end of the day, it's their problem, not mine. Heehee!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't worry! At the end of the day, it's their
problem, not mine. Heehee!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫大丈夫、あくまで 二人の問題だもんね～♪
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫大丈夫、あくまで
二人の問題だもんね～♪

engChrName: (Guess it's natural for kids her age to poke fun at other kids. I'll leave 'em be.)
engSearchText:
(Guess it's natural for kids her age to poke fun at
other kids. I'll leave 'em be.)
jpnChrName: （面白がってるようにしか見えねえが、   ……まあ年相応ちゃ相応か。）
jpnSearchText:
（面白がってるようにしか見えねえが、
……まあ年相応ちゃ相応か。）
