engChrName: So that's how it works... You have to make the words line up with the rhythm of the song. That's the real tricky part...
engSearchText:
So that's how it works... You have to make the words
line up with the rhythm of the song. That's the real
tricky part...
jpnChrName: なるほど～、単純そうに見えて 言葉や音節の勉強にもなってるんだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど～、単純そうに見えて
言葉や音節の勉強にもなってるんだねぇ。

engChrName: Father Nikolai wants me to include a word I learned recently, too. Man, he sure knows how to keep me on my toes...
engSearchText:
Father Nikolai wants me to include a word I learned
recently, too. Man, he sure knows how to keep me
on my toes...
jpnChrName: “最近覚えた言葉を組み込む”ってルールが いい難易度調整になってて……さすが教区長様だよ。
jpnSearchText:
“最近覚えた言葉を組み込む”ってルールが
いい難易度調整になってて……さすが教区長様だよ。

engChrName: Let's see here... Ooh, 'corporatocracy'! That's a cool word I heard recently! But how do I include it in a sentence...?
engSearchText:
Let's see here... Ooh, 'corporatocracy'! That's a cool
word I heard recently! But how do I include it in
a sentence...?
jpnChrName: あとは……『コーポレートガバナンス』、 この言葉をどう組み込むかかなぁ～？
jpnSearchText:
あとは……『コーポレートガバナンス』、
この言葉をどう組み込むかかなぁ～？

engChrName: Oh, back again? Didn't you have a long soak this morning already?
engSearchText:
Oh, back again? Didn't you have a long soak this
morning already?
jpnChrName: あれ、ヴァンってば 朝も念入りに入ってたのに、また……？
jpnSearchText:
あれ、ヴァンってば
朝も念入りに入ってたのに、また……？

engChrName: Something must really be on your mind, huh? Heehee. I feel for you.
engSearchText:
Something must really be on your mind, huh?
Heehee. I feel for you.
jpnChrName: もしかして何か抱えてるの？ ……ふふ、苦労するよね解決屋も。
jpnSearchText:
もしかして何か抱えてるの？
……ふふ、苦労するよね解決屋も。

engChrName: I'll lend you an ear whenever. Just lemme know, 'kay?
engSearchText: I'll lend you an ear whenever. Just lemme know, 'kay?
jpnChrName: あたしでよければ話聞くから、 いつでも来なよ～？
jpnSearchText:
あたしでよければ話聞くから、
いつでも来なよ～？

engChrName: I... Thanks? But like, who are you, the manager of the snack bar? My stuff's over your head.
engSearchText:
I... Thanks? But like, who are you, the manager of the
snack bar? My stuff's over your head.
jpnChrName: おう──って飲み屋のママかっつーの。 耳年増もほどほどにしとけよ？
jpnSearchText:
おう──って飲み屋のママかっつーの。
耳年増もほどほどにしとけよ？

engChrName: Oof! Shot down!
engSearchText: Oof! Shot down!
jpnChrName: あはは、冗談冗談♪
jpnSearchText: あはは、冗談冗談♪

engChrName: I mean it, though, okay? I know a lot about grownup problems... It's paperwork, isn't it? I bet it's paperwork.
engSearchText:
I mean it, though, okay? I know a lot about
grownup problems... It's paperwork, isn't it? I bet
it's paperwork.
jpnChrName: でもまあ、相談に乗るのはホントだからね？ ……どうせ事務書類とか溜めてるんでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
でもまあ、相談に乗るのはホントだからね？
……どうせ事務書類とか溜めてるんでしょ。

engChrName: Tch... Wish you weren't right about that.
engSearchText: Tch... Wish you weren't right about that.
jpnChrName: うっ……まあ否定はしねえが……
jpnSearchText: うっ……まあ否定はしねえが……

engChrName: Aww, your face is panicking! Heehee.
engSearchText: Aww, your face is panicking! Heehee.
jpnChrName: あはは、目が泳いでるよ～。
jpnSearchText: あはは、目が泳いでるよ～。

engChrName: Make sure to stay on top of all that paperwork, now! Paulette's gonna be mad if you miss rent.
engSearchText:
Make sure to stay on top of all that paperwork, now!
Paulette's gonna be mad if you miss rent.
jpnChrName: せめてミラの管理くらいはちゃんとしなよ。 ポーレットさんに迷惑かけないためにも。
jpnSearchText:
せめてミラの管理くらいはちゃんとしなよ。
ポーレットさんに迷惑かけないためにも。

engChrName: Hey, I know! (Kid knows too much, damn.)
engSearchText:
Hey, I know!
(Kid knows too much, damn.)
jpnChrName: へいへい、わーったよ！ （ホントしっかりしてやがんな、コイツ。）
jpnSearchText:
へいへい、わーったよ！
（ホントしっかりしてやがんな、コイツ。）

engChrName: I just wrapped up the check book and all the old regulars are behaving themselves, so I've got time to work through the sales slips.
engSearchText:
I just wrapped up the check book and all the old
regulars are behaving themselves, so I've got time to
work through the sales slips.
jpnChrName: お爺さんたちも静かにさせたし、 帳簿付けも終わったから伝票整理をね。
jpnSearchText:
お爺さんたちも静かにさせたし、
帳簿付けも終わったから伝票整理をね。

engChrName: They're changing the taxes around this year, so I gotta make sure I do them right.
engSearchText:
They're changing the taxes around this year, so I
gotta make sure I do them right.
jpnChrName: 今年は税制もちょこちょこ変わったし 年末に向けて漏れがないようにしないと……
jpnSearchText:
今年は税制もちょこちょこ変わったし
年末に向けて漏れがないようにしないと……

engChrName: Man, this stuff's gotta be freaking you out, huh? Heehee.
engSearchText:
Man, this stuff's gotta be freaking you out, huh?
Heehee.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンってこの辺、苦手そうだよね～。
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンってこの辺、苦手そうだよね～。

engChrName: ...I go to the bath to DE-stress, y'know.
engSearchText: ...I go to the bath to DE-stress, y'know.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも風呂に入ってる間は 考えたくねえな。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも風呂に入ってる間は
考えたくねえな。

engChrName: Back again, huh? You folks sure like your baths!
engSearchText: Back again, huh? You folks sure like your baths!
jpnChrName: あれ、ヴァンたちまた来たの～？ ホントに好きだねえ。
jpnSearchText:
あれ、ヴァンたちまた来たの～？
ホントに好きだねえ。

engChrName: What can I say? Feels good every time.
engSearchText: What can I say? Feels good every time.
jpnChrName: ま、風呂は何度入ってもいいもんだからな。
jpnSearchText: ま、風呂は何度入ってもいいもんだからな。

engChrName: That löyly felt really good! Thanks for the recommendation.
engSearchText:
That löyly felt really good! Thanks for
the recommendation.
jpnChrName: あはは、確かにあのロウリュは すごく気持ちよかったですよ！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、確かにあのロウリュは
すごく気持ちよかったですよ！

engChrName: Oh, are you doing homework there?
engSearchText: Oh, are you doing homework there?
jpnChrName: アーニャちゃんは日曜学校の宿題……ですか？
jpnSearchText: アーニャちゃんは日曜学校の宿題……ですか？

engChrName: Huh? Oh, no. These are our accounting documents. I started doing the finances last year.
engSearchText:
Huh? Oh, no. These are our accounting documents.
I started doing the finances last year.
jpnChrName: あ、ううん、これウチの経理書類。 去年から財務管理も任されてるんだよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ううん、これウチの経理書類。
去年から財務管理も任されてるんだよねぇ。

engChrName: B-Beg pardon? At your age?
engSearchText: B-Beg pardon? At your age?
jpnChrName: ざ、財務管理…… その歳でですか……！？
jpnSearchText:
ざ、財務管理……
その歳でですか……！？

engChrName: Eh, it's no biggie. Most of our costs are the same every year, so there's not much math to do.
engSearchText:
Eh, it's no biggie. Most of our costs are the same
every year, so there's not much math to do.
jpnChrName: まあ大したことじゃないけどね～。 ウチは固定費多いから計算も楽だし。
jpnSearchText:
まあ大したことじゃないけどね～。
ウチは固定費多いから計算も楽だし。

engChrName: Apparently I've just always had a knack for numbers. I learned a lot of this stuff from watching other people, though.
engSearchText:
Apparently I've just always had a knack for numbers.
I learned a lot of this stuff from watching other
people, though.
jpnChrName: ちなみに番頭やってると色んな話を耳にするから 経理感覚っぽいのは元々あったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに番頭やってると色んな話を耳にするから
経理感覚っぽいのは元々あったみたいで。

engChrName: I hear a lot of stuff about finance from old Huck and his gambling buddies, so maybe that helped?
engSearchText:
I hear a lot of stuff about finance from old Huck and
his gambling buddies, so maybe that helped?
jpnChrName: ふふ、オジサンたちの経済談義とかも 聞いてて勉強になったかな～？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、オジサンたちの経済談義とかも
聞いてて勉強になったかな～？

engChrName: Huh... Guess there's somethin' to be said for the school of hard knocks.
engSearchText:
Huh... Guess there's somethin' to be said for the
school of hard knocks.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……門前の小僧 なんとやらとは言うが。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……門前の小僧
なんとやらとは言うが。

engChrName: Hmm... I really do have a lot to learn.
engSearchText: Hmm... I really do have a lot to learn.
jpnChrName: うーん、わたしも見習わないとです！
jpnSearchText: うーん、わたしも見習わないとです！

engChrName: (I knew she was mature for her age, but I hadn't expected that...)
engSearchText:
(I knew she was mature for her age, but I hadn't
expected that...)
jpnChrName: （しっかり者だとは思ってましたけど   そういう事だったんですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（しっかり者だとは思ってましたけど
そういう事だったんですね……）

engChrName: Hrm... What are Huck and his buddies up to? They're getting awfully loud over there.
engSearchText:
Hrm... What are Huck and his buddies up to?
They're getting awfully loud over there.
jpnChrName: それにしてもハック爺さんたち、 ちょっと騒がしいよね～。
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもハック爺さんたち、
ちょっと騒がしいよね～。

engChrName: Gambling in here isn't against our rules, really—and they teach me some cool stuff about the math behind it...
engSearchText:
Gambling in here isn't against our rules, really—and
they teach me some cool stuff about the math
behind it...
jpnChrName: 別に賭け龍雀はいいんだけど…… ついでに言うと色々教えてくれて助かってるけど……
jpnSearchText:
別に賭け龍雀はいいんだけど……
ついでに言うと色々教えてくれて助かってるけど……

engChrName: ...but they'd better not be disturbing the other customers.
engSearchText:
...but they'd better not be disturbing the
other customers.
jpnChrName: 他のお客さんの迷惑になるのは 見過ごせないかなあ。
jpnSearchText:
他のお客さんの迷惑になるのは
見過ごせないかなあ。

engChrName: I think I'll give them a little warning.
engSearchText: I think I'll give them a little warning.
jpnChrName: ここは番頭として かるーく絞っておかないとだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ここは番頭として
かるーく絞っておかないとだねぇ。

engChrName: I don't see the clerk around. Are they open today?
engSearchText: I don't see the clerk around. Are they open today?
jpnChrName: 番頭さん、いらっしゃらないですね…… 営業時間外なんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
番頭さん、いらっしゃらないですね……
営業時間外なんでしょうか。

engChrName: Should be. They open at 5:30 in the morning... Kinda weird not to see the clerk up front. Maybe they're busy?
engSearchText:
Should be. They open at 5:30 in the morning...
Kinda weird not to see the clerk up front.
Maybe they're busy?
jpnChrName: いや、ここは朝５時半からやってるんだが…… 珍しく席を外してるようだな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、ここは朝５時半からやってるんだが……
珍しく席を外してるようだな。

engChrName: Yo, Anya! Lemme get a soak!
engSearchText: Yo, Anya! Lemme get a soak!
jpnChrName: ──おいアーニャ！　お客サンだぞ！
jpnSearchText: ──おいアーニャ！　お客サンだぞ！

engChrName: Sorry, sorry! Welcome!
engSearchText: Sorry, sorry! Welcome!
jpnChrName: はいはい、いらっしゃいませー！
jpnSearchText: はいはい、いらっしゃいませー！

engChrName: Just you today, huh? You never get tired of this place, do you?
engSearchText:
Just you today, huh? You never get tired of this place,
do you?
jpnChrName: ってまたヴァンかぁ。 毎日飽きないねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ってまたヴァンかぁ。
毎日飽きないねぇ。

engChrName: Wha...? The clerk is a child?
engSearchText: Wha...? The clerk is a child?
jpnChrName: お、女の子……？
jpnSearchText: お、女の子……？

engChrName: Yup! My folks are busy, so I'm the clerk here.
engSearchText: Yup! My folks are busy, so I'm the clerk here.
jpnChrName: うんうん、ウチは両親が忙しいから わたしが店番してるんだよ～。
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、ウチは両親が忙しいから
わたしが店番してるんだよ～。

engChrName: Have you heard about our special löyly bath? It's this steam sauna you walk right into! They're big in Remiferia, way up north.
engSearchText:
Have you heard about our special löyly bath? It's this
steam sauna you walk right into! They're big in
Remiferia, way up north.
jpnChrName: ちなみに北国レミフェリア由来の 《ロウリュ（蒸気サウナ）》も楽しめる浴場でね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに北国レミフェリア由来の
《ロウリュ（蒸気サウナ）》も楽しめる浴場でね。

engChrName: My grandparents are both from there, so ours is the real deal!
engSearchText:
My grandparents are both from there, so ours is the
real deal!
jpnChrName: お祖父ちゃんとお祖母ちゃんが レミフェリア出身だから、本格的だよ～！
jpnSearchText:
お祖父ちゃんとお祖母ちゃんが
レミフェリア出身だから、本格的だよ～！

engChrName: Really? That sounds wonderful...! (I'd like to give it a try, now!)
engSearchText:
Really? That sounds wonderful...!
(I'd like to give it a try, now!)
jpnChrName: そ、それは凄そうですね…… （ちょっと興味あるかも……）
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは凄そうですね……
（ちょっと興味あるかも……）

engChrName: Normally you're right up at the counter. Somethin' happen back there...?
engSearchText:
Normally you're right up at the counter.
Somethin' happen back there...?
jpnChrName: だがお前が番頭を外してるなんてな。 ……まさかとは思うが……
jpnSearchText:
だがお前が番頭を外してるなんてな。
……まさかとは思うが……

engChrName: Oof, haha. I knew you'd notice. We had a pipe burst this morning...
engSearchText:
Oof, haha. I knew you'd notice. We had a pipe burst
this morning...
jpnChrName: あはは、さすがヴァン～。 実は今朝、水道管の水漏れが見つかってね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、さすがヴァン～。
実は今朝、水道管の水漏れが見つかってね。

engChrName: So we're closed for the day, sorry. We've got a guy repairing it, so hopefully we're back in business soon.
engSearchText:
So we're closed for the day, sorry. We've got a guy
repairing it, so hopefully we're back in business soon.
jpnChrName: いま業者さんに直してもらってるんだ～。 悪いんだけど、今日は臨時休業かなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
いま業者さんに直してもらってるんだ～。
悪いんだけど、今日は臨時休業かなぁ？

engChrName: Well, shit... Sucks, but what can you do. Hope you guys get that fixed soon.
engSearchText:
Well, shit... Sucks, but what can you do. Hope you
guys get that fixed soon.
jpnChrName: クソ、仕方ねえな…… 今日の所は引き上げるしかねえか。
jpnSearchText:
クソ、仕方ねえな……
今日の所は引き上げるしかねえか。

engChrName: Right, of course. (Does Van...frequent this place?)
engSearchText:
Right, of course.
(Does Van...frequent this place?)
jpnChrName: ええ、そうですね。 （というかヴァンさん、もしかして……）
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そうですね。
（というかヴァンさん、もしかして……）

engChrName: Do come again!
engSearchText: Do come again!
jpnChrName: あはは、二人ともまたご贔屓に～！
jpnSearchText: あはは、二人ともまたご贔屓に～！

engChrName: I never thought you'd go and put a part-timer on your payroll.
engSearchText:
I never thought you'd go and put a part-timer on
your payroll.
jpnChrName: それにしてもヴァンが バイトさんを雇うなんてね～……
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもヴァンが
バイトさんを雇うなんてね～……

engChrName: She's really pretty, too. You'd better be careful, Van— you never know what kinda mistakes you'll make in the heat of passion!
engSearchText:
She's really pretty, too. You'd better be careful, Van—
you never know what kinda mistakes you'll make in
the heat of passion!
jpnChrName: 想像以上の美人さんだし、これは一つ屋根の下 マチガイが起こっちゃうかもだねぇ、ヴァン♪
jpnSearchText:
想像以上の美人さんだし、これは一つ屋根の下
マチガイが起こっちゃうかもだねぇ、ヴァン♪

engChrName: Aidios, did you pick up that sleazy shit from Huck? We're all business, so don't go spreadin' crap about us.
engSearchText:
Aidios, did you pick up that sleazy shit from Huck?
We're all business, so don't go spreadin' crap
about us.
jpnChrName: ねえっつーの！　ったくマセやがって…… 勝手にヘンな噂立てんじゃねーぞ？
jpnSearchText:
ねえっつーの！　ったくマセやがって……
勝手にヘンな噂立てんじゃねーぞ？

engChrName: All righty! It'll be neat to see how she does as a spriggan.
engSearchText:
All righty! It'll be neat to see how she does as
a spriggan.
jpnChrName: うんうん、解決事務所の 今後には期待してるね～！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、解決事務所の
今後には期待してるね～！

engChrName: (I'm attracting attention already, for better or worse. I'll have to work hard!)
engSearchText:
(I'm attracting attention already, for better or worse.
I'll have to work hard!)
jpnChrName: （と、とりあえず注目されてるみたいですね。   ……うん、しっかりお仕事しないと。）
jpnSearchText:
（と、とりあえず注目されてるみたいですね。
……うん、しっかりお仕事しないと。）

engChrName: Here you go! Mommy's special lunch set!
engSearchText: Here you go! Mommy's special lunch set!
jpnChrName: はいっ、ママのとくせーランチセット！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、ママのとくせーランチセット！

engChrName: Thanks, Yumé! I was just starting to get hungry.
engSearchText: Thanks, Yumé! I was just starting to get hungry.
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんありがと～！ 丁度お腹減ってきた所だったんだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃんありがと～！
丁度お腹減ってきた所だったんだよね～。

engChrName: Here's the money, and here's your tip. Make sure you count it all properly, okay?
engSearchText:
Here's the money, and here's your tip. Make sure you
count it all properly, okay?
jpnChrName: じゃあこれ、代金とお駄賃だよ。 ちゃんと数えてね～。
jpnSearchText:
じゃあこれ、代金とお駄賃だよ。
ちゃんと数えてね～。

engChrName: 'Kay!
engSearchText: 'Kay!
jpnChrName: わかったー！！
jpnSearchText: わかったー！！

engChrName: Looks like you're really on top of things, Yumé!
engSearchText: Looks like you're really on top of things, Yumé!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、お使いは順調みたいですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、お使いは順調みたいですね。

engChrName: Heehee, of course! I'm the poster girl, after all!
engSearchText: Heehee, of course! I'm the poster girl, after all!
jpnChrName: えっへん、とーぜん！ ユメはかんばんムスメなんだから～っ！
jpnSearchText:
えっへん、とーぜん！
ユメはかんばんムスメなんだから～っ！

engChrName: Damn. Six years old and you're runnin' errands for mom? Smart cookie.
engSearchText:
Damn. Six years old and you're runnin' errands
for mom? Smart cookie.
jpnChrName: ま、６歳にしちゃあ 仕事できそうな返事じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、６歳にしちゃあ
仕事できそうな返事じゃねえか。

engChrName: Heehee. Yumé has a bright future ahead of her.
engSearchText: Heehee. Yumé has a bright future ahead of her.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ユメ様の将来が楽しみですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ユメ様の将来が楽しみですね。

engChrName: You can leave this to me. The neighborhood folks trust me, so I should be able to keep them calm.
engSearchText:
You can leave this to me. The neighborhood folks
trust me, so I should be able to keep them calm.
jpnChrName: この辺りのことは任せて頂戴な。 うちはご近所にも顔が利くから♪
jpnSearchText:
この辺りのことは任せて頂戴な。
うちはご近所にも顔が利くから♪

engChrName: It's not looking good out there...but you guys can do it! I know you can!
engSearchText:
It's not looking good out there...but you guys can
do it! I know you can!
jpnChrName: この先大変な事がありそうだけど…… どうか負けないでね。
jpnSearchText:
この先大変な事がありそうだけど……
どうか負けないでね。

engChrName: Make sure you've got everything sorted out before you go!
engSearchText:
Make sure you've got everything sorted out before
you go!
jpnChrName: 準備を整えてから進んで頂戴！
jpnSearchText: 準備を整えてから進んで頂戴！

engChrName: Anya was just over the moon this morning— apparently they're doing some special class at Sunday School today.
engSearchText:
Anya was just over the moon this morning—
apparently they're doing some special class at Sunday
School today.
jpnChrName: 今日の日曜学校、特別授業があるみたいで アーニャも楽しそうに出かけて行ったわ。
jpnSearchText:
今日の日曜学校、特別授業があるみたいで
アーニャも楽しそうに出かけて行ったわ。

engChrName: As a parent, I'm happy to see the school so engaged with its students. I appreciate how they tweak and refine the lesson plans as they go!
engSearchText:
As a parent, I'm happy to see the school so engaged
with its students. I appreciate how they tweak and
refine the lesson plans as they go!
jpnChrName: 最近の日曜学校は色々工夫を 凝らしてくれて、親としても嬉しいわ♪
jpnSearchText:
最近の日曜学校は色々工夫を
凝らしてくれて、親としても嬉しいわ♪

engChrName: Anya may be wise beyond her years, but she still has much to learn. I want her to soak up everything she can while she's still young and curious.
engSearchText:
Anya may be wise beyond her years, but she still has
much to learn. I want her to soak up everything she
can while she's still young and curious.
jpnChrName: アーニャも何だかんだいって子供だし、 まだまだ色んな事を学んで欲しいわよね～。
jpnSearchText:
アーニャも何だかんだいって子供だし、
まだまだ色んな事を学んで欲しいわよね～。

engChrName: Oh! Welcome! Anya's at Sunday School today.
engSearchText: Oh! Welcome! Anya's at Sunday School today.
jpnChrName: あら、いらっしゃい。 今日はアーニャが日曜学校なのよ～。
jpnSearchText:
あら、いらっしゃい。
今日はアーニャが日曜学校なのよ～。

engChrName: She's run the front desk so smoothly, it's been a while since I manned it myself.
engSearchText:
She's run the front desk so smoothly, it's been a while
since I manned it myself.
jpnChrName: 最近はあの子に任せきりだから 番頭に立つのも久しぶりねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
最近はあの子に任せきりだから
番頭に立つのも久しぶりねぇ。

engChrName: Goodness, I hope I'm not rusty.
engSearchText: Goodness, I hope I'm not rusty.
jpnChrName: う～ん、上手く務まるかしら？
jpnSearchText: う～ん、上手く務まるかしら？

engChrName: Van, everyone! You're all okay!
engSearchText: Van, everyone! You're all okay!
jpnChrName: ヴァンたち、無事だったんだ……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンたち、無事だったんだ……！

engChrName: Sorry for worrying you. We've got it all under control now.
engSearchText:
Sorry for worrying you. We've got it all under
control now.
jpnChrName: ん、心配かけてゴメン。 でももう大丈夫だから。
jpnSearchText:
ん、心配かけてゴメン。
でももう大丈夫だから。

engChrName: We've destroyed the demon spheres, so the monsters should be weaker now!
engSearchText:
We've destroyed the demon spheres, so the monsters
should be weaker now!
jpnChrName: はい、“魔球”も破壊したので 化け物たちの力は削いだはずです！
jpnSearchText:
はい、“魔球”も破壊したので
化け物たちの力は削いだはずです！

engChrName: Oh, thank goodness...
engSearchText: Oh, thank goodness...
jpnChrName: そ、そうだったの。 それは少し安心だけれど……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうだったの。
それは少し安心だけれど……

engChrName: Are we getting any help from outside?
engSearchText: Are we getting any help from outside?
jpnChrName: 助けは来るんじゃろうか……
jpnSearchText: 助けは来るんじゃろうか……

engChrName: Probably not. Everybody's got their hands tied...
engSearchText: Probably not. Everybody's got their hands tied...
jpnChrName: いや、今の所は望み薄だろうな……
jpnSearchText: いや、今の所は望み薄だろうな……

engChrName: ...but we're gonna figure this shit out, I promise. You don't get to just take over our town like that!
engSearchText:
...but we're gonna figure this shit out, I promise.
You don't get to just take over our town like that!
jpnChrName: だがどうにか突破口を見つけるつもりだ。 “連中”に好き勝手させねえためにもな！
jpnSearchText:
だがどうにか突破口を見つけるつもりだ。
“連中”に好き勝手させねえためにもな！

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァン……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン……

engChrName: Okay! I'll hold down the fort here! I'll make sure the neighbors are okay, too!
engSearchText:
Okay! I'll hold down the fort here! I'll make sure the
neighbors are okay, too!
jpnChrName: わかったよ、こっちは任せて～！ 近隣の人たちにも声掛けしておくから！
jpnSearchText:
わかったよ、こっちは任せて～！
近隣の人たちにも声掛けしておくから！

engChrName: The bath is still up and running, so if you need it, lemme know!
engSearchText:
The bath is still up and running, so if you need it,
lemme know!
jpnChrName: お風呂もなんとか使えるみたい！ 必要なら声をかけてね～！
jpnSearchText:
お風呂もなんとか使えるみたい！
必要なら声をかけてね～！

engChrName: Hah, you're a lucky girl, Anya. Work's keeping me tied down all through the festival.
engSearchText:
Hah, you're a lucky girl, Anya. Work's keeping me
tied down all through the festival.
jpnChrName: ハァ……アーニャはいいのう。 ワシなんて記念祭は仕事じゃよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハァ……アーニャはいいのう。
ワシなんて記念祭は仕事じゃよ？

engChrName: Banquets, parties, all that crap. It's all a nightmare this time of year.
engSearchText:
Banquets, parties, all that crap. It's all a nightmare
this time of year.
jpnChrName: あちこちの祝賀会だのパーティだの、 メンドイことこの上ないわい……
jpnSearchText:
あちこちの祝賀会だのパーティだの、
メンドイことこの上ないわい……

engChrName: You know, you complain about this EVERY year!
engSearchText: You know, you complain about this EVERY year!
jpnChrName: ハック爺さんも相変わらずだよねぇ。 毎年ぼやいてる気がするよ～。
jpnSearchText:
ハック爺さんも相変わらずだよねぇ。
毎年ぼやいてる気がするよ～。

engChrName: They were saying what, 200,000? If we get that many people at the festival—
engSearchText:
They were saying what, 200,000? If we get that many
people at the festival—
jpnChrName: ……記念祭の人出を２０万人と仮定して ウチに来るお客さんの期待値は──
jpnSearchText:
……記念祭の人出を２０万人と仮定して
ウチに来るお客さんの期待値は──

engChrName: Oh, don't even get me started. It's gonna be a nightmare...
engSearchText:
Oh, don't even get me started. It's gonna be
a nightmare...
jpnChrName: シクシク、にべもないのう……
jpnSearchText: シクシク、にべもないのう……

engChrName: The real giveaway is the GDP: more money in people's pockets means more tourists at the festival. And they were saying the GDP rose 25% this year.
engSearchText:
The real giveaway is the GDP: more money in
people's pockets means more tourists at the festival.
And they were saying the GDP rose 25% this year.
jpnChrName: あーあと今年のＧＤＰ、１．２５倍じゃから。 観光客数と強い相関関係があってじゃな～。
jpnSearchText:
あーあと今年のＧＤＰ、１．２５倍じゃから。
観光客数と強い相関関係があってじゃな～。

engChrName: Oh, really? Then that means...
engSearchText: Oh, really? Then that means...
jpnChrName: そうなんだ～！　じゃあこの試算で……！
jpnSearchText: そうなんだ～！　じゃあこの試算で……！

engChrName: Yeah, using this index, you can calc figures here like so...
engSearchText:
Yeah, using this index, you can calc figures here
like so...
jpnChrName: ところがこの指標を使うとじゃな～！
jpnSearchText: ところがこの指標を使うとじゃな～！

engChrName: (Huh. Not the most likely friendship, but good for them.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. Not the most likely friendship, but good
for them.)
jpnChrName: （何だかんだ言いつつ   仲がいいよな、この二人はよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（何だかんだ言いつつ
仲がいいよな、この二人はよ。）

engChrName: Oh, we were just talking about the rise of pork barrel politics. It's really shifting the market around as of late. Wanna shoot the shit?
engSearchText:
Oh, we were just talking about the rise of pork
barrel politics. It's really shifting the market around as
of late. Wanna shoot the shit?
jpnChrName: おお、ヴァンも一緒にやるかの？ バラマキ政策の市場へのインパクトが──
jpnSearchText:
おお、ヴァンも一緒にやるかの？
バラマキ政策の市場へのインパクトが──

engChrName: Sorry, all that just flew over my head. Gonna have to pass.
engSearchText:
Sorry, all that just flew over my head. Gonna have
to pass.
jpnChrName: さすがに専門外なんでな、 遠慮しておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
さすがに専門外なんでな、
遠慮しておくぜ。

engChrName: Fair. Oh, hey, is that the—why, yes it is! I'd recognize that body anywhere. I've seen you once or twice in the neighborhood.
engSearchText:
Fair. Oh, hey, is that the—why, yes it is! I'd recognize
that body anywhere. I've seen you once or twice in
the neighborhood.
jpnChrName: おおっ！？　最近見かける ナイスバディのオネーサンではないか！
jpnSearchText:
おおっ！？　最近見かける
ナイスバディのオネーサンではないか！

engChrName: And is it just me, or do you... I just feel like I saw you somewhere else, too. But where...?
engSearchText:
And is it just me, or do you... I just feel like I saw you
somewhere else, too. But where...?
jpnChrName: しかしその面影……うーむ、どうにも どこかで見覚えがある気がするんじゃが──
jpnSearchText:
しかしその面影……うーむ、どうにも
どこかで見覚えがある気がするんじゃが──

engChrName: I-I haven't the foggiest idea what you're talking about!
engSearchText:
I-I haven't the foggiest idea what you're
talking about!
jpnChrName: なな、何のことかしら……！？
jpnSearchText: なな、何のことかしら……！？

engChrName: (Don't tell me he's figured it out...?)
engSearchText: (Don't tell me he's figured it out...?)
jpnChrName: （ごくり……まさか   ジュディスさんの正体を……）
jpnSearchText:
（ごくり……まさか
ジュディスさんの正体を……）

engChrName: That's it! There was this apprentice singer I met back when I was a young lad... Now it's coming back to me.
engSearchText:
That's it! There was this apprentice singer I met back
when I was a young lad... Now it's coming back
to me.
jpnChrName: 思い出したぞい！　若かりし頃に 出会った、あの歌手見習いの女性──
jpnSearchText:
思い出したぞい！　若かりし頃に
出会った、あの歌手見習いの女性──

engChrName: I got to listen to her sing just this wonderful chanson! Knocked me off my feet! You look just like her, I swear!
engSearchText:
I got to listen to her sing just this wonderful chanson!
Knocked me off my feet! You look just like her,
I swear!
jpnChrName: 見事なシャンソンを披露してくれた 彼女にそっくりじゃわい！
jpnSearchText:
見事なシャンソンを披露してくれた
彼女にそっくりじゃわい！

engChrName: An apprentice, huh?
engSearchText: An apprentice, huh?
jpnChrName: へっ……歌手見習い！？
jpnSearchText: へっ……歌手見習い！？

engChrName: You might be thinking of someone else.
engSearchText: You might be thinking of someone else.
jpnChrName: べ、別人でしたね。
jpnSearchText: べ、別人でしたね。

engChrName: What, that's it? No big backstory or anything? Laaame.
engSearchText:
What, that's it? No big backstory or anything?
Laaame.
jpnChrName: なんだよ、つまんねーな。
jpnSearchText: なんだよ、つまんねーな。

engChrName: (I don't like where this is going, but I couldn't tell you why. I'll just butt out.)
engSearchText:
(I don't like where this is going, but I couldn't tell
you why. I'll just butt out.)
jpnChrName: （どっか引っかかる気もするが……   まあ今は置いとくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（どっか引っかかる気もするが……
まあ今は置いとくか。）

engChrName: I was just a young man at the time, and heavens, she had me wrapped around her finger before I could say, 'bravo.'
engSearchText:
I was just a young man at the time, and heavens, she
had me wrapped around her finger before I could
say, 'bravo.'
jpnChrName: ワシも若かったのでな、一目で 虜になってしまったわい。
jpnSearchText:
ワシも若かったのでな、一目で
虜になってしまったわい。

engChrName: She made her debut around that time, and then her career just exploded overnight. She's a real big shot now.
engSearchText:
She made her debut around that time, and then her
career just exploded overnight. She's a real big
shot now.
jpnChrName: 彼女はその後デビューして 一躍時の人となったんじゃが──
jpnSearchText:
彼女はその後デビューして
一躍時の人となったんじゃが──

engChrName: But to me, she'll always be that humble girl I saw on that little old stage...
engSearchText:
But to me, she'll always be that humble girl I saw on
that little old stage...
jpnChrName: ワシにとってはいつまでも あの日の美しい姿のままじゃなぁ♪
jpnSearchText:
ワシにとってはいつまでも
あの日の美しい姿のままじゃなぁ♪

engChrName: (Wait, that sounds like... Oh. Oh, dear.)
engSearchText: (Wait, that sounds like... Oh. Oh, dear.)
jpnChrName: （……う～ん、それってもしかして……）
jpnSearchText: （……う～ん、それってもしかして……）

engChrName: (I don't want to open THAT can of worms, so I'll keep quiet.)
engSearchText:
(I don't want to open THAT can of worms, so I'll
keep quiet.)
jpnChrName: （ま、まあヤブヘビな気もするし   突っ込まないでおこうかしら……）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、まあヤブヘビな気もするし
突っ込まないでおこうかしら……）

engChrName: *sigh* I just can't catch a break.
engSearchText: *sigh* I just can't catch a break.
jpnChrName: はぁ～、最近潤いがなくていかんの～！
jpnSearchText: はぁ～、最近潤いがなくていかんの～！

engChrName: My kingdom for another look at that vixen... I've only seen her in passing, but she steals my heart every time!
engSearchText:
My kingdom for another look at that vixen... I've only
seen her in passing, but she steals my heart
every time!
jpnChrName: 最近よく見かけるナイスバディの オネーサンがいれば、あるいは……（チラチラ）
jpnSearchText:
最近よく見かけるナイスバディの
オネーサンがいれば、あるいは……（チラチラ）

engChrName: (Who, Judith?) My guy, just quit while you're ahead.
engSearchText: (Who, Judith?) My guy, just quit while you're ahead.
jpnChrName: （ジュディスの事か……？） ったく、爺さんも懲りねえな。
jpnSearchText:
（ジュディスの事か……？）
ったく、爺さんも懲りねえな。

engChrName: Now, I'm no diplomat, but I have an idea of how this'll impact the marketplace...and I don't like where it's headed.
engSearchText:
Now, I'm no diplomat, but I have an idea of how
this'll impact the marketplace...and I don't like where
it's headed.
jpnChrName: 国家としての対応は専門ではないが…… 今は経済への影響が心配じゃのう。
jpnSearchText:
国家としての対応は専門ではないが……
今は経済への影響が心配じゃのう。

engChrName: The markets are like horses—they spook real easily. You get a big incident like this and futures plummet.
engSearchText:
The markets are like horses—they spook real easily.
You get a big incident like this and futures plummet.
jpnChrName: これだけの大事件、情勢不安が続けば 経済恐慌に繋がる可能性もある……
jpnSearchText:
これだけの大事件、情勢不安が続けば
経済恐慌に繋がる可能性もある……

engChrName: I can only hope they get it all resolved soon... How they can even do that, though, is beyond me.
engSearchText:
I can only hope they get it all resolved soon...
How they can even do that, though, is beyond me.
jpnChrName: 早期解決が望まれるが── 穏便な手段では済まぬかもしれぬなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
早期解決が望まれるが──
穏便な手段では済まぬかもしれぬなぁ……

engChrName: Insurance companies are all on fire right now. That can bleed over into other sectors pretty quickly if it keeps up...
engSearchText:
Insurance companies are all on fire right now.
That can bleed over into other sectors pretty quickly
if it keeps up...
jpnChrName: どこの保険会社もパニック寸前のようじゃ。 このままでは実体経済への影響も……
jpnSearchText:
どこの保険会社もパニック寸前のようじゃ。
このままでは実体経済への影響も……

engChrName: Here's hoping they get it all straightened out sooner rather than later.
engSearchText:
Here's hoping they get it all straightened out sooner
rather than later.
jpnChrName: ……ふむ、どうにか 早期解決に持ち込めれば良いのじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
……ふむ、どうにか
早期解決に持ち込めれば良いのじゃが……

engChrName: Ahh, the sauna really hit the spot today.
engSearchText: Ahh, the sauna really hit the spot today.
jpnChrName: 今日もイイ感じにサウナってきたんじゃが……
jpnSearchText: 今日もイイ感じにサウナってきたんじゃが……

engChrName: I saw some teenager in there, too. Couldn't have been older than fifteen or sixteen.
engSearchText:
I saw some teenager in there, too. Couldn't have been
older than fifteen or sixteen.
jpnChrName: さっき１５歳くらいの少年が 出かけていくのを見かけての。
jpnSearchText:
さっき１５歳くらいの少年が
出かけていくのを見かけての。

engChrName: I could see the bags under his eyes—probably preparing for entrance exams. I worry for the lad.
engSearchText:
I could see the bags under his eyes—probably
preparing for entrance exams. I worry for the lad.
jpnChrName: 確か受験生の子じゃったか。 ふむ……少々心配じゃが。
jpnSearchText:
確か受験生の子じゃったか。
ふむ……少々心配じゃが。

engChrName: Nosy, I know, but I can't help worrying about him as a neighbor.
engSearchText:
Nosy, I know, but I can't help worrying about him as
a neighbor.
jpnChrName: 余計なお節介かもしれんが 近所じゃからの、つい気にかけてしまうわい。
jpnSearchText:
余計なお節介かもしれんが
近所じゃからの、つい気にかけてしまうわい。

engChrName: Kids like stickin' it to the man at that age, just breaking rules for the sake of breaking them...
engSearchText:
Kids like stickin' it to the man at that age, just
breaking rules for the sake of breaking them...
jpnChrName: あのくらいの歳頃は 親に反抗したくなるものじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
あのくらいの歳頃は
親に反抗したくなるものじゃが……

engChrName: ...but really, he tried putting his slimy fingers on Judith?! JUDITH?!
engSearchText:
...but really, he tried putting his slimy fingers
on Judith?! JUDITH?!
jpnChrName: ……ジュディスちゃんに…… ジュディスちゃんに手を出すとは……
jpnSearchText:
……ジュディスちゃんに……
ジュディスちゃんに手を出すとは……

engChrName: That filthy little horndog! How dare he dash my hopes and dreams like that?! Just... BASTARD!
engSearchText:
That filthy little horndog! How dare he dash my
hopes and dreams like that?! Just... BASTARD!
jpnChrName: 羨まケシカラン！　あの優男め、 ワシら純情な男子の夢を……！！
jpnSearchText:
羨まケシカラン！　あの優男め、
ワシら純情な男子の夢を……！！

engChrName: (Umm... What's he on about?)
engSearchText: (Umm... What's he on about?)
jpnChrName: （えっと、何の話だろ……？）
jpnSearchText: （えっと、何の話だろ……？）

engChrName: (Beats me. Just leave him be, I guess.)
engSearchText: (Beats me. Just leave him be, I guess.)
jpnChrName: （さてな……まあ   大した話じゃなさそうだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（さてな……まあ
大した話じゃなさそうだが。）

engChrName: Oh, dear... He seems quite upset.
engSearchText: Oh, dear... He seems quite upset.
jpnChrName: あはは……ご立腹みたいですね……
jpnSearchText: あはは……ご立腹みたいですね……

engChrName: Bud, you're no spring chicken anymore. Let her go.
engSearchText: Bud, you're no spring chicken anymore. Let her go.
jpnChrName: 爺さんも歳なんだからよ、 ほどほどにしとけよな。
jpnSearchText:
爺さんも歳なんだからよ、
ほどほどにしとけよな。

engChrName: Ex-CUSE you! I may not look like a chicken, but I've still got one!
engSearchText:
Ex-CUSE you! I may not look like a chicken, but I've
still got one!
jpnChrName: フン、ワシはいくつになっても 現役なんじゃああああ～！！
jpnSearchText:
フン、ワシはいくつになっても
現役なんじゃああああ～！！

engChrName: (Anya's got a bright future ahead of her... I wanted to give her some experience handling this sort of thing, but...)
engSearchText:
(Anya's got a bright future ahead of her... I wanted to
give her some experience handling this sort of
thing, but...)
jpnChrName: （実際、アーニャは将来が楽しみな子ではあるし   いい経験かとも思ったんじゃが……）
jpnSearchText:
（実際、アーニャは将来が楽しみな子ではあるし
いい経験かとも思ったんじゃが……）

engChrName: (...Bah. Maybe it's too early. There'll be another time.)
engSearchText:
(...Bah. Maybe it's too early. There'll be
another time.)
jpnChrName: （まあまたの機会かの～。）
jpnSearchText: （まあまたの機会かの～。）

engChrName: This really isn't my speed. Won't somebody take this poor old man's place...?
engSearchText:
This really isn't my speed. Won't somebody take this
poor old man's place...?
jpnChrName: こういうの、柄じゃないんじゃよ～…… 誰ぞ代わってくれんかの～？（チラッ）
jpnSearchText:
こういうの、柄じゃないんじゃよ～……
誰ぞ代わってくれんかの～？（チラッ）

engChrName: I, umm... (He's more cunning than he lets on.)
engSearchText:
I, umm...
(He's more cunning than he lets on.)
jpnChrName: あはは…… （随分軽妙な方だったんですね……）
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
（随分軽妙な方だったんですね……）

engChrName: (Eh, not really. What'cha see is what'cha get with him. Just be yourself.)
engSearchText:
(Eh, not really. What'cha see is what'cha get
with him. Just be yourself.)
jpnChrName: （素でこういう爺さんなんでな、   フツーに接してりゃいいと思うぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（素でこういう爺さんなんでな、
フツーに接してりゃいいと思うぜ。）

engChrName: Van, m'boy! What brings you here today?
engSearchText: Van, m'boy! What brings you here today?
jpnChrName: おおヴァン、サイデン地区に来ておったのか。
jpnSearchText: おおヴァン、サイデン地区に来ておったのか。

engChrName: I'll be having some senators over for a meal... Good networking, but man, these stuffy meetings just drive me up the wall.
engSearchText:
I'll be having some senators over for a meal...
Good networking, but man, these stuffy
meetings just drive me up the wall.
jpnChrName: 今夜は議員と会食でなぁ、 堅苦しいのは苦手なんじゃが。
jpnSearchText:
今夜は議員と会食でなぁ、
堅苦しいのは苦手なんじゃが。

engChrName: Coulda fooled me, you look chill as ever.
engSearchText: Coulda fooled me, you look chill as ever.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そうは見えねえけどな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そうは見えねえけどな。

engChrName: (First time I've seen Huck in a suit. Y'know, he looks presentable, for once.)
engSearchText:
(First time I've seen Huck in a suit. Y'know, he looks
presentable, for once.)
jpnChrName: （しかしスーツ姿のハック爺さん──   旧市街で龍雀打ってる時とは大違いだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（しかしスーツ姿のハック爺さん──
旧市街で龍雀打ってる時とは大違いだな。）

engChrName: (I should probably bring him up to speed, while I got the chance.)
engSearchText:
(I should probably bring him up to speed, while I got
the chance.)
jpnChrName: （爺さんには事の顛末を   説明しておいた方がいいかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（爺さんには事の顛末を
説明しておいた方がいいかもな。）

engChrName: Yo, so about the request from before. I met up with Roderick, no issues there.
engSearchText:
Yo, so about the request from before. I met up with
Roderick, no issues there.
jpnChrName: よう、さっきの依頼の事なんだが 無事にロデリックと会えたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よう、さっきの依頼の事なんだが
無事にロデリックと会えたぜ。

engChrName: Pulled it off without a hitch. Thanks for the help, old timer.
engSearchText:
Pulled it off without a hitch. Thanks for the help,
old timer.
jpnChrName: おかげで依頼の方も達成できた、 爺さんには世話になったな。
jpnSearchText:
おかげで依頼の方も達成できた、
爺さんには世話になったな。

engChrName: Oho! Well, that's good news.
engSearchText: Oho! Well, that's good news.
jpnChrName: おお、そうかそうか！
jpnSearchText: おお、そうかそうか！

engChrName: I hope he's doing well, the boy?
engSearchText: I hope he's doing well, the boy?
jpnChrName: ちなみにロデリック君は 元気そうにしておったかの？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにロデリック君は
元気そうにしておったかの？

engChrName: Yeah. The yuppie life suits him pretty well.
engSearchText: Yeah. The yuppie life suits him pretty well.
jpnChrName: ああ、ピンピンしてやがったぜ。 今は青年実業家として活躍中みてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ピンピンしてやがったぜ。
今は青年実業家として活躍中みてえだな。

engChrName: Is he, now?! I might have another fellow to bellya— er, discuss business with! What a joyous day!
engSearchText:
Is he, now?! I might have another fellow to bellya—
er, discuss business with! What a joyous day!
jpnChrName: なんと！　実業家ならばワシも 仕事の話が出来るかもしれんのう！
jpnSearchText:
なんと！　実業家ならばワシも
仕事の話が出来るかもしれんのう！

engChrName: Remind me to get in touch with him.
engSearchText: Remind me to get in touch with him.
jpnChrName: はは、今度連絡をとってみるか！
jpnSearchText: はは、今度連絡をとってみるか！

engChrName: Sullivan's been tracking that incident like a bloodhound. No doubt she's caught a whiff of something by now.
engSearchText:
Sullivan's been tracking that incident like
a bloodhound. No doubt she's caught a whiff of
something by now.
jpnChrName: サリバン編集長はあの事件の事を しつこく追っていたはずじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
サリバン編集長はあの事件の事を
しつこく追っていたはずじゃ。

engChrName: I imagine she's heard a thing or two about Roderick, too.
engSearchText:
I imagine she's heard a thing or two about
Roderick, too.
jpnChrName: 今のロデリック君についても 知っている事があるかもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
今のロデリック君についても
知っている事があるかもしれん。

engChrName: Best of luck, Van—this old man's counting on you.
engSearchText: Best of luck, Van—this old man's counting on you.
jpnChrName: 彼の事を、どうかよろしく頼むぞ。
jpnSearchText: 彼の事を、どうかよろしく頼むぞ。

engChrName: Ahh, the table's calling my name! I'm gonna go at it until my wallet cries for mercy!
engSearchText:
Ahh, the table's calling my name! I'm gonna go at it
until my wallet cries for mercy!
jpnChrName: 今日も一日元気に 賭け龍雀ざんまいで過ごしてやるわい！
jpnSearchText:
今日も一日元気に
賭け龍雀ざんまいで過ごしてやるわい！

engChrName: ...Is what I would like to say, but I have business to tend to at night.
engSearchText:
...Is what I would like to say, but I have business to
tend to at night.
jpnChrName: ……と言いたい所じゃが、 夜には用事が入っとっての～。
jpnSearchText:
……と言いたい所じゃが、
夜には用事が入っとっての～。

engChrName: I have to at least do my job in passing, or the suits around me get all crotchety.
engSearchText:
I have to at least do my job in passing, or the suits
around me get all crotchety.
jpnChrName: たまには仕事をせねば 周りがウルサイんじゃ……はぁぁ。
jpnSearchText:
たまには仕事をせねば
周りがウルサイんじゃ……はぁぁ。

engChrName: Think of it like brain training. Gotta stay sharp at your age, yeah?
engSearchText:
Think of it like brain training. Gotta stay sharp at
your age, yeah?
jpnChrName: ま、観念するんだな。 ボケ防止にもいいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、観念するんだな。
ボケ防止にもいいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Zip it, whippersnapper! Besides, what's the harm in going senile? My brain goes to mush, I go to a nursing home with beautiful ladies who tend to my every need!
engSearchText:
Zip it, whippersnapper! Besides, what's the harm in
going senile? My brain goes to mush, I go to a nursing
home with beautiful ladies who tend to my every need!
jpnChrName: フン、邪魔するでない！　ワシは盛大にボケて 美人ナースの世話になる予定なんじゃ！！
jpnSearchText:
フン、邪魔するでない！　ワシは盛大にボケて
美人ナースの世話になる予定なんじゃ！！

engChrName: (I could swear I've seen him somewhere before...)
engSearchText: (I could swear I've seen him somewhere before...)
jpnChrName: （それにしてもこの方、   どこかで見た事があるような……）
jpnSearchText:
（それにしてもこの方、
どこかで見た事があるような……）

engChrName: (Perhaps it was just my imagination.)
engSearchText: (Perhaps it was just my imagination.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、気のせいかしら……）
jpnSearchText: （うーん、気のせいかしら……）

engChrName: I don't really get it, but I guess he's doing all right for himself.
engSearchText:
I don't really get it, but I guess he's doing all right
for himself.
jpnChrName: よくわかりませんけど、 当分はお元気そうですねっ！
jpnSearchText:
よくわかりませんけど、
当分はお元気そうですねっ！

engChrName: There really is nothing sadder than a boring dream like that.
engSearchText:
There really is nothing sadder than a boring dream
like that.
jpnChrName: まあ分からなくもねえが 男の夢にしちゃショボくねえか？
jpnSearchText:
まあ分からなくもねえが
男の夢にしちゃショボくねえか？

engChrName: Where's the fire? The passion? Screw a nursing home, I'd want a whole harem before I go out!
engSearchText:
Where's the fire? The passion? Screw a nursing
home, I'd want a whole harem before I go out!
jpnChrName: 俺様ならハーレムの一棟や二棟 築くまで死なねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
俺様ならハーレムの一棟や二棟
築くまで死なねえけどな。

engChrName: Oooh, now that's the spirit, young man! What a wonderful idea!
engSearchText:
Oooh, now that's the spirit, young man! What a
wonderful idea!
jpnChrName: おお、見所のある若者よ！ それは名案じゃの～！
jpnSearchText:
おお、見所のある若者よ！
それは名案じゃの～！

engChrName: Yeah, okay, enough of that. You two fantasize off the clock.
engSearchText:
Yeah, okay, enough of that. You two fantasize off
the clock.
jpnChrName: はいそこ、勝手に盛り上がらない。 仕事中ですよ？
jpnSearchText:
はいそこ、勝手に盛り上がらない。
仕事中ですよ？

engChrName: Anyhow, I have to head out tonight...
engSearchText: Anyhow, I have to head out tonight...
jpnChrName: まあともかく、夜には出かけねばならん……
jpnSearchText: まあともかく、夜には出かけねばならん……

engChrName: What a chore. Can't an old man like me just gamble in peace?
engSearchText:
What a chore. Can't an old man like me just gamble
in peace?
jpnChrName: はぁ、面倒じゃの～…… ワシは日がな一日龍雀をしたいだけなんじゃが。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、面倒じゃの～……
ワシは日がな一日龍雀をしたいだけなんじゃが。

engChrName: Ah, blast it! That's it for me...
engSearchText: Ah, blast it! That's it for me...
jpnChrName: いや～、負けた負けた……
jpnSearchText: いや～、負けた負けた……

engChrName: When'd Anya get so good at mahjong? She racked up a sanbaiman like nobody's business...
engSearchText:
When'd Anya get so good at mahjong?
She racked up a sanbaiman like nobody's business...
jpnChrName: アーニャちゃん強すぎでしょ～…… 三倍満でまくってくるとか人間技じゃないよ……
jpnSearchText:
アーニャちゃん強すぎでしょ～……
三倍満でまくってくるとか人間技じゃないよ……

engChrName: To think we taught her how to play... We've raised a monster!
engSearchText:
To think we taught her how to play... We've raised
a monster!
jpnChrName: あやつに《龍雀（ロンジャン）》を仕込んだのは ワシらだというのに……なんという体たらくじゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
あやつに《龍雀（ロンジャン）》を仕込んだのは
ワシらだというのに……なんという体たらくじゃ……！

engChrName: ...Our poor, poor wallets.
engSearchText: ...Our poor, poor wallets.

engChrName: (Wow. Total shellacking across the entire table.)
engSearchText: (Wow. Total shellacking across the entire table.)
jpnChrName: （ハハ……よく分からんが   相当コテンパンにやられたみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハハ……よく分からんが
相当コテンパンにやられたみてえだな。）

engChrName: I miss the days when Anya was still green. We just had her around to fill the table, back then.
engSearchText:
I miss the days when Anya was still green. We just
had her around to fill the table, back then.
jpnChrName: アーニャちゃんに数合わせで 入ってもらってた頃が懐かしいですねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
アーニャちゃんに数合わせで
入ってもらってた頃が懐かしいですねぇ……

engChrName: We used to give her candy for coming up to play... Now we can't stop her.
engSearchText:
We used to give her candy for coming up to play...
Now we can't stop her.
jpnChrName: うむ……よくアメ玉で釣って付き合わせて おったが……もはや暴風雨じゃな……
jpnSearchText:
うむ……よくアメ玉で釣って付き合わせて
おったが……もはや暴風雨じゃな……

engChrName: She just soaks up math and numbers like a sponge. We don't stand a chance against her...
engSearchText:
She just soaks up math and numbers like a sponge.
We don't stand a chance against her...
jpnChrName: あやつは何事も飲み込みが早すぎじゃ…… もう歯が立たんとはのぉ……
jpnSearchText:
あやつは何事も飲み込みが早すぎじゃ……
もう歯が立たんとはのぉ……

engChrName: Wahaha! How about another pon for you? This game's as good as mine now!
engSearchText:
Wahaha! How about another pon for you? This game's
as good as mine now!
jpnChrName: ワッハッハ！　もう一丁ポンじゃ！ それそれ、このまま和了（アガ）ってしまうぞい！
jpnSearchText:
ワッハッハ！　もう一丁ポンじゃ！
それそれ、このまま和了（アガ）ってしまうぞい！

engChrName: Oh, this is, uhh...mahjong, right? I remember they were playing it this morning.
engSearchText:
Oh, this is, uhh...mahjong, right? I remember they
were playing it this morning.
jpnChrName: これは……確か《龍雀（ロンジャン）》でしたか。 午前中も見かけましたが。
jpnSearchText:
これは……確か《龍雀（ロンジャン）》でしたか。
午前中も見かけましたが。

engChrName: Yup. Old Eastern table game. Those old farts'll play it till they drop if you let 'em.
engSearchText:
Yup. Old Eastern table game. Those old farts'll play it
till they drop if you let 'em.
jpnChrName: ああ、東方由来のテーブルゲームだな。 爺さんたちはほっときゃ一日中やってるが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、東方由来のテーブルゲームだな。
爺さんたちはほっときゃ一日中やってるが……

engChrName: ...But damn. A 30,000 point gap? Whew.
engSearchText: ...But damn. A 30,000 point gap? Whew.
jpnChrName: ……しかし３万点差か、確かに調子良さそうだ。
jpnSearchText: ……しかし３万点差か、確かに調子良さそうだ。

engChrName: Leave it to Huck, the showoff!
engSearchText: Leave it to Huck, the showoff!
jpnChrName: そうなんだよ、ハックめ 今日は飛ばしやがってぇ……！！
jpnSearchText:
そうなんだよ、ハックめ
今日は飛ばしやがってぇ……！！

engChrName: Van, old boy, lend us a hand, won't you?
engSearchText: Van, old boy, lend us a hand, won't you?
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃんも手伝ってくれよ～！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンちゃんも手伝ってくれよ～！

engChrName: Keep your hands off him! He's MINE! The day he turns to you scoundrels is the day I kick the bucket!
engSearchText:
Keep your hands off him! He's MINE! The day he
turns to you scoundrels is the day I kick the bucket!
jpnChrName: 何を言うか！　ヴァンはワシの盟友── お主らに肩入れする事などありはせんのじゃ！
jpnSearchText:
何を言うか！　ヴァンはワシの盟友──
お主らに肩入れする事などありはせんのじゃ！

engChrName: Well, you're chipper today, ain'tcha, Huck?
engSearchText: Well, you're chipper today, ain'tcha, Huck?
jpnChrName: ハック爺さん、今日は 何から何まで調子がいいな。
jpnSearchText:
ハック爺さん、今日は
何から何まで調子がいいな。

engChrName: That he is...
engSearchText: That he is...
jpnChrName: あははは……
jpnSearchText: あははは……

engChrName: They call the three of us the Old Dragons of Old Town, you see.
engSearchText:
They call the three of us the Old Dragons of Old
Town, you see.
jpnChrName: ちなみにわしらは“旧市街の三羽雀”とも 呼ばれておってな。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにわしらは“旧市街の三羽雀”とも
呼ばれておってな。

engChrName: Let me show you how we earned that moniker, eh? Come, to the table!
engSearchText:
Let me show you how we earned that moniker, eh?
Come, to the table!
jpnChrName: 今日こそ誰が最強か思い知らせてやるわい～！
jpnSearchText: 今日こそ誰が最強か思い知らせてやるわい～！

engChrName: Well, wait, don't you need four to make a full group?
engSearchText: Well, wait, don't you need four to make a full group?
jpnChrName: 三羽雀……４人で卓を囲むには 一人足りないんですね？
jpnSearchText:
三羽雀……４人で卓を囲むには
一人足りないんですね？

engChrName: Yup. That's their thing—they're big on bluffin', but you can see right through 'em.
engSearchText:
Yup. That's their thing—they're big on bluffin', but
you can see right through 'em.
jpnChrName: ビミョーに締まらねえのが 爺さんたちだよな。
jpnSearchText:
ビミョーに締まらねえのが
爺さんたちだよな。

engChrName: Grr! Yes, yes, we know!
engSearchText: Grr! Yes, yes, we know!
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ……よく分かっておる！
jpnSearchText: ぐぬぬ……よく分かっておる！

engChrName: That's why we need a young gun or two—like you, Van! C'mon!
engSearchText:
That's why we need a young gun or two—like
you, Van! C'mon!
jpnChrName: というわけでヴァンよ、 いつでも参戦待っておるぞ！！
jpnSearchText:
というわけでヴァンよ、
いつでも参戦待っておるぞ！！

engChrName: (They're really active for their age... Old Town's a great place to live!)
engSearchText:
(They're really active for their age... Old Town's a
great place to live!)
jpnChrName: （お年寄りたちのこの活気……   ふふ、やっぱり旧市街（ここ）は良い所みたいです！）
jpnSearchText:
（お年寄りたちのこの活気……
ふふ、やっぱり旧市街（ここ）は良い所みたいです！）

engChrName: Just a crying shame, I tell you. I hope they can get the baths back open soon.
engSearchText:
Just a crying shame, I tell you. I hope they can get the
baths back open soon.
jpnChrName: いや～しかし、浴場が臨時休業とはの～！
jpnSearchText: いや～しかし、浴場が臨時休業とはの～！

engChrName: But I say, good company and good games wash my troubles away just as well!
engSearchText:
But I say, good company and good games wash my
troubles away just as well!
jpnChrName: じゃがそんな苦難も何のその、 今日も一日イイ感じにだべってやったわい。
jpnSearchText:
じゃがそんな苦難も何のその、
今日も一日イイ感じにだべってやったわい。

engChrName: Now, then, I figure it's about time for dinner. I'll drag my old bones over to Montmart—they got food for my belly, and Paulette's food for my soul!
engSearchText:
Now, then, I figure it's about time for dinner.
I'll drag my old bones over to Montmart—they got food
for my belly, and Paulette's food for my soul!
jpnChrName: さてさて夕食はモンマルトで ポーレットちゃんにでも……
jpnSearchText:
さてさて夕食はモンマルトで
ポーレットちゃんにでも……

engChrName: Well, say it ain't so...
engSearchText: Well, say it ain't so...
jpnChrName: おや、あそこにおるのは確か噂に聞いた……
jpnSearchText: おや、あそこにおるのは確か噂に聞いた……

engChrName: I guess the young blood was always bound to catch up to us. *sigh* How the mighty have fallen.
engSearchText:
I guess the young blood was always bound to catch up
to us. *sigh* How the mighty have fallen.
jpnChrName: ……まあ事情を鑑（かんが）みれば無理もないか。 落ちぶれたエリートほど哀しいものはないのお……
jpnSearchText:
……まあ事情を鑑（かんが）みれば無理もないか。
落ちぶれたエリートほど哀しいものはないのお……

engChrName: Oh, Van! Got someone with you today? Now, she's quite the fetching young lady, isn't she?
engSearchText:
Oh, Van! Got someone with you today? Now, she's
quite the fetching young lady, isn't she?
jpnChrName: おやヴァン、今日はおなご連れか…… 随分なべっぴんさんじゃのう。
jpnSearchText:
おやヴァン、今日はおなご連れか……
随分なべっぴんさんじゃのう。

engChrName: ...Don't be breaking any laws, now.
engSearchText: ...Don't be breaking any laws, now.
jpnChrName: ……犯罪はいかんぞ、犯罪は。
jpnSearchText: ……犯罪はいかんぞ、犯罪は。

engChrName: Do I look like some kinda sleazebag to you? She's my new employee, she's workin' part time at Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
Do I look like some kinda sleazebag to you? She's my
new employee, she's workin' part time at
Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: なんでそうなる…… うちのバイトだっつの。
jpnSearchText:
なんでそうなる……
うちのバイトだっつの。

engChrName: My name is Agnès. Pleased to meet you!
engSearchText: My name is Agnès. Pleased to meet you!
jpnChrName: あはは……アニエスと言います。 どうかお見知りおきください。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……アニエスと言います。
どうかお見知りおきください。

engChrName: Now, I've heard a lot about you already, young lady! My name's Huck—this here boy and I go way back.
engSearchText:
Now, I've heard a lot about you already, young lady!
My name's Huck—this here boy and I go way back.
jpnChrName: はは、風の噂に聞いておったよ。 わしはハック、ヴァンとは“入浴友達”での。
jpnSearchText:
はは、風の噂に聞いておったよ。
わしはハック、ヴァンとは“入浴友達”での。

engChrName: A shame they don't have any mixed baths here... Heh heh.
engSearchText:
A shame they don't have any mixed baths here...
Heh heh.
jpnChrName: しかし……すまんな、お嬢さん。 折角だというのに、ここは混浴ではないんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……すまんな、お嬢さん。
折角だというのに、ここは混浴ではないんじゃ……

engChrName: ...And you were telling ME not to break the law.
engSearchText: ...And you were telling ME not to break the law.
jpnChrName: ハック爺さん、それセクハラな。
jpnSearchText: ハック爺さん、それセクハラな。

engChrName: Wahaha! Oh, pay me no mind! I just can't help taking in sights for these sore eyes of mine.
engSearchText:
Wahaha! Oh, pay me no mind! I just can't help
taking in sights for these sore eyes of mine.
jpnChrName: はっはっは、いや失敬！ わしとしては平常運転なんじゃがの～！
jpnSearchText:
はっはっは、いや失敬！
わしとしては平常運転なんじゃがの～！

engChrName: (He's, umm... He's quite the lecher, isn't he? He certainly stands out.)
engSearchText:
(He's, umm... He's quite the lecher, isn't he?
He certainly stands out.)
jpnChrName: （お元気というか、   個性的な方みたいですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（お元気というか、
個性的な方みたいですね……）

engChrName: You'll find me here just about all day.
engSearchText: You'll find me here just about all day.
jpnChrName: わしは日中なら大抵ここにおるぞ。
jpnSearchText: わしは日中なら大抵ここにおるぞ。

engChrName: Have you tried the löyly yet? It works wonders, I say!
engSearchText: Have you tried the löyly yet? It works wonders, I say!
jpnChrName: 今日はちとアレじゃが、 なにせ“ロウリュ”が最高じゃからの～！
jpnSearchText:
今日はちとアレじゃが、
なにせ“ロウリュ”が最高じゃからの～！

engChrName: My mind and body are ready to hustle!
engSearchText: My mind and body are ready to hustle!
jpnChrName: お陰で身も心もハッスルハッスルじゃ！
jpnSearchText: お陰で身も心もハッスルハッスルじゃ！

engChrName: That's well and good, but you're gonna blow through your savings if you just goof off every day.
engSearchText:
That's well and good, but you're gonna blow through
your savings if you just goof off every day.
jpnChrName: それはいいんだが…… たまには仕事にも行けよ、ハック爺さん。
jpnSearchText:
それはいいんだが……
たまには仕事にも行けよ、ハック爺さん。

engChrName: Now, Anya, you've got a good head on your shoulders and a knack for math like nobody I've ever seen...
engSearchText:
Now, Anya, you've got a good head on your shoulders
and a knack for math like nobody I've ever seen...
jpnChrName: アーニャよ……お前は頭も切れるし 大人顔負けの知識もある……
jpnSearchText:
アーニャよ……お前は頭も切れるし
大人顔負けの知識もある……

engChrName: ...so tell you what: how about you help with my article for next year's economic outlook? Exciting, huh?
engSearchText:
...so tell you what: how about you help with my article
for next year's economic outlook? Exciting, huh?
jpnChrName: よってこの『来年の経済展望』というテーマ、 お前ならできるッ！！
jpnSearchText:
よってこの『来年の経済展望』というテーマ、
お前ならできるッ！！

engChrName: No way, Jose. That's your job! You shouldn't need a little kid to help you write your paper.
engSearchText:
No way, Jose. That's your job! You shouldn't need a
little kid to help you write your paper.
jpnChrName: やんないよ～、そのタイレル通信への寄稿は ハック爺さんの仕事だもん。
jpnSearchText:
やんないよ～、そのタイレル通信への寄稿は
ハック爺さんの仕事だもん。

engChrName: Do it yourself, why don't you?
engSearchText: Do it yourself, why don't you?
jpnChrName: ちゃんと自分でやってよね～。
jpnSearchText: ちゃんと自分でやってよね～。

engChrName: Denied! Oh, the humanity!
engSearchText: Denied! Oh, the humanity!
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ……失敗じゃったか！
jpnSearchText: ぐぬぬ……失敗じゃったか！

engChrName: Man, you never change, do you?
engSearchText: Man, you never change, do you?
jpnChrName: ったく、やれやれだな。
jpnSearchText: ったく、やれやれだな。

engChrName: So, as I understand it, even after achieving such success as an investor, you continue to live a humble lifestyle in Old Town...
engSearchText:
So, as I understand it, even after achieving such
success as an investor, you continue to live a
humble lifestyle in Old Town...
jpnChrName: ええと、投資家として大成功されてからも 旧市街で質素な生活を送られているとか──
jpnSearchText:
ええと、投資家として大成功されてからも
旧市街で質素な生活を送られているとか──

engChrName: (*sigh* Does he really need to scrutinize me? Let me live my life in peace, damn it!)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* Does he really need to scrutinize me? Let me
live my life in peace, damn it!)
jpnChrName: （はぁ、めんどい……   別にワシ、好きに生きとるだけなんじゃけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（はぁ、めんどい……
別にワシ、好きに生きとるだけなんじゃけど。）

engChrName: (Wait, isn't that...?)
engSearchText: (Wait, isn't that...?)
jpnChrName: （あれ、この方は……）
jpnSearchText: （あれ、この方は……）

engChrName: I'm joined today by Walter Huckberry, the financial wunderkind who turned his company into one of Zemuria's very best consulting firms.
engSearchText:
I'm joined today by Walter Huckberry, the financial
wunderkind who turned his company into one of
Zemuria's very best consulting firms.
jpnChrName: 大陸でも五本の指に入る投資会社を率い、 伝説の投資家と名高いハックベリー社長──
jpnSearchText:
大陸でも五本の指に入る投資会社を率い、
伝説の投資家と名高いハックベリー社長──

engChrName: Thank you for your time today, Mr. Huckberry. I'd like to ask you about your approach to balancing your investments with your personal dealings...
engSearchText:
Thank you for your time today, Mr. Huckberry.
I'd like to ask you about your approach to balancing
your investments with your personal dealings...
jpnChrName: 取材を受けて頂きありがとうございます。 本日は主に投資哲学と人物像についてですね……
jpnSearchText:
取材を受けて頂きありがとうございます。
本日は主に投資哲学と人物像についてですね……

engChrName: Oh, my aching back... This is all such a pain. Let me just head on home already...
engSearchText:
Oh, my aching back... This is all such a pain. Let me
just head on home already...
jpnChrName: なんかメンドイのう…… はよ帰りたいわい……
jpnSearchText:
なんかメンドイのう……
はよ帰りたいわい……

engChrName: You're slippin', old man. Hang in there.
engSearchText: You're slippin', old man. Hang in there.
jpnChrName: 本音が漏れてんぞ、ハック爺さん。
jpnSearchText: 本音が漏れてんぞ、ハック爺さん。

engChrName: Wow... I didn't know about all that. I thought he was just your average retiree!
engSearchText:
Wow... I didn't know about all that. I thought he was
just your average retiree!
jpnChrName: というかそんなに凄い人だったんですね…… てっきりただのロウリュ好きかと！
jpnSearchText:
というかそんなに凄い人だったんですね……
てっきりただのロウリュ好きかと！

engChrName: Talk about a crouching tiger. I thought he was just some doddering old fart gambling his golden years away.
engSearchText:
Talk about a crouching tiger. I thought he was just
some doddering old fart gambling his golden
years away.
jpnChrName: つーかこの爺さん、んな大物だったのかよ…… ただの龍雀狂いかと思ってたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
つーかこの爺さん、んな大物だったのかよ……
ただの龍雀狂いかと思ってたぜ。

engChrName: In other circles, he's Walter Huckberry, financial guru and revered consultant to hedge funds the world over.
engSearchText:
In other circles, he's Walter Huckberry, financial guru
and revered consultant to hedge funds the world over.
jpnChrName: ウォルター・ハックベリー。 “金融界の賢人”とも呼ばれる人物ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ウォルター・ハックベリー。
“金融界の賢人”とも呼ばれる人物ですね。

engChrName: (I knew I recognized him from somewhere...)
engSearchText: (I knew I recognized him from somewhere...)
jpnChrName: （あはは、どこかで見た事がある方だとは   思っていたけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは、どこかで見た事がある方だとは
思っていたけど……）

engChrName: Oh, stop it. I'm no fan of the spotlight, got it?
engSearchText: Oh, stop it. I'm no fan of the spotlight, got it?
jpnChrName: ホラホラ、だからヤなんじゃよ～。 そういう若者の視線……
jpnSearchText:
ホラホラ、だからヤなんじゃよ～。
そういう若者の視線……

engChrName: You kids leave me be! I can't relax when you're all staring at me like that.
engSearchText:
You kids leave me be! I can't relax when you're all
staring at me like that.
jpnChrName: 地元でダラけられなくなるじゃろ？ 勘弁してほしいんじゃよ～！
jpnSearchText:
地元でダラけられなくなるじゃろ？
勘弁してほしいんじゃよ～！

engChrName: I-I'm sorry! I didn't mean to intrude...
engSearchText: I-I'm sorry! I didn't mean to intrude...
jpnChrName: ええとその！　なんかすみません…… 僕の取材のせいで……
jpnSearchText:
ええとその！　なんかすみません……
僕の取材のせいで……

engChrName: Dude, the reporter's just doin' his job. Act like an adult, will ya?
engSearchText:
Dude, the reporter's just doin' his job. Act like an
adult, will ya?
jpnChrName: ったく、記者に当てつけてないで 真面目に対応してやれよな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、記者に当てつけてないで
真面目に対応してやれよな。

engChrName: It may surprise you to learn that I'm a Thaumaturge myself—I learned well from the church.
engSearchText:
It may surprise you to learn that I'm a Thaumaturge
myself—I learned well from the church.
jpnChrName: こう見えて、教会に伝わる 《法術》をかじった事がありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
こう見えて、教会に伝わる
《法術》をかじった事がありましてね。

engChrName: So you needn't worry for me—I can hold my own against these foul creatures.
engSearchText:
So you needn't worry for me—I can hold my own
against these foul creatures.
jpnChrName: 私の事なら心配には及びません。 邪悪なるものを退ける事くらいはできましょう。
jpnSearchText:
私の事なら心配には及びません。
邪悪なるものを退ける事くらいはできましょう。

engChrName: I've received word of numerous casualties here in Old Town. I'll make sure to treat everyone I can as I do my rounds.
engSearchText:
I've received word of numerous casualties here in
Old Town. I'll make sure to treat everyone I can as I
do my rounds.
jpnChrName: ……旧市街でも何人か怪我人が出ている様子。 一回りして手当てを施すつもりですよ。
jpnSearchText:
……旧市街でも何人か怪我人が出ている様子。
一回りして手当てを施すつもりですよ。

engChrName: Let us both tread carefully and keep our wits about us. Goddess be with you.
engSearchText:
Let us both tread carefully and keep our wits
about us. Goddess be with you.
jpnChrName: お互い油断せずに参りましょう。 どうか女神の加護を。
jpnSearchText:
お互い油断せずに参りましょう。
どうか女神の加護を。

engChrName: The festival coincides with a special mass we hold here at the church.
engSearchText:
The festival coincides with a special mass we hold
here at the church.
jpnChrName: ふふ、革命記念日に合わせ 特別ミサを執り行っているのですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、革命記念日に合わせ
特別ミサを執り行っているのですよ。

engChrName: The Revolution Festival is more than just a holiday: it is a day when we express our gratitude for family, fraternity, and neighborly love.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival is more than just a holiday: it
is a day when we express our gratitude for family,
fraternity, and neighborly love.
jpnChrName: 共和国に暮らす人々にとって特別な日。 祖先に感謝し、隣人に親愛を伝える日です。
jpnSearchText:
共和国に暮らす人々にとって特別な日。
祖先に感謝し、隣人に親愛を伝える日です。

engChrName: I, too, need my rest—I visited the sauna this morning to cleanse my body and soul preceding the festival.
engSearchText:
I, too, need my rest—I visited the sauna this morning
to cleanse my body and soul preceding the festival.
jpnChrName: ……私も今朝はサウナに入り、 身も心も整えて臨んでおります。
jpnSearchText:
……私も今朝はサウナに入り、
身も心も整えて臨んでおります。

engChrName: If you'd like, please take a moment to pray.
engSearchText: If you'd like, please take a moment to pray.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ヴァン君たちもよければ 祈りを捧げて行ってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ヴァン君たちもよければ
祈りを捧げて行ってくださいね。

engChrName: That's our Nikolai, pious as ever. We'll stop by if we get the time.
engSearchText:
That's our Nikolai, pious as ever. We'll stop by if we
get the time.
jpnChrName: はは……流石は教区長。 ええ、時間が合えばぜひ。
jpnSearchText:
はは……流石は教区長。
ええ、時間が合えばぜひ。

jpnChrName: おや……？
jpnSearchText: おや……？

engChrName: You've something on your mind, I see. It doesn't seem to be troubling you, but it does...concern you, in a sense.
engSearchText:
You've something on your mind, I see. It doesn't
seem to be troubling you, but it does...concern you, in
a sense.
jpnChrName: ふふ、今夜は何か思う所があるようですね。 考え事──とは少し違うようですが。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、今夜は何か思う所があるようですね。
考え事──とは少し違うようですが。

engChrName: Heh. Can't hide anything from you, can I? I just ran into an old face for the first time in a while, is all.
engSearchText:
Heh. Can't hide anything from you, can I? I just ran
into an old face for the first time in a while, is all.
jpnChrName: はは、隠せませんね。 まあ久々に懐かしい顔と話したもんで。
jpnSearchText:
はは、隠せませんね。
まあ久々に懐かしい顔と話したもんで。

engChrName: (That obvious I'm worked up, huh? Man...)
engSearchText: (That obvious I'm worked up, huh? Man...)
jpnChrName: （きっとそのせいだろ。   妙に高ぶって感じるのは──）
jpnSearchText:
（きっとそのせいだろ。
妙に高ぶって感じるのは──）

engChrName: I'm running a bit late today. I had some business to attend to this morning.
engSearchText:
I'm running a bit late today. I had some business to
attend to this morning.
jpnChrName: 今日は私も片づけをしていて 遅くなってしまいました。
jpnSearchText:
今日は私も片づけをしていて
遅くなってしまいました。

engChrName: But now that I'm here, I can lead you in prayer for as long as you wish.
engSearchText:
But now that I'm here, I can lead you in prayer for as
long as you wish.
jpnChrName: ふふ、しばらくはここにいるので よければ祈りを捧げていってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、しばらくはここにいるので
よければ祈りを捧げていってくださいね。

engChrName: Thanks much.
engSearchText: Thanks much.
jpnChrName: ええ……感謝します、教区長。
jpnSearchText: ええ……感謝します、教区長。

engChrName: The Goddess walks with us always. When you find yourself lost, you need only offer your prayer unto Her.
engSearchText:
The Goddess walks with us always. When you find
yourself lost, you need only offer your prayer
unto Her.
jpnChrName: 空の女神はいつも我々と共にあります。 迷った時は祈りを捧げるとよいでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
空の女神はいつも我々と共にあります。
迷った時は祈りを捧げるとよいでしょう。

engChrName: May the Goddess smile upon you.
engSearchText: May the Goddess smile upon you.
jpnChrName: ──貴方の行く末に 女神のご加護があらん事を。
jpnSearchText:
──貴方の行く末に
女神のご加護があらん事を。

engChrName: Over these last two weeks, I've made a point of being an ear for the townsfolk's troubles.
engSearchText:
Over these last two weeks, I've made a point of being
an ear for the townsfolk's troubles.
jpnChrName: この２週間、一人一人の不安や悩み事を じっくり聞くという事を繰り返していましてね。
jpnSearchText:
この２週間、一人一人の不安や悩み事を
じっくり聞くという事を繰り返していましてね。

engChrName: I believe that is the first step toward overcoming their woes—having someone who will listen can help them open up and understand themselves better.
engSearchText:
I believe that is the first step toward overcoming their
woes—having someone who will listen can help them
open up and understand themselves better.
jpnChrName: お陰でようやく、礼拝にいらっしゃる 皆さんの顔に安堵が戻ったように思います。
jpnSearchText:
お陰でようやく、礼拝にいらっしゃる
皆さんの顔に安堵が戻ったように思います。

engChrName: A broken heart does not easily mend. Many still carry those wounds inside them—unseen and untreated.
engSearchText:
A broken heart does not easily mend. Many still carry
those wounds inside them—unseen and untreated.
jpnChrName: 心の傷は、簡単に癒えるものではありません。 まだまだ抱えてらっしゃる方もいるでしょうが──
jpnSearchText:
心の傷は、簡単に癒えるものではありません。
まだまだ抱えてらっしゃる方もいるでしょうが──

engChrName: I wish to give them a shoulder to lean on...an ear for their troubles. I wish to heal them, not just as a clergyman, but as a neighbor and a friend.
engSearchText:
I wish to give them a shoulder to lean on...an ear
for their troubles. I wish to heal them, not just
as a clergyman, but as a neighbor and a friend.
jpnChrName: できる限り、寄り添っていきたいものですね。 聖職者として、何より一人の隣人として。
jpnSearchText:
できる限り、寄り添っていきたいものですね。
聖職者として、何より一人の隣人として。

engChrName: Today's Sunday School session was a rousing success, due in no small part to Sister Myria.
engSearchText:
Today's Sunday School session was a rousing success,
due in no small part to Sister Myria.
jpnChrName: 今日は日曜学校も盛況なようです。 ふふ……シスター・ミリアの功績でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
今日は日曜学校も盛況なようです。
ふふ……シスター・ミリアの功績でしょうか。

engChrName: She's grown much in her time with the church... I think she might be ready to take on more responsibility.
engSearchText:
She's grown much in her time with the church...
I think she might be ready to take on
more responsibility.
jpnChrName: 彼女も成長していますし、もっと 色々な経験を積んでもよい頃かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
彼女も成長していますし、もっと
色々な経験を積んでもよい頃かもしれませんね。

engChrName: Three days have passed... Creil Village is still shrouded in mystery. I understand many feel directionless...
engSearchText:
Three days have passed... Creil Village is still
shrouded in mystery. I understand many
feel directionless...
jpnChrName: あれから３日……クレイユ村の状況がいまだ 不明瞭な事も不安を誘っているようですが……
jpnSearchText:
あれから３日……クレイユ村の状況がいまだ
不明瞭な事も不安を誘っているようですが……

engChrName: Our duty, however, has not changed. I shall conduct another mass today, and comfort those lost in fear and anxiety.
engSearchText:
Our duty, however, has not changed. I shall conduct
another mass today, and comfort those lost in fear
and anxiety.
jpnChrName: 我々のすべきことに変わりはありません。 さあ、本日もミサを執り行うとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
我々のすべきことに変わりはありません。
さあ、本日もミサを執り行うとしましょう。

engChrName: May we one day welcome peace again, under the auspices of the Goddess.
engSearchText:
May we one day welcome peace again, under the
auspices of the Goddess.
jpnChrName: 女神エイドスの名の下に 世に平安が訪れますように──
jpnSearchText:
女神エイドスの名の下に
世に平安が訪れますように──

engChrName: In my youth, I studied under Bishop Orwell at the Edith Grand Cathedral.
engSearchText:
In my youth, I studied under Bishop Orwell at the
Edith Grand Cathedral.
jpnChrName: 私はかつて、イーディス大聖堂の オーウェル司教に師事しておりましてね。
jpnSearchText:
私はかつて、イーディス大聖堂の
オーウェル司教に師事しておりましてね。

engChrName: He has truly earned his title, junior only to the archbishop. I deeply admire his candor and diligence.
engSearchText:
He has truly earned his title, junior only to
the archbishop. I deeply admire his candor
and diligence.
jpnChrName: 大司教に次ぐ位階にあられるお方── それは立派な人物ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
大司教に次ぐ位階にあられるお方──
それは立派な人物ですよ。

engChrName: Haha... Ah, the nostalgia. Much time has passed since those wonderful days...
engSearchText:
Haha... Ah, the nostalgia. Much time has passed
since those wonderful days...
jpnChrName: ふふ、修行時代が懐かしいですね。 色々な事がありましたが──
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、修行時代が懐かしいですね。
色々な事がありましたが──

engChrName: ...but those experiences have shaped me into the man I am today. I have Bishop Orwell to thank for that.
engSearchText:
...but those experiences have shaped me into the man
I am today. I have Bishop Orwell to thank for that.
jpnChrName: 全ては私という人間を育んでくれました。 オーウェル司教には感謝の言葉もありませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
全ては私という人間を育んでくれました。
オーウェル司教には感謝の言葉もありませんよ。

engChrName: I was quite the troublemaker in my youth, if you could believe it. Bishop Orwell was right to set me straight.
engSearchText:
I was quite the troublemaker in my youth, if you
could believe it. Bishop Orwell was right to set
me straight.
jpnChrName: こう見えて、私はかなりの問題児でしてね。 ふふ、オーウェル司教にはお世話になりました。
jpnSearchText:
こう見えて、私はかなりの問題児でしてね。
ふふ、オーウェル司教にはお世話になりました。

engChrName: I often find myself nostalgic for those days. I'm a much different man now...
engSearchText:
I often find myself nostalgic for those days. I'm a
much different man now...
jpnChrName: 修行時代が懐かしいですね。 本当に色々な事がありましたが──
jpnSearchText:
修行時代が懐かしいですね。
本当に色々な事がありましたが──

engChrName: Bishop Watson and I go back to our training days at the Grand Cathedral. He's still busy as ever, from what I've heard.
engSearchText:
Bishop Watson and I go back to our training days at
the Grand Cathedral. He's still busy as ever, from
what I've heard.
jpnChrName: ワトソン司祭とは修行時代からの親友でしてね。 ふふ、相変わらず忙しくしているようですが。
jpnSearchText:
ワトソン司祭とは修行時代からの親友でしてね。
ふふ、相変わらず忙しくしているようですが。

engChrName: Word has it, he's serving as Bishop Orwell's assistant on quite the momentous assignment.
engSearchText:
Word has it, he's serving as Bishop Orwell's assistant
on quite the momentous assignment.
jpnChrName: 今はオーウェル司教の補佐役として 重要な職務に付いているとか……
jpnSearchText:
今はオーウェル司教の補佐役として
重要な職務に付いているとか……

engChrName: I've much to talk about these days. Come, let me prepare some tea and castella for you.
engSearchText:
I've much to talk about these days. Come, let me
prepare some tea and castella for you.
jpnChrName: 積もる話もありますし、 紅茶とカステラをお出しするとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
積もる話もありますし、
紅茶とカステラをお出しするとしましょうか。

engChrName: Sister Myria is a wonderful teacher, truly. Her care for her students is immediately evident.
engSearchText:
Sister Myria is a wonderful teacher, truly. Her care
for her students is immediately evident.
jpnChrName: シスター・ミリアは子供たちの事を想い、 積極的に行動してくれていますね。
jpnSearchText:
シスター・ミリアは子供たちの事を想い、
積極的に行動してくれていますね。

engChrName: I am certain that her class will teach them much. I look forward to watching her.
engSearchText:
I am certain that her class will teach them much.
I look forward to watching her.
jpnChrName: ふふ、きっと良い授業になる事でしょう。 私も楽しみにしていましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、きっと良い授業になる事でしょう。
私も楽しみにしていましょうか。

engChrName: Ah. Good morning, everyone. Truth be told, I've found myself quite drawn to gardening these days.
engSearchText:
Ah. Good morning, everyone. Truth be told, I've
found myself quite drawn to gardening these days.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、おはようございます。 ふふ、実は園芸にハマっていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
皆さん、おはようございます。
ふふ、実は園芸にハマっていましてね。

engChrName: I'm often greeted by passersby as I water the plants here. I deeply appreciate that sense of community.
engSearchText:
I'm often greeted by passersby as I water the
plants here. I deeply appreciate that sense
of community.
jpnChrName: こうして水やりをしていると 近所の皆さんに話しかけられる事も増えました。
jpnSearchText:
こうして水やりをしていると
近所の皆さんに話しかけられる事も増えました。

engChrName: Now, then... Raymond taught me a better method for potting plants. I should give it a try.
engSearchText:
Now, then... Raymond taught me a better method for
potting plants. I should give it a try.
jpnChrName: さて、今日はレイモンド君が教えてくれた 新しい鉢植えなどを試してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日はレイモンド君が教えてくれた
新しい鉢植えなどを試してみましょうか。

engChrName: Huh. Well, whatever makes you happy.
engSearchText: Huh. Well, whatever makes you happy.
jpnChrName: そいつはまた…… なんつーか、楽しそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
そいつはまた……
なんつーか、楽しそうですね。

engChrName: Indeed. I lead a busy life, but it leaves me well and truly fulfilled.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I lead a busy life, but it leaves me well and
truly fulfilled.
jpnChrName: ふふ、毎日楽しいですよ。 飽きる暇もありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、毎日楽しいですよ。
飽きる暇もありませんね。

engChrName: I hope you have a wonderful day yourself. If you ever need an ear for your thoughts, I'm happy to listen.
engSearchText:
I hope you have a wonderful day yourself. If you ever
need an ear for your thoughts, I'm happy to listen.
jpnChrName: 皆さんもよい一日を。 相談事があればいつでも来て下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんもよい一日を。
相談事があればいつでも来て下さいね。

engChrName: It warms my heart to see the schoolchildren enjoying their lessons.
engSearchText:
It warms my heart to see the schoolchildren enjoying
their lessons.
jpnChrName: ふふ、子供たちも楽しんで 授業を受けてくれたようで何よりでした。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、子供たちも楽しんで
授業を受けてくれたようで何よりでした。

engChrName: Beyond just sating their curiosity for the arts and sciences, I like that they're learning to appreciate the smaller joys in life as well.
engSearchText:
Beyond just sating their curiosity for the arts and
sciences, I like that they're learning to appreciate the
smaller joys in life as well.
jpnChrName: 知識や学力も大切ですが、もっと身近にある 幸せを知って欲しい──私は常々そう考えています。
jpnSearchText:
知識や学力も大切ですが、もっと身近にある
幸せを知って欲しい──私は常々そう考えています。

engChrName: I have Sister Myria to thank for teaching them so wonderfully. It pleases me to see them growing not just in mind, but in spirit as well.
engSearchText:
I have Sister Myria to thank for teaching them
so wonderfully. It pleases me to see them growing not
just in mind, but in spirit as well.
jpnChrName: それが少しでも伝われば幸いですね。 機会をくれたシスター・ミリアにも感謝しなくては。
jpnSearchText:
それが少しでも伝われば幸いですね。
機会をくれたシスター・ミリアにも感謝しなくては。

engChrName: I did hear that one Sunday School student has stopped attending classes as of late...
engSearchText:
I did hear that one Sunday School student has
stopped attending classes as of late...
jpnChrName: ……ところで、日曜学校と言えば…… 一人だけ通っていない子がいましたね。
jpnSearchText:
……ところで、日曜学校と言えば……
一人だけ通っていない子がいましたね。

engChrName: I believe they're studying for entrance exams, hence their seclusion... I admit, that has me a touch concerned.
engSearchText:
I believe they're studying for entrance exams, hence
their seclusion... I admit, that has me a
touch concerned.
jpnChrName: 受験生だと聞いていますが、ふむ…… 少々気掛かりではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
受験生だと聞いていますが、ふむ……
少々気掛かりではありますが……

engChrName: Now, today's is a special lesson, class. We'll be writing our own songs today.
engSearchText:
Now, today's is a special lesson, class. We'll be writing
our own songs today.
jpnChrName: ……では皆さん、今日は特別授業として 『オリジナルの歌』を作ってみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
……では皆さん、今日は特別授業として
『オリジナルの歌』を作ってみましょう。

engChrName: I'd like you to think first about what kind of tone and rhythm you'd like to convey with your songs.
engSearchText:
I'd like you to think first about what kind of tone and
rhythm you'd like to convey with your songs.
jpnChrName: まずは歌にどんな気持ちを込めたいか、 それをイメージしてみる事です。
jpnSearchText:
まずは歌にどんな気持ちを込めたいか、
それをイメージしてみる事です。

engChrName: And when you write your lyrics, I'd like you to use at least one word you've recently learned, be it from a book, a lecture, anything of the sort.
engSearchText:
And when you write your lyrics, I'd like you to use at
least one word you've recently learned, be it from a
book, a lecture, anything of the sort.
jpnChrName: そして歌詞を作る時は、“最近覚えた言葉”を １つ以上、盛り込んでみてください。
jpnSearchText:
そして歌詞を作る時は、“最近覚えた言葉”を
１つ以上、盛り込んでみてください。

engChrName: Without further ado, let's begin our writing! If you get stuck or need help, I'm happy to guide you.
engSearchText:
Without further ado, let's begin our writing! If you
get stuck or need help, I'm happy to guide you.
jpnChrName: それでは歌作り、スタートです──！ 途中で困ったらどんどん相談してくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
それでは歌作り、スタートです──！
途中で困ったらどんどん相談してくださいね。

engChrName: Sister Myria is blessed with a truly kind heart.
engSearchText: Sister Myria is blessed with a truly kind heart.
jpnChrName: シスター・ミリアは本当に子供想いですね。
jpnSearchText: シスター・ミリアは本当に子供想いですね。

engChrName: She does sometimes get ahead of herself or misinterpret a question...but I don't think that's necessarily a bad thing. To err is human.
engSearchText:
She does sometimes get ahead of herself or
misinterpret a question...but I don't think that's
necessarily a bad thing. To err is human.
jpnChrName: 少々早とちりや誤認も多いのですが、 たまにはこういうのもいいかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
少々早とちりや誤認も多いのですが、
たまにはこういうのもいいかもしれません。

engChrName: I feel a pressure to perform in kind, myself. I should find ways to improve, haha.
engSearchText:
I feel a pressure to perform in kind, myself. I should
find ways to improve, haha.
jpnChrName: 彼女の気持ちにも応えられるよう、 私も何か考えてみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
彼女の気持ちにも応えられるよう、
私も何か考えてみましょうか。

engChrName: Welcome to our... Ah! It's good to see you, Ferida.
engSearchText: Welcome to our... Ah! It's good to see you, Ferida.
jpnChrName: 礼拝堂へようこそ── おや、フェリーダ君も一緒でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
礼拝堂へようこそ──
おや、フェリーダ君も一緒でしたか。

engChrName: I recall introducing the Central Eastern temple to you the other day. Has it helped you adjust to life in the capital?
engSearchText:
I recall introducing the Central Eastern temple to
you the other day. Has it helped you adjust to life in
the capital?
jpnChrName: 先日は中東式の寺院を紹介しましたが…… ふふ、首都での生活には慣れましたか？
jpnSearchText:
先日は中東式の寺院を紹介しましたが……
ふふ、首都での生活には慣れましたか？

engChrName: Uhh... Yeah, kinda! There's still a lot I don't really know, but I'll learn eventually! I think.
engSearchText:
Uhh... Yeah, kinda! There's still a lot I don't really
know, but I'll learn eventually! I think.
jpnChrName: は、はいっ！　知らない事ばかりですけど これも修行の一環ですから！
jpnSearchText:
は、はいっ！　知らない事ばかりですけど
これも修行の一環ですから！

engChrName: Haha... I admire your boundless energy.
engSearchText: Haha... I admire your boundless energy.
jpnChrName: ははは……今日も元気一杯ですね。
jpnSearchText: ははは……今日も元気一杯ですね。

engChrName: Out of curiosity, have you heard of the three tenets of Calvard?
engSearchText:
Out of curiosity, have you heard of the three tenets
of Calvard?
jpnChrName: ところで、このカルバードという国の 基礎理念をご存じでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
ところで、このカルバードという国の
基礎理念をご存じでしょうか？

engChrName: The...three tenets? I don't think so.
engSearchText: The...three tenets? I don't think so.
jpnChrName: 基礎理念、……ですか？
jpnSearchText: 基礎理念、……ですか？

engChrName: In our country, we hold these values above all: freedom, equality, and fraternity. These form what we call the Calvardian constitution.
engSearchText:
In our country, we hold these values above all:
freedom, equality, and fraternity. These form what we
call the Calvardian constitution.
jpnChrName: ええ、《共和国憲章》と呼ばれるもの── すなわち『自由・平等・友愛』の３つの柱。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、《共和国憲章》と呼ばれるもの──
すなわち『自由・平等・友愛』の３つの柱。

engChrName: In short, we hold the belief that everyone, regardless of color, creed, or social standing, is born equal and deserves to be treated with dignity.
engSearchText:
In short, we hold the belief that everyone, regardless
of color, creed, or social standing, is born equal and
deserves to be treated with dignity.
jpnChrName: 平たく言えば、この国では身分や人種に関わらず みな等しく隣人であるということです。
jpnSearchText:
平たく言えば、この国では身分や人種に関わらず
みな等しく隣人であるということです。

engChrName: You may feel pressure to fit in, to carry yourself as a native would...but truly, there is no right or wrong way to be Calvardian.
engSearchText:
You may feel pressure to fit in, to carry yourself as a
native would...but truly, there is no right or wrong
way to be Calvardian.
jpnChrName: 外国の出身だから、他人と違うからといって 無理に周囲に合わせる必要はありません。
jpnSearchText:
外国の出身だから、他人と違うからといって
無理に周囲に合わせる必要はありません。

engChrName: You are the sum of your heritage and your experiences. So I say, treasure what makes you, you.
engSearchText:
You are the sum of your heritage and
your experiences. So I say, treasure what makes
you, you.
jpnChrName: 新しい事を知るのも素晴らしいですが、 君らしさも大切にして下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
新しい事を知るのも素晴らしいですが、
君らしさも大切にして下さいね。

engChrName: Uh-huh... Yeah, I get that. It's just a little tough to wrap my head around.
engSearchText:
Uh-huh... Yeah, I get that. It's just a little tough to
wrap my head around.
jpnChrName: は、はい……えへへ、なんだか ちょっと難しい気もしますけど……
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……えへへ、なんだか
ちょっと難しい気もしますけど……

engChrName: But thank you for teaching me! I'll keep the three tenets in mind!
engSearchText:
But thank you for teaching me! I'll keep the three
tenets in mind!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、教区長様！ 心に留めておきますね！
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます、教区長様！
心に留めておきますね！

engChrName: (She's just so pure... Heehee. Don't worry, Feri. We'll help you along every step of the way.)
engSearchText:
(She's just so pure... Heehee. Don't worry, Feri.
We'll help you along every step of the way.)
jpnChrName: （フェリちゃん……ふふっ、   私たちも見守っていきたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（フェリちゃん……ふふっ、
私たちも見守っていきたいですね。）

engChrName: (All right, all right. Guess I gotta be an adult for her every now and then, heh.)
engSearchText:
(All right, all right. Guess I gotta be an adult for her
every now and then, heh.)
jpnChrName: （仕方ねえ、しばらくは   保護者役を務めてやるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（仕方ねえ、しばらくは
保護者役を務めてやるか。）

engChrName: Our Calvard is woven from threads of many different colors. No one trait can define us all.
engSearchText:
Our Calvard is woven from threads of many
different colors. No one trait can define us all.
jpnChrName: ふふ、このカルバードは 多種多様な人々が暮らし、行きかう国です。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、このカルバードは
多種多様な人々が暮らし、行きかう国です。

engChrName: Our nation is not without problems, certainly...but the Calvardian constitution offers wonderful words to live by.
engSearchText:
Our nation is not without problems, certainly...but
the Calvardian constitution offers wonderful words to
live by.
jpnChrName: 実際には様々な問題もありますが、 共和国憲章の理念は素晴らしいと思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
実際には様々な問題もありますが、
共和国憲章の理念は素晴らしいと思いますよ。

engChrName: We must treasure ourselves, our neighbors, and the freedom we all share. Our celebration of our community is what fulfills our hearts.
engSearchText:
We must treasure ourselves, our neighbors, and the
freedom we all share. Our celebration of our
community is what fulfills our hearts.
jpnChrName: 隣人を、自由を、貴方自身を大切にしてください。 それが私たちの心を豊かにしてくれるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
隣人を、自由を、貴方自身を大切にしてください。
それが私たちの心を豊かにしてくれるでしょう。

engChrName: Ah, good of you to come, Van. About the bathing advice you gave me...
engSearchText:
Ah, good of you to come, Van. About the bathing
advice you gave me...
jpnChrName: やあヴァン君、よく来てくれましたね。 丁度話をしたいと思っていたのです。
jpnSearchText:
やあヴァン君、よく来てくれましたね。
丁度話をしたいと思っていたのです。

engChrName: I tried your steam bath method the other day, and I must say, it was lovely.
engSearchText:
I tried your steam bath method the other day, and I
must say, it was lovely.
jpnChrName: ──先日教えてくれた蒸し風呂（ロウリュ）の整え方…… 試してみましたが、中々よきものでした。
jpnSearchText:
──先日教えてくれた蒸し風呂（ロウリュ）の整え方……
試してみましたが、中々よきものでした。

engChrName: I felt fully refreshed after my soak—dare I say, I felt younger, even!
engSearchText:
I felt fully refreshed after my soak—dare I say, I felt
younger, even!
jpnChrName: たっぷり汗をかき、入浴後も体がポカポカする 心地よさ──あれは無上の喜びでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
たっぷり汗をかき、入浴後も体がポカポカする
心地よさ──あれは無上の喜びでしょう。

engChrName: That's what I like to hear! Glad you enjoyed it.
engSearchText: That's what I like to hear! Glad you enjoyed it.
jpnChrName: さすがは教区長、分かってもらえましたか。
jpnSearchText: さすがは教区長、分かってもらえましたか。

engChrName: I'm gonna have to tell you about how to use a vihta next. Takes a little effort, but I promise you'll love it.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna have to tell you about how to use a
vihta next. Takes a little effort, but I promise you'll
love it.
