jpnChrName: でしたら次は“ヴィヒタ”の使い方なんかを…… ちょっとしたコツがありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
でしたら次は“ヴィヒタ”の使い方なんかを……
ちょっとしたコツがありましてね。

engChrName: Oh, I would love that. You've won me over already— what sage technique of yours might I learn next?
engSearchText:
Oh, I would love that. You've won me over already—
what sage technique of yours might I learn next?
jpnChrName: ええ、ぜひお願いしますよ。 今や私も立派な“サ道”ファンですから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ぜひお願いしますよ。
今や私も立派な“サ道”ファンですから。

engChrName: ...Huh. (He's quite the easygoing fellow, actually.)
engSearchText:
...Huh.
(He's quite the easygoing fellow, actually.)
jpnChrName: え、えっと……？ （なんだか親しみやすい教区長さんですね。）
jpnSearchText:
え、えっと……？
（なんだか親しみやすい教区長さんですね。）

engChrName: (He is, once you get used to him. Just loves trying new things. He's down to earth beneath all that cloth—bit of a weirdo, even...)
engSearchText:
(He is, once you get used to him. Just loves trying
new things. He's down to earth beneath all that
cloth—bit of a weirdo, even...)
jpnChrName: （ああ、よく新しい事に挑戦しててな。   庶民目線というか、まあぶっちゃけ変人だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、よく新しい事に挑戦しててな。
庶民目線というか、まあぶっちゃけ変人だな。）

engChrName: (...but he's got a good head on his shoulders.)
engSearchText: (...but he's got a good head on his shoulders.)
jpnChrName: （その分出来た人でもあるんだが。）
jpnSearchText: （その分出来た人でもあるんだが。）

engChrName: Welcome to our little chapel. It's good to see things so lively here, haha.
engSearchText:
Welcome to our little chapel. It's good to see things
so lively here, haha.
jpnChrName: 礼拝堂へようこそ。 はは、少々雑談が膨らんでしまいましたね。
jpnSearchText:
礼拝堂へようこそ。
はは、少々雑談が膨らんでしまいましたね。

engChrName: I'm often asked how to find fulfillment and happiness in life... My best advice, from my own experience, is to live each day to the fullest.
engSearchText:
I'm often asked how to find fulfillment and happiness
in life... My best advice, from my own experience, is
to live each day to the fullest.
jpnChrName: 幸せの秘訣は日々を満喫すること── それを私なりに実践しているというだけですよ。
jpnSearchText:
幸せの秘訣は日々を満喫すること──
それを私なりに実践しているというだけですよ。

engChrName: In these lives we lead, we will invariably shoulder many personal burdens. Fear, sadness, anxiety...and indeed, sin.
engSearchText:
In these lives we lead, we will invariably shoulder
many personal burdens. Fear, sadness, anxiety...and
indeed, sin.
jpnChrName: 不安、悲しみ、恐れ、そして罪…… 人は生きている限り、多くの物を背負い続けます。
jpnSearchText:
不安、悲しみ、恐れ、そして罪……
人は生きている限り、多くの物を背負い続けます。

engChrName: Yet we are not meant to carry these burdens alone. In your time of need, you can always turn to the church, and to Aidios. I will always be here to pray with you.
engSearchText:
Yet we are not meant to carry these burdens alone. In
your time of need, you can always turn to the church,
and to Aidios. I will always be here to pray with you.
jpnChrName: ですから……抱えきれなくなったらいらして下さい。 ふふ、共に女神に祈りを捧げるとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ですから……抱えきれなくなったらいらして下さい。
ふふ、共に女神に祈りを捧げるとしましょう。

engChrName: Haha. I'm no match for you, I'm afraid.
engSearchText: Haha. I'm no match for you, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: はは、君には本当に敵わないな。
jpnSearchText: はは、君には本当に敵わないな。

engChrName: Our clergymen are wonderful, wise beyond their years. The Grand Cathedral is in good hands.
engSearchText:
Our clergymen are wonderful, wise beyond
their years. The Grand Cathedral is in good hands.
jpnChrName: ああ、イーディス大聖堂の者たちも 元気に勤めを果たしているよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、イーディス大聖堂の者たちも
元気に勤めを果たしているよ。

engChrName: You should really drop by, sometime. I'm sure Bishop Orwell would be delighted to see you.
engSearchText:
You should really drop by, sometime. I'm sure Bishop
Orwell would be delighted to see you.
jpnChrName: 君もたまには顔を出したまえ。 オーウェル司教もお喜びになるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
君もたまには顔を出したまえ。
オーウェル司教もお喜びになるだろう。

engChrName: Oh, Bishop Watson! So nice to see you. It's been quite some time, hasn't it?
engSearchText:
Oh, Bishop Watson! So nice to see you. It's been
quite some time, hasn't it?
jpnChrName: おお、ワトソン司祭……！ 訪ねていらっしゃるのは何時ぶりでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
おお、ワトソン司祭……！
訪ねていらっしゃるのは何時ぶりでしょうか。

engChrName: I happened to be in the neighborhood on business, so I thought I'd stop by. You look like you've kept well, old friend!
engSearchText:
I happened to be in the neighborhood on business, so
I thought I'd stop by. You look like you've kept well,
old friend!
jpnChrName: はは、所用で近くに立ち寄ったのでね。 壮健そうで何よりだ、わが友よ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、所用で近くに立ち寄ったのでね。
壮健そうで何よりだ、わが友よ。

engChrName: I have, yes. I can only hope Bishop Orwell is staying healthy himself.
engSearchText:
I have, yes. I can only hope Bishop Orwell is staying
healthy himself.
jpnChrName: ええ、我らが師・オーウェル司教も お元気にされているといいのですが。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、我らが師・オーウェル司教も
お元気にされているといいのですが。

engChrName: But this isn't the best place to converse, I believe. Let's retreat to my office.
engSearchText:
But this isn't the best place to converse, I believe.
Let's retreat to my office.
jpnChrName: 立ち話もなんです、どうぞ執務室の方へ。
jpnSearchText: 立ち話もなんです、どうぞ執務室の方へ。

engChrName: I've developed somewhat of a sweet tooth in my old age. Would you like a piece of this castella I just baked?
engSearchText:
I've developed somewhat of a sweet tooth in my
old age. Would you like a piece of this castella I
just baked?
jpnChrName: 最近お菓子作りにハマっていましてね。 カステラを焼いたのでおひとつ如何でしょう？
jpnSearchText:
最近お菓子作りにハマっていましてね。
カステラを焼いたのでおひとつ如何でしょう？

engChrName: You never cease to surprise, haha. Sure, I'll indulge!
engSearchText: You never cease to surprise, haha. Sure, I'll indulge!
jpnChrName: はは……君には本当に敵わないな。 ここはお言葉に甘えるとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
はは……君には本当に敵わないな。
ここはお言葉に甘えるとしようか。

engChrName: E-Everyone, please stay indoors! It's far too dangerous outside!
engSearchText:
E-Everyone, please stay indoors! It's far too
dangerous outside!
jpnChrName: みっ、皆さんはどうか外へ出ないように──！
jpnSearchText: みっ、皆さんはどうか外へ出ないように──！

engChrName: Ah...! Van, and everyone else! Are you working to expel those monsters?
engSearchText:
Ah...! Van, and everyone else! Are you working to
expel those monsters?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたち──……ハッ！！ この事態を止めようとされているのですね！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたち──……ハッ！！
この事態を止めようとされているのですね！

engChrName: I knew you wouldn't just sit idly by! You can always count on the spriggan to swoop in.
engSearchText:
I knew you wouldn't just sit idly by! You can always
count on the spriggan to swoop in.
jpnChrName: 流石ですわ！！　解決事務所の皆さんなら きっと放っておかないと信じておりました！
jpnSearchText:
流石ですわ！！　解決事務所の皆さんなら
きっと放っておかないと信じておりました！

engChrName: Damn straight! Good that you guys are already hunkerin' up.
engSearchText:
Damn straight! Good that you guys are already
hunkerin' up.
jpnChrName: ハハ、いつも以上に 理解が早くて助かるぜ……
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、いつも以上に
理解が早くて助かるぜ……

engChrName: You guys should be safe here, I don't think those monsters'll get in. But don't let your guard down. Myria, can I trust you to hold down the fort?
engSearchText:
You guys should be safe here, I don't think those
monsters'll get in. But don't let your guard down.
Myria, can I trust you to hold down the fort?
jpnChrName: 化け物共が入ってくることは無いと思うが── ここは頼んだぜ、シスター・ミリア！
jpnSearchText:
化け物共が入ってくることは無いと思うが──
ここは頼んだぜ、シスター・ミリア！

engChrName: Of course! Goddess be with you out there!
engSearchText: Of course! Goddess be with you out there!
jpnChrName: ええっ！　どうか女神の加護を！！
jpnSearchText: ええっ！　どうか女神の加護を！！

engChrName: I'm not quite sure what's going on, but...what I AM sure of is that Father Nikolai entrusted the chapel to me!
engSearchText:
I'm not quite sure what's going on, but...what I AM
sure of is that Father Nikolai entrusted the chapel
to me!
jpnChrName: 私も何が何だか…… でも教区長にここを任されたのです！
jpnSearchText:
私も何が何だか……
でも教区長にここを任されたのです！

engChrName: I will protect us from those unholy creations—I swear it!
engSearchText:
I will protect us from those unholy creations—I
swear it!
jpnChrName: ここにいる皆さんは、責任をもって 守り通してみせますわ！！
jpnSearchText:
ここにいる皆さんは、責任をもって
守り通してみせますわ！！

engChrName: I leave the rest in your hands. Goddess bless you!
engSearchText: I leave the rest in your hands. Goddess bless you!
jpnChrName: あとの事は解決事務所の皆さんに託します。 ──女神の加護があらんことを！！
jpnSearchText:
あとの事は解決事務所の皆さんに託します。
──女神の加護があらんことを！！

engChrName: Now, welcome to today's special mass! I see we have more people than usual today.
engSearchText:
Now, welcome to today's special mass! I see we
have more people than usual today.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、本日は特別ミサへようこそ！ ご近所の皆さんも沢山いらして下さって……
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、本日は特別ミサへようこそ！
ご近所の皆さんも沢山いらして下さって……

engChrName: I must say, I'm honored! It warms my heart to see so many of our neighbors here!
engSearchText:
I must say, I'm honored! It warms my heart to see so
many of our neighbors here!
jpnChrName: 私、感無量です！！ 呼びかけて良かったですわ！！
jpnSearchText:
私、感無量です！！
呼びかけて良かったですわ！！

engChrName: I do have a luncheon scheduled after mass— you're all welcome to eat and make merry together.
engSearchText:
I do have a luncheon scheduled after mass—
you're all welcome to eat and make merry together.
jpnChrName: ミサの後は一緒に団欒ができる 昼食会も予定しているんです。
jpnSearchText:
ミサの後は一緒に団欒ができる
昼食会も予定しているんです。

engChrName: Montmart has offered to cater for our lunch! I've prepared some homemade dishes myself.
engSearchText:
Montmart has offered to cater for our lunch! I've
prepared some homemade dishes myself.
jpnChrName: モンマルトの特別メニューに加えて 私もいくつか手料理を──
jpnSearchText:
モンマルトの特別メニューに加えて
私もいくつか手料理を──

engChrName: Oh, I'm just excited beyond words. May you have a wonderful day, too!
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm just excited beyond words. May you have a
wonderful day, too!
jpnChrName: ふふふっ、どうかお楽しみにですわっ！ 皆さんも素敵な一日を過ごされますように！！
jpnSearchText:
ふふふっ、どうかお楽しみにですわっ！
皆さんも素敵な一日を過ごされますように！！

engChrName: Oh, right, right! Montmart said they were quite busy today, so I have to try to pick up our food early.
engSearchText:
Oh, right, right! Montmart said they were quite busy
today, so I have to try to pick up our food early.
jpnChrName: そうそう、今日はモンマルトは お忙しいとかで、お料理は取りにいかないと……
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、今日はモンマルトは
お忙しいとかで、お料理は取りにいかないと……

engChrName: Goodness, things are setting up to be quite busy after mass. Heehee! I do hope you enjoy the day!
engSearchText:
Goodness, things are setting up to be quite busy after
mass. Heehee! I do hope you enjoy the day!
jpnChrName: ミサが終わったら忙しくなりますね。 ふふふっ、どうかお楽しみにですわっ！
jpnSearchText:
ミサが終わったら忙しくなりますね。
ふふふっ、どうかお楽しみにですわっ！

engChrName: Goodness me...! Tomorrow, I'm visiting the great cathedral for a meeting in Bishop Nikolai's stead!
engSearchText:
Goodness me...! Tomorrow, I'm visiting the great
cathedral for a meeting in Bishop Nikolai's stead!
jpnChrName: むふ～！　明日は教区長の代理として 大聖堂へ行ってくる事になったのです！
jpnSearchText:
むふ～！　明日は教区長の代理として
大聖堂へ行ってくる事になったのです！

engChrName: He did tell me it was time I 'broadened my horizons'...
engSearchText:
He did tell me it was time I 'broadened
my horizons'...
jpnChrName: 私もそろそろ色んな事を 経験した方がいいと、推薦して下さって──
jpnSearchText:
私もそろそろ色んな事を
経験した方がいいと、推薦して下さって──

engChrName: Well, I certainly can't let him down, can I? I'll give it my all!
engSearchText:
Well, I certainly can't let him down, can I? I'll give it
my all!
jpnChrName: これはきっと期待されてるのですね！ 記念祭の打ち合わせ、頑張っちゃいますよー！
jpnSearchText:
これはきっと期待されてるのですね！
記念祭の打ち合わせ、頑張っちゃいますよー！

engChrName: I can't deny I'm nervous, but it's a wonderful opportunity to experience higher church duties!
engSearchText:
I can't deny I'm nervous, but it's a wonderful
opportunity to experience higher church duties!
jpnChrName: 教区長の代理だなんて 緊張しますけど、せっかくの機会ですから！
jpnSearchText:
教区長の代理だなんて
緊張しますけど、せっかくの機会ですから！

engChrName: So I need to rest up and ready myself. I'm sure this year's festival will be just wonderful!
engSearchText:
So I need to rest up and ready myself. I'm sure this
year's festival will be just wonderful!
jpnChrName: 打ち合わせもバッチリこなして 記念祭も素晴らしい日にしてみせますわっ！
jpnSearchText:
打ち合わせもバッチリこなして
記念祭も素晴らしい日にしてみせますわっ！

engChrName: I asked Gin for her help with today's special lesson, and I'm glad I did!
engSearchText:
I asked Gin for her help with today's special lesson,
and I'm glad I did!
jpnChrName: 今日の特別授業は ギン婆様にお願いしたんです！
jpnSearchText:
今日の特別授業は
ギン婆様にお願いしたんです！

engChrName: She just has so many fascinating stories to tell. I learned a thing or two myself!
engSearchText:
She just has so many fascinating stories to tell.
I learned a thing or two myself!
jpnChrName: う～ん、面白いお話ばかりで 私の方が勉強になっちゃってますねっ！
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、面白いお話ばかりで
私の方が勉強になっちゃってますねっ！

engChrName: And my goodness, the kids had so many curious questions for her at the end, heehee. I knew I was right to ask her!
engSearchText:
And my goodness, the kids had so many curious
questions for her at the end, heehee. I knew I was
right to ask her!
jpnChrName: 子供たちも活発に質問してくれて…… ふふっ、やっぱりお願いして正解でした！！
jpnSearchText:
子供たちも活発に質問してくれて……
ふふっ、やっぱりお願いして正解でした！！

engChrName: We have many a churchgoer in for prayer today... I understand everyone's feeling uneasy.
engSearchText:
We have many a churchgoer in for prayer today...
I understand everyone's feeling uneasy.
jpnChrName: 今日も礼拝にいらっしゃる方が多くて…… やはり不安を抱えてらっしゃるのでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
今日も礼拝にいらっしゃる方が多くて……
やはり不安を抱えてらっしゃるのでしょう……

engChrName: I'll need to work as hard as I can to calm their spirits. They're depending on me!
engSearchText:
I'll need to work as hard as I can to calm their spirits.
They're depending on me!
jpnChrName: 私も精一杯頑張ります！
jpnSearchText: 私も精一杯頑張ります！

engChrName: Goodness, time flies when you're speaking with Gin. Before I knew it, night had already fallen.
engSearchText:
Goodness, time flies when you're speaking with Gin.
Before I knew it, night had already fallen.
jpnChrName: ふうっ、ギン婆様と話していたら あっという間に夜になってしまいました。
jpnSearchText:
ふうっ、ギン婆様と話していたら
あっという間に夜になってしまいました。

engChrName: There's still much we need to go over, so I'll be back at it in the morning!
engSearchText:
There's still much we need to go over, so I'll be back
at it in the morning!
jpnChrName: でもでも、交渉の余地はあると見ました！ 私は諦めませんよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
でもでも、交渉の余地はあると見ました！
私は諦めませんよ～っ！！

engChrName: I heard that a fellow priest visited Father Nikolai today...but I'm not sure who.
engSearchText:
I heard that a fellow priest visited Father Nikolai
today...but I'm not sure who.
jpnChrName: そういえば……今日はとある司祭様が ニコル教区長を訪ねてきたそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……今日はとある司祭様が
ニコル教区長を訪ねてきたそうですね。

engChrName: Apparently he's a high-ranking father from the Grand Cathedral. What would bring someone of his stature here, I wonder...?
engSearchText:
Apparently he's a high-ranking father from the
Grand Cathedral. What would bring someone of his
stature here, I wonder...?
jpnChrName: イーディス大聖堂の有名な方だったみたいですが…… うーん、どうしてそんな凄そうな人が……？
jpnSearchText:
イーディス大聖堂の有名な方だったみたいですが……
うーん、どうしてそんな凄そうな人が……？

engChrName: I never have been able to get a read on Father Nikolai. It's gotten me curious now: just what kind of person is he?
engSearchText:
I never have been able to get a read on
Father Nikolai. It's gotten me curious now: just what
kind of person is he?
jpnChrName: 今さらですけど教区長って一体何者なんでしょう。 なんだか気になっちゃいますよね。
jpnSearchText:
今さらですけど教区長って一体何者なんでしょう。
なんだか気になっちゃいますよね。

engChrName: If you ever need guidance, or anything at all, then please, reach out to me! I'll help as best I can!
engSearchText:
If you ever need guidance, or anything at all, then
please, reach out to me! I'll help as best I can!
jpnChrName: む～、またよく分からない事を仰って！ 私は諦めませんよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
む～、またよく分からない事を仰って！
私は諦めませんよ～っ！！

engChrName: Oh, thank heavens... I was worrying all for nothing!
engSearchText: Oh, thank heavens... I was worrying all for nothing!
jpnChrName: よかった……不安もあったのですけど ふふっ、綺麗にかき消えてしまいました！
jpnSearchText:
よかった……不安もあったのですけど
ふふっ、綺麗にかき消えてしまいました！

engChrName: However, seeing how kind Father Nikolai was did strike me as a bit odd...
engSearchText:
However, seeing how kind Father Nikolai was did
strike me as a bit odd...
jpnChrName: ……それにしても教区長は、 どうしてこんなにお優しいのでしょうね……
jpnSearchText:
……それにしても教区長は、
どうしてこんなにお優しいのでしょうね……

engChrName: It felt as if he had...other motives. Very mysterious, he is.
engSearchText:
It felt as if he had...other motives. Very mysterious,
he is.
jpnChrName: ただ慈愛に満ちた方というだけではないような…… う～ん、なんだか不思議な方ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ただ慈愛に満ちた方というだけではないような……
う～ん、なんだか不思議な方ですよね。

engChrName: I think I'll give the books a good dusting today!
engSearchText: I think I'll give the books a good dusting today!
jpnChrName: 今日は書物の虫干しをしてと～♪
jpnSearchText: 今日は書物の虫干しをしてと～♪

engChrName: Ah! You're the maid I've been seeing in the neighborhood lately.
engSearchText:
Ah! You're the maid I've been seeing in the
neighborhood lately.
jpnChrName: あら、そちらの方は…… 最近お見掛けするメイドさんではありませんか！
jpnSearchText:
あら、そちらの方は……
最近お見掛けするメイドさんではありませんか！

engChrName: I didn't realize you were working for Van! I'm sorry, I should have introduced myself sooner.
engSearchText:
I didn't realize you were working for Van! I'm sorry, I
should have introduced myself sooner.
jpnChrName: 解決事務所にお勤めだったのですね！ まあまあ！　ご挨拶が遅れてしまって！
jpnSearchText:
解決事務所にお勤めだったのですね！
まあまあ！　ご挨拶が遅れてしまって！

engChrName: Not a problem. My name is Risette Twinings— pleased to make your acquaintance.
engSearchText:
Not a problem. My name is Risette Twinings—
pleased to make your acquaintance.
jpnChrName: いいえ、こちらこそ。 わたくしリゼット・トワイニングと申します。
jpnSearchText:
いいえ、こちらこそ。
わたくしリゼット・トワイニングと申します。

engChrName: I've been temporarily assigned to Arkride Solutions as their on-site concierge. In truth, though, I'm beholden to the Marduk Company.
engSearchText:
I've been temporarily assigned to Arkride Solutions as
their on-site concierge. In truth, though, I'm
beholden to the Marduk Company.
jpnChrName: マルドゥック社より出向という形で “現地ＳＣ（サービスコンシェルジュ）”を務めておりまして。
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥック社より出向という形で
“現地ＳＣ（サービスコンシェルジュ）”を務めておりまして。

engChrName: I...see! (I don't really see, though. It's a touch confusing...)
engSearchText:
I...see!
(I don't really see, though. It's a touch confusing...)
jpnChrName: シュッコウ……サービス、コンシュ…… （んん～？　想像以上に難しいような……）
jpnSearchText:
シュッコウ……サービス、コンシュ……
（んん～？　想像以上に難しいような……）

engChrName: So, a concierge as in...? Is that like a special service?
engSearchText: So, a concierge as in...? Is that like a special service?
jpnChrName: あ、分かりました！ 今週のサービスの方なのですね！
jpnSearchText:
あ、分かりました！
今週のサービスの方なのですね！

engChrName: I've noticed those kinds of things have cropped up more often here—like, erm, delivery service, cleaning service, that sort of thing.
engSearchText:
I've noticed those kinds of things have cropped up
more often here—like, erm, delivery service, cleaning
service, that sort of thing.
jpnChrName: 最近は“デリバリー”？　でしたっけ。 いろんなサービスがありますものね！
jpnSearchText:
最近は“デリバリー”？　でしたっけ。
いろんなサービスがありますものね！

engChrName: (Flew right over her head.)
engSearchText: (Flew right over her head.)
jpnChrName: （うん、なるほどな。   １リジュも分かってねえようだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（うん、なるほどな。
１リジュも分かってねえようだ。）

engChrName: (It did... Her job description isn't very clear, in fairness.)
engSearchText:
(It did... Her job description isn't very clear,
in fairness.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……一般の人には   ちょっと難しいかもですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……一般の人には
ちょっと難しいかもですね。）

engChrName: I do a thorough cleaning every so often, myself. It won't do to let dust colonize the chapel!
engSearchText:
I do a thorough cleaning every so often, myself.
It won't do to let dust colonize the chapel!
jpnChrName: 礼拝堂もたまには大掃除をするんですよ。 ホコリが溜まるといけませんからね！
jpnSearchText:
礼拝堂もたまには大掃除をするんですよ。
ホコリが溜まるといけませんからね！

engChrName: Oh, right, right! On the topic of deliveries...
engSearchText: Oh, right, right! On the topic of deliveries...
jpnChrName: ……そうそう、デリバリーといえば……
jpnSearchText: ……そうそう、デリバリーといえば……

engChrName: Paulette asked me if I wanted a lunch delivered today.
engSearchText: Paulette asked me if I wanted a lunch delivered today.
jpnChrName: さっきポーレットさんから 昼食を届けましょうかって連絡がきたんです。
jpnSearchText:
さっきポーレットさんから
昼食を届けましょうかって連絡がきたんです。

engChrName: And she says Yumé will be making the delivery! Oh, that bundle of sunshine just can't get here fast enough! I need to tidy up before she gets here!
engSearchText:
And she says Yumé will be making the delivery!
Oh, that bundle of sunshine just can't get here
fast enough! I need to tidy up before she gets here!
jpnChrName: なんでもユメちゃんが届けてくれるとか…… ふふっ、楽しみです！　お掃除も頑張らないと！
jpnSearchText:
なんでもユメちゃんが届けてくれるとか……
ふふっ、楽しみです！　お掃除も頑張らないと！

engChrName: Ah, today's Sunday School session was simply wonderful! I don't think I've ever seen a class so curious and eager to learn.
engSearchText:
Ah, today's Sunday School session was
simply wonderful! I don't think I've ever seen a class
so curious and eager to learn.
jpnChrName: 今日の日曜学校、本当に大盛況でした！ あんなに楽しい授業は生まれて初めてです！
jpnSearchText:
今日の日曜学校、本当に大盛況でした！
あんなに楽しい授業は生まれて初めてです！

engChrName: They're just so excited when it comes to reading and writing—not to say the other classes didn't go well, too!
engSearchText:
They're just so excited when it comes to reading and
writing—not to say the other classes didn't go
well, too!
jpnChrName: 子供たちも国語に興味を持ってくれましたし 通常授業も大いに進んで……！
jpnSearchText:
子供たちも国語に興味を持ってくれましたし
通常授業も大いに進んで……！

engChrName: I'm so glad I pitched the idea to Father Nikolai. I hope we get to hold another session soon!
engSearchText:
I'm so glad I pitched the idea to Father Nikolai.
I hope we get to hold another session soon!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、教区長にお願いしてよかった…… 次の特別授業も、またそのうち開きたいですね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、教区長にお願いしてよかった……
次の特別授業も、またそのうち開きたいですね！

engChrName: I knew Father Nikolai would be open to the idea, heehee!
engSearchText:
I knew Father Nikolai would be open to the
idea, heehee!
jpnChrName: 今日の授業、やっぱり 教区長にお願いして大正解でした！
jpnSearchText:
今日の授業、やっぱり
教区長にお願いして大正解でした！

engChrName: It gives the kids an extra dash of learning, sans the long hours of the typical school day. They've taken to it well, reading and writing especially.
engSearchText:
It gives the kids an extra dash of learning, sans the
long hours of the typical school day. They've taken to
it well, reading and writing especially.
jpnChrName: これなら年少の子から取り組めますし、 国語にも興味を持ってくれそうだし──
jpnSearchText:
これなら年少の子から取り組めますし、
国語にも興味を持ってくれそうだし──

engChrName: And most importantly, they're all excited to learn! Father Nikolai really knows how to pique their curiosity.
engSearchText:
And most importantly, they're all excited to learn!
Father Nikolai really knows how to pique
their curiosity.
jpnChrName: なにより子供たちのワクワク感が凄いです！ ふふっ、さすがは教区長ですね！！
jpnSearchText:
なにより子供たちのワクワク感が凄いです！
ふふっ、さすがは教区長ですね！！

engChrName: I'd love to host these regularly, and I'm sure the kids would, too. I'm so glad I get to do this!
engSearchText:
I'd love to host these regularly, and I'm sure the kids
would, too. I'm so glad I get to do this!
jpnChrName: たまには特別授業もいいですよね……！ 教区長にお願いして大正解でした！！
jpnSearchText:
たまには特別授業もいいですよね……！
教区長にお願いして大正解でした！！

engChrName: Oh, I'm just over the moon. I can't thank Father Nikolai enough!
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm just over the moon. I can't thank Father
Nikolai enough!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、快く引き受けてもらえて良かったです！
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、快く引き受けてもらえて良かったです！

engChrName: Normally he's reading and playing with the children... I don't know much about his teaching talents, though.
engSearchText:
Normally he's reading and playing with the children...
I don't know much about his teaching
talents, though.
jpnChrName: 教区長は普段から、子供たちに絵本を読んだり 一緒にごっこ遊びをしているんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
教区長は普段から、子供たちに絵本を読んだり
一緒にごっこ遊びをしているんですよ。

engChrName: Still, I can't wait to see what kind of class he'll put on!
engSearchText: Still, I can't wait to see what kind of class he'll put on!
jpnChrName: そんな教区長がしてくださる授業…… ふふっ、当日が楽しみですね！
jpnSearchText:
そんな教区長がしてくださる授業……
ふふっ、当日が楽しみですね！

engChrName: Well, hello there, Ferida! It's been a little while, hasn't it?
engSearchText:
Well, hello there, Ferida! It's been a little while,
hasn't it?
jpnChrName: あら、フェリーダさん！ 先日いらして以来ですね！
jpnSearchText:
あら、フェリーダさん！
先日いらして以来ですね！

engChrName: I just wanted to say... If you ever need a shoulder to lean on, I'll always be here. I know it must be tough, living so far from home at your age...
engSearchText:
I just wanted to say... If you ever need a shoulder to
lean on, I'll always be here. I know it must be tough,
living so far from home at your age...
jpnChrName: そのぅ、いつでも頼ってくださいね？ その歳で故郷に帰れなくなってしまったとか──
jpnSearchText:
そのぅ、いつでも頼ってくださいね？
その歳で故郷に帰れなくなってしまったとか──

engChrName: And you're having to support yourself, too. It's just... You're such a brave girl! I want to help you however I can!
engSearchText:
And you're having to support yourself, too. It's just...
You're such a brave girl! I want to help you however
I can!
jpnChrName: 働きながら生計を立てているなんて聞いた日には ……ぐすっ、本当に大変でしたね……！！
jpnSearchText:
働きながら生計を立てているなんて聞いた日には
……ぐすっ、本当に大変でしたね……！！

engChrName: E-Err... (I'm glad she wants to help, but it's really not as hard as she's making it out to be...)
engSearchText:
E-Err...
(I'm glad she wants to help, but it's really not as hard
as she's making it out to be...)
jpnChrName: ええと、あの…… （その通りなのですが、何か誤解があるような……）
jpnSearchText:
ええと、あの……
（その通りなのですが、何か誤解があるような……）

engChrName: Oh, now that I think about it, you're working for Arkride Solutions, right?
engSearchText:
Oh, now that I think about it, you're working for
Arkride Solutions, right?
jpnChrName: ハッ、待ってください！ その勤め先はアークライド解決事務所……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、待ってください！
その勤め先はアークライド解決事務所……

engChrName: So that means... Ohh! Van's helping you out, isn't he? Oh, that's wonderful!
engSearchText:
So that means... Ohh! Van's helping you out, isn't he?
Oh, that's wonderful!
jpnChrName: ──ということはヴァンさんが後見人に なられたのですね！？　流石ですわ！！
jpnSearchText:
──ということはヴァンさんが後見人に
なられたのですね！？　流石ですわ！！

engChrName: Oh, I'm just keepin' her pointed the right way, heh heh.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm just keepin' her pointed the right way,
heh heh.
jpnChrName: はっはっは、いや～ それほどでもありませんがね。
jpnSearchText:
はっはっは、いや～
それほどでもありませんがね。

engChrName: (It might help her to look before she leaps to conclusions...)
engSearchText:
(It might help her to look before she leaps
to conclusions...)
jpnChrName: （早とちりに早とちりが重なって   色々曲解されている気がしますけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（早とちりに早とちりが重なって
色々曲解されている気がしますけど……）

engChrName: (Just let her be, it's easier that way.)
engSearchText: (Just let her be, it's easier that way.)
jpnChrName: （面倒くせえからスルーだスルー。）
jpnSearchText: （面倒くせえからスルーだスルー。）

engChrName: (I'm not sure I get her, but she seems really nice! Old Town feels nice and cozy.)
engSearchText:
(I'm not sure I get her, but she seems really nice!
Old Town feels nice and cozy.)
jpnChrName: （よくわかりませんけど……   旧市街の方は皆さん、優しい息吹ですっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（よくわかりませんけど……
旧市街の方は皆さん、優しい息吹ですっ！）

engChrName: It puts me at ease knowing that Van is watching over you.
engSearchText:
It puts me at ease knowing that Van is
watching over you.
jpnChrName: うんうん、わたくしも少し安心しました！
jpnSearchText: うんうん、わたくしも少し安心しました！

engChrName: I heard you're attending Sunday School at the temple. I know it's tough, having to put yourself out there in a new city at such a young age...
engSearchText:
I heard you're attending Sunday School at
the temple. I know it's tough, having to put yourself
out there in a new city at such a young age...
jpnChrName: とはいえ慣れない暮らしで困る事もあるでしょう。 日曜学校は別の寺院に通う事にしたそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ慣れない暮らしで困る事もあるでしょう。
日曜学校は別の寺院に通う事にしたそうですが……

engChrName: ...but you have myself and all your neighbors here to help you! If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask me.
engSearchText:
...but you have myself and all your neighbors here to
help you! If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to
ask me.
jpnChrName: 同じ旧市街に住む者同士でもあります！ いつでも頼ってくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
同じ旧市街に住む者同士でもあります！
いつでも頼ってくださいね！

engChrName: Of course! Thank you so much, Sister Myria!
engSearchText: Of course! Thank you so much, Sister Myria!
jpnChrName: はいっ、ありがとうございます、シスター！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、ありがとうございます、シスター！

engChrName: G'morning, Sister Myria.
engSearchText: G'morning, Sister Myria.
jpnChrName: シスター・ミリアか、おはようさん。
jpnSearchText: シスター・ミリアか、おはようさん。

engChrName: Ah, good morning.
engSearchText: Ah, good morning.
jpnChrName: アークライド解決事務所の……
jpnSearchText: アークライド解決事務所の……

engChrName: So, pardon my nosiness, but I've heard you're taking some...choice jobs.
engSearchText:
So, pardon my nosiness, but I've heard you're taking
some...choice jobs.
jpnChrName: 私、最近耳にしてしまったのです。 貴方がなさっているという“裏”の仕事を……
jpnSearchText:
私、最近耳にしてしまったのです。
貴方がなさっているという“裏”の仕事を……

engChrName: That your clientele sometimes runs on the, erm... unsavory side.
engSearchText:
That your clientele sometimes runs on the, erm...
unsavory side.
jpnChrName: なんでも後ろ暗い人々の 悩みごとばかり引き受けて回っているとか──
jpnSearchText:
なんでも後ろ暗い人々の
悩みごとばかり引き受けて回っているとか──

engChrName: But, umm...honestly, I love that! Just as the Goddess forgives those who let Her into their hearts, you too extend forgiveness to your clients!
engSearchText:
But, umm...honestly, I love that! Just as the Goddess
forgives those who let Her into their hearts, you too
extend forgiveness to your clients!
jpnChrName: す、素晴らしいです──！ まさに空の女神のおっしゃる慈愛の体現……！
jpnSearchText:
す、素晴らしいです──！
まさに空の女神のおっしゃる慈愛の体現……！

engChrName: Hearing about the work you do, and...and the people you support without scorn or judgment is just... *sniffle* It simply moves me!
engSearchText:
Hearing about the work you do, and...and the people
you support without scorn or judgment is just...
*sniffle* It simply moves me!
jpnChrName: 取り残されがちな人々の声にも真摯に 耳を傾ける姿勢──聖職者として感銘を受けました！
jpnSearchText:
取り残されがちな人々の声にも真摯に
耳を傾ける姿勢──聖職者として感銘を受けました！

engChrName: I'll support you all the way, so that you can support those in need!
engSearchText:
I'll support you all the way, so that you can support
those in need!
jpnChrName: どうかこれからも、人々のために 共に尽力して参りましょう！
jpnSearchText:
どうかこれからも、人々のために
共に尽力して参りましょう！

engChrName: Haha, yep! I never turn down a client! (Long as they got dough.)
engSearchText:
Haha, yep! I never turn down a client!
(Long as they got dough.)
jpnChrName: ハハ、もちろんですとも。 （ミラ次第で）力にならせてもらいますよ！
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、もちろんですとも。
（ミラ次第で）力にならせてもらいますよ！

engChrName: (Huh? Did you say something, Van? I felt as if you... let something slip there.)
engSearchText:
(Huh? Did you say something, Van? I felt as if you...
let something slip there.)
jpnChrName: （き、気のせいかな……   ヴァンさんの本音が聞こえるような……）
jpnSearchText:
（き、気のせいかな……
ヴァンさんの本音が聞こえるような……）

engChrName: Forgive my assumptions, Van... I didn't realize you had such a pure, compassionate heart!
engSearchText:
Forgive my assumptions, Van... I didn't realize you
had such a pure, compassionate heart!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんはただの解決屋ではなかったのですね。 こんなに広いお心の持ち主だとは、つゆ知らず……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんはただの解決屋ではなかったのですね。
こんなに広いお心の持ち主だとは、つゆ知らず……

engChrName: As a woman of the cloth, I'm moved almost to tears! The Goddess smiles upon you... Please, keep up your wonderful work!
engSearchText:
As a woman of the cloth, I'm moved almost to tears!
The Goddess smiles upon you... Please, keep up your
wonderful work!
jpnChrName: 聖職者として感銘を受けました！ これからも人々のため、共に尽力いたしましょう！
jpnSearchText:
聖職者として感銘を受けました！
これからも人々のため、共に尽力いたしましょう！

engChrName: That's what Arkride Solutions is for! You can leave your past at the door.
engSearchText:
That's what Arkride Solutions is for! You can leave
your past at the door.
jpnChrName: ハハ、ご依頼はアークライド解決事務所まで！
jpnSearchText: ハハ、ご依頼はアークライド解決事務所まで！

engChrName: (This feels...incorrect.)
engSearchText: (This feels...incorrect.)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、これでいいのかな……？）
jpnSearchText: （う～ん、これでいいのかな……？）

engChrName: Oh, Father, about my idea for a Sunday School session...
engSearchText:
Oh, Father, about my idea for a Sunday
School session...
jpnChrName: 教区長、再来週の日曜学校なのですが……
jpnSearchText: 教区長、再来週の日曜学校なのですが……

engChrName: Ah, yes. I do recall you mentioning that.
engSearchText: Ah, yes. I do recall you mentioning that.
jpnChrName: そういえば、授業内容を相談したいと 言っていましたね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、授業内容を相談したいと
言っていましたね。

engChrName: I admire your passion, Myria. I'd be happy to implement that class the week after next.
engSearchText:
I admire your passion, Myria. I'd be happy to
implement that class the week after next.
jpnChrName: ふふ、貴女の熱意は本物です。 どんな内容であれ、諦めることなどありませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、貴女の熱意は本物です。
どんな内容であれ、諦めることなどありませんよ。

engChrName: R-Really? You would?! Oh, thank goodness!
engSearchText: R-Really? You would?! Oh, thank goodness!
jpnChrName: 本当ですか！？　ほっ、良かった……
jpnSearchText: 本当ですか！？　ほっ、良かった……

engChrName: Thank you so much, Father! I'm sure you'll do just swimmingly!
engSearchText:
Thank you so much, Father! I'm sure you'll do
just swimmingly!
jpnChrName: では教区長、よろしくお願いしますね！
jpnSearchText: では教区長、よろしくお願いしますね！

engChrName: I...will? I might be missing something.
engSearchText: I...will? I might be missing something.
jpnChrName: ええと……？　それはもしや……
jpnSearchText: ええと……？　それはもしや……

engChrName: O-Oh? I thought I had... Well, my idea was, I wanted you to be the guest teacher for that class!
engSearchText:
O-Oh? I thought I had... Well, my idea was, I
wanted you to be the guest teacher for that class!
jpnChrName: はい、ぜひ教区長に教師役をお願いしたくて！
jpnSearchText: はい、ぜひ教区長に教師役をお願いしたくて！

engChrName: I mean, the children adore you! Surely they'll appreciate a class from you, right?
engSearchText:
I mean, the children adore you! Surely they'll
appreciate a class from you, right?
jpnChrName: だって普段から子供たちに人気なんですもの！ きっといい授業ができますわ！
jpnSearchText:
だって普段から子供たちに人気なんですもの！
きっといい授業ができますわ！

engChrName: Ah, haha... Now I understand. That said, I'm...not sure how my popularity would translate to teaching ability.
engSearchText:
Ah, haha... Now I understand. That said, I'm...not
sure how my popularity would translate to
teaching ability.
jpnChrName: はは、そう来ましたか…… ……正直そこは関係なさそうに思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
はは、そう来ましたか……
……正直そこは関係なさそうに思いますが……

engChrName: But then, what is life without new experiences? I'll consider this a challenge of sorts, haha. Sign me up.
engSearchText:
But then, what is life without new experiences?
I'll consider this a challenge of sorts, haha. Sign
me up.
jpnChrName: わかりました、折角ですし引き受けるとしましょう。 これも１つの挑戦でしょうしね。
jpnSearchText:
わかりました、折角ですし引き受けるとしましょう。
これも１つの挑戦でしょうしね。

engChrName: I see... Another special class, you say—and with a guest teacher this time?
engSearchText:
I see... Another special class, you say—and with a
guest teacher this time?
jpnChrName: なるほど、また特別授業を…… それも今回は“ゲスト講師”をお呼びしたいと。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、また特別授業を……
それも今回は“ゲスト講師”をお呼びしたいと。

engChrName: Yes, exactly! I was trying to figure out how we can make history class more interesting.
engSearchText:
Yes, exactly! I was trying to figure out how we can
make history class more interesting.
jpnChrName: はい！　歴史の授業をもっと楽しく できないかと思いまして……
jpnSearchText:
はい！　歴史の授業をもっと楽しく
できないかと思いまして……

engChrName: I thought that perhaps if they had a teacher they knew and got along with, they would be more curious to learn.
engSearchText:
I thought that perhaps if they had a teacher they
knew and got along with, they would be more curious
to learn.
jpnChrName: 子供たちも馴染みがあって、かつ詳しい方に 昔のお話を聞く──そんな授業をしてみたくて！
jpnSearchText:
子供たちも馴染みがあって、かつ詳しい方に
昔のお話を聞く──そんな授業をしてみたくて！

engChrName: Now, I think that's a wonderful idea, Myria! I can always trust you to keep their best interests in mind.
engSearchText:
Now, I think that's a wonderful idea, Myria! I can
always trust you to keep their best interests in mind.
jpnChrName: ふふ、シスター・ミリアらしい とてもいいアイデアだと思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、シスター・ミリアらしい
とてもいいアイデアだと思いますよ。

engChrName: Such a lesson plan would likely require a fair bit of work...but I trust you can handle it. Best of luck, Sister.
engSearchText:
Such a lesson plan would likely require a fair bit of
work...but I trust you can handle it. Best of
luck, Sister.
jpnChrName: 少し大変かもしれませんが、私も応援しています。 どんどん挑戦してみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
少し大変かもしれませんが、私も応援しています。
どんどん挑戦してみましょう。

engChrName: I-I will! Thank you so much, Father!
engSearchText: I-I will! Thank you so much, Father!
jpnChrName: は、はいっ！ ありがとうございます、教区長！
jpnSearchText:
は、はいっ！
ありがとうございます、教区長！

engChrName: Blessings be, everyone...
engSearchText: Blessings be, everyone...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、それに皆様……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、それに皆様……

engChrName: You're heading out, at a time like this? Please, do be careful...
engSearchText:
You're heading out, at a time like this? Please, do
be careful...
jpnChrName: どこかへ出かけられるようですね。 かような時です、慎重に行動なさいますよう。
jpnSearchText:
どこかへ出かけられるようですね。
かような時です、慎重に行動なさいますよう。

engChrName: Of course! We'll make sure of that.
engSearchText: Of course! We'll make sure of that.
jpnChrName: はい、ありがとうございます。 十分に気を付けますね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ありがとうございます。
十分に気を付けますね。

engChrName: I mean, I don't think we're gonna get riots out in the streets or anything like that.
engSearchText:
I mean, I don't think we're gonna get riots out in the
streets or anything like that.
jpnChrName: 今すぐ事態が動くってことは 無いと思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
今すぐ事態が動くってことは
無いと思いますが……

engChrName: The opposite, really: everybody's drained. They dunno what to do. But I think if anybody can help 'em, it's you guys here at the church.
engSearchText:
The opposite, really: everybody's drained.
They dunno what to do. But I think if anybody can
help 'em, it's you guys here at the church.
jpnChrName: それだけに精神的に参ってくる連中もいそうだ。 教会でも気にかけておいてもらえると。
jpnSearchText:
それだけに精神的に参ってくる連中もいそうだ。
教会でも気にかけておいてもらえると。

engChrName: Absolutely. No matter the situation, the church will always extend its hand to those in need.
engSearchText:
Absolutely. No matter the situation, the church will
always extend its hand to those in need.
jpnChrName: ええ、もちろんですとも。 いかなる時も私は皆と共にありましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、もちろんですとも。
いかなる時も私は皆と共にありましょう。

engChrName: I'll be here as well! I can't deny I'm nervous, but...I have to stay strong!
engSearchText:
I'll be here as well! I can't deny I'm nervous, but...I
have to stay strong!
jpnChrName: わ、わたしも……！ 不安もありますけど精一杯頑張ります！
jpnSearchText:
わ、わたしも……！
不安もありますけど精一杯頑張ります！

engChrName: Please stay safe, everyone!
engSearchText: Please stay safe, everyone!
jpnChrName: 皆さんも無茶はなさらないで下さいね！
jpnSearchText: 皆さんも無茶はなさらないで下さいね！

engChrName: Huh? Speak up, missy! You want me to TEACH, was that it?!
engSearchText:
Huh? Speak up, missy! You want me to
TEACH, was that it?!
jpnChrName: ──ハァ？　なんだって？ アタシに日曜学校の教師役をやれだぁ！？
jpnSearchText:
──ハァ？　なんだって？
アタシに日曜学校の教師役をやれだぁ！？

engChrName: Yes, please! I'm looking for a guest teacher for their history lessons, and I think you'd make a wonderful lecturer!
engSearchText:
Yes, please! I'm looking for a guest teacher for their
history lessons, and I think you'd make a
wonderful lecturer!
jpnChrName: そうなんです！　歴史の授業の一環で 子供たちに昔の話を聞かせてあげたくてですね！
jpnSearchText:
そうなんです！　歴史の授業の一環で
子供たちに昔の話を聞かせてあげたくてですね！

engChrName: All the other elders in the neighborhood directed me to you. They said you would be the best for the job!
engSearchText:
All the other elders in the neighborhood directed me
to you. They said you would be the best for the job!
jpnChrName: 近所のご老人を回ったのですが…… そこはギン婆様が適任だと皆さん口を揃えて！
jpnSearchText:
近所のご老人を回ったのですが……
そこはギン婆様が適任だと皆さん口を揃えて！

engChrName: Those backstabbin' little...!
engSearchText: Those backstabbin' little...!
jpnChrName: ったくどいつもこいつも……！
jpnSearchText: ったくどいつもこいつも……！

engChrName: Look, I ain't some show pony you can parade around to keep kids busy! Leave me alone, damn it!
engSearchText:
Look, I ain't some show pony you can parade around
to keep kids busy! Leave me alone, damn it!
jpnChrName: ええい、あたしゃオモテに立ちたくないんだよ！ 真っ平ごめんさ！！
jpnSearchText:
ええい、あたしゃオモテに立ちたくないんだよ！
真っ平ごめんさ！！

engChrName: Wha...? N-No, that's not what I meant! I mean, what's the harm, anyway?
engSearchText:
Wha...? N-No, that's not what I meant! I mean,
what's the harm, anyway?
jpnChrName: オモテ？？　よ、よく分かりませんけど いいじゃないですか、減るものでもないですし～！
jpnSearchText:
オモテ？？　よ、よく分かりませんけど
いいじゃないですか、減るものでもないですし～！

engChrName: What's the harm? WHAT'S THE HARM?! Ask my privacy!
engSearchText:
What's the harm? WHAT'S THE HARM?! Ask
my privacy!
jpnChrName: 減るんだよ！！　アタシの威厳ってやつがね！
jpnSearchText: 減るんだよ！！　アタシの威厳ってやつがね！

engChrName: (They seem quite animated today.)
engSearchText: (They seem quite animated today.)
jpnChrName: （何か揉めてるみたいだけど……）
jpnSearchText: （何か揉めてるみたいだけど……）

engChrName: (*sigh* Just ignore 'em. We don't need to hit up Gin's shop right now anyway.)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* Just ignore 'em. We don't need to hit up Gin's
shop right now anyway.)
jpnChrName: （あー、気にせずとっとと   買い物だけ済ませちまうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（あー、気にせずとっとと
買い物だけ済ませちまうか。）

engChrName: Wh-What's going on?! And why NOW?!
engSearchText: Wh-What's going on?! And why NOW?!
jpnChrName: どど、どうなってるんだよっ……！？ こんなのありえないっての！！
jpnSearchText:
どど、どうなってるんだよっ……！？
こんなのありえないっての！！

engChrName: Where are Dad and the others?! I knew they went off to Auber, but...but...!
engSearchText:
Where are Dad and the others?! I knew they went off
to Auber, but...but...!
jpnChrName: それに……父さんたちは無事なのか……！？ 確かオーベル地区の方に行ったみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
それに……父さんたちは無事なのか……！？
確かオーベル地区の方に行ったみたいだけど……

engChrName: I get you're anxious, but you're only gonna make it worse by wandering off out there.
engSearchText:
I get you're anxious, but you're only gonna make it
worse by wandering off out there.
jpnChrName: そうか、そいつは心配だが…… まだ外をうろつかない方がいい。
jpnSearchText:
そうか、そいつは心配だが……
まだ外をうろつかない方がいい。

engChrName: Please, stay inside until it's safe!
engSearchText: Please, stay inside until it's safe!
jpnChrName: 状況が落ち着くまでは ここにいて下さいっ！
jpnSearchText:
状況が落ち着くまでは
ここにいて下さいっ！

engChrName: Urgh... Okay, okay.
engSearchText: Urgh... Okay, okay.
jpnChrName: くっ……わ、分かったよ！
jpnSearchText: くっ……わ、分かったよ！

engChrName: But if you see Dad and the others, tell them to get back here ASAP!
engSearchText:
But if you see Dad and the others, tell them to get
back here ASAP!
jpnChrName: けどその、もし父さんたちに会ったら…… 絶対帰って来いって伝えといてくれよな！！
jpnSearchText:
けどその、もし父さんたちに会ったら……
絶対帰って来いって伝えといてくれよな！！

engChrName: Got'cha.
engSearchText: Got'cha.
jpnChrName: その依頼、承ったぜ。
jpnSearchText: その依頼、承ったぜ。

engChrName: We've no time to waste.
engSearchText: We've no time to waste.
jpnChrName: わたくしたちも先を急ぎましょう。
jpnSearchText: わたくしたちも先を急ぎましょう。

engChrName: Let's get moving!
engSearchText: Let's get moving!
jpnChrName: わたしたちも先を急ぎましょう！
jpnSearchText: わたしたちも先を急ぎましょう！

engChrName: Mom... Dad... If you don't come home, I-I swear...!
engSearchText: Mom... Dad... If you don't come home, I-I swear...!
jpnChrName: くっ……父さんも母さんも…… これで帰ってこなかったら勝手すぎだろ！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……父さんも母さんも……
これで帰ってこなかったら勝手すぎだろ！

engChrName: G-Get your butts home, right now! Please...!
engSearchText: G-Get your butts home, right now! Please...!
jpnChrName: そんなの絶対許さない── 僕は認めないからなっ！！
jpnSearchText:
そんなの絶対許さない──
僕は認めないからなっ！！

engChrName: Why do you have to just...?!
engSearchText: Why do you have to just...?!
jpnChrName: ……父さんも母さんも勝手すぎだろ！！
jpnSearchText: ……父さんも母さんも勝手すぎだろ！！

engChrName: I'm so sorry, Curtis. I realize now how harsh we were being to you.
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry, Curtis. I realize now how harsh we were
being to you.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさいねカーチス、でも── きっと今までの方が勝手すぎたんだわ。
jpnSearchText:
ごめんなさいねカーチス、でも──
きっと今までの方が勝手すぎたんだわ。

engChrName: I... Man, I regret not being there for you more.
engSearchText: I... Man, I regret not being there for you more.
jpnChrName: まあな……ワシももっとお前を 見てやればよかったと反省しておる。
jpnSearchText:
まあな……ワシももっとお前を
見てやればよかったと反省しておる。

engChrName: We've put a lot of thought into this, trust me. We want to set things right.
engSearchText:
We've put a lot of thought into this, trust me.
We want to set things right.
jpnChrName: だからこそ、お互いどうすべきか しっかり考えるべきだと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ、お互いどうすべきか
しっかり考えるべきだと思ってな。

engChrName: I just... I don't get it...
engSearchText: I just... I don't get it...
jpnChrName: な、なんか二人ともぎこちないな……
jpnSearchText: な、なんか二人ともぎこちないな……

engChrName: (I know this is all my fault... *sigh*)
engSearchText: (I know this is all my fault... *sigh*)
jpnChrName: （まあ全部僕のせいなんだけどね……   ………はぁぁ………）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ全部僕のせいなんだけどね……
………はぁぁ………）

engChrName: (I'm glad we avoided making this a police thing, but one wrong move and the entrance exam wouldn't have even mattered anymore...)
engSearchText:
(I'm glad we avoided making this a police thing, but
one wrong move and the entrance exam wouldn't
have even mattered anymore...)
jpnChrName: （お陰で警察沙汰にならずに済んだけど……   下手したら受験どころじゃなかったし。）
jpnSearchText:
（お陰で警察沙汰にならずに済んだけど……
下手したら受験どころじゃなかったし。）

engChrName: (That bracer cleared things up for us, but one wrong move and the entrance exam wouldn't have even mattered anymore...)
engSearchText:
(That bracer cleared things up for us, but one wrong
move and the entrance exam wouldn't have even
mattered anymore...)
jpnChrName: （遊撃士の人に止めてもらったけど……   下手したら受験どころじゃなかったし。）
jpnSearchText:
（遊撃士の人に止めてもらったけど……
下手したら受験どころじゃなかったし。）

engChrName: (We've always been like this. How can we just change?)
engSearchText:
(We've always been like this. How can we
just change?)
jpnChrName: （でもウチってずっとこんな感じだったし……   イマサラどうしたらいいのか……）
jpnSearchText:
（でもウチってずっとこんな感じだったし……
イマサラどうしたらいいのか……）

engChrName: (Huh. Somethin' sketch happen?)
engSearchText: (Huh. Somethin' sketch happen?)
jpnChrName: （ふむ、なにか後ろ暗い事でも   あったようだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ、なにか後ろ暗い事でも
あったようだが……）

engChrName: (Looks like it's all cleared up, whatever it was. Guess it ain't my business.)
engSearchText:
(Looks like it's all cleared up, whatever it was.
Guess it ain't my business.)
jpnChrName: （ま、解決したっぽいし   突っ込むのは止めておくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、解決したっぽいし
突っ込むのは止めておくか。）

engChrName: What's gotten into you two...? You were all normal until this morning, and now you're all soft and stuff...
engSearchText:
What's gotten into you two...? You were all normal
until this morning, and now you're all soft and stuff...
jpnChrName: なんだよ、今朝まで相変わらずだったのに、 ２人とも急にしおらしくなっちゃってさ……
jpnSearchText:
なんだよ、今朝まで相変わらずだったのに、
２人とも急にしおらしくなっちゃってさ……

engChrName: ...Fine, I'll take the medicine, okay?
engSearchText: ...Fine, I'll take the medicine, okay?
jpnChrName: ……とりあえず、貰った薬はちゃんと飲むよ。
jpnSearchText: ……とりあえず、貰った薬はちゃんと飲むよ。

engChrName: And, umm...thanks. I guess I owe you.
engSearchText: And, umm...thanks. I guess I owe you.
jpnChrName: その……色々と世話になったな。
jpnSearchText: その……色々と世話になったな。

engChrName: YES! I got all the questions in the reference book right! Hah, told you I could do this!
engSearchText:
YES! I got all the questions in the reference
book right! Hah, told you I could do this!
jpnChrName: この参考書も全問正解──！ ヒヒッ、いいぞこのペースだ！！
jpnSearchText:
この参考書も全問正解──！
ヒヒッ、いいぞこのペースだ！！

engChrName: Mom's not on my butt anymore, either. Oh, that feels good!
engSearchText:
Mom's not on my butt anymore, either. Oh, that
feels good!
jpnChrName: ママもゴチャゴチャ言わなくなったし クク……実にいい気分だ……
jpnSearchText:
ママもゴチャゴチャ言わなくなったし
クク……実にいい気分だ……

engChrName: All right! It'll be an all-nighter for me tonight!
engSearchText: All right! It'll be an all-nighter for me tonight!
jpnChrName: ──よーし、今日も徹夜だな！！
jpnSearchText: ──よーし、今日も徹夜だな！！

engChrName: (Brat's been buggin' me for a while now...)
engSearchText: (Brat's been buggin' me for a while now...)
jpnChrName: （このガキンチョ、この前から   ちょいと気になるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（このガキンチョ、この前から
ちょいと気になるが……）

engChrName: (...but he ain't my business. I don't have the time anyway.)
engSearchText:
(...but he ain't my business. I don't have the
time anyway.)
jpnChrName: （ま、今は構ってる暇はねえか……）
jpnSearchText: （ま、今は構ってる暇はねえか……）

engChrName: C'mon, focus... Okay... Equation here... That cancels out, so the proof is like that...
engSearchText:
C'mon, focus... Okay... Equation here... That cancels
out, so the proof is like that...
jpnChrName: ハア……ハア…… 方程式の応用……定理から証明……
jpnSearchText:
ハア……ハア……
方程式の応用……定理から証明……

engChrName: ...Yes! That's the answer! Phew...! All that's left is to prove it!
engSearchText:
...Yes! That's the answer! Phew...! All that's left is to
prove it!
jpnChrName: ──よし見えたっ、コイツが答えだ！！ ゼエゼエ……あとは記述して……
jpnSearchText:
──よし見えたっ、コイツが答えだ！！
ゼエゼエ……あとは記述して……

engChrName: All right! That's ahead of my pace, too! Ugh, I'm light-headed... Worth it, though!
engSearchText:
All right! That's ahead of my pace, too! Ugh,
I'm light-headed... Worth it, though!
jpnChrName: ハハッ、また目標タイムを縮めてやったぜ！ 酸欠でクラクラするけどな……！！
jpnSearchText:
ハハッ、また目標タイムを縮めてやったぜ！
酸欠でクラクラするけどな……！！

engChrName: (I didn't know one could get light-headed just from studying. That's some incredible focus.)
engSearchText:
(I didn't know one could get light-headed just
from studying. That's some incredible focus.)
jpnChrName: （勉強で酸欠だなんて……   うーん、凄い集中力ですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（勉強で酸欠だなんて……
うーん、凄い集中力ですね……）

engChrName: (It does happen. Hyperfocusing can leave you faint, if you're not careful.)
engSearchText:
(It does happen. Hyperfocusing can leave you faint, if
you're not careful.)
jpnChrName: （ああ……過度な集中は“脳酸欠”を   引き起こす事があるけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ……過度な集中は“脳酸欠”を
引き起こす事があるけど……）

engChrName: (Kid's got spirit... Maybe a bit too much spirit. Not my place to micromanage him, though.)
engSearchText:
(Kid's got spirit... Maybe a bit too much spirit.
Not my place to micromanage him, though.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、ちょいと張り切りすぎだな……   まあ口出しする筋合いもねえが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、ちょいと張り切りすぎだな……
まあ口出しする筋合いもねえが。）

engChrName: I can barely stand being at home anymore, so I slipped out...
engSearchText:
I can barely stand being at home anymore, so I
slipped out...
jpnChrName: ……なんか辛くなっちまってさ、 家を抜けだして来たんだ……
jpnSearchText:
……なんか辛くなっちまってさ、
家を抜けだして来たんだ……

engChrName: *sigh* What's so important about this stupid exam? It doesn't prove anything...
engSearchText:
*sigh* What's so important about this stupid exam?
It doesn't prove anything...
jpnChrName: ハァ～……僕はなんで 受験勉強なんてやってるんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ハァ～……僕はなんで
受験勉強なんてやってるんだろ。

engChrName: Hell, why am I trying so hard to get into Aramis, anyway?
engSearchText:
Hell, why am I trying so hard to get into
Aramis, anyway?
jpnChrName: よく考えたらアラミスだって…… どうしても入りたい訳じゃないんだよな……
jpnSearchText:
よく考えたらアラミスだって……
どうしても入りたい訳じゃないんだよな……

engChrName: I've lost focus... I just can't do anything anymore.
engSearchText: I've lost focus... I just can't do anything anymore.
jpnChrName: ここの所、集中力が続かないんだ……
jpnSearchText: ここの所、集中力が続かないんだ……

engChrName: My grades keep getting worse, Mom's all hysterical...
engSearchText: My grades keep getting worse, Mom's all hysterical...
jpnChrName: 成績もますます落ちるし…… 母さんはヒステリックになるし……
jpnSearchText:
成績もますます落ちるし……
母さんはヒステリックになるし……

engChrName: *sigh* And my head's a mess. What am I supposed to do?
engSearchText:
*sigh* And my head's a mess. What am I supposed
to do?
jpnChrName: ……はぁぁ……頭の中がグルグルする…… どうすりゃいいんだろ……
jpnSearchText:
……はぁぁ……頭の中がグルグルする……
どうすりゃいいんだろ……

engChrName: Freaking... URGH! What's the deal with this stupid exam?!
engSearchText:
Freaking... URGH! What's the deal with this
stupid exam?!
jpnChrName: クソクソクソッ──！！ な、なんだよあの模試の結果……！！
jpnSearchText:
クソクソクソッ──！！
な、なんだよあの模試の結果……！！

engChrName: How did I drop a hundred spots on the practice test?! I just... I don't get it!
engSearchText:
How did I drop a hundred spots on the practice test?!
I just... I don't get it!
jpnChrName: ……なんで順位が１００も落ちてるんだよ…… あ、ありえないだろっ！！
jpnSearchText:
……なんで順位が１００も落ちてるんだよ……
あ、ありえないだろっ！！

engChrName: I'm gonna fail at this rate... I'm gonna FAIL! Why is this happening to me?!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna fail at this rate... I'm gonna FAIL! Why is
this happening to me?!
jpnChrName: このままじゃ合格圏すら…… ……くっ、こんなの認められるかっての！！
jpnSearchText:
このままじゃ合格圏すら……
……くっ、こんなの認められるかっての！！

engChrName: Wh-What's your deal?! Leave me alone!
engSearchText: Wh-What's your deal?! Leave me alone!
jpnChrName: な、なんだよアンタ──ほっとけよっ！！
jpnSearchText: な、なんだよアンタ──ほっとけよっ！！

engChrName: Mom'll be unbearable if she finds out... I gotta find a way around that. Maybe a little white lie...
engSearchText:
Mom'll be unbearable if she finds out... I gotta find a
way around that. Maybe a little white lie...
jpnChrName: 母さんに知れたら面倒だ…… ……どうにか誤魔化さないと……ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
母さんに知れたら面倒だ……
……どうにか誤魔化さないと……ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: Geez... Why did this practice test feel so much harder than the other ones?
engSearchText:
Geez... Why did this practice test feel so much harder
than the other ones?
jpnChrName: うーん、おかしいな…… この前の模試、想像以上に難しかったような……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、おかしいな……
この前の模試、想像以上に難しかったような……

engChrName: But, well, I guess I should've expected that from Aramis. I can't let it get to me!
engSearchText:
But, well, I guess I should've expected that
from Aramis. I can't let it get to me!
jpnChrName: ま、まあ名門アラミスともなれば当然か。 ──ハハ、弱気になるなっての！
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ名門アラミスともなれば当然か。
──ハハ、弱気になるなっての！

engChrName: The test results should be posted soon, and then I can use that to fine tune my strat for the real exam.
engSearchText:
The test results should be posted soon, and then I can
use that to fine tune my strat for the real exam.
jpnChrName: そろそろ結果が届くだろうし、 それを元に本試対策を完璧に練らないとな……！
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ結果が届くだろうし、
それを元に本試対策を完璧に練らないとな……！

engChrName: My first choice is the Aramis Academy. I mean, where else? It's the best high school in the capital.
engSearchText:
My first choice is the Aramis Academy. I mean,
where else? It's the best high school in the capital.
jpnChrName: 僕の第一志望は共和国きっての名門校── そう、あの《アラミス高等学校（エコール・ド・アラミス）》さ。
jpnSearchText:
僕の第一志望は共和国きっての名門校──
そう、あの《アラミス高等学校（エコール・ド・アラミス）》さ。

engChrName: Not that I'd expect common folk to know much about it. It's where the brightest stars like me go to hone their skills.
engSearchText:
Not that I'd expect common folk to know much
about it. It's where the brightest stars like me go to
hone their skills.
jpnChrName: ま、当然だろ？　僕は優秀だからな。 あんたら庶民には雲の上の話かもしれないが──
jpnSearchText:
ま、当然だろ？　僕は優秀だからな。
あんたら庶民には雲の上の話かもしれないが──

engChrName: ...Huh? Wh-What is it?
engSearchText: ...Huh? Wh-What is it?
jpnChrName: って、ん？　な、なんだよ……？
jpnSearchText: って、ん？　な、なんだよ……？

engChrName: Oh, don't mind me. (So he's studying for Aramis' entrance exam?)
engSearchText:
Oh, don't mind me.
(So he's studying for Aramis' entrance exam?)
jpnChrName: あはは、いえ…… （アラミス志望の受験生だったんですね。）
jpnSearchText:
あはは、いえ……
（アラミス志望の受験生だったんですね。）

engChrName: (Could this be that 'big fish in a small pond' thing I heard once?)
engSearchText:
(Could this be that 'big fish in a small pond' thing I
heard once?)
jpnChrName: （うーん、これはもしかして   『井の中の蛙』という奴でしょうか！）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、これはもしかして
『井の中の蛙』という奴でしょうか！）

engChrName: What are you—what's with that smug look on your face? I... Err, never mind.
engSearchText:
What are you—what's with that smug look on
your face? I... Err, never mind.
jpnChrName: み、妙に楽しそうな反応だな…… まあいいけど……
jpnSearchText:
み、妙に楽しそうな反応だな……
まあいいけど……

engChrName: Just make sure you don't mix me up with the common dregs. I'm not an ordinary kid!
engSearchText:
Just make sure you don't mix me up with the
common dregs. I'm not an ordinary kid!
jpnChrName: ともかくそこらの一般人とは格が違うんだ。 あんたらも弁（わきま）えておけよな。
jpnSearchText:
ともかくそこらの一般人とは格が違うんだ。
あんたらも弁（わきま）えておけよな。

engChrName: Dad's finally stopped getting on my case, so now I can focus on studying.
engSearchText:
Dad's finally stopped getting on my case, so now I
can focus on studying.
jpnChrName: やっと親父もあの辛気臭い顔を 見せなくなったし、これで勉強に集中できるよ。
jpnSearchText:
やっと親父もあの辛気臭い顔を
見せなくなったし、これで勉強に集中できるよ。

engChrName: Heh, it was really nice giving him a taste of his own medicine. 'You're annoying' was all it took!
engSearchText:
Heh, it was really nice giving him a taste of his
own medicine. 'You're annoying' was all it took!
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、『アンタが家にいると迷惑』って ハッキリ言ってやって正解だったな。
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、『アンタが家にいると迷惑』って
ハッキリ言ってやって正解だったな。

engChrName: I can't let anything distract me on the road to Aramis—not even my parents.
engSearchText:
I can't let anything distract me on the road to
Aramis—not even my parents.
jpnChrName: 僕が狙うのはあのアラミスなんだ。 ジャマな要因は排除して当然だろ？
jpnSearchText:
僕が狙うのはあのアラミスなんだ。
ジャマな要因は排除して当然だろ？

engChrName: Huh? What is WITH you? Do you just go sneaking into people's houses for fun?
engSearchText:
Huh? What is WITH you? Do you just go sneaking
into people's houses for fun?
jpnChrName: え？　何だよあんたたち…… ウチにずかずか入ってきたわけ？
jpnSearchText:
え？　何だよあんたたち……
ウチにずかずか入ってきたわけ？

engChrName: Well, whatever. Just don't interrupt my studies, okay?
engSearchText: Well, whatever. Just don't interrupt my studies, okay?
jpnChrName: ──まあいいけどさ、この僕の勉強の 邪魔だけはしないでよね。
jpnSearchText:
──まあいいけどさ、この僕の勉強の
邪魔だけはしないでよね。

engChrName: I've already got two helicopters bugging me, I don't need a third.
engSearchText:
I've already got two helicopters bugging me, I don't
need a third.
jpnChrName: ただでさえ出来の悪い両親をもって 苦労してるんだからさぁ、分かるよね？
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえ出来の悪い両親をもって
苦労してるんだからさぁ、分かるよね？

engChrName: These walls and floors are paper thin. I can hear everything down there... How am I supposed to study when everybody and their mother is interrupting me?!
engSearchText:
These walls and floors are paper thin. I can hear
everything down there... How am I supposed to study
when everybody and their mother is interrupting me?!
jpnChrName: こんなボロ屋じゃ、一階の声が丸聞こえだよ。 ……まったく受験前になんでこんな事に………
jpnSearchText:
こんなボロ屋じゃ、一階の声が丸聞こえだよ。
……まったく受験前になんでこんな事に………

engChrName: *sigh* Those two are so freakin' annoying! It's their fault if I fail the exam!
engSearchText:
*sigh* Those two are so freakin' annoying! It's their
fault if I fail the exam!
jpnChrName: ハァ～あの二人、マジでウザッ！ 僕が受験に失敗したら責任取って欲しいよね。
jpnSearchText:
ハァ～あの二人、マジでウザッ！
僕が受験に失敗したら責任取って欲しいよね。

engChrName: When... How long HAS it been since we last ate together, actually?
engSearchText:
When... How long HAS it been since we last ate
together, actually?
jpnChrName: う、うーむ、家族で食事…… 何年振りになるか……
jpnSearchText:
う、うーむ、家族で食事……
何年振りになるか……

engChrName: (I suppose I only have myself to blame. I've been crunching for years now...)
engSearchText:
(I suppose I only have myself to blame. I've been
crunching for years now...)
jpnChrName: （思えば俺も、家族など放ったらかしで   仕事三昧じゃったからな……）
jpnSearchText:
（思えば俺も、家族など放ったらかしで
仕事三昧じゃったからな……）

engChrName: (All of that just to be rewarded with a demotion. Am... Am I the real problem?)
engSearchText:
(All of that just to be rewarded with a demotion.
Am... Am I the real problem?)
jpnChrName: （その上、下手を打って左遷──   家族には迷惑ばかりかけていたのかもな……）
jpnSearchText:
（その上、下手を打って左遷──
家族には迷惑ばかりかけていたのかもな……）

engChrName: So, bud, how are, umm...how are your grades?
engSearchText: So, bud, how are, umm...how are your grades?
jpnChrName: その……なんだ。 今の成績はどんなものなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
その……なんだ。
今の成績はどんなものなんだ？

engChrName: Er, no, no, that's not what I should be talking about.
engSearchText: Er, no, no, that's not what I should be talking about.
jpnChrName: って、違うな…… こういう話をしたいんじゃないんだが。
jpnSearchText:
って、違うな……
こういう話をしたいんじゃないんだが。

engChrName: I just don't really know where to start...
engSearchText: I just don't really know where to start...
jpnChrName: 改まると、どう話を切り出していいのか……
jpnSearchText: 改まると、どう話を切り出していいのか……

engChrName: I get off work early and come here to recharge after a day in a new office...
engSearchText:
I get off work early and come here to recharge after a
day in a new office...
jpnChrName: 不慣れな子会社勤めの疲れを癒すために 早めの食事に来てみれば……
jpnSearchText:
不慣れな子会社勤めの疲れを癒すために
早めの食事に来てみれば……

engChrName: ...and I immediately hear about my boy causing trouble?
engSearchText:
...and I immediately hear about my boy
causing trouble?
jpnChrName: まさか息子の醜態を 聞かされることになるとはな！
jpnSearchText:
まさか息子の醜態を
聞かされることになるとはな！

engChrName: What in the world is Zora doing?! I swear, that boy's lording over her!
engSearchText:
What in the world is Zora doing?! I swear, that boy's
lording over her!
jpnChrName: 全く、ふんぞり返っている癖に ゾーラは何をしとるんだか……！
jpnSearchText:
全く、ふんぞり返っている癖に
ゾーラは何をしとるんだか……！

engChrName: Ahh... Montmart hits the spot every single time.
engSearchText: Ahh... Montmart hits the spot every single time.
jpnChrName: ふう……やはり モンマルトで取る食事は格別だな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……やはり
モンマルトで取る食事は格別だな。

engChrName: All my exhaustion from work just gets washed away.
engSearchText: All my exhaustion from work just gets washed away.
jpnChrName: 仕事の疲れも吹き飛ぶようだ。
jpnSearchText: 仕事の疲れも吹き飛ぶようだ。

engChrName: Ahh... Montmart hits the spot every single time.
engSearchText: Ahh... Montmart hits the spot every single time.
jpnChrName: ふう……やはり モンマルトで取る食事は格別だな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……やはり
モンマルトで取る食事は格別だな。

engChrName: All my exhaustion from work just gets washed away.
engSearchText: All my exhaustion from work just gets washed away.
jpnChrName: 仕事の疲れも吹き飛ぶようだ。
jpnSearchText: 仕事の疲れも吹き飛ぶようだ。

engChrName: That annoying little...buzzard! Zora drives me up the wall... This is MY house.
engSearchText:
That annoying little...buzzard! Zora drives me up
the wall... This is MY house.
jpnChrName: フン、ゾーラのヤツ、狼狽えておるな。 じゃがここは俺の家じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、ゾーラのヤツ、狼狽えておるな。
じゃがここは俺の家じゃ。

engChrName: I put up with her, so she can stand to put up with me!
engSearchText: I put up with her, so she can stand to put up with me!
jpnChrName: いくら居心地が悪かろうが 知ったこっちゃないわ～い！！
jpnSearchText:
いくら居心地が悪かろうが
知ったこっちゃないわ～い！！

engChrName: Harumph! Neither Zora nor Curtis give a damn what their breadwinner thinks.
engSearchText:
Harumph! Neither Zora nor Curtis give a damn
what their breadwinner thinks.
jpnChrName: ゾーラもカーチスも…… どうせ俺の気持ちなんぞ……フンッ！
jpnSearchText:
ゾーラもカーチスも……
どうせ俺の気持ちなんぞ……フンッ！

engChrName: Nobody does, I swear! Drives me mad!
engSearchText: Nobody does, I swear! Drives me mad!
jpnChrName: どうせ誰も俺の気持ちなんぞ……フンッ！
jpnSearchText: どうせ誰も俺の気持ちなんぞ……フンッ！

engChrName: Incidentally, where HAS that boy run off to?
engSearchText: Incidentally, where HAS that boy run off to?
jpnChrName: ……そういえば…… カーチスはどこに行ったんじゃ？
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば……
カーチスはどこに行ったんじゃ？

engChrName: I haven't seen him around lately... Well, whatever. As if I care.
engSearchText:
I haven't seen him around lately... Well, whatever.
As if I care.
jpnChrName: ここの所姿を見んが…… まあいいか、俺の知ったことではないしな！
jpnSearchText:
ここの所姿を見んが……
まあいいか、俺の知ったことではないしな！

engChrName: I come home after my first day of work and Zora just brushes me off!
engSearchText:
I come home after my first day of work and Zora just
brushes me off!
jpnChrName: ……初出勤を終えて帰ってみれば、 ゾーラめ、完全に俺の存在を無視しおって……
jpnSearchText:
……初出勤を終えて帰ってみれば、
ゾーラめ、完全に俺の存在を無視しおって……

engChrName: Harumph! Fine, then! If she doesn't wanna talk to her husband, I don't wanna talk to my wife!
engSearchText:
Harumph! Fine, then! If she doesn't wanna talk to
her husband, I don't wanna talk to my wife!
jpnChrName: フン、そっちがその気なら こっちも好きにさせてもらうわい……！
jpnSearchText:
フン、そっちがその気なら
こっちも好きにさせてもらうわい……！

engChrName: Maybe I'll just take the damned living room for myself, see what she thinks of that!
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll just take the damned living room for
myself, see what she thinks of that!
jpnChrName: こうしてリビングを占領し続けてやる。 せいぜい居心地悪くなるがいいわ……！
jpnSearchText:
こうしてリビングを占領し続けてやる。
せいぜい居心地悪くなるがいいわ……！

engChrName: Curtis barely shows his face around here these days...
engSearchText: Curtis barely shows his face around here these days...
jpnChrName: カーチスのやつも最近は滅多に顔を見せんし……
jpnSearchText: カーチスのやつも最近は滅多に顔を見せんし……

engChrName: Hmph! Kid wants to blow me off, I'll give him the cold shoulder too!
engSearchText:
Hmph! Kid wants to blow me off, I'll give him the
cold shoulder too!
jpnChrName: フ、フン！　俺も好きにさせてもらうからな！
jpnSearchText: フ、フン！　俺も好きにさせてもらうからな！

engChrName: Whyyyyy...?! I was such a good cheeef...
engSearchText: Whyyyyy...?! I was such a good cheeef...
jpnChrName: オレぁ……ビンワンゆーしカチョー…… ………むにゃむにゃ………
jpnSearchText:
オレぁ……ビンワンゆーしカチョー……
………むにゃむにゃ………

engChrName: I'll be out of house arrest, soon... Then I gotta go work.
engSearchText:
I'll be out of house arrest, soon... Then I gotta
go work.
jpnChrName: もうすぐ自宅謹慎が解けて 出勤日が来るんだが……
jpnSearchText:
もうすぐ自宅謹慎が解けて
出勤日が来るんだが……

engChrName: ...Perish the thought. Just thinking about it terrifies me.
engSearchText:
...Perish the thought. Just thinking about it
terrifies me.
jpnChrName: ……そのな、逆に怖いというか……
jpnSearchText: ……そのな、逆に怖いというか……

engChrName: They didn't fire me...but my career's over. I'm back down to some subsidiary branch now...
engSearchText:
They didn't fire me...but my career's over. I'm back
down to some subsidiary branch now...
jpnChrName: 解雇はされなかったものの 子会社に左遷されてしまったわけだしな……
jpnSearchText:
解雇はされなかったものの
子会社に左遷されてしまったわけだしな……

engChrName: Urgh... Why's my heart beating so fast?
engSearchText: Urgh... Why's my heart beating so fast?
jpnChrName: ううむ……流石にドキドキするぞ……
jpnSearchText: ううむ……流石にドキドキするぞ……

engChrName: Roman, I think you've had quite enough.
engSearchText: Roman, I think you've had quite enough.
jpnChrName: ローマンさん、もうこれくらいで……
jpnSearchText: ローマンさん、もうこれくらいで……

engChrName: You should go home and get some rest, okay? Let me get you some water.
engSearchText:
You should go home and get some rest, okay? Let me
get you some water.
jpnChrName: 今日はもう帰られた方がいいわ。 ……今お水をお持ちしますね。
jpnSearchText:
今日はもう帰られた方がいいわ。
……今お水をお持ちしますね。

engChrName: I'm fiiine! Lemme drink a libble mo-*hic* Bwuh...
engSearchText: I'm fiiine! Lemme drink a libble mo-*hic* Bwuh...
jpnChrName: ンン～っ！！　俺ァ、だ、大丈夫だぁ……！
jpnSearchText: ンン～っ！！　俺ァ、だ、大丈夫だぁ……！

engChrName: I AIN'T! I ain't no dru... *buuurp*
engSearchText: I AIN'T! I ain't no dru... *buuurp*
jpnChrName: 酔ってなんれないろ～～！！
jpnSearchText: 酔ってなんれないろ～～！！

engChrName: I just cand... I cand deal with it! The gossip rags're just LYIN' about ebrythin...
engSearchText:
I just cand... I cand deal with it! The gossip rags're
just LYIN' about ebrythin...
jpnChrName: ……ヒック………どいつもこいつも…… ゴシップ紙もこぞって書きたてやがって……
jpnSearchText:
……ヒック………どいつもこいつも……
ゴシップ紙もこぞって書きたてやがって……

engChrName: Whuh? Who're you? You gobba... Gotta PROBLEM, huh? Zaddit?
engSearchText:
Whuh? Who're you? You gobba...
Gotta PROBLEM, huh? Zaddit?
jpnChrName: なんだァ？　俺に文句でもあんのかァ！？
jpnSearchText: なんだァ？　俺に文句でもあんのかァ！？

engChrName: (Damn. Middle of the day and he's down for the count.)
engSearchText:
(Damn. Middle of the day and he's down for
the count.)
jpnChrName: （おーおー、昼間から出来上がってるねぇ。）
jpnSearchText: （おーおー、昼間から出来上がってるねぇ。）

engChrName: (Wasn't he here the other day, too? Will he be all right?)
engSearchText:
(Wasn't he here the other day, too? Will he be
all right?)
jpnChrName: （この方、先日から入り浸ってるみたいですが   大丈夫なのでしょうか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（この方、先日から入り浸ってるみたいですが
大丈夫なのでしょうか……？）

engChrName: This suuucks, man... I'm just cooped up at home wasting away. *sigh* I gotta start doing something. All the time in the world, for better or worse.
engSearchText:
This suuucks, man... I'm just cooped up at home
wasting away. *sigh* I gotta start doing something.
All the time in the world, for better or worse.
jpnChrName: ど～せしばらくは自宅謹慎だからな。 ……ハッ……どこで何をしようが俺の勝手だろうよ……
jpnSearchText:
ど～せしばらくは自宅謹慎だからな。
……ハッ……どこで何をしようが俺の勝手だろうよ……

engChrName: Aidios, what a dump. People like me don't belong here... How'd I just go from riches to rags like this?
engSearchText:
Aidios, what a dump. People like me don't
belong here... How'd I just go from riches to rags
like this?
jpnChrName: ハッ……しかし薄汚い町並みだ。 ……この俺が旧市街なんぞに身を落とすとはな……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……しかし薄汚い町並みだ。
……この俺が旧市街なんぞに身を落とすとはな……

engChrName: And who does my wife think she is, treating me like a pest in my own house?! Who funded her lifestyle? Who supported her kid?!
engSearchText:
And who does my wife think she is, treating me like a
pest in my own house?! Who funded her lifestyle?
Who supported her kid?!
jpnChrName: おまけに家族にも厄介者扱い…… 今まで誰のお陰で裕福な暮らしを──！
jpnSearchText:
おまけに家族にも厄介者扱い……
今まで誰のお陰で裕福な暮らしを──！

engChrName: ...Tch. Barely even matters now... It's just me out here. All my crunching, all my work, and I have nothing to show for it...
engSearchText:
...Tch. Barely even matters now... It's just me
out here. All my crunching, all my work, and I have
nothing to show for it...
jpnChrName: ハッ、もはやどうでもいい話か…… ……俺は一体、今まで何をしてきたんだろうな……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、もはやどうでもいい話か……
……俺は一体、今まで何をしてきたんだろうな……

engChrName: BWAAAHAAAAAH! Damn it all! Why'd this have to happen to me?!
engSearchText:
BWAAAHAAAAAH! Damn it all! Why'd
this have to happen to me?!
jpnChrName: ぷは～～～～っ！！ ……クソッ……どうして全部俺の責任なんだ……っ！
jpnSearchText:
ぷは～～～～っ！！
……クソッ……どうして全部俺の責任なんだ……っ！

engChrName: *hic* I'm NOT standin' for it! Demotion, my ass! They can sssuck my... My— *burp*
engSearchText:
*hic* I'm NOT standin' for it! Demotion, my ass!
They can sssuck my... My— *burp*
jpnChrName: ヒック、ふ、ふざけんなよおっ！？ なにが謹慎処分だ……なにが子会社に左遷だぁ！！
jpnSearchText:
ヒック、ふ、ふざけんなよおっ！？
なにが謹慎処分だ……なにが子会社に左遷だぁ！！

engChrName: (Oh, dear... I think he's had a bit much to drink.)
engSearchText: (Oh, dear... I think he's had a bit much to drink.)
jpnChrName: （うぅ……お酒臭いです……）
jpnSearchText: （うぅ……お酒臭いです……）

engChrName: (Guess work went south or somethin'.)
engSearchText: (Guess work went south or somethin'.)
jpnChrName: （ふ～ん？　仕事で何かあったようだが……）
jpnSearchText: （ふ～ん？　仕事で何かあったようだが……）

engChrName: Well, umm... Dinner's ready...
engSearchText: Well, umm... Dinner's ready...
jpnChrName: と、とりあえず夕食を……
jpnSearchText: と、とりあえず夕食を……

engChrName: (I know we have to talk this over as a family, but how do we even begin to unpack it all...?)
engSearchText:
(I know we have to talk this over as a family, but how
do we even begin to unpack it all...?)
jpnChrName: （家族で話し合う事にしたのですけれど……   ど、どう話したらいいのやら……）
jpnSearchText:
（家族で話し合う事にしたのですけれど……
ど、どう話したらいいのやら……）

engChrName: (Especially when I'm the one who pushed Curtis that far...)
engSearchText:
(Especially when I'm the one who pushed Curtis
that far...)
jpnChrName: （カーチスをここまで追い詰めていたのは   わたくし……ですものね……）
jpnSearchText:
（カーチスをここまで追い詰めていたのは
わたくし……ですものね……）

engChrName: A-Anyway, I have to get dinner ready.
engSearchText: A-Anyway, I have to get dinner ready.
jpnChrName: と、とりあえずわたくしは 夕食の準備をしないといけませんわね。
jpnSearchText:
と、とりあえずわたくしは
夕食の準備をしないといけませんわね。

engChrName: Let's discuss this over dinner, okay?
engSearchText: Let's discuss this over dinner, okay?
jpnChrName: 話し合いは晩ご飯の時にしましょう。
jpnSearchText: 話し合いは晩ご飯の時にしましょう。

engChrName: Well, I'll go ahead and get dinner ready. Your report will get here when it gets here.
engSearchText:
Well, I'll go ahead and get dinner ready. Your report
will get here when it gets here.
jpnChrName: とりあえず夕食の準備をしながら 報告を待たせてもらうわね。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず夕食の準備をしながら
報告を待たせてもらうわね。

engChrName: *sigh* What kind of wretch would give Curtis those ghastly pills?
engSearchText:
*sigh* What kind of wretch would give Curtis those
ghastly pills?
jpnChrName: はぁ……きっと不良がカーチスに あのタブレットを勧めたのよ。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……きっと不良がカーチスに
あのタブレットを勧めたのよ。

engChrName: Surely my poor, innocent boy wouldn't stoop that low! He must have been coerced!
engSearchText:
Surely my poor, innocent boy wouldn't stoop
that low! He must have been coerced!
jpnChrName: ええ、そうに違いないわ…… だってあの子が自分から不良になるだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そうに違いないわ……
だってあの子が自分から不良になるだなんて……

engChrName: *sigh* When are the fixers coming?
engSearchText: *sigh* When are the fixers coming?
jpnChrName: ふぅ……解決屋さんは いつ来てくれるのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……解決屋さんは
いつ来てくれるのかしら。

engChrName: I'm just beside myself... I need to sort this out with Curtis as soon as I can.
engSearchText:
I'm just beside myself... I need to sort this out with
Curtis as soon as I can.
jpnChrName: 不安だわ……カーチスに何があったのか 早く調べないといけないのに……
jpnSearchText:
不安だわ……カーチスに何があったのか
早く調べないといけないのに……

engChrName: (Fixers, eh? I look 'em over on the bulletin board or somethin'?)
engSearchText:
(Fixers, eh? I look 'em over on the bulletin board
or somethin'?)
jpnChrName: （おっと、解決屋だと？ 　……確認してねえ掲示板でもあったか。）
jpnSearchText:
（おっと、解決屋だと？
　……確認してねえ掲示板でもあったか。）

engChrName: How...? How did an entire village vanish like that? I never thought the horrors from two years ago would surface again...
engSearchText:
How...? How did an entire village vanish like that?
I never thought the horrors from two years ago would
surface again...
jpnChrName: む、村が１つ消えるだなんて…… ……まさか２年前の“あの時”みたいな……
jpnSearchText:
む、村が１つ消えるだなんて……
……まさか２年前の“あの時”みたいな……

engChrName: Just what is the army doing? Don't tell me they'll have the city locked down all the way through the rest of exam season...
engSearchText:
Just what is the army doing? Don't tell me they'll have
the city locked down all the way through the rest of
exam season...
jpnChrName: ぐ、軍は何をしているのかしら…… まさかこのまま、カーチスの受験日まで……
jpnSearchText:
ぐ、軍は何をしているのかしら……
まさかこのまま、カーチスの受験日まで……

engChrName: My word! Just, anything but that!
engSearchText: My word! Just, anything but that!
jpnChrName: ああもう、それだけは 絶対に許しませんわよ──っ！？
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、それだけは
絶対に許しませんわよ──っ！？

engChrName: Curtis lashed out at me... He said I was a distraction. He doesn't want me to enter his room and break his concentration.
engSearchText:
Curtis lashed out at me... He said I was a distraction.
He doesn't want me to enter his room and break
his concentration.
jpnChrName: カーチスに、集中力が切れるから 部屋に入るなって言われてしまったんですの。
jpnSearchText:
カーチスに、集中力が切れるから
部屋に入るなって言われてしまったんですの。

engChrName: I feel hurt... My poor boy...
engSearchText: I feel hurt... My poor boy...
jpnChrName: あの子ったら冷たい事……
jpnSearchText: あの子ったら冷たい事……

engChrName: But, well, his grades have markedly improved as of late. Perhaps that truly is what he needed.
engSearchText:
But, well, his grades have markedly improved as
of late. Perhaps that truly is what he needed.
jpnChrName: でも、成績もかなり上がってますし。 しばらくは様子を見るとしましょうか♪
jpnSearchText:
でも、成績もかなり上がってますし。
しばらくは様子を見るとしましょうか♪

engChrName: That said, if his grades fall again, he can bet I'll be back in there.
engSearchText:
That said, if his grades fall again, he can bet I'll be
back in there.
jpnChrName: また成績が下がるようならわたくしが じっくり見てあげれば良いだけでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
また成績が下がるようならわたくしが
じっくり見てあげれば良いだけでしょう。

engChrName: Who does he think he is, just lazing about in the living room? What a cockroach.
engSearchText:
Who does he think he is, just lazing about in the
living room? What a cockroach.
jpnChrName: ……それにしても…… リビングでふんぞり返っている人、邪魔ですわね～？
jpnSearchText:
……それにしても……
リビングでふんぞり返っている人、邪魔ですわね～？

engChrName: He can prance about and bang his chest all he pleases, but he won't get so much as a glass of water from me.
engSearchText:
He can prance about and bang his chest all he pleases,
but he won't get so much as a glass of water from me.
jpnChrName: 偉そうな顔をしても、水一杯 出すつもりはありませんから。
jpnSearchText:
偉そうな顔をしても、水一杯
出すつもりはありませんから。

engChrName: Hmph! Sometimes I wonder how I fell in love with that man to begin with.
engSearchText:
Hmph! Sometimes I wonder how I fell in love with
that man to begin with.
jpnChrName: フンッ！　早く引っ込んでほしいものですわね！
jpnSearchText: フンッ！　早く引っ込んでほしいものですわね！

engChrName: I'm happy to see Curtis is studying well.
engSearchText: I'm happy to see Curtis is studying well.
jpnChrName: ふふ、カーチスもようやく 調子が出てきたようですわねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、カーチスもようやく
調子が出てきたようですわねぇ！

engChrName: I'd expect no less from my son, heehee! I'm sure he'll pass Aramis' entrance exam with flying colors!
engSearchText:
I'd expect no less from my son, heehee! I'm sure he'll
pass Aramis' entrance exam with flying colors!
jpnChrName: それでこそわたくしの息子…… アラミスにだって合格して当然なのです！
jpnSearchText:
それでこそわたくしの息子……
アラミスにだって合格して当然なのです！

engChrName: And my husband's finally gotten his lazy bum to work, too! Oh, I'm just over the moon!
engSearchText:
And my husband's finally gotten his lazy bum to
work, too! Oh, I'm just over the moon!
jpnChrName: 主人もようやく会社に行ったようですし、 実に晴れやかな気分ですわ……！
jpnSearchText:
主人もようやく会社に行ったようですし、
実に晴れやかな気分ですわ……！

engChrName: Mmgh... I wish that sad sack in the living room would get up and move.
engSearchText:
Mmgh... I wish that sad sack in the living room
would get up and move.
jpnChrName: あ～邪魔ですわね、あのリビングにいる人！
jpnSearchText: あ～邪魔ですわね、あのリビングにいる人！

engChrName: Who does he take himself for? He only has himself to blame for his demotion—no sob story will change his fortunes!
engSearchText:
Who does he take himself for? He only has himself to
blame for his demotion—no sob story will change
his fortunes!
jpnChrName: エラソーに、仕事帰りがなんですの？ 子会社に飛ばされた分際で──
jpnSearchText:
エラソーに、仕事帰りがなんですの？
子会社に飛ばされた分際で──

engChrName: If he's so content to just drift in the doldrums of mediocrity, then why should I placate him? He should make himself useful and leave!
engSearchText:
If he's so content to just drift in the doldrums of
mediocrity, then why should I placate him?
He should make himself useful and leave!
jpnChrName: どうせ窓際族なんですから、せめて 視界に入らないようにして欲しいですわね！
jpnSearchText:
どうせ窓際族なんですから、せめて
視界に入らないようにして欲しいですわね！

engChrName: It simply baffles me. I've been keeping an eye on Curtis and his studies, but his grades just continue to drop...
engSearchText:
It simply baffles me. I've been keeping an eye on
Curtis and his studies, but his grades just continue
to drop...
jpnChrName: おかしい、おかしいですわ…… 勉強させているのにカーチスの成績が……
jpnSearchText:
おかしい、おかしいですわ……
勉強させているのにカーチスの成績が……

engChrName: Don't tell me he's skipping behind my back? I swear, that boy...!
engSearchText:
Don't tell me he's skipping behind my back? I swear,
that boy...!
jpnChrName: ハッ、もしや隠れてサボっているのかしら！？ なんて事！　あの子ったら──！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、もしや隠れてサボっているのかしら！？
なんて事！　あの子ったら──！

engChrName: That's it! I'm redoubling my efforts—this time, I'll set him straight!
engSearchText:
That's it! I'm redoubling my efforts—this time, I'll set
him straight!
jpnChrName: わたくしの息子だというのに嘆かわしい！ やはりもっと本腰を入れて──！！
jpnSearchText:
わたくしの息子だというのに嘆かわしい！
やはりもっと本腰を入れて──！！

engChrName: Curtis is taking his sweet time... Too much time for a mere study break.
engSearchText:
Curtis is taking his sweet time... Too much time for a
mere study break.
jpnChrName: そういえばカーチスの帰りが遅いわね…… 勉強の息抜きにしては長すぎないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばカーチスの帰りが遅いわね……
勉強の息抜きにしては長すぎないかしら？

engChrName: *sigh* I knew I shouldn't have let him off his leash. The boy just can't take care of himself.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I knew I shouldn't have let him off his leash.
The boy just can't take care of himself.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、やっぱり自由にさせ過ぎたわね。
jpnSearchText: ……ふう、やっぱり自由にさせ過ぎたわね。

engChrName: Starting tomorrow, he needs my permission to leave the house. He can play after he works!
engSearchText:
Starting tomorrow, he needs my permission to leave
the house. He can play after he works!
jpnChrName: 明日からは外出も許可制にして、 もっと本腰を入れて勉強させましょう。
jpnSearchText:
明日からは外出も許可制にして、
もっと本腰を入れて勉強させましょう。

engChrName: That should do the trick, I'm certain of it!
engSearchText: That should do the trick, I'm certain of it!
jpnChrName: ええ、我ながらいい案だわ！
jpnSearchText: ええ、我ながらいい案だわ！

engChrName: My husband has been coming home later and later... but I'm hard-pressed to care.
engSearchText:
My husband has been coming home later and later...
but I'm hard-pressed to care.
jpnChrName: 主人も最近帰りが遅いけれど ……あの人はもはやどうでもいいですわ。
jpnSearchText:
主人も最近帰りが遅いけれど
……あの人はもはやどうでもいいですわ。

engChrName: I can't stand the sorry drivel from that mouth of his. He should either leave his vitriol at the door, or just not come back at all!
engSearchText:
I can't stand the sorry drivel from that mouth of his.
He should either leave his vitriol at the door, or just
not come back at all!
jpnChrName: これ以上私たちの顔に泥を塗らないよう 慎ましく呼吸だけしていてほしいものですわね。
jpnSearchText:
これ以上私たちの顔に泥を塗らないよう
慎ましく呼吸だけしていてほしいものですわね。

engChrName: I was about to go shopping when this woman stopped me.
engSearchText:
I was about to go shopping when this woman
stopped me.
jpnChrName: 買い物に出ようとしたら この方に捕まってしまったのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
買い物に出ようとしたら
この方に捕まってしまったのだけど……

engChrName: I just couldn't get a read on her! Can I really trust her...?
engSearchText:
I just couldn't get a read on her! Can I really trust
her...?
jpnChrName: まさかそんな人物だったなんて…… ……いえでも、信用できるのかしら……！？
jpnSearchText:
まさかそんな人物だったなんて……
……いえでも、信用できるのかしら……！？

engChrName: This is just commendably frustrating... What do I do?!
engSearchText:
This is just commendably frustrating... What do
I do?!
jpnChrName: ううぅ……わたくしは一体どうすれば……！
jpnSearchText: ううぅ……わたくしは一体どうすれば……！

engChrName: My husband had built himself a wonderful career at the Bank of Edith...
engSearchText:
My husband had built himself a wonderful career at
the Bank of Edith...
jpnChrName: ウチの主人は、かの《バンク・オブ・イーディス（ＢｏＥ）》の エリート銀行マンだったのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ウチの主人は、かの《バンク・オブ・イーディス（ＢｏＥ）》の
エリート銀行マンだったのだけど……

engChrName: ...but then, he got himself embroiled in some filthy scandal, and now his career is all but sunk. What a slob!
engSearchText:
...but then, he got himself embroiled in some filthy
scandal, and now his career is all but sunk. What
a slob!
jpnChrName: あろうことか不祥事を起こして、 今は自宅謹慎中の身──本当に情けない限りですわ！
jpnSearchText:
あろうことか不祥事を起こして、
今は自宅謹慎中の身──本当に情けない限りですわ！

engChrName: Now look at us: living in some ramshackle bungalow to escape the prying eyes of the press. How much more will he shame our family?
engSearchText:
Now look at us: living in some ramshackle bungalow
to escape the prying eyes of the press. How much
more will he shame our family?
jpnChrName: 挙句ゴシップ紙から逃げるようにこんなあばら家に…… わたくしにどれだけ恥をかかせるつもりでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
挙句ゴシップ紙から逃げるようにこんなあばら家に……
わたくしにどれだけ恥をかかせるつもりでしょう。

engChrName: Hmph. I need to make sure the boy doesn't follow his example.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I need to make sure the boy doesn't follow
his example.
jpnChrName: フン、あんな大人にはならないよう カーチスにもよく言って聞かせませんと……！
jpnSearchText:
フン、あんな大人にはならないよう
カーチスにもよく言って聞かせませんと……！

engChrName: I see my husband has taken to public drunkenness now...
engSearchText:
I see my husband has taken to public
drunkenness now...
jpnChrName: ……主人は最近、 昼間から飲み歩いているようですわ。
jpnSearchText:
……主人は最近、
昼間から飲み歩いているようですわ。

engChrName: Hmph. I don't know him anymore. He should count himself lucky that I'm not filing divorce papers!
engSearchText:
Hmph. I don't know him anymore. He should count
himself lucky that I'm not filing divorce papers!
jpnChrName: 本当に愛想が尽きますわ…… 離婚しないだけ感謝して欲しいですわね！！
jpnSearchText:
本当に愛想が尽きますわ……
離婚しないだけ感謝して欲しいですわね！！

engChrName: Y-Yes?! What is it?
engSearchText: Y-Yes?! What is it?
jpnChrName: ……な、なにかご用かしらっ！？
jpnSearchText: ……な、なにかご用かしらっ！？

engChrName: Are you from the neighborhood? Sorry, but I'd rather you not consider me your neighbor. I'm not like you Old Town dregs.
engSearchText:
Are you from the neighborhood? Sorry, but I'd rather
you not consider me your neighbor. I'm not like you
Old Town dregs.
jpnChrName: 近所のどなたかかしらね？ 生憎、旧市街の住民と関わる気はありませんの。
jpnSearchText:
近所のどなたかかしらね？
生憎、旧市街の住民と関わる気はありませんの。

engChrName: Now, begone! Leave me be!
engSearchText: Now, begone! Leave me be!
jpnChrName: とっとと立ち去ってくださいな！
jpnSearchText: とっとと立ち去ってくださいな！

engChrName: (Should we, erm, leave her be?)
engSearchText: (Should we, erm, leave her be?)
jpnChrName: （え、えっと……   あまりお邪魔しない方が良さそうですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（え、えっと……
あまりお邪魔しない方が良さそうですね。）

engChrName: (Yeah. I think her family just moved here... At any rate, not our job to unpack their baggage.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah. I think her family just moved here... At any
rate, not our job to unpack their baggage.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ、確か最近引っ越してきた一家だったか。   ……色々抱えてるみたいだねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ、確か最近引っ越してきた一家だったか。
……色々抱えてるみたいだねぇ。）

engChrName: Why, oh, why must I suffer so...?
engSearchText: Why, oh, why must I suffer so...?
