jpnChrName: それにしても何故わたくしがこんな惨めな目に……
jpnSearchText: それにしても何故わたくしがこんな惨めな目に……

engChrName: I have to at least make sure Curtis passes his exams... *mumble* *mumble*
engSearchText:
I have to at least make sure Curtis passes his exams...
*mumble* *mumble*
jpnChrName: ……ぶつぶつ……せめてカーチスの受験だけは しっかりやり遂げませんと……！
jpnSearchText:
……ぶつぶつ……せめてカーチスの受験だけは
しっかりやり遂げませんと……！

engChrName: You see, Curtis, your papa got to where he was by working long and hard, just like your studying.
engSearchText:
You see, Curtis, your papa got to where he was by
working long and hard, just like your studying.
jpnChrName: ……カーチス、父さんはな。 お前みたいに猛勉強して高給取りになった。
jpnSearchText:
……カーチス、父さんはな。
お前みたいに猛勉強して高給取りになった。

engChrName: But I can't say for certain that doing so brought me happiness. It distracted me from my family, from...you.
engSearchText:
But I can't say for certain that doing so brought
me happiness. It distracted me from my family,
from...you.
jpnChrName: だがそれで幸せになれたかというと ──正直、結局の所は分からん。
jpnSearchText:
だがそれで幸せになれたかというと
──正直、結局の所は分からん。

engChrName: So... I don't want you to follow in my footsteps.
engSearchText: So... I don't want you to follow in my footsteps.
jpnChrName: だからな、お前は 父さんみたいにならなくてもいいぞ。
jpnSearchText:
だからな、お前は
父さんみたいにならなくてもいいぞ。

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!

engChrName: I... Wha...? Th-There's only a month and a half until the entrance exam! What am I supposed to do?!
engSearchText:
I... Wha...? Th-There's only a month and a half until
the entrance exam! What am I supposed to do?!
jpnChrName: 急に何言ってるのさ、父さん！ 受験日まであと一月半なんだぜ！？
jpnSearchText:
急に何言ってるのさ、父さん！
受験日まであと一月半なんだぜ！？

engChrName: I can't just stop now! That's not fair! C-C'mon, Mom, you agree, don't you?!
engSearchText:
I can't just stop now! That's not fair!
C-C'mon, Mom, you agree, don't you?!
jpnChrName: イマサラそんな事──勝手すぎるだろ！！ ……なあ母さん！？
jpnSearchText:
イマサラそんな事──勝手すぎるだろ！！
……なあ母さん！？

engChrName: Well, honey, I'm...not so sure, myself.
engSearchText: Well, honey, I'm...not so sure, myself.
jpnChrName: カーチス……その…… ママもよく分からないのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
カーチス……その……
ママもよく分からないのだけど……

engChrName: I owe you an apology... After talking with some friends, I've realized that I was much too pushy about your studies.
engSearchText:
I owe you an apology... After talking with some
friends, I've realized that I was much too pushy about
your studies.
jpnChrName: 色々な人と話して気づいたの…… ママ、貴方にうるさく言い過ぎてたかもって。
jpnSearchText:
色々な人と話して気づいたの……
ママ、貴方にうるさく言い過ぎてたかもって。

engChrName: I think it might be best if you decide what you want for yourself. I know it's a lot to ask, but...it's clear I haven't been helping you.
engSearchText:
I think it might be best if you decide what you want
for yourself. I know it's a lot to ask, but...it's clear I
haven't been helping you.
jpnChrName: だからね、しばらく何も言わない事にするわ。 自分の事は自分で考えてみて頂戴。
jpnSearchText:
だからね、しばらく何も言わない事にするわ。
自分の事は自分で考えてみて頂戴。

engChrName: Wha—you, too?! I... What the hell?!
engSearchText: Wha—you, too?! I... What the hell?!
jpnChrName: ……っ……母さんまで……… な、なんだよそれええっ！！
jpnSearchText:
……っ……母さんまで………
な、なんだよそれええっ！！

engChrName: Ah, Zora. Would you like to, erm...hit the festival with me?
engSearchText:
Ah, Zora. Would you like to, erm...hit the festival
with me?
jpnChrName: 俺たちは……ゾーラ、記念祭でも回るか。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちは……ゾーラ、記念祭でも回るか。

engChrName: Hmm... Yes, let's. It's been quite some time, hasn't it?
engSearchText: Hmm... Yes, let's. It's been quite some time, hasn't it?
jpnChrName: そ、そうねぇ。 随分と久しぶりだけれど……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうねぇ。
随分と久しぶりだけれど……

engChrName: To think we used to tour the city in an ETWS limo and party our worries away...
engSearchText:
To think we used to tour the city in an ETWS limo
and party our worries away...
jpnChrName: 若い頃は確か、エトワスのリムジンで パーティばかり回っていたかしら。
jpnSearchText:
若い頃は確か、エトワスのリムジンで
パーティばかり回っていたかしら。

engChrName: Quite the socialites, we were...
engSearchText: Quite the socialites, we were...
jpnChrName: お前も相当なお嬢様だったからな……
jpnSearchText: お前も相当なお嬢様だったからな……

engChrName: But perhaps this is what we need. It'll give us some time to think things over—maybe we can figure out where to go from here.
engSearchText:
But perhaps this is what we need. It'll give us some
time to think things over—maybe we can figure out
where to go from here.
jpnChrName: まあ、お互い距離を置いて 考えるにはいい機会かもしれんぞ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、お互い距離を置いて
考えるにはいい機会かもしれんぞ。

engChrName: Curtis? How are your studies going?
engSearchText: Curtis? How are your studies going?
jpnChrName: カーチス～？　お勉強は捗っているかしら？
jpnSearchText: カーチス～？　お勉強は捗っているかしら？

engChrName: ...Only three questions, huh? That won't do, come exam time. You need to figure out how to improve your pace—
engSearchText:
...Only three questions, huh? That won't do, come
exam time. You need to figure out how to improve
your pace—
jpnChrName: あらまだ３問しか進んでないじゃない！？ いいこと、模試も近いのだからもっと真剣に──
jpnSearchText:
あらまだ３問しか進んでないじゃない！？
いいこと、模試も近いのだからもっと真剣に──

engChrName: I-I know, I know! Be quiet!
engSearchText: I-I know, I know! Be quiet!
jpnChrName: う、うるさいなぁ！　分かってるっての！！
jpnSearchText: う、うるさいなぁ！　分かってるっての！！

engChrName: And could you stop peeking in every hour? It's really anno—I mean...it throws me off!
engSearchText:
And could you stop peeking in every hour? It's really
anno—I mean...it throws me off!
jpnChrName: っていうか１時間ごとに見に来るのやめてくんない？ ウザ……じゃなくて気が散って仕方ないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
っていうか１時間ごとに見に来るのやめてくんない？
ウザ……じゃなくて気が散って仕方ないんだけど……

engChrName: I'm just trying to make sure you don't get distracted.
engSearchText: I'm just trying to make sure you don't get distracted.
jpnChrName: カーチス、それは貴方の集中力が足りないからです。
jpnSearchText: カーチス、それは貴方の集中力が足りないからです。

engChrName: I'll bring you a snack if it helps, so keep at it, understood?!
engSearchText:
I'll bring you a snack if it helps, so keep at
it, understood?!
jpnChrName: ママがお夜食を持ってきてあげるから 今夜は頑張りなさい、いいわね！？
jpnSearchText:
ママがお夜食を持ってきてあげるから
今夜は頑張りなさい、いいわね！？

engChrName: (Geez... Mom's really been a pain in the ass lately.)
engSearchText: (Geez... Mom's really been a pain in the ass lately.)
jpnChrName: （チッ、またかよ……   最近の母さん、マジでウザイよなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
（チッ、またかよ……
最近の母さん、マジでウザイよなぁ……）

engChrName: Do you understand me? I expect full marks on your practice test!
engSearchText:
Do you understand me? I expect full marks on your
practice test!
jpnChrName: 分かっているわね？ 次の模試で必ずＡ判定を取ること。
jpnSearchText:
分かっているわね？
次の模試で必ずＡ判定を取ること。

engChrName: This will make or break your future, young man! If nothing else, think of your mother...
engSearchText:
This will make or break your future, young man!
If nothing else, think of your mother...
jpnChrName: あなたの人生にとって一番大事な時期なのです！ ママを安心させるためにも──
jpnSearchText:
あなたの人生にとって一番大事な時期なのです！
ママを安心させるためにも──

engChrName: (Would she shut up?! She's even worse than she usually is... It's driving me up the wall!)
engSearchText:
(Would she shut up?! She's even worse than she
usually is... It's driving me up the wall!)
jpnChrName: （あーウザッ……！   昔からそうだったけど最近酷すぎだろっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（あーウザッ……！
昔からそうだったけど最近酷すぎだろっ！）

engChrName: Ahh, yes. Your family moved here just the other day, if memory serves correct. Quite the change of scenery from your bougie old neighborhood.
engSearchText:
Ahh, yes. Your family moved here just the other day,
if memory serves correct. Quite the change of scenery
from your bougie old neighborhood.
jpnChrName: あらあら、確か先日引っ越してきたご一家の…… 前は５区の高級住宅街に住んでいらしたとか。
jpnSearchText:
あらあら、確か先日引っ越してきたご一家の……
前は５区の高級住宅街に住んでいらしたとか。

engChrName: Now, what could have happened to cause such a drastic change? Folks of your status are a rare sight in Old Town.
engSearchText:
Now, what could have happened to cause such a
drastic change? Folks of your status are a rare sight in
Old Town.
jpnChrName: うふふ、旧市街にいらっしゃるなんて 何か事情がおありなのかしらねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、旧市街にいらっしゃるなんて
何か事情がおありなのかしらねぇ～。

engChrName: E-Err, well, umm...
engSearchText: E-Err, well, umm...
jpnChrName: え、ええまあ……それはその…………
jpnSearchText: え、ええまあ……それはその…………

engChrName: (This old crow has me in her talons. I need to find a way out of here, posthaste...!)
engSearchText:
(This old crow has me in her talons. I need to find a
way out of here, posthaste...!)
jpnChrName: （面倒そうな人に捕まってしまったわね……   どうにか切り抜けませんと……）
jpnSearchText:
（面倒そうな人に捕まってしまったわね……
どうにか切り抜けませんと……）

engChrName: It might surprise you to learn that I used to be a police officer.
engSearchText:
It might surprise you to learn that I used to be a
police officer.
jpnChrName: 私、こう見えて警察にも顔が利くんですよ。
jpnSearchText: 私、こう見えて警察にも顔が利くんですよ。

engChrName: In my heyday, I was the Bloodhound of the SID. If you've got something that needs taken care of, I just might be able to help!
engSearchText:
In my heyday, I was the Bloodhound of the SID.
If you've got something that needs taken care of, I
just might be able to help!
jpnChrName: 昔は“特捜課のブルドッグ”なんて呼ばれていたし 力になれる事があるかもしれないわねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
昔は“特捜課のブルドッグ”なんて呼ばれていたし
力になれる事があるかもしれないわねぇ～。

engChrName: Wha—?! Are you serious?!
engSearchText: Wha—?! Are you serious?!
jpnChrName: えええええええ～っ！！ そ、そうだったんですの！？
jpnSearchText:
えええええええ～っ！！
そ、そうだったんですの！？

engChrName: (Bloodhound?! So she's more than meets the eye... She might be able to help with my husband, but...)
engSearchText:
(Bloodhound?! So she's more than meets the eye...
She might be able to help with my husband, but...)
jpnChrName: （一体何者……というかこれは使えるのかしら……？   主人の不祥事の件も……で、でも………）
jpnSearchText:
（一体何者……というかこれは使えるのかしら……？
主人の不祥事の件も……で、でも………）

engChrName: A bit of a departure from her previous title, isn't it?
engSearchText: A bit of a departure from her previous title, isn't it?
jpnChrName: あはは……以前は“八区のレジェンド”とか 仰っていましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
あはは……以前は“八区のレジェンド”とか
仰っていましたけど……

engChrName: The Bloodhound of the SID? I had no idea she used to be in the police force.
engSearchText:
The Bloodhound of the SID? I had no idea she used
to be in the police force.
jpnChrName: “特捜課のブルドッグ”…… まさか元警察の方だったなんて……
jpnSearchText:
“特捜課のブルドッグ”……
まさか元警察の方だったなんて……

engChrName: Yeah, because she wasn't.
engSearchText: Yeah, because she wasn't.
jpnChrName: ──いや、デタラメに決まってんだろ。
jpnSearchText: ──いや、デタラメに決まってんだろ。

engChrName: Bloodhound? Wow, I didn't know she was an officer back then!
engSearchText:
Bloodhound? Wow, I didn't know she was an officer
back then!
jpnChrName: “特捜課のブルドッグ”…… そんなに凄いお婆さんだったとは！
jpnSearchText:
“特捜課のブルドッグ”……
そんなに凄いお婆さんだったとは！

engChrName: Yeah, because she wasn't.
engSearchText: Yeah, because she wasn't.
jpnChrName: ──いや、デタラメに決まってんだろ。
jpnSearchText: ──いや、デタラメに決まってんだろ。

engChrName: Bloodhound? Looks like your common bitch to me.
engSearchText: Bloodhound? Looks like your common bitch to me.
jpnChrName: ハッ、んな腕の立つババアには見えねえがな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、んな腕の立つババアには見えねえがな。

engChrName: Yeah, she's all bark and no bite. Just ignore her.
engSearchText: Yeah, she's all bark and no bite. Just ignore her.
jpnChrName: ああ、デタラメに決まってんだろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、デタラメに決まってんだろ。

engChrName: Lady, don't go yankin' people's chains like that.
engSearchText: Lady, don't go yankin' people's chains like that.
jpnChrName: 婆さんも、あんま人を混乱させないようにな？
jpnSearchText: 婆さんも、あんま人を混乱させないようにな？

engChrName: Oh, dear, heehee. Did I get too carried away, there?
engSearchText: Oh, dear, heehee. Did I get too carried away, there?
jpnChrName: うふふ、嫌ねぇ。 少し自慢話が過ぎちゃったかしら～？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、嫌ねぇ。
少し自慢話が過ぎちゃったかしら～？

engChrName: What if I just told them both the truth...? I don't even know how many times I've considered it.
engSearchText:
What if I just told them both the truth...? I don't even
know how many times I've considered it.
jpnChrName: もしも２人に全て打ち明けてしまったら…… なんて、今まで何度も考えてきたけど。
jpnSearchText:
もしも２人に全て打ち明けてしまったら……
なんて、今まで何度も考えてきたけど。

engChrName: I just never expected things to turn out the way they did.
engSearchText:
I just never expected things to turn out the way
they did.
jpnChrName: こんな未来が来るだなんて、 少しも想像できなかったよ。
jpnSearchText:
こんな未来が来るだなんて、
少しも想像できなかったよ。

engChrName: I guess miracles do happen... Heh. Some new lyrics just popped in my head.
engSearchText:
I guess miracles do happen... Heh. Some new lyrics
just popped in my head.
jpnChrName: こんな奇跡みたいな事も起きるんだね。 うん……今ならいい曲が作れる気がするよ。
jpnSearchText:
こんな奇跡みたいな事も起きるんだね。
うん……今ならいい曲が作れる気がするよ。

engChrName: Today's the day... My record's on the shelves now.
engSearchText: Today's the day... My record's on the shelves now.
jpnChrName: ……いよいよ今日、 僕の新作レコードが発売されたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……いよいよ今日、
僕の新作レコードが発売されたんだ。

engChrName: My big debut's done and over with, but... *sigh* I'm still just as restless as I was before.
engSearchText:
My big debut's done and over with, but... *sigh* I'm
still just as restless as I was before.
jpnChrName: これで実質メジャーデビューなんだけど…… ……ふう、さすがにソワソワするな……
jpnSearchText:
これで実質メジャーデビューなんだけど……
……ふう、さすがにソワソワするな……

engChrName: Maybe I should hit up the record stores and see what people think. I do kinda wanna see Raymond's jacket cover in action.
engSearchText:
Maybe I should hit up the record stores and see what
people think. I do kinda wanna see Raymond's jacket
cover in action.
jpnChrName: 後でレコード店を回ってみるべきか…… レイモンドのジャケット絵でもあるし……
jpnSearchText:
後でレコード店を回ってみるべきか……
レイモンドのジャケット絵でもあるし……

engChrName: The plan is to put on a little show tonight to celebrate my debut.
engSearchText:
The plan is to put on a little show tonight to celebrate
my debut.
jpnChrName: 今夜はメジャーデビューの 記念公演もやる予定なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
今夜はメジャーデビューの
記念公演もやる予定なんだ。

engChrName: It'll be at the usual spot, the Blue Score. The owner there's really helped me out.
engSearchText:
It'll be at the usual spot, the Blue Score. The owner
there's really helped me out.
jpnChrName: 場所はいつもの《ブルースコア》さ。 あそこのオーナーにはお世話になったし……
jpnSearchText:
場所はいつもの《ブルースコア》さ。
あそこのオーナーにはお世話になったし……

engChrName: I'll need to give this performance my all—it's the least I can do to repay his kindness.
engSearchText:
I'll need to give this performance my all—it's the least
I can do to repay his kindness.
jpnChrName: 今日は恩返しも込めて しっかり演奏しないとな。
jpnSearchText:
今日は恩返しも込めて
しっかり演奏しないとな。

engChrName: So those, uh, 'idols' I met recently. They asked me to direct some of their music.
engSearchText:
So those, uh, 'idols' I met recently. They asked me to
direct some of their music.
jpnChrName: この前知り合った“アイドル”……だっけ。 その子達に頼まれて、曲の監修をしてるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この前知り合った“アイドル”……だっけ。
その子達に頼まれて、曲の監修をしてるんだ。

engChrName: Being honest, that genre's pretty far out of my wheelhouse...
engSearchText:
Being honest, that genre's pretty far out of
my wheelhouse...
jpnChrName: こういう方向の曲は正直専門外だし ハチャメチャな所も多いけど……
jpnSearchText:
こういう方向の曲は正直専門外だし
ハチャメチャな所も多いけど……

engChrName: ...but I gave it my best shot. I think it turned out all right. Hopefully it's still as cheery as they wanted it to be.
engSearchText:
...but I gave it my best shot. I think it turned out
all right. Hopefully it's still as cheery as they wanted it
to be.
jpnChrName: うん、ハッピーでいい曲なんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText: うん、ハッピーでいい曲なんじゃないかな。

engChrName: Once they nail the basics, the message should shine through. I'm just giving them a helping hand, as it were.
engSearchText:
Once they nail the basics, the message should
shine through. I'm just giving them a helping hand, as
it were.
jpnChrName: 基本を整えたらもっとクリアに伝わると思う── 手直しだけさせてもらおうかな。
jpnSearchText:
基本を整えたらもっとクリアに伝わると思う──
手直しだけさせてもらおうかな。

engChrName: Apparently this is the debut song they wrote. I'll tidy it up as best I can.
engSearchText:
Apparently this is the debut song they wrote.
I'll tidy it up as best I can.
jpnChrName: あの子たちで書いたデビュー曲らしいんだ。 微力ながら整えさせてもらうつもりさ。
jpnSearchText:
あの子たちで書いたデビュー曲らしいんだ。
微力ながら整えさせてもらうつもりさ。

engChrName: ...It's been a while since I got some good news. I hope this debut will help lift my spirits.
engSearchText:
...It's been a while since I got some good news. I hope
this debut will help lift my spirits.
jpnChrName: ……暗いニュースばかりだけど、 だからこそこの曲のお披露目が楽しみかな。
jpnSearchText:
……暗いニュースばかりだけど、
だからこそこの曲のお披露目が楽しみかな。

engChrName: Ah. You're the spriggan, right?
engSearchText: Ah. You're the spriggan, right?
jpnChrName: ああ、解決屋の人たちか……
jpnSearchText: ああ、解決屋の人たちか……

engChrName: Sometimes I struggle to carry on... I don't know if this is the right thing to do.
engSearchText:
Sometimes I struggle to carry on... I don't know if
this is the right thing to do.
jpnChrName: 時々辛くなるんだよね…… ずっとこのままなんて、やるせなさすぎる……
jpnSearchText:
時々辛くなるんだよね……
ずっとこのままなんて、やるせなさすぎる……

engChrName: No matter how well my music sells, how much my audience entreats me...
engSearchText:
No matter how well my music sells, how much my
audience entreats me...
jpnChrName: どんなに曲が売れても ……世間に認められても……
jpnSearchText:
どんなに曲が売れても
……世間に認められても……

engChrName: If only I could just... No, I can't. This is the way it has to be.
engSearchText:
If only I could just... No, I can't. This is the way it has
to be.
jpnChrName: もし僕が………だったら…… ……いや、でもこれでいいんだ、きっと……
jpnSearchText:
もし僕が………だったら……
……いや、でもこれでいいんだ、きっと……

engChrName: (He has much on his mind, from the sounds of it.)
engSearchText: (He has much on his mind, from the sounds of it.)
jpnChrName: （この人、随分悩んでるみたいだけど……）
jpnSearchText: （この人、随分悩んでるみたいだけど……）

engChrName: (Indeed...but it doesn't sound like he wants to talk to us about it.)
engSearchText:
(Indeed...but it doesn't sound like he wants to talk to
us about it.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……でも今は   触れてほしくなさそうな雰囲気ですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ……でも今は
触れてほしくなさそうな雰囲気ですね……）

engChrName: (We all got our problems. Best not to stick our noses where they don't belong.)
engSearchText:
(We all got our problems. Best not to stick our noses
where they don't belong.)
jpnChrName: （……ま、悩みなんざ人それぞれだ。   無理に首を突っ込むこともねえだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ま、悩みなんざ人それぞれだ。
無理に首を突っ込むこともねえだろ。）

engChrName: Is this...really all right?
engSearchText: Is this...really all right?
jpnChrName: 僕は……これでいいんだろうか………
jpnSearchText: 僕は……これでいいんだろうか………

engChrName: C'mon, don't sell yourself short. Your music is incredible and people are finally starting to notice. The agency knows you're gonna be a big hit.
engSearchText:
C'mon, don't sell yourself short. Your music is
incredible and people are finally starting to notice.
The agency knows you're gonna be a big hit.
jpnChrName: ジェス、お前の歌は大したもんだ。 評判も上々──事務所だって今後に期待してる。
jpnSearchText:
ジェス、お前の歌は大したもんだ。
評判も上々──事務所だって今後に期待してる。

engChrName: That's why they greenlit the new record to begin with.
engSearchText:
That's why they greenlit the new record to
begin with.
jpnChrName: だからこその“新曲レコード”なんだぞ？
jpnSearchText: だからこその“新曲レコード”なんだぞ？

engChrName: This is your big break here. You gotta decide what your brand is, so yeah, I think the jacket design is really important.
engSearchText:
This is your big break here. You gotta decide what
your brand is, so yeah, I think the jacket design is
really important.
jpnChrName: これでお前はブレイクするかもしれねえ…… そのジャケットがどれだけ大事か分かるよな？
jpnSearchText:
これでお前はブレイクするかもしれねえ……
そのジャケットがどれだけ大事か分かるよな？

engChrName: You're right, you're right. I get I'm being stubborn with this, but I really wanna stick the landing.
engSearchText:
You're right, you're right. I get I'm being stubborn
with this, but I really wanna stick the landing.
jpnChrName: ええ、もちろんです。 ……だからこそ拘りたいんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、もちろんです。
……だからこそ拘りたいんですよ。

engChrName: I want that design to be personal—to be more than just a fancy logo. I want it designed by someone who really, truly gets me.
engSearchText:
I want that design to be personal—to be more than
just a fancy logo. I want it designed by someone who
really, truly gets me.
jpnChrName: どこの誰かも分からない絵描きより、 僕の曲を誰よりも理解してくれている人──
jpnSearchText:
どこの誰かも分からない絵描きより、
僕の曲を誰よりも理解してくれている人──

engChrName: So I want him to draw it for me. I think that's the best thing I could ask for.
engSearchText:
So I want him to draw it for me. I think that's the
best thing I could ask for.
jpnChrName: そんな人に手掛けてほしい。 最高のレコードにするために。
jpnSearchText:
そんな人に手掛けてほしい。
最高のレコードにするために。

engChrName: I mean, okay, but like... You're striking it rich with this! You can afford to shell out the big bucks for a popular designer, y'know?
engSearchText:
I mean, okay, but like... You're striking it rich
with this! You can afford to shell out the big bucks for
a popular designer, y'know?
jpnChrName: いやだからだな、ここは実績のある有名画家に…… ……おい聞いてるか、ジェス！？
jpnSearchText:
いやだからだな、ここは実績のある有名画家に……
……おい聞いてるか、ジェス！？

engChrName: I can, but I don't want to. This is my first record I'm making here in the capital... I want that design to be more personal.
engSearchText:
I can, but I don't want to. This is my first record I'm
making here in the capital... I want that design to be
more personal.
jpnChrName: ……首都に来て初めてのレコード…… だったら僕の曲を誰よりも理解している人でないと──
jpnSearchText:
……首都に来て初めてのレコード……
だったら僕の曲を誰よりも理解している人でないと──

engChrName: Man, you're overthinking this. Just let the agency handle it.
engSearchText:
Man, you're overthinking this. Just let the agency
handle it.
jpnChrName: ったく……そこは事務所を信じて任せてくれよな。
jpnSearchText: ったく……そこは事務所を信じて任せてくれよな。

engChrName: Their whole job is to make your job easier, so why are you fussing over this so much?
engSearchText:
Their whole job is to make your job easier, so why are
you fussing over this so much?
jpnChrName: お前さんはどうしてそう ヘンな拘りが強いんだ……
jpnSearchText:
お前さんはどうしてそう
ヘンな拘りが強いんだ……

engChrName: I don't mind these rainy nights... They help me unwind.
engSearchText:
I don't mind these rainy nights... They help
me unwind.
jpnChrName: 少し降ってるみたいだけど、 その分静かで落ち着く夜だね。
jpnSearchText:
少し降ってるみたいだけど、
その分静かで落ち着く夜だね。

engChrName: It's not often that Raymond, Carol, and I get some time to ourselves like this.
engSearchText:
It's not often that Raymond, Carol, and I get some
time to ourselves like this.
jpnChrName: ……それにレイモンドもキャロルも 揃ってゆっくりできる日なんて珍しい。
jpnSearchText:
……それにレイモンドもキャロルも
揃ってゆっくりできる日なんて珍しい。

engChrName: ...What I'd give for more nights like these.
engSearchText: ...What I'd give for more nights like these.
jpnChrName: ──やっぱり好きだな、この時間が。
jpnSearchText: ──やっぱり好きだな、この時間が。

engChrName: It's nice and quiet today... I can feel a good rhythm coming on.
engSearchText:
It's nice and quiet today... I can feel a good rhythm
coming on.
jpnChrName: ……今日は静かでいい日だね。 曲作りも捗るよ。
jpnSearchText:
……今日は静かでいい日だね。
曲作りも捗るよ。

engChrName: Raymond, Carol, and I, we've known each other since grade school. We all grew up in Anchorville.
engSearchText:
Raymond, Carol, and I, we've known each other since
grade school. We all grew up in Anchorville.
jpnChrName: 僕とレイモンド、キャロルの三人は幼馴染でね、 アンカーヴィルって街の出身なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
僕とレイモンド、キャロルの三人は幼馴染でね、
アンカーヴィルって街の出身なんだ。

engChrName: That place is nothing special...but that's what made writing music there so easy. It's so perfectly calm and chill.
engSearchText:
That place is nothing special...but that's what made
writing music there so easy. It's so perfectly calm
and chill.
jpnChrName: 何の変哲もない街だけど、穏やかでいい所さ。 曲作りなんかにはもってこいだよ。
jpnSearchText:
何の変哲もない街だけど、穏やかでいい所さ。
曲作りなんかにはもってこいだよ。

engChrName: But now I'm here in the hustle and bustle of the capital... Those two ended up coming with me, too.
engSearchText:
But now I'm here in the hustle and bustle of
the capital... Those two ended up coming with
me, too.
jpnChrName: でも僕は……首都でメジャーデビューする事になって。 誘ってみたら、二人も一緒に来てくれたんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
でも僕は……首都でメジャーデビューする事になって。
誘ってみたら、二人も一緒に来てくれたんだよな。

engChrName: I only hope they're not coming along just to appease me...
engSearchText:
I only hope they're not coming along just to
appease me...
jpnChrName: ……僕の我儘に付き合わせたので ないならいいけど……
jpnSearchText:
……僕の我儘に付き合わせたので
ないならいいけど……

engChrName: I feel like the big city's getting to them. Carol changed jobs, Raymond hasn't been drawing much...
engSearchText:
I feel like the big city's getting to them.
Carol changed jobs, Raymond hasn't been
drawing much...
jpnChrName: キャロルは転職する事になったし、 レイモンドも最近絵を描かなくなった……
jpnSearchText:
キャロルは転職する事になったし、
レイモンドも最近絵を描かなくなった……

engChrName: I just hope they're not only doing it to appease me...
engSearchText: I just hope they're not only doing it to appease me...
jpnChrName: 僕の我儘に付き合わせてなきゃいいんだけど……
jpnSearchText: 僕の我儘に付き合わせてなきゃいいんだけど……

engChrName: Oh, you guys.
engSearchText: Oh, you guys.
jpnChrName: おっと……君たちか。
jpnSearchText: おっと……君たちか。

engChrName: I really appreciate how you handled my request. I can finally relax for a little bit.
engSearchText:
I really appreciate how you handled my request. I can
finally relax for a little bit.
jpnChrName: 依頼の件は本当に助かったよ。 これでいくらかは安心して過ごせそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
依頼の件は本当に助かったよ。
これでいくらかは安心して過ごせそうだ。

engChrName: Now it's just me and my feelings... Go figure. Never pans out the way you expect, huh?
engSearchText:
Now it's just me and my feelings... Go figure.
Never pans out the way you expect, huh?
jpnChrName: 後は僕の気持ち次第か…… ままならないものだよ、本当に。
jpnSearchText:
後は僕の気持ち次第か……
ままならないものだよ、本当に。

engChrName: I've still got time before the bus comes along... Maybe I'll go say hi to Raymond.
engSearchText:
I've still got time before the bus comes along...
Maybe I'll go say hi to Raymond.
jpnChrName: バスの時間まで少しあるし、 レイモンドにも挨拶していこう……
jpnSearchText:
バスの時間まで少しあるし、
レイモンドにも挨拶していこう……

engChrName: He's the one who really pushed me when it came to this record deal.
engSearchText:
He's the one who really pushed me when it came to
this record deal.
jpnChrName: 僕のデビューを誰よりも 後押ししてくれたのは、レイモンドだもんな。
jpnSearchText:
僕のデビューを誰よりも
後押ししてくれたのは、レイモンドだもんな。

engChrName: I really owe you two a lot. You've saved my bacon more times than I can count.
engSearchText:
I really owe you two a lot. You've saved my bacon
more times than I can count.
jpnChrName: キャロルとレイモンドには、 いつも本当に助けられているよ。
jpnSearchText:
キャロルとレイモンドには、
いつも本当に助けられているよ。

engChrName: ...Umm, sorry. Who are you?
engSearchText: ...Umm, sorry. Who are you?
jpnChrName: ……えっと、君たちは……？
jpnSearchText: ……えっと、君たちは……？

engChrName: Oh! Pay me no mind. Your music really spoke to me...
engSearchText:
Oh! Pay me no mind. Your music really spoke
to me...
jpnChrName: す、すみません、素敵な音に誘われてしまって……
jpnSearchText: す、すみません、素敵な音に誘われてしまって……

engChrName: Really? Thanks.
engSearchText: Really? Thanks.
jpnChrName: そう、まあいいけど。
jpnSearchText: そう、まあいいけど。

engChrName: I'm writing the next song I'll be performing live. I'd prefer some alone time so that I can really let my thoughts flow out onto the paper.
engSearchText:
I'm writing the next song I'll be performing live.
I'd prefer some alone time so that I can really let my
thoughts flow out onto the paper.
jpnChrName: 次の公演で発表する新曲を作ってるんだ。 邪魔はしないでくれると嬉しいよ。
jpnSearchText:
次の公演で発表する新曲を作ってるんだ。
邪魔はしないでくれると嬉しいよ。

engChrName: I need a sound that really captures the discord inside my head. This maelstrom of emotions crashing against me...
engSearchText:
I need a sound that really captures the discord inside
my head. This maelstrom of emotions crashing
against me...
jpnChrName: ……もっとこう、感情の震えが伝わる音を……
jpnSearchText: ……もっとこう、感情の震えが伝わる音を……

engChrName: Maybe a change of lyrics would do... 'I sent the voice in a bottle 'cross the waves...'
engSearchText:
Maybe a change of lyrics would do... 'I sent the voice
in a bottle 'cross the waves...'
jpnChrName: ……歌詞も変えた方がいいな。 『永遠に届かない、僕の声──』
jpnSearchText:
……歌詞も変えた方がいいな。
『永遠に届かない、僕の声──』

engChrName: (He certainly has a flair for the dramatic... Is he particularly popular?)
engSearchText:
(He certainly has a flair for the dramatic... Is he
particularly popular?)
jpnChrName: （いい歌……もしかして   有名な方なんでしょうか……）
jpnSearchText:
（いい歌……もしかして
有名な方なんでしょうか……）

engChrName: (Beats me. Might've heard him on the radio once or twice.)
engSearchText:
(Beats me. Might've heard him on the radio once
or twice.)
jpnChrName: （さあな、どこかで聞いた事くらいは   あるかもしれんが。）
jpnSearchText:
（さあな、どこかで聞いた事くらいは
あるかもしれんが。）

engChrName: Yeah, that flows better.
engSearchText: Yeah, that flows better.
jpnChrName: ……うん、いい感じかな。
jpnSearchText: ……うん、いい感じかな。

engChrName: All right... Fill in another word or two until the pause there, and then we're good.
engSearchText:
All right... Fill in another word or two until the pause
there, and then we're good.
jpnChrName: もう一息……次の区切りまで作ってしまおう。
jpnSearchText: もう一息……次の区切りまで作ってしまおう。

engChrName: Why, Jess?! You didn't have to protect me like that...! P-Please, help him!
engSearchText:
Why, Jess?! You didn't have to protect me like that...!
P-Please, help him!
jpnChrName: ジェスが僕を庇って……！ ……な、なんでこんな事に……っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ジェスが僕を庇って……！
……な、なんでこんな事に……っ！！

engChrName: One of the bracers patched him up, but he's really struggling...!
engSearchText:
One of the bracers patched him up, but he's really
struggling...!
jpnChrName: 遊撃士さんが応急措置をしてくれたけど 意識が朦朧としてきて──
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士さんが応急措置をしてくれたけど
意識が朦朧としてきて──

engChrName: Calm down. The wound isn't that deep.
engSearchText: Calm down. The wound isn't that deep.
jpnChrName: 落ち着いて、そこまで深手じゃない。
jpnSearchText: 落ち着いて、そこまで深手じゃない。

engChrName: He's lost a lot of blood, but we can get him some medicine from the church. That should stabilize him.
engSearchText:
He's lost a lot of blood, but we can get him some
medicine from the church. That should stabilize him.
jpnChrName: ちょっと出血が多いけど、 教会の薬があれば。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと出血が多いけど、
教会の薬があれば。

engChrName: He'll be okay, I promise! Just stay by his side!
engSearchText: He'll be okay, I promise! Just stay by his side!
jpnChrName: きっと大丈夫です！ 諦めずに励ましてあげてくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
きっと大丈夫です！
諦めずに励ましてあげてくださいっ！

engChrName: I-I will! Just stay calm, Raymond... Goddess, if you can hear me...!
engSearchText:
I-I will! Just stay calm, Raymond... Goddess, if you
can hear me...!
jpnChrName: ああ……そうする、そうするよ！ ……女神様、どうかジェスをお救い下さい……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ……そうする、そうするよ！
……女神様、どうかジェスをお救い下さい……！

engChrName: Even if we drift apart a little bit, that bond will always bring us back together.
engSearchText:
Even if we drift apart a little bit, that bond will always
bring us back together.
jpnChrName: ただの幼馴染同士じゃなくても、 僕達３人の絆は変わらないと思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ただの幼馴染同士じゃなくても、
僕達３人の絆は変わらないと思うんだ。

engChrName: This helped me realize that... Thank you. Thank you so much!
engSearchText:
This helped me realize that... Thank you. Thank you
so much!
jpnChrName: 今回の事でそれを再確認できたよ。 ……本当にありがとう。
jpnSearchText:
今回の事でそれを再確認できたよ。
……本当にありがとう。

engChrName: And here I thought I knew everything about Jess...
engSearchText: And here I thought I knew everything about Jess...
jpnChrName: ジェスの事は何でも 分かってるつもりだったのにな……
jpnSearchText:
ジェスの事は何でも
分かってるつもりだったのにな……

engChrName: I'll just be waiting here for Jess to come home.
engSearchText: I'll just be waiting here for Jess to come home.
jpnChrName: 僕はここでジェスが帰って来ないか 見ている事にしますね。
jpnSearchText:
僕はここでジェスが帰って来ないか
見ている事にしますね。

engChrName: Good look on your investigation!
engSearchText: Good look on your investigation!
jpnChrName: 皆さんはどうか、調査の方を よろしくお願いします……！
jpnSearchText:
皆さんはどうか、調査の方を
よろしくお願いします……！

engChrName: *sigh* Gotta find a way to pass the time...
engSearchText: *sigh* Gotta find a way to pass the time...
jpnChrName: はぁぁ、一体どうしたらいいんだろう……
jpnSearchText: はぁぁ、一体どうしたらいいんだろう……

engChrName: I get to see Jess perform live tonight! First time in ages.
engSearchText:
I get to see Jess perform live tonight! First time
in ages.
jpnChrName: 今夜は久々にジェスの公演を 見に行くんですよ～！
jpnSearchText:
今夜は久々にジェスの公演を
見に行くんですよ～！

engChrName: I could barely even sleep last night. I can't help it, I'm just too excited! Gotta make sure I'm all ready...
engSearchText:
I could barely even sleep last night. I can't help it, I'm
just too excited! Gotta make sure I'm all ready...
jpnChrName: あはは、張り切りすぎて早く上がっちゃいました。 準備は万端にして……
jpnSearchText:
あはは、張り切りすぎて早く上がっちゃいました。
準備は万端にして……

engChrName: Maybe I should prepare a little surprise for him...?
engSearchText: Maybe I should prepare a little surprise for him...?
jpnChrName: サプライズも用意して ジェスを驚かせちゃおうかな～♪
jpnSearchText:
サプライズも用意して
ジェスを驚かせちゃおうかな～♪

engChrName: I drew the jacket cover for Jess' new record!
engSearchText: I drew the jacket cover for Jess' new record!
jpnChrName: 今日発売のジェスのレコード、実は 僕がジャケットを描かせてもらったんです。
jpnSearchText:
今日発売のジェスのレコード、実は
僕がジャケットを描かせてもらったんです。

engChrName: It's not exactly high art, but I heard it's getting good reviews.
engSearchText:
It's not exactly high art, but I heard it's getting
good reviews.
jpnChrName: 全然大したものじゃ無いんですが…… なんだか噂が広まっちゃったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
全然大したものじゃ無いんですが……
なんだか噂が広まっちゃったみたいで。

engChrName: Here's hoping it gives his sales a little shot in the arm!
engSearchText: Here's hoping it gives his sales a little shot in the arm!
jpnChrName: あはは、でもこれをきっかけに レコードが売れると僕も嬉しいな♪
jpnSearchText:
あはは、でもこれをきっかけに
レコードが売れると僕も嬉しいな♪

engChrName: O-Oh, right, my actual job! Feel free to take some flowers with you, if you're so inclined.
engSearchText:
O-Oh, right, my actual job! Feel free to take some
flowers with you, if you're so inclined.
jpnChrName: あ、もちろん皆さんには お花も買って欲しいですけど！
jpnSearchText:
あ、もちろん皆さんには
お花も買って欲しいですけど！

engChrName: It's getting pretty bleak with Creil Village...
engSearchText: It's getting pretty bleak with Creil Village...
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の件、やっぱり 絶望的だそうですね……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の件、やっぱり
絶望的だそうですね……

engChrName: People keep coming by for...sympathy flowers...
engSearchText: People keep coming by for...sympathy flowers...
jpnChrName: あれから弔いの花を買っていく人が絶えなくて。
jpnSearchText: あれから弔いの花を買っていく人が絶えなくて。

engChrName: It still doesn't register in my mind. How does an entire village just...disappear?
engSearchText:
It still doesn't register in my mind. How does an
entire village just...disappear?
jpnChrName: なんだか未だに信じられません…… 一つの村が丸ごと消えてしまったなんて……
jpnSearchText:
なんだか未だに信じられません……
一つの村が丸ごと消えてしまったなんて……

engChrName: All righty. That should pop out nicely. Just a little more over here...
engSearchText:
All righty. That should pop out nicely. Just a little
more over here...
jpnChrName: うんうん、ここは鮮やかに仕上げて…… ふふ、もう一息かな。
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、ここは鮮やかに仕上げて……
ふふ、もう一息かな。

engChrName: I'm drawing the jacket cover for Jess' new record!
engSearchText: I'm drawing the jacket cover for Jess' new record!
jpnChrName: ジェスが出す新作レコードの ジャケットを描いているんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスが出す新作レコードの
ジャケットを描いているんですよ。

engChrName: I wasn't sure how I'd make it work, but once I stopped overthinking things, the ideas just flowed right onto the paper.
engSearchText:
I wasn't sure how I'd make it work, but once I
stopped overthinking things, the ideas just flowed
right onto the paper.
jpnChrName: 僕に描けるのかって悩んでましたけど 考えるのを止めたら、急にアイデアが湧いてきて。
jpnSearchText:
僕に描けるのかって悩んでましたけど
考えるのを止めたら、急にアイデアが湧いてきて。

engChrName: It's really coming along now. I might have it done today!
engSearchText:
It's really coming along now. I might have it
done today!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、この調子で今日中に 描き上げてしまおうかな♪
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、この調子で今日中に
描き上げてしまおうかな♪

engChrName: Man, I haven't sat down and drawn since I graduated school, but it still calms me right down.
engSearchText:
Man, I haven't sat down and drawn since I graduated
school, but it still calms me right down.
jpnChrName: 絵を描くのは学生時代以来だけど、 やっぱり落ち着きます。
jpnSearchText:
絵を描くのは学生時代以来だけど、
やっぱり落ち着きます。

engChrName: I should do this more often, hah. I forgot how relaxing it was. I'm gonna have to thank Jess for letting me do it!
engSearchText:
I should do this more often, hah. I forgot how
relaxing it was. I'm gonna have to thank Jess for
letting me do it!
jpnChrName: たまにはいいですね、こういうのも。 ふふっ、ジェスには感謝しないと。
jpnSearchText:
たまにはいいですね、こういうのも。
ふふっ、ジェスには感謝しないと。

engChrName: I haven't been able to make it to any concerts lately... but I'm gonna hit up the next one for sure.
engSearchText:
I haven't been able to make it to any concerts lately...
but I'm gonna hit up the next one for sure.
jpnChrName: 最近ライブに行けてないけど…… うん、僕も次の公演は観にいこうかな。
jpnSearchText:
最近ライブに行けてないけど……
うん、僕も次の公演は観にいこうかな。

engChrName: Jess has his first big gig at the end of the year, and then his new album comes out right after.
engSearchText:
Jess has his first big gig at the end of the year, and
then his new album comes out right after.
jpnChrName: 年末にジェスが、メジャーデビュー後 初めてのレコードを出すんです。
jpnSearchText:
年末にジェスが、メジャーデビュー後
初めてのレコードを出すんです。

engChrName: So he's asked me to draw the cover jacket...
engSearchText: So he's asked me to draw the cover jacket...
jpnChrName: そのジャケットの絵を頼まれてしまって……
jpnSearchText: そのジャケットの絵を頼まれてしまって……

engChrName: ...but I dunno if I can pull it off. His music is some really emotional, profound stuff... Hrm...
engSearchText:
...but I dunno if I can pull it off. His music is some
really emotional, profound stuff... Hrm...
jpnChrName: ジェスの歌のあの切なさ、引き込む力を 僕なんかが表現しきれるのか……う～ん……
jpnSearchText:
ジェスの歌のあの切なさ、引き込む力を
僕なんかが表現しきれるのか……う～ん……

engChrName: No, bad thoughts. I can do this! If anyone knows Jess and his style, it's his childhood buddy!
engSearchText:
No, bad thoughts. I can do this! If anyone knows Jess
and his style, it's his childhood buddy!
jpnChrName: でもなんとかやり遂げたいな…… ジェスの事は、ずっと近くで見てきてますから。
jpnSearchText:
でもなんとかやり遂げたいな……
ジェスの事は、ずっと近くで見てきてますから。

engChrName: I did make a new mint chocolate pudding, but... Hmm. How'd the word spread so fast?
engSearchText:
I did make a new mint chocolate pudding, but...
Hmm. How'd the word spread so fast?
jpnChrName: 新しくチョコミントプディングを作ってみたんですが う～ん、みんなどこから噂を……
jpnSearchText:
新しくチョコミントプディングを作ってみたんですが
う～ん、みんなどこから噂を……

engChrName: Sorry, Van, all sold out. Better luck next time!
engSearchText: Sorry, Van, all sold out. Better luck next time!
jpnChrName: あはは、早くも売り切れてしまって。 すみません、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、早くも売り切れてしまって。
すみません、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Ah, damn... Just my luck.
engSearchText: Ah, damn... Just my luck.
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ……一足遅かったか……
jpnSearchText: ぐぬぬ……一足遅かったか……

engChrName: It may be prudent to visit earlier in the morning, henceforth.
engSearchText:
It may be prudent to visit earlier in the
morning, henceforth.
jpnChrName: 毎朝チェックが必要な案件のようですね。
jpnSearchText: 毎朝チェックが必要な案件のようですね。

engChrName: If you'd like, I can visit this store myself and inform you of any new products.
engSearchText:
If you'd like, I can visit this store myself and inform
you of any new products.
jpnChrName: 今後新作が売り出された際は ヴァン様にご連絡するよう致しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
今後新作が売り出された際は
ヴァン様にご連絡するよう致しましょうか。

engChrName: Thanks... You know me too well, Risette. Makes me real proud to have an ace concierge like you.
engSearchText:
Thanks... You know me too well, Risette. Makes me
real proud to have an ace concierge like you.
jpnChrName: 流石だね、リゼット君。 さすがは我が事務所が誇る優秀なＳＣだ。
jpnSearchText:
流石だね、リゼット君。
さすがは我が事務所が誇る優秀なＳＣだ。

engChrName: Wow, she's like a super secretary! I've got a lot to learn.
engSearchText:
Wow, she's like a super secretary! I've got a lot
to learn.
jpnChrName: これがハイパーアシスタント…… わたしも見習わないとですっ！
jpnSearchText:
これがハイパーアシスタント……
わたしも見習わないとですっ！

engChrName: Heh... Kiss-ass. Need her to buy you some dignity, too?
engSearchText:
Heh... Kiss-ass. Need her to buy you some
dignity, too?
jpnChrName: クク…… 所長の威厳も形無しだな、オイ。
jpnSearchText:
クク……
所長の威厳も形無しだな、オイ。

engChrName: (Is that really a good use of her time...?)
engSearchText: (Is that really a good use of her time...?)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、これでいいんでしょうか……）
jpnSearchText: （う～ん、これでいいんでしょうか……）

engChrName: Ahh, sorry. I sold out super quick today.
engSearchText: Ahh, sorry. I sold out super quick today.
jpnChrName: あはは……今日は早く売り切れてしまって すみませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……今日は早く売り切れてしまって
すみませんでした。

engChrName: I make 'em with my special home-grown mints!
engSearchText: I make 'em with my special home-grown mints!
jpnChrName: 僕が育てた新鮮なミントを使ってるんですよ♪
jpnSearchText: 僕が育てた新鮮なミントを使ってるんですよ♪

engChrName: I had Jess and Carol taste test them, and they both gave double thumbs up! Give 'em a try when you get the chance!
engSearchText:
I had Jess and Carol taste test them, and they both
gave double thumbs up! Give 'em a try when you get
the chance!
jpnChrName: 姉さんやジェスも絶品だって言ってくれましたし また機会があればご賞味くださいね！
jpnSearchText:
姉さんやジェスも絶品だって言ってくれましたし
また機会があればご賞味くださいね！

engChrName: At the end of the day, I don't hold a candle to my sister's cooking.
engSearchText:
At the end of the day, I don't hold a candle to my
sister's cooking.
jpnChrName: なんだかんだ、姉さんが 作ってくれるものが一番美味しいんだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
なんだかんだ、姉さんが
作ってくれるものが一番美味しいんだよね～。

engChrName: Her dishes just melt my exhaustion away every time!
engSearchText: Her dishes just melt my exhaustion away every time!
jpnChrName: 一日の疲れも吹っ飛んじゃうよ♪
jpnSearchText: 一日の疲れも吹っ飛んじゃうよ♪

engChrName: Don't sell yourself short, Raymond. Your sweets are pretty good, too.
engSearchText:
Don't sell yourself short, Raymond. Your sweets are
pretty good, too.
jpnChrName: ふふ……レイモンドの作るお菓子も 十分美味しいけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……レイモンドの作るお菓子も
十分美味しいけどね。

engChrName: Aww, thanks! You up for taste testing some more, then? Lemme show you what I've been cooking up!
engSearchText:
Aww, thanks! You up for taste testing some
more, then? Lemme show you what I've been
cooking up!
jpnChrName: あはは、そう？　じゃあまた作ってみるから ジェスも試食、頼んだよ！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、そう？　じゃあまた作ってみるから
ジェスも試食、頼んだよ！

engChrName: Bien sur. Of course.
engSearchText: Bien sur. Of course.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、もちろん（ビヤンシュール）。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、もちろん（ビヤンシュール）。

engChrName: Hum de dum... Best to water 'em nice and good before the sun comes up.
engSearchText:
Hum de dum... Best to water 'em nice and good
before the sun comes up.
jpnChrName: ふんふふ～ん……♪ 日が高くなる前に水をやってと……
jpnSearchText:
ふんふふ～ん……♪
日が高くなる前に水をやってと……

engChrName: Oh, wait no. They said there's a storm coming today. Hold the water, then!
engSearchText:
Oh, wait no. They said there's a storm coming today.
Hold the water, then!
jpnChrName: あ、今日は天気が崩れるんだっけ。 少なめにしておかないとね～！
jpnSearchText:
あ、今日は天気が崩れるんだっけ。
少なめにしておかないとね～！

engChrName: I'm really having a blast with this job! Hard to believe it's been half a year already—I don't feel burned out at all!
engSearchText:
I'm really having a blast with this job! Hard to believe
it's been half a year already—I don't feel burned out
at all!
jpnChrName: 花屋のバイト、やっぱり楽しいです♪ もう半年以上になるけど全然飽きなくて。
jpnSearchText:
花屋のバイト、やっぱり楽しいです♪
もう半年以上になるけど全然飽きなくて。

engChrName: Back in school, I really went all in on art and drawing and stuff... Thinking back on it, though, it wasn't really my 'thing.'
engSearchText:
Back in school, I really went all in on art and drawing
and stuff... Thinking back on it, though, it wasn't
really my 'thing.'
jpnChrName: 学生の頃は画家を目指していたんですけど…… 今から思うと、そう拘る必要もないかなって。
jpnSearchText:
学生の頃は画家を目指していたんですけど……
今から思うと、そう拘る必要もないかなって。

engChrName: I didn't have that natural talent for it like Jess does for music.
engSearchText:
I didn't have that natural talent for it like Jess does
for music.
jpnChrName: ジェスみたいに才能が あるわけでもないですしね。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスみたいに才能が
あるわけでもないですしね。

engChrName: I'm perfectly happy with this job...and our sharehouse, too. Keeps rent nice and low!
engSearchText:
I'm perfectly happy with this job...and our
sharehouse, too. Keeps rent nice and low!
jpnChrName: シェアハウスのお陰で 家賃も安く上がってるし……
jpnSearchText:
シェアハウスのお陰で
家賃も安く上がってるし……

engChrName: This job makes me happy and lets me live with Jess and my sister, and that's all I can ask for. Being a florist isn't so bad, after all!
engSearchText:
This job makes me happy and lets me live with Jess
and my sister, and that's all I can ask for. Being a
florist isn't so bad, after all!
jpnChrName: ふふ、姉さんやジェスとのんびり暮らしていくなら 花屋のバイトは天職かもですね♪
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、姉さんやジェスとのんびり暮らしていくなら
花屋のバイトは天職かもですね♪

engChrName: Huh, usually Carol's home by now... I guess she went straight to Riverside for Jess' concert.
engSearchText:
Huh, usually Carol's home by now... I guess she went
straight to Riverside for Jess' concert.
jpnChrName: 姉さんは帰ってないか……職場からリバーサイドに 直行して、ジェスの公演を観てるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
姉さんは帰ってないか……職場からリバーサイドに
直行して、ジェスの公演を観てるみたいですね。

engChrName: She never misses a show. Talk about passionate, right? I hope Jess catches on to her eventually, for her sake.
engSearchText:
She never misses a show. Talk about
passionate, right? I hope Jess catches on to her
eventually, for her sake.
jpnChrName: いつも欠かさず熱心っていうか。 ふふ、上手くやってるといいけど。
jpnSearchText:
いつも欠かさず熱心っていうか。
ふふ、上手くやってるといいけど。

engChrName: He can be a bit...well, oblivious to that kinda stuff.
engSearchText: He can be a bit...well, oblivious to that kinda stuff.
jpnChrName: ………でもジェスは鈍いからな………
jpnSearchText: ………でもジェスは鈍いからな………

engChrName: Maybe I should give him a little nudge? Wingman for Carol, perhaps? Eh...
engSearchText:
Maybe I should give him a little nudge? Wingman for
Carol, perhaps? Eh...
jpnChrName: ふう、さすがに背中を押すべきかな…… う～ん、でもなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、さすがに背中を押すべきかな……
う～ん、でもなぁ……

engChrName: Jess and I go all the way back to school—we even shared a dorm room.
engSearchText:
Jess and I go all the way back to school—we even
shared a dorm room.
jpnChrName: ジェスとは学生時代からの付き合いで。 寮でも同室だったくらいなんです。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスとは学生時代からの付き合いで。
寮でも同室だったくらいなんです。

engChrName: So I've come to learn how...dense he is. My sister's advances just bounce right off that thick skull of his.
engSearchText:
So I've come to learn how...dense he is. My sister's
advances just bounce right off that thick skull of his.
jpnChrName: だから確実に言える── ジェスは姉さんの気持ちに気づいてないって。
jpnSearchText:
だから確実に言える──
ジェスは姉さんの気持ちに気づいてないって。

engChrName: Maybe I should give him a hint or two, but... Well, maybe not...
engSearchText:
Maybe I should give him a hint or two, but...
Well, maybe not...
jpnChrName: さすがに背中を押すべきかな…… ……う～ん、でもなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
さすがに背中を押すべきかな……
……う～ん、でもなぁ……

engChrName: (*sigh* My sister's just too nice. I worry he's gonna break that heart of hers.)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* My sister's just too nice. I worry he's gonna
break that heart of hers.)
jpnChrName: （ふう、姉さんは優しいけど   そこがたまに心配になりますよ～。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふう、姉さんは優しいけど
そこがたまに心配になりますよ～。）

engChrName: (She acts like she's on top of things, but she can be a bit of a ditz, actually... It's pretty cute of her, though. Heh.)
engSearchText:
(She acts like she's on top of things, but she can be a
bit of a ditz, actually... It's pretty cute of her, though.
Heh.)
jpnChrName: （しっかりしてそうで抜けてる所もあるし……   まあ、そこも姉さんの魅力なんですけどね♪）
jpnSearchText:
（しっかりしてそうで抜けてる所もあるし……
まあ、そこも姉さんの魅力なんですけどね♪）

engChrName: Right, Jess is heading out to work. I'll see him off, why not?
engSearchText:
Right, Jess is heading out to work. I'll see him off,
why not?
jpnChrName: さてと、ジェスも仕事に行くみたいだし 軽く見送りでもしようかな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、ジェスも仕事に行くみたいだし
軽く見送りでもしようかな。

engChrName: Nice that our house is so close! Really makes our commutes easier.
engSearchText:
Nice that our house is so close! Really makes our
commutes easier.
jpnChrName: ふふ、家が近いと 何かと融通が利いて助かりますよ～！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、家が近いと
何かと融通が利いて助かりますよ～！

engChrName: Heya, Van! Welcome! Tell you what, how'd you like some gerbera daisies today?
engSearchText:
Heya, Van! Welcome! Tell you what, how'd you like
some gerbera daisies today?
jpnChrName: やあヴァンさん、いらっしゃい！ 今日はガーベラなんていかがですか？
jpnSearchText:
やあヴァンさん、いらっしゃい！
今日はガーベラなんていかがですか？

engChrName: In the language of flowers, they symbolize progress and hope. Perfect for a nice, optimistic autumn day like this one, no?
engSearchText:
In the language of flowers, they symbolize progress
and hope. Perfect for a nice, optimistic autumn day
like this one, no?
jpnChrName: 花言葉は『進歩』、そして『希望』── 今朝みたいな秋晴れの日にはぴったりかと♪
jpnSearchText:
花言葉は『進歩』、そして『希望』──
今朝みたいな秋晴れの日にはぴったりかと♪

engChrName: Quite the sales pitch, there. No wonder you're popular with the flowery types.
engSearchText:
Quite the sales pitch, there. No wonder you're
popular with the flowery types.
jpnChrName: 相変わらず売り文句が上手いな。 女性陣に人気なのも頷けるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
相変わらず売り文句が上手いな。
女性陣に人気なのも頷けるぜ。

engChrName: Indeed. This little shop is quite lovely!
engSearchText: Indeed. This little shop is quite lovely!
jpnChrName: 確かに、凄く人気がおありなんですね。
jpnSearchText: 確かに、凄く人気がおありなんですね。

engChrName: Haha... Well, today's a bit different. Word's gotten out about what I'm whipping up...
engSearchText:
Haha... Well, today's a bit different. Word's gotten
out about what I'm whipping up...
jpnChrName: はは、今日はちょっと特別ですかね。 試作中の“アレ”の噂が広がったみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
はは、今日はちょっと特別ですかね。
試作中の“アレ”の噂が広がったみたいで……

engChrName: I'm using some flower nectar to make sweet muffins! They're going on sale today.
engSearchText:
I'm using some flower nectar to make sweet muffins!
They're going on sale today.
jpnChrName: 花の蜜を使った特製スイートマフィン、 実は今日から販売予定なんですよ♪
jpnSearchText:
花の蜜を使った特製スイートマフィン、
実は今日から販売予定なんですよ♪

engChrName: *twitch* ...What muffins?
engSearchText: *twitch* ...What muffins?

engChrName: Huh? Sweet mu... Ohh, right, you've got a sweet tooth, don't you?
engSearchText:
Huh? Sweet mu... Ohh, right, you've got a sweet
tooth, don't you?
jpnChrName: あはは、甘いものがお好きなんでしたっけ。
jpnSearchText: あはは、甘いものがお好きなんでしたっけ。

engChrName: They go on sale this afternoon, but do you want me to set some aside for you?
engSearchText:
They go on sale this afternoon, but do you want me
to set some aside for you?
jpnChrName: 並べるのは午後からの予定なんですけど…… 良かったら取り置きしておきましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
並べるのは午後からの予定なんですけど……
良かったら取り置きしておきましょうか？

engChrName: You're a good man, Raymond. Never forget that.
engSearchText: You're a good man, Raymond. Never forget that.
jpnChrName: ああ、その段取りで頼む。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その段取りで頼む。

engChrName: I-I'm happy for you. More desserts are, umm...never a bad thing?
engSearchText:
I-I'm happy for you. More desserts are, umm...never a
bad thing?
jpnChrName: よ、良かったですね。 デザートが一品増えて……
jpnSearchText:
よ、良かったですね。
デザートが一品増えて……

engChrName: Seeing people so excited for my sweets makes all the hard work feel worth it, haha!
engSearchText:
Seeing people so excited for my sweets makes all the
hard work feel worth it, haha!
jpnChrName: はは、皆さんが楽しみにしてくれてると思うと お菓子作りにも気合が入りますね！
jpnSearchText:
はは、皆さんが楽しみにしてくれてると思うと
お菓子作りにも気合が入りますね！

engChrName: I'm just a part-timer, for reference—I don't own the place.
engSearchText:
I'm just a part-timer, for reference—I don't own
the place.
jpnChrName: ちなみに僕はバイトで、 オーナーは別にいらっしゃるんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに僕はバイトで、
オーナーは別にいらっしゃるんですけど……

engChrName: But the owner gives me free reign to do whatever. It's nice and relaxing, and pretty fun, too!
engSearchText:
But the owner gives me free reign to do whatever.
It's nice and relaxing, and pretty fun, too!
jpnChrName: 結構好きにやらせてもらっているので 毎日楽しいですよ。
jpnSearchText:
結構好きにやらせてもらっているので
毎日楽しいですよ。

engChrName: Plus it's not even a minute from my house. No commute for me—just an easy walk and some lovely flowers to take care of!
engSearchText:
Plus it's not even a minute from my house.
No commute for me—just an easy walk and some
lovely flowers to take care of!
jpnChrName: それに家からも徒歩でたった３０秒ですから。 お花の手入れもこまめにできちゃいます♪
jpnSearchText:
それに家からも徒歩でたった３０秒ですから。
お花の手入れもこまめにできちゃいます♪

engChrName: I never planned on coming back here...
engSearchText: I never planned on coming back here...
jpnChrName: ここにはもう二度と帰って来ない つもりでいたんだけどな……
jpnSearchText:
ここにはもう二度と帰って来ない
つもりでいたんだけどな……

engChrName: ...and yet here I am, with my old friends in tow. It feels...strange.
engSearchText:
...and yet here I am, with my old friends in tow.
It feels...strange.
jpnChrName: しかも、レイモンドとキャロルに囲まれて…… なんだか不思議な気分だな。
jpnSearchText:
しかも、レイモンドとキャロルに囲まれて……
なんだか不思議な気分だな。

engChrName: Well...yeah. The heck do you mean, 'strange'? We're all home together, just as it should be.
engSearchText:
Well...yeah. The heck do you mean, 'strange'?
We're all home together, just as it should be.
jpnChrName: 何言ってるんだ、 僕たちの家なんだから当たり前だろ？
jpnSearchText:
何言ってるんだ、
僕たちの家なんだから当たり前だろ？

engChrName: You can't just up and leave without saying anything, you big dork!
engSearchText:
You can't just up and leave without saying anything,
you big dork!
jpnChrName: そうよ、勝手に家を出て行くなんて ルール違反なんだから。
jpnSearchText:
そうよ、勝手に家を出て行くなんて
ルール違反なんだから。

engChrName: I... Yeah. You're right. Sorry for worrying you.
engSearchText: I... Yeah. You're right. Sorry for worrying you.
jpnChrName: うん……心配かけて、本当にごめん。
jpnSearchText: うん……心配かけて、本当にごめん。

engChrName: Heh, you're a real handful sometimes, you know that?
engSearchText: Heh, you're a real handful sometimes, you know that?
jpnChrName: ふふ、世話の焼ける幼馴染だな。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、世話の焼ける幼馴染だな。

engChrName: Oh, right. I can't forget work! Now that we've found Jess, I gotta get back to business.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. I can't forget work! Now that we've found
Jess, I gotta get back to business.
jpnChrName: っと……そうだ、ジェスが見つかったからには バイト先を手伝いに行こうかな。
jpnSearchText:
っと……そうだ、ジェスが見つかったからには
バイト先を手伝いに行こうかな。

engChrName: Ah! Right, and I need to get back to the store!
engSearchText: Ah! Right, and I need to get back to the store!
jpnChrName: あっ！　それを言ったら私も 店に戻らないといけないんだったわ！
jpnSearchText:
あっ！　それを言ったら私も
店に戻らないといけないんだったわ！

engChrName: Actually, though...why don't we get together for the festival tonight? I think that'd be fun! It'd help us unwind after everything.
engSearchText:
Actually, though...why don't we get together for the
festival tonight? I think that'd be fun! It'd help us
unwind after everything.
jpnChrName: ああでも待って、今日は折角の記念祭なんだもの。 夜は皆で仲直りのパーティーをしない？
jpnSearchText:
ああでも待って、今日は折角の記念祭なんだもの。
夜は皆で仲直りのパーティーをしない？

engChrName: Haha... Sounds like a plan.
engSearchText: Haha... Sounds like a plan.
jpnChrName: はは……それはいい考えだね。
jpnSearchText: はは……それはいい考えだね。

engChrName: Heck yeah!
engSearchText: Heck yeah!
jpnChrName: 僕も賛成だよ！
jpnSearchText: 僕も賛成だよ！

engChrName: Today's probably gonna be pretty rough at work, though.
engSearchText:
Today's probably gonna be pretty rough at
work, though.
jpnChrName: その為にも昼間は忙しくなりそうだな。
jpnSearchText: その為にも昼間は忙しくなりそうだな。

engChrName: Yeah, we're gonna be busy. Let's think of what kind of dinner we can make while we're all at work!
engSearchText:
Yeah, we're gonna be busy. Let's think of what kind
of dinner we can make while we're all at work!
jpnChrName: ええ、仕事も勿論だけど それぞれ美味しい物を用意しておきましょ！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、仕事も勿論だけど
それぞれ美味しい物を用意しておきましょ！

engChrName: J-Jess, he... He saved me, but he's hurt! He needs help!
engSearchText:
J-Jess, he... He saved me, but he's hurt! He
needs help!
jpnChrName: ジェスが、ジェスが僕を庇って……！
jpnSearchText: ジェスが、ジェスが僕を庇って……！

engChrName: I understand. Let me tend to him. I promise you, Jess will be all right.
engSearchText:
I understand. Let me tend to him. I promise you, Jess
will be all right.
jpnChrName: 分かりました、どうか私に任せて。 ……大丈夫、きっと助かりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
分かりました、どうか私に任せて。
……大丈夫、きっと助かりますよ。

engChrName: Wait, Father, what're you doing here? This ain't a good spot. You'd better get back inside—
engSearchText:
Wait, Father, what're you doing here? This ain't a
good spot. You'd better get back inside—
jpnChrName: 教区長、こんな所に…… 今は外を出歩かれない方が──
jpnSearchText:
教区長、こんな所に……
今は外を出歩かれない方が──

engChrName: Ah, thank goodness. It puts my heart at ease to see you all safe.
engSearchText:
Ah, thank goodness. It puts my heart at ease to see
you all safe.
jpnChrName: ヴァン君、皆さん。 戻っていたのですね、本当に良かった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン君、皆さん。
戻っていたのですね、本当に良かった。

engChrName: Please, worry not for me.
engSearchText: Please, worry not for me.
jpnChrName: 私の事なら心配には及びませんよ。
jpnSearchText: 私の事なら心配には及びませんよ。

engChrName: It may surprise you to learn that I'm a Thaumaturge myself—I learned well from the church.
engSearchText:
It may surprise you to learn that I'm a Thaumaturge
myself—I learned well from the church.
jpnChrName: こう見えて、教会に伝わる 《法術》をかじった事がありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
こう見えて、教会に伝わる
《法術》をかじった事がありましてね。

engChrName: I can hold my own against these foul creatures. Leave this place to me, and continue on your way.
engSearchText:
I can hold my own against these foul creatures.
Leave this place to me, and continue on your way.
jpnChrName: 邪悪なるものを退ける事くらいはできましょう。 こちらは任せて、皆さんはどうか先へ。
jpnSearchText:
邪悪なるものを退ける事くらいはできましょう。
こちらは任せて、皆さんはどうか先へ。

engChrName: Well...if you say so, I guess. Stay safe!
engSearchText: Well...if you say so, I guess. Stay safe!
jpnChrName: ……っ……分かりました、 ここはお言葉に甘えさせてもらいますよ！
jpnSearchText:
……っ……分かりました、
ここはお言葉に甘えさせてもらいますよ！

engChrName: Please be careful!
engSearchText: Please be careful!
jpnChrName: どうかくれぐれもお気をつけて！
jpnSearchText: どうかくれぐれもお気をつけて！

engChrName: Wait, what? Why me? You don't want someone else to draw the jacket cover?
engSearchText:
Wait, what? Why me? You don't want someone else
to draw the jacket cover?
jpnChrName: えっ……新曲レコードのジャケットを 描いて欲しいって……？
jpnSearchText:
えっ……新曲レコードのジャケットを
描いて欲しいって……？

engChrName: Yeah. I want it to be you... It has to be.
engSearchText: Yeah. I want it to be you... It has to be.
jpnChrName: ……ああ。 レイモンドに頼みたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ。
レイモンドに頼みたいんだ。

engChrName: Look, I get I drew a lot back in school, and it'd be fun to do some promo art like that, but...
engSearchText:
Look, I get I drew a lot back in school, and it'd be fun
to do some promo art like that, but...
jpnChrName: そりゃあ画家を目指してたしさ、 絵の仕事をもらえるのは嬉しいけど……
jpnSearchText:
そりゃあ画家を目指してたしさ、
絵の仕事をもらえるのは嬉しいけど……

engChrName: ...Umm, Jess?
engSearchText: ...Umm, Jess?
jpnChrName: ……えっと、ジェス？
jpnSearchText: ……えっと、ジェス？

engChrName: (Man, it bugs me when he goes all quiet out of nowhere. I just can't tell what he's thinking.)
engSearchText:
(Man, it bugs me when he goes all quiet out
of nowhere. I just can't tell what he's thinking.)
jpnChrName: （……ジェスって時々黙っちゃうんだよな……   真意がよく分からないっていうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ジェスって時々黙っちゃうんだよな……
真意がよく分からないっていうか。）

engChrName: (This could make or break his new record... It's a really big deal! Am I really the right guy for the job?)
engSearchText:
(This could make or break his new record... It's a
really big deal! Am I really the right guy for the job?)
jpnChrName: （それにレコードの売り上げを左右する大役──   本当に僕でいいのかな……？）
jpnSearchText:
（それにレコードの売り上げを左右する大役──
本当に僕でいいのかな……？）

engChrName: I just... Give me some time to think it over. I dunno what to say...
engSearchText:
I just... Give me some time to think it over. I dunno
what to say...
jpnChrName: う～ん、少なくとも急すぎっていうか…… 少し考えさせてもらってもいい？
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、少なくとも急すぎっていうか……
少し考えさせてもらってもいい？

engChrName: All right. I just don't see anyone else being fit for the job.
engSearchText:
All right. I just don't see anyone else being fit for
the job.
jpnChrName: 分かった……でも僕は レイモンド以外に頼むつもりは無いから。
jpnSearchText:
分かった……でも僕は
レイモンド以外に頼むつもりは無いから。

engChrName: (Hah, stubborn as ever. He never changes.)
engSearchText: (Hah, stubborn as ever. He never changes.)
jpnChrName: （はは、相変わらずガンコだなぁ……   まあジェスらしいと言えばらしいけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（はは、相変わらずガンコだなぁ……
まあジェスらしいと言えばらしいけど。）

engChrName: Welcome! Care to buy a three-leaf clover to celebrate the festival today?
engSearchText:
Welcome! Care to buy a three-leaf clover to celebrate
the festival today?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、今日は革命記念日用に 三つ葉のクローブを置いているわよ。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、今日は革命記念日用に
三つ葉のクローブを置いているわよ。

engChrName: You can see them on the Calvardian flag as a symbol of the revolution. They make for wonderful souvenirs!
engSearchText:
You can see them on the Calvardian flag as a symbol
of the revolution. They make for
wonderful souvenirs!
jpnChrName: 共和国の国旗にもなっている 民主化革命の象徴──
jpnSearchText:
共和国の国旗にもなっている
民主化革命の象徴──

engChrName: You can even take them home and display them on your porches or window sills. Feel free to pick one up for yourself!
engSearchText:
You can even take them home and display them on
your porches or window sills. Feel free to pick one up
for yourself!
jpnChrName: 軒先に飾ったりする人もいるわね。 良ければ見ていって頂戴。
jpnSearchText:
軒先に飾ったりする人もいるわね。
良ければ見ていって頂戴。

engChrName: So I was going to ask Raymond to take a shift today...
engSearchText: So I was going to ask Raymond to take a shift today...
jpnChrName: それにしても、今日もレイモンド君に バイトをお願いしようと思っていたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、今日もレイモンド君に
バイトをお願いしようと思っていたんだけど……

engChrName: ...but he canceled on me—he said some urgent business came up. I hope he's all right...
engSearchText:
...but he canceled on me—he said some urgent
business came up. I hope he's all right...
jpnChrName: 急用とかでキャンセルになってしまったの。 う～ん、何かあったのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
急用とかでキャンセルになってしまったの。
う～ん、何かあったのかしら……

engChrName: Thank the Goddess...! *sniffle* I'm so glad you're all right!
engSearchText:
Thank the Goddess...! *sniffle* I'm so glad you're
all right!
jpnChrName: 本当に良かったわ……ぐすっ…… また元気な顔を見せてくれて。
jpnSearchText:
本当に良かったわ……ぐすっ……
また元気な顔を見せてくれて。

engChrName: I can't believe Harry did that... I'm so happy he was around!
engSearchText:
I can't believe Harry did that... I'm so happy he
was around!
jpnChrName: ハリーのお陰ね、あとであの子にも お礼を言っておかないと。
jpnSearchText:
ハリーのお陰ね、あとであの子にも
お礼を言っておかないと。

engChrName: Y-Yeah. Harry saved me...
engSearchText: Y-Yeah. Harry saved me...
jpnChrName: う、うん、ハリーには助けられたけど……
jpnSearchText: う、うん、ハリーには助けられたけど……

engChrName: (He's always so feisty, but...that saved me. When things calm down, I wanna go thank him...)
engSearchText:
(He's always so feisty, but...that saved me.
When things calm down, I wanna go thank him...)
jpnChrName: （無茶ばかりするけど、今回はお陰で……   ……落ち着いたらお礼を言っとこっかな……）
jpnSearchText:
（無茶ばかりするけど、今回はお陰で……
……落ち着いたらお礼を言っとこっかな……）

engChrName: What in the world is going on...?
engSearchText: What in the world is going on...?
jpnChrName: 本当に……何が起きているのかしら……
jpnSearchText: 本当に……何が起きているのかしら……

engChrName: My husband should be okay once we get his injuries patched up, but...where are the kids?
engSearchText:
My husband should be okay once we get his injuries
patched up, but...where are the kids?
jpnChrName: 主人の怪我は大した事なさそうだけど…… ……ああ、子供たちが……
jpnSearchText:
主人の怪我は大した事なさそうだけど……
……ああ、子供たちが……

engChrName: Sheena, Mark... Paulette, Yumé... Please, PLEASE be safe...!
engSearchText:
Sheena, Mark... Paulette, Yumé... Please, PLEASE
be safe...!
jpnChrName: シーナ、マーク…… ポーレットとユメちゃんも無事でいて……！
jpnSearchText:
シーナ、マーク……
ポーレットとユメちゃんも無事でいて……！

engChrName: It's been quite some time since I sat down and had lunch at Montmart.
engSearchText:
It's been quite some time since I sat down and had
lunch at Montmart.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、モンマルトで 昼食にするのも久々かしら。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、モンマルトで
昼食にするのも久々かしら。

engChrName: I grew up together with Paulette and my husband, right here in Old Town.
engSearchText:
I grew up together with Paulette and my husband,
right here in Old Town.
jpnChrName: 主人もポーレットも幼馴染なのよね。 同じ旧市街育ちの♪
jpnSearchText:
主人もポーレットも幼馴染なのよね。
同じ旧市街育ちの♪

engChrName: So seeing Sheena and Mark having fun together... It makes me a bit nostalgic for my own younger days.
engSearchText:
So seeing Sheena and Mark having fun together...
It makes me a bit nostalgic for my own younger days.
jpnChrName: だからうちのシーナとマークを見ていると なんだか懐かしい気分になるわね。
jpnSearchText:
だからうちのシーナとマークを見ていると
なんだか懐かしい気分になるわね。

engChrName: Happy Revolution Festival Day!
engSearchText: Happy Revolution Festival Day!
jpnChrName: 革命記念日おめでとう！
jpnSearchText: 革命記念日おめでとう！

engChrName: You, too!
engSearchText: You, too!
engHtmlText: ロビンソン＆マーガレット
jpnChrName: おめでとう～！！
jpnSearchText: おめでとう～！！

engChrName: Ah, the nostalgia... How long has it been since we terrorized the festival together?
engSearchText:
Ah, the nostalgia... How long has it been since we
terrorized the festival together?
jpnChrName: にしてもお前らと記念祭を回るなんて 何年振りだろうなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
にしてもお前らと記念祭を回るなんて
何年振りだろうなぁ。

engChrName: Man, gotta be at least ten years... We haven't gone out and done that since the kids were born, have we?
engSearchText:
Man, gotta be at least ten years... We haven't gone
out and done that since the kids were born, have we?
jpnChrName: 子供が生まれる前だから……十年以上前か？ ハハ、隣同士だってのにな。
jpnSearchText:
子供が生まれる前だから……十年以上前か？
ハハ、隣同士だってのにな。

engChrName: Well, no better time than now! Let's hit the town, just like old times!
engSearchText:
Well, no better time than now! Let's hit the town,
just like old times!
jpnChrName: 今日はお隣同士、幼馴染同士 ゆっくり回るとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
今日はお隣同士、幼馴染同士
ゆっくり回るとしましょうか。

engChrName: It'd be a lovely chance to catch up on things. I'd love to hear how your kids are doing these days!
engSearchText:
It'd be a lovely chance to catch up on things. I'd love
to hear how your kids are doing these days!
jpnChrName: 最近の子供たちの様子も聞きたいし♪
jpnSearchText: 最近の子供たちの様子も聞きたいし♪

engChrName: Sounds good to me. Let's make this festival one to remember for us old-timers!
engSearchText:
Sounds good to me. Let's make this festival one to
remember for us old-timers!
jpnChrName: ああ、久々に二家族会議といくかね！
jpnSearchText: ああ、久々に二家族会議といくかね！

engChrName: Speaking of the kids, have Harry and Sheena been getting along?
engSearchText:
Speaking of the kids, have Harry and Sheena been
getting along?
jpnChrName: 子供たちと言えば…… ハリーとシーナ、最近どうなんだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
子供たちと言えば……
ハリーとシーナ、最近どうなんだろうな？

engChrName: Oh, they're fine. Hah, they remind me of us when we were kids. Sheena can be a bit pushy, but, well...
engSearchText:
Oh, they're fine. Hah, they remind me of us when we
were kids. Sheena can be a bit pushy, but, well...
jpnChrName: ハハ、昔の俺たちを思い出すよな。 シーナはちょっと気が強いが──
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、昔の俺たちを思い出すよな。
シーナはちょっと気が強いが──

engChrName: And why might you be looking at me, mister?
engSearchText: And why might you be looking at me, mister?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、なにかしら貴方？ こちらを見ないでくださる？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、なにかしら貴方？
こちらを見ないでくださる？

engChrName: Err, no special reason! (Like mother, like daughter. Even their crazy smiles are the same.)
engSearchText:
Err, no special reason!
(Like mother, like daughter. Even their crazy smiles
are the same.)
jpnChrName: いやぁ、何でもないさ！　ハハハ！ （流石は母娘……この笑顔もそっくりだな。）
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、何でもないさ！　ハハハ！
（流石は母娘……この笑顔もそっくりだな。）

engChrName: I haven't heard anything about Riverside... I hope the kids are okay...
engSearchText:
I haven't heard anything about Riverside... I hope the
kids are okay...
jpnChrName: リバーサイドはどうなっているのかしら…… ……あの子達、無事だといいけど……
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイドはどうなっているのかしら……
……あの子達、無事だといいけど……

engChrName: Damn it, if only we had a car, then I could pick them up myself!
engSearchText:
Damn it, if only we had a car, then I could pick them
up myself!
jpnChrName: くっ、せめて車さえあれば 迎えに行けるんだが……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、せめて車さえあれば
迎えに行けるんだが……！

engChrName: Looks like the monsters have died down a little...
engSearchText: Looks like the monsters have died down a little...
jpnChrName: 化け物共の数も減ったそうだし、 ひとまず家に向かって──
jpnSearchText:
化け物共の数も減ったそうだし、
ひとまず家に向かって──

engChrName: We just gotta pray the kids are all right.
engSearchText: We just gotta pray the kids are all right.
jpnChrName: 今はあの子たちの無事を 信じるしかないな……
jpnSearchText:
今はあの子たちの無事を
信じるしかないな……

engChrName: Paulette and Yumé are out there, too... They have to be okay! They can't just...!
engSearchText:
Paulette and Yumé are out there, too... They have to
be okay! They can't just...!
jpnChrName: ポーレットやユメちゃんも…… ううん、きっとどこかで無事よ……！
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットやユメちゃんも……
ううん、きっとどこかで無事よ……！

engChrName: Let's try and get things squared away here, instead of sitting about. We need first aid, we need food...
engSearchText:
Let's try and get things squared away here, instead of
sitting about. We need first aid, we need food...
jpnChrName: せめて俺たちも備えておこう…… 救急セット、それに食料も……
jpnSearchText:
せめて俺たちも備えておこう……
救急セット、それに食料も……

engChrName: Sounds good. I'll check up on the others!
engSearchText: Sounds good. I'll check up on the others!
jpnChrName: ああ、みんなに声掛けしていくか……！
jpnSearchText: ああ、みんなに声掛けしていくか……！

engChrName: Please, wait! You shouldn't go outside yet!
engSearchText: Please, wait! You shouldn't go outside yet!
jpnChrName: 待ってください、 まだ外には出ない方が……！
jpnSearchText:
待ってください、
まだ外には出ない方が……！

engChrName: What she said. We're heading over to Riverside after we clear things out here.
engSearchText:
What she said. We're heading over to Riverside after
we clear things out here.
jpnChrName: だな……リバーサイドなら この後向かうつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
だな……リバーサイドなら
この後向かうつもりだ。

engChrName: We'll look for Paulette and the kids once we're there, okay?
engSearchText:
We'll look for Paulette and the kids once we're
there, okay?
jpnChrName: よけりゃ俺たちで様子を見てくるが──
jpnSearchText: よけりゃ俺たちで様子を見てくるが──

engChrName: R-Really?!
engSearchText: R-Really?!
jpnChrName: ほ、本当かい……！？
jpnSearchText: ほ、本当かい……！？

engChrName: That would be a massive help! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: That would be a massive help! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: それは願ってもない…… どうかよろしくお願いする！！
jpnSearchText:
それは願ってもない……
どうかよろしくお願いする！！

engChrName: Thank you, from the bottom of my heart!
engSearchText: Thank you, from the bottom of my heart!
jpnChrName: あの子たちの事、 よろしくお願いいたします……！
jpnSearchText:
あの子たちの事、
よろしくお願いいたします……！

engChrName: Harry's parents, yeah? Can't blame 'em for being worried.
engSearchText:
Harry's parents, yeah? Can't blame 'em for
being worried.
jpnChrName: ハリーたちの親御さんだな。 こっちはこっちで心配してたようだが……
jpnSearchText:
ハリーたちの親御さんだな。
こっちはこっちで心配してたようだが……

engChrName: Might be faster to just use my car and give 'em a ride back.
engSearchText:
Might be faster to just use my car and give 'em a
ride back.
jpnChrName: 車もある、こうなったら 連れてきちまった方が早そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
車もある、こうなったら
連れてきちまった方が早そうだな。

engChrName: Yeah! Let's give them a ride home!
engSearchText: Yeah! Let's give them a ride home!
jpnChrName: はいっ！　ハリーたちを 送ってあげましょう！！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！　ハリーたちを
送ってあげましょう！！

engChrName: Pain in the dick, but it beats having them run around and get smoked by some monster. Let's get 'er done!
engSearchText:
Pain in the dick, but it beats having them run around
and get smoked by some monster. Let's get 'er done!
jpnChrName: 面倒だがその方が後腐れもねえか。 ──ならとっとと片付けるかよ！
jpnSearchText:
面倒だがその方が後腐れもねえか。
──ならとっとと片付けるかよ！

engChrName: Van and company made haste to Riverside, where they found the Old Town children, and ferried them back home.
engSearchText:
Van and company made haste to Riverside, where
they found the Old Town children, and ferried
them back home.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァン達はリバーサイドに向かい、 旧市街の子供たちを乗せてきたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァン達はリバーサイドに向かい、
旧市街の子供たちを乗せてきたのだった。

engChrName: And that's all my shopping done! Thank you for your help, Sheena.
engSearchText:
And that's all my shopping done! Thank you for your
help, Sheena.
jpnChrName: 買い出し終了っと。 ふふっ、助かったわシーナ。
jpnSearchText:
買い出し終了っと。
ふふっ、助かったわシーナ。

engChrName: No problem!
engSearchText: No problem!
jpnChrName: どーいたしましてっ！
jpnSearchText: どーいたしましてっ！

engChrName: So, why DID you buy so much, Mom?
engSearchText: So, why DID you buy so much, Mom?
jpnChrName: でもお母さん、今日はこんなに 沢山買い込んで……どうするつもりなの？
jpnSearchText:
でもお母さん、今日はこんなに
沢山買い込んで……どうするつもりなの？

engChrName: Because the festival's coming up, silly!
engSearchText: Because the festival's coming up, silly!
jpnChrName: あら忘れたの、シーナ？
jpnSearchText: あら忘れたの、シーナ？

engChrName: And as per tradition, I'm cooking up dishes for the whole neighborhood.
engSearchText:
And as per tradition, I'm cooking up dishes for the
whole neighborhood.
jpnChrName: 記念祭にはお料理をして、 ご近所に配らないといけないでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
記念祭にはお料理をして、
ご近所に配らないといけないでしょ？

engChrName: Oh, right, you DO do that every year.
engSearchText: Oh, right, you DO do that every year.
jpnChrName: あ、そっか……記念祭の贈り物の風習、 うちはお母さんの料理なんだっけ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、そっか……記念祭の贈り物の風習、
うちはお母さんの料理なんだっけ。

engChrName: Why don't you try cooking something this year, Sheena?
engSearchText:
Why don't you try cooking something this
year, Sheena?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、今年はシーナも なにかお料理してみたら？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、今年はシーナも
なにかお料理してみたら？

engChrName: You could give it to someone you really like.
engSearchText: You could give it to someone you really like.
jpnChrName: 身近な人に贈ってみたり、ね♪
jpnSearchText: 身近な人に贈ってみたり、ね♪

engChrName: (Someone I really like...? But... Mmgh...)
engSearchText: (Someone I really like...? But... Mmgh...)
jpnChrName: （み、身近な人……   うーん、でもなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
（み、身近な人……
うーん、でもなぁ……）

engChrName: You...don't have to think so hard about it. It can just be a friend!
engSearchText:
You...don't have to think so hard about it. It can just
be a friend!
jpnChrName: 難しく考えなくてもいいのに……
jpnSearchText: 難しく考えなくてもいいのに……

engChrName: You're a part of this neighborhood, too, so sooner or later, you'll be taking part anyway.
engSearchText:
You're a part of this neighborhood, too, so sooner or
later, you'll be taking part anyway.
jpnChrName: ご近所付き合いなんだから、 いずれシーナもやらなくちゃいけない事よ？
jpnSearchText:
ご近所付き合いなんだから、
いずれシーナもやらなくちゃいけない事よ？

engChrName: I-I know, I know! Just...
engSearchText: I-I know, I know! Just...
jpnChrName: ううっ、そ、そうかもだけど……！
jpnSearchText: ううっ、そ、そうかもだけど……！

engChrName: (Ugh... I just know Harry's gonna get the wrong idea if I give him food I made myself.)
engSearchText:
(Ugh... I just know Harry's gonna get the wrong idea
if I give him food I made myself.)
jpnChrName: （ハリーのやつ、手料理渡したら   変な誤解したりしないわよね……？）
jpnSearchText:
（ハリーのやつ、手料理渡したら
変な誤解したりしないわよね……？）

engChrName: *sigh* I posted the request, but is anyone really gonna take it?
engSearchText:
*sigh* I posted the request, but is anyone really gonna
take it?
jpnChrName: ふぅ……依頼は出してみたけど、 本当に来てくれるのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……依頼は出してみたけど、
本当に来てくれるのかな……？

engChrName: I'll try and loop back with Daniel.
engSearchText: I'll try and loop back with Daniel.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ僕は ダニエルに連絡をとってみますね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ僕は
ダニエルに連絡をとってみますね。

engChrName: If I find anything out, I'll give you a call!
engSearchText: If I find anything out, I'll give you a call!
jpnChrName: 何か分かったら皆さんに 連絡させてもらいます……！
jpnSearchText:
何か分かったら皆さんに
連絡させてもらいます……！

engChrName: I really dodged a bullet there... If I hadn't been able to apologize to him, who knows what would've happened...
engSearchText:
I really dodged a bullet there... If I hadn't been able to
apologize to him, who knows what
would've happened...
jpnChrName: あのままジェスに謝れずにいたらと 思うとゾッとしちゃうわ。
jpnSearchText:
あのままジェスに謝れずにいたらと
思うとゾッとしちゃうわ。

engChrName: It's made me realize that I have to be more honest with myself...and with other people. I can't just bottle up my feelings forever.
engSearchText:
It's made me realize that I have to be more honest
with myself...and with other people. I can't just bottle
up my feelings forever.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと向き合わなくちゃ駄目だって…… 後悔を残しちゃ駄目だって、勉強になっちゃった。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと向き合わなくちゃ駄目だって……
後悔を残しちゃ駄目だって、勉強になっちゃった。

engChrName: So tonight, we're putting all that to rest for good with a big old party! I'll look for a good present once I'm done with work.
engSearchText:
So tonight, we're putting all that to rest for good with
a big old party! I'll look for a good present once I'm
done with work.
jpnChrName: だからこそ、まずは今夜の仲直りパーティよね！ 仕事終わりにプレゼントでも探してみようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ、まずは今夜の仲直りパーティよね！
仕事終わりにプレゼントでも探してみようかしら。

engChrName: It's just been busy day after busy day, what with EGC prep and all.
engSearchText:
It's just been busy day after busy day, what with EGC
prep and all.
jpnChrName: 《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の開催準備も大詰めで 連日忙しいんですが……
jpnSearchText:
《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の開催準備も大詰めで
連日忙しいんですが……

engChrName: But today, I get to slip out from work early! Heehee.
engSearchText: But today, I get to slip out from work early! Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、今日は早上がりさせて もらえる事になったんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、今日は早上がりさせて
もらえる事になったんです。

engChrName: Tonight, Jess has a big concert to celebrate his new record. I wouldn't miss it for the world!
engSearchText:
Tonight, Jess has a big concert to celebrate his
new record. I wouldn't miss it for the world!
jpnChrName: 実は今夜はジェスがメジャーデビュー記念の 公演をやることになっていて──
jpnSearchText:
実は今夜はジェスがメジャーデビュー記念の
公演をやることになっていて──

engChrName: I'm so excited, heehee! I gotta make sure I'm all ready.
engSearchText:
I'm so excited, heehee! I gotta make sure I'm
all ready.
jpnChrName: バッチリ準備して駆け付けないと！ ふふっ、待ち遠しいですね！
jpnSearchText:
バッチリ準備して駆け付けないと！
ふふっ、待ち遠しいですね！

engChrName: Welcome. We're still open here, for the time being.
engSearchText: Welcome. We're still open here, for the time being.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ。 当店は平常通り営業しております。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ。
当店は平常通り営業しております。

engChrName: We hope we don't have to close up shop, but the way things are going, we just can't say anything for certain...
engSearchText:
We hope we don't have to close up shop, but the way
things are going, we just can't say anything
for certain...
jpnChrName: ですが今後の情勢次第では 一時営業を見合わせる可能性も……
jpnSearchText:
ですが今後の情勢次第では
一時営業を見合わせる可能性も……

engChrName: Please be careful out there.
engSearchText: Please be careful out there.
jpnChrName: お客様もどうか 慎重に行動なさってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
お客様もどうか
慎重に行動なさってくださいね。

engChrName: At this rate, it's a coin flip whether or not the EGC goes forward at all...
engSearchText:
At this rate, it's a coin flip whether or not the EGC
goes forward at all...
jpnChrName: この分では今年の《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の 開催も危ぶまれますが……
jpnSearchText:
この分では今年の《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の
開催も危ぶまれますが……

engChrName: Be careful out there, all right?
engSearchText: Be careful out there, all right?
jpnChrName: ともかく、お客様もどうか 慎重に行動なさってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、お客様もどうか
慎重に行動なさってくださいね。

engChrName: *sniffle* Jess is just... He hits me right in the feels...!
engSearchText: *sniffle* Jess is just... He hits me right in the feels...!
jpnChrName: ………グスッ……ジェスってば……… 本気で泣かせに来るんだから……
jpnSearchText:
………グスッ……ジェスってば………
本気で泣かせに来るんだから……

engChrName: (And he's so cool. Gah, I feel like my heart's gonna jump outta my chest!)
engSearchText:
(And he's so cool. Gah, I feel like my heart's gonna
jump outta my chest!)
jpnChrName: （それにあんなにカッコ良くて……   ………もう胸が張り裂けそう………）
jpnSearchText:
（それにあんなにカッコ良くて……
………もう胸が張り裂けそう………）

engChrName: (I can't hold out much longer...!)
engSearchText: (I can't hold out much longer...!)
jpnChrName: （………やっぱり私これ以上は………）
jpnSearchText: （………やっぱり私これ以上は………）

engChrName: I managed to get some time off—shocking, I know. I've racked up a lot of overtime lately, so I had some leverage.
engSearchText:
I managed to get some time off—shocking, I know.
I've racked up a lot of overtime lately, so I had
some leverage.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、今日は珍しくお休みが取れたの。 近頃残業してるから店長が気を遣ってくれたみたい。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、今日は珍しくお休みが取れたの。
近頃残業してるから店長が気を遣ってくれたみたい。

engChrName: They're gonna use Jess' song as the opening for the EGC this year.
engSearchText:
They're gonna use Jess' song as the opening for the
EGC this year.
jpnChrName: ジェスの曲……《ＥＧＣ》のオープニングにも 正式に採用されてね。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスの曲……《ＥＧＣ》のオープニングにも
正式に採用されてね。

engChrName: That about sets it in stone: he's the next big star of the music world! Heehee.
engSearchText:
That about sets it in stone: he's the next big star of
the music world! Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、これでジェスの新作レコードも 大ヒット間違いなしかしら！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、これでジェスの新作レコードも
大ヒット間違いなしかしら！

engChrName: He's my little brother's best friend. He's stoic, he's reclusive... He's a bit awkward. But he has an incredible talent for music.
engSearchText:
He's my little brother's best friend. He's stoic,
he's reclusive... He's a bit awkward. But he has an
incredible talent for music.
jpnChrName: ……ジェスは、弟の親友で…… ストイックで不器用で、でも凄くて……
jpnSearchText:
……ジェスは、弟の親友で……
ストイックで不器用で、でも凄くて……

engChrName: I almost see him as more than a friend, like... something bigger.
engSearchText:
I almost see him as more than a friend, like...
something bigger.
jpnChrName: ……最初は弟が増えたみたいなものだって 思ってたのになぁ、ふふっ……
jpnSearchText:
……最初は弟が増えたみたいなものだって
思ってたのになぁ、ふふっ……

engChrName: But I've been bottling up my feelings for him for so long. My heart is aching... Is it just not meant to be?
engSearchText:
But I've been bottling up my feelings for him for
so long. My heart is aching... Is it just not meant
to be?
jpnChrName: どうしてこんなに切ないのかな…… もう黙っているのが辛いかも……
jpnSearchText:
どうしてこんなに切ないのかな……
もう黙っているのが辛いかも……

engChrName: Jess is really rising up the ranks. I'm really happy for him, but...
engSearchText:
Jess is really rising up the ranks. I'm really happy for
him, but...
jpnChrName: ジェスがどんどん成功して、 認められていくのは嬉しいけど……
jpnSearchText:
ジェスがどんどん成功して、
認められていくのは嬉しいけど……

engChrName: ...I'm down here, and my feelings for him are only getting stronger. Will he leave me behind...?
engSearchText:
...I'm down here, and my feelings for him are only
getting stronger. Will he leave me behind...?
jpnChrName: ジェスへの気持ちも どんどん大きくなっていく気がして……
jpnSearchText:
ジェスへの気持ちも
どんどん大きくなっていく気がして……

engChrName: I've been bottling up my feelings for him for so long. My heart is aching... Is it just not meant to be?
engSearchText:
I've been bottling up my feelings for him for so long.
My heart is aching... Is it just not meant to be?
jpnChrName: どうしてこんなに切ないのかな…… もう黙っているのが辛いかも……
jpnSearchText:
どうしてこんなに切ないのかな……
もう黙っているのが辛いかも……

engChrName: The amazing thing about the EGC is that all the clothes you see the models wearing, you can go and buy for yourself.
engSearchText:
The amazing thing about the EGC is that all the
clothes you see the models wearing, you can go and
buy for yourself.
jpnChrName: 《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の凄い所は、同じ会場内で モデルが着ていたアイテムを購入できるんです。
jpnSearchText:
《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の凄い所は、同じ会場内で
モデルが着ていたアイテムを購入できるんです。

engChrName: So it's more like an expo than a fashion show, and it's big PR for the brands. In the fashion industry, it's one of the biggest events of the year.
engSearchText:
So it's more like an expo than a fashion show, and it's
big PR for the brands. In the fashion industry, it's one
of the biggest events of the year.
jpnChrName: つまりブランドの大々的なＰＲにもなっていて── 年末の一大イベントといっても過言ではありません。
jpnSearchText:
つまりブランドの大々的なＰＲにもなっていて──
年末の一大イベントといっても過言ではありません。

engChrName: I'll be doing more than just attending this year—I'm helping out as a staff member!
engSearchText:
I'll be doing more than just attending this year—I'm
helping out as a staff member!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、実は私もスタッフとして参加するのは 初めてなんですけれどね♪
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、実は私もスタッフとして参加するのは
初めてなんですけれどね♪

engChrName: Just two months left until opening day... I gotta work hard. This needs to be everything that a girl could dream of!
engSearchText:
Just two months left until opening day... I gotta
work hard. This needs to be everything that a girl
could dream of!
jpnChrName: 開催まで二ヶ月……カルバード中の女の子たちの 期待に応えられるよう、準備も頑張らないとですね！
jpnSearchText:
開催まで二ヶ月……カルバード中の女の子たちの
期待に応えられるよう、準備も頑張らないとですね！

engChrName: Oh, Raymond. He can be so spoiled at times...
engSearchText: Oh, Raymond. He can be so spoiled at times...
jpnChrName: レイモンドったら、家じゃ甘えん坊なんだから……
jpnSearchText: レイモンドったら、家じゃ甘えん坊なんだから……

engChrName: (But he helps keep Jess and I in check... I'm really thankful for that. I dunno what I'd do without him.)
engSearchText:
(But he helps keep Jess and I in check... I'm really
thankful for that. I dunno what I'd do without him.)
jpnChrName: （でもまあ、ジェスとずっと二人きりだと   流石に心臓が持たないし、ありがたいのよね……）
jpnSearchText:
（でもまあ、ジェスとずっと二人きりだと
流石に心臓が持たないし、ありがたいのよね……）

engChrName: (He makes sure Jess eats properly, too...) A-Ahem!
engSearchText: (He makes sure Jess eats properly, too...) A-Ahem!
jpnChrName: （ジェスも一人じゃろくな食事を取らないし……） ──コホン、仕方ないなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
（ジェスも一人じゃろくな食事を取らないし……）
──コホン、仕方ないなぁ。

engChrName: Big sisters can cook, too! I'll whip up something nice today.
engSearchText:
