Big sisters can cook, too! I'll whip up something
nice today.
jpnChrName: 今日はお姉さんが 腕によりをかけてあげますか♪
jpnSearchText:
今日はお姉さんが
腕によりをかけてあげますか♪

engChrName: Welcome... Ah, you're the group I heard about!
engSearchText: Welcome... Ah, you're the group I heard about!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ…… ……ってあれ、解決事務所の！
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ……
……ってあれ、解決事務所の！

engChrName: If memory serves, you live in that sharehouse, right?
engSearchText: If memory serves, you live in that sharehouse, right?
jpnChrName: あ、確か旧市街で シェアハウスをされている……
jpnSearchText:
あ、確か旧市街で
シェアハウスをされている……

engChrName: Umm, oh! You live in that sharehouse place in Old Town, right?
engSearchText:
Umm, oh! You live in that sharehouse place in Old
Town, right?
jpnChrName: えっと、たしか旧市街で “シェアハウス”？　をされてる……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、たしか旧市街で
“シェアハウス”？　をされてる……

engChrName: You're in that sharehouse, yeah? Didn't realize you worked here.
engSearchText:
You're in that sharehouse, yeah? Didn't realize you
worked here.
jpnChrName: ああ、近所のシェアハウスの。 そうか、ここで働いてたんだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、近所のシェアハウスの。
そうか、ここで働いてたんだな。

engChrName: Heehee, yup! I'm the clerk here at Erland.
engSearchText: Heehee, yup! I'm the clerk here at Erland.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そうなの──っていけない、 《エルラント》の店員ともあろうものが。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、そうなの──っていけない、
《エルラント》の店員ともあろうものが。

engChrName: Let me just... Ahem! Thank you for browsing our products today. If you need help picking out a look, we can curate a selection just for you!
engSearchText:
Let me just... Ahem! Thank you for browsing our
products today. If you need help picking out a look,
we can curate a selection just for you!
jpnChrName: コホン、本日はようこそお越し下さいました。 当店ではキュレーションサービスもございます。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、本日はようこそお越し下さいました。
当店ではキュレーションサービスもございます。

engChrName: We're here to help you find that perfect look. If you have any questions, you need only ask!
engSearchText:
We're here to help you find that perfect look. If you
have any questions, you need only ask!
jpnChrName: 皆様にぴったりのコーディネートも提案できますので どうぞお気軽にお申し付けくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
皆様にぴったりのコーディネートも提案できますので
どうぞお気軽にお申し付けくださいね。

engChrName: Oho. Some bougie brands here. Maybe I'll find something on clearance.
engSearchText:
Oho. Some bougie brands here. Maybe I'll find
something on clearance.
jpnChrName: へえ？　高級路線のブランドみてえだし 冷やかさせてもらうか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ？　高級路線のブランドみてえだし
冷やかさせてもらうか。

engChrName: Haha. Sure, why not? I'll take a look around.
engSearchText: Haha. Sure, why not? I'll take a look around.
jpnChrName: はは、流石に様になってんな。 まあゆっくり見せてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
はは、流石に様になってんな。
まあゆっくり見せてもらうとするか。

engChrName: Our manager also helped launch the Edith Girls' Collection, or EGC. Now it's the biggest fashion event in the capital!
engSearchText:
Our manager also helped launch the Edith Girls'
Collection, or EGC. Now it's the biggest fashion
event in the capital!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、店長は首都最大のファッションイベント 《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》にも立ち上げから関わっていて。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、店長は首都最大のファッションイベント
《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》にも立ち上げから関わっていて。

engChrName: That earned her the moniker of Dream Weaver, both for her fashion sense and for her own beauty.
engSearchText:
That earned her the moniker of Dream Weaver, both
for her fashion sense and for her own beauty.
jpnChrName: あの物静かな美貌もあって、 伝説のコンパニオンと呼ばれていたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの物静かな美貌もあって、
伝説のコンパニオンと呼ばれていたんですよ。

engChrName: She's every bit as knowledgeable as the name implies, heehee. She's still an EGC mainstay.
engSearchText:
She's every bit as knowledgeable as the name
implies, heehee. She's still an EGC mainstay.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ファッションへの造詣も確かですし 今でもとっても人気があるんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ファッションへの造詣も確かですし
今でもとっても人気があるんです。

engChrName: Whew, that was rough! I ran into a couple snags there, but I still got all my work done for the day!
engSearchText:
Whew, that was rough! I ran into a couple snags
there, but I still got all my work done for the day!
jpnChrName: ふう、間に合った！ 仕事が長引いてギリギリになっちゃったけど！
jpnSearchText:
ふう、間に合った！
仕事が長引いてギリギリになっちゃったけど！

engChrName: Wow, he's really full of energy!
engSearchText: Wow, he's really full of energy!
jpnChrName: それにしても…… ふふっ、盛り上がってるじゃない♪
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……
ふふっ、盛り上がってるじゃない♪

engChrName: He's been kinda low energy lately...but not anymore! He's on fire today!
engSearchText:
He's been kinda low energy lately...but not anymore!
He's on fire today!
jpnChrName: 最近少し元気が無さそうだったけど、 今日は絶好調みたいね！
jpnSearchText:
最近少し元気が無さそうだったけど、
今日は絶好調みたいね！

engChrName: He was looking really out of it the other day. I can't deny I was worried...but I guess all's well now!
engSearchText:
He was looking really out of it the other day. I can't
deny I was worried...but I guess all's well now!
jpnChrName: 最近少し元気が無さそうだったから 気になってたけど……無駄な心配だったみたいね！
jpnSearchText:
最近少し元気が無さそうだったから
気になってたけど……無駄な心配だったみたいね！

engChrName: Oh, Raymond, have you seen Jess, by chance?
engSearchText: Oh, Raymond, have you seen Jess, by chance?
jpnChrName: ところでレイモンド、 ……ジェスを見かけなかった？
jpnSearchText:
ところでレイモンド、
……ジェスを見かけなかった？

engChrName: Can't say I have. He didn't drop by the store today.
engSearchText: Can't say I have. He didn't drop by the store today.
jpnChrName: えっと、店には来てないけど……
jpnSearchText: えっと、店には来てないけど……

engChrName: He has that gig tonight, right? Maybe he's off getting himself ready.
engSearchText:
He has that gig tonight, right? Maybe he's off getting
himself ready.
jpnChrName: 今夜も公演だったよね？ どこかで調子でも整えてるんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
今夜も公演だったよね？
どこかで調子でも整えてるんじゃない？

engChrName: Right, yeah. That makes sense.
engSearchText: Right, yeah. That makes sense.
jpnChrName: うん、そうね。 ……だったらいいんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
うん、そうね。
……だったらいいんだけど。

engChrName: *sigh* Oh, Jess...
engSearchText: *sigh* Oh, Jess...
jpnChrName: ふう、ジェスってばもう……
jpnSearchText: ふう、ジェスってばもう……

engChrName: He's really not letting the fame get to his head—quite the opposite. He's as humble as he ever was... Almost too much.
engSearchText:
He's really not letting the fame get to his head—quite
the opposite. He's as humble as he ever was...
Almost too much.
jpnChrName: 彼、地元じゃレコードも出してるんだけど 腰が低いっていうか、いつもこんな感じなのよね。
jpnSearchText:
彼、地元じゃレコードも出してるんだけど
腰が低いっていうか、いつもこんな感じなのよね。

engChrName: Sometimes I worry about him, but, well...that modesty is what makes Jess, Jess.
engSearchText:
Sometimes I worry about him, but, well...that
modesty is what makes Jess, Jess.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ちょっと心配な時もあるけど…… それも含めての“ジェスらしさ”なのかもね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ちょっと心配な時もあるけど……
それも含めての“ジェスらしさ”なのかもね。

engChrName: Now then, I think I'll whip us up a nice little lunch!
engSearchText: Now then, I think I'll whip us up a nice little lunch!
jpnChrName: さーて、お昼はお姉さんが 腕によりをかけて作っちゃいますか♪
jpnSearchText:
さーて、お昼はお姉さんが
腕によりをかけて作っちゃいますか♪

engChrName: I know that we're all adults, so we're expected to cook for ourselves...
engSearchText:
I know that we're all adults, so we're expected to cook
for ourselves...
jpnChrName: ま、私たちは一応“シェアハウス”って形だし 食事は各自が用意するのがルールなんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ま、私たちは一応“シェアハウス”って形だし
食事は各自が用意するのがルールなんだけど……

engChrName: ...but we're all friends, and we all need to eat. What's wrong with making stuff for the three of us?
engSearchText:
...but we're all friends, and we all need to eat.
What's wrong with making stuff for the three of us?
jpnChrName: レイモンドは弟だし、ジェスも昔馴染だし、 どうせ自分の分も作らなきゃだし……
jpnSearchText:
レイモンドは弟だし、ジェスも昔馴染だし、
どうせ自分の分も作らなきゃだし……

engChrName: It's not like I'm giving myself extra work—I'd just have a ton of leftovers to eat by myself, otherwise! Now, what should I make...?
engSearchText:
It's not like I'm giving myself extra work—I'd just
have a ton of leftovers to eat by myself, otherwise!
Now, what should I make...?
jpnChrName: 手間も変わらないんだから今更よね～。 ふふっ、逆にとびきりの料理で驚かせちゃおうかな？
jpnSearchText:
手間も変わらないんだから今更よね～。
ふふっ、逆にとびきりの料理で驚かせちゃおうかな？

engChrName: Wow, those are some powerful notes... Jess is really putting his all into it. I hope he likes how it turns out...
engSearchText:
Wow, those are some powerful notes... Jess is really
putting his all into it. I hope he likes how it
turns out...
jpnChrName: この音色……ジェスも頑張ってるみたいね。 ふふっ、喜んでくれるかなぁ～……
jpnSearchText:
この音色……ジェスも頑張ってるみたいね。
ふふっ、喜んでくれるかなぁ～……

engChrName: Ahem! Not to say you shouldn't go bother him, but do be considerate, okay?
engSearchText:
Ahem! Not to say you shouldn't go bother him, but
do be considerate, okay?
jpnChrName: って、コホン、そうそう…… ジェスに声をかけるなら気遣ってあげてね。
jpnSearchText:
って、コホン、そうそう……
ジェスに声をかけるなら気遣ってあげてね。

engChrName: He can be a bit delicate at times, but I guess that's just common to a lot of artists.
engSearchText:
He can be a bit delicate at times, but I guess that's
just common to a lot of artists.
jpnChrName: アーティスト気質っていうのかしら、 彼ちょっと繊細な所があるから。
jpnSearchText:
アーティスト気質っていうのかしら、
彼ちょっと繊細な所があるから。

engChrName: All right, I'm off.
engSearchText: All right, I'm off.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、行ってくるよ。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、行ってくるよ。

engChrName: Break a leg, rock star! Once I'm done with work for the day, I'll head right on over to watch!
engSearchText:
Break a leg, rock star! Once I'm done with work for
the day, I'll head right on over to watch!
jpnChrName: 頑張って、プロミュージシャン！ 私も用事を片付けたら観に行くから！
jpnSearchText:
頑張って、プロミュージシャン！
私も用事を片付けたら観に行くから！

engChrName: Thank you, but...really, you don't have to do that for me. I know you're plenty busy—
engSearchText:
Thank you, but...really, you don't have to do that
for me. I know you're plenty busy—
jpnChrName: いつもありがとう……でも無理しなくていいよ。 キャロルも忙しいだろうし──
jpnSearchText:
いつもありがとう……でも無理しなくていいよ。
キャロルも忙しいだろうし──

engChrName: Wha...? Why WOULDN'T I go to your concert? Jess, I love... Eep!
engSearchText:
Wha...? Why WOULDN'T I go to your concert?
Jess, I love... Eep!
jpnChrName: な、なに言ってるのよもう！ 私は好きで行ってるんだから──
jpnSearchText:
な、なに言ってるのよもう！
私は好きで行ってるんだから──

engChrName: Your performances! I love your performances!
engSearchText: Your performances! I love your performances!
jpnChrName: って違う違う！　好きって言っても そういう意味じゃないんだからねっ！！
jpnSearchText:
って違う違う！　好きって言っても
そういう意味じゃないんだからねっ！！

engChrName: I, err... I see. Well...thanks. I'll make sure you love what you hear.
engSearchText:
I, err... I see. Well...thanks. I'll make sure you love
what you hear.
jpnChrName: うん……よく分からないけど ありがとう、頑張ってくるよ。
jpnSearchText:
うん……よく分からないけど
ありがとう、頑張ってくるよ。

engChrName: Umm... What do you mean by that?
engSearchText: Umm... What do you mean by that?
jpnChrName: えっと、ジェス…… 今のって……どういう意味……？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、ジェス……
今のって……どういう意味……？

engChrName: I mean... That's just how I feel. I want to make you happy.
engSearchText:
I mean... That's just how I feel. I want to make
you happy.
jpnChrName: ……………………………… キャロル、それが僕の気持ちだ。
jpnSearchText:
………………………………
キャロル、それが僕の気持ちだ。

engChrName: I owe the both of you so much for helping me get here, so that's why...
engSearchText:
I owe the both of you so much for helping me get
here, so that's why...
jpnChrName: 君たちには感謝してる。 だからこそ僕は……
jpnSearchText:
君たちには感謝してる。
だからこそ僕は……

engChrName: ...Sorry. Forget it. I'm rambling.
engSearchText: ...Sorry. Forget it. I'm rambling.
jpnChrName: いや、これ以上は言いたくない……
jpnSearchText: いや、これ以上は言いたくない……

engChrName: No, I... Jess, you can tell me. What's on your mind?
engSearchText: No, I... Jess, you can tell me. What's on your mind?
jpnChrName: ……ねえジェス、それってもしかして……
jpnSearchText: ……ねえジェス、それってもしかして……

engChrName: (Well, this is awkward.)
engSearchText: (Well, this is awkward.)
jpnChrName: （？　なにか話し込んでるようだが……）
jpnSearchText: （？　なにか話し込んでるようだが……）

engChrName: (None of my business, anyway. Good luck, lovebirds.)
engSearchText: (None of my business, anyway. Good luck, lovebirds.)
jpnChrName: （個人的な話みたいだしな、   これ以上は踏み込まないでおくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（個人的な話みたいだしな、
これ以上は踏み込まないでおくか。）

engChrName: Jess! Jess, hang in there!
engSearchText: Jess! Jess, hang in there!
jpnChrName: ジェス……ああ、ジェス！！ しっかりして……！！
jpnSearchText:
ジェス……ああ、ジェス！！
しっかりして……！！

engChrName: I'm...okay... It's good that...you're all right...
engSearchText: I'm...okay... It's good that...you're all right...
jpnChrName: だい……じょうぶだ…… ……キャロル………
jpnSearchText:
だい……じょうぶだ……
……キャロル………

engChrName: I-It's okay, don't talk! Just lie down there, okay?
engSearchText: I-It's okay, don't talk! Just lie down there, okay?
jpnChrName: な、なに？　あまり喋らない方が──
jpnSearchText: な、なに？　あまり喋らない方が──

engChrName: Thank you...so much... Carol... For every...thing...
engSearchText: Thank you...so much... Carol... For every...thing...
jpnChrName: 今まで……ありがとう…… ……それと……すまな……かった……
jpnSearchText:
今まで……ありがとう……
……それと……すまな……かった……

engChrName: N-No! Please, don't say that! Y-You're gonna be fine, right? Right?! J-Jess!
engSearchText:
N-No! Please, don't say that! Y-You're gonna be
fine, right? Right?! J-Jess!
jpnChrName: そ、そういう事言わないでよ…… ……縁起でもないじゃない！？　ジェス！！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そういう事言わないでよ……
……縁起でもないじゃない！？　ジェス！！

engChrName: (Is he gonna make it...?)
engSearchText: (Is he gonna make it...?)
jpnChrName: （だ、大丈夫でしょうか……）
jpnSearchText: （だ、大丈夫でしょうか……）

engChrName: (His vitals look okay, but he's losin' a ton of blood. We gotta get him patched up, stat.)
engSearchText:
(His vitals look okay, but he's losin' a ton of blood.
We gotta get him patched up, stat.)
jpnChrName: （見た所急所は外れてるようだ。   失血で意識がヤバいんだろうが……）
jpnSearchText:
（見た所急所は外れてるようだ。
失血で意識がヤバいんだろうが……）

engChrName: (The hospitals are all haywire, though... Get him to Father Nikolai. He's our best bet.)
engSearchText:
(The hospitals are all haywire, though... Get him to
Father Nikolai. He's our best bet.)
jpnChrName: （病院も機能してねえだろう。   ここは教区長に任せるしかねえな──）
jpnSearchText:
（病院も機能してねえだろう。
ここは教区長に任せるしかねえな──）

engChrName: I always...knew...deep down...
engSearchText: I always...knew...deep down...
jpnChrName: 今まで……君の気持ち…… ……気づいていた……のに………
jpnSearchText:
今まで……君の気持ち……
……気づいていた……のに………

engChrName: Jess, please! Don't waste your energy! Just sit still...!
engSearchText:
Jess, please! Don't waste your energy!
Just sit still...!
jpnChrName: ジェス……！　お願いだからもう喋らないで！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ジェス……！　お願いだからもう喋らないで！

engChrName: Hiya, Carol! Come to check on little old me?
engSearchText: Hiya, Carol! Come to check on little old me?
jpnChrName: わ～い、姉さんだ！ ふふ、様子を見に来てくれたのっ？
jpnSearchText:
わ～い、姉さんだ！
ふふ、様子を見に来てくれたのっ？

engChrName: Yeah, I... Hey! How many times have I told you to stop being all cutesy like that? Especially in public!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I... Hey! How many times have I told you to
stop being all cutesy like that? Especially in public!
jpnChrName: うんうん……じゃなくて 外でその人懐こさはやめなさいってば！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん……じゃなくて
外でその人懐こさはやめなさいってば！

engChrName: I just don't want people getting the wrong idea! I mean... Mmgh...
engSearchText:
I just don't want people getting the wrong idea!
I mean... Mmgh...
jpnChrName: 勘違いした女の子たちが泣いてないか おねーちゃん心配になるわよ、もう……
jpnSearchText:
勘違いした女の子たちが泣いてないか
おねーちゃん心配になるわよ、もう……

engChrName: I... Huh?
engSearchText: I... Huh?
jpnChrName: えっと……？？
jpnSearchText: えっと……？？

engChrName: Ahem! A-Anyway, I'm off to work.
engSearchText: Ahem! A-Anyway, I'm off to work.
jpnChrName: コホン、まあともかく、 おねーちゃんちょっと仕事に行ってくるわ。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、まあともかく、
おねーちゃんちょっと仕事に行ってくるわ。

engChrName: One of my coworkers caught a cold, so I have to come in. Can't leave the place short-staffed.
engSearchText:
One of my coworkers caught a cold, so I have to
come in. Can't leave the place short-staffed.
jpnChrName: 同僚が風邪ひいちゃったみたいなの。 店長一人には任せておけないでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
同僚が風邪ひいちゃったみたいなの。
店長一人には任せておけないでしょ？

engChrName: Aww, boo... Well, nothing we can do about that, I guess.
engSearchText:
Aww, boo... Well, nothing we can do about that,
I guess.
jpnChrName: ええ～っ、そうだったんだ…… 姉さんってば………まあいいけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ～っ、そうだったんだ……
姉さんってば………まあいいけど。

engChrName: Just don't overwork yourself. I'll make dinner around the usual time, okay?
engSearchText:
Just don't overwork yourself. I'll make dinner around
the usual time, okay?
jpnChrName: 無理しちゃダメだよ？ 夕食は僕が作るから、早めに帰ってね？
jpnSearchText:
無理しちゃダメだよ？
夕食は僕が作るから、早めに帰ってね？

engChrName: Of course! Thank you for that. Could you be a darling and handle some of that housework today, too?
engSearchText:
Of course! Thank you for that. Could you be a
darling and handle some of that housework
today, too?
jpnChrName: はいはい、ありがと！ 家の事は頼んだわね！
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、ありがと！
家の事は頼んだわね！

engChrName: Phew! I really did the works today.
engSearchText: Phew! I really did the works today.
jpnChrName: ふう、今日も一日仕事頑張った～！
jpnSearchText: ふう、今日も一日仕事頑張った～！

engChrName: Oh, Carol! Can you whip up some hot cocoa, pretty please? Oh, and the radio on the usual station, too? Thanks a million!
engSearchText:
Oh, Carol! Can you whip up some hot cocoa,
pretty please? Oh, and the radio on the usual
station, too? Thanks a million!
jpnChrName: 姉さん姉さん～！　ご飯の前にホットココア頂戴♪ あとラジオはいつもの音楽番組ね！
jpnSearchText:
姉さん姉さん～！　ご飯の前にホットココア頂戴♪
あとラジオはいつもの音楽番組ね！

engChrName: Well, sure! Sounds like somebody wants to be spoiled today.
engSearchText:
Well, sure! Sounds like somebody wants to be
spoiled today.
jpnChrName: はいはい、ウチの弟は甘えん坊なんだから。
jpnSearchText: はいはい、ウチの弟は甘えん坊なんだから。

engChrName: Well, c'est la vie. I'll make some of my special gratin tonight, just for you!
engSearchText:
Well, c'est la vie. I'll make some of my special gratin
tonight, just for you!
jpnChrName: 仕方ないから、夕食はお姉ちゃん特製の アツアツグラタンを出してあげようかな～？
jpnSearchText:
仕方ないから、夕食はお姉ちゃん特製の
アツアツグラタンを出してあげようかな～？

engChrName: Thank youuu! Man, today's been so awesome!
engSearchText: Thank youuu! Man, today's been so awesome!
jpnChrName: やったっ……！ はぁ～、今夜はシアワセだよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
やったっ……！
はぁ～、今夜はシアワセだよ～！！

engChrName: Heh... Man, you never change.
engSearchText: Heh... Man, you never change.

jpnSearchText: はは、レイモンドも変わらないな。

engChrName: Mrowr! Ffft!
engSearchText: Mrowr! Ffft!
jpnChrName: フシャーッ！　ニャオッ！！
jpnSearchText: フシャーッ！　ニャオッ！！

engChrName: Looks like the cats're all hunkerin' down, too.
engSearchText: Looks like the cats're all hunkerin' down, too.
jpnChrName: こいつらもここに避難してやがんのか……
jpnSearchText: こいつらもここに避難してやがんのか……

engChrName: I'm glad they're okay, but they look really stressed out...
engSearchText:
I'm glad they're okay, but they look really
stressed out...

jpnSearchText:
無事だったのはよかったけど
気が立ってるみたいです……

engSearchText: We have to get to the bottom of this!
jpnChrName: この事態、必ず解決しないとですね！
jpnSearchText: この事態、必ず解決しないとですね！

engChrName: Agreed. Let's round up everybody else first!
engSearchText: Agreed. Let's round up everybody else first!
jpnChrName: ああ──ひとまず残りの連中と合流すんぞ！
jpnSearchText: ああ──ひとまず残りの連中と合流すんぞ！

engChrName: Rawrr... MrrrRRAWWW...
engSearchText: Rawrr... MrrrRRAWWW...
jpnChrName: フン、ニャ～オ……
jpnSearchText: フン、ニャ～オ……

engChrName: Mrow! Mreowwr...!
engSearchText: Mrow! Mreowwr...!
jpnChrName: ニャオッ！　ニャオン！！
jpnSearchText: ニャオッ！　ニャオン！！

engChrName: Still don't wanna play nice, huh?
engSearchText: Still don't wanna play nice, huh?
jpnChrName: 相変わらず懐いちゃくれねえが……
jpnSearchText: 相変わらず懐いちゃくれねえが……

engChrName: Maybe the festival's got him all freaked out. Or he's just watchin' it all from his perch.
engSearchText:
Maybe the festival's got him all freaked out. Or he's
just watchin' it all from his perch.

jpnSearchText:
ま、人間の祭りをこいつなりに
見守ってくれてるみたいだな。

engChrName: Mrow! Mreowwwr...!
engSearchText: Mrow! Mreowwwr...!

jpnSearchText: ニャオッ！　ニャオン！！

engSearchText: Mreooow... Mrawr!

jpnSearchText: ニャ～オ。……ニャオンッ！

engChrName: Well, what're they all doin' together?
engSearchText: Well, what're they all doin' together?

engChrName: Mrooowr!
engSearchText: Mrooowr!
jpnChrName: ……フニャ～ンッ！！

Holy...! What's with all these cats?! I've never seen so

jpnSearchText:
ね、猫の集会……！？
こんなの初めて見るわね……

engSearchText:
They appear awfully cautious. Perhaps they've
sensed something...

jpnSearchText:
なんだか注意してるみたいです……
猫たちも何か感じ取ってるんでしょうか。

engSearchText:
I mean, all of us humans are freakin' out—I think
they're pickin' up on us. Clever little...
jpnChrName: 人間がこれだけ騒いでりゃな。 ……しかし想像以上に利口な連中だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
人間がこれだけ騒いでりゃな。
……しかし想像以上に利口な連中だぜ。

engChrName: Mrow! Mrowwwr!
engSearchText: Mrow! Mrowwwr!
jpnChrName: フニャッ！　ニャオンッ！！

engChrName: Mrooowr!
engSearchText: Mrooowr!
jpnChrName: ……フニャ～ンッ！！

jpnSearchText: フウウウウウ……シァァ──ッ！！

engSearchText:
(Heh. He looks like a bush with his hair on end.
Guess this is his turf and he wants us gone?)
jpnChrName: （こっちの怒りは収まりそうにねえが……   やっぱ縄張りを主張してんのかねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（こっちの怒りは収まりそうにねえが……
やっぱ縄張りを主張してんのかねぇ。）

engChrName: Huh? That the...
engSearchText: Huh? That the...
jpnChrName: ん？　あいつは……
jpnSearchText: ん？　あいつは……

engChrName: Mrrrrr... RRRRROWR! *HISS*
engSearchText: Mrrrrr... RRRRROWR! *HISS*
jpnChrName: じ～～～～　ニャオンッ！ フンッ！！
jpnSearchText:
じ～～～～　ニャオンッ！
フンッ！！

engChrName: He seems awfully hostile toward XEROS. He exudes this...aura? I'm not sure how to put it.
engSearchText:
He seems awfully hostile toward XEROS. He exudes
this...aura? I'm not sure how to put it.
jpnChrName: えっと、なんだかＸＥＲＯＳに対して 気に入らないオーラを感じるんだけど？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、なんだかＸＥＲＯＳに対して
気に入らないオーラを感じるんだけど？

engChrName: His fur is all puffed out, like he's trying to make himself look bigger. Does he think XEROS is some kind of threat?
engSearchText:
His fur is all puffed out, like he's trying to make
himself look bigger. Does he think XEROS is some
kind of threat?
jpnChrName: け、警戒しているみたいですね…… もしくは“偉そうな奴め”的な……
jpnSearchText:
け、警戒しているみたいですね……
もしくは“偉そうな奴め”的な……

engChrName: Yup, he's got cattitude. Bein' the head honcho, he feels the need to scare people out of his turf.
engSearchText:
Yup, he's got cattitude. Bein' the head honcho, he
feels the need to scare people out of his turf.
jpnChrName: この辺りの猫の顔役みてえだし 気に入らないんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
この辺りの猫の顔役みてえだし
気に入らないんだろ。

engChrName: Mrow! Rrrawr!
engSearchText: Mrow! Rrrawr!
jpnChrName: フンッ！　ニャオンッ！
jpnSearchText: フンッ！　ニャオンッ！

engChrName: Mrowr?!
engSearchText: Mrowr?!
jpnChrName: ……ニャッ！？
jpnSearchText: ……ニャッ！？

engChrName: *HISS*
engSearchText: *HISS*
jpnChrName: フシャーッ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>フシャーッ！！

engChrName: Okay, okay. Sorry.
engSearchText: Okay, okay. Sorry.
jpnChrName: ……悪ぃ、邪魔しちまったな。
jpnSearchText: ……悪ぃ、邪魔しちまったな。

engChrName: (I see that cat every now and then. Guess this is his turf.)
engSearchText:
(I see that cat every now and then. Guess this is
his turf.)

jpnSearchText:
（時々ここで休んでる気がするが……

engChrName: Mrowr! *hiss*
engSearchText: Mrowr! *hiss*
jpnChrName: ニャッ！　フシャーッ！！
jpnSearchText: ニャッ！　フシャーッ！！

engChrName: Mrrur...
engSearchText: Mrrur...

engChrName: Ahh, so that's where he is... I can see why the kids are having such trouble finding him.
engSearchText:
Ahh, so that's where he is... I can see why the kids are
having such trouble finding him.
jpnChrName: あんな所に…… ふふっ、子供たちが探していたみたいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
あんな所に……
ふふっ、子供たちが探していたみたいですけど。

engChrName: They'll be lookin' a while longer, I wager.
engSearchText: They'll be lookin' a while longer, I wager.
jpnChrName: ちょっと捕まえるのは難しそうですね。
jpnSearchText: ちょっと捕まえるのは難しそうですね。

engChrName: For sure. Little critter knows this place like the back of his paw.
engSearchText:
For sure. Little critter knows this place like the back
of his paw.
jpnChrName: だな、あいつの方が上手（うわて）だろ。
jpnSearchText: だな、あいつの方が上手（うわて）だろ。

engChrName: (Feel like he's got somethin' on his mind... I ain't a cat, though, so what do I know.)
engSearchText:
(Feel like he's got somethin' on his mind... I ain't a
cat, though, so what do I know.)
jpnChrName: （にしても何かを気にしてるようだが……   さすがに猫の考えてる事は分からねえか。）
jpnSearchText:
（にしても何かを気にしてるようだが……
さすがに猫の考えてる事は分からねえか。）

engChrName: *hiss*
engSearchText: *hiss*

engChrName: Aww, were you resting there? Sorry.
engSearchText: Aww, were you resting there? Sorry.
jpnChrName: おっと悪ぃな、休憩中だったか？
jpnSearchText: おっと悪ぃな、休憩中だったか？

engChrName: (Looks like he's tryna keep dry... Y'know, it wouldn't hurt him to swallow his pride and just let people help him out.)
engSearchText:
(Looks like he's tryna keep dry... Y'know, it wouldn't
hurt him to swallow his pride and just let people help
him out.)
jpnChrName: （雨宿りみてえだが……   ったくいつも気位が高いっつーか。）
jpnSearchText:
（雨宿りみてえだが……
ったくいつも気位が高いっつーか。）

engChrName: Mroww! ♪
engSearchText: Mroww! ♪
jpnChrName: ニャオ～ン♪
jpnSearchText: ニャオ～ン♪

engChrName: Mmmrow.
engSearchText: Mmmrow.
jpnChrName: フン──ニャオン。
jpnSearchText: フン──ニャオン。

engChrName: It looks like they've all come to drink that water. And they're cozying up to that gray cat in particular...
engSearchText:
It looks like they've all come to drink that water.
And they're cozying up to that gray cat in particular...
jpnChrName: これは……水を飲みに集まってるんですね。 灰猫は随分慕われてるみたいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
これは……水を飲みに集まってるんですね。
灰猫は随分慕われてるみたいですけど……

engChrName: Are they here for the water? Or that gray cat, maybe? He seems really popular!
engSearchText:
Are they here for the water? Or that gray cat, maybe?
He seems really popular!
jpnChrName: これは……水を飲みに集まってるんでしょうか。 うーん、灰色の猫は人気みたいです！
jpnSearchText:
これは……水を飲みに集まってるんでしょうか。
うーん、灰色の猫は人気みたいです！

engChrName: What's up with the cats? It feels like I just walked down the wrong alley—they're all ganging up and stuff.
engSearchText:
What's up with the cats? It feels like I just walked
down the wrong alley—they're all ganging up
and stuff.
jpnChrName: 何だコイツら……水を飲みに来てんのか？ ビミョーに力関係っぽいのも感じるがよ。
jpnSearchText:
何だコイツら……水を飲みに来てんのか？
ビミョーに力関係っぽいのも感じるがよ。

engChrName: They got their own little system. You'd best just leave 'em be, okay?
engSearchText:
They got their own little system. You'd best just leave
'em be, okay?
jpnChrName: 猫の間でも色々あんだろ。
jpnSearchText: 猫の間でも色々あんだろ。

engChrName: (We got a lotta stray cats here in Old Town, but they all seem to fall in line around that gray one.)
engSearchText:
(We got a lotta stray cats here in Old Town, but they
all seem to fall in line around that gray one.)
jpnChrName: （そういや旧市街には猫も多いが……   大抵のヤツは弁えてる気がすんなぁ。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや旧市街には猫も多いが……
大抵のヤツは弁えてる気がすんなぁ。）

engChrName: Oho. What'cha up to, little guy?
engSearchText: Oho. What'cha up to, little guy?
jpnChrName: おっと、こいつは確か……
jpnSearchText: おっと、こいつは確か……

engChrName: *stares cattily*
engSearchText: *stares cattily*

engChrName: *turns tail*
engSearchText: *turns tail*
jpnChrName: （プイッ）
jpnSearchText: （プイッ）

engChrName: Aaand he's gone.
engSearchText: Aaand he's gone.
jpnChrName: 行っちまったか、やれやれ……
jpnSearchText: 行っちまったか、やれやれ……

engChrName: (Oh, he's runnin' off toward the... Ehh, not my business.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, he's runnin' off toward the... Ehh, not
my business.)
jpnChrName: （にしてもこの先は確か……   ま、今は立ち入らないでおくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（にしてもこの先は確か……
ま、今は立ち入らないでおくか。）

engChrName: Huh? Oh, that's...
engSearchText: Huh? Oh, that's...
jpnChrName: あっ、あれって……
jpnSearchText: あっ、あれって……

engChrName: Mreow!
engSearchText: Mreow!
jpnChrName: ニャーッ！！
jpnSearchText: ニャーッ！！

engChrName: Is he talking to the other cats, perhaps?
engSearchText: Is he talking to the other cats, perhaps?
jpnChrName: なんでしょう、猫たちに 何かを話しているような……？
jpnSearchText:
なんでしょう、猫たちに
何かを話しているような……？

engChrName: Maybe he's like a...mediator, for the cats or somethin'. A meowdiator. It'd make sense, given he's kinda the king of the block.
engSearchText:
Maybe he's like a...mediator, for the cats
or somethin'. A meowdiator. It'd make sense, given
he's kinda the king of the block.
jpnChrName: ケンカの仲裁でもしてんのかねぇ。 ふむ、あの灰猫が“顔役”みてえだが……
jpnSearchText:
ケンカの仲裁でもしてんのかねぇ。
ふむ、あの灰猫が“顔役”みてえだが……

engChrName: Mreow! Mowr!
engSearchText: Mreow! Mowr!
jpnChrName: ニャンニャン……！
jpnSearchText: ニャンニャン……！

engChrName: Mrrrrrm...
engSearchText: Mrrrrrm...

engChrName: (Did he sigh, there? Or am I just hearing things?)
engSearchText: (Did he sigh, there? Or am I just hearing things?)
jpnChrName: （えっと、気のせいか   ため息をついているような……？）
jpnSearchText:
（えっと、気のせいか
ため息をついているような……？）

engChrName: (Had his fill of the kids and bailed, maybe. Heh. Who's the boss now, kitty cat?)
engSearchText:
(Had his fill of the kids and bailed, maybe. Heh.
Who's the boss now, kitty cat?)
jpnChrName: （ガキンチョどもに呆れてるみてえだな。   ……やれやれ、どっちの立場が上なんだか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ガキンチョどもに呆れてるみてえだな。
……やれやれ、どっちの立場が上なんだか。）

engChrName: Oh! There's a little cat over there. Hello!
engSearchText: Oh! There's a little cat over there. Hello!
jpnChrName: あら、こんな所に猫が……
jpnSearchText: あら、こんな所に猫が……

engChrName: Mreow?
engSearchText: Mreow?
jpnChrName: ニャオン……？
jpnSearchText: ニャオン……？

engChrName: *stares cattily*
engSearchText: *stares cattily*

engChrName: *turns tail*
engSearchText: *turns tail*
jpnChrName: （プイッ）
jpnSearchText: （プイッ）

engChrName: O-Oh. I guess he doesn't like me.
engSearchText: O-Oh. I guess he doesn't like me.
jpnChrName: ええと……嫌われちゃったみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: ええと……嫌われちゃったみたいですね。

engChrName: Don't take it personally, he hates everyone. That's just how he is.
engSearchText:
Don't take it personally, he hates everyone.
That's just how he is.
jpnChrName: コイツは誰にも懐かなくてな。 たまに見かけてもこんなモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
コイツは誰にも懐かなくてな。
たまに見かけてもこんなモンだ。

engChrName: He's been around Old Town for a while now, but he just keeps to himself.
engSearchText:
He's been around Old Town for a while now, but he
just keeps to himself.
jpnChrName: 大分前から旧市街に住み着いてるらしいが…… ま、人様と関わる気は無ぇんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
大分前から旧市街に住み着いてるらしいが……
ま、人様と関わる気は無ぇんだろう。

engChrName: I see. (I feel like there's more to it, though...)
engSearchText:
I see.
(I feel like there's more to it, though...)
jpnChrName: そうですか…… （……でも、それだけじゃない気も……）
jpnSearchText:
そうですか……
（……でも、それだけじゃない気も……）

engChrName: Well, I think I'll make it a point to get on his good side! It can be done, surely!
engSearchText:
Well, I think I'll make it a point to get on his
good side! It can be done, surely!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ともかく見かけたら 仲良くなれるよう努力してみますね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ともかく見かけたら
仲良くなれるよう努力してみますね！

engChrName: Yeah? Well, hey, more power to you. (Weirdo.)
engSearchText:
Yeah? Well, hey, more power to you.
(Weirdo.)
jpnChrName: あー、まあ好きにすりゃあいいんじゃねえか？ （……コイツも少し変わってるよなぁ。）
jpnSearchText:
あー、まあ好きにすりゃあいいんじゃねえか？
（……コイツも少し変わってるよなぁ。）

engChrName: *stares cattily*
engSearchText: *stares cattily*

engChrName: *turns tail*
engSearchText: *turns tail*
jpnChrName: （プイッ）
jpnSearchText: （プイッ）

engChrName: Well, well. I don't often see you here, Étoile.
engSearchText: Well, well. I don't often see you here, Étoile.
jpnChrName: あらあら、こんな所に エトワールがいるだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
あらあら、こんな所に
エトワールがいるだなんて……

engChrName: Now, who's a good kitty cat? You want some pats? I think you do!
engSearchText:
Now, who's a good kitty cat? You want some pats?
I think you do!
jpnChrName: よしよし、この私が ナデナデしてあげましょうね～！
jpnSearchText:
よしよし、この私が
ナデナデしてあげましょうね～！

engChrName: Mrowr! *hiss*
engSearchText: Mrowr! *hiss*
jpnChrName: フニャッ！　ニャオンッ！
jpnSearchText: フニャッ！　ニャオンッ！

engChrName: Oh, killjoy. Did I come on too strong...?
engSearchText: Oh, killjoy. Did I come on too strong...?
jpnChrName: あらぁ、行ってしまったわ……
jpnSearchText: あらぁ、行ってしまったわ……

engChrName: Or is he perhaps inviting me to follow him, instead? Mweheehee...
engSearchText:
Or is he perhaps inviting me to follow him, instead?
Mweheehee...
jpnChrName: うふふっ、それとも私を 誘っているのかしら～？
jpnSearchText:
うふふっ、それとも私を
誘っているのかしら～？

engChrName: Well, considering he freakin' hissed at you, no. No, he isn't.
engSearchText:
Well, considering he freakin' hissed at you, no.
No, he isn't.
jpnChrName: どうみても嫌がってたろ…… 放っといてやれよ、婆さん。
jpnSearchText:
どうみても嫌がってたろ……
放っといてやれよ、婆さん。

engChrName: Aww... Alas, he's just such a sourpuss.
engSearchText: Aww... Alas, he's just such a sourpuss.
jpnChrName: あらぁ、残念だわ～。
jpnSearchText: あらぁ、残念だわ～。

engChrName: But I have to at least earn his favor before I up and croak. What secrets is he hiding...?
engSearchText:
But I have to at least earn his favor before I up
and croak. What secrets is he hiding...?
jpnChrName: ……ふふっ、あの子を手懐けるまでは 死ねないわねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふっ、あの子を手懐けるまでは
死ねないわねぇ～。

engChrName: Mrrrrr...
engSearchText: Mrrrrr...
jpnChrName: フウウウウウ……
jpnSearchText: フウウウウウ……

engChrName: *HISS*
engSearchText: *HISS*
jpnChrName: シァァ──ッ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>シァァ──ッ！！

engChrName: Response: anger. Calculating motive... Unable to identify.
engSearchText:
Response: anger. Calculating motive... Unable
to identify.
jpnChrName: 怒ッテル？　理由ヲ推測── ………………特定フノウ。
jpnSearchText:
怒ッテル？　理由ヲ推測──
………………特定フノウ。

engChrName: Yeah, this ain't goin' anywhere.
engSearchText: Yeah, this ain't goin' anywhere.
jpnChrName: 何だか面倒な事になってんな……
jpnSearchText: 何だか面倒な事になってんな……

engChrName: Just leave 'em alone, all right? Can't exactly reason with cats. You poke your nose in there and you'll just cause a commotion.
engSearchText:
Just leave 'em alone, all right? Can't exactly reason
with cats. You poke your nose in there and you'll just
cause a commotion.
jpnChrName: とりあえず喧嘩すんなよ？ 大家にも迷惑になるんだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず喧嘩すんなよ？
大家にも迷惑になるんだからよ。

engChrName: Mrowr!
engSearchText: Mrowr!
jpnChrName: ──フンッ！！
jpnSearchText: ──フンッ！！

engChrName: Understood. FIO will moderate voice volume at night so as not to disturb local felines.
engSearchText:
Understood. FIO will moderate voice volume at night
so as not to disturb local felines.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯハ了解。 夜間ニツキ騒音ニハ注意スル。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯハ了解。
夜間ニツキ騒音ニハ注意スル。

engChrName: Mreow... Mrrrrroww...
engSearchText: Mreow... Mrrrrroww...
jpnChrName: ニャオ、ニャオオン。
jpnSearchText: ニャオ、ニャオオン。

engChrName: WOOF?
engSearchText: WOOF?
jpnChrName: ＷＡＯＮ？
jpnSearchText: ＷＡＯＮ？

engChrName: Mrrow. Meowrr...
engSearchText: Mrrow. Meowrr...
jpnChrName: ニャ～オ。……ニャオン。
jpnSearchText: ニャ～オ。……ニャオン。

engChrName: I, er... Huh.
engSearchText: I, er... Huh.
jpnChrName: こ、これは……
jpnSearchText: こ、これは……

engChrName: They seem to be communicating... I haven't seen anything like it before!
engSearchText:
They seem to be communicating... I haven't seen
anything like it before!
jpnChrName: コミュニケーションを取ってるみたいだ…… こんなのは初めて見たかも。
jpnSearchText:
コミュニケーションを取ってるみたいだ……
こんなのは初めて見たかも。

engChrName: You tellin' me the dog speaks cat? That's wack.
engSearchText: You tellin' me the dog speaks cat? That's wack.
jpnChrName: 話し合ってやがんのか？ 想像の斜め上なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
話し合ってやがんのか？
想像の斜め上なんだが……

engChrName: And he got himself into the neighborhood kitty clique, too.
engSearchText:
And he got himself into the neighborhood kitty
clique, too.
jpnChrName: ともあれ“受け入れられた”みたいだな。 ご近所の猫たちによ。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ“受け入れられた”みたいだな。
ご近所の猫たちによ。

engChrName: WOOF...
engSearchText: WOOF...
jpnChrName: ＷＯＦＷＯＦ……
jpnSearchText: ＷＯＦＷＯＦ……

engChrName: Meow... Mreow!
engSearchText: Meow... Mreow!
jpnChrName: フン……ニャオン！
jpnSearchText: フン……ニャオン！

engChrName: Haha. Looks like Mr. Kitty's higher up on the food chain!
engSearchText:
Haha. Looks like Mr. Kitty's higher up on the
food chain!
jpnChrName: あはは……猫ちゃんの方が 立場が上みたいですね！
jpnSearchText:
あはは……猫ちゃんの方が
立場が上みたいですね！

engChrName: Intriguing... If XEROS continues 'talking' with these cats, it might develop an algorithm for translating their speech.
engSearchText:
Intriguing... If XEROS continues 'talking' with these
cats, it might develop an algorithm for translating
their speech.
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳの学習が進めば、将来的には 猫の言葉も解析できるかもね……
jpnSearchText:
ＸＥＲＯＳの学習が進めば、将来的には
猫の言葉も解析できるかもね……

engChrName: That would be lovely! I look forward to XEROS' learning.
engSearchText:
That would be lovely! I look forward to
XEROS' learning.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、それは楽しそうですね。 ちょっと期待しちゃいそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、それは楽しそうですね。
ちょっと期待しちゃいそうです。

engChrName: Everybody's got their gremlins, I guess.
engSearchText: Everybody's got their gremlins, I guess.
jpnChrName: クク、こいつらも苦労してるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText: クク、こいつらも苦労してるみてえだな。

engChrName: Well, I have no shortage of conversation topics. You get me started and I can go on for hours.
engSearchText:
Well, I have no shortage of conversation topics.
You get me started and I can go on for hours.
jpnChrName: ま、このメンバーだと話題も尽きないし 何時間でも入れそうだよね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、このメンバーだと話題も尽きないし
何時間でも入れそうだよね。

engChrName: Well, maybe I'll just lie low and see how this fun little development goes down. No need to rush.
engSearchText:
Well, maybe I'll just lie low and see how this fun little
development goes down. No need to rush.
jpnChrName: ふふ、いい土産話になりそうだし 午前中はゆっくりしようかな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いい土産話になりそうだし
午前中はゆっくりしようかな。

engChrName: Sylvie can be awfully strict, but I don't mind it. Having her correct my mistakes will help make me a better artisan!
engSearchText:
Sylvie can be awfully strict, but I don't mind it.
Having her correct my mistakes will help make me a
better artisan!
jpnChrName: シルヴィさんは厳しいけど、あたしが職人として 何かを目指すなら避けては通れない道だよ！
jpnSearchText:
シルヴィさんは厳しいけど、あたしが職人として
何かを目指すなら避けては通れない道だよ！

engChrName: For a while, I was sorta balancing old-school smithing philosophy with all the new protocols and stuff for new-age machines.
engSearchText:
For a while, I was sorta balancing old-school smithing
philosophy with all the new protocols and stuff for
new-age machines.
jpnChrName: あたしは今まで、昔の鍛冶職人の哲学に 憧れながら機械弄りに邁進してきたけど……
jpnSearchText:
あたしは今まで、昔の鍛冶職人の哲学に
憧れながら機械弄りに邁進してきたけど……

engChrName: But gunsmiths are kind of a weird middle ground. Guns aren't cutting edge, but they're not stone age, either.
engSearchText:
But gunsmiths are kind of a weird middle ground.
Guns aren't cutting edge, but they're not stone
age, either.
jpnChrName: ガンスミスって、まさにその中間みたいな 感じがしてさ……
jpnSearchText:
ガンスミスって、まさにその中間みたいな
感じがしてさ……

engChrName: It might actually be the place for me, though. If I can get good at it, I think I'll be set!
engSearchText:
It might actually be the place for me, though. If I can
get good at it, I think I'll be set!
jpnChrName: これをマスターすれば、絶対にあたしなりの 職人としての生き方が見えると思うんだ！
jpnSearchText:
これをマスターすれば、絶対にあたしなりの
職人としての生き方が見えると思うんだ！

engChrName: Rebecca is just pinpoint precise with her work. She's like a walking encyclopedia on new tech, too! She's really incredible.
engSearchText:
Rebecca is just pinpoint precise with her work.
She's like a walking encyclopedia on new tech, too!
She's really incredible.
jpnChrName: レベッカさんは超精密な工作から 最新の導力技術まで精通してて、何でもできて──
jpnSearchText:
レベッカさんは超精密な工作から
最新の導力技術まで精通してて、何でもできて──

engChrName: I come from a smithing family, and it was their worldview that motivated me to become an engineer myself. I really respect them for that.
engSearchText:
I come from a smithing family, and it was their
worldview that motivated me to become an
engineer myself. I really respect them for that.
jpnChrName: あたしも技師を目指したきっかけが先祖の鍛冶師の 価値観とはいえ、素直に尊敬しちゃうっていうか。
jpnSearchText:
あたしも技師を目指したきっかけが先祖の鍛冶師の
価値観とはいえ、素直に尊敬しちゃうっていうか。

engChrName: *sigh* I'd love to study under her, but she just keeps turning me down.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'd love to study under her, but she just keeps
turning me down.
jpnChrName: はぁ、ホントは弟子入りしたいくらいだけど ずっと断られちゃってて。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、ホントは弟子入りしたいくらいだけど
ずっと断られちゃってて。

engChrName: I'd really love for her to show me the ropes, though! Maybe some day I'll get my chance...
engSearchText:
I'd really love for her to show me the ropes, though!
Maybe some day I'll get my chance...
jpnChrName: 機会があれば本格的に 教えてほしいんだけどな～！
jpnSearchText:
機会があれば本格的に
教えてほしいんだけどな～！

engChrName: Oh, Lashkar! How's the guild work going?
engSearchText: Oh, Lashkar! How's the guild work going?
jpnChrName: ラシュカル、ギルドの手伝いは どうだった？
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカル、ギルドの手伝いは
どうだった？

engChrName: You said you'd be helping out with reception and stuff?
engSearchText:
You said you'd be helping out with reception
and stuff?
jpnChrName: 受付の手伝いとか、依頼者の案内が 中心だったって話だったけど……
jpnSearchText:
受付の手伝いとか、依頼者の案内が
中心だったって話だったけど……

engChrName: It's been great! I've been doing a lot more than I thought I would.
engSearchText:
It's been great! I've been doing a lot more than I
thought I would.
jpnChrName: ああ、思った以上に実りあるってモンだぜ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、思った以上に実りあるってモンだぜ！

engChrName: They've been showing me how to handle requests, how to assign backup to on-site bracers...
engSearchText:
They've been showing me how to handle requests,
how to assign backup to on-site bracers...
jpnChrName: 依頼者にどう対応するのかとか、現場の遊撃士を 支部がどうやってサポートしてるのかとか……
jpnSearchText:
依頼者にどう対応するのかとか、現場の遊撃士を
支部がどうやってサポートしてるのかとか……

engChrName: It's really cool getting to see how they all work together!
engSearchText:
It's really cool getting to see how they all
work together!
jpnChrName: そういうのが判って、一層遊撃士の 存在意義っつーか強みが判ったつーか！
jpnSearchText:
そういうのが判って、一層遊撃士の
存在意義っつーか強みが判ったつーか！

engChrName: Oh, and because this is their HQ in Calvard, you get to hear about what's going on across the whole country!
engSearchText:
Oh, and because this is their HQ in Calvard, you get
to hear about what's going on across the
whole country!
jpnChrName: あ、あと総支部だけあって、地方の情報も 多少は聞けたのも面白かったな！
jpnSearchText:
あ、あと総支部だけあって、地方の情報も
多少は聞けたのも面白かったな！

engChrName: Heehee! I'm glad to hear it! I was kinda worried you'd find it boring, honestly.
engSearchText:
Heehee! I'm glad to hear it! I was kinda worried you'd
find it boring, honestly.
jpnChrName: それはよかったね！　いやあ、地味目な裏方の 仕事だとラシュカル飽きないか心配だったけど……
jpnSearchText:
それはよかったね！　いやあ、地味目な裏方の
仕事だとラシュカル飽きないか心配だったけど……

engChrName: But yeah, you keep this up and you're gonna be a whole new Lashkar when you come back to the village!
engSearchText:
But yeah, you keep this up and you're gonna be a
whole new Lashkar when you come back to the village!
jpnChrName: ま、何にせよまだ何日かやる訳だもんな。 村に帰る時には絶対一皮むけるよ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、何にせよまだ何日かやる訳だもんな。
村に帰る時には絶対一皮むけるよ！

engChrName: You bet I am! I'm gonna be the best bracer that Creil Village has ever seen!
engSearchText:
You bet I am! I'm gonna be the best bracer that Creil
Village has ever seen!
jpnChrName: ああ、将来遊撃士になるのに絶対に 活かしてやるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、将来遊撃士になるのに絶対に
活かしてやるぜ！

engChrName: So, what about you, Kaina? How's the whole gunsmith thing?
engSearchText:
So, what about you, Kaina? How's the whole
gunsmith thing?
jpnChrName: で、そういうカイナ姉ちゃんの方は どうだったんだよ、“がんすみす”だっけ？
jpnSearchText:
で、そういうカイナ姉ちゃんの方は
どうだったんだよ、“がんすみす”だっけ？

engChrName: Well, it certainly isn't like the smithing I've been doing. It's still very...smithy, though, if that makes sense!
engSearchText:
Well, it certainly isn't like the smithing I've
been doing. It's still very...smithy, though, if that
makes sense!
jpnChrName: ガンスミスな！　何でも、銃の鍛冶師って 意味の言葉らしいんだ！
jpnSearchText:
ガンスミスな！　何でも、銃の鍛冶師って
意味の言葉らしいんだ！

engChrName: It makes sense, given Sylvie's worldview. She draws a lot of inspiration from her ancestors, too, just like me.
engSearchText:
It makes sense, given Sylvie's worldview. She draws a
lot of inspiration from her ancestors, too, just like me.
jpnChrName: そういうだけあって、シルヴィさんの技師としての 価値観もどこかご先祖に通ずる所もあって──
jpnSearchText:
そういうだけあって、シルヴィさんの技師としての
価値観もどこかご先祖に通ずる所もあって──

engChrName: Check this out! This is the frame I mentioned earlier—I got to cast it myself at the workshop!
engSearchText:
Check this out! This is the frame I mentioned
earlier—I got to cast it myself at the workshop!
jpnChrName: これ、前に言ってた新型の金属フレーム！ 工房の設備借りて作ったんだ！
jpnSearchText:
これ、前に言ってた新型の金属フレーム！
工房の設備借りて作ったんだ！

engChrName: Tough as nails and perfectly modular, just the way I like it! Oh, right, I also got some spare parts here...
engSearchText:
Tough as nails and perfectly modular, just the way I
like it! Oh, right, I also got some spare parts here...
jpnChrName: 強度も拡張性も親方の折り紙付き！ あとは村用に作ったシリンダーの余り分も……
jpnSearchText:
強度も拡張性も親方の折り紙付き！
あとは村用に作ったシリンダーの余り分も……

engChrName: A gift? Heh heh, thanks! You've really taken to this stuff, Kaina.
engSearchText:
A gift? Heh heh, thanks! You've really taken to this
stuff, Kaina.
jpnChrName: でへへ……お土産ありがとう…… カイナも腕を上げてるみたいだね……
jpnSearchText:
でへへ……お土産ありがとう……
カイナも腕を上げてるみたいだね……

engChrName: Can I really just take this, though?
engSearchText: Can I really just take this, though?
jpnChrName: でもいいの……？　こんなに貰っちゃって……
jpnSearchText: でもいいの……？　こんなに貰っちゃって……

engChrName: Of course! If anything, I'd love for you to critique it. I wanna learn how I can make my stuff even better!
engSearchText:
Of course! If anything, I'd love for you to critique it.
I wanna learn how I can make my stuff even better!
jpnChrName: もちろんっ！　むしろレベッカさんに ぜひぜひ見てほしいっていうか！
jpnSearchText:
もちろんっ！　むしろレベッカさんに
ぜひぜひ見てほしいっていうか！

engChrName: It can be anything! Shape, strength, whatever! I-I insist!
engSearchText:
It can be anything! Shape, strength, whatever!
I-I insist!
jpnChrName: な、直した方がいい所とか アドバイスとか大歓迎なんで──！！
jpnSearchText:
な、直した方がいい所とか
アドバイスとか大歓迎なんで──！！

engChrName: Just, lemme read a little from that encyclopedia of yours! C'mon, gimme a chance!
engSearchText:
Just, lemme read a little from that encyclopedia
of yours! C'mon, gimme a chance!
jpnChrName: ぶっちゃけ前みたいに 色々教えてくださいよ～、レベッカさん！！
jpnSearchText:
ぶっちゃけ前みたいに
色々教えてくださいよ～、レベッカさん！！

engChrName: Whoa, whoa, I'm...not really good with that sorta teaching stuff. Uh...
engSearchText:
Whoa, whoa, I'm...not really good with that sorta
teaching stuff. Uh...
jpnChrName: あはは……わたしそういうの、 苦手なんだけど……って──
jpnSearchText:
あはは……わたしそういうの、
苦手なんだけど……って──

engChrName: Whuh—Van?! When did you get here?!
engSearchText: Whuh—Van?! When did you get here?!
jpnChrName: ひっ、ヴァン……き、来てたの……？
jpnSearchText: ひっ、ヴァン……き、来てたの……？

engChrName: Oh! You're the guys who saved the village! Thank you so much for what you did, truly!
engSearchText:
Oh! You're the guys who saved the village! Thank you
so much for what you did, truly!
jpnChrName: あ、前に村に来て皆を助けてくれた…… その節はありがと！
jpnSearchText:
あ、前に村に来て皆を助けてくれた……
その節はありがと！

engChrName: You're from Creil Village, right? Long time, no see.
engSearchText: You're from Creil Village, right? Long time, no see.
jpnChrName: お前さんは……確かクレイユ村の。 久しぶりだな。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんは……確かクレイユ村の。
久しぶりだな。

engChrName: I'm from Old Town myself. Didn't realize you two knew each other.
engSearchText:
I'm from Old Town myself. Didn't realize you two
knew each other.
jpnChrName: ま、俺も一応はこの工房の近所ではあるんだが なんだ、二人は知り合いだったのか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺も一応はこの工房の近所ではあるんだが
なんだ、二人は知り合いだったのか？

engChrName: Thank you for all your help at the village, Kaina! Heehee, it's nice to bump into each other again.
engSearchText:
Thank you for all your help at the village, Kaina!
Heehee, it's nice to bump into each other again.
jpnChrName: カイナさん！　あの時は私達も お世話になりました、また会えて嬉しいです。
jpnSearchText:
カイナさん！　あの時は私達も
お世話になりました、また会えて嬉しいです。

engChrName: Oh, right. You're from the workshop... Umm, thanks for helping us search for Aida!
engSearchText:
Oh, right. You're from the workshop... Umm, thanks
for helping us search for Aida!
jpnChrName: あの時の工房の……その、アイーダさんの捜索に 協力してくれてありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText:
あの時の工房の……その、アイーダさんの捜索に
協力してくれてありがとうございます！

engChrName: Huh? Who's she? Stands out a bit, she does.
engSearchText: Huh? Who's she? Stands out a bit, she does.
jpnChrName: アン、東方系の娘のようだが知り合いか？
jpnSearchText: アン、東方系の娘のようだが知り合いか？

engChrName: Budding engineer from way out in the sticks. She helped us out on an investigation once.
engSearchText:
Budding engineer from way out in the sticks.
She helped us out on an investigation once.
jpnChrName: ああ、田舎の工房の駆け出し職人だ。 ま、聞き込みなんかでも世話になってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、田舎の工房の駆け出し職人だ。
ま、聞き込みなんかでも世話になってな。

engChrName: S-So it's, umm... Uhh, Dad is good friends with Kaina's boss. I don't think they've talked in a while, though.
engSearchText:
S-So it's, umm... Uhh, Dad is good friends with
Kaina's boss. I don't think they've talked in a
while, though.
jpnChrName: い、一応……父がカイナの師匠と懇意に…… 最近は会ってないようだけど……
jpnSearchText:
い、一応……父がカイナの師匠と懇意に……
最近は会ってないようだけど……

engChrName: Yup. About half a year ago, my boss introduced us, and the rest is history!
engSearchText:
Yup. About half a year ago, my boss introduced us,
and the rest is history!
jpnChrName: それで、半年くらい前に 気が合うんじゃないかって紹介されて。
jpnSearchText:
それで、半年くらい前に
気が合うんじゃないかって紹介されて。

engChrName: She's just a total mechanical mastermind! And she's a real role model for me, too—not just as an engineer, but as a girl, you know?
engSearchText:
She's just a total mechanical mastermind! And she's a
real role model for me, too—not just as an engineer,
but as a girl, you know?
jpnChrName: レベッカさんの超絶技巧に惚れ込んだっていうか！ 同じ女性技師として憧れの──！
jpnSearchText:
レベッカさんの超絶技巧に惚れ込んだっていうか！
同じ女性技師として憧れの──！

engChrName: K-Kaina? Please, no, I'm getting embarrassed...
engSearchText: K-Kaina? Please, no, I'm getting embarrassed...
jpnChrName: やや、やめてカイナ…… ……は、恥ずかしいよぉ……
jpnSearchText:
やや、やめてカイナ……
……は、恥ずかしいよぉ……

engChrName: Well, good to see the hermit's made a friend.
engSearchText: Well, good to see the hermit's made a friend.
jpnChrName: はは……何だか知らんが 仲が良いみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
はは……何だか知らんが
仲が良いみたいだな。

engChrName: Sometimes I play messenger between some of the other chapels in the city.
engSearchText:
Sometimes I play messenger between some of the
other chapels in the city.
jpnChrName: 時おりこうして、各礼拝堂や寺院との 連絡役を務めているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
時おりこうして、各礼拝堂や寺院との
連絡役を務めているのですが……

engChrName: Every time I visit one, I can't help feeling self-conscious about all my shortcomings and my own vices.
engSearchText:
Every time I visit one, I can't help feeling
self-conscious about all my shortcomings and my
own vices.
jpnChrName: その……その度に自らの不徳というか、 煩悩を自認させられるというか……
jpnSearchText:
その……その度に自らの不徳というか、
煩悩を自認させられるというか……

engChrName: *sigh* I need to learn to be as devout as the other sisters...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I need to learn to be as devout as the
other sisters...
jpnChrName: ──ふう、他のシスターの方々のように もう少し自制して奉仕出来るようにならねば……
jpnSearchText:
──ふう、他のシスターの方々のように
もう少し自制して奉仕出来るようにならねば……

engChrName: They really shelled out for that camera in Basel's Verne Plaza. It doesn't just take pictures—it can record live video, too, like broadcast equipment.
engSearchText:
They really shelled out for that camera in Basel's
Verne Plaza. It doesn't just take pictures—it can
record live video, too, like broadcast equipment.
jpnChrName: バーゼルのヴェルヌプラザにあった 映像撮影機能付きカメラ、超お高かったけど……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルのヴェルヌプラザにあった
映像撮影機能付きカメラ、超お高かったけど……

engChrName: I heard about this little store with some killer deals... Wonder if I can snag one of those cameras for cheap?
engSearchText:
I heard about this little store with some killer deals...
Wonder if I can snag one of those cameras for cheap?
jpnChrName: ウワサで聞いたこのお店だったら 安く手に入らないかなぁ～……
jpnSearchText:
ウワサで聞いたこのお店だったら
安く手に入らないかなぁ～……

engChrName: Video is really, REALLY big for me. If I can get my own video recorder, I can make my own films!
engSearchText:
Video is really, REALLY big for me. If I can get my
own video recorder, I can make my own films!
jpnChrName: あたし、どーしても映像を撮ってみたいんだよね。 短編映画なら形になるかもしれないし……！
jpnSearchText:
あたし、どーしても映像を撮ってみたいんだよね。
短編映画なら形になるかもしれないし……！

engChrName: Phew... Looking good. Still gotta work on my stomach a bit, though...
engSearchText:
Phew... Looking good. Still gotta work on my
stomach a bit, though...
jpnChrName: ふぇ～、ととのったぁ…… ちょっとお腹がタプタプだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふぇ～、ととのったぁ……
ちょっとお腹がタプタプだけど……

engChrName: U-Uh, Van?! What are you guys doing here?!
engSearchText: U-Uh, Van?! What are you guys doing here?!
jpnChrName: ってヴァンさんたち、 どうしてこんな所に……！
jpnSearchText:
ってヴァンさんたち、
どうしてこんな所に……！

engChrName: O-Oh, right. He did say your office was around here. I, uh...kinda forgot.
engSearchText:
O-Oh, right. He did say your office was around here.
I, uh...kinda forgot.
jpnChrName: そういえば、たしか事務所が このあたりって話でしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、たしか事務所が
このあたりって話でしたっけ。

engChrName: Dingo, I take it?
engSearchText: Dingo, I take it?
jpnChrName: ああ、ディンゴから聞いたのか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ディンゴから聞いたのか。

engChrName: Mhm! We're just above the Montmart Bistro.
engSearchText: Mhm! We're just above the Montmart Bistro.
jpnChrName: ふふ、この近くにある ビストロの２階にあるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、この近くにある
ビストロの２階にあるんですよ。

engChrName: You mean the same place Dingo treated me to...? Huh. I had no idea.
engSearchText:
You mean the same place Dingo treated me to...?
Huh. I had no idea.
jpnChrName: 昼間ディンゴさんにご馳走になった…… へえ～、そうだったんですか。
jpnSearchText:
昼間ディンゴさんにご馳走になった……
へえ～、そうだったんですか。

engChrName: Are you here for business or for pleasure, Ms. Aymé?
engSearchText: Are you here for business or for pleasure, Ms. Aymé?
jpnChrName: マリエル様はどうしてこちらに？ 取材で来られたのですか？
jpnSearchText:
マリエル様はどうしてこちらに？
取材で来られたのですか？

engChrName: So what brings you here, Marielle? Are you here for work?
engSearchText:
So what brings you here, Marielle? Are you here
for work?
jpnChrName: マリエルさんはどうしてこちらに？ 取材でいらっしゃったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさんはどうしてこちらに？
取材でいらっしゃったんですか？

engChrName: If I hadn't bumped into him earlier, I'd have assumed you two were hitting up the baths together.
engSearchText:
If I hadn't bumped into him earlier, I'd have assumed
you two were hitting up the baths together.
jpnChrName: さっき会ってなかったらディンゴとの お風呂デートかと思った所だが。
jpnSearchText:
さっき会ってなかったらディンゴとの
お風呂デートかと思った所だが。

engChrName: Ah, you ran into him...? H-Hey, wait, don't go saying we're an item!
engSearchText:
Ah, you ran into him...? H-Hey, wait, don't go saying
we're an item!
jpnChrName: ああ、ディンゴさんと会ったんですか？ ってデートって……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ディンゴさんと会ったんですか？
ってデートって……！

engChrName: Or maybe you're here for a little bath date with Dingo?
engSearchText: Or maybe you're here for a little bath date with Dingo?
jpnChrName: お、もしやディンゴとの お風呂デートとか言わねえよな？
jpnSearchText:
お、もしやディンゴとの
お風呂デートとか言わねえよな？

engChrName: N-No way! I'm sing—ALONE! I'm alone!
engSearchText: N-No way! I'm sing—ALONE! I'm alone!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなわけないじゃないですか！ そもそもわたし一人ですしっ！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなわけないじゃないですか！
そもそもわたし一人ですしっ！

engChrName: Public baths...? Ah, is that what this is?
engSearchText: Public baths...? Ah, is that what this is?
jpnChrName: お風呂って…… ああ、もしかしてここって。
jpnSearchText:
お風呂って……
ああ、もしかしてここって。

engChrName: Yup. Didn't have 'em over in Basel?
engSearchText: Yup. Didn't have 'em over in Basel?
jpnChrName: ああ、公衆浴場だな。 バーゼルあたりじゃ珍しかったか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、公衆浴場だな。
バーゼルあたりじゃ珍しかったか？

engChrName: So the other day, I got my first scoop on the job! Well, kinda.
engSearchText:
So the other day, I got my first scoop on the job!
Well, kinda.
jpnChrName: ……その、実は先日わたし、 初めてスクープっぽいものをとれて。
jpnSearchText:
……その、実は先日わたし、
初めてスクープっぽいものをとれて。

engChrName: I asked Dingo for a little bonus for my work, and he ended up treating me to lunch!
engSearchText:
I asked Dingo for a little bonus for my work, and he
ended up treating me to lunch!
jpnChrName: それでディンゴさんにご褒美をねだったら お休みの今日、ランチをご馳走してくれたんです。
jpnSearchText:
それでディンゴさんにご褒美をねだったら
お休みの今日、ランチをご馳走してくれたんです。

engChrName: He went off to do his own stuff afterward, but not before recommending the public baths to me.
engSearchText:
He went off to do his own stuff afterward, but not
before recommending the public baths to me.
jpnChrName: その後ディンゴさん、仕事で行っちゃいましたけど こちらの公衆浴場を勧めてもらって。
jpnSearchText:
その後ディンゴさん、仕事で行っちゃいましたけど
こちらの公衆浴場を勧めてもらって。

engChrName: I didn't realize they had a sauna, too! He just might have made a regular out of me.
engSearchText:
I didn't realize they had a sauna, too! He just might
have made a regular out of me.
jpnChrName: サウナまであって良いですよね～！ 思わずハマっちゃいそうになりました！
jpnSearchText:
サウナまであって良いですよね～！
思わずハマっちゃいそうになりました！

engChrName: Right? Place rules. You've got a good eye and good taste, young lass.
engSearchText:
Right? Place rules. You've got a good eye and good
taste, young lass.
jpnChrName: お、そうだろそうだろ？ なかなか見所があるじゃねえか♪
jpnSearchText:
お、そうだろそうだろ？
なかなか見所があるじゃねえか♪

engChrName: Greeeat, another one of his people.
engSearchText: Greeeat, another one of his people.
jpnChrName: まーた始まったよ。
jpnSearchText: まーた始まったよ。

engChrName: On the subject, are there supposed to be these milk bottles strewn about the place?
engSearchText:
On the subject, are there supposed to be these milk
bottles strewn about the place?
jpnChrName: あはは……そういえば何だか いっぱい牛乳瓶がありますね？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……そういえば何だか
いっぱい牛乳瓶がありますね？

engChrName: Oh, that's fruit au lait! I've had some, and it's really good! Better than coffee, even.
engSearchText:
Oh, that's fruit au lait! I've had some, and it's
really good! Better than coffee, even.
jpnChrName: むむ、フルーツオレですね！ わたしもコーヒーより好きです！
jpnSearchText:
むむ、フルーツオレですね！
わたしもコーヒーより好きです！

engChrName: Yeah, about that... I won a lifetime's supply of fruit au lait the other day.
engSearchText:
Yeah, about that... I won a lifetime's supply of fruit au
lait the other day.
jpnChrName: えっと、実はさっきから 連続してアタリを引いちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、実はさっきから
連続してアタリを引いちゃって……

engChrName: I didn't think it actually meant lifetime. It just keeps coming and coming! I finish a pallet and another pops up at my door!
engSearchText:
I didn't think it actually meant lifetime. It just keeps
coming and coming! I finish a pallet and another
pops up at my door!
jpnChrName: やっと飲み終わったと思ったら ダブルのアタリが出ちゃったんです。
jpnSearchText:
やっと飲み終わったと思ったら
ダブルのアタリが出ちゃったんです。

engChrName: Sooo, how about I give you some? Waste not, want not!
engSearchText:
Sooo, how about I give you some? Waste not,
want not!
jpnChrName: そうだ──よかったら こちらの２本、飲んでくれません？
jpnSearchText:
そうだ──よかったら
こちらの２本、飲んでくれません？

engChrName: Trust me, I couldn't drink them all if I tried... My poor, aching stomach...
engSearchText:
Trust me, I couldn't drink them all if I tried...
My poor, aching stomach...
jpnChrName: 折角貰ったのにお腹タプタプで……
jpnSearchText: 折角貰ったのにお腹タプタプで……

engChrName: Can we really?
engSearchText: Can we really?
jpnChrName: わぁ、いいんですか！？
jpnSearchText: わぁ、いいんですか！？

engChrName: Thank you very much! Would you like some as well, Quatre?
engSearchText:
Thank you very much! Would you like some as
well, Quatre?
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとうございます。 折角ですしカトル君もどうですか？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ありがとうございます。
折角ですしカトル君もどうですか？

engChrName: Er... Is that all right? I admit I'm curious—I haven't had fruit au lait before.
engSearchText:
Er... Is that all right? I admit I'm curious—I haven't
had fruit au lait before.
jpnChrName: えっと……いいのかな？ 飲んだこと無いから気になるけど。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……いいのかな？
飲んだこと無いから気になるけど。

engChrName: Received 2  .
engSearchText:
Received 2
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_DRINK_36}を２個貰った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_DRINK_36}を２個貰った。

engChrName: (Sounds a bit farfetched, but I guess it's not impossible.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds a bit farfetched, but I guess it's
not impossible.)
jpnChrName: （しかしラッキーな姉ちゃんだな。   そこまで連続して当たるもんかよ？）
jpnSearchText:
（しかしラッキーな姉ちゃんだな。
そこまで連続して当たるもんかよ？）

engChrName: (Yeah, according to Dingo, she's just stupid lucky.)
engSearchText: (Yeah, according to Dingo, she's just stupid lucky.)
jpnChrName: （そういやディンゴ曰く   “あり得ないほど運がいい”そうだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういやディンゴ曰く
“あり得ないほど運がいい”そうだが……）

engChrName: (Mr. Brad would be correct, evidently.)
engSearchText: (Mr. Brad would be correct, evidently.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ……どうやらその言葉に   偽りなし、みたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ……どうやらその言葉に
偽りなし、みたいですね。）

engChrName: Hmm? I don't think I've seen you here before...
engSearchText: Hmm? I don't think I've seen you here before...
jpnChrName: あれ、そういえば見覚えのない 顔触れがいるような……
jpnSearchText:
あれ、そういえば見覚えのない
顔触れがいるような……

engChrName: Are you a new assistant of his?
engSearchText: Are you a new assistant of his?
jpnChrName: また新しい助手さんですか？
jpnSearchText: また新しい助手さんですか？

engChrName: Yes, I'm on a temporary assignment here. My name is Quatre Salision.
engSearchText:
Yes, I'm on a temporary assignment here. My name is
Quatre Salision.
jpnChrName: ええ、臨時ですけど。 カトル・サリシオンといいます。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、臨時ですけど。
カトル・サリシオンといいます。

engChrName: He's still learnin' the ropes. I'm thinkin' about puttin' him in charge of all our IT and engineering stuff.
engSearchText:
He's still learnin' the ropes. I'm thinkin' about puttin'
him in charge of all our IT and engineering stuff.
jpnChrName: まだ試用期間だけどな。 技術方面の担当を任せるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
まだ試用期間だけどな。
技術方面の担当を任せるつもりだ。

engChrName: I see... You've been building up quite the little crew here, haven't you?
engSearchText:
I see... You've been building up quite the little crew
here, haven't you?
jpnChrName: むむ、何だか知らないうちに どんどん戦力アップしてますねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
むむ、何だか知らないうちに
どんどん戦力アップしてますねぇ。

engChrName: Funny how...young they look. But hey, that's none of my business.
engSearchText:
Funny how...young they look. But hey, that's none of
my business.
jpnChrName: まあ、皆さん良い子みたいですし。
jpnSearchText: まあ、皆さん良い子みたいですし。

engChrName: If Van does something sketch, you do me a favor and sock it to him, all righty?
engSearchText:
If Van does something sketch, you do me a favor and
sock it to him, all righty?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんが怪しい事をしそうになったら たまには嗜めてあげてくださいねっ！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんが怪しい事をしそうになったら
たまには嗜めてあげてくださいねっ！

engChrName: Roger!
engSearchText: Roger!
jpnChrName: 了解ですっ。
jpnSearchText: 了解ですっ。

engChrName: Should the need arise.
engSearchText: Should the need arise.
jpnChrName: まあ、機会があれば なるべく努めてみますよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、機会があれば
なるべく努めてみますよ。

engChrName: Heh. Care to defend yourself, Mister Child Labor?
engSearchText: Heh. Care to defend yourself, Mister Child Labor?
jpnChrName: クク、だそうだが？
jpnSearchText: クク、だそうだが？

engChrName: ...You're all conniving little snots and I hate you.
engSearchText: ...You're all conniving little snots and I hate you.
jpnChrName: ったく…… 意気投合しやがって。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
意気投合しやがって。

engChrName: Ah, haha...
engSearchText: Ah, haha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Trust is paramount here at Arkride Solutions. Heehee.
engSearchText:
Trust is paramount here at Arkride Solutions.
Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふ、これもある意味、 信頼の証ではないかと。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、これもある意味、
信頼の証ではないかと。

engChrName: Whew... Been a while since I got some time off. I'll rest up for a bit and then head on home.
engSearchText:
Whew... Been a while since I got some time off.
I'll rest up for a bit and then head on home.
jpnChrName: ふう、久々のオフだし、 もう一休みしたらいったん家に戻って……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、久々のオフだし、
もう一休みしたらいったん家に戻って……

engChrName: ...Actually, I remember Dingo saying he wanted to go out for drinks sometime.
engSearchText:
...Actually, I remember Dingo saying he wanted to go
out for drinks sometime.
jpnChrName: ……そういえばディンゴさん、そのうち 飲みにも連れて行ってくれるそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
……そういえばディンゴさん、そのうち
飲みにも連れて行ってくれるそうだけど……

engChrName: Maybe he's free tonight? I'll hit him up and see what he's up to.
engSearchText:
Maybe he's free tonight? I'll hit him up and see what
he's up to.
jpnChrName: 今日の夜はどうするのかな……？ ……あとでまた連絡してみようかな……？
jpnSearchText:
今日の夜はどうするのかな……？
……あとでまた連絡してみようかな……？

engChrName: (Heh. Sly bastard, the guy.)
engSearchText: (Heh. Sly bastard, the guy.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、ディンゴも   ほんと罪作りなヤツだよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ、ディンゴも
ほんと罪作りなヤツだよな。）

engChrName: (I'm...not sure you're one to talk, Van. With all due respect.)
engSearchText:
(I'm...not sure you're one to talk, Van. With all
due respect.)
jpnChrName: （うーん……ヴァンさんも   人のことは言えないような。）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん……ヴァンさんも
人のことは言えないような。）

engChrName: I can only hope Nate and the others are okay... This is just horrible...
engSearchText:
I can only hope Nate and the others are okay...
This is just horrible...
jpnChrName: ネイトに他の警官たち── 皆が無事か、気になる所ではあるが……
jpnSearchText:
ネイトに他の警官たち──
皆が無事か、気になる所ではあるが……

engChrName: But I can't leave my post here—I have to make sure this area is secured. The rest, I leave to you.
engSearchText:
But I can't leave my post here—I have to make sure
this area is secured. The rest, I leave to you.
jpnChrName: 今はこの辺りの安全確保を優先すべきだろう。 お前達には他の地を頼んだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
今はこの辺りの安全確保を優先すべきだろう。
お前達には他の地を頼んだぞ。

engChrName: ...Funny. You'd have caught me dead before trusting a spriggan like you with clearing the streets.
engSearchText:
...Funny. You'd have caught me dead before trusting
a spriggan like you with clearing the streets.
jpnChrName: ……フッ、まさかお前達に 何かを託す日が来るとは思わなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
……フッ、まさかお前達に
何かを託す日が来るとは思わなかったが。

engChrName: But with all this going on, your friends are where you find them. Stay on your toes out there, all right?
engSearchText:
But with all this going on, your friends are where you
find them. Stay on your toes out there, all right?
jpnChrName: ともかく、この場は俺が引き受ける、 案じず進むがいい。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、この場は俺が引き受ける、
案じず進むがいい。

engChrName: That girl's got some spunk. Hopefully she doesn't get in the way.
engSearchText:
That girl's got some spunk. Hopefully she doesn't get
in the way.
jpnChrName: ……どうやらそちらのご婦人も 相当肝の据わった方のようだしな。
jpnSearchText:
……どうやらそちらのご婦人も
相当肝の据わった方のようだしな。

engChrName: If I can get the locals to work with me, that'll make this a lot easier.
engSearchText:
If I can get the locals to work with me, that'll make
this a lot easier.
jpnChrName: 他にも住民の力を借りれば 安否確認や安全確保も可能だろう。
jpnSearchText:
他にも住民の力を借りれば
安否確認や安全確保も可能だろう。

engChrName: I'll handle this area. You guys move out! Stay sharp out there, you hear?
engSearchText:
I'll handle this area. You guys move out! Stay sharp
out there, you hear?
jpnChrName: この場は俺が引き受ける、 お前たちは案じず進むがいい！
jpnSearchText:
この場は俺が引き受ける、
お前たちは案じず進むがいい！

engChrName: Man... I never expected anything like this...
engSearchText: Man... I never expected anything like this...
jpnChrName: フン、まさかこんな事が起ころうとは 思いもしなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
フン、まさかこんな事が起ころうとは
思いもしなかったが……

engChrName: ...but I expect the unexpected. As a man of the law, I have to be ready for anything. Leave these streets to me.
engSearchText:
...but I expect the unexpected. As a man of the law, I
have to be ready for anything. Leave these streets
to me.
jpnChrName: 捜査官としてやってきた以上、想定外など 覚悟の上だ、こちらの事は案ずるな。
jpnSearchText:
捜査官としてやってきた以上、想定外など
覚悟の上だ、こちらの事は案ずるな。

engChrName: I'm no stranger to the bistro anymore. I'll keep it safe, no matter what.
engSearchText:
I'm no stranger to the bistro anymore. I'll keep it safe,
no matter what.
jpnChrName: この店にも縁ができた事だ、 任せて貰うとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
この店にも縁ができた事だ、
任せて貰うとしよう。

engChrName: Heh, I think the owner and I will get along just fine.
engSearchText: Heh, I think the owner and I will get along just fine.
jpnChrName: はは、ここの店主殿とは…… 分かり合えそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、ここの店主殿とは……
分かり合えそうだな。

engChrName: Been a while since we all ate out together... I forgot how nice it is.
engSearchText:
Been a while since we all ate out together... I forgot
how nice it is.
jpnChrName: 家族と外食するのも久しいが…… ここまで気分の良いものだったとは。
jpnSearchText:
家族と外食するのも久しいが……
ここまで気分の良いものだったとは。

engChrName: I have the owner to thank for going out on a limb for us. He might make a regular outta me.
engSearchText:
I have the owner to thank for going out on a limb
for us. He might make a regular outta me.
jpnChrName: これも、店主殿が色々と気を利かせてくれた お陰でもある、今後とも贔屓にしたいものだ。
jpnSearchText:
これも、店主殿が色々と気を利かせてくれた
お陰でもある、今後とも贔屓にしたいものだ。

engChrName: ...I'm glad they're okay. You have my thanks.
engSearchText: ...I'm glad they're okay. You have my thanks.
jpnChrName: ……そちらの子も無事に帰ってきて良かった。 あなた方にも改めてお礼を言わせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
……そちらの子も無事に帰ってきて良かった。
あなた方にも改めてお礼を言わせてもらうわ。

engChrName: My husband is out there... He's working with the locals to try and restore order.
engSearchText:
My husband is out there... He's working with the
locals to try and restore order.
jpnChrName: 夫は……今は町の人と協力して、この近辺の 秩序維持に努めるつもりらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
夫は……今は町の人と協力して、この近辺の
秩序維持に努めるつもりらしいわ。

engChrName: I wish he could be home with us right now, but I know how important his work is... This is how it has to be.
engSearchText:
I wish he could be home with us right now, but I
know how important his work is... This is how it has
to be.
jpnChrName: すぐ近くにいてくれないのは少し 寂しいけど、仕方のない事よね。
jpnSearchText:
すぐ近くにいてくれないのは少し
寂しいけど、仕方のない事よね。

engChrName: And at any rate, we can't just sit here and sob while he does all the hard work.
engSearchText:
And at any rate, we can't just sit here and sob while
he does all the hard work.
jpnChrName: 夫は皆のために頑張っているんですもの、 私たち家族だけが我侭を言う訳にはいかないわ。
jpnSearchText:
夫は皆のために頑張っているんですもの、
私たち家族だけが我侭を言う訳にはいかないわ。

engChrName: I'm not very well acquainted with you, but if my husband trusts you, then so do I.
engSearchText:
I'm not very well acquainted with you, but if my
husband trusts you, then so do I.
jpnChrName: ……あなた達の事はあまりよく知らないけど、 夫が言うならとても頼りになる方々なのね……
jpnSearchText:
……あなた達の事はあまりよく知らないけど、
夫が言うならとても頼りになる方々なのね……

engChrName: We'll keep ourselves safe... Don't worry about us. Please, go out and make sure those kids are safe!
engSearchText:
We'll keep ourselves safe... Don't worry about us.
Please, go out and make sure those kids are safe!
jpnChrName: どうか……私達の事は気にしないで、 その子達の事を助けに行ってあげて。
jpnSearchText:
どうか……私達の事は気にしないで、
その子達の事を助けに行ってあげて。

engChrName: Gigi and I have nothing to fear with my husband here!
engSearchText:
Gigi and I have nothing to fear with my
husband here!
jpnChrName: 私もジジも……頼もしい夫が一緒に いてくれるから、怖くもないから……！
jpnSearchText:
私もジジも……頼もしい夫が一緒に
いてくれるから、怖くもないから……！

engChrName: Heehee... And here I thought my husband was too much of a workaholic for little dates like these. Quite the lovely place he's found!
engSearchText:
Heehee... And here I thought my husband was too
much of a workaholic for little dates like these.
Quite the lovely place he's found!
jpnChrName: ふふ、夫は仕事の事ばかりかと思っていたけど、 こういうお店を見つけたりもしていたのね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、夫は仕事の事ばかりかと思っていたけど、
こういうお店を見つけたりもしていたのね。

engChrName: Come to think of it, he goes out and tours all kinds of neighborhoods on the job. Maybe that's how he found this place...
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, he goes out and tours all kinds of
neighborhoods on the job. Maybe that's how he
found this place...
jpnChrName: そう思えば、あちこちに行く捜査官の仕事も、 案外色々なものを見つける機会もあるのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
そう思えば、あちこちに行く捜査官の仕事も、
案外色々なものを見つける機会もあるのかしら。

engChrName: Well, however he happened upon the bistro, I'm glad he took us here. We're a family, and I love every chance to spend time together as one.
engSearchText:
Well, however he happened upon the bistro, I'm glad
he took us here. We're a family, and I love every
chance to spend time together as one.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、今日は付き合ってくれて嬉しいわ。 やっぱりこういう日は家族で過ごさないと。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、今日は付き合ってくれて嬉しいわ。
やっぱりこういう日は家族で過ごさないと。

engChrName: Daddy said he's going to bring everyone together with that scary old lady.
engSearchText:
Daddy said he's going to bring everyone together
with that scary old lady.
jpnChrName: パパ、あっちのコワイおばあちゃんと イッショにみんなをまもるんだって。
jpnSearchText:
パパ、あっちのコワイおばあちゃんと
イッショにみんなをまもるんだって。

engChrName: Usually he's always at work, but today he had to do some other stuff.
engSearchText:
Usually he's always at work, but today he had to do
some other stuff.
jpnChrName: ……フダンはジジたちをおいてオシゴトに いってるけど、きょうはしかたないよね。
jpnSearchText:
……フダンはジジたちをおいてオシゴトに
いってるけど、きょうはしかたないよね。

engChrName: Oh, oh, and he said that once the outside is back to normal, we're gonna start the party back up!
engSearchText:
Oh, oh, and he said that once the outside is back to
normal, we're gonna start the party back up!
jpnChrName: もとにもどったら、ゼッタイにオイワイの つづきやるってヤクソクしてくれたし！
jpnSearchText:
もとにもどったら、ゼッタイにオイワイの
つづきやるってヤクソクしてくれたし！

engChrName: This lady named Feri, she was really nice... She said she was gonna help everybody outside. I hope she's okay...
engSearchText:
This lady named Feri, she was really nice... She said
she was gonna help everybody outside. I hope
she's okay...
jpnChrName: フェリっておねえちゃんが……みんなのために おそとにいって……ダイジョウブかな……？
jpnSearchText:
フェリっておねえちゃんが……みんなのために
おそとにいって……ダイジョウブかな……？

engChrName: I'm not scared. Daddy's gonna protect me! But not everybody in town has someone like Daddy... Will they be okay?
engSearchText:
I'm not scared. Daddy's gonna protect me! But not
everybody in town has someone like Daddy...
Will they be okay?
jpnChrName: ジジたちはパパとイッショだしコワくないけど、 マチのみんなはきっとコワイよね……
jpnSearchText:
ジジたちはパパとイッショだしコワくないけど、
マチのみんなはきっとコワイよね……

engChrName: Daddy's kinda weird, but he's super tough!
engSearchText: Daddy's kinda weird, but he's super tough!
jpnChrName: パパ、ブキヨーだけどつよいもん！
jpnSearchText: パパ、ブキヨーだけどつよいもん！

engChrName: He's always busy with work, so I'm only with him when we go to the temple together...
engSearchText:
He's always busy with work, so I'm only with him
when we go to the temple together...
jpnChrName: パパ、いつもオシゴトばっかりで 寺院くらいしかイッショにいってなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
パパ、いつもオシゴトばっかりで
寺院くらいしかイッショにいってなかったけど……

engChrName: ...but I didn't know he knew about cool restaurants! He's pretty smart!
engSearchText:
...but I didn't know he knew about cool restaurants!
He's pretty smart!
jpnChrName: こんなステキなおみせもしってるんだね、 みなおしちゃったよ！
jpnSearchText:
こんなステキなおみせもしってるんだね、
みなおしちゃったよ！

engChrName: I wish he'd tell me more about all the places he sees. It's all so cool...!
engSearchText:
I wish he'd tell me more about all the places he sees.
It's all so cool...!
jpnChrName: でもパパ、それならもっとレイハイのときにでも いろいろおしえてくれたっていいのにね～。
jpnSearchText:
でもパパ、それならもっとレイハイのときにでも
いろいろおしえてくれたっていいのにね～。

engChrName: C-C-Cao?!
engSearchText: C-C-Cao?!
jpnChrName: ツ、ツ、ツ、ツァオ──！？

engChrName: I was so worried...! *sniffle* How long were you going to make me wait...?
engSearchText:
I was so worried...! *sniffle* How long were you going
to make me wait...?
jpnChrName: 本当に来てくれたんだ……！ ぐすっ、待ちくたびれちゃったじゃない……
jpnSearchText:
本当に来てくれたんだ……！
ぐすっ、待ちくたびれちゃったじゃない……

engChrName: There, there... I understand my absence must have been difficult for you.
engSearchText:
There, there... I understand my absence must have
been difficult for you.
jpnChrName: おや、お涙が── フフ、よほど心細かったのですね。
jpnSearchText:
おや、お涙が──
フフ、よほど心細かったのですね。

engChrName: My apologies for making you worry so. My callousness is simply shameful.
engSearchText:
My apologies for making you worry so.
My callousness is simply shameful.
jpnChrName: お嬢様にこのような顔をさせてしまうとは 己の不甲斐なさを恥じるばかりです。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様にこのような顔をさせてしまうとは
己の不甲斐なさを恥じるばかりです。

engChrName: It's okay... I just, I knew you'd come...
engSearchText: It's okay... I just, I knew you'd come...
jpnChrName: ………ツァオ………ううん、 あたし……信じてたから……
jpnSearchText:
………ツァオ………ううん、
あたし……信じてたから……

engChrName: I must take my leave, unfortunately. Van and company could use me for their investigation.
engSearchText:
I must take my leave, unfortunately. Van and
company could use me for their investigation.
jpnChrName: ですが申し訳ありません、しばらく私は ヴァンさん達と行動を共にする事になりまして。
jpnSearchText:
ですが申し訳ありません、しばらく私は
ヴァンさん達と行動を共にする事になりまして。

engChrName: Allow me to arrange an escort for you. For the time being, stay here where it's safe.
engSearchText:
Allow me to arrange an escort for you. For the time
being, stay here where it's safe.
jpnChrName: 別の迎えが来るよう手配いたしましょう。 どうかそれまで、ここでお待ちください。
jpnSearchText:
別の迎えが来るよう手配いたしましょう。
どうかそれまで、ここでお待ちください。

engChrName: What? N-No, please! You just returned and you're already leaving...?
engSearchText:
What? N-No, please! You just returned and you're
already leaving...?
jpnChrName: ってツァオ！？ もうちょっと傍にいてくれたって……！
jpnSearchText:
ってツァオ！？
もうちょっと傍にいてくれたって……！

engChrName: H-He's just so cold... But why does my heart feel like it's on fire...?
engSearchText:
H-He's just so cold... But why does my heart feel like
it's on fire...?
jpnChrName: で、でもそういうすげない所も……
jpnSearchText: で、でもそういうすげない所も……

engChrName: Girl, you're hopeless.
engSearchText: Girl, you're hopeless.
jpnChrName: ったく、処置ナシだな。
jpnSearchText: ったく、処置ナシだな。

engChrName: (Well, glad she's doin' well, at least.)
engSearchText: (Well, glad she's doin' well, at least.)
jpnChrName: （ま、相変わらずのようで何よりだぜ。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、相変わらずのようで何よりだぜ。）

engChrName: It looks like things have calmed down for now... I'm tempted to investigate and see if I can learn anything new.
engSearchText:
It looks like things have calmed down for now...
I'm tempted to investigate and see if I can learn
anything new.
jpnChrName: 状況が落ち着いた事だし、 街の状況を調べたい所だけど……
jpnSearchText:
状況が落ち着いた事だし、
街の状況を調べたい所だけど……

engChrName: W-Well, I wouldn't mind playing the damsel for a certain dashing fellow... ❤
engSearchText:
W-Well, I wouldn't mind playing the damsel for a
certain dashing fellow... ❤
jpnChrName: い、いっそあたしもついて行って ツァオに守ってもらっちゃったり……❤
jpnSearchText:
い、いっそあたしもついて行って
ツァオに守ってもらっちゃったり……❤

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: ふむ……？
jpnSearchText: ふむ……？

engChrName: Nothing! Nothing at all. S-Sorry, that was, er, unbecoming of a Heiyue agent.
engSearchText:
Nothing! Nothing at all. S-Sorry, that was, er,
unbecoming of a Heiyue agent.
jpnChrName: って何でもないわ！ あたしも黒月の人間としてしっかりしないと……
jpnSearchText:
って何でもないわ！
あたしも黒月の人間としてしっかりしないと……

engChrName: Leave things here to me! Good luck, you two!
engSearchText: Leave things here to me! Good luck, you two!
jpnChrName: こっちの事は任せて、 ツァオにヴァンさん達もしっかりね！
jpnSearchText:
こっちの事は任せて、
ツァオにヴァンさん達もしっかりね！

engChrName: I shouldn't go wandering around, if Cao's calling somebody to pick me up.
engSearchText:
I shouldn't go wandering around, if Cao's calling
somebody to pick me up.
jpnChrName: ツァオが迎えをよこしてくれるなら あんまりうろつく訳にはいかないわね。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオが迎えをよこしてくれるなら
あんまりうろつく訳にはいかないわね。

engChrName: *sigh* If Xipha service were still online, I could at least provide reconnaissance.
engSearchText:
*sigh* If Xipha service were still online, I could at
least provide reconnaissance.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、せめてザイファの通信が使えるようになれば あたしも黒月として動きようがあるんだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、せめてザイファの通信が使えるようになれば
あたしも黒月として動きようがあるんだけどな。

engChrName: But with Cao on the way, I need to just stay here and wait it out.
engSearchText:
But with Cao on the way, I need to just stay here and
wait it out.
jpnChrName: ツァオが迎えに来るだろうし、 あんまりうろつくわけにはいかないわね。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオが迎えに来るだろうし、
あんまりうろつくわけにはいかないわね。

engChrName: Just imagine: the cool, collected Cao loses his composure and desperately searches for his woman... Oh, how dreamy...! ㈱
engSearchText:
Just imagine: the cool, collected Cao loses his
composure and desperately searches for his woman...
Oh, how dreamy...! ㈱
jpnChrName: はぁ……あたしの為に必死になって、 普段のクールさが崩れてたりしたらサイコーね㈱
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……あたしの為に必死になって、
普段のクールさが崩れてたりしたらサイコーね㈱

engChrName: Please, let him come soon... I just can't spend another minute without him.
engSearchText:
Please, let him come soon... I just can't spend another
minute without him.
jpnChrName: あ～、早く迎えに来てくれないかしら。 なんだか楽しみになって来ちゃった。
jpnSearchText:
あ～、早く迎えに来てくれないかしら。
なんだか楽しみになって来ちゃった。

engChrName: Is he desperate? Frantically searching for me? Oh, my heart is just...!
engSearchText:
Is he desperate? Frantically searching for me? Oh, my
heart is just...!
jpnChrName: 焦った感じで駆け付けてくれたらもう……！
jpnSearchText: 焦った感じで駆け付けてくれたらもう……！

engChrName: Those agents tailing me have backed off, too.
engSearchText: Those agents tailing me have backed off, too.
jpnChrName: あたしについて来てた隠密も 停まっちゃってるみたいなのよね。
jpnSearchText:
あたしについて来てた隠密も
停まっちゃってるみたいなのよね。

engChrName: *sigh* Surely they have better things to do...?
engSearchText: *sigh* Surely they have better things to do...?
jpnChrName: はぁ……こういう時こそ役に立ってほしいのに。
jpnSearchText: はぁ……こういう時こそ役に立ってほしいのに。

engChrName: At any rate, those two should still be in Old Town somewhere. Please, make sure they're okay!
engSearchText:
At any rate, those two should still be in Old
Town somewhere. Please, make sure they're okay!
jpnChrName: とにかく、二人はまだ旧市街から離れてないはずよ。 早く合流してあげてちょうだいね。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、二人はまだ旧市街から離れてないはずよ。
早く合流してあげてちょうだいね。

engChrName: Being who I am, I don't get to be so casual back at home. It's all business, all the time.
engSearchText:
Being who I am, I don't get to be so casual back
at home. It's all business, all the time.
jpnChrName: 地元だと、同世代の女の子と 気兼ねなく話せる機会って少ないのよね～。
jpnSearchText:
地元だと、同世代の女の子と
気兼ねなく話せる機会って少ないのよね～。

engChrName: But the festival lets me forget about all that for a little bit! I'm gonna take it all in.
engSearchText:
But the festival lets me forget about all that for a
little bit! I'm gonna take it all in.
jpnChrName: だから今日は思いっきり 女子会を楽しませてもらっちゃうわ♪
jpnSearchText:
だから今日は思いっきり
女子会を楽しませてもらっちゃうわ♪

engChrName: Oh, thank heavens, you're okay...! I know my sister has to be out there somewhere, too...
engSearchText:
Oh, thank heavens, you're okay...! I know my sister
has to be out there somewhere, too...
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんもフィーさんも無事でよかった！ お姉だって、きっと……
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんもフィーさんも無事でよかった！
お姉だって、きっと……

engChrName: But the hotel she's at is an awful long way from here...
engSearchText:
But the hotel she's at is an awful long way
from here...
jpnChrName: でもでも、探しに行こうにも お姉がいたホテル、結構遠いみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
でもでも、探しに行こうにも
お姉がいたホテル、結構遠いみたいだし……

engChrName: If only I could get in touch with her. I need to let her know what's going on.
engSearchText:
If only I could get in touch with her. I need to let her
know what's going on.
jpnChrName: う～ん、せめてこっちの状況が 伝えられたらいいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、せめてこっちの状況が
伝えられたらいいんだけど……

engChrName: The film festival was crazy enough, but this is just... I can hardly keep tabs on it all.
engSearchText:
The film festival was crazy enough, but this is just...
I can hardly keep tabs on it all.
jpnChrName: 映画祭の時も色々あったけど、 今回はもっと大変な事になっちゃったね……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭の時も色々あったけど、
今回はもっと大変な事になっちゃったね……

engChrName: But you guys being here puts me at ease. I know you'll put a stop to this!
engSearchText:
But you guys being here puts me at ease. I know you'll
put a stop to this!
jpnChrName: でも……お兄さんたちがいてくれたら 今回だってきっと！
jpnSearchText:
でも……お兄さんたちがいてくれたら
今回だってきっと！

engChrName: We're okay here, so go and find the others!
engSearchText: We're okay here, so go and find the others!
jpnChrName: あたしたちは大丈夫だから── 早く二人の所に行ってあげて！
jpnSearchText:
あたしたちは大丈夫だから──
早く二人の所に行ってあげて！

engChrName: Ashen really knows her beauty stuff. I should ask for her recommendations some time!
engSearchText:
Ashen really knows her beauty stuff. I should ask for
her recommendations some time!
jpnChrName: アシェンさんって、洗顔料とか化粧水とか 色々と詳しくて勉強になっちゃうんだよねー！
jpnSearchText:
アシェンさんって、洗顔料とか化粧水とか
色々と詳しくて勉強になっちゃうんだよねー！

engChrName: I'll have to pass it on to my sister, too!
engSearchText: I'll have to pass it on to my sister, too!
jpnChrName: 後でお姉にも教えてあげよっと！
jpnSearchText: 後でお姉にも教えてあげよっと！

engChrName: Of course this had to happen during the festival. We just can't have anything nice this year...
engSearchText:
Of course this had to happen during the festival.
We just can't have anything nice this year...
jpnChrName: 折角のお祭りだったのに、 急にこんなおかしな事になっちゃうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
折角のお祭りだったのに、
急にこんなおかしな事になっちゃうなんて……

engChrName: I have no idea where my sister is... Please let her be safe...
engSearchText:
I have no idea where my sister is... Please let her
be safe...
jpnChrName: お姉は大丈夫かな…… ちゃんと避難してるといいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
お姉は大丈夫かな……
ちゃんと避難してるといいんだけど……

engChrName: I've confirmed Aaron is all right, at least.
engSearchText: I've confirmed Aaron is all right, at least.
jpnChrName: あたしはアーロンの無事を確認できたし……
jpnSearchText: あたしはアーロンの無事を確認できたし……

engChrName: I do worry about Aaron...
engSearchText: I do worry about Aaron...
jpnChrName: そうね、あたしはアーロンの事も心配だし……
jpnSearchText: そうね、あたしはアーロンの事も心配だし……

engChrName: Cao and I have met up, and I'm sure Bàbà and the others are all right.
engSearchText:
Cao and I have met up, and I'm sure Bàbà and the
others are all right.
jpnChrName: ツァオと合流出来たし、 爸爸（パパ）達の事も心配いらないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオと合流出来たし、
爸爸（パパ）達の事も心配いらないでしょう。
