engChrName: I'm sure Bàbà and the others are okay, but I'd feel a whole lot better if I could find Cao already. I just have to see him for myself...
engSearchText:
I'm sure Bàbà and the others are okay, but I'd feel a
whole lot better if I could find Cao already. I just
have to see him for myself...
jpnChrName: 爸爸（パパ）達の事は心配いらないでしょうけど。 早くツァオと合流出来たら心強いんだけどね……
jpnSearchText:
爸爸（パパ）達の事は心配いらないでしょうけど。
早くツァオと合流出来たら心強いんだけどね……

engChrName: I know I shouldn't be worried about Feri and Fie, but...they dove right into that mess together.
engSearchText:
I know I shouldn't be worried about Feri and Fie,
but...they dove right into that mess together.
jpnChrName: なによりもまずは 調査に行ったフェリさんとフィーさんが心配ね。
jpnSearchText:
なによりもまずは
調査に行ったフェリさんとフィーさんが心配ね。

engChrName: Yeah... They can hold their own in a fight, but who knows what kind of monsters they're running into out there.
engSearchText:
Yeah... They can hold their own in a fight, but who
knows what kind of monsters they're running into
out there.
jpnChrName: うん、二人とも強いから大丈夫だろうけど 街中は不気味な魔獣ばっかりみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
うん、二人とも強いから大丈夫だろうけど
街中は不気味な魔獣ばっかりみたいだし……

engChrName: I can't help but worry... You have to find them!
engSearchText: I can't help but worry... You have to find them!
jpnChrName: こんな状況で何が起きるかも分からないし、 早く合流してあげてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
こんな状況で何が起きるかも分からないし、
早く合流してあげてちょうだい。

engChrName: They can't have gone far from Old Town yet.
engSearchText: They can't have gone far from Old Town yet.
jpnChrName: まだ旧市街からそう離れていないはずよ。
jpnSearchText: まだ旧市街からそう離れていないはずよ。

engChrName: Please be careful! Don't do anything reckless!
engSearchText: Please be careful! Don't do anything reckless!
jpnChrName: 出来れば怪我はしないように 気を付けて行ってきてね……！
jpnSearchText:
出来れば怪我はしないように
気を付けて行ってきてね……！

engChrName: You got it.
engSearchText: You got it.
jpnChrName: ああ、任された。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任された。

engChrName: I dunno how she does it, but Paulette washes away all my exhaustion with one little smile.
engSearchText:
I dunno how she does it, but Paulette washes away all
my exhaustion with one little smile.
jpnChrName: それにしても、ポーレットさんの笑顔は本当に 疲れが吹き飛びますよね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、ポーレットさんの笑顔は本当に
疲れが吹き飛びますよね。

engChrName: This stuff is exhausting, having to run around and deal with customers everywhere...but it's all worth it when I stop by Montmart.
engSearchText:
This stuff is exhausting, having to run around and
deal with customers everywhere...but it's all worth it
when I stop by Montmart.
jpnChrName: 僕もあの後事後処理に駆り出されて疲れていたし、 出荷ついでにここで休めるのは救いですよ。
jpnSearchText:
僕もあの後事後処理に駆り出されて疲れていたし、
出荷ついでにここで休めるのは救いですよ。

engChrName: Man, I really owe Paulette big time, don't I? Haha.
engSearchText: Man, I really owe Paulette big time, don't I? Haha.
jpnChrName: はは、こりゃあポーレットさんにも 感謝しないとですね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、こりゃあポーレットさんにも
感謝しないとですね。

engChrName: I really learned a lot about how bracers work and conduct themselves. Man, I can't wait to grow up!
engSearchText:
I really learned a lot about how bracers work and
conduct themselves. Man, I can't wait to grow up!
jpnChrName: オレも遊撃士の在り方に一歩近づけた 感じもして、この後も一層楽しみだよ！
jpnSearchText:
オレも遊撃士の在り方に一歩近づけた
感じもして、この後も一層楽しみだよ！

engChrName: I'll be in the capital for a few more days—maybe I can meet a super big bracer and talk to them about stuff!
engSearchText:
I'll be in the capital for a few more days—maybe I can
meet a super big bracer and talk to them about stuff!
jpnChrName: まだ何日も首都にいる訳だし……もしかしたら、 もっと有名な遊撃士と会って話せるかもな！
jpnSearchText:
まだ何日も首都にいる訳だし……もしかしたら、
もっと有名な遊撃士と会って話せるかもな！

engChrName: Thanks for your patronage. Hope to see you again!
engSearchText: Thanks for your patronage. Hope to see you again!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございました、またどうぞ。
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございました、またどうぞ。

engChrName: Just you now. We're about to close for the day.
engSearchText: Just you now. We're about to close for the day.
jpnChrName: おい、もう閉店だぞ。
jpnSearchText: おい、もう閉店だぞ。

engChrName: Yeah, I hear you.
engSearchText: Yeah, I hear you.
jpnChrName: へいへい、分かってるっての。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、分かってるっての。

engChrName: C'mon. Gotta take this upstairs, Yumes.
engSearchText: C'mon. Gotta take this upstairs, Yumes.
jpnChrName: ユメ坊、眠たいんなら二階のベッドにな。
jpnSearchText: ユメ坊、眠たいんなら二階のベッドにな。

engChrName: Mmm...?
engSearchText: Mmm...?
jpnChrName: むー……
jpnSearchText: むー……

engChrName: I'm gonna go to bed, then. Night night...
engSearchText: I'm gonna go to bed, then. Night night...
jpnChrName: おやすみ～…… ママ、おじいちゃん、上行くね～……
jpnSearchText:
おやすみ～……
ママ、おじいちゃん、上行くね～……

engChrName: Night night. Grandpa loves you.
engSearchText: Night night. Grandpa loves you.
jpnChrName: うんうん、おやすみなぁ、ユメ❤
jpnSearchText: うんうん、おやすみなぁ、ユメ❤

engChrName: Good night, sweetie. Don't forget to brush your teeth first, all right? This one's on me, Van.
engSearchText:
Good night, sweetie. Don't forget to brush your teeth
first, all right? This one's on me, Van.
jpnChrName: おやすみなさい、ちゃんと歯を磨くのよ。 ──はい、これはサービス。
jpnSearchText:
おやすみなさい、ちゃんと歯を磨くのよ。
──はい、これはサービス。

engChrName: Heh. Thanks. These little perks're why they call you the diva of the diner, you know.
engSearchText:
Heh. Thanks. These little perks're why they call you
the diva of the diner, you know.
jpnChrName: お、サンクス。 さすがは麗しのマドンナだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お、サンクス。
さすがは麗しのマドンナだぜ。

engChrName: Heehee. Well, this diva's very welcome.
engSearchText: Heehee. Well, this diva's very welcome.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、どういたしまして。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、どういたしまして。

engChrName: Think you can butter her up, do you? You really shouldn't enable him.
engSearchText:
Think you can butter her up, do you? You really
shouldn't enable him.
jpnChrName: コラ、気安いぞ不良店子！ お前もあんまり甘やかすと……
jpnSearchText:
コラ、気安いぞ不良店子！
お前もあんまり甘やかすと……
……………………………………

engChrName: (Heh. I sure smell something brewin'—and it ain't the coffee.)
engSearchText:
(Heh. I sure smell something brewin'—and it ain't
the coffee.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……   ………妙に匂いやがるな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……
………妙に匂いやがるな。）

engChrName: The next day...
engSearchText: The next day...
jpnChrName: 翌日──

engChrName: August 27th, 10:05AM
engSearchText: August 27th, 10:05AM

engChrName: Capital of Calvard, Edith Eighth District, Vieux Quartier a.k.a. Old Town
engSearchText:
Capital of Calvard, Edith
Eighth District, Vieux Quartier
a.k.a. Old Town
jpnChrName: 首都イーディス八区　旧市街
jpnSearchText: <s40>首都イーディス八区　旧市街

engChrName: Montmart... This looks like the building.
engSearchText: Montmart... This looks like the building.
jpnChrName: ＭＯＮＴＭＡＲＴ（モンマルト）…… うん、この建物で間違いないみたい。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＯＮＴＭＡＲＴ（モンマルト）……
うん、この建物で間違いないみたい。

engChrName: What an adorable bistro this is. It has such a welcoming storefront.
engSearchText:
What an adorable bistro this is. It has such a
welcoming storefront.
jpnChrName: ビストロ、なのかな？ 素敵な雰囲気のお店だけど……
jpnSearchText:
ビストロ、なのかな？
素敵な雰囲気のお店だけど……

engChrName: Is the place I'm looking for really right above here...?
engSearchText: Is the place I'm looking for really right above here...?
jpnChrName: ………本当にこの２階が？
jpnSearchText: ………本当にこの２階が？

engChrName: Oh! Are you a customer, perhaps?
engSearchText: Oh! Are you a customer, perhaps?
jpnChrName: あら、お客さんですか？
jpnSearchText: あら、お客さんですか？

engChrName: It's still breakfast hours if you're interested. Or is it the office upstairs you're here for?
engSearchText:
It's still breakfast hours if you're interested. Or is it
the office upstairs you're here for?
jpnChrName: モーニング、まだやってますよ。 それとも２階の事務所にご用かしら？
jpnSearchText:
モーニング、まだやってますよ。
それとも２階の事務所にご用かしら？

engChrName: I-It IS the office, actually.
engSearchText: I-It IS the office, actually.
jpnChrName: は、はいっ。
jpnSearchText: は、はいっ。

engChrName: Is this where I can find Arkride Solutions?
engSearchText: Is this where I can find Arkride Solutions?
jpnChrName: その、やっぱりこちらの２階が “アークライド”さんの……？
jpnSearchText:
その、やっぱりこちらの２階が
“アークライド”さんの……？

engChrName: That's right. He only just finished breakfast himself, so I'm sure you'll still find him in his office.
engSearchText:
That's right. He only just finished breakfast himself,
so I'm sure you'll still find him in his office.
jpnChrName: ええ、モーニングを済ませたばかりだから まだ出かけていないんじゃないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、モーニングを済ませたばかりだから
まだ出かけていないんじゃないかしら。

engChrName: He might've gone back to bed, though, so don't be shy about knocking a few times to get his attention.
engSearchText:
He might've gone back to bed, though, so don't be
shy about knocking a few times to get his attention.
jpnChrName: 二度寝しちゃってるかもしれないけど ノックを何度かすれば大丈夫よ。
jpnSearchText:
二度寝しちゃってるかもしれないけど
ノックを何度かすれば大丈夫よ。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Th-Thank you very much.
engSearchText: Th-Thank you very much.
jpnChrName: あ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: あ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: First, I'd like to tell you a little about myself. My name is Agnès Claudel.
engSearchText:
First, I'd like to tell you a little about myself.
My name is Agnès Claudel.
jpnChrName: ──初めまして。 アニエス・クローデルと申します。
jpnSearchText:
──初めまして。
アニエス・クローデルと申します。

engChrName: I currently attend a school in the Auber District—
engSearchText: I currently attend a school in the Auber District—
jpnChrName: 現在、オーベル地区にある──
jpnSearchText: 現在、オーベル地区にある──

engChrName: Aramis Academy, yeah? Pretty famous school.
engSearchText: Aramis Academy, yeah? Pretty famous school.
jpnChrName: 首都きって、いや共和国きっての名門校、 《アラミス高等学校》……
jpnSearchText:
首都きって、いや共和国きっての名門校、
《アラミス高等学校》……

engChrName: Guess you're a first-year student livin' in the dorms, Ms. Claudel?
engSearchText:
Guess you're a first-year student livin' in the dorms,
Ms. Claudel?
jpnChrName: その学生寮に住んでいる一年って所か。
jpnSearchText: その学生寮に住んでいる一年って所か。

engChrName: You're very well informed... Oh, was it my uniform that gave it away?
engSearchText:
You're very well informed... Oh, was it my uniform
that gave it away?
jpnChrName: よくご存じですね…… あっ、制服で、ですか？
jpnSearchText:
よくご存じですね……
あっ、制服で、ですか？

engChrName: You got it. Though I think anybody who lives in Edith would recognize it.
engSearchText:
You got it. Though I think anybody who lives in
Edith would recognize it.
jpnChrName: ま、首都に住んでりゃ どうしたってその制服は目立つ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、首都に住んでりゃ
どうしたってその制服は目立つ。

engChrName: The first-year part's just my gut. You sure got the looks of a grown woman, but the way you carry yourself says it all.
engSearchText:
The first-year part's just my gut. You sure got the
looks of a grown woman, but the way you carry
yourself says it all.
jpnChrName: 一年ってのはただのカンだ。 発育はともかくスレてなさそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
一年ってのはただのカンだ。
発育はともかくスレてなさそうだしな。

engChrName: I-I beg your pardon?
engSearchText: I-I beg your pardon?
jpnChrName: 発っ……
jpnSearchText: 発っ……

engChrName: The name's Van. Van Arkride.
engSearchText: The name's Van. Van Arkride.
jpnChrName: ヴァンだ、ヴァン・アークライド。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンだ、ヴァン・アークライド。

engChrName: Don't got a clue how you found out about me...
engSearchText: Don't got a clue how you found out about me...
jpnChrName: どういうツテで ここに辿り着いたかは知らんが……
jpnSearchText:
どういうツテで
ここに辿り着いたかは知らんが……

engChrName: ...but if you know the 4SPG code, you gotta know what work I do here, right?
engSearchText:
...but if you know the 4SPG code, you gotta know
what work I do here, right?
jpnChrName: “４ｓｐｇ”を知ってるってことは 俺の肩書きが何かも知っている筈だな？
jpnSearchText:
“４ｓｐｇ”を知ってるってことは
俺の肩書きが何かも知っている筈だな？

engChrName: I do.
engSearchText: I do.
jpnSearchText: ………はい。

engChrName: You're a contractor people go to when they have a job they feel uncomfortable discussing with the police or the guild.
engSearchText:
You're a contractor people go to when they have a job
they feel uncomfortable discussing with the police or
the guild.
jpnChrName: 警察にも、遊撃士協会にも相談しにくい事を 引き受けてもらえるという“請負人”……
jpnSearchText:
警察にも、遊撃士協会にも相談しにくい事を
引き受けてもらえるという“請負人”……

engChrName: I'm told people often refer to you as a 'spriggan.'
engSearchText: I'm told people often refer to you as a 'spriggan.'
jpnChrName: 『裏解決屋（スプリガン）』── そう呼ばれていると伺っています。
jpnSearchText:
『裏解決屋（スプリガン）』──
そう呼ばれていると伺っています。

engChrName: Close, but not quite.
engSearchText: Close, but not quite.
jpnChrName: 半分アタリで、半分ハズレだ。
jpnSearchText: 半分アタリで、半分ハズレだ。

engChrName: It's not just an issue of comfort. I take on jobs you flat-out couldn't bring up to the authorities.
engSearchText:
It's not just an issue of comfort. I take on jobs you
flat-out couldn't bring up to the authorities.
jpnChrName: “相談しにくい事”だけじゃねえ。 “相談できない事”を引き受ける時もある。
jpnSearchText:
“相談しにくい事”だけじゃねえ。
“相談できない事”を引き受ける時もある。

engChrName: Jobs so close to illegal, the cops hate me. You get that, right?
engSearchText:
Jobs so close to illegal, the cops hate me. You get
that, right?
jpnChrName: 非合法スレスレのグレーな稼業…… そういう人種ってのは分かってるのか？
jpnSearchText:
非合法スレスレのグレーな稼業……
そういう人種ってのは分かってるのか？

engChrName: I... I think so.
engSearchText: I... I think so.
jpnChrName: っ…… 分かっている、つもりです。
jpnSearchText:
っ……
分かっている、つもりです。

engChrName: Well, whatever. Just gimme a rundown on what you want doin' for starters.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever. Just gimme a rundown on what you
want doin' for starters.
jpnChrName: まあいい、まずは話すだけは 話してみたらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、まずは話すだけは
話してみたらどうだ？

engChrName: I'll decide whether to take it on after that.
engSearchText: I'll decide whether to take it on after that.
jpnChrName: 引き受ける約束はできないが。
jpnSearchText: 引き受ける約束はできないが。

engChrName: Th-Thank you! In that case...
engSearchText: Th-Thank you! In that case...
jpnChrName: ！　はい……！ それでは──
jpnSearchText:
！　はい……！
それでは──

engChrName: Holy shit. Don't tell me Aramis gives all new students Xiphas these days. Those things are top of the line.
engSearchText:
Holy shit. Don't tell me Aramis gives all new students
Xiphas these days. Those things are top of the line.
jpnChrName: おいおい、最新式（ザイファ）かよ。 まさか学校の備品とか言わねえよな？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、最新式（ザイファ）かよ。
まさか学校の備品とか言わねえよな？

engChrName: No...but, umm...you're not far off.
engSearchText: No...but, umm...you're not far off.
jpnChrName: えっと、まあ当たらずとも 遠からずと言いますか。
jpnSearchText:
えっと、まあ当たらずとも
遠からずと言いますか。

engChrName: Please, have a look at this.
engSearchText: Please, have a look at this.
jpnChrName: ……こちらです。
jpnSearchText: ……こちらです。

engChrName: An antique pocket watch? Wait...
engSearchText: An antique pocket watch? Wait...
jpnChrName: そいつは…… ……年代物の懐中時計、いや。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは……
……年代物の懐中時計、いや。

engChrName: This is what I want your help with.
engSearchText: This is what I want your help with.
jpnChrName: お願いしたいのは他でもありません。
jpnSearchText: お願いしたいのは他でもありません。

engChrName: I'd like your assistance in locating the old orbment in that image.
engSearchText:
I'd like your assistance in locating the old orbment in
that image.
jpnChrName: こちらの古い《導力器（オーブメント）》の 捜索を手伝って頂きたいんです。
jpnSearchText:
こちらの古い《導力器（オーブメント）》の
捜索を手伝って頂きたいんです。

engChrName: It's a few decades old and a memento of a relative of mine—erm, my great-grandfather.
engSearchText:
It's a few decades old and a memento of a relative of
mine—erm, my great-grandfather.
jpnChrName: 数十年前の品で、私のひいお祖父ちゃ── 曾祖父の遺したものになります。
jpnSearchText:
数十年前の品で、私のひいお祖父ちゃ──
曾祖父の遺したものになります。
……………………………………

engChrName: Where'd you get this image?
engSearchText: Where'd you get this image?
jpnChrName: ……この画像は？
jpnSearchText: ……この画像は？

engChrName: It was...well, it wasn't through an ordinary search engine, I'll say that.
engSearchText:
It was...well, it wasn't through an ordinary search
engine, I'll say that.
jpnChrName: その……ちょっと大きな声では言えない 導力ネットの検索方法で……
jpnSearchText:
その……ちょっと大きな声では言えない
導力ネットの検索方法で……

engChrName: Records indicate it was stolen from an antique shop in the city a week ago.
engSearchText:
Records indicate it was stolen from an antique shop
in the city a week ago.
jpnChrName: 一週間前に、首都のとある古物商から 盗難されたばかりだそうです。
jpnSearchText:
一週間前に、首都のとある古物商から
盗難されたばかりだそうです。

engChrName: I'm gonna assume you mean a special search app based on a P4 protocol exploit.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna assume you mean a special search app
based on a P4 protocol exploit.
jpnChrName: Ｐ４プロトコルの穴（ホール）を利用した 特殊な検索アプリを使ったわけか。
jpnSearchText:
Ｐ４プロトコルの穴（ホール）を利用した
特殊な検索アプリを使ったわけか。

engChrName: Not what I was expectin'...
engSearchText: Not what I was expectin'...
jpnSearchText:
だがコイツは……
……………………………………

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: え、えっと……
jpnSearchText: え、えっと……

engChrName: I'll give it to you straight: take this one to the cops or the guild.
engSearchText:
I'll give it to you straight: take this one to the cops or
the guild.
jpnChrName: ──悪いことは言わねえ。 ギルドか警察にでも相談するんだな。
jpnSearchText:
──悪いことは言わねえ。
ギルドか警察にでも相談するんだな。

engChrName: I don't know what kinda orbment this is, but it looks like it's got a whole lot of historical value.
engSearchText:
I don't know what kinda orbment this is, but it looks
like it's got a whole lot of historical value.
jpnChrName: なんの導力器かは知らんが アンティーク価値も結構ありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
なんの導力器かは知らんが
アンティーク価値も結構ありそうだ。

engChrName: And you mentioned it was stolen. Likely some seedy folks're involved at this point.
engSearchText:
And you mentioned it was stolen. Likely some seedy
folks're involved at this point.
jpnChrName: 盗まれたことも含めて厄介な連中が 絡んでいる可能性もある。
jpnSearchText:
盗まれたことも含めて厄介な連中が
絡んでいる可能性もある。

engChrName: 'Sides, searching for a memento of a relative sounds like somethin' those suckers at the guild would eat right up.
engSearchText:
'Sides, searching for a memento of a relative sounds
like somethin' those suckers at the guild would eat
right up.
jpnChrName: むしろ故人の遺品ってことなら尚更、 甘っちょろいギルド向きなんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
むしろ故人の遺品ってことなら尚更、
甘っちょろいギルド向きなんじゃねえか？

engChrName: S-So you say, but...
engSearchText: S-So you say, but...
jpnChrName: そ、それは………
jpnSearchText: そ、それは………

engChrName: I can't. I just can't.
engSearchText: I can't. I just can't.
jpnChrName: ………駄目、なんです。
jpnSearchText: ………駄目、なんです。

engChrName: I can't go to the police with this—and the guild is even more out of the question.
engSearchText:
I can't go to the police with this—and the guild is
even more out of the question.
jpnChrName: 警察には、まして遊撃士協会にも 相談するわけにはいかなくて。
jpnSearchText:
警察には、まして遊撃士協会にも
相談するわけにはいかなくて。
……………………………………

engChrName: *sigh* If you say so... Oh, I guess I should've put out somethin' to eat with the tea, huh?
engSearchText:
*sigh* If you say so... Oh, I guess I should've put out
somethin' to eat with the tea, huh?
jpnChrName: ふう、何だか知らんが…… ──っと、茶請けを出し忘れたか。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、何だか知らんが……
──っと、茶請けを出し忘れたか。

engChrName: Oh! Speaking of food!
engSearchText: Oh! Speaking of food!
jpnChrName: あ…… わ、私も忘れていました。
jpnSearchText:
あ……
わ、私も忘れていました。

engChrName: This is from a popular cakery near our dorm.
engSearchText: This is from a popular cakery near our dorm.
jpnChrName: その、学生寮近くにある 人気のお店のケーキでして。
jpnSearchText:
その、学生寮近くにある
人気のお店のケーキでして。

engChrName: They only make twenty of them a day, and they're supposed to be really goo—
engSearchText:
They only make twenty of them a day, and they're
supposed to be really goo—
jpnChrName: １日２０個限定みたいですから 結構美味しいんじゃないかと──
jpnSearchText:
１日２０個限定みたいですから
結構美味しいんじゃないかと──

engChrName: This is Andalucía's late summer limited-time edition!
engSearchText:
This is Andalucía's late summer
limited-time edition!
jpnChrName: 《アンダルシア》の晩夏限定ケーキ！
jpnSearchText: 《アンダルシア》の晩夏限定ケーキ！

engChrName: The specially made tart covered in violette de sollies figs from Ored and honey!
engSearchText:
The specially made tart covered in violette
de sollies figs from Ored and honey!
jpnChrName: オレド産黒イチジクを隙間なく敷き詰めて 糖蜜でコーティングした特製タルトかよ！
jpnSearchText:
オレド産黒イチジクを隙間なく敷き詰めて
糖蜜でコーティングした特製タルトかよ！

engChrName: You...are something of an expert, I see.
engSearchText: You...are something of an expert, I see.
jpnChrName: えっと……お詳しいんですね？
jpnSearchText: えっと……お詳しいんですね？
………………………………

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnSearchText: ……えっと…………

engChrName: I just wanna make this clear.
engSearchText: I just wanna make this clear.
jpnChrName: ──いいか、一言言っておく。
jpnSearchText: ──いいか、一言言っておく。

engChrName: I'm NOT doing this 'cause I couldn't say no to that tart. Got it?
engSearchText:
I'm NOT doing this 'cause I couldn't say no to
that tart. Got it?
jpnChrName: 限定ケーキに釣られたわけじゃない、 いいね？
jpnSearchText:
限定ケーキに釣られたわけじゃない、
いいね？

engChrName: If you say so...
engSearchText: If you say so...
jpnChrName: は、はあ……
jpnSearchText: は、はあ……

engChrName: You must be a connoisseur of sweets, huh?
engSearchText: You must be a connoisseur of sweets, huh?
jpnChrName: ──ふふっ、 甘い物、お好きなんですね？
jpnSearchText:
──ふふっ、
甘い物、お好きなんですね？

engChrName: I thought you would wolf it down right on the spot, but you put it in the fridge with all the care given to a family heirloom.
engSearchText:
I thought you would wolf it down right on the spot,
but you put it in the fridge with all the care given to a
family heirloom.
jpnChrName: すぐに食べるかと思ったら 大切そうに冷蔵庫に仕舞って……
jpnSearchText:
すぐに食べるかと思ったら
大切そうに冷蔵庫に仕舞って……

engChrName: It's Andalucía! What kinda sick freak wouldn't save it for an end-of-the-day treat?
engSearchText:
It's Andalucía! What kinda sick freak wouldn't save it
for an end-of-the-day treat?
jpnChrName: 《アンダルシア》の限定品だぞ！？ 一日のご褒美にしないでどうすんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
《アンダルシア》の限定品だぞ！？
一日のご褒美にしないでどうすんだよ。

engChrName: Ohh, I'm so jealous you live near that place... Must be nice bein' a student.
engSearchText:
Ohh, I'm so jealous you live near that place... Must be
nice bein' a student.
jpnChrName: クソ……たしかに学生寮の近くだったか。 学生様はいいですなぁ、簡単にお買いになれて。
jpnSearchText:
クソ……たしかに学生寮の近くだったか。
学生様はいいですなぁ、簡単にお買いになれて。

engChrName: Ahaha... Even we have a hard time getting the limited-time ones, to be honest.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... Even we have a hard time getting the
limited-time ones, to be honest.
jpnChrName: あはは、私たちにも なかなかの競争率ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、私たちにも
なかなかの競争率ですけど。

engChrName: So, Mr. Arkride...
engSearchText: So, Mr. Arkride...
jpnChrName: えっと…… その、アークライド所長。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……
その、アークライド所長。

engChrName: ...are you really accepting my job, then?
engSearchText: ...are you really accepting my job, then?
jpnChrName: ──本当に、いいんですか？
jpnSearchText: ──本当に、いいんですか？

engChrName: I'm not gonna turn it down now—but that tart only got you in the front door.
engSearchText:
I'm not gonna turn it down now—but that tart only
got you in the front door.
jpnChrName: 限定ケーキはあくまで口利きだ。
jpnSearchText: 限定ケーキはあくまで口利きだ。

engChrName: You're still gonna have to pay my usual rate, and that's a hell of a lot more than what the guild charges.
engSearchText:
You're still gonna have to pay my usual rate, and
that's a hell of a lot more than what the guild charges.
jpnChrName: 規定の依頼料は払ってもらう。 言っておくがギルドより割高だぞ？
jpnSearchText:
規定の依頼料は払ってもらう。
言っておくがギルドより割高だぞ？

engChrName: That's fine. I have the money.
engSearchText: That's fine. I have the money.
jpnChrName: はい、構いません。 ある程度は用意してきましたから。
jpnSearchText:
はい、構いません。
ある程度は用意してきましたから。

engChrName: Now, where are we going first?
engSearchText: Now, where are we going first?
jpnChrName: それで……これからどちらへ？
jpnSearchText: それで……これからどちらへ？

engChrName: To see an old geezer who knows more about thievin' than most.
engSearchText:
To see an old geezer who knows more about thievin'
than most.
jpnChrName: 盗品絡みなら人一倍、 鼻の利くオッサンを知っている。
jpnSearchText:
盗品絡みなら人一倍、
鼻の利くオッサンを知っている。

engChrName: He's as skeezy as you get, but there's no better guy in times like these. Should be in the 6th District right about now.
engSearchText:
He's as skeezy as you get, but there's no better guy in
times like these. Should be in the 6th District right
about now.
jpnChrName: 色々うさんくせえヤツだが、 今日の昼なら多分、六区にいるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
色々うさんくせえヤツだが、
今日の昼なら多分、六区にいるだろ。

engChrName: Near the river?
engSearchText: Near the river?
jpnChrName: 六区……河沿いの地区（リバーサイド）ですね。
jpnSearchText: 六区……河沿いの地区（リバーサイド）ですね。

engChrName: Are we taking the subway, then?
engSearchText: Are we taking the subway, then?
jpnChrName: そうなると地下鉄で？
jpnSearchText: そうなると地下鉄で？

engChrName: Nah. The bus'll get us there at this hour.
engSearchText: Nah. The bus'll get us there at this hour.
jpnChrName: いや、このタイミングだと 路線バスが早いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
いや、このタイミングだと
路線バスが早いだろう。

engChrName: I know it's not even eleven, but I want this job done before end of day so I can toast our success with Miss Good Lookin' in the fridge.
engSearchText:
I know it's not even eleven, but I want this job done
before end of day so I can toast our success with Miss
Good Lookin' in the fridge.
jpnChrName: まだ１１時前、できれば今日中に片付けて 限定ケーキを堪能したいところだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まだ１１時前、できれば今日中に片付けて
限定ケーキを堪能したいところだぜ。

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: クスクス……
jpnSearchText: クスクス……

engChrName: Then I'm counting on you, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: Then I'm counting on you, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ──どうかよろしくお願いします、 アークライド所長。
jpnSearchText:
──どうかよろしくお願いします、
アークライド所長。

engChrName: Same to you.
engSearchText: Same to you.
jpnChrName: ああ、こちらこそだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、こちらこそだ。

engChrName: Van's fine, by the way.
engSearchText: Van's fine, by the way.
jpnChrName: それとヴァンでいい、クローデル嬢。
jpnSearchText: それとヴァンでいい、クローデル嬢。

engChrName: If you're sure...
engSearchText: If you're sure...
jpnSearchText: あ……

engChrName: Then why don't you call me Agnès?
engSearchText: Then why don't you call me Agnès?
jpnChrName: はい、ヴァンさん。 私もアニエスでお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ヴァンさん。
私もアニエスでお願いします。

engChrName: Received various outfits for the party as a New Game+ bonus.
engSearchText:
Received various outfits for the party as a New
Game+ bonus.
jpnChrName: 周回プレイの特典として、 ヴァンたちの様々な衣装を入手した。
jpnSearchText:
周回プレイの特典として、
ヴァンたちの様々な衣装を入手した。

engChrName: Oh! There's the bus stop.
engSearchText: Oh! There's the bus stop.
jpnChrName: あ、あれがバス停ですね。
jpnSearchText: あ、あれがバス停ですね。

engChrName: Yeah. The next one should be here soon—then we're a hop, a skip, and a jump away to the Riverside District.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The next one should be here soon—then we're a
hop, a skip, and a jump away to the Riverside District.
jpnChrName: そろそろ次が来る。 六区まではすぐだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ次が来る。
六区まではすぐだぜ。

engChrName: (Probably got time to grab somethin' from the kiosk if we need to.)
engSearchText:
(Probably got time to grab somethin' from the kiosk
if we need to.)
jpnChrName: （……あまり時間はねえが   タバコ屋で何か買っとくか？）
jpnSearchText:
（……あまり時間はねえが
タバコ屋で何か買っとくか？）

engChrName: August 27th, 10:05PM
engSearchText: August 27th, 10:05PM

engChrName: Montmart, Eighth District
engSearchText: Montmart, Eighth District
jpnChrName: 首都八区　旧市街《モンマルト》
jpnSearchText: 首都八区　旧市街《モンマルト》

engChrName: Damn. Guess I'm goin' without dinner.
engSearchText: Damn. Guess I'm goin' without dinner.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… 夕飯を喰い損ねたな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
夕飯を喰い損ねたな。

engChrName: You even good to be out this late? I thought students had a curfew.
engSearchText:
You even good to be out this late? I thought students
had a curfew.
jpnChrName: そっちは学生寮だろう？ 門限はいいのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
そっちは学生寮だろう？
門限はいいのかよ。

engChrName: That's kind of you to think of me, but I received permission to be out this late beforehand.
engSearchText:
That's kind of you to think of me, but I received
permission to be out this late beforehand.
jpnChrName: ……一応、深夜までの 外出届を出しているので。
jpnSearchText:
……一応、深夜までの
外出届を出しているので。

engChrName: Never mind my curfew. Won't you let me see to your arm?
engSearchText:
Never mind my curfew. Won't you let me see to
your arm?
jpnChrName: それよりどうか、 手当てをさせてください。
jpnSearchText:
それよりどうか、
手当てをさせてください。

engChrName: Do you have a first aid kit in the office?
engSearchText: Do you have a first aid kit in the office?
jpnChrName: 救急箱、ありますか……？
jpnSearchText: 救急箱、ありますか……？

engChrName: I do, but...
engSearchText: I do, but...
jpnChrName: まあ、あるけどよ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、あるけどよ。

engChrName: It looks like it started healing on its own.
engSearchText: It looks like it started healing on its own.
jpnChrName: 傷……もう治りかかって いるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
傷……もう治りかかって
いるみたいですね。

engChrName: I know it wasn't THAT bad in the first place...
engSearchText: I know it wasn't THAT bad in the first place...
jpnChrName: そもそも大した傷じゃねえって 言いたい所だが──
jpnSearchText:
そもそも大した傷じゃねえって
言いたい所だが──

engChrName: ...but it's still healing way too fast for it to be normal. Wonder if I got that orbment or turnin' into a monster to thank for this.
engSearchText:
...but it's still healing way too fast for it to be normal.
Wonder if I got that orbment or turnin' into a
monster to thank for this.
jpnChrName: 幾らなんでも治りが早すぎるな。 あの装置か、バケモノ化が原因か……
jpnSearchText:
幾らなんでも治りが早すぎるな。
あの装置か、バケモノ化が原因か……
………………………

engChrName: This all began with those diaries.
engSearchText: This all began with those diaries.
jpnChrName: ──きっかけは４年前に亡くなった 母が保管していた“手記”でした。
jpnSearchText:
──きっかけは４年前に亡くなった
母が保管していた“手記”でした。

engChrName: They were passed down from my great-grandfather to my grandmother, and then down to my mother until her death four years ago.
engSearchText:
They were passed down from my great-grandfather to
my grandmother, and then down to my mother until
her death four years ago.
jpnChrName: 祖母と母が半世紀も受け継いできた 曾祖父の遺した手記──
jpnSearchText:
祖母と母が半世紀も受け継いできた
曾祖父の遺した手記──

engChrName: As you guessed, my great-grandfather is the famous Professor Epstein.
engSearchText:
As you guessed, my great-grandfather is the famous
Professor Epstein.
jpnChrName: お察しの通り、導力器を発明した Ｃ・エプスタインその人でした。
jpnSearchText:
お察しの通り、導力器を発明した
Ｃ・エプスタインその人でした。

engChrName: It was known at the time that he had an adopted daughter, but she went missing very suddenly after he passed away.
engSearchText:
It was known at the time that he had an adopted
daughter, but she went missing very suddenly after he
passed away.
jpnChrName: 彼には養女が一人いたものの、 その死後、行方不明になっていて……
jpnSearchText:
彼には養女が一人いたものの、
その死後、行方不明になっていて……

engChrName: By the sound of it, something compelled her to shy away from the public eye.
engSearchText:
By the sound of it, something compelled her to shy
away from the public eye.
jpnChrName: どうやら祖母は何らかの事情で 表から身を隠したみたいなんです。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら祖母は何らかの事情で
表から身を隠したみたいなんです。

engChrName: I don't know what that something was. It wasn't written in the letter she left me.
engSearchText:
I don't know what that something was. It wasn't
written in the letter she left me.
jpnChrName: 祖母のメッセージもありましたが 理由は明かされていませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
祖母のメッセージもありましたが
理由は明かされていませんでした。

engChrName: Then after my mother died, my father began to lose himself in his work...
engSearchText:
Then after my mother died, my father began to lose
himself in his work...
jpnChrName: 母の死後、父が仕事に 没頭するようになったのもあって……
jpnSearchText:
母の死後、父が仕事に
没頭するようになったのもあって……

engChrName: ...and now all alone, I became more and more captivated by the many diaries that were left behind.
engSearchText:
...and now all alone, I became more and more
captivated by the many diaries that were left behind.
jpnChrName: 私は曾祖父の手記に 次第に引き込まれていきました。
jpnSearchText:
私は曾祖父の手記に
次第に引き込まれていきました。

engChrName: They weren't filled with complex formulae or specialist knowledge or things like that.
engSearchText:
They weren't filled with complex formulae or
specialist knowledge or things like that.
jpnChrName: ……といっても、数式や専門知識が 記されているわけではなくて……
jpnSearchText:
……といっても、数式や専門知識が
記されているわけではなくて……

engChrName: Instead, they were about who he was as a person. What he was like, what his philosophies were, what he valued most in life.
engSearchText:
Instead, they were about who he was as a person.
What he was like, what his philosophies were, what
he valued most in life.
jpnChrName: その人柄や哲学、人生で大切なことは 何かなどが多く綴られていました。
jpnSearchText:
その人柄や哲学、人生で大切なことは
何かなどが多く綴られていました。

engChrName: He wrote about the little things that colored his days, his bonds with his loved ones, his time spent with his disciples...
engSearchText:
He wrote about the little things that colored his days,
his bonds with his loved ones, his time spent with
his disciples...
jpnChrName: 日々の何でもないこと、家族との絆、 お弟子さんたちとのやり取り──
jpnSearchText:
日々の何でもないこと、家族との絆、
お弟子さんたちとのやり取り──

engChrName: I could see through every word written that he was a kind, warm-hearted man with a good sense of humor. A man I could respect a great deal.
engSearchText:
I could see through every word written that he was a
kind, warm-hearted man with a good sense of humor.
A man I could respect a great deal.
jpnChrName: ……温かみがあってユーモアに満ちた 尊敬できる人だったんです。
jpnSearchText:
……温かみがあってユーモアに満ちた
尊敬できる人だったんです。

engChrName: I was so happy to have his writings so I could peer into his world, just like my mother and grandmother before me.
engSearchText:
I was so happy to have his writings so I could peer
into his world, just like my mother and grandmother
before me.
jpnChrName: その想いが祖母に、母に、そして私にも 受け継がれていることが嬉しくて……
jpnSearchText:
その想いが祖母に、母に、そして私にも
受け継がれていることが嬉しくて……

engChrName: And before I knew it, those diaries became my most treasured possessions.
engSearchText:
And before I knew it, those diaries became my most
treasured possessions.
jpnChrName: 少しずつ読み進める曾祖父の手記は いつしか私の宝物になっていました。
jpnSearchText:
少しずつ読み進める曾祖父の手記は
いつしか私の宝物になっていました。

engChrName: However...
engSearchText: However...
jpnChrName: ですが──
jpnSearchText: ですが──

engChrName: ...at the end of his final entry, on the very last page, I found a shocking message.
engSearchText:
...at the end of his final entry, on the very last page, I
found a shocking message.
jpnChrName: 数冊に渡る最後の手記── 最後のページにはこうありました。
jpnSearchText:
数冊に渡る最後の手記──
最後のページにはこうありました。

engChrName: It said: 'Recover the Oct-Geneses before the year 120X.'
engSearchText:
It said: 'Recover the Oct-Geneses before the
year 120X.'
jpnChrName: 『どうか《オクト＝ゲネシス》を   １２０＊年までに取り戻して欲しい』
jpnSearchText:
『どうか《オクト＝ゲネシス》を
１２０＊年までに取り戻して欲しい』

engChrName: 'Else all we know will come to an end.'
engSearchText: 'Else all we know will come to an end.'
jpnChrName: 『さもなければ全てが終わる』──と。
jpnSearchText: 『さもなければ全てが終わる』──と。

engChrName: Pretty ominous thing to write down.
engSearchText: Pretty ominous thing to write down.
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: It could have been a delusion that came to him in the winter of his years.
engSearchText:
It could have been a delusion that came to him in the
winter of his years.
jpnChrName: ……もちろん、 亡くなる間際の妄想かもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
……もちろん、
亡くなる間際の妄想かもしれません。

engChrName: But I began to feel that it was why his diaries had been passed down to me...
engSearchText:
But I began to feel that it was why his diaries had
been passed down to me...
jpnChrName: ですが、祖母から母、そして私に 受け継がれた意味を考えてしまうと……
jpnSearchText:
ですが、祖母から母、そして私に
受け継がれた意味を考えてしまうと……

engChrName: ...and as the days wore on, my desire to do something to avert the end he foretold grew stronger and stronger.
engSearchText:
...and as the days wore on, my desire to do something
to avert the end he foretold grew stronger
and stronger.
jpnChrName: 何とかしなきゃって想いが、 日に日に強くなってしまったんです。
jpnSearchText:
何とかしなきゃって想いが、
日に日に強くなってしまったんです。

engChrName: But I knew I couldn't go public with any of it. Not with my grandmother's disappearance.
engSearchText:
But I knew I couldn't go public with any of it.
Not with my grandmother's disappearance.
jpnChrName: ……ただ祖母が身を隠した事も含めて、 公にはどうしてもできなくて……
jpnSearchText:
……ただ祖母が身を隠した事も含めて、
公にはどうしてもできなくて……

engChrName: That led me to enroll at Aramis Academy, where I met a very dependable upperclassman.
engSearchText:
That led me to enroll at Aramis Academy, where I
met a very dependable upperclassman.
jpnChrName: そうしてアラミスに入学して…… とある頼りになる先輩と知り合って。
jpnSearchText:
そうしてアラミスに入学して……
とある頼りになる先輩と知り合って。

engChrName: Her advice took me to the orbal net, and that led me to you.
engSearchText:
Her advice took me to the orbal net, and that led me
to you.
jpnChrName: そのアドバイスで導力ネットを調べて ……こちらの事務所に辿り着いたんです。
jpnSearchText:
そのアドバイスで導力ネットを調べて
……こちらの事務所に辿り着いたんです。

engChrName: I just never thought when I started all of this that these would be the consequences...
engSearchText:
I just never thought when I started all of this that
these would be the consequences...
jpnChrName: ……まさかこんな事になるなんて 夢にも思わずに……
jpnSearchText:
……まさかこんな事になるなんて
夢にも思わずに……

engChrName: That someone would die... That you would be put in so much danger...
engSearchText:
That someone would die... That you would be put in
so much danger...
jpnChrName: 亡くなる人まで出して…… ………貴方を危ない目に遭わせて。
jpnSearchText:
亡くなる人まで出して……
………貴方を危ない目に遭わせて。
…………………………

engChrName: Well, you managed to get one of 'em.
engSearchText: Well, you managed to get one of 'em.
jpnChrName: ……ま、なんにせよ一つは 無事に手に入ったわけだしな。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、なんにせよ一つは
無事に手に入ったわけだしな。

engChrName: Even if there're still seven more out there, you could always call it quits here.
engSearchText:
Even if there're still seven more out there, you could
always call it quits here.
jpnChrName: 他に７つあるらしいが、ここらで 手を引いてもいいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
他に７つあるらしいが、ここらで
手を引いてもいいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: I can't. Not when they're what connect me to my family.
engSearchText:
I can't. Not when they're what connect me to
my family.
jpnChrName: ──やっぱり私にとっては 家族の絆でもありますから……
jpnSearchText:
──やっぱり私にとっては
家族の絆でもありますから……

engChrName: Not when I now know they really exist, and not after seeing that final entry.
engSearchText:
Not when I now know they really exist, and not after
seeing that final entry.
jpnChrName: それに本当に存在し、手記の最後に あんな事が書かれていた以上──
jpnSearchText:
それに本当に存在し、手記の最後に
あんな事が書かれていた以上──

engChrName: I can't look away from all of that.
engSearchText: I can't look away from all of that.
jpnChrName: 目は、逸らしたくないんです。
jpnSearchText: 目は、逸らしたくないんです。

engChrName: Here. This 50,000 mira is everything I was able to gather for this.
engSearchText:
Here. This 50,000 mira is everything I was able to
gather for this.
jpnChrName: ５万ミラ、あります。 何とか用意できた全額です。
jpnSearchText:
５万ミラ、あります。
何とか用意できた全額です。

engChrName: Please, accept it as compensation for all the help you've given me.
engSearchText:
Please, accept it as compensation for all the help
you've given me.
jpnChrName: どうか今回の依頼料として お受け取りください。
jpnSearchText:
どうか今回の依頼料として
お受け取りください。

engChrName: ...I thought I told you my rate.
engSearchText: ...I thought I told you my rate.
jpnChrName: ……依頼料の規定は 最初に説明したはずだが？
jpnSearchText:
……依頼料の規定は
最初に説明したはずだが？

engChrName: Well, umm...you did, but I don't feel that it accounted for that injury you sustained because of me.
engSearchText:
Well, umm...you did, but I don't feel that it
accounted for that injury you sustained because of me.
jpnChrName: えっと、怪我をさせてしまった 迷惑料と思っていただければ……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、怪我をさせてしまった
迷惑料と思っていただければ……

engChrName: I intend to find the remaining seven on my own.
engSearchText: I intend to find the remaining seven on my own.
jpnChrName: ………この先は 自分一人で何とか捜してみます。
jpnSearchText:
………この先は
自分一人で何とか捜してみます。

engChrName: I don't want anyone else to get hurt because of my problems. Oh! But I'll be very careful about it! Promise!
engSearchText:
I don't want anyone else to get hurt because of
my problems. Oh! But I'll be very careful about it!
Promise!
jpnChrName: もう誰も巻き込まないやり方で…… あ、身の安全には気を付けますから！
jpnSearchText:
もう誰も巻き込まないやり方で……
あ、身の安全には気を付けますから！

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ハッ……
jpnSearchText: ハッ……

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnSearchText: え……

engChrName: My rate's 1,000 mira an hour, excluding other necessary expenses.
engSearchText:
My rate's 1,000 mira an hour, excluding other
necessary expenses.
jpnChrName: アークライド解決事務所の基本料は １時間１０００ミラで諸経費その他だ。
jpnSearchText:
アークライド解決事務所の基本料は
１時間１０００ミラで諸経費その他だ。

engChrName: I'll bump it up a little 'cause of the danger involved, but you rolled up your sleeves more than your average client.
engSearchText:
I'll bump it up a little 'cause of the danger involved,
but you rolled up your sleeves more than your
average client.
jpnChrName: 今回、危険手当は適用させてもらうが 結果的に依頼人のあんたにも手伝わせた。
jpnSearchText:
今回、危険手当は適用させてもらうが
結果的に依頼人のあんたにも手伝わせた。

engChrName: You put yourself in danger to help me. Any more than 10,000 would be rippin' you off.
engSearchText:
You put yourself in danger to help me. Any more
than 10,000 would be rippin' you off.
jpnChrName: あまつさえ危険に晒したことを考えると 成功報酬でも一万が関の山だろ。
jpnSearchText:
あまつさえ危険に晒したことを考えると
成功報酬でも一万が関の山だろ。

engChrName: This is how the world of work is. Good thing you're still in school, 'cause you got a lot to learn.
engSearchText:
This is how the world of work is. Good thing you're
still in school, 'cause you got a lot to learn.
jpnChrName: これが仕事ってモンだ── 舐めてんじゃねぇぞ、学生。
jpnSearchText:
これが仕事ってモンだ──
舐めてんじゃねぇぞ、学生。

engChrName: M-Maybe, but still...
engSearchText: M-Maybe, but still...
jpnChrName: で、でも……
jpnSearchText: で、でも……

engChrName: I'm sorry. I just feel you've taken on a lot more than you bargained for from start to finish.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry. I just feel you've taken on a lot more than
you bargained for from start to finish.
jpnChrName: ……すみません。 わたし、やる事なす事──
jpnSearchText:
……すみません。
わたし、やる事なす事──

engChrName: To be honest, that whole turnin' into a monster thing's got my interest piqued.
engSearchText:
To be honest, that whole turnin' into a monster
thing's got my interest piqued.
jpnChrName: ま、あのバケモノ化といい 個人的にも興味が出てたからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あのバケモノ化といい
個人的にも興味が出てたからな。

engChrName: So it wouldn't feel right to ask you for even more mira with how we're gonna keep this thing goin'.
engSearchText:
So it wouldn't feel right to ask you for even more mira
with how we're gonna keep this thing goin'.
jpnChrName: 追加料金ってのも違うだろう。
jpnSearchText: 追加料金ってのも違うだろう。

engChrName: What do you...?
engSearchText: What do you...?
jpnSearchText: え……

engChrName: Unless you decide to give up altogether, I'll pitch in however I can from here on out.
engSearchText:
Unless you decide to give up altogether, I'll pitch in
however I can from here on out.
jpnChrName: ──あんたが諦めないなら 今後も出来る範囲で手伝ってやる。
jpnSearchText:
──あんたが諦めないなら
今後も出来る範囲で手伝ってやる。

engChrName: In exchange, you can share any info you got on the Geneses or anything those diaries say.
engSearchText:
In exchange, you can share any info you got on the
Geneses or anything those diaries say.
jpnChrName: 代わりにそっちは《ゲネシス》や 手記の情報をその都度提供してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
代わりにそっちは《ゲネシス》や
手記の情報をその都度提供してくれ。

engChrName: How's that sound?
engSearchText: How's that sound?
jpnChrName: そんな交換条件でどうだ？
jpnSearchText: そんな交換条件でどうだ？
…………………………

engChrName: Umm... Correct me if I'm wrong, but...
engSearchText: Umm... Correct me if I'm wrong, but...
jpnChrName: あの……それって。
jpnSearchText: あの……それって。

engChrName: ...a-are you telling me that even though you know it might be dangerous...
engSearchText:
...a-are you telling me that even though you know it
might be dangerous...
jpnChrName: 今回みたいな危険が あるかもしれないのに……
jpnSearchText:
今回みたいな危険が
あるかもしれないのに……

engChrName: ...you're going to help me search for the other seven... without taking additional compensation?
engSearchText:
...you're going to help me search for the other seven...
without taking additional compensation?
jpnChrName: 依頼料も取らずに捜索の手伝いを してくださるっていう……？
jpnSearchText:
依頼料も取らずに捜索の手伝いを
してくださるっていう……？

engChrName: Hey, info's good compensation.
engSearchText: Hey, info's good compensation.
jpnChrName: だから交換条件って言っただろ。
jpnSearchText: だから交換条件って言っただろ。

engChrName: I ain't takin' a single mira, though.
engSearchText: I ain't takin' a single mira, though.
jpnChrName: 言っておくがビタ一文たりとも 追加は受け付けねえからな？
jpnSearchText:
言っておくがビタ一文たりとも
追加は受け付けねえからな？

engChrName: I'm gonna need you to get more used to real combat, too. For your own safety.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna need you to get more used to real
combat, too. For your own safety.
jpnChrName: それと危機管理の観点から もう少し実戦慣れもしてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
それと危機管理の観点から
もう少し実戦慣れもしてもらう。

engChrName: Can't have you leavin' yourself wide open and all that good stuff—and I'm gonna drill it into you until you're up to snuff.
engSearchText:
Can't have you leavin' yourself wide open and all that
good stuff—and I'm gonna drill it into you until
you're up to snuff.
jpnChrName: てめえでてめえは守れるくらいに── 厳しく行くから覚悟しとけよ？
jpnSearchText:
てめえでてめえは守れるくらいに──
厳しく行くから覚悟しとけよ？

engChrName: I-I don't know...
engSearchText: I-I don't know...
jpnChrName: ……っ、そんなの……
jpnSearchText: ……っ、そんなの……

engChrName: (This doesn't sound like a fair trade at all. I'm the only one benefitting here...)
engSearchText:
(This doesn't sound like a fair trade at all. I'm the
only one benefitting here...)
jpnChrName: （……そんなの私一人が   得してるだけじゃないですか……）
jpnSearchText:
（……そんなの私一人が
得してるだけじゃないですか……）

engChrName: Well, if you insist, Van, then thank you very much. Having your support means a lot to me.
engSearchText:
Well, if you insist, Van, then thank you very much.
Having your support means a lot to me.
jpnChrName: ……分かりました……！ 今後ともよろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText:
……分かりました……！
今後ともよろしくお願いします！

engChrName: Yeah, well, I'll be countin' on you, too.
engSearchText: Yeah, well, I'll be countin' on you, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、こちらこそな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、こちらこそな。

engChrName: All right. Now that today's done and dusted...time for my hard-earned reward!
engSearchText:
All right. Now that today's done and dusted...time for
my hard-earned reward!
jpnChrName: ──話がまとまった所で 本日のご褒美タイムといくか。
jpnSearchText:
──話がまとまった所で
本日のご褒美タイムといくか。

engChrName: I've been waitin' for my Andalucía fig and honey tart all day!
engSearchText:
I've been waitin' for my Andalucía fig and honey tart
all day!
jpnChrName: 晩夏限定、アンダルシアの 黒イチジクの糖蜜がけタルト──
jpnSearchText:
晩夏限定、アンダルシアの
黒イチジクの糖蜜がけタルト──

engChrName: I was gonna scarf it down all by myself, but you pulled your weight today, so let's go half-half.
engSearchText:
I was gonna scarf it down all by myself, but you
pulled your weight today, so let's go half-half.
jpnChrName: 全部頂くつもりだったが、今日はお互い お疲れ様ってことで山分けしてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
全部頂くつもりだったが、今日はお互い
お疲れ様ってことで山分けしてやるよ。

engChrName: Ahaha... Thank you.
engSearchText: Ahaha... Thank you.
jpnChrName: あはは…… ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Oh! But I still want to say...
engSearchText: Oh! But I still want to say...
jpnChrName: あ……そうだ。
jpnSearchText: あ……そうだ。

engChrName: ...it really does bother me just how much I benefit from this arrangement compared to you.
engSearchText:
...it really does bother me just how much I benefit
from this arrangement compared to you.
jpnChrName: ……その、先程の条件だと 流石に申し訳ないと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
……その、先程の条件だと
流石に申し訳ないと思うんです。

engChrName: I was thinking of a way to even it out and thought, you know, how about I work here part time?
engSearchText:
I was thinking of a way to even it out and thought,
you know, how about I work here part time?
jpnChrName: ですから──せめてものお返しに こちらでアルバイトさせてください！
jpnSearchText:
ですから──せめてものお返しに
こちらでアルバイトさせてください！

engChrName: ...? You wanna WHAT?!
engSearchText: ...? You wanna WHAT?!
jpnChrName: ！？ ──はああああっ！？
jpnSearchText:
！？
──はああああっ！？

engChrName: You seem to be so busy that I can't imagine how you find the time to clean up around here...
engSearchText:
You seem to be so busy that I can't imagine how you
find the time to clean up around here...
jpnChrName: 見たところお忙しそうですし、 色々と散らかっていますし……
jpnSearchText:
見たところお忙しそうですし、
色々と散らかっていますし……

engChrName: I'm also good at secretarial work, too, so I'm sure I'd be a big help with sorting paperwork and whatever else you need.
engSearchText:
I'm also good at secretarial work, too, so I'm sure I'd
be a big help with sorting paperwork and whatever
else you need.
jpnChrName: 書類整理は慣れていますから お力になれると思うんです……！
jpnSearchText:
書類整理は慣れていますから
お力になれると思うんです……！

engChrName: Just a standard wage is fine. Or even no wage! Unpaid is totally fine!
engSearchText:
Just a standard wage is fine. Or even no wage!
Unpaid is totally fine!
jpnChrName: あ、バイト代はお気持ち程度で！ タダでも結構ですし！
jpnSearchText:
あ、バイト代はお気持ち程度で！
タダでも結構ですし！

engChrName: I-I can't do that! Haven't you ever heard of labor laws?
engSearchText:
I-I can't do that! Haven't you ever heard of
labor laws?
jpnChrName: そ、そんな訳に行くか！ 労働基準法ってモンが……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな訳に行くか！
労働基準法ってモンが……

engChrName: A-And forget that! This whole idea is crazy!
engSearchText: A-And forget that! This whole idea is crazy!
jpnChrName: ──じゃなくて！ そもそも前提がおかしい！
jpnSearchText:
──じゃなくて！
そもそも前提がおかしい！

engChrName: How did me hiring you even get into your head?!
engSearchText: How did me hiring you even get into your head?!
jpnChrName: なんでいきなりお前を バイトで雇う話になるんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
なんでいきなりお前を
バイトで雇う話になるんだ！？

engChrName: Well, it's because you won't accept any mira from me.
engSearchText: Well, it's because you won't accept any mira from me.
jpnChrName: だってヴァンさん、追加料金は 絶対に受け取らないって……
jpnSearchText:
だってヴァンさん、追加料金は
絶対に受け取らないって……

engChrName: I understand you have your own way of doing things, but I have my own pride to satisfy, you know. You'll just have to compromise.
engSearchText:
I understand you have your own way of doing things,
but I have my own pride to satisfy, you know.
You'll just have to compromise.
jpnChrName: それが流儀なのは分かりましたけど 学生にも譲れないものはあるんです。
jpnSearchText:
それが流儀なのは分かりましたけど
学生にも譲れないものはあるんです。

engChrName: *flabbergasted sputtering*
engSearchText: *flabbergasted sputtering*
jpnSearchText: …………………………………

engChrName: Now, let me just cut this tart into two so we can dig in and enjoy! Don't worry—I'll make sure you get the bigger portion.
engSearchText:
Now, let me just cut this tart into two so we can dig
in and enjoy! Don't worry—I'll make sure you get the
bigger portion.
jpnChrName: あ、早速タルトを切りますね！ もちろんヴァンさんは特大で！
jpnSearchText:
あ、早速タルトを切りますね！
もちろんヴァンさんは特大で！

engChrName: And where do you keep your coffee beans? Oh! There they are.
engSearchText:
And where do you keep your coffee beans? Oh!
There they are.
jpnChrName: それとコーヒー豆は── うん、こちらの棚みたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
それとコーヒー豆は──
うん、こちらの棚みたいですね。

engChrName: Wait. How did you find 'em so—who said you could make yourself at home this fast?!
engSearchText:
Wait. How did you find 'em so—who said you could
make yourself at home this fast?!
jpnChrName: なんでコーヒーの場所まで…… 速攻で馴染んでんじゃねえっつの！？
jpnSearchText:
なんでコーヒーの場所まで……
速攻で馴染んでんじゃねえっつの！？

engChrName: Main 4SPG [Her Great-Grandfather's Orbment] completed! Received
engSearchText:
Main 4SPG [Her Great-Grandfather's Orbment] completed!
Received
jpnChrName: メイン４ｓｐｇ【曾祖父が遺した《導力器》の捜索】の 報酬として
jpnSearchText:
メイン４ｓｐｇ【曾祖父が遺した《導力器》の捜索】の
報酬として

engChrName: September 6th, 1208, 9:30AM
engSearchText: September 6th, 1208, 9:30AM

engChrName: Messeldam Film Festival Canceled in Response to Terrorist Threat
engSearchText:
Messeldam Film Festival Canceled in Response to
Terrorist Threat

jpnSearchText:
（アルマータの連中も音沙汰無し。

engChrName: (As for Genesis and the Grendel...still comin' up empty.)
engSearchText:
(As for Genesis and the Grendel...still comin'
up empty.)

jpnSearchText:
（《ゲネシス》に《グレンデル》──
どうやっても引っかかる気配がねぇ。）

engChrName: (Are they being actively deleted? Is this all part of some big coverup?)
engSearchText:
(Are they being actively deleted? Is this all part of
some big coverup?)

jpnSearchText:
（完璧に隠蔽されてるのか……
それともネットから消されたのか。）

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Just tell me what you want.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Just tell me what you want.
jpnChrName: はいはい、なんなの？ 用件を言いなさいよね。
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、なんなの？
用件を言いなさいよね。

engChrName: She's the same as usual, too.
engSearchText: She's the same as usual, too.
jpnChrName: こっちも相変わらず、か。
jpnSearchText: こっちも相変わらず、か。

engChrName: Should I call on Marduk? ...Nah. That'd probably just cause even MORE headaches for me.
engSearchText:
Should I call on Marduk? ...Nah. That'd probably just
cause even MORE headaches for me.
jpnChrName: いっそマルドゥックに聞くか？ ──いや、それこそヤブ蛇ってもんか。
jpnSearchText:
いっそマルドゥックに聞くか？
──いや、それこそヤブ蛇ってもんか。

engChrName: Well, it's almost time for my regular checkup, so I may as well put a pin in it. *sigh* ...Why do I feel like I'm gonna get an earful this time?
engSearchText:
Well, it's almost time for my regular checkup, so I may
as well put a pin in it. *sigh* ...Why do I feel like I'm
gonna get an earful this time?
jpnChrName: そういやそろそろ定期査定だったな…… ……微妙にどやされそうな気もするが。
jpnSearchText:
そういやそろそろ定期査定だったな……
……微妙にどやされそうな気もするが。

engChrName: Wanna not bang my door in, Yumes?
engSearchText: Wanna not bang my door in, Yumes?
jpnChrName: ユメ坊、ノックはお淑やかにしろ。
jpnSearchText: ユメ坊、ノックはお淑やかにしろ。

engChrName: Whoa! You're up already? That's crazy!
engSearchText: Whoa! You're up already? That's crazy!
jpnChrName: もう起きてたんだー、めずらし～！
jpnSearchText: もう起きてたんだー、めずらし～！

engChrName: Good morning, Van! You better be earning an honest living up here!
engSearchText:
Good morning, Van! You better be earning an honest
living up here!
jpnChrName: おっはよ～ヴァン！ “まっとう”にかせいでる～？
jpnSearchText:
おっはよ～ヴァン！
“まっとう”にかせいでる～？

engChrName: No bringing shame to the Goddess or your landlords!
engSearchText: No bringing shame to the Goddess or your landlords!
jpnChrName: 女神さまとオテントさまに ハジない生きかたしないとダメだぞー？
jpnSearchText:
女神さまとオテントさまに
ハジない生きかたしないとダメだぞー？

engChrName: ...No prizes for guessing who you learned all THAT from.
engSearchText:
...No prizes for guessing who you learned all
THAT from.
jpnChrName: ……ビクトルのおやっさん、 孫娘になに吹き込んでやがる。
jpnSearchText:
……ビクトルのおやっさん、
孫娘になに吹き込んでやがる。

engChrName: How 'bout takin' after your mother instead?
engSearchText: How 'bout takin' after your mother instead?
jpnChrName: 真似するならポーレット── ママの真似をした方がいいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
真似するならポーレット──
ママの真似をした方がいいぜ？

engChrName: Wouldn't it be nice to become a charming, pretty lady just like her one day?
engSearchText:
Wouldn't it be nice to become a charming, pretty lady
just like her one day?
jpnChrName: ああいう素敵な美人になりたいならな。
jpnSearchText: ああいう素敵な美人になりたいならな。

engChrName: Yeah! I wanna be just like Mommy!
engSearchText: Yeah! I wanna be just like Mommy!
jpnChrName: うんっ！ ユメ、ママみたいになるー！
jpnSearchText:
うんっ！
ユメ、ママみたいになるー！

engChrName: Oh! But Agnès is really pretty, too!
engSearchText: Oh! But Agnès is really pretty, too!
jpnChrName: あ、アニエスちゃんみたいにも なりたいかなぁ～？
jpnSearchText:
あ、アニエスちゃんみたいにも
なりたいかなぁ～？
っ……？

engChrName: Come on in. Don't be shy.
engSearchText: Come on in. Don't be shy.
jpnChrName: ったく、いいから入って来いよ。 何を遠慮してんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ったく、いいから入って来いよ。
何を遠慮してんだ？

engChrName: Well, if you say so...
engSearchText: Well, if you say so...
jpnChrName: は、はい……それでは。
jpnSearchText: は、はい……それでは。
…………………………

engChrName: You said not to come in my uniform, so I wore this... Umm... How do I look?
engSearchText:
You said not to come in my uniform, so I wore this...
Umm... How do I look?
jpnChrName: その、言われた通り私服で来ましたけど ………ど、どうでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
その、言われた通り私服で来ましたけど
………ど、どうでしょうか？

engChrName: It'll work, I guess?
engSearchText: It'll work, I guess?
jpnChrName: いや……悪くないんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: いや……悪くないんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Kinda too dressy for casual walkin' around town, but then again, goin' the plain route with you would just make you stick out like a sore thumb.
engSearchText:
Kinda too dressy for casual walkin' around town, but
then again, goin' the plain route with you would just
make you stick out like a sore thumb.
jpnChrName: 街巡りにはちっと小綺麗すぎるが、 地味目だと逆に目立つだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
街巡りにはちっと小綺麗すぎるが、
地味目だと逆に目立つだろうしな。

engChrName: Still beats the uniform either way.
engSearchText: Still beats the uniform either way.
jpnChrName: ま、制服よりはマシだと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、制服よりはマシだと思うぜ。

engChrName: That's good...
engSearchText: That's good...
jpnChrName: そ、そうですか………
jpnSearchText: そ、そうですか………

engChrName: You're being mean, Van! She looks really pretty, so you should tell her she looks really pretty!
engSearchText:
You're being mean, Van! She looks really pretty, so
you should tell her she looks really pretty!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、わかってなーい！ すっごくカワイイかっこうなのにー！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、わかってなーい！
すっごくカワイイかっこうなのにー！

engChrName: Come on. Let's ditch this big loser and eat some breakfast!
engSearchText:
Come on. Let's ditch this big loser and eat
some breakfast!
jpnChrName: こんなダメダメなオトコほっといて 朝ゴハンたべよ～、アニエスちゃんっ！
jpnSearchText:
こんなダメダメなオトコほっといて
朝ゴハンたべよ～、アニエスちゃんっ！

engChrName: We're serving bacon quiche with pumpkin soup today!
engSearchText:
We're serving bacon quiche with pumpkin
soup today!
jpnChrName: きょうのモーニングはベーコンキッシュに カボチャのスープだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
きょうのモーニングはベーコンキッシュに
カボチャのスープだよ～！

engChrName: Oh, that sounds delicious! Lead the way!
engSearchText: Oh, that sounds delicious! Lead the way!
jpnChrName: わっ、美味しそう。 それじゃあ行きましょう、ユメちゃん。
jpnSearchText:
わっ、美味しそう。
それじゃあ行きましょう、ユメちゃん。

engChrName: Well, damn. Those two sure hit it off quick.
engSearchText: Well, damn. Those two sure hit it off quick.
jpnChrName: ……ったく。 あっという間に馴染みやがって。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく。
あっという間に馴染みやがって。

engChrName: All right. This is now your first official day on the job.
engSearchText:
All right. This is now your first official day on
the job.
jpnChrName: さて──今日がお前の バイト初日になるわけだが……
jpnSearchText:
さて──今日がお前の
バイト初日になるわけだが……

engChrName: First thing's gonna be goin' over how this all works.
engSearchText: First thing's gonna be goin' over how this all works.
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》について まずは表向きの仕事の概要を説明する。
jpnSearchText:
《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》について
まずは表向きの仕事の概要を説明する。

engChrName: I could use a formal primer, so yes! Please do!
engSearchText: I could use a formal primer, so yes! Please do!
jpnChrName: “表向き”…… ──はい、宜しくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
“表向き”……
──はい、宜しくお願いします。

engChrName: Now, unless a major job comes in, I just go around the city helpin' people out with little problems.
engSearchText:
Now, unless a major job comes in, I just go around
the city helpin' people out with little problems.
jpnChrName: 基本、大型の依頼が入らない限り、 首都での細かい依頼をこなしてゆく。
jpnSearchText:
基本、大型の依頼が入らない限り、
首都での細かい依頼をこなしてゆく。

engChrName: As for how I take 'em on, well, you'll see. It's not the usual route, but it gets the job done and us paid.
engSearchText:
As for how I take 'em on, well, you'll see. It's not the
usual route, but it gets the job done and us paid.
jpnChrName: この依頼だが、ネット以外では ちょいと特殊な受け方をしていてな。
jpnSearchText:
この依頼だが、ネット以外では
ちょいと特殊な受け方をしていてな。

engChrName: The plan today's gonna involve you touring around with me so you can get a visual on all of the above.
engSearchText:
The plan today's gonna involve you touring around
with me so you can get a visual on all of the above.
jpnChrName: 今日のところは、研修がてら 一通り付き合ってもらうつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
今日のところは、研修がてら
一通り付き合ってもらうつもりだ。

engChrName: Was that why you were concerned about me standing out too much in my uniform?
engSearchText:
Was that why you were concerned about me standing
out too much in my uniform?
jpnChrName: それが制服だと目立つ、 “街巡り”に繋がるんですね？
jpnSearchText:
それが制服だと目立つ、
“街巡り”に繋がるんですね？

engChrName: Yeah. Oh, and one more thing...
engSearchText: Yeah. Oh, and one more thing...
jpnChrName: そういうことだ。 ──そしてここが肝心だが。
jpnSearchText:
そういうことだ。
──そしてここが肝心だが。

engChrName: I pretty much told you this when we first met, but not all the jobs I take are above board.
engSearchText:
I pretty much told you this when we first met, but not
all the jobs I take are above board.
jpnChrName: “裏”が付く以上、受けるのは 真っ当な依頼ばかりじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
“裏”が付く以上、受けるのは
真っ当な依頼ばかりじゃない。

engChrName: Some of 'em are from crooks. Some are damn near illegal.
engSearchText:
Some of 'em are from crooks. Some are damn
near illegal.
jpnChrName: 裏社会の人間からの依頼もあれば、 違法スレスレの相談案件もある。
jpnSearchText:
裏社会の人間からの依頼もあれば、
違法スレスレの相談案件もある。

engChrName: I don't take on anything and everything, of course—I do turn jobs down sometimes.
engSearchText:
I don't take on anything and everything, of course—I
do turn jobs down sometimes.
jpnChrName: 全てを受けるわけじゃない。 受けるかどうかは俺が決める。
jpnSearchText:
全てを受けるわけじゃない。
受けるかどうかは俺が決める。

engChrName: But...
engSearchText: But...
jpnChrName: だが──
jpnSearchText: だが──

engChrName: ...what I'm comfortable doing and what an average student is comfortable doing are gonna be very different.
engSearchText:
...what I'm comfortable doing and what an average
student is comfortable doing are gonna be
very different.
jpnChrName: 真っ当なお嬢様には受け入れがたい 依頼なんかもあるかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
真っ当なお嬢様には受け入れがたい
依頼なんかもあるかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: So one more time: you SURE you wanna work with me?
engSearchText:
So one more time: you SURE you wanna work
with me?
jpnChrName: 何度も言ったが、本当にいいんだな？
jpnSearchText: 何度も言ったが、本当にいいんだな？

engChrName: ...Yes.
engSearchText: ...Yes.

engChrName: I know the world isn't always such a pretty place.
engSearchText: I know the world isn't always such a pretty place.
jpnChrName: 世の中の“表”と“裏”── 綺麗事だけではないのは知っています。
jpnSearchText:
世の中の“表”と“裏”──
綺麗事だけではないのは知っています。

engChrName: That awareness may not be through personal experience, but I'd say that even for a sixteen-year-old girl...
engSearchText:
That awareness may not be through personal
experience, but I'd say that even for a
sixteen-year-old girl...
jpnChrName: もちろん知識としてだけですが、 ………学校のみんなよりはずっと………
jpnSearchText:
もちろん知識としてだけですが、
………学校のみんなよりはずっと………

engChrName: ...I know a lot more than the average student about both sides of the coin.
engSearchText:
...I know a lot more than the average student about
both sides of the coin.
jpnChrName: 一応、１６年は生きているので それなりに、程度ですけれど。
jpnSearchText:
一応、１６年は生きているので
それなりに、程度ですけれど。

engChrName: How old are you, by the way?
engSearchText: How old are you, by the way?
jpnChrName: あ、そういえば── ヴァンさんってお幾つなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、そういえば──
ヴァンさんってお幾つなんですか？

engChrName: Where'd that come from? Twenty-four.
engSearchText: Where'd that come from? Twenty-four.
jpnChrName: なんだ急に……２４だが。
jpnSearchText: なんだ急に……２４だが。

engChrName: Really? I thought you were a little younger than that.
engSearchText: Really? I thought you were a little younger than that.
jpnChrName: そうなんですか！ もう少しお若いのかと……！
jpnSearchText:
そうなんですか！
もう少しお若いのかと……！

engChrName: Though it makes sense with how much life experience you seem to have. Your clothes, room, and hobbies seem to be a generation ahead of mine, too...
engSearchText:
Though it makes sense with how much life
experience you seem to have. Your clothes, room, and
hobbies seem to be a generation ahead of mine, too...
jpnChrName: でも人生経験も豊富そうですし 服や部屋の趣味も渋めですよね。
jpnSearchText:
でも人生経験も豊富そうですし
服や部屋の趣味も渋めですよね。

engChrName: So you're almost a decade older than me, huh? ...*glance*
engSearchText:
So you're almost a decade older than me, huh?
...*glance*

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. To a high school student, I might as well be knockin' on death's door already.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah. To a high school student, I might as well
be knockin' on death's door already.
jpnChrName: あー、お前くらいからすりゃ オッサンっつうのは分かってるよ。
jpnSearchText:
あー、お前くらいからすりゃ
オッサンっつうのは分かってるよ。

engChrName: Make the most of your teenage years, all right?
engSearchText: Make the most of your teenage years, all right?
jpnChrName: ハッ、せいぜい今のうちに 悔いなく青春を謳歌しておきな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、せいぜい今のうちに
悔いなく青春を謳歌しておきな。

engChrName: Might feel like an eternity until you graduate, but the second you cross twenty, you'll be walkin' with your cane like an old codger in no time.
engSearchText:
Might feel like an eternity until you graduate, but the
second you cross twenty, you'll be walkin' with your
cane like an old codger in no time.
jpnChrName: 卒業まで長いつもりかもしれんが、 ハタチ超えたらあっという間だからな？
jpnSearchText:
卒業まで長いつもりかもしれんが、
ハタチ超えたらあっという間だからな？

engChrName: Ahaha... Oh, I didn't say being in your twenties was old. Just that you were older than me.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... Oh, I didn't say being in your twenties
was old. Just that you were older than me.
jpnChrName: あはは……別におじさんなんて 思ってもいませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……別におじさんなんて
思ってもいませんけど。

engChrName: Circling back to what we were talking about before, you don't have to worry about me. I'm confident I can handle any task you give me.
engSearchText:
Circling back to what we were talking about before,
you don't have to worry about me. I'm confident I can
handle any task you give me.
jpnChrName: ──とにかく大丈夫です。 遠慮なくこき使ってください。
jpnSearchText:
──とにかく大丈夫です。
遠慮なくこき使ってください。

engChrName: Heh. I'll be the judge of that.
engSearchText: Heh. I'll be the judge of that.
jpnChrName: まあ、使えるかどうかも含めて 見定めさせてもらうつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、使えるかどうかも含めて
見定めさせてもらうつもりだ。

engChrName: We'll be stickin' to three of the city's districts.
engSearchText: We'll be stickin' to three of the city's districts.
jpnChrName: とりあえず今日は…… ３エリアくらいが関の山か。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず今日は……
３エリアくらいが関の山か。

engChrName: First, I'll show you around Old Town where we are now, which is the Eighth District.
engSearchText:
First, I'll show you around Old Town where we are
now, which is the Eighth District.
jpnChrName: ──まずはこの８区、 旧市街を一通り案内してやる。
jpnSearchText:
──まずはこの８区、
旧市街を一通り案内してやる。

engChrName: I use some of the shops here in my day-to-day work, so they'll be worth committing to memory.
engSearchText:
I use some of the shops here in my day-to-day work,
so they'll be worth committing to memory.
jpnChrName: 仕事で利用する店なんかもあるから 覚えておいて損はねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
仕事で利用する店なんかもあるから
覚えておいて損はねえだろう。

engChrName: That sounds good. I'm ready when you are!
engSearchText: That sounds good. I'm ready when you are!
jpnChrName: 分かりました、 どうかよろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
分かりました、
どうかよろしくお願いします。

engChrName: Getting ready for a hard day's work?
engSearchText: Getting ready for a hard day's work?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、アルバイト、 いよいよ本格始動みたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、アルバイト、
いよいよ本格始動みたいね。

engChrName: That's right. Oh! Thank you!
engSearchText: That's right. Oh! Thank you!
jpnChrName: ポーレットさん、はいっ。 ──あ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットさん、はいっ。
──あ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: I've put her on a trial period to start with.
engSearchText: I've put her on a trial period to start with.
jpnChrName: とりあえず試用期間だがな。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず試用期間だがな。

engChrName: Then that's all the more reason why you need to support her while she learns.
engSearchText:
Then that's all the more reason why you need to
support her while she learns.
jpnChrName: だったら尚更ヴァンさんが アニエスちゃんをフォローしないと。
jpnSearchText:
だったら尚更ヴァンさんが
アニエスちゃんをフォローしないと。

engChrName: Don't overdo it today—and make sure you're back in time for dinner.
engSearchText:
Don't overdo it today—and make sure you're back in
time for dinner.
jpnChrName: ──今日は２人とも無茶しないで 夕食もちゃんとウチで食べること。
jpnSearchText:
──今日は２人とも無茶しないで
夕食もちゃんとウチで食べること。

engChrName: I mean that for you, too, Agnès. We'll have a piping hot, delicious meal waiting for you.
engSearchText:
I mean that for you, too, Agnès. We'll have a piping
hot, delicious meal waiting for you.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの分はもちろんだけど アニエスちゃんの分も用意しておくわ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんの分はもちろんだけど
アニエスちゃんの分も用意しておくわ。

engChrName: Wouldn't want it to get cold now, would you?
engSearchText: Wouldn't want it to get cold now, would you?
jpnChrName: 無駄にしたらメッ、だからね？
jpnSearchText: 無駄にしたらメッ、だからね？

engChrName: You're not her mom, you know...
engSearchText: You're not her mom, you know...
jpnChrName: メッって…… オフクロじゃねえんだから。
jpnSearchText:
メッって……
オフクロじゃねえんだから。

engChrName: Aww... Thank you! I already can't wait.
engSearchText: Aww... Thank you! I already can't wait.
jpnChrName: あはは…… はいっ、楽しみにしています！
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
はいっ、楽しみにしています！

engChrName: The people here are so sweet.
engSearchText: The people here are so sweet.
jpnChrName: ポーレットさんにユメちゃん、 マスターのビクトルさん……
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットさんにユメちゃん、
マスターのビクトルさん……

engChrName: You're really blessed to have such a wonderful family as landlords.
engSearchText:
You're really blessed to have such a wonderful family
as landlords.
jpnChrName: 事務所の大家さんでもあるそうですけど、 すごく良い方々みたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
事務所の大家さんでもあるそうですけど、
すごく良い方々みたいですね？

engChrName: Shame the old man's always getting on my case, though.
engSearchText:
Shame the old man's always getting on my
case, though.
jpnChrName: ま、おやっさんが どやしつけてくるのは玉に瑕だが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、おやっさんが
どやしつけてくるのは玉に瑕だが。

engChrName: Anyway, we'll head off as soon as you finish your coffee. You got you-know-what with you, right?
engSearchText:
Anyway, we'll head off as soon as you finish
your coffee. You got you-know-what with you, right?
jpnChrName: コーヒーを飲んじまったら行くぞ。 ……そういや、あれは持っているな？
jpnSearchText:
コーヒーを飲んじまったら行くぞ。
……そういや、あれは持っているな？

engChrName: Ahh. I do.
engSearchText: Ahh. I do.
jpnChrName: あ、はい──
jpnSearchText: あ、はい──

engChrName: You told me to keep it on me at all times to prevent it from being stolen.
engSearchText:
You told me to keep it on me at all times to prevent it
from being stolen.
jpnChrName: ……盗難対策なども兼ねて しばらくは肌身離さず、ですね？
jpnSearchText:
……盗難対策なども兼ねて
しばらくは肌身離さず、ですね？

engChrName: Good. Who knows if it'll activate out of nowhere like it did before...
engSearchText:
Good. Who knows if it'll activate out of nowhere like
it did before...
jpnChrName: ああ、また何かのきっかけに 作動するかもしれねえが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、また何かのきっかけに
作動するかもしれねえが……

engChrName: ...but as long as I'm with you, I'll back you up as best I can.
engSearchText:
...but as long as I'm with you, I'll back you up as best
I can.
jpnChrName: 俺が近くにいる限りは フォローするから安心しとけ。
jpnSearchText:
俺が近くにいる限りは
フォローするから安心しとけ。

engChrName: Gotta look out for my new assistant while I'm still giving her the tour, right?
engSearchText:
Gotta look out for my new assistant while I'm still
giving her the tour, right?
jpnChrName: “助手見習い”の指導がてらな。
jpnSearchText: “助手見習い”の指導がてらな。

engChrName: Heehee. Right.
engSearchText: Heehee. Right.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、お手柔らかにお願いします。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、お手柔らかにお願いします。

engChrName: And speaking of...shall we?
engSearchText: And speaking of...shall we?
jpnChrName: えっと、それでは……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、それでは……？

engChrName: We shall. Then let the workday begin.
engSearchText: We shall. Then let the workday begin.
jpnChrName: ああ──アークライド解決事務所、 《“裏”解決業務》を始めるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──アークライド解決事務所、
《“裏”解決業務》を始めるぞ。

engChrName: So, what's the first order of business?
engSearchText: So, what's the first order of business?
jpnChrName: それで、まずは何を行いますか？
jpnSearchText: それで、まずは何を行いますか？

engChrName: The first thing I do every day I'm workin' is check the notice boards around the city.
engSearchText:
The first thing I do every day I'm workin' is check the
notice boards around the city.
jpnChrName: 兎にも角にも、ウチの仕事は “掲示板”を見て回ることから始まる。
jpnSearchText:
兎にも角にも、ウチの仕事は
“掲示板”を見て回ることから始まる。

engChrName: There's one here in Old Town, so let's go check that one out for starters.
engSearchText:
There's one here in Old Town, so let's go check that
one out for starters.
jpnChrName: この旧市街にも一つあってな。 まずはそれを確認しに行く。
jpnSearchText:
この旧市街にも一つあってな。
まずはそれを確認しに行く。

engChrName: Got it!
engSearchText: Got it!
jpnChrName: 掲示板ですか……分かりました。
jpnSearchText: 掲示板ですか……分かりました。

engChrName: Oh, we should probably go talk to Victor before we head out, though.
engSearchText:
Oh, we should probably go talk to Victor before we
head out, though.
jpnChrName: その前に、ビクトルの おやっさんには改めて声をかけておくか。
jpnSearchText:
その前に、ビクトルの
おやっさんには改めて声をかけておくか。

engChrName: We should pay a visit to the repair shop down the alley out front, too.
engSearchText:
We should pay a visit to the repair shop down the
alley out front, too.
jpnChrName: それと、正面の通路脇にある 中古修理屋にも顔を出すぞ。
jpnSearchText:
それと、正面の通路脇にある
中古修理屋にも顔を出すぞ。

engChrName: Understood. Victor first, then?
engSearchText: Understood. Victor first, then?
jpnChrName: えっと……では最初に ビクトルさんに挨拶ですね。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……では最初に
ビクトルさんに挨拶ですね。

engChrName: After which we can check the notice board and visit the repair shop. Got it.
engSearchText:
After which we can check the notice board and visit
the repair shop. Got it.
jpnChrName: それから掲示板と中古修理屋、と。 ──了解しました。
jpnSearchText:
それから掲示板と中古修理屋、と。
──了解しました。

engChrName: You can now use the Travel menu.
engSearchText: You can now use the Travel menu.
jpnChrName: 移動メニューが使えるようになった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>移動メニューが使えるようになった。

engChrName: (Should I make my move?)
engSearchText: (Should I make my move?)
jpnChrName: （……そろそろ仕掛けるか？）
jpnSearchText: （……そろそろ仕掛けるか？）

engChrName: How adorable...
engSearchText: How adorable...
jpnChrName: 可愛い……
jpnSearchText: 可愛い……

engChrName: The hell? A kid?
engSearchText: The hell? A kid?
jpnChrName: ………ガキか。
jpnSearchText: ………ガキか。

engChrName: I can't believe I let a civilian get the better of me.
engSearchText: I can't believe I let a civilian get the better of me.
jpnChrName: ……民間人に後れを取るなんて……
jpnSearchText: ……民間人に後れを取るなんて……

engChrName: You knew I was tailing you and led me here on purpose, didn't you?
engSearchText:
You knew I was tailing you and led me here on
purpose, didn't you?
jpnChrName: ううん、最初から気付かれて、 ここに誘い込まれたんですね……？
jpnSearchText:
ううん、最初から気付かれて、
ここに誘い込まれたんですね……？

engChrName: Well, I knew I wasn't gonna lose you, so this was the next best thing.
engSearchText:
Well, I knew I wasn't gonna lose you, so this was the
next best thing.
jpnChrName: 振り切れなさそうだったからな。
jpnSearchText: 振り切れなさそうだったからな。

engChrName: That was a form of active camo using shards. Same kinda thing RAMDAs can do—just works different.
engSearchText:
That was a form of active camo using shards.
Same kinda thing RAMDAs can do—just
works different.
jpnChrName: 今のはシャードによる偽装映像だ。 ＲＡＭＤＡとは違う方式だな。
jpnSearchText:
今のはシャードによる偽装映像だ。
ＲＡＭＤＡとは違う方式だな。

engChrName: Y-You can do that with shards, too?
engSearchText: Y-You can do that with shards, too?
jpnChrName: そ、そんな機能まで……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな機能まで……

engChrName: You ARE the real deal, huh? Actually, even realer than real.
engSearchText:
You ARE the real deal, huh? Actually, even realer
than real.
jpnChrName: ……すごい……… 噂通り──ううんそれ以上かも。
jpnSearchText:
……すごい………
噂通り──ううんそれ以上かも。

engChrName: Glad I decided to come even with what Abi said.
engSearchText: Glad I decided to come even with what Abi said.
jpnChrName: えへへ……よかった。 お父さん（アブ）たちの反対を押し切って……
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……よかった。
お父さん（アブ）たちの反対を押し切って……

engChrName: 'Abi'? If I recall, that means...
engSearchText: 'Abi'? If I recall, that means...
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）──その呼び方って。
jpnSearchText: お父さん（アブ）──その呼び方って。

engChrName: It's 'Father.' From a dialect in the Central East.
engSearchText: It's 'Father.' From a dialect in the Central East.
jpnChrName: 大陸中東部の方言か。
jpnSearchText: 大陸中東部の方言か。

engChrName: With how fast you are and the way you're dressed, are you—
engSearchText:
With how fast you are and the way you're dressed, are
you—
jpnChrName: 装束に身のこなしといい、 ひょっとしてお前──
jpnSearchText:
装束に身のこなしといい、
ひょっとしてお前──

engChrName: Waaait a minute... I think I just realized somethin' else.
engSearchText:
Waaait a minute... I think I just realized
somethin' else.
jpnChrName: あー……２重の意味で “ひょっとして”だったか。
jpnSearchText:
あー……２重の意味で
“ひょっとして”だったか。

engChrName: What's wrong?
engSearchText: What's wrong?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: How are you a jaeger in the Kruga corps at your age?
engSearchText: How are you a jaeger in the Kruga corps at your age?
jpnChrName: ──参ったな。 その歳で《クルガ》の猟兵……
jpnSearchText:
──参ったな。
その歳で《クルガ》の猟兵……

engChrName: You're one hell of a girl.
engSearchText: You're one hell of a girl.
jpnChrName: しかも小娘とはな。
jpnSearchText: しかも小娘とはな。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: ええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ……！？

engChrName: I'm the eldest daughter of the Warriors of Kruga's vice chief, Ferida Al-Fayed.
engSearchText:
I'm the eldest daughter of the Warriors of Kruga's
vice chief, Ferida Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: えと、《クルガ戦士団》副頭目が長女、 フェリーダ・アルファイドっていいます。
jpnSearchText:
えと、《クルガ戦士団》副頭目が長女、
フェリーダ・アルファイドっていいます。

engChrName: I came here to ask for your help, Mr. Arkride. Could we go somewhere to talk?
engSearchText:
I came here to ask for your help, Mr. Arkride.
Could we go somewhere to talk?
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》アークライド様── どうか相談に乗っていただけませんか？
jpnSearchText:
《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》アークライド様──
どうか相談に乗っていただけませんか？

engChrName: This is my first time hearing about the Warriors of Kruga.
engSearchText:
This is my first time hearing about the Warriors
of Kruga.
jpnChrName: 《クルガ戦士団》…… そういった方々がいるんですね。
jpnSearchText:
《クルガ戦士団》……
そういった方々がいるんですね。

engChrName: So you're from just below the Ishgal Mountains in the Central East?
engSearchText:
So you're from just below the Ishgal Mountains in the
Central East?
jpnChrName: 東のイシュガル山脈の南方── 大陸中東部の北側でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
東のイシュガル山脈の南方──
大陸中東部の北側でしょうか？

engChrName: Along the northern edge of the Central East, yeah. We see ourselves as—and live a lifestyle befitting of—warriors.
engSearchText:
Along the northern edge of the Central East, yeah.
We see ourselves as—and live a lifestyle befitting
of—warriors.
jpnChrName: はい、わたしたちクルガの民は “焔”と翼の女神（アルーシャ）を奉じています。
jpnSearchText:
はい、わたしたちクルガの民は
“焔”と翼の女神（アルーシャ）を奉じています。

engChrName: We revere flames and the Goddess Arusha.
engSearchText: We revere flames and the Goddess Arusha.
jpnChrName: 山岳地にある里で暮らしていて、 《戦士》として戦うのが習わしなんです。
jpnSearchText:
山岳地にある里で暮らしていて、
《戦士》として戦うのが習わしなんです。

engChrName: Their whole tribe forms one major corps that serves to rep the whole Central East.
engSearchText:
Their whole tribe forms one major corps that serves
to rep the whole Central East.
jpnChrName: ま、部族ぐるみでやっている、 大陸中東を代表する高位猟兵団だ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、部族ぐるみでやっている、
大陸中東を代表する高位猟兵団だ。

engChrName: They're very proud and value their traditions, though, so they won't take on any jobs they deem immoral.
engSearchText:
They're very proud and value their traditions, though,
so they won't take on any jobs they deem immoral.
jpnChrName: ただ誇りと伝統を重んじていて 汚れ仕事は受けないことでも知られる。
jpnSearchText:
ただ誇りと伝統を重んじていて
汚れ仕事は受けないことでも知られる。

engChrName: And if you're surprised people so upstanding would let a kid fight—well, me, too.
engSearchText:
And if you're surprised people so upstanding would
let a kid fight—well, me, too.
jpnChrName: ──つってもこんな子供を 戦わせてるってのはどうかとは思うが。
jpnSearchText:
──つってもこんな子供を
戦わせてるってのはどうかとは思うが。

engChrName: Heehee. Oh, please. I'm not a full-fledged warrior like Abi yet.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Oh, please. I'm not a full-fledged warrior
like Abi yet.
jpnChrName: えへへ……そんな。 わたしなんかまだまだ半人前で。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……そんな。
わたしなんかまだまだ半人前で。

engChrName: But it's nice to hear you think of me as one.
engSearchText: But it's nice to hear you think of me as one.
jpnChrName: 早くお父さん（アブ）たちみたいな 一人前の戦士になりたいんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
早くお父さん（アブ）たちみたいな
一人前の戦士になりたいんですけど。

engChrName: (Innocent little thing, isn't she?)
engSearchText: (Innocent little thing, isn't she?)
jpnChrName: （ピュアかよ……）
jpnSearchText: （ピュアかよ……）

engChrName: (Ahaha. Yes, she strikes me as very pure of heart.)
engSearchText: (Ahaha. Yes, she strikes me as very pure of heart.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……でも   凄く素直な子みたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……でも
凄く素直な子みたいですね。）

engChrName: So you're looking for another jaeger corps, is that right?
engSearchText:
So you're looking for another jaeger corps, is
that right?
jpnChrName: それで、フェリちゃんは クルガとは別の猟兵団──
jpnSearchText:
それで、フェリちゃんは
クルガとは別の猟兵団──

engChrName: One called 'Eisenschild'?
engSearchText: One called 'Eisenschild'?
jpnChrName: 《アイゼンシルト》の 人たちを捜しているんでしたか？
jpnSearchText:
《アイゼンシルト》の
人たちを捜しているんでしたか？

engChrName: They're another famous high-ranking corps in Central Zemuria.
engSearchText:
They're another famous high-ranking corps in
Central Zemuria.
jpnChrName: そっちも大陸中部じゃ有名だな。
jpnSearchText: そっちも大陸中部じゃ有名だな。

engChrName: They work outta the free cities to the north and got a lot of former soldiers in their ranks.
engSearchText:
They work outta the free cities to the north and got a
lot of former soldiers in their ranks.
jpnChrName: 北の自由都市圏を拠点とする、 元軍人なんかが多い高位猟兵団だ。
jpnSearchText:
北の自由都市圏を拠点とする、
元軍人なんかが多い高位猟兵団だ。

engChrName: Fairly decent group for a jaeger corps, too. They take care of their city's defenses and stuff.
engSearchText:
Fairly decent group for a jaeger corps, too. They take
care of their city's defenses and stuff.
jpnChrName: こっちも比較的マシな連中で、 都市の治安維持を任されてもいる。
jpnSearchText:
こっちも比較的マシな連中で、
都市の治安維持を任されてもいる。

engChrName: That's interesting. I didn't know there were so many different kinds of jaeger corps.
engSearchText:
That's interesting. I didn't know there were so many
different kinds of jaeger corps.
jpnChrName: 成程……色々あるんですね。
jpnSearchText: 成程……色々あるんですね。

engChrName: We've clashed against the Eisenschild a lot over the years.
engSearchText:
We've clashed against the Eisenschild a lot over
the years.
jpnChrName: えと、その《アイゼンシルト》と 戦士団が戦うことは度々あって……
jpnSearchText:
えと、その《アイゼンシルト》と
戦士団が戦うことは度々あって……

engChrName: Our last one was around a couple weeks ago in a proxy war against them.
engSearchText:
Our last one was around a couple weeks ago in a
proxy war against them.
jpnChrName: 半月くらい前も とある代理戦争で交戦しました。
jpnSearchText:
半月くらい前も
とある代理戦争で交戦しました。

engChrName: We eventually settled that, and both sides left the battlefield, but...
engSearchText:
We eventually settled that, and both sides left the
battlefield, but...
jpnChrName: その時の決着はついて お互い、故郷に戻ったんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
その時の決着はついて
お互い、故郷に戻ったんですけど……

engChrName: ...from what I've heard, one unit of the Eisenschild's jaegers still hasn't returned home yet.
engSearchText:
...from what I've heard, one unit of the Eisenschild's
jaegers still hasn't returned home yet.
jpnChrName: 《アイゼンシルト》の中隊の一つが 現時点でも、戻ってないそうなんです。
jpnSearchText:
《アイゼンシルト》の中隊の一つが
現時点でも、戻ってないそうなんです。

engChrName: Huh. And you're sure they didn't take on another job on the way back, right?
engSearchText:
Huh. And you're sure they didn't take on another job
on the way back, right?
jpnChrName: へえ……？　別のヤマを 受けてるわけじゃねえんだよな？
jpnSearchText:
へえ……？　別のヤマを
受けてるわけじゃねえんだよな？

engChrName: We're sure. Their regimental commander contacted our village directly asking if we knew anything.
engSearchText:
We're sure. Their regimental commander contacted
our village directly asking if we knew anything.
jpnChrName: はい、先方の連隊長さんから 里に直接問い合わせがあって……
jpnSearchText:
はい、先方の連隊長さんから
里に直接問い合わせがあって……

engChrName: Abi—our vice chief—has been so worried that he's doing just about everything he can to find them.
engSearchText:
Abi—our vice chief—has been so worried that he's
doing just about everything he can to find them.
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）──副頭目も心配して 色々当たっているみたいなんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
お父さん（アブ）──副頭目も心配して
色々当たっているみたいなんですけど……

engChrName: Yeah? That so...?
engSearchText: Yeah? That so...?
jpnChrName: ハン…… 《アイゼンシルト》の中隊がねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
《アイゼンシルト》の中隊がねぇ。

engChrName: Sorry. I'm a little confused.
engSearchText: Sorry. I'm a little confused.
jpnChrName: えっと……すみません。
jpnSearchText: えっと……すみません。

engChrName: Didn't you say that both of your corps fought as enemies only a couple weeks ago?
engSearchText:
Didn't you say that both of your corps fought as
enemies only a couple weeks ago?
jpnChrName: 《クルガ》と《アイゼンシルト》の方々は 半月前、敵対関係にあったんですよね……？
jpnSearchText:
《クルガ》と《アイゼンシルト》の方々は
半月前、敵対関係にあったんですよね……？

engChrName: Hmm? I did. Why?
engSearchText: Hmm? I did. Why?
jpnChrName: ？　はい、そうですけど……
jpnSearchText: ？　はい、そうですけど……

engChrName: It's a jaeger thing. Don't worry about it.
