engSearchText: It's a jaeger thing. Don't worry about it.
jpnChrName: あー、猟兵ってのはそんなモンだ。
jpnSearchText: あー、猟兵ってのはそんなモンだ。

engChrName: Soon as the fighting stops, it's water under the bridge for them.
engSearchText:
Soon as the fighting stops, it's water under the bridge
for them.
jpnChrName: たとえ前日に殺し合いをしてても 戦いが終わったら完全に切り替える。
jpnSearchText:
たとえ前日に殺し合いをしてても
戦いが終わったら完全に切り替える。

engChrName: It's not uncommon for them to be enemies on one job and allies on the next.
engSearchText:
It's not uncommon for them to be enemies on one job
and allies on the next.
jpnChrName: 前の戦場じゃ敵でも、次の戦場じゃ 味方ってことはザラだからな。
jpnSearchText:
前の戦場じゃ敵でも、次の戦場じゃ
味方ってことはザラだからな。

engChrName: How unusual...
engSearchText: How unusual...
jpnChrName: な、なるほど。
jpnSearchText: な、なるほど。

engChrName: I, uhh...didn't mean to confuse you.
engSearchText: I, uhh...didn't mean to confuse you.
jpnChrName: えっと、すみません…… ヘンなこと言っちゃったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
えっと、すみません……
ヘンなこと言っちゃったみたいで。

engChrName: But he's right. We don't bear them any ill will.
engSearchText: But he's right. We don't bear them any ill will.
jpnChrName: ──でも、ヴァン様の言うとおり、 あんまり憎いとかはないんです。
jpnSearchText:
──でも、ヴァン様の言うとおり、
あんまり憎いとかはないんです。

engChrName: The leader of the unit that vanished has actually always been real good to me.
engSearchText:
The leader of the unit that vanished has actually
always been real good to me.
jpnChrName: それどころか行方不明の中隊の 隊長さんには良くしてもらってて……
jpnSearchText:
それどころか行方不明の中隊の
隊長さんには良くしてもらってて……

engChrName: Really?
engSearchText: Really?
jpnChrName: ほう……？
jpnSearchText: ほう……？

engChrName: What kind of person are they?
engSearchText: What kind of person are they?
jpnChrName: どんな方なんですか？
jpnSearchText: どんな方なんですか？

engChrName: Her name's Aida. She's one of the most capable jaegers in her corps.
engSearchText:
Her name's Aida. She's one of the most capable
jaegers in her corps.
jpnChrName: ……アイーダさんっていう女猟兵で アイゼンシルトでも指折りの実力者です。
jpnSearchText:
……アイーダさんっていう女猟兵で
アイゼンシルトでも指折りの実力者です。

engChrName: We've fought as allies and as enemies a lot since I first became a warrior two years ago.
engSearchText:
We've fought as allies and as enemies a lot since I
first became a warrior two years ago.
jpnChrName: わたしが２年前に戦士となってから 何度か敵味方として付き合いがあって……
jpnSearchText:
わたしが２年前に戦士となってから
何度か敵味方として付き合いがあって……

engChrName: She also teaches me all kinds of things on our off days or when our corps train together, too.
engSearchText:
She also teaches me all kinds of things on our off days
or when our corps train together, too.
jpnChrName: 休戦日や、合同訓練の時に 色々なことを教えてくれたんです。
jpnSearchText:
休戦日や、合同訓練の時に
色々なことを教えてくれたんです。

engChrName: It would have been easy to ignore someone as young as me, but she's been nothing but a true friend.
engSearchText:
It would have been easy to ignore someone as young
as me, but she's been nothing but a true friend.
jpnChrName: わたし、妹に弟、歳の離れた お兄ちゃんはいるんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
わたし、妹に弟、歳の離れた
お兄ちゃんはいるんですけど……

engChrName: Or maybe even a sister. I already have an older brother, but if I had to picture what an older sister would be like, it'd be her.
engSearchText:
Or maybe even a sister. I already have an older
brother, but if I had to picture what an older sister
would be like, it'd be her.
jpnChrName: 本当のお姉ちゃんみたいな感じで、 年下だけど友だちって言ってくれて……
jpnSearchText:
本当のお姉ちゃんみたいな感じで、
年下だけど友だちって言ってくれて……

engChrName: She's very, very important to me.
engSearchText: She's very, very important to me.
jpnChrName: ──大切な人、なんです。
jpnSearchText: ──大切な人、なんです。

engChrName: So of course I wanted to join in on the search party for her...but they wouldn't let me.
engSearchText:
So of course I wanted to join in on the search party
for her...but they wouldn't let me.
jpnChrName: でも……クルガからの捜索隊への参加を 希望しても認めてもらえませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
でも……クルガからの捜索隊への参加を
希望しても認めてもらえませんでした。

engChrName: Abi said it was because I'm still only thirteen and don't know anything outside of war and our village.
engSearchText:
Abi said it was because I'm still only thirteen and
don't know anything outside of war and our village.
jpnChrName: まだ１３歳だし、里と戦場しか 知らないからってお父さん（アブ）が……
jpnSearchText:
まだ１３歳だし、里と戦場しか
知らないからってお父さん（アブ）が……

engChrName: Makes sense.
engSearchText: Makes sense.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどな。

engChrName: So that's why you came all the way to Calvard? Because you couldn't give up?
engSearchText:
So that's why you came all the way to Calvard?
Because you couldn't give up?
jpnChrName: そう……だから心配で 共和国まで捜しに来たんですね？
jpnSearchText:
そう……だから心配で
共和国まで捜しに来たんですね？

engChrName: That's right. I left on my own and rode on buses and trains for the first time to get here.
engSearchText:
That's right. I left on my own and rode on buses and
trains for the first time to get here.
jpnChrName: ……はい、初めて一人で里を出て バスと鉄道を乗り継いで。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、初めて一人で里を出て
バスと鉄道を乗り継いで。

engChrName: We know that Aida's unit came through Calvard on their way home...
engSearchText:
We know that Aida's unit came through Calvard on
their way home...
jpnChrName: アイーダさんの中隊が共和国経由で 帰還したのは分かっていますから……
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんの中隊が共和国経由で
帰還したのは分かっていますから……

engChrName: ...so if they really have gone missing, the odds are they're somewhere in this country.
engSearchText:
...so if they really have gone missing, the odds are
they're somewhere in this country.
jpnChrName: 行方不明になったとすれば この国の可能性が高いと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
行方不明になったとすれば
この国の可能性が高いと思うんです。

engChrName: As for why I came to you, I've heard about you from the warriors in my village.
engSearchText:
As for why I came to you, I've heard about you from
the warriors in my village.
jpnChrName: その──ヴァン様の噂は 以前、里の戦士の人から聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
その──ヴァン様の噂は
以前、里の戦士の人から聞きました。

engChrName: They told me about a spriggan in Calvard's capital who was willing to lend an ear to even jaegers like us.
engSearchText:
They told me about a spriggan in Calvard's capital
who was willing to lend an ear to even jaegers like us.
jpnChrName: 共和国の首都に、《裏解決屋》っていう 猟兵の相談にも乗ってくれる人がいるって。
jpnSearchText:
共和国の首都に、《裏解決屋》っていう
猟兵の相談にも乗ってくれる人がいるって。

engChrName: This is a lump of argem.
engSearchText: This is a lump of argem.
jpnChrName: 銀耀石（アルジェム）の塊です。
jpnSearchText: 銀耀石（アルジェム）の塊です。

engChrName: Will this be enough to cover your fees for helping me find Aida?
engSearchText:
Will this be enough to cover your fees for helping me
find Aida?
jpnChrName: これでアイーダさんたちの行方を 捜してもらえないでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
これでアイーダさんたちの行方を
捜してもらえないでしょうか……？

engChrName: Ahh! Don't worry—I got this legitimately through a job.
engSearchText:
Ahh! Don't worry—I got this legitimately through
a job.
jpnChrName: あっ、一応戦士としての 報酬で受け取ったものです……！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、一応戦士としての
報酬で受け取ったものです……！

engChrName: But that's...
engSearchText: But that's...
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん……
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん……

engChrName: You kiddin' me? A lump that big could fetch around 100,000 mira, easy.
engSearchText:
You kiddin' me? A lump that big could fetch around
100,000 mira, easy.
jpnChrName: ハン……その大きさだと １０万ミラくらいになるか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……その大きさだと
１０万ミラくらいになるか。

engChrName: Well, we can talk money stuff later.
engSearchText: Well, we can talk money stuff later.
jpnChrName: ──そういうのは後でいい。
jpnSearchText: ──そういうのは後でいい。

engChrName: But just to be upfront, our rate's 1,000 mira an hour, excluding other necessary expenses.
engSearchText:
But just to be upfront, our rate's 1,000 mira an hour,
excluding other necessary expenses.
jpnChrName: ちなみにウチの基本料は １時間１０００ミラで諸経費だ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにウチの基本料は
１時間１０００ミラで諸経費だ。

engChrName: I'm not in the market for a hundred-hour job.
engSearchText: I'm not in the market for a hundred-hour job.
jpnChrName: 百時間も拘束されるつもりはねえぞ？
jpnSearchText: 百時間も拘束されるつもりはねえぞ？

engChrName: Wh-What do you...?
engSearchText: Wh-What do you...?
jpnSearchText: え、え……？

engChrName: Heehee. You don't have to make it sound like you're turning her down.
engSearchText:
Heehee. You don't have to make it sound like you're
turning her down.
jpnChrName: ふふ、素直じゃないんですから。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、素直じゃないんですから。

engChrName: You're still going to help her, aren't you?
engSearchText: You're still going to help her, aren't you?
jpnChrName: ──フェリちゃんの 力になってあげるんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
──フェリちゃんの
力になってあげるんですよね？

engChrName: Don't make it sound like an easy yes. This one seems like a little more trouble than we can afford to handle.
engSearchText:
Don't make it sound like an easy yes. This one seems
like a little more trouble than we can afford to handle.
jpnChrName: 決めつけるんじゃねえ。 正直、手に余りそうな案件だ。
jpnSearchText:
決めつけるんじゃねえ。
正直、手に余りそうな案件だ。

engChrName: Everything about it screams trouble, in fact.
engSearchText: Everything about it screams trouble, in fact.
jpnChrName: 高位猟兵団の部隊が消息不明…… ヤバイ匂いがプンプンしやがる。
jpnSearchText:
高位猟兵団の部隊が消息不明……
ヤバイ匂いがプンプンしやがる。

engChrName: And we still got your case to work on, too, so can't just drop everything for some far-off pl—
engSearchText:
And we still got your case to work on, too, so can't
just drop everything for some far-off pl—
jpnChrName: お前の曾祖父さんの件もある以上、 首都を離れるわけにも──
jpnSearchText:
お前の曾祖父さんの件もある以上、
首都を離れるわけにも──

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?

engChrName: Huh? Your bag is glowing.
engSearchText: Huh? Your bag is glowing.
jpnChrName: ……？　それって……
jpnSearchText: ……？　それって……

engChrName: Great timing...
engSearchText: Great timing...
jpnChrName: おいおい……
jpnSearchText: おいおい……

engChrName: ...My great-grandfather wrote that the Eight Geneses are drawn to one another.
engSearchText:
...My great-grandfather wrote that the Eight Geneses
are drawn to one another.
jpnChrName: ……曾祖父の手記によれば、８つの 《ゲネシス》はお互い惹かれ合うそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……曾祖父の手記によれば、８つの
《ゲネシス》はお互い惹かれ合うそうです。

engChrName: This is the first time I've seen it react this way—and that it just happened to do so now...
engSearchText:
This is the first time I've seen it react this way—and
that it just happened to do so now...
jpnChrName: 今まで何の反応もなくて、フェリちゃんの話を 聞いたら光り出したということは……
jpnSearchText:
今まで何の反応もなくて、フェリちゃんの話を
聞いたら光り出したということは……

engChrName: Bah. Wish I could chalk it up to superstitious bull, but...
engSearchText:
Bah. Wish I could chalk it up to superstitious
bull, but...
jpnChrName: チッ、オカルト── ともあながち言えねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、オカルト──
ともあながち言えねぇか。

engChrName: I'm...not sure what's going on. It's really pretty, but what is it?
engSearchText:
I'm...not sure what's going on. It's really pretty, but
what is it?
jpnChrName: ？？？　あの…… その綺麗な装置が一体……？
jpnSearchText:
？？？　あの……
その綺麗な装置が一体……？

engChrName: It's a memento of my great-grandfather that has a special power.
engSearchText:
It's a memento of my great-grandfather that has a
special power.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私のひいお祖父ちゃんの遺品で ちょっと不思議な力を持っているんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私のひいお祖父ちゃんの遺品で
ちょっと不思議な力を持っているんです。

engChrName: And it just might help us find Aida.
engSearchText: And it just might help us find Aida.
jpnChrName: ひょっとしたらアイーダさんたちを 捜す手がかりになるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとしたらアイーダさんたちを
捜す手がかりになるかもしれません。

engChrName: Y-You really think so?!
engSearchText: Y-You really think so?!
jpnChrName: ！　ほ、本当ですか……！？
jpnSearchText: ！　ほ、本当ですか……！？

engChrName: Easy, there!
engSearchText: Easy, there!
jpnChrName: だから先走んじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText: だから先走んじゃねえ！

engChrName: I'm not gonna commit to the job just yet. First, I need a better hold on the overall situation.
engSearchText:
I'm not gonna commit to the job just yet. First, I need
a better hold on the overall situation.
jpnChrName: ──引き受けるかはともかく、 まずは状況整理をする。
jpnSearchText:
──引き受けるかはともかく、
まずは状況整理をする。

engChrName: Can you help fill in some gaps for us?
engSearchText: Can you help fill in some gaps for us?
jpnChrName: もう少し詳しく話せや、依頼人。
jpnSearchText: もう少し詳しく話せや、依頼人。

engChrName: Oh... Yeah! Of course I can!
engSearchText: Oh... Yeah! Of course I can!
jpnChrName: あ── はいっ、ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText:
あ──
はいっ、ありがとうございます！

engChrName: While this certainly is a lot of useful information...
engSearchText: While this certainly is a lot of useful information...
jpnChrName: ──有力な情報が 幾つか入ってきましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
──有力な情報が
幾つか入ってきましたけど……

engChrName: ...it's all so fragmented that it doesn't feel like it will bring us much closer to finding what we're looking for.
engSearchText:
...it's all so fragmented that it doesn't feel like it will
bring us much closer to finding what we're
looking for.
jpnChrName: どれも断片的すぎて 決め手にはならなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
どれも断片的すぎて
決め手にはならなさそうですね。

engChrName: Unfortunately...
engSearchText: Unfortunately...

engChrName: I feel like it's only just starting to set in how big this country is.
engSearchText:
I feel like it's only just starting to set in how big this
country is.
jpnChrName: その、共和国って こんなに大きい国なんですね。
jpnSearchText:
その、共和国って
こんなに大きい国なんですね。

engChrName: I knew it was big from looking at maps, but that didn't tell me just how many groups and forces were at work.
engSearchText:
I knew it was big from looking at maps, but that
didn't tell me just how many groups and forces were
at work.
jpnChrName: 地図では分かっていましたけど 組織とか勢力も色々ありすぎて……
jpnSearchText:
地図では分かっていましたけど
組織とか勢力も色々ありすぎて……

engChrName: Well, it's not one of the two big powerhouses of the continent for nothin'. Hell, it takes the number one spot now.
engSearchText:
Well, it's not one of the two big powerhouses of the
continent for nothin'. Hell, it takes the number one
spot now.
jpnChrName: 腐っても二大国の一つ── いや、今となっては単独首位か。
jpnSearchText:
腐っても二大国の一つ──
いや、今となっては単独首位か。

engChrName: We got plenty of corps of our own based here.
engSearchText: We got plenty of corps of our own based here.
jpnChrName: クルガやアイゼンシルト以外にも 入り込んでいる猟兵団は多い。
jpnSearchText:
クルガやアイゼンシルト以外にも
入り込んでいる猟兵団は多い。

engChrName: Then we got syndicates, mafias, and other shady groups and spies from abroad lurking around every corner.
engSearchText:
Then we got syndicates, mafias, and other shady
groups and spies from abroad lurking around
every corner.
jpnChrName: もちろんシンジケートにマフィア、 怪しげな結社に他国のスパイなんかもな。
jpnSearchText:
もちろんシンジケートにマフィア、
怪しげな結社に他国のスパイなんかもな。

engChrName: I guess Aida would've had to conceal her identity while passing through here.
engSearchText:
I guess Aida would've had to conceal her identity
while passing through here.
jpnChrName: ……多分、アイーダさんたちも 身分を偽装して移動したと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……多分、アイーダさんたちも
身分を偽装して移動したと思います。

engChrName: Which will make it even more difficult to find her...
engSearchText: Which will make it even more difficult to find her...
jpnChrName: だとしたら簡単に足取りは………
jpnSearchText: だとしたら簡単に足取りは………

engChrName: Don't worry! Van's the perfect man for the job!
engSearchText: Don't worry! Van's the perfect man for the job!
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫ですよ、ヴァンさんなら！
jpnSearchText: だ、大丈夫ですよ、ヴァンさんなら！

engChrName: He has all kinds of shady connections on call around here. ...Don't you?
engSearchText:
He has all kinds of shady connections on call
around here. ...Don't you?
jpnChrName: 色々と怪しげなコネもありますし、 ………ですよね？
jpnSearchText:
色々と怪しげなコネもありますし、
………ですよね？

engChrName: Just all kindsa fine blurtin' that out now, huh...?
engSearchText: Just all kindsa fine blurtin' that out now, huh...?
jpnChrName: ったく、遠慮が無くなってきたな。 まあ否定はしないけどよ──
jpnSearchText:
ったく、遠慮が無くなってきたな。
まあ否定はしないけどよ──

engChrName: Well, hello, Van. I've been expecting your call.
engSearchText: Well, hello, Van. I've been expecting your call.
jpnChrName: ──ヴァンか。 そろそろ掛けてくると思ったぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──ヴァンか。
そろそろ掛けてくると思ったぞ。

engChrName: (That sounds like...)
engSearchText: (That sounds like...)
jpnChrName: （この声って……）
jpnSearchText: （この声って……）

engChrName: Bah. Was a 50-50 chance it was you.
engSearchText: Bah. Was a 50-50 chance it was you.
jpnChrName: チッ、五分五分かと思ったが。
jpnSearchText: チッ、五分五分かと思ったが。

engChrName: You know exactly who my next client is, then, huh?
engSearchText: You know exactly who my next client is, then, huh?
jpnChrName: ──どうやらウチの依頼人についても 掴んでるみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
──どうやらウチの依頼人についても
掴んでるみたいだな？

engChrName: Indeed. Ferida Al-Fayed, daughter of the Warriors of Kruga's vice chief.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Ferida Al-Fayed, daughter of the Warriors of
Kruga's vice chief.
jpnChrName: ああ、《クルガ戦士団》ハサン副頭目の娘、 フェリーダ・アルファイド。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《クルガ戦士団》ハサン副頭目の娘、
フェリーダ・アルファイド。

engChrName: I also know she wants your help in finding a missing jaeger corps.
engSearchText:
I also know she wants your help in finding a missing
jaeger corps.
jpnChrName: 《アイゼンシルト》中隊の捜索依頼だな？
jpnSearchText: 《アイゼンシルト》中隊の捜索依頼だな？

engChrName: H-How do you...?
engSearchText: H-How do you...?
jpnChrName: ど、どうして……
jpnSearchText: ど、どうして……

engChrName: I'm gonna say they've been on her ever since she arrived in the capital. The CID's database isn't just for show.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna say they've been on her ever since she
arrived in the capital. The CID's database isn't just
for show.
jpnChrName: 首都に来た時点で捕捉されたんだろう。 あとはＣＩＤのデータベースってな。
jpnSearchText:
首都に来た時点で捕捉されたんだろう。
あとはＣＩＤのデータベースってな。

engChrName: But if you know exactly what she's here for...
engSearchText: But if you know exactly what she's here for...
jpnChrName: しかし依頼まで 具体的に把握してるってことは──
jpnSearchText:
しかし依頼まで
具体的に把握してるってことは──

engChrName: ...then you probably played a part in why the corps has gone AWOL, right?
engSearchText:
...then you probably played a part in why the corps
has gone AWOL, right?
jpnChrName: アイゼンシルト中隊の消息不明。 ＣＩＤ（オマエら）も噛んでやがるな？
jpnSearchText:
アイゼンシルト中隊の消息不明。
ＣＩＤ（オマエら）も噛んでやがるな？

engChrName: Is that really true...?
engSearchText: Is that really true...?
jpnChrName: そ、そういう事ですか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そういう事ですか……

engChrName: I'd be lying if I said it isn't.
engSearchText: I'd be lying if I said it isn't.
jpnChrName: ああ──１０日ほど前の話だ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ああ──１０日ほど前の話だ。

engChrName: We caught wind of their movements ten days ago on their way back to the free cities via Calvard.
engSearchText:
We caught wind of their movements ten days ago on
their way back to the free cities via Calvard.
jpnChrName: カルバード国内を経由して、自由都市圏に 帰還するアイゼンシルト中隊を捕捉した。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード国内を経由して、自由都市圏に
帰還するアイゼンシルト中隊を捕捉した。

engChrName: As you well know, there are no laws that prohibit jaeger corps from entering or leaving the country.
engSearchText:
As you well know, there are no laws that prohibit
jaeger corps from entering or leaving the country.
jpnChrName: 知っての通り猟兵団の立入については 共和国では原則、禁じられてはいない。
jpnSearchText:
知っての通り猟兵団の立入については
共和国では原則、禁じられてはいない。

engChrName: However, we in the CID make it our business to know exactly what each corps is doing while here.
engSearchText:
However, we in the CID make it our business to
know exactly what each corps is doing while here.
jpnChrName: だが当然、ＣＩＤは全ての団の動向を 捕捉・把握できるように努めている。
jpnSearchText:
だが当然、ＣＩＤは全ての団の動向を
捕捉・把握できるように努めている。

engChrName: We also take advantage of particularly capable units to 'train' our own Special Ops division from time to time.
engSearchText:
We also take advantage of particularly capable units
to 'train' our own Special Ops division from time
to time.
jpnChrName: そして稀に──特に有能な部隊には 特務部隊の訓練相手を務めてもらっていてな。
jpnSearchText:
そして稀に──特に有能な部隊には
特務部隊の訓練相手を務めてもらっていてな。

jpnChrName: ！？　それって……
jpnSearchText: ！？　それって……

engChrName: S-Special Ops division?
engSearchText: S-Special Ops division?
jpnChrName: と、特務部隊……？
jpnSearchText: と、特務部隊……？

engChrName: Hercules, right?
engSearchText: Hercules, right?
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの特務部隊── 《ハーキュリーズ》か。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤの特務部隊──
《ハーキュリーズ》か。

engChrName: Heard it was given a serious overhaul after its screwup against the Empire a couple years back.
engSearchText:
Heard it was given a serious overhaul after its screwup
against the Empire a couple years back.
jpnChrName: ２年前に帝国相手にヘマをやらかして テコ入れされてるって話だが。
jpnSearchText:
２年前に帝国相手にヘマをやらかして
テコ入れされてるって話だが。

engChrName: The capabilities of each individual unit differ greatly even now, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
The capabilities of each individual unit differ greatly
even now, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: 正直、練度は部隊ごとにピンキリだ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>正直、練度は部隊ごとにピンキリだ。

engChrName: All this is to say, we set one of the more promising units against Aida the Flameeater and her corps.
engSearchText:
All this is to say, we set one of the more promising
units against Aida the Flameeater and her corps.
jpnChrName: それなりに見込みのある部隊を、 《火喰鳥（ひくいどり）》アイーダの中隊にぶつけた。
jpnSearchText:
それなりに見込みのある部隊を、
《火喰鳥（ひくいどり）》アイーダの中隊にぶつけた。

engChrName: I would note that the goal of this operation was to merely encircle her unit—not to engage in combat.
engSearchText:
I would note that the goal of this operation was to
merely encircle her unit—not to engage in combat.
jpnChrName: といっても交戦抜きの捕捉包囲作戦──
jpnSearchText: <C1>といっても交戦抜きの捕捉包囲作戦──

engChrName: And while the operation started off on the right foot, she managed to break through our lines and escape.
engSearchText:
And while the operation started off on the right foot,
she managed to break through our lines and escape.
jpnChrName: 良い所までは持って行けたが 最後は突破されてロストに終わった。
jpnSearchText:
良い所までは持って行けたが
最後は突破されてロストに終わった。

engChrName: I can't say the news came as any surprise to me, knowing the corps she was in before.
engSearchText:
I can't say the news came as any surprise to me,
knowing the corps she was in before.
jpnChrName: 流石は《火喰鳥》── かの団出身のエースといった所か。
jpnSearchText:
流石は《火喰鳥》──
かの団出身のエースといった所か。

engChrName: Heh. Yeah, I've heard the rumors.
engSearchText: Heh. Yeah, I've heard the rumors.
jpnChrName: ハン……噂は聞いてたが。
jpnSearchText: ハン……噂は聞いてたが。

engChrName: Still, this was all ten days ago? I understand the initial trouble that happened, but...
engSearchText:
Still, this was all ten days ago? I understand the initial
trouble that happened, but...
jpnChrName: 少し混乱しましたけど…… それが１０日ほど前の話、ですか。
jpnSearchText:
少し混乱しましたけど……
それが１０日ほど前の話、ですか。

engChrName: She hasn't been captured since then, has she?
engSearchText: She hasn't been captured since then, has she?
jpnChrName: そ、それじゃあアイーダさんたち、 捕まったわけじゃないんですねっ……？
jpnSearchText:
そ、それじゃあアイーダさんたち、
捕まったわけじゃないんですねっ……？

engChrName: That is correct. I'll send you our data on where we cornered her, but beyond that, I've told you all that I know.
engSearchText:
That is correct. I'll send you our data on where we
cornered her, but beyond that, I've told you all that
I know.
jpnChrName: ああ、私が掴んでいるのはここまでだ。 捕捉地点のデータも送ってやろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、私が掴んでいるのはここまでだ。
捕捉地点のデータも送ってやろう。

engChrName: Consider this my way of repaying my debt to you from the other day. I leave the rest to you.
engSearchText:
Consider this my way of repaying my debt to you
from the other day. I leave the rest to you.
jpnChrName: ──先日の借りの代わりだ。 あとは自分たちで突き止めるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
──先日の借りの代わりだ。
あとは自分たちで突き止めるがいい。

engChrName: H-Hey! Don't hang up on—
engSearchText: H-Hey! Don't hang up on—
jpnChrName: あ、おいコラ……！
jpnSearchText: あ、おいコラ……！

engChrName: Come on... They just HAD to stick their fingers in this pie, huh?
engSearchText:
Come on... They just HAD to stick their fingers in
this pie, huh?
jpnChrName: クソ、てめえの所が 間接的な原因だったんじゃねーか！
jpnSearchText:
クソ、てめえの所が
間接的な原因だったんじゃねーか！

engChrName: So it seems...
engSearchText: So it seems...
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりそういう事、ですよね。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱりそういう事、ですよね。

engChrName: The CID is Calvard's intelligence division, right?
engSearchText: The CID is Calvard's intelligence division, right?
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤ……えっとたしか 共和国の諜報組織、ですよね？
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤ……えっとたしか
共和国の諜報組織、ですよね？

engChrName: So even they couldn't catch her... Heehee. She's so awesome.
engSearchText:
So even they couldn't catch her... Heehee. She's
so awesome.
jpnChrName: えへへ、流石はアイーダさん。 そんな人たちを躱（かわ）しちゃうなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、流石はアイーダさん。
そんな人たちを躱（かわ）しちゃうなんて……！

engChrName: Way to think positive, kiddo.
engSearchText: Way to think positive, kiddo.
jpnChrName: まあ、前向きなのは結構だ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、前向きなのは結構だ。

engChrName: Well, I feel like we can narrow down where she could be now. Let's review what we've got so far again.
engSearchText:
Well, I feel like we can narrow down where she could
be now. Let's review what we've got so far again.
jpnChrName: ──色々と絞り込めてきたな。 もう一度整理して俯瞰してみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──色々と絞り込めてきたな。
もう一度整理して俯瞰してみるぞ。

engChrName: This should do it.
engSearchText: This should do it.
jpnChrName: ──こんな所か。
jpnSearchText: ──こんな所か。

engChrName: This is where the CID tried and failed to corner Aida's corps.
engSearchText:
This is where the CID tried and failed to corner
Aida's corps.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの部隊がアイーダ中隊を捕捉、 取り逃した地点はここだ。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤの部隊がアイーダ中隊を捕捉、
取り逃した地点はここだ。

engChrName: After we eliminate where the CID's unit was, we can narrow down their escape route to three possible locations.
engSearchText:
After we eliminate where the CID's unit was, we can
narrow down their escape route to three
possible locations.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤのバックアップの配置状況から 離脱した可能性があるのは以下の３つ。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤのバックアップの配置状況から
離脱した可能性があるのは以下の３つ。

engChrName: Which one do you think is the most likely?
engSearchText: Which one do you think is the most likely?
jpnChrName: 依頼人、アニエスも。 どのルートが臭いと思う？
jpnSearchText:
依頼人、アニエスも。
どのルートが臭いと思う？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: えっと…… （可能性があるとしたら……）
jpnSearchText:
えっと……
（可能性があるとしたら……）

engChrName: With the surrounding terrain and villages, I think they returned via...
engSearchText:
With the surrounding terrain and villages, I think
they returned via...
jpnChrName: ………周辺地形や 集落の分布を考えると……
jpnSearchText:
………周辺地形や
集落の分布を考えると……

engChrName: Can't see 'em taking a direct route with the CID hot on their tail.
engSearchText:
Can't see 'em taking a direct route with the CID hot
on their tail.
jpnChrName: 流石にマークされてる状態じゃ 裏の裏で直通ルートは取らねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
流石にマークされてる状態じゃ
裏の裏で直通ルートは取らねぇだろ。

engChrName: Any other day I'd consider Messeldam, but it's got too many eyes on it after that bomb threat last month.
engSearchText:
Any other day I'd consider Messeldam, but it's got
too many eyes on it after that bomb threat last month.
jpnChrName: かといってメッセルダム港は先月から 爆破予告もあって注目されていた。
jpnSearchText:
かといってメッセルダム港は先月から
爆破予告もあって注目されていた。

engChrName: Any other day I'd consider Messeldam, but it's got too many eyes on it after that bomb threat last month.
engSearchText:
Any other day I'd consider Messeldam, but it's got
too many eyes on it after that bomb threat last month.
jpnChrName: 通常ならアリだが、メッセルダム港は 先月から爆破予告もあって注目されていた。
jpnSearchText:
通常ならアリだが、メッセルダム港は
先月から爆破予告もあって注目されていた。

engChrName: Can't see 'em taking a direct route with the CID hot on their tail.
engSearchText:
Can't see 'em taking a direct route with the CID hot
on their tail.
jpnChrName: かといって裏の裏で直通ルートってのも マークされてる状態だと考えにくい。
jpnSearchText:
かといって裏の裏で直通ルートってのも
マークされてる状態だと考えにくい。

engChrName: Nice thinkin'.
engSearchText: Nice thinkin'.
jpnChrName: イイ読みをしてんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: イイ読みをしてんじゃねえか。

engChrName: This route will open up two—even four times the options to get back home.
engSearchText:
This route will open up two—even four times the
options to get back home.
jpnChrName: こっちのルートなら帰還の選択肢が ２倍、いや４倍に増やせる。
jpnSearchText:
こっちのルートなら帰還の選択肢が
２倍、いや４倍に増やせる。

engChrName: Plus it makes sense they'd wanna go through another country to get the CID off their back.
engSearchText:
Plus it makes sense they'd wanna go through another
country to get the CID off their back.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤのマークを外す意味で いったん外国を挟むのも有効だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤのマークを外す意味で
いったん外国を挟むのも有効だろう。

engChrName: Now, if they took this route here, they most likely stopped off at...
engSearchText:
Now, if they took this route here, they most likely
stopped off at...
jpnChrName: となると立ち寄ってそうなのが──
jpnSearchText: となると立ち寄ってそうなのが──

engChrName: Creil Village... Oh, hey!
engSearchText: Creil Village... Oh, hey!
jpnChrName: Creil Village（クレイユ村）──あ。
jpnSearchText: Creil Village（クレイユ村）──あ。

engChrName: It's a farming village to the northwest known for its gorgeous rustic scenery.
engSearchText:
It's a farming village to the northwest known for its
gorgeous rustic scenery.
jpnChrName: 北西部に位置する、 田園風景でも有名な農村ですね。
jpnSearchText:
北西部に位置する、
田園風景でも有名な農村ですね。

engChrName: I've never been there myself, but it sounds like it rings a bell for you, Feri.
engSearchText:
I've never been there myself, but it sounds like it rings
a bell for you, Feri.
jpnChrName: 行ったことはありませんけど…… フェリちゃん、何か心あたりが？
jpnSearchText:
行ったことはありませんけど……
フェリちゃん、何か心あたりが？

engChrName: It does. Aida's told me about it before.
engSearchText: It does. Aida's told me about it before.
jpnChrName: …………はい。 アイーダさんから聞いたことが。
jpnSearchText:
…………はい。
アイーダさんから聞いたことが。

engChrName: She said that public transportation is well built there even though it's so rural, so it's a good spot to resupply...
engSearchText:
She said that public transportation is well built there
even though it's so rural, so it's a good spot
to resupply...
jpnChrName: 田舎だけど交通の便がよくて 補給なんかもしやすくて……
jpnSearchText:
田舎だけど交通の便がよくて
補給なんかもしやすくて……

engChrName: ...and that I should come visit since the scenery is so pretty and the food's so good.
engSearchText:
...and that I should come visit since the scenery is so
pretty and the food's so good.
jpnChrName: とっても綺麗でご飯も美味しい、 いつか遊びに行くといい村だって……
jpnSearchText:
とっても綺麗でご飯も美味しい、
いつか遊びに行くといい村だって……

engChrName: I see... Oh!
engSearchText: I see... Oh!
jpnChrName: そうですか……あ。
jpnSearchText: そうですか……<w1000>あ。

engChrName: Think that settles it.
engSearchText: Think that settles it.
jpnChrName: ──決まりだな、依頼人。
jpnSearchText: ──決まりだな、依頼人。

engChrName: Tomorrow morning, we make for Creil. I can almost bet we'll find somethin' there.
engSearchText:
Tomorrow morning, we make for Creil. I can almost
bet we'll find somethin' there.
jpnChrName: 明日の朝、クレイユ村に向かう。 何か手がかりがある筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
明日の朝、クレイユ村に向かう。
何か手がかりがある筈だ。

engChrName: You can stay up in the third floor for tonight. I'll give a heads up to our landlords.
engSearchText:
You can stay up in the third floor for tonight. I'll give
a heads up to our landlords.
jpnChrName: 大家とは話を付けておく。 今夜は３階の部屋に泊まっていけ──
jpnSearchText:
大家とは話を付けておく。
今夜は３階の部屋に泊まっていけ──

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: September 7th, 6:04AM
engSearchText: September 7th, 6:04AM

engChrName: Wow!
engSearchText: Wow!
jpnChrName: わぁ……！
jpnSearchText: わぁ……！

engChrName: Your truck is huge!
engSearchText: Your truck is huge!
jpnChrName: 大きな車、ですね……！
jpnSearchText: 大きな車、ですね……！

engChrName: Oh, yeah. She's a big girl.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. She's a big girl.
jpnChrName: まあ、な。
jpnSearchText: まあ、な。

engChrName: 1204 Ingert Nightbreaker Pickup Truck
engSearchText: 1204 Ingert Nightbreaker Pickup Truck
jpnChrName: インゲルト社製ピックアップトラック 《ナイトブレイカー》1204年モデル
jpnSearchText:
インゲルト社製ピックアップトラック
《ナイトブレイカー》1204年モデル

engChrName: Of the four big car manufacturers in Calvard, Ingert's got the best rep when it comes to sports cars.
engSearchText:
Of the four big car manufacturers in Calvard, Ingert's
got the best rep when it comes to sports cars.
jpnChrName: 四大導力車ライセンシーの中でも スポーツを得意とする《インゲルト》──
jpnSearchText:
四大導力車ライセンシーの中でも
スポーツを得意とする《インゲルト》──

engChrName: This here's the best one they ever made—and I went ham tunin' her up even further.
engSearchText:
This here's the best one they ever made—and I went
ham tunin' her up even further.
jpnChrName: その傑作ピックアップトラックを 俺なりにカスタムチューンしててな。
jpnSearchText:
その傑作ピックアップトラックを
俺なりにカスタムチューンしててな。

engChrName: You can see what I mean at the front and in the suspension system where I've—
engSearchText:
You can see what I mean at the front and in the
suspension system where I've—
jpnChrName: 特にフロントと足回りを……
jpnSearchText: 特にフロントと足回りを……

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: I can't follow a word you're saying, but it sure looks nice!
engSearchText:
I can't follow a word you're saying, but it sure
looks nice!
jpnChrName: ……？ すごい車なんですねっ……！
jpnSearchText:
……？
すごい車なんですねっ……！

engChrName: *sigh* Should've known you wouldn't be able to appreciate a man's one true love.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Should've known you wouldn't be able to
appreciate a man's one true love.
jpnChrName: ……いいもんいいもん。 男のロマンが理解されなくたって。
jpnSearchText:
……いいもんいいもん。
男のロマンが理解されなくたって。

engChrName: You wanna tell me why women only wanna date guys with rides but don't wanna hear a word ABOUT said rides? Man...
engSearchText:
You wanna tell me why women only wanna date guys
with rides but don't wanna hear a word ABOUT
said rides? Man...
jpnChrName: 大体女っつーのは、車がマストのクセに 車種や馬力には見向きもしねぇしよ……
jpnSearchText:
大体女っつーのは、車がマストのクセに
車種や馬力には見向きもしねぇしよ……

engChrName: Careful painting all women with that excessively large brush you've got there...
engSearchText:
Careful painting all women with that excessively large
brush you've got there...
jpnChrName: えっと、そういう女性だけじゃ ないとは思いますけど……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、そういう女性だけじゃ
ないとは思いますけど……

engChrName: (Even if it's true that I don't care about cars at all.)
engSearchText: (Even if it's true that I don't care about cars at all.)
jpnChrName: （でも確かにどうでもいいかも……）
jpnSearchText: （でも確かにどうでもいいかも……）

engChrName: Well, whatever 'tuning' is, I'm sure it's made your truck look very cool.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever 'tuning' is, I'm sure it's made your
truck look very cool.
jpnChrName: あの、カッコイイとは思いますっ！ チューン？はよく分かりませんけど……！
jpnSearchText:
あの、カッコイイとは思いますっ！
チューン？はよく分かりませんけど……！

engChrName: Ugh... Just get in and be quiet before you make me cry!
engSearchText:
Ugh... Just get in and be quiet before you make
me cry!
jpnChrName: グッ……もういい、 ２人ともとっとと乗りやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
グッ……もういい、
２人ともとっとと乗りやがれ！

engChrName: What's all this whining first thing in the morning?
engSearchText: What's all this whining first thing in the morning?
jpnChrName: ──朝っぱらから 何をグチグチ言ってやがる。
jpnSearchText:
──朝っぱらから
何をグチグチ言ってやがる。

engChrName: Oh! You're the kind people who gave me food yesterday!
engSearchText:
Oh! You're the kind people who gave me
food yesterday!
jpnChrName: あ、昨日ご馳走になった……
jpnSearchText: あ、昨日ご馳走になった……

engChrName: Hey, guys.
engSearchText: Hey, guys.
jpnChrName: おやっさん…… ポーレットにユメも。
jpnSearchText:
おやっさん……
ポーレットにユメも。

engChrName: Did you really come all the way out here just to see us off?
engSearchText:
Did you really come all the way out here just to see
us off?
jpnChrName: ひょ、ひょっとして見送りに 来て下さったんですか……！？
jpnSearchText:
ひょ、ひょっとして見送りに
来て下さったんですか……！？

engChrName: Mmm... Yeah...
engSearchText: Mmm... Yeah...
jpnChrName: ……むにゅ～…… そ～だよアニエスちゃあん……
jpnSearchText:
……むにゅ～……
そ～だよアニエスちゃあん……

engChrName: Mostly for Agnès and Feri, but...Van, too, I guess.
engSearchText: Mostly for Agnès and Feri, but...Van, too, I guess.
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんも…… ………ヴァンはついでに～……
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんも……
………ヴァンはついでに～……

engChrName: Aww...
engSearchText: Aww...

engChrName: I heard that.
engSearchText: I heard that.
jpnChrName: ってオイ。
jpnSearchText: ってオイ。

engChrName: We also wanted to bring you this.
engSearchText: We also wanted to bring you this.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、それとこれ、 持っていってちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、それとこれ、
持っていってちょうだい。

engChrName: It's got sandwiches, milk, and coffee. I'm sure you haven't had much time for breakfast this morning.
engSearchText:
It's got sandwiches, milk, and coffee. I'm sure you
haven't had much time for breakfast this morning.
jpnChrName: サンドイッチにミルクにコーヒー。 モーニング代わりにどうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
サンドイッチにミルクにコーヒー。
モーニング代わりにどうぞ。

engChrName: Nice. Thanks.
engSearchText: Nice. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そいつはすまねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そいつはすまねぇな。

engChrName: Oh, you really shouldn't have... Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Oh, you really shouldn't have... Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: あ、ありがとうございます！ わざわざこんな──
jpnSearchText:
あ、ありがとうございます！
わざわざこんな──

engChrName: And after you did so much for me yesterday, too...
engSearchText: And after you did so much for me yesterday, too...
jpnChrName: え、えと…… その、ご馳走になりますっ……！
jpnSearchText:
え、えと……
その、ご馳走になりますっ……！

engChrName: I really don't know how to thank you.
engSearchText: I really don't know how to thank you.
jpnChrName: 昨日もお世話になって…… なんてお礼を言ったらいいか。
jpnSearchText:
昨日もお世話になって……
なんてお礼を言ったらいいか。

engChrName: Heehee. Oh, think nothing of it. Making a guest feel welcome is what a good host does.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Oh, think nothing of it. Making a guest feel
welcome is what a good host does.
jpnChrName: ふふ、いいのよ。 お客さんをもてなすのは当然だから。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いいのよ。
お客さんをもてなすのは当然だから。

engChrName: You would do the same in your home, too, wouldn't you?
engSearchText:
You would do the same in your home, too,
wouldn't you?
jpnChrName: 貴女の故郷だってそうでしょう？
jpnSearchText: 貴女の故郷だってそうでしょう？

engChrName: O-Of course.
engSearchText: O-Of course.
jpnChrName: あ………（コクン）
jpnSearchText: あ………（コクン）

engChrName: Kids your age gotta eat a lot to grow up big and strong.
engSearchText:
Kids your age gotta eat a lot to grow up big
and strong.
jpnChrName: ハン、お前さんみたいなチビッ子は よく寝て良く食べるのが一番だ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、お前さんみたいなチビッ子は
よく寝て良く食べるのが一番だ。

engChrName: Keep an eye on them both, all right, Van?
engSearchText: Keep an eye on them both, all right, Van?
jpnChrName: ──ヴァン、お嬢ちゃんたちに くれぐれも危ないことが無いようにな。
jpnSearchText:
──ヴァン、お嬢ちゃんたちに
くれぐれも危ないことが無いようにな。

engChrName: Will do. And thanks for comin' to see us off, Yumes.
engSearchText: Will do. And thanks for comin' to see us off, Yumes.
jpnChrName: わーってるっての。 ユメも見送りありがとうな。
jpnSearchText:
わーってるっての。
ユメも見送りありがとうな。

engChrName: Heehee. Have a safe trip...!
engSearchText: Heehee. Have a safe trip...!
jpnChrName: えへへ～…… ……いってらっしゃ～い……！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ～……
……いってらっしゃ～い……！

engChrName: Several days later...
engSearchText: Several days later...
jpnChrName: 数日後──
jpnSearchText: 数日後──

engChrName: September 12th, 1208, 4:00PM
engSearchText: September 12th, 1208, 4:00PM

engChrName: Neither of them have reacted since that day.
engSearchText: Neither of them have reacted since that day.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりあれから 特に反応はありませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱりあれから
特に反応はありませんでした。

engChrName: There's obviously some kinda trigger, but I just can't put my finger on what.
engSearchText:
There's obviously some kinda trigger, but I just can't
put my finger on what.
jpnChrName: ──まあ、間違いなく 何らかのトリガーがあるんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──まあ、間違いなく
何らかのトリガーがあるんだろう。

engChrName: One thing's clear, though: that red Genesis caused all those jaegers to turn into ghouls.
engSearchText:
One thing's clear, though: that red Genesis caused all
those jaegers to turn into ghouls.
jpnChrName: 今回の《火喰鳥》たちの屍鬼化…… それを起こしたのは間違いなくそいつだ。
jpnSearchText:
今回の《火喰鳥》たちの屍鬼化……
それを起こしたのは間違いなくそいつだ。

engChrName: You said they were designed for researching biological activity, yeah?
engSearchText:
You said they were designed for researching
biological activity, yeah?
jpnChrName: たしか“生命活動”に 関係する実験装置って話だったか？
jpnSearchText:
たしか“生命活動”に
関係する実験装置って話だったか？

engChrName: Yes. That's what was written in the diaries, anyway.
engSearchText: Yes. That's what was written in the diaries, anyway.
jpnChrName: はい……曾祖父の手記によれば。
jpnSearchText: はい……曾祖父の手記によれば。

engChrName: Supposedly, they were used in the development of recovery arts like Tear.
engSearchText:
Supposedly, they were used in the development of
recovery arts like Tear.
jpnChrName: “ティア”みたいな回復アーツの 開発に貢献したみたいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
“ティア”みたいな回復アーツの
開発に貢献したみたいですけど……

engChrName: Maybe they somehow turned that ability on its head in this case.
engSearchText:
Maybe they somehow turned that ability on its head
in this case.
jpnChrName: その機能を何らかの方法で “反転”させたのかは知らねえが……
jpnSearchText:
その機能を何らかの方法で
“反転”させたのかは知らねえが……

engChrName: Either way, we can't take these things lightly.
engSearchText: Either way, we can't take these things lightly.
jpnChrName: 改めてヤバイ代物みたいだな。 お前の曾祖父さんの遺産ってのは。
jpnSearchText:
改めてヤバイ代物みたいだな。
お前の曾祖父さんの遺産ってのは。

engChrName: Agreed...
engSearchText: Agreed...
jpnSearchText: ………はい……………

engChrName: I never imagined they would be abused like this...and by the mafia of all people.
engSearchText:
I never imagined they would be abused like this...and
by the mafia of all people.
jpnChrName: しかもそれをマフィアの人たちが あんな形で悪用していたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
しかもそれをマフィアの人たちが
あんな形で悪用していたなんて……

engChrName: All the Geneses did was bring pain and suffering to Feri and Aida...
engSearchText:
All the Geneses did was bring pain and suffering to
Feri and Aida...
jpnChrName: ……そのせいでフェリちゃんと アイーダさんにあんな想いをさせて……
jpnSearchText:
……そのせいでフェリちゃんと
アイーダさんにあんな想いをさせて……

engChrName: I mean, that's not completely true—the one you held on to pretty much saved our asses.
engSearchText:
I mean, that's not completely true—the one you held
on to pretty much saved our asses.
jpnChrName: ただ、お前が持ってたゲネシスが ２番目のヤツを“抑えた”のも確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、お前が持ってたゲネシスが
２番目のヤツを“抑えた”のも確かだ。

engChrName: It's the thing that suppressed the red Genesis. If that didn't happen, we would've been royally screwed.
engSearchText:
It's the thing that suppressed the red Genesis. If that
didn't happen, we would've been royally screwed.
jpnChrName: ヤバイ状況だったがあの不思議現象で 一発逆転にも繋がったし……
jpnSearchText:
ヤバイ状況だったがあの不思議現象で
一発逆転にも繋がったし……

engChrName: And with two Geneses in our hands, that's two less for any evil bastards who wanna get thier greasy hands on 'em.
engSearchText:
And with two Geneses in our hands, that's two less
for any evil bastards who wanna get thier greasy
hands on 'em.
jpnChrName: これ以上の悪用を防いだって意味でも 回収した甲斐はあっただろう。
jpnSearchText:
これ以上の悪用を防いだって意味でも
回収した甲斐はあっただろう。

engChrName: Now's not the time to throw in the towel. The fight hasn't even begun.
engSearchText:
Now's not the time to throw in the towel. The fight
hasn't even begun.
jpnChrName: ──何よりもどうせ、 今後も退くつもりはねえんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
──何よりもどうせ、
今後も退くつもりはねえんだろ？

engChrName: Oh, I know. I don't intend to stop here—doing that would be a betrayal to the people who have suffered and died because of the Geneses.
engSearchText:
Oh, I know. I don't intend to stop here—doing that
would be a betrayal to the people who have suffered
and died because of the Geneses.
jpnChrName: はい、前回に続いて 猟兵の方たちも亡くなって……
jpnSearchText:
はい、前回に続いて
猟兵の方たちも亡くなって……

engChrName: They're incredibly dangerous—no doubt about that. But that's precisely why I can't turn a blind eye to this.
engSearchText:
They're incredibly dangerous—no doubt about that.
But that's precisely why I can't turn a blind eye
to this.
jpnChrName: ──でも、危険だからこそ 目を背けられないと改めて思いました。
jpnSearchText:
──でも、危険だからこそ
目を背けられないと改めて思いました。

engChrName: I hope the feeling is mutual—I'll still need your help, after all.
engSearchText:
I hope the feeling is mutual—I'll still need your help,
after all.
jpnChrName: ですからヴァンさん…… これからも宜しくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
ですからヴァンさん……
これからも宜しくお願いします。

engChrName: And you'll have it. I already told you I'd pitch in however I can.
engSearchText:
And you'll have it. I already told you I'd pitch in
however I can.
jpnChrName: ま、約束だしそれはいい。
jpnSearchText: ま、約束だしそれはいい。

engChrName: But you don't have to pitch in here to get my help. You sure you wanna keep workin' for someone like me?
engSearchText:
But you don't have to pitch in here to get my help.
You sure you wanna keep workin' for someone
like me?
jpnChrName: ──だがアニエス、 改めてバイトの方はどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
──だがアニエス、
改めてバイトの方はどうだ？

engChrName: You know full well I'm not like the cops or bracers. I do things my own way.
engSearchText:
You know full well I'm not like the cops or bracers.
I do things my own way.
jpnChrName: 俺は警察でも遊撃士でもない。 あくまで自分の流儀を貫くだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺は警察でも遊撃士でもない。
あくまで自分の流儀を貫くだけだ。

engChrName: And that way isn't black, but it definitely ain't white, either. Mine's like the color of a dark blue sky just before dawn.
engSearchText:
And that way isn't black, but it definitely ain't
white, either. Mine's like the color of a dark blue sky
just before dawn.
jpnChrName: 黒でも白でも、灰色ですらない、 黎（あおぐろ）い狭間の領域で。
jpnSearchText:
黒でも白でも、灰色ですらない、
黎（あおぐろ）い狭間の領域で。

engChrName: I don't want you to get stained from bein' too close—
engSearchText: I don't want you to get stained from bein' too close—
jpnChrName: お前までそれに染まる必要は──
jpnSearchText: お前までそれに染まる必要は──

engChrName: Don't worry. That will never happen.
engSearchText: Don't worry. That will never happen.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫です、 染まりはしませんから。
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫です、
染まりはしませんから。

engChrName: The act you performed for Aida just isn't in my nature.
engSearchText:
The act you performed for Aida just isn't in
my nature.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんへの“慈悲”…… 私には到底真似はできませんから。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんへの“慈悲”……
私には到底真似はできませんから。

engChrName: And I could not have stood in for Feri in the way that you did.
engSearchText:
And I could not have stood in for Feri in the way that
you did.
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんが大人になるのを 待ってあげる優しさも……
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんが大人になるのを
待ってあげる優しさも……

engChrName: I'm not going to become a wholly different person if I stay by your side.
engSearchText:
I'm not going to become a wholly different person if I
stay by your side.
jpnChrName: でも、そんな貴方を支えて 寄り添うことは出来ると思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
でも、そんな貴方を支えて
寄り添うことは出来ると思うんです。

engChrName: I'm very much my own woman, and that's not about to change.
engSearchText:
I'm very much my own woman, and that's not about
to change.
jpnChrName: まだまだ半人前ですけど あくまで私ならではの“色”で。
jpnSearchText:
まだまだ半人前ですけど
あくまで私ならではの“色”で。

engChrName: I'm planning to stay right where I am, and I don't intend to leave anytime soon.
engSearchText:
I'm planning to stay right where I am, and I don't
intend to leave anytime soon.
jpnChrName: ですからアルバイトの方も 宜しくお願いします、ヴァン所長。
jpnSearchText:
ですからアルバイトの方も
宜しくお願いします、ヴァン所長。
……ッ………

engChrName: Damn. You're still rarin' for more even after all that's happened? You're either fearless or the chillest person I've ever met.
engSearchText:
Damn. You're still rarin' for more even after all
that's happened? You're either fearless or the chillest
person I've ever met.
jpnChrName: ったく、あれだけの修羅場に立ち会って 呑気なんだか、腹が据わってんだか……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、あれだけの修羅場に立ち会って
呑気なんだか、腹が据わってんだか……

engChrName: There's some trouble stirrin', that much is for sure. I don't just mean Almata.
engSearchText:
There's some trouble stirrin', that much is for sure.
I don't just mean Almata.
jpnChrName: ──アルマータも含めて 何かが動き始めてるのは確かだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──アルマータも含めて
何かが動き始めてるのは確かだろう。

engChrName: The Direwolf belongs to a pack of absolute wackos, and they're arguably more dangerous than the mafia.
engSearchText:
The Direwolf belongs to a pack of absolute wackos,
and they're arguably more dangerous than the mafia.
jpnChrName: あの《痩せ狼》が所属する組織だって ある意味、マフィア以上にヤバい連中だ。
jpnSearchText:
あの《痩せ狼》が所属する組織だって
ある意味、マフィア以上にヤバい連中だ。

engChrName: Right... I think I heard the name of their group. Wasn't it the society?
engSearchText:
Right... I think I heard the name of their group.
Wasn't it the society?
jpnChrName: そうみたいですね…… 《結社》って呼ばれていましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
そうみたいですね……
《結社》って呼ばれていましたけど。

engChrName: Yeah. I'll tell you about 'em when the time's right.
engSearchText: Yeah. I'll tell you about 'em when the time's right.
jpnChrName: いずれ機会があれば話してやる。
jpnSearchText: いずれ機会があれば話してやる。

engChrName: It feels like the CID's cooking up somethin' fishy, too.
engSearchText:
It feels like the CID's cooking up somethin'
fishy, too.
jpnChrName: ──ＣＩＤはＣＩＤで 怪しげな動きをしてやがるし……
jpnSearchText:
──ＣＩＤはＣＩＤで
怪しげな動きをしてやがるし……

engChrName: And while our interests sometimes align with the guild's, we're still not exactly buddy-buddy.
engSearchText:
And while our interests sometimes align with the
guild's, we're still not exactly buddy-buddy.
jpnChrName: ギルドとは立ち位置的に そこまで馴れ合いはできねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドとは立ち位置的に
そこまで馴れ合いはできねえ。

engChrName: *sigh* The more I think about it, the more I realize we could use a few more allies.
engSearchText:
*sigh* The more I think about it, the more I realize
we could use a few more allies.
jpnChrName: ふう……こうなってくると ちょっとばかり手が足りねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……こうなってくると
ちょっとばかり手が足りねえな。

engChrName: Or at least another pair of hands...
engSearchText: Or at least another pair of hands...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Another pair of hands coming right up!
engSearchText: Another pair of hands coming right up!
jpnChrName: だったら丁度よかったですっ……！
jpnSearchText: だったら丁度よかったですっ……！

engChrName: Oh, maybe I should knock before I shout.
engSearchText: Oh, maybe I should knock before I shout.
jpnChrName: あ……！ ノックが先、ですよね……？
jpnSearchText:
あ……！
ノックが先、ですよね……？

engChrName: Hold up...
engSearchText: Hold up...
jpnChrName: お前……
jpnSearchText: お前……

engChrName: Feri?!
engSearchText: Feri?!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん……！？
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん……！？

engChrName: Heehee. Nice to see you guys, even if it hasn't been super long. Thanks a bunch for all the help you gave me.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Nice to see you guys, even if it hasn't been
super long. Thanks a bunch for all the help you
gave me.
jpnChrName: えへへ……その節は 本当にお世話になりました。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……その節は
本当にお世話になりました。

engChrName: I know I should've given you, like, a billion thank-yous after everything you did. Sorry...
engSearchText:
I know I should've given you, like, a billion
thank-yous after everything you did. Sorry...
jpnChrName: あの後、ロクにお礼もできずに お別れすることになっちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
あの後、ロクにお礼もできずに
お別れすることになっちゃって……

engChrName: Oh, there's no need to apologize—nor is there any need to shower us in thanks.
engSearchText:
Oh, there's no need to apologize—nor is there any
need to shower us in thanks.
jpnChrName: そんな……！ ふふ、でもよく来てくれましたね。
jpnSearchText:
そんな……！
ふふ、でもよく来てくれましたね。

engChrName: Yeah. I got showered in mira, so I'm good.
engSearchText: Yeah. I got showered in mira, so I'm good.
jpnChrName: 依頼料もちゃんと受け取ったしな。
jpnSearchText: 依頼料もちゃんと受け取ったしな。

engChrName: You went back to your village after we split, right? Then I'm guessin' you came here with your dad this time.
engSearchText:
You went back to your village after we split, right?
Then I'm guessin' you came here with your dad
this time.
jpnChrName: あの後、クルガの里に帰ったようだが 今度は親父さんと一緒に来たのか？
jpnSearchText:
あの後、クルガの里に帰ったようだが
今度は親父さんと一緒に来たのか？

engChrName: Well, uh, n-not exactly...
engSearchText: Well, uh, n-not exactly...
jpnChrName: いえ……そのう……
jpnSearchText: いえ……そのう……

engChrName: He kinda sorta maybe...disowned me.
engSearchText: He kinda sorta maybe...disowned me.
jpnChrName: ………実は勘当されちゃいまして。
jpnSearchText: ………実は勘当されちゃいまして。

engChrName: What.
engSearchText: What.
jpnChrName: へ。
jpnSearchText: へ。

engChrName: WHAT?!
engSearchText: WHAT?!
jpnChrName: えええええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: えええええっ……！？

engChrName: Well, I did disobey a direct order from the corps, which is a big no-no.
engSearchText:
Well, I did disobey a direct order from the corps,
which is a big no-no.
jpnChrName: 戦士団の言いつけに背いて 勝手に動いたことが理由です。
jpnSearchText:
戦士団の言いつけに背いて
勝手に動いたことが理由です。

engChrName: I'm also a little too weak for their tastes.
engSearchText: I'm also a little too weak for their tastes.
jpnChrName: 戦士としても、あまりに未熟…… “半人前”にすら至っていないと。
jpnSearchText:
戦士としても、あまりに未熟……
“半人前”にすら至っていないと。

engChrName: Abi told me to go on a journey. He wants me to see more of the world and expand my horizons and stuff.
engSearchText:
Abi told me to go on a journey. He wants me to see
more of the world and expand my horizons and stuff.
jpnChrName: それで副頭目（お父さん）に、広い世界を 学んでくるように言われまして。
jpnSearchText:
それで副頭目（お父さん）に、広い世界を
学んでくるように言われまして。

engChrName: And that brought me right back to your doorstep. I owe you guys big time.
engSearchText:
And that brought me right back to your doorstep.
I owe you guys big time.
jpnChrName: ──アイーダさんの件、 お二人には本当にお世話になりました。
jpnSearchText:
──アイーダさんの件、
お二人には本当にお世話になりました。

engChrName: You granted Aida's final wish and taught me an invaluable lesson—one I intend to carry with me for the rest of my life.
engSearchText:
You granted Aida's final wish and taught me an
invaluable lesson—one I intend to carry with me for
the rest of my life.
jpnChrName: 依頼以上に大切なものを教えてくれて アイーダさんの望みも叶えてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
依頼以上に大切なものを教えてくれて
アイーダさんの望みも叶えてくれて……

engChrName: And we Warriors of Kruga always pay our debts...
engSearchText: And we Warriors of Kruga always pay our debts...
jpnChrName: そしてクルガの戦士にとって“恩”は 全身全霊を賭けてお返しするものです。
jpnSearchText:
そしてクルガの戦士にとって“恩”は
全身全霊を賭けてお返しするものです。

engChrName: ...so let me help you out with your work! I can do lots of things, so please hire me! You won't regret it, I promise!
engSearchText:
...so let me help you out with your work! I can do lots
of things, so please hire me! You won't regret it,
I promise!
jpnChrName: ですから──どうかわたしも しばらくお手伝いさせて下さいっ！
jpnSearchText:
ですから──どうかわたしも
しばらくお手伝いさせて下さいっ！

engChrName: Consider yourself hired! Welcome to the Arkride Solutions team!
engSearchText:
Consider yourself hired! Welcome to the Arkride
Solutions team!
jpnChrName: わあっ、もちろん大歓迎ですよ～！
jpnSearchText: わあっ、もちろん大歓迎ですよ～！

engChrName: H-Hey! That's MY call, part-timer! You're not in charge of hiring!
engSearchText:
H-Hey! That's MY call, part-timer! You're not in
charge of hiring!
jpnChrName: か、勝手に歓迎すんじゃねえ！？
jpnSearchText: か、勝手に歓迎すんじゃねえ！？

engChrName: Oh, I almost forgot! Abi asked me to give you this, Van.
engSearchText:
Oh, I almost forgot! Abi asked me to give you
this, Van.
jpnChrName: あ、忘れてました……！ これ、お父さん（アブ）からヴァンさんにって。
jpnSearchText:
あ、忘れてました……！
これ、お父さん（アブ）からヴァンさんにって。

engChrName: A letter? Oh, no. I'm gettin' bad vibes already...
engSearchText: A letter? Oh, no. I'm gettin' bad vibes already...
jpnChrName: 手紙……？ ったく冗談じゃねえぞ……
jpnSearchText:
手紙……？
ったく冗談じゃねえぞ……

engChrName: (Guessin' he wants me to look out for his darling daughter. Maybe he'll ask me to talk some sense into her or somethin'.)
engSearchText:
(Guessin' he wants me to look out for his
darling daughter. Maybe he'll ask me to talk some
sense into her or somethin'.)
jpnChrName: （ハハン、大事な娘みたいだし、   俺の方から思い止まらせろってか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（ハハン、大事な娘みたいだし、
俺の方から思い止まらせろってか……？）

engChrName: Dear Van Arkride,
engSearchText: Dear Van Arkride,
jpnChrName: 前略　ヴァン・アークライド殿
jpnSearchText: 前略　ヴァン・アークライド殿

engChrName: Thank you in advance for indulging my daughter's selfish request.
engSearchText:
Thank you in advance for indulging my daughter's
selfish request.
jpnChrName: この度は娘の我儘に 付き合っていただき感謝する。
jpnSearchText:
この度は娘の我儘に
付き合っていただき感謝する。

engChrName: This was not the first time you aided one of our own—and once again, I was thoroughly impressed by your combat prowess.
engSearchText:
This was not the first time you aided one of our
own—and once again, I was thoroughly impressed by
your combat prowess.
jpnChrName: 以前クルガの者も世話になったようだが 噂に違わぬ仕事ぶりと改めて感服した。
jpnSearchText:
以前クルガの者も世話になったようだが
噂に違わぬ仕事ぶりと改めて感服した。

engChrName: Though I do not appreciate that you robbed my daughter of an opportunity to grow. I would be lying if I said I was not beside myself with anger.
engSearchText:
Though I do not appreciate that you robbed my
daughter of an opportunity to grow. I would be lying
if I said I was not beside myself with anger.
jpnChrName: ──しかし娘の成長の機会を奪ったこと、 親としてはともかく、副頭目としては遺憾だ。
jpnSearchText:
──しかし娘の成長の機会を奪ったこと、
親としてはともかく、副頭目としては遺憾だ。

engChrName: If you wish to make amends, you must rectify that loss by personally nurturing her development. You may be as harsh a taskmaster as you must.
engSearchText:
If you wish to make amends, you must rectify that
loss by personally nurturing her development.
You may be as harsh a taskmaster as you must.
jpnChrName: 代償として、幾らコキ使ってもよいので おぬしから成長の機会を与えてやって欲しい。
jpnSearchText:
代償として、幾らコキ使ってもよいので
おぬしから成長の機会を与えてやって欲しい。

engChrName: However, should you dare to make any untoward advances on her...you will either face death at the hands of our entire corps...
engSearchText:
However, should you dare to make any untoward
advances on her...you will either face death at the
hands of our entire corps...
jpnChrName: ……ただし万が一手を出したら “全クルガ”をもって死を与えるか──
jpnSearchText:
……ただし万が一手を出したら
“全クルガ”をもって死を与えるか──

engChrName: ...or be forced to take responsibility for your actions for the rest of your days.
engSearchText:
...or be forced to take responsibility for your actions
for the rest of your days.
jpnChrName: 色々な意味で“責任”を 取ってもらうのでそのつもりでおれ。
jpnSearchText:
色々な意味で“責任”を
取ってもらうのでそのつもりでおれ。

engChrName: Regards, Hasan Al-Fayed
engSearchText: Regards, Hasan Al-Fayed
jpnChrName: 草々　ハサン・アルファイド
jpnSearchText: 草々　ハサン・アルファイド

engChrName: Are you all right, Van? You're looking rather pale...
engSearchText: Are you all right, Van? You're looking rather pale...
jpnChrName: えっと、ヴァンさん……？ なんだか顔色が青いですけど……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、ヴァンさん……？
なんだか顔色が青いですけど……

engChrName: Umm... So what does it say?
engSearchText: Umm... So what does it say?
jpnChrName: えっと、お父さん（アブ）はなんて……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、お父さん（アブ）はなんて……？

engChrName: That's on a strict need-to-know basis! Anyway, where're you even gonna stay—
engSearchText:
That's on a strict need-to-know basis!
Anyway, where're you even gonna stay—
jpnChrName: 何でもねえっつの！ そもそも住む場所はどうすん──って。
jpnSearchText:
何でもねえっつの！
そもそも住む場所はどうすん──って。

engChrName: What?! He rented one of the upstairs rooms ALREADY?!
engSearchText:
What?! He rented one of the upstairs
rooms ALREADY?!
jpnChrName: だああっ、もうこの上の 空き部屋を契約してんのかよっ！？
jpnSearchText:
だああっ、もうこの上の
空き部屋を契約してんのかよっ！？

engChrName: Main 4SPG [Find the Missing Eisenschild Company] completed! Received
engSearchText:
Main 4SPG [Find the Missing Eisenschild Company] completed!
Received
jpnChrName: メイン４ｓｐｇ【消えた《アイゼンシルト》中隊の捜索】の 報酬として
jpnSearchText:
メイン４ｓｐｇ【消えた《アイゼンシルト》中隊の捜索】の
報酬として

engChrName: September 19th, 1208, 10:25AM
engSearchText: September 19th, 1208, 10:25AM

engChrName: Aaaaaah...
engSearchText: Aaaaaah...
jpnChrName: ぷはああああああっ……
jpnSearchText: ぷはああああああっ……

engChrName: (That's the stuff. When it comes to saunas, nothin' beats a good löyly.)
engSearchText:
(That's the stuff. When it comes to saunas, nothin'
beats a good löyly.)
jpnChrName: （……キタキタ………   この水風呂こそがロウリュ（蒸気サウナ）の……）
jpnSearchText:
（……キタキタ………
この水風呂こそがロウリュ（蒸気サウナ）の……）

engChrName: Vaaan! Are you in there?
engSearchText: Vaaan! Are you in there?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさーん、居ますか～！？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさーん、居ますか～！？

engChrName: The floor's so chilly!
engSearchText: The floor's so chilly!
jpnChrName: わわっ、つ、冷たい……！？
jpnSearchText: わわっ、つ、冷たい……！？

engChrName: You've gotta be kidding me.
engSearchText: You've gotta be kidding me.
jpnChrName: ……おい、まさか………
jpnSearchText: ……おい、まさか………

engChrName: Oh! You really are here.
engSearchText: Oh! You really are here.
jpnChrName: あ、やっぱりいました！
jpnSearchText: あ、やっぱりいました！

engChrName: The hell are you bargin' in on me for?
engSearchText: The hell are you bargin' in on me for?
jpnChrName: ってお前ら、なんでいやがる！？
jpnSearchText: ってお前ら、なんでいやがる！？

engChrName: They told us at Montmart that you might be here right now.
engSearchText:
They told us at Montmart that you might be here
right now.
jpnChrName: あはは……モンマルトで聞いて この時間ならこちらじゃないかって。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……モンマルトで聞いて
この時間ならこちらじゃないかって。

engChrName: So we decided to join you for a soak.
engSearchText: So we decided to join you for a soak.
jpnChrName: いい機会ですのでわたしたちも ご一緒させて頂くことにしましたっ。
jpnSearchText:
いい機会ですのでわたしたちも
ご一緒させて頂くことにしましたっ。

engChrName: Speaking of, we should try the löyly!
engSearchText: Speaking of, we should try the löyly!
jpnChrName: あ、フェリちゃん、 ロウリュを試しましょう……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、フェリちゃん、
ロウリュを試しましょう……！

engChrName: Is that a kind of bath? I only know hamams.
engSearchText: Is that a kind of bath? I only know hamams.
jpnChrName: ロウリュ…… ハマム（蒸し風呂）とは違うんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
ロウリュ……
ハマム（蒸し風呂）とは違うんでしょうか？

engChrName: It is. I don't know all the specifics, but I think the temperature control is different.
engSearchText:
It is. I don't know all the specifics, but I think the
temperature control is different.
jpnChrName: う～ん、私も詳しくありませんけど 熱さとか入り方が全然違うみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、私も詳しくありませんけど
熱さとか入り方が全然違うみたいですね。

engChrName: Oooh! Let's go find it!
engSearchText: Oooh! Let's go find it!
jpnChrName: それは楽しみです！
jpnSearchText: それは楽しみです！

engChrName: What's a man gotta do to enjoy his bath time in peace...?
engSearchText:
What's a man gotta do to enjoy his bath time in
peace...?
jpnChrName: お、俺の……至高の時間が………
jpnSearchText: お、俺の……至高の時間が………

engChrName: Agh. You know what? I'm going for a second soak later, AND I'm treatin' myself to some gelato after!
engSearchText:
Agh. You know what? I'm going for a second soak
later, AND I'm treatin' myself to some gelato after!
jpnChrName: クソ、こうなったらもう一セットだ！ ──ランチ前だがジェラートも付けてやる！
jpnSearchText:
クソ、こうなったらもう一セットだ！
──ランチ前だがジェラートも付けてやる！

engChrName: Mmm!
engSearchText: Mmm!
engHtmlText: ヴァン＆アニエス＆フェリ
jpnChrName: んんんんん～～～っ！！
jpnSearchText: んんんんん～～～っ！！

engChrName: It's so cold and sweet!
engSearchText: It's so cold and sweet!
jpnChrName: 冷たくて甘くて美味しいです……！
jpnSearchText: 冷たくて甘くて美味しいです……！

engChrName: The perfect treat after a hot bath.
engSearchText: The perfect treat after a hot bath.
jpnChrName: お風呂上がりだと格別ですよねぇ。
jpnSearchText: お風呂上がりだと格別ですよねぇ。

engChrName: Exactly. Cold, sweet, and humble as can be.
engSearchText: Exactly. Cold, sweet, and humble as can be.
jpnChrName: そう……冷たくて、甘くて、美味しい。 ただそれだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
そう……冷たくて、甘くて、美味しい。
ただそれだけだ。

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん？

engChrName: It's not trying to be somethin' it's not. It's got no frills or gimmicks.
engSearchText:
It's not trying to be somethin' it's not. It's got no frills
or gimmicks.
jpnChrName: 奇をてらった味付けもなく、 特におしゃれな見た目でもない。
jpnSearchText:
奇をてらった味付けもなく、
特におしゃれな見た目でもない。

engChrName: Milk gelato relies on nailing the basics: flavor, texture, and temperature.
engSearchText:
Milk gelato relies on nailing the basics: flavor, texture,
and temperature.
jpnChrName: 単に基本を忠実に押さえただけの ミルクジェラート。
jpnSearchText:
単に基本を忠実に押さえただけの
ミルクジェラート。

engChrName: But that's exactly why it's the perfect pairing!
engSearchText: But that's exactly why it's the perfect pairing!
jpnChrName: だからこそ、この場所に相応しい！
jpnSearchText: だからこそ、この場所に相応しい！

engChrName: Simple yet profound. Just like a hot bath.
engSearchText: Simple yet profound. Just like a hot bath.
jpnChrName: 冷たくて、甘くて、美味しいだけという シンプルな奥深さ──人生にも通じる所がある。
jpnSearchText:
冷たくて、甘くて、美味しいだけという
シンプルな奥深さ──人生にも通じる所がある。

engChrName: It's pure relaxation condensed down into dessert form. Like a cool breeze on a hot summer's day.
engSearchText:
It's pure relaxation condensed down into
dessert form. Like a cool breeze on a hot
summer's day.
jpnChrName: 湯上がりの体に爽やかな風を吹き込む、 究極の癒しが濃縮されたようなひと時。
jpnSearchText:
湯上がりの体に爽やかな風を吹き込む、
究極の癒しが濃縮されたようなひと時。

engChrName: It's moments like this that remind us why life's worth livin'.
engSearchText:
It's moments like this that remind us why life's
worth livin'.
jpnChrName: この瞬間のために生きているんじゃないか？ ──コイツを食べる時はいつもそう思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この瞬間のために生きているんじゃないか？
──コイツを食べる時はいつもそう思うんだ。

engChrName: I get it! ...Probably!
engSearchText: I get it! ...Probably!
jpnChrName: な、なるほど…… ちょっとだけ分かる気がしますっ！
jpnSearchText:
な、なるほど……
ちょっとだけ分かる気がしますっ！

engChrName: (Knowing Van, I doubt he was kidding around at all...)
engSearchText:
(Knowing Van, I doubt he was kidding around
at all...)
jpnChrName: （うーん、ヴァンさんの事だから   本気で言ってそうな気も……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、ヴァンさんの事だから
本気で言ってそうな気も……）

engChrName: So, why'd you come looking for me before lunch, anyway? Thought I said we'd meet up in the afternoon.
engSearchText:
So, why'd you come looking for me before
lunch, anyway? Thought I said we'd meet up in
the afternoon.
jpnChrName: で、なんで午前中に来てるんだ？ 今日は午後からって言っただろう。
jpnSearchText:
で、なんで午前中に来てるんだ？
今日は午後からって言っただろう。

engChrName: Well, since Feri's still so new to the city, I wanted to help her get acclimated.
engSearchText:
Well, since Feri's still so new to the city, I wanted to
help her get acclimated.
jpnChrName: ええと、フェリちゃんがまだ 首都に慣れていないと思いまして……
jpnSearchText:
ええと、フェリちゃんがまだ
首都に慣れていないと思いまして……

engChrName: We've been enjoying our morning off sightseeing together.
engSearchText:
We've been enjoying our morning off
sightseeing together.
jpnChrName: お仕事がてら案内はどうかなって思ったんです。
jpnSearchText: お仕事がてら案内はどうかなって思ったんです。

engChrName: You don't have to go out of your way for me. This is part of my training.
engSearchText:
You don't have to go out of your way for me. This is
part of my training.
jpnChrName: べ、別に大丈夫です、一人でも。 これも修行のうちですし……！
jpnSearchText:
べ、別に大丈夫です、一人でも。
これも修行のうちですし……！

engChrName: Got the lay of the land yet?
engSearchText: Got the lay of the land yet?
jpnChrName: 実際はどうなんだ？ どの区に何があるか把握してるか？
jpnSearchText:
実際はどうなんだ？
どの区に何があるか把握してるか？

engChrName: Umm... Let's see... The temple's in the 6th District— the, uhh...water one.
engSearchText:
Umm... Let's see... The temple's in the 6th District—
the, uhh...water one.
jpnChrName: えと……六区の“りばーさいど”に 七耀寺院があるってくらいしか……
jpnSearchText:
えと……六区の“りばーさいど”に
七耀寺院があるってくらいしか……

engChrName: You'll be attending Sunday School there, right?
engSearchText: You'll be attending Sunday School there, right?
jpnChrName: そういえばそちらの日曜学校に 通うようになったんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばそちらの日曜学校に
通うようになったんですよね？

engChrName: Yeah. I stopped in to say hello, but it's the only other district I've been to.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I stopped in to say hello, but it's the only other
district I've been to.
jpnChrName: はい、その挨拶も兼ねて伺いましたが、 他の区なんかはまだ……
jpnSearchText:
はい、その挨拶も兼ねて伺いましたが、
他の区なんかはまだ……

engChrName: This city is so huge. I have no idea how we'd plan for urban warfare here.
engSearchText:
This city is so huge. I have no idea how we'd plan for
urban warfare here.
jpnChrName: そもそもイーディスは大きすぎです！ 市街戦の作戦も立てづらいかと……！
jpnSearchText:
そもそもイーディスは大きすぎです！
市街戦の作戦も立てづらいかと……！

engChrName: Is that really an issue...?
engSearchText: Is that really an issue...?
jpnChrName: 市街戦って……
jpnSearchText: 市街戦って……

engChrName: (Guess she's still a jaeger at heart.)
engSearchText: (Guess she's still a jaeger at heart.)
jpnChrName: （──ま、仕方ねぇか。）
jpnSearchText: （──ま、仕方ねぇか。）

engChrName: Listen up. 'Sides the odd business trip, we do all our gigs here in the capital.
engSearchText:
Listen up. 'Sides the odd business trip, we do all our
gigs here in the capital.
jpnChrName: ウチの事務所は出張以外じゃ、 首都での依頼しか基本請け負わねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチの事務所は出張以外じゃ、
首都での依頼しか基本請け負わねぇ。

engChrName: If you're gonna be workin' for me, you've gotta learn your way around.
engSearchText:
If you're gonna be workin' for me, you've gotta learn
your way around.
jpnChrName: 各エリアの位置や施設を把握してねぇと 仕事に支障をきたすぞ。
jpnSearchText:
各エリアの位置や施設を把握してねぇと
仕事に支障をきたすぞ。

engChrName: Right...
engSearchText: Right...
jpnChrName: ううっ……
jpnSearchText: ううっ……

engChrName: Don't worry. I'll show you the ropes.
engSearchText: Don't worry. I'll show you the ropes.
jpnChrName: てわけで、今日もバイト研修だ。
jpnSearchText: てわけで、今日もバイト研修だ。

engChrName: What's on our itinerary?
engSearchText: What's on our itinerary?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、それって……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、それって……

engChrName: We can't see the whole city in a day, but we can still make a dent while we handle some jobs.
engSearchText:
We can't see the whole city in a day, but we can still
make a dent while we handle some jobs.
jpnChrName: いきなり全部とはいかないが、 依頼をこなしながら各区を案内する。
jpnSearchText:
いきなり全部とはいかないが、
依頼をこなしながら各区を案内する。

engChrName: And since Feri's a combat vet, she oughta catch on mighty quick.
engSearchText:
And since Feri's a combat vet, she oughta catch on
mighty quick.
jpnChrName: 実戦経験は豊富みたいだし、 アニエスの時よりペースを上げていくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
実戦経験は豊富みたいだし、
アニエスの時よりペースを上げていくぞ。

engChrName: Don't go fallin' behind, now.
engSearchText: Don't go fallin' behind, now.
jpnChrName: しっかりついて来い。
jpnSearchText: しっかりついて来い。

engChrName: Roger that!
engSearchText: Roger that!
jpnChrName: はいっ、よろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、よろしくお願いします！

engChrName: The three went to Montmart for an early lunch.
engSearchText: The three went to Montmart for an early lunch.
jpnChrName: その後、モンマルトに戻ったヴァンたちは 早めのランチを取り──
jpnSearchText:
その後、モンマルトに戻ったヴァンたちは
早めのランチを取り──

engChrName: After that, they began work for the day.
engSearchText: After that, they began work for the day.
jpnChrName: 準備を整えてから《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》の 活動を開始するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
準備を整えてから《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》の
活動を開始するのだった。

engChrName: Quests can now be reported at the office desk.
engSearchText: Quests can now be reported at the office desk.
jpnChrName: 事務所のデスクでＳＰレポートが行えるようになった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>事務所のデスクでＳＰレポートが行えるようになった。

engChrName: Here's where we pick up most of our jobs.
engSearchText: Here's where we pick up most of our jobs.
jpnChrName: 基本的にウチの仕事は ここから受けることになる。
jpnSearchText:
基本的にウチの仕事は
ここから受けることになる。

engChrName: Is this one of the guild's message boards?
engSearchText: Is this one of the guild's message boards?
jpnChrName: これは……ギルドにあるという依頼板？ ……には見えませんね。
jpnSearchText:
これは……ギルドにあるという依頼板？
……には見えませんね。

engChrName: Actually, it's this district's public bulletin board.
engSearchText: Actually, it's this district's public bulletin board.
jpnChrName: 普通の掲示板ですよ。 誰かへの伝言やお店のセールス情報など──
jpnSearchText:
普通の掲示板ですよ。
誰かへの伝言やお店のセールス情報など──

engChrName: As you can see, it's mostly used for announcements or advertising.
engSearchText:
As you can see, it's mostly used for announcements
or advertising.
jpnChrName: その地区に関することが書かれています。
jpnSearchText: その地区に関することが書かれています。

engChrName: If you wanna find the stuff addressed to us, all you gotta do is reach around back.
engSearchText:
If you wanna find the stuff addressed to us, all you
gotta do is reach around back.
jpnChrName: で、裏に印がついてるモンが、 《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》宛ての依頼ってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
で、裏に印がついてるモンが、
《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》宛ての依頼ってわけだ。

engChrName: Now and then, folks'll reach out and contact me directly, but most of our jobs come from boards like this.
engSearchText:
Now and then, folks'll reach out and contact me
directly, but most of our jobs come from boards
like this.
jpnChrName: 他にも下請けの仕事が入るようになったが、 とりあえずはこんなもんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
他にも下請けの仕事が入るようになったが、
とりあえずはこんなもんだろ。

engChrName: Huh. I thought our jobs would involve more fighting.
engSearchText: Huh. I thought our jobs would involve more fighting.
jpnChrName: へえ、戦闘になりそうな 依頼ではなさそうですね……
jpnSearchText:
へえ、戦闘になりそうな
依頼ではなさそうですね……

engChrName: I was expecting like, assassinations and stuff.
engSearchText: I was expecting like, assassinations and stuff.
jpnChrName: てっきり“標的抹殺”みたいな ミッションかと思ったのですが。
jpnSearchText:
てっきり“標的抹殺”みたいな
ミッションかと思ったのですが。

engChrName: Ahaha... People don't come to us with matters THAT violent...do they?
engSearchText:
Ahaha... People don't come to us with matters
THAT violent...do they?
jpnChrName: あはは、流石にそれは…… ……………ありませんよね？
jpnSearchText:
あはは、流石にそれは……
……………ありませんよね？

engChrName: Nah. Every once in a while, I've gotta beat up a stalker or something, but that's about it.
engSearchText:
Nah. Every once in a while, I've gotta beat up a
stalker or something, but that's about it.
jpnChrName: まあ、ストーカーを半殺しにしてくれ みたいな依頼はあるけどな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ストーカーを半殺しにしてくれ
みたいな依頼はあるけどな。

engChrName: Then please allow me to deliver the beatings from now on!
engSearchText:
Then please allow me to deliver the beatings from
now on!
jpnChrName: そういう任務でしたら、 わたしに任せてくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
そういう任務でしたら、
わたしに任せてくださいっ！

engChrName: C-Couldn't we just hand them over to the police...?
engSearchText: C-Couldn't we just hand them over to the police...?
jpnChrName: その場合は捕まえて 警察に引き渡しましょうね……
jpnSearchText:
その場合は捕まえて
警察に引き渡しましょうね……

engChrName: Hmm? What's that flyer there?
engSearchText: Hmm? What's that flyer there?
jpnChrName: ん？　これは……？
jpnSearchText: ん？　これは……？

engChrName: 'Seeking information on the enigmatic thief Grimcat!'
engSearchText: 'Seeking information on the enigmatic thief Grimcat!'
jpnChrName: 『怪盗グリムキャッツ、各種情報求む』
jpnSearchText: 『怪盗グリムキャッツ、各種情報求む』

engChrName: 'Report any leads to your local police station. Promising information will be compensated with cash!'
engSearchText:
'Report any leads to your local police station.
Promising information will be compensated
with cash!'
jpnChrName: 『心当たりがある方は首都警察にご一報ください。   有力情報には謝礼の準備がございます。』
jpnSearchText:
『心当たりがある方は首都警察にご一報ください。
有力情報には謝礼の準備がございます。』

engChrName: I've never heard of them.
engSearchText: I've never heard of them.
jpnChrName: 怪盗ぐりむきゃっつ……？
jpnSearchText: 怪盗ぐりむきゃっつ……？

engChrName: A lady thief who has been operating in Calvard for the past few years.
engSearchText:
A lady thief who has been operating in Calvard for
the past few years.
jpnChrName: ああ、ここ数年カルバードで 活動している“女怪盗”さんですね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ここ数年カルバードで
活動している“女怪盗”さんですね。

engChrName: They say she only steals from bad people—corrupt politicians, shady millionaires, and so on.
engSearchText:
They say she only steals from bad people—corrupt
politicians, shady millionaires, and so on.
jpnChrName: 狙うのは汚職政治家や役人、 黒い噂のある企業や資産家だけ……
jpnSearchText:
狙うのは汚職政治家や役人、
黒い噂のある企業や資産家だけ……

engChrName: Supposedly, once you receive a calling card from her, your fate is sealed.
engSearchText:
Supposedly, once you receive a calling card from her,
your fate is sealed.
jpnChrName: しかも予告状を出して狙った獲物を 一度も逃がしたことはないそうです。
jpnSearchText:
しかも予告状を出して狙った獲物を
一度も逃がしたことはないそうです。

engChrName: Wow... There are so many interesting people in the city.
engSearchText:
Wow... There are so many interesting people in
the city.
jpnChrName: そ、そんな人が…… 都会って凄いですね……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな人が……
都会って凄いですね……！

engChrName: Because Grimcat never steals from the innocent, many people in Edith admire her.
engSearchText:
Because Grimcat never steals from the innocent,
many people in Edith admire her.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、義賊みたいですし、 ちょっとロマンがありますよね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、義賊みたいですし、
ちょっとロマンがありますよね。

engChrName: They also say she scampers around the city in a skimpy outfit you'd expect to see in a seedy club.
engSearchText:
They also say she scampers around the city in a
skimpy outfit you'd expect to see in a seedy club.
jpnChrName: ──ま、あられもないスーツを纏って 夜の首都を飛び回ってるらしいけどな。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、あられもないスーツを纏って
夜の首都を飛び回ってるらしいけどな。

engChrName: Your righteous thief sounds more like a kinkster to me.
engSearchText:
Your righteous thief sounds more like a kinkster
to me.
jpnChrName: 怪盗というよりただの痴女じゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText: 怪盗というよりただの痴女じゃねえのか？

engChrName: What's a—?
engSearchText: What's a—?
jpnChrName: ………ちじょ？
jpnSearchText: ………ちじょ？

engChrName: Don't say it...
engSearchText: Don't say it...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: The gossip rags are just makin' a big deal of her for sales. Nothin' we need to worry about.
engSearchText:
The gossip rags are just makin' a big deal of her
for sales. Nothin' we need to worry about.
jpnChrName: どうせゴシップ誌あたりが 大げさに広めてるだけだろ。
jpnSearchText:
どうせゴシップ誌あたりが
大げさに広めてるだけだろ。

engChrName: So anyway, job boards.
engSearchText: So anyway, job boards.
jpnChrName: ──ま、ともかく これが“４ｓｐｇ”の依頼だ。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、ともかく
これが“４ｓｐｇ”の依頼だ。

engChrName: Let's go check the boards in the other districts and find some work to do.
engSearchText:
Let's go check the boards in the other districts and
find some work to do.
jpnChrName: 請けるかどうかはともかく、 他の区の掲示板も見ていくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
請けるかどうかはともかく、
他の区の掲示板も見ていくぞ。

engChrName: Semi-Required 4SPGs
engSearchText: Semi-Required 4SPGs
jpnChrName: ～準必須４ｓｐｇについて～
jpnSearchText: <C1>～準必須４ｓｐｇについて～

engChrName: Sometimes, you will need to complete semi-required 4SPGs in order to advance the story.
engSearchText:
Sometimes, you will need to complete semi-required
4SPGs in order to advance the story.
jpnChrName: メインストーリーを進めるためには、 準必須４ｓｐｇをいくつかこなす必要があります。
jpnSearchText:
メインストーリーを進めるためには、
準必須４ｓｐｇをいくつかこなす必要があります。

engChrName: You don't need to finish all the requests available, but you may if you want to.
engSearchText:
You don't need to finish all the requests available, but
you may if you want to.
jpnChrName: 準必須４ｓｐｇは全て達成する必要はありませんが、 必要な達成数はその時々に応じて変わります。
jpnSearchText:
準必須４ｓｐｇは全て達成する必要はありませんが、
必要な達成数はその時々に応じて変わります。

engChrName: (Oh, right. I've got some personal business I should squeeze into today, too.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, right. I've got some personal business I should
squeeze into today, too.)
jpnChrName: （──さて、暇を見て今日の内に   個人的な雑用なんかもこなしておくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（──さて、暇を見て今日の内に
個人的な雑用なんかもこなしておくか。）

engChrName: You can now view connection events in the Connection tab of your To-Do List.
engSearchText:
You can now view connection events in the
Connection tab of your To-Do List.
jpnChrName: ＴｏＤｏリストの『コネクト』から 『コネクトイベント』が起動できるようになった。
jpnSearchText:
ＴｏＤｏリストの『コネクト』から
『コネクトイベント』が起動できるようになった。

engChrName: (Man, that asshole really knows how to jerk people around.)
engSearchText:
(Man, that asshole really knows how to jerk
people around.)
jpnChrName: （“気持ち”はともかく……   あの野郎、人の足元を見やがって。）
jpnSearchText:
（“気持ち”はともかく……
あの野郎、人の足元を見やがって。）

engChrName: (Guess you don't get a fancy nickname like 'White Orchid Dragon' for bein' a slouch.)
engSearchText:
(Guess you don't get a fancy nickname like 'White
Orchid Dragon' for bein' a slouch.)
jpnChrName: （流石は《白蘭竜（はくらんりゅう）》──   黒月きっての切れ者と言うべきか。）
jpnSearchText:
（流石は《白蘭竜（はくらんりゅう）》──
黒月きっての切れ者と言うべきか。）

engChrName: (Well, that should do it. Dingo and Bermotti'll take care of everything while I'm away.)
engSearchText:
(Well, that should do it. Dingo and Bermotti'll take
care of everything while I'm away.)
jpnChrName: （……これでよし。   ディンゴたちなら計らってくれんだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……これでよし。
ディンゴたちなら計らってくれんだろ。）

engChrName: (It's an early start tomorrow, and we're gonna be out for two or three days after that.)
engSearchText:
(It's an early start tomorrow, and we're gonna be out
for two or three days after that.)
jpnChrName: （明日は早いが──   ２、３日留守にするからな。）
jpnSearchText:
（明日は早いが──
２、３日留守にするからな。）

engChrName: (Suppose it wouldn't hurt to hit the town for a bit before turnin' in.)
engSearchText:
(Suppose it wouldn't hurt to hit the town for a bit
before turnin' in.)
jpnChrName: （少しばかり街を回ってみるか。）
jpnSearchText: （少しばかり街を回ってみるか。）

engChrName: (It's been crazy havin' to corral two employees while on the job.)
engSearchText:
(It's been crazy havin' to corral two employees while
on the job.)
jpnChrName: （しかし……助手が二人も入って   それなりに慌ただしかったな。）
jpnSearchText:
（しかし……助手が二人も入って
それなりに慌ただしかったな。）

engChrName: (Could go catch a movie. Haven't gone by myself in a hot minute.)
engSearchText:
(Could go catch a movie. Haven't gone by myself in a
hot minute.)
jpnChrName: （今夜も微かに“匂い”はするが……）
jpnSearchText: （今夜も微かに“匂い”はするが……）

engChrName: (Though, somethin' smells a bit off in the city tonight—and it ain't old popcorn.)
engSearchText:
(Though, somethin' smells a bit off in the city
tonight—and it ain't old popcorn.)
jpnChrName: （久しぶりの一人行動だ。   たまには映画館にでも足を運んでみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（久しぶりの一人行動だ。
たまには映画館にでも足を運んでみるか。）

engChrName: Nighttime Activities
engSearchText: Nighttime Activities
jpnChrName: ～夜の行動について～
jpnSearchText: <C1>～夜の行動について～

engChrName: Ocassionally, you will be able to walk around Edith at night as Van.
engSearchText:
Ocassionally, you will be able to walk around Edith at
night as Van.
jpnChrName: 首都の夜はヴァン一人で行動することになります。
jpnSearchText: <C1>首都の夜はヴァン一人で行動することになります。

engChrName: Some locations are not available at night, but there are hidden quests to be found and connection events to enjoy.
engSearchText:
Some locations are not available at night, but there
are hidden quests to be found and connection events
to enjoy.
jpnChrName: 行ける場所は制限されますが、 隠しクエストやコネクトイベントなども存在します。
jpnSearchText:
行ける場所は制限されますが、
隠しクエストやコネクトイベントなども存在します。

engChrName: After completing all required events, finish up for the night by selecting Finish Nighttime Activities at the desk in the office.
engSearchText:
After completing all required events, finish up for the
night by selecting Finish Nighttime Activities at the
desk in the office.
jpnChrName: 必須のイベントを一通りこなすと、 事務所の机から『夜行動を終了する』が選択できます。
jpnSearchText:
必須のイベントを一通りこなすと、
事務所の机から『夜行動を終了する』が選択できます。

engChrName: Guess I oughta take a shower tonight. Not like I'm gonna have time in the morning.
engSearchText:
Guess I oughta take a shower tonight. Not like I'm
gonna have time in the morning.
jpnChrName: ふう……明日は早いし とっととシャワーでも浴びるか。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……明日は早いし
とっととシャワーでも浴びるか。

engChrName: *sigh* Can't believe she weaseled her way in again...
engSearchText: *sigh* Can't believe she weaseled her way in again...
jpnChrName: しかし今回もとはな………
jpnSearchText: しかし今回もとはな………

engChrName: Why does everyone gotta be so damn stubborn?
engSearchText: Why does everyone gotta be so damn stubborn?
jpnChrName: はぁ、どいつもこいつも 頑固っつーかなんつーか……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、どいつもこいつも
頑固っつーかなんつーか……

engChrName: At least Feri acts like a normal kid when fighting's not involved.
engSearchText:
At least Feri acts like a normal kid when fighting's
not involved.
jpnChrName: 助手２号も、今日の様子を見りゃあ 戦闘以外は年相応なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
助手２号も、今日の様子を見りゃあ
戦闘以外は年相応なんだが……

engChrName: Hmm? An international call? ...Oh, right.
engSearchText: Hmm? An international call? ...Oh, right.
jpnChrName: 国外からの長距離コール……？ ああ、ひょっとして。
jpnSearchText:
国外からの長距離コール……？
ああ、ひょっとして。

engChrName: My apologies for calling so late, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: My apologies for calling so late, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: 夜分に失礼します、 ヴァン・アークライド様。
jpnSearchText:
夜分に失礼します、
ヴァン・アークライド様。

engChrName: No worries. Figured I'd hear from you soon.
engSearchText: No worries. Figured I'd hear from you soon.
jpnChrName: アンタか。 そろそろ掛けてくると思ったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタか。
そろそろ掛けてくると思ったぜ。

engChrName: Thank you for your understanding.
engSearchText: Thank you for your understanding.
jpnChrName: フフ、それは光栄です。
jpnSearchText: フフ、それは光栄です。

engChrName: Now, then, do you have time for last month's data review? We can reschedule if I've caught you at a bad time.
engSearchText:
Now, then, do you have time for last month's
data review? We can reschedule if I've caught you at a
bad time.
jpnChrName: 早速ですが先月の査定をさせて頂けますか？ お忙しいようでしたら後日でも結構ですが。
jpnSearchText:
早速ですが先月の査定をさせて頂けますか？
お忙しいようでしたら後日でも結構ですが。

engChrName: I'm gonna be outta town for a few days startin' tomorrow, so let's just get it outta the way.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna be outta town for a few days startin'
tomorrow, so let's just get it outta the way.
jpnChrName: いや、丁度明日から仕事が入ってるんでな。 とっとと済まさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、丁度明日から仕事が入ってるんでな。
とっとと済まさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: ('Cause this ain't gonna be a fun one...)
engSearchText: ('Cause this ain't gonna be a fun one...)
jpnChrName: （色々突っ込まれそうだしな……）
jpnSearchText: （色々突っ込まれそうだしな……）

engChrName: Is something the matter?
engSearchText: Is something the matter?
jpnChrName: ？　どうかされましたか？
jpnSearchText: ？　どうかされましたか？

engChrName: Nah. Lemme send you the stuff.
engSearchText: Nah. Lemme send you the stuff.
jpnChrName: こっちの話だ。 そんじゃ使用状況を送るぞ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちの話だ。
そんじゃ使用状況を送るぞ。

engChrName: Thank you.
engSearchText: Thank you.
jpnChrName: ええ、宜しくお願いします。
