jpnSearchText: ええ、宜しくお願いします。

engChrName: The data has been successfully transferred.
engSearchText: The data has been successfully transferred.
jpnChrName: ………頂戴しました。
jpnSearchText: ………頂戴しました。

engChrName: First, allow me to see how your stun caliber and hollow style have fared in combat.
engSearchText:
First, allow me to see how your stun caliber and
hollow style have fared in combat.
jpnChrName: それでは零式勁術（ゼロ・ストライク）と撃剣（スタンキャリバー）──
jpnSearchText: それでは零式勁術（ゼロ・ストライク）と撃剣（スタンキャリバー）──

engChrName: I will also be checking Mare's usage records.
engSearchText: I will also be checking Mare's usage records.
jpnChrName: 並びにザイファ用特殊ホロウ 《メア》の使用状況を確認させて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
並びにザイファ用特殊ホロウ
《メア》の使用状況を確認させて頂きます。

engChrName: Heehee. Busy as ever, I see—oh? What's this...?
engSearchText: Heehee. Busy as ever, I see—oh? What's this...?
jpnChrName: 相変わらずお忙しそうですね……あら？
jpnSearchText: 相変わらずお忙しそうですね……あら？

engChrName: Your vital data shows extreme deviations in the latter half of the month, as well as a number of unusual holo activations.
engSearchText:
Your vital data shows extreme deviations in the latter
half of the month, as well as a number of unusual
holo activations.
jpnChrName: ……先月後半のバイタルの数値が…… それにホロウ稼働時のこの異様な数値は……
jpnSearchText:
……先月後半のバイタルの数値が……
それにホロウ稼働時のこの異様な数値は……

engChrName: ...Mr. Arkride, is there something you're not telling me?
engSearchText:
...Mr. Arkride, is there something you're not
telling me?
jpnChrName: ………………ヴァン様、 一体何があったのですか？
jpnSearchText:
………………ヴァン様、
一体何があったのですか？

engChrName: September 20th, 1208, 6:30AM
engSearchText: September 20th, 1208, 6:30AM

engChrName: Several days later...
engSearchText: Several days later...
jpnChrName: ──数日後
jpnSearchText: ──数日後

engChrName: September 27th, 1208, 10:34AM
engSearchText: September 27th, 1208, 10:34AM

engChrName: After Messeldam Trading Company pulled out of Langport, everything started getting back to normal.
engSearchText:
After Messeldam Trading Company pulled out of
Langport, everything started getting back to normal.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0954}──《メッセルダム商事》は完全撤退、 煌都にも平穏が戻ったってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0954}──《メッセルダム商事》は完全撤退、
煌都にも平穏が戻ったってわけだ。

engChrName: Well, on the surface, anyway.
engSearchText: Well, on the surface, anyway.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0955}少なくとも、表面上はな。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0955}少なくとも、表面上はな。

engChrName: The conflict between Heiyue and Almata is probably only going to intensify from here on.
engSearchText:
The conflict between Heiyue and Almata is probably
only going to intensify from here on.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0956}でも黒月とアルマータの抗争は むしろこれからが本番みたい。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0956}でも黒月とアルマータの抗争は
むしろこれからが本番みたい。

engChrName: Especially since Yin's back.
engSearchText: Especially since Yin's back.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0957}長らく共和国を離れていた《銀》も 今後関わってくる可能性もあるし。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0957}長らく共和国を離れていた《銀》も
今後関わってくる可能性もあるし。

engChrName: Why didn't anybody tell me that Yin is a woman?
engSearchText: Why didn't anybody tell me that Yin is a woman?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0958}っていうか《銀》が女性だなんて 聞いてなかったんだけど……！
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0958}っていうか《銀》が女性だなんて
聞いてなかったんだけど……！

engChrName: Wait! You don't think she and Cao are secretly... you know?!
engSearchText:
Wait! You don't think she and Cao are secretly...
you know?!
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0959}ま、まさかツァオと そういう関係なんじゃ──
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0959}ま、まさかツァオと
そういう関係なんじゃ──

engChrName: Eh, doubt it. I hear she's got her eyes set on a guy in Crossbell.
engSearchText:
Eh, doubt it. I hear she's got her eyes set on a guy
in Crossbell.
jpnChrName: あー、それは無いんじゃねぇか？ クロスベルに“本命”がいるみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
あー、それは無いんじゃねぇか？
クロスベルに“本命”がいるみたいだし。

engChrName: So she's an acquaintance of yours, then?
engSearchText: So she's an acquaintance of yours, then?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん…… やっぱりお知り合いなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……
やっぱりお知り合いなんですか？

engChrName: I got the impression Elaine knows her, too.
engSearchText: I got the impression Elaine knows her, too.
jpnChrName: そういえばエレインさんも ご存じのような雰囲気でしたが……
jpnSearchText:
そういえばエレインさんも
ご存じのような雰囲気でしたが……

engChrName: I'm not surprised about Van since he seems to know everybody...
engSearchText:
I'm not surprised about Van since he seems to
know everybody...
jpnChrName: 伝説の凶手とＡ級遊撃士。
jpnSearchText: 伝説の凶手とＡ級遊撃士。

engChrName: ...but I wouldn't think an assassin and an A-rank bracer would get along.
engSearchText:
...but I wouldn't think an assassin and an A-rank
bracer would get along.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんはともかく、 水と油な印象ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんはともかく、
水と油な印象ですけど。

engChrName: Yin and I bumped into each other on a job two years back.
engSearchText:
Yin and I bumped into each other on a job two
years back.
jpnChrName: ……俺の方はまあ ２年前の仕事でちょっとな。
jpnSearchText:
……俺の方はまあ
２年前の仕事でちょっとな。

engChrName: As for Elaine, dunno. Guess they must've teamed up at some point.
engSearchText:
As for Elaine, dunno. Guess they must've teamed up
at some point.
jpnChrName: エレインは知らんが多分、 表と裏で何か協力したんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
エレインは知らんが多分、
表と裏で何か協力したんだろ。

engChrName: Shame I couldn't just sit back while they handled everything this time.
engSearchText:
Shame I couldn't just sit back while they handled
everything this time.
jpnChrName: そんな風に勝手にまとまってくれりゃ、 俺の仕事もラクになるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
そんな風に勝手にまとまってくれりゃ、
俺の仕事もラクになるんだが。

engChrName: Is there anybody you don't know?
engSearchText: Is there anybody you don't know?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0968}ふふっ、相変わらず事情通だね。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0968}ふふっ、相変わらず事情通だね。

engChrName: Heh. You talk tough, but we all know—Cao included—that you can't help but get involved.
engSearchText:
Heh. You talk tough, but we all know—Cao
included—that you can't help but get involved.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0969}クク、そう言いつつ毎度首を突っ込むから ツァオあたりに付け込まれるんだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0969}クク、そう言いつつ毎度首を突っ込むから
ツァオあたりに付け込まれるんだろうが？

engChrName: Can it, already.
engSearchText: Can it, already.
jpnChrName: うるせえよ！
jpnSearchText: うるせえよ！

engChrName: Though, can't say I enjoy feelin' like he had us dancin' in the palm of his hand.
engSearchText:
Though, can't say I enjoy feelin' like he had us
dancin' in the palm of his hand.
jpnChrName: にしても、どうも煮え切らねぇぜ。 最後までヤツの掌の上だったような……
jpnSearchText:
にしても、どうも煮え切らねぇぜ。
最後までヤツの掌の上だったような……

engChrName: I suspect this whole thing was probably just a changing of the guard over at Heiyue, so to speak.
engSearchText:
I suspect this whole thing was probably just a
changing of the guard over at Heiyue, so to speak.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0972}ま、今回の件は黒月の世代交代を ある程度印象づけるものだっただろ。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0972}ま、今回の件は黒月の世代交代を
ある程度印象づけるものだっただろ。

engChrName: Fan went to mourn the dead and visit their families.
engSearchText: Fan went to mourn the dead and visit their families.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0973}ファン大人は、亡くなった若者たちへの 弔いと家族への見舞いをした上で──
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0973}ファン大人は、亡くなった若者たちへの
弔いと家族への見舞いをした上で──

engChrName: Even sent the bodies of the thugs back home—well, those with enough of a body left to send.
engSearchText:
Even sent the bodies of the thugs back home—well,
those with enough of a body left to send.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0974}遺体が残っていた半グレたちについても、 きちんと弔って亡骸を故郷に返した。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0974}遺体が残っていた半グレたちについても、
きちんと弔って亡骸を故郷に返した。

engChrName: It's all made him pretty popular around here.
engSearchText: It's all made him pretty popular around here.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0975}完全に民衆の支持を得たってわけだ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0975}完全に民衆の支持を得たってわけだ。

engChrName: No doubt thanks to Cao's schemes.
engSearchText: No doubt thanks to Cao's schemes.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0976}で、それを支えるのがツァオと。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0976}で、それを支えるのがツァオと。

engChrName: He's already done so much over in Crossbell and Erebonia, and now he's masterminded all this, too.
engSearchText:
He's already done so much over in Crossbell and
Erebonia, and now he's masterminded all this, too.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0977}元々クロスベルと帝国方面の利権を 握っている上、今回の結末も全て導いた。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0977}元々クロスベルと帝国方面の利権を
握っている上、今回の結末も全て導いた。

engChrName: People are starting to talk about him being a future elder.
engSearchText:
People are starting to talk about him being a
future elder.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0978}早くも次期長老入りが囁かれてるみたい。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0978}早くも次期長老入りが囁かれてるみたい。

engChrName: Bah! That freakin' guy...
engSearchText: Bah! That freakin' guy...
jpnChrName: クソ……！ やっぱり利用されただけじゃねーか！
jpnSearchText:
クソ……！
やっぱり利用されただけじゃねーか！

engChrName: I knooow, isn't he dreamy? ❤
engSearchText: I knooow, isn't he dreamy? ❤
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0980}はあ…… その怖さに痺れるんだけどね❤
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0980}はあ……
その怖さに痺れるんだけどね❤

engChrName: Oh, right. Did you make it back in time for school, Agnès?
engSearchText:
Oh, right. Did you make it back in time for
school, Agnès?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0981}あ、そういえばアニエス、 結局学校には間に合ったの？
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0981}あ、そういえばアニエス、
結局学校には間に合ったの？

engChrName: Ahaha... Not quite.
engSearchText: Ahaha... Not quite.
jpnChrName: あはは…… やっぱり遅刻しちゃいまして。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
やっぱり遅刻しちゃいまして。

engChrName: How many times did I warn you about missin' the night train?
engSearchText:
How many times did I warn you about missin' the
night train?
jpnChrName: 当たり前だろ…… だから夜行で戻れっつったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
当たり前だろ……
だから夜行で戻れっつったんだ。

engChrName: You sound like you're her dad or something.
engSearchText: You sound like you're her dad or something.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、それは水臭いです。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、それは水臭いです。

engChrName: Not like it would have been easy to leave anyway. Between the guild, police, and navy, it was a real mess.
engSearchText:
Not like it would have been easy to leave anyway.
Between the guild, police, and navy, it was a
real mess.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0985}あの夜の後始末は大変だったもんねぇ。 ギルドに警察に、海軍まで出張ってきて。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0985}あの夜の後始末は大変だったもんねぇ。
ギルドに警察に、海軍まで出張ってきて。

engChrName: Van ended up giving us a ride back in the early hours of the morning...
engSearchText:
Van ended up giving us a ride back in the early hours
of the morning...
jpnChrName: 結局夜行に間に合わず、早朝の未明に ヴァンさんたちと一緒に車で戻りました。
jpnSearchText:
結局夜行に間に合わず、早朝の未明に
ヴァンさんたちと一緒に車で戻りました。

engChrName: ...so at least I was still able to attend my afternoon classes.
engSearchText:
...so at least I was still able to attend my
afternoon classes.
jpnChrName: 一応、午後から出席しましたけど。
jpnSearchText: 一応、午後から出席しましたけど。

engChrName: If I were you, I'd have called it a wash and taken the rest of the day off.
engSearchText:
If I were you, I'd have called it a wash and taken the
rest of the day off.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0988}真面目ねぇ…… なら午後も休んじゃえばいいのに。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0988}真面目ねぇ……
なら午後も休んじゃえばいいのに。

engChrName: That's our model student for you.
engSearchText: That's our model student for you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、アニエスさんらしいです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、アニエスさんらしいです。

engChrName: Are you glad you got to see things through to the end?
engSearchText:
Are you glad you got to see things through to
the end?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0990}そっか── 最後まで見届けたかったんだね？
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0990}そっか──
最後まで見届けたかったんだね？

engChrName: Yes. Though, I don't feel like I was able to contribute that much.
engSearchText:
Yes. Though, I don't feel like I was able to contribute
that much.
jpnChrName: はい…… 大した力にはなれませんでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
はい……
大した力にはなれませんでしたが。

engChrName: Even so, I'm glad that I was there to provide what help I could.
engSearchText:
Even so, I'm glad that I was there to provide what
help I could.
jpnChrName: それでもこの目で見届けて、 自分に出来ることを最後まで。
jpnSearchText:
それでもこの目で見届けて、
自分に出来ることを最後まで。

engChrName: Heh...
engSearchText: Heh...
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: Are you a lucky boss or what?
engSearchText: Are you a lucky boss or what?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0994}フッ…… いい助手たちに恵まれたじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0994}フッ……
いい助手たちに恵まれたじゃねえか。

engChrName: Can't imagine Elaine's all that pleased about it, though.
engSearchText:
Can't imagine Elaine's all that pleased about
it, though.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_0995}ま、エレイン嬢ちゃんは 気が気じゃないかもしれんがな。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_0995}ま、エレイン嬢ちゃんは
気が気じゃないかもしれんがな。

engChrName: Don't remind me. Already got an earful about it last night.
engSearchText:
Don't remind me. Already got an earful about it
last night.
jpnChrName: ……だからうるせぇよ。 そういやまた釘を刺されたな。
jpnSearchText:
……だからうるせぇよ。
そういやまた釘を刺されたな。

engChrName: So, you given her suggestion any thought?
engSearchText: So, you given her suggestion any thought?
jpnChrName: ──てな話だったがどうよ？
jpnSearchText: ──てな話だったがどうよ？

engChrName: ...I think Elaine would do her best to solve my case. I can trust her.
engSearchText:
...I think Elaine would do her best to solve my case.
I can trust her.
jpnChrName: ……エレインさんは尊敬できる、 とても信頼できる方だと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……エレインさんは尊敬できる、
とても信頼できる方だと思います。

engChrName: However, I've seen firsthand that some problems can only be solved by eschewing conventions. I think there's still more to learn this way.
engSearchText:
However, I've seen firsthand that some problems can
only be solved by eschewing conventions. I think
there's still more to learn this way.
jpnChrName: でも、今回も酷い事件でしたけど…… だからこそ得られた経験や絆がありました。
jpnSearchText:
でも、今回も酷い事件でしたけど……
だからこそ得られた経験や絆がありました。

engChrName: So...I stand by my initial decision.
engSearchText: So...I stand by my initial decision.
jpnChrName: ですから…… 引き続きお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
ですから……
引き続きお願いします。

engChrName: If you say so.
engSearchText: If you say so.
jpnChrName: そうか。
jpnSearchText: そうか。

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: えへへ……
jpnSearchText: えへへ……

engChrName: Keep at it!
engSearchText: Keep at it!
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1007}ふふ、応援してるよ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1007}ふふ、応援してるよ。

engChrName: What she said. You've got this!
engSearchText: What she said. You've got this!
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1008}頑張ってね！
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1008}頑張ってね！

engChrName: Will do!
engSearchText: Will do!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: Hmm. Now the only problem left is Aaron.
engSearchText: Hmm. Now the only problem left is Aaron.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1010}うーん、しかし問題はアーロンよねぇ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1010}うーん、しかし問題はアーロンよねぇ。

engChrName: He's more into older women, so I don't think he'll cause too much grief, but he's still a bad influence...
engSearchText:
He's more into older women, so I don't think he'll
cause too much grief, but he's still a bad influence...
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1011}マザコン気味だから年下にちょっかいは 掛けないと思うけど、風紀は乱しそうだし。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1011}マザコン気味だから年下にちょっかいは
掛けないと思うけど、風紀は乱しそうだし。

engChrName: You think so?
engSearchText: You think so?
jpnChrName: あはは…… アーロンさんに悪いですよ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
アーロンさんに悪いですよ。

engChrName: Is he really that bad?
engSearchText: Is he really that bad?
jpnChrName: 風紀、ですか？
jpnSearchText: 風紀、ですか？

engChrName: ...Hold on. What are we talkin' about right now?
engSearchText: ...Hold on. What are we talkin' about right now?
jpnChrName: ……？　って待て。 どうしてあのガキの名前が出てくる？
jpnSearchText:
……？　って待て。
どうしてあのガキの名前が出てくる？

engChrName: That salve had him knocked out cold by the time we left.
engSearchText:
That salve had him knocked out cold by the time
we left.
jpnChrName: そういやアイツ、例の軟膏の反動で 速攻ブッ倒れてやがったが……
jpnSearchText:
そういやアイツ、例の軟膏の反動で
速攻ブッ倒れてやがったが……

engChrName: He's not gonna be up and around for a few weeks now, right?
engSearchText:
He's not gonna be up and around for a few weeks
now, right?
jpnChrName: たしか半月は動けないんだったか？
jpnSearchText: たしか半月は動けないんだったか？

engChrName: About that—
engSearchText: About that—
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1017}あ、うん、それがね──
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1017}あ、うん、それがね──

engChrName: Leave it to an old fart to think like an old fart.
engSearchText: Leave it to an old fart to think like an old fart.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… オッサンと違ってまだ若いんでなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
オッサンと違ってまだ若いんでなァ。
……………………………

engChrName: Welcome to Edith!
engSearchText: Welcome to Edith!
jpnChrName: お疲れ様です、アーロンさん。
jpnSearchText: お疲れ様です、アーロンさん。

engChrName: Did you find the place all right?
engSearchText: Did you find the place all right?
jpnChrName: 迷いませんでした？
jpnSearchText: 迷いませんでした？

engChrName: It was my first time taking the subway, but it was actually pretty easy.
engSearchText:
It was my first time taking the subway, but it was
actually pretty easy.
jpnChrName: 地下鉄っつーのは初めてだが 迷いはしなかったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
地下鉄っつーのは初めてだが
迷いはしなかったぜ。

engChrName: But damn if this city isn't hella big.
engSearchText: But damn if this city isn't hella big.
jpnChrName: さすが首都── アガるデカさとは思ったけどな。
jpnSearchText:
さすが首都──
アガるデカさとは思ったけどな。

engChrName: Wow! You made good time.
engSearchText: Wow! You made good time.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1024}なんだ、もう着いたんだ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1024}なんだ、もう着いたんだ。

engChrName: I was surprised you made up your mind so quickly.
engSearchText: I was surprised you made up your mind so quickly.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1025}それにしても 決めるのも早かったね？
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1025}それにしても
決めるのも早かったね？

engChrName: Once I did my mourning with Fan and said my goodbyes, that's all there was to do.
engSearchText:
Once I did my mourning with Fan and said my
goodbyes, that's all there was to do.
jpnChrName: セイたちの弔いは爺さんと済ませた…… 街の連中にも挨拶して義理は通したしな。
jpnSearchText:
セイたちの弔いは爺さんと済ませた……
街の連中にも挨拶して義理は通したしな。

engChrName: Oh, by the way, the folks downstairs are letting me rent a room here.
engSearchText:
Oh, by the way, the folks downstairs are letting me
rent a room here.
jpnChrName: ああ、部屋の契約も さっき下で済ませてきたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、部屋の契約も
さっき下で済ませてきたぜ。

engChrName: What?! Why are you even here?!
engSearchText: What?! Why are you even here?!
jpnChrName: はああああっ！？ どういうことだ──！？
jpnSearchText:
はああああっ！？
どういうことだ──！？

engChrName: Thanks to your investigation, I don't have a place to belong anymore.
engSearchText:
Thanks to your investigation, I don't have a place to
belong anymore.
jpnChrName: アンタがしゃしゃり出てきたおかげで 俺は“居場所”を無くした。
jpnSearchText:
アンタがしゃしゃり出てきたおかげで
俺は“居場所”を無くした。

engChrName: But really, this is a chance to take a hard look at myself.
engSearchText:
But really, this is a chance to take a hard look
at myself.
jpnChrName: いや── 改めて見つめ直すきっかけになった。
jpnSearchText:
いや──
改めて見つめ直すきっかけになった。

engChrName: So I told anyone who'd care that I'd be skipping town for a while.
engSearchText:
So I told anyone who'd care that I'd be skipping town
for a while.
jpnChrName: 爺さんやオッサン、ツァオとも話して しばらくの間、煌都を離れることにしてな。
jpnSearchText:
爺さんやオッサン、ツァオとも話して
しばらくの間、煌都を離れることにしてな。

engChrName: And since I have nowhere else to be, you get the honor of hanging with me for a while.
engSearchText:
And since I have nowhere else to be, you get the
honor of hanging with me for a while.
jpnChrName: 代償としてしばらく厄介にならせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: 代償としてしばらく厄介にならせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: I'll crash here, work for you during the day, and see the sights of the capital at night.
engSearchText:
I'll crash here, work for you during the day, and see
the sights of the capital at night.
jpnChrName: 元々、首都には興味があったし、 アルマータにゲネシスってのも気になる。
jpnSearchText:
元々、首都には興味があったし、
アルマータにゲネシスってのも気になる。

engChrName: Oh, and count on me for whatever Almata and Genesis stuff you've got going on.
engSearchText:
Oh, and count on me for whatever Almata and
Genesis stuff you've got going on.
jpnChrName: 大体のコツは掴んでるし 裏解決屋も気が向いたら手伝ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
大体のコツは掴んでるし
裏解決屋も気が向いたら手伝ってやるよ。

engChrName: I look forward to fighting alongside you again!
engSearchText: I look forward to fighting alongside you again!
jpnChrName: 戦力的には頼もしいですっ。
jpnSearchText: 戦力的には頼もしいですっ。

engChrName: We're pleased to have you.
engSearchText: We're pleased to have you.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、よろしくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、よろしくお願いしますね。

engChrName: Ain't you all forgetting who's in charge here?!
engSearchText: Ain't you all forgetting who's in charge here?!
jpnChrName: だから勝手に宜しくすんじゃねえ！！
jpnSearchText: だから勝手に宜しくすんじゃねえ！！

engChrName: Those scheming Heiyue bastards... Pick up your damn phones, already!
engSearchText:
Those scheming Heiyue bastards... Pick up your
damn phones, already!
jpnChrName: あのジジイにツァオの野郎…… ───くそっ、出やがらねえ！
jpnSearchText:
あのジジイにツァオの野郎……
───くそっ、出やがらねえ！

engChrName: Careful. You're gonna sprout some gray hairs at this rate.
engSearchText:
Careful. You're gonna sprout some gray hairs at
this rate.
jpnChrName: 往生際が悪ぃなァ、オッサン。
jpnSearchText: 往生際が悪ぃなァ、オッサン。

engChrName: I think it's time to fold, pal.
engSearchText: I think it's time to fold, pal.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1040}クク……ま、しっかりやれよ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1040}クク……ま、しっかりやれよ。

engChrName: I'm sure it'll be fine.
engSearchText: I'm sure it'll be fine.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1041}あんたなら大丈夫でしょ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1041}あんたなら大丈夫でしょ。

engChrName: Aaron, remember to be a courteous guest, all right?
engSearchText: Aaron, remember to be a courteous guest, all right?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_20_1042}あ、でもこっちでみたいに あんまり傍若無人に振る舞わないのよ？
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_20_1042}あ、でもこっちでみたいに
あんまり傍若無人に振る舞わないのよ？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah.
jpnChrName: あー、分かってるって。
jpnSearchText: あー、分かってるって。

engChrName: Just take care of Langport while I'm away, will ya?
engSearchText: Just take care of Langport while I'm away, will ya?
jpnChrName: ──そんじゃあ 留守中、そっちは任せたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──そんじゃあ
留守中、そっちは任せたぜ。

engChrName: Main 4SPG [Business Trip to Langport] completed! Received
engSearchText:
Main 4SPG [Business Trip to Langport] completed!
Received
jpnChrName: メイン４ｓｐｇ【ラングポートへの出張業務】の 報酬として
jpnSearchText:
メイン４ｓｐｇ【ラングポートへの出張業務】の
報酬として

engChrName: Main 4SPG [Helping Aaron] completed! Received
engSearchText:
Main 4SPG [Helping Aaron] completed!
Received
jpnChrName: メイン４ｓｐｇ【アーロンへの助太刀】の 報酬として
jpnSearchText:
メイン４ｓｐｇ【アーロンへの助太刀】の
報酬として

engChrName: So, you wanna go out for a drink or two tonight, Paulette?
engSearchText:
So, you wanna go out for a drink or two
tonight, Paulette?
jpnChrName: なあなあ、ポーレット。 今夜あたりに飲みに行かねえ？
jpnSearchText:
なあなあ、ポーレット。
今夜あたりに飲みに行かねえ？

engChrName: Heehee. You really shouldn't tease your elders, Aaron.
engSearchText:
Heehee. You really shouldn't tease your
elders, Aaron.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、あんまりオバさんを からかうものじゃないわ、アーロン君。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、あんまりオバさんを
からかうものじゃないわ、アーロン君。

engChrName: Hey! You leave Mommy alone!
engSearchText: Hey! You leave Mommy alone!
jpnChrName: こらアーロン！ ママにちょっかいかけんな！
jpnSearchText:
こらアーロン！
ママにちょっかいかけんな！

engChrName: This brat's somethin' else...
engSearchText: This brat's somethin' else...
jpnChrName: まったくこのガキは……
jpnSearchText: まったくこのガキは……

engChrName: *munch* I kinda feel like she's just brushing him off, though.
engSearchText:
*munch* I kinda feel like she's just brushing him
off, though.
jpnChrName: モグモグ……でもぜんぜん 相手にされていないような。
jpnSearchText:
モグモグ……でもぜんぜん
相手にされていないような。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: So, we're going to be splitting up this afternoon?
engSearchText: So, we're going to be splitting up this afternoon?
jpnChrName: ──では、今日の午後からは 手分けするんですね？
jpnSearchText:
──では、今日の午後からは
手分けするんですね？

engChrName: Yeah, 'cause we've got more people now.
engSearchText: Yeah, 'cause we've got more people now.
jpnChrName: ああ、人手も増えたことだしな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、人手も増えたことだしな。

engChrName: I'm obviously gonna be one of the ones workin' outside, but I'm gonna have one of you come with me, too.
engSearchText:
I'm obviously gonna be one of the ones workin'
outside, but I'm gonna have one of you come with
me, too.
jpnChrName: 俺が外回りするのは前提として、 もう１人サポートについて来てもらう。
jpnSearchText:
俺が外回りするのは前提として、
もう１人サポートについて来てもらう。

engChrName: The remaining two will either be standing by here in the office, or out gatherin' info and looking into things separately.
engSearchText:
The remaining two will either be standing by here in
the office, or out gatherin' info and looking into
things separately.
jpnChrName: それ以外の２人は事務所に待機、もしくは 調べ物とか情報収集を割り振る感じだな。
jpnSearchText:
それ以外の２人は事務所に待機、もしくは
調べ物とか情報収集を割り振る感じだな。

engChrName: And then if we get a job that needs more manpower—like, say, a monster extermination gig— we regroup for it?
engSearchText:
And then if we get a job that needs more
manpower—like, say, a monster extermination gig—
we regroup for it?
jpnChrName: そして手配魔獣だの厄介そうな案件は 集合して一気に片付ける、と。
jpnSearchText:
そして手配魔獣だの厄介そうな案件は
集合して一気に片付ける、と。

engChrName: Sounds good. I don't wanna go around all buddy-buddy with everyone all the time, either.
engSearchText:
Sounds good. I don't wanna go around all
buddy-buddy with everyone all the time, either.
jpnChrName: まあ、ずっと仲良しこよしで 団体行動とかありえねーしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ずっと仲良しこよしで
団体行動とかありえねーしな。

engChrName: That's not a very nice thing to say... Though that does sound pretty efficient to me, too.
engSearchText:
That's not a very nice thing to say... Though that does
sound pretty efficient to me, too.
jpnChrName: む…… でも効率はよさそうです。
jpnSearchText:
む……
でも効率はよさそうです。

engChrName: We don't have any subcontracted work right now, but that could change any second.
engSearchText:
We don't have any subcontracted work right now, but
that could change any second.
jpnChrName: 現状、“下請け”の仕事は 届いていないっぽいが……
jpnSearchText:
現状、“下請け”の仕事は
届いていないっぽいが……

engChrName: Either way, the main team's focus is gonna be patrolling districts where it feels like something might happen while watchin' the 4SPGs.
engSearchText:
Either way, the main team's focus is gonna be
patrolling districts where it feels like something might
happen while watchin' the 4SPGs.
jpnChrName: あとは何か起きそうな区画を見回りつつ ４ｓｐｇを回収する……そんなノリだな。
jpnSearchText:
あとは何か起きそうな区画を見回りつつ
４ｓｐｇを回収する……そんなノリだな。

engChrName: 'Where something might happen'? Can you really tell that?
engSearchText:
'Where something might happen'? Can you really
tell that?
jpnChrName: 何か起きそうって…… そんなこと分かるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
何か起きそうって……
そんなこと分かるんですか？

engChrName: Makes sense to me.
engSearchText: Makes sense to me.
jpnChrName: ハッ……なんとなく分かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……なんとなく分かるぜ。

engChrName: After you've lived in a place long enough to know it like your own backyard, you just know when something smells off.
engSearchText:
After you've lived in a place long enough to know it
like your own backyard, you just know when
something smells off.
jpnChrName: 庭同然に馴染んでる街なら、 自然と鼻は利いてくるもんだからな。
jpnSearchText:
庭同然に馴染んでる街なら、
自然と鼻は利いてくるもんだからな。

engChrName: Really? Hmm...
engSearchText: Really? Hmm...
jpnChrName: そういうものですか……
jpnSearchText: そういうものですか……

engChrName: There's always stuff you're gonna miss if you don't go lookin' around, so that's what we're gonna do.
engSearchText:
There's always stuff you're gonna miss if you don't go
lookin' around, so that's what we're gonna do.
jpnChrName: まあ、それだけじゃ取りこぼすから 結局は足を使うしかねぇんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それだけじゃ取りこぼすから
結局は足を使うしかねぇんだがな。

engChrName: Life's full of surprises, especially in a field like this.
engSearchText: Life's full of surprises, especially in a field like this.
jpnChrName: それに、予想外のことは起こるもんだ。 こういう仕事をしてると特にな。
jpnSearchText:
それに、予想外のことは起こるもんだ。
こういう仕事をしてると特にな。

engChrName: So that's why we need to split up and be flexible?
engSearchText: So that's why we need to split up and be flexible?
jpnChrName: だからこそ役割分担して 柔軟に対応していくんですね。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ役割分担して
柔軟に対応していくんですね。

engChrName: I'll have to work very hard not to be the one holding the whole team back!
engSearchText:
I'll have to work very hard not to be the one holding
the whole team back!
jpnChrName: 私もフェリちゃんやアーロンさんに 負けないように頑張らないと……！
jpnSearchText:
私もフェリちゃんやアーロンさんに
負けないように頑張らないと……！

engChrName: There's no need to think that hard about it. Other than the fact we're splittin' up, everything else is gonna be the same as it always was.
engSearchText:
There's no need to think that hard about it.
Other than the fact we're splittin' up, everything else
is gonna be the same as it always was.
jpnChrName: あー、肩肘張る必要はねぇ。 分担以外は今まで通りだしな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、肩肘張る必要はねぇ。
分担以外は今まで通りだしな。

engChrName: Anyway, looks like it's noon already.
engSearchText: Anyway, looks like it's noon already.
jpnChrName: と、そうこう言っている間に 正午を回ったか。
jpnSearchText:
と、そうこう言っている間に
正午を回ったか。

engChrName: Then let's get to work!
engSearchText: Then let's get to work!
jpnChrName: そろそろ行動再開、ですね！
jpnSearchText: そろそろ行動再開、ですね！

engChrName: Now it's my turn to see what you guys can do.
engSearchText: Now it's my turn to see what you guys can do.
jpnChrName: クク、今度はこっちが お手並み拝見させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、今度はこっちが
お手並み拝見させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Select one additional member to accompany Van. They can be swapped out later.
engSearchText:
Select one additional member to accompany Van.
They can be swapped out later.
jpnChrName: 同行メンバーを１人選んでください。 （後で変更も可能です。）
jpnSearchText:
同行メンバーを１人選んでください。
（後で変更も可能です。）

engChrName: (Should we head over to the park now?)
engSearchText: (Should we head over to the park now?)
jpnChrName: （そろそろ記念公園に向かうか？）
jpnSearchText: （そろそろ記念公園に向かうか？）

engChrName: (We'd best take care of everything that needs doing here before we go.)
engSearchText:
(We'd best take care of everything that needs doing
here before we go.)
jpnChrName: （他に用事があるなら今のうちに   片付けた方がよさそうだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（他に用事があるなら今のうちに
片付けた方がよさそうだが……）

engChrName: After you set off for the memorial park, the main story will advance.
engSearchText:
After you set off for the memorial park, the main
story will advance.
jpnChrName: 記念公園に向かうと メインのストーリーが進行します。
jpnSearchText:
記念公園に向かうと
メインのストーリーが進行します。

engChrName: Van contacted the backup members and explained the situation.
engSearchText:
Van contacted the backup members and explained
the situation.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは待機メンバーに連絡して 記念公園に向かう事情を説明し……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは待機メンバーに連絡して
記念公園に向かう事情を説明し……

engChrName: Before long, everyone was gathered in front of the garage and ready to go.
engSearchText:
Before long, everyone was gathered in front of the
garage and ready to go.
jpnChrName: ほどなくして全員がガレージ前に集合した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ほどなくして全員がガレージ前に集合した。

engChrName: So the memorial park is a place people from the capital go to relax?
engSearchText:
So the memorial park is a place people from the
capital go to relax?
jpnChrName: 記念公園……首都の人たちの 憩いの場所、なんですか。
jpnSearchText:
記念公園……首都の人たちの
憩いの場所、なんですか。

engChrName: That's right. Whole families sometimes go there for picnics, for example.
engSearchText:
That's right. Whole families sometimes go there for
picnics, for example.
jpnChrName: ええ、家族でピクニックに 行ったりする場所ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、家族でピクニックに
行ったりする場所ですね。

engChrName: It's also popular for couples going on dates, since it's split into multiple areas, each with their own natural charms.
engSearchText:
It's also popular for couples going on dates, since it's
split into multiple areas, each with their own
natural charms.
jpnChrName: 自然豊かで色んなエリアがあって デートスポットとしても人気みたいです。
jpnSearchText:
自然豊かで色んなエリアがあって
デートスポットとしても人気みたいです。

engChrName: That sounds like a perfect place to do some combat drills!
engSearchText:
That sounds like a perfect place to do some
combat drills!
jpnChrName: むむ、なんだか格好の 演習場所な気もしますねっ。
jpnSearchText:
むむ、なんだか格好の
演習場所な気もしますねっ。

engChrName: Small fry here never changes...
engSearchText: Small fry here never changes...
jpnChrName: このチビもブレねぇな。
jpnSearchText: このチビもブレねぇな。

engChrName: It's within walkin' distance if you really want to go that way, but most people just head there by car or by bus.
engSearchText:
It's within walkin' distance if you really want to go
that way, but most people just head there by car or
by bus.
jpnChrName: ま、歩いて行けなくもないが バスか車で行くのが普通だ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、歩いて行けなくもないが
バスか車で行くのが普通だ。

engChrName: It's about thirty minutes from here in the car.
engSearchText: It's about thirty minutes from here in the car.
jpnChrName: ここからだと３０分くらいか。
jpnSearchText: ここからだと３０分くらいか。

engChrName: Tch. Kind of a trek, but I guess we've got no choice.
engSearchText: Tch. Kind of a trek, but I guess we've got no choice.
jpnChrName: チッ、面倒クセーがしゃーねぇ。
jpnSearchText: チッ、面倒クセーがしゃーねぇ。

engChrName: Let's see what this pickup of yours is like to ride.
engSearchText: Let's see what this pickup of yours is like to ride.
jpnChrName: ご自慢のそのピックアップ、 乗り心地を試させてもらおうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ご自慢のそのピックアップ、
乗り心地を試させてもらおうじゃねえか。

engChrName: Oh, that's right. This will be your first time in Van's car.
engSearchText:
Oh, that's right. This will be your first time in
Van's car.
jpnChrName: あ、そういえばアーロンさんは 何気に初めて乗るんでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、そういえばアーロンさんは
何気に初めて乗るんでしたね。

engChrName: You better not get her dirty, punkass.
engSearchText: You better not get her dirty, punkass.
jpnChrName: ……汚すんじゃねーぞ？
jpnSearchText: ……汚すんじゃねーぞ？

engChrName: Little late for that. Poor thing probably stinks of old man musk after years of carrying you around.
engSearchText:
Little late for that. Poor thing probably stinks of old
man musk after years of carrying you around.
jpnChrName: オヤジ臭が染みついてるんだろうし 細かいこと言ってんじゃねえっつの。
jpnSearchText:
オヤジ臭が染みついてるんだろうし
細かいこと言ってんじゃねえっつの。

engChrName: Hahaha! I'm gonna murder you someday, you little shit.
engSearchText:
Hahaha! I'm gonna murder you someday, you
little shit.
jpnChrName: ハハハ、殺すぞクソガキ。
jpnSearchText: ハハハ、殺すぞクソガキ。

engChrName: Oh! Excuse me... (Wait. This number belongs to...)
engSearchText:
Oh! Excuse me...
(Wait. This number belongs to...)
jpnChrName: あ、失礼します…… （ってこの番号は。）
jpnSearchText:
あ、失礼します……
（ってこの番号は。）

engChrName: Hello? Yes, I'm glad you called, actually.
engSearchText: Hello? Yes, I'm glad you called, actually.
jpnChrName: もしもし──先輩ですか？
jpnSearchText: もしもし──先輩ですか？

engChrName: I'm afraid I might be back a little late today, you see...
engSearchText: I'm afraid I might be back a little late today, you see...
jpnChrName: ちょうど良かった、実は今日は 戻るのが遅くなりそうで……
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど良かった、実は今日は
戻るのが遅くなりそうで……

engChrName: What? From my family?!
engSearchText: What? From my family?!
jpnChrName: ……ええっ、実家から！？
jpnSearchText: ……ええっ、実家から！？

engChrName: But I'm about to...
engSearchText: But I'm about to...
jpnChrName: ………で、ですがこれから………
jpnSearchText: ………で、ですがこれから………

engChrName: Well, I'm not going to force you to come back. It's all up to you.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm not going to force you to come back. It's all
up to you.
jpnChrName: ま、戻るかどうかは 貴女の判断に任せるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、戻るかどうかは
貴女の判断に任せるわ。

engChrName: ...Message received. I'm on my way.
engSearchText: ...Message received. I'm on my way.
jpnChrName: ……分かりました、先輩。 すぐに戻りますので。
jpnSearchText:
……分かりました、先輩。
すぐに戻りますので。

engChrName: Yes. Of course. Goodbye for now, then.
engSearchText: Yes. Of course. Goodbye for now, then.
jpnChrName: はい、はい……失礼します。
jpnSearchText: はい、はい……失礼します。

engChrName: I'm so sorry. Something important's come up that I really need to take care of.
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry. Something important's come up that I
really need to take care of.
jpnChrName: ……すみません、 急用が入ってしまって……
jpnSearchText:
……すみません、
急用が入ってしまって……

engChrName: Don't sweat it. Go do whatever you gotta do.
engSearchText: Don't sweat it. Go do whatever you gotta do.
jpnChrName: あー、いいから行ってこい。
jpnSearchText: あー、いいから行ってこい。

engChrName: The rest of us can handle a few stray critters.
engSearchText: The rest of us can handle a few stray critters.
jpnChrName: こっちは気にすんな、魔獣相手なら 俺たちだけで十分対応できんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちは気にすんな、魔獣相手なら
俺たちだけで十分対応できんだろ。

engChrName: I'm sure you can, but...please, be careful.
engSearchText: I'm sure you can, but...please, be careful.
jpnChrName: はい…… どうか気を付けてくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
はい……
どうか気を付けてくださいね。

engChrName: Again, my apologies. I'll make my way back to the office as soon as I'm done!
engSearchText:
Again, my apologies. I'll make my way back to the
office as soon as I'm done!
jpnChrName: その、用事を片付けたら 事務所に顔を出しますのでっ。
jpnSearchText:
その、用事を片付けたら
事務所に顔を出しますのでっ。

engChrName: Huh.
engSearchText: Huh.
jpnChrName: ハン……？
jpnSearchText: ハン……？

engChrName: Wh-What was all that about? Agnès doesn't usually lose her composure like that.
engSearchText:
Wh-What was all that about? Agnès doesn't usually
lose her composure like that.
jpnChrName: ど、どうしたんでしょう？ 随分慌ててましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
ど、どうしたんでしょう？
随分慌ててましたけど……

engChrName: Just let her do her thing. We'll get our job done and be back here by this evening.
engSearchText:
Just let her do her thing. We'll get our job done and
be back here by this evening.
jpnChrName: いいからとっとと乗りな。 夕方までには片付けて戻るぞ。
jpnSearchText:
いいからとっとと乗りな。
夕方までには片付けて戻るぞ。

engChrName: On their way back, they stopped to purchase some coffee beans from a roastery near the market in the 9th District...
engSearchText:
On their way back, they stopped to purchase some
coffee beans from a roastery near the market in the
9th District...
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは九区にある 市場近くの焙煎所で珈琲豆を仕入れ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンたちは九区にある
市場近くの焙煎所で珈琲豆を仕入れ……

engChrName: ...and by the time they returned to Old Town, the rain was coming down even more heavily.
engSearchText:
...and by the time they returned to Old Town, the
rain was coming down even more heavily.
jpnChrName: 旧市街に戻る頃には雨脚も少し強くなっていた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>旧市街に戻る頃には雨脚も少し強くなっていた。

engChrName: Huh.
engSearchText: Huh.
jpnChrName: おっと。
jpnSearchText: おっと。

engChrName: It looks like she's finished whatever she needed to deal with.
engSearchText:
It looks like she's finished whatever she needed to
deal with.
jpnChrName: 用事、済んだみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: 用事、済んだみたいですね。

engChrName: Can't believe she actually waited here. Starch-straight laces, I swear.
engSearchText:
Can't believe she actually waited here.
Starch-straight laces, I swear.
jpnChrName: マジで待ってやがるとは、 クソ真面目な小娘だな。
jpnSearchText:
マジで待ってやがるとは、
クソ真面目な小娘だな。

engChrName: Welcome back, everyone. How did things go at the park?
engSearchText:
Welcome back, everyone. How did things go at
the park?
jpnChrName: お帰りなさい、皆さん。 記念公園の方はどうでした？
jpnSearchText:
お帰りなさい、皆さん。
記念公園の方はどうでした？

engChrName: Oh, it was no problem at all.
engSearchText: Oh, it was no problem at all.
jpnChrName: はいっ、滞りなく。
jpnSearchText: はいっ、滞りなく。

engChrName: Something up? You look oddly tired.
engSearchText: Something up? You look oddly tired.
jpnChrName: ……？ なんだ、微妙に疲れた顔してるな。
jpnSearchText:
……？
なんだ、微妙に疲れた顔してるな。

engChrName: I-I do? I can't imagine why...
engSearchText: I-I do? I can't imagine why...
jpnChrName: え……そ、そうですか？ そんなことはありませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
え……そ、そうですか？
そんなことはありませんけど。

engChrName: I really can't apologize enough for walking off like that during work hours, though. I—
engSearchText:
I really can't apologize enough for walking off like
that during work hours, though. I—
jpnChrName: その、急な用事ですみませんでした。 今日の活動については──
jpnSearchText:
その、急な用事ですみませんでした。
今日の活動については──

engChrName: So you're the spriggan, are you?
engSearchText: So you're the spriggan, are you?
jpnChrName: ──アンタが解決屋って人だな？
jpnSearchText: ──アンタが解決屋って人だな？

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: えっと……？
jpnSearchText: えっと……？

engChrName: Who's this runt?
engSearchText: Who's this runt?
jpnChrName: なんだ、この小僧は。
jpnSearchText: なんだ、この小僧は。

engChrName: Wh-What are you doing here, Albert?
engSearchText: Wh-What are you doing here, Albert?
jpnChrName: ア、アルベール君？ どうしてここに……
jpnSearchText:
ア、アルベール君？
どうしてここに……

engChrName: Ahh. This a classmate of yours? Shoulda put two and two together when I saw the uniform.
engSearchText:
Ahh. This a classmate of yours? Shoulda put two and
two together when I saw the uniform.
jpnChrName: ああ、アラミスの同級生か。 そういや制服も着ているな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アラミスの同級生か。
そういや制服も着ているな。

engChrName: *whistle* He your boyfriend or something?
engSearchText: *whistle* He your boyfriend or something?
jpnChrName: お、もしかして彼氏かよ？
jpnSearchText: お、もしかして彼氏かよ？

engChrName: Wait! Is he?!
engSearchText: Wait! Is he?!
jpnChrName: ！　そうなんですかっ！？
jpnSearchText: ！　そうなんですかっ！？

engChrName: N-No! He's just a classmate I've known for a long—
engSearchText: N-No! He's just a classmate I've known for a long—
jpnChrName: い、いえ、昔からのお友だちで──
jpnSearchText: い、いえ、昔からのお友だちで──

engChrName: I'll just come out and say it... Take your poisonous fangs out of my friend!
engSearchText:
I'll just come out and say it... Take your poisonous
fangs out of my friend!
jpnChrName: 単刀直入に言う──これ以上、 アニエスを誑かさないでくれないか！？
jpnSearchText:
単刀直入に言う──これ以上、
アニエスを誑かさないでくれないか！？

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?

engChrName: A-A-Albert?! What are you saying?!
engSearchText: A-A-Albert?! What are you saying?!
jpnChrName: ア、アルベール君っ……！？
jpnSearchText: ア、アルベール君っ……！？

engChrName: I've heard a LOT of unpleasant rumors about you.
engSearchText: I've heard a LOT of unpleasant rumors about you.
jpnChrName: アンタの噂は色々聞いた……
jpnSearchText: アンタの噂は色々聞いた……

engChrName: They call you a good-for-nothing who takes on all manner of borderline-criminal requests.
engSearchText:
They call you a good-for-nothing who takes on all
manner of borderline-criminal requests.
jpnChrName: なんでも違法スレスレの依頼をこなす ヤクザ者だそうじゃないか！？
jpnSearchText:
なんでも違法スレスレの依頼をこなす
ヤクザ者だそうじゃないか！？

engChrName: You're just taking advantage of her kind nature to force her to do your dirty work, aren't you?!
engSearchText:
You're just taking advantage of her kind nature to
force her to do your dirty work, aren't you?!
jpnChrName: どうせお人好しな彼女に付け込んで 無理矢理働かせているんだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
どうせお人好しな彼女に付け込んで
無理矢理働かせているんだろう！？

engChrName: N-Now hold on! You've got Van all wrong—
engSearchText: N-Now hold on! You've got Van all wrong—
jpnChrName: ま、待ってアルベール君……！ ヴァンさんはそういうのじゃ──
jpnSearchText:
ま、待ってアルベール君……！
ヴァンさんはそういうのじゃ──

engChrName: Sorry, but stay out of this, Agnès! Well? Aren't you going to deny it? You can't, can you?!
engSearchText:
Sorry, but stay out of this, Agnès! Well? Aren't you
going to deny it? You can't, can you?!
jpnChrName: アニエス、君は黙っていてくれ！ ──どうした、答えられないのか！？
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、君は黙っていてくれ！
──どうした、答えられないのか！？

engChrName: Slow your roll, there, kiddo.
engSearchText: Slow your roll, there, kiddo.
jpnChrName: まあ待て、落ち着け少年。
jpnSearchText: まあ待て、落ち着け少年。

engChrName: ...This is about when she got back real late a while ago, right?
engSearchText:
...This is about when she got back real late a while
ago, right?
jpnChrName: ……そうか、この前の 大遅刻の件についてだな？
jpnSearchText:
……そうか、この前の
大遅刻の件についてだな？

engChrName: Guess that's what made you start worryin' about her, huh? Especially now that she's gettin' calls from home.
engSearchText:
Guess that's what made you start worryin' about
her, huh? Especially now that she's gettin' calls
from home.
jpnChrName: “実家”からの呼び出しもあって いよいよ心配になっちまったわけか。
jpnSearchText:
“実家”からの呼び出しもあって
いよいよ心配になっちまったわけか。

engChrName: H-How do you...?
engSearchText: H-How do you...?
jpnChrName: っ……ど、どうして……
jpnSearchText: っ……ど、どうして……

engChrName: Anyone can connect the dots when the clues are this obvious. How naïve can you get?
engSearchText:
Anyone can connect the dots when the clues are
this obvious. How naïve can you get?
jpnChrName: ま、聞いてりゃ誰でも分かるわな。 ピュアだねぇ～、学生クンは。
jpnSearchText:
ま、聞いてりゃ誰でも分かるわな。
ピュアだねぇ～、学生クンは。

engChrName: He seems like a nice guy to me.
engSearchText: He seems like a nice guy to me.
jpnChrName: ふふ、親切な人みたいですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、親切な人みたいですね。

engChrName: Wh-What's wrong with being concerned about your friends?!
engSearchText:
Wh-What's wrong with being concerned about
your friends?!
jpnChrName: ゆ、友人を心配して何が悪い！？
jpnSearchText: ゆ、友人を心配して何が悪い！？

engChrName: This all started because YOU casually decided to hire her without thinking of the consequences!
engSearchText:
This all started because YOU casually decided to hire
her without thinking of the consequences!
jpnChrName: そもそも彼女を軽々しく 雇うなんてのが間違ってるんだ！
jpnSearchText:
そもそも彼女を軽々しく
雇うなんてのが間違ってるんだ！

engChrName: If word was to get out that Agnès is working with seedy people like you, it would put her father in a very—
engSearchText:
If word was to get out that Agnès is working with
seedy people like you, it would put her father in a
very—
jpnChrName: そんな所でバイトしてるなんて知られたら お父上の名前に──
jpnSearchText:
そんな所でバイトしてるなんて知られたら
お父上の名前に──

engChrName: ALBERT!
engSearchText: ALBERT!
jpnChrName: ──アルベール君っ……！
jpnSearchText: <S5>──アルベール君っ……！

engChrName: ...I'm sorry. I said too much. But I still—
engSearchText: ...I'm sorry. I said too much. But I still—
jpnChrName: ……すまない、だけど僕は……！
jpnSearchText: ……すまない、だけど僕は……！

engChrName: (...Who is her dad?)
engSearchText: (...Who is her dad?)

engChrName: There you are! I knew we'd find you here.
engSearchText: There you are! I knew we'd find you here.
jpnChrName: あーっ、やっぱりここに来てた！
jpnSearchText: あーっ、やっぱりここに来てた！

engChrName: You really need to stop charging in like a bull in a glass shop, Albert!
engSearchText:
You really need to stop charging in like a bull in a
glass shop, Albert!
jpnChrName: もー、アルベールは すぐ先走るんだから～！
jpnSearchText:
もー、アルベールは
すぐ先走るんだから～！

engChrName: Heehee. He never changes.
engSearchText: Heehee. He never changes.
jpnChrName: うふふ、らしいけどね。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、らしいけどね。

engChrName: O-Odette! Renne!
engSearchText: O-Odette! Renne!
jpnChrName: オ、オデットに…… ──ブライト先輩！？
jpnSearchText:
オ、オデットに……
──ブライト先輩！？

engChrName: Oh! More of Agnès' friends!
engSearchText: Oh! More of Agnès' friends!
jpnChrName: あ…… またお友達ですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
あ……
またお友達ですねっ。

engChrName: For real? What is this, a field trip?
engSearchText: For real? What is this, a field trip?
jpnChrName: ハン、次から次へと。
jpnSearchText: ハン、次から次へと。

engChrName: What are you two doing here?
engSearchText: What are you two doing here?
jpnChrName: オデット、先輩までどうして……
jpnSearchText: オデット、先輩までどうして……

engChrName: We're here to tell you off, duh. I thought I already told you that you need to let Agnès live her own life.
engSearchText:
We're here to tell you off, duh. I thought I already
told you that you need to let Agnès live her own life.
jpnChrName: ダメじゃない、見守ってあげよって ちゃんと話したでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
ダメじゃない、見守ってあげよって
ちゃんと話したでしょ？

engChrName: You have serious tunnel vision when it comes to her, and you need to do something about it.
engSearchText:
You have serious tunnel vision when it comes to her,
and you need to do something about it.
jpnChrName: まったくアニエスの事になると すーぐ周りが見えなくなるんだから。
jpnSearchText:
まったくアニエスの事になると
すーぐ周りが見えなくなるんだから。

engChrName: N-No, I don't...! I just...
engSearchText: N-No, I don't...! I just...
jpnChrName: ばっ、ちがっ、僕は別に……！
jpnSearchText: ばっ、ちがっ、僕は別に……！

engChrName: Oh, right! I'm Odette, by the way! Nice to finally meet you all.
engSearchText:
Oh, right! I'm Odette, by the way! Nice to finally
meet you all.
jpnChrName: どうも初めまして！ あたし、オデットって言います！
jpnSearchText:
どうも初めまして！
あたし、オデットって言います！

engChrName: I've heard a lot about you guys from Agnès!
engSearchText: I've heard a lot about you guys from Agnès!
jpnChrName: ウチのアニエスがいつも お世話になってるみたいで！
jpnSearchText:
ウチのアニエスがいつも
お世話になってるみたいで！

engChrName: Ooh, you must be Feri! Oh. My. Goodness, you really are SO ADORABLE!
engSearchText:
Ooh, you must be Feri! Oh. My. Goodness, you really
are SO ADORABLE!
jpnChrName: わわっ、貴女がフェリちゃん？ メチャクチャ可愛い～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
わわっ、貴女がフェリちゃん？
メチャクチャ可愛い～っ！！

engChrName: And wow! I knew you were hot, Aaron, but the sun's got nothing on you!
engSearchText:
And wow! I knew you were hot, Aaron, but the sun's
got nothing on you!
jpnChrName: アーロンさんも聞いてた以上の 超絶イケメンですねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんも聞いてた以上の
超絶イケメンですねぇ！

engChrName: And...well, yeah, Van, you got some mega bad boy vibes—which trust me, only makes you look cooler.
engSearchText:
And...well, yeah, Van, you got some mega bad boy
vibes—which trust me, only makes you look cooler.
jpnChrName: そしてヴァンさん──チョイ悪っぽいけど 結構カッコイイじゃないですか～！
jpnSearchText:
そしてヴァンさん──チョイ悪っぽいけど
結構カッコイイじゃないですか～！

engChrName: You're a lot younger than I was expecting, by the way. I thought you'd be way older. No offense!
engSearchText:
You're a lot younger than I was expecting, by the way.
I thought you'd be way older. No offense!
jpnChrName: 思ってたよりずっとお若いし！ もっとオジサンなのかと、な～んて！
jpnSearchText:
思ってたよりずっとお若いし！
もっとオジサンなのかと、な～んて！

engChrName: Thanks, I...think...?
engSearchText: Thanks, I...think...?
jpnChrName: お、おう……
jpnSearchText: お、おう……

engChrName: O-Odette, please! You're being very rude!
engSearchText: O-Odette, please! You're being very rude!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっとオデット、 失礼ですってば……！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっとオデット、
失礼ですってば……！

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Damn. No off button on this girl, huh?
engSearchText: Damn. No off button on this girl, huh?
jpnChrName: ハン、姦しいことこの上ねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ハン、姦しいことこの上ねぇな。

engChrName: Heehee. Don't mind our resident ball of energy over here.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Don't mind our resident ball of energy
over here.
jpnChrName: クスクス……いきなり来て 騒がしくしてごめんなさい。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……いきなり来て
騒がしくしてごめんなさい。

engChrName: We're all members of Aramis Academy's Student Council.
engSearchText:
We're all members of Aramis Academy's
Student Council.
jpnChrName: 私たち、アラミス高等学校で “生徒会”をやっているの。
jpnSearchText:
私たち、アラミス高等学校で
“生徒会”をやっているの。

engChrName: Agnès is in charge of general affairs.
engSearchText: Agnès is in charge of general affairs.
jpnChrName: アニエスも庶務として ずっと一緒にやってきた仲間でね。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスも庶務として
ずっと一緒にやってきた仲間でね。

engChrName: I apologize our treasurer got a little...hmm... ahead of himself.
engSearchText:
I apologize our treasurer got a little...hmm...
ahead of himself.
jpnChrName: ウチの会計君も心配で たまらなくなっちゃったみたい。
jpnSearchText:
ウチの会計君も心配で
たまらなくなっちゃったみたい。

engChrName: Nah, it's fine. Can't blame the kid for bein' worried.
engSearchText: Nah, it's fine. Can't blame the kid for bein' worried.
jpnChrName: ……いや、気にすんな。 その心配もごもっともだしな。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、気にすんな。
その心配もごもっともだしな。

engChrName: But her wants have come first and foremost so far, and I plan on keepin' it that way.
engSearchText:
But her wants have come first and foremost so far,
and I plan on keepin' it that way.
jpnChrName: あくまで彼女自身の意志を 尊重すんのは変わりねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで彼女自身の意志を
尊重すんのは変わりねぇが。

engChrName: Hrgh...
engSearchText: Hrgh...
jpnChrName: ぐっ……！
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……！

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Sounds like a good deal to me.
engSearchText: Sounds like a good deal to me.
jpnChrName: ま、結局はそこだしねぇ～。
jpnSearchText: ま、結局はそこだしねぇ～。

engChrName: Well, all I ask as Student Council president and her dorm neighbor...
engSearchText:
Well, all I ask as Student Council president and her
dorm neighbor...
jpnChrName: うふふ、くれぐれも安全には 配慮してくれると助かるわ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、くれぐれも安全には
配慮してくれると助かるわ。

engChrName: ...is that you do your best to keep her safe.
engSearchText: ...is that you do your best to keep her safe.
jpnChrName: 生徒会長としても、だけど 同じ寮のお隣さんとしてもね。
jpnSearchText:
生徒会長としても、だけど
同じ寮のお隣さんとしてもね。

engChrName: Now, let's get going, Albert. Agnès clearly still has some work to do.
engSearchText:
Now, let's get going, Albert. Agnès clearly still has
some work to do.
jpnChrName: ──ほらアルベール君。 彼女はまだ用事があるみたい。
jpnSearchText:
──ほらアルベール君。
彼女はまだ用事があるみたい。

engChrName: We should leave her to it.
engSearchText: We should leave her to it.
jpnChrName: 私たちはこれで失礼するわよ。
jpnSearchText: 私たちはこれで失礼するわよ。

engChrName: W-Wait! I-I'm not finished—
engSearchText: W-Wait! I-I'm not finished—
jpnChrName: ま、待ってください先輩っ、 僕はまだ……！
jpnSearchText:
ま、待ってください先輩っ、
僕はまだ……！

engChrName: Really? Very well. As long as you've finished the budget I asked you to handle, you can stay.
engSearchText:
Really? Very well. As long as you've finished the
budget I asked you to handle, you can stay.
jpnChrName: アルベール君──頼んでおいた 例の予算割り当てはどうなってるの？
jpnSearchText:
アルベール君──頼んでおいた
例の予算割り当てはどうなってるの？

engChrName: You DID finish that before coming out here, correct?
engSearchText: You DID finish that before coming out here, correct?
jpnChrName: 当然、終わらせてから来たのよね？
jpnSearchText: 当然、終わらせてから来たのよね？

engChrName: Umm... Well...
engSearchText: Umm... Well...
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: *sigh* Meanwhile, Agnès handled every one of those tedious purchase requests I made before coming to her quote-unquote 'actual' job.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Meanwhile, Agnès handled every one of those
tedious purchase requests I made before coming to
her quote-unquote 'actual' job.
jpnChrName: ふう……アニエスは面倒な購入申請を とっくに終わらせてくれてるわよ？
jpnSearchText:
ふう……アニエスは面倒な購入申請を
とっくに終わらせてくれてるわよ？

engChrName: If you want to fault others for how they handle their affairs, you'd best have your own in order first.
engSearchText:
If you want to fault others for how they handle their
affairs, you'd best have your own in order first.
jpnChrName: まずは自分の筋を通しなさい。 人に意見するのはそれからよ。
jpnSearchText:
まずは自分の筋を通しなさい。
人に意見するのはそれからよ。

engChrName: Agh...
engSearchText: Agh...
jpnSearchText: ……うう………

engChrName: Well, good day to you, Mister Spriggan. I'll see you back at the dorms, Agnès.
engSearchText:
Well, good day to you, Mister Spriggan. I'll see you
back at the dorms, Agnès.
jpnChrName: それではご機嫌よう、“解決屋”さん。 ──アニエスは寮でね。
jpnSearchText:
それではご機嫌よう、“解決屋”さん。
──アニエスは寮でね。

engChrName: See you tomorrow, Agnès! Don't come home TOO late!
engSearchText:
See you tomorrow, Agnès! Don't come home
TOO late!
jpnChrName: また明日ね～。 でも、あんまり遅くならないように！
jpnSearchText:
また明日ね～。
でも、あんまり遅くならないように！

engChrName: Th-Thank you. Have a safe trip back, everyone!
engSearchText: Th-Thank you. Have a safe trip back, everyone!
jpnChrName: う、うん、ありがとう。 ──先輩、アルベール君もまた！
jpnSearchText:
う、うん、ありがとう。
──先輩、アルベール君もまた！

engChrName: (Who the hell's the one with the purple hair?)
engSearchText: (Who the hell's the one with the purple hair?)
jpnChrName: （なんだァ……あのスミレ髪？）
jpnSearchText: （なんだァ……あのスミレ髪？）

engChrName: (I'm wondering the same thing. She's not the kind of student you see here every day.)
engSearchText:
(I'm wondering the same thing. She's not the kind of
student you see here every day.)
jpnChrName: （……学生さんにしては   只者じゃない雰囲気でしたね。）
jpnSearchText:
（……学生さんにしては
只者じゃない雰囲気でしたね。）

engChrName: (Hard to believe it's been five years...)
engSearchText: (Hard to believe it's been five years...)

engChrName: (She sure ain't the lost kitten she was back then anymore. She's really grown up.)
engSearchText:
(She sure ain't the lost kitten she was back
then anymore. She's really grown up.)
jpnChrName: （あの途方にくれてた仔猫が   マジで見違えたもんだぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（あの途方にくれてた仔猫が
マジで見違えたもんだぜ。）

engChrName: So what WAS that all about?
engSearchText: So what WAS that all about?
jpnChrName: ──で、結局なんだったんだ？
jpnSearchText: ──で、結局なんだったんだ？

engChrName: You know, the call from home that was so important you ditched us in the middle of a job.
engSearchText:
You know, the call from home that was so important
you ditched us in the middle of a job.
jpnChrName: 手配魔獣の退治よりも優先した “実家”からの呼び出しってのは？
jpnSearchText:
手配魔獣の退治よりも優先した
“実家”からの呼び出しってのは？

engChrName: Hey, don't be mean! It's not like we weren't perfectly capable of handling stuff.
engSearchText:
Hey, don't be mean! It's not like we weren't perfectly
capable of handling stuff.
jpnChrName: そんな言い方……別にわたしたちで 問題なく対処できましたし。
jpnSearchText:
そんな言い方……別にわたしたちで
問題なく対処できましたし。

engChrName: Course we were. But that's not the point.
engSearchText: Course we were. But that's not the point.
jpnChrName: たりめーだ。 そういう話をしてんじゃねーよ。
jpnSearchText:
たりめーだ。
そういう話をしてんじゃねーよ。

engChrName: It's fine to have shit come up from time to time—but not for other people you know to get all up in our business about it.
engSearchText:
It's fine to have shit come up from time to time—but
not for other people you know to get all up in our
business about it.
jpnChrName: 急用があんのはいい──だが、 関係者が乗り込んでくるのは別だろ。
jpnSearchText:
急用があんのはいい──だが、
関係者が乗り込んでくるのは別だろ。

engChrName: You might be doing what you think is best, but you should ask yourself if you're doing right by everyone around you. All I'm saying.
engSearchText:
You might be doing what you think is best, but you
should ask yourself if you're doing right by everyone
around you. All I'm saying.
jpnChrName: てめぇ自身はともかく、ちゃんと周りにも “スジ”を通してんのかって話だ。
jpnSearchText:
てめぇ自身はともかく、ちゃんと周りにも
“スジ”を通してんのかって話だ。

engChrName: Umm... Well...
engSearchText: Umm... Well...
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: This stuff's important whether you're Heiyue, a jaeger, or just some Joe working a desk job.
engSearchText:
This stuff's important whether you're Heiyue, a
jaeger, or just some Joe working a desk job.
jpnChrName: 一般人だろうが黒月だろうが 猟兵だろうがそこん所は同じだろ。
jpnSearchText:
一般人だろうが黒月だろうが
猟兵だろうがそこん所は同じだろ。

engChrName: And it's crazy to me that I'M the one pushing this and not you.
engSearchText:
And it's crazy to me that I'M the one pushing this
and not you.
jpnChrName: ──本来てめぇが 突っ込むべきじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
──本来てめぇが
突っ込むべきじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Yeah, I guess you're right.
engSearchText: Yeah, I guess you're right.
jpnChrName: ま、確かにな。
jpnSearchText: ま、確かにな。

engChrName: Your old man startin' to have a problem with your side gig?
engSearchText:
Your old man startin' to have a problem with your
side gig?
jpnChrName: “親父さん”あたりから そろそろ突っ込みが入ったか？
jpnSearchText:
“親父さん”あたりから
そろそろ突っ込みが入ったか？

engChrName: H-How do you...?
engSearchText: H-How do you...?
jpnChrName: ど、どうしてそれを……
jpnSearchText: ど、どうしてそれを……

engChrName: I dunno squat. I'm just guessin'.
engSearchText: I dunno squat. I'm just guessin'.
jpnChrName: いや── あくまで一般論だぜ？
jpnSearchText:
いや──
あくまで一般論だぜ？

engChrName: I haven't changed my stance since you started workin' here.
engSearchText:
I haven't changed my stance since you started
workin' here.
jpnChrName: 俺のスタンスは 最初から話してる通りだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺のスタンスは
最初から話してる通りだ。

engChrName: You make the calls on what you wanna do with your life. Whether that leads you to stick around or leave is up to you.
engSearchText:
You make the calls on what you wanna do with
your life. Whether that leads you to stick around or
leave is up to you.
jpnChrName: だが決めるのはお前だ── バイトを続けるのも止めるのもな。
jpnSearchText:
だが決めるのはお前だ──
バイトを続けるのも止めるのもな。

engChrName: Though if your family's gonna start interfering, I might have to be careful what I ask you to do from here on out.
engSearchText:
Though if your family's gonna start interfering, I
might have to be careful what I ask you to do from
here on out.
jpnChrName: ああいった突っ込みが来るとなると そうそう無理はさせられねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
ああいった突っ込みが来るとなると
そうそう無理はさせられねぇが。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: It's the opposite of what you all seem to think. He was only checking in on me.
engSearchText:
It's the opposite of what you all seem to think.
He was only checking in on me.
jpnChrName: ………その逆、です。 呼び出しもただの定期連絡で。
jpnSearchText:
………その逆、です。
呼び出しもただの定期連絡で。

engChrName: My father is a busy man. He doesn't even have time to send the occasional letter, like Feri's does.
engSearchText:
My father is a busy man. He doesn't even have time
to send the occasional letter, like Feri's does.
jpnChrName: 父は忙しい人で……フェリちゃんみたいに 手紙のやりとりすらろくにできなくて。
jpnSearchText:
父は忙しい人で……フェリちゃんみたいに
手紙のやりとりすらろくにできなくて。

engChrName: I haven't spoken to him in three months, so I didn't want to pass up the chance. I really am sorry about running off.
engSearchText:
I haven't spoken to him in three months, so I didn't
want to pass up the chance. I really am sorry about
running off.
jpnChrName: ……３ヶ月ぶりに話せると思ったので すみません、途中で外してしまって……
jpnSearchText:
……３ヶ月ぶりに話せると思ったので
すみません、途中で外してしまって……

engChrName: So that's what it was...
engSearchText: So that's what it was...
jpnChrName: そう……だったんですね。
jpnSearchText: そう……だったんですね。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.

engChrName: Honestly, I thought I was going to get yelled at for being late the other day, or taking on this dangerous job...
engSearchText:
Honestly, I thought I was going to get yelled at for
being late the other day, or taking on this
dangerous job...
jpnChrName: ……本当は先日の遅刻の件とか バイトについて怒られると思ったんです。
jpnSearchText:
……本当は先日の遅刻の件とか
バイトについて怒られると思ったんです。

engChrName: But even though I'm sure he knows everything I've been doing, he didn't have a word of criticism about it.
engSearchText:
But even though I'm sure he knows everything I've
been doing, he didn't have a word of criticism
about it.
jpnChrName: でも、知っている筈なのに 一言も咎められることもなくて──
jpnSearchText:
でも、知っている筈なのに
一言も咎められることもなくて──

engChrName: ...In short, it's not going to be a problem for me to keep working as I've been doing.
engSearchText:
...In short, it's not going to be a problem for me to
keep working as I've been doing.
jpnChrName: ──ですから、大丈夫です。 バイトを続けても良さそうなので。
jpnSearchText:
──ですから、大丈夫です。
バイトを続けても良さそうなので。

engChrName: This should be the last time I have to run off like that, too.
engSearchText:
This should be the last time I have to run off like
that, too.
jpnChrName: これからは今日みたいに 突然外すこともないと思います。
jpnSearchText:
これからは今日みたいに
突然外すこともないと思います。

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: ...Hmph.
engSearchText: ...Hmph.

engChrName: Well, it ain't up to me to poke my nose into other people's family business.
engSearchText:
Well, it ain't up to me to poke my nose into other
people's family business.
jpnChrName: ま、家庭の事情に 突っ込むつもりはねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、家庭の事情に
突っ込むつもりはねぇが……

engChrName: But it sounds to me like he trusts you, and that's worth something.
engSearchText:
But it sounds to me like he trusts you, and that's
worth something.
jpnChrName: ──フェアなのは悪くねぇ。 お前を信頼している証拠だろう。
jpnSearchText:
──フェアなのは悪くねぇ。
お前を信頼している証拠だろう。

engChrName: It's up to you what you want do with the Geneses, or whether you want this job to begin with. Am I wrong?
engSearchText:
It's up to you what you want do with the Geneses, or
whether you want this job to begin with. Am
I wrong?
jpnChrName: バイトにしても《ゲネシス》にしても 決めるのはお前だ──違うか？
jpnSearchText:
バイトにしても《ゲネシス》にしても
決めるのはお前だ──違うか？

engChrName: ...No, you're absolutely right.
engSearchText: ...No, you're absolutely right.
jpnChrName: ………いえ、違いません。
jpnSearchText: ………いえ、違いません。

engChrName: Either way, I'm happy to be able to keep working with you all.
engSearchText:
Either way, I'm happy to be able to keep working
with you all.
jpnChrName: 改めてよろしくお願いします── ヴァンさん、フェリちゃんにアーロンさんも。
jpnSearchText:
改めてよろしくお願いします──
ヴァンさん、フェリちゃんにアーロンさんも。

engChrName: Yeah! We're happy to have you, too!
engSearchText: Yeah! We're happy to have you, too!
jpnChrName: はい、もちろんですっ。
jpnSearchText: はい、もちろんですっ。

engChrName: Try not to fall behind, though.
engSearchText: Try not to fall behind, though.
jpnChrName: ハッ、精々ヨロシクしてやるよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、精々ヨロシクしてやるよ。

engChrName: She's been doin' this longer than you have...but I'm with Feri on this one.
engSearchText:
She's been doin' this longer than you have...but I'm
with Feri on this one.
jpnChrName: お前は後輩だろうが…… ──ま、こちらこそ宜しくだ。
jpnSearchText:
お前は後輩だろうが……
──ま、こちらこそ宜しくだ。

engChrName: Just...try and do somethin' about that friend of yours. We can't have him bargin' in half the damn time in the future.
engSearchText:
Just...try and do somethin' about that friend of yours.
We can't have him bargin' in half the damn time in
the future.
jpnChrName: ただしお友達は何とかしろよ？ 毎度、突撃されちゃあかなわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ただしお友達は何とかしろよ？
毎度、突撃されちゃあかなわねぇ。

engChrName: I'll do my best to clear up his misunderstandings—or, barring that, at least get him to promise to leave us alone.
engSearchText:
I'll do my best to clear up his misunderstandings—or,
barring that, at least get him to promise to leave
us alone.
jpnChrName: はい、しっかり誤解を── ……上手く言い繕っておきますので。
jpnSearchText:
はい、しっかり誤解を──
……上手く言い繕っておきますので。

engChrName: Yeah, you tell him the truth and he'd lose his shit.
engSearchText: Yeah, you tell him the truth and he'd lose his shit.
jpnChrName: クク、マトモに説明したら あの小僧とか泡吹きそうだしなァ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、マトモに説明したら
あの小僧とか泡吹きそうだしなァ。

engChrName: Hmm... So this is an example of the ends justifying the means, huh? Now I get it!
engSearchText:
Hmm... So this is an example of the ends justifying
the means, huh? Now I get it!
jpnChrName: なるほど…… これが『ウソも方便』ですか！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
これが『ウソも方便』ですか！

engChrName: I mean, it...is, but try not to learn any life lessons from it...
engSearchText:
I mean, it...is, but try not to learn any life
lessons from it...
jpnChrName: ううっ……正しい用法ですけど 参考にしちゃダメですからね……？
jpnSearchText:
ううっ……正しい用法ですけど
参考にしちゃダメですからね……？

engChrName: Wait. This is—
engSearchText: Wait. This is—
jpnChrName: っと、この番号は──
jpnSearchText: っと、この番号は──

engChrName: You got a moment, Van?
engSearchText: You got a moment, Van?
jpnChrName: ──ヴァン、今いいか？
jpnSearchText: ──ヴァン、今いいか？

engChrName: Hey. Not often I get a call from you.
engSearchText: Hey. Not often I get a call from you.
jpnChrName: ディンゴか…… そっちからってのも珍しいな。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴか……
そっちからってのも珍しいな。

engChrName: You got work or somethin'? We just wrapped a job up, so we're free if you wanna talk it out.
engSearchText:
You got work or somethin'? We just wrapped a job
up, so we're free if you wanna talk it out.
jpnChrName: どうした、なんか依頼があれば 一区切りついたし相談に乗るぜ？
jpnSearchText:
どうした、なんか依頼があれば
一区切りついたし相談に乗るぜ？

engChrName: Perfect. But I'm not the one with the request.
engSearchText: Perfect. But I'm not the one with the request.
jpnChrName: フッ、話が早くて助かる── といっても俺からの依頼じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、話が早くて助かる──
といっても俺からの依頼じゃない。

engChrName: I was asked by an acquaintance to hook them up with some facetime with you.
engSearchText:
I was asked by an acquaintance to hook them up with
some facetime with you.
jpnChrName: ちょっとしたツテから 《裏解決屋（お前たち）》への仲介を頼まれてな。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとしたツテから
《裏解決屋（お前たち）》への仲介を頼まれてな。

engChrName: I gave them your work number, so they should be calling anytime now. Up to you whether you take them on, though.
engSearchText:
I gave them your work number, so they should be
calling anytime now. Up to you whether you take
them on, though.
jpnChrName: 事務所の端末番号を教えた。 受けるかどうかは話して決めてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
事務所の端末番号を教えた。
受けるかどうかは話して決めてくれ。

engChrName: ...Oh? Well, all right. Got it.
engSearchText: ...Oh? Well, all right. Got it.
jpnChrName: ハン……？ まあいい、了解だ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？
まあいい、了解だ。

engChrName: Sounds like it was that tabloid geek?
engSearchText: Sounds like it was that tabloid geek?
jpnChrName: ゴシップ記者兼情報屋だったか？
jpnSearchText: ゴシップ記者兼情報屋だったか？

engChrName: Guy has nothing on me, but he's got the looks. Unlike a certain crusty old fart I know.
engSearchText:
Guy has nothing on me, but he's got the looks.
Unlike a certain crusty old fart I know.
jpnChrName: 俺様ほどじゃねえがイケメンだな。 どこぞのオッサンとは違って。
jpnSearchText:
俺様ほどじゃねえがイケメンだな。
どこぞのオッサンとは違って。

engChrName: You wanna take this outside, brat?
engSearchText: You wanna take this outside, brat?
jpnChrName: このガキ……表に出るか？
jpnSearchText: このガキ……表に出るか？

engChrName: (I think Van's pretty good looking, though...)
engSearchText: (I think Van's pretty good looking, though...)
jpnChrName: （わたしはヴァンさんも   “いけめん”だと思いますけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（わたしはヴァンさんも
“いけめん”だと思いますけど。）

engChrName: (Heehee. I think he'd cry with joy if he heard you say that.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. I think he'd cry with joy if he heard you
say that.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、ヴァンさんが聞いたら   泣いて喜んじゃうかもですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ、ヴァンさんが聞いたら
泣いて喜んじゃうかもですね。）

engChrName: Huh. There it is already.
engSearchText: Huh. There it is already.
jpnChrName: っと、早速来たか。
jpnSearchText: っと、早速来たか。

engChrName: Oh! Thank goodness! I was worried I wouldn't be able to get through.
engSearchText:
Oh! Thank goodness! I was worried I wouldn't be
able to get through.
jpnChrName: あ──…… よかった、繋がったみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
あ──……
よかった、繋がったみたいですね。

engChrName: No way...
engSearchText: No way...

engChrName: For real?!
engSearchText: For real?!

engChrName: I-Isn't that...?
engSearchText: I-Isn't that...?
jpnChrName: こ、この方って……
jpnSearchText: こ、この方って……

engChrName: Okay, when Dingo told me he had a client, I never dreamed it'd be you.
engSearchText:
Okay, when Dingo told me he had a client, I never
dreamed it'd be you.
jpnChrName: おいおい、驚いたな──
jpnSearchText: おいおい、驚いたな──

engChrName: Heehee. I see a new face among your number, too.
engSearchText: Heehee. I see a new face among your number, too.
jpnChrName: ふふ、昼間見なかった方も いらっしゃるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、昼間見なかった方も
いらっしゃるみたいですね。

engChrName: In any case, I'm very much hoping to work with you.
engSearchText: In any case, I'm very much hoping to work with you.
jpnChrName: ──ディンゴさんに紹介して頂いた、 依頼人のニナ・フェンリィです。
jpnSearchText:
──ディンゴさんに紹介して頂いた、
依頼人のニナ・フェンリィです。

engChrName: All right. See you at 7PM tomorrow.
engSearchText: All right. See you at 7PM tomorrow.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ、明日の夜７時にな。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあ、明日の夜７時にな。

engChrName: Of course. I'll make sure to tell everyone that I'm going somewhere this time, too.
engSearchText:
Of course. I'll make sure to tell everyone that I'm
going somewhere this time, too.
jpnChrName: はい、今度はきちんと 周囲に伝えておきますので。
jpnSearchText:
はい、今度はきちんと
周囲に伝えておきますので。

engChrName: Well, good night, everyone.
engSearchText: Well, good night, everyone.
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、アーロンさんも 今日はお疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん、アーロンさんも
今日はお疲れ様でした。

engChrName: So, I figure Feri's comin', but what about you?
engSearchText: So, I figure Feri's comin', but what about you?
jpnChrName: んで、フェリはともかく お前もついてくるってか？
jpnSearchText:
んで、フェリはともかく
お前もついてくるってか？

engChrName: I'm down. Like I could say no after hearing all that.
engSearchText: I'm down. Like I could say no after hearing all that.
jpnChrName: たりめーだろ？ あんな話を聞いちゃあなァ。
jpnSearchText:
たりめーだろ？
あんな話を聞いちゃあなァ。

engChrName: I'm totally coming, too!
engSearchText: I'm totally coming, too!
jpnChrName: わたしは言わずもがなですっ。
jpnSearchText: わたしは言わずもがなですっ。

engChrName: *sigh* Not that I can blame you. That story would've gotten anyone's interest.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Not that I can blame you. That story would've
gotten anyone's interest.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… ま、確かに気になる依頼だしな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
ま、確かに気になる依頼だしな。

engChrName: Guess that means we're all goin' to Tharbad.
engSearchText: Guess that means we're all goin' to Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 共和国南東──《サルバッド》か。
jpnSearchText: 共和国南東──《サルバッド》か。

engChrName: A film festival?
engSearchText: A film festival?
jpnChrName: 映画祭、ですか……？
jpnSearchText: 映画祭、ですか……？

engChrName: One's held every year in the city of Messeldam, to the north.
engSearchText:
One's held every year in the city of Messeldam, to
the north.
jpnChrName: 毎年、北のメッセルダム市で 行われてるヤツだな。
jpnSearchText:
毎年、北のメッセルダム市で
行われてるヤツだな。

engChrName: Though I'd heard this year's was canceled about two months back, thanks to a terrorist threat.
engSearchText:
Though I'd heard this year's was canceled about two
months back, thanks to a terrorist threat.
jpnChrName: ２ヶ月前くらいのテロ予告で 今年は中止になったって聞いたが。
jpnSearchText:
２ヶ月前くらいのテロ予告で
今年は中止になったって聞いたが。

engChrName: The one in Messeldam certainly was, but this is something else.
engSearchText:
The one in Messeldam certainly was, but this is
something else.
jpnChrName: いえ、それとは別のものでして。
jpnSearchText: <C1>いえ、それとは別のものでして。

engChrName: It's a new event taking place for the first time this year, backed by the Principality of Elsaim in the Central East.
engSearchText:
It's a new event taking place for the first time this
year, backed by the Principality of Elsaim in the
Central East.
jpnChrName: 中東の《エルザイム公国》の後援で 今年から新たに開催されるものです。
jpnSearchText:
中東の《エルザイム公国》の後援で
今年から新たに開催されるものです。

engChrName: It's going to be called the Tharbad Film Festival, and it's sponsored by Vegas Films.
engSearchText:
It's going to be called the Tharbad Film Festival, and
it's sponsored by Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: 名前は《サルバッド映画祭》── 主催は《ベガスフィルム》となります。
jpnSearchText:
名前は《サルバッド映画祭》──
主催は《ベガスフィルム》となります。

engChrName: Oh, right. I remember hearing about that, now that you mention it.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. I remember hearing about that, now that
you mention it.
jpnChrName: そうか……噂は聞いちゃいたが。
jpnSearchText: そうか……噂は聞いちゃいたが。

engChrName: Vegas is a film distributor that's had a bunch of big hits lately, right?
engSearchText:
Vegas is a film distributor that's had a bunch of big
hits lately, right?
jpnChrName: 確かド派手な映画を立て続けに ヒットさせてる配給会社だったか？
jpnSearchText:
確かド派手な映画を立て続けに
ヒットさせてる配給会社だったか？

engChrName: All directed by some freak named Gotti.
engSearchText: All directed by some freak named Gotti.
jpnChrName: なんちゃらゴッチとかいう えらく濃い監督が仕切っている。
jpnSearchText:
なんちゃらゴッチとかいう
えらく濃い監督が仕切っている。

engChrName: O-Oh! Golden Blood was one of those, right?
engSearchText: O-Oh! Golden Blood was one of those, right?
jpnChrName: あ、たしか 『ゴールデンブラッド』の……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、たしか
『ゴールデンブラッド』の……！

engChrName: That's right. They're still a relatively new company, but at their current rate, they'll be a major studio before much longer.
engSearchText:
That's right. They're still a relatively new company,
but at their current rate, they'll be a major studio
before much longer.
jpnChrName: ええ、新興の映画会社ですけど 大手に迫る勢いみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、新興の映画会社ですけど
大手に迫る勢いみたいですね。

engChrName: The director prioritizes entertainment value above all else, and his films can be a bit, erm...extreme in their content.
engSearchText:
The director prioritizes entertainment value above all
else, and his films can be a bit, erm...extreme in
their content.
jpnChrName: エンターテイメント性重視で ……ちょっと表現も過激っていう。
jpnSearchText:
エンターテイメント性重視で
……ちょっと表現も過激っていう。

engChrName: Pfft. You want extreme, try watching the director's cut. Now THAT was spicy.
engSearchText:
Pfft. You want extreme, try watching the
director's cut. Now THAT was spicy.
jpnChrName: クク、ネンネだねぇ。 完全（Ｒ１７）版とか見てみろよ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ネンネだねぇ。
完全（Ｒ１７）版とか見てみろよ。

engChrName: I-I can't! I'm still sixteen!
engSearchText: I-I can't! I'm still sixteen!
jpnChrName: わ、私は１６ですから！
jpnSearchText: わ、私は１６ですから！

engChrName: What's a 'director's cut?'
engSearchText: What's a 'director's cut?'
jpnChrName: あーるじゅうなな？
jpnSearchText: あーるじゅうなな？

engChrName: Vegas Films wouldn't be where they are without Salvatore Gotti. No one makes cinema the way he does.
engSearchText:
Vegas Films wouldn't be where they are without
Salvatore Gotti. No one makes cinema the way
he does.
jpnChrName: ま、ほぼ専属の売れっ子監督、 サルバトーレ・ゴッチの手腕だな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ほぼ専属の売れっ子監督、
サルバトーレ・ゴッチの手腕だな。

engChrName: So I'm guessin' the whole thing's mostly an excuse to give his company and their releases most of the awards?
engSearchText:
So I'm guessin' the whole thing's mostly an excuse to
give his company and their releases most of
the awards?
jpnChrName: すると実質ベガスフィルム関係の 受賞で独占って感じかね？
jpnSearchText:
すると実質ベガスフィルム関係の
受賞で独占って感じかね？

engChrName: Not at all. Gotti is determined to make the judging process completely fair and impartial.
engSearchText:
Not at all. Gotti is determined to make the judging
process completely fair and impartial.
jpnChrName: いえ──そこは完全にフェアに というのがゴッチ監督の意向だそうです。
jpnSearchText:
いえ──そこは完全にフェアに
というのがゴッチ監督の意向だそうです。

engChrName: Most of the nominated films are mass-market, but a wide variety of directors, actors, and actresses are invited.
engSearchText:
Most of the nominated films are mass-market, but a
wide variety of directors, actors, and actresses
are invited.
jpnChrName: エンターテイメント作品寄りですけど 招待されている監督、俳優も多く……
jpnSearchText:
エンターテイメント作品寄りですけど
招待されている監督、俳優も多く……

engChrName: I am one of those actresses, as is the other client for this request.
engSearchText:
I am one of those actresses, as is the other client for
this request.
jpnChrName: 私と、もう一人の依頼者もその内です。
jpnSearchText: <C1>私と、もう一人の依頼者もその内です。

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...
jpnChrName: なるほど……そしてそんな時に ニナさんの事務所に届いたのが──
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……そしてそんな時に
ニナさんの事務所に届いたのが──

engChrName: And so that's the context behind this threatening letter that showed up at your agency?
engSearchText:
And so that's the context behind this threatening
letter that showed up at your agency?
jpnChrName: 問題の“脅迫状”ってヤツか。
jpnSearchText: 問題の“脅迫状”ってヤツか。

engChrName: Indeed... It reads like this: 'Decline to participate in the Tharbad Film Festival, or tragedy will befall you.'
engSearchText:
Indeed... It reads like this: 'Decline to participate in
the Tharbad Film Festival, or tragedy will befall you.'
jpnChrName: 『サルバッド映画祭への参加を辞退せよ──   さもなくば災いが降りかかるだろう。』
jpnSearchText:
『サルバッド映画祭への参加を辞退せよ──
さもなくば災いが降りかかるだろう。』

engChrName: The same letter was sent to other companies connected to ours, too.
engSearchText:
The same letter was sent to other companies
connected to ours, too.
jpnChrName: ──そんな内容の怪文書が うちを含めた関係各位に届いたんです。
jpnSearchText:
──そんな内容の怪文書が
うちを含めた関係各位に届いたんです。

engChrName: We can't rule out the possibility that it's just an elaborate prank, but we're still concerned.
engSearchText:
We can't rule out the possibility that it's just an
elaborate prank, but we're still concerned.
jpnChrName: もちろん、イタズラである可能性も 高いとは思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、イタズラである可能性も
高いとは思いますが……

engChrName: You definitely can't ignore it when another film festival's already been canceled because of a terrorist threat...
engSearchText:
You definitely can't ignore it when another film
festival's already been canceled because of a
terrorist threat...
jpnChrName: テロ予告で他の映画祭が中止になった以上、 無視もできないわけですね。
jpnSearchText:
テロ予告で他の映画祭が中止になった以上、
無視もできないわけですね。

engChrName: Though the culprit could've just sent these things because they knew you'd feel that way.
engSearchText:
Though the culprit could've just sent these things
because they knew you'd feel that way.
jpnChrName: ハッ、その辺も狙って 送りつけてそうな気もするがな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、その辺も狙って
送りつけてそうな気もするがな。

engChrName: Yes. My agency has been trying to persuade me not to attend because of the danger involved...
engSearchText:
Yes. My agency has been trying to persuade me not to
attend because of the danger involved...
jpnChrName: ええ……事務所からは参加を 辞退するように説得されていまして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……事務所からは参加を
辞退するように説得されていまして。

engChrName: ...but I'm still a relatively inexperienced actress, so I think the festival could be a valuable opportunity.
engSearchText:
...but I'm still a relatively inexperienced actress, so I
think the festival could be a valuable opportunity.
jpnChrName: ──ですが経験も浅い私にとって またとない機会であるのも確かです。
jpnSearchText:
──ですが経験も浅い私にとって
またとない機会であるのも確かです。

engChrName: The other client for this job feels the same way, and that was what inspired us to look for potential help.
engSearchText:
The other client for this job feels the same way, and
that was what inspired us to look for potential help.
jpnChrName: もう一人の共同依頼者も同じ想いで、 何とかできないか各方面に相談を……
jpnSearchText:
もう一人の共同依頼者も同じ想いで、
何とかできないか各方面に相談を……

engChrName: And that's when you chanced on us, huh?
engSearchText: And that's when you chanced on us, huh?
jpnChrName: で、こちらに お鉢が回ってきたわけか。
jpnSearchText:
で、こちらに
お鉢が回ってきたわけか。

engChrName: Heh. You're a lot gutsier than you look.
engSearchText: Heh. You're a lot gutsier than you look.
jpnChrName: ハン…… 顔に似合わず逞しいじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
顔に似合わず逞しいじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Heehee. When I met you all earlier today, it reminded me of some rumors I'd heard about you in the industry.
engSearchText:
Heehee. When I met you all earlier today, it
reminded me of some rumors I'd heard about you in
the industry.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、昼間助けていただいた時に 業界の“噂話”を思い出しまして。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、昼間助けていただいた時に
業界の“噂話”を思い出しまして。

engChrName: And since I already knew Dingo from when he previously helped with some trouble in my agency, I asked him for your number.
engSearchText:
And since I already knew Dingo from when he
previously helped with some trouble in my agency, I
asked him for your number.
jpnChrName: 以前、事務所のトラブルでお世話になった ディンゴさんに仲介をお願いしたんです。
jpnSearchText:
以前、事務所のトラブルでお世話になった
ディンゴさんに仲介をお願いしたんです。

engChrName: Your team just seems like the most reasonable option.
engSearchText: Your team just seems like the most reasonable option.
jpnChrName: ──要は リスク管理の問題だと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
──要は
リスク管理の問題だと思うんです。

engChrName: In this line of work, image is everything, so I really don't want to get the police involved and turn this into a big deal...
engSearchText:
In this line of work, image is everything, so I really
don't want to get the police involved and turn this
into a big deal...
jpnChrName: 人気商売としては警察沙汰にして 大事にはしたくない……
jpnSearchText:
人気商売としては警察沙汰にして
大事にはしたくない……

engChrName: ...but the guild isn't really suited to delicate matters like these, either.
engSearchText:
...but the guild isn't really suited to delicate matters
like these, either.
jpnChrName: かといってギルドにはどうしても デリケートな案件は頼みにくいですから。
jpnSearchText:
かといってギルドにはどうしても
デリケートな案件は頼みにくいですから。

engChrName: That makes sense. Bracers have always struck me as prioritizing their code above all else and avoiding anything remotely illegal.
engSearchText:
That makes sense. Bracers have always struck me as
prioritizing their code above all else and avoiding
anything remotely illegal.
jpnChrName: なるほど、確かに規約優先で 違法行為にも敏感みたいですし……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、確かに規約優先で
違法行為にも敏感みたいですし……

engChrName: Yeah. Bracers are heroes of justice first and foremost—if you need moral flexibility, they ain't your guys.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Bracers are heroes of justice first and
foremost—if you need moral flexibility, they ain't
your guys.
jpnChrName: ああ、基本的には正義の味方、 清濁併せ呑むっつうのは難しいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、基本的には正義の味方、
清濁併せ呑むっつうのは難しいだろう。

engChrName: Dingo's brought me showbiz-related jobs in the past, so this wouldn't be my first time doin' one...
engSearchText:
Dingo's brought me showbiz-related jobs in the past,
so this wouldn't be my first time doin' one...
jpnChrName: ──確かにディンゴの仲介で 芸能関連の仕事をした事もあるが……
jpnSearchText:
──確かにディンゴの仲介で
芸能関連の仕事をした事もあるが……

engChrName: Will be my first time with one this big, though. Hope you know this ain't gonna come cheap.
engSearchText:
Will be my first time with one this big, though.
Hope you know this ain't gonna come cheap.
jpnChrName: 流石にその規模の仕事は初めてだ。 言っておくが、安くはねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
流石にその規模の仕事は初めてだ。
言っておくが、安くはねえぞ？

engChrName: Of course. You'd be protecting the film festival— that's quite a task.
engSearchText:
Of course. You'd be protecting the film festival—
that's quite a task.
jpnChrName: ええ、勿論です── 映画祭を守っていただくんですから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、勿論です──
映画祭を守っていただくんですから。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: If you are willing to do this, I'd like you to plan to arrive in Tharbad the day after tomorrow.
engSearchText:
