If you are willing to do this, I'd like you to plan to
arrive in Tharbad the day after tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 引き受けていただけるのなら、 明後日には現地入りをしていただき──
jpnSearchText:
引き受けていただけるのなら、
明後日には現地入りをしていただき──

engChrName: I'd then like you to nose around for any suspicious activity during the three days leading up to the festival.
engSearchText:
I'd then like you to nose around for any suspicious
activity during the three days leading up to
the festival.
jpnChrName: 映画祭当日までの３日間、不穏な動きが ないか調べていただきたいんです。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭当日までの３日間、不穏な動きが
ないか調べていただきたいんです。

engChrName: However you do that is up to you, of course. I'm aware you traditionally handle requests through that '4SPG' system of yours.
engSearchText:
However you do that is up to you, of course.
I'm aware you traditionally handle requests through
that '4SPG' system of yours.
jpnChrName: “４ｓｐｇ”でしたか…… そちらの出張を通した形でも構いません。
jpnSearchText:
“４ｓｐｇ”でしたか……
そちらの出張を通した形でも構いません。

engChrName: Myself and the other client will provide for your expenses and compensation out of our personal funds, too.
engSearchText:
Myself and the other client will provide for your
expenses and compensation out of our personal
funds, too.
jpnChrName: 現地での活動資金、成功報酬諸々を 私達のポケットマネーからお支払いします。
jpnSearchText:
現地での活動資金、成功報酬諸々を
私達のポケットマネーからお支払いします。

engChrName: Wow... You can afford that?
engSearchText: Wow... You can afford that?
jpnChrName: 太っ腹です……
jpnSearchText: 太っ腹です……

engChrName: Makes sense a rising star would be filthy rich. Now you've got me curious about who this 'other client' is.
engSearchText:
Makes sense a rising star would be filthy rich.
Now you've got me curious about who this 'other
client' is.
jpnChrName: 流石は売れっ子スターってわけか。 “もう一人”ってのも気になるが。
jpnSearchText:
流石は売れっ子スターってわけか。
“もう一人”ってのも気になるが。

engChrName: Hmm... (Yeah, this is gonna be longer than our visit to Langport, even. What to do...)
engSearchText:
Hmm...
(Yeah, this is gonna be longer than our visit to
Langport, even. What to do...)
jpnChrName: ふむ……（ラングポートよりも 期間は長そうだがどうするか……）
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……（ラングポートよりも
期間は長そうだがどうするか……）

engChrName: (*gasp* Van!)
engSearchText: (*gasp* Van!)
jpnChrName: （！　ヴァンさん……！）
jpnSearchText: （！　ヴァンさん……！）

engChrName: (Oh!)
engSearchText: (Oh!)

engChrName: (Wait...)
engSearchText: (Wait...)
jpnChrName: （そいつは……）
jpnSearchText: （そいつは……）

engChrName: ...Hmm? What is it?
engSearchText: ...Hmm? What is it?
jpnChrName: ？　えっと……？
jpnSearchText: ？　えっと……？

engChrName: Oh, don't sweat it.
engSearchText: Oh, don't sweat it.
jpnChrName: ああ、こっちの話だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、こっちの話だ。

engChrName: Anyway, this is a really big ask outta the blue, so we'll discuss it and call you back.
engSearchText:
Anyway, this is a really big ask outta the blue, so we'll
discuss it and call you back.
jpnChrName: ──流石に急すぎるから 予定を確認して折り返させてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
──流石に急すぎるから
予定を確認して折り返させてもらう。

engChrName: Usually we prefer a bit more of a heads up on tall orders like this.
engSearchText:
Usually we prefer a bit more of a heads up on tall
orders like this.
jpnChrName: できればこういった話は 余裕をもって相談してほしいモンだがな。
jpnSearchText:
できればこういった話は
余裕をもって相談してほしいモンだがな。

engChrName: Gettin' everything ready on our end to arrive in Tharbad in time for the day after tomorrow ain't gonna be easy.
engSearchText:
Gettin' everything ready on our end to arrive in
Tharbad in time for the day after tomorrow ain't
gonna be easy.
jpnChrName: 明後日にサルバッド入りとなると どうしたってドタバタしちまいそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
明後日にサルバッド入りとなると
どうしたってドタバタしちまいそうだ。

engChrName: I'm sorry for imposing on you. It's just that I only really decided after meeting you in person.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry for imposing on you. It's just that I only
really decided after meeting you in person.
jpnChrName: ふふ、すみません。 何分お会いできたのが決め手でして。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、すみません。
何分お会いできたのが決め手でして。

engChrName: Oh, but considering the short notice, maybe I could offer you a little something extra to sweeten the deal?
engSearchText:
Oh, but considering the short notice, maybe I could
offer you a little something extra to sweeten the deal?
jpnChrName: そうだ、急な依頼のお詫びも兼ねて、 もし引き受けてくださるのならですが……
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、急な依頼のお詫びも兼ねて、
もし引き受けてくださるのならですが……

engChrName: I'd be happy to treat you to a limited-edition confection available at the Al-Jumeirah, a six-star hotel in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
I'd be happy to treat you to a limited-edition
confection available at the Al-Jumeirah, a six-star
hotel in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 現地の六つ星ホテル《アルジュメイラ》の 限定スイーツをご馳走させてください。
jpnSearchText:
現地の六つ星ホテル《アルジュメイラ》の
限定スイーツをご馳走させてください。

engChrName: ...Oh? Tell me more. Just for reference.
engSearchText: ...Oh? Tell me more. Just for reference.
jpnChrName: ……ほう。 参考までにそれはどんな代物だ？
jpnSearchText:
……ほう。
参考までにそれはどんな代物だ？

engChrName: It's called melfita, a type of chocolate made using camel's milk.
engSearchText:
It's called melfita, a type of chocolate made using
camel's milk.
jpnChrName: “メルフィータ”っていう、 ラクダのミルクを使ったショコラです。
jpnSearchText:
“メルフィータ”っていう、
ラクダのミルクを使ったショコラです。

engChrName: They combine it with highly valuable cacao pulp, too, I believe.
engSearchText:
They combine it with highly valuable cacao pulp, too,
I believe.
jpnChrName: これまた貴重な“生カカオ”と 一緒に練り合わせているらしくて。
jpnSearchText:
これまた貴重な“生カカオ”と
一緒に練り合わせているらしくて。

engChrName: The result is a unique, full-bodied sweetness that caresses your tongue—
engSearchText:
The result is a unique, full-bodied sweetness that
caresses your tongue—
jpnChrName: 官能的なほど独特で濃厚な甘みが 舌の上でまろやかに広がって──
jpnSearchText:
官能的なほど独特で濃厚な甘みが
舌の上でまろやかに広がって──

engChrName: Okay. I've heard enough.
engSearchText: Okay. I've heard enough.
jpnChrName: ──ああ分かった、十分だ。
jpnSearchText: ──ああ分かった、十分だ。

engChrName: I'll call you with our decision tomorrow. I suspect it'll be one that'll make us both happy.
engSearchText:
I'll call you with our decision tomorrow. I suspect it'll
be one that'll make us both happy.
jpnChrName: 明日までには必ず連絡する。 前向きに検討するから待っててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
明日までには必ず連絡する。
前向きに検討するから待っててくれ。

engChrName: Heehee. I'll have to thank Dingo for his advice.
engSearchText: Heehee. I'll have to thank Dingo for his advice.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ディンゴさんのアドバイスが 早速役に立ったみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ディンゴさんのアドバイスが
早速役に立ったみたいですね。

engChrName: I'll be looking forward to your response, then, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
I'll be looking forward to your response, then,
Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ──それではお待ちしています、 アークライドさん。
jpnSearchText:
──それではお待ちしています、
アークライドさん。

engChrName: You are such a damn pushover.
engSearchText: You are such a damn pushover.
jpnChrName: ま、てめぇのチョロさはさておき。
jpnSearchText: ま、てめぇのチョロさはさておき。

engChrName: But hell, I've never been to Tharbad before, so I'm kinda looking forward to this.
engSearchText:
But hell, I've never been to Tharbad before, so I'm
kinda looking forward to this.
jpnChrName: 俺もサルバッドは初めてだし、 せいぜい楽しみにしておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺もサルバッドは初めてだし、
せいぜい楽しみにしておくぜ。

engChrName: Oh! I've been there before, so I might be able to help us get around a little!
engSearchText:
Oh! I've been there before, so I might be able to help
us get around a little!
jpnChrName: わたしは行ったことがあるので ちょっとは案内できると思いますっ。
jpnSearchText:
わたしは行ったことがあるので
ちょっとは案内できると思いますっ。

engChrName: I don't mind you guys comin' along, just make sure you take care of everything you've gotta do here first.
engSearchText:
I don't mind you guys comin' along, just make sure
you take care of everything you've gotta do here first.
jpnChrName: ま、付いてくるのはいいが 片付けるモンは片付けとけよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、付いてくるのはいいが
片付けるモンは片付けとけよ。

engChrName: I'm sure you got a lotta schoolwork to do, Ferida— and you gotta get your license renewed, right?
engSearchText:
I'm sure you got a lotta schoolwork to do, Ferida—
and you gotta get your license renewed, right?
jpnChrName: フェリーダは日曜学校、 お前も“再交付”があんだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
フェリーダは日曜学校、
お前も“再交付”があんだろうが？

engChrName: Oh, you're right! If nothing else, I need to get my math homework done.
engSearchText:
Oh, you're right! If nothing else, I need to get my
math homework done.
jpnChrName: そうでした、数学の宿題も ちゃんと終わらせないと……
jpnSearchText:
そうでした、数学の宿題も
ちゃんと終わらせないと……

engChrName: I know about the license, but man it's a pain. Can't I just go without one for a few days?
engSearchText:
I know about the license, but man it's a pain. Can't I
just go without one for a few days?
jpnChrName: そのつもりだったが微妙にダリーな。 数日くらいなら無免でもいんじゃね？
jpnSearchText:
そのつもりだったが微妙にダリーな。
数日くらいなら無免でもいんじゃね？

engChrName: Like hell, you can!
engSearchText: Like hell, you can!
jpnChrName: いいわけあるかっつの！
jpnSearchText: いいわけあるかっつの！

engChrName: (I can't believe it lit up right that moment.)
engSearchText: (I can't believe it lit up right that moment.)
jpnChrName: （まさかあんなタイミングで   光るとはな……）
jpnSearchText:
（まさかあんなタイミングで
光るとはな……）

engChrName: (Was it a coincidence? Nah...like hell it was.)
engSearchText: (Was it a coincidence? Nah...like hell it was.)
jpnChrName: （偶然か？　……いや。）
jpnSearchText: （偶然か？　……いや。）

engChrName: The city's always got a nice ambience to it when it's rainin', but something smells a bit off.
engSearchText:
The city's always got a nice ambience to it when it's
rainin', but something smells a bit off.
jpnChrName: ………雨の首都。 悪くねぇが微かに匂いやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
………雨の首都。
悪くねぇが微かに匂いやがるな。

engChrName: This is as good a time as any to go sniffin' around before we head off to the desert, I guess.
engSearchText:
This is as good a time as any to go sniffin' around
before we head off to the desert, I guess.
jpnChrName: 乾いた砂漠に向かう前に せいぜい“嗅ぎ回って”おくか。
jpnSearchText:
乾いた砂漠に向かう前に
せいぜい“嗅ぎ回って”おくか。

engChrName: (Should I call it a night?)
engSearchText: (Should I call it a night?)
jpnChrName: さてと、今夜はこのくらいか？
jpnSearchText: さてと、今夜はこのくらいか？

engChrName: (Tomorrow's gonna be another busy day, so I should probably turn in soon.)
engSearchText:
(Tomorrow's gonna be another busy day, so I should
probably turn in soon.)
jpnChrName: 明日は諸々準備もあるし そろそろ休んでもいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
明日は諸々準備もあるし
そろそろ休んでもいいかもな。

engChrName: Choosing to finish up for the night will cause all unfinished quests and subevents to disappear.
engSearchText:
Choosing to finish up for the night will cause all
unfinished quests and subevents to disappear.
jpnChrName: 行動を終了すると見ていないクエスト、 サブイベントなどが消滅します。
jpnSearchText:
行動を終了すると見ていないクエスト、
サブイベントなどが消滅します。

engChrName: Wait, what's this?
engSearchText: Wait, what's this?
jpnChrName: こいつは……
jpnSearchText: こいつは……

engChrName: Would you care to join me for a tea party in Riverside?
engSearchText:
Would you care to join me for a tea party
in Riverside?
jpnChrName: リバーサイドでお茶会はいかが？
jpnSearchText: <C1>リバーサイドでお茶会はいかが？

engChrName: Man. Always got people runnin' around at her beck and call.
engSearchText:
Man. Always got people runnin' around at her beck
and call.
jpnChrName: ……ったく、相変わらず 振り回してくれるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、相変わらず
振り回してくれるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Still, who am I to say no to an invitation?
engSearchText: Still, who am I to say no to an invitation?
jpnChrName: ま、せっかくのお誘いだしな。
jpnSearchText: ま、せっかくのお誘いだしな。

engChrName: October 4th, 6:30PM
engSearchText: October 4th, 6:30PM

engChrName: I'm jealous! I wanna go to the film-festi too!
engSearchText: I'm jealous! I wanna go to the film-festi too!
jpnChrName: いいな～、ヴァンたち。 ユメもエーガサイ、行きた～い！
jpnSearchText:
いいな～、ヴァンたち。
ユメもエーガサイ、行きた～い！

engChrName: You get to meet famous people, right?
engSearchText: You get to meet famous people, right?
jpnChrName: じょゆーさんとかにも会えるんでしょ？
jpnSearchText: じょゆーさんとかにも会えるんでしょ？

engChrName: We're not going for fun, y'know. This is real work hours, here.
engSearchText:
We're not going for fun, y'know. This is real work
hours, here.
jpnChrName: ま、仕事だ仕事。
jpnSearchText: ま、仕事だ仕事。

engChrName: It is quite exciting, though. You never know, we really might meet lots of famous people.
engSearchText:
It is quite exciting, though. You never know, we really
might meet lots of famous people.
jpnChrName: でも、ちょっとドキドキしますね。 銀幕スターたちに会えるかもと思うと。
jpnSearchText:
でも、ちょっとドキドキしますね。
銀幕スターたちに会えるかもと思うと。

engChrName: You're right. We'll be meeting Nina for sure, and she had a really unique...aura, I guess!
engSearchText:
You're right. We'll be meeting Nina for sure, and she
had a really unique...aura, I guess!
jpnChrName: はいっ、あのニナさんも何だか ちょっと不思議な雰囲気でしたし！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、あのニナさんも何だか
ちょっと不思議な雰囲気でしたし！

engChrName: Tharbad's a good eight hours by car, isn't it?
engSearchText: Tharbad's a good eight hours by car, isn't it?
jpnChrName: サルバッドまで車だと ８時間くらいだったかしら？
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドまで車だと
８時間くらいだったかしら？

engChrName: That's quite a drive. Make sure you have plenty to eat while you can.
engSearchText:
That's quite a drive. Make sure you have plenty to eat
while you can.
jpnChrName: かなりの距離でしょうし、 しっかり食べていってちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
かなりの距離でしょうし、
しっかり食べていってちょうだい。

engChrName: Thank you, Paulette.
engSearchText: Thank you, Paulette.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Then time for a drink to liven up—
engSearchText: Then time for a drink to liven up—
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、俺は景気づけに一杯──
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ、俺は景気づけに一杯──

engChrName: You absolute dumbass. Don't tell me you forgot why you renewed your license ALREADY.
engSearchText:
You absolute dumbass. Don't tell me you forgot why
you renewed your license ALREADY.
jpnChrName: アホかてめぇ…… 何のために再交付してきたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
アホかてめぇ……
何のために再交付してきたんだ？

engChrName: You people couldn't stay serious if your lives depended on it, could you?
engSearchText:
You people couldn't stay serious if your lives
depended on it, could you?
jpnChrName: ったく、毎度毎度、 緊張感のねぇ店子どもだな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、毎度毎度、
緊張感のねぇ店子どもだな。

engChrName: Heehee. I don't know what job you've taken on that's taking you to Tharbad, but please do take care.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I don't know what job you've taken on that's
taking you to Tharbad, but please do take care.
jpnChrName: ふふ、どんな依頼かは知らないけど どうか気を付けて行ってきてね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、どんな依頼かは知らないけど
どうか気を付けて行ってきてね。

engChrName: All right. Can't say I ain't nervous, but you try takin' the wheel till we're outta Edith.
engSearchText:
All right. Can't say I ain't nervous, but you try takin'
the wheel till we're outta Edith.
jpnChrName: ……正直不安だがまずはお試しだ。 市外に出るまではお前が運転してみろ。
jpnSearchText:
……正直不安だがまずはお試しだ。
市外に出るまではお前が運転してみろ。

engChrName: Let's see you put those driving chops you showed riding Red Stars around Langport into practice.
engSearchText:
Let's see you put those driving chops you showed
riding Red Stars around Langport into practice.
jpnChrName: 煌都でレッドスターを乗り回してた っつう腕前、とくと見極めてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都でレッドスターを乗り回してた
っつう腕前、とくと見極めてやるよ。

engChrName: Méiwèntí! I got this. Ingert, Red Star—it's all the same when you're behind the wheel.
engSearchText:
Méiwèntí! I got this. Ingert, Red Star—it's all the
same when you're behind the wheel.
jpnChrName: へっ、無問題（モウマンタイ）だっつの。 インゲルトだろうがノリは同じだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
へっ、無問題（モウマンタイ）だっつの。
インゲルトだろうがノリは同じだろうしな。

engChrName: I can drive this baby way more smoothly than a shaky-handed codger like you.
engSearchText:
I can drive this baby way more smoothly than a
shaky-handed codger like you.
jpnChrName: 手足の震えるオッサンの運転よりは よっぽど安定した走りを見せてやんぜ。
jpnSearchText:
手足の震えるオッサンの運転よりは
よっぽど安定した走りを見せてやんぜ。

engChrName: ...This is gonna be your first and only warning, kid.
engSearchText: ...This is gonna be your first and only warning, kid.
jpnChrName: ……いいか、これだけは言っとくぞ。
jpnSearchText: ……いいか、これだけは言っとくぞ。

engChrName: You end up scratchin' her or veering us into a ticket and you're gonna be in the trunk the rest of the way.
engSearchText:
You end up scratchin' her or veering us into a ticket
and you're gonna be in the trunk the rest of the way.
jpnChrName: 舐めた運転でコスったり切符切られてみろ。 後ろの荷台に転がして連れてくからな……？
jpnSearchText:
舐めた運転でコスったり切符切られてみろ。
後ろの荷台に転がして連れてくからな……？

engChrName: ...Sweets really aren't the only thing you're picky about, huh?
engSearchText:
...Sweets really aren't the only thing you're picky
about, huh?
jpnChrName: ……薄々分かってたがスイーツ以外も うるせえのがあんのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
……薄々分かってたがスイーツ以外も
うるせえのがあんのかよ。

engChrName: Like cars and saunas. The essentials of life!
engSearchText: Like cars and saunas. The essentials of life!
jpnChrName: あとは車とサウナですよねっ。
jpnSearchText: あとは車とサウナですよねっ。

engChrName: Still, it sounds like as long as you drive safely, everything will be...fine?
engSearchText:
Still, it sounds like as long as you drive safely,
everything will be...fine?
jpnChrName: まあ、とにかく 安全運転さえしていただければ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、とにかく
安全運転さえしていただければ……

engChrName: Ugh... Why does someone have to call now? (Wait a sec...)
engSearchText:
Ugh... Why does someone have to call now?
(Wait a sec...)
jpnChrName: なんだ、こんな時に。 ってこの番号は──
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、こんな時に。
ってこの番号は──

engChrName: (Bah... I'd rather not take this in front of them, but guess I ain't got a choice.)
engSearchText:
(Bah... I'd rather not take this in front of them, but
guess I ain't got a choice.)
jpnChrName: （コイツらもいるが仕方ねぇか……）
jpnSearchText: （コイツらもいるが仕方ねぇか……）

engChrName: Hello, Mr. Arkride. I hope I didn't catch you at a bad time—oh.
engSearchText:
Hello, Mr. Arkride. I hope I didn't catch you at a bad
time—oh.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様、宜しいでしょうか──あら。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン様、宜しいでしょうか──あら。

engChrName: Huh...?
engSearchText: Huh...?

engChrName: Damn. Didn't think it'd be from a chick.
engSearchText: Damn. Didn't think it'd be from a chick.
jpnChrName: お、なんだなんだ、女からかよ？
jpnSearchText: お、なんだなんだ、女からかよ？

engChrName: (A weirdly dressed one, too...)
engSearchText: (A weirdly dressed one, too...)
jpnChrName: （不思議な格好……）
jpnSearchText: （不思議な格好……）

engChrName: I see that I did... I'm very sorry. I didn't know you were with your employees.
engSearchText:
I see that I did... I'm very sorry. I didn't know you
were with your employees.
jpnChrName: その、申し訳ありません。 事務所の方々とご一緒でしたか……
jpnSearchText:
その、申し訳ありません。
事務所の方々とご一緒でしたか……

engChrName: Nah, it's cool.
engSearchText: Nah, it's cool.
jpnChrName: あー、気にしないでくれ。
jpnSearchText: あー、気にしないでくれ。

engChrName: But sorry. If you had somethin' else you wanted to run through with me, this ain't a good time.
engSearchText:
But sorry. If you had somethin' else you wanted to
run through with me, this ain't a good time.
jpnChrName: ──悪い、追加査定だったか？ すまんが今ちょっと立て込んでてな。
jpnSearchText:
──悪い、追加査定だったか？
すまんが今ちょっと立て込んでてな。

engChrName: We're gonna be outta town for a while. Can it wait till I get back?
engSearchText:
We're gonna be outta town for a while. Can it wait
till I get back?
jpnChrName: これから出張で首都を空けるんだ。 戻ってきてからってことでいいか？
jpnSearchText:
これから出張で首都を空けるんだ。
戻ってきてからってことでいいか？

engChrName: Oh! I see...
engSearchText: Oh! I see...
jpnChrName: ！　そうでしたか……
jpnSearchText: ！　そうでしたか……

engChrName: Should've given you a call myself, to be honest, but this was a real last-minute thing.
engSearchText:
Should've given you a call myself, to be honest, but
this was a real last-minute thing.
jpnChrName: 何分、急に決まっちまってな。 アンタにも連絡しとくべきだったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
何分、急に決まっちまってな。
アンタにも連絡しとくべきだったぜ。

engChrName: Not at all. What I wanted to discuss is hardly urgent.
engSearchText: Not at all. What I wanted to discuss is hardly urgent.
jpnChrName: いえ、こちらは問題ありません。
jpnSearchText: いえ、こちらは問題ありません。

engChrName: I simply noticed a number of...irregularities in the last set of data you sent me.
engSearchText:
I simply noticed a number of...irregularities in the last
set of data you sent me.
jpnChrName: ですがヴァン様──前回受け取った 各種ステータスは明らかに異常でした。
jpnSearchText:
ですがヴァン様──前回受け取った
各種ステータスは明らかに異常でした。

engChrName: And as your service provider, I cannot help but be concerned.
engSearchText:
And as your service provider, I cannot help but
be concerned.
jpnChrName: サービスを提供するわたくし共と いたしましても捨て置くわけには──
jpnSearchText:
サービスを提供するわたくし共と
いたしましても捨て置くわけには──

engChrName: I am deeply worried on a personal level, too, considering I am charged with your care.
engSearchText:
I am deeply worried on a personal level, too,
considering I am charged with your care.
jpnChrName: 何より担当として……個人的にも心配です。
jpnSearchText: 何より担当として……個人的にも心配です。

engChrName: Uhh... I mean, I'm grateful, but...
engSearchText: Uhh... I mean, I'm grateful, but...
jpnChrName: あー…… そう言ってくれるのは有り難いんだが。
jpnSearchText:
あー……
そう言ってくれるのは有り難いんだが。

engChrName: Anyway, we'll only be away for a few days. I'll call you once things settle down afterwards. See ya.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we'll only be away for a few days. I'll call you
once things settle down afterwards. See ya.
jpnChrName: まあ数日で戻るから待っててくれ。 落ち着いたら連絡する──じゃあな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ数日で戻るから待っててくれ。
落ち着いたら連絡する──じゃあな。

engChrName: Oh, please wai—
engSearchText: Oh, please wai—
jpnChrName: あ、お待ちくだ──
jpnSearchText: あ、お待ちくだ──

engChrName: Phew... Uh.
engSearchText: Phew... Uh.
jpnChrName: ふう──って。
jpnSearchText: ふう──って。

engChrName: Wh-Why're you all looking at me like that? She doesn't work at some sleazy shop or whatever, okay?
engSearchText:
Wh-Why're you all looking at me like that?
She doesn't work at some sleazy shop or
whatever, okay?
jpnChrName: な、なんだその目は…… いかがわしい店とかじゃねえからな？
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだその目は……
いかがわしい店とかじゃねえからな？

engChrName: You sure about that? Sounded like she was talking to her fa-vo-rite customer from where I'm standing.
engSearchText:
You sure about that? Sounded like she was talking to
her fa-vo-rite customer from where I'm standing.
jpnChrName: そうかぁ？　完全に馴染みの店の オキニとの会話じゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
そうかぁ？　完全に馴染みの店の
オキニとの会話じゃねーか。

engChrName: And what the hell gave you that impression?!
engSearchText: And what the hell gave you that impression?!
jpnChrName: どこがだよっ！？
jpnSearchText: どこがだよっ！？

engChrName: I dunno what this 'sleazy shop' stuff is about, but she WAS super pretty.
engSearchText:
I dunno what this 'sleazy shop' stuff is about, but she
WAS super pretty.
jpnChrName: オキニ……？　よく分かりませんけど キレイな人でしたねっ。
jpnSearchText:
オキニ……？　よく分かりませんけど
キレイな人でしたねっ。

engChrName: Her outfit was really cute, too!
engSearchText: Her outfit was really cute, too!
jpnChrName: あの服も心なしか惹きつけられますし！
jpnSearchText: あの服も心なしか惹きつけられますし！

engChrName: It looked like a maid outfit. Which, yes, did make me wonder what 'service' she 'provides' while being 'charged with your care'...
engSearchText:
It looked like a maid outfit. Which, yes, did make me
wonder what 'service' she 'provides' while being
'charged with your care'...
jpnChrName: ……あれはメイド服、でしょうか？ サービスの提供……担当として個人的に心配……
jpnSearchText:
……あれはメイド服、でしょうか？
サービスの提供……担当として個人的に心配……

engChrName: Gah! Let's just get goin', okay?!
engSearchText: Gah! Let's just get goin', okay?!
jpnChrName: だあっ！ いいからとっとと出発するぞ！
jpnSearchText:
だあっ！
いいからとっとと出発するぞ！

engChrName: October 12th, 1208
engSearchText: October 12th, 1208
jpnChrName: 七耀暦１２０８年　１０月１２日
jpnSearchText: 七耀暦１２０８年　１０月１２日

engChrName: Judith Lanster appears to be taking the loss of the Lionne d'Or very seriously.
engSearchText:
Judith Lanster appears to be taking the loss of the
Lionne d'Or very seriously.
jpnChrName: ──なお、ジュディスさんは 最優秀賞（レオンドール）を逃したことを真摯に受け止め……
jpnSearchText:
──なお、ジュディスさんは
最優秀賞（レオンドール）を逃したことを真摯に受け止め……

engChrName: She has now sworn to win against Nina Fenly next year in BOTH festivals after acknowledging the younger actress as her true equal.
engSearchText:
She has now sworn to win against Nina Fenly next
year in BOTH festivals after acknowledging the
younger actress as her true equal.
jpnChrName: 今後は後輩でなくライバルとしてニナさんに 来年の両映画祭でのリベンジを誓ったんだとか。
jpnSearchText:
今後は後輩でなくライバルとしてニナさんに
来年の両映画祭でのリベンジを誓ったんだとか。

engChrName: Between that and Salvatore Gotti already teasing his next work, I'd venture to say the future has quite a lot in store for us.
engSearchText:
Between that and Salvatore Gotti already teasing his
next work, I'd venture to say the future has quite a lot
in store for us.
jpnChrName: いや～、早くも次回作の制作を仄めかした ゴッチ監督も含めて、今後の動向が楽しみですね。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、早くも次回作の制作を仄めかした
ゴッチ監督も含めて、今後の動向が楽しみですね。

engChrName: Next, the Quincy Company recently released a new addition to its lineup...
engSearchText:
Next, the Quincy Company recently released a new
addition to its lineup...
jpnChrName: それでは次の特集です。 先日発売されたクインシー社の新商品──
jpnSearchText:
それでは次の特集です。
先日発売されたクインシー社の新商品──

engChrName: Man, I dunno how they can be so carefree after all the shit that went down.
engSearchText:
Man, I dunno how they can be so carefree after all
the shit that went down.
jpnChrName: ったく、どいつもこいつも呑気なモンだ。
jpnSearchText: ったく、どいつもこいつも呑気なモンだ。

engChrName: Especially Director Deviant. Takes a weird pair of balls to only think about how to make a movie out of it.
engSearchText:
Especially Director Deviant. Takes a weird pair of
balls to only think about how to make a movie out
of it.
jpnChrName: エロ監督に至っちゃ、あの事件を 映画化するとか抜かしてるんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
エロ監督に至っちゃ、あの事件を
映画化するとか抜かしてるんだったか？

engChrName: Ahaha... He's resilient, all right. The kind of man who always finds something on the floor every time he's knocked down.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... He's resilient, all right. The kind of man
who always finds something on the floor every time
he's knocked down.
jpnChrName: あはは……逞しいですよね。 転んでもただでは起きないと言いますか。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……逞しいですよね。
転んでもただでは起きないと言いますか。

engChrName: The news isn't saying much about the drugs or organized crime, though... Not that I'm especially surprised about that.
engSearchText:
The news isn't saying much about the drugs or
organized crime, though... Not that I'm especially
surprised about that.
jpnChrName: ……さすがに薬物やマフィアの件は 大きくは取り上げられなかったですね。
jpnSearchText:
……さすがに薬物やマフィアの件は
大きくは取り上げられなかったですね。

engChrName: Yeah. That'd just put people on edge.
engSearchText: Yeah. That'd just put people on edge.
jpnChrName: まあ、不安を煽るだけだろうしな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、不安を煽るだけだろうしな。

engChrName: Guessin' it's probably René's people and the principality hushing things up.
engSearchText:
Guessin' it's probably René's people and the
principality hushing things up.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤ（ルネたち）の情報規制に、 公国方面からの働きかけの賜物だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤ（ルネたち）の情報規制に、
公国方面からの働きかけの賜物だろう。

engChrName: I was worried the prince and Naje would be out for a while, so it's good they recovered right away.
engSearchText:
I was worried the prince and Naje would be out for a
while, so it's good they recovered right away.
jpnChrName: あの後、殿下たちも すぐ回復されて良かったですね。
jpnSearchText:
あの後、殿下たちも
すぐ回復されて良かったですね。

engChrName: Saara and Shaheena were able to pay off their debts, too.
engSearchText:
Saara and Shaheena were able to pay off their
debts, too.
jpnChrName: サァラさんとシャヒーナさんも、 ちゃんと借金を返せたみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
サァラさんとシャヒーナさんも、
ちゃんと借金を返せたみたいですし。

engChrName: Yeah. I doubt those loan sharks were expecting to get it all back in one go.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I doubt those loan sharks were expecting to get
it all back in one go.
jpnChrName: クク、いきなり耳揃えて返したから 闇金業者のヤツらも魂消たみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
クク、いきなり耳揃えて返したから
闇金業者のヤツらも魂消たみたいだが。

engChrName: They were both such lovely people. I'm so glad we got to meet them.
engSearchText:
They were both such lovely people. I'm so glad we got
to meet them.
jpnChrName: ……本当に素敵なご姉妹でしたね。
jpnSearchText: ……本当に素敵なご姉妹でしたね。

engChrName: It sounds like the future is looking bright for them, too, if they have such a big show confirmed already.
engSearchText:
It sounds like the future is looking bright for them,
too, if they have such a big show confirmed already.
jpnChrName: そういえば早速、 大きな舞台が決まったんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば早速、
大きな舞台が決まったんですよね？

engChrName: Yeah. Not everyone gets to collaborate with a group like Crossbell's Arc en Ciel right out the door.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Not everyone gets to collaborate with a group
like Crossbell's Arc en Ciel right out the door.
jpnChrName: ああ、クロスベルの 《アルカンシェル》とのコラボ公演か。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、クロスベルの
《アルカンシェル》とのコラボ公演か。

engChrName: They gotta be feelin' some pressure, jumpin' into the big leagues so quickly, but they're up for it, I'm sure.
engSearchText:
They gotta be feelin' some pressure, jumpin' into the
big leagues so quickly, but they're up for it, I'm sure.
jpnChrName: 一気にスターダムを駆け上がりそうだが ま、あの姉妹なら何とかやって行けるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
一気にスターダムを駆け上がりそうだが
ま、あの姉妹なら何とかやって行けるだろ。

engChrName: You've always had a ton of suspicious criminal contacts, but now you're drowning in public superstars, too.
engSearchText:
You've always had a ton of suspicious criminal
contacts, but now you're drowning in public
superstars, too.
jpnChrName: ハッ、裏についても胡散臭えが 表のコネも随分増えたじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、裏についても胡散臭えが
表のコネも随分増えたじゃねえか？

engChrName: Top actresses, big league directors, promising dancers...
engSearchText:
Top actresses, big league directors,
promising dancers...
jpnChrName: トップ女優どもに売れっ子監督、 将来有望な踊り子姉妹とはなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
トップ女優どもに売れっ子監督、
将来有望な踊り子姉妹とはなぁ。

engChrName: Bet you must be feeling like you've struck gold, what with all these famous chicks all over you lately.
engSearchText:
Bet you must be feeling like you've struck gold, what
with all these famous chicks all over you lately.
jpnChrName: ……さぞやに下がって 鼻の下延ばしてんだろ、オイ？
jpnSearchText:
……さぞやに下がって
鼻の下延ばしてんだろ、オイ？

engChrName: Uhh, what do you mean?
engSearchText: Uhh, what do you mean?
jpnChrName: やにさがる……？
jpnSearchText: やにさがる……？

engChrName: ...Well, Van?
engSearchText: ...Well, Van?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Why d'you always gotta go right for my jugular?
engSearchText: Why d'you always gotta go right for my jugular?
jpnChrName: ねえっつの……人聞き悪ぃ事を言うな。
jpnSearchText: ねえっつの……人聞き悪ぃ事を言うな。

engChrName: I WAS fine with this stayin' a quiet, one-man operation, y'know.
engSearchText:
I WAS fine with this stayin' a quiet, one-man
operation, y'know.
jpnChrName: 大体な、お前らも含めてここまで 手広くやるつもりは無かったんだからな？
jpnSearchText:
大体な、お前らも含めてここまで
手広くやるつもりは無かったんだからな？

engChrName: Now all of a sudden I've got a load of employees, and both the CID and Elsaim royals have their eyes on me. What a pain...
engSearchText:
Now all of a sudden I've got a load of employees, and
both the CID and Elsaim royals have their eyes
on me. What a pain...
jpnChrName: それが今やＣＩＤやエルザイム方面まで 目を付けられる始末……面倒臭すぎだろ。
jpnSearchText:
それが今やＣＩＤやエルザイム方面まで
目を付けられる始末……面倒臭すぎだろ。

engChrName: I think you're mostly to blame for that, though.
engSearchText: I think you're mostly to blame for that, though.
jpnChrName: あはは……でも半分以上は ヴァンさん自身のせいのような。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……でも半分以上は
ヴァンさん自身のせいのような。

engChrName: 'Mostly?' It's all his fault.
engSearchText: 'Mostly?' It's all his fault.
jpnChrName: 半分どころか１００パーだろ。
jpnSearchText: 半分どころか１００パーだろ。

engChrName: I thought you made a positive impression on the prince, though. He seemed to really like you.
engSearchText:
I thought you made a positive impression on the
prince, though. He seemed to really like you.
jpnChrName: えへへ、公太子殿下に 気に入られたのも凄いと思いますっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、公太子殿下に
気に入られたのも凄いと思いますっ。

engChrName: Yeah, I wouldn't call that 'liking.' He was puttin' me on his radar.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I wouldn't call that 'liking.' He was puttin' me
on his radar.
jpnChrName: だからありゃあ気に入られたっつーより “目を付けられた”っつうんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
だからありゃあ気に入られたっつーより
“目を付けられた”っつうんだよ。

engChrName: Granted, if he wants to give me some fat bonuses, who am I to say no? Heh heh.
engSearchText:
Granted, if he wants to give me some fat bonuses,
who am I to say no? Heh heh.
jpnChrName: ま、報酬の“色”については 遠慮なく受け取るけどな──フフフ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、報酬の“色”については
遠慮なく受け取るけどな──フフフ。

engChrName: Mmm... It's definitely over seventy percent his fault.
engSearchText: Mmm... It's definitely over seventy percent his fault.
jpnChrName: やっぱり７割以上は……
jpnSearchText: やっぱり７割以上は……

engChrName: Seventy? Try one-twenty.
engSearchText: Seventy? Try one-twenty.
jpnChrName: いや、１２０パーだろこりゃ。
jpnSearchText: いや、１２０パーだろこりゃ。

engChrName: Still, nothin' good comes from bitin' off more than you can chew. Better to keep this operation focused.
engSearchText:
Still, nothin' good comes from bitin' off more than
you can chew. Better to keep this operation focused.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、手を広げすぎると やっぱロクなことはねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、手を広げすぎると
やっぱロクなことはねぇな。

engChrName: Besides, why'd he have to bring Marduk's name up? They got nothin' to do with us now.
engSearchText:
Besides, why'd he have to bring Marduk's name up?
They got nothin' to do with us now.
jpnChrName: 第一マルドゥックは関係ねぇだろ、 マルドゥックは。
jpnSearchText:
第一マルドゥックは関係ねぇだろ、
マルドゥックは。

engChrName: Risette helpin' out was just a one-time thing. Now I'm back to bein' just a regular old tester.
engSearchText:
Risette helpin' out was just a one-time thing.
Now I'm back to bein' just a regular old tester.
jpnChrName: “出向サポート”はあの時限りで 今は元通りのテスター契約だけだしな。
jpnSearchText:
“出向サポート”はあの時限りで
今は元通りのテスター契約だけだしな。

engHtmlText: アニエス／フェリ／アーロン
jpnSearchText: え……／？？？／は？

engChrName: Uhh... What's with all the confusion?
engSearchText: Uhh... What's with all the confusion?
jpnChrName: ……？ なんだよ、その反応は。
jpnSearchText:
……？
なんだよ、その反応は。

engChrName: Umm... Well...
engSearchText: Umm... Well...
jpnChrName: えと……その。
jpnSearchText: えと……その。

engChrName: ...Yo, Agnès. You keeping stuff from him again?
engSearchText: ...Yo, Agnès. You keeping stuff from him again?
jpnChrName: ……おい小娘。 また黙ってやがったのか？
jpnSearchText:
……おい小娘。
また黙ってやがったのか？

engChrName: I didn't mean to... I really only intended that with you.
engSearchText:
I didn't mean to... I really only intended that
with you.
jpnChrName: そ、そんなことは…… あれはアーロンさんの時だけで。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなことは……
あれはアーロンさんの時だけで。

engChrName: Excuse me.
engSearchText: Excuse me.
jpnChrName: 失礼いたします。
jpnSearchText: 失礼いたします。

engChrName: Guess we got another client. I'll be right there!
engSearchText: Guess we got another client. I'll be right there!
jpnChrName: っと、客か。 はいはいお待ちくださいよっと。
jpnSearchText:
っと、客か。
はいはいお待ちくださいよっと。

engChrName: ...Huh. Funny. I must be seein' things.
engSearchText: ...Huh. Funny. I must be seein' things.
jpnChrName: ……まあ待て、落ち着け。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ待て、落ち着け。

engChrName: Hello there. It's good to see you all again—even if it's been less than a week since we last met.
engSearchText:
Hello there. It's good to see you all again—even if it's
been less than a week since we last met.
jpnChrName: 皆様、ご無沙汰しております。 といっても５日ぶりですが。
jpnSearchText:
皆様、ご無沙汰しております。
といっても５日ぶりですが。

engChrName: Talk about a stickler for time. Not even a minute late.
engSearchText: Talk about a stickler for time. Not even a minute late.
jpnChrName: 時間ピッタリかよ、 クソ真面目なメイドだな。
jpnSearchText:
時間ピッタリかよ、
クソ真面目なメイドだな。

engChrName: I trust you didn't get lost on the way here?
engSearchText: I trust you didn't get lost on the way here?
jpnChrName: 道には迷いませんでしたか？
jpnSearchText: 道には迷いませんでしたか？

engChrName: Not at all. I've known where Mr. Arkride lives for quite some time.
engSearchText:
Not at all. I've known where Mr. Arkride lives for
quite some time.
jpnChrName: ええ、ご住所は 以前から把握しておりましたので。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ご住所は
以前から把握しておりましたので。

engChrName: I look forward to working with you all.
engSearchText: I look forward to working with you all.
jpnChrName: 改めて、これからお世話になります。
jpnSearchText: 改めて、これからお世話になります。

engChrName: WHAT?!
engSearchText: WHAT?!
jpnChrName: はああああああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: はああああああっ……！？

engChrName: Now just one damn minute! What's this all—
engSearchText: Now just one damn minute! What's this all—
jpnChrName: おいおい、ちょっと待て！ いったいどういう──
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、ちょっと待て！
いったいどういう──

engChrName: After the events of the other day, Marduk HQ undertook a thorough investigation and risk assessment of the situation.
engSearchText:
After the events of the other day, Marduk HQ
undertook a thorough investigation and risk
assessment of the situation.
jpnChrName: 先日の事件についてオレド本社での 各種報告とリスク分析が完了いたしました。
jpnSearchText:
先日の事件についてオレド本社での
各種報告とリスク分析が完了いたしました。

engChrName: The possibility was raised that, on this exceptional occasion, the continued presence of an on-site concierge may be warranted...
engSearchText:
The possibility was raised that, on this exceptional
occasion, the continued presence of an on-site
concierge may be warranted...
jpnChrName: その結果、極めて異例ではありますが“現地ＳＣ” としてのサポート業務継続の必要性が検討され──
jpnSearchText:
その結果、極めて異例ではありますが“現地ＳＣ”
としてのサポート業務継続の必要性が検討され──

engChrName: As a result, my subsequent internal application to be assigned directly to Arkride Solutions long-term was granted...and so, here I am.
engSearchText:
As a result, my subsequent internal application to be
assigned directly to Arkride Solutions long-term was
granted...and so, here I am.
jpnChrName: この度めでたく、アークライド解決事務所への 長期出向の申請が下りた次第です。
jpnSearchText:
この度めでたく、アークライド解決事務所への
長期出向の申請が下りた次第です。

engChrName: Umm... It sounds like she'll be able to help out with a lot, including Mare, while keeping the details secret from Marduk HQ.
engSearchText:
Umm... It sounds like she'll be able to help out with a
lot, including Mare, while keeping the details secret
from Marduk HQ.
jpnChrName: その、私たちの事情も本社には伏せつつ メアちゃんも含めてサポートできるそうで……
jpnSearchText:
その、私たちの事情も本社には伏せつつ
メアちゃんも含めてサポートできるそうで……

engChrName: Plus she can teach us more about shards and do a whole bunch of other useful stuff for us!
engSearchText:
Plus she can teach us more about shards and do a
whole bunch of other useful stuff for us!
jpnChrName: シャード指南やその他サービスなんかも 色々と受けられるらしいですっ！
jpnSearchText:
シャード指南やその他サービスなんかも
色々と受けられるらしいですっ！

engChrName: Yeah. There was something about having us try out some cutting-edge orbal net service, too.
engSearchText:
Yeah. There was something about having us try out
some cutting-edge orbal net service, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、なんか導力ネットを使った 最先端のサービスが試せるらしいなァ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、なんか導力ネットを使った
最先端のサービスが試せるらしいなァ？

engChrName: That's right. I would greatly benefit from the wider pool of testers, rather than just Mr. Arkride alone.
engSearchText:
That's right. I would greatly benefit from the wider
pool of testers, rather than just Mr. Arkride alone.
jpnChrName: はい、ヴァン様同様、皆様には テスターとして協力していただければと。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ヴァン様同様、皆様には
テスターとして協力していただければと。

engChrName: Of course, I will take care to ensure the terms of your contracts are fair and beneficial to you all.
engSearchText:
Of course, I will take care to ensure the terms of your
contracts are fair and beneficial to you all.
jpnChrName: もちろん不都合な契約にならないよう、 誠心誠意、計らわせていただきますので。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん不都合な契約にならないよう、
誠心誠意、計らわせていただきますので。

engChrName: I don't think any of us are worried on that count as long as you're involved.
engSearchText:
I don't think any of us are worried on that count as
long as you're involved.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、リゼットさんでしたら そのあたりも安心できますから。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、リゼットさんでしたら
そのあたりも安心できますから。

engChrName: Uhh...
engSearchText: Uhh...
jpnSearchText: ………えっと……………

engChrName: Oh, and I have of course already signed a lease for one of the rooms on the third floor and deposited my belongings there.
engSearchText:
Oh, and I have of course already signed a lease for
one of the rooms on the third floor and deposited my
belongings there.
jpnChrName: ああ──すでに３Ｆの部屋も契約済み、 荷物も置いてまいりました。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──すでに３Ｆの部屋も契約済み、
荷物も置いてまいりました。

engChrName: I believe you are behind on temporary employment tax paperwork and insurance applications for everyone here.
engSearchText:
I believe you are behind on temporary employment
tax paperwork and insurance applications for
everyone here.
jpnChrName: 伺います限り、非正規雇用の税務手続きや 保険申請なども滞っていらっしゃるご様子──
jpnSearchText:
伺います限り、非正規雇用の税務手続きや
保険申請なども滞っていらっしゃるご様子──

engChrName: I would be happy to help with those matters and more besides, so please let me know if I can be of service.
engSearchText:
I would be happy to help with those matters and
more besides, so please let me know if I can be
of service.
jpnChrName: 諸々サポートさせていただきますので、 遠慮なく申しつけてください。
jpnSearchText:
諸々サポートさせていただきますので、
遠慮なく申しつけてください。

engChrName: Oh, we couldn't possibly leave everything to you. I'll do all I can to handle my fair share, too!
engSearchText:
Oh, we couldn't possibly leave everything to you.
I'll do all I can to handle my fair share, too!
jpnChrName: 全部押し付けるのは流石に…… その、私も勉強させていただきますので！
jpnSearchText:
全部押し付けるのは流石に……
その、私も勉強させていただきますので！

engChrName: Oooh, but first, you should give me a crash course in how to use those shard footholds!
engSearchText:
Oooh, but first, you should give me a crash course in
how to use those shard footholds!
jpnChrName: あ、早速ですけど シャード足場を使った戦術指南を……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、早速ですけど
シャード足場を使った戦術指南を……！

engChrName: GAH! Can you people stop making decisions without me?!
engSearchText:
GAH! Can you people stop making decisions
without me?!
jpnChrName: お前ら──俺を差し置いて 話を進めまくってんじゃねええっ！！
jpnSearchText:
お前ら──俺を差し置いて
話を進めまくってんじゃねええっ！！

engChrName: Main 4SPG [Business Trip to Tharbad] completed! Received
engSearchText:
Main 4SPG [Business Trip to Tharbad] completed!
Received
jpnChrName: メイン４ｓｐｇ【サルバッドへの出張業務】の 報酬として
jpnSearchText:
メイン４ｓｐｇ【サルバッドへの出張業務】の
報酬として

engChrName: October 18th, 1208, 11:03AM
engSearchText: October 18th, 1208, 11:03AM

engChrName: I read your report. I'm pleased to see everything seems to be going swimmingly.
engSearchText:
I read your report. I'm pleased to see everything
seems to be going swimmingly.
jpnChrName: 報告は読ませてもらった── 成程、おおむね順調のようだね。
jpnSearchText:
報告は読ませてもらった──
成程、おおむね順調のようだね。

engChrName: I foresee no major issues in you conducting your support and operational work from Edith.
engSearchText:
I foresee no major issues in you conducting your
support and operational work from Edith.
jpnChrName: カルバード首都圏での現地サポート・ オペレーション業務も問題なさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード首都圏での現地サポート・
オペレーション業務も問題なさそうだ。

engChrName: As such, I will leave all but emergency matters to your discretion while you're with Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
As such, I will leave all but emergency matters to your
discretion while you're with Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: アークライド解決事務所への出向── 緊急案件以外は君の判断に任せよう。
jpnSearchText:
アークライド解決事務所への出向──
緊急案件以外は君の判断に任せよう。

engChrName: Thank you very much.
engSearchText: Thank you very much.
jpnChrName: ご承認、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ご承認、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: I will continue to report all I can regarding the Almata matter, too, aside from the agreed exceptions.
engSearchText:
I will continue to report all I can regarding the
Almata matter, too, aside from the agreed exceptions.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》案件については例外を除いて 引き続きご報告させて頂きますので。
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》案件については例外を除いて
引き続きご報告させて頂きますので。

engChrName: Please do.
engSearchText: Please do.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうしてくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうしてくれたまえ。

engChrName: Although I can't help but feel that much will fall under the 'exceptions' umbrella.
engSearchText:
Although I can't help but feel that much will fall
under the 'exceptions' umbrella.
jpnChrName: ──例外というのが想定以上に 多くなりそうなのが気にはなるがね。
jpnSearchText:
──例外というのが想定以上に
多くなりそうなのが気にはなるがね。

engChrName: I do apologize about that. However—
engSearchText: I do apologize about that. However—
jpnChrName: ……恐縮です、ですが──
jpnSearchText: ……恐縮です、ですが──

engChrName: Oh, I didn't mean to sound critical of you. This arrangement doesn't violate the terms of our agreement in any way.
engSearchText:
Oh, I didn't mean to sound critical of you.
This arrangement doesn't violate the terms of our
agreement in any way.
jpnChrName: ああ、咎めているわけではないよ。 それについては“規程”の範疇内だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、咎めているわけではないよ。
それについては“規程”の範疇内だ。

engChrName: I'm just sure you appreciate that we cannot allow complete free reign à la a certain society's agents.
engSearchText:
I'm just sure you appreciate that we cannot allow
complete free reign à la a certain society's agents.
jpnChrName: 流石に某組織のように執行権限者に 全ての自由を認めるのは無理だがね。
jpnSearchText:
流石に某組織のように執行権限者に
全ての自由を認めるのは無理だがね。

engChrName: Of course. That degree of freedom would not befit a corporate setting.
engSearchText:
Of course. That degree of freedom would not befit a
corporate setting.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、企業活動に 馴染まないのは確かかと。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、企業活動に
馴染まないのは確かかと。

engChrName: Now, I am very interested in the actions of Van Arkride and his personal holo...
engSearchText:
Now, I am very interested in the actions of Van
Arkride and his personal holo...
jpnChrName: こちらとしてはヴァン・アークライドと 専用ホロウの挙動も気になるが……
jpnSearchText:
こちらとしてはヴァン・アークライドと
専用ホロウの挙動も気になるが……

engChrName: Just as much as I anticipate perusing your own data from your time there.
engSearchText:
Just as much as I anticipate perusing your own data
from your time there.
jpnChrName: それとは別に、“君自身”の経過と 実践データについても期待している。
jpnSearchText:
それとは別に、“君自身”の経過と
実践データについても期待している。

engChrName: I'm counting on you, Ms. Twinings.
engSearchText: I'm counting on you, Ms. Twinings.
jpnChrName: 宜しく頼むよ── リゼット・トワイニングＳＣ。
jpnSearchText:
宜しく頼むよ──
リゼット・トワイニングＳＣ。

engChrName: I will not disappoint you, Mr. Thorndyke.
engSearchText: I will not disappoint you, Mr. Thorndyke.
jpnChrName: ……かしこまりました。 ソーンダイクＧＭ（ゼネラルマネージャー）。
jpnSearchText:
……かしこまりました。
ソーンダイクＧＭ（ゼネラルマネージャー）。

engChrName: (Marduk truly is an enigma—even to those in it like me.)
engSearchText:
(Marduk truly is an enigma—even to those in it
like me.)
jpnChrName: （……マルドゥック──   所属してなお底が見えませんね。）
jpnSearchText:
（……マルドゥック──
所属してなお底が見えませんね。）

engChrName: (They prioritize profit above all else, but also use a perfect mixture of truth and lies to blur just how far their reach really extends.)
engSearchText:
(They prioritize profit above all else, but also use a
perfect mixture of truth and lies to blur just how far
their reach really extends.)
jpnChrName: （実利を優先しながら、虚実を徹底的に   使い分けて輪郭をぼかす在り方……）
jpnSearchText:
（実利を優先しながら、虚実を徹底的に
使い分けて輪郭をぼかす在り方……）

engChrName: ...But I suppose I'm in no position to decry that.
engSearchText: ...But I suppose I'm in no position to decry that.
jpnChrName: ……言えた立場ではありませんか。
jpnSearchText: ……言えた立場ではありませんか。

engChrName: Well, then, it's time I started work for today.
engSearchText: Well, then, it's time I started work for today.
jpnChrName: さて、わたくしも 本日の業務を始めましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、わたくしも
本日の業務を始めましょうか。

engChrName: *humming* ♪
engSearchText: *humming* ♪
jpnSearchText: ～～～～♪

engChrName: Oh, there you are! Someone's in a good mood today.
engSearchText: Oh, there you are! Someone's in a good mood today.
jpnChrName: あっ、ここにいた── ご機嫌ですね、ヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、ここにいた──
ご機嫌ですね、ヴァンさん！

engChrName: Hey. Done with school for the day?
engSearchText: Hey. Done with school for the day?
jpnChrName: おう、授業はもう終わりか？
jpnSearchText: おう、授業はもう終わりか？

engChrName: I sure am!
engSearchText: I sure am!
jpnChrName: えへへ、つつがなく。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、つつがなく。

engChrName: Are you doing some maintenance before work? You're so dedicated.
engSearchText:
Are you doing some maintenance before work?
You're so dedicated.
jpnChrName: お仕事前に整備ですか？ ヴァンさんもマメですよねっ。
jpnSearchText:
お仕事前に整備ですか？
ヴァンさんもマメですよねっ。

engChrName: My girl only deserves the best.
engSearchText: My girl only deserves the best.
jpnChrName: ま、大切な相棒だからな。
jpnSearchText: ま、大切な相棒だからな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Your corps used cars to get around, too, right?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Your corps used cars to get around,
too, right?
jpnChrName: そういやお前んトコの団も 移動は導力車が中心だっただろ。
jpnSearchText:
そういやお前んトコの団も
移動は導力車が中心だっただろ。

engChrName: Your pops a car buff at all?
engSearchText: Your pops a car buff at all?
jpnChrName: 親父さんとか拘ってんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText: 親父さんとか拘ってんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: I don't know if I'd say that... He drives a Leno, that I know.
engSearchText:
I don't know if I'd say that... He drives a Leno, that
I know.
jpnChrName: んー、どうでしょう。 《レノ》の導力車を使ってましたが。
jpnSearchText:
んー、どうでしょう。
《レノ》の導力車を使ってましたが。

engChrName: Oh! But he's pretty picky about his tires and... shock absorbers? Whatever those are.
engSearchText:
Oh! But he's pretty picky about his tires and...
shock absorbers? Whatever those are.
jpnChrName: あ、タイヤとか“だんぱー”とかには 拘っていた気がします。
jpnSearchText:
あ、タイヤとか“だんぱー”とかには
拘っていた気がします。

engChrName: I bet. If you're drivin' across mountains and deserts all the time, you need only the best.
engSearchText:
I bet. If you're drivin' across mountains and deserts all
the time, you need only the best.
jpnChrName: 山岳地や砂漠だとどうしてもなぁ。
jpnSearchText: 山岳地や砂漠だとどうしてもなぁ。

engChrName: You have no idea how much work I had to put into tuning her up so we'd have a smooth ride over the sand dunes in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
You have no idea how much work I had to put into
tuning her up so we'd have a smooth ride over the
sand dunes in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ちなみに前回、砂丘で安定して走れたのも 入念なチューンナップあってこそだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに前回、砂丘で安定して走れたのも
入念なチューンナップあってこそだぜ？

engChrName: Really? I would've never guessed you did anything special.
engSearchText:
Really? I would've never guessed you did
anything special.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… よく分かりませんけどっ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
よく分かりませんけどっ。

engChrName: Ugh. Okay, let me give you a primer. So the most important tweaking you can do is to the suspension, right? And—
engSearchText:
Ugh. Okay, let me give you a primer. So the most
important tweaking you can do is to the
suspension, right? And—
jpnChrName: ぐっ、いいか足回りっつーのは カスタムの中でも特に重要で──……
jpnSearchText:
ぐっ、いいか足回りっつーのは
カスタムの中でも特に重要で──……

engChrName: What's that over there?
engSearchText: What's that over there?
jpnChrName: あれは……？
jpnSearchText: あれは……？

engChrName: Yeah, that. It came from Elsaim this mornin'.
engSearchText: Yeah, that. It came from Elsaim this mornin'.
jpnChrName: ああ、午前中に エルザイム方面から届いてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、午前中に
エルザイム方面から届いてな。

engChrName: It's a present from the crown prince.
engSearchText: It's a present from the crown prince.
jpnChrName: 例の公太子からのプレゼントだ。
jpnSearchText: 例の公太子からのプレゼントだ。

engChrName: That's right...
engSearchText: That's right...
jpnChrName: ああ、そういえば……
jpnSearchText: ああ、そういえば……

engChrName: I threw in a bonus on top of your base reward, so you have something extra to look forward to. It will arrive separately.
engSearchText:
I threw in a bonus on top of your base reward, so you
have something extra to look forward to. It will
arrive separately.
jpnChrName: ──報酬には色を付けさせてもらった。 後日届けさせるから楽しみにしてくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
──報酬には色を付けさせてもらった。
後日届けさせるから楽しみにしてくれたまえ。

engChrName: It's a custom part made with top-quality materials. And I mean 'top quality'—being successor to the throne means real money to burn.
engSearchText:
It's a custom part made with top-quality materials.
And I mean 'top quality'—being successor to the
throne means real money to burn.
jpnChrName: 特注された最先端素材のパーツ…… さすが跡継ぎ、こんなモンを用意するとは。
jpnSearchText:
特注された最先端素材のパーツ……
さすが跡継ぎ、こんなモンを用意するとは。

engChrName: Kinda pisses me off that he conveniently sent it just as it was startin' to get a little too snug for everyone to fit in.
engSearchText:
Kinda pisses me off that he conveniently sent it just as
it was startin' to get a little too snug for everyone to
fit in.
jpnChrName: 人も増えてどうしようかってところに お膳立てされたのは気にくわねえが。
jpnSearchText:
人も増えてどうしようかってところに
お膳立てされたのは気にくわねえが。

engChrName: Is it something designed to add more seats to the back of the car, then?
engSearchText:
Is it something designed to add more seats to the
back of the car, then?
jpnChrName: ああ、なるほど…… 後部座席を追加するパーツですか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、なるほど……
後部座席を追加するパーツですか。

engChrName: Huh. How'd you guess?
engSearchText: Huh. How'd you guess?
jpnChrName: お──分かんのかよ？
jpnSearchText: お──分かんのかよ？

engChrName: I think I've told you this before, but I've got a brother who left our corps and set out on his own.
engSearchText:
I think I've told you this before, but I've got a brother
who left our corps and set out on his own.
jpnChrName: 前にも言いましたけど…… 戦士団を出て独立した兄がいまして。
jpnSearchText:
前にも言いましたけど……
戦士団を出て独立した兄がいまして。

engChrName: When he came back to the village for a brief visit last year, he had something like that attached to his car, too.
engSearchText:
When he came back to the village for a brief visit last
year, he had something like that attached to his
car, too.
jpnChrName: 去年、里に顔を出した時に乗ってた車に 同じようなパーツが付いていたんです。
jpnSearchText:
去年、里に顔を出した時に乗ってた車に
同じようなパーツが付いていたんです。

engChrName: Though it's possible he's got a different car now.
engSearchText: Though it's possible he's got a different car now.
jpnChrName: 今は別の車に乗ってるかもですけど。
jpnSearchText: 今は別の車に乗ってるかもですけど。

engChrName: Got'cha. He's probably ridin' the same one, if I had to guess.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. He's probably ridin' the same one, if I had
to guess.
jpnChrName: なるほどな…… まあ、まだ乗ってるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな……
まあ、まだ乗ってるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: You think so? Heehee. Maybe you're right.
engSearchText: You think so? Heehee. Maybe you're right.
jpnChrName: ……？ えへへ、そうかもですね。
jpnSearchText:
……？
えへへ、そうかもですね。

engChrName: I thought I might find you here, Van. And hello, Feri.
engSearchText:
I thought I might find you here, Van. And
hello, Feri.
jpnChrName: ──ヴァンさん。 フェリちゃんもこちらでしたか。
jpnSearchText:
──ヴァンさん。
フェリちゃんもこちらでしたか。

engChrName: Agnès!
engSearchText: Agnès!
jpnChrName: あ、アニエスさんっ。
jpnSearchText: あ、アニエスさんっ。

engChrName: You always get here ten minutes early. I don't mind you bein' a little more lax, you know.
engSearchText:
You always get here ten minutes early. I don't mind
you bein' a little more lax, you know.
jpnChrName: 毎度毎度の１０分前行動か、 もう少し緩くてもいいんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
毎度毎度の１０分前行動か、
もう少し緩くてもいいんだぜ？

engChrName: Heehee. I'm sure you don't, but it's a hard habit to break once you've started.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'm sure you don't, but it's a hard habit to
break once you've started.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そう言われましても 染みついているので……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そう言われましても
染みついているので……

engChrName: *yawn* Guess that means I can hit the hay a while longer, then...
engSearchText:
*yawn* Guess that means I can hit the hay a while
longer, then...
jpnChrName: ふあああっ、そんじゃ俺は 二度寝させてもらうかね……
jpnSearchText:
ふあああっ、そんじゃ俺は
二度寝させてもらうかね……

engChrName: You should try taking a page or two outta her book, Mister Serial Nightcrawler.
engSearchText:
You should try taking a page or two outta her book,
Mister Serial Nightcrawler.
jpnChrName: ……テメーはもっと見習え。 毎晩毎晩、朝帰りしやがって。
jpnSearchText:
……テメーはもっと見習え。
毎晩毎晩、朝帰りしやがって。

engChrName: Hey, what I do in my free time's my business, chief.
engSearchText: Hey, what I do in my free time's my business, chief.
jpnChrName: ハッ、俺の勝手だろーが……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、俺の勝手だろーが……

engChrName: *sigh* You do know it's almost noon...
engSearchText: *sigh* You do know it's almost noon...
jpnChrName: もう、アーロンさんは…… もうすぐお昼ですよ？
jpnSearchText:
もう、アーロンさんは……
もうすぐお昼ですよ？

engChrName: Yeah! Almost noon!
engSearchText: Yeah! Almost noon!
jpnChrName: そーだそーだー！
jpnSearchText: そーだそーだー！

engChrName: I'm glad to see everyone gathered.
engSearchText: I'm glad to see everyone gathered.
jpnChrName: ふふ、皆さんお揃いで何よりです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、皆さんお揃いで何よりです。

engChrName: Now get some grub and get outta here before the lunch rush hits!
engSearchText:
Now get some grub and get outta here before the
lunch rush hits!
jpnChrName: お前ら、込み合う前に とっとと食っていきやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
お前ら、込み合う前に
とっとと食っていきやがれ！

engChrName: Get outta here!
engSearchText: Get outta here!
jpnChrName: やがれ～！
jpnSearchText: やがれ～！

engChrName: Thanks a bunch! Let's go eat, guys!
engSearchText: Thanks a bunch! Let's go eat, guys!
jpnChrName: えへへ、いただきます！ 行きましょう、みなさん！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、いただきます！
行きましょう、みなさん！

engChrName: Sure thing.
engSearchText: Sure thing.
jpnChrName: おう。
jpnSearchText: おう。

engChrName: Man. Any more people and we won't know where else to put 'em.
engSearchText:
Man. Any more people and we won't know where
else to put 'em.
jpnChrName: ったく……すっかり 賑やかになっちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……すっかり
賑やかになっちまったな。

engChrName: Heehee. Maybe, but I think it's nice.
engSearchText: Heehee. Maybe, but I think it's nice.
jpnChrName: ふふ、本当に。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、本当に。

engChrName: The group had an early lunch at Montmart.
engSearchText: The group had an early lunch at Montmart.
jpnChrName: その後、《モンマルト》で 早めの昼食をとったあと……
jpnSearchText:
その後、《モンマルト》で
早めの昼食をとったあと……

engChrName: Once done, they gathered in the office to plan out their workload.
engSearchText:
Once done, they gathered in the office to plan out
their workload.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは改めて事務所で 本日の活動の指針を決めることにした。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは改めて事務所で
本日の活動の指針を決めることにした。

engChrName: This will be the final day of my trial period.
engSearchText: This will be the final day of my trial period.
jpnChrName: ──本日でわたくしの “試用期間”最終日となります。
jpnSearchText:
──本日でわたくしの
“試用期間”最終日となります。

engChrName: I hope I'll be able to learn quite a bit from you all by the end of it.
engSearchText:
I hope I'll be able to learn quite a bit from you all by
the end of it.
jpnChrName: 皆様、改めてご教授いただければ。
jpnSearchText: 皆様、改めてご教授いただければ。

engChrName: Ahaha... I'm not sure you even HAVE anything to learn at this point.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... I'm not sure you even HAVE anything to
learn at this point.
jpnChrName: あはは……もうすっかり 事務所のことを把握されてますし。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……もうすっかり
事務所のことを把握されてますし。

engChrName: You know so much about everything here that it almost feels like we're the ones learning from you.
engSearchText:
You know so much about everything here that it
almost feels like we're the ones learning from you.
jpnChrName: 逆に教わってばかりですっ。
jpnSearchText: 逆に教わってばかりですっ。

engChrName: She's already wrapped up all our pain-in-the-ass paperwork, too.
engSearchText:
She's already wrapped up all our pain-in-the-ass
paperwork, too.
jpnChrName: めんどくせー事務仕事も 全部片付けやがったからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
めんどくせー事務仕事も
全部片付けやがったからなぁ。

engChrName: You should just make her the boss and be done with it.
engSearchText:
You should just make her the boss and be done
with it.
jpnChrName: そろそろ所長業もやらせるかよ？
jpnSearchText: そろそろ所長業もやらせるかよ？

engChrName: Hell no! ...But it really is a big help havin' you here.
engSearchText: Hell no! ...But it really is a big help havin' you here.
jpnChrName: それはもういいっつーの！ ……いやまあ、実際助かってるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それはもういいっつーの！
……いやまあ、実際助かってるぜ。

engChrName: You're not an assistant so much as a superhero.
engSearchText: You're not an assistant so much as a superhero.
jpnChrName: ま、お前さんは助手っつーより ハイパーアシスタントだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前さんは助手っつーより
ハイパーアシスタントだろうしな。

engChrName: But I'm sure you've got your share of other stuff to do elsewhere, so no need to cross every t and dot every i on my account.
engSearchText:
But I'm sure you've got your share of other stuff to do
elsewhere, so no need to cross every t and dot every i
on my account.
jpnChrName: ──ただまあ、他の業務もあるだろうし そこまで完璧にやらなくてもいい。
jpnSearchText:
──ただまあ、他の業務もあるだろうし
そこまで完璧にやらなくてもいい。

engChrName: It's not doin' the crew any favors to be so dry on work, either. Start makin' some time for yourself.
engSearchText:
It's not doin' the crew any favors to be so dry on
work, either. Start makin' some time for yourself.
jpnChrName: コイツらの為にもならねぇし 少しは自分のために時間を使ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
コイツらの為にもならねぇし
少しは自分のために時間を使ってくれ。

engChrName: Oh, but I couldn't...
engSearchText: Oh, but I couldn't...
jpnChrName: ですが……
jpnSearchText: ですが……

engChrName: Umm... I know I'm not as capable as you, but I'll work hard to narrow the gap between us!
engSearchText:
Umm... I know I'm not as capable as you, but I'll
work hard to narrow the gap between us!
jpnChrName: えっと、私も頑張って 追い付けるようにしますので……！
jpnSearchText:
えっと、私も頑張って
追い付けるようにしますので……！

engChrName: So please, let me share some of the load. Everyone needs a good work-life balance.
engSearchText:
So please, let me share some of the load.
Everyone needs a good work-life balance.
jpnChrName: プライベートも大切ですし、 少しは私にも負担させてください。
jpnSearchText:
プライベートも大切ですし、
少しは私にも負担させてください。

engChrName: I'm here to help, too!
engSearchText: I'm here to help, too!
jpnChrName: はいっ、わたしも頑張ります！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、わたしも頑張ります！

engChrName: Why? If she wants to do all the tedious shit, just let her.
engSearchText:
Why? If she wants to do all the tedious shit, just
let her.
jpnChrName: あ？　メンドくせーな。 やりたいヤツにやらせときゃいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
あ？　メンドくせーな。
やりたいヤツにやらせときゃいいだろ。

engChrName: Especially since SOMEONE'S got something else on their mind just eating away at 'em.
engSearchText:
Especially since SOMEONE'S got something else on
their mind just eating away at 'em.
jpnChrName: チビはともかく誰かさんは 焦りなんかもあるんだろうからなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
チビはともかく誰かさんは
焦りなんかもあるんだろうからなぁ？

engChrName: Umm... Well...
engSearchText: Umm... Well...
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: You just want an excuse to be lazy!
engSearchText: You just want an excuse to be lazy!
jpnChrName: むっ、アーロンさんこそ 少しは事務所の分担をすべきかと！
jpnSearchText:
むっ、アーロンさんこそ
少しは事務所の分担をすべきかと！

engChrName: Your wild combat style already makes you hard to fight with, you know.
engSearchText:
Your wild combat style already makes you hard to
fight with, you know.
jpnChrName: やっぱりムラが多いので 戦力としてもまだ不安定ですし。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりムラが多いので
戦力としてもまだ不安定ですし。

engChrName: You wanna take this outside, small fry?
engSearchText: You wanna take this outside, small fry?
jpnChrName: ほう、やんのかチビ？
jpnSearchText: ほう、やんのかチビ？

engChrName: Let's do it!
engSearchText: Let's do it!
jpnChrName: のぞむところですっ！
jpnSearchText: のぞむところですっ！

engChrName: *sigh* That's enough, you two...
engSearchText: *sigh* That's enough, you two...
jpnChrName: ああもう、２人とも……
jpnSearchText: ああもう、２人とも……

engChrName: I would much rather all of you were able to focus on your studies and hobbies...
engSearchText:
I would much rather all of you were able to focus on
your studies and hobbies...
jpnChrName: 皆様の方こそ、学業や趣味など 大切にして頂きたいところですが……
jpnSearchText:
皆様の方こそ、学業や趣味など
大切にして頂きたいところですが……

engChrName: ...but if you insist, I will endeavor to use some of my time for my own benefit.
engSearchText:
...but if you insist, I will endeavor to use some of my
time for my own benefit.
jpnChrName: ──分かりました、お言葉に甘えて 自分の時間も取らせていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
──分かりました、お言葉に甘えて
自分の時間も取らせていただきます。

engChrName: Glad to hear it.
engSearchText: Glad to hear it.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうしてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうしてくれ。

engChrName: So, goes without sayin' that Risette's coming with me today, but so's Agnès.
engSearchText:
So, goes without sayin' that Risette's coming with me
today, but so's Agnès.
jpnChrName: ──そんじゃあ今日の業務だが リゼットに加え、アニエスも来てもらう。
jpnSearchText:
──そんじゃあ今日の業務だが
リゼットに加え、アニエスも来てもらう。

engChrName: Her orbal staff's just been updated, and I want her to try out this new service I've been hearin' about.
engSearchText:
Her orbal staff's just been updated, and I want her to
try out this new service I've been hearin' about.
jpnChrName: 導力杖もアップデートしたばかりだし “新サービス”に慣れてもらうためにもな。
jpnSearchText:
導力杖もアップデートしたばかりだし
“新サービス”に慣れてもらうためにもな。

engChrName: Oh! That sounds good!
engSearchText: Oh! That sounds good!
jpnChrName: ……！　分かりました！
jpnSearchText: ……！　分かりました！

engChrName: I guess she would be a lot more suited to that than me...
engSearchText:
I guess she would be a lot more suited to that
than me...
jpnChrName: う……たしかにわたしたちより はるかに適任ですね。
jpnSearchText:
う……たしかにわたしたちより
はるかに適任ですね。

engChrName: Hmph. Pretty sure I could master it in minutes if I gave it a whirl.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Pretty sure I could master it in minutes if I
gave it a whirl.
jpnChrName: フン……俺はその気になりゃ、 速攻でモノにしてみせるけどな。
jpnSearchText:
フン……俺はその気になりゃ、
速攻でモノにしてみせるけどな。

engChrName: I dunno, might be tough for someone with a 'wild combat style.'
engSearchText:
I dunno, might be tough for someone with a 'wild
combat style.'
jpnChrName: クク、ムラッ気が多いと 意外と苦労する分野だろうがな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ムラッ気が多いと
意外と苦労する分野だろうがな。

engChrName: Anyway, I'm still gonna bring one of you two to round us out.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm still gonna bring one of you two to
round us out.
jpnChrName: どのみちお前たちのうち 一人には来てもらうつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
どのみちお前たちのうち
一人には来てもらうつもりだ。

engChrName: Whoever's left'll be handling the office work, shopping—stuff like that. No slacking allowed.
engSearchText:
Whoever's left'll be handling the office work,
shopping—stuff like that. No slacking allowed.
jpnChrName: 留守番役は事務仕事やら買い出しだ。 サボんじゃねーぞ。
jpnSearchText:
留守番役は事務仕事やら買い出しだ。
サボんじゃねーぞ。

engChrName: I wouldn't dream of it!
engSearchText: I wouldn't dream of it!
jpnChrName: もちろんですっ！
jpnSearchText: もちろんですっ！

engChrName: Yeah, sure. Hurry up and pick, then.
engSearchText: Yeah, sure. Hurry up and pick, then.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、いいから選べや。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、いいから選べや。

engChrName: Select one additional member to accompany Van, Agnès, and Risette.
engSearchText:
Select one additional member to accompany Van,
Agnès, and Risette.
jpnChrName: ヴァン・アニエス・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン・アニエス・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: Agnès' orbal staff has been updated to use more powerful sub-parts.
engSearchText:
Agnès' orbal staff has been updated to use more
powerful sub-parts.
jpnChrName: アニエスの導力杖がアップデートされ、 より強力なサブパーツをセットできるようになった。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスの導力杖がアップデートされ、
より強力なサブパーツをセットできるようになった。

engChrName: Obtained the White Headpiece II weapon sub-part for Agnès' weapon.
engSearchText:
Obtained the White Headpiece II weapon sub-part
for Agnès' weapon.
jpnChrName: アニエスの武器のサブパーツ 『ホワイトヘッダーⅡ』を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスの武器のサブパーツ
『ホワイトヘッダーⅡ』を手に入れた。

engChrName: So let's go see what this new service is about, shall we?
engSearchText:
So let's go see what this new service is about,
shall we?
jpnChrName: さて、そんじゃあ “新サービス”の方も確かめるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、そんじゃあ
“新サービス”の方も確かめるとすっか。

engChrName: We use it from a special computer in your room, right, Risette?
engSearchText:
We use it from a special computer in your room,
right, Risette?
jpnChrName: リゼットさんのお部屋に 専用の端末があるんでしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
リゼットさんのお部屋に
専用の端末があるんでしたっけ。

engChrName: Yes. I'll point it out to you.
engSearchText: Yes. I'll point it out to you.
jpnChrName: はい、では部屋に向かいましょう。
jpnSearchText: はい、では部屋に向かいましょう。

engChrName: Then lead the way!
engSearchText: Then lead the way!
jpnChrName: えへへ、お邪魔しますね。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、お邪魔しますね。

engChrName: Let's do this.
engSearchText: Let's do this.
jpnChrName: ハッ、邪魔させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、邪魔させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: After that, Prince Sherid and Kincaid saw them back to their office.
engSearchText:
After that, Prince Sherid and Kincaid saw them back
to their office.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは旧市街まで送られ……
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後、ヴァンたちは旧市街まで送られ……

engChrName: Once they arrived, they enjoyed dinner at Montmart before gathering to discuss the crown prince's request.
engSearchText:
Once they arrived, they enjoyed dinner at Montmart
before gathering to discuss the crown prince's request.
jpnChrName: モンマルトで夕食をとってから、 依頼について話し合うのだった。
jpnSearchText:
モンマルトで夕食をとってから、
依頼について話し合うのだった。

engChrName: Take it you ain't heard a thing about all this from your own company?
engSearchText:
Take it you ain't heard a thing about all this from
your own company?
jpnChrName: ──ちなみに、 “本社”から何か聞いてねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみに、
“本社”から何か聞いてねぇのか？

engChrName: I'm naturally aware of the plan to make the Xipha standard available to the masses, but not about problems in Basel.
engSearchText:
I'm naturally aware of the plan to make the Xipha
standard available to the masses, but not about
problems in Basel.
jpnChrName: ザイファ規格の民生化については 存じていますが、異変については何も。
jpnSearchText:
ザイファ規格の民生化については
存じていますが、異変については何も。

engChrName: If A really is involved, I would have expected to have already been informed.
engSearchText:
If A really is involved, I would have expected to have
already been informed.
jpnChrName: ただし《Ａ》関連であれば わたくしの方にも連絡があると思います。
jpnSearchText:
ただし《Ａ》関連であれば
わたくしの方にも連絡があると思います。

engChrName: Got'cha. Does sound like somethin' that'd take us three days either way.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Does sound like somethin' that'd take us
three days either way.
jpnChrName: そうか……引き受けるとなると 確かに３日はかかりそうな案件だ。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……引き受けるとなると
確かに３日はかかりそうな案件だ。

engChrName: But if we're lookin' into things at Verne and the institute, we're gonna need to work mostly weekdays.
engSearchText:
But if we're lookin' into things at Verne and the
institute, we're gonna need to work mostly weekdays.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌや理科大学の実態調査である以上、 平日に動く必要もあんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌや理科大学の実態調査である以上、
平日に動く必要もあんだろう。

engChrName: But that would mean Agnès...
engSearchText: But that would mean Agnès...
jpnChrName: そうなるとアニエスさんは……
jpnSearchText: そうなるとアニエスさんは……

engChrName: Actually...the timing here is rather perfect.
engSearchText: Actually...the timing here is rather perfect.
jpnChrName: えっと、それなんですが…… むしろ丁度いいかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
えっと、それなんですが……
むしろ丁度いいかもしれません。

engChrName: You see...
engSearchText: You see...
jpnChrName: 実は──
jpnSearchText: 実は──

engChrName: Wow! High school here sounds really fun.
engSearchText: Wow! High school here sounds really fun.
jpnChrName: 《視察研修》……！ 高校って面白いですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
《視察研修》……！
高校って面白いですねっ。

engChrName: Trust a big school in the capital to bust out the fancy trips.
engSearchText:
Trust a big school in the capital to bust out the
fancy trips.
jpnChrName: さすが首都の有名校、 小生意気なカリキュラムだな。
jpnSearchText:
さすが首都の有名校、
小生意気なカリキュラムだな。

engChrName: Aramis is all about its students thinkin' for themselves, so somethin' like this makes sense.
engSearchText:
Aramis is all about its students thinkin' for
themselves, so somethin' like this makes sense.
jpnChrName: 生徒の自主性を重んじる アラミスならではの伝統行事だな。
jpnSearchText:
生徒の自主性を重んじる
アラミスならではの伝統行事だな。

engChrName: Bet you'll have reports to write for days about it, too.
engSearchText: Bet you'll have reports to write for days about it, too.
jpnChrName: レポートもさぞかし たんまり出るんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
レポートもさぞかし
たんまり出るんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Yes, actually... Some of my friends who came here the other day are considering Basel, too.
engSearchText:
Yes, actually... Some of my friends who came here the
other day are considering Basel, too.
jpnChrName: ？　はい……実は前に事務所にも来た 友人や先輩がバーゼル行きを検討してまして。
jpnSearchText:
？　はい……実は前に事務所にも来た
友人や先輩がバーゼル行きを検討してまして。

engChrName: I was interested in going myself, but I wasn't sure whether or not that was the best decision.
engSearchText:
I was interested in going myself, but I wasn't sure
whether or not that was the best decision.
jpnChrName: 私も興味があったので、どうしようかと 迷っていたところだったんです。
jpnSearchText:
私も興味があったので、どうしようかと
迷っていたところだったんです。

engChrName: But you would be leaving next Thursday for three days, so the timing matches up splendidly.
engSearchText:
But you would be leaving next Thursday for three
days, so the timing matches up splendidly.
jpnChrName: 来週木曜からの３日間の研修…… タイミング的にも一致していますね。
jpnSearchText:
来週木曜からの３日間の研修……
タイミング的にも一致していますね。

engChrName: Heehee. It's almost as if Arusha wants this to happen!
engSearchText: Heehee. It's almost as if Arusha wants this to happen!
jpnChrName: えへへ……なんだか 翼の女神（アルーシャ）の導きを感じますっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……なんだか
翼の女神（アルーシャ）の導きを感じますっ。

engChrName: Oh, not that I think my personal circumstances should push us into taking this on, of course!
engSearchText:
Oh, not that I think my personal circumstances
should push us into taking this on, of course!
jpnChrName: あ、でもだからといって依頼を引き受ける 決め手にはなりませんけど……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、でもだからといって依頼を引き受ける
決め手にはなりませんけど……！

engChrName: Course.
engSearchText: Course.
jpnChrName: ま、そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ま、そうだな。

engChrName: But that goes both ways. You're a student first, so don't go forcin' your decision to line up with our job.
engSearchText:
But that goes both ways. You're a student first, so
don't go forcin' your decision to line up with our job.
jpnChrName: 学校行事だし、そっちこそ無理に 依頼と絡めて決めることもねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
学校行事だし、そっちこそ無理に
依頼と絡めて決めることもねえだろう。

engChrName: Even if we do end up in the same general place, your studies might mean we won't even see each other.
engSearchText:
Even if we do end up in the same general place, your
studies might mean we won't even see each other.
jpnChrName: 行き先が被ったところで研修って名目なら 別行動の可能性も高いだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
行き先が被ったところで研修って名目なら
別行動の可能性も高いだろうしな。

engChrName: W-Well, I suppose that's true...
engSearchText: W-Well, I suppose that's true...
jpnChrName: そ、それはそうですけど……
jpnSearchText: そ、それはそうですけど……

engChrName: ...but that still kind of hurts.
engSearchText: ...but that still kind of hurts.
jpnChrName: ……それはそれで 寂しいと言いますか。
jpnSearchText:
……それはそれで
寂しいと言いますか。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: Heh. That's rich coming from the guy who always decides where to go based on who'll shove dessert down his throat.
engSearchText:
Heh. That's rich coming from the guy who always
decides where to go based on who'll shove dessert
down his throat.
jpnChrName: クク、毎度スイーツに釣られるヤツが どのツラ下げてって話だがなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、毎度スイーツに釣られるヤツが
どのツラ下げてって話だがなぁ。

engChrName: Speaking of which, what're we going to find in Basel on that front?
engSearchText:
Speaking of which, what're we going to find in Basel
on that front?
jpnChrName: あ、ちなみにバーゼルは どんなお菓子があるんですかっ？
jpnSearchText:
あ、ちなみにバーゼルは
どんなお菓子があるんですかっ？

engChrName: Excellent question! A baked tart called an engadin is probably the most famous.
engSearchText:
Excellent question! A baked tart called an engadin is
probably the most famous.
jpnChrName: よくぞ聞いた──有名なのは 《エンガディーナ》って焼き菓子だ。
jpnSearchText:
よくぞ聞いた──有名なのは
《エンガディーナ》って焼き菓子だ。

engChrName: It's made of walnuts and honey nougat and has a simple but mellow taste that's just—
engSearchText:
It's made of walnuts and honey nougat and has a
simple but mellow taste that's just—
jpnChrName: クルミと蜂蜜のヌガーがぎっしり詰まった 素朴だが濃密な味わいのタルトでなぁ……！
jpnSearchText:
クルミと蜂蜜のヌガーがぎっしり詰まった
素朴だが濃密な味わいのタルトでなぁ……！

engChrName: (I suppose Van's right. I need to make up my own mind about what to do.)
engSearchText:
(I suppose Van's right. I need to make up my own
mind about what to do.)
jpnChrName: （……ヴァンさんの言う通りかな。   ちゃんと自分で考えて決めないと。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ヴァンさんの言う通りかな。
ちゃんと自分で考えて決めないと。）

engChrName: (Otherwise my great-grandfather would never... Or Dad, for that matter.)
engSearchText:
(Otherwise my great-grandfather would never...
Or Dad, for that matter.)
jpnChrName: （そうでないと曾お祖父ちゃんに……   ………ううん、お父さんにだって──）
jpnSearchText:
（そうでないと曾お祖父ちゃんに……
………ううん、お父さんにだって──）

engChrName: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to cause you concern.
engSearchText: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to cause you concern.
jpnChrName: あ……すみません、 心配させちゃいましたか？
jpnSearchText:
あ……すみません、
心配させちゃいましたか？

engChrName: Not at all. I don't think anyone could blame you for feeling conflicted here.
engSearchText:
Not at all. I don't think anyone could blame you for
feeling conflicted here.
jpnChrName: いえ、アニエス様が 迷われるのも無理はないかと。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、アニエス様が
迷われるのも無理はないかと。

engChrName: But should we end up going to the same place, rest assured that I will do all I can to support you.
engSearchText:
But should we end up going to the same place, rest
assured that I will do all I can to support you.
jpnChrName: 行き先が重なった場合は わたくしもフォローしますのでご安心を。
jpnSearchText:
行き先が重なった場合は
わたくしもフォローしますのでご安心を。

engChrName: (She is way too perceptive...) Thank you. But why—
engSearchText:
(She is way too perceptive...)
Thank you. But why—
jpnChrName: （やっぱり敵わないな……） ありがとうございます、でもどうして──
jpnSearchText:
（やっぱり敵わないな……）
ありがとうございます、でもどうして──

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: No way...
engSearchText: No way...
jpnChrName: おいおい、こいつは……
jpnSearchText: おいおい、こいつは……

engChrName: I'll speak to my friends at school tomorrow.
engSearchText: I'll speak to my friends at school tomorrow.
jpnChrName: ──明日、 友人や先輩にも相談してみます。
jpnSearchText:
──明日、
友人や先輩にも相談してみます。

engChrName: But if you could work under the assumption we'll all be going and prepare accordingly...
engSearchText:
But if you could work under the assumption we'll all
be going and prepare accordingly...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちもそのつもりで 準備を進めて頂ければ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたちもそのつもりで
準備を進めて頂ければ。

engChrName: Got it. But—
engSearchText: Got it. But—
jpnChrName: 了解だ、ただし──
jpnSearchText: 了解だ、ただし──

engChrName: —don't forget that I'm a student first and foremost, right?
engSearchText:
—don't forget that I'm a student first and
foremost, right?
jpnChrName: 学生の本分は忘れるな──ですよね？
jpnSearchText: 学生の本分は忘れるな──ですよね？

engChrName: I won't. I'll make this work so I can handle my obligations properly, both here and at school.
engSearchText:
I won't. I'll make this work so I can handle my
obligations properly, both here and at school.
jpnChrName: そちらはご心配なく、なんとか 両立できるようにしてみますから。
jpnSearchText:
そちらはご心配なく、なんとか
両立できるようにしてみますから。

engChrName: Well, good night.
engSearchText: Well, good night.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、おやすみなさい。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、おやすみなさい。

engChrName: Yeah. Night.
engSearchText: Yeah. Night.
jpnChrName: ああ、お疲れさんだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、お疲れさんだ。

engChrName: (So I guess we'll be leavin' next Thursday—same day as Aramis.)
engSearchText:
(So I guess we'll be leavin' next Thursday—same day
as Aramis.)
jpnChrName: （出発は来週木曜──   アラミスの出発日と合わせて、か。）
jpnSearchText:
（出発は来週木曜──
アラミスの出発日と合わせて、か。）

engChrName: (But René and the prince just dumped this on us, so they can wait until tomorrow for an answer.)
engSearchText:
(But René and the prince just dumped this on us, so
they can wait until tomorrow for an answer.)
jpnChrName: （ま、すぐに連絡すんのも癪だし   ルネたちへの返事は明日でいいか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、すぐに連絡すんのも癪だし
ルネたちへの返事は明日でいいか。）

engChrName: (Still, she's sure lookin' brighter than when I met her.)
engSearchText:
(Still, she's sure lookin' brighter than when I
met her.)
jpnChrName: （しかし……   いい顔をするようになったもんだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（しかし……
いい顔をするようになったもんだ。）

engChrName: (With how much she's got weighin' on her, I'm sure she's still got a lot to work through...)
engSearchText:
(With how much she's got weighin' on her, I'm sure
she's still got a lot to work through...)
jpnChrName: （抱えてるモンが多い分、 まだまだ迷いもあるんだろうが……）
jpnSearchText:
（抱えてるモンが多い分、
まだまだ迷いもあるんだろうが……）

engChrName: (...but I'll look out for her as best as I can. Bein' her boss and all.)
engSearchText:
(...but I'll look out for her as best as I can. Bein' her
boss and all.)
jpnChrName: （精々ウザがられない程度に   フォローしてやるか──雇い主として。）
jpnSearchText:
（精々ウザがられない程度に
フォローしてやるか──雇い主として。）

engChrName: (Man, that sure was a day.)
engSearchText: (Man, that sure was a day.)
jpnChrName: ったく、今日も今日とて 色々あったもんだぜ……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、今日も今日とて
色々あったもんだぜ……

engChrName: (Guess I'll go for a walk to wind down before bed.)
engSearchText: (Guess I'll go for a walk to wind down before bed.)
jpnChrName: 気晴らしついでに このままちょいとブラつくかね。
jpnSearchText:
気晴らしついでに
このままちょいとブラつくかね。

engChrName: (Should I call it a night?)
engSearchText: (Should I call it a night?)
jpnChrName: （さてと、今夜はこのくらいか？）
jpnSearchText: （さてと、今夜はこのくらいか？）

engChrName: (Tomorrow's gonna be another busy day, so I should probably turn in soon.)
engSearchText:
(Tomorrow's gonna be another busy day, so I should
probably turn in soon.)
jpnChrName: （明日は諸々準備もあるし   そろそろ休んでもいいかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（明日は諸々準備もあるし
そろそろ休んでもいいかもな。）

engChrName: Choosing to finish up for the night will cause all unfinished quests and subevents to disappear.
engSearchText:
Choosing to finish up for the night will cause all
unfinished quests and subevents to disappear.
jpnChrName: 行動を終了すると見ていないクエスト、 サブイベントなどが消滅します。
jpnSearchText:
行動を終了すると見ていないクエスト、
サブイベントなどが消滅します。

engChrName: Come to think of it, I know Agnès is gonna go by train...
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I know Agnès is gonna go
by train...
jpnChrName: そういや、アニエスたちは 列車で向かうみたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
そういや、アニエスたちは
列車で向かうみたいだが……

engChrName: ...but I should probably get what the prince sent me fitted sooner rather than later.
engSearchText:
...but I should probably get what the prince sent me
fitted sooner rather than later.
jpnChrName: 一応、公太子に貰ったアレも 出発までには取り付けちまうか。
jpnSearchText:
一応、公太子に貰ったアレも
出発までには取り付けちまうか。

engChrName: First time doing any major mods to my baby in a while. Might as well have some fun with it! ♪
engSearchText:
First time doing any major mods to my baby in
a while. Might as well have some fun with it! ♪
jpnChrName: よっしゃ、久々の大がかりなカスタムだ。 気合入れて整備してやらねえとな♪
jpnSearchText:
よっしゃ、久々の大がかりなカスタムだ。
気合入れて整備してやらねえとな♪

engChrName: November 2nd, 1208, 2:40PM
engSearchText: November 2nd, 1208, 2:40PM

engChrName: ...The Institute of Science claims this formula will allow for a more efficient extraction of orbal energy from septium.
engSearchText:
...The Institute of Science claims this formula will
allow for a more efficient extraction of orbal energy
from septium.
jpnChrName: 理科大学の発表によれば、その数式の応用により 七耀石からの導力抽出効率は格段に向上するらしく……
jpnSearchText:
理科大学の発表によれば、その数式の応用により
七耀石からの導力抽出効率は格段に向上するらしく……

engChrName: Experts believe that the new discovery will have a significant impact on technological development in Zemuria going forward.
engSearchText:
Experts believe that the new discovery will have a
significant impact on technological development in
Zemuria going forward.
jpnChrName: 今後の技術界にも大きな影響を与えるだろうと 専門家たちの期待が集まっています。
jpnSearchText:
今後の技術界にも大きな影響を与えるだろうと
専門家たちの期待が集まっています。

engChrName: This revolutionary breakthrough was made possible by the late Professor Callaghan as part of his last work.
engSearchText:
This revolutionary breakthrough was made possible
by the late Professor Callaghan as part of his
last work.
jpnChrName: この画期的な発見は、故キャラハン教授による 最後の研究成果によるものであり……
jpnSearchText:
この画期的な発見は、故キャラハン教授による
最後の研究成果によるものであり……

engChrName: They really pulled it off, didn't they?
engSearchText: They really pulled it off, didn't they?
jpnChrName: ……皆さん、やり遂げられたんですね。
jpnSearchText: ……皆さん、やり遂げられたんですね。

engChrName: Yeah. In no small part 'cause of Renne and the rest of 'em.
engSearchText:
Yeah. In no small part 'cause of Renne and the rest
of 'em.
jpnChrName: お前の先輩や 関係者も手伝ったみたいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
お前の先輩や
関係者も手伝ったみたいだしな。

engChrName: Sounds like the genius professor left Basel as soon as the work was done, though.
engSearchText:
Sounds like the genius professor left Basel as soon as
the work was done, though.
jpnChrName: あの天才教授はケリが付き次第 とっととバーゼルを離れたみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
あの天才教授はケリが付き次第
とっととバーゼルを離れたみたいだが。

engChrName: That CEO's gonna be in for a fun time now that he's lost two of his smartasses.
engSearchText:
That CEO's gonna be in for a fun time now that he's
lost two of his smartasses.
jpnChrName: ハッ、天才が２人もいなくなって あのＣＥＯもこれからが大変そうだなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、天才が２人もいなくなって
あのＣＥＯもこれからが大変そうだなァ。

engChrName: Maybe, but it sounds like this news has got Verne's shares shootin' straight up.
engSearchText:
Maybe, but it sounds like this news has got Verne's
shares shootin' straight up.
jpnChrName: まあ、ヴェルヌの株自体は今回の件で さらに爆上がりしたみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ヴェルヌの株自体は今回の件で
さらに爆上がりしたみたいだが。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton's back for now, too, so he can probably breathe easy for a while.
engSearchText:
Professor Hamilton's back for now, too, so he can
probably breathe easy for a while.
jpnChrName: 博士も一時的とはいえ戻ってきた── 今のところは安心なんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
博士も一時的とはいえ戻ってきた──
今のところは安心なんじゃねえか？
