engChrName: I'd heard so much about her, but it was such a surprise to actually get to meet her.
engSearchText:
I'd heard so much about her, but it was such a surprise
to actually get to meet her.
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士…… 何度かお話は聞いていましたが。
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン博士……
何度かお話は聞いていましたが。

engChrName: Heehee. She's such an amazing lady.
engSearchText: Heehee. She's such an amazing lady.
jpnChrName: えへへ、本当に素敵な人でしたね。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、本当に素敵な人でしたね。

engChrName: She really is. I couldn't agree more.
engSearchText: She really is. I couldn't agree more.
jpnChrName: はい……本当に。
jpnSearchText: はい……本当に。

engChrName: By the way, Agnès, did you manage to finish your report on your visitation to Basel?
engSearchText:
By the way, Agnès, did you manage to finish your
report on your visitation to Basel?
jpnChrName: そういえばアニエスさん…… 視察研修のレポートはどうでした？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばアニエスさん……
視察研修のレポートはどうでした？

engChrName: I most certainly did!
engSearchText: I most certainly did!
jpnChrName: ふふ、バッチリでしたよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、バッチリでしたよ。

engChrName: The others in my group helped a lot, too, and we ended up receiving some very positive feedback from the school.
engSearchText:
The others in my group helped a lot, too, and we
ended up receiving some very positive feedback from
the school.
jpnChrName: オデットたちと合わせてかなり充実した 内容にできたので、校内での評判も良くて。
jpnSearchText:
オデットたちと合わせてかなり充実した
内容にできたので、校内での評判も良くて。

engChrName: Though I'm happy Renne was willing to cover up so much for me—no, happy isn't what I should be saying, is it?
engSearchText:
Though I'm happy Renne was willing to cover up so
much for me—no, happy isn't what I should be
saying, is it?
jpnChrName: レン先輩が色々と誤魔化してくれて 良かっ──少し後ろめたいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
レン先輩が色々と誤魔化してくれて
良かっ──少し後ろめたいですけど。

engChrName: The old fart's broken moral compass starting to rub off on you, huh?
engSearchText:
The old fart's broken moral compass starting to rub
off on you, huh?
jpnChrName: クク、なんだかんだ いい感じで染まってんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
クク、なんだかんだ
いい感じで染まってんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: I-I'm being careful not to go TOO far! I don't want to end up like Van.
engSearchText:
I-I'm being careful not to go TOO far! I don't want
to end up like Van.
jpnChrName: い、一線は弁えてますからっ。 ヴァンさんよりは厳しめに……！
jpnSearchText:
い、一線は弁えてますからっ。
ヴァンさんよりは厳しめに……！

engChrName: Hey.
engSearchText: Hey.
jpnChrName: ってオイ。
jpnSearchText: ってオイ。

engChrName: Heehee... Oh, we're almost done with the roasted chestnuts.
engSearchText:
Heehee... Oh, we're almost done with the
roasted chestnuts.
jpnChrName: えへへ……あ、焼き栗、 無くなっちゃいましたね。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……あ、焼き栗、
無くなっちゃいましたね。

engChrName: Ahh... I look forward to these every year.
engSearchText: Ahh... I look forward to these every year.
jpnChrName: いや～、しかし 今年も良い出来だよな。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、しかし
今年も良い出来だよな。

engChrName: Their fragrance and soft texture really hammer home that fall is here.
engSearchText:
Their fragrance and soft texture really hammer home
that fall is here.
jpnChrName: この香ばしさとホクホク感が 深まる秋を感じさせるっつーか。
jpnSearchText:
この香ばしさとホクホク感が
深まる秋を感じさせるっつーか。

engChrName: Here you go again... Took the last of them, too, you bastard.
engSearchText:
Here you go again... Took the last of them, too,
you bastard.
jpnChrName: また始まりやがった…… 最後の一つも取ってやがるし。
jpnSearchText:
また始まりやがった……
最後の一つも取ってやがるし。

engChrName: Ahaha... Don't worry. We have another batch.
engSearchText: Ahaha... Don't worry. We have another batch.
jpnChrName: あはは……大丈夫ですよ。 そちらにもう一包みありますから。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……大丈夫ですよ。
そちらにもう一包みありますから。

engChrName: Hello? I hope I'm not interrupting.
engSearchText: Hello? I hope I'm not interrupting.
jpnChrName: ──失礼します、皆様。
jpnSearchText: ──失礼します、皆様。

engChrName: Oh, hey.
engSearchText: Oh, hey.
jpnChrName: おっと……
jpnSearchText: おっと……

engChrName: A lovely day to you all. I am here to resume work once more.
engSearchText:
A lovely day to you all. I am here to resume work
once more.
jpnChrName: リゼット・トワイニング、 ──ただいま戻りました。
jpnSearchText:
リゼット・トワイニング、
──ただいま戻りました。
……ぁ…………

engChrName: Risette!
engSearchText: Risette!
jpnChrName: リゼットさん……！
jpnSearchText: リゼットさん……！

engChrName: That's our maid. Three o'clock on the dot.
engSearchText: That's our maid. Three o'clock on the dot.
jpnChrName: ジャスト３時…… 相変わらず律儀なメイドだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ジャスト３時……
相変わらず律儀なメイドだぜ。

engChrName: You're all good now, then?
engSearchText: You're all good now, then?
jpnChrName: もう、大丈夫みたいだな？
jpnSearchText: もう、大丈夫みたいだな？

engChrName: I'm the picture of health, thank you. Professor Hamilton, her students, and many others took excellent care of me.
engSearchText:
I'm the picture of health, thank you.
Professor Hamilton, her students, and many others
took excellent care of me.
jpnChrName: はい、ハミルトン博士と門下の皆様、 それ以外の方々のご尽力のおかげで。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ハミルトン博士と門下の皆様、
それ以外の方々のご尽力のおかげで。

engChrName: My new artificial limbs are a vast improvement over my previous ones, even.
engSearchText:
My new artificial limbs are a vast improvement over
my previous ones, even.
jpnChrName: 擬体パーツもアップデートされて、 むしろ以前より調子がいいくらいです。
jpnSearchText:
擬体パーツもアップデートされて、
むしろ以前より調子がいいくらいです。

engChrName: ...I can see I've had you all very worried. I'm so very sorry.
engSearchText:
...I can see I've had you all very worried. I'm so
very sorry.
jpnChrName: ……ご心配をおかけしたみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: ……ご心配をおかけしたみたいですね。

engChrName: Oh, Risette... Of course we were worried!
engSearchText: Oh, Risette... Of course we were worried!
jpnChrName: えへへ…… 当たり前じゃないですかっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
当たり前じゃないですかっ。

engChrName: We're so glad to have you back. Welcome home, Risette.
engSearchText:
We're so glad to have you back. Welcome
home, Risette.
jpnChrName: ……本当に良かった。 おかえりなさい、リゼットさん。
jpnSearchText:
……本当に良かった。
おかえりなさい、リゼットさん。

engChrName: Heehee. Thank you for the warm welcome.
engSearchText: Heehee. Thank you for the warm welcome.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… ありがとうございます、皆様。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
ありがとうございます、皆様。

engChrName: We've got a solid chunk of work that's been pilin' up, including managing the pay comin' in from our last job.
engSearchText:
We've got a solid chunk of work that's been pilin' up,
including managing the pay comin' in from our
last job.
jpnChrName: 前回の報酬も含めて 色々と事務仕事も溜まっててな。
jpnSearchText:
前回の報酬も含めて
色々と事務仕事も溜まっててな。

engChrName: You got time to help me out with it right now?
engSearchText: You got time to help me out with it right now?
jpnChrName: さっそく手伝ってくれるか？
jpnSearchText: さっそく手伝ってくれるか？

engChrName: All the time in the world. ...Oh, but first.
engSearchText: All the time in the world. ...Oh, but first.
jpnChrName: 勿論です──と、その前に。
jpnSearchText: 勿論です──と、その前に。

engChrName: Agnès and Feri located.
engSearchText: Agnès and Feri located.
jpnChrName: 見ツケタ、アニエス、フェリ。
jpnSearchText: 見ツケタ、アニエス、フェリ。

engChrName: FIO?!
engSearchText: FIO?!
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯちゃん！？
jpnSearchText: ＦＩＯちゃん！？

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: WHOA! THE HELL?!
engSearchText: WHOA! THE HELL?!
jpnChrName: どわああ、なんだっ！？
jpnSearchText: どわああ、なんだっ！？

engChrName: XEROS!
engSearchText: XEROS!
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳも……！
jpnSearchText: ＸＥＲＯＳも……！

engChrName: Down, XEROS—and come back here, FIO.
engSearchText: Down, XEROS—and come back here, FIO.
jpnChrName: ステイ、ＸＥＲＯＳ。 ＦＩＯも戻っておいで。
jpnSearchText:
ステイ、ＸＥＲＯＳ。
ＦＩＯも戻っておいで。

engChrName: Quatre! What are you doing here?
engSearchText: Quatre! What are you doing here?
jpnChrName: カトル君、どうして……！
jpnSearchText: カトル君、どうして……！

engChrName: He came along to make sure everything was how it should be after all the work that was done on me.
engSearchText:
He came along to make sure everything was how it
should be after all the work that was done on me.
jpnChrName: 処置後の経過確認がてら ここまで付き添って頂きまして。
jpnSearchText:
処置後の経過確認がてら
ここまで付き添って頂きまして。

engChrName: ...Though he has something else he wishes to discuss in addition to that.
engSearchText:
...Though he has something else he wishes to discuss
in addition to that.
jpnChrName: それとは別にお話もあるそうです。
jpnSearchText: それとは別にお話もあるそうです。

engChrName: Hmm... It's a bit cramped, but there's a wired connection to the orbal network here, at least.
engSearchText:
Hmm... It's a bit cramped, but there's a wired
connection to the orbal network here, at least.
jpnChrName: ……うん、ちょっと狭いけど 有線ネットも通ってるみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
……うん、ちょっと狭いけど
有線ネットも通ってるみたいだね。

engChrName: I should be able to work in this environment.
engSearchText: I should be able to work in this environment.
jpnChrName: これなら何とかやっていけそうかな？
jpnSearchText: これなら何とかやっていけそうかな？

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: Don't tell me...
engSearchText: Don't tell me...
jpnChrName: ………おい、まさか。
jpnSearchText: ………おい、まさか。

engChrName: That's right. I'm going to be helping out around here for a while.
engSearchText:
That's right. I'm going to be helping out around here
for a while.
jpnChrName: うん──貴方たちをしばらく 手伝わせてもらうことにしたよ。
jpnSearchText:
うん──貴方たちをしばらく
手伝わせてもらうことにしたよ。

engChrName: I'll admit that Professor Hamilton may have been the one to recommend it, but the final decision was mine.
engSearchText:
I'll admit that Professor Hamilton may have been the
one to recommend it, but the final decision was mine.
jpnChrName: 博士の勧めもあったけど、 あくまでも僕自身の意志でね。
jpnSearchText:
博士の勧めもあったけど、
あくまでも僕自身の意志でね。

engChrName: All of you remarkably captured my interest during our time together.
engSearchText:
All of you remarkably captured my interest during our
time together.
jpnChrName: アニエスさんの《ゲネシス》は勿論、 貴方たち自身にも色々興味が湧いたから。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんの《ゲネシス》は勿論、
貴方たち自身にも色々興味が湧いたから。

engChrName: Not just because of Agnès' Geneses, but because of that Grendel and Mare, too.
engSearchText:
Not just because of Agnès' Geneses, but because of
that Grendel and Mare, too.
jpnChrName: ……《グレンデル》とか あの《メア》ってホロウについてもね。
jpnSearchText:
……《グレンデル》とか
あの《メア》ってホロウについてもね。

engChrName: Gah...
engSearchText: Gah...
jpnChrName: ぐっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……

engChrName: I suppose no one can blame you for that.
engSearchText: I suppose no one can blame you for that.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、 無理からぬことかと。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、
無理からぬことかと。

engChrName: I'm also concerned on a broader level.
engSearchText: I'm also concerned on a broader level.
jpnChrName: それにバーゼルの一件に限らず……
jpnSearchText: それにバーゼルの一件に限らず……

engChrName: Basel doesn't appear to be the only place where criminals are misusing tech for nefarious purposes.
engSearchText:
Basel doesn't appear to be the only place where
criminals are misusing tech for nefarious purposes.
jpnChrName: どうやら裏の世界でも予想以上に “技術犯罪”が増加しているみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら裏の世界でも予想以上に
“技術犯罪”が増加しているみたいだ。

engChrName: So I think Arkride Solutions is going to need its own technical advisor—don't you?
engSearchText:
So I think Arkride Solutions is going to need its own
technical advisor—don't you?
jpnChrName: ──これからの裏解決屋には “技術顧問”も必要なんじゃないかな？
jpnSearchText:
──これからの裏解決屋には
“技術顧問”も必要なんじゃないかな？

engChrName: That's, umm...actually a good point.
engSearchText: That's, umm...actually a good point.
jpnChrName: それは……確かに心強いですね。
jpnSearchText: それは……確かに心強いですね。

engChrName: A very good point. While I am well versed in modern technology, my field is software, not hardware.
engSearchText:
A very good point. While I am well versed in modern
technology, my field is software, not hardware.
jpnChrName: ええ、わたくしの専門はソフトで ハードは専門外ですし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、わたくしの専門はソフトで
ハードは専門外ですし。

engChrName: Those black and silver thingies would be good backup in a fight, too.
engSearchText:
Those black and silver thingies would be good backup
in a fight, too.
jpnChrName: 銀色と黒いのの 支援と戦力も悪くねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
銀色と黒いのの
支援と戦力も悪くねぇしな。

engChrName: ...What's it gonna be, chief?
engSearchText: ...What's it gonna be, chief?
jpnChrName: ──ま、所長殿次第だろうが？
jpnSearchText: ──ま、所長殿次第だろうが？

engChrName: Aww, screw it! What's one more at this point?!
engSearchText: Aww, screw it! What's one more at this point?!
jpnChrName: ああもう── こうなりゃ４人も５人も同じことだ！
jpnSearchText:
ああもう──
こうなりゃ４人も５人も同じことだ！

engChrName: I'll introduce you to our landlords later!
engSearchText: I'll introduce you to our landlords later!
jpnChrName: 後で付いて来い、大家に紹介してやる！
jpnSearchText: 後で付いて来い、大家に紹介してやる！

engChrName: Heehee... Thank you. I'm looking forward to working here.
engSearchText:
Heehee... Thank you. I'm looking forward to
working here.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ありがとうヴァンさん。 ──これからもよろしく。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ありがとうヴァンさん。
──これからもよろしく。

engChrName: Oh! But, Risette, Quatre! You've got to try the roasted chestnuts. They're super soft and sweet!
engSearchText:
Oh! But, Risette, Quatre! You've got to try the
roasted chestnuts. They're super soft and sweet!
jpnChrName: その前にリゼットさん、カトルさん！ ホクホクの焼き栗があるんです！
jpnSearchText:
その前にリゼットさん、カトルさん！
ホクホクの焼き栗があるんです！

engChrName: I'll go and make some more coffee for us, too.
engSearchText: I'll go and make some more coffee for us, too.
jpnChrName: コーヒーも淹れ直しますから 改めてみんなで頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
コーヒーも淹れ直しますから
改めてみんなで頂きましょう。

engChrName: November 9th, 1208, 10:30AM
engSearchText: November 9th, 1208, 10:30AM

engChrName: This thing's so COOL! It's a mechanical wolf, right? Awesome!
engSearchText:
This thing's so COOL! It's a mechanical wolf, right?
Awesome!
jpnChrName: すっげええええ！？ 狼型メカ！？　カッコよすぎだろー！
jpnSearchText:
すっげええええ！？
狼型メカ！？　カッコよすぎだろー！

engChrName: It looks really strong, too!
engSearchText: It looks really strong, too!
jpnChrName: 黒くてつよそーっ！！
jpnSearchText: 黒くてつよそーっ！！

engChrName: He's like some kind of guardian beast from a fairy tale. He's awesome...
engSearchText:
He's like some kind of guardian beast from a
fairy tale. He's awesome...
jpnChrName: ……すごい…… まるでお伽話の守護獣みたい。
jpnSearchText:
……すごい……
まるでお伽話の守護獣みたい。

engChrName: He is! He's living with us now!
engSearchText: He is! He's living with us now!
jpnChrName: えへん、そーでしょー！ ウチのいそーろーになったんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
えへん、そーでしょー！
ウチのいそーろーになったんだよ！

engChrName: Aren'tcha, XEROS?
engSearchText: Aren'tcha, XEROS?
jpnChrName: ねー、ＸＥＲＯＳ（ゼロス）ー？
jpnSearchText: ねー、ＸＥＲＯＳ（ゼロス）ー？

engChrName: GRR... RUFF!
engSearchText: GRR... RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ．

engChrName: H-He can bark, too?!
engSearchText: H-He can bark, too?!
jpnChrName: しゃ、喋ったああ！？
jpnSearchText: しゃ、喋ったああ！？

engChrName: Can we pet him?!
engSearchText: Can we pet him?!
jpnChrName: ユメちゃん、さわらせてー！
jpnSearchText: ユメちゃん、さわらせてー！

engChrName: E-Easy, you two. Don't upset him.
engSearchText: E-Easy, you two. Don't upset him.
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと２人とも、 あんまり失礼なことをしたら……
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと２人とも、
あんまり失礼なことをしたら……

engChrName: That Van's just a magnet for strange types, isn't he?
engSearchText: That Van's just a magnet for strange types, isn't he?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンの野郎、次から次へと ワケありな店子を増やしやがって。
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンの野郎、次から次へと
ワケありな店子を増やしやがって。

engChrName: The new lad and his animals seem like a good bunch, but still.
engSearchText:
The new lad and his animals seem like a good bunch,
but still.
jpnChrName: ま、あの黒いのと銀色のと ボウズ自身は信用できそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あの黒いのと銀色のと
ボウズ自身は信用できそうだが。

engChrName: Well, even better than good, since they've made Yumé the happiest I've seen in a while! She is just the cutest darned thing you ever did see!
engSearchText:
Well, even better than good, since they've made
Yumé the happiest I've seen in a while! She is just the
cutest darned thing you ever did see!
jpnChrName: なによりユメが大喜びだし！ いやぁ、ホント可愛いよなぁ～……
jpnSearchText:
なによりユメが大喜びだし！
いやぁ、ホント可愛いよなぁ～……

engChrName: You're always like a different person when you're talking about her...
engSearchText:
You're always like a different person when you're
talking about her...
jpnChrName: お父さん、デレデレしすぎ。
jpnSearchText: お父さん、デレデレしすぎ。

engChrName: Heehee. And I like that Van is broadening his circle of friends and acquaintances. It's nice to see.
engSearchText:
Heehee. And I like that Van is broadening his circle
of friends and acquaintances. It's nice to see.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、でもこれもヴァンさんが 繋いでくれている縁でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、でもこれもヴァンさんが
繋いでくれている縁でしょう。

engChrName: Oh, they're back.
engSearchText: Oh, they're back.
jpnChrName: あ、戻ってきたみたいね。
jpnSearchText: あ、戻ってきたみたいね。

engChrName: Market purchases complete.
engSearchText: Market purchases complete.
jpnChrName: 九区ノ市場（まるしぇ）デ購入カンリョウ。
jpnSearchText: 九区ノ市場（まるしぇ）デ購入カンリョウ。

engChrName: Five curims of mussels, three curims of shrimp, and two curims of artichokes purchased. Please confirm.
engSearchText:
Five curims of mussels, three curims of shrimp, and
two curims of artichokes purchased. Please confirm.
jpnChrName: ムール貝５クリム、エビ３クリム、 アーティチョーク２クリム、確認ヲ。
jpnSearchText:
ムール貝５クリム、エビ３クリム、
アーティチョーク２クリム、確認ヲ。

engChrName: Thanks, FIO! I can tell you picked the freshest ones, too. ♪
engSearchText:
Thanks, FIO! I can tell you picked the freshest
ones, too. ♪
jpnChrName: ありがとう、ＦＩＯちゃん。 うーん、どれも新鮮そうね♪
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、ＦＩＯちゃん。
うーん、どれも新鮮そうね♪

engChrName: Incredible how quickly technology has advanced... Argh. Now I sound really old.
engSearchText:
Incredible how quickly technology has advanced...
Argh. Now I sound really old.
jpnChrName: ったく技術の進歩ってのは…… ってのも年寄りの繰言か。
jpnSearchText:
ったく技術の進歩ってのは……
ってのも年寄りの繰言か。

engChrName: It sure has gotten livelier around here compared to when Van was working by his lonesome, though.
engSearchText:
It sure has gotten livelier around here compared to
when Van was working by his lonesome, though.
jpnChrName: ハン、しかし一人の頃と比べて 賑やかになってきたじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、しかし一人の頃と比べて
賑やかになってきたじゃねえか。

engChrName: They're all growing boys and girls, too, so I want to be sure to give them all the food they need.
engSearchText:
They're all growing boys and girls, too, so I want to
be sure to give them all the food they need.
jpnChrName: ええ……みんな若いんだし、 一杯食べてくれると嬉しいわね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……みんな若いんだし、
一杯食べてくれると嬉しいわね。

engChrName: So let's shift the topic toward the Geneses and Van's Grendel.
engSearchText:
So let's shift the topic toward the Geneses and
Van's Grendel.
jpnChrName: さて──改めて《ゲネシス》と ヴァンさんの“グレンデル化”だけど。
jpnSearchText:
さて──改めて《ゲネシス》と
ヴァンさんの“グレンデル化”だけど。

engChrName: Unfortunately, I don't think it'll be possible to learn anything about the Geneses' nature from them directly.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, I don't think it'll be possible to learn
anything about the Geneses' nature from
them directly.
jpnChrName: 現時点で《ゲネシス》そのものに迫るのは やっぱり無理みたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
現時点で《ゲネシス》そのものに迫るのは
やっぱり無理みたいだ。

engChrName: They appear to have some kind of protection, akin to artifacts, keeping their secrets from us.
engSearchText:
They appear to have some kind of protection, akin to
artifacts, keeping their secrets from us.
jpnChrName: 多分、古代遺物に近い“プロテクト”が 何らかの形で掛かっているんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
多分、古代遺物に近い“プロテクト”が
何らかの形で掛かっているんだろう。

engChrName: I can't fathom why they only react to Agnès, either. It does feel as though the mafia knows a fair amount about them, though.
engSearchText:
I can't fathom why they only react to Agnès, either.
It does feel as though the mafia knows a fair amount
about them, though.
jpnChrName: アニエスさんにだけ反応する事も含めて。 まあ、マフィアは何か知ってそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんにだけ反応する事も含めて。
まあ、マフィアは何か知ってそうだけど。

engChrName: I had a feeling you wouldn't be able to learn anything from them...
engSearchText:
I had a feeling you wouldn't be able to learn anything
from them...
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりそうですよね。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱりそうですよね。

engChrName: Mind you, Almata is also somewhat in the dark when it comes to the Geneses.
engSearchText:
Mind you, Almata is also somewhat in the dark when
it comes to the Geneses.
jpnChrName: あの人たちも完全に使いこなしている わけではなさそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの人たちも完全に使いこなしている
わけではなさそうですけど……

engChrName: Yeah. I get the impression they don't know HOW they're doing what they're doing with 'em—they just have an idea of WHAT they can do.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I get the impression they don't know HOW
they're doing what they're doing with 'em—they just
have an idea of WHAT they can do.
jpnChrName: ああ、利用はしてるが詳しい原理を 分かって使っていた感じじゃねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、利用はしてるが詳しい原理を
分かって使っていた感じじゃねえな。

engChrName: They're more like disposable tools to whip out for whatever they wanna do at any given point.
engSearchText:
They're more like disposable tools to whip out for
whatever they wanna do at any given point.
jpnChrName: 効果を限定的に把握した上での “その場限りの使い捨て”って所か。
jpnSearchText:
効果を限定的に把握した上での
“その場限りの使い捨て”って所か。

engChrName: It makes me mad that they're using them that way, but there's no better way of putting it.
engSearchText:
It makes me mad that they're using them that way,
but there's no better way of putting it.
jpnChrName: 使い捨て……納得できませんけど 確かにそんな感じはします。
jpnSearchText:
使い捨て……納得できませんけど
確かにそんな感じはします。

engChrName: We've taken four back from them so far, and that's how it's seemed every time.
engSearchText:
We've taken four back from them so far, and that's
how it's seemed every time.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんの時も、ラングポートや サルバッドにバーゼルの時も……
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんの時も、ラングポートや
サルバッドにバーゼルの時も……

engChrName: Yeah. Much as it pisses me off, they don't seem to give a damn about what happens to a Genesis after they're done with it.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Much as it pisses me off, they don't seem to
give a damn about what happens to a Genesis after
they're done with it.
jpnChrName: ムカつくことこの上ねえが 連中が拘ってねえのは確かだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ムカつくことこの上ねえが
連中が拘ってねえのは確かだろう。

engChrName: Worth noting here that they do seem to be pretty consistent in how they've used the Geneses, too.
engSearchText:
Worth noting here that they do seem to be pretty
consistent in how they've used the Geneses, too.
jpnChrName: ただ、連中が起こした現象については 一定の“法則”はありそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、連中が起こした現象については
一定の“法則”はありそうだな。

engChrName: Yes, I agree.
engSearchText: Yes, I agree.
jpnChrName: はい……私もそう思います。
jpnSearchText: はい……私もそう思います。

engChrName: They've referred to everything they've done as an experiment.
engSearchText:
They've referred to everything they've done as
an experiment.
jpnChrName: あの人たちが何度か口にした “実験”という言葉も含めて。
jpnSearchText:
あの人たちが何度か口にした
“実験”という言葉も含めて。

engChrName: Whether it's manipulating people's vital energies, interfering with their minds, or installing a human's personality into a machine...
engSearchText:
Whether it's manipulating people's vital energies,
interfering with their minds, or installing a human's
personality into a machine...
jpnChrName: 生命活動の操作に、人々への感能力、 人格の機械へのインストールまで……
jpnSearchText:
生命活動の操作に、人々への感能力、
人格の機械へのインストールまで……

engChrName: ...Almata has kept using the Geneses as a trigger for various kinds of unnatural phenomena.
engSearchText:
...Almata has kept using the Geneses as a trigger for
various kinds of unnatural phenomena.
jpnChrName: 何らかの“きっかけ”としてゲネシスを 利用していたようにも見受けられますね。
jpnSearchText:
何らかの“きっかけ”としてゲネシスを
利用していたようにも見受けられますね。

engChrName: Yeah. I think that's an important fact to bear in mind if we're going to get to the bottom of this.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I think that's an important fact to bear in mind
if we're going to get to the bottom of this.
jpnChrName: うん、鍵はそこにあると思うんだ。
jpnSearchText: うん、鍵はそこにあると思うんだ。

engChrName: Fortunately, in all of the cases we've seen, the phenomenon triggered hasn't reoccurred once it's been stopped.
engSearchText:
Fortunately, in all of the cases we've seen, the
phenomenon triggered hasn't reoccurred once it's
been stopped.
jpnChrName: どれも事件後に似たような現象が 起こっていないのは幸いだけど……
jpnSearchText:
どれも事件後に似たような現象が
起こっていないのは幸いだけど……

engChrName: ...But there is one particular phenomenon that Almata ISN'T behind that's happened again and again.
engSearchText:
...But there is one particular phenomenon that
Almata ISN'T behind that's happened again
and again.
jpnChrName: 同じく《ゲネシス》がきっかけとなって、 しかも“再現性”がある現象が存在する。
jpnSearchText:
同じく《ゲネシス》がきっかけとなって、
しかも“再現性”がある現象が存在する。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: Heh. I got'cha.
engSearchText: Heh. I got'cha.
jpnChrName: ハッ、なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、なるほどな。

engChrName: Van's transformation into the Grendel, correct?
engSearchText: Van's transformation into the Grendel, correct?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさんが《グレンデル》という 謎の存在に変身するという現象ですね。
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンさんが《グレンデル》という
謎の存在に変身するという現象ですね。

engChrName: That's right. The ability to reproduce results for further study is a crucial factor in science and engineering.
engSearchText:
That's right. The ability to reproduce results for
further study is a crucial factor in science
and engineering.
jpnChrName: うん、そして科学や技術にとって 何より重要なのはその“再現性”でね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、そして科学や技術にとって
何より重要なのはその“再現性”でね。

engChrName: There's a lot that we don't know about the Grendel, but what we DO know now is that it's comprised of exceedingly high-density shards.
engSearchText:
There's a lot that we don't know about the Grendel,
but what we DO know now is that it's comprised of
exceedingly high-density shards.
jpnChrName: この場合のポイントは、グレンデルがどうやら 高密度の霊子装片（シャード）で構成されていること──
jpnSearchText:
この場合のポイントは、グレンデルがどうやら
高密度の霊子装片（シャード）で構成されていること──

engChrName: We also know that Van's holo, Mare, appears when activating it—or rather, a version of her that possesses free will appears.
engSearchText:
We also know that Van's holo, Mare, appears when
activating it—or rather, a version of her that possesses
free will appears.
jpnChrName: その発動時に必ず、《メア》って専用ホロウが 自由意志を持ったように現れるってことさ。
jpnSearchText:
その発動時に必ず、《メア》って専用ホロウが
自由意志を持ったように現れるってことさ。

engChrName: Yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah.
jpnChrName: ──ま、そうなるわな。
jpnSearchText: ──ま、そうなるわな。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Just tell me what you want.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Just tell me what you want.
jpnChrName: はいはい、なんなの？ 用件を言いなさいよね。
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、なんなの？
用件を言いなさいよね。

engChrName: Mare, incidentally, is a custom holo developed at Marduk.
engSearchText:
Mare, incidentally, is a custom holo developed
at Marduk.
jpnChrName: 改めてになりますが──《メア》は マルドゥック社が開発したカスタム・ホロウです。
jpnSearchText:
改めてになりますが──《メア》は
マルドゥック社が開発したカスタム・ホロウです。

engChrName: Her source code is classified, but she was created using AI knowledge purchased from multiple companies.
engSearchText:
Her source code is classified, but she was created
using AI knowledge purchased from
multiple companies.
jpnChrName: ソースは非公開ですが、各方面から買い上げた ＡＩ研究成果の“ハイブリッド”となります。
jpnSearchText:
ソースは非公開ですが、各方面から買い上げた
ＡＩ研究成果の“ハイブリッド”となります。

engChrName: However, it goes without saying that the holo designed by Marduk does not have free will.
engSearchText:
However, it goes without saying that the holo
designed by Marduk does not have free will.
jpnChrName: ですが当然“自由意志”は実現できていません。
jpnSearchText: ですが当然“自由意志”は実現できていません。

engChrName: And that's normal. The holos that the rest of us use also talk, but you can't have a conversation with them.
engSearchText:
And that's normal. The holos that the rest of us use
also talk, but you can't have a conversation with them.
jpnChrName: 確かに……わたしたちが使うホロウも お話しますけど、一方通行な感じです。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……わたしたちが使うホロウも
お話しますけど、一方通行な感じです。

engChrName: But when she shows up to help Van transform, she's clearly got a sense of self.
engSearchText:
But when she shows up to help Van transform, she's
clearly got a sense of self.
jpnChrName: だが、あの時のチビはどう考えても “自分の意志”を持ってる感じだったな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、あの時のチビはどう考えても
“自分の意志”を持ってる感じだったな。

engChrName: It's theoretically possible she's programmed to only seem that way on the surface, but I'm inclined to agree.
engSearchText:
It's theoretically possible she's programmed to only
seem that way on the surface, but I'm inclined
to agree.
jpnChrName: はい……そう思わせる パターン反応なのかもしれませんが。
jpnSearchText:
はい……そう思わせる
パターン反応なのかもしれませんが。

engChrName: Same here. They'd need to program an obscene number of possible responses to give the illusion of free will.
engSearchText:
Same here. They'd need to program an obscene
number of possible responses to give the illusion of
free will.
jpnChrName: それはそれで膨大なパターンを 用意してるってことになるが……
jpnSearchText:
それはそれで膨大なパターンを
用意してるってことになるが……

engChrName: She doesn't even have enough space for that much code, right?
engSearchText:
She doesn't even have enough space for that much
code, right?
jpnChrName: それだけの容量はない筈だったな？
jpnSearchText: それだけの容量はない筈だったな？

engChrName: That's correct. She takes up only marginally more space on your Xipha than the holos that everyone else uses.
engSearchText:
That's correct. She takes up only marginally more
space on your Xipha than the holos that everyone
else uses.
jpnChrName: はい、ヴァン様のザイファに占めるホロウ容量は 他の皆さんとそこまで差はありません。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ヴァン様のザイファに占めるホロウ容量は
他の皆さんとそこまで差はありません。

engChrName: We would need to perform a special test to be absolutely sure either way...
engSearchText:
We would need to perform a special test to be
absolutely sure either way...
jpnChrName: 専用の偽証テストに掛けてみないと 断言まではできませんが──
jpnSearchText:
専用の偽証テストに掛けてみないと
断言まではできませんが──

engChrName: ...but the Mare that possesses free will seems to be a lifeform comprised entirely of data.
engSearchText:
...but the Mare that possesses free will seems to be a
lifeform comprised entirely of data.
jpnChrName: わたくしにはあの時の彼女（メア）が自由意志のある “情報生命体”に思えてなりませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしにはあの時の彼女（メア）が自由意志のある
“情報生命体”に思えてなりませんでした。

engChrName: I don't think I can even wrap my head around that idea...
engSearchText:
I don't think I can even wrap my head around
that idea...
jpnChrName: ジョウホウ、セイメイタイ……
jpnSearchText: ジョウホウ、セイメイタイ……

engChrName: This is sounding real shady all of a sudden.
engSearchText: This is sounding real shady all of a sudden.
jpnChrName: 胡散臭ぇ話になってきやがったが……
jpnSearchText: 胡散臭ぇ話になってきやがったが……

engChrName: Now, if for argument's sake, we assume that Mare is an AI app that's achieved free will...
engSearchText:
Now, if for argument's sake, we assume that Mare is
an AI app that's achieved free will...
jpnChrName: ……ですが本来ＡＩアプリでしかない メアちゃんが自由意志を獲得したのなら。
jpnSearchText:
……ですが本来ＡＩアプリでしかない
メアちゃんが自由意志を獲得したのなら。

engChrName: ...the trigger for that would have to be the Geneses, no?
engSearchText:
...the trigger for that would have to be the
Geneses, no?
jpnChrName: その“きっかけ”となったのが 《ゲネシス》と言えるわけですね？
jpnSearchText:
その“きっかけ”となったのが
《ゲネシス》と言えるわけですね？

engChrName: That's what I was thinking, yeah.
engSearchText: That's what I was thinking, yeah.
jpnChrName: うん、そういう事だね。
jpnSearchText: うん、そういう事だね。

engChrName: Then again...I hate to say this in front of you, Risette, but I can't say I fully trust anything Marduk says or does.
engSearchText:
Then again...I hate to say this in front of you, Risette,
but I can't say I fully trust anything Marduk says
or does.
jpnChrName: その……リゼットさんには悪いけど 僕はマルドゥック社を信用しきれない。
jpnSearchText:
その……リゼットさんには悪いけど
僕はマルドゥック社を信用しきれない。

engChrName: You needn't worry about causing offense. I understand why you would feel that way.
engSearchText:
You needn't worry about causing offense.
I understand why you would feel that way.
jpnChrName: いえ、お気になさらず。 無理もないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、お気になさらず。
無理もないでしょう。

engChrName: Thanks. Still, I think that even they have their limits.
engSearchText: Thanks. Still, I think that even they have their limits.
jpnChrName: ありがとう──でもある意味で、 フェアな企業でもあるとは思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう──でもある意味で、
フェアな企業でもあるとは思うんだ。

engChrName: I can't help but wonder exactly where the material that formed her source code came from...
engSearchText:
I can't help but wonder exactly where the material
that formed her source code came from...
jpnChrName: 《メア》の複数のソースというのが どのあたりかは別にして……
jpnSearchText:
《メア》の複数のソースというのが
どのあたりかは別にして……

engChrName: ...but I can't imagine they entrusted her to Van believing that she would exhibit so much unusual behavior.
engSearchText:
...but I can't imagine they entrusted her to Van
believing that she would exhibit so much
unusual behavior.
jpnChrName: あそこまでの異常現象を見越して ヴァンさんに託しているとも思えない。
jpnSearchText:
あそこまでの異常現象を見越して
ヴァンさんに託しているとも思えない。

engChrName: So I think the root of the cause lies in Professor Epstein's legacy rather than her.
engSearchText:
So I think the root of the cause lies in Professor
Epstein's legacy rather than her.
jpnChrName: ──だとすればやっぱり原因は “エプスタイン博士の遺産”なんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──だとすればやっぱり原因は
“エプスタイン博士の遺産”なんだろう。

engChrName: Incidentally, an AI gaining free will is one thing that would qualify as a technological singularity.
engSearchText:
Incidentally, an AI gaining free will is one thing that
would qualify as a technological singularity.
jpnChrName: ちなみにＡＩが自由意志を獲得する指標は 『技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）』とも呼ばれるけど……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにＡＩが自由意志を獲得する指標は
『技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）』とも呼ばれるけど……

engChrName: Which would mean that, put another way, something happened to Mare that allowed her to evolve past that massive hurdle.
engSearchText:
Which would mean that, put another way, something
happened to Mare that allowed her to evolve past that
massive hurdle.
jpnChrName: そのブレイクスルーを促す“進化”が メアに起きたとも言い換えられそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
そのブレイクスルーを促す“進化”が
メアに起きたとも言い換えられそうだね。

engChrName: Evolve...?
engSearchText: Evolve...?
jpnChrName: 進化………
jpnSearchText: 進化………

engChrName: Now we're really in the Goddess' territory.
engSearchText: Now we're really in the Goddess' territory.
jpnChrName: オイオイ、それこそ女神の 専売特許ってヤツじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ、それこそ女神の
専売特許ってヤツじゃねえのか？

engChrName: The Testaments suggest that evolution was a process intended to let we humans shape the world around us.
engSearchText:
The Testaments suggest that evolution was a process
intended to let we humans shape the world around us.
jpnChrName: ……聖典によれば“進化”は 私たち人間が世界に働きかけるため──
jpnSearchText:
……聖典によれば“進化”は
私たち人間が世界に働きかけるため──

engChrName: It's also described as what's helped us bring about our latent potential.
engSearchText:
It's also described as what's helped us bring about our
latent potential.
jpnChrName: 『可能性として持っている資質』とも 記されているようでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
『可能性として持っている資質』とも
記されているようでしたが……

engChrName: That was from the Book of Shahat, Verse 2: Jokanan's Letter, I think?
engSearchText:
That was from the Book of Shahat, Verse 2:
Jokanan's Letter, I think?
jpnChrName: シャハト記第二節、 『ヨカナンの手紙』だったか。
jpnSearchText:
シャハト記第二節、
『ヨカナンの手紙』だったか。

engChrName: Anyway, I think I get what you're sayin'.
engSearchText: Anyway, I think I get what you're sayin'.
jpnChrName: ……ま、いずれにせよ 言いたい事は分かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、いずれにせよ
言いたい事は分かったぜ。

engChrName: You wanna have a chance to observe everything, right?
engSearchText:
You wanna have a chance to observe
everything, right?
jpnChrName: ──要は観察させろってことだな？
jpnSearchText: ──要は観察させろってことだな？

engChrName: Mare's appearance, the shards goin' berserk—in short, everything that happens from the start to me goin' Grendel.
engSearchText:
Mare's appearance, the shards goin' berserk—in
short, everything that happens from the start to
me goin' Grendel.
jpnChrName: メアの出現からシャードの暴走、 グレンデルとなるまでの一連の流れ……
jpnSearchText:
メアの出現からシャードの暴走、
グレンデルとなるまでの一連の流れ……

engChrName: You wanna see it all, including what role the Geneses play in it.
engSearchText:
You wanna see it all, including what role the Geneses
play in it.
jpnChrName: 《ゲネシス》がどういう役割を 果たしているかも含めた、総てを。
jpnSearchText:
《ゲネシス》がどういう役割を
果たしているかも含めた、総てを。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: Exactly. I think that knowledge will help me support Agnès in her quest for answers, too.
engSearchText:
Exactly. I think that knowledge will help me support
Agnès in her quest for answers, too.
jpnChrName: うん、そうすればアニエスさんの 抱えている問題の糸口にもなるし……
jpnSearchText:
うん、そうすればアニエスさんの
抱えている問題の糸口にもなるし……

engChrName: It might also let you call on the Grendel's power in a less haphazard and dangerous way.
engSearchText:
It might also let you call on the Grendel's power in a
less haphazard and dangerous way.
jpnChrName: 場当たり的でしかないグレンデルにしても マシな運用法が見つかるかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
場当たり的でしかないグレンデルにしても
マシな運用法が見つかるかもしれない。

engChrName: What do you think? Does that work for you?
engSearchText: What do you think? Does that work for you?
jpnChrName: だから──どうかな、ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: だから──どうかな、ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Sure.
engSearchText: Sure.
jpnChrName: ま、いいだろ。
jpnSearchText: ま、いいだろ。

engChrName: We've got five Geneses so far, which leaves three still out there to recover.
engSearchText:
We've got five Geneses so far, which leaves three
still out there to recover.
jpnChrName: ８つあるっつうアニエスの 曾祖父さんの遺産も残り３つ。
jpnSearchText:
８つあるっつうアニエスの
曾祖父さんの遺産も残り３つ。

engChrName: We can't be sure the mafia has the rest, but if we get any more chances to stop 'em from causin' any trouble, we should take 'em.
engSearchText:
We can't be sure the mafia has the rest, but if we get
any more chances to stop 'em from causin' any
trouble, we should take 'em.
jpnChrName: マフィアが持っているかは分からねえが 白黒付けられそうな所は付けとくか。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアが持っているかは分からねえが
白黒付けられそうな所は付けとくか。

engChrName: And if I end up with a good excuse to transform in our future work, we'll give it a shot.
engSearchText:
And if I end up with a good excuse to transform in
our future work, we'll give it a shot.
jpnChrName: ──とりあえず今日以降の仕事で チャンスがありそうなら試してみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──とりあえず今日以降の仕事で
チャンスがありそうなら試してみるぞ。

engChrName: As long as we have a Genesis on hand, we should be able to brute force whatever the other transformation conditions are.
engSearchText:
As long as we have a Genesis on hand, we should be
able to brute force whatever the other transformation
conditions are.
jpnChrName: 《ゲネシス》さえあれば擬似的に グレンデル化の条件は整えられる……
jpnSearchText:
《ゲネシス》さえあれば擬似的に
グレンデル化の条件は整えられる……

engChrName: Then we just gotta grab Mare-Bear when she shows up, right?
engSearchText:
Then we just gotta grab Mare-Bear when she shows
up, right?
jpnChrName: それでメア公がノコノコ 現れた瞬間を押さえればいいんだな？
jpnSearchText:
それでメア公がノコノコ
現れた瞬間を押さえればいいんだな？

engChrName: That's about the short of it.
engSearchText: That's about the short of it.
jpnChrName: うん、そんな感じかな。
jpnSearchText: うん、そんな感じかな。

engChrName: I've already added the sensors necessary to observe her and record it all to FIO.
engSearchText:
I've already added the sensors necessary to observe her
and record it all to FIO.
jpnChrName: 彼女を観測・記録するためのセンサー類も 既にＦＩＯに組み込んでいる。
jpnSearchText:
彼女を観測・記録するためのセンサー類も
既にＦＩＯに組み込んでいる。

engChrName: This could be a little dangerous, but I think it'll be worth our while to try.
engSearchText:
This could be a little dangerous, but I think it'll be
worth our while to try.
jpnChrName: もちろん危険かもしれないけど── 試してみる価値はあると思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん危険かもしれないけど──
試してみる価値はあると思うんだ。

engChrName: Don't worry. I'll have you guys there to back me up, so I'm sure I'll be fine.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. I'll have you guys there to back me up,
so I'm sure I'll be fine.
jpnChrName: それについては心配すんな。 お前らにも手伝ってもらうしな。
jpnSearchText:
それについては心配すんな。
お前らにも手伝ってもらうしな。

engChrName: Of course you will! We'll be right there with you all the way!
engSearchText:
Of course you will! We'll be right there with you all
the way!
jpnChrName: もちろんですっ……！ 危険になったらお任せくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
もちろんですっ……！
危険になったらお任せくださいっ！

engChrName: This sounds like it could be fun.
engSearchText: This sounds like it could be fun.
jpnChrName: ハン、面倒くせぇが なかなか面白そうじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、面倒くせぇが
なかなか面白そうじゃねーか。

engChrName: I will be there to give any technology-related support that you may need.
engSearchText:
I will be there to give any technology-related support
that you may need.
jpnChrName: 技術的なサポートも含めて わたくしもお力添えさせて頂けると。
jpnSearchText:
技術的なサポートも含めて
わたくしもお力添えさせて頂けると。

engChrName: We can't do any of this without a Genesis being there. If you're not on board, we won't go ahead with it.
engSearchText:
We can't do any of this without a Genesis
being there. If you're not on board, we won't go
ahead with it.
jpnChrName: ま、ゲネシスあっての話だ。 お前が反対なら見送るけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ゲネシスあっての話だ。
お前が反対なら見送るけどな。

engChrName: ...It's not that.
engSearchText: ...It's not that.
jpnChrName: いえ……
jpnSearchText: いえ……

engChrName: I can't deny that I'm worried you might be hurt in the process...
engSearchText:
I can't deny that I'm worried you might be hurt in
the process...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさんの身に 危険が及ぶのは心配ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンさんの身に
危険が及ぶのは心配ですけど……

engChrName: ...but the chances of us learning something more about the Geneses and the Grendel through this are promising.
engSearchText:
...but the chances of us learning something more
about the Geneses and the Grendel through this
are promising.
jpnChrName: ゲネシスやグレンデルについて 少しでも手がかりが掴めるのなら。
jpnSearchText:
ゲネシスやグレンデルについて
少しでも手がかりが掴めるのなら。

engChrName: So I'll do all that I can to support you!
engSearchText: So I'll do all that I can to support you!
jpnChrName: ──私も全力でサポートします。 どうかお役に立たせてください！
jpnSearchText:
──私も全力でサポートします。
どうかお役に立たせてください！

engChrName: Then it's settled.
engSearchText: Then it's settled.
jpnChrName: 決まりだな。
jpnSearchText: 決まりだな。

engChrName: All right. Then let's get started on today's work.
engSearchText: All right. Then let's get started on today's work.
jpnChrName: よし──そんじゃあ 本日のお仕事を始めるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
よし──そんじゃあ
本日のお仕事を始めるぞ。

engChrName: I'm gonna need a few of you to handle some other stuff, but Quatre's trial period ain't over yet, so he's comin' with me.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna need a few of you to handle some other
stuff, but Quatre's trial period ain't over yet, so he's
comin' with me.
jpnChrName: 何人かには別の用事を頼むが…… カトル、お前は試用研修で同行だ。
jpnSearchText:
何人かには別の用事を頼むが……
カトル、お前は試用研修で同行だ。

engChrName: That works for me—though I honestly can't imagine it would take me long to grasp exactly what you do here.
engSearchText:
That works for me—though I honestly can't imagine
it would take me long to grasp exactly what you
do here.
jpnChrName: ＯＫ、仕事の手順くらいなら 正直あっという間だと思うけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ＯＫ、仕事の手順くらいなら
正直あっという間だと思うけどね。

engChrName: But go ahead and show me exactly what being a spriggan is all about.
engSearchText:
But go ahead and show me exactly what being a
spriggan is all about.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋（スプリガン）の流儀とやら── 改めて勉強させてもらおうかな。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋（スプリガン）の流儀とやら──
改めて勉強させてもらおうかな。

engChrName: I'll back you up to the best of my ability.
engSearchText: I'll back you up to the best of my ability.
jpnChrName: あはは……こちらも色々と サポートさせてもらいますね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……こちらも色々と
サポートさせてもらいますね。

engChrName: Select one additional member to accompany Quatre, Agnès, and Van outside. The rest will work elsewhere.
engSearchText:
Select one additional member to accompany Quatre,
Agnès, and Van outside. The rest will
work elsewhere.
jpnChrName: カトルとアニエスがパーティに入りました。 追加の同行メンバーを１名選んで下さい。 （※選ばなかったキャラは別行動となります）
jpnSearchText:
カトルとアニエスがパーティに入りました。
追加の同行メンバーを１名選んで下さい。
（※選ばなかったキャラは別行動となります）

engChrName: Orbments can now be customized from the main menu now that Quatre is in the party.
engSearchText:
Orbments can now be customized from the main
menu now that Quatre is in the party.
jpnChrName: カトルが加入したことで、メインメニューから オーブメントのカスタマイズができるようになりました。
jpnSearchText:
カトルが加入したことで、メインメニューから
オーブメントのカスタマイズができるようになりました。

engChrName: RUFF?
engSearchText: RUFF?
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ？
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ？

engChrName: Whoa!
engSearchText: Whoa!
jpnChrName: うわぁああっ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>うわぁああっ！？

engChrName: O-Oh, it's just a dog... Wait, IS it?
engSearchText: O-Oh, it's just a dog... Wait, IS it?
jpnChrName: な、なんだ犬か───じゃない！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだ犬か───じゃない！？

engChrName: It's a form of cutting-edge technology called an orbal drone. No need to be afraid—he won't bite.
engSearchText:
It's a form of cutting-edge technology called an
orbal drone. No need to be afraid—he won't bite.
jpnChrName: 導力ドローンという最先端技術です。 まあ、気にしないでください。
jpnSearchText:
導力ドローンという最先端技術です。
まあ、気にしないでください。

engChrName: I-If you say so...
engSearchText: I-If you say so...
jpnChrName: へ、あ、そう……なのかい？
jpnSearchText: へ、あ、そう……なのかい？

engChrName: Montmart... Is this a bistro? It looks so cozy.
engSearchText: Montmart... Is this a bistro? It looks so cozy.
jpnChrName: へえ──ＭＯＮＴＭＡＲＴ（モンマルト）か。 ビストロかい？　雰囲気良さそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
へえ──ＭＯＮＴＭＡＲＴ（モンマルト）か。
ビストロかい？　雰囲気良さそうだけど。

engChrName: It is. The food served here is wonderful, too.
engSearchText: It is. The food served here is wonderful, too.
jpnChrName: はい、とっても美味しくて素敵な店ですよ。
jpnSearchText: はい、とっても美味しくて素敵な店ですよ。

engChrName: And we're lucky enough to get to eat here all the time!
engSearchText:
And we're lucky enough to get to eat here all
the time!
jpnChrName: えへへ、わたしたちも いつもお世話になっています。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、わたしたちも
いつもお世話になっています。

engChrName: Hmm... It's no secret that holes in the wall like this tend to taste surprisingly good...
engSearchText:
Hmm... It's no secret that holes in the wall like this
tend to taste surprisingly good...
jpnChrName: ふーん、こういった店は 意外と名店が多いっていうし……
jpnSearchText:
ふーん、こういった店は
意外と名店が多いっていうし……

engChrName: I should blend in a lot better here than the luxury restaurants I usually frequent—
engSearchText:
I should blend in a lot better here than the luxury
restaurants I usually frequent—
jpnChrName: 僕の行きつけの高級店よりは 目立たなくて済みそう──
jpnSearchText:
僕の行きつけの高級店よりは
目立たなくて済みそう──

engChrName: Hey-hey! What'cha doing?
engSearchText: Hey-hey! What'cha doing?
jpnChrName: ねえねえ、なにやってんのー？
jpnSearchText: ねえねえ、なにやってんのー？

engChrName: WHOA-AAAH! ...Uhh, huh? There's nobody here?
engSearchText:
WHOA-AAAH!
...Uhh, huh? There's nobody here?
jpnChrName: うぁあああああ！？ ──って、誰もいない！？
jpnSearchText:
うぁあああああ！？
──って、誰もいない！？

engChrName: Heehee. Got you!
engSearchText: Heehee. Got you!
jpnChrName: にひひ、ひっかかったー！
jpnSearchText: にひひ、ひっかかったー！

engChrName: Oh, it's just a child... Just what on earth was that for?!
engSearchText: Oh, it's just a child... Just what on earth was that for?!
jpnChrName: なんだ子供か…… じゃなくて、何するんだ君はっ！？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ子供か……
じゃなくて、何するんだ君はっ！？

engChrName: She's the granddaughter of this bistro's owner.
engSearchText: She's the granddaughter of this bistro's owner.
jpnChrName: このビストロの孫娘さ。
jpnSearchText: このビストロの孫娘さ。

engChrName: Go easy on him, Yumes. He's technically a client.
engSearchText: Go easy on him, Yumes. He's technically a client.
jpnChrName: ユメ坊、一応お客さんだから お手柔らかにな。
jpnSearchText:
ユメ坊、一応お客さんだから
お手柔らかにな。

engChrName: Okay! But you should still take off your glasses. They make you look weird!
engSearchText:
Okay! But you should still take off your glasses.
They make you look weird!
jpnChrName: らじゃー！ でもオジサン、ヘンなカオー！
jpnSearchText:
らじゃー！
でもオジサン、ヘンなカオー！

engChrName: W-Well, wasn't she a rude little thing!
engSearchText: W-Well, wasn't she a rude little thing!
jpnChrName: し、失礼な子供だな……！
jpnSearchText: し、失礼な子供だな……！

engChrName: I wouldn't be wearing these sunglasses if I had a choice in the matter!
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be wearing these sunglasses if I had a
choice in the matter!
jpnChrName: 僕だってこんなサングラス、 付けたくて付けてるわけじゃ──
jpnSearchText:
僕だってこんなサングラス、
付けたくて付けてるわけじゃ──

engChrName: D-Don't let it get to you...
engSearchText: D-Don't let it get to you...
jpnChrName: ま、まあまあ。
jpnSearchText: ま、まあまあ。

engChrName: You're the one who landed yourself in this situation, so you kinda did have a choice.
engSearchText:
You're the one who landed yourself in this situation,
so you kinda did have a choice.
jpnChrName: クク、どうやら完全に 自業自得みたいだしなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、どうやら完全に
自業自得みたいだしなぁ？

engChrName: Perhaps we should make our way up to the office before we draw a crowd.
engSearchText:
Perhaps we should make our way up to the office
before we draw a crowd.
jpnChrName: 人目につく前に事務所に 上がられては如何でしょう？
jpnSearchText:
人目につく前に事務所に
上がられては如何でしょう？

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...
jpnChrName: むぐっ……
jpnSearchText: むぐっ……

engChrName: Yeah. We'll hear your story up there.
engSearchText: Yeah. We'll hear your story up there.
jpnChrName: ま、話を聞かせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、話を聞かせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: I want you to help me find someone.
engSearchText: I want you to help me find someone.
jpnChrName: 依頼というのは他でもない── ある女性を捜してもらいたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
依頼というのは他でもない──
ある女性を捜してもらいたいんだ。

engChrName: Getting right to the point, huh? Tell us more.
engSearchText: Getting right to the point, huh? Tell us more.
jpnChrName: 単刀直入だな。 で、その女性ってのは？
jpnSearchText:
単刀直入だな。
で、その女性ってのは？

engChrName: A woman, to be more specific. As you know, I'm single at the moment.
engSearchText:
A woman, to be more specific. As you know, I'm
single at the moment.
jpnChrName: 実はその…… 僕は知っての通り独身なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
実はその……
僕は知っての通り独身なんだが。

engChrName: However, there was one woman in the past I was very close to.
engSearchText:
However, there was one woman in the past I was very
close to.
jpnChrName: 過去、とある女性と 良い仲になったことがあってね。
jpnSearchText:
過去、とある女性と
良い仲になったことがあってね。

engChrName: We did break up after a while...
engSearchText: We did break up after a while...
jpnChrName: 色々あって別れてしまったんだが……
jpnSearchText: 色々あって別れてしまったんだが……

engChrName: ...but I later heard that she gave birth to our child.
engSearchText: ...but I later heard that she gave birth to our child.
jpnChrName: その──どうも彼女が僕との子供を 産んでいたらしいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
その──どうも彼女が僕との子供を
産んでいたらしいんだ。

engChrName: Oh, wow...
engSearchText: Oh, wow...
jpnChrName: それって……
jpnSearchText: それって……

engChrName: Heh. Buzzraider wasn't kidding about you being a piece of shit, huh?
engSearchText:
Heh. Buzzraider wasn't kidding about you being a
piece of shit, huh?
jpnChrName: クク、スクープ通りの ゲス野郎だったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、スクープ通りの
ゲス野郎だったみたいだな。

engChrName: They do say that our heroes are often corrupt. I see there is some truth to that.
engSearchText:
They do say that our heroes are often corrupt. I see
there is some truth to that.
jpnChrName: ふう、英雄色を好むとは 昔から言われていますが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、英雄色を好むとは
昔から言われていますが……

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...

engChrName: Y-You're getting it all wrong!
engSearchText: Y-You're getting it all wrong!
jpnChrName: い、いや、だから違うんだ……！
jpnSearchText: い、いや、だから違うんだ……！

engChrName: Are we? I'm not so sure we are.
engSearchText: Are we? I'm not so sure we are.
jpnChrName: 違うも何も、事実なんだよね？
jpnSearchText: 違うも何も、事実なんだよね？

engChrName: A-At least let me explain how it all happened, please.
engSearchText: A-At least let me explain how it all happened, please.
jpnChrName: それはそうなんだが…… 経緯を聞いて欲しい。
jpnSearchText:
それはそうなんだが……
経緯を聞いて欲しい。

engChrName: It all began eight years ago, back when I was twenty-three.
engSearchText:
It all began eight years ago, back when I
was twenty-three.
jpnChrName: ……８年くらい前のことさ。
jpnSearchText: ……８年くらい前のことさ。

engChrName: Z1 had just started to become a big thing, and I was a rookie racer who was struggling to make it into the big leagues.
engSearchText:
Z1 had just started to become a big thing, and I was a
rookie racer who was struggling to make it into the
big leagues.
jpnChrName: 僕は２３──昇格したばかりのＺ１で 駆け出しレーサーとして伸び悩んでいてね。
jpnSearchText:
僕は２３──昇格したばかりのＺ１で
駆け出しレーサーとして伸び悩んでいてね。

engChrName: One day, I was in a major accident during one of my races and was badly injured.
engSearchText:
One day, I was in a major accident during one of my
races and was badly injured.
jpnChrName: そんな頃、レース中の事故で大怪我をしたんだ。
jpnSearchText: そんな頃、レース中の事故で大怪我をしたんだ。

engChrName: I was rushed to the hospital—and it was there we first met.
engSearchText:
I was rushed to the hospital—and it was there we
first met.
jpnChrName: 運び込まれた病院で彼女と知り合って──
jpnSearchText: 運び込まれた病院で彼女と知り合って──

engChrName: She devoted her whole being to helping me recover and, thanks to her tireless care and physical therapy, I did. It was a downright miracle.
engSearchText:
She devoted her whole being to helping me recover
and, thanks to her tireless care and physical
therapy, I did. It was a downright miracle.
jpnChrName: その献身的な介護とリハビリもあって、 僕は何とか奇跡的に快復していった。
jpnSearchText:
その献身的な介護とリハビリもあって、
僕は何とか奇跡的に快復していった。

engChrName: When the time came for me to be discharged from the hospital, I summoned the courage to tell her how I felt, and the two of us started dating.
engSearchText:
When the time came for me to be discharged from
the hospital, I summoned the courage to tell her how
I felt, and the two of us started dating.
jpnChrName: そして退院時、思い切って彼女に告白して 僕たちは付き合うことになったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そして退院時、思い切って彼女に告白して
僕たちは付き合うことになったんだ。

engChrName: She was both a strong-willed and kind woman, and before I knew it, I was head over heels in love with her.
engSearchText:
She was both a strong-willed and kind woman, and
before I knew it, I was head over heels in love
with her.
jpnChrName: 優しいだけじゃなくて芯もあって…… 僕はもう彼女にゾッコンだったよ。
jpnSearchText:
優しいだけじゃなくて芯もあって……
僕はもう彼女にゾッコンだったよ。

engChrName: After I'd begged her enough times, she agreed to live with me, too. It was a little while after that that I finally returned to racing.
engSearchText:
After I'd begged her enough times, she agreed to live
with me, too. It was a little while after that that I
finally returned to racing.
jpnChrName: 何度も拝み倒して、同棲することになって そんな中でＺ１に復帰することもできた。
jpnSearchText:
何度も拝み倒して、同棲することになって
そんな中でＺ１に復帰することもできた。

engChrName: Thinking back, those were the happiest days of my life.
engSearchText:
Thinking back, those were the happiest days of
my life.
jpnChrName: 幸せだったよ── 今思えば人生で一番だったくらい。
jpnSearchText:
幸せだったよ──
今思えば人生で一番だったくらい。

engChrName: Due in no small part to the support I got from her, I ended up winning my first post-recovery championship.
engSearchText:
Due in no small part to the support I got from her, I
ended up winning my first post-recovery
championship.
jpnChrName: ……だがそんな献身と支えのおかげか、 復帰後最初のＺ１で何と優勝してね。
jpnSearchText:
……だがそんな献身と支えのおかげか、
復帰後最初のＺ１で何と優勝してね。

engChrName: Then I won the following championship. Then the next one after that... Before I knew it, people were treating me like some kind of hero.
engSearchText:
Then I won the following championship. Then the
next one after that... Before I knew it, people were
treating me like some kind of hero.
jpnChrName: その後も連戦連勝──あれよあれよと 周りに持ち上げられ始めたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
その後も連戦連勝──あれよあれよと
周りに持ち上げられ始めたんだ。

engChrName: Everyone wanted my attention. I was out partying one night after another.
engSearchText:
Everyone wanted my attention. I was out partying
one night after another.
jpnChrName: あちこちから声が掛かるようになって 派手な夜遊びも続くようになって……
jpnSearchText:
あちこちから声が掛かるようになって
派手な夜遊びも続くようになって……

engChrName: And, umm...I'm not proud of it, but I had more than a few one-night stands with other women around that time, too.
engSearchText:
And, umm...I'm not proud of it, but I had more than
a few one-night stands with other women around that
time, too.
jpnChrName: ……その、複数の女性と一夜限りの 関係なんかも持ってしまった。
jpnSearchText:
……その、複数の女性と一夜限りの
関係なんかも持ってしまった。

engChrName: ...Then one day, she suddenly disappeared from my life, leaving only a single note behind.
engSearchText:
...Then one day, she suddenly disappeared from my
life, leaving only a single note behind.
jpnChrName: そんな中──彼女はある日、 書き置きを残して消えてしまった。
jpnSearchText:
そんな中──彼女はある日、
書き置きを残して消えてしまった。

engChrName: I was filled with regret from my actions, but I didn't know what to say to her—so I just wallowed in self-loathing and let her go.
engSearchText:
I was filled with regret from my actions, but I didn't
know what to say to her—so I just wallowed in
self-loathing and let her go.
jpnChrName: 心底後悔したが……どの面下げてって 自己嫌悪もあって後を追わなかったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
心底後悔したが……どの面下げてって
自己嫌悪もあって後を追わなかったんだ。

engChrName: But two years later, I went to visit that same hospital where we first met for a regular checkup...
engSearchText:
But two years later, I went to visit that same hospital
where we first met for a regular checkup...
jpnChrName: だが２年後──何の因果か、 定期健診で例の病院を訪れた際……
jpnSearchText:
だが２年後──何の因果か、
定期健診で例の病院を訪れた際……

engChrName: ...and learned by pure chance that when she'd left me, she'd learned she was pregnant and also left her job.
engSearchText:
...and learned by pure chance that when she'd left me,
she'd learned she was pregnant and also left her job.
jpnChrName: 彼女があの時妊娠して、退職していた事を 偶然知ってしまったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
彼女があの時妊娠して、退職していた事を
偶然知ってしまったんだ。

engChrName: I was so shocked that I tried to get a coworker she was close with to give me a way to contact her.
engSearchText:
I was so shocked that I tried to get a coworker she
was close with to give me a way to contact her.
jpnChrName: 驚愕した僕は、彼女の親友だった 同僚の女性に聞き出そうとしたが──
jpnSearchText:
驚愕した僕は、彼女の親友だった
同僚の女性に聞き出そうとしたが──

engChrName: But she wouldn't give me a drop of information, no matter what I said.
engSearchText:
But she wouldn't give me a drop of information, no
matter what I said.
jpnChrName: その人は、彼女の連絡先や実家を 頑として教えてくれなくって……
jpnSearchText:
その人は、彼女の連絡先や実家を
頑として教えてくれなくって……

engChrName: I pestered her enough that she told me she'd call the guild if I didn't stay away from her.
engSearchText:
I pestered her enough that she told me she'd call the
guild if I didn't stay away from her.
jpnChrName: ………最後に『これ以上付きまとうなら 遊撃士協会に相談しますよ！』って警告された。
jpnSearchText:
………最後に『これ以上付きまとうなら
遊撃士協会に相談しますよ！』って警告された。

engChrName: That's... I think I'd do the same in her position, too, honestly.
engSearchText:
That's... I think I'd do the same in her position,
too, honestly.
jpnChrName: ……それは……… まあ、当然かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
……それは………
まあ、当然かもしれませんね。

engChrName: You really are the worst.
engSearchText: You really are the worst.
jpnChrName: …………やっぱり最低です。
jpnSearchText: …………やっぱり最低です。

engChrName: Erk...
engSearchText: Erk...
jpnChrName: うっ……
jpnSearchText: うっ……

engChrName: Well, I certainly see why you can't ask the police for help with this.
engSearchText:
Well, I certainly see why you can't ask the police for
help with this.
jpnChrName: 当然、警察とかにも 相談できる案件じゃないしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
当然、警察とかにも
相談できる案件じゃないしねぇ。

engChrName: She chose to remove you from her life. Trying to chase her down now would likely just be seen as stalking.
engSearchText:
She chose to remove you from her life. Trying to
chase her down now would likely just be seen
as stalking.
jpnChrName: 自ら姿を消された以上、付きまとえば ストーカー行為ともなりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
自ら姿を消された以上、付きまとえば
ストーカー行為ともなりそうです。

engChrName: Haha! Yeah, if you went to the guild with this, you'd be in for a bad time.
engSearchText:
Haha! Yeah, if you went to the guild with this, you'd
be in for a bad time.
jpnChrName: クハハ、ギルドに相談したら 逆に締め上げられちまいそうだなァ。
jpnSearchText:
クハハ、ギルドに相談したら
逆に締め上げられちまいそうだなァ。

engChrName: Argh...
engSearchText: Argh...
jpnChrName: ……ぐううっ……
jpnSearchText: ……ぐううっ……

engChrName: So that's why when this latest news hit, you decided to come to us.
engSearchText:
So that's why when this latest news hit, you decided
to come to us.
jpnChrName: で、今回のスクープを受けて 俺たちにってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
で、今回のスクープを受けて
俺たちにってわけか。

engChrName: That's right. You might not believe me, but I've changed a lot since then.
engSearchText:
That's right. You might not believe me, but I've
changed a lot since then.
jpnChrName: ああ……こう言っちゃなんだが あれから僕も心を入れ替えたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……こう言っちゃなんだが
あれから僕も心を入れ替えたんだ。

engChrName: I do still go out partying, but I've always kept myself in check. I swear that on Aidios' name.
engSearchText:
I do still go out partying, but I've always kept myself
in check. I swear that on Aidios' name.
jpnChrName: そりゃあ夜遊びくらいはするけど 女神に誓ってちゃんと一線は引いている。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃあ夜遊びくらいはするけど
女神に誓ってちゃんと一線は引いている。

engChrName: I've actually been using a lot of my free time over the past few years traveling around in hopes of finding her and our child.
engSearchText:
I've actually been using a lot of my free time over the
past few years traveling around in hopes of finding
her and our child.
jpnChrName: 僕なりに休暇で、彼女と子供を捜しに 各地に出向いていただけなんだ。
jpnSearchText:
僕なりに休暇で、彼女と子供を捜しに
各地に出向いていただけなんだ。

engChrName: Make that four years, in fact...
engSearchText: Make that four years, in fact...
jpnChrName: もう４年もそんな事を続けているよ……
jpnSearchText: もう４年もそんな事を続けているよ……

engChrName: Wow...
engSearchText: Wow...
jpnChrName: マクシムさん……
jpnSearchText: マクシムさん……

engChrName: That is quite a lot of time.
engSearchText: That is quite a lot of time.
jpnChrName: ４年……結構な期間ですね。
jpnSearchText: ４年……結構な期間ですね。

engChrName: Erm...
engSearchText: Erm...
jpnChrName: えと……その……
jpnSearchText: えと……その……

engChrName: Still, even if you aren't actually dating Lanster, it sure sounds like you were happy to 'get to know her a bit better,' if you catch my drift.
engSearchText:
Still, even if you aren't actually dating Lanster, it sure
sounds like you were happy to 'get to know her a bit
better,' if you catch my drift.
jpnChrName: クク、だが愛人はデマとしても 有名女優とはしっぽりするわけだ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、だが愛人はデマとしても
有名女優とはしっぽりするわけだ？

engChrName: Sh-She just asked me out for a meal and I accepted! Really, there wasn't anything more to it than that.
engSearchText:
Sh-She just asked me out for a meal and I accepted!
Really, there wasn't anything more to it than that.
jpnChrName: い、いや、あれは彼女の方から いきなり食事の誘いがあって……
jpnSearchText:
い、いや、あれは彼女の方から
いきなり食事の誘いがあって……

engChrName: We'd never interacted much before that, so I didn't have a clue why she invited me—and I certainly had no intentions of crossing any lines with her...
engSearchText:
We'd never interacted much before that, so I didn't
have a clue why she invited me—and I certainly had
no intentions of crossing any lines with her...
jpnChrName: あまり接点も無かったから戸惑ったし、 一線を越えるつもりもなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
あまり接点も無かったから戸惑ったし、
一線を越えるつもりもなかったけど……

engChrName: Besides, what man in my position WOULDN'T be at least a little tempted if such a beautiful woman made a move on him?!
engSearchText:
Besides, what man in my position WOULDN'T be
at least a little tempted if such a beautiful woman
made a move on him?!
jpnChrName: ──あ、あんな美人に迫られたら フラつくのは男として仕方ないだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
──あ、あんな美人に迫られたら
フラつくのは男として仕方ないだろう！？

engChrName: And here come the excuses.
engSearchText: And here come the excuses.
jpnChrName: あ、開き直った。
jpnSearchText: あ、開き直った。

engChrName: I'd bet mira that if this ex of yours saw that Buzzraider story, she'd start shakin' her head.
engSearchText:
I'd bet mira that if this ex of yours saw that
Buzzraider story, she'd start shakin' her head.
jpnChrName: ま、今回のゴシップで “彼女”も呆れ果ててそうだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今回のゴシップで
“彼女”も呆れ果ててそうだがな。

engChrName: Erk...
engSearchText: Erk...
jpnChrName: ぐっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……

engChrName: You're right. Perhaps that should have been enough to sever the last sliver of hope remaining for me...if there was ever any hope at all.
engSearchText:
You're right. Perhaps that should have been enough
to sever the last sliver of hope remaining for me...if
there was ever any hope at all.
jpnChrName: ああ、もう終わってるかもしれないけど 一縷の望みすら断たれてしまうだろう……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、もう終わってるかもしれないけど
一縷の望みすら断たれてしまうだろう……

engChrName: But as long as I still have a chance, please! I'm begging you—I need your help!
engSearchText:
But as long as I still have a chance, please!
I'm begging you—I need your help!
jpnChrName: だから頼む── どうか力になってくれないか！？
jpnSearchText:
だから頼む──
どうか力になってくれないか！？

engChrName: Erm...
engSearchText: Erm...

engChrName: Well, nothing we've heard so far tells me you didn't bring this all on yourself...
engSearchText:
Well, nothing we've heard so far tells me you didn't
bring this all on yourself...
jpnChrName: ま、自業自得としか 言えねぇのは確かだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、自業自得としか
言えねぇのは確かだが。

engChrName: Not a bit of it. But I think it still qualifies as a 4SPG based on Van's guidelines.
engSearchText:
Not a bit of it. But I think it still qualifies as a 4SPG
based on Van's guidelines.
jpnChrName: 確かにヴァンさんが言っていた ４ｓｐｇの条件には該当しそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
確かにヴァンさんが言っていた
４ｓｐｇの条件には該当しそうだね。

engChrName: Indeed. It's a request that can't be taken to the guild or the police while still being within reason.
engSearchText:
Indeed. It's a request that can't be taken to the guild
or the police while still being within reason.
jpnChrName: ええ、警察にもギルドにも頼れない、 それなりに“筋は通った”依頼……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、警察にもギルドにも頼れない、
それなりに“筋は通った”依頼……

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: So, what's her name? Do you have any photos of her?
engSearchText: So, what's her name? Do you have any photos of her?
jpnChrName: ──“彼女”の名前は？ 写真とかは持ってねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
──“彼女”の名前は？
写真とかは持ってねぇのか？

engChrName: S-Sorry, but I can't tell you her name just yet.
engSearchText: S-Sorry, but I can't tell you her name just yet.
jpnChrName: わ、悪いが現時点で名前は教えられない。
jpnSearchText: わ、悪いが現時点で名前は教えられない。

engChrName: I know you've saved me before, but I'm still not fully sure I can trust you.
engSearchText:
I know you've saved me before, but I'm still not fully
sure I can trust you.
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》……前に助けられたが 正直、信用しきれるか分からないからね。
jpnSearchText:
《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》……前に助けられたが
正直、信用しきれるか分からないからね。

engChrName: I don't want to cause any more trouble for her or our child than I already have.
engSearchText:
I don't want to cause any more trouble for her or our
child than I already have.
jpnChrName: 万が一でも彼女たちに 迷惑が掛かることだけは避けたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
万が一でも彼女たちに
迷惑が掛かることだけは避けたいんだ。

jpnChrName: へぇ……？
jpnSearchText: へぇ……？

engChrName: Not sure you should be making demands when you've got nowhere else to go.
engSearchText:
Not sure you should be making demands when you've
got nowhere else to go.
jpnChrName: ケッ、後がねえクセに 生意気なオッサンだな。
jpnSearchText:
ケッ、後がねえクセに
生意気なオッサンだな。

engChrName: Perhaps, though I do understand his intent.
engSearchText: Perhaps, though I do understand his intent.
jpnChrName: でも…… 当然の配慮かもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
でも……
当然の配慮かもしれません。

engChrName: You can never be too careful.
engSearchText: You can never be too careful.
jpnChrName: そうですね、このご時世、 慎重な判断かと思います。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、このご時世、
慎重な判断かと思います。

engChrName: What are we going to be using to find them, then?
engSearchText: What are we going to be using to find them, then?
jpnChrName: えと、ならマクシムさんは わたしたちに何を……？
jpnSearchText:
えと、ならマクシムさんは
わたしたちに何を……？

engChrName: We'll at least want a photograph. That would give us some options in searching.
engSearchText:
We'll at least want a photograph. That would give us
some options in searching.
jpnChrName: 写真があるなら色々な方法で 人捜しも出来そうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
写真があるなら色々な方法で
人捜しも出来そうだけど。

engChrName: Unfortunately, I don't have any.
engSearchText: Unfortunately, I don't have any.
jpnChrName: いや──残念ながら写真（そちら）は 一枚も手元に残っていなくてね。
jpnSearchText:
いや──残念ながら写真（そちら）は
一枚も手元に残っていなくてね。

engChrName: That's part of the reason why I've been reduced to wandering around searching for them myself.
engSearchText:
That's part of the reason why I've been reduced to
wandering around searching for them myself.
jpnChrName: それもあって自分で地方に 捜しに行くしかなかったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
それもあって自分で地方に
捜しに行くしかなかったんだが……

engChrName: But it only occurred to me recently that there IS one picture I took with her still in existence—I just don't have it.
engSearchText:
But it only occurred to me recently that there IS one
picture I took with her still in existence—I just don't
have it.
jpnChrName: 実は一枚だけ、彼女と一緒に撮った 写真が残っていることに気付いたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
実は一枚だけ、彼女と一緒に撮った
写真が残っていることに気付いたんだ。

engChrName: Before we moved in together, we went to Dirke Memorial Park on a date.
engSearchText:
Before we moved in together, we went to Dirke
Memorial Park on a date.
jpnChrName: ……同棲する前、デートで行った 首都郊外にあるディルク記念公園……
jpnSearchText:
……同棲する前、デートで行った
首都郊外にあるディルク記念公園……

engChrName: While we were there, we participated in a special event in an area of the park that's now been closed off due to monsters.
engSearchText:
While we were there, we participated in a special
event in an area of the park that's now been closed off
due to monsters.
jpnChrName: その後、魔獣が出て閉鎖されたエリアで “あるイベント”に２人で参加してね。
jpnSearchText:
その後、魔獣が出て閉鎖されたエリアで
“あるイベント”に２人で参加してね。

engChrName: The picture's in a time capsule we buried in front of the memorial tree there. I want you to come and help me dig it up.
engSearchText:
The picture's in a time capsule we buried in front of
the memorial tree there. I want you to come and help
me dig it up.
jpnChrName: その記念樹に埋めた“タイムカプセル”── それを掘り起こすのを手伝って欲しいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
その記念樹に埋めた“タイムカプセル”──
それを掘り起こすのを手伝って欲しいんだ。

engChrName: This really does look like a nice little bistro.
engSearchText: This really does look like a nice little bistro.
jpnChrName: うーん…… それにしても良さそうな店だな。
jpnSearchText:
うーん……
それにしても良さそうな店だな。

engChrName: The stew and the hamburg steaks are my favorites!
engSearchText: The stew and the hamburg steaks are my favorites!
jpnChrName: ちなみに“しちゅー”と “はんばーぐ”がお勧めです。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに“しちゅー”と
“はんばーぐ”がお勧めです。

engChrName: The food they serve with alcohol isn't half bad, either. They know what pairs perfect with baijiu.
engSearchText:
The food they serve with alcohol isn't half bad, either.
They know what pairs perfect with baijiu.
jpnChrName: 酒のツマミも悪くねぇな。 白酒（パイチュウ）に合うアレンジもしやがるし。
jpnSearchText:
酒のツマミも悪くねぇな。
白酒（パイチュウ）に合うアレンジもしやがるし。

engChrName: Figures you'd go right for the hard drinks...
engSearchText: Figures you'd go right for the hard drinks...
jpnChrName: ってお前な……
jpnSearchText: ってお前な……

engChrName: Ack... You're making me want to stop by once we're done at the park.
engSearchText:
Ack... You're making me want to stop by once we're
done at the park.
jpnChrName: ゴクッ、帰りに寄りたいが……
jpnSearchText: ゴクッ、帰りに寄りたいが……

engChrName: ...No, I can't. I'd just attract attention and cause them trouble.
engSearchText:
...No, I can't. I'd just attract attention and cause
them trouble.
jpnChrName: ──いやいや、どう騒がれるか 分かったもんじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
──いやいや、どう騒がれるか
分かったもんじゃないか。

engChrName: You're worrying yourself over nothing if you ask me...
engSearchText: You're worrying yourself over nothing if you ask me...
jpnChrName: 気にしすぎだと思うけど……
jpnSearchText: 気にしすぎだと思うけど……

engChrName: They also do takeout if that's more to your liking.
engSearchText: They also do takeout if that's more to your liking.
jpnChrName: テイクアウトなども お勧めかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
テイクアウトなども
お勧めかもしれませんね。

engChrName: We can vouch for those, too. Their sandwiches are always first rate.
engSearchText:
We can vouch for those, too. Their sandwiches are
always first rate.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そうですね。 サンドイッチも絶品ですし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、そうですね。
サンドイッチも絶品ですし。

engChrName: Aww... Work must be super busy for them, huh?
engSearchText: Aww... Work must be super busy for them, huh?
jpnChrName: あれっ、ヴァンたち…… オシゴトいそがしーのかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
あれっ、ヴァンたち……
オシゴトいそがしーのかなぁ？

engChrName: Are they already off on another job?
engSearchText: Are they already off on another job?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたち、またお出かけ？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんたち、またお出かけ？

engChrName: Yeah. They drove off with some weird guy with blond hair.
engSearchText:
Yeah. They drove off with some weird guy with
blond hair.
jpnChrName: んー、キンパツの変なオジサンと いっしょに行っちゃったよー。
jpnSearchText:
んー、キンパツの変なオジサンと
いっしょに行っちゃったよー。

engChrName: Heehee. You're so silly, Yumé. Well, are you ready to go?
engSearchText:
Heehee. You're so silly, Yumé. Well, are you ready
to go?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、なにそれ？ ──まあいいわ、行きましょユメ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、なにそれ？
──まあいいわ、行きましょユメ。

engChrName: Yup! Yaaay, I get to go shopping with Mommy!
engSearchText: Yup! Yaaay, I get to go shopping with Mommy!
jpnChrName: うんっ！ えへへ、ママとおかいものー！
jpnSearchText:
うんっ！
えへへ、ママとおかいものー！

engChrName: I'm all done, Grandpa!
engSearchText: I'm all done, Grandpa!
jpnChrName: おじーちゃん、ふきおわったよー！
jpnSearchText: おじーちゃん、ふきおわったよー！

engChrName: All done? Well, aren't you such a good girl, Yumé?
engSearchText: All done? Well, aren't you such a good girl, Yumé?
jpnChrName: おうおう、ありがとうなぁユメ。
jpnSearchText: おうおう、ありがとうなぁユメ。

engChrName: Yumé... So that's her name...
engSearchText: Yumé... So that's her name...
jpnChrName: ユメ…… ……ユメっていうのか………
jpnSearchText:
ユメ……
……ユメっていうのか………

engChrName: Come to think of it, your eyes are the same color as hers.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, your eyes are the same color
as hers.
jpnChrName: あ……そういえば 瞳の色が同じですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
あ……そういえば
瞳の色が同じですねっ。

engChrName: Tch. Would've been a better twist if she was someone else's kid.
engSearchText:
Tch. Would've been a better twist if she was someone
else's kid.
jpnChrName: チッ、別の野郎が父親って オチだったら面白かったのによ。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、別の野郎が父親って
オチだったら面白かったのによ。

engChrName: N-No, it would not!
engSearchText: N-No, it would not!
jpnChrName: お、面白くないっ！
jpnSearchText: お、面白くないっ！

engChrName: I hope we did the right thing by telling him where she lives...
engSearchText:
I hope we did the right thing by telling him where
she lives...
jpnChrName: うーん、結局身元も含めて 教えることになっちゃったけど。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、結局身元も含めて
教えることになっちゃったけど。

engChrName: I-I have my doubts, too, but it's not as though she's married.
engSearchText:
I-I have my doubts, too, but it's not as though
she's married.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ、ポーレットさんも ご結婚はされていませんし……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ、ポーレットさんも
ご結婚はされていませんし……

engChrName: And I'm not sure how we could have talked our way out of telling him after our reactions earlier...
engSearchText:
And I'm not sure how we could have talked our way
out of telling him after our reactions earlier...
jpnChrName: 流石にあの状況で誤魔化すのも 難しかったでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
流石にあの状況で誤魔化すのも
難しかったでしょう。

engChrName: *sigh* I can't believe the diva of the diner used to date this guy...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can't believe the diva of the diner used to date
this guy...
jpnChrName: はあ……旧市街のマドンナの 元相手がこんなのとはねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
はあ……旧市街のマドンナの
元相手がこんなのとはねぇ。

engChrName: Well, sorry for not living up to your standards! ...I really do appreciate your help finding her, though.
engSearchText:
Well, sorry for not living up to your standards! ...I
really do appreciate your help finding her, though.
jpnChrName: こんなので悪かったな…… ──いや、でも本当にありがとう。
jpnSearchText:
こんなので悪かったな……
──いや、でも本当にありがとう。

engChrName: But where IS Paulette? I don't recall seeing her earlier, either.
engSearchText:
But where IS Paulette? I don't recall seeing her
earlier, either.
jpnChrName: しかしポーレットはどこに…… 昼間も見かけなかったし。
jpnSearchText:
しかしポーレットはどこに……
昼間も見かけなかったし。

engChrName: Maybe buyin' extra stuff? Sounds about right at this time of day.
engSearchText:
Maybe buyin' extra stuff? Sounds about right at this
time of day.
jpnChrName: ああ、この時間だったら 追加の買い出しじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この時間だったら
追加の買い出しじゃねえか？

engChrName: FIO's helping her, but I'm sure she still needs to go out herself sometimes.
engSearchText:
FIO's helping her, but I'm sure she still needs to go
out herself sometimes.
jpnChrName: 流石にＦＩＯの手伝いだけじゃ 行き届かないだろうからね。
jpnSearchText:
流石にＦＩＯの手伝いだけじゃ
行き届かないだろうからね。

engChrName: Oh, you'd be surprised just how much of a help that little one has been.
engSearchText:
Oh, you'd be surprised just how much of a help that
little one has been.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、とんでもない。 みんなも本当に助かってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、とんでもない。
みんなも本当に助かってるわ。

engChrName: Paulette!
engSearchText: Paulette!
jpnChrName: ポーレットさん……！
jpnSearchText: ポーレットさん……！

engChrName: Erm... How long have you been standing there?
engSearchText: Erm... How long have you been standing there?
jpnChrName: あ、あの、いつからそこに……
jpnSearchText: あ、あの、いつからそこに……

engChrName: ...? I was just over at Brenda's store buying some extra seasonings.
engSearchText:
...? I was just over at Brenda's store buying some
extra seasonings.
jpnChrName: ？　ブレンダさんの所で 調味料を買い足してたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
？　ブレンダさんの所で
調味料を買い足してたんだけど……

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnSearchText: あら──……

engChrName: H-Hey... It's...umm... I, uh...I don't really know what I'm doing...
engSearchText:
H-Hey... It's...umm... I, uh...I don't really know
what I'm doing...
jpnChrName: や、やあ…… ……その、何というか……
jpnSearchText:
や、やあ……
……その、何というか……

engChrName: (Dude's going for it, huh?)
engSearchText: (Dude's going for it, huh?)
jpnChrName: （ハラ括りやがったか。）
jpnSearchText: （ハラ括りやがったか。）

engChrName: I-It's been a while, hasn't it?
engSearchText: I-It's been a while, hasn't it?
jpnChrName: ひ、久しぶり──
jpnSearchText: ひ、久しぶり──

engChrName: Ah! Do we have ourselves a new customer?
engSearchText: Ah! Do we have ourselves a new customer?
jpnChrName: ふふ、新しいお客さんかしら？
jpnSearchText: ふふ、新しいお客さんかしら？

engChrName: It's nice to meet you. I'm Paulette, an employee at this bistro.
engSearchText:
It's nice to meet you. I'm Paulette, an employee at
this bistro.
jpnChrName: ──初めまして、こちらのビストロの 従業員をしているポーレットといいます。
jpnSearchText:
──初めまして、こちらのビストロの
従業員をしているポーレットといいます。

engChrName: So you must be a friend of Van's?
engSearchText: So you must be a friend of Van's?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちのお知り合いかしら？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんたちのお知り合いかしら？

engChrName: (Rest in peace...)
engSearchText: (Rest in peace...)

engChrName: (*sigh* Her reaction comes as no surprise, of course.)
engSearchText: (*sigh* Her reaction comes as no surprise, of course.)
jpnChrName: （ふう、ある程度、   想定の範疇でしたが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふう、ある程度、
想定の範疇でしたが……）

engChrName: Aha...haha... Yeah, you could say that.
engSearchText: Aha...haha... Yeah, you could say that.
jpnChrName: あ、あはは…… うん……まあそんな所かな。
jpnSearchText:
あ、あはは……
うん……まあそんな所かな。

engChrName: Sorry. It looks like I mistook you for someone else.
engSearchText: Sorry. It looks like I mistook you for someone else.
jpnChrName: ………いや。 人違いだったようだ、お嬢さん。
jpnSearchText:
………いや。
人違いだったようだ、お嬢さん。

engChrName: I suppose I should get out of your hair now. I'll wire you your mira as soon as I get a chance.
engSearchText:
I suppose I should get out of your hair now. I'll wire
you your mira as soon as I get a chance.
jpnChrName: ──君たち、今日は失礼するよ。 依頼料は後ほど口座に振り込んでおく。
jpnSearchText:
──君たち、今日は失礼するよ。
依頼料は後ほど口座に振り込んでおく。

engChrName: M-Maxim!
engSearchText: M-Maxim!
jpnChrName: あ、あのマクシムさん……！
jpnSearchText: あ、あのマクシムさん……！

engChrName: Sorry to burst your bubble when you're tryin' to play it cool, but you leavin' your Leno here?
engSearchText:
Sorry to burst your bubble when you're tryin' to play it
cool, but you leavin' your Leno here?
jpnChrName: 格好つけてる所悪いが、 乗ってきたレノはいいのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
格好つけてる所悪いが、
乗ってきたレノはいいのかよ？

engChrName: Heehee...
engSearchText: Heehee...
jpnChrName: ふふ……
jpnSearchText: ふふ……

engChrName: I can see you've had quite the busy day.
engSearchText: I can see you've had quite the busy day.
jpnChrName: ──なんだかお疲れみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: ──なんだかお疲れみたいですね。

engChrName: It's almost time to close up shop for the day, but if you haven't eaten yet, you're welcome to come in for something.
engSearchText:
It's almost time to close up shop for the day, but if
you haven't eaten yet, you're welcome to come in
for something.
jpnChrName: そろそろ開店ですし、お腹が空いているなら 何か召し上がっていかれませんか？
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ開店ですし、お腹が空いているなら
何か召し上がっていかれませんか？
………ぁ……………

engChrName: ...Are you...sure about that?
engSearchText: ...Are you...sure about that?
jpnChrName: ………その、いいのかな？
jpnSearchText: ………その、いいのかな？

engChrName: Of course. Montmart's doors are open to anyone and everyone.
engSearchText:
Of course. Montmart's doors are open to anyone
and everyone.
jpnChrName: もちろん、モンマルトは どんなお客様も大歓迎ですから。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、モンマルトは
どんなお客様も大歓迎ですから。

engChrName: You're all welcome to come in, too, of course. I'll go hop in the kitchen.
engSearchText:
You're all welcome to come in, too, of course. I'll go
hop in the kitchen.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちもどうぞ── 今ならすぐに賄いも用意できるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたちもどうぞ──
今ならすぐに賄いも用意できるわ。

engChrName: November 9th, 6:20PM
engSearchText: November 9th, 6:20PM

engChrName: *sniffle* This food tastes so good...and yet strangely salty... *sniffle*
engSearchText:
*sniffle* This food tastes so good...and yet
strangely salty... *sniffle*
jpnChrName: ……ううっ、なんて美味しいんだ…… ちょっとしょっぱいけど……グス……
jpnSearchText:
……ううっ、なんて美味しいんだ……
ちょっとしょっぱいけど……グス……

engChrName: Paulette...
engSearchText: Paulette...
jpnChrName: おい、ポーレット……
jpnSearchText: おい、ポーレット……

engChrName: Huh? What is it?
engSearchText: Huh? What is it?
jpnChrName: ？　なぁにお父さん？
jpnSearchText: ？　なぁにお父さん？

engChrName: Well, nothing, but...
engSearchText: Well, nothing, but...
jpnChrName: いや………
jpnSearchText: いや………

engChrName: Heeey... What'cha crying for, mister?
engSearchText: Heeey... What'cha crying for, mister?
jpnChrName: ねーねー。 オジサン、なんで泣いてるのー？
jpnSearchText:
ねーねー。
オジサン、なんで泣いてるのー？

engChrName: He's in for a long ride if that's anything to go by.
engSearchText: He's in for a long ride if that's anything to go by.
jpnChrName: やーれやれ。 あの調子じゃ先は長そうだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
やーれやれ。
あの調子じゃ先は長そうだなァ？

engChrName: Ahaha... There might be a light at the end of the tunnel for him, though.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... There might be a light at the end of the
tunnel for him, though.
jpnChrName: あはは…… でも何とかなりそうですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
でも何とかなりそうですねっ。

engChrName: Even if he will have to keep proving his sincerity to earn it.
engSearchText:
Even if he will have to keep proving his sincerity to
earn it.
jpnChrName: まあ、誠意を見せ続ける必要は ありそうですが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、誠意を見せ続ける必要は
ありそうですが。

engChrName: True, but if he can, I'm sure everything will work out for the best.
engSearchText:
True, but if he can, I'm sure everything will work out
for the best.
jpnChrName: はい……それでもきっと。
jpnSearchText: はい……それでもきっと。

engChrName: All right, then. That's another job well done.
engSearchText: All right, then. That's another job well done.
jpnChrName: ──ま、とにかく依頼はクリアだ。
jpnSearchText: ──ま、とにかく依頼はクリアだ。

engChrName: I bet he earns a boatload, so he better get ready to pay up.
engSearchText:
I bet he earns a boatload, so he better get ready to
pay up.
jpnChrName: 超稼いでるトップレーサーだし、 成功報酬として精々ふんだくってやる。
jpnSearchText:
超稼いでるトップレーサーだし、
成功報酬として精々ふんだくってやる。

engChrName: And y'know, no matter how damn good a racecar driver he is, I'm not so sure I wanna accept him as Yumé's dad.
engSearchText:
And y'know, no matter how damn good a racecar
driver he is, I'm not so sure I wanna accept him as
Yumé's dad.
jpnChrName: しかしレーサーとしては認めるが ユメの父親とは……ちとムカつくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしレーサーとしては認めるが
ユメの父親とは……ちとムカつくぜ。

engChrName: It doesn't hurt to be happy for people, Van...
engSearchText: It doesn't hurt to be happy for people, Van...
jpnChrName: もう、ヴァンさん…… そこは祝福してあげましょうよ。
jpnSearchText:
もう、ヴァンさん……
そこは祝福してあげましょうよ。

engChrName: I might be with him here... I've only just met Paulette, but I can tell she's a lovely woman who deserves only the best.
engSearchText:
I might be with him here... I've only just met
Paulette, but I can tell she's a lovely woman who
deserves only the best.
jpnChrName: うーん、知り合ったばかりだけど ポーレットさん素敵だもんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、知り合ったばかりだけど
ポーレットさん素敵だもんねぇ。

engChrName: All the regulars downstairs love her, too. I've been in her debt for years, myself.
engSearchText:
All the regulars downstairs love her, too. I've been in
her debt for years, myself.
jpnChrName: つーか常連客全員のマドンナだぞ？ 俺も結構前から世話になってるし。
jpnSearchText:
つーか常連客全員のマドンナだぞ？
俺も結構前から世話になってるし。

engChrName: Hmph. Still, I can't imagine it'll be easy for him to get back into her good graces, so I'll just sit back and watch smugly till he does.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Still, I can't imagine it'll be easy for him to
