get back into her good graces, so I'll just sit back and
watch smugly till he does.
jpnChrName: ハン……簡単にヨリを戻せるとも思えねえし せいぜい高みの見物でもしてやるか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……簡単にヨリを戻せるとも思えねえし
せいぜい高みの見物でもしてやるか。

engChrName: Yeah! He should suffer a little for all he's done.
engSearchText: Yeah! He should suffer a little for all he's done.
jpnChrName: はいっ、おのれの報いですし、 せいぜい頑張るべきかと。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、おのれの報いですし、
せいぜい頑張るべきかと。

engChrName: He's really gonna have his work cut out if he wants the old man and the kid to welcome him into their lives, too.
engSearchText:
He's really gonna have his work cut out if he wants
the old man and the kid to welcome him into their
lives, too.
jpnChrName: クク、ジーサンにチビも含めて ハードル高そうなのもザマァだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ジーサンにチビも含めて
ハードル高そうなのもザマァだぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* I think you all need to be a little more forgiving of others...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I think you all need to be a little more forgiving
of others...
jpnChrName: もう…… フェリちゃんにアーロンさんも。
jpnSearchText:
もう……
フェリちゃんにアーロンさんも。

engChrName: Changing the subject, however...we certainly had some interesting developments on another front, didn't we?
engSearchText:
Changing the subject, however...we certainly had
some interesting developments on another front,
didn't we?
jpnChrName: それはそれとして── “進展”がありましたね。
jpnSearchText:
それはそれとして──
“進展”がありましたね。

engChrName: Did we ever... Even if it feels like the number of questions that need answering has only increased.
engSearchText:
Did we ever... Even if it feels like the number of
questions that need answering has only increased.
jpnChrName: ……はい。 他にも色々気になることが。
jpnSearchText:
……はい。
他にも色々気になることが。

engChrName: Well, we've had dinner, and we still got plenty of time left before we need to call it a day...
engSearchText:
Well, we've had dinner, and we still got plenty of
time left before we need to call it a day...
jpnChrName: 早めのメシも喰ったことだし、 まだ時間はありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
早めのメシも喰ったことだし、
まだ時間はありそうだ。

engChrName: You mind getting to work, Quatre?
engSearchText: You mind getting to work, Quatre?
jpnChrName: 頼めるか、カトル？
jpnSearchText: 頼めるか、カトル？

engChrName: Not at all. This is our time to shine.
engSearchText: Not at all. This is our time to shine.
jpnChrName: ああ── ここからは僕たちの出番だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
ここからは僕たちの出番だ。

engChrName: Yeah, I think this should be enough data to narrow down the triggers for making Mare appear.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I think this should be enough data to narrow
down the triggers for making Mare appear.
jpnChrName: ──うん、これで《メア》出現の 再現式は何とか割り出せそうかな。
jpnSearchText:
──うん、これで《メア》出現の
再現式は何とか割り出せそうかな。

engChrName: If you'll give me a hand, I should be able to have the job done by tonight, even.
engSearchText:
If you'll give me a hand, I should be able to have the
job done by tonight, even.
jpnChrName: リゼットさんが手伝ってくれたら 今夜中には終わるんじゃないかな？
jpnSearchText:
リゼットさんが手伝ってくれたら
今夜中には終わるんじゃないかな？

engChrName: I would be delighted to. I have a wireless network set up already, so that should help.
engSearchText:
I would be delighted to. I have a wireless network set
up already, so that should help.
jpnChrName: ええ、お任せください。 無線ＬＡＮも構築していますし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、お任せください。
無線ＬＡＮも構築していますし。

engChrName: You've been gettin' yourselves all set up here while I wasn't looking, huh?
engSearchText:
You've been gettin' yourselves all set up here while I
wasn't looking, huh?
jpnChrName: ったく、俺の知らない間に 着々と足場を固めやがって……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、俺の知らない間に
着々と足場を固めやがって……

engChrName: Heehee. I think that's a good thing. We can't rely on Renne for every little thing, after all.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I think that's a good thing. We can't rely on
Renne for every little thing, after all.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、有り難いじゃないですか。 毎回レン先輩には頼れませんし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、有り難いじゃないですか。
毎回レン先輩には頼れませんし。

engChrName: Just don't expect me to work as fast as she does. I don't think I have that in me.
engSearchText:
Just don't expect me to work as fast as she does.
I don't think I have that in me.
jpnChrName: いや……流石に彼女ほどの スピードを求められても困るけど。
jpnSearchText:
いや……流石に彼女ほどの
スピードを求められても困るけど。

engChrName: The infamous Kitty is extraordinarily capable as a hacker. No ordinary operator could hope to compare.
engSearchText:
The infamous Kitty is extraordinarily capable as
a hacker. No ordinary operator could hope
to compare.
jpnChrName: 不世出の天才ハッカー《キティ》…… オペレーターとは次元が違いますね。
jpnSearchText:
不世出の天才ハッカー《キティ》……
オペレーターとは次元が違いますね。

engChrName: All of you might as well be using some kind of magic to me...
engSearchText:
All of you might as well be using some kind of magic
to me...
jpnChrName: ……わたしにしてみれば みんな魔法使いみたいに見えます。
jpnSearchText:
……わたしにしてみれば
みんな魔法使いみたいに見えます。

engChrName: As long as they're willing to do all that work, I'm not even gonna think about it. Just leave the tech to the pros.
engSearchText:
As long as they're willing to do all that work, I'm not
even gonna think about it. Just leave the tech to
the pros.
jpnChrName: ま、餅は餅屋に任せるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、餅は餅屋に任せるぜ。

engChrName: So, do you think you'll be able to turn into the Grendel without putting yourself in mortal danger?
engSearchText:
So, do you think you'll be able to turn into the
Grendel without putting yourself in mortal danger?
jpnChrName: ──それで結局、ピンチ以外でも てめぇが《グレンデル》になれるってか？
jpnSearchText:
──それで結局、ピンチ以外でも
てめぇが《グレンデル》になれるってか？

engChrName: In theory, it should be possible.
engSearchText: In theory, it should be possible.
jpnChrName: ああ──理論上は行けんだろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──理論上は行けんだろ。

engChrName: It looks like Agnès being in the vicinity with at least one Genesis is a mandatory condition, though.
engSearchText:
It looks like Agnès being in the vicinity with at least
one Genesis is a mandatory condition, though.
jpnChrName: 《ゲネシス》を持ったアニエスさんが 近くにいるのが条件にはなるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
《ゲネシス》を持ったアニエスさんが
近くにいるのが条件にはなるけどね。

engChrName: So far, you've constantly been putting yourself in serious danger just to transform and help us win...
engSearchText:
So far, you've constantly been putting yourself in
serious danger just to transform and help us win...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさんは私たちのために 危険な目に遭ってばかりでしたから……
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンさんは私たちのために
危険な目に遭ってばかりでしたから……

engChrName: ...so I sincerely hope there's some way for you to transform without having to resort to that.
engSearchText:
...so I sincerely hope there's some way for you to
transform without having to resort to that.
jpnChrName: 危ない状況を前提にしないで あの状態になれるのは良いと思います。
jpnSearchText:
危ない状況を前提にしないで
あの状態になれるのは良いと思います。

engChrName: And we should be conscious of what Mare said about not relying on the Grendel too much.
engSearchText:
And we should be conscious of what Mare said about
not relying on the Grendel too much.
jpnChrName: ──ですがメアちゃんも言ったように あまり多用はしないでください。
jpnSearchText:
──ですがメアちゃんも言ったように
あまり多用はしないでください。

engChrName: We'll all do what we can to support you so that you don't have to. I won't let you always shoulder most of the burden yourself.
engSearchText:
We'll all do what we can to support you so that you
don't have to. I won't let you always shoulder most of
the burden yourself.
jpnChrName: 私たちも……私も頑張りますから。 ヴァンさんが無理しなくて済むように。
jpnSearchText:
私たちも……私も頑張りますから。
ヴァンさんが無理しなくて済むように。

engChrName: I won't, either! I'm going to keep getting stronger so I can help more!
engSearchText:
I won't, either! I'm going to keep getting stronger so I
can help more!
jpnChrName: もちろんわたしもですっ……！ もっともっと、精進しますので！
jpnSearchText:
もちろんわたしもですっ……！
もっともっと、精進しますので！

engChrName: I don't actually care how much danger you have to put yourself in, but I'm not down to have you always steal our thunder.
engSearchText:
I don't actually care how much danger you have to
put yourself in, but I'm not down to have you always
steal our thunder.
jpnChrName: ま、てめぇのピンチは知らねえが 見せ場の横取りはムカつくからなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、てめぇのピンチは知らねえが
見せ場の横取りはムカつくからなァ。

engChrName: As the concierge assigned to support you, I have been opposed to you exposing yourself to unnecessary risk from the start.
engSearchText:
As the concierge assigned to support you, I have been
opposed to you exposing yourself to unnecessary risk
from the start.
jpnChrName: 元より担当ＳＣとしても 過度のリスクはお勧めできません。
jpnSearchText:
元より担当ＳＣとしても
過度のリスクはお勧めできません。

engChrName: Listen here...
engSearchText: Listen here...
jpnChrName: いや、あのな……
jpnSearchText: いや、あのな……

engChrName: I'm inclined to agree.
engSearchText: I'm inclined to agree.
jpnChrName: ま、状況を見るに僕も同感かな。
jpnSearchText: ま、状況を見るに僕も同感かな。

engChrName: After what Mare said, I think this is something you should absolutely only use against the strongest of opponents.
engSearchText:
After what Mare said, I think this is something you
should absolutely only use against the strongest
of opponents.
jpnChrName: その意味で、一定以上の相手にのみ 解禁するって決めておくべきかもね。
jpnSearchText:
その意味で、一定以上の相手にのみ
解禁するって決めておくべきかもね。

engChrName: *sigh* Fine.
engSearchText: *sigh* Fine.
jpnChrName: はあ、わーったっての。
jpnSearchText: はあ、わーったっての。

engChrName: (The more people who come work for me, the less I feel like I'm the one in charge...)
engSearchText:
(The more people who come work for me, the less I
feel like I'm the one in charge...)
jpnChrName: （なんつうか小姑が倍々で   増えて行ってる感じだぜ……）
jpnSearchText:
（なんつうか小姑が倍々で
増えて行ってる感じだぜ……）

engChrName: Do you have something else you want to say?
engSearchText: Do you have something else you want to say?
jpnChrName: なにか言いました？
jpnSearchText: なにか言いました？

engChrName: Nope. Not at all.
engSearchText: Nope. Not at all.
jpnChrName: いえ、何でもないです。
jpnSearchText: いえ、何でもないです。

engChrName: Man, someone's whipped.
engSearchText: Man, someone's whipped.
jpnChrName: クク、見事な ケツの敷かれっぷりだな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、見事な
ケツの敷かれっぷりだな。

engChrName: Ahaha... Oh, by the way!
engSearchText: Ahaha... Oh, by the way!
jpnChrName: あはは……あ、そういえば。
jpnSearchText: あはは……あ、そういえば。

engChrName: We still don't have any idea why we couldn't understand some of what Mare was saying, right?
engSearchText:
We still don't have any idea why we couldn't
understand some of what Mare was saying, right?
jpnChrName: あのときメアちゃんの言葉が 分からなかったのは何なんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
あのときメアちゃんの言葉が
分からなかったのは何なんでしょう？

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Almost forgot about that.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. Almost forgot about that.
jpnChrName: ああ──それもあったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ──それもあったな。

engChrName: I'm being gracious enough to lend you a helping hand as a ㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍ under the influence of the ㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍!
engSearchText:
I'm being gracious enough to lend you a helping
hand as a ㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍ under the influence of
the ㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍!
jpnChrName: ㌍㌫㍊㍍の影響を受けた㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍として、 わざわざ力を貸してあげてるだけよ。
jpnSearchText:
㌍㌫㍊㍍の影響を受けた㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍として、
わざわざ力を貸してあげてるだけよ。

engChrName: Just be careful. Using it too much will cause ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍊㌫㍍.
engSearchText:
Just be careful. Using it too much will
cause ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍊㌫㍍.
jpnChrName: ──言っておくけど過度な使用は ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍊㌫㍍になるから。
jpnSearchText:
──言っておくけど過度な使用は
㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍊㌫㍍になるから。

engChrName: We heard what she was saying—it was more like our brains couldn't process it or something.
engSearchText:
We heard what she was saying—it was more like our
brains couldn't process it or something.
jpnChrName: ……僕たち全員が聞いたはずなのに “認識”できない感じだったね。
jpnSearchText:
……僕たち全員が聞いたはずなのに
“認識”できない感じだったね。

engChrName: That's how I would put it. It was almost as if we were listening to an audio recording, and part of it was replaced by noise.
engSearchText:
That's how I would put it. It was almost as if we were
listening to an audio recording, and part of it was
replaced by noise.
jpnChrName: ええ、録音にもノイズとしてのみ 記録されているようですし……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、録音にもノイズとしてのみ
記録されているようですし……

engChrName: Yeah. Kinda creepy, if we're being real here.
engSearchText: Yeah. Kinda creepy, if we're being real here.
jpnChrName: ハン……薄気味悪いっつーか、 座りが悪い感じだったな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……薄気味悪いっつーか、
座りが悪い感じだったな。

engChrName: It was like we came dangerously close to one of this world's many secrets...
engSearchText:
It was like we came dangerously close to one of this
world's many secrets...
jpnChrName: はい、まるで世界の“秘密”に 触れでもしたかのような……
jpnSearchText:
はい、まるで世界の“秘密”に
触れでもしたかのような……

engChrName: ...I-I'm sorry! Just forget I said something so silly. I've clearly read one too many books.
engSearchText:
...I-I'm sorry! Just forget I said something so silly.
I've clearly read one too many books.
jpnChrName: わ、忘れてください……！ 小説とかお伽話みたいですよね。
jpnSearchText:
わ、忘れてください……！
小説とかお伽話みたいですよね。

engChrName: I don't think it was silly at all. If anything, it sounds right.
engSearchText:
I don't think it was silly at all. If anything, it
sounds right.
jpnChrName: ううん、何だかちょっと 頷けるような気がしますっ。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、何だかちょっと
頷けるような気がしますっ。

engChrName: I think it's a possibility we ought to keep in mind.
engSearchText: I think it's a possibility we ought to keep in mind.
jpnChrName: ……何らかの手がかりに なる可能性もありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……何らかの手がかりに
なる可能性もありそうですね。

engChrName: Yeah, for sure.
engSearchText: Yeah, for sure.
jpnChrName: ああ、気に掛けておくか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、気に掛けておくか。

engChrName: ...Hmm? Maybe a client?
engSearchText: ...Hmm? Maybe a client?
jpnChrName: ん……また依頼か？
jpnSearchText: ん……また依頼か？

engChrName: Oh, I got through! Whew—I was worried I didn't have the right number.
engSearchText:
Oh, I got through! Whew—I was worried I didn't
have the right number.
jpnChrName: ──あ、繋がった！ よかった、間違ってなかったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
──あ、繋がった！
よかった、間違ってなかったみたいね。

engChrName: That sounds like...
engSearchText: That sounds like...
jpnChrName: この声は……
jpnSearchText: この声は……

engChrName: Ashen?
engSearchText: Ashen?
jpnChrName: ひょっとして──アシェンかよ？
jpnSearchText: ひょっとして──アシェンかよ？

engChrName: Wanshang hao! Good evening, guys!
engSearchText: Wanshang hao! Good evening, guys!
jpnChrName: 晩上好（ワンシャンハオ／こんばんは）、 ヴァンさんにアーロン。
jpnSearchText:
晩上好（ワンシャンハオ／こんばんは）、
ヴァンさんにアーロン。

engChrName: It feels like I haven't talked to you in ages.
engSearchText: It feels like I haven't talked to you in ages.
jpnChrName: アニエスとフェリも久しぶりね～。
jpnSearchText: アニエスとフェリも久しぶりね～。

engChrName: It's good to see you again, Ashen!
engSearchText: It's good to see you again, Ashen!
jpnChrName: アシェンさん……お久しぶりです！
jpnSearchText: アシェンさん……お久しぶりです！

engChrName: It really is. What are you calling about?
engSearchText: It really is. What are you calling about?
jpnChrName: はいっ、でもどうして ヴァンさんのザイファに？
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、でもどうして
ヴァンさんのザイファに？

engChrName: Decided to give up on Cao and go after this old fart instead?
engSearchText:
Decided to give up on Cao and go after this old
fart instead?
jpnChrName: なんだ、ツァオは諦めて このジジイに乗り換えんのかァ？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、ツァオは諦めて
このジジイに乗り換えんのかァ？

engChrName: O-Of course not! You shut up, Aaron!
engSearchText: O-Of course not! You shut up, Aaron!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなわけないじゃない！ アーロンは黙ってなさい！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなわけないじゃない！
アーロンは黙ってなさい！

engChrName: I hope he hasn't been raising too much of a ruckus over in Edith, by the way. Especially when it comes to women.
engSearchText:
I hope he hasn't been raising too much of a ruckus
over in Edith, by the way. Especially when it comes
to women.
jpnChrName: そういえばコイツ、首都で悪さしてない？ 特に女の子絡みとかで。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばコイツ、首都で悪さしてない？
特に女の子絡みとかで。

engChrName: Umm... About that...
engSearchText: Umm... About that...
jpnChrName: えっと、それは……
jpnSearchText: えっと、それは……

engChrName: He does come home smelling like perfume sometimes.
engSearchText:
He does come home smelling like
perfume sometimes.
jpnChrName: ……たまに白粉（おしろい）の匂いを させてる時があるような。
jpnSearchText:
……たまに白粉（おしろい）の匂いを
させてる時があるような。

engChrName: What can I say? I like getting to know people.
engSearchText: What can I say? I like getting to know people.
jpnChrName: ただのスキンシップだろ。
jpnSearchText: ただのスキンシップだろ。

engChrName: Can we be serious for five minutes around here?! Also, I'm five years younger than Cao, I'll have you know!
engSearchText:
Can we be serious for five minutes around here?!
Also, I'm five years younger than Cao, I'll have
you know!
jpnChrName: だぁ、姦（かしま）しいんだっつーの！ あと俺はツァオより５歳は若いからな！？
jpnSearchText:
だぁ、姦（かしま）しいんだっつーの！
あと俺はツァオより５歳は若いからな！？

engChrName: I can't believe you know that off the top of your head... Also, sorry to ask, but I don't think we've met before.
engSearchText:
I can't believe you know that off the top of
your head... Also, sorry to ask, but I don't think we've
met before.
jpnChrName: 割と気にしてるんだ。 えっと、それよりその人って……
jpnSearchText:
割と気にしてるんだ。
えっと、それよりその人って……

engChrName: I assume she is connected to Heiyue in some manner?
engSearchText: I assume she is connected to Heiyue in some manner?
jpnChrName: 《黒月》に連なる方のようですね。
jpnSearchText: 《黒月》に連なる方のようですね。

engChrName: Oh, Aaron did mention that you have some new part-timers.
engSearchText:
Oh, Aaron did mention that you have some
new part-timers.
jpnChrName: あ、アーロンに聞いてたけど 新しい人たちが入ったんだっけ？
jpnSearchText:
あ、アーロンに聞いてたけど
新しい人たちが入ったんだっけ？

engChrName: I'm Ashen Lu. I am indeed part of one of the families of Heiyue.
engSearchText:
I'm Ashen Lu. I am indeed part of one of the families
of Heiyue.
jpnChrName: あたしはアシェン・ルウ。 お察しの通り《黒月》関連の家人よ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしはアシェン・ルウ。
お察しの通り《黒月》関連の家人よ。

engChrName: Wait—your new part-timers are a maid and a pretty boy? Arkride Solutions never settles for average, does it?
engSearchText:
Wait—your new part-timers are a maid and a
pretty boy? Arkride Solutions never settles for
average, does it?
jpnChrName: ──ってメイドさんに美少年！？ なんか更に面子が濃くなってない！？
jpnSearchText:
──ってメイドさんに美少年！？
なんか更に面子が濃くなってない！？

engChrName: Our cast is a colorful one, yeah... So, what's this about?
engSearchText:
Our cast is a colorful one, yeah... So, what's
this about?
jpnChrName: 否定はしねえぜ…… で、用事はなんだ、お嬢さん。
jpnSearchText:
否定はしねえぜ……
で、用事はなんだ、お嬢さん。

engChrName: Is Cao causing trouble again?
engSearchText: Is Cao causing trouble again?
jpnChrName: またツァオがやらかしたのか？
jpnSearchText: またツァオがやらかしたのか？

engChrName: I wouldn't say that. He's as busy as always.
engSearchText: I wouldn't say that. He's as busy as always.
jpnChrName: うーん、そっちは 相変わらず忙しいみたいでね～。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、そっちは
相変わらず忙しいみたいでね～。

engChrName: And actually, I didn't just call you on behalf of Heiyue today. This message is from several others, too.
engSearchText:
And actually, I didn't just call you on behalf of
Heiyue today. This message is from several
others, too.
jpnChrName: ──じゃなくて、今日は黒月（ウチ）もだけど 幾つかの筋を代表して連絡したのよ。
jpnSearchText:
──じゃなくて、今日は黒月（ウチ）もだけど
幾つかの筋を代表して連絡したのよ。

engChrName: Really, now?
engSearchText: Really, now?
jpnChrName: 幾つかの筋……？
jpnSearchText: 幾つかの筋……？

engChrName: What message?
engSearchText: What message?
jpnChrName: ああん、どういうことだ？
jpnSearchText: ああん、どういうことだ？

engChrName: Well, Bàbà had the chance to talk to a few other important people with different affiliations the other day.
engSearchText:
Well, Bàbà had the chance to talk to a few other
important people with different affiliations the
other day.
jpnChrName: 先日、爸爸（パパ）が各方面の お偉いさんと話す機会があってね。
jpnSearchText:
先日、爸爸（パパ）が各方面の
お偉いさんと話す機会があってね。

engChrName: And apparently, the topic ended up shifting to you guys, and they agreed to do a little something special for you.
engSearchText:
And apparently, the topic ended up shifting to you
guys, and they agreed to do a little something
special for you.
jpnChrName: そこで偶然、貴方たちの話で盛り上がって “あること”を一緒に決めたらしいのよ。
jpnSearchText:
そこで偶然、貴方たちの話で盛り上がって
“あること”を一緒に決めたらしいのよ。

engChrName: You know, for all you've done for the people of Langport, Tharbad, and Basel.
engSearchText:
You know, for all you've done for the people of
Langport, Tharbad, and Basel.
jpnChrName: ラングポート、サルバッド、バーゼルで 尽力してくれたアークライド解決事務所──
jpnSearchText:
ラングポート、サルバッド、バーゼルで
尽力してくれたアークライド解決事務所──

engChrName: Consider it a special thank-you gift from everyone.
engSearchText: Consider it a special thank-you gift from everyone.
jpnChrName: そのメンバー全員に、依頼料とは別に 改めて“ささやかなお礼”をしようって。
jpnSearchText:
そのメンバー全員に、依頼料とは別に
改めて“ささやかなお礼”をしようって。

engChrName: Hang on a minute...
engSearchText: Hang on a minute...
jpnChrName: おいおい、そいつは──
jpnSearchText: おいおい、そいつは──

engChrName: The important people you're talking about wouldn't happen to be...?
engSearchText:
The important people you're talking about wouldn't
happen to be...?
jpnChrName: 各方面というのはもしかして……？
jpnSearchText: 各方面というのはもしかして……？

engChrName: Mm-hmm. I'm calling on behalf of Elsaim's Crown Prince Sherid, the Basel Institute of Science's Professor Hamilton...
engSearchText:
Mm-hmm. I'm calling on behalf of Elsaim's Crown
Prince Sherid, the Basel Institute of Science's
Professor Hamilton...
jpnChrName: ええ、エルザイムのシェリド公太子殿下に バーゼル理科大学のハミルトン博士──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、エルザイムのシェリド公太子殿下に
バーゼル理科大学のハミルトン博士──

engChrName: ...the Kowloon Group's Fan Lu, and one other individual—whose name I will not disclose—to extend you an invitation.
engSearchText:
...the Kowloon Group's Fan Lu, and one other
individual—whose name I will not disclose—to extend
you an invitation.
jpnChrName: そして九龍グループのファン・ルウと、 “ある人”の共同招待という形になるわね。
jpnSearchText:
そして九龍グループのファン・ルウと、
“ある人”の共同招待という形になるわね。

engChrName: They all want you to spend two nights at the five-star Hekizanro Inn in the eastward hot springs paradise of Longlai.
engSearchText:
They all want you to spend two nights at the five-star
Hekizanro Inn in the eastward hot springs paradise
of Longlai.
jpnChrName: ──東の温泉郷《龍來（ロンライ）》で 五つ星旅館として名高い《碧山楼（へきざんろう）》……
jpnSearchText:
──東の温泉郷《龍來（ロンライ）》で
五つ星旅館として名高い《碧山楼（へきざんろう）》……

engChrName: Your tickets should arrive shortly! ❤
engSearchText: Your tickets should arrive shortly! ❤
jpnChrName: その二泊三日の宿泊チケットを 貴方たち全員に送らせてもらうわ❤
jpnSearchText:
その二泊三日の宿泊チケットを
貴方たち全員に送らせてもらうわ❤

engChrName: Evening! Special delivery!
engSearchText: Evening! Special delivery!
jpnChrName: ちわ～、特急便でーす。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ちわ～、特急便でーす。

engChrName: November 9th, 8:05PM
engSearchText: November 9th, 8:05PM

engChrName: ...There's no way there isn't more to this than it seems.
engSearchText:
...There's no way there isn't more to this than
it seems.
jpnChrName: ……ったく。 どう考えても何かあんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく。
どう考えても何かあんだろ。

engChrName: But it's true we've been real busy lately. Would be a good chance to get some R&R...
engSearchText:
But it's true we've been real busy lately. Would be a
good chance to get some R&R...
jpnChrName: まあ忙しかったのは確かだし、 良い機会っちゃ良い機会だが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ忙しかったのは確かだし、
良い機会っちゃ良い機会だが……

engChrName: Man... Longlai sure brings back some memories.
engSearchText: Man... Longlai sure brings back some memories.
jpnChrName: だが、龍來（ロンライ）か…… ちょいと懐かしいのは確かだな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、龍來（ロンライ）か……
ちょいと懐かしいのは確かだな。

engChrName: Your mindset is very different from that of others.
engSearchText: Your mindset is very different from that of others.
jpnChrName: ──おぬしはどうも “芯の置き所”が人と違うようだ。
jpnSearchText:
──おぬしはどうも
“芯の置き所”が人と違うようだ。

engChrName: It has long convinced you that there is no place for you in this world.
engSearchText:
It has long convinced you that there is no place for
you in this world.
jpnChrName: まるで世に己（おの）が居場所は無いと 最初から諦めているような……
jpnSearchText:
まるで世に己（おの）が居場所は無いと
最初から諦めているような……

engChrName: And that is, from my perspective, proof positive that you still have so much to learn.
engSearchText:
And that is, from my perspective, proof positive that
you still have so much to learn.
jpnChrName: だが──私に言わせればまだ青い。
jpnSearchText: だが──私に言わせればまだ青い。

engChrName: For everything in this world is connected. I'm sure you will one day come to that realization yourself with enough firsthand experience.
engSearchText:
For everything in this world is connected. I'm sure
you will one day come to that realization yourself with
enough firsthand experience.
jpnChrName: 天地人が繋がっていること、 まずは身をもって実感するがよかろう。
jpnSearchText:
天地人が繋がっていること、
まずは身をもって実感するがよかろう。

engChrName: (He always tried to pretend he was normal, but he was anything but.)
engSearchText:
(He always tried to pretend he was normal, but he
was anything but.)
jpnChrName: （……常識人のフリして   無茶苦茶な爺さんだったよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……常識人のフリして
無茶苦茶な爺さんだったよな。）

engChrName: (Wish I'd been able to avenge him, but that chance is long gone now.)
engSearchText:
(Wish I'd been able to avenge him, but that chance is
long gone now.)
jpnChrName: （結局、仇も取れずじまいだったが。）
jpnSearchText: （結局、仇も取れずじまいだったが。）

engChrName: (Still, I suppose Longlai wouldn't be a bad place to visit to pay my respects since I can't get over to his grave.)
engSearchText:
(Still, I suppose Longlai wouldn't be a bad place to
visit to pay my respects since I can't get over to
his grave.)
jpnChrName: （ま、墓参り代わりに   行ってみるのも悪くはねぇか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、墓参り代わりに
行ってみるのも悪くはねぇか。）

engChrName: (My crew could use a break about now, too.)
engSearchText: (My crew could use a break about now, too.)
jpnChrName: （不本意だが──   助手どもへの慰安も兼ねてな。）
jpnSearchText:
（不本意だが──
助手どもへの慰安も兼ねてな。）

engChrName: Anyway, I guess I'll go wander around for a while before turnin' in.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I guess I'll go wander around for a while
before turnin' in.
jpnChrName: ……そうと決まりゃあ 今夜も適当に回ってみるかね。
jpnSearchText:
……そうと決まりゃあ
今夜も適当に回ってみるかね。

engChrName: We're gonna be away for three days, so I wanna make sure everything's in order before we head out.
engSearchText:
We're gonna be away for three days, so I wanna make
sure everything's in order before we head out.
jpnChrName: 二泊三日の龍來旅行── 留守前のスス払いってな。
jpnSearchText:
二泊三日の龍來旅行──
留守前のスス払いってな。

engChrName: November 14th, 1208, 6:30AM
engSearchText: November 14th, 1208, 6:30AM

engChrName: Okay! I'm gonna head out now!
engSearchText: Okay! I'm gonna head out now!
jpnChrName: それじゃあママ、おじいちゃん、 行ってくるねー！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあママ、おじいちゃん、
行ってくるねー！

engChrName: We'll be right here when you get back. Be careful, now!
engSearchText:
We'll be right here when you get back. Be
careful, now!
jpnChrName: おお……！ 気をつけて行ってくるんだぞおっ！
jpnSearchText:
おお……！
気をつけて行ってくるんだぞおっ！

engChrName: Take good care of her for us. We're counting on you!
engSearchText: Take good care of her for us. We're counting on you!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、お前らも ユメのことを頼んだからなぁっ！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、お前らも
ユメのことを頼んだからなぁっ！

engChrName: I know, I know.
engSearchText: I know, I know.
jpnChrName: へいへい、分かってるっての。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、分かってるっての。

engChrName: She's in safe hands with us!
engSearchText: She's in safe hands with us!
jpnChrName: はいっ、お任せくださいっ。
jpnSearchText: はいっ、お任せくださいっ。

engChrName: Thank you for looking after her. If she starts being selfish or making a fuss, don't be afraid to give her a talking-to.
engSearchText:
Thank you for looking after her. If she starts being
selfish or making a fuss, don't be afraid to give her a
talking-to.
jpnChrName: お言葉に甘えちゃったけど わがまま言ったら遠慮なく叱ってね。
jpnSearchText:
お言葉に甘えちゃったけど
わがまま言ったら遠慮なく叱ってね。

engChrName: We want you to have lots of fun, but we also need you to be a good girl, okay?
engSearchText:
We want you to have lots of fun, but we also need
you to be a good girl, okay?
jpnChrName: ──ユメ、良い子で元気に いっぱい楽しんでいらっしゃい。
jpnSearchText:
──ユメ、良い子で元気に
いっぱい楽しんでいらっしゃい。

engChrName: And don't forget to brush your teeth and use the bathroom before you go to bed.
engSearchText:
And don't forget to brush your teeth and use the
bathroom before you go to bed.
jpnChrName: 歯磨きと寝る前のトイレは ちゃんと忘れないようにね？
jpnSearchText:
歯磨きと寝る前のトイレは
ちゃんと忘れないようにね？

engChrName: I won't!
engSearchText: I won't!
jpnChrName: うんっ、だいじょーぶ！
jpnSearchText: うんっ、だいじょーぶ！

engChrName: Heehee. She's always a good girl. She'll be fine.
engSearchText: Heehee. She's always a good girl. She'll be fine.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、 ユメちゃんなら大丈夫ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、
ユメちゃんなら大丈夫ですよ。

engChrName: We'll be sure to keep a close eye on her at all times.
engSearchText: We'll be sure to keep a close eye on her at all times.
jpnChrName: どうかご安心ください。 ちゃんと見ておきますので。
jpnSearchText:
どうかご安心ください。
ちゃんと見ておきますので。

engChrName: Umm... I'll be there for her, too.
engSearchText: Umm... I'll be there for her, too.
jpnChrName: えっと、僕も微力くらいは。
jpnSearchText: えっと、僕も微力くらいは。

engChrName: Ehh, I can help her pick out souvenirs or something.
engSearchText: Ehh, I can help her pick out souvenirs or something.
jpnChrName: ま、土産物を買うくらいは 付き合ってやるつもりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、土産物を買うくらいは
付き合ってやるつもりだぜ。

engChrName: ...So, what did you want to talk about?
engSearchText: ...So, what did you want to talk about?
jpnChrName: ……で、話ってのは何なんだ？
jpnSearchText: ……で、話ってのは何なんだ？

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...
jpnChrName: うん──
jpnSearchText: うん──

engChrName: This conversation might take a while, so I think I'll go make us some coffee first.
engSearchText:
This conversation might take a while, so I think I'll
go make us some coffee first.
jpnChrName: ちょっと長くなると思うから コーヒーでも淹れるわね。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと長くなると思うから
コーヒーでも淹れるわね。

engChrName: November 16th, 6:52PM
engSearchText: November 16th, 6:52PM

engChrName: Oh, Yumé! Thank Aidios you're back!
engSearchText: Oh, Yumé! Thank Aidios you're back!
jpnChrName: ユメ、戻ってきたのね！
jpnSearchText: ユメ、戻ってきたのね！

engChrName: Huh? What's wrong, Mommy?
engSearchText: Huh? What's wrong, Mommy?
jpnChrName: ふえっ……ママ？
jpnSearchText: ふえっ……ママ？

engChrName: Welcome home, all of you. I'm so relieved to see you're safe.
engSearchText:
Welcome home, all of you. I'm so relieved to see
you're safe.
jpnChrName: みんなもお帰りなさい。 よく戻ってきてくれたわね……
jpnSearchText:
みんなもお帰りなさい。
よく戻ってきてくれたわね……

engChrName: I-Is everything all right...?
engSearchText: I-Is everything all right...?
jpnChrName: ポ、ポーレットさん……？
jpnSearchText: ポ、ポーレットさん……？

engChrName: Come on, now. This isn't like you.
engSearchText: Come on, now. This isn't like you.
jpnChrName: おいおい、 アンタらしくもねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、
アンタらしくもねぇな。

engChrName: Wh-What happened? Why does everyone look so serious?
engSearchText:
Wh-What happened? Why does everyone look
so serious?
jpnChrName: ど、どうしたんですか？ お店の方といい……
jpnSearchText:
ど、どうしたんですか？
お店の方といい……

engChrName: An orbal radio? Oh, wait...
engSearchText: An orbal radio? Oh, wait...
jpnChrName: 導力ラジオ……？ ……もしかして……
jpnSearchText:
導力ラジオ……？
……もしかして……

engChrName: Is everyone gathered for the announcement mentioned earlier?
engSearchText:
Is everyone gathered for the announcement
mentioned earlier?
jpnChrName: 皆さんで先ほど 告知された発表を……？
jpnSearchText:
皆さんで先ほど
告知された発表を……？

engChrName: Guess so... (Then the official announcement must be comin' from...)
engSearchText:
Guess so...
(Then the official announcement must be
comin' from...)
jpnChrName: ……みたいだな。 （すると公式ってのは……）
jpnSearchText:
……みたいだな。
（すると公式ってのは……）

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァン、さん………
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァン、さん………

engChrName: M-Marielle...?
engSearchText: M-Marielle...?
jpnChrName: マ、マリエルさん？
jpnSearchText: マ、マリエルさん？

engChrName: Oh, it's you. Wait—what's wrong?
engSearchText: Oh, it's you. Wait—what's wrong?
jpnChrName: お前さんか──ってどうした？
jpnSearchText: お前さんか──ってどうした？

engChrName: Dingo's... Dingo, he's...
engSearchText: Dingo's... Dingo, he's...
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんが…… ………ディンゴさんが………
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんが……
………ディンゴさんが………

engChrName: What about him? I did get a message from him earlier...
engSearchText:
What about him? I did get a message from
him earlier...
jpnChrName: ディンゴのヤツがどうした？ ──そういや、さっきメールが……
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴのヤツがどうした？
──そういや、さっきメールが……

engChrName: It's about to start!
engSearchText: It's about to start!
jpnChrName: おっ、始まるぞ！
jpnSearchText: おっ、始まるぞ！

engChrName: Th-Those rumors can't be true, right? That...eil...ed...
engSearchText: Th-Those rumors can't be true, right? That...eil...ed...
jpnChrName: ホ、ホントなのか……？ ……イユ村が……たって……
jpnSearchText:
ホ、ホントなのか……？
……イユ村が……たって……

engChrName: Just shut up and listen!
engSearchText: Just shut up and listen!
jpnChrName: ええい、黙って聞きやがれ！
jpnSearchText: ええい、黙って聞きやがれ！

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnSearchText: え……？

engChrName: Here it comes.
engSearchText: Here it comes.
jpnChrName: ……始まるみたいね。
jpnSearchText: ……始まるみたいね。

engChrName: Good evening. Today's 7PM news will begin with an emergency announcement.
engSearchText:
Good evening. Today's 7PM news will begin with an
emergency announcement.
jpnChrName: ──７時のニュースの時間ですが、 本日は臨時放送とさせていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
──７時のニュースの時間ですが、
本日は臨時放送とさせていただきます。

engChrName: This announcement is being brought to you by none other than the Presidential Office. We ask that you listen closely.
engSearchText:
This announcement is being brought to you by none
other than the Presidential Office. We ask that you
listen closely.
jpnChrName: これより大統領府より、告知されていた 公式発表がありますのでお聞きください。
jpnSearchText:
これより大統領府より、告知されていた
公式発表がありますのでお聞きください。

engChrName: I bring you this emergency announcement from the Presidential Office in Edith's Vantail District.
engSearchText:
I bring you this emergency announcement from the
Presidential Office in Edith's Vantail District.
jpnChrName: 首都ヴァンタイユ地区、大統領府より 緊急の公式発表をお伝えさせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
首都ヴァンタイユ地区、大統領府より
緊急の公式発表をお伝えさせて頂きます。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: Isn't that...?
engSearchText: Isn't that...?
jpnChrName: この声は……確か。
jpnSearchText: この声は……確か。

engChrName: Hold up a sec... Isn't that the spec's voice?
engSearchText: Hold up a sec... Isn't that the spec's voice?
jpnChrName: オイオイ…… 鬼畜メガネじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ……
鬼畜メガネじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Yeah...
engSearchText: Yeah...
jpnChrName: ああ………
jpnSearchText: ああ………

engChrName: As President Gramheart is engaged with time-sensitive matters, I, Kincaid, will be speaking on his behalf as his provisional aide.
engSearchText:
As President Gramheart is engaged with
time-sensitive matters, I, Kincaid, will be speaking on
his behalf as his provisional aide.
jpnChrName: 現在、グラムハート大統領極めて多忙につき、 臨時補佐官キンケイドが代理として発表します。
jpnSearchText:
現在、グラムハート大統領極めて多忙につき、
臨時補佐官キンケイドが代理として発表します。

engChrName: This is an announcement that deeply pains me to make—and one that will be equally painful to hear.
engSearchText:
This is an announcement that deeply pains me to
make—and one that will be equally painful to hear.
jpnChrName: ──これから国民の皆さんに 痛ましい一報をお伝えしなくてはなりません。
jpnSearchText:
──これから国民の皆さんに
痛ましい一報をお伝えしなくてはなりません。

engChrName: Dingo went... He went to Creil yesterday.
engSearchText: Dingo went... He went to Creil yesterday.
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん…… 昨日、クレイユ村に行ってたんです。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん……
昨日、クレイユ村に行ってたんです。

engChrName: He'd found a new lead, you see—one that said the mafia was going to do something awful.
engSearchText:
He'd found a new lead, you see—one that said the
mafia was going to do something awful.
jpnChrName: 例のマフィアの動きを掴んで…… とんでもない事をしようとしてるって……
jpnSearchText:
例のマフィアの動きを掴んで……
とんでもない事をしようとしてるって……

engChrName: Before dawn today, in the Vichy County in northwest Calvard...
engSearchText:
Before dawn today, in the Vichy County in
northwest Calvard...
jpnChrName: ──本日未明、カルバード北西ヴィシー郡、 クレイユ村にて……
jpnSearchText:
──本日未明、カルバード北西ヴィシー郡、
クレイユ村にて……

engChrName: ...the village of Creil was engulfed in a monumental explosion from an unknown weapon.
engSearchText:
...the village of Creil was engulfed in a monumental
explosion from an unknown weapon.
jpnChrName: 未知の兵器によるものと思われる 凄まじい規模の爆発が発生しました。
jpnSearchText:
未知の兵器によるものと思われる
凄まじい規模の爆発が発生しました。

engChrName: Huh...?
engSearchText: Huh...?
jpnSearchText: え───

engChrName: That can't mean...
engSearchText: That can't mean...
jpnChrName: ……それって………
jpnSearchText: ……それって………

engChrName: I... I wanted to go and see what he was doing...
engSearchText: I... I wanted to go and see what he was doing...
jpnChrName: わたし……現場に確認しに 行こうとしたんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
わたし……現場に確認しに
行こうとしたんですけど……

engChrName: ...but the whole area was blocked to traffic...and my editors wouldn't let me go, either!
engSearchText:
...but the whole area was blocked to traffic...and my
editors wouldn't let me go, either!
jpnChrName: そっち方面が完全に交通規制されてて、 編集部からも止められちゃって……！
jpnSearchText:
そっち方面が完全に交通規制されてて、
編集部からも止められちゃって……！

engChrName: The village and its surroundings were completely annihilated. There are believed to be no survivors.
engSearchText:
The village and its surroundings were
completely annihilated. There are believed to be
no survivors.
jpnChrName: 爆発により同村周辺は壊滅── 住民の生存も、絶望的とのことです。
jpnSearchText:
爆発により同村周辺は壊滅──
住民の生存も、絶望的とのことです。
………ぁ…………

engChrName: Oh, no...
engSearchText: Oh, no...
jpnSearchText: ……う……そ………

engChrName: Van, what—just what am I supposed to do?!
engSearchText: Van, what—just what am I supposed to do?!
jpnChrName: ねえヴァンさん──わたし、 どうしたらいいんですかああっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ねえヴァンさん──わたし、
どうしたらいいんですかああっ！？

engChrName: In light of the circumstances, a presidential executive order has been issued...
engSearchText:
In light of the circumstances, a presidential executive
order has been issued...
jpnChrName: なお本日１９時をもって大統領令が発動──
jpnSearchText: なお本日１９時をもって大統領令が発動──

engChrName: ...declaring a state of emergency across the entirety of the Republic of Calvard.
engSearchText:
...declaring a state of emergency across the entirety of
the Republic of Calvard.
jpnChrName: カルバード共和国全土に 国家非常事態宣言が発令されました。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード共和国全土に
国家非常事態宣言が発令されました。

engChrName: We ask that all of you cooperate with local and national authorities and remain calm.
engSearchText:
We ask that all of you cooperate with local and
national authorities and remain calm.
jpnChrName: 国民の皆さんは当局と各自治体の指示に従い、 どうか冷静に行動されますよう──
jpnSearchText:
国民の皆さんは当局と各自治体の指示に従い、
どうか冷静に行動されますよう──

engChrName: Main 4SPG [Finding Memories] completed! Received
engSearchText:
Main 4SPG [Finding Memories] completed!
Received
jpnChrName: メイン４ｓｐｇ【“想い出”の行方】の 報酬として
jpnSearchText:
メイン４ｓｐｇ【“想い出”の行方】の
報酬として

engChrName: November 19th, 1208, 1:03PM
engSearchText: November 19th, 1208, 1:03PM

engChrName: I can't believe it. They managed to forcibly detonate the weapon...
engSearchText:
I can't believe it. They managed to forcibly detonate
the weapon...
jpnChrName: 馬鹿な…… ……あんなやり方で………
jpnSearchText:
馬鹿な……
……あんなやり方で………

engChrName: This can't be happening...
engSearchText: This can't be happening...
jpnSearchText: ………どう………して………

engChrName: I see now just how capable he was.
engSearchText: I see now just how capable he was.
jpnChrName: 優秀な方だったのですね……
jpnSearchText: 優秀な方だったのですね……

engChrName: He uploaded the footage to the orbal network cloud by combining his camera and Xipha to distribute it across rural wireless networks.
engSearchText:
He uploaded the footage to the orbal network cloud
by combining his camera and Xipha to distribute it
across rural wireless networks.
jpnChrName: 最新式の導力カメラとザイファを連動、 地方の無線回線網を通じて分散する形で──
jpnSearchText:
最新式の導力カメラとザイファを連動、
地方の無線回線網を通じて分散する形で──

engChrName: Had he not done so, the footage would have surely been lost.
engSearchText:
Had he not done so, the footage would have surely
been lost.
jpnChrName: 導力ネット上のクラウドにアップされたようです。
jpnSearchText: 導力ネット上のクラウドにアップされたようです。

engChrName: He was one of the most irritatingly charming guys I've ever met. He was charismatic as all hell.
engSearchText:
He was one of the most irritatingly charming guys
I've ever met. He was charismatic as all hell.
jpnChrName: ……ムカつくほどのイケメンだったからな、 昔から、色んな意味で。
jpnSearchText:
……ムカつくほどのイケメンだったからな、
昔から、色んな意味で。

engChrName: Everything he did was perfect to a tee, but he never let his talents get to his head.
engSearchText:
Everything he did was perfect to a tee, but he never
let his talents get to his head.
jpnChrName: やることなすことソツが無くて── それでいて己を弁えていた。
jpnSearchText:
やることなすことソツが無くて──
それでいて己を弁えていた。

engChrName: He probably knew this would happen, but he still didn't turn back. What was that dumbass thinking...?
engSearchText:
He probably knew this would happen, but he still
didn't turn back. What was that dumbass thinking...?
jpnChrName: 多分、覚悟はしてたんだろう…… …………馬鹿野郎が。
jpnSearchText:
多分、覚悟はしてたんだろう……
…………馬鹿野郎が。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァン、さん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、さん……

engChrName: He did a lot for me and Nina.
engSearchText: He did a lot for me and Nina.
jpnChrName: ……あたしやニナも 何度かお世話になったわね……
jpnSearchText:
……あたしやニナも
何度かお世話になったわね……

engChrName: Same for all of us as well... To say nothing of all the people in Creil.
engSearchText:
Same for all of us as well... To say nothing of all the
people in Creil.
jpnChrName: ……私たちもです…… そしてクレイユの人たち全員が……
jpnSearchText:
……私たちもです……
そしてクレイユの人たち全員が……
………ッ……………

engChrName: How'd they figure out how to use a nuclear weapon? I thought they weren't able to finish it.
engSearchText:
How'd they figure out how to use a nuclear weapon?
I thought they weren't able to finish it.
jpnChrName: ……だがどうして“反応兵器”が？ 完成しなかったんじゃなかったのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
……だがどうして“反応兵器”が？
完成しなかったんじゃなかったのかよ。

engChrName: Don't think they did. They had to've been pretty close to completion, though.
engSearchText:
Don't think they did. They had to've been pretty
close to completion, though.
jpnChrName: ………逆に言えば、 “あと一歩”までは辿り着いていた。
jpnSearchText:
………逆に言えば、
“あと一歩”までは辿り着いていた。

engChrName: And they must've been able to bridge the gap with the explosive lens and an artifact.
engSearchText:
And they must've been able to bridge the gap with
the explosive lens and an artifact.
jpnChrName: あの《爆縮レンズ》ってヤツと古代遺物で 無理矢理補完したってところか。
jpnSearchText:
あの《爆縮レンズ》ってヤツと古代遺物で
無理矢理補完したってところか。

engChrName: They abandoned the scientific process and relied on brute force to achieve their desired outcome.
engSearchText:
They abandoned the scientific process and relied on
brute force to achieve their desired outcome.
jpnChrName: うん……必要なプロセスを無視して 結果だけに辿り着いたんだと思う……
jpnSearchText:
うん……必要なプロセスを無視して
結果だけに辿り着いたんだと思う……

engChrName: And they trampled on the wishes of Professor Callaghan all the while.
engSearchText:
And they trampled on the wishes of Professor
Callaghan all the while.
jpnChrName: キャラハン先生の無念を踏みにじって……
jpnSearchText: キャラハン先生の無念を踏みにじって……

engChrName: So what are we going to do now?
engSearchText: So what are we going to do now?
jpnChrName: ……で、どうするの？
jpnSearchText: ……で、どうするの？

engChrName: A whole lot of people have access to this video.
engSearchText: A whole lot of people have access to this video.
jpnChrName: このデータ──ＣＩＤやギルドはおろか、 相当流出してるそうじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
このデータ──ＣＩＤやギルドはおろか、
相当流出してるそうじゃない。

engChrName: Not like it's been released to the public, but yeah, a lotta people have got their hands on it now.
engSearchText:
Not like it's been released to the public, but yeah, a
lotta people have got their hands on it now.
jpnChrName: ……さすがに 表には出てないようだがな。
jpnSearchText:
……さすがに
表には出てないようだがな。

engChrName: I can't believe the CID effectively resorted to blackmailing you—just to get access to the video.
engSearchText:
I can't believe the CID effectively resorted to
blackmailing you—just to get access to the video.
jpnChrName: まさかディンゴさんが残した今の映像を ＣＩＤがサーバーごと押さえていて……
jpnSearchText:
まさかディンゴさんが残した今の映像を
ＣＩＤがサーバーごと押さえていて……

engChrName: They could've simply seized the server it was on and blocked access to it until we provided the password Dingo left with you.
engSearchText:
They could've simply seized the server it was on and
blocked access to it until we provided the password
Dingo left with you.
jpnChrName: データ共有を引き換えに、ヴァンさんが 預かっていたパスワードを要求するなんて……
jpnSearchText:
データ共有を引き換えに、ヴァンさんが
預かっていたパスワードを要求するなんて……

engChrName: Regardless, they didn't leave us with much choice. Now it's in the hands of the army's and police's top brass, as well as the guild.
engSearchText:
Regardless, they didn't leave us with much choice.
Now it's in the hands of the army's and police's top
brass, as well as the guild.
jpnChrName: 仕方なしに教えたら僕たちだけじゃなくて 軍や警察の上層部、ギルドにも公開……
jpnSearchText:
仕方なしに教えたら僕たちだけじゃなくて
軍や警察の上層部、ギルドにも公開……

engChrName: I'm certain other nations' intelligence agencies and criminal groups have it as well.
engSearchText:
I'm certain other nations' intelligence agencies and
criminal groups have it as well.
jpnChrName: 今や各国の諜報機関や“裏の勢力”にも 広まりつつあるとはね……
jpnSearchText:
今や各国の諜報機関や“裏の勢力”にも
広まりつつあるとはね……

engChrName: I asked Marduk HQ if they have it, but they just said they will get back to me when they have an answer.
engSearchText:
I asked Marduk HQ if they have it, but they just said
they will get back to me when they have an answer.
jpnChrName: ……本社にも問い合わせましたが 『確認中につき後ほど連絡する』だそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……本社にも問い合わせましたが
『確認中につき後ほど連絡する』だそうです。

engChrName: They are being coy, in other words, so I believe it is safe to assume they have it also.
engSearchText:
They are being coy, in other words, so I believe it is
safe to assume they have it also.
jpnChrName: ですが間違いなく伝わっているかと。
jpnSearchText: ですが間違いなく伝わっているかと。

engChrName: Who doesn't have it at this point?
engSearchText: Who doesn't have it at this point?
jpnChrName: ま、そうだろうな。
jpnSearchText: ま、そうだろうな。

engChrName: Doubt puttin' it out there was the CID's decision alone.
engSearchText:
Doubt puttin' it out there was the CID's
decision alone.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの独断とも思えねえ、 たぶん何らかの意向が働いているんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤの独断とも思えねえ、
たぶん何らかの意向が働いているんだろう。

engChrName: I'm thinkin' there's a higher power at play here—the highest in all of Calvard.
engSearchText:
I'm thinkin' there's a higher power at play here—the
highest in all of Calvard.
jpnChrName: ──恐らくこの国の最高権力者殿の意向が。
jpnSearchText: ──恐らくこの国の最高権力者殿の意向が。

engChrName: Huh? Why would the president want it?
engSearchText: Huh? Why would the president want it?
jpnChrName: 大統領さんがどうして……
jpnSearchText: 大統領さんがどうして……

engChrName: Dunno, but if he's making a big claim like that, he's probably got some idea of why he would.
engSearchText:
Dunno, but if he's making a big claim like that, he's
probably got some idea of why he would.
jpnChrName: 色々と狙いがありそうだな。
jpnSearchText: 色々と狙いがありそうだな。

engChrName: Though there's one thing we can all agree on: we can't let these guys get away with this shit any longer.
engSearchText:
Though there's one thing we can all agree on: we
can't let these guys get away with this shit any longer.
jpnChrName: 連中をこれ以上野放しにできねぇのは どこも変わらねえだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
連中をこれ以上野放しにできねぇのは
どこも変わらねえだろうが。

engChrName: You got that right. We just need to sniff out their next move.
engSearchText:
You got that right. We just need to sniff out their
next move.
jpnChrName: 一番のポイントはアルマータの動きだが……
jpnSearchText: 一番のポイントはアルマータの動きだが……

engChrName: They wouldn't pull a stunt like this without a plan. There's gotta be a follow-up act.
engSearchText:
They wouldn't pull a stunt like this without a plan.
There's gotta be a follow-up act.
jpnChrName: ここまでやらかしたからには 用意周到に“準備”しているはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ここまでやらかしたからには
用意周到に“準備”しているはずだ。

engChrName: It'd fit with what that guy in the armor told us, too.
engSearchText: It'd fit with what that guy in the armor told us, too.
jpnChrName: あの甲冑野郎が言ってたことも合わせてな。
jpnSearchText: あの甲冑野郎が言ってたことも合わせてな。

engChrName: Like I said, the real fun'll begin at our next play date...
engSearchText:
Like I said, the real fun'll begin at our next
play date...
jpnChrName: ──さっきも言ったが “次”を愉しみにさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──さっきも言ったが
“次”を愉しみにさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: In a joyous carnival of blood and violence the likes of which the world has never seen.
engSearchText:
In a joyous carnival of blood and violence the likes of
which the world has never seen.
jpnChrName: 噎（む）せ返る血の匂いと暴力に酔いしれる、 とっておきの《謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）》でな。
jpnSearchText:
噎（む）せ返る血の匂いと暴力に酔いしれる、
とっておきの《謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）》でな。

engChrName: Yes. The tragedy struck on the night of that very day.
engSearchText: Yes. The tragedy struck on the night of that very day.
jpnChrName: あの日の“夜”に事件が 起こったことを考えると……
jpnSearchText:
あの日の“夜”に事件が
起こったことを考えると……

engChrName: They must have already been preparing for the attack on Creil when we met him.
engSearchText:
They must have already been preparing for the attack
on Creil when we met him.
jpnChrName: 既にクレイユ村をあんな風にするべく 動いてたわけですね……
jpnSearchText:
既にクレイユ村をあんな風にするべく
動いてたわけですね……

engChrName: Then they better be prepared to pay for it, too!
engSearchText: Then they better be prepared to pay for it, too!
jpnChrName: ……許せません……！
jpnSearchText: ……許せません……！

engChrName: It's safe to assume they were fully aware of how everyone would react to this incident.
engSearchText:
It's safe to assume they were fully aware of how
everyone would react to this incident.
jpnChrName: 逆に言えば──彼らはこの推移を 完全に見越していたのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
逆に言えば──彼らはこの推移を
完全に見越していたのでしょう。

engChrName: Yeah. They wanted all eyes on them. Must've been what they were after from the word go.
engSearchText:
Yeah. They wanted all eyes on them. Must've been
what they were after from the word go.
jpnChrName: ああ……最悪中の最悪を起こして、 ヘイト集めまくるのも想定済みの筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……最悪中の最悪を起こして、
ヘイト集めまくるのも想定済みの筈だ。

engChrName: They manipulated Professor Callaghan, and when they got what they wanted, they tossed him aside like a used rag doll.
engSearchText:
They manipulated Professor Callaghan, and when
they got what they wanted, they tossed him aside like
a used rag doll.
jpnChrName: ……先生を利用するだけ利用して、 届かなかった領域に土足で踏み込んで……
jpnSearchText:
……先生を利用するだけ利用して、
届かなかった領域に土足で踏み込んで……

engChrName: And they proceeded to use his work for the most heinous purpose imaginable—with flagrant disregard for human life. It makes me sick.
engSearchText:
And they proceeded to use his work for the most
heinous purpose imaginable—with flagrant disregard
for human life. It makes me sick.
jpnChrName: 何の罪もない大勢の人を犠牲にした── 一技術者として、絶対に見過ごせない。
jpnSearchText:
何の罪もない大勢の人を犠牲にした──
一技術者として、絶対に見過ごせない。

engChrName: I still don't know what our best course of action is, but what I do know is that Dingo gave us a request that I—no, we can't refuse.
engSearchText:
I still don't know what our best course of action is,
but what I do know is that Dingo gave us a request
that I—no, we can't refuse.
jpnChrName: 今回どう動くかは正直まだ分からねえが、 俺は──俺たちは裏解決屋（スプリガン）だ。
jpnSearchText:
今回どう動くかは正直まだ分からねえが、
俺は──俺たちは裏解決屋（スプリガン）だ。

engChrName: He chose to leave that video in our hands—so I'm seein' this thing through. It's the least I can do for him.
engSearchText:
He chose to leave that video in our hands—so I'm
seein' this thing through. It's the least I can do
for him.
jpnChrName: あんな形でディンゴがデータを託した以上、 “正式な依頼”としてある程度見届ける。
jpnSearchText:
あんな形でディンゴがデータを託した以上、
“正式な依頼”としてある程度見届ける。

engChrName: You guys good with that?
engSearchText: You guys good with that?
jpnChrName: ……それでいいな？
jpnSearchText: ……それでいいな？

engChrName: Stuff's probably happenin' under the surface in Edith, too. We can start by hittin' up the notice boards while we keep our ears to the ground.
engSearchText:
Stuff's probably happenin' under the surface in
Edith, too. We can start by hittin' up the notice
boards while we keep our ears to the ground.
jpnChrName: 首都でも水面下で動きがあるはずだ ──４ｓｐｇも当たりながら掴むぞ。
jpnSearchText:
首都でも水面下で動きがあるはずだ
──４ｓｐｇも当たりながら掴むぞ。

engChrName: We gotta figure out what the CID, the guild, and everyone else is up to.
engSearchText:
We gotta figure out what the CID, the guild, and
everyone else is up to.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤにギルド、それ以外の動きも全てな。
jpnSearchText: ＣＩＤにギルド、それ以外の動きも全てな。

engChrName: Makes sense to me. Then let's put our backs into it!
engSearchText: Makes sense to me. Then let's put our backs into it!
jpnChrName: なるほど…… じゃあ張り切っていかないとね！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
じゃあ張り切っていかないとね！

engChrName: Uhh... So you've managed to make it this far without takin' no for an answer.
engSearchText:
Uhh... So you've managed to make it this far without
takin' no for an answer.
jpnChrName: で、結局ここまで問答無用で 首を突っ込んできてるわけだが……
jpnSearchText:
で、結局ここまで問答無用で
首を突っ込んできてるわけだが……

engChrName: You do know this ain't got anything to do with you, right?
engSearchText:
You do know this ain't got anything to do with
you, right?
jpnChrName: 本来、お前さんには関係ねぇ話だろ？
jpnSearchText: 本来、お前さんには関係ねぇ話だろ？

engChrName: Au contraire. It's got everything to do with me.
engSearchText: Au contraire. It's got everything to do with me.
jpnChrName: 無いわけないでしょ。
jpnSearchText: 無いわけないでしょ。

engChrName: These are the same bastards who ruined the film festival—and I've visited Creil for film shoots, too.
engSearchText:
These are the same bastards who ruined the film
festival—and I've visited Creil for film shoots, too.
jpnChrName: 映画祭だって滅茶苦茶にされたし── ロケでクレイユに行った事もあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭だって滅茶苦茶にされたし──
ロケでクレイユに行った事もあるわ。

engChrName: Oh, right...
engSearchText: Oh, right...
jpnChrName: そうだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですか……

engChrName: Plus I've already signed a lease for a room in this building.
engSearchText:
Plus I've already signed a lease for a room in
this building.
jpnChrName: ──ちなみにここの一部屋も 既に契約させてもらったわ。
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみにここの一部屋も
既に契約させてもらったわ。

engChrName: I've wanted a second home for a while—both as a safe haven from the paparazzi and as a hideout for my, umm...other gig.
engSearchText:
I've wanted a second home for a while—both as a safe
haven from the paparazzi and as a hideout for my,
umm...other gig.
jpnChrName: パパラッチ対策もそうだけど“あの活動”用の セカンドハウスを探してたのよね。
jpnSearchText:
パパラッチ対策もそうだけど“あの活動”用の
セカンドハウスを探してたのよね。

engChrName: I mean, hey, I'm not about to turn away help when it comes knockin', but you're...uh...gonna attract a lot of attention out there.
engSearchText:
I mean, hey, I'm not about to turn away help when it
comes knockin', but you're...uh...gonna attract a lot of
attention out there.
jpnChrName: ま、お前さんの実力は知ってるし 今は人手が多いに越したことはねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前さんの実力は知ってるし
今は人手が多いに越したことはねぇが……

engChrName: Oh, you think I'll be recognized?
engSearchText: Oh, you think I'll be recognized?
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちの心配？
jpnSearchText: ああ、そっちの心配？

engChrName: Not to worry. I'm not third in a line of phantom thieves for nothing.
engSearchText:
Not to worry. I'm not third in a line of phantom
thieves for nothing.
jpnChrName: フフン、心配ご無用よ。 伊達に三代渡って怪盗やってないし。
jpnSearchText:
フフン、心配ご無用よ。
伊達に三代渡って怪盗やってないし。

engChrName: So what do you think? Impressive, right?
engSearchText: So what do you think? Impressive, right?
jpnChrName: これでどう？
jpnSearchText: これでどう？

engChrName: Whoa! That's so cool!
engSearchText: Whoa! That's so cool!
jpnChrName: すごい……！
jpnSearchText: すごい……！

engChrName: Sounds like a bargain-bin comic book.
engSearchText: Sounds like a bargain-bin comic book.
jpnChrName: マジで劇画（コミック）の世界かよ……
jpnSearchText: マジで劇画（コミック）の世界かよ……

engChrName: So that's one of the tools of your trade. I wonder how it works...
engSearchText:
So that's one of the tools of your trade. I wonder how
it works...
jpnChrName: 所謂《怪盗道具》か…… どういう原理か分からないけど。
jpnSearchText:
所謂《怪盗道具》か……
どういう原理か分からないけど。

engChrName: Eh, that'll do. Now you won't get busted the moment you walk out the door... Probably.
engSearchText:
Eh, that'll do. Now you won't get busted the moment
you walk out the door... Probably.
jpnChrName: ま、確かにそれなら 簡単にバレることはなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、確かにそれなら
簡単にバレることはなさそうだ。

engChrName: Okay, gang. Let's get to work.
engSearchText: Okay, gang. Let's get to work.
jpnChrName: ──そうと決まれば、 とっとと解決業務を始めるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──そうと決まれば、
とっとと解決業務を始めるぞ。

engChrName: Same deal as always. One team stays inside, and the other goes out. Countin' on everyone to do their thing.
engSearchText:
Same deal as always. One team stays inside, and the
other goes out. Countin' on everyone to do
their thing.
jpnChrName: 今回も外回りと待機組で分かれる。 それぞれ動いてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
今回も外回りと待機組で分かれる。
それぞれ動いてくれ。

engChrName: Select two additional members to accompany Judith, Agnès, and Van.
engSearchText:
Select two additional members to accompany Judith,
Agnès, and Van.
jpnChrName: ジュディスとアニエス以外の 追加の同行メンバーを２名選んで下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスとアニエス以外の
追加の同行メンバーを２名選んで下さい。

engChrName: Van's holo core was changed to Mare.
engSearchText: Van's holo core was changed to Mare.
jpnChrName: ヴァンのホロウコアを「メア」に変更しました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンのホロウコアを「メア」に変更しました。

engChrName: You can change your holo core by pressing  in the Orbment menu.
engSearchText:
You can change your holo core by pressing in the
Orbment menu.
jpnChrName: メインメニューのオーブメント画面から ボタンでホロウコアの変更ができます。
jpnSearchText:
メインメニューのオーブメント画面から
ボタンでホロウコアの変更ができます。

engChrName: I am Bergard Zeman—though I was once known by another name.
engSearchText:
I am Bergard Zeman—though I was once known by
another name.
jpnChrName: ベルガルド・ゼーマン、 今はそう名乗らせてもらっている。
jpnSearchText:
ベルガルド・ゼーマン、
今はそう名乗らせてもらっている。

engChrName: I see you have brought quite a number of fledglings under your wing, Van. Very interesting.
engSearchText:
I see you have brought quite a number of fledglings
under your wing, Van. Very interesting.
jpnChrName: ふむ、なかなか面白い若者たちが 集まっているようだな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、なかなか面白い若者たちが
集まっているようだな。

engChrName: Not as interesting as the dead man who's back from the grave. Mind sharin' how you managed that?
engSearchText:
Not as interesting as the dead man who's back from
the grave. Mind sharin' how you managed that?
jpnChrName: ……死んだはずの人間がピンピンしてるほど、 面白くはないと思いますがねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……死んだはずの人間がピンピンしてるほど、
面白くはないと思いますがねぇ。

engChrName: That is a very long story. Another time, perhaps.
engSearchText: That is a very long story. Another time, perhaps.
jpnChrName: フフ、そう拗ねるでない。 これには色々と事情があってな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、そう拗ねるでない。
これには色々と事情があってな。

engChrName: Hard to believe it's already been five years—even harder to believe you're the same troublemaker I once knew...
engSearchText:
Hard to believe it's already been five years—even
harder to believe you're the same troublemaker I
once knew...
jpnChrName: ──だが、あれから５年か。 あの若輩者がすっかり見違えたものだ。
jpnSearchText:
──だが、あれから５年か。
あの若輩者がすっかり見違えたものだ。

engChrName: ...and that those same words of wisdom would come from your mouth, no less. I see you are living in accordance with your own principles.
engSearchText:
...and that those same words of wisdom would come
from your mouth, no less. I see you are living in
accordance with your own principles.
jpnChrName: 先ほどの娘への気遣いといい、 己の流儀を貫き通していると見える。
jpnSearchText:
先ほどの娘への気遣いといい、
己の流儀を貫き通していると見える。

engChrName: P-Please. I didn't do anything. I just echoed the words of a much wiser man.
engSearchText:
P-Please. I didn't do anything. I just echoed the
words of a much wiser man.
jpnChrName: っ……よして下さいよ。 あんなモンはただの借り物で──
jpnSearchText:
っ……よして下さいよ。
あんなモンはただの借り物で──

engChrName: Is my man being bashful? Never thought I'd see the day.
engSearchText:
Is my man being bashful? Never thought I'd see
the day.
jpnChrName: おお……照れてやがるぜ。
jpnSearchText: おお……照れてやがるぜ。

engChrName: Haha. It's certainly a rare sight.
engSearchText: Haha. It's certainly a rare sight.
jpnChrName: ふふ、なんだか珍しいわね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、なんだか珍しいわね。

engChrName: It's rather cute, to be honest.
engSearchText: It's rather cute, to be honest.
jpnChrName: うんうん、 ちょっと可愛い感じかも。
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、
ちょっと可愛い感じかも。

engChrName: Oh, shove it!
engSearchText: Oh, shove it!
jpnChrName: だああっ、お前らは黙ってろ！
jpnSearchText: だああっ、お前らは黙ってろ！

engChrName: Heehee. Well, you did do a good job putting Marielle at ease.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Well, you did do a good job putting Marielle
at ease.
jpnChrName: えへへ、でもマリエルさんも 安心できたと思います。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、でもマリエルさんも
安心できたと思います。

engChrName: Yes. I think you helped her regain some of her old spirit.
engSearchText:
Yes. I think you helped her regain some of her
old spirit.
jpnChrName: ええ──少しは自分を 取り戻せたみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──少しは自分を
取り戻せたみたいですし。

engChrName: Those words were quite touching. Very befitting of you—and of Mr. Brad.
engSearchText:
Those words were quite touching. Very befitting of
you—and of Mr. Brad.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様らしい── そしてディンゴ様らしい言葉でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様らしい──
そしてディンゴ様らしい言葉でしたね。

engChrName: Yeah. They resonated deeply with me as well.
engSearchText: Yeah. They resonated deeply with me as well.
jpnChrName: はい……私もなんだか 聞いてて改めて胸に響きました。
jpnSearchText:
はい……私もなんだか
聞いてて改めて胸に響きました。

engChrName: Thinking about the gap between what I can do and what I want to do is an interesting thought experiment, if nothing else.
engSearchText:
Thinking about the gap between what I can do and
what I want to do is an interesting thought
experiment, if nothing else.
jpnChrName: 出来ることとやりたい事のギャップにこそ 前に進むためのヒントがある、か。
jpnSearchText:
出来ることとやりたい事のギャップにこそ
前に進むためのヒントがある、か。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.

engChrName: Can we PLEASE move on from this topic?
engSearchText: Can we PLEASE move on from this topic?
jpnChrName: ああもう、そいつはいいだろ。
jpnSearchText: ああもう、そいつはいいだろ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I should let my employees introduce themselves. Agnès, you go first.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I should let my employees
introduce themselves. Agnès, you go first.
jpnChrName: ──とりあえず改めて紹介しますよ。 アニエス、お前からだ。
jpnSearchText:
──とりあえず改めて紹介しますよ。
アニエス、お前からだ。

engChrName: Gladly. My name is...
engSearchText: Gladly. My name is...
jpnChrName: ふふっ、はい。 改めてになりますが──
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、はい。
改めてになりますが──

engChrName: W-Wow. That's quite a history. Honestly, I had trouble keeping up with it all.
engSearchText:
W-Wow. That's quite a history. Honestly, I had
trouble keeping up with it all.
jpnChrName: ……な、なんだか凄い経歴すぎて 頭が付いていけてませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
……な、なんだか凄い経歴すぎて
頭が付いていけてませんけど……

engChrName: So you were among the twelve knights who lead the church's Gralsritter.
engSearchText:
So you were among the twelve knights who lead the
church's Gralsritter.
jpnChrName: 教会の“騎士団”を束ねる 十二人の特別な騎士のおひとり──
jpnSearchText:
教会の“騎士団”を束ねる
十二人の特別な騎士のおひとり──

engChrName: I've heard much about your various exploits, Roaring Lion.
engSearchText:
I've heard much about your various exploits,
Roaring Lion.
jpnChrName: 名高き《吼天獅子》の勇名、 かねてより存じ上げておりました。
jpnSearchText:
名高き《吼天獅子》の勇名、
かねてより存じ上げておりました。

engChrName: It's a famous name in a lot of circles, so it's not surprising.
engSearchText:
It's a famous name in a lot of circles, so it's
not surprising.
jpnChrName: ま、そっち方面じゃ あまりに有名な二つ名だよな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そっち方面じゃ
あまりに有名な二つ名だよな。

engChrName: *sigh* Once again, that name is no longer mine. I would ask that you keep that in mind.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Once again, that name is no longer mine.
I would ask that you keep that in mind.
jpnChrName: 繰り返すが“過去”の話── できればそのつもりで頼みたい。
jpnSearchText:
繰り返すが“過去”の話──
できればそのつもりで頼みたい。

engChrName: Now we know why we passed you on the way to Longlai.
engSearchText:
Now we know why we passed you on the way
to Longlai.
jpnChrName: ハン……だがやっぱり龍來に行く時、 すれ違ったのはそういうカラクリかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……だがやっぱり龍來に行く時、
すれ違ったのはそういうカラクリかよ？

engChrName: So you arranged our invitation there? And I'm guessing a few others played a part in that as well.
engSearchText:
So you arranged our invitation there? And I'm
guessing a few others played a part in that as well.
jpnChrName: なるほど、博士や黒月の次期長老、 エルザイムの公太子以外にも……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、博士や黒月の次期長老、
エルザイムの公太子以外にも……

engChrName: Namely...Professor Hamilton, Heiyue's future elder, the crown prince of Elsaim, and former President Rocksmith? Am I correct?
engSearchText:
Namely...Professor Hamilton, Heiyue's future elder,
the crown prince of Elsaim, and former
President Rocksmith? Am I correct?
jpnChrName: ロックスミス元大統領と示し合わせて 僕たちを龍來旅行に招待したんですね？
jpnSearchText:
ロックスミス元大統領と示し合わせて
僕たちを龍來旅行に招待したんですね？

engChrName: Bullseye. I happen to be acquainted with all of them, including the grand prince of Elsaim and Elder Gien.
engSearchText:
Bullseye. I happen to be acquainted with all of them,
including the grand prince of Elsaim and Elder Gien.
jpnChrName: うむ、サルマン公王にギエン殿も含め、 共通の知人同士でもあったのでな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、サルマン公王にギエン殿も含め、
共通の知人同士でもあったのでな。

engChrName: The former president was anxious to make your acquaintance, and I believed meeting him would prove to be beneficial for your future.
engSearchText:
The former president was anxious to make your
acquaintance, and I believed meeting him would
prove to be beneficial for your future.
jpnChrName: ロックスミス殿の意向もあったが、この状況で おぬしらが彼と知り合う意義は大きいと思った。
jpnSearchText:
ロックスミス殿の意向もあったが、この状況で
おぬしらが彼と知り合う意義は大きいと思った。

engChrName: Though it pains me that a well-intentioned invitation coincided with such a horrific tragedy.
engSearchText:
Though it pains me that a well-intentioned invitation
coincided with such a horrific tragedy.
jpnChrName: ……その矢先に 事件が起きたのは忸怩たる思いだが。
jpnSearchText:
……その矢先に
事件が起きたのは忸怩たる思いだが。

engChrName: Hey, it's not like you could've seen that one coming.
engSearchText: Hey, it's not like you could've seen that one coming.
jpnChrName: そんなの予想できるわけ……
jpnSearchText: そんなの予想できるわけ……

engChrName: Even if we hadn't been in Longlai, we would have been powerless to stop it regardless.
engSearchText:
Even if we hadn't been in Longlai, we would have
been powerless to stop it regardless.
jpnChrName: はい……結局は何も 出来なかったでしょうし……
jpnSearchText:
はい……結局は何も
出来なかったでしょうし……

engChrName: Yeah. The only one who could've foretold that would be the Goddess Herself.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The only one who could've foretold that would
be the Goddess Herself.
jpnChrName: ああ──それこそ 女神のみぞってヤツでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──それこそ
女神のみぞってヤツでしょう。

engChrName: Anyway, I knew you'd gone off to the Empire after you finished training me five years ago.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I knew you'd gone off to the Empire after
you finished training me five years ago.
jpnChrName: ──しかし５年前、俺に修行を付けた後、 帝国の騒動に関わってたのは知ってましたが。
jpnSearchText:
──しかし５年前、俺に修行を付けた後、
帝国の騒動に関わってたのは知ってましたが。

engChrName: Then I heard you bit the dust durin' a border dispute in Nord. They said you laid down your life protecting one of your students.
engSearchText:
Then I heard you bit the dust durin' a border dispute
in Nord. They said you laid down your life protecting
one of your students.
jpnChrName: ノルドでの国境紛争に巻き込まれた時に “他の弟子”を庇って亡くなった筈が──
jpnSearchText:
ノルドでの国境紛争に巻き込まれた時に
“他の弟子”を庇って亡くなった筈が──

engChrName: But here you are—alive and well. You cheated death and carried on livin'—just without your title and mark.
engSearchText:
But here you are—alive and well. You cheated death
and carried on livin'—just without your title
and mark.
jpnChrName: まさか“徴（しるし）”と立場を譲りながら 半死半生で生き延びていたとはね。
jpnSearchText:
まさか“徴（しるし）”と立場を譲りながら
半死半生で生き延びていたとはね。

engChrName: Won't pry into what you've been doin' all these years, but can you at least tell me why you never contacted me?
engSearchText:
Won't pry into what you've been doin' all these years,
but can you at least tell me why you never
contacted me?
jpnChrName: 名前を捨てて各地を回ってるそうですが、 ……なんで連絡してくれなかったんです？
jpnSearchText:
名前を捨てて各地を回ってるそうですが、
……なんで連絡してくれなかったんです？

engChrName: Before I answer, I should note that you were not the only one in the dark.
engSearchText:
Before I answer, I should note that you were not the
only one in the dark.
jpnChrName: おぬしだけでない──弟子たち全てにだ。
jpnSearchText: おぬしだけでない──弟子たち全てにだ。

engChrName: I did not reach out to my other students, either, and I never intended to do so. I wanted you all to walk your own paths...
engSearchText:
I did not reach out to my other students, either, and I
never intended to do so. I wanted you all to walk your
own paths...
jpnChrName: それに……こんな状況でもなければ、 名乗り出るつもりも無かったのでな。
jpnSearchText:
それに……こんな状況でもなければ、
名乗り出るつもりも無かったのでな。

engChrName: ...and I intended to leave my survival a secret—a trump card that I could pull out in the wake of a crisis.
engSearchText:
...and I intended to leave my survival a secret—a
trump card that I could pull out in the wake of
a crisis.
jpnChrName: 各々の成長のため、そして私の生存を いざというときの“切り札”とするためにも。
jpnSearchText:
各々の成長のため、そして私の生存を
いざというときの“切り札”とするためにも。

engChrName: Bah.
engSearchText: Bah.
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: Guessin' you figured it was time to play that card, then. To help us with THIS crisis.
engSearchText:
Guessin' you figured it was time to play that
card, then. To help us with THIS crisis.
jpnChrName: ──ひとつ“貸し”として、 つまりそれだけの事態ってわけですか。
jpnSearchText:
──ひとつ“貸し”として、
つまりそれだけの事態ってわけですか。

engChrName: Correct. I have news regarding the mafia Almata and the assassins of the Gardens.
engSearchText:
Correct. I have news regarding the mafia Almata and
the assassins of the Gardens.
jpnChrName: うむ、アルマータなるマフィア、 そして《庭園》なる暗殺組織だが。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、アルマータなるマフィア、
そして《庭園》なる暗殺組織だが。

engChrName: Their whereabouts were discovered several hours ago.
engSearchText: Their whereabouts were discovered several hours ago.
jpnChrName: 数刻前、全員の居場所が判明した。
jpnSearchText: 数刻前、全員の居場所が判明した。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: なんだとッ……！？
jpnSearchText: なんだとッ……！？

engChrName: Where?!
engSearchText: Where?!
jpnChrName: いったい何処に……！
jpnSearchText: いったい何処に……！

engChrName: Almata's leader and executives, as well as the Gardens' overseers, have established a new base...
engSearchText:
Almata's leader and executives, as well as the
Gardens' overseers, have established a new base...
jpnChrName: クレイユを滅ぼした首領に幹部たち、 そして“管理人”なる魔人ども──
jpnSearchText:
クレイユを滅ぼした首領に幹部たち、
そして“管理人”なる魔人ども──

engChrName: ...and it is located in a city within this very country.
engSearchText: ...and it is located in a city within this very country.
jpnChrName: 全てが“とある都市”を 新たな本拠に集まっているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
全てが“とある都市”を
新たな本拠に集まっているようだ。

engChrName: What's more, that information has been passed around to all the major players in this nation.
engSearchText:
What's more, that information has been passed
around to all the major players in this nation.
jpnChrName: そして──現在その情報は あらゆる勢力に明かされている。
jpnSearchText:
そして──現在その情報は
あらゆる勢力に明かされている。

engChrName: W-Wait... All of them?
engSearchText: W-Wait... All of them?
jpnChrName: あ、あらゆる勢力って……
jpnSearchText: あ、あらゆる勢力って……

engChrName: Guess that means the army, the police, and the guild are all in the know.
engSearchText:
Guess that means the army, the police, and the guild
are all in the know.
jpnChrName: 軍や警察、ギルドはもちろん……
jpnSearchText: 軍や警察、ギルドはもちろん……

engChrName: I assume Heiyue and other jaeger corps are also aware of this new base?
engSearchText:
I assume Heiyue and other jaeger corps are also
aware of this new base?
jpnChrName: 先ほどの黒月に 猟兵団、他の勢力までも……？
jpnSearchText:
先ほどの黒月に
猟兵団、他の勢力までも……？

engChrName: Yes. I imagine they are all preparing to take action at this very moment.
engSearchText:
Yes. I imagine they are all preparing to take action at
this very moment.
jpnChrName: うむ、今まさに“それぞれの流儀”で 動き出している所であろう。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、今まさに“それぞれの流儀”で
動き出している所であろう。

engChrName: This country's supreme authority is no exception. They have resolved to quell the unfolding chaos.
engSearchText:
This country's supreme authority is no exception.
They have resolved to quell the unfolding chaos.
jpnChrName: そして今回、この国の最高権力者は 完全に“割り切った”ようだ。
jpnSearchText:
そして今回、この国の最高権力者は
完全に“割り切った”ようだ。

engChrName: And they will do so by any means necessary—even if that involves fighting one evil with another.
engSearchText:
And they will do so by any means necessary—even if
that involves fighting one evil with another.
jpnChrName: 蛇の道は蛇── いや、“毒をもって毒を制する”と。
jpnSearchText:
蛇の道は蛇──
いや、“毒をもって毒を制する”と。

engChrName: So that's what Gien was talking about earlier.
engSearchText: So that's what Gien was talking about earlier.
jpnChrName: そうか、それでギエン爺さんが……
jpnSearchText: そうか、それでギエン爺さんが……

engChrName: I'm sure many jaeger corps will be all over this—my people included.
engSearchText:
I'm sure many jaeger corps will be all over this—my
people included.
jpnChrName: 戦士団も……それどころか、 恐らく幾つもの猟兵団が……
jpnSearchText:
戦士団も……それどころか、
恐らく幾つもの猟兵団が……

engChrName: Marduk HQ will likely be making their move as well.
engSearchText: Marduk HQ will likely be making their move as well.
jpnChrName: ……当然“本社”も 動き始めているでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
……当然“本社”も
動き始めているでしょうね。

engChrName: You can't be serious!
engSearchText: You can't be serious!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと待ってよ、つまり……
jpnSearchText: ちょ、ちょっと待ってよ、つまり……

engChrName: All of these groups are going to flood the city at once?!
engSearchText:
All of these groups are going to flood the city
at once?!
jpnChrName: そうした“裏”の連中が一斉に “その都市”を目指してるってわけ！？
jpnSearchText:
そうした“裏”の連中が一斉に
“その都市”を目指してるってわけ！？

engChrName: So where do you stand in all this, Master?
engSearchText: So where do you stand in all this, Master?
jpnChrName: ──それで、師父（せんせい）の立場は？
jpnSearchText: ──それで、師父（せんせい）の立場は？

engChrName: By the sounds of it, these people're gonna try to capture Almata alive—or go after their heads.
engSearchText:
By the sounds of it, these people're gonna try to
capture Almata alive—or go after their heads.
jpnChrName: アルマータどもの拘束か殲滅……
jpnSearchText: アルマータどもの拘束か殲滅……

engChrName: Some might even be aiming to get their grubby little hands on one of those nuclear devices.
engSearchText:
Some might even be aiming to get their grubby little
hands on one of those nuclear devices.
jpnChrName: もしくは反応兵器の回収あたりを 狙っている勢力はそれなりにいそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
もしくは反応兵器の回収あたりを
狙っている勢力はそれなりにいそうだ。

engChrName: That...would be really bad.
engSearchText: That...would be really bad.
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: Granted, I don't know how likely that is. Just having one of those things would make you public enemy number one.
engSearchText:
Granted, I don't know how likely that is. Just having
one of those things would make you public enemy
number one.
jpnChrName: いや……流石に回収は厳しいか。 持ってるだけで殲滅対象になりかねねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……流石に回収は厳しいか。
持ってるだけで殲滅対象になりかねねぇ。

engChrName: It ain't a stretch, though. There's plenty of historical precedent for groups using artifacts as weapons.
engSearchText:
It ain't a stretch, though. There's plenty of historical
precedent for groups using artifacts as weapons.
jpnChrName: だが、古代遺物を武器として利用する 騎士団の標的みたいな連中なんてのもいる。
jpnSearchText:
だが、古代遺物を武器として利用する
騎士団の標的みたいな連中なんてのもいる。

engChrName: So, given the stakes, what're you planning to do?
engSearchText: So, given the stakes, what're you planning to do?
jpnChrName: そんな状況下で── 師父（せんせい）はどうしたいと思ってるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
そんな状況下で──
師父（せんせい）はどうしたいと思ってるんですか？

engChrName: As it stands, I am effectively dead. If the people of my former home decide to act, I will not join them nor stand in their way.
engSearchText:
As it stands, I am effectively dead. If the people of my
former home decide to act, I will not join them nor
stand in their way.
jpnChrName: 既に“死んだ”身── 古巣が動くとしても関与はせぬつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
既に“死んだ”身──
古巣が動くとしても関与はせぬつもりだ。

engChrName: However, now that the gift of life has been bestowed upon me once more, I intend to honor it by supporting the youths whose futures are so bright.
engSearchText:
However, now that the gift of life has been bestowed
upon me once more, I intend to honor it by
supporting the youths whose futures are so bright.
jpnChrName: だが九死に一生を得た以上、せめて若人の 明日のために力を貸したいと思っている。
jpnSearchText:
だが九死に一生を得た以上、せめて若人の
明日のために力を貸したいと思っている。

engChrName: And also...to keep them safe from venomous fiends— like these unwanted guests of yours.
engSearchText:
And also...to keep them safe from venomous fiends—
like these unwanted guests of yours.
jpnChrName: それに──これより訪れる“客人”どもに 少々睨みを利かせる必要があろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
それに──これより訪れる“客人”どもに
少々睨みを利かせる必要があろうからな。

engChrName: Uh-oh...
engSearchText: Uh-oh...
jpnChrName: こ、この息吹は……！
jpnSearchText: こ、この息吹は……！

engChrName: Wh-What?!
engSearchText: Wh-What?!
jpnChrName: そ、それって……！？
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……！？

engChrName: Hey, we're busy in here. 'Fraid you'll have to come back another day.
engSearchText:
Hey, we're busy in here. 'Fraid you'll have to come
back another day.
jpnChrName: 取り込み中だ──依頼なら できれば後日にして欲しいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
取り込み中だ──依頼なら
できれば後日にして欲しいんだが。

engChrName: That so? What a shame.
engSearchText: That so? What a shame.
jpnChrName: アン？　そいつは困ったなぁ。
jpnSearchText: アン？　そいつは困ったなぁ。

engChrName: And after we came all this way to give you a job...and a little souvenir from your reporter friend.
engSearchText:
And after we came all this way to give you a job...and
a little souvenir from your reporter friend.
jpnChrName: 依頼ついでにルポライターの形見を 持ってきてやったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
依頼ついでにルポライターの形見を
持ってきてやったんだが。

engChrName: ...Fine. Get in here.
engSearchText: ...Fine. Get in here.

engChrName: Knew that'd reel you in. Thanks, bud.
engSearchText: Knew that'd reel you in. Thanks, bud.
jpnChrName: おお、邪魔するぜ。
jpnSearchText: おお、邪魔するぜ。

engChrName: Heehee. Do excuse us.
engSearchText: Heehee. Do excuse us.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ごめんやす。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、ごめんやす。

engChrName: I recognize you two...
engSearchText: I recognize you two...
jpnChrName: てめえら、どっかで……
jpnSearchText: てめえら、どっかで……

engChrName: It's the shady duo from that nightclub in Tharbad.
engSearchText: It's the shady duo from that nightclub in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ……サルバッドの ナイトクラブで見かけた連中か。
jpnSearchText:
……サルバッドの
ナイトクラブで見かけた連中か。

engChrName: I also met you back in Longlai.
engSearchText: I also met you back in Longlai.
jpnChrName: そっちのアンタとは先日ぶりだな。
jpnSearchText: そっちのアンタとは先日ぶりだな。

engChrName: Oh? You recognized me after all?
engSearchText: Oh? You recognized me after all?
jpnChrName: あら、バレてもた？
jpnSearchText: あら、バレてもた？

engChrName: Heheheh. Nice to finally meet you all, ladies and gentlemen of Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
Heheheh. Nice to finally meet you all, ladies and
gentlemen of Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: クク──よう“裏解決屋”。 こうしてまともに話すのは初めてだな。
jpnSearchText:
クク──よう“裏解決屋”。
こうしてまともに話すのは初めてだな。

engChrName: Oh? Now there's a face I never thought I'd see again.
engSearchText: Oh? Now there's a face I never thought I'd see again.
jpnChrName: っと、そっちの爺さんは……
jpnSearchText: っと、そっちの爺さんは……

engChrName: Oho. Neither did I. Tell me, what's a dead man doing out of his coffin?
engSearchText:
Oho. Neither did I. Tell me, what's a dead man doing
out of his coffin?
jpnChrName: あらまぁ、どうなっとるん？ とっくに亡くならはったって聞いたけど。
jpnSearchText:
あらまぁ、どうなっとるん？
とっくに亡くならはったって聞いたけど。

engChrName: *sigh* I was granted life once more. And I don't need to tell you the reason why—because you already know.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I was granted life once more. And I don't need
to tell you the reason why—because you
already know.
jpnChrName: 然り──だが新たな生を得てここにいる。 理由はおぬしらがよく知る通りだ。
jpnSearchText:
然り──だが新たな生を得てここにいる。
理由はおぬしらがよく知る通りだ。

engChrName: No need to give us the death glare, you old fossil. We've traded many friendly blows in the past, haven't we?
engSearchText:
No need to give us the death glare, you old fossil.
We've traded many friendly blows in the past,
haven't we?
jpnChrName: クク……そんなに邪険にすんなよ。 何度か愉しくやり合った仲だろう？
jpnSearchText:
クク……そんなに邪険にすんなよ。
何度か愉しくやり合った仲だろう？

engChrName: Why don't we bury the hatchet? Let's be like the jaegers—embrace yesterday's foe as today's friend.
engSearchText:
Why don't we bury the hatchet? Let's be like the
jaegers—embrace yesterday's foe as today's friend.
jpnChrName: 猟兵どもよろしく 昨日の敵は今日の友と行こうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
猟兵どもよろしく
昨日の敵は今日の友と行こうぜ。

engChrName: I'm afraid I'll have to decline. Had the Azure Abyss or the late Steel Maiden made the suggestion, I would have entertained the thought.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid I'll have to decline. Had the Azure Abyss
or the late Steel Maiden made the suggestion, I
would have entertained the thought.
jpnChrName: 笑止── 亡き《鋼》殿や《深淵》ならいざ知らず。
jpnSearchText:
笑止──
亡き《鋼》殿や《深淵》ならいざ知らず。

engChrName: Not for you, though. Never in a million years.
engSearchText: Not for you, though. Never in a million years.
jpnChrName: おぬし相手に許せる気などあるまい？
jpnSearchText: おぬし相手に許せる気などあるまい？

engChrName: Heehee. He's got your number, dear. No one will ever reconcile with you—and for that, you've no one to blame but yourself.
engSearchText:
Heehee. He's got your number, dear. No one will
ever reconcile with you—and for that, you've no one
to blame but yourself.
jpnChrName: クスクス、それはそうやねぇ。 旦さんの場合、完全に自業自得やけど。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス、それはそうやねぇ。
旦さんの場合、完全に自業自得やけど。

engChrName: You're on thin ice. But your words are laced with the truth—venomous though they are.
engSearchText:
You're on thin ice. But your words are laced with
the truth—venomous though they are.
jpnChrName: レティてめぇ…… ま、確かに俺もそう思うわ、クク。
jpnSearchText:
レティてめぇ……
ま、確かに俺もそう思うわ、クク。

engChrName: I get it now.
engSearchText: I get it now.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどな。

engChrName: You're the guy the Direwolf and Renne warned us about.
engSearchText:
You're the guy the Direwolf and Renne warned
us about.
jpnChrName: 要するにアンタが、痩せ狼や レンが言ってたヤツってワケか。
jpnSearchText:
要するにアンタが、痩せ狼や
レンが言ってたヤツってワケか。

engChrName: Y-You're...part of Ouroboros, then.
engSearchText: Y-You're...part of Ouroboros, then.
jpnChrName: そ、それって……
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……

engChrName: And one of their highest ranking members, at that.
engSearchText: And one of their highest ranking members, at that.
jpnChrName: 結社《身喰らう蛇》── その“最高幹部”の一人でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
結社《身喰らう蛇》──
その“最高幹部”の一人でしたか。

engChrName: The name's Ellroy Harwood. I'm the Fourth Anguis.
engSearchText: The name's Ellroy Harwood. I'm the Fourth Anguis.
jpnChrName: 蛇の使徒（アンギス）第四柱。 エルロイ・ハーウッドってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
蛇の使徒（アンギス）第四柱。
エルロイ・ハーウッドってモンだ。

engChrName: But you can just call me the Oathbreaker. Everyone does.
engSearchText:
But you can just call me the Oathbreaker.
Everyone does.
jpnChrName: 《破戒》って呼ばれる方が多いがな。
jpnSearchText: 《破戒》って呼ばれる方が多いがな。

engChrName: I am Enforcer No. III, Lucrezia Isselee.
engSearchText: I am Enforcer No. III, Lucrezia Isselee.
jpnChrName: 執行者Ｎｏ．Ⅲ、 ルクレツィア・イスレどすえ。
jpnSearchText:
執行者Ｎｏ．Ⅲ、
ルクレツィア・イスレどすえ。

engChrName: I'm delighted to make your acquaintance, Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
I'm delighted to make your acquaintance,
Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: よろしゅうなぁ── 《裏解決屋》のお兄はんたち。
jpnSearchText:
よろしゅうなぁ──
《裏解決屋》のお兄はんたち。

engChrName: Hey, put that away. This is a smoke-free building.
engSearchText: Hey, put that away. This is a smoke-free building.
jpnChrName: おい…… ここは禁煙なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
おい……
ここは禁煙なんだが。

engChrName: Really, now? Very well, I promise I won't smoke in here.
engSearchText:
Really, now? Very well, I promise I won't smoke
in here.
jpnChrName: アン、そうだったのか？
jpnSearchText: アン、そうだったのか？

engChrName: Ooh. Accidentally went and made an oath there—and I can't afford to keep those.
engSearchText:
Ooh. Accidentally went and made an oath there—and
I can't afford to keep those.
jpnChrName: クク、細かいことは気にすんなよ。 俺の二つ名はもう分かってんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、細かいことは気にすんなよ。
俺の二つ名はもう分かってんだろ？

engChrName: I've got a reputation—and a title—to uphold, you see. Gotta break an oath or two from time to time.
engSearchText:
I've got a reputation—and a title—to uphold, you see.
Gotta break an oath or two from time to time.
jpnChrName: たまには“破戒”らしいことも しなくちゃ名が廃るってモンだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
たまには“破戒”らしいことも
しなくちゃ名が廃るってモンだぜ。

engChrName: ...From time to time? You break oaths and rules as easily as you breathe.
engSearchText:
...From time to time? You break oaths and rules as
easily as you breathe.
jpnChrName: よく言うなぁ。 息吸うようにしてはるクセに。
jpnSearchText:
よく言うなぁ。
息吸うようにしてはるクセに。

engChrName: Haha. True, true.
engSearchText: Haha. True, true.
jpnChrName: ハハ、違いねえ。
