jpnSearchText: ハハ、違いねえ。

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...

engChrName: Anyway, on to business. I want you to go on a little trip for me.
engSearchText:
Anyway, on to business. I want you to go on a little
trip for me.
jpnChrName: 単刀直入に言うぜ── お前らに“出張業務”を頼みたい。
jpnSearchText:
単刀直入に言うぜ──
お前らに“出張業務”を頼みたい。

engChrName: Are you for real?
engSearchText: Are you for real?
jpnChrName: はあッ──！？
jpnSearchText: はあッ──！？

engChrName: You're joking.
engSearchText: You're joking.
jpnChrName: しゅ、出張って……
jpnSearchText: しゅ、出張って……

engChrName: What, you're not up for it?
engSearchText: What, you're not up for it?
jpnChrName: なんだ、ダメなのか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、ダメなのか？

engChrName: Strange. I thought I heard you took work from anyone.
engSearchText:
Strange. I thought I heard you took work
from anyone.
jpnChrName: どんな客からの依頼でも 受けてくれるって聞いてたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
どんな客からの依頼でも
受けてくれるって聞いてたんだが。

engChrName: Yeah, if the work's reasonable—and if I like you. And your likeability's goin' up in smoke faster than the tobacco in that cigar.
engSearchText:
Yeah, if the work's reasonable—and if I like you.
And your likeability's goin' up in smoke faster than
the tobacco in that cigar.
jpnChrName: ……筋さえ通った依頼ならな。 その意味じゃ現在進行形で減点中だが。
jpnSearchText:
……筋さえ通った依頼ならな。
その意味じゃ現在進行形で減点中だが。

engChrName: I know you guys are after Almata. Hell, you probably know where they're at, too...
engSearchText:
I know you guys are after Almata. Hell, you probably
know where they're at, too...
jpnChrName: 結社がアルマータを追ってるのは知ってる── 他と同じく既に居場所も掴んでるんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
結社がアルマータを追ってるのは知ってる──
他と同じく既に居場所も掴んでるんだろう。

engChrName: ...but before we ask you where that is, I need to know why you've come to us.
engSearchText:
...but before we ask you where that is, I need to know
why you've come to us.
jpnChrName: そこが何処かを聞く前に── “どうして俺たちに”なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
そこが何処かを聞く前に──
“どうして俺たちに”なんだ？

engChrName: You gotta be kidding me. Do I really gotta spell it out?
engSearchText:
You gotta be kidding me. Do I really gotta spell
it out?
jpnChrName: おいおい、皆まで言わせんなよ。
jpnSearchText: おいおい、皆まで言わせんなよ。

engChrName: It's 'cause you kids will make things way more fun.
engSearchText: It's 'cause you kids will make things way more fun.
jpnChrName: ──その方が、 面白そうだからに決まってるだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
──その方が、
面白そうだからに決まってるだろうが？

engChrName: F-Fun?!
engSearchText: F-Fun?!
jpnChrName: お、面白いだって……！？
jpnSearchText: お、面白いだって……！？

engChrName: How can you even say that?! There's nothing FUN about this whole ordea—
engSearchText:
How can you even say that?! There's nothing FUN
about this whole ordea—
jpnChrName: ふざけんじゃないわよ！ アンタこの状況が分かって──
jpnSearchText:
ふざけんじゃないわよ！
アンタこの状況が分かって──

engChrName: Don't waste your energy on this guy. He isn't someone you can appeal to with logic or reason.
engSearchText:
Don't waste your energy on this guy. He isn't
someone you can appeal to with logic or reason.
jpnChrName: ……やめとけや。 マトモな話が通じる相手じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
……やめとけや。
マトモな話が通じる相手じゃねえ。

engChrName: The society's already decided its course of action for this whole thing, and I'm leading the charge.
engSearchText:
The society's already decided its course of action for
this whole thing, and I'm leading the charge.
jpnChrName: ぶっちゃけた話、《結社》の方針は決まっててな。 今回は俺の仕切りでそれを進めることになった。
jpnSearchText:
ぶっちゃけた話、《結社》の方針は決まっててな。
今回は俺の仕切りでそれを進めることになった。

engChrName: Enforcer No. III will be backing me up—and so will Enforcer No. VIII, who you already know so well.
engSearchText:
Enforcer No. III will be backing me up—and so will
Enforcer No. VIII, who you already know so well.
jpnChrName: 俺とこっちのＮｏ．Ⅲ（レティ）に加えて、 ご存じのＮｏ．Ⅷ（ヴァルター）の３名を投入──
jpnSearchText:
俺とこっちのＮｏ．Ⅲ（レティ）に加えて、
ご存じのＮｏ．Ⅷ（ヴァルター）の３名を投入──

engChrName: The goal's to round up the members of Almata and the Gardens—and murder every last one of them.
engSearchText:
The goal's to round up the members of Almata and
the Gardens—and murder every last one of them.
jpnChrName: アルマータと《庭園》どもを皆殺しにする。
jpnSearchText: アルマータと《庭園》どもを皆殺しにする。

engChrName: ...I see. And you ain't doin' so in the name of justice, I'm guessing?
engSearchText:
...I see. And you ain't doin' so in the name of justice,
I'm guessing?
jpnChrName: ……皆殺し、か。 もちろん“正義”のためじゃねえよな？
jpnSearchText:
……皆殺し、か。
もちろん“正義”のためじゃねえよな？

engChrName: Nope. Had they kept to their little dog and pony shows, we wouldn't lay a finger on them.
engSearchText:
Nope. Had they kept to their little dog and pony
shows, we wouldn't lay a finger on them.
jpnChrName: ま、今まで程度のヤンチャだったら 放置してやっても良かったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今まで程度のヤンチャだったら
放置してやっても良かったんだが。

engChrName: Honestly, I rather enjoyed kicking back and watching them wreak havoc.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I rather enjoyed kicking back and watching
them wreak havoc.
jpnChrName: それはそれで愉しそうだったからなぁ。
jpnSearchText: それはそれで愉しそうだったからなぁ。

engChrName: But they've become a threat to our plans now—and we can't have that. If those little bugs want to punch above their weight...
engSearchText:
But they've become a threat to our plans now—and
we can't have that. If those little bugs want to punch
above their weight...
jpnChrName: だがこれ以上掻き回されると 俺たちの《計画》にも影響が出ちまう。
jpnSearchText:
だがこれ以上掻き回されると
俺たちの《計画》にも影響が出ちまう。

engChrName: ...then we'll crush them beneath our feet.
engSearchText: ...then we'll crush them beneath our feet.
jpnChrName: ──だからいっそのこと 綺麗サッパリ消えてもらうことにしたわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
──だからいっそのこと
綺麗サッパリ消えてもらうことにしたわけだ。

engChrName: Heehee. Though no doubt it will be easier said than done.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Though no doubt it will be easier said
than done.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そう簡単には行かへんやろけど。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そう簡単には行かへんやろけど。

engChrName: They're both troublesome and insidious, and some rather formidable guests will be joining their party.
engSearchText:
They're both troublesome and insidious, and some
rather formidable guests will be joining their party.
jpnChrName: なかなか厄介な子たちやし、 面倒そうな面々も来るみたいやからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
なかなか厄介な子たちやし、
面倒そうな面々も来るみたいやからねぇ。

engChrName: Right. You will have some fierce competition.
engSearchText: Right. You will have some fierce competition.
jpnChrName: ……それ以外の“勢力”ですね。
jpnSearchText: ……それ以外の“勢力”ですね。

engChrName: Everyone's got different aims here. Some want them brought to justice, some want them dead and buried.
engSearchText:
Everyone's got different aims here. Some want them
brought to justice, some want them dead and buried.
jpnChrName: ああ、“殲滅”か“条件付きの確保”か…… それぞれの思惑や条件の違いはあんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、“殲滅”か“条件付きの確保”か……
それぞれの思惑や条件の違いはあんだろう。

engChrName: Heiyue will surely be joining the fray, and I'll bet the jaeger corps will be after their bounty. I'm guessing Marduk HQ will be there, too, yeah?
engSearchText:
Heiyue will surely be joining the fray, and I'll bet the
jaeger corps will be after their bounty. I'm guessing
Marduk HQ will be there, too, yeah?
jpnChrName: 黒月も当然そうだろうが、猟兵団も複数介入。 ──そっちのアンタの本社もだろ？
jpnSearchText:
黒月も当然そうだろうが、猟兵団も複数介入。
──そっちのアンタの本社もだろ？

engChrName: More than likely.
engSearchText: More than likely.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、恐らくは。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ、恐らくは。

engChrName: The guild won't stand idly by, either.
engSearchText: The guild won't stand idly by, either.
jpnChrName: 当然、ギルドも見過ごさぬであろう。
jpnSearchText: 当然、ギルドも見過ごさぬであろう。

engChrName: Same goes for the Gralsritter. Artifacts are involved in this, after all.
engSearchText:
Same goes for the Gralsritter. Artifacts are involved
in this, after all.
jpnChrName: そして古代遺物が関わっている以上、 我が古巣たる《騎士団》も然り……
jpnSearchText:
そして古代遺物が関わっている以上、
我が古巣たる《騎士団》も然り……

engChrName: And I wouldn't be surprised if other forces from the church showed up as well.
engSearchText:
And I wouldn't be surprised if other forces from the
church showed up as well.
jpnChrName: それ以外の教会勢力も 既に別方面で動き始めている。
jpnSearchText:
それ以外の教会勢力も
既に別方面で動き始めている。

engChrName: Ah, right. You got students in other parts of the church—not just the Gralsritter.
engSearchText:
Ah, right. You got students in other parts of the
church—not just the Gralsritter.
jpnChrName: ああ、騎士団は当然として もう一方にも弟子がいるんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、騎士団は当然として
もう一方にも弟子がいるんだったか？

engChrName: Things are gonna get interesting, then. Must be tough being a master. I don't envy you.
engSearchText:
Things are gonna get interesting, then. Must be
tough being a master. I don't envy you.
jpnChrName: なかなか面白いことになりそうじゃねえか。 クク、師匠ってのも大変だねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
なかなか面白いことになりそうじゃねえか。
クク、師匠ってのも大変だねぇ？

engChrName: If that is what fate has in store, then I will follow it. You needn't concern yourself with me.
engSearchText:
If that is what fate has in store, then I will follow it.
You needn't concern yourself with me.
jpnChrName: それもまた縁── 余計な世話というものだ。
jpnSearchText:
それもまた縁──
余計な世話というものだ。

engChrName: Regardless, that should serve as the basic overview of the situation.
engSearchText:
Regardless, that should serve as the basic overview of
the situation.
jpnChrName: ま、とにかくそういう状況やからねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ま、とにかくそういう状況やからねぇ。

engChrName: Almata and the Gardens will not be the only sources of mischief in that city.
engSearchText:
Almata and the Gardens will not be the only sources
of mischief in that city.
jpnChrName: アルマータに庭園の子たちの他にも 色々面倒がありそうなんよ。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータに庭園の子たちの他にも
色々面倒がありそうなんよ。

engChrName: One wrong move and the whole affair could turn into an indiscriminate bloodbath—so someone ought to keep an eye on the little guys, don't you think?
engSearchText:
One wrong move and the whole affair could turn into
an indiscriminate bloodbath—so someone ought to
keep an eye on the little guys, don't you think?
jpnChrName: 下手すれば“無差別”になりそうやし── 適当にフォローしてもらおと思てなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
下手すれば“無差別”になりそうやし──
適当にフォローしてもらおと思てなぁ。

engChrName: In other words, civilians might get killed, and you aren't gonna look after them.
engSearchText:
In other words, civilians might get killed, and you
aren't gonna look after them.
jpnChrName: ハッ……民間人あたりを巻き込んでも 仕方ねえって口ぶりじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……民間人あたりを巻き込んでも
仕方ねえって口ぶりじゃねえか。

engChrName: You guys are scum.
engSearchText: You guys are scum.
jpnChrName: ふざけてるわね……
jpnSearchText: ふざけてるわね……

engChrName: Still, if Almata really does have another nuclear weapon in their possession...
engSearchText:
Still, if Almata really does have another nuclear
weapon in their possession...
jpnChrName: でも──アルマータが更なる 反応兵器を持っているなら……
jpnSearchText:
でも──アルマータが更なる
反応兵器を持っているなら……

engChrName: ...we have no other choice but to get involved.
engSearchText: ...we have no other choice but to get involved.
jpnChrName: はい……私たちも放っておけません。
jpnSearchText: はい……私たちも放っておけません。

engChrName: You can use whatever justification you want. I don't really care why you join—just so long as you do.
engSearchText:
You can use whatever justification you want. I don't
really care why you join—just so long as you do.
jpnChrName: あー、そういう大義名分は そっちの口実にでもすりゃあいい。
jpnSearchText:
あー、そういう大義名分は
そっちの口実にでもすりゃあいい。

engChrName: 'Cause if you don't, this whole thing will be a snooze cruise from start to finish. I need you kiddos to prevent this battle from being too one-sided.
engSearchText:
'Cause if you don't, this whole thing will be a snooze
cruise from start to finish. I need you kiddos to
prevent this battle from being too one-sided.
jpnChrName: 俺らは俺らで動く──わざわざこんな 依頼をすんのはバランスが良くねえからだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺らは俺らで動く──わざわざこんな
依頼をすんのはバランスが良くねえからだ。

engChrName: The hell do you mean by that?
engSearchText: The hell do you mean by that?
jpnChrName: ……バランスだと？
jpnSearchText: ……バランスだと？

engChrName: The guild's the only one in this brawl that's gonna be fighting for the common man.
engSearchText:
The guild's the only one in this brawl that's gonna be
fighting for the common man.
jpnChrName: 恐らく“参加者”はギルドを除けば “裏”に偏り過ぎるだろうからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
恐らく“参加者”はギルドを除けば
“裏”に偏り過ぎるだろうからなぁ。

engChrName: If we add you into the mix, however, it'll make for a more balanced blend—a recipe that's made for chaos.
engSearchText:
If we add you into the mix, however, it'll make for a
more balanced blend—a recipe that's made for chaos.
jpnChrName: そこにお前らを加えたら── ちょうどいい具合の“混沌”になるだろう？
jpnSearchText:
そこにお前らを加えたら──
ちょうどいい具合の“混沌”になるだろう？

engChrName: Oh, and should you happen to run into us, I'd like you to come at me knives out—and ready to cut me into a million little pieces.
engSearchText:
Oh, and should you happen to run into us, I'd like
you to come at me knives out—and ready to cut me
into a million little pieces.
jpnChrName: その上で俺たちとカチ合ったら 遠慮なく殺り合ってくれていいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
その上で俺たちとカチ合ったら
遠慮なく殺り合ってくれていいぜ？

engChrName: I'm very much into that sort of thing.
engSearchText: I'm very much into that sort of thing.
jpnChrName: そういうのもオジサン、大歓迎だ。
jpnSearchText: そういうのもオジサン、大歓迎だ。

engChrName: Hah. You are one masochistic bastard.
engSearchText: Hah. You are one masochistic bastard.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 聞いてた以上の悪趣味だな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
聞いてた以上の悪趣味だな。

engChrName: Well, we've got our reasons for chasing Almata down, so I'm not opposed to doin' this on the side.
engSearchText:
Well, we've got our reasons for chasing Almata down,
so I'm not opposed to doin' this on the side.
jpnChrName: こっちにもヤツらを追う理由がある…… そのついでに引き受けてやってもいい。
jpnSearchText:
こっちにもヤツらを追う理由がある……
そのついでに引き受けてやってもいい。

engChrName: But first, I need to get one thing straight.
engSearchText: But first, I need to get one thing straight.
jpnChrName: ──だが一つ聞かせろ。
jpnSearchText: ──だが一つ聞かせろ。

engChrName: I have a hunch you guys have some connection to either Almata or the Gardens.
engSearchText:
I have a hunch you guys have some connection to
either Almata or the Gardens.
jpnChrName: アンタらは連中──アルマータか 《庭園》のどちらかと因縁があるようだが。
jpnSearchText:
アンタらは連中──アルマータか
《庭園》のどちらかと因縁があるようだが。

engChrName: So spill it: what kinda relationship does Ouroboros have with them?
engSearchText:
So spill it: what kinda relationship does Ouroboros
have with them?
jpnChrName: 一体、どういう関係だ？
jpnSearchText: 一体、どういう関係だ？

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: ああ……？
jpnSearchText: ああ……？

engChrName: Well, it isn't a close one, if that's what you're wondering.
engSearchText:
Well, it isn't a close one, if that's what
you're wondering.
jpnChrName: 大したことじゃねえ、よくある話だ。
jpnSearchText: 大したことじゃねえ、よくある話だ。

engChrName: We haven't exactly been keeping in touch as of late, but your hunch is on point. We do have a connection with the Gardens.
engSearchText:
We haven't exactly been keeping in touch as of late,
but your hunch is on point. We do have a connection
with the Gardens.
jpnChrName: 今じゃあ完全に関係を絶ってるが…… 一応、《庭園（ガーデン）》は結社の関連組織でな。
jpnSearchText:
今じゃあ完全に関係を絶ってるが……
一応、《庭園（ガーデン）》は結社の関連組織でな。

engChrName: You see, the two of us were once part of the Order of the Moonlight Horse—an organization of assassins.
engSearchText:
You see, the two of us were once part of the Order of
the Moonlight Horse—an organization of assassins.
jpnChrName: 元々、旦さんとウチは別組織の人間でなぁ。
jpnSearchText: 元々、旦さんとウチは別組織の人間でなぁ。

engChrName: Fourteen years ago, Ouroboros destroyed the order, but they extended a hand to the two of us and brought us into the fold.
engSearchText:
Fourteen years ago, Ouroboros destroyed the order,
but they extended a hand to the two of us and
brought us into the fold.
jpnChrName: １４年前、もう一人の子と一緒に 《結社》とやり合って軍門に下ったんよ。
jpnSearchText:
１４年前、もう一人の子と一緒に
《結社》とやり合って軍門に下ったんよ。

engChrName: Although, they did not do the same for many of its other members. The society is a small group of elites, and they only accept the best and brightest.
engSearchText:
Although, they did not do the same for many of its
other members. The society is a small group of elites,
and they only accept the best and brightest.
jpnChrName: ただ《結社》は基本、少数精鋭みたいな所やから “他の團員（だんいん）”らの扱いにずっと困ってなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ《結社》は基本、少数精鋭みたいな所やから
“他の團員（だんいん）”らの扱いにずっと困ってなぁ。

engChrName: Fortune had not abandoned them, however. Shortly after, another villainous group was nearly wiped out in a major operation.
engSearchText:
Fortune had not abandoned them, however.
Shortly after, another villainous group was nearly
wiped out in a major operation.
jpnChrName: そのうち、とある掃討作戦で壊滅しかかってた “別組織”の残党とその團員たちを──
jpnSearchText:
そのうち、とある掃討作戦で壊滅しかかってた
“別組織”の残党とその團員たちを──

engChrName: My companion here herded the lost sheep of both groups and let them form their own flock.
engSearchText:
My companion here herded the lost sheep of both
groups and let them form their own flock.
jpnChrName: こちらの旦さんが“合流”させたんよ。
jpnSearchText: こちらの旦さんが“合流”させたんよ。

engChrName: Wait...
engSearchText: Wait...

engChrName: You don't mean...
engSearchText: You don't mean...

engChrName: Has it already been fourteen years?
engSearchText: Has it already been fourteen years?
jpnChrName: １４年前、か…… 意外とそんな前って気はしねぇなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
１４年前、か……
意外とそんな前って気はしねぇなぁ。

engChrName: Heheheh. Time sure flies when you're having fun— and the society has offered me a wealth of entertainment.
engSearchText:
Heheheh. Time sure flies when you're having fun—
and the society has offered me a wealth
of entertainment.
jpnChrName: ククク……《結社》で色々と 刺激的な日々を過ごしたおかげかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ククク……《結社》で色々と
刺激的な日々を過ごしたおかげかねぇ。

engChrName: From the data available to Marduk, there is only one operation that matches her story.
engSearchText:
From the data available to Marduk, there is only one
operation that matches her story.
jpnChrName: １４年前……その後の“とある掃討作戦”。 ＭＫ社のデータに該当するのは──
jpnSearchText:
１４年前……その後の“とある掃討作戦”。
ＭＫ社のデータに該当するのは──

engChrName: I REALLY hope it ain't the one I'm thinkin' of.
engSearchText: I REALLY hope it ain't the one I'm thinkin' of.
jpnChrName: おい……まさかとは思うが。
jpnSearchText: おい……まさかとは思うが。

engChrName: Please tell me the group y'all are talking about isn't—
engSearchText: Please tell me the group y'all are talking about isn't—
jpnChrName: その壊滅しかかってた “別組織”ってのは──
jpnSearchText:
その壊滅しかかってた
“別組織”ってのは──

engChrName: It's exactly as you think: the D∴G cult.
engSearchText: It's exactly as you think: the D∴G cult.
jpnChrName: ああ──《Ｄ∴Ｇ教団》。
jpnSearchText: ああ──《Ｄ∴Ｇ教団》。

engChrName: You know the ones—the devil worshipers that spread chaos across the Republic and the continent as a whole.
engSearchText:
You know the ones—the devil worshipers that spread
chaos across the Republic and the continent as
a whole.
jpnChrName: 共和国、そして大陸中で災厄を振りまいた “悪魔”を崇めるっつう宗教団体だな。
jpnSearchText:
共和国、そして大陸中で災厄を振りまいた
“悪魔”を崇めるっつう宗教団体だな。

engChrName: No way... I've heard about those fiends from Cao.
engSearchText: No way... I've heard about those fiends from Cao.
jpnChrName: ……オイオイ…… 前にツァオが話してた……
jpnSearchText:
……オイオイ……
前にツァオが話してた……

engChrName: And I heard about them from my grammy.
engSearchText: And I heard about them from my grammy.
jpnChrName: ……お祖母ちゃんたちに聞いた……
jpnSearchText: ……お祖母ちゃんたちに聞いた……

engChrName: I brought the remnants of the Moonlight Horse and the D∴G cult together...and set them loose on the world.
engSearchText:
I brought the remnants of the Moonlight Horse and
the D∴G cult together...and set them loose on
the world.
jpnChrName: その生き残りの残党と、俺たちがいた暗殺組織── 《月光木馬團》を合流させて好きにやらせてみた。
jpnSearchText:
その生き残りの残党と、俺たちがいた暗殺組織──
《月光木馬團》を合流させて好きにやらせてみた。

engChrName: That's how the Gardens were created. They find seeds that are scattered by the wind and grow them into fresh assassins that are ripe for the picking.
engSearchText:
That's how the Gardens were created. They find
seeds that are scattered by the wind and grow them
into fresh assassins that are ripe for the picking.
jpnChrName: そうして立ち上がったのが、他に類を見ない 育成システムを編み出した《庭園（ガーデン）》ってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうして立ち上がったのが、他に類を見ない
育成システムを編み出した《庭園（ガーデン）》ってわけだ。

engChrName: Had I left them alone, the founding members would've rotted away, and their budding talent would have died on the vine.
engSearchText:
Had I left them alone, the founding members
would've rotted away, and their budding talent
would have died on the vine.
jpnChrName: しかしまあ、後は腐って落ちるだけの 果実でしかなかった組織２つが──
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ、後は腐って落ちるだけの
果実でしかなかった組織２つが──

engChrName: But by mixing the leftovers of the cult and the order, I created a chemical reaction more potent than my wildest imagination could've conjured.
engSearchText:
But by mixing the leftovers of the cult and the order,
I created a chemical reaction more potent than my
wildest imagination could've conjured.
jpnChrName: 混ざり合って、そこまで面白い化学反応を 引き起こしたっつーのも傑作だよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
混ざり合って、そこまで面白い化学反応を
引き起こしたっつーのも傑作だよなぁ。

engChrName: I gave that one domino a little push—and look at all the tragedies and pain that befell the world. Heheheh.
engSearchText:
I gave that one domino a little push—and look at all
the tragedies and pain that befell the world.
Heheheh.
jpnChrName: ククク、お前らもそう思わねえか……？
jpnSearchText: ククク、お前らもそう思わねえか……？

engChrName: How...could you?
engSearchText: How...could you?
jpnChrName: ……なんて、ことを………
jpnSearchText: ……なんて、ことを………

engChrName: So this is all your fault!
engSearchText: So this is all your fault!
jpnChrName: 貴様が、全ての……！
jpnSearchText: 貴様が、全ての……！

engChrName: I take back what I said earlier. You aren't just a masochistic bastard—you're also a sadistic monster.
engSearchText:
I take back what I said earlier. You aren't just a
masochistic bastard—you're also a sadistic monster.
jpnChrName: 訂正するぜ、アンタは悪趣味じゃねぇ。 “外道”──それも最悪の部類みたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
訂正するぜ、アンタは悪趣味じゃねぇ。
“外道”──それも最悪の部類みたいだな。

engChrName: Can't say you're wrong. My colleagues, like the Wellspring Alchemist and the professor, never go far enough for my tastes.
engSearchText:
Can't say you're wrong. My colleagues, like the
Wellspring Alchemist and the professor, never go far
enough for my tastes.
jpnChrName: クク、別に否定はしねぇぜ。 博士や根源もヌルいっちゃヌルいからな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、別に否定はしねぇぜ。
博士や根源もヌルいっちゃヌルいからな。

engChrName: But that's humanity for you. No one's the same. We've all got our own desires that make us tick.
engSearchText:
But that's humanity for you. No one's the same.
We've all got our own desires that make us tick.
jpnChrName: でもまあ── そんなのは人それぞれだろ？
jpnSearchText:
でもまあ──
そんなのは人それぞれだろ？

engChrName: Yeah, and those things that make you 'tick' just so happen to tick me off.
engSearchText:
Yeah, and those things that make you 'tick' just so
happen to tick me off.
jpnChrName: 話が通じる気がしねえな。 ……だが要件は分かった。
jpnSearchText:
話が通じる気がしねえな。
……だが要件は分かった。

engChrName: I get what you want us to do, though. It also comes at the perfect time—given Dingo's last request.
engSearchText:
I get what you want us to do, though. It also comes at
the perfect time—given Dingo's last request.
jpnChrName: ディンゴの依頼を片付けるには この上なく都合がいいって事もな。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴの依頼を片付けるには
この上なく都合がいいって事もな。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: I don't like the idea of getting involved with these shitheads, but...you might be right.
engSearchText:
I don't like the idea of getting involved with these
shitheads, but...you might be right.
jpnChrName: ……正直胸クソ悪いが、 確かにその通りかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
……正直胸クソ悪いが、
確かにその通りかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: So this gathering will include Marduk, Heiyue, the guild, and many other formidable groups.
engSearchText:
So this gathering will include Marduk, Heiyue, the
guild, and many other formidable groups.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社に黒月、ギルドや 他の多数の勢力も一堂に会する状況……
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社に黒月、ギルドや
他の多数の勢力も一堂に会する状況……

engChrName: Loath as I am to admit it, we may require their aid if we are to force our way inside.
engSearchText:
Loath as I am to admit it, we may require their aid if
we are to force our way inside.
jpnChrName: 食い込むには相応の足場は必要ですか。
jpnSearchText: 食い込むには相応の足場は必要ですか。

engChrName: S-Surely there's another way...
engSearchText: S-Surely there's another way...
jpnChrName: と、とは言っても……
jpnSearchText: と、とは言っても……

engChrName: Yeah, I do NOT want to help a pair of cold-blooded killers!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I do NOT want to help a pair of
cold-blooded killers!
jpnChrName: ……こんな連中に手を貸すなんて……！
jpnSearchText: ……こんな連中に手を貸すなんて……！

engChrName: You do not need to think of it as helping us.
engSearchText: You do not need to think of it as helping us.
jpnChrName: フフ、別に手を貸すなんて思わんでええよ？
jpnSearchText: フフ、別に手を貸すなんて思わんでええよ？

engChrName: You may instead think of it as entering a mutually beneficial relationship—where our goal is simply to use one another for our own ends.
engSearchText:
You may instead think of it as entering a mutually
beneficial relationship—where our goal is simply to
use one another for our own ends.
jpnChrName: それぞれの利益のために利用し合う── 協力関係ならぬ互恵関係ってやつやろし。
jpnSearchText:
それぞれの利益のために利用し合う──
協力関係ならぬ互恵関係ってやつやろし。

engChrName: I can take charge of laying the groundwork for the requests you'll get at the city. Those'll keep you plenty busy.
engSearchText:
I can take charge of laying the groundwork for the
requests you'll get at the city. Those'll keep you
plenty busy.
jpnChrName: ４ｓｐｇってのの根回しも任せとけ。
jpnSearchText: ４ｓｐｇってのの根回しも任せとけ。

engChrName: I'll even throw in a couple that'll give you a real thrill.
engSearchText: I'll even throw in a couple that'll give you a real thrill.
jpnChrName: パンチの利いた依頼が来るように 適当に仕込んでおいてやるさ。
jpnSearchText:
パンチの利いた依頼が来るように
適当に仕込んでおいてやるさ。

engChrName: ...As long as you don't slip a trap or two in 'em.
engSearchText: ...As long as you don't slip a trap or two in 'em.
jpnChrName: ……妙な罠を仕込むんじゃねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText: ……妙な罠を仕込むんじゃねぇぞ？

engChrName: My, my. They really don't trust you, do they?
engSearchText: My, my. They really don't trust you, do they?
jpnChrName: うふふ、信用ないなぁ。 いや、むしろありすぎるんやろか？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、信用ないなぁ。
いや、むしろありすぎるんやろか？

engChrName: Anyway, sounds like we have ourselves a deal.
engSearchText: Anyway, sounds like we have ourselves a deal.
jpnChrName: ま、これでめでたく契約成立ってワケだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、これでめでたく契約成立ってワケだ。

engChrName: Oh! Almost forgot the other reason I came to this little office. Here's that souvenir I mentioned earlier.
engSearchText:
Oh! Almost forgot the other reason I came to this
little office. Here's that souvenir I mentioned earlier.
jpnChrName: っと、忘れるところだったな。 せっかくの形見だ、取っておけよ。
jpnSearchText:
っと、忘れるところだったな。
せっかくの形見だ、取っておけよ。

engChrName: Are you sure it's safe...?
engSearchText: Are you sure it's safe...?
jpnChrName: ……ですが、情報によれば……
jpnSearchText: ……ですが、情報によれば……

engChrName: If you're worried about radiation, don't be.
engSearchText: If you're worried about radiation, don't be.
jpnChrName: ああ、予想されてた“放射線”だったか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、予想されてた“放射線”だったか。

engChrName: The professor—our technical expert—looked into the matter, and he found no traces of it whatsoever.
engSearchText:
The professor—our technical expert—looked into the
matter, and he found no traces of it whatsoever.
jpnChrName: 博士──ウチの技術担当が調べたが 別に検出されなかったそうだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
博士──ウチの技術担当が調べたが
別に検出されなかったそうだぜ？

engChrName: The three disciples are probably racking their brains about that mystery this very moment.
engSearchText:
The three disciples are probably racking their brains
about that mystery this very moment.
jpnChrName: 今ごろ三高弟も頭を捻ってんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: 今ごろ三高弟も頭を捻ってんじゃねえか？

engChrName: There's no radioactive contamination? But all of the theories we have suggest—
engSearchText:
There's no radioactive contamination? But all of the
theories we have suggest—
jpnChrName: 放射線汚染が無かった……？ ……でも確かに理論上では……
jpnSearchText:
放射線汚染が無かった……？
……でも確かに理論上では……

engChrName: No, wait... Perhaps they don't apply because the bomb was detonated in a non-traditional manner.
engSearchText:
No, wait... Perhaps they don't apply because the
bomb was detonated in a non-traditional manner.
jpnChrName: いや、通常のプロセスをスキップして 起爆したらそういう事もあり得るのか……？
jpnSearchText:
いや、通常のプロセスをスキップして
起爆したらそういう事もあり得るのか……？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: I'm so lost...
engSearchText: I'm so lost...
jpnChrName: ……技術的なことは さっぱり分かりませんが……
jpnSearchText:
……技術的なことは
さっぱり分かりませんが……

engChrName: Hang on a sec. You nabbed the camera before the authorities locked the scene down?
engSearchText:
Hang on a sec. You nabbed the camera before the
authorities locked the scene down?
jpnChrName: 要するに、当局が封鎖する前に てめえらが回収したってことかよ？
jpnSearchText:
要するに、当局が封鎖する前に
てめえらが回収したってことかよ？

engChrName: Won't ask how you managed to get there ahead of the cops, 'cause if I heard the answer...
engSearchText:
Won't ask how you managed to get there ahead of
the cops, 'cause if I heard the answer...
jpnChrName: ……どうやって先んじられたかは 聞かないでおくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……どうやって先んじられたかは
聞かないでおくぜ。

engChrName: ...you'd be leavin' this room with a big ol' black eye.
engSearchText: ...you'd be leavin' this room with a big ol' black eye.
jpnChrName: 聞いちまったらアンタを ブン殴りたくなりそうだからな。
jpnSearchText:
聞いちまったらアンタを
ブン殴りたくなりそうだからな。

engChrName: Ooh. Scary.
engSearchText: Ooh. Scary.
jpnChrName: ククク……
jpnSearchText: ククク……

engChrName: (It's in our hands now, Dingo.)
engSearchText: (It's in our hands now, Dingo.)
jpnChrName: （……確かに受け取ったぜ、ディンゴ。）
jpnSearchText: （……確かに受け取ったぜ、ディンゴ。）

engChrName: Guess we'll be off. We wouldn't want to overstay our welcome, now would we?
engSearchText:
Guess we'll be off. We wouldn't want to overstay our
welcome, now would we?
jpnChrName: んじゃ期待してるぜ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
jpnSearchText: んじゃ期待してるぜ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

engChrName: I can hardly wait to see how you—and those relics of yours—will liven things up.
engSearchText:
I can hardly wait to see how you—and those relics of
yours—will liven things up.
jpnChrName: お前らのやり方と例の遺産が “祭り”をどう盛り上げるかをな。
jpnSearchText:
お前らのやり方と例の遺産が
“祭り”をどう盛り上げるかをな。

engChrName: (He knows about the Geneses?)
engSearchText: (He knows about the Geneses?)
jpnChrName: （ゲネシスのことも……）
jpnSearchText: （ゲネシスのことも……）

engChrName: ...Haven't got a clue what you're on about. So, you gonna tell us where we're goin' or not?
engSearchText:
...Haven't got a clue what you're on about. So, you
gonna tell us where we're goin' or not?
jpnChrName: ──何のことか分からんが、 肝心の“出張先”はどこなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
──何のことか分からんが、
肝心の“出張先”はどこなんだ？

engChrName: Heheh. Why don't you ask the defanged lion? I've done enough talking for one day.
engSearchText:
Heheh. Why don't you ask the defanged lion?
I've done enough talking for one day.
jpnChrName: クク、メンドくせえから そっちの元獅子殿に聞けよ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、メンドくせえから
そっちの元獅子殿に聞けよ。

engChrName: Well, then. Have a lovely rest of your day!
engSearchText: Well, then. Have a lovely rest of your day!
jpnChrName: ほな、あんじょうよろしゅうな～。
jpnSearchText: ほな、あんじょうよろしゅうな～。

engChrName: Whew... Glad you were here, Master. I doubt I would've been able to keep my cool, otherwise.
engSearchText:
Whew... Glad you were here, Master. I doubt I
would've been able to keep my cool, otherwise.
jpnChrName: ……来てくれて助かりましたよ。 ヘタすりゃ呑み込まれる所だった。
jpnSearchText:
……来てくれて助かりましたよ。
ヘタすりゃ呑み込まれる所だった。

engChrName: Nonsense. You would have handled things just fine on your own.
engSearchText:
Nonsense. You would have handled things just fine
on your own.
jpnChrName: 取り越し苦労とは思ったのだがな。
jpnSearchText: 取り越し苦労とは思ったのだがな。

engChrName: You held your ground well against them. You've grown into a fearless leader in my absence.
engSearchText:
You held your ground well against them.
You've grown into a fearless leader in my absence.
jpnChrName: おぬしの肚の据わりようならば 必要なかったかもしれぬ。
jpnSearchText:
おぬしの肚の据わりようならば
必要なかったかもしれぬ。

engChrName: I think you're giving me too much credit.
engSearchText: I think you're giving me too much credit.
jpnChrName: 買いかぶりすぎですよ。
jpnSearchText: 買いかぶりすぎですよ。

engChrName: All right, guys. I'm gonna ask that you all stay here. I'm goin' solo on this one.
engSearchText:
All right, guys. I'm gonna ask that you all stay here.
I'm goin' solo on this one.
jpnChrName: 今回は俺一人で当たる── お前らは全員、首都に残れ。
jpnSearchText:
今回は俺一人で当たる──
お前らは全員、首都に残れ。

engChrName: Huh? But why?
engSearchText: Huh? But why?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん……

engChrName: 'Cause it's too dangerous. This is their turf, and everyone there'll be playin' by their rules.
engSearchText:
'Cause it's too dangerous. This is their turf, and
everyone there'll be playin' by their rules.
jpnChrName: 今回向かうのは、あれだけの事を しでかした連中の新たな本拠地だ。
jpnSearchText:
今回向かうのは、あれだけの事を
しでかした連中の新たな本拠地だ。

engChrName: There's no telling what'll happen there, and I can be a lot more flexible if I'm on my own.
engSearchText:
There's no telling what'll happen there, and I can be a
lot more flexible if I'm on my own.
jpnChrName: 何が起きるか分からねえ以上、 俺だけの方がむしろ動きやすいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
何が起きるか分からねえ以上、
俺だけの方がむしろ動きやすいだろう。

engChrName: Oh, but I can make an exception for Master. I figure I'm gonna need his help, at least.
engSearchText:
Oh, but I can make an exception for Master. I figure
I'm gonna need his help, at least.
jpnChrName: ああ、師父（せんせい）だけは 当てにさせてもらいますがね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、師父（せんせい）だけは
当てにさせてもらいますがね。

engChrName: You figure right. That is precisely why I came in the first place.
engSearchText:
You figure right. That is precisely why I came in the
first place.
jpnChrName: 無論── そのために来たのだからな。
jpnSearchText:
無論──
そのために来たのだからな。

engChrName: Don't get me wrong. I don't think of y'all as a burden. This is just the best division of labor.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong. I don't think of y'all as a burden.
This is just the best division of labor.
jpnChrName: 足手まといっつってるわけじゃねぇ。 要は役割分担ってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
足手まといっつってるわけじゃねぇ。
要は役割分担ってヤツだ。

engChrName: I'll need you to gather info, be the point of contact for other groups, work with the guild, and—
engSearchText:
I'll need you to gather info, be the point of contact for
other groups, work with the guild, and—
jpnChrName: お前らは各方面との連絡や情報収集、 構成員への対応やギルドとの──
jpnSearchText:
お前らは各方面との連絡や情報収集、
構成員への対応やギルドとの──

engChrName: ...Hey!
engSearchText: ...Hey!
jpnChrName: ってオイ……
jpnSearchText: ってオイ……

engChrName: You done flapping your gums yet?
engSearchText: You done flapping your gums yet?
jpnChrName: で、寝言は終わったのか？
jpnSearchText: で、寝言は終わったのか？

engChrName: Good. 'Cause I stopped listening when I heard the words 'it's too dangerous.'
engSearchText:
Good. 'Cause I stopped listening when I heard the
words 'it's too dangerous.'
jpnChrName: まさかそんなタワゴトで俺らを 言い包められるとか思ってねぇよな？
jpnSearchText:
まさかそんなタワゴトで俺らを
言い包められるとか思ってねぇよな？

engChrName: I appreciate that you're worried about us. I really do. However...
engSearchText:
I appreciate that you're worried about us. I really do.
However...
jpnChrName: わたしたちのために言ってくれて いるのは分かります、でも……
jpnSearchText:
わたしたちのために言ってくれて
いるのは分かります、でも……

engChrName: We all have our reasons for wanting to go along with you.
engSearchText:
We all have our reasons for wanting to go along
with you.
jpnChrName: 僕たちには全員、理由があるからね。
jpnSearchText: 僕たちには全員、理由があるからね。

engChrName: Mine is to ensure the nuclear devices can never again be used for malicious means.
engSearchText:
Mine is to ensure the nuclear devices can never again
be used for malicious means.
jpnChrName: ……個人的にこれ以上、 反応兵器は絶対に悪用させない。
jpnSearchText:
……個人的にこれ以上、
反応兵器は絶対に悪用させない。

engChrName: Marduk considers this crisis to be a matter of grave concern, so it is only logical that I also accompany you.
engSearchText:
Marduk considers this crisis to be a matter of grave
concern, so it is only logical that I also
accompany you.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社の危機管理案件にも関わる以上、 ＳＣとしての業務にも沿っていますし。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社の危機管理案件にも関わる以上、
ＳＣとしての業務にも沿っていますし。

engChrName: You said it yourself. I'm not even a part-timer here to begin with—which means you can't order me around.
engSearchText:
You said it yourself. I'm not even a part-timer here to
begin with—which means you can't order me around.
jpnChrName: アンタの言った通り あたしは別にバイトじゃないし～？
jpnSearchText:
アンタの言った通り
あたしは別にバイトじゃないし～？

engChrName: I'm a phantom thief, so I'm going to steal this show whether you like it or not!
engSearchText:
I'm a phantom thief, so I'm going to steal this show
whether you like it or not!
jpnChrName: 華麗なる一怪盗として 勝手に現地入りさせてもらうだけよ。
jpnSearchText:
華麗なる一怪盗として
勝手に現地入りさせてもらうだけよ。

engChrName: C'mon, you guys...
engSearchText: C'mon, you guys...
jpnChrName: お前らな……
jpnSearchText: お前らな……

engChrName: I haven't been steeling my nerves all this time for nothing. I'm not letting anything get between me and my sweet, sweet revenge.
engSearchText:
I haven't been steeling my nerves all this time
for nothing. I'm not letting anything get between me
and my sweet, sweet revenge.
jpnChrName: ──“仇討ち”も含めて こっちは端から腹を括ってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
──“仇討ち”も含めて
こっちは端から腹を括ってんだ。

engChrName: Even if you fire me, I'll just hitch a ride with Heiyue instead.
engSearchText:
Even if you fire me, I'll just hitch a ride with
Heiyue instead.
jpnChrName: テメーが切るってんなら 黒月に乗っかっても勝手に行くぜ？
jpnSearchText:
テメーが切るってんなら
黒月に乗っかっても勝手に行くぜ？

engChrName: And I'd try to join up with the Warriors of Kruga.
engSearchText: And I'd try to join up with the Warriors of Kruga.
jpnChrName: わたしも……戦士団が動くなら そちらに参加するかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
わたしも……戦士団が動くなら
そちらに参加するかもしれません。

engChrName: I would really rather go with everyone here, though.
engSearchText: I would really rather go with everyone here, though.
jpnChrName: ですができれば一緒に行きたいです。
jpnSearchText: ですができれば一緒に行きたいです。

engChrName: I wanna tackle this thing head on—the spriggan way.
engSearchText: I wanna tackle this thing head on—the spriggan way.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんがわたしたちに示してくれた 裏解決屋の流儀で立ち向かうために。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんがわたしたちに示してくれた
裏解決屋の流儀で立ち向かうために。

engChrName: Naturally, I would like to accompany you as well.
engSearchText: Naturally, I would like to accompany you as well.
jpnChrName: もちろん、私もご一緒させてください。
jpnSearchText: もちろん、私もご一緒させてください。

engChrName: Not just because of the Geneses—though I'll admit that is a factor.
engSearchText:
Not just because of the Geneses—though I'll admit
that is a factor.
jpnChrName: 今回も多分《ゲネシス》が…… いえ、もうそれだけの話じゃありません。
jpnSearchText:
今回も多分《ゲネシス》が……
いえ、もうそれだけの話じゃありません。

engChrName: More importantly, I feel this conflict is born from the source of Calvard's turmoil—the distortions in the everyday world I know and the underworld.
engSearchText:
More importantly, I feel this conflict is born from the
source of Calvard's turmoil—the distortions in the
everyday world I know and the underworld.
jpnChrName: この国の表と裏──そこでの“歪み”が 極まった果てに起きた気がするんです。
jpnSearchText:
この国の表と裏──そこでの“歪み”が
極まった果てに起きた気がするんです。

engChrName: If my feeling is correct, then I want—no, must see this through to its conclusion.
engSearchText:
If my feeling is correct, then I want—no, must see
this through to its conclusion.
jpnChrName: だったら私は……私だけは。
jpnSearchText: だったら私は……私だけは。

engChrName: I recognize this may be a harrowing experience for me, but even so, I am determined to confront the harsh realities that lie in wait.
engSearchText:
I recognize this may be a harrowing experience for
me, but even so, I am determined to confront the
harsh realities that lie in wait.
jpnChrName: どんな厳しい結末が待っていたとしても その目で見届けなくちゃいけない……
jpnSearchText:
どんな厳しい結末が待っていたとしても
その目で見届けなくちゃいけない……

engChrName: So take me with you, Van. Please.
engSearchText: So take me with you, Van. Please.
jpnChrName: ですから──どうかお願いします。
jpnSearchText: ですから──どうかお願いします。

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

jpnChrName: （この子……）
jpnSearchText: （この子……）

engChrName: *sigh* Somehow I knew it'd end up like this one way or another.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Somehow I knew it'd end up like this one way
or another.
jpnChrName: はあ……いつかこうなる気はしてたが。
jpnSearchText: はあ……いつかこうなる気はしてたが。

engChrName: Unlucky for you, though, the trouble isn't happening on a weekend or during a school trip. You're gonna have to play hooky.
engSearchText:
Unlucky for you, though, the trouble isn't happening
on a weekend or during a school trip. You're gonna
have to play hooky.
jpnChrName: ──今回ばかりは連休も行事もねえ。 付いてくるならサボりになるがいいのか？
jpnSearchText:
──今回ばかりは連休も行事もねえ。
付いてくるならサボりになるがいいのか？

engChrName: I know, and I do feel guilty about it. Still, I have a plan in mind, so don't worry.
engSearchText:
I know, and I do feel guilty about it. Still, I have a
plan in mind, so don't worry.
jpnChrName: はい──ちょっと後ろめたいですけど 既に“手立て”は考えてあります。
jpnSearchText:
はい──ちょっと後ろめたいですけど
既に“手立て”は考えてあります。

engChrName: Startin' to think I'm a bad influence.
engSearchText: Startin' to think I'm a bad influence.
jpnChrName: クク…… だったら何も言うことはねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
クク……
だったら何も言うことはねぇな。

engChrName: I'll make sure you get paid in advance. That way, you'll have the mira for the bribes and hush money.
engSearchText:
I'll make sure you get paid in advance. That way,
you'll have the mira for the bribes and hush money.
jpnChrName: 精々バイト代は弾んでやるから 賄賂やら口止め料とかに使っておけよ。
jpnSearchText:
精々バイト代は弾んでやるから
賄賂やら口止め料とかに使っておけよ。

engChrName: I-I wasn't planning on going THAT far!
engSearchText: I-I wasn't planning on going THAT far!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな後ろ暗い 手立てじゃありませんから……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな後ろ暗い
手立てじゃありませんから……！

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: えへへ……
jpnSearchText: えへへ……

engChrName: Wow. Van's right. He really IS a bad influence on you.
engSearchText:
Wow. Van's right. He really IS a bad influence
on you.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、ヴァンさんじゃないんだから。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、ヴァンさんじゃないんだから。

engChrName: Okay, then. Now that we've got all that squared away, mind sharing the location of the base?
engSearchText:
Okay, then. Now that we've got all that squared away,
mind sharing the location of the base?
jpnChrName: さぁて──話がまとまった所で そろそろ話してもらおうか、爺さん？
jpnSearchText:
さぁて──話がまとまった所で
そろそろ話してもらおうか、爺さん？

engChrName: Right. We need to know where they are so we can kick their sorry butts.
engSearchText:
Right. We need to know where they are so we can
kick their sorry butts.
jpnChrName: ええ……アルマータや庭園の連中が 新たな本拠地として選んだ“都市”を。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……アルマータや庭園の連中が
新たな本拠地として選んだ“都市”を。

engChrName: Heh. Very well, then.
engSearchText: Heh. Very well, then.
jpnChrName: フフ、よかろう──
jpnSearchText: フフ、よかろう──

engChrName: Their base of operations is located in the third-largest city in the Republic, as well as its oldest.
engSearchText:
Their base of operations is located in the third-largest
city in the Republic, as well as its oldest.
jpnChrName: と言っても彼奴（きゃつ）らが利用してきた者たちを思えば ある意味“必然”とも言える。
jpnSearchText:
と言っても彼奴（きゃつ）らが利用してきた者たちを思えば
ある意味“必然”とも言える。

engChrName: It is also the place where the terrorists of Calvard get much of their funding.
engSearchText:
It is also the place where the terrorists of Calvard get
much of their funding.
jpnChrName: かの“民族テロ”最大の資金源となってきた カルバード最古にして第三の都市──
jpnSearchText:
かの“民族テロ”最大の資金源となってきた
カルバード最古にして第三の都市──

engChrName: The old city capital: Oración.
engSearchText: The old city capital: Oración.
jpnChrName: 共和国北東に位置する《旧王都オラシオン》。
jpnSearchText: 共和国北東に位置する《旧王都オラシオン》。

engChrName: That is where they have set the stage for their carnival of chaos.
engSearchText:
That is where they have set the stage for their carnival
of chaos.
jpnChrName: ──それが彼奴らが見込んだ “謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）”の舞台だ。
jpnSearchText:
──それが彼奴らが見込んだ
“謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）”の舞台だ。

engChrName: November 20th, 1208, 5:35AM
engSearchText: November 20th, 1208, 5:35AM

engChrName: It really is a shame we can't take Marielle with us.
engSearchText: It really is a shame we can't take Marielle with us.
jpnChrName: マリエルさんもご一緒できれば 良かったんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさんもご一緒できれば
良かったんですけど……

engChrName: At least she's going there with the guild. Better than traveling on her own.
engSearchText:
At least she's going there with the guild. Better than
traveling on her own.
jpnChrName: ギルドと一緒に現地入りなら それはそれで安心そうですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドと一緒に現地入りなら
それはそれで安心そうですねっ。

engChrName: Yeah. Sounds like they're planning to send a lot of people over to Oración.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Sounds like they're planning to send a lot of
people over to Oración.
jpnChrName: ああ、連中もかなりのメンツを オラシオンに投入するらしい。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、連中もかなりのメンツを
オラシオンに投入するらしい。

engChrName: Can't think of a better group for the job.
engSearchText: Can't think of a better group for the job.
jpnChrName: 民間人の護衛って意味じゃ むしろ適材適所ってモンだろ。
jpnSearchText:
民間人の護衛って意味じゃ
むしろ適材適所ってモンだろ。

engChrName: Indeed. Helping civilians is what they do best.
engSearchText: Indeed. Helping civilians is what they do best.
jpnChrName: うむ、良い役割分担であろうな。
jpnSearchText: うむ、良い役割分担であろうな。

engChrName: Heh. Meanwhile, we're only going to avenge that handsome reporter guy.
engSearchText:
Heh. Meanwhile, we're only going to avenge that
handsome reporter guy.
jpnChrName: ハッ、こっちはこっちで イケメンブン屋の仇を討つだけか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、こっちはこっちで
イケメンブン屋の仇を討つだけか。

engChrName: Were you able to get the matter settled with your school, Agnès?
engSearchText:
Were you able to get the matter settled with your
school, Agnès?
jpnChrName: それでアニエスさん、 学校は大丈夫だったの？
jpnSearchText:
それでアニエスさん、
学校は大丈夫だったの？

engChrName: Yes. I told them yesterday I would be absent for a few days due to a family emergency.
engSearchText:
Yes. I told them yesterday I would be absent for a few
days due to a family emergency.
jpnChrName: ……はい、“家庭の事情”で 昨日のうちに欠席届を出しました。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、“家庭の事情”で
昨日のうちに欠席届を出しました。

engChrName: They've always been very accommodating of my family...situation.
engSearchText:
They've always been very accommodating of my
family...situation.
jpnChrName: その──ちょっと事情があって そういう融通が元々利きやすくて。
jpnSearchText:
その──ちょっと事情があって
そういう融通が元々利きやすくて。

engChrName: Although, I've never taken advantage of it like this...
engSearchText: Although, I've never taken advantage of it like this...
jpnChrName: ふう、“それとなく勝手に勘違い” させたのは心が痛みますけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、“それとなく勝手に勘違い”
させたのは心が痛みますけど……

engChrName: I don't think anyone can blame you, given the circumstances.
engSearchText:
I don't think anyone can blame you, given
the circumstances.
jpnChrName: ……それはご愁傷様。
jpnSearchText: ……それはご愁傷様。

engChrName: It's still a black mark on your spotless record, though. Miss Perfect's gonna turn into Miss Delinquent before we know it.
engSearchText:
It's still a black mark on your spotless record, though.
Miss Perfect's gonna turn into Miss Delinquent
before we know it.
jpnChrName: クク、そういう繰り返しが 不良への第一歩ってな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そういう繰り返しが
不良への第一歩ってな。

engChrName: As long as she doesn't sink to Van's level, she'll be fine!
engSearchText:
As long as she doesn't sink to Van's level, she'll
be fine!
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫ですよ！ ヴァンさんのズルさと比べたらっ。
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫ですよ！
ヴァンさんのズルさと比べたらっ。

engChrName: I am literally standing right here.
engSearchText: I am literally standing right here.
jpnChrName: ってオイ……
jpnSearchText: ってオイ……

engChrName: You guys sure love to bicker, don't you?
engSearchText: You guys sure love to bicker, don't you?
jpnChrName: やれやれ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ。

engChrName: What of Ms. Bright and your other friends? Have you informed them?
engSearchText:
What of Ms. Bright and your other friends? Have you
informed them?
jpnChrName: それではレン様などにも？
jpnSearchText: それではレン様などにも？

engChrName: Renne already knows. She's going to be helping the guild on this mission.
engSearchText:
Renne already knows. She's going to be helping the
guild on this mission.
jpnChrName: はい……と言っても今回、 先輩もギルドに協力するらしくて。
jpnSearchText:
はい……と言っても今回、
先輩もギルドに協力するらしくて。

engChrName: She already left last night, so I expect we'll run into her in Oración.
engSearchText:
She already left last night, so I expect we'll run into
her in Oración.
jpnChrName: 昨夜のうちに出発していましたから、 多分、現地で会えると思います。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜のうちに出発していましたから、
多分、現地で会えると思います。

engChrName: Makes sense. Guessin' she had to take some time off, too, then?
engSearchText:
Makes sense. Guessin' she had to take some time off,
too, then?
jpnChrName: らしいな……って、 あいつも欠席届を出したわけか。
jpnSearchText:
らしいな……って、
あいつも欠席届を出したわけか。

engChrName: Yes. She told the school she received an emergency request to return home from the Liberlian embassy.
engSearchText:
Yes. She told the school she received an emergency
request to return home from the Liberlian embassy.
jpnChrName: リベール大使館からの 帰国要請の名目にしたらしくて。
jpnSearchText:
リベール大使館からの
帰国要請の名目にしたらしくて。

engChrName: I didn't get a chance to fill in Odette and Albert on what's been happening, though.
engSearchText:
I didn't get a chance to fill in Odette and Albert on
what's been happening, though.
jpnChrName: ……逆にオデットたちには 改めて説明する余裕がなくて。
jpnSearchText:
……逆にオデットたちには
改めて説明する余裕がなくて。

engChrName: I'll make it a point to apologize to them when we get back.
engSearchText:
I'll make it a point to apologize to them when we
get back.
jpnChrName: 帰ったらちゃんと謝ります。
jpnSearchText: 帰ったらちゃんと謝ります。

engChrName: Sounds like a plan.
engSearchText: Sounds like a plan.
jpnChrName: ま、そうしとけ。
jpnSearchText: ま、そうしとけ。

engChrName: Mornin', y'all. Sorry you two had to get up so early on our account.
engSearchText:
Mornin', y'all. Sorry you two had to get up so early on
our account.
jpnChrName: 悪いなおやっさん。 ポーレットもこんな朝早くに。
jpnSearchText:
悪いなおやっさん。
ポーレットもこんな朝早くに。

engChrName: Hmph. We have to get the bistro ready for business, anyway. ...Though tell me, why is the actress going with you?
engSearchText:
Hmph. We have to get the bistro ready for
business, anyway. ...Though tell me, why is the actress
going with you?
jpnChrName: フン、店の準備もあるしな。 なんで女優まで行くのか知らねえが。
jpnSearchText:
フン、店の準備もあるしな。
なんで女優まで行くのか知らねえが。

engChrName: O-Oh, I'm, uh, going with them to...assess the location for my next film. Yeah, that's it.
engSearchText:
O-Oh, I'm, uh, going with them to...assess the
location for my next film. Yeah, that's it.
jpnChrName: いや～、ちょっと次回作の ロケハンなんかも兼ねてまして。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、ちょっと次回作の
ロケハンなんかも兼ねてまして。

engChrName: I hope that goes well, then.
engSearchText: I hope that goes well, then.
jpnChrName: そう……頑張ってくださいね。
jpnSearchText: そう……頑張ってくださいね。

engChrName: *sigh* I was hoping Yumé would be able to get up and see you off, but it was just too early for her.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I was hoping Yumé would be able to get up and
see you off, but it was just too early for her.
jpnChrName: ふう、ユメも起きられたら よかったんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ユメも起きられたら
よかったんだけど。

engChrName: We'll buy her a souvenir or two while we're out, so tell her to look forward to 'em.
engSearchText:
We'll buy her a souvenir or two while we're out, so
tell her to look forward to 'em.
jpnChrName: ま、土産でも買ってくるから 楽しみにするよう言っといてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、土産でも買ってくるから
楽しみにするよう言っといてくれ。

engChrName: Of course. I'll do just that.
engSearchText: Of course. I'll do just that.
jpnChrName: ええ……
jpnSearchText: ええ……

engChrName: I'm almost scared to ask why you have to leave for Oración of all places—especially at a time like this...
engSearchText:
I'm almost scared to ask why you have to leave for
Oración of all places—especially at a time like this...
jpnChrName: ……こんな時期にどうして オラシオンにって聞きたかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
……こんな時期にどうして
オラシオンにって聞きたかったけど。

engChrName: ...but remember, I'm holding you to your promise about that souvenir.
engSearchText:
...but remember, I'm holding you to your promise
about that souvenir.
jpnChrName: ユメへのお土産、どうかよろしくね？
jpnSearchText: ユメへのお土産、どうかよろしくね？

engChrName: Take good care of your people, you troublemaking buffoon.
engSearchText:
Take good care of your people, you
troublemaking buffoon.
jpnChrName: くれぐれも気をつけろ、不良店子。
jpnSearchText: くれぐれも気をつけろ、不良店子。

engChrName: If you don't—if even one of 'em gets hurt—I'm doubling the rent on your office.
engSearchText:
If you don't—if even one of 'em gets hurt—I'm
doubling the rent on your office.
jpnChrName: 全員、無事戻って来なかったら…… 事務所の賃料を倍にしてやるからな！
jpnSearchText:
全員、無事戻って来なかったら……
事務所の賃料を倍にしてやるからな！

engChrName: Ouch. You aren't pullin' your punches, are you? Well, I'll do what I can to keep 'em safe.
engSearchText:
Ouch. You aren't pullin' your punches, are you?
Well, I'll do what I can to keep 'em safe.
jpnChrName: そ、そいつはヘビーだな…… ああ──何とかそれは避けるさ。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そいつはヘビーだな……
ああ──何とかそれは避けるさ。

engChrName: We'll pick the best souvenir money can buy. It'll put a big smile on Yumé's face. Guaranteed!
engSearchText:
We'll pick the best souvenir money can buy. It'll put a
big smile on Yumé's face. Guaranteed!
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんへのお土産も バッチリ選んできますからっ！
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃんへのお土産も
バッチリ選んできますからっ！

engChrName: ...We have not known each other for long, Mr. Zeman, but I can tell you're no ordinary traveler.
engSearchText:
...We have not known each other for long, Mr.
Zeman, but I can tell you're no ordinary traveler.
jpnChrName: ……ベルガルドさん、 改めて只者じゃないとお見受けする。
jpnSearchText:
……ベルガルドさん、
改めて只者じゃないとお見受けする。

engChrName: Please make sure my tenants come back safe and sound.
engSearchText:
Please make sure my tenants come back safe
and sound.
jpnChrName: どうか店子たちを宜しく頼みます。
jpnSearchText: どうか店子たちを宜しく頼みます。

engChrName: Of course. That's what I'm here for.
engSearchText: Of course. That's what I'm here for.
jpnChrName: 相分かった、老骨に鞭打ってでも。
jpnSearchText: 相分かった、老骨に鞭打ってでも。

engChrName: In return, why don't we go for another round of chess when I get back? And I would not be opposed to having more of that heavenly food of yours, too.
engSearchText:
In return, why don't we go for another round of chess
when I get back? And I would not be opposed to
having more of that heavenly food of yours, too.
jpnChrName: 戻ったらマスター殿の手料理を肴に またチェスを一局お願いしたいものだ。
jpnSearchText:
戻ったらマスター殿の手料理を肴に
またチェスを一局お願いしたいものだ。

engChrName: Haha. Nothing would make me happier—especially since our game last night ended in a draw.
engSearchText:
Haha. Nothing would make me happier—especially
since our game last night ended in a draw.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そりゃあいい。 昨夜は決着が付かなかったからな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、そりゃあいい。
昨夜は決着が付かなかったからな。

engChrName: It had been eight days since the events of Oración came to a close.
engSearchText:
It had been eight days since the events of Oración
came to a close.
jpnChrName: あれから──狂乱のオラシオンでの騒動から ８日ほどの期間が経過していた。
jpnSearchText:
あれから──狂乱のオラシオンでの騒動から
８日ほどの期間が経過していた。

engChrName: After the crisis was resolved, it was announced that the explosion at Vashtar Palace and Creil's destruction were the work of Almata.
engSearchText:
After the crisis was resolved, it was announced that
the explosion at Vashtar Palace and Creil's
destruction were the work of Almata.
jpnChrName: 古都の旧王宮跡での爆発を起こしたのが 《アルマータ》であることも改めて公表され……
jpnSearchText:
古都の旧王宮跡での爆発を起こしたのが
《アルマータ》であることも改めて公表され……

engChrName: However, as if to quell any unease, it was also promptly announced that Almata was no more thanks to the CID and a number of external collaborators.
engSearchText:
However, as if to quell any unease, it was also
promptly announced that Almata was no more thanks
to the CID and a number of external collaborators.
jpnChrName: 同時にクレイユ村を消滅させた 黒幕にして元凶だったことも明かされたが、 ＣＩＤと複数の協力者により同組織は壊滅──
jpnSearchText:
同時にクレイユ村を消滅させた
黒幕にして元凶だったことも明かされたが、
ＣＩＤと複数の協力者により同組織は壊滅──

engChrName: With the last remaining nuclear device being recovered, the state of emergency around Edith was lifted the next day.
engSearchText:
With the last remaining nuclear device being
recovered, the state of emergency around Edith was
lifted the next day.
jpnChrName: 元凶となった兵器も無事押収されたことで 首都周辺の非常事態宣言も翌日には解除された。
jpnSearchText:
元凶となった兵器も無事押収されたことで
首都周辺の非常事態宣言も翌日には解除された。

engChrName: This happened in tandem with fervent reports that the CEOs of the Quincy Company and ETWS had been formally arrested.
engSearchText:
This happened in tandem with fervent reports that
the CEOs of the Quincy Company and ETWS had
been formally arrested.
jpnChrName: そんな中、オラシオンの有力企業である クインシー社とエトワス社のＣＥＯがそれぞれ、 逮捕、出頭するというニュースも流れることに。
jpnSearchText:
そんな中、オラシオンの有力企業である
クインシー社とエトワス社のＣＥＯがそれぞれ、
逮捕、出頭するというニュースも流れることに。

engChrName: This was a shock to many. The Quincy Company's products were beloved across the continent, and ETWS vehicles seen as a major status symbol.
engSearchText:
This was a shock to many. The Quincy Company's
products were beloved across the continent, and
ETWS vehicles seen as a major status symbol.
jpnChrName: 大陸全土に販路を持つ巨大製菓会社に 最高のステータスを持つ高級車メーカー。
jpnSearchText:
大陸全土に販路を持つ巨大製菓会社に
最高のステータスを持つ高級車メーカー。

engChrName: It was almost unfathomable that both men had been blackmailed into funding a terrorist organization.
engSearchText:
It was almost unfathomable that both men had been
blackmailed into funding a terrorist organization.
jpnChrName: それらのトップが犯罪組織に弱みを握られ、 資金供給を行っていたというニュースは 国内外に大きな衝撃を与えたが……
jpnSearchText:
それらのトップが犯罪組織に弱みを握られ、
資金供給を行っていたというニュースは
国内外に大きな衝撃を与えたが……

engChrName: The Quincy Company's CEO being the father of a famous A-rank bracer added to much of the discussion as well.
engSearchText:
The Quincy Company's CEO being the father of a
famous A-rank bracer added to much of the
discussion as well.
jpnChrName: ──特に前者は、高名なＡ級遊撃士の 実父であることも取り沙汰された。
jpnSearchText:
──特に前者は、高名なＡ級遊撃士の
実父であることも取り沙汰された。

engChrName: However, as his daughter personally led the charge on his arrest, the general public's sentiment was one of compassion and concern...
engSearchText:
However, as his daughter personally led the charge on
his arrest, the general public's sentiment was one of
compassion and concern...
jpnChrName: しかし同社ＣＥＯを逮捕したのもまた 娘である《剣の乙女》本人であったため、 世間的には同情する声も少なくなく……
jpnSearchText:
しかし同社ＣＥＯを逮捕したのもまた
娘である《剣の乙女》本人であったため、
世間的には同情する声も少なくなく……

engChrName: ...and her attempt to turn in her bracer badge was summarily rejected by the guild's headquarters in Leman.
engSearchText:
...and her attempt to turn in her bracer badge was
summarily rejected by the guild's headquarters
in Leman.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士資格を返上するという彼女の申し出も ギルド総本部に却下されたと報じられた。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士資格を返上するという彼女の申し出も
ギルド総本部に却下されたと報じられた。

engChrName: Calvard's economy, which had been briefly thrown into disarray by the state of emergency, was quick to return to relative normality.
engSearchText:
Calvard's economy, which had been briefly thrown
into disarray by the state of emergency, was quick to
return to relative normality.
jpnChrName: 傷痕は残しつつ全土での経済活動が再開され、 これまでの好景気が戻ってきたが……
jpnSearchText:
傷痕は残しつつ全土での経済活動が再開され、
これまでの好景気が戻ってきたが……

engChrName: Yet some things would never return—the impending end of reparations continued to emit a small degree of unease among the populace.
engSearchText:
Yet some things would never return—the impending
end of reparations continued to emit a small degree of
unease among the populace.
jpnChrName: 帝国からの賠償金が終了することもあり、 今後、若干翳りそうな空気も漂い始めていた。
jpnSearchText:
帝国からの賠償金が終了することもあり、
今後、若干翳りそうな空気も漂い始めていた。

engChrName: Still, this and the culmination of events had no ill effect on President Gramheart's approval rating. Indeed, they only served to increase it.
engSearchText:
Still, this and the culmination of events had no ill
effect on President Gramheart's approval rating.
Indeed, they only served to increase it.
jpnChrName: しかし賠償金獲得と未曾有の経済成長を 導いたグラムハート大統領の支持率は 事件の迅速な解決もあり更に高まっており……
jpnSearchText:
しかし賠償金獲得と未曾有の経済成長を
導いたグラムハート大統領の支持率は
事件の迅速な解決もあり更に高まっており……

engChrName: His office stated that a memorial service for Creil would be held during December 3rd's Revolution Festival. Following that would be quite the reveal:
engSearchText:
His office stated that a memorial service for Creil
would be held during December 3rd's Revolution
Festival. Following that would be quite the reveal:
jpnChrName: 大統領府から、１２月３日の《革命記念祭》で 共和国軍の大規模刷新のお披露目の前に、 クレイユ村の追悼式が執り行われることも発表──
jpnSearchText:
大統領府から、１２月３日の《革命記念祭》で
共和国軍の大規模刷新のお披露目の前に、
クレイユ村の追悼式が執り行われることも発表──

engChrName: The Calvard military's newest weapon would be on display—a symbol of the country overcoming its grief and moving forward with great strength.
engSearchText:
The Calvard military's newest weapon would be on
display—a symbol of the country overcoming its grief
and moving forward with great strength.
jpnChrName: 悼ましい事件を乗り越えて“国家”として 更に飛躍していくという期待感のようなものが カルバード国内に広まりつつあった。
jpnSearchText:
悼ましい事件を乗り越えて“国家”として
更に飛躍していくという期待感のようなものが
カルバード国内に広まりつつあった。

engChrName: November 30th, 1208 9:12AM
engSearchText: November 30th, 1208 9:12AM

engChrName: So that's that, huh?
engSearchText: So that's that, huh?
jpnChrName: 一応、これで一区切りってわけね？
jpnSearchText: 一応、これで一区切りってわけね？

engChrName: Yeah. Melchior's still on the run, which does bug me...
engSearchText:
Yeah. Melchior's still on the run, which does
bug me...
jpnChrName: ああ── メルキオルの野郎だけは行方不明だが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
メルキオルの野郎だけは行方不明だが。

engChrName: ...but the authorities and the guild have taken out all their bases and secured any routes that could be used to flee the country.
engSearchText:
...but the authorities and the guild have taken out all
their bases and secured any routes that could be used
to flee the country.
jpnChrName: 連中の全拠点は当局とギルドに潰され、 国外ルートも徹底的に押さえられている。
jpnSearchText:
連中の全拠点は当局とギルドに潰され、
国外ルートも徹底的に押さえられている。

engChrName: Their partners in crime are being taken care of, too, right?
engSearchText:
Their partners in crime are being taken care of,
too, right?
jpnChrName: “裏”の方も、なんですよね？
jpnSearchText: “裏”の方も、なんですよね？

engChrName: Indeed. The Gralsritter and Iscariot have put aside their differences for now to pursue the Gardens.
engSearchText:
Indeed. The Gralsritter and Iscariot have put aside
their differences for now to pursue the Gardens.
jpnChrName: うむ、騎士と僧兵たちも矛を収めて 共に《庭園》方面に当たっているらしい。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、騎士と僧兵たちも矛を収めて
共に《庭園》方面に当たっているらしい。

engChrName: Several jaegers, including those of Ikaruga, and even the society have also been working toward that end.
engSearchText:
Several jaegers, including those of Ikaruga, and even
the society have also been working toward that end.
jpnChrName: 《斑鳩》を始めとする猟兵たちや結社も その点だけは協力しているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
《斑鳩》を始めとする猟兵たちや結社も
その点だけは協力しているようだ。

engChrName: Meanwhile, Heiyue and Marduk spearheaded the effort to expose all of Almata's connections.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, Heiyue and Marduk spearheaded the
effort to expose all of Almata's connections.
jpnChrName: 更に黒月とマルドゥック社主導により 彼らのコネクション全てが洗い出され……
jpnSearchText:
更に黒月とマルドゥック社主導により
彼らのコネクション全てが洗い出され……

engChrName: I believe their findings, which reveal a number of associates, have since been sold to the CID.
engSearchText:
I believe their findings, which reveal a number of
associates, have since been sold to the CID.
jpnChrName: 半グレ──準構成員の情報なども まとめてＣＩＤに売り払われた模様です。
jpnSearchText:
半グレ──準構成員の情報なども
まとめてＣＩＤに売り払われた模様です。

engChrName: That's quite a lot...
engSearchText: That's quite a lot...
jpnChrName: そうだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですか……

engChrName: Man, Gien and Cao never miss a beat.
engSearchText: Man, Gien and Cao never miss a beat.
jpnChrName: 爺さんにツァオたちか。 ったく、抜け目ねぇ連中だな。
jpnSearchText:
爺さんにツァオたちか。
ったく、抜け目ねぇ連中だな。

engChrName: Abi and the rest of our people have been hard at work with Eisenschild, too.
engSearchText:
Abi and the rest of our people have been hard at work
with Eisenschild, too.
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）たちもアイゼンシルトと、 色々と動いていたみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
お父さん（アブ）たちもアイゼンシルトと、
色々と動いていたみたいです。

engChrName: As for the nuclear weapon, we don't need to worry about that, either.
engSearchText:
As for the nuclear weapon, we don't need to worry
about that, either.
jpnChrName: 反応兵器も……もう大丈夫だろうね。
jpnSearchText: 反応兵器も……もう大丈夫だろうね。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton and the other disciples supervised its disassembly, so it's no longer a threat.
engSearchText:
Professor Hamilton and the other disciples supervised
its disassembly, so it's no longer a threat.
jpnChrName: 回収したあの一基も、ハミルトン博士と 他の二高弟の立ち会いで解体──
jpnSearchText:
回収したあの一基も、ハミルトン博士と
他の二高弟の立ち会いで解体──

engChrName: Professor Callaghan isn't believed to have made any more, and the mafia won't be capable of making more themselves any time soon.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan isn't believed to have made any
more, and the mafia won't be capable of making more
themselves any time soon.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授もそれ以上は製造しなかった みたいだし、マフィアに再現は不可能だろう。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授もそれ以上は製造しなかった
みたいだし、マフィアに再現は不可能だろう。

engChrName: Even if the one sword capable of detonating them was still in their possession, they would still need a device to BE detonated.
engSearchText:
Even if the one sword capable of detonating them
was still in their possession, they would still need a
device to BE detonated.
jpnChrName: うむ、起爆を唯一可能にした《剣》が 仮に残っていたとしてもな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、起爆を唯一可能にした《剣》が
仮に残っていたとしてもな。

engChrName: I might add that Calvard is aiding the Congregation for the Sacraments in going through and clearing the rubble that was once Vashtar Palace.
engSearchText:
I might add that Calvard is aiding the Congregation
for the Sacraments in going through and clearing the
rubble that was once Vashtar Palace.
jpnChrName: 現在、封聖省と共和国の協力で 旧王宮の瓦礫の撤去が進められておる。
jpnSearchText:
現在、封聖省と共和国の協力で
旧王宮の瓦礫の撤去が進められておる。

engChrName: They expect to have finished the task and found that sword, together with the halberd and armor artifacts, by mid-next month.
engSearchText:
They expect to have finished the task and found that
sword, together with the halberd and armor artifacts,
by mid-next month.
jpnChrName: あの魔剣、斧槍と甲冑も含め、 来月半ばには回収されるとのことだ。
jpnSearchText:
あの魔剣、斧槍と甲冑も含め、
来月半ばには回収されるとのことだ。

engChrName: None of them can be used by anyone but their rightful owner anyway, right?
engSearchText:
None of them can be used by anyone but their
rightful owner anyway, right?
jpnChrName: しかもそれぞれ所有者にしか 使えないシロモノって話だったっけ？
jpnSearchText:
しかもそれぞれ所有者にしか
使えないシロモノって話だったっけ？

engChrName: *sigh* I guess once that's wrapped up, we'll be able to say this whole thing's well and truly over.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I guess once that's wrapped up, we'll be able to
say this whole thing's well and truly over.
jpnChrName: ふう、そこまで行けば本当の意味で 事件も終わりってことね……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、そこまで行けば本当の意味で
事件も終わりってことね……

engChrName: I suppose so, yes. To think we've persevered through so much...
engSearchText:
I suppose so, yes. To think we've persevered through
so much...
jpnChrName: ……はい、本当に…… 本当に色々ありましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、本当に……
本当に色々ありましたけど。

engChrName: ...We sure have.
engSearchText: ...We sure have.
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: I'm still worried about Melchior, though.
engSearchText: I'm still worried about Melchior, though.
jpnChrName: ……でも、 あの男（メルキオル）については心配ですね。
jpnSearchText:
……でも、
あの男（メルキオル）については心配ですね。

engChrName: Just to me, it's strange how no one seems to have any idea where he is.
engSearchText:
Just to me, it's strange how no one seems to have any
idea where he is.
jpnChrName: 結局、まったく消息が 掴めていないみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
結局、まったく消息が
掴めていないみたいですし。

engChrName: I still can't believe what he did to his own boss...
engSearchText: I still can't believe what he did to his own boss...
jpnChrName: ……最後に自分のボスに あんな事をするなんて……
jpnSearchText:
……最後に自分のボスに
あんな事をするなんて……

engChrName: I don't know if I'll ever be able to understand how that guy thinks. Not that I want to.
engSearchText:
I don't know if I'll ever be able to understand how
that guy thinks. Not that I want to.
jpnChrName: 一リジュも理解できない…… ううん、したくないヤツだったわね。
jpnSearchText:
一リジュも理解できない……
ううん、したくないヤツだったわね。

engChrName: Psychopath does psychopathic things, news at 11. Just how it is.
engSearchText:
Psychopath does psychopathic things, news at 11.
Just how it is.
jpnChrName: ハッ、歪みまくったサイコ野郎なんざ そんなモンだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、歪みまくったサイコ野郎なんざ
そんなモンだろ。

engChrName: I wish I could've taken revenge on the last asshole responsible for my bros' deaths, but can't win 'em all, I guess.
engSearchText:
I wish I could've taken revenge on the last asshole
responsible for my bros' deaths, but can't win 'em all,
I guess.
jpnChrName: セイたちの仇のラスト、 取れてねえのは心残りだが……
jpnSearchText:
セイたちの仇のラスト、
取れてねえのは心残りだが……

engChrName: Yeah. We're gonna have to leave that one to the Oathbreaker's people.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We're gonna have to leave that one to the
Oathbreaker's people.
jpnChrName: ま、これ以上は《破戒》どもに 任せておくしかねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、これ以上は《破戒》どもに
任せておくしかねぇだろう。

engChrName: They say you gotta fight poison with poison—now it's time to see if he'll live up to that old saying.
engSearchText:
They say you gotta fight poison with poison—now
it's time to see if he'll live up to that old saying.
jpnChrName: 蛇の道は蛇……キッチリ カタに嵌めてくれりゃあいいが。
jpnSearchText:
蛇の道は蛇……キッチリ
カタに嵌めてくれりゃあいいが。

engChrName: Right. But at least now, the world can finally be at ease.
engSearchText:
Right. But at least now, the world can finally be
at ease.
jpnChrName: はい……ですが表も裏も、 一安心ではありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
はい……ですが表も裏も、
一安心ではありそうですね。

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: Are you still feeling guilty that you couldn't stop it all from happening?
engSearchText:
Are you still feeling guilty that you couldn't stop it all
from happening?
jpnChrName: また、食い止められなかったとか ヘコんでるの？
jpnSearchText:
また、食い止められなかったとか
ヘコんでるの？

engChrName: I am, but I'm also trying to tell myself that I did everything that I could.
engSearchText:
I am, but I'm also trying to tell myself that I did
everything that I could.
jpnChrName: はい……ですがやれるだけのことは 出来たと思うことにします。
jpnSearchText:
はい……ですがやれるだけのことは
出来たと思うことにします。

engChrName: Including for the children of Oración.
engSearchText: Including for the children of Oración.
jpnChrName: 孤児院や街の子供たちのことも……
jpnSearchText: 孤児院や街の子供たちのことも……

engChrName: Even if I can't help but feel like I put a lot of people out for nothing.
engSearchText:
Even if I can't help but feel like I put a lot of people
out for nothing.
jpnChrName: その、我儘を言わせてもらって 余り意味はなかったかもしれませんが。
jpnSearchText:
その、我儘を言わせてもらって
余り意味はなかったかもしれませんが。

engChrName: That's not true at all!
engSearchText: That's not true at all!
jpnChrName: そんな、とんでもないよ！
jpnSearchText: そんな、とんでもないよ！

engChrName: Perhaps there may be some who would see your actions as self-righteous, but I believe they were meaningful.
engSearchText:
Perhaps there may be some who would see your
actions as self-righteous, but I believe they
were meaningful.
jpnChrName: 見方によっては独り善がり…… ですが価値も意義もあったでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
見方によっては独り善がり……
ですが価値も意義もあったでしょう。

engChrName: Course they were. And I'm not in the business of telling my assistants what's right and wrong, either.
engSearchText:
Course they were. And I'm not in the business of
telling my assistants what's right and wrong, either.
jpnChrName: ああ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）として 何が正しかったと言うつもりはねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）として
何が正しかったと言うつもりはねえ。

engChrName: You did what you believed was right. That's good enough for me.
engSearchText:
You did what you believed was right. That's good
enough for me.
jpnChrName: お前はお前の流儀を貫いた── 今はそれだけで十分だろ。
jpnSearchText:
お前はお前の流儀を貫いた──
今はそれだけで十分だろ。

engChrName: So you got my thanks, too.
engSearchText: So you got my thanks, too.
jpnChrName: ……それと、 改めて礼を言わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……それと、
改めて礼を言わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Well, you're welcome, but I couldn't have done any of it without a lot of help from others.
engSearchText:
Well, you're welcome, but I couldn't have done any of
it without a lot of help from others.
jpnChrName: あはは……先輩たちや多くの方々の 助けがあってのことですし。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……先輩たちや多くの方々の
助けがあってのことですし。

engChrName: Not everything had a happy conclusion, since Elaine's father ended up arrested...
engSearchText:
Not everything had a happy conclusion, since Elaine's
father ended up arrested...
jpnChrName: ……エレインさんのお父さんが 逮捕されたのは残念ですけれど……
jpnSearchText:
……エレインさんのお父さんが
逮捕されたのは残念ですけれど……

engChrName: Not everything had a happy conclusion, since Elaine's father ended up in a coma...
engSearchText:
Not everything had a happy conclusion, since Elaine's
father ended up in a coma...
jpnChrName: ……エレインさんのお父さんは まだ昏睡しているそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
……エレインさんのお父さんは
まだ昏睡しているそうですけど……

engChrName: ...but I'm still so glad that we're all able to gather like this again.
engSearchText:
...but I'm still so glad that we're all able to gather like
this again.
jpnChrName: ……それでも良かったです。 みんなでこうして戻ってこられて。
jpnSearchText:
……それでも良かったです。
みんなでこうして戻ってこられて。

engChrName: Yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah.
jpnChrName: ……そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……そうだな。

engChrName: Me, too!
engSearchText: Me, too!
jpnChrName: えへへ……はいっ！
jpnSearchText: えへへ……はいっ！

engChrName: Our foes were a terrifying force to be reckoned with, but through everyone's cooperation, we triumphed.
engSearchText:
Our foes were a terrifying force to be reckoned with,
but through everyone's cooperation, we triumphed.
jpnChrName: 恐るべき敵に対立する諸勢力…… 皆様、改めてお疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText:
恐るべき敵に対立する諸勢力……
皆様、改めてお疲れ様でした。

engChrName: You deserve a lot of praise yourself, you know. Thinking back, there were a lot of times when I don't know what we would've done without you.
engSearchText:
You deserve a lot of praise yourself, you know.
Thinking back, there were a lot of times when I don't
know what we would've done without you.
jpnChrName: 貴女もね──ホント何度危ないと 思ったか分からないくらいだし。
jpnSearchText:
貴女もね──ホント何度危ないと
思ったか分からないくらいだし。

engChrName: We owe so much to the Goddess...or maybe to our chief having the devil's own luck?
engSearchText:
We owe so much to the Goddess...or maybe to our
chief having the devil's own luck?
jpnChrName: これも女神の賜物…… というより所長の悪運の賜物かしら？
jpnSearchText:
これも女神の賜物……
というより所長の悪運の賜物かしら？

engChrName: Heh. Could be.
engSearchText: Heh. Could be.
jpnChrName: クク、違いねえ。
jpnSearchText: クク、違いねえ。

engChrName: Either that or 'cause I made Lady Luck my bitch.
engSearchText: Either that or 'cause I made Lady Luck my bitch.
jpnChrName: ま、どっちかっつーとオレは 幸運の女神をコマした結果だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、どっちかっつーとオレは
幸運の女神をコマした結果だろうが。

engChrName: What does that mean?
engSearchText: What does that mean?
jpnChrName: こます……？
jpnSearchText: こます……？

engChrName: Will you stop that?! You really can't help yourself, can you?
engSearchText:
Will you stop that?! You really can't help yourself,
can you?
jpnChrName: わーっ、わーっ！ ちょっといい加減にしてよね！？
jpnSearchText:
わーっ、わーっ！
ちょっといい加減にしてよね！？

engChrName: *sigh*
engSearchText: *sigh*
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: Haha...
engSearchText: Haha...
jpnChrName: フフ……
jpnSearchText: フフ……

engChrName: So we now have six Geneses in our possession.
engSearchText: So we now have six Geneses in our possession.
jpnChrName: ──《ゲネシス》も ６つが揃ったことになります。
jpnSearchText:
──《ゲネシス》も
６つが揃ったことになります。

engChrName: I doubt I could have ever gotten this far without all of you, so...thank you.
engSearchText:
I doubt I could have ever gotten this far without all of
you, so...thank you.
jpnChrName: そちらもご尽力、 本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
そちらもご尽力、
本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: Aww. We were happy to help! That just leaves two now, though, right?
engSearchText:
Aww. We were happy to help! That just leaves two
now, though, right?
jpnChrName: えへへ、いえいえ。 でも、残り２つでしたっけ？
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、いえいえ。
でも、残り２つでしたっけ？

engChrName: There are supposed to be eight in all, so that should be the case.
engSearchText:
There are supposed to be eight in all, so that should
be the case.
jpnChrName: 《オクト（８の）＝ゲネシス》ってことは そうなるんじゃないかな？
jpnSearchText:
《オクト（８の）＝ゲネシス》ってことは
そうなるんじゃないかな？

engChrName: Professor Hamilton has been looking into where they could be, but nothing's come up so far.
engSearchText:
Professor Hamilton has been looking into where they
could be, but nothing's come up so far.
jpnChrName: うーん、ハミルトン博士の方でも 色々探ってくれてるみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ハミルトン博士の方でも
色々探ってくれてるみたいだけど。

engChrName: None have been discovered in any of Almata's bases or the Gardens' hideouts, either.
engSearchText:
None have been discovered in any of Almata's bases
or the Gardens' hideouts, either.
jpnChrName: 現時点で《アルマータ》と《庭園》の 拠点からも見つかっていないそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
現時点で《アルマータ》と《庭園》の
拠点からも見つかっていないそうですね。

engChrName: I'm sure they'll turn up eventually. Just gotta keep lookin'.
engSearchText:
I'm sure they'll turn up eventually. Just gotta
keep lookin'.
jpnChrName: ま、そっちは 気長に攻めるしかねえかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そっちは
気長に攻めるしかねえかもな。

engChrName: So, now that we've dealt with Almata, things should be back to business as usual before long.
engSearchText:
So, now that we've dealt with Almata, things should
be back to business as usual before long.
jpnChrName: ──なんにせよマフィア絡みは決着、 事務所もボチボチ平常運転に戻るだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──なんにせよマフィア絡みは決着、
事務所もボチボチ平常運転に戻るだろう。

engChrName: There's still gonna be plenty on our plates, especially in the short term...
engSearchText:
There's still gonna be plenty on our plates, especially
in the short term...
jpnChrName: 仕事は幾らでもあるが──
jpnSearchText: 仕事は幾らでもあるが──

engChrName: ...but it's about time you guys started thinkin' about whether or not you wanna keep workin' here.
engSearchText:
...but it's about time you guys started thinkin' about
whether or not you wanna keep workin' here.
jpnChrName: このままバイトを続けるかどうか、 それぞれ考えておくんだな。
jpnSearchText:
このままバイトを続けるかどうか、
それぞれ考えておくんだな。

engChrName: Hmph...
engSearchText: Hmph...
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: I suppose it is getting to be that time... The way things are going, my primary task will be complete before much longer.
engSearchText:
I suppose it is getting to be that time... The way
things are going, my primary task will be complete
before much longer.
jpnChrName: 確かに……出向の主目的も このままだと無事完了しそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……出向の主目的も
このままだと無事完了しそうですし。

engChrName: I've still got other things I want to do here in the capital, at least.
engSearchText:
I've still got other things I want to do here in the
capital, at least.
jpnChrName: うーん、僕はまだ 首都でやり残したことはあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、僕はまだ
首都でやり残したことはあるけど……

engChrName: And hey! I'm not even employed here!
engSearchText: And hey! I'm not even employed here!
jpnChrName: って、あたしはそもそも 助手でもなんでもないでしょ！
jpnSearchText:
って、あたしはそもそも
助手でもなんでもないでしょ！

engChrName: Wasn't really talkin' to you, but since you seem so dead set against being here anyway, why not go home already?
engSearchText:
Wasn't really talkin' to you, but since you seem so
dead set against being here anyway, why not go
home already?
jpnChrName: お前さんに言ったつもりはねぇが…… だったらいつ自宅に戻るんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんに言ったつもりはねぇが……
だったらいつ自宅に戻るんだよ？

engChrName: Umm... Well...
engSearchText: Umm... Well...
jpnChrName: うっ……それはその。
jpnSearchText: うっ……それはその。

engChrName: I would, but the paparazzi are such a headache, and the food here is so good...
engSearchText:
I would, but the paparazzi are such a headache, and
the food here is so good...
jpnChrName: パパラッチが面倒だし…… ………ゴハンも美味しいし。
jpnSearchText:
パパラッチが面倒だし……
………ゴハンも美味しいし。

engChrName: I get that they're a hassle, but come on—they have to've given up on your story by now.
engSearchText:
I get that they're a hassle, but come on—they have
to've given up on your story by now.
jpnChrName: 気持ちは分からんでもねぇが そろそろ賞味期限切れのネタだろ。
jpnSearchText:
気持ちは分からんでもねぇが
そろそろ賞味期限切れのネタだろ。

engChrName: And Nina seems worried about you, so even if you don't go see your family, you should still go back to your old place.
engSearchText:
And Nina seems worried about you, so even if you
don't go see your family, you should still go back to
your old place.
jpnChrName: 後輩も心配してるし、実家はともかく、 自宅には戻った方がいいんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
後輩も心配してるし、実家はともかく、
自宅には戻った方がいいんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: I-I will—EVENTUALLY! What are you, my mother?!
engSearchText:
I-I will—EVENTUALLY! What are you,
my mother?!
jpnChrName: わ、分かってるわよ！ アンタはあたしのオカンかっ！
jpnSearchText:
わ、分かってるわよ！
アンタはあたしのオカンかっ！

engChrName: Perhaps you should discuss the situation with the owner of your apartment?
engSearchText:
Perhaps you should discuss the situation with the
owner of your apartment?
jpnChrName: ま、まあマンションの管理人さんには 話した方がいいかもしれませんね……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあマンションの管理人さんには
話した方がいいかもしれませんね……

engChrName: I WAS talkin' to you, though.
engSearchText: I WAS talkin' to you, though.
jpnChrName: つうかアニエス、お前も同じだぞ。
jpnSearchText: つうかアニエス、お前も同じだぞ。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: There's still coverin' all the trouble Almata caused, but I doubt that'll last more than a month.
engSearchText:
There's still coverin' all the trouble Almata caused,
but I doubt that'll last more than a month.
jpnChrName: 今までアルマータの影響で発生していた “裏の仕事”も一月したら落ち着くだろう。
jpnSearchText:
今までアルマータの影響で発生していた
“裏の仕事”も一月したら落ち着くだろう。

engChrName: So unless I start takin' on more subcontracted jobs, I'm not gonna need to pay out for any assistants anymore—or have the budget to do it.
engSearchText:
So unless I start takin' on more subcontracted jobs,
I'm not gonna need to pay out for any assistants
anymore—or have the budget to do it.
jpnChrName: 他の下請けとかしなけりゃ、 無理して助手を雇う必要もなくなる。
jpnSearchText:
他の下請けとかしなけりゃ、
無理して助手を雇う必要もなくなる。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: B-But...
engSearchText: B-But...

engChrName: I plan to find those last two Geneses, but it's gotta be on the side while I do other work from here on.
engSearchText:
I plan to find those last two Geneses, but it's gotta
be on the side while I do other work from here on.
jpnChrName: 残る２つの捜索も継続するが どうしたって仕事の合間にはなる。
jpnSearchText:
残る２つの捜索も継続するが
どうしたって仕事の合間にはなる。

engChrName: So while a helpin' hand when I'm swamped would be nice, it's all I'm gonna need you for.
engSearchText:
So while a helpin' hand when I'm swamped would be
nice, it's all I'm gonna need you for.
jpnChrName: だから──たまに忙しい時に バイトに来てもらうくらいで十分だ。
jpnSearchText:
だから──たまに忙しい時に
バイトに来てもらうくらいで十分だ。

engChrName: 'Sides, you're gonna be loaded up with Student Council work for a good while after next month rolls around.
engSearchText:
'Sides, you're gonna be loaded up with Student
Council work for a good while after next month
rolls around.
jpnChrName: それに生徒会なら来月くらいから しばらく忙しくなるんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
それに生徒会なら来月くらいから
しばらく忙しくなるんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: That's...true, but...
engSearchText: That's...true, but...

engChrName: What kind of work?
engSearchText: What kind of work?
jpnChrName: ？　それって……
jpnSearchText: ？　それって……

engChrName: Oh, umm... There's going to be some big event taking place at Agnès' school in a few months.
engSearchText:
Oh, umm... There's going to be some big event
taking place at Agnès' school in a few months.
jpnChrName: ……えと、高校の方で 行事があるみたいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
……えと、高校の方で
行事があるみたいですけど……

engChrName: There's no need to hurry them into a decision.
engSearchText: There's no need to hurry them into a decision.
jpnChrName: まあ、そう急（せ）くこともあるまい。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そう急（せ）くこともあるまい。

engChrName: As you said, you still intend to help deal with the aftermath of Almata's actions.
engSearchText:
As you said, you still intend to help deal with the
aftermath of Almata's actions.
jpnChrName: おぬしの事だ──もうしばし首都での “後始末”に対応するのであろう？
jpnSearchText:
おぬしの事だ──もうしばし首都での
“後始末”に対応するのであろう？
