engChrName: I will remain here to assist you with that as well—and the more we have on our side, the better.
engSearchText:
I will remain here to assist you with that as well—and
the more we have on our side, the better.
jpnChrName: 私もそこまでは助太刀するつもりだし、 人手は多いに越したことはあるまい？
jpnSearchText:
私もそこまでは助太刀するつもりだし、
人手は多いに越したことはあるまい？

engChrName: You're not wrong there.
engSearchText: You're not wrong there.
jpnChrName: ま、そりゃ確かに。
jpnSearchText: ま、そりゃ確かに。

engChrName: I just wanted to give you guys a heads up that you should be thinkin' about this stuff.
engSearchText:
I just wanted to give you guys a heads up that you
should be thinkin' about this stuff.
jpnChrName: とにかく考えとけってことだ。
jpnSearchText: とにかく考えとけってことだ。

engChrName: The Revolution Festival's in three days, and we're gonna be drownin' in work until then for sure.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival's in three days, and we're
gonna be drownin' in work until then for sure.
jpnChrName: とりあえず３日後の革命記念祭までは “揺れ戻し”で忙しいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず３日後の革命記念祭までは
“揺れ戻し”で忙しいだろ。

engChrName: Been a while since we could focus on 4SPGs in Edith, so hope you're ready to dive in soon as breakfast is done.
engSearchText:
Been a while since we could focus on 4SPGs in
Edith, so hope you're ready to dive in soon as
breakfast is done.
jpnChrName: 久々の首都の４ｓｐｇ──朝メシ喰ったら バリバリ手伝ってもらうから覚悟しとけよ。
jpnSearchText:
久々の首都の４ｓｐｇ──朝メシ喰ったら
バリバリ手伝ってもらうから覚悟しとけよ。

engChrName: I'll meet you guys back here at half-past ten. What're you gonna be up to in the meantime, Agnès?
engSearchText:
I'll meet you guys back here at half-past ten.
What're you gonna be up to in the meantime, Agnès?
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ１０時半に集合だ。 ──アニエス、お前はどうする？
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあ１０時半に集合だ。
──アニエス、お前はどうする？

engChrName: Oh, not much. I do have something that I need to do, though...
engSearchText:
Oh, not much. I do have something that I need to
do, though...
jpnChrName: あ、ちょっと やる事がありまして……
jpnSearchText:
あ、ちょっと
やる事がありまして……

engChrName: I think I should take care of a software update that needs installing now, actually.
engSearchText:
I think I should take care of a software update that
needs installing now, actually.
jpnChrName: そうだ、今のうちに インストールしとかなきゃ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、今のうちに
インストールしとかなきゃ。

engChrName: Version 3.6.2 of the Kitty Engine that was released last night? I was thinking the same thing.
engSearchText:
Version 3.6.2 of the Kitty Engine that was released
last night? I was thinking the same thing.
jpnChrName: 昨夜更新されたばかりの キティエンジンver3.6.2ですね。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜更新されたばかりの
キティエンジンver3.6.2ですね。

engChrName: Umm... I'll just get going for now, then.
engSearchText: Umm... I'll just get going for now, then.
jpnChrName: えと……失礼します。
jpnSearchText: えと……失礼します。

engChrName: Until later.
engSearchText: Until later.
jpnChrName: では、後ほどな。
jpnSearchText: では、後ほどな。

engChrName: So she pushed an update, huh? Our ex-Kitty sure keeps herself busy.
engSearchText:
So she pushed an update, huh? Our ex-Kitty sure
keeps herself busy.
jpnChrName: 確かに更新が来てるな…… 元仔猫もマメっつーか。
jpnSearchText:
確かに更新が来てるな……
元仔猫もマメっつーか。

engChrName: And I just know her workload in Oración must've been nuts, too.
engSearchText:
And I just know her workload in Oración must've
been nuts, too.
jpnChrName: オラシオンでもアニエスにエレインと あちこちに協力してやがったし。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンでもアニエスにエレインと
あちこちに協力してやがったし。

engChrName: (...This is for the best, I think.)
engSearchText: (...This is for the best, I think.)
jpnChrName: （──ま、このへんが落とし所だろ。）
jpnSearchText: （──ま、このへんが落とし所だろ。）

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Just tell me what you want.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Just tell me what you want.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_9000}はいはい、なんなの？ 用件を言いなさいよね。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_9000}はいはい、なんなの？
用件を言いなさいよね。

engChrName: (She hasn't done anything out of the ordinary since Oración.)
engSearchText:
(She hasn't done anything out of the ordinary
since Oración.)
jpnChrName: （……あれから特に反応はねぇか。）
jpnSearchText: （……あれから特に反応はねぇか。）

engChrName: (There's still a lot of mysteries to be solved about both her and the Grendel...)
engSearchText:
(There's still a lot of mysteries to be solved about both
her and the Grendel...)
jpnChrName: （グレンデルと合わせて   まだまだ謎は残っているが……）
jpnSearchText:
（グレンデルと合わせて
まだまだ謎は残っているが……）

engChrName: (...but those've got nothin' to do with the others—not even Agnès.)
engSearchText:
(...but those've got nothin' to do with the others—not
even Agnès.)
jpnChrName: （あいつらには本来、関係ないしな。 ──アニエスも含めて。）
jpnSearchText:
（あいつらには本来、関係ないしな。
──アニエスも含めて。）

engChrName: No... This is all wrong...
engSearchText: No... This is all wrong...
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_9001}ちがう……こんなのちがう……
jpnSearchText: <C8>{CC_VOICE=VO_60_9001}<W600>ちがう……こんなのちがう……

engChrName: This isn't who I am! This isn't me!
engSearchText: This isn't who I am! This isn't me!
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_9002}──アタシじゃない！ こんなのアタシじゃないもんっ！
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_9002}──アタシじゃない！
こんなのアタシじゃないもんっ！

engChrName: Haha. I was right all along...
engSearchText: Haha. I was right all along...
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_9003}クク……やはりそうか………
jpnSearchText: <C8>{CC_VOICE=VO_60_9003}<W600>クク……やはりそうか………

engChrName: I found it... Seems my work here is now done...
engSearchText: I found it... Seems my work here is now done...
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_9004}……見つけたぞ……… これで目的達成だ───……
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_9004}……見つけたぞ………
これで目的達成だ───……

engChrName: ...Still, maybe Master was right that I laid that on them outta nowhere.
engSearchText:
...Still, maybe Master was right that I laid that on
them outta nowhere.
jpnChrName: ……ま、師父（せんせい）の言葉じゃねえが さっきは流石にいきなりすぎたか。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、師父（せんせい）の言葉じゃねえが
さっきは流石にいきなりすぎたか。

engChrName: There's still time until we need to head out. Why don't I go check on 'em?
engSearchText:
There's still time until we need to head out.
Why don't I go check on 'em?
jpnChrName: まだ時間はある── ちょいと様子を見て出かけるかね。
jpnSearchText:
まだ時間はある──
ちょいと様子を見て出かけるかね。

engChrName: Are those Central Eastern and Western history textbooks?
engSearchText:
Are those Central Eastern and Western
history textbooks?
jpnChrName: そいつは──中東式と 西方式の歴史の教科書か？
jpnSearchText:
そいつは──中東式と
西方式の歴史の教科書か？

engChrName: Oh! Yeah. Agnès gave me the Western one.
engSearchText: Oh! Yeah. Agnès gave me the Western one.
jpnChrName: あ、はいっ、こっちの西方式は アニエスさんにもらったものです。
jpnSearchText:
あ、はいっ、こっちの西方式は
アニエスさんにもらったものです。

engChrName: They're supposed to be the same edition, but there's a bunch of little differences between their contents and viewpoints.
engSearchText:
They're supposed to be the same edition, but there's a
bunch of little differences between their contents
and viewpoints.
jpnChrName: 同じ版？だそうですけど項目とか 見方がちょっとずつ違っていて。
jpnSearchText:
同じ版？だそうですけど項目とか
見方がちょっとずつ違っていて。

engChrName: It's been really eye-opening comparing them—even if there's also lots of stuff I don't really understand.
engSearchText:
It's been really eye-opening comparing them—even if
there's also lots of stuff I don't really understand.
jpnChrName: とっても勉強になります。 分からないことも多いですけど……
jpnSearchText:
とっても勉強になります。
分からないことも多いですけど……

engChrName: Well, ain't you a budding scholar? If you can get your hands on the Far Eastern version, I bet you'd find all kinds of differences there, too.
engSearchText:
Well, ain't you a budding scholar? If you can get your
hands on the Far Eastern version, I bet you'd find all
kinds of differences there, too.
jpnChrName: ハハ、勉強熱心だな。 東方式もまた違ってたはずだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、勉強熱心だな。
東方式もまた違ってたはずだが。

engChrName: Heehee. I was thinking the same thing, so Aaron promised to give me his old copy.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I was thinking the same thing, so Aaron
promised to give me his old copy.
jpnChrName: えへへ、そっちはアーロンさんに 昔のものを貰う約束になってます。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、そっちはアーロンさんに
昔のものを貰う約束になってます。

engChrName: You know, before I met you, I barely left the village. Most of my life was spent inside of it.
engSearchText:
You know, before I met you, I barely left the village.
Most of my life was spent inside of it.
jpnChrName: わたし、クルガの里にずっといて 遠征でたまに外に出ただけですけど……
jpnSearchText:
わたし、クルガの里にずっといて
遠征でたまに外に出ただけですけど……

engChrName: But Aida wasn't kidding when she talked about how big the outside world is.
engSearchText:
But Aida wasn't kidding when she talked about how
big the outside world is.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんの言っていたように 世界って、ホントーに広いんですね。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんの言っていたように
世界って、ホントーに広いんですね。

engChrName: Even if I dedicated my entire life to studying, I doubt I could learn all there is to know about it.
engSearchText:
Even if I dedicated my entire life to studying, I doubt
I could learn all there is to know about it.
jpnChrName: それこそ勉強しきれないくらい……
jpnSearchText: それこそ勉強しきれないくらい……

engChrName: ...Probably, yeah.
engSearchText: ...Probably, yeah.
jpnChrName: ……そうか。
jpnSearchText: ……そうか。

engChrName: Listen: I meant what I said earlier, but I probably shouldn't have brought it up outta nowhere the way I did.
engSearchText:
Listen: I meant what I said earlier, but I probably
shouldn't have brought it up outta nowhere the way
I did.
jpnChrName: 謝るつもりはねぇが── 少し、いきなりすぎたみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
謝るつもりはねぇが──
少し、いきなりすぎたみたいだな。

engChrName: N-No, I totally get where you're coming from!
engSearchText: N-No, I totally get where you're coming from!
jpnChrName: いえっ、そんなっ……！
jpnSearchText: いえっ、そんなっ……！

engChrName: The timing is right. Now that Almata's gone, I feel like I've been able to avenge Aida's death.
engSearchText:
The timing is right. Now that Almata's gone, I feel
like I've been able to avenge Aida's death.
jpnChrName: アルマータが壊滅したことで 一応、アイーダさんの仇も討てました。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータが壊滅したことで
一応、アイーダさんの仇も討てました。

engChrName: It sounds like Abi's willing to forgive me for disobeying his orders, too.
engSearchText:
It sounds like Abi's willing to forgive me for
disobeying his orders, too.
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）も命令違反の“罰”は ある程度大目に見てもいいって……
jpnSearchText:
お父さん（アブ）も命令違反の“罰”は
ある程度大目に見てもいいって……

engChrName: I also miss Umi—my mom—and my siblings Lana and Camil, to tell you the truth.
engSearchText:
I also miss Umi—my mom—and my siblings Lana
and Camil, to tell you the truth.
jpnChrName: お母さん（アマ）にラナにカミルとも 久しぶりに会いたいですし……
jpnSearchText:
お母さん（アマ）にラナにカミルとも
久しぶりに会いたいですし……

engChrName: But...I've also gotten used to living in Calvard, and I have a lot of fun at Sunday School...
engSearchText:
But...I've also gotten used to living in Calvard, and I
have a lot of fun at Sunday School...
jpnChrName: ……でも、こっちの日曜学校や カルバードでの暮らしも慣れてきて……
jpnSearchText:
……でも、こっちの日曜学校や
カルバードでの暮らしも慣れてきて……

engChrName: ...and more than anything else, I'd be really sad to say goodbye to you and everyone here.
engSearchText:
...and more than anything else, I'd be really sad to say
goodbye to you and everyone here.
jpnChrName: 何よりヴァンさんやアニエスさんたちと お別れなのはさみしいです……
jpnSearchText:
何よりヴァンさんやアニエスさんたちと
お別れなのはさみしいです……

engChrName: ...Haha.
engSearchText: ...Haha.
jpnChrName: ………ははっ。
jpnSearchText: ………ははっ。

engChrName: Still, we're not talkin' about tomorrow or even next week—and even if you do go home it's not like we'll never see each other again.
engSearchText:
Still, we're not talkin' about tomorrow or even next
week—and even if you do go home it's not like we'll
never see each other again.
jpnChrName: まだ先の話だし、仮に故郷に帰っても その気になりゃいつでも会えんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
まだ先の話だし、仮に故郷に帰っても
その気になりゃいつでも会えんだろ。

engChrName: If your goal is to become a real warrior, though, then I think the choice is clear.
engSearchText:
If your goal is to become a real warrior, though, then
I think the choice is clear.
jpnChrName: “一人前の戦士”になりたいんだったら 迷うことはないんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
“一人前の戦士”になりたいんだったら
迷うことはないんじゃねえか？

engChrName: I guess you're right...
engSearchText: I guess you're right...
jpnSearchText: ……………はい…………

engChrName: Though you don't have to go down that path if you don't want to. There's plenty of things you could do off the battlefield.
engSearchText:
Though you don't have to go down that path if you
don't want to. There's plenty of things you could do
off the battlefield.
jpnChrName: まあ、突撃銃剣（アサルトソード）を 取らない道もアリとは思うが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、突撃銃剣（アサルトソード）を
取らない道もアリとは思うが。

engChrName: You could even try followin' a path more like Sylphid's.
engSearchText:
You could even try followin' a path more
like Sylphid's.
jpnChrName: もしくは“妖精”みたいな道とかな。
jpnSearchText: もしくは“妖精”みたいな道とかな。

engChrName: You really think I could be like Fie?
engSearchText: You really think I could be like Fie?
jpnChrName: え……フィーさんと？
jpnSearchText: え……フィーさんと？

engChrName: I'm not pushin' you to join the guild or anything, to be clear.
engSearchText:
I'm not pushin' you to join the guild or anything, to
be clear.
jpnChrName: いや、別にギルドを 勧めてるわけでもねぇけどな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、別にギルドを
勧めてるわけでもねぇけどな。

engChrName: Just sayin' it might be better than you followin' in your brother's footsteps...
engSearchText:
Just sayin' it might be better than you followin' in
your brother's footsteps...
jpnChrName: ──お前の兄貴の所属先は 流石にちょいとお勧めできねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
──お前の兄貴の所属先は
流石にちょいとお勧めできねぇが。

engChrName: Y-Yeah. I think so, too.
engSearchText: Y-Yeah. I think so, too.
jpnChrName: そ、それはわたしも思いますけど……
jpnSearchText: そ、それはわたしも思いますけど……

engChrName: Still, I never even considered becoming a bracer...
engSearchText: Still, I never even considered becoming a bracer...
jpnChrName: わたしが遊撃士……？ ……そんなこと考えたことも……
jpnSearchText:
わたしが遊撃士……？
……そんなこと考えたことも……

engChrName: I-Is it okay if I think more about it?
engSearchText: I-Is it okay if I think more about it?
jpnChrName: も、もうちょっと考えさせてくださいっ！
jpnSearchText: も、もうちょっと考えさせてくださいっ！

engChrName: Think about it as long as you want—there's no rush. And just be ready to head out in a bit, okay?
engSearchText:
Think about it as long as you want—there's no rush.
And just be ready to head out in a bit, okay?
jpnChrName: 別に焦る必要はねえっての。 ──ま、出かける準備はしとけ。
jpnSearchText:
別に焦る必要はねえっての。
──ま、出かける準備はしとけ。

engChrName: Okay!
engSearchText: Okay!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: *humming* ♪
engSearchText: *humming* ♪
jpnSearchText: ～～♪～～……

engChrName: Honestly kinda nice to have you still actin' the same around times like these.
engSearchText:
Honestly kinda nice to have you still actin' the same
around times like these.
jpnChrName: ……なんつーか、お前のブレなさは こういう時は貴重な気がするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……なんつーか、お前のブレなさは
こういう時は貴重な気がするぜ。

engChrName: What? You come to talk about that cold bunk you said to the kiddos?
engSearchText:
What? You come to talk about that cold bunk you
said to the kiddos?
jpnChrName: ハッ、お子ちゃまどもにかけた つれねぇ言葉のことか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、お子ちゃまどもにかけた
つれねぇ言葉のことか？

engChrName: If it was gonna eat away at you, you shouldn't have said it in the first place. Looks lame when a dad past his prime sulks over his teenage kids.
engSearchText:
If it was gonna eat away at you, you shouldn't have
said it in the first place. Looks lame when a dad past
his prime sulks over his teenage kids.
jpnChrName: 気にするくらいなら言ってんじゃねえ。 思春期のガキがいるオッサンかよ。
jpnSearchText:
気にするくらいなら言ってんじゃねえ。
思春期のガキがいるオッサンかよ。

engChrName: Quit findin' ways to call me old!
engSearchText: Quit findin' ways to call me old!
jpnChrName: オッサン言うんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText: オッサン言うんじゃねえ！

engChrName: 'Sides, you seem to have it in your head I wasn't talkin' to you, but I was.
engSearchText:
'Sides, you seem to have it in your head I wasn't
talkin' to you, but I was.
jpnChrName: ──しれっとスルーしてやがるが お前に向けても言ったことだからな。
jpnSearchText:
──しれっとスルーしてやがるが
お前に向けても言ったことだからな。

engChrName: You gotta have plans to go back home eventually, right?
engSearchText:
You gotta have plans to go back home
eventually, right?
jpnChrName: 特にお前は煌都がホームだ。 いずれ戻るのは決めてんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
特にお前は煌都がホームだ。
いずれ戻るのは決めてんだろ？

engChrName: Sure do. I'm a born and bred Langport boy, and I always will be.
engSearchText:
Sure do. I'm a born and bred Langport boy, and I
always will be.
jpnChrName: たりめーだ。 煌都の水で育った煌都っ子だからな。
jpnSearchText:
たりめーだ。
煌都の水で育った煌都っ子だからな。

engChrName: But I've only been here for three months. That's barely enough time to miss me.
engSearchText:
But I've only been here for three months.
That's barely enough time to miss me.
jpnChrName: ま、首都に出て３ヶ月かそこらで 里帰りっつーのも格好がつかねぇし。
jpnSearchText:
ま、首都に出て３ヶ月かそこらで
里帰りっつーのも格好がつかねぇし。

engChrName: So unless I've got some specific reason to head back, I'm staying put.
engSearchText:
So unless I've got some specific reason to head back,
I'm staying put.
jpnChrName: 特に理由がねぇ限りは まだ煌都に戻るつもりはねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
特に理由がねぇ限りは
まだ煌都に戻るつもりはねぇな。

engChrName: But I wouldn't mind going to a few other places, like Crossbell or Erebonia.
engSearchText:
But I wouldn't mind going to a few other places, like
Crossbell or Erebonia.
jpnChrName: いずれクロスベルや帝国なんかを ぐるっと回ってもいいかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
いずれクロスベルや帝国なんかを
ぐるっと回ってもいいかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Hell, I'd even put eastern Zemuria on the table.
engSearchText: Hell, I'd even put eastern Zemuria on the table.
jpnChrName: もしくは──大陸東部なんかをな。
jpnSearchText: もしくは──大陸東部なんかをな。

engChrName: Heh. Look at you go.
engSearchText: Heh. Look at you go.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Knock it off with the 'my baby's growin' up' vibe.
engSearchText: Knock it off with the 'my baby's growin' up' vibe.
jpnChrName: 生暖かい目はウゼーからやめろ。
jpnSearchText: 生暖かい目はウゼーからやめろ。

engChrName: Oh, and let's get one thing straight: me staying in the capital doesn't mean I'm gonna be at your beck and call.
engSearchText:
Oh, and let's get one thing straight: me staying in the
capital doesn't mean I'm gonna be at your beck
and call.
jpnChrName: ちなみに首都にしばらく居るからって てめぇを手伝うかどうかは別だからな？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに首都にしばらく居るからって
てめぇを手伝うかどうかは別だからな？

engChrName: If the girls left and this place turned into a total sausage fest...I don't even wanna think about how sad a sight that'd be.
engSearchText:
If the girls left and this place turned into a total
sausage fest...I don't even wanna think about how sad
a sight that'd be.
jpnChrName: 仮に野郎だけの職場とかなったら ウザすぎつうか……ワビしすぎんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
仮に野郎だけの職場とかなったら
ウザすぎつうか……ワビしすぎんだろ。

engChrName: Hey, don't give me that look! I'm not after your pity, all right?
engSearchText:
Hey, don't give me that look! I'm not after your pity,
all right?
jpnChrName: 哀れむ目で見てんじゃねえ！ ったく……
jpnSearchText:
哀れむ目で見てんじゃねえ！
ったく……

engChrName: By the way...your old problem ain't shown any sign of resurfacing, right?
engSearchText:
By the way...your old problem ain't shown any sign
of resurfacing, right?
jpnChrName: それはともかく…… お前、あれから何もないのか？
jpnSearchText:
それはともかく……
お前、あれから何もないのか？

engChrName: You mean that Tyrant?
engSearchText: You mean that Tyrant?
jpnChrName: ああ…… あのクソッタレな大君（タイクン）とやらか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
あのクソッタレな大君（タイクン）とやらか？

engChrName: Yeah, nothing there. Gien can call me a reincarnation all he wants, but as far as I'm concerned, I'm as me as I can be.
engSearchText:
Yeah, nothing there. Gien can call me a reincarnation
all he wants, but as far as I'm concerned, I'm as me as
I can be.
jpnChrName: 爺さんは生まれ変わりだのなんだの 抜かしてたが、オレはあくまでオレだ。
jpnSearchText:
爺さんは生まれ変わりだのなんだの
抜かしてたが、オレはあくまでオレだ。

engChrName: I decide what I wanna do with my life—not some dusty old relic from the ancient past.
engSearchText:
I decide what I wanna do with my life—not some
dusty old relic from the ancient past.
jpnChrName: てめえの道はてめぇで切り拓く。 骨董品なんざお呼びじゃねーんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
てめえの道はてめぇで切り拓く。
骨董品なんざお呼びじゃねーんだよ。

engChrName: Heh... You're a one-of-a-kind cocky little bastard, you know that?
engSearchText:
Heh... You're a one-of-a-kind cocky little bastard,
you know that?
jpnChrName: そうか…… ほんとクソ生意気な小僧だな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……
ほんとクソ生意気な小僧だな。

engChrName: And what's that supposed to mean? Don't be such a freakin' creep.
engSearchText:
And what's that supposed to mean? Don't be such a
freakin' creep.
jpnChrName: ……？　気持ち悪ぃな。
jpnSearchText: ……？　気持ち悪ぃな。

engChrName: Anyway, get lost so I can have my fun.
engSearchText: Anyway, get lost so I can have my fun.
jpnChrName: とにかく食後のお愉しみくらい、 好きにタンノーさせろや。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく食後のお愉しみくらい、
好きにタンノーさせろや。

engChrName: Though if you don't mind waiting to kick some ass on the clock, that'll give me time to go tap some ass off the clock.
engSearchText:
Though if you don't mind waiting to kick some ass
on the clock, that'll give me time to go tap some ass
off the clock.
jpnChrName: ああ、もう少し待てっつうなら オキニのトコにしけ込んで来るぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、もう少し待てっつうなら
オキニのトコにしけ込んで来るぜ？

engChrName: We ain't puttin' off work for THAT! Just how much have you been getting around when I haven't been lookin'?!
engSearchText:
We ain't puttin' off work for THAT! Just how much
have you been getting around when I haven't
been lookin'?!
jpnChrName: そこまで時間はねえっつの！ つかどんだけ遊んでんだお前は！？
jpnSearchText:
そこまで時間はねえっつの！
つかどんだけ遊んでんだお前は！？

engChrName: (Must be working on stuff for Marduk. Probably about Almata.)
engSearchText:
(Must be working on stuff for Marduk.
Probably about Almata.)
jpnChrName: （ＭＫの案件処理か……   アルマータの事後処理っぽいな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ＭＫの案件処理か……
アルマータの事後処理っぽいな。）

engChrName: (There's still a decent chunk of time until half past, so I'd better get out of her hair.)
engSearchText:
(There's still a decent chunk of time until half past, so
I'd better get out of her hair.)
jpnChrName: （まだ半まで時間はあるし   邪魔するのはやめておくか──）
jpnSearchText:
（まだ半まで時間はあるし
邪魔するのはやめておくか──）

engChrName: Phew... Oh, Mr. Arkride!
engSearchText: Phew... Oh, Mr. Arkride!
jpnChrName: ふう…… ──あら、ヴァン様？
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
──あら、ヴァン様？

engChrName: Sorry. I wouldn't have come in if I'd known you were working.
engSearchText:
Sorry. I wouldn't have come in if I'd known you
were working.
jpnChrName: 悪ぃ、邪魔するつもりは 無かったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
悪ぃ、邪魔するつもりは
無かったんだが。

engChrName: All the Almata stuff almost wrapped up?
engSearchText: All the Almata stuff almost wrapped up?
jpnChrName: アルマータ関連も 一通り落ち着いてきたか。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ関連も
一通り落ち着いてきたか。

engChrName: Yes. We've been able to pinpoint groups related to them, their dummy corporations, and other illegal channels.
engSearchText:
Yes. We've been able to pinpoint groups related to
them, their dummy corporations, and other
illegal channels.
jpnChrName: ええ、関連組織に裏ルート、 ペーパーカンパニーの類いは粗方。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、関連組織に裏ルート、
ペーパーカンパニーの類いは粗方。

engChrName: I admit to some surprise at just how far outside of Calvard their reach spreads...
engSearchText:
I admit to some surprise at just how far outside of
Calvard their reach spreads...
jpnChrName: カルバードのみならず、大陸各地にまで コネクションが及んでいたのは驚きですが……
jpnSearchText:
カルバードのみならず、大陸各地にまで
コネクションが及んでいたのは驚きですが……

engChrName: ...but Marduk has largely decontaminated the areas over which it has influence.
engSearchText:
...but Marduk has largely decontaminated the areas
over which it has influence.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社のカバーするエリアの “除染”はほぼ完了した模様です。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社のカバーするエリアの
“除染”はほぼ完了した模様です。

engChrName: Your chief of security had a big role to play in that, too, I'm sure.
engSearchText:
Your chief of security had a big role to play in that,
too, I'm sure.
jpnChrName: 警備主任殿もさぞご活躍だろうな。
jpnSearchText: 警備主任殿もさぞご活躍だろうな。

engChrName: Though who wants to bet Thorndyke'll use this as a chance to expand Marduk's market share?
engSearchText:
Though who wants to bet Thorndyke'll use this as a
chance to expand Marduk's market share?
jpnChrName: あのＧＭあたりはこれを機に 露骨にシェア拡大を狙ってそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
あのＧＭあたりはこれを機に
露骨にシェア拡大を狙ってそうだが。

engChrName: Heehee. I suspect you would be on the winning side of that bet.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I suspect you would be on the winning side
of that bet.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうですね。

engChrName: Between the war against the Empire and the tower in Crossbell appearing soon after, it feels like too much is happening too fast in Zemuria.
engSearchText:
Between the war against the Empire and the tower in
Crossbell appearing soon after, it feels like too much
is happening too fast in Zemuria.
jpnChrName: ──帝国の戦役、それに続くバベル事件で 大陸の時計の針はますます加速しています。
jpnSearchText:
──帝国の戦役、それに続くバベル事件で
大陸の時計の針はますます加速しています。

engChrName: As other countries seek to catch up with the Republic and its latest innovations—Xiphas, Assault Frames...
engSearchText:
As other countries seek to catch up with the Republic
and its latest innovations—Xiphas, Assault Frames...
jpnChrName: ザイファやＡＦを始めとする新技術に 世界が追いついていく意味でも……
jpnSearchText:
ザイファやＡＦを始めとする新技術に
世界が追いついていく意味でも……

engChrName: ...I imagine the need for Marduk's services will only expand going forward.
engSearchText:
...I imagine the need for Marduk's services will only
expand going forward.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社のシェアは今後も伸びるでしょう。
jpnSearchText: ＭＫ社のシェアは今後も伸びるでしょう。

engChrName: Makes it abundantly clear we're livin' in a time of big change.
engSearchText:
Makes it abundantly clear we're livin' in a time of
big change.
jpnChrName: まさに世の趨勢ってヤツだな。
jpnSearchText: まさに世の趨勢ってヤツだな。

engChrName: And speaking of, you started thinkin' of the next step for yourself at all?
engSearchText:
And speaking of, you started thinkin' of the next step
for yourself at all?
jpnChrName: その意味ではお前さんも当然、 次のステージを考えていそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
その意味ではお前さんも当然、
次のステージを考えていそうだな？

engChrName: I am but a humble concierge. Nothing more, nothing less.
engSearchText:
I am but a humble concierge. Nothing more,
nothing less.
jpnChrName: わたくしは一介のＳＣ── それ以上でも以下でもありませんから。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしは一介のＳＣ──
それ以上でも以下でもありませんから。

engChrName: My focus for the foreseeable future remains in supporting you, Mr. Arkride—be that with Mare or with your stun caliber.
engSearchText:
My focus for the foreseeable future remains in
supporting you, Mr. Arkride—be that with Mare or
with your stun caliber.
jpnChrName: 撃剣やメアを始めとするヴァン様の サポート業務については現状最優先……
jpnSearchText:
撃剣やメアを始めとするヴァン様の
サポート業務については現状最優先……

engChrName: I could do most of my work remotely as I did before, of course, but I am now aware of just how much more inefficient that is.
engSearchText:
I could do most of my work remotely as I did before,
of course, but I am now aware of just how much more
inefficient that is.
jpnChrName: 以前のようなリモートでのバックアップも 可能ですが、効率が落ちるのは頂けません。
jpnSearchText:
以前のようなリモートでのバックアップも
可能ですが、効率が落ちるのは頂けません。

engChrName: Got'cha. Sure wish I knew why your people love to have their eye on me so damn much...
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Sure wish I knew why your people love to
have their eye on me so damn much...
jpnChrName: そうか……なんでＭＫがそこまで 俺に注目してるのかは知らんが。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……なんでＭＫがそこまで
俺に注目してるのかは知らんが。

engChrName: ...but I ain't gonna tell you what to do. We got an equal deal goin' on between us.
engSearchText:
...but I ain't gonna tell you what to do. We got an
equal deal goin' on between us.
jpnChrName: お前さんについては好きにしな。 元より、イーブンな契約でもある。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんについては好きにしな。
元より、イーブンな契約でもある。

engChrName: Just keep in mind that starting next month, I'm not gonna need as much office help as I have been.
engSearchText:
Just keep in mind that starting next month, I'm not
gonna need as much office help as I have been.
jpnChrName: ただし来月以降、事務所の手伝いは デフォでは必要ねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText:
ただし来月以降、事務所の手伝いは
デフォでは必要ねぇぞ？

engChrName: Which is probably fine for you. Your plate's full enough without dealin' with the day-to-day around here.
engSearchText:
Which is probably fine for you. Your plate's full
enough without dealin' with the day-to-day
around here.
jpnChrName: 首都でのオペレーションなら 幾らでも業務はあるんだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
首都でのオペレーションなら
幾らでも業務はあるんだろうからな。

engChrName: Well, I suppose I do—though I would like to believe I'm making a fair contribution irrespective of that.
engSearchText:
Well, I suppose I do—though I would like to believe
I'm making a fair contribution irrespective of that.
jpnChrName: ええ、それは確かに…… ある程度は分担できてもいますが。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それは確かに……
ある程度は分担できてもいますが。

engChrName: Somethin' up?
engSearchText: Somethin' up?
jpnChrName: ？　どうした？
jpnSearchText: ？　どうした？

engChrName: It's nothing, really...
engSearchText: It's nothing, really...
jpnChrName: いえ……
jpnSearchText: いえ……

engChrName: I was only thinking that I might not be able to help you from next month onward after all.
engSearchText:
I was only thinking that I might not be able to help
you from next month onward after all.
jpnChrName: ……確かに来月以降にお手伝いが 出来なくなる可能性はあるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
……確かに来月以降にお手伝いが
出来なくなる可能性はあるかもしれません。

engChrName: You see, next month will mark one year since I was given this body, and it's about time it was given some thorough maintenance.
engSearchText:
You see, next month will mark one year since I was
given this body, and it's about time it was given some
thorough maintenance.
jpnChrName: この身体になって来月で一年── 本格メンテナンスの時期でもありますので。
jpnSearchText:
この身体になって来月で一年──
本格メンテナンスの時期でもありますので。

engChrName: Oh. Right...
engSearchText: Oh. Right...
jpnChrName: ！　そうか……
jpnSearchText: ！　そうか……

engChrName: Depending on matters here and the overall project's status, I might have to return to my former environment.
engSearchText:
Depending on matters here and the overall project's
status, I might have to return to my
former environment.
jpnChrName: そちらの状況とプロジェクト次第では わたくしが元の環境に戻る可能性もあります。
jpnSearchText:
そちらの状況とプロジェクト次第では
わたくしが元の環境に戻る可能性もあります。

engChrName: In that event, I would have no choice but to revert to assisting you remot—
engSearchText:
In that event, I would have no choice but to revert to
assisting you remot—
jpnChrName: そうなった場合、やはりリモートでの バックアップとなってしまいますが──
jpnSearchText:
そうなった場合、やはりリモートでの
バックアップとなってしまいますが──

engChrName: Now hold up there.
engSearchText: Now hold up there.
jpnChrName: ちょっと待て。
jpnSearchText: ちょっと待て。

engChrName: You really gonna be okay with that?
engSearchText: You really gonna be okay with that?
jpnChrName: 元のって……それでいいのかよ？
jpnSearchText: 元のって……それでいいのかよ？

engChrName: So you have an inkling as to what that former environment was.
engSearchText:
So you have an inkling as to what that former
environment was.
jpnChrName: フフ、わたくしが“どう在ったか”、 やはり察していらっしゃるのですね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、わたくしが“どう在ったか”、
やはり察していらっしゃるのですね。

engChrName: What gave it away? Was it something about the way I work? ...No, I suppose there isn't any point in me knowing.
engSearchText:
What gave it away? Was it something about the way
I work? ...No, I suppose there isn't any point in
me knowing.
jpnChrName: それはお仕事の中で……？ いえ、それこそ詮無き質問ですか。
jpnSearchText:
それはお仕事の中で……？
いえ、それこそ詮無き質問ですか。

engChrName: Nah, it wasn't anything like that. Just...
engSearchText: Nah, it wasn't anything like that. Just...
jpnChrName: そんなことはねえよ。 だが……
jpnSearchText:
そんなことはねえよ。
だが……

engChrName: Please, don't misunderstand.
engSearchText: Please, don't misunderstand.
jpnChrName: どうか誤解なさらないでください。
jpnSearchText: どうか誤解なさらないでください。

engChrName: As you're aware, Marduk is a logical, impartial corporation.
engSearchText:
As you're aware, Marduk is a logical,
impartial corporation.
jpnChrName: ご存じの通り、マルドゥックは ある意味合理的で“フェア”な企業です。
jpnSearchText:
ご存じの通り、マルドゥックは
ある意味合理的で“フェア”な企業です。

engChrName: So long as I keep demonstrating I can provide value to them, I don't doubt they will keep letting me use this body.
engSearchText:
So long as I keep demonstrating I can provide value
to them, I don't doubt they will keep letting me use
this body.
jpnChrName: わたくしが価値を示し続ける限り、 今後もこの身体を提供し続けるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしが価値を示し続ける限り、
今後もこの身体を提供し続けるでしょう。

engChrName: In that regard, our relationship is quite equitable. I even plan to purchase it from them if all goes well.
engSearchText:
In that regard, our relationship is quite equitable.
I even plan to purchase it from them if all goes well.
jpnChrName: その意味では対等──いずれこの身体も 買い取らせてもらおうと思っています。
jpnSearchText:
その意味では対等──いずれこの身体も
買い取らせてもらおうと思っています。

engChrName: Huh. That's an option?
engSearchText: Huh. That's an option?
jpnChrName: ハハッ……そうか。
jpnSearchText: ハハッ……そうか。

engChrName: A state-of-the-art artificial body can't run cheap, though.
engSearchText:
A state-of-the-art artificial body can't run
cheap, though.
jpnChrName: 最新式の“擬体”だったか…… 幾らすんのか想像すらできねえが。
jpnSearchText:
最新式の“擬体”だったか……
幾らすんのか想像すらできねえが。

engChrName: It most certainly is costly, but with my salary, I think it's possible that I could have enough mira saved in a few years.
engSearchText:
It most certainly is costly, but with my salary, I think
it's possible that I could have enough mira saved in a
few years.
jpnChrName: 一応、それなりの高給取りですので 数年もあれば何とかなるかと。
jpnSearchText:
一応、それなりの高給取りですので
数年もあれば何とかなるかと。

engChrName: My current arrangement here earns me even more than my remote work did, too, so I would like to keep at it as long as possible.
engSearchText:
My current arrangement here earns me even more
than my remote work did, too, so I would like to keep
at it as long as possible.
jpnChrName: 手当が多い分、現在の出向形態も “魅力的な選択肢”ではありますね。
jpnSearchText:
手当が多い分、現在の出向形態も
“魅力的な選択肢”ではありますね。

engChrName: Hey, happy to help.
engSearchText: Hey, happy to help.
jpnChrName: そりゃ何よりだ。
jpnSearchText: そりゃ何よりだ。

engChrName: ...So I'm curious. Just how high a salary are we talkin', anyway?
engSearchText:
...So I'm curious. Just how high a salary are we
talkin', anyway?
jpnChrName: ──ちなみに参考までに 幾らくらい貰ってんだ？
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみに参考までに
幾らくらい貰ってんだ？

engChrName: Well, I can't give you a specific number, since that's classified information...
engSearchText:
Well, I can't give you a specific number, since that's
classified information...
jpnChrName: 社外秘なので明言はできませんが……
jpnSearchText: 社外秘なので明言はできませんが……

engChrName: ...but about enough to buy an ETWS entry-level sedan?
engSearchText:
...but about enough to buy an ETWS
entry-level sedan?
jpnChrName: エトワスのエントリーセダンが 購入できるかどうかくらいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
エトワスのエントリーセダンが
購入できるかどうかくらいでしょうか？

engChrName: You could buy a used apartment in the suburbs with that kinda money!
engSearchText:
You could buy a used apartment in the suburbs with
that kinda money!
jpnChrName: って郊外の中古マンションが 買えるくらいのミラじゃねーかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
って郊外の中古マンションが
買えるくらいのミラじゃねーかっ！？

engChrName: Hello, Van.
engSearchText: Hello, Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、ヨクキタ。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、ヨクキタ。

engChrName: Oh, is it time to go already?
engSearchText: Oh, is it time to go already?
jpnChrName: あれ、もう時間だった？
jpnSearchText: あれ、もう時間だった？

engChrName: You still got time, don't worry. But damn, your drone is somethin'.
engSearchText:
You still got time, don't worry. But damn, your drone
is somethin'.
jpnChrName: いや、まだゆっくりしていいぞ。 ──しかしつくづく大したモンだな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、まだゆっくりしていいぞ。
──しかしつくづく大したモンだな。

engChrName: Their speech is stiffer than a holo's, but it's wild how you can hold a whole conversation with them.
engSearchText:
Their speech is stiffer than a holo's, but it's wild how
you can hold a whole conversation with them.
jpnChrName: ホロウよりも片言だが ちゃんと受け答えをしてやがる。
jpnSearchText:
ホロウよりも片言だが
ちゃんと受け答えをしてやがる。

engChrName: Yeah. They don't have complete free will, but they do have a networked sense of self.
engSearchText:
Yeah. They don't have complete free will, but they do
have a networked sense of self.
jpnChrName: うん、“自由意志”までは行かないけど ネットワーク化された“自我”はある感じかな。
jpnSearchText:
うん、“自由意志”までは行かないけど
ネットワーク化された“自我”はある感じかな。

engChrName: XEROS is the same. They're around the same quality as those combat shells in the Empire, from what I understand.
engSearchText:
XEROS is the same. They're around the same quality
as those combat shells in the Empire, from what
I understand.
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳにしても同じ──帝国にあった 《戦術殻》っていうのも同レベルみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
ＸＥＲＯＳにしても同じ──帝国にあった
《戦術殻》っていうのも同レベルみたいだ。

engChrName: The other Mare is leagues ahead of them on a technical scale, but Aidios knows how long it'll take humanity to make something similar.
engSearchText:
The other Mare is leagues ahead of them on a
technical scale, but Aidios knows how long it'll take
humanity to make something similar.
jpnChrName: この先に“あのメア”があるのは間違いないけど 正直いつ実現できるか分からないレベルだね。
jpnSearchText:
この先に“あのメア”があるのは間違いないけど
正直いつ実現できるか分からないレベルだね。

engChrName: That'd be a tough ask even for Hamilton and Cronkite, huh?
engSearchText:
That'd be a tough ask even for Hamilton and
Cronkite, huh?
jpnChrName: なるほど……ハミルトン博士や あのクロンカイト教授あたりでもか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……ハミルトン博士や
あのクロンカイト教授あたりでもか。

engChrName: Oh, absolutely. We're talking singularities here.
engSearchText: Oh, absolutely. We're talking singularities here.
jpnChrName: それほどまでに難しいんだよ。 技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）のブレイクスルーは。
jpnSearchText:
それほどまでに難しいんだよ。
技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）のブレイクスルーは。

engChrName: Still, we know it's theoretically possible. That was proven by what happened behind the scenes two years ago.
engSearchText:
Still, we know it's theoretically possible. That was
proven by what happened behind the scenes two
years ago.
jpnChrName: でも──それが実際に可能なことが 裏の世界で２年前に証明されてしまった。
jpnSearchText:
でも──それが実際に可能なことが
裏の世界で２年前に証明されてしまった。

engChrName: You've heard all about that, I assume?
engSearchText: You've heard all about that, I assume?
jpnChrName: 当然、ヴァンさんも知っているんだよね？
jpnSearchText: 当然、ヴァンさんも知っているんだよね？

engChrName: A bit, yeah.
engSearchText: A bit, yeah.
jpnChrName: ああ、風の噂くらいだが。
jpnSearchText: ああ、風の噂くらいだが。

engChrName: I guess I don't even need to ask what you're gonna do once you graduate?
engSearchText:
I guess I don't even need to ask what you're gonna do
once you graduate?
jpnChrName: ──しかし考えてみりゃあ 既に進路は決めてるってことだよな。
jpnSearchText:
──しかし考えてみりゃあ
既に進路は決めてるってことだよな。

engChrName: Feels like a given that you'll be focusing on orbal drone research. Or have you got your sights set even higher?
engSearchText:
Feels like a given that you'll be focusing on orbal
drone research. Or have you got your sights set
even higher?
jpnChrName: 導力ドローン研究…… いや、それだけに留まらないのか？
jpnSearchText:
導力ドローン研究……
いや、それだけに留まらないのか？

engChrName: Haha. I'd like to help the professor with her work at some point, even if I don't feel like I'm quite ready yet.
engSearchText:
Haha. I'd like to help the professor with her work at
some point, even if I don't feel like I'm quite
ready yet.
jpnChrName: はは……いずれ博士の 手伝いをしたいとは思ってるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
はは……いずれ博士の
手伝いをしたいとは思ってるけどね。

engChrName: Still, I'd rather finish things here before moving on to something else.
engSearchText:
Still, I'd rather finish things here before moving on to
something else.
jpnChrName: まずはこっちの分野が先かな。 中途半端にやっても物にならないし。
jpnSearchText:
まずはこっちの分野が先かな。
中途半端にやっても物にならないし。

engChrName: Working here has been incredible for broadening my horizons, too, so I think continuing my studies here would be more than worth its while.
engSearchText:
Working here has been incredible for broadening my
horizons, too, so I think continuing my studies here
would be more than worth its while.
jpnChrName: でも、色々な視野は持っておきたいから ここで研究を続けるのもアリだとは思う。
jpnSearchText:
でも、色々な視野は持っておきたいから
ここで研究を続けるのもアリだとは思う。

engChrName: You think?
engSearchText: You think?
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: Basel has patently more in the way of facilities, but the orbal network is lightning quick these days.
engSearchText:
Basel has patently more in the way of facilities, but
the orbal network is lightning quick these days.
jpnChrName: バーゼルの方が設備は整っているけど 今は導力ネットも高速化してるしね。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルの方が設備は整っているけど
今は導力ネットも高速化してるしね。

engChrName: It's even helped me attend lectures at the institute remotely, so it hasn't been half as inconvenient as I was expecting.
engSearchText:
It's even helped me attend lectures at the institute
remotely, so it hasn't been half as inconvenient as I
was expecting.
jpnChrName: 理科大学での講義にも遠隔出席できるから 思ったほど不便は感じていないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
理科大学での講義にも遠隔出席できるから
思ったほど不便は感じていないんだ。

engChrName: Being here will also let me take part in the project to upgrade the network currently in use in Edith and the surrounding area.
engSearchText:
Being here will also let me take part in the project to
upgrade the network currently in use in Edith and the
surrounding area.
jpnChrName: 首都周辺での次世代ネットワークの プロジェクトにも参加するつもりだし……
jpnSearchText:
首都周辺での次世代ネットワークの
プロジェクトにも参加するつもりだし……

engChrName: Though at some point, I'd really like to broaden my studies at the Epstein Foundation, ZCF, and Reinford.
engSearchText:
Though at some point, I'd really like to broaden my
studies at the Epstein Foundation, ZCF,
and Reinford.
jpnChrName: ああ、いずれはエプスタイン財団やＺＣＦ、 ラインフォルトの技術も学びたいかな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いずれはエプスタイン財団やＺＣＦ、
ラインフォルトの技術も学びたいかな。

engChrName: Makes sense.
engSearchText: Makes sense.
jpnChrName: ……そうか。
jpnSearchText: ……そうか。

engChrName: Man, our little boy who could only think of protectin' his grandmother's home is all ready to take the world by storm.
engSearchText:
Man, our little boy who could only think of protectin'
his grandmother's home is all ready to take the world
by storm.
jpnChrName: 祖母さんの留守を必死で守っていた 小僧が一皮剥けたじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
祖母さんの留守を必死で守っていた
小僧が一皮剥けたじゃねえか。

engChrName: With how grown up you are, you should've just joined us in the springs instead of bein' shy.
engSearchText:
With how grown up you are, you should've just joined
us in the springs instead of bein' shy.
jpnChrName: ハハ、温泉で恥ずかしがらずに 堂々と相風呂すりゃあよかったのによ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、温泉で恥ずかしがらずに
堂々と相風呂すりゃあよかったのによ。

engChrName: Wha—?! Who are you, Aaron?!
engSearchText: Wha—?! Who are you, Aaron?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、アーロンさんみたいなこと 言わないでよっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、アーロンさんみたいなこと
言わないでよっ！？

engChrName: ...My bad. I only heard it after it came outta my mouth.
engSearchText:
...My bad. I only heard it after it came outta
my mouth.
jpnChrName: ………スマン。 言っちまってから気付いたわ。
jpnSearchText:
………スマン。
言っちまってから気付いたわ。

engChrName: But yeah. Compared to the others, it hasn't been long since you moved in.
engSearchText:
But yeah. Compared to the others, it hasn't been long
since you moved in.
jpnChrName: ──お前については 首都に来たばかりだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
──お前については
首都に来たばかりだろうしな。

engChrName: If you're satisfied with the setup you got goin' on here, I don't see the harm in working from here for a while longer.
engSearchText:
If you're satisfied with the setup you got goin' on
here, I don't see the harm in working from here for a
while longer.
jpnChrName: 環境もあるし、ここを拠点に すること自体は悪くねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
環境もあるし、ここを拠点に
すること自体は悪くねぇだろう。

engChrName: Plus you got Paulette to breathe down your neck if your health starts to nosedive from researchin' all night.
engSearchText:
Plus you got Paulette to breathe down your neck if
your health starts to nosedive from researchin'
all night.
jpnChrName: 不摂生してたらポーレットが うるさく言ってくれるだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
不摂生してたらポーレットが
うるさく言ってくれるだろうし。

engChrName: Haha. You're probably right—it's nice how she always worries.
engSearchText:
Haha. You're probably right—it's nice how she
always worries.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それも有り難いよね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それも有り難いよね。

engChrName: Still, are you sure you aren't going to need my help after this month?
engSearchText:
Still, are you sure you aren't going to need my help
after this month?
jpnChrName: でも──今月中はともかく、 それ以降は本当に手伝わなくていいの？
jpnSearchText:
でも──今月中はともかく、
それ以降は本当に手伝わなくていいの？

engChrName: Almata might be out of the picture, but the issue of the Geneses is still ongoing...
engSearchText:
Almata might be out of the picture, but the issue of
the Geneses is still ongoing...
jpnChrName: アルマータは壊滅したけど 《ゲネシス》の件は残ってるし……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータは壊滅したけど
《ゲネシス》の件は残ってるし……

engChrName: ...and there's still a lot we don't know about Mare, the Grendel, or Marduk, either.
engSearchText:
...and there's still a lot we don't know about Mare, the
Grendel, or Marduk, either.
jpnChrName: メアにグレンデル、マルドゥックとか、 色々気がかりも多いんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
メアにグレンデル、マルドゥックとか、
色々気がかりも多いんじゃない？

engChrName: Then there's whatever Yang—Professor Cronkite—is working on with the president...
engSearchText:
Then there's whatever Yang—Professor Cronkite—is
working on with the president...
jpnChrName: 僕にしてもヤン兄──クロンカイト教授が 大統領府と何してるのか気になるし……
jpnSearchText:
僕にしてもヤン兄──クロンカイト教授が
大統領府と何してるのか気になるし……

engChrName: You got a point. There's a lot goin' on.
engSearchText: You got a point. There's a lot goin' on.
jpnChrName: まあ、な。
jpnSearchText: まあ、な。

engChrName: So if I need help with stuff, I'll be sure to come knockin'. That means you come knockin' if you need help with stuff, too.
engSearchText:
So if I need help with stuff, I'll be sure to
come knockin'. That means you come knockin' if you
need help with stuff, too.
jpnChrName: 困ったら相談させてもらうぜ。 代わりにいつでもアテにしろ。
jpnSearchText:
困ったら相談させてもらうぜ。
代わりにいつでもアテにしろ。

engChrName: I can investigate whatever you want—even down to the color of Cronkite's underwear.
engSearchText:
I can investigate whatever you want—even down to
the color of Cronkite's underwear.
jpnChrName: お前の兄弟子の下着の色くらいなら いつでも調べてやれると思うぜ？
jpnSearchText:
お前の兄弟子の下着の色くらいなら
いつでも調べてやれると思うぜ？

engChrName: Ahaha. That's so random—and don't think I didn't notice you patting me on the head!
engSearchText:
Ahaha. That's so random—and don't think I didn't
notice you patting me on the head!
jpnChrName: あはは、なにそれ── って、さり気なく撫でないでよっ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、なにそれ──
って、さり気なく撫でないでよっ。

engChrName: You've become very red, Quatre.
engSearchText: You've become very red, Quatre.
jpnChrName: カトル、チョット赤イ？
jpnSearchText: カトル、チョット赤イ？

engChrName: You catch a cold? Let me feel—
engSearchText: You catch a cold? Let me feel—
jpnChrName: 風邪かよ？　どれどれ──
jpnSearchText: 風邪かよ？　どれどれ──

engChrName: My temperature is perfectly normal, thank you very much!
engSearchText:
My temperature is perfectly normal, thank you
very much!
jpnChrName: まったくもって平熱だからっ！
jpnSearchText: まったくもって平熱だからっ！

engChrName: So you're going back to your apartment?
engSearchText: So you're going back to your apartment?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_0119}それじゃあジュディス先輩、 やっと自宅に戻ってくるんですね？
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_0119}それじゃあジュディス先輩、
やっと自宅に戻ってくるんですね？

engChrName: Yeeeah, I guess that's the plan. I must've worried you sick, huh?
engSearchText:
Yeeeah, I guess that's the plan. I must've worried you
sick, huh?
jpnChrName: あー、うん…… あんたにも心配かけちゃったわね。
jpnSearchText:
あー、うん……
あんたにも心配かけちゃったわね。

engChrName: It looks like Buzzraider's finally given up on their stupid obsession with me, so it seems safe enough to live there again.
engSearchText:
It looks like Buzzraider's finally given up on their
stupid obsession with me, so it seems safe enough to
live there again.
jpnChrName: バズレイダーの方は やっと諦めたっぽいけど。
jpnSearchText:
バズレイダーの方は
やっと諦めたっぽいけど。

engChrName: There's been so much going on lately that I'm sure they've got bigger fish to fry now...
engSearchText:
There's been so much going on lately that I'm sure
they've got bigger fish to fry now...
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_0122}ここ半月それどころの騒ぎじゃ ありませんでしたからね……
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_0122}ここ半月それどころの騒ぎじゃ
ありませんでしたからね……

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_0123}──あら？
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_60_0123}──あら？

engChrName: Sorry. Didn't mean to interrupt.
engSearchText: Sorry. Didn't mean to interrupt.
jpnChrName: 悪い、邪魔したみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText: 悪い、邪魔したみてぇだな。

engChrName: Oh, you're fine! I've actually been wanting to thank you for helping out Judith for a while now.
engSearchText:
Oh, you're fine! I've actually been wanting to thank
you for helping out Judith for a while now.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_0124}いえいえ、アークライドさんには 先輩が本当にお世話になりまして……
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_0124}いえいえ、アークライドさんには
先輩が本当にお世話になりまして……

engChrName: Please pass on my regards to everyone else as well, including the family who runs the bistro.
engSearchText:
Please pass on my regards to everyone else as well,
including the family who runs the bistro.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_0125}ビストロの皆さん共々、 どうか宜しく伝えておいてください。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_0125}ビストロの皆さん共々、
どうか宜しく伝えておいてください。

engChrName: N-Now hold your horses! I'm the one who's been helping HIM out, so why's he the one getting thanked?!
engSearchText:
N-Now hold your horses! I'm the one who's been
helping HIM out, so why's he the one
getting thanked?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、手伝ったのはあたしの方なのに なんでコイツに礼を言うのよっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、手伝ったのはあたしの方なのに
なんでコイツに礼を言うのよっ！？

engChrName: Because I'm sure that you just weaseled your way into his trips outside the capital without taking no for an answer.
engSearchText:
Because I'm sure that you just weaseled your way into
his trips outside the capital without taking no for
an answer.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_0127}どうせ先輩が無理言って 旅先まで付いていったんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_0127}どうせ先輩が無理言って
旅先まで付いていったんでしょう？

engChrName: I don't know all you've been up to, but I do know that you were able to return in one piece thanks to Arkride Solutions' efforts.
engSearchText:
I don't know all you've been up to, but I do know that
you were able to return in one piece thanks to Arkride
Solutions' efforts.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_0128}詳細は分かりませんけど 無事、戻ってきてくれましたし……
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_0128}詳細は分かりませんけど
無事、戻ってきてくれましたし……

engChrName: And with how much I respect you as my senior in the industry, I think it's only natural for me to want to say thank you.
engSearchText:
And with how much I respect you as my senior in the
industry, I think it's only natural for me to want to say
thank you.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_0129}尊敬する先輩がお世話になったんですから 後輩としてお礼を言うのは当然ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_0129}尊敬する先輩がお世話になったんですから
後輩としてお礼を言うのは当然ですよ。

engChrName: So you respect me that much, huh...? I-I mean, not that it isn't perfectly natural for you to respect me, of course!
engSearchText:
So you respect me that much, huh...? I-I mean, not
that it isn't perfectly natural for you to respect me,
of course!
jpnChrName: そ、尊敬するって…… ──まあ当然だけどねっ。
jpnSearchText:
そ、尊敬するって……
──まあ当然だけどねっ。

engChrName: (Never takes much to butter her up...though I'm sure our young lady here just so happens to be an expert at it.)
engSearchText:
(Never takes much to butter her up...though I'm sure
our young lady here just so happens to be an expert
at it.)
jpnChrName: （ほんとチョロイっつーか……   まあ相手が上手ってだけか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ほんとチョロイっつーか……
まあ相手が上手ってだけか。）

engChrName: She's become such a sassy little thing...
engSearchText: She's become such a sassy little thing...
jpnChrName: まったく生意気になっちゃって……
jpnSearchText: まったく生意気になっちゃって……

engChrName: She was so cute and polite when she first started out, but look at her now. All that success must be going to her head.
engSearchText:
She was so cute and polite when she first started out,
but look at her now. All that success must be
going to her head.
jpnChrName: デビューしたての頃は 清楚でホント可愛かったのになぁ。
jpnSearchText:
デビューしたての頃は
清楚でホント可愛かったのになぁ。

engChrName: That was three years ago, right?
engSearchText: That was three years ago, right?
jpnChrName: 確か３年くらい前だったか？
jpnSearchText: 確か３年くらい前だったか？

engChrName: Though I dunno if fifteen's early or late for startin' out in your industry.
engSearchText:
Though I dunno if fifteen's early or late for startin'
out in your industry.
jpnChrName: １５でデビューってのが 早いのか遅いのか分からんが。
jpnSearchText:
１５でデビューってのが
早いのか遅いのか分からんが。

engChrName: It's not late, but it's not really early, either. I started acting at fourteen, myself.
engSearchText:
It's not late, but it's not really early, either. I started
acting at fourteen, myself.
jpnChrName: 遅くはないけど早くもないわね。 あたしだって１４だったし。
jpnSearchText:
遅くはないけど早くもないわね。
あたしだって１４だったし。

engChrName: A lot of actors and actresses get their first roles when they're children, even, which just goes to show how much of an unusual case she is.
engSearchText:
A lot of actors and actresses get their first roles when
they're children, even, which just goes to show how
much of an unusual case she is.
jpnChrName: 子役からって俳優も多いから その意味では規格外ですらあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
子役からって俳優も多いから
その意味では規格外ですらあるわ。

engChrName: She ended up going from a rookie to a top actress in three years, which is just...crazy.
engSearchText:
She ended up going from a rookie to a top actress in
three years, which is just...crazy.
jpnChrName: なにせ３年かそこらでトップ女優と 言われる実績を積んでいるんだもの。
jpnSearchText:
なにせ３年かそこらでトップ女優と
言われる実績を積んでいるんだもの。

engChrName: I can see why, though. I've seen a few of her films, and it's interestin' seeing how different her approach to the craft is compared to yours.
engSearchText:
I can see why, though. I've seen a few of her films,
and it's interestin' seeing how different her approach
to the craft is compared to yours.
jpnChrName: 幾つか出演作は見てるが お前さんと方向性は完全に違うよな。
jpnSearchText:
幾つか出演作は見てるが
お前さんと方向性は完全に違うよな。

engChrName: You can handle any kind of role that's thrown at you, yeah, but she just...fully becomes the character she's playing without even trying.
engSearchText:
You can handle any kind of role that's thrown at you,
yeah, but she just...fully becomes the character she's
playing without even trying.
jpnChrName: お前さんが万能型だとすると あっちは憑依型の典型っつーか。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんが万能型だとすると
あっちは憑依型の典型っつーか。

engChrName: I didn't realize you knew your way around different acting techniques. I agree with you, too.
engSearchText:
I didn't realize you knew your way around different
acting techniques. I agree with you, too.
jpnChrName: あら、聞いたような口を利くじゃない。 あたしもそれは同感だけどね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、聞いたような口を利くじゃない。
あたしもそれは同感だけどね。

engChrName: Her performance in Wolves' Requiem was amazing, but Gloria just blew me away...
engSearchText:
Her performance in Wolves' Requiem was amazing,
but Gloria just blew me away...
jpnChrName: 『狼たちの鎮魂歌』もいいけど、 『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』とか度肝を抜かれたし……
jpnSearchText:
『狼たちの鎮魂歌』もいいけど、
『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』とか度肝を抜かれたし……

engChrName: Yeah. Her as Sheena Dirke was somethin' else.
engSearchText: Yeah. Her as Sheena Dirke was somethin' else.
jpnChrName: ああ、シーナ・ディルクの役か。
jpnSearchText: ああ、シーナ・ディルクの役か。

engChrName: The media kicked up all that fuss about an Easterner playing the role, but in the end it was hard to see her as anything other than Sheena reborn.
engSearchText:
The media kicked up all that fuss about an Easterner
playing the role, but in the end it was hard to see her
as anything other than Sheena reborn.
jpnChrName: たしかに途中から東方系とか 一切感じさせずになりきってたな。
jpnSearchText:
たしかに途中から東方系とか
一切感じさせずになりきってたな。

engChrName: Boy... She's four years my junior, and already, she's nipping at my heels. She's sure not making it easy to stay top dog...
engSearchText:
Boy... She's four years my junior, and already, she's
nipping at my heels. She's sure not making it easy to
stay top dog...
jpnChrName: やれやれ、ヤになっちゃうわね。 ４つ下に完全に追い上げられると……
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、ヤになっちゃうわね。
４つ下に完全に追い上げられると……

engChrName: ...but I say bring it on. I don't plan to go down without a fight!
engSearchText:
...but I say bring it on. I don't plan to go down
without a fight!
jpnChrName: まあ、負けるつもりもないんだけど。
jpnSearchText: まあ、負けるつもりもないんだけど。

engChrName: Good. I got nothin' but respect for that spunk you got in you.
engSearchText:
Good. I got nothin' but respect for that spunk you got
in you.
jpnChrName: お前さんのそういう所は 正直、素直に凄ぇと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんのそういう所は
正直、素直に凄ぇと思うぜ。

engChrName: Real shame 'bout the rest of you, though.
engSearchText: Real shame 'bout the rest of you, though.
jpnChrName: ただちょっと残念ってだけで。
jpnSearchText: ただちょっと残念ってだけで。

engChrName: You better watch your darn mouth!
engSearchText: You better watch your darn mouth!
jpnChrName: 誰が残念よ、誰が！
jpnSearchText: 誰が残念よ、誰が！

engChrName: And while I'm at it—I think what you said earlier was pretty out of line, too.
engSearchText:
And while I'm at it—I think what you said earlier was
pretty out of line, too.
jpnChrName: それはそうと──アンタ、 さっきのは良くないんじゃないの？
jpnSearchText:
それはそうと──アンタ、
さっきのは良くないんじゃないの？

engChrName: Uhh... Right.
engSearchText: Uhh... Right.
jpnChrName: ああ……
jpnSearchText: ああ……

engChrName: So, now that we've dealt with Almata, things should be back to business as usual before long.
engSearchText:
So, now that we've dealt with Almata, things should
be back to business as usual before long.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_9077}──なんにせよマフィア絡みは決着、 事務所もボチボチ平常運転に戻るだろう。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_9077}──なんにせよマフィア絡みは決着、
事務所もボチボチ平常運転に戻るだろう。

engChrName: But it's about time you guys started thinkin' about whether or not you wanna keep workin' here.
engSearchText:
But it's about time you guys started thinkin' about
whether or not you wanna keep workin' here.
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_60_9078}このままバイトを続けるかどうか、 それぞれ考えておくんだな。
jpnSearchText:
{CC_VOICE=VO_60_9078}このままバイトを続けるかどうか、
それぞれ考えておくんだな。

engChrName: ...Yeah. I think so, too.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. I think so, too.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、な。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、な。

engChrName: Wow. I didn't expect you to outright admit it. Then...
engSearchText: Wow. I didn't expect you to outright admit it. Then...
jpnChrName: なによ、素直じゃない。 それじゃあ──
jpnSearchText:
なによ、素直じゃない。
それじゃあ──

engChrName: Still, you don't want people butting in on your side hustle, either, do you?
engSearchText:
Still, you don't want people butting in on your side
hustle, either, do you?
jpnChrName: だが、お前さんだって“副業”には 他人を立ち入らせたくねぇんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
だが、お前さんだって“副業”には
他人を立ち入らせたくねぇんだろ？

engChrName: W-Well, no, but that's not the same thing.
engSearchText: W-Well, no, but that's not the same thing.
jpnChrName: そ、それは当然じゃない。
jpnSearchText: そ、それは当然じゃない。

engChrName: I inherited my techniques from my mom and hers before her, and while they might not be legal, I still think the world needs—
engSearchText:
I inherited my techniques from my mom and hers
before her, and while they might not be legal, I still
think the world needs—
jpnChrName: あたしがママたちから引き継いだ、 後ろ暗くても世に必要な──
jpnSearchText:
あたしがママたちから引き継いだ、
後ろ暗くても世に必要な──

engChrName: ...Oh. I get you now. I don't know what your secret is, but...
engSearchText:
...Oh. I get you now. I don't know what your secret
is, but...
jpnChrName: そっか、何なのかは分からないけど。
jpnSearchText: そっか、何なのかは分からないけど。

engChrName: ...you've got something you don't want people to get involved in, too, huh?
engSearchText:
...you've got something you don't want people to get
involved in, too, huh?
jpnChrName: アンタにもあるわけね？ 他人には立ち入らせたくない……
jpnSearchText:
アンタにもあるわけね？
他人には立ち入らせたくない……

engChrName: Or I guess...something you can't afford to let them get involved in.
engSearchText:
Or I guess...something you can't afford to let them
get involved in.
jpnChrName: ──ううん。 立ち入らせられない“何か”が。
jpnSearchText:
──ううん。
立ち入らせられない“何か”が。

engChrName: Anyway, as two people who transform into things a teenager might've dreamed up, we gotta look out for each other.
engSearchText:
Anyway, as two people who transform into things a
teenager might've dreamed up, we gotta look out for
each other.
jpnChrName: ま、同じ変身する痛いヤツ同士、 持ちつ持たれつ、ゆる～く行こうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、同じ変身する痛いヤツ同士、
持ちつ持たれつ、ゆる～く行こうぜ。

engChrName: Don't know if I'm down to get caught livin' with an actual criminal, though, so you should still probably find some other place to live.
engSearchText:
Don't know if I'm down to get caught livin' with an
actual criminal, though, so you should still probably
find some other place to live.
jpnChrName: ただ悪役（ヴィラン）が同じヤサってのも締まらねぇから セカンドハウスは別の場所を勧めるがな。
jpnSearchText:
ただ悪役（ヴィラン）が同じヤサってのも締まらねぇから
セカンドハウスは別の場所を勧めるがな。

engChrName: Erk... (But I really, really don't want to give this place up...)
engSearchText:
Erk...
(But I really, really don't want to give this place up...)
jpnChrName: うっ……（できれば部屋は このまま借りときたいんだけど。）
jpnSearchText:
うっ……（できれば部屋は
このまま借りときたいんだけど。）

engChrName: W-Well, I've got my next film's premiere coming up, so I'll go back to my old place before the festival, at least.
engSearchText:
W-Well, I've got my next film's premiere coming up,
so I'll go back to my old place before the festival,
at least.
jpnChrName: ──ま、まあ新作の封切りもあるし 記念祭までにはマンションに戻るわよ。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、まあ新作の封切りもあるし
記念祭までにはマンションに戻るわよ。

engChrName: *sigh* I just wish I didn't have a bunch of stuff to report to Mom and Grammy first...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I just wish I didn't have a bunch of stuff to
report to Mom and Grammy first...
jpnChrName: はあ、その前にママとお祖母ちゃんに 色々と報告しないと……
jpnSearchText:
はあ、その前にママとお祖母ちゃんに
色々と報告しないと……

engChrName: Well, look who's made himself right at home.
engSearchText: Well, look who's made himself right at home.
jpnChrName: つーか満喫しまくってますね、 師父（せんせい）……
jpnSearchText:
つーか満喫しまくってますね、
師父（せんせい）……

engChrName: As you well know, I shouldn't even be alive right now.
engSearchText: As you well know, I shouldn't even be alive right now.
jpnChrName: 繰り返すが一度死んだ身なのでな。
jpnSearchText: 繰り返すが一度死んだ身なのでな。

engChrName: I have decided to make the most of this chance to try things I couldn't even imagine in my previous life— and have found myself rather enjoying them.
engSearchText:
I have decided to make the most of this chance to try
things I couldn't even imagine in my previous life—
and have found myself rather enjoying them.
jpnChrName: 以前の生では想像できなかった様式なども 試してみたら存外馴染んだ次第だ。
jpnSearchText:
以前の生では想像できなかった様式なども
試してみたら存外馴染んだ次第だ。

engChrName: The magazines you used to read were quite inspirational, if I'm being honest.
engSearchText:
The magazines you used to read were quite
inspirational, if I'm being honest.
jpnChrName: フフ、おぬしが読んでいた雑誌などを 思い起こして参考にもしたかな？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、おぬしが読んでいた雑誌などを
思い起こして参考にもしたかな？

engChrName: Wait, so this is my fault?!
engSearchText: Wait, so this is my fault?!
jpnChrName: って、俺がきっかけで ハマったとか止めてくださいよ！？
jpnSearchText:
って、俺がきっかけで
ハマったとか止めてくださいよ！？

engChrName: (If his hordes of more respectable students ever found this out, they'd have my head...)
engSearchText:
(If his hordes of more respectable students ever found
this out, they'd have my head...)
jpnChrName: （やたらいるっつう“表”の弟子どもに   締め上げられる未来しか浮かばねぇ……）
jpnSearchText:
（やたらいるっつう“表”の弟子どもに
締め上げられる未来しか浮かばねぇ……）

engChrName: So Ashladd isn't the uncooperative jackass I was expecting?
engSearchText:
So Ashladd isn't the uncooperative jackass I
was expecting?
jpnChrName: そんじゃあのアシュラッドってヤツは 意外にも協力的なんですね？
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあのアシュラッドってヤツは
意外にも協力的なんですね？

engChrName: Indeed. He may be a man of few words, but he is an honorable, just, and determined one capable of seeing the greater picture.
engSearchText:
Indeed. He may be a man of few words, but he is an
honorable, just, and determined one capable of seeing
the greater picture.
jpnChrName: うむ、彼自身は一本芯の通った男だ。 寡黙だが義に篤く、大局も見通せる。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、彼自身は一本芯の通った男だ。
寡黙だが義に篤く、大局も見通せる。

engChrName: Rank-and-file armed monks trust him, so I would be confident in Iscariot's handling of matters if he were the only one they answered to. However...
engSearchText:
Rank-and-file armed monks trust him, so I would be
confident in Iscariot's handling of matters if he were
the only one they answered to. However...
jpnChrName: 一般僧兵からも信頼されているゆえ、 安心ではあるのだが──
jpnSearchText:
一般僧兵からも信頼されているゆえ、
安心ではあるのだが──

engChrName: We got his boss to worry about—their 'captain,' right?
engSearchText:
We got his boss to worry about—their
'captain,' right?
jpnChrName: 噂の“僧兵長”殿ってヤツですか。
jpnSearchText: 噂の“僧兵長”殿ってヤツですか。

engChrName: The one all 30,000 members of the Papal Guard and Iscariot answer to.
engSearchText:
The one all 30,000 members of the Papal Guard and
Iscariot answer to.
jpnChrName: ３万人の一般僧兵と、 隠密僧兵（イスカリオ）を束ねているっていう。
jpnSearchText:
３万人の一般僧兵と、
隠密僧兵（イスカリオ）を束ねているっていう。

engChrName: Correct. They took up their post after my retirement, so I've never met them.
engSearchText:
Correct. They took up their post after my retirement,
so I've never met them.
jpnChrName: ああ、私が引退してから就任した人物ゆえ、 直接の面識は全くない。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、私が引退してから就任した人物ゆえ、
直接の面識は全くない。

engChrName: I believe their identity is considered a top secret even among the Congregation for Divine Worship, to whom the Papal Guard also answers.
engSearchText:
I believe their identity is considered a top secret even
among the Congregation for Divine Worship, to
whom the Papal Guard also answers.
jpnChrName: それどころか僧兵庁上位の典礼省でも 完全に“極秘”の扱いらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
それどころか僧兵庁上位の典礼省でも
完全に“極秘”の扱いらしくてな。

engChrName: I suspect only a small number of people know who they are.
engSearchText:
I suspect only a small number of people know who
they are.
jpnChrName: 恐らく正体を知るのはごく一握り。
jpnSearchText: 恐らく正体を知るのはごく一握り。

engChrName: Several hundred Iscariot monks, the cardinals of the Congregation for Divine Worship, the commander of the Gralsritter, and the Pope.
engSearchText:
Several hundred Iscariot monks, the cardinals of the
Congregation for Divine Worship, the commander of
the Gralsritter, and the Pope.
jpnChrName: 数百名ほどの隠密僧兵に、典礼省の枢機卿。 対等たる星杯の総長に、法王猊下その人。
jpnSearchText:
数百名ほどの隠密僧兵に、典礼省の枢機卿。
対等たる星杯の総長に、法王猊下その人。

engChrName: Whoever they are, they are without a doubt the congregation's wild card.
engSearchText:
Whoever they are, they are without a doubt the
congregation's wild card.
jpnChrName: 間違いなく典礼省の“鬼札”であろう。
jpnSearchText: 間違いなく典礼省の“鬼札”であろう。

engChrName: But what reason would someone like that have to get their righthand man involved in this?
engSearchText:
But what reason would someone like that have to get
their righthand man involved in this?
jpnChrName: そんなヤツがどうして右腕を……
jpnSearchText: そんなヤツがどうして右腕を……

engChrName: The Geneses? But they're more of a Gralsritter kinda deal...
engSearchText:
The Geneses? But they're more of a Gralsritter
kinda deal...
jpnChrName: まさか《ゲネシス》を…… いや──そっちは騎士団担当だったか。
jpnSearchText:
まさか《ゲネシス》を……
いや──そっちは騎士団担当だったか。

engChrName: Actually, why are you even telling me all this stuff in the first place?
engSearchText:
Actually, why are you even telling me all this stuff in
the first place?
jpnChrName: って、何でそんな話をするんですか？
jpnSearchText: って、何でそんな話をするんですか？

engChrName: I'm already like a magnet for info I don't wanna know as it is.
engSearchText:
I'm already like a magnet for info I don't wanna know
as it is.
jpnChrName: ただでさえ知りたくもない 各方面の裏事情を知りすぎてんのに。
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえ知りたくもない
各方面の裏事情を知りすぎてんのに。

engChrName: Hahaha! It's far too late to be caring about such things, my young friend.
engSearchText:
Hahaha! It's far too late to be caring about such
things, my young friend.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、 今更小さいことを言うでない。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ、
今更小さいことを言うでない。

engChrName: Still, whether they are criminal or legal, your old friends or your assistants...
engSearchText:
Still, whether they are criminal or legal, your old
friends or your assistants...
jpnChrName: ──それに、表にせよ裏にせよ、 助手たちや昔馴染みとの関わりにせよ。
jpnSearchText:
──それに、表にせよ裏にせよ、
助手たちや昔馴染みとの関わりにせよ。

engChrName: ...I genuinely believe that the more people you know and interact with, the better.
engSearchText:
...I genuinely believe that the more people you know
and interact with, the better.
jpnChrName: しがらみが多い方がおぬしには良かろう？
jpnSearchText: しがらみが多い方がおぬしには良かろう？

engChrName: Who we meet shapes who we become.
engSearchText: Who we meet shapes who we become.
jpnChrName: 人は、人の間にあって人間となる。
jpnSearchText: 人は、人の間にあって人間となる。

engChrName: Be these relationships fortunate or foul, we are all the more human because of them. Surely the past five years have taught you this?
engSearchText:
Be these relationships fortunate or foul, we are all the
more human because of them. Surely the past five
years have taught you this?
jpnChrName: 良縁であろうと悪縁であろうと…… この五年で、身に沁みたのではないか？
jpnSearchText:
良縁であろうと悪縁であろうと……
この五年で、身に沁みたのではないか？

engChrName: Well, I just...
engSearchText: Well, I just...
jpnChrName: ですが、俺は……
jpnSearchText: ですが、俺は……

engChrName: ...Haha. People's natures just don't change easily, I guess.
engSearchText:
...Haha. People's natures just don't change easily,
I guess.
jpnChrName: ハハ……人の性根ってヤツは そう簡単に変わりゃあしませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……人の性根ってヤツは
そう簡単に変わりゃあしませんよ。

engChrName: Having you in Oración was a huge help—as huge a help as it is having you here now.
engSearchText:
Having you in Oración was a huge help—as huge a
help as it is having you here now.
jpnChrName: オラシオンでも助かりましたが マフィア絡みの面倒くさい後片付け──
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンでも助かりましたが
マフィア絡みの面倒くさい後片付け──

engChrName: So I count this relationship among the fortunate ones, at least.
engSearchText:
So I count this relationship among the fortunate ones,
at least.
jpnChrName: 師父（せんせい）が手を貸してくれるんなら それはそれでラッキーだ。
jpnSearchText:
師父（せんせい）が手を貸してくれるんなら
それはそれでラッキーだ。

engChrName: So keep stickin' around so the younger generation can kick back a bit, yeah?
engSearchText:
So keep stickin' around so the younger generation can
kick back a bit, yeah?
jpnChrName: 今のうちにせいぜい若いモンを 甘やかしてラクさせてくださいよ。
jpnSearchText:
今のうちにせいぜい若いモンを
甘やかしてラクさせてくださいよ。

engChrName: I'd pay you as thanks, but I don't think you'd take the mira. Hmm...
engSearchText:
I'd pay you as thanks, but I don't think you'd take
the mira. Hmm...
jpnChrName: バイト代──は受け取って くれないでしょうし、そうだな……
jpnSearchText:
バイト代──は受け取って
くれないでしょうし、そうだな……

engChrName: At least let me get you somethin' even nicer than that jacket you've taken a liking to.
engSearchText:
At least let me get you somethin' even nicer than that
jacket you've taken a liking to.
jpnChrName: そっちのライダースに負けないくらい イカスやつでもプレゼントしますから。
jpnSearchText:
そっちのライダースに負けないくらい
イカスやつでもプレゼントしますから。

engChrName: Anyway, we've still got plenty of time left, so I'll go ahead and leave you be. Take it easy, Master.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we've still got plenty of time left, so I'll go
ahead and leave you be. Take it easy, Master.
jpnChrName: まだ半まで時間はあります。 ごゆっくり、ベルガルド師父（せんせい）。
jpnSearchText:
まだ半まで時間はあります。
ごゆっくり、ベルガルド師父（せんせい）。

engChrName: There are things in life you cannot avert your eyes from no matter how hard you try.
engSearchText:
There are things in life you cannot avert your
eyes from no matter how hard you try.
jpnChrName: ……目を背けても、背けきれぬものはある。
jpnSearchText: ……目を背けても、背けきれぬものはある。

engChrName: Whether you can realize that fundamental truth is down to you, Van.
engSearchText:
Whether you can realize that fundamental truth is
down to you, Van.
jpnChrName: 気づけるか否かはおぬし次第だ──ヴァンよ。
jpnSearchText: 気づけるか否かはおぬし次第だ──ヴァンよ。
……～～♪～～………

engChrName: Okay, that should do it.
engSearchText: Okay, that should do it.
jpnChrName: うんっ……これでよしっと。
jpnSearchText: うんっ……これでよしっと。

engChrName: Oh, Van. Is it almost time to go?
engSearchText: Oh, Van. Is it almost time to go?
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさん。 そろそろ出かけますか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンさん。
そろそろ出かけますか？

engChrName: It's getting there, but we still got some time.
engSearchText: It's getting there, but we still got some time.
jpnChrName: ……ボチボチな。 半までまだちょっとあるが。
jpnSearchText:
……ボチボチな。
半までまだちょっとあるが。

engChrName: I can't believe how lifelike this guy is. Professor Hamilton's students are somethin' else.
engSearchText:
I can't believe how lifelike this guy is.
Professor Hamilton's students are somethin' else.
jpnChrName: しかし犬まんまだなコイツは。 ハミルトン一門ってのはどんだけだよ。
jpnSearchText:
しかし犬まんまだなコイツは。
ハミルトン一門ってのはどんだけだよ。

engChrName: I was told there's more to him sleeping in the sun than just imitating dogs, too.
engSearchText:
I was told there's more to him sleeping in the sun
than just imitating dogs, too.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、日向ぼっこにも ちゃんと意味があるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、日向ぼっこにも
ちゃんと意味があるみたいですね。

engChrName: He can turn the sun's rays into orbal energy.
engSearchText: He can turn the sun's rays into orbal energy.
jpnChrName: 太陽光を導力エネルギーに変換する機構が 搭載されているそうです。
jpnSearchText:
太陽光を導力エネルギーに変換する機構が
搭載されているそうです。

engChrName: Makes sense. I remember that bein' one of the areas Professor Hamilton was researching.
engSearchText:
Makes sense. I remember that bein' one of the areas
Professor Hamilton was researching.
jpnChrName: なるほど、ハミルトン博士の 研究テーマの一つらしいが……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、ハミルトン博士の
研究テーマの一つらしいが……

engChrName: Still, I know you've gotten real comfy around here over the past few months...
engSearchText:
Still, I know you've gotten real comfy around here
over the past few months...
jpnChrName: この３ヶ月、事務所にもモンマルトにも すっかり馴染んだようだが……
jpnSearchText:
この３ヶ月、事務所にもモンマルトにも
すっかり馴染んだようだが……

engChrName: ...but it's almost time to start plannin' the next school festival, ain't it? Isn't the Student Council gonna get real busy soon?
engSearchText:
...but it's almost time to start plannin' the next school
festival, ain't it? Isn't the Student Council gonna get
real busy soon?
jpnChrName: そろそろ学藝祭の企画時期だったか。 生徒会なら相当忙しくなるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ学藝祭の企画時期だったか。
生徒会なら相当忙しくなるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Haha... Yes, you're absolutely right. I'm starting to feel the pressure, to tell you the truth.
engSearchText:
Haha... Yes, you're absolutely right. I'm starting to
feel the pressure, to tell you the truth.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、はい。 流石にちょっとプレッシャーです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、はい。
流石にちょっとプレッシャーです。

engChrName: The end of April still feels like a long ways off now, but I know it'll be here before we know it.
engSearchText:
The end of April still feels like a long ways off now,
but I know it'll be here before we know it.
jpnChrName: ──毎年、四月下旬に開催される、 全校上げての『アラミス学藝（がくげい）祭』。
jpnSearchText:
──毎年、四月下旬に開催される、
全校上げての『アラミス学藝（がくげい）祭』。

engChrName: I was able to attend last year's festival just after enrolling, and there was just so much to see and do over those three days.
engSearchText:
I was able to attend last year's festival just after
enrolling, and there was just so much to see and do
over those three days.
jpnChrName: 今年、入学直後に参加しましたけど ３日間本当に見所も多くって……
jpnSearchText:
今年、入学直後に参加しましたけど
３日間本当に見所も多くって……

engChrName: It was hard to believe that the whole event was planned and executed by students alone—even if quite a lot of them did take part.
engSearchText:
It was hard to believe that the whole event was
planned and executed by students alone—even if
quite a lot of them did take part.
jpnChrName: とても学生だけで企画、準備、 運営していたとは思えなかったです。
jpnSearchText:
とても学生だけで企画、準備、
運営していたとは思えなかったです。

engChrName: Yeah. It's a staple of spring in the capital at this point, especially with how many people check it out.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's a staple of spring in the capital at this point,
especially with how many people check it out.
jpnChrName: 一般来場者も多数…… 首都の春の風物詩でもあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
一般来場者も多数……
首都の春の風物詩でもあるからな。

engChrName: And with your current president at the helm, I can see this upcoming one bein' a festival for the books.
engSearchText:
And with your current president at the helm, I can
see this upcoming one bein' a festival for the books.
jpnChrName: ま、あの元仔猫が生徒会長なら 更に破天荒に仕上げてきそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あの元仔猫が生徒会長なら
更に破天荒に仕上げてきそうだが。

engChrName: Aha...ha... The other Student Council members and I are a liiittle worried about that.
engSearchText:
Aha...ha... The other Student Council members and I
are a liiittle worried about that.
jpnChrName: あはは……正直オデットたちと 戦々恐々としているところでして。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……正直オデットたちと
戦々恐々としているところでして。

engChrName: So you did attend Aramis, then?
engSearchText: So you did attend Aramis, then?
jpnChrName: ──でも、やっぱりヴァンさんも アラミスの出身だったんですね？
jpnSearchText:
──でも、やっぱりヴァンさんも
アラミスの出身だったんですね？

engChrName: Just like Elaine and Mr. Kincaid.
engSearchText: Just like Elaine and Mr. Kincaid.
jpnChrName: エレインさんや、キンケイドさんと同じく。
jpnSearchText: エレインさんや、キンケイドさんと同じく。

engChrName: Yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah.
jpnChrName: ああ……
jpnSearchText: ああ……

engChrName: I dropped out not long after becoming a second-year student, though.
engSearchText:
I dropped out not long after becoming a second-year
student, though.
jpnChrName: つっても俺は２年に上がって すぐに中退しちまったが。
jpnSearchText:
つっても俺は２年に上がって
すぐに中退しちまったが。

engChrName: Elaine and I were in the same year, while René was a third year.
engSearchText:
Elaine and I were in the same year, while René was a
third year.
jpnChrName: ちなみに俺とエレインは同学年、 ルネは１個上だった。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに俺とエレインは同学年、
ルネは１個上だった。

engChrName: The second he had the chance, René took on being Student Council president, 'cause of course he did.
engSearchText:
The second he had the chance, René took on being
Student Council president, 'cause of course he did.
jpnChrName: ルネの野郎はいかにもっつーか 生徒会長を引き受けててな。
jpnSearchText:
ルネの野郎はいかにもっつーか
生徒会長を引き受けててな。

engChrName: And 'cause we'd known him for so long, we started helpin' out with Student Council work, too.
engSearchText:
And 'cause we'd known him for so long, we started
helpin' out with Student Council work, too.
jpnChrName: 幼馴染みのよしみで、エレインと俺も 一年から生徒会を手伝ってたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
幼馴染みのよしみで、エレインと俺も
一年から生徒会を手伝ってたんだ。

engChrName: Then Elaine stepped up and took the role of vice president once the former one decided to go abroad for a while...
engSearchText:
Then Elaine stepped up and took the role of vice
president once the former one decided to go abroad
for a while...
jpnChrName: 途中、２年の副会長が留学した時に エレインが後任を引き受けて……
jpnSearchText:
途中、２年の副会長が留学した時に
エレインが後任を引き受けて……

engChrName: So there you go—that's how the festival came to be under one man's merciless watch.
engSearchText:
So there you go—that's how the festival came to be
under one man's merciless watch.
jpnChrName: あの鬼畜メガネの指揮下で 学藝祭を企画・運営したもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あの鬼畜メガネの指揮下で
学藝祭を企画・運営したもんだぜ。

engChrName: Heehee. I see.
engSearchText: Heehee. I see.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうだったんですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうだったんですね。

engChrName: Of course, after getting to know you so well, I can imagine that whatever you organized for it was anything but typical.
engSearchText:
Of course, after getting to know you so well, I can
imagine that whatever you organized for it was
anything but typical.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの事だから突拍子もない 出し物とか企画していそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんの事だから突拍子もない
出し物とか企画していそうですけど……

engChrName: *whistle*
engSearchText: *whistle*

engChrName: Ahaha! I'm sure Elaine was less than impressed with it...
engSearchText:
Ahaha! I'm sure Elaine was less than impressed
with it...
jpnChrName: あはは、エレインさんの 顰（しか）め面が目に浮かんじゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、エレインさんの
顰（しか）め面が目に浮かんじゃいますね。

engChrName: ...while Mr. Kincaid thought it would be funny and thoroughly approved even though he probably shouldn't have.
engSearchText:
...while Mr. Kincaid thought it would be funny and
thoroughly approved even though he probably
shouldn't have.
jpnChrName: キンケイドさんは 逆に面白がって認めそうですけど。
jpnSearchText:
キンケイドさんは
逆に面白がって認めそうですけど。

engChrName: Heh. It's like you were right there with us.
engSearchText: Heh. It's like you were right there with us.
jpnChrName: クク、正にそんな感じだったぜ。
jpnSearchText: クク、正にそんな感じだったぜ。

engChrName: I still remember my first drink at the afterparty back then, too. Man, it was so good.
engSearchText:
I still remember my first drink at the afterparty back
then, too. Man, it was so good.
jpnChrName: しかしあの時の“打ち上げ”の 最初の一杯はそりゃあ美味かったなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしあの時の“打ち上げ”の
最初の一杯はそりゃあ美味かったなぁ。

engChrName: You know how much of a sweet tooth I've got, but not even the bitterness of the alcohol could keep me from crackin' a smile.
engSearchText:
You know how much of a sweet tooth I've got, but
not even the bitterness of the alcohol could keep me
from crackin' a smile.
jpnChrName: 甘党の俺も思わずニッコリだったぜ。
jpnSearchText: 甘党の俺も思わずニッコリだったぜ。

engChrName: I should have known. You were pushing the boundaries of legality even as a teenager...
engSearchText:
I should have known. You were pushing the
boundaries of legality even as a teenager...
jpnChrName: もう……グレーなのは その頃からだったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
もう……グレーなのは
その頃からだったんですね。

engChrName: So the festival came to a close, and the Student Council elections were held in May.
engSearchText:
So the festival came to a close, and the Student
Council elections were held in May.
jpnChrName: すると学藝祭が終わって ５月に生徒会長選挙があって……
jpnSearchText:
すると学藝祭が終わって
５月に生徒会長選挙があって……

engChrName: That's when Elaine became the next president...and when you dropped out, I assume?
engSearchText:
That's when Elaine became the next president...and
when you dropped out, I assume?
jpnChrName: エレインさんが新会長になった直後に ヴァンさんは辞めてしまったんですね？
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんが新会長になった直後に
ヴァンさんは辞めてしまったんですね？

engChrName: You did it without warning, too—without so much as a single discussion with anyone beforehand.
engSearchText:
You did it without warning, too—without so much as
a single discussion with anyone beforehand.
jpnChrName: それもお二人に何も相談しないで ある日突然、行き先も告げずに……
jpnSearchText:
それもお二人に何も相談しないで
ある日突然、行き先も告げずに……

engChrName: So? How right am I?
engSearchText: So? How right am I?
jpnChrName: そうじゃありませんか？
jpnSearchText: そうじゃありませんか？

engChrName: ...You sure you're not psychic? It's like you're in my head.
engSearchText:
...You sure you're not psychic? It's like you're in
my head.
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ、少しばかり 喰えなくなりやがったじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
……やれやれ、少しばかり
喰えなくなりやがったじゃねえか。

engChrName: Heehee. Well, I know the average school year at Aramis, so I just put two and two together after seeing the way you talk to them.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Well, I know the average school year at
Aramis, so I just put two and two together after
seeing the way you talk to them.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、お二人との会話や アラミスの日程からの推測ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、お二人との会話や
アラミスの日程からの推測ですけど。

engChrName: That, and these last few months have also done wonders for my personal growth.
engSearchText:
That, and these last few months have also done
wonders for my personal growth.
jpnChrName: ──それにこの３ヶ月、 色々な意味で鍛えられましたから。
jpnSearchText:
──それにこの３ヶ月、
色々な意味で鍛えられましたから。

engChrName: I used to be this shy little girl who was afraid to leave her comfort zone...
engSearchText:
I used to be this shy little girl who was afraid to leave
her comfort zone...
jpnChrName: 引っ込み思案で前に踏み出せない……
jpnSearchText: 引っ込み思案で前に踏み出せない……

engChrName: Someone who couldn't even speak her mind to the one family member she wished she could the most.
engSearchText:
Someone who couldn't even speak her mind to the
one family member she wished she could the most.
jpnChrName: たった一人の家族に対しても 言いたいことが言えなかった子供が。
jpnSearchText:
たった一人の家族に対しても
言いたいことが言えなかった子供が。

engChrName: But now, I feel like a whole new me. I can walk a little further and have learned to say what's in my heart.
engSearchText:
But now, I feel like a whole new me. I can walk a
little further and have learned to say what's in
my heart.
jpnChrName: ちょっとだけ踏み出せて、 想いを伝えられるようになりました。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとだけ踏み出せて、
想いを伝えられるようになりました。

engChrName: I have everyone here to thank for that—but most of all I have you to thank for that.
engSearchText:
I have everyone here to thank for that—but most
of all I have you to thank for that.
jpnChrName: 全部、皆さんが── とりわけヴァンさんがくれたものです。
jpnSearchText:
全部、皆さんが──
とりわけヴァンさんがくれたものです。

engChrName: I thought divining my high school years was enough of a surprise, but you weren't done, huh?
engSearchText:
I thought divining my high school years was enough
of a surprise, but you weren't done, huh?
jpnChrName: 訂正するぜ……“少し”じゃなくて 相当、喰えなくなりやがったな。
jpnSearchText:
訂正するぜ……“少し”じゃなくて
相当、喰えなくなりやがったな。

engChrName: At this rate, you're gonna have everyone runnin' around at your beck and call even more than Renne.
engSearchText:
