At this rate, you're gonna have everyone runnin'
around at your beck and call even more than Renne.
jpnChrName: そのうち先輩以上に周りを 振り回すようになるんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
そのうち先輩以上に周りを
振り回すようになるんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Oh, stop. I doubt that'll be the case.
engSearchText: Oh, stop. I doubt that'll be the case.
jpnChrName: あはは、それは畏れ多いですよ。
jpnSearchText: あはは、それは畏れ多いですよ。

engChrName: (Though there is one person I wish would pay a bit more attention to me.)
engSearchText:
(Though there is one person I wish would pay a bit
more attention to me.)
jpnChrName: （……振り回すというより、   気にして欲しい人はいますけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（……振り回すというより、
気にして欲しい人はいますけど……）

engChrName: ...Hmm? What's up?
engSearchText: ...Hmm? What's up?
jpnChrName: ？　どうした？
jpnSearchText: ？　どうした？

engChrName: Nothing. I was just thinking that I still have a long road ahead of me.
engSearchText:
Nothing. I was just thinking that I still have a long
road ahead of me.
jpnChrName: ……いえいえ。 先は長そうだなぁって。
jpnSearchText:
……いえいえ。
先は長そうだなぁって。

engChrName: So you got to talk to him a bit on the phone after what happened in Oración, but that's it?
engSearchText:
So you got to talk to him a bit on the phone after
what happened in Oración, but that's it?
jpnChrName: ──オラシオンから帰った後も 通信で少し話したくらいなのか。
jpnSearchText:
──オラシオンから帰った後も
通信で少し話したくらいなのか。

engChrName: Yes...though I'm used to that by now.
engSearchText: Yes...though I'm used to that by now.
jpnChrName: はい……でも慣れていますから。
jpnSearchText: はい……でも慣れていますから。

engChrName: It seems like this year's Revolution Festival is going to be a big one, too, what with the memorial service and more besides.
engSearchText:
It seems like this year's Revolution Festival is going to
be a big one, too, what with the memorial service and
more besides.
jpnChrName: 実際、今年の革命記念祭は 追悼式やそれ以外もありますし。
jpnSearchText:
実際、今年の革命記念祭は
追悼式やそれ以外もありますし。

engChrName: It's no wonder he doesn't have much time to dedicate to me right now.
engSearchText:
It's no wonder he doesn't have much time to dedicate
to me right now.
jpnChrName: 父の立場なら時間が取れなくても 仕方ないと思います。
jpnSearchText:
父の立場なら時間が取れなくても
仕方ないと思います。

engChrName: But he did say we could get together after the ceremony is over, thankfully.
engSearchText:
But he did say we could get together after the
ceremony is over, thankfully.
jpnChrName: あ、一応式典が終わった後に 顔を合わせる事にはなっていまして。
jpnSearchText:
あ、一応式典が終わった後に
顔を合わせる事にはなっていまして。

engChrName: Really? I guess that's better than nothing—and at least you can still see him.
engSearchText:
Really? I guess that's better than nothing—and at
least you can still see him.
jpnChrName: そうか……ま、会えるだけ まだマシなのかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……ま、会えるだけ
まだマシなのかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: That is true... Compared to Elaine, I'm very fortunate.
engSearchText:
That is true... Compared to Elaine, I'm
very fortunate.
jpnChrName: ………はい。 エレインさんのお父さんですね。
jpnSearchText:
………はい。
エレインさんのお父さんですね。

engChrName: I can't even imagine what she must be going through...
engSearchText:
I can't even imagine what she must be
going through...
jpnChrName: 安易に同情なんてできませんが……
jpnSearchText: 安易に同情なんてできませんが……

engChrName: She's amazing to have been able to do what she did— to make what must have been an excruciating decision—even if it was the right one.
engSearchText:
She's amazing to have been able to do what she did—
to make what must have been an excruciating
decision—even if it was the right one.
jpnChrName: 悩んだ末に決断して、真摯に家族と 向き合った結果だと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
悩んだ末に決断して、真摯に家族と
向き合った結果だと思うんです。

engChrName: I don't think there are many people who could have followed through on that, bracer or otherwise.
engSearchText:
I don't think there are many people who could have
followed through on that, bracer or otherwise.
jpnChrName: Ａ級遊撃士とかは関係なく…… 改めて凄い人だなって尊敬します。
jpnSearchText:
Ａ級遊撃士とかは関係なく……
改めて凄い人だなって尊敬します。

engChrName: I hate that the hard times clearly aren't over for her...
engSearchText: I hate that the hard times clearly aren't over for her...
jpnChrName: その……それでも色々、 辛いこともあると思うので。
jpnSearchText:
その……それでも色々、
辛いこともあると思うので。

engChrName: I hate that the hard times clearly aren't over for her now that her dad is in a coma...
engSearchText:
I hate that the hard times clearly aren't over for her
now that her dad is in a coma...
jpnChrName: その……お父さんが今も 昏睡状態というのもありますし。
jpnSearchText:
その……お父さんが今も
昏睡状態というのもありますし。

engChrName: ...but if you could just be there for her, I think she would like that very much.
engSearchText:
...but if you could just be there for her, I think she
would like that very much.
jpnChrName: 寄り添ってフォローするのは ヴァンさんの務めだとも思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
寄り添ってフォローするのは
ヴァンさんの務めだとも思うんです。

engChrName: I don't mean to put that responsibility squarely on your shoulders, of course! Mr. Kincaid and the guild should be there for her, too—but still!
engSearchText:
I don't mean to put that responsibility squarely on
your shoulders, of course! Mr. Kincaid and the guild
should be there for her, too—but still!
jpnChrName: あ、キンケイドさんやギルドの方々、 お友達なども同じでしょうけどっ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、キンケイドさんやギルドの方々、
お友達なども同じでしょうけどっ。

engChrName: I mean...yeah? I wasn't gonna give her the cold shoulder or anything.
engSearchText:
I mean...yeah? I wasn't gonna give her the cold
shoulder or anything.
jpnChrName: ああ……？ ま、元よりそのつもりだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……？
ま、元よりそのつもりだがな。

engChrName: It won't make up for what I did seven years ago, but I'd like to think I can be there for her in some way others can't.
engSearchText:
It won't make up for what I did seven years ago, but
I'd like to think I can be there for her in some way
others can't.
jpnChrName: ７年前のワビってわけじゃねえが 俺にしか出来ない役割もあんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
７年前のワビってわけじゃねえが
俺にしか出来ない役割もあんだろ。

engChrName: Sounds like she won't be back here for a while, though. She's got a ton left to do in Oración.
engSearchText:
Sounds like she won't be back here for a
while, though. She's got a ton left to do in Oración.
jpnChrName: つっても、後始末やらでまだ首都に 戻れてねぇみたいだからなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
つっても、後始末やらでまだ首都に
戻れてねぇみたいだからなぁ……

engChrName: What's that look for? Not proactive enough, you think?
engSearchText:
What's that look for? Not proactive enough,
you think?
jpnChrName: ？　まだ足りねぇってか？
jpnSearchText: ？　まだ足りねぇってか？

engChrName: Oh, don't mind me. I'm sure just knowing you want to comfort her would mean a lot in itself. Really!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't mind me. I'm sure just knowing you want
to comfort her would mean a lot in itself. Really!
jpnChrName: いえ──エレインさんも 安心できるんじゃないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
いえ──エレインさんも
安心できるんじゃないでしょうか？

engChrName: O-Oh, okay... (Yeesh. Can't always please a teenager once they get to that age, I guess.)
engSearchText:
O-Oh, okay...
(Yeesh. Can't always please a teenager once they get
to that age, I guess.)
jpnChrName: お、おお…… （年頃の娘ってのは難しいな。）
jpnSearchText:
お、おお……
（年頃の娘ってのは難しいな。）

engChrName: (Still...) Haha...
engSearchText:
(Still...)
Haha...

engChrName: Wh-What is it? Why are you laughing?
engSearchText: Wh-What is it? Why are you laughing?
jpnChrName: え、え…… どうして笑うんですか～っ！？
jpnSearchText:
え、え……
どうして笑うんですか～っ！？

engChrName: Heh. You lovebirds wanna get a room?
engSearchText: Heh. You lovebirds wanna get a room?
jpnChrName: ハッ、なにイチャコラしてやがる。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、なにイチャコラしてやがる。

engChrName: I-I didn't know you were all here! Is it already time to leave, then?
engSearchText:
I-I didn't know you were all here! Is it already time to
leave, then?
jpnChrName: み、皆さん……！ あ……もう時間でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
み、皆さん……！
あ……もう時間でしたか。

engChrName: You might wanna get your eyes checked if you thought you were seein' heart eyes.
engSearchText:
You might wanna get your eyes checked if you
thought you were seein' heart eyes.
jpnChrName: ったく、してねえっつーの。
jpnSearchText: ったく、してねえっつーの。

engChrName: Oh, I don't know... Did you hear anything special, XEROS?
engSearchText:
Oh, I don't know... Did you hear anything
special, XEROS?
jpnChrName: ふーん、どうだかねぇ。 ＸＥＲＯＳ、何か聞いてない？
jpnSearchText:
ふーん、どうだかねぇ。
ＸＥＲＯＳ、何か聞いてない？

engChrName: RUFF?
engSearchText: RUFF?
jpnChrName: ＷＡＯＮ？
jpnSearchText: ＷＡＯＮ？

engChrName: N-Not you, too, Quatre... We were just making small talk. Honest!
engSearchText:
N-Not you, too, Quatre... We were just making
small talk. Honest!
jpnChrName: カ、カトル君まで…… ただの世間話ですからっ。
jpnSearchText:
カ、カトル君まで……
ただの世間話ですからっ。

engChrName: Heehee. I feel a little better now, to be honest.
engSearchText: Heehee. I feel a little better now, to be honest.
jpnChrName: えへへ…… でも何だか安心しましたっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
でも何だか安心しましたっ。

engChrName: Our futures may still be uncertain, but for now, we can continue to take each day as it comes.
engSearchText:
Our futures may still be uncertain, but for now, we
can continue to take each day as it comes.
jpnChrName: “今後”についてはともかく── 本日は本日、で宜しいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
“今後”についてはともかく──
本日は本日、で宜しいでしょうか？

engChrName: That we can—and sorry. I shouldn't have said what I did earlier.
engSearchText:
That we can—and sorry. I shouldn't have said what I
did earlier.
jpnChrName: ああ……それと悪いな。 つまらんことを言っちまって。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……それと悪いな。
つまらんことを言っちまって。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Heh. Our boss is such a little troublemaker.
engSearchText: Heh. Our boss is such a little troublemaker.
jpnChrName: フフ、世話が焼けるわね。
jpnSearchText: フフ、世話が焼けるわね。

engChrName: Don't sweat it. They say not being able to read the room comes with old age.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. They say not being able to read the
room comes with old age.
jpnChrName: いや～、空気読めなくなるのは 加齢のせいらしいから気にすんなよ？
jpnSearchText:
いや～、空気読めなくなるのは
加齢のせいらしいから気にすんなよ？

engChrName: You know...one day you're gonna realize I'm still in my prime!
engSearchText:
You know...one day you're gonna realize I'm still in
my prime!
jpnChrName: アーロン……っていくらなんでも そこまでトシ食ってねえっつの！！
jpnSearchText:
アーロン……っていくらなんでも
そこまでトシ食ってねえっつの！！

engChrName: It's always the same with you two...
engSearchText: It's always the same with you two...
jpnChrName: やれやれ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ。

engChrName: Heh heh...
engSearchText: Heh heh...

engChrName: Forget it... Let's just see what's on the docket for today.
engSearchText:
Forget it... Let's just see what's on the docket
for today.
jpnChrName: ったく……それじゃあ とっとと４ｓｐｇの確認に行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……それじゃあ
とっとと４ｓｐｇの確認に行くぞ。

engChrName: The Revolution Festival's three days out, and I wouldn't be surprised if the aftermath of Almata's destruction led to problems, too.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival's three days out, and I
wouldn't be surprised if the aftermath of Almata's
destruction led to problems, too.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭の３日前── マフィア壊滅の揺れ戻しもありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭の３日前──
マフィア壊滅の揺れ戻しもありそうだ。

engChrName: It's only half-past ten, and there's a lot of us, so I think we can cover all the districts in this part of town by today, right?
engSearchText:
It's only half-past ten, and there's a lot of us, so I
think we can cover all the districts in this part of town
by today, right?
jpnChrName: まだ１０時半、人手もあるし 一通りのエリアを回るからな！
jpnSearchText:
まだ１０時半、人手もあるし
一通りのエリアを回るからな！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Then let's get to work!
engSearchText: Then let's get to work!
jpnChrName: それでは業務開始、ですね。
jpnSearchText: それでは業務開始、ですね。

engChrName: Agnès, Feri, and Aaron have joined the party. Select two additional members.
engSearchText:
Agnès, Feri, and Aaron have joined the party.
Select two additional members.
jpnChrName: アニエス、フェリ、アーロンがパーティに入りました。 追加のメンバーを２名選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、フェリ、アーロンがパーティに入りました。
追加のメンバーを２名選んでください。

engChrName: November 30th, 4:55PM
engSearchText: November 30th, 4:55PM

engChrName: Upon hearing of their plans, Montmart's owners graciously allowed them an exclusive run of the bistro until 7PM.
engSearchText:
Upon hearing of their plans, Montmart's owners
graciously allowed them an exclusive run of the bistro
until 7PM.
jpnChrName: ──その後、ビストロ一家の厚意により 夜７時まで貸し切りすることとなり……
jpnSearchText:
──その後、ビストロ一家の厚意により
夜７時まで貸し切りすることとなり……

engChrName: They then invited many of their friends and acquaintances to join them, amounting to a more than modest celebration.
engSearchText:
They then invited many of their friends and
acquaintances to join them, amounting to a
more than modest celebration.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは、多くの関係者や知り合いを招き、 “打ち上げ”をすることとなった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは、多くの関係者や知り合いを招き、
“打ち上げ”をすることとなった。

engChrName: With Almata's reign of terror at an end, they were able to let go and truly enjoy the moment...
engSearchText:
With Almata's reign of terror at an end, they were
able to let go and truly enjoy the moment...
jpnChrName: ここ半年で加速し、クレイユ村消滅で極まった アルマータという災厄の終結を祝うように──
jpnSearchText:
ここ半年で加速し、クレイユ村消滅で極まった
アルマータという災厄の終結を祝うように──

engChrName: ...and despite most attendees rarely or never crossing paths, they opened up to each other in record time.
engSearchText:
...and despite most attendees rarely or never crossing
paths, they opened up to each other in record time.
jpnChrName: 普段接点のない者同士、ヴァンたちを通じて あっという間に打ち解けていき……
jpnSearchText:
普段接点のない者同士、ヴァンたちを通じて
あっという間に打ち解けていき……

engChrName: Even celebrities like Judith, Nina, and the crown prince fit right in with the evening of merriment and delicious food.
engSearchText:
Even celebrities like Judith, Nina, and the crown
prince fit right in with the evening of merriment and
delicious food.
jpnChrName: ジュディスやニナ、公太子のような有名人共々、 お喋りとモンマルトの料理を楽しむのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスやニナ、公太子のような有名人共々、
お喋りとモンマルトの料理を楽しむのだった。

engChrName: (There were some who stepped over the line and ended up paying the price, but they only got what they deserved.)
engSearchText:
(There were some who stepped over the line and
ended up paying the price, but they only got what
they deserved.)
jpnChrName: （綺麗どころにはっちゃける者などもいたが、   痛い目を見たのは言うまでもない。）
jpnSearchText:
（綺麗どころにはっちゃける者などもいたが、
痛い目を見たのは言うまでもない。）

engChrName: I can't believe even Cao ended up comin'... This shit ended up being a crazier mess than I was countin' on.
engSearchText:
I can't believe even Cao ended up comin'... This shit
ended up being a crazier mess than I was countin' on.
jpnChrName: まさかツァオたちまで来るとは…… やっぱカオスになったじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
まさかツァオたちまで来るとは……
やっぱカオスになったじゃねーか。

engChrName: It is quite the mishmash of people—I never pictured Renne, the Gralsritter, and the crown prince to ever be in the same room.
engSearchText:
It is quite the mishmash of people—I never pictured
Renne, the Gralsritter, and the crown prince to ever
be in the same room.
jpnChrName: レンさんに星杯騎士たち、 公太子殿下まで同席するなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
レンさんに星杯騎士たち、
公太子殿下まで同席するなんてね。

engChrName: If you tried to tell someone who wasn't here about this guest list, they'd think you were making it up.
engSearchText:
If you tried to tell someone who wasn't here about
this guest list, they'd think you were making it up.
jpnChrName: ちょっとあり得ないというか 色々突っ込みたくて仕方なかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとあり得ないというか
色々突っ込みたくて仕方なかったわ。

engChrName: Especially so with unscrupulous celebrities like Rixia Mao and Judith Lanster being here.
engSearchText:
Especially so with unscrupulous celebrities like Rixia
Mao and Judith Lanster being here.
jpnChrName: フッ、それを言うならリーシャ・マオに ジュディス・ランスターも同じだろう。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、それを言うならリーシャ・マオに
ジュディス・ランスターも同じだろう。

engChrName: Since we do owe them, however, I see no reason to drive them out.
engSearchText:
Since we do owe them, however, I see no reason to
drive them out.
jpnChrName: 色々貸し借りもあるし、 野暮なことを言うつもりはないが。
jpnSearchText:
色々貸し借りもあるし、
野暮なことを言うつもりはないが。

engChrName: I got no comment on either of 'em—though Miss Vice President here might not be as up for lettin' some things slide.
engSearchText:
I got no comment on either of 'em—though Miss
Vice President here might not be as up for lettin'
some things slide.
jpnChrName: ま、コメントは控えておくぜ。 お堅い副会長殿はそうもいかんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、コメントは控えておくぜ。
お堅い副会長殿はそうもいかんだろうが。

engChrName: Just how far stuck in the past are you? If nothing else, dealing with the Twilight forced me to be a little more flexible with whom I work.
engSearchText:
Just how far stuck in the past are you? If nothing else,
dealing with the Twilight forced me to be a little
more flexible with whom I work.
jpnChrName: 何時の話をしてるのよ…… 《黄昏》の時点で割り切っているわ。
jpnSearchText:
何時の話をしてるのよ……
《黄昏》の時点で割り切っているわ。

engChrName: And I certainly doubt you could have triumphed in Oración without the help of people from all sides of the moral spectrum.
engSearchText:
And I certainly doubt you could have triumphed in
Oración without the help of people from all sides of
the moral spectrum.
jpnChrName: ………オラシオンでの決着も 表裏双方の協力あってこそでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
………オラシオンでの決着も
表裏双方の協力あってこそでしょうし。

engChrName: Sure doubt it.
engSearchText: Sure doubt it.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Realizing that you can't always keep it clean is a sign you have truly matured.
engSearchText:
Realizing that you can't always keep it clean is a sign
you have truly matured.
jpnChrName: まあ、その割り切りが 大人になるということだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その割り切りが
大人になるということだろう。

engChrName: I'd wondered if the two of you would ever grow up, but at last, I can breathe a sigh of relief.
engSearchText:
I'd wondered if the two of you would ever grow up,
but at last, I can breathe a sigh of relief.
jpnChrName: モラトリアムを拗らせた弟妹（きょうだい）分を見守ってきた 身としては、少し肩の荷が下りた気分だ。
jpnSearchText:
モラトリアムを拗らせた弟妹（きょうだい）分を見守ってきた
身としては、少し肩の荷が下りた気分だ。

engChrName: Don't lump me in with her! / Don't lump me in with him!
engSearchText:
Don't lump me in with her! /
Don't lump me in with him!
jpnChrName: 一緒にすんな！／しないで！
jpnSearchText: 一緒にすんな！／しないで！

engChrName: Haha... Or maybe you two haven't changed in the slightest.
engSearchText:
Haha... Or maybe you two haven't changed in
the slightest.
jpnChrName: クク……お前たちも 驚くほど変わっていないな。
jpnSearchText:
クク……お前たちも
驚くほど変わっていないな。

engChrName: You're both exactly like you were in high school.
engSearchText: You're both exactly like you were in high school.
jpnChrName: 高二の時のまんまじゃないか？
jpnSearchText: 高二の時のまんまじゃないか？

engChrName: That goes double for you, then. You're still the same slave driver you've always been.
engSearchText:
That goes double for you, then. You're still the same
slave driver you've always been.
jpnChrName: グッ、てめえこそ 鬼畜生徒会長のまんまじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
グッ、てめえこそ
鬼畜生徒会長のまんまじゃねーか。

engChrName: Paid off, though. From Student Council president to counseling THE president.
engSearchText:
Paid off, though. From Student Council president to
counseling THE president.
jpnChrName: いつの間にか大統領補佐官なんて とんでもねぇコネを作ってるしよ。
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にか大統領補佐官なんて
とんでもねぇコネを作ってるしよ。

engChrName: To be sure. You've never been shy about your lofty ambitions.
engSearchText:
To be sure. You've never been shy about your
lofty ambitions.
jpnChrName: ええ、ルネらしく、 野心を隠す気もないみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ルネらしく、
野心を隠す気もないみたいね？

engChrName: What's the plan, then? Building a foothold in the CID, shooting through police bureaucracy, then finally landing in politics?
engSearchText:
What's the plan, then? Building a foothold in the
CID, shooting through police bureaucracy, then
finally landing in politics?
jpnChrName: 諜報畑で足場を作ってから警察官僚を 経由して政界入り──あたりかしら？
jpnSearchText:
諜報畑で足場を作ってから警察官僚を
経由して政界入り──あたりかしら？

engChrName: I won't deny it. Skill and knowledge only have meaning when you use them, and I intend to use mine.
engSearchText:
I won't deny it. Skill and knowledge only have
meaning when you use them, and I intend to
use mine.
jpnChrName: 否定はしないさ。 能力と知識は役立ててこそだ。
jpnSearchText:
否定はしないさ。
能力と知識は役立ててこそだ。

engChrName: Of course, there are plenty of roads I could take to get into politics besides that one.
engSearchText:
Of course, there are plenty of roads I could take to get
into politics besides that one.
jpnChrName: まあ政界入りするルートなど それ以外に幾らでもあるだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ政界入りするルートなど
それ以外に幾らでもあるだろうが。

engChrName: Here comes his boundless confidence. Not like he ain't got good reason for it, but ugh.
engSearchText:
Here comes his boundless confidence. Not like he
ain't got good reason for it, but ugh.
jpnChrName: 出たよ根拠しかねえ自信。
jpnSearchText: 出たよ根拠しかねえ自信。

engChrName: I bet your chief must have a hard time working out what to do with you.
engSearchText:
I bet your chief must have a hard time working out
what to do with you.
jpnChrName: ふう、ロウラン室長も さぞ気を揉んでいるでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ロウラン室長も
さぞ気を揉んでいるでしょうね。

engChrName: Well, she's a smart woman. I don't doubt she sees right through me.
engSearchText:
Well, she's a smart woman. I don't doubt she sees
right through me.
jpnChrName: フフ、そのあたりはとっくに 見透かされているだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
フフ、そのあたりはとっくに
見透かされているだろうが……

engChrName: ...You've found yourself a fine base of operations, haven't you?
engSearchText:
...You've found yourself a fine base of operations,
haven't you?
jpnChrName: ……フッ…… なかなか良い拠点じゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
……フッ……
なかなか良い拠点じゃないか？

engChrName: It's almost a shame the actual work you do from here is as shady as it comes.
engSearchText:
It's almost a shame the actual work you do from here
is as shady as it comes.
jpnChrName: やっている事と言えば 胡散臭いことばかりのようだが。
jpnSearchText:
やっている事と言えば
胡散臭いことばかりのようだが。

engChrName: It really is a nice place. Even your landlords are sweethearts.
engSearchText:
It really is a nice place. Even your landlords
are sweethearts.
jpnChrName: ……助手さん同様、 良い大家さんにも恵まれたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
……助手さん同様、
良い大家さんにも恵まれたみたいね。

engChrName: I'm sure them being around has helped you achieve a balanced diet, too—even if it probably still contains far too much sugar.
engSearchText:
I'm sure them being around has helped you achieve a
balanced diet, too—even if it probably still contains
far too much sugar.
jpnChrName: 甘い物はともかく、日々の食生活が 乱れてなさそうなのは安心したわ。
jpnSearchText:
甘い物はともかく、日々の食生活が
乱れてなさそうなのは安心したわ。

engChrName: Who are you, my mother? And if you think the work we're doin' here is shady, maybe stop pilin' more on us!
engSearchText:
Who are you, my mother? And if you think the work
we're doin' here is shady, maybe stop pilin' more
on us!
jpnChrName: オカンか──つうか胡散臭いなら 余計な仕事を回してくるんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
オカンか──つうか胡散臭いなら
余計な仕事を回してくるんじゃねえ。

engChrName: How're things with your dad, by the way?
engSearchText: How're things with your dad, by the way?
jpnChrName: それより…… 親父さんの方はどうなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
それより……
親父さんの方はどうなんだ？

engChrName: I've heard he's at least cooperating with questioning.
engSearchText: I've heard he's at least cooperating with questioning.
jpnChrName: 大人しく事情聴取に 応じてるっつうのは聞いたが。
jpnSearchText:
大人しく事情聴取に
応じてるっつうのは聞いたが。

engChrName: He is. I've started seeing glimpses of the man he once was.
engSearchText:
He is. I've started seeing glimpses of the man he
once was.
jpnChrName: ええ……まるで 憑き物が落ちたみたいにね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……まるで
憑き物が落ちたみたいにね。

engChrName: I did plan to stay in Oración until a guilty verdict on his charges was reached...
engSearchText:
I did plan to stay in Oración until a guilty verdict on
his charges was reached...
jpnChrName: 罪状が確定するまでオラシオンに 留まろうとも思ったけれど……
jpnSearchText:
罪状が確定するまでオラシオンに
留まろうとも思ったけれど……

engChrName: ...but my mother sent me away, saying she was sure I had something more important to do.
engSearchText:
...but my mother sent me away, saying she was sure I
had something more important to do.
jpnChrName: 貴女には貴女の役割があるでしょうって 母に送り出されてしまったわ。
jpnSearchText:
貴女には貴女の役割があるでしょうって
母に送り出されてしまったわ。

engChrName: Last I heard, he still hadn't woken up.
engSearchText: Last I heard, he still hadn't woken up.
jpnChrName: ……どうやらまだ 目を覚ましていないらしいが。
jpnSearchText:
……どうやらまだ
目を覚ましていないらしいが。

engChrName: That's all I know, too. Though we're lucky he's alive at all...
engSearchText:
That's all I know, too. Though we're lucky he's alive
at all...
jpnChrName: ええ……でも命を拾っただけ 運が良かったと思うことにする。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……でも命を拾っただけ
運が良かったと思うことにする。

engChrName: The doctors say there's still at least a chance that he'll recover.
engSearchText:
The doctors say there's still at least a chance that
he'll recover.
jpnChrName: お医者様によると、快復する可能性も 残されているみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
お医者様によると、快復する可能性も
残されているみたいだし……

engChrName: I did intend to stay with him a while longer, but my mother sent me away.
engSearchText:
I did intend to stay with him a while longer, but my
mother sent me away.
jpnChrName: しばらく付き添おうと思ったのだけど 母に送り出されてしまったわ。
jpnSearchText:
しばらく付き添おうと思ったのだけど
母に送り出されてしまったわ。

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Simone always was a strong woman—and it appears that she still is.
engSearchText:
Simone always was a strong woman—and it appears
that she still is.
jpnChrName: シモーヌ夫人か…… 幼少以来だが強いご婦人だな。
jpnSearchText:
シモーヌ夫人か……
幼少以来だが強いご婦人だな。

engChrName: Well, even if there's more to come, you must be feeling some relief that you have finally settled matters with him?
engSearchText:
Well, even if there's more to come, you must be
feeling some relief that you have finally settled
matters with him?
jpnChrName: だが──色々な意味で 吹っ切れたようじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
だが──色々な意味で
吹っ切れたようじゃないか？

engChrName: I do. Half the reason I wanted to become a bracer was to clear my doubts about Father.
engSearchText:
I do. Half the reason I wanted to become a bracer was
to clear my doubts about Father.
jpnChrName: ええ、この道を選んだ理由の半分は 父への疑心だったけれど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、この道を選んだ理由の半分は
父への疑心だったけれど。

engChrName: I hate how those doubts turned out to be justified, but even still, he'll always be family to me...
engSearchText:
I hate how those doubts turned out to be justified, but
even still, he'll always be family to me...
jpnChrName: それでもやっぱり私にとって 家族であるのは間違いなくて……
jpnSearchText:
それでもやっぱり私にとって
家族であるのは間違いなくて……

engChrName: ...and though it led me to being the one to charge him, I don't regret the path I chose.
engSearchText:
...and though it led me to being the one to charge
him, I don't regret the path I chose.
jpnChrName: そんな父を告発することになっても 遊撃士になった事への後悔はなくて──
jpnSearchText:
そんな父を告発することになっても
遊撃士になった事への後悔はなくて──

engChrName: Now I can dedicate my days to mulling over what being a bracer really means to me.
engSearchText:
Now I can dedicate my days to mulling over what
being a bracer really means to me.
jpnChrName: ……だから今後は本当の意味で 遊撃士という道に向き合えると思う。
jpnSearchText:
……だから今後は本当の意味で
遊撃士という道に向き合えると思う。

engChrName: It's time for me to consider my personal goals—to find how I can wield my sword for my sake.
engSearchText:
It's time for me to consider my personal goals—to
find how I can wield my sword for my sake.
jpnChrName: 他の誰でもない私が、私であるために、 これからどう剣を振るうのか。
jpnSearchText:
他の誰でもない私が、私であるために、
これからどう剣を振るうのか。

engChrName: It's like I can finally see things for what they truly are for the first time.
engSearchText:
It's like I can finally see things for what they truly are
for the first time.
jpnChrName: その視界だけは クリアになったと思えるから。
jpnSearchText:
その視界だけは
クリアになったと思えるから。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: フッ……
jpnSearchText: フッ……

engChrName: Maybe you should try aimin' for that unofficial S-rank, then.
engSearchText:
Maybe you should try aimin' for that unofficial
S-rank, then.
jpnChrName: ま、どうせだったら非公式っつう Ｓ級ってのを目指してみちゃどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
ま、どうせだったら非公式っつう
Ｓ級ってのを目指してみちゃどうだ？

engChrName: You know you got the determination to work for it.
engSearchText: You know you got the determination to work for it.
jpnChrName: クソ真面目なお前なら行けるだろ。
jpnSearchText: クソ真面目なお前なら行けるだろ。

engChrName: I don't know about that...or why you know about that rank, for that matter.
engSearchText:
I don't know about that...or why you know about that
rank, for that matter.
jpnChrName: あれは流石に……どうして貴方が そのランクを知っているかはともかく。
jpnSearchText:
あれは流石に……どうして貴方が
そのランクを知っているかはともかく。

engChrName: But now that I have a clearer head, I feel like even A-rank is too high for me as I am.
engSearchText:
But now that I have a clearer head, I feel like even
A-rank is too high for me as I am.
jpnChrName: 視界が開けた今、Ａ級というランクすら 私にとっては過ぎたものだわ。
jpnSearchText:
視界が開けた今、Ａ級というランクすら
私にとっては過ぎたものだわ。

engChrName: Though since the higher ups rejected not only my resignation but my request for a rank decrease, I'll just have to make peace with it.
engSearchText:
Though since the higher ups rejected not only my
resignation but my request for a rank decrease, I'll just
have to make peace with it.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士資格に続けて返上を却下された以上、 向き合っていくしかなさそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士資格に続けて返上を却下された以上、
向き合っていくしかなさそうだけど。

engChrName: You even asked for a demotion, huh? Damn, you really gotta learn to loosen up.
engSearchText:
You even asked for a demotion, huh? Damn, you
really gotta learn to loosen up.
jpnChrName: 降格も申し出てたのかよ…… やれやれ、ほんとクソ真面目だな。
jpnSearchText:
降格も申し出てたのかよ……
やれやれ、ほんとクソ真面目だな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. You said that your dad was half the reason you became a bracer, right?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. You said that your dad was half the reason
you became a bracer, right?
jpnChrName: そういや親父さんへの反発が 目指した理由の半分っていうと……
jpnSearchText:
そういや親父さんへの反発が
目指した理由の半分っていうと……

engChrName: What was the other half?
engSearchText: What was the other half?
jpnChrName: 残りの半分はなんだったんだ？
jpnSearchText: 残りの半分はなんだったんだ？

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: Like, uhh...did something happen at school between me droppin' out and graduation?
engSearchText:
Like, uhh...did something happen at school between
me droppin' out and graduation?
jpnChrName: ……？　俺が辞めた後、 卒業までになんかあったのか？
jpnSearchText:
……？　俺が辞めた後、
卒業までになんかあったのか？

engChrName: You could say that, I suppose.
engSearchText: You could say that, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、そのようなものね。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、そのようなものね。

engChrName: But it has absolutely nothing to do with you. Not in the slightest.
engSearchText:
But it has absolutely nothing to do with you. Not in
the slightest.
jpnChrName: 言っておくけど貴方には全く、 一リジュたりとも関係ない事だから。
jpnSearchText:
言っておくけど貴方には全く、
一リジュたりとも関係ない事だから。

engChrName: G-Got it...
engSearchText: G-Got it...
jpnChrName: は、はあ。
jpnSearchText: は、はあ。

engChrName: (What's her deal? Did I screw up or somethin'?)
engSearchText: (What's her deal? Did I screw up or somethin'?)
jpnChrName: （……おい。   なんかやっちまったか？）
jpnSearchText:
（……おい。
なんかやっちまったか？）

engChrName: (You do nothing BUT screw up with Elaine.)
engSearchText: (You do nothing BUT screw up with Elaine.)
jpnChrName: （クク……エレイン相手に お前がやらかさない事があるのか？）
jpnSearchText:
（クク……エレイン相手に
お前がやらかさない事があるのか？）

engChrName: (Me and my big mouth...)
engSearchText: (Me and my big mouth...)

engChrName: Stop whispering over me! Honestly, boys...
engSearchText: Stop whispering over me! Honestly, boys...
jpnChrName: そこ、ヒソヒソ話さない！ ──まったく貴方たち男と来たら。
jpnSearchText:
そこ、ヒソヒソ話さない！
──まったく貴方たち男と来たら。

engChrName: You know, I heard how the two of you had a whale of a time at your own little gathering following the school festival's afterparty.
engSearchText:
You know, I heard how the two of you had a whale of
a time at your own little gathering following the
school festival's afterparty.
jpnChrName: あの学藝祭の打ち上げだって 二次会で盛り上がったみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
あの学藝祭の打ち上げだって
二次会で盛り上がったみたいだし。

engChrName: How disgraceful.
engSearchText: How disgraceful.
jpnChrName: さぞ楽しかったんでしょうね～？ ………イヤらしい。
jpnSearchText:
さぞ楽しかったんでしょうね～？
………イヤらしい。

engChrName: Look, just 'cause René brought his older girlfriend along doesn't mean we were lookin' to get into trouble!
engSearchText:
Look, just 'cause René brought his older girlfriend
along doesn't mean we were lookin' to get
into trouble!
jpnChrName: そ、そういう集まりじゃねえっつの。 ルネは年上の彼女を連れてきてたが。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そういう集まりじゃねえっつの。
ルネは年上の彼女を連れてきてたが。

engChrName: We just wanted to drink some stuff our square of a vice prez would've had our heads over. We didn't have a choice but to leave you out.
engSearchText:
We just wanted to drink some stuff our square of a
vice prez would've had our heads over. We didn't
have a choice but to leave you out.
jpnChrName: お堅い副会長様の目があると どうしても飲めない飲み物をだなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
お堅い副会長様の目があると
どうしても飲めない飲み物をだなぁ。

engChrName: Though we certainly saw some stunning 'clientele' at that place my ex picked out, didn't we?
engSearchText:
Though we certainly saw some stunning 'clientele' at
that place my ex picked out, didn't we?
jpnChrName: まあ、元カノ紹介の店だったから ゲストも華やかではあったがな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、元カノ紹介の店だったから
ゲストも華やかではあったがな。

engChrName: Don't tell her that!
engSearchText: Don't tell her that!
jpnChrName: ってオイ！
jpnSearchText: ってオイ！

engChrName: I-I knew it! I knew it!
engSearchText: I-I knew it! I knew it!
jpnChrName: や、やっぱりそうなんじゃない！
jpnSearchText: や、やっぱりそうなんじゃない！

engChrName: You supported me during the Student Council elections, but you were getting up to such debauchery behind the scenes...
engSearchText:
You supported me during the Student Council
elections, but you were getting up to such debauchery
behind the scenes...
jpnChrName: 私を放っておいてそんな事して 会長選挙じゃ最大限に支えてくれて！
jpnSearchText:
私を放っておいてそんな事して
会長選挙じゃ最大限に支えてくれて！

engChrName: Then out of nowhere you just leave that letter and—
engSearchText: Then out of nowhere you just leave that letter and—
jpnChrName: 挙句の果てにあんな書き置きを──
jpnSearchText: 挙句の果てにあんな書き置きを──

engChrName: ...I'm sorry. Bringing that up again is hitting below the belt, isn't it?
engSearchText:
...I'm sorry. Bringing that up again is hitting below
the belt, isn't it?
jpnChrName: ………ごめんなさい。 ルール違反、だったわね。
jpnSearchText:
………ごめんなさい。
ルール違反、だったわね。

engChrName: Haha. In whose playbook?
engSearchText: Haha. In whose playbook?
jpnChrName: ハハ、どんなルールだっつの。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、どんなルールだっつの。

engChrName: 'Sides, I'm the one who's in the wrong here. You don't need to apologize.
engSearchText:
'Sides, I'm the one who's in the wrong here.
You don't need to apologize.
jpnChrName: それと悪いのは誰でもない── 俺だけだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
それと悪いのは誰でもない──
俺だけだろうが。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...

engChrName: ...If I'm allowed to stay on this subject, then, please at least answer one question for me.
engSearchText:
...If I'm allowed to stay on this subject, then, please at
least answer one question for me.
jpnChrName: ……だったらせめて これだけは聞かせてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
……だったらせめて
これだけは聞かせてちょうだい。

engChrName: Not why you left us behind—why you wouldn't let us help you.
engSearchText:
Not why you left us behind—why you wouldn't let us
help you.
jpnChrName: どうして居なくなったかじゃなく…… なぜ、力にならせてくれなかったか。
jpnSearchText:
どうして居なくなったかじゃなく……
なぜ、力にならせてくれなかったか。
……っ。

engChrName: I know we were at that age where we weren't quite adults, but we weren't children, either.
engSearchText:
I know we were at that age where we weren't quite
adults, but we weren't children, either.
jpnChrName: 確かにルネも含めた私たちは あの時、大人と子供の狭間で……
jpnSearchText:
確かにルネも含めた私たちは
あの時、大人と子供の狭間で……

engChrName: Maybe we couldn't have helped much even if we'd tried...
engSearchText:
Maybe we couldn't have helped much even if
we'd tried...
jpnChrName: 貴方の抱えていた事情や問題に 力になれなかったかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
貴方の抱えていた事情や問題に
力になれなかったかもしれない。

engChrName: ...but it's been seven years, and all of us are grown now.
engSearchText:
...but it's been seven years, and all of us are
grown now.
jpnChrName: でもあれから７年── 私たちはお互い、それなりに成長したわ。
jpnSearchText:
でもあれから７年──
私たちはお互い、それなりに成長したわ。

engChrName: And we're not the only ones who want to help you. All of your part-timers do, too, along with so many others.
engSearchText:
And we're not the only ones who want to help you.
All of your part-timers do, too, along with so
many others.
jpnChrName: 私たちだけじゃない、助手さんたちを始め 貴方の力になりたい人は大勢いるはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
私たちだけじゃない、助手さんたちを始め
貴方の力になりたい人は大勢いるはずよ。

engChrName: Is there nothing we can do? Can you still not rely on us?
engSearchText:
Is there nothing we can do? Can you still not rely
on us?
jpnChrName: それでもまだ……頼ってくれないの？
jpnSearchText: それでもまだ……頼ってくれないの？

engChrName: ...Sorry.
engSearchText: ...Sorry.
jpnSearchText: …………………悪い。
っ……！

engChrName: Elaine.
engSearchText: Elaine.
jpnChrName: エレイン。
jpnSearchText: エレイン。

engChrName: ...I know what you're going to say. I'm sorry, Van. I overstepped my boundaries there.
engSearchText:
...I know what you're going to say. I'm sorry, Van.
I overstepped my boundaries there.
jpnChrName: ……そうね。 ごめんなさい、踏み込みすぎた。
jpnSearchText:
……そうね。
ごめんなさい、踏み込みすぎた。

engChrName: Like I said, I'm the one who's in the wrong. So you know...
engSearchText:
Like I said, I'm the one who's in the wrong. So
you know...
jpnChrName: だから謝るのはこっちだろ。 ──だがまあ……
jpnSearchText:
だから謝るのはこっちだろ。
──だがまあ……

engChrName: ...you're right to be mad at me—and honestly, it makes me kinda happy that you are.
engSearchText:
...you're right to be mad at me—and honestly, it
makes me kinda happy that you are.
jpnChrName: お前の怒りはもっともだし、 ……それが嬉しくもある。
jpnSearchText:
お前の怒りはもっともだし、
……それが嬉しくもある。

engChrName: Thanks.
engSearchText: Thanks.
jpnChrName: ありがとな。
jpnSearchText: ありがとな。
………ぁ……………

engChrName: *sigh* You are so uncool.
engSearchText: *sigh* You are so uncool.
jpnChrName: ふう…… 貴方、カッコ悪いわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
貴方、カッコ悪いわね。

engChrName: Yeah. No arguments here.
engSearchText: Yeah. No arguments here.
jpnChrName: ああ……そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ああ……そうだな。

engChrName: It goes beyond uncool. It's almost painful to watch sometimes.
engSearchText:
It goes beyond uncool. It's almost painful to
watch sometimes.
jpnChrName: 格好悪いというか無様だろう。
jpnSearchText: 格好悪いというか無様だろう。

engChrName: You try your best to come across as apathetic about everything, but it's obvious as can be that you're faking it.
engSearchText:
You try your best to come across as apathetic about
everything, but it's obvious as can be that you're
faking it.
jpnChrName: ニヒルを気取っているようにしか 見えないのが痛すぎる。
jpnSearchText:
ニヒルを気取っているようにしか
見えないのが痛すぎる。

engChrName: I agree. We bracers might get labeled something as embarrassing as 'allies of justice,' but you're the one acting more like a kid's idea of 'cool.'
engSearchText:
I agree. We bracers might get labeled something as
embarrassing as 'allies of justice,' but you're the one
acting more like a kid's idea of 'cool.'
jpnChrName: そうね……正義の味方なんて 揶揄されている私たち以上に。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……正義の味方なんて
揶揄されている私たち以上に。

engChrName: Someone who's so soft that he can't bear to turn his back on anyone in need.
engSearchText:
Someone who's so soft that he can't bear to turn his
back on anyone in need.
jpnChrName: なんだかんだ困っている人を 見捨てられない甘さも含めて。
jpnSearchText:
なんだかんだ困っている人を
見捨てられない甘さも含めて。

engChrName: Heh. Hit the nail on the head. You're softer than half the candy you eat and aren't even aware of it.
engSearchText:
Heh. Hit the nail on the head. You're softer than half
the candy you eat and aren't even aware of it.
jpnChrName: クク、好物のスイーツも 顔負けのダダ甘さだからな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、好物のスイーツも
顔負けのダダ甘さだからな。

engChrName: You guys can stop dunkin' on me anytime now!
engSearchText: You guys can stop dunkin' on me anytime now!
jpnChrName: そこまで言われるほどじゃねえよ！
jpnSearchText: そこまで言われるほどじゃねえよ！

engChrName: Heehee. Putting aside your uncool demeanor, then...
engSearchText: Heehee. Putting aside your uncool demeanor, then...
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、貴方の格好悪さが どのレベルかはさておき。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、貴方の格好悪さが
どのレベルかはさておき。

engChrName: ...you could probably stand to be a little more like the adult you are in front of your employees.
engSearchText:
...you could probably stand to be a little more like the
adult you are in front of your employees.
jpnChrName: 助手さんたちにはもう少し 格好つけた方がいいと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
助手さんたちにはもう少し
格好つけた方がいいと思うけど。
……！？

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnSearchText: ……あはは………

engChrName: Damn. Fun's over already?
engSearchText: Damn. Fun's over already?
jpnChrName: チッ、もう終わりかよ。
jpnSearchText: チッ、もう終わりかよ。

engChrName: W-We didn't mean to butt in... We just wanted to tell you that it was about time for the party to break up.
engSearchText:
W-We didn't mean to butt in... We just wanted to
tell you that it was about time for the party to
break up.
jpnChrName: す、すみません。 そろそろお開きって伝えに……
jpnSearchText:
す、すみません。
そろそろお開きって伝えに……

engChrName: That doesn't really track with how hard you were trying not to be noticed...
engSearchText:
That doesn't really track with how hard you were
trying not to be noticed...
jpnChrName: その割には息を潜めて 聞き入ってたみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
その割には息を潜めて
聞き入ってたみたいだけど。

engChrName: H-How long have you guys been there?
engSearchText: H-How long have you guys been there?
jpnChrName: お、お前ら…… ……いつから聞いて……
jpnSearchText:
お、お前ら……
……いつから聞いて……

engChrName: Pardon us. We arrived roughly around when you said 'thanks.'
engSearchText:
Pardon us. We arrived roughly around when you
said 'thanks.'
jpnChrName: 申し訳ありません…… 『ありがとな』あたりからです。
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ありません……
『ありがとな』あたりからです。

engChrName: You are so hopeless... You can sniff out just about anything, but you couldn't catch a whiff of us right around the corner?
engSearchText:
You are so hopeless... You can sniff out just about
anything, but you couldn't catch a whiff of us right
around the corner?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、鼻は利くくせに 気配察知はまだまだみたいね～。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、鼻は利くくせに
気配察知はまだまだみたいね～。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnSearchText: ……フフ…………

engChrName: Elaine!
engSearchText: Elaine!
jpnChrName: エレインさん……！
jpnSearchText: エレインさん……！

engChrName: We're heading back to the branch now—what're you gonna do?
engSearchText:
We're heading back to the branch now—what're you
gonna do?
jpnChrName: いったん支部に戻るが お前さんはどうする！？
jpnSearchText:
いったん支部に戻るが
お前さんはどうする！？

engChrName: We won't stop you if you were planning a little one-on-one time with your 'friend' there.
engSearchText:
We won't stop you if you were planning a little
one-on-one time with your 'friend' there.
jpnChrName: あ、それとも 誰かさんとアフターとか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、それとも
誰かさんとアフターとか？

engChrName: O-Of course I'm not! I'll come down and join you.
engSearchText: O-Of course I'm not! I'll come down and join you.
jpnChrName: そ、そんなわけないでしょう！ ──私も付き合います。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなわけないでしょう！
──私も付き合います。

engChrName: I'm planning to return to the office as well. Will you be accompanying me, Kincaid?
engSearchText:
I'm planning to return to the office as well. Will you
be accompanying me, Kincaid?
jpnChrName: こちらも戻るけど キンケイド君はどうするの？
jpnSearchText:
こちらも戻るけど
キンケイド君はどうするの？

engChrName: If I may. I will be right there.
engSearchText: If I may. I will be right there.
jpnChrName: ええ、自分も戻ります。
jpnSearchText: ええ、自分も戻ります。

engChrName: Aww... There were so many cute girls here I felt like I was clicking with, too...
engSearchText:
Aww... There were so many cute girls here I felt like I
was clicking with, too...
jpnChrName: ええ～、せっかく色んな綺麗所と お近づきになれたのに……
jpnSearchText:
ええ～、せっかく色んな綺麗所と
お近づきになれたのに……

engChrName: I can stay longer, right, sir?!
engSearchText: I can stay longer, right, sir?!
jpnChrName: 警部、僕はもうちょっとだけ──
jpnSearchText: 警部、僕はもうちょっとだけ──

engChrName: Are you out of your mind? You have reports to write!
engSearchText: Are you out of your mind? You have reports to write!
jpnChrName: お前は報告書がまだだろうが！
jpnSearchText: お前は報告書がまだだろうが！

engChrName: I feel you, young man! I feel you so much it hurts!
engSearchText: I feel you, young man! I feel you so much it hurts!
jpnChrName: 分かる、分かるぞ若人よ～！
jpnSearchText: 分かる、分かるぞ若人よ～！

engChrName: Honestly, I'm of the same mind—but it isn't right to deny the regulars of their bistro any longer.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I'm of the same mind—but it isn't right to
deny the regulars of their bistro any longer.
jpnChrName: いや～、私も同感だが そろそろ常連方に譲らねばね。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、私も同感だが
そろそろ常連方に譲らねばね。

engChrName: Thanks for inviting me, Van!
engSearchText: Thanks for inviting me, Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、誘ってくれて どうもありがとね！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、誘ってくれて
どうもありがとね！

engChrName: I had a lot of fun here, too.
engSearchText: I had a lot of fun here, too.
jpnChrName: 楽しかったです、本当に。
jpnSearchText: 楽しかったです、本当に。

engChrName: I am so very honored that you extended an invitation to my humble self as well.
engSearchText:
I am so very honored that you extended an invitation
to my humble self as well.
jpnChrName: フフ、私にも声を掛けてくださり 感謝いたしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、私にも声を掛けてくださり
感謝いたしますよ。

engChrName: We didn't! Why did you even come?!
engSearchText: We didn't! Why did you even come?!
jpnChrName: アンタは呼んだ覚えはねえよ！
jpnSearchText: アンタは呼んだ覚えはねえよ！

engChrName: My bad. I just wanted the hot dancer, but he ended up tagging along.
engSearchText:
My bad. I just wanted the hot dancer, but he ended
up tagging along.
jpnChrName: ワリワリ、舞姫目当てで連絡したら 付いてきちまったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ワリワリ、舞姫目当てで連絡したら
付いてきちまったわ。

engChrName: So it was YOUR fault!
engSearchText: So it was YOUR fault!
jpnChrName: ってオイ！
jpnSearchText: ってオイ！

engChrName: November 30th, 7:51PM
engSearchText: November 30th, 7:51PM

engChrName: I still can't believe it... You really went to Aramis, then?
engSearchText:
I still can't believe it... You really went to
Aramis, then?
jpnChrName: 嘘だろ……本当にあんたが アラミスの先輩だっていうのか？
jpnSearchText:
嘘だろ……本当にあんたが
アラミスの先輩だっていうのか？

engChrName: Yeah, though I dropped out.
engSearchText: Yeah, though I dropped out.
jpnChrName: ま、あくまで中退だがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、あくまで中退だがな。

engChrName: That stage performance you did when you were a student was bonkers!
engSearchText:
That stage performance you did when you were a
student was bonkers!
jpnChrName: あ、でもヴァンさんたちが主催した ７年前の舞台は凄かったですよね！
jpnSearchText:
あ、でもヴァンさんたちが主催した
７年前の舞台は凄かったですよね！

engChrName: Albert was almost starry-eyed when he was watching it. He started going on about how we had to do something at LEAST as goo—
engSearchText:
Albert was almost starry-eyed when he was
watching it. He started going on about how we had to
do something at LEAST as goo—
jpnChrName: アルベールなんか映像見て感動して 絶対やってみようとか意気込んで──
jpnSearchText:
アルベールなんか映像見て感動して
絶対やってみようとか意気込んで──

engChrName: I-I was not and I did not!
engSearchText: I-I was not and I did not!
jpnChrName: い、言ってない！
jpnSearchText: い、言ってない！

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Well, may it serve as inspiration while we start ironing out what we want to do for our own festival.
engSearchText:
Well, may it serve as inspiration while we start
ironing out what we want to do for our own festival.
jpnChrName: ま、学藝祭の企画時期だし そろそろ考え始めないとね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、学藝祭の企画時期だし
そろそろ考え始めないとね。

engChrName: Goodbye for now, Van. Thank you for inviting us.
engSearchText: Goodbye for now, Van. Thank you for inviting us.
jpnChrName: それじゃあね、ヴァンさん。 お招きありがとう。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあね、ヴァンさん。
お招きありがとう。

engChrName: There were so many interesting folks. I had a blast chatting them up!
engSearchText:
There were so many interesting folks. I had a blast
chatting them up!
jpnChrName: いや～、濃い人たちばかりで とっても楽しかったです！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、濃い人たちばかりで
とっても楽しかったです！

engChrName: Glad to hear it. What about you? Had fun?
engSearchText: Glad to hear it. What about you? Had fun?
jpnChrName: そりゃ何よりだ。 お前さんも楽しめたか？
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ何よりだ。
お前さんも楽しめたか？

engChrName: W-Well, the food was pretty stellar, and it was exciting to meet so many different kinds of people...
engSearchText:
W-Well, the food was pretty stellar, and it was
exciting to meet so many different kinds of people...
jpnChrName: そ、そりゃ料理も美味しかったし 凄く刺激にはなったけど……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そりゃ料理も美味しかったし
凄く刺激にはなったけど……

engChrName: Augh, whatever! Thank you for inviting me, sir!
engSearchText: Augh, whatever! Thank you for inviting me, sir!
jpnChrName: ──ああもう！ ありがとうございます、先輩！
jpnSearchText:
──ああもう！
ありがとうございます、先輩！

engChrName: Aww. 'Sir.' Lookit him being so sweet.
engSearchText: Aww. 'Sir.' Lookit him being so sweet.
jpnChrName: お、デレた。
jpnSearchText: お、デレた。

engChrName: Sweet now, but will he go back to sour later?
engSearchText: Sweet now, but will he go back to sour later?
jpnChrName: デレ半分、対抗心半分かしら？
jpnSearchText: デレ半分、対抗心半分かしら？

engChrName: You don't need to analyze me!
engSearchText: You don't need to analyze me!
jpnChrName: 分析しないでくださいっ！
jpnSearchText: 分析しないでくださいっ！

engChrName: Haha...
engSearchText: Haha...
jpnChrName: ハハ……
jpnSearchText: ハハ……

engChrName: Hmm? You good?
engSearchText: Hmm? You good?
jpnChrName: ん？　どうした？
jpnSearchText: ん？　どうした？

engChrName: Oh, it's nothing.
engSearchText: Oh, it's nothing.
jpnChrName: いえ──
jpnSearchText: いえ──

engChrName: The train arriving on platform two will be traveling through the Auber District to...
engSearchText:
The train arriving on platform two will be traveling
through the Auber District to...
jpnChrName: ──間もなく２番線に列車が参ります。 五区オーベル地区経由となりますので……
jpnSearchText:
──間もなく２番線に列車が参ります。
五区オーベル地区経由となりますので……

engChrName: There's our train.
engSearchText: There's our train.
jpnChrName: あら、来ちゃったわね。
jpnSearchText: あら、来ちゃったわね。

engChrName: We gotta go, Agnès!
engSearchText: We gotta go, Agnès!
jpnChrName: アニエス、行かなきゃ！
jpnSearchText: アニエス、行かなきゃ！

engChrName: Right! Umm... Don't worry—it really is nothing.
engSearchText: Right! Umm... Don't worry—it really is nothing.
jpnChrName: うん……！ ──その、何でもないです。
jpnSearchText:
うん……！
──その、何でもないです。

engChrName: It's been a challenging day, so I hope you get a lot of rest.
engSearchText:
It's been a challenging day, so I hope you get a lot
of rest.
jpnChrName: おやすみなさい、 今日はゆっくり休んでくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
おやすみなさい、
今日はゆっくり休んでくださいね。

engChrName: Same to you. Night, all.
engSearchText: Same to you. Night, all.
jpnChrName: ああ、お前もな。 ──そんじゃあな、学生ども。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、お前もな。
──そんじゃあな、学生ども。

engChrName: Whew... It's only eight and I'm already feelin' beat.
engSearchText: Whew... It's only eight and I'm already feelin' beat.
jpnChrName: ふう、まだ８時なのに どっと疲れたな……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、まだ８時なのに
どっと疲れたな……

engChrName: (...It's just my imagination, right?)
engSearchText: (...It's just my imagination, right?)
jpnChrName: （気のせい……の筈だ。）
jpnSearchText: （気のせい……の筈だ。）

engChrName: (We've dealt with all of Almata's leftovers. My nose ain't pickin' up anything out of the ordinary, either.)
engSearchText:
(We've dealt with all of Almata's leftovers. My nose
ain't pickin' up anything out of the ordinary, either.)
jpnChrName: （アルマータの残党も押さえた。   匂いもこれ以上は感じねぇ……）
jpnSearchText:
（アルマータの残党も押さえた。
匂いもこれ以上は感じねぇ……）
㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍊㌫㌻㍊㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍍

engChrName: (I doubt I'll sniff out anything more tonight.)
engSearchText: (I doubt I'll sniff out anything more tonight.)
jpnChrName: （……今夜はもうこれ以上   嗅ぎ取れなさそうだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……今夜はもうこれ以上
嗅ぎ取れなさそうだが……）

engChrName: (Better to focus on clearin' out the 4SPGs I've got piled up over the next couple days.)
engSearchText:
(Better to focus on clearin' out the 4SPGs I've got
piled up over the next couple days.)
jpnChrName: （明日、明後日は溜まっている   依頼案件もこなさなきゃならねえ。）
jpnSearchText:
（明日、明後日は溜まっている
依頼案件もこなさなきゃならねえ。）

engChrName: I should make the rounds and see what else I can wrap up. I'm sure there's somethin'.
engSearchText:
I should make the rounds and see what else I can
wrap up. I'm sure there's somethin'.
jpnChrName: ──やり残しを片付ける意味でも 軽く一回りしてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
──やり残しを片付ける意味でも
軽く一回りしてみるか。

engChrName: The next three days leading up to the festival swept through like a whirlwind.
engSearchText:
The next three days leading up to the festival swept
through like a whirlwind.
jpnChrName: それから３日──革命記念祭を目前に 解決事務所は慌ただしい日々を迎えていた。
jpnSearchText:
それから３日──革命記念祭を目前に
解決事務所は慌ただしい日々を迎えていた。

engChrName: Though the trouble with Almata was recent, there was very little in the way of problems relating to them.
engSearchText:
Though the trouble with Almata was recent, there
was very little in the way of problems relating
to them.
jpnChrName: アルマータ壊滅による最後の揺れ戻し──
jpnSearchText: <C1>アルマータ壊滅による最後の揺れ戻し──

engChrName: Instead, most of Arkride Solutions' work consisted of subcontracted tasks and other modest requests.
engSearchText:
Instead, most of Arkride Solutions' work consisted of
subcontracted tasks and other modest requests.
jpnChrName: しかし残党のような物騒な案件は殆どなく、 細かい相談事や委託要請が大部分を占めていた。
jpnSearchText:
しかし残党のような物騒な案件は殆どなく、
細かい相談事や委託要請が大部分を占めていた。

engChrName: As if celebrations were already upon them, they found themselves rewarded with not just mira, but food and other material gifts as well.
engSearchText:
As if celebrations were already upon them, they found
themselves rewarded with not just mira, but food and
other material gifts as well.
jpnChrName: 前祝いとばかりに、ミラ以外の謝礼として 食料品や引出物を受け取るケースも多く……
jpnSearchText:
前祝いとばかりに、ミラ以外の謝礼として
食料品や引出物を受け取るケースも多く……

engChrName: Those, together with the gradual increase in decorations strewn about the city, made them keenly aware of the festival's approach.
engSearchText:
Those, together with the gradual increase in
decorations strewn about the city, made them keenly
aware of the festival's approach.
jpnChrName: 飾り付けられていく首都の街並みと合わせて 記念祭が近付いてくるのを実感するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
飾り付けられていく首都の街並みと合わせて
記念祭が近付いてくるのを実感するのだった。

engChrName: Each of Van's assistants also found themselves considering their respective futures in response to what he said.
engSearchText:
Each of Van's assistants also found themselves
considering their respective futures in response to
what he said.
jpnChrName: それと合わせて、ヴァンの言葉をきっかけに 各メンバーは“今後”について考え始め……
jpnSearchText:
それと合わせて、ヴァンの言葉をきっかけに
各メンバーは“今後”について考え始め……

engChrName: With all this in mind and more, it felt like the grand event was destined to become a turning point in their lives.
engSearchText:
With all this in mind and more, it felt like the grand
event was destined to become a turning point in
their lives.
jpnChrName: 色々な意味で、革命記念祭が一つの 区切りとなることを予感するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
色々な意味で、革命記念祭が一つの
区切りとなることを予感するのだった。

engChrName: But the night before the Revolution Festival had an early surprise in store...
engSearchText:
But the night before the Revolution Festival had an
early surprise in store...
jpnChrName: そして革命記念祭前夜──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして革命記念祭前夜──

engChrName: Be on guard for the seventh Genesis at the Revolution Festival tomorrow. \\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000-C
engSearchText:
Be on guard for the seventh Genesis at the Revolution Festival tomorrow.
\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000-C
jpnChrName: 明日の革命記念祭では ７番目のゲネシスに気をつけられたし。 　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　《Ｃ》
jpnSearchText:
明日の革命記念祭では
７番目のゲネシスに気をつけられたし。
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　《Ｃ》

engChrName: It's almost 10AM...
engSearchText: It's almost 10AM...
jpnChrName: ……そろそろ１０時、ですね。
jpnSearchText: ……そろそろ１０時、ですね。

engChrName: Kept us waiting long enough.
engSearchText: Kept us waiting long enough.
jpnChrName: ハン、勿体ぶりやがって。
jpnSearchText: ハン、勿体ぶりやがって。

engChrName: Just look at all the people! I spot Yumé and a bunch of others, too.
engSearchText:
Just look at all the people! I spot Yumé and a bunch
of others, too.
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんたちも含めて 結構知り合いがいましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃんたちも含めて
結構知り合いがいましたね。

engChrName: I'm impressed you can pick her out from the crowd.
engSearchText: I'm impressed you can pick her out from the crowd.
jpnChrName: へぇ、よく分かるわねぇ。
jpnSearchText: へぇ、よく分かるわねぇ。

engChrName: Renne and your other friends are there, too, right? You sure you didn't wanna tag along?
engSearchText:
Renne and your other friends are there, too, right?
You sure you didn't wanna tag along?
jpnChrName: 先輩たちは会場に行ったみてぇだが 付き合わなくて良かったのか？
jpnSearchText:
先輩たちは会場に行ったみてぇだが
付き合わなくて良かったのか？

engChrName: Oh! Yes, I think it was for the best that I didn't.
engSearchText: Oh! Yes, I think it was for the best that I didn't.

engChrName: With my position, I would have needed bodyguards if I had gone, unfortunately.
engSearchText:
With my position, I would have needed bodyguards if
I had gone, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: 立場上、あの場所に行く場合、 護衛は必須とのことでしたので……
jpnSearchText:
立場上、あの場所に行く場合、
護衛は必須とのことでしたので……

engChrName: And that message we received made me want to remain here that much more.
engSearchText:
And that message we received made me want to
remain here that much more.
jpnChrName: “あのメール”も気になりますし、 こちらに居させてください。
jpnSearchText:
“あのメール”も気になりますし、
こちらに居させてください。

engChrName: Got'cha.
engSearchText: Got'cha.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: I wish we knew who even sent the damn thing.
engSearchText: I wish we knew who even sent the damn thing.
jpnChrName: チッ、あのふざけたメールか。
jpnSearchText: チッ、あのふざけたメールか。

engChrName: Yeah. Especially since they mentioned the Geneses— and one we don't have, at that.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Especially since they mentioned the Geneses—
and one we don't have, at that.
jpnChrName: ゲネシスの──しかも未発見の ７番目とか言われちゃったらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ゲネシスの──しかも未発見の
７番目とか言われちゃったらねぇ。

engChrName: All we have to go on is the name 'C'...
engSearchText: All we have to go on is the name 'C'...
jpnChrName: 《Ｃ》というのは 結局、何者なんでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
《Ｃ》というのは
結局、何者なんでしょうか……？

engChrName: That name has been assumed by two people who made themselves known in the Empire in recent years.
engSearchText:
That name has been assumed by two people who
made themselves known in the Empire in
recent years.
jpnChrName: その名前──ここ数年で２度ほど エレボニア帝国を騒がせたものだな。
jpnSearchText:
その名前──ここ数年で２度ほど
エレボニア帝国を騒がせたものだな。

engChrName: I do not believe either to be the one who sent that message, however.
engSearchText:
I do not believe either to be the one who sent that
message, however.
jpnChrName: 無論、同一人物ではなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText: 無論、同一人物ではなさそうだが。

engChrName: The original was a terrorist responsible for triggering the civil war over there, right? Then someone else used it after that.
engSearchText:
The original was a terrorist responsible for triggering
the civil war over there, right? Then someone else
used it after that.
jpnChrName: 何でも、内戦を起こしたテロリストに、 それを騙った“とある人物”だそうね？
jpnSearchText:
何でも、内戦を起こしたテロリストに、
それを騙った“とある人物”だそうね？

engChrName: That is correct, but bear in mind that both of those matters are considered resolved. We have no reason to believe they would take up the name again.
engSearchText:
That is correct, but bear in mind that both of those
matters are considered resolved. We have no reason
to believe they would take up the name again.
jpnChrName: はい、ですがどちらも解決済みで 今回関わっている可能性は低そうです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ですがどちらも解決済みで
今回関わっている可能性は低そうです。

engChrName: That being said...I'm certain that the alias must have been chosen through careful deliberation.
engSearchText:
That being said...I'm certain that the alias must have
been chosen through careful deliberation.
jpnChrName: ですが……その名前を使うことに 何らかの“意図”はありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ですが……その名前を使うことに
何らかの“意図”はありそうですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Now it's just a matter of figuring out if they're tryin' to help us or mess with us.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Now it's just a matter of figuring out if they're
tryin' to help us or mess with us.
jpnChrName: ああ、誘導か攪乱か……
jpnSearchText: ああ、誘導か攪乱か……

engChrName: But not like we got much to go on. We can't even say for sure it's someone whose name starts with a C.
engSearchText:
But not like we got much to go on. We can't even say
for sure it's someone whose name starts with a C.
jpnChrName: ひょっとしたら直球で “Ｃ”を冠するヤツかもしれねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとしたら直球で
“Ｃ”を冠するヤツかもしれねぇが。

engChrName: That's true. It could be anyone...
engSearchText: That's true. It could be anyone...
jpnChrName: ……確かに。 色々と可能性はありそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……確かに。
色々と可能性はありそうです。

engChrName: Melchior's still at large, so hell, can't even write him off.
engSearchText:
Melchior's still at large, so hell, can't even write
him off.
jpnChrName: メルキオルの野郎が捕まってねぇから ヤツの可能性もありそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
メルキオルの野郎が捕まってねぇから
ヤツの可能性もありそうだが……

engChrName: Oh! There's Agnès' dad!
engSearchText: Oh! There's Agnès' dad!
jpnChrName: あっ……！ アニエスさんのお父さんですっ。
jpnSearchText:
あっ……！
アニエスさんのお父さんですっ。

engChrName: Ladies and gentlemen, it's 10AM, which means that the time has come!
engSearchText:
Ladies and gentlemen, it's 10AM, which means that
the time has come!
jpnChrName: 皆さん、お待たせしました！
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、お待たせしました！

engChrName: President Gramheart has arrived to make his speech!
engSearchText: President Gramheart has arrived to make his speech!
jpnChrName: 時刻は１０：００ちょうど── グラムハート大統領が姿を見せました！
jpnSearchText:
時刻は１０：００ちょうど──
グラムハート大統領が姿を見せました！

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: There's René, too.
engSearchText: There's René, too.
jpnChrName: ……ルネも居やがるな。
jpnSearchText: ……ルネも居やがるな。

engChrName: At this time, the Edith Cathedral Choir will be singing a hymn, followed by a statement from Archbishop Jerome.
engSearchText:
At this time, the Edith Cathedral Choir will be
singing a hymn, followed by a statement from
Archbishop Jerome.
jpnChrName: ここでイーディス大聖堂の聖歌隊による賛美歌と ジェローム大司教猊下からのお言葉があります。
jpnSearchText:
ここでイーディス大聖堂の聖歌隊による賛美歌と
ジェローム大司教猊下からのお言葉があります。

engChrName: Creil sounds like it must have been a truly beautiful place.
engSearchText:
Creil sounds like it must have been a truly
beautiful place.
jpnChrName: ……とても綺麗な村、 だったそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……とても綺麗な村、
だったそうですね。

engChrName: It was. It's where a close friend and someone I owe a lot to passed away...
engSearchText:
It was. It's where a close friend and someone I owe a
lot to passed away...
jpnChrName: はい……わたしにとっては恩人が 眠っている場所でもありました……
jpnSearchText:
はい……わたしにとっては恩人が
眠っている場所でもありました……

engChrName: I've done some filming there in the past.
engSearchText: I've done some filming there in the past.
jpnChrName: そっか…… ロケに行った時を思い出すわね。
jpnSearchText:
そっか……
ロケに行った時を思い出すわね。

engChrName: It's hard to believe I'll never see that same scenery ever again...
engSearchText:
It's hard to believe I'll never see that same scenery
ever again...
jpnChrName: ……あの光景ももう二度と……
jpnSearchText: ……あの光景ももう二度と……

engChrName: As long as we do not forget them, they will continue to live on.
engSearchText:
As long as we do not forget them, they will continue
to live on.
jpnChrName: ……我々が忘れなければ いつまでも生き続けるであろう。
jpnSearchText:
……我々が忘れなければ
いつまでも生き続けるであろう。

engChrName: Both the people who lived there and the places in which they lived.
engSearchText:
Both the people who lived there and the places in
which they lived.
jpnChrName: 人の魂も、光景も。
jpnSearchText: 人の魂も、光景も。

engChrName: ...I hope you're right.
engSearchText: ...I hope you're right.
jpnChrName: ハン……だと、いいがな。
jpnSearchText: ハン……だと、いいがな。

engChrName: I'd like to believe that, too...
engSearchText: I'd like to believe that, too...
jpnChrName: 信じても、いいのかな……？
jpnSearchText: 信じても、いいのかな……？

engChrName: I feel the same way—but even if we do forget, they won't be gone forever.
engSearchText:
I feel the same way—but even if we do forget, they
won't be gone forever.
jpnChrName: ああ──それに 忘れたとしても大丈夫だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──それに
忘れたとしても大丈夫だ。

engChrName: Everyone who lives leaves a mark on others and their surroundings. That gets passed down whether people are aware of it or not.
engSearchText:
Everyone who lives leaves a mark on others and
their surroundings. That gets passed down whether
people are aware of it or not.
jpnChrName: 人がいた証ってのはどこかで 誰かの血肉になるモンだからな。
jpnSearchText:
人がいた証ってのはどこかで
誰かの血肉になるモンだからな。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: You think so...?
engSearchText: You think so...?
jpnChrName: ……証は血肉に………
jpnSearchText: ……証は血肉に………

engChrName: I couldn't have put it better myself.
engSearchText: I couldn't have put it better myself.
jpnChrName: フフ…… 言うようになったな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
言うようになったな。

engChrName: Still, your dad's some wordsmith, huh?
engSearchText: Still, your dad's some wordsmith, huh?
jpnChrName: しっかしお前の親父っつーのは 改めてとんでもねぇ野郎だな。
jpnSearchText:
しっかしお前の親父っつーのは
改めてとんでもねぇ野郎だな。

engChrName: I almost found myself getting won over by all that stuff he was saying.
engSearchText:
I almost found myself getting won over by all that
stuff he was saying.
jpnChrName: うっかり聞いてると タラし込まれそうになってくるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
うっかり聞いてると
タラし込まれそうになってくるぜ。

engChrName: Ahaha... You really think so?
engSearchText: Ahaha... You really think so?
jpnChrName: あはは……そうでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: あはは……そうでしょうか？

engChrName: That's what I was gonna say! Your dad is awesome!
engSearchText: That's what I was gonna say! Your dad is awesome!
jpnChrName: うんうん、凄いですっ！ アニエスさんのお父さん（アブ）！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、凄いですっ！
アニエスさんのお父さん（アブ）！

engChrName: He's super cool. I feel like I could trust him with anything!
engSearchText:
He's super cool. I feel like I could trust him
with anything!
jpnChrName: カッコイイですし、 頼りになりそーですし！
jpnSearchText:
カッコイイですし、
頼りになりそーですし！

engChrName: Not to mention that face. If he ever wanted to jump the political ship, he could get work as an actor in no time flat.
engSearchText:
Not to mention that face. If he ever wanted to jump
the political ship, he could get work as an actor in no
time flat.
jpnChrName: イケオジなのは間違いないわね。 俳優も余裕でこなせそうなオーラだし。
jpnSearchText:
イケオジなのは間違いないわね。
俳優も余裕でこなせそうなオーラだし。

engChrName: Even his voice carries well. Talk about hitting the lottery...
engSearchText:
Even his voice carries well. Talk about hitting
the lottery...
jpnChrName: よく通る声がまた反則なのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText: よく通る声がまた反則なのよねぇ。

engChrName: Rocksmith fits my image of a politician a lot more, but no one could deny how talented your dad is.
engSearchText:
Rocksmith fits my image of a politician a lot more,
but no one could deny how talented your dad is.
jpnChrName: うーん、ロックスミスさんの方が 政治家っぽい感じではあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ロックスミスさんの方が
政治家っぽい感じではあるけど……

engChrName: Like Aaron said, I could feel myself being roped in by his act—erm, sorry. I shouldn't have put it like that.
engSearchText:
Like Aaron said, I could feel myself being roped in by
his act—erm, sorry. I shouldn't have put it like that.
jpnChrName: アーロンさんじゃないけど思わず 誑かされそうっていうか──ってゴメン。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんじゃないけど思わず
誑かされそうっていうか──ってゴメン。

engChrName: You don't have to apologize. I...understand how you feel, to tell you the truth.
engSearchText:
You don't have to apologize. I...understand how you
feel, to tell you the truth.
jpnChrName: ふふ、いいんです。 ……私もちょっと同感ですから。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いいんです。
……私もちょっと同感ですから。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: え、えと……
jpnSearchText: え、えと……

engChrName: He is certainly a man without equal—in a different sense from President Rocksmith.
engSearchText:
He is certainly a man without equal—in a different
sense from President Rocksmith.
jpnChrName: 傑物なのは間違いあるまい。 ロックスミス殿とはまた違う意味で。
jpnSearchText:
傑物なのは間違いあるまい。
ロックスミス殿とはまた違う意味で。

engChrName: I believe we're about to get another glimpse of just how, too.
engSearchText:
I believe we're about to get another glimpse of just
how, too.
jpnChrName: ──更なる一端を これから見せてくれるようだが。
jpnSearchText:
──更なる一端を
これから見せてくれるようだが。

engChrName: The mourning is at an end, which means it is time for the grand unveiling.
engSearchText:
The mourning is at an end, which means it is time for
the grand unveiling.
jpnChrName: 追悼の儀はここまで…… いよいよお披露目でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
追悼の儀はここまで……
いよいよお披露目でしょうか。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどな。

engChrName: Th-That was certainly overwhelming...
engSearchText: Th-That was certainly overwhelming...
jpnChrName: す、凄いね……
jpnSearchText: す、凄いね……

engChrName: Even if we've already seen the airships and the AFs, yeah.
engSearchText:
Even if we've already seen the airships and the
AFs, yeah.
jpnChrName: クク、ＡＦやら巡洋艦も とっくに見ちゃあいたが……
jpnSearchText:
クク、ＡＦやら巡洋艦も
とっくに見ちゃあいたが……

engChrName: Right... I didn't expect him to roll them out in such a dramatic fashion, though.
engSearchText:
Right... I didn't expect him to roll them out in such a
dramatic fashion, though.
jpnChrName: はい……まさかあんな風に 盛り上げるとは思いませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
はい……まさかあんな風に
盛り上げるとは思いませんでした。

engChrName: He appears to have made full use of all of Marduk's evaluations of them.
engSearchText:
He appears to have made full use of all of Marduk's
evaluations of them.
jpnChrName: ええ、ＭＫ社の戦力評価を 最大限に活用していましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ＭＫ社の戦力評価を
最大限に活用していましたね。

engChrName: This is my first time seeing them, so I'm more than a little blown away right now.
engSearchText:
This is my first time seeing them, so I'm more than a
little blown away right now.
jpnChrName: って、こっちは初めて見たから 普通に度肝を抜かれたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
って、こっちは初めて見たから
普通に度肝を抜かれたんだけど……

engChrName: Oh, yeah... You weren't with us when we saw some of them in Basel.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah... You weren't with us when we saw some of
them in Basel.
jpnChrName: あ、たしかに…… バーゼルの時ですもんね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、たしかに……
バーゼルの時ですもんね。

engChrName: This marks the end of the ceremony. Some of the new weaponry revealed will be on display in the Revolution Plaza.
engSearchText:
This marks the end of the ceremony. Some of the
new weaponry revealed will be on display in the
Revolution Plaza.
jpnChrName: 記念式典は終了しましたが、次世代戦車および ＡＦの一部は革命広場に展示されるそうです。
jpnSearchText:
記念式典は終了しましたが、次世代戦車および
ＡＦの一部は革命広場に展示されるそうです。

engChrName: Visitors are also reminded that the area around the presidential building will remain closed to the public.
engSearchText:
Visitors are also reminded that the area around the
presidential building will remain closed to the public.
jpnChrName: 大統領府方面は立入禁止となりますので 来場される場合はご注意を──
jpnSearchText:
大統領府方面は立入禁止となりますので
来場される場合はご注意を──

engChrName: Anyway, now that the big speeches are over, it's time to get to what we planned.
engSearchText:
Anyway, now that the big speeches are over, it's time
to get to what we planned.
jpnChrName: ──ま、何にせよ、 ここからは打ち合わせ通りだ。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、何にせよ、
ここからは打ち合わせ通りだ。

engChrName: We'll spread throughout the city while checkin' for 4SPGs on the bulletin boards.
engSearchText:
We'll spread throughout the city while checkin' for
4SPGs on the bulletin boards.
jpnChrName: ４ｓｐｇをチェックしつつ 首都の各地に向かってもらう。
jpnSearchText:
４ｓｐｇをチェックしつつ
首都の各地に向かってもらう。

engChrName: Sounds good!
engSearchText: Sounds good!
jpnChrName: はいっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！

engChrName: We'll also be keeping an eye out for any signs of the seventh Genesis...
engSearchText:
We'll also be keeping an eye out for any signs of the
seventh Genesis...
jpnChrName: ７番目のゲネシスに気をつけろ……
jpnSearchText: ７番目のゲネシスに気をつけろ……

engChrName: Even if we shouldn't dedicate too much of our energy to that.
engSearchText:
Even if we shouldn't dedicate too much of our energy
to that.
jpnChrName: あの警告メールに対して 一応、備えるってことだね。
jpnSearchText:
あの警告メールに対して
一応、備えるってことだね。

engChrName: Yeah. There's still a chance that message was a prank, but better safe than sorry.
engSearchText:
Yeah. There's still a chance that message was a prank,
but better safe than sorry.
jpnChrName: ああ、悪戯の可能性もあるから “念のため”くらいだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、悪戯の可能性もあるから
“念のため”くらいだがな。

engChrName: I wish my affairs hadn't ended up casting such a shadow over what should be a happy day...
engSearchText:
I wish my affairs hadn't ended up casting such a
shadow over what should be a happy day...
jpnChrName: すみません……折角のお祭りなのに 巻き込んでしまったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
すみません……折角のお祭りなのに
巻き込んでしまったみたいで。

engChrName: Heehee. Oh, come on! You're being silly!
engSearchText: Heehee. Oh, come on! You're being silly!
jpnChrName: えへへ、とんでもないですっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、とんでもないですっ。

engChrName: Tell me about it.
engSearchText: Tell me about it.
jpnChrName: ハッ、今更だろ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、今更だろ。

engChrName: I'd be more nervous NOT being in the loop on what's going on at this point. We want to be involved.
engSearchText:
I'd be more nervous NOT being in the loop on what's
going on at this point. We want to be involved.
jpnChrName: むしろ付き合わせてもらわないと かえって気になっちゃいそうだし。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ付き合わせてもらわないと
かえって気になっちゃいそうだし。

engChrName: 'Sides, I'm all for everyone enjoying the festival. Only me and one other person need to actively patrol.
engSearchText:
'Sides, I'm all for everyone enjoying the festival.
Only me and one other person need to actively patrol.
jpnChrName: ま、巡回するのは俺とあと一人だが 祭りを楽しんでも構わねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、巡回するのは俺とあと一人だが
祭りを楽しんでも構わねぇだろ。

engChrName: Just if you notice somethin' out of the ordinary— anything at all—you let us all know. That's vital.
engSearchText:
Just if you notice somethin' out of the ordinary—
anything at all—you let us all know. That's vital.
jpnChrName: ただし何か違和感があったら すぐに連絡しろ──そこが肝心だ。
jpnSearchText:
ただし何か違和感があったら
すぐに連絡しろ──そこが肝心だ。

engChrName: Understood. We'll be on the lookout.
engSearchText: Understood. We'll be on the lookout.
jpnChrName: アークライド流警戒術、だね。
jpnSearchText: アークライド流警戒術、だね。

engChrName: Heh. My nose might not be as good as yours, but there's no way I'd miss trouble brewing.
engSearchText:
Heh. My nose might not be as good as yours, but
there's no way I'd miss trouble brewing.
jpnChrName: ハッ、匂いってのはともかく オレ様が見逃すのはあり得ねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、匂いってのはともかく
オレ様が見逃すのはあり得ねえな。

engChrName: Understood. I'll always be available to switch in if I am needed.
engSearchText:
Understood. I'll always be available to switch in if I
am needed.
jpnChrName: 承知しました、こちらは何時でも 交替できるようにいたしますので。
jpnSearchText:
承知しました、こちらは何時でも
交替できるようにいたしますので。

engChrName: The same can be said for me. Should you need a hand, I will always be here.
engSearchText:
The same can be said for me. Should you need a
hand, I will always be here.
jpnChrName: それ以外に、手が必要な時などは 遠慮なく声を掛けるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
それ以外に、手が必要な時などは
遠慮なく声を掛けるがいい。

engChrName: I appreciate it.
engSearchText: I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ええ、頼みます。
jpnSearchText: ええ、頼みます。

engChrName: Select one additional member to accompany Van. (This character can be swapped out from the desk in Van's office at any time.)
engSearchText:
Select one additional member to accompany Van.
(This character can be swapped out from the desk in
Van's office at any time.)
jpnChrName: 市内を巡回するメンバーを一人選んで下さい。 （※事務所のデスクでいつでも変更できます）
jpnSearchText:
市内を巡回するメンバーを一人選んで下さい。
（※事務所のデスクでいつでも変更できます）

engChrName: Looks like Victor's back already.
engSearchText: Looks like Victor's back already.
jpnChrName: ビクトルのおやっさん、 戻ってきてるみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
ビクトルのおやっさん、
戻ってきてるみてぇだな。

engChrName: Paulette and Yumé must still be out enjoyin' the festival.
engSearchText:
Paulette and Yumé must still be out enjoyin'
the festival.
jpnChrName: ポーレットとユメは 記念祭の見物でもしてんのか？
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットとユメは
記念祭の見物でもしてんのか？

engChrName: I hope they're having fun if they are. I wonder if Maxim is with them, too.
engSearchText:
I hope they're having fun if they are. I wonder if
Maxim is with them, too.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ひょっとしたら マクシムさんと一緒かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ひょっとしたら
マクシムさんと一緒かもしれませんね。

engChrName: Their future together started seeming a bit more promising at the party.
engSearchText:
Their future together started seeming a bit more
promising at the party.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの時も色々と 進展していそうな感じでしたし。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの時も色々と
進展していそうな感じでしたし。

engChrName: I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it ain't my call to make.
engSearchText:
I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it
ain't my call to make.
jpnChrName: それはそれで複雑だが…… まあ、大目に見てやるか。
jpnSearchText:
それはそれで複雑だが……
まあ、大目に見てやるか。

engChrName: All right, then. Let's get to work.
engSearchText: All right, then. Let's get to work.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあアニエス、巡回を始めるぞ。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあアニエス、巡回を始めるぞ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: I'm real curious if Maxim is with them, too.
engSearchText: I'm real curious if Maxim is with them, too.
jpnChrName: あ、ひょっとしたら マクシムさんと一緒かも……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ひょっとしたら
マクシムさんと一緒かも……！

engChrName: They seemed like they were getting along really well at the party.
engSearchText:
They seemed like they were getting along really well
at the party.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの時もいろいろ、 仲が良い感じでしたしっ。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの時もいろいろ、
仲が良い感じでしたしっ。

engChrName: I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it ain't my call to make.
engSearchText:
I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it
ain't my call to make.

jpnSearchText:
それはそれで複雑だが……
まあ、大目に見てやるか。

engChrName: All right, then. Let's get to work.
engSearchText: All right, then. Let's get to work.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあフェリ、巡回を始めるぞ。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあフェリ、巡回を始めるぞ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）っ……！
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）っ……！

engChrName: Wonder if that loser racecar driver is with them, too.
engSearchText: Wonder if that loser racecar driver is with them, too.
jpnChrName: ハッ、あの残念レーサーと 一緒とか言わねえだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、あの残念レーサーと
一緒とか言わねえだろうな。

engChrName: It sure felt like sparks were flying at the party.
engSearchText: It sure felt like sparks were flying at the party.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの時に微妙に 進展してやがったみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの時に微妙に
進展してやがったみてぇだが。

engChrName: I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it ain't my call to make.
engSearchText:
I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it
ain't my call to make.
jpnChrName: それはそれで複雑だが…… まあ、大目に見てやるか。
jpnSearchText:
それはそれで複雑だが……
まあ、大目に見てやるか。

engChrName: All right, then. Let's get to work.
engSearchText: All right, then. Let's get to work.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあアーロン、巡回を始めるぞ。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあアーロン、巡回を始めるぞ。

engChrName: More like time to play until we drop.
engSearchText: More like time to play until we drop.
jpnChrName: クク、せいぜい遊び回ってやんぜ。
jpnSearchText: クク、せいぜい遊び回ってやんぜ。

engChrName: Heehee. I wonder if Mr. Lugan is also with them?
engSearchText: Heehee. I wonder if Mr. Lugan is also with them?
jpnChrName: ふふ、もしかしたらマクシム様と ご一緒かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、もしかしたらマクシム様と
ご一緒かもしれませんね。

engChrName: They seemed to be getting along rather well at the party.
engSearchText:
They seemed to be getting along rather well at
the party.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの時にある程度は 進展しているご様子でしたし。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの時にある程度は
進展しているご様子でしたし。

engChrName: I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it ain't my call to make.
engSearchText:
I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it
ain't my call to make.
jpnChrName: それはそれで複雑だが…… まあ、大目に見てやるか。
jpnSearchText:
それはそれで複雑だが……
まあ、大目に見てやるか。

engChrName: All right, then. Let's get to work.
engSearchText: All right, then. Let's get to work.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあリゼット、 巡回に付き合ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあリゼット、
巡回に付き合ってくれ。

engChrName: I would be delighted to accompany you.
engSearchText: I would be delighted to accompany you.
jpnChrName: はい、お付き合いいたします。
jpnSearchText: はい、お付き合いいたします。

engChrName: I wonder if Maxim's with them, too?
engSearchText: I wonder if Maxim's with them, too?
jpnChrName: うーん、もしかしたら マクシムさんと一緒かもしれないね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、もしかしたら
マクシムさんと一緒かもしれないね。

engChrName: They seemed to be getting along really well at the party.
engSearchText:
They seemed to be getting along really well at
the party.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの時に結構、 進展してるっぽい感じだったし。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの時に結構、
進展してるっぽい感じだったし。

engChrName: I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it ain't my call to make.
engSearchText:
I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it
ain't my call to make.
jpnChrName: それはそれで複雑だが…… まあ、大目に見てやるか。
jpnSearchText:
それはそれで複雑だが……
まあ、大目に見てやるか。

engChrName: All right, then. Let's get to work.
engSearchText: All right, then. Let's get to work.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあカトル、巡回を始めるぞ。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあカトル、巡回を始めるぞ。

engChrName: Got it!
engSearchText: Got it!
jpnChrName: うん、任せてよ。
jpnSearchText: うん、任せてよ。

engChrName: Heh. I wonder if Maxim's with them, too?
engSearchText: Heh. I wonder if Maxim's with them, too?
jpnChrName: フフ、もしかしたらマクシムさんと 一緒なんじゃないの？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、もしかしたらマクシムさんと
一緒なんじゃないの？

engChrName: They seemed like they were getting along pretty well at the party, in any case.
engSearchText:
They seemed like they were getting along pretty well
at the party, in any case.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの時にそこそこ 進展してるっぽい空気だったし。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの時にそこそこ
進展してるっぽい空気だったし。

engChrName: I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it ain't my call to make.
engSearchText:
I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it
ain't my call to make.
jpnChrName: それはそれで複雑だが…… まあ、大目に見てやるか。
jpnSearchText:
それはそれで複雑だが……
まあ、大目に見てやるか。

engChrName: All right, then. Let's get to work.
engSearchText: All right, then. Let's get to work.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあジュディス、 巡回に付き合ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあジュディス、
巡回に付き合ってくれ。

engChrName: Let's do it.
engSearchText: Let's do it.
jpnChrName: ええ、任せなさい。
jpnSearchText: ええ、任せなさい。

engChrName: I wonder if that young racer is accompanying them?
engSearchText: I wonder if that young racer is accompanying them?
jpnChrName: ふむ、もしかしたら例のレーサーと 一緒に回っているかもしれぬ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、もしかしたら例のレーサーと
一緒に回っているかもしれぬ。

engChrName: It looked to me as though they were getting along rather well during the party.
engSearchText:
It looked to me as though they were getting along
rather well during the party.
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの時にある程度、 進展している様子であったしな。
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの時にある程度、
進展している様子であったしな。

engChrName: I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it ain't my call to make.
engSearchText:
I kinda have mixed feelings about that...but I guess it
ain't my call to make.
jpnChrName: それはそれで複雑ですが…… まあ、大目に見てやりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
それはそれで複雑ですが……
まあ、大目に見てやりますよ。

engChrName: Well, should we get to work? Really appreciate the help, Master.
engSearchText:
Well, should we get to work? Really appreciate the
help, Master.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ師父（せんせい）、 よろしくお付き合いください。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ師父（せんせい）、
よろしくお付き合いください。

engChrName: Not at all. I'm happy to help.
engSearchText: Not at all. I'm happy to help.
jpnChrName: うむ、任せるがいい。
jpnSearchText: うむ、任せるがいい。

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...

engChrName: It looks like time has stopped in this area, too.
engSearchText: It looks like time has stopped in this area, too.
jpnChrName: ふむ、どうやらここも “停まって”いるようだね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、どうやらここも
“停まって”いるようだね。

engChrName: Bah. Here, too, huh?
engSearchText: Bah. Here, too, huh?
jpnChrName: チッ……ここもかよ。
jpnSearchText: チッ……ここもかよ。

engChrName: I thought this would be the case.
engSearchText: I thought this would be the case.
jpnChrName: 予想された事態だろう。
jpnSearchText: 予想された事態だろう。

engChrName: The effect extends this far, too, I see.
engSearchText: The effect extends this far, too, I see.
jpnChrName: やはりここも、ですか……
jpnSearchText: やはりここも、ですか……

engChrName: I expected as much.
engSearchText: I expected as much.
jpnChrName: フフ、予想された事態ですね。
jpnSearchText: フフ、予想された事態ですね。

engChrName: This place, too, huh?
engSearchText: This place, too, huh?
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりここもか。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱりここもか。

engChrName: It appears that many people are frozen here as well.
