engSearchText: It appears that many people are frozen here as well.
jpnChrName: 停まっている方々も それなりにいらっしゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
停まっている方々も
それなりにいらっしゃいますね。

engChrName: I suspect the whole city is in the same state.
engSearchText: I suspect the whole city is in the same state.
jpnChrName: もはや首都全域が 同じだと考えた方がよかろう。
jpnSearchText:
もはや首都全域が
同じだと考えた方がよかろう。

engChrName: I suspect the entire city is in the same state.
engSearchText: I suspect the entire city is in the same state.
jpnChrName: もはや首都全域が 同じと考えるべきでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
もはや首都全域が
同じと考えるべきでしょう。

engChrName: Here they come! And something's tellin' me they won't be as much of a pushover as the others.
engSearchText:
Here they come! And something's tellin' me they
won't be as much of a pushover as the others.
jpnChrName: 出やがったか！ ──だがコイツは……
jpnSearchText:
出やがったか！
──だがコイツは……

engChrName: Heh. Looks like—these seem like they'll put up much more of a fight.
engSearchText:
Heh. Looks like—these seem like they'll put up much
more of a fight.
jpnChrName: フフ、どうやら先ほどの 連中とは一味違うようだ……！
jpnSearchText:
フフ、どうやら先ほどの
連中とは一味違うようだ……！

engChrName: Here they come!
engSearchText: Here they come!
jpnChrName: ハッ、出やがったか！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、出やがったか！

engChrName: These look to have been enhanced by a demon sphere, too.
engSearchText:
These look to have been enhanced by a demon
sphere, too.
jpnChrName: しかもやはり“魔球”で 強化されているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
しかもやはり“魔球”で
強化されているようだ。

engChrName: Here they come!
engSearchText: Here they come!
jpnChrName: 現れましたわね……！
jpnSearchText: 現れましたわね……！

engChrName: These look to have been enhanced by a demon sphere as well.
engSearchText:
These look to have been enhanced by a demon sphere
as well.
jpnChrName: しかもやはり“魔球”で 強化されているようです。
jpnSearchText:
しかもやはり“魔球”で
強化されているようです。

engChrName: Hah! Get outta here, losers!
engSearchText: Hah! Get outta here, losers!
jpnChrName: ハッ……！ ウゼエんだっつーの！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……！
ウゼエんだっつーの！

engChrName: We shall defeat them swiftly!
engSearchText: We shall defeat them swiftly!
jpnChrName: 速やかに無力化します！
jpnSearchText: 速やかに無力化します！

engChrName: One minute will be more than sufficient for foes like you!
engSearchText:
One minute will be more than sufficient for foes
like you!
jpnChrName: ああ、１分で終わらせるぞ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、１分で終わらせるぞ！

engChrName: This will barely take a moment!
engSearchText: This will barely take a moment!
jpnChrName: フフ、刹那で片付けましょうか！
jpnSearchText: フフ、刹那で片付けましょうか！

engChrName: That takes care of 'em. What was up with those auras they had, though?
engSearchText:
That takes care of 'em. What was up with those auras
they had, though?
jpnChrName: 片付けたか…… だが、今のオーラは。
jpnSearchText:
片付けたか……
だが、今のオーラは。

engChrName: I'm wondering the same thing. They were in a different league compared to the last batch.
engSearchText:
I'm wondering the same thing. They were in a
different league compared to the last batch.
jpnChrName: うん、先ほど戦った時とは 明らかに違っていたようだね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、先ほど戦った時とは
明らかに違っていたようだね。

engChrName: Whew... These things are still a real headache.
engSearchText: Whew... These things are still a real headache.
jpnChrName: ふう…… 相変わらず手こずったが。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
相変わらず手こずったが。

engChrName: At least they're small time. Not like they're gonna give us much trouble.
engSearchText:
At least they're small time. Not like they're gonna
give us much trouble.
jpnChrName: 所詮はザコだし、 やりようは幾らでもあんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
所詮はザコだし、
やりようは幾らでもあんだろ。

engChrName: At least they were comparatively low-level devils.
engSearchText: At least they were comparatively low-level devils.
jpnChrName: 比較的低級の部類ですし まだやりようはありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
比較的低級の部類ですし
まだやりようはありそうですね。

engChrName: The demon spheres're gonna have to buff 'em up a hell of a lot more than that if they want 'em to stand a chance against this crew.
engSearchText:
The demon spheres're gonna have to buff 'em up a
hell of a lot more than that if they want 'em to stand a
chance against this crew.
jpnChrName: 魔球で強化されてたとはいえ、 この面子なら危なげはねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
魔球で強化されてたとはいえ、
この面子なら危なげはねぇな。

engChrName: Heh. Damn right.
engSearchText: Heh. Damn right.
jpnChrName: ハン、当然だろ。
jpnSearchText: ハン、当然だろ。

engChrName: That said, we still cannot afford to let our guard down against them.
engSearchText:
That said, we still cannot afford to let our guard down
against them.
jpnChrName: とはいえ油断は禁物でしょうが。
jpnSearchText: とはいえ油断は禁物でしょうが。

engChrName: Tch!
engSearchText: Tch!
jpnChrName: っ……チイッ！
jpnSearchText: っ……チイッ！

engChrName: Think you're being clever, do you?
engSearchText: Think you're being clever, do you?
jpnChrName: 小知恵が回る……！
jpnSearchText: 小知恵が回る……！

engChrName: Mimicry?! Think you're being clever, do you?
engSearchText: Mimicry?! Think you're being clever, do you?
jpnChrName: 擬態──小癪な！
jpnSearchText: 擬態──小癪な！

engChrName: Mimicry? Very impressive.
engSearchText: Mimicry? Very impressive.
jpnChrName: 擬態──やりますね！
jpnSearchText: 擬態──やりますね！

engChrName: Inspector! Victor!
engSearchText: Inspector! Victor!
jpnChrName: ダスワニ警部……！ ビクトルのおやっさんも！
jpnSearchText:
ダスワニ警部……！
ビクトルのおやっさんも！

engChrName: Glad to see you two ladies are safe, too.
engSearchText: Glad to see you two ladies are safe, too.
jpnChrName: お嬢さんにシャヒーナも 無事だったか……！
jpnSearchText:
お嬢さんにシャヒーナも
無事だったか……！

engChrName: You guys are okay?! Good to see.
engSearchText: You guys are okay?! Good to see.
jpnChrName: アシェンに踊り子妹も 無事だったかよ！
jpnSearchText:
アシェンに踊り子妹も
無事だったかよ！

engChrName: I am relieved to see that you're all safe.
engSearchText: I am relieved to see that you're all safe.
jpnChrName: アシェン様にシャヒーナ様も よくぞご無事で。
jpnSearchText:
アシェン様にシャヒーナ様も
よくぞご無事で。

engChrName: You guys are okay?! Good to see.
engSearchText: You guys are okay?! Good to see.
jpnChrName: アシェンに踊り子妹も 無事だったかよ！
jpnSearchText:
アシェンに踊り子妹も
無事だったかよ！

engChrName: I am relieved to see that you're all safe.
engSearchText: I am relieved to see that you're all safe.
jpnChrName: ご無事で何よりでした。
jpnSearchText: ご無事で何よりでした。

engChrName: I'm glad to see the young lady from Heiyue is well.
engSearchText: I'm glad to see the young lady from Heiyue is well.
jpnChrName: フッ……黒月のご令嬢が 無事なのは何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……黒月のご令嬢が
無事なのは何よりだ。

engChrName: It does my heart good to see you well, Lady Ashen.
engSearchText: It does my heart good to see you well, Lady Ashen.
jpnChrName: フフ、何よりですお嬢様。
jpnSearchText: フフ、何よりですお嬢様。

engChrName: Just when I thought we'd finished evacuating everyone, you had to show up.
engSearchText:
Just when I thought we'd finished evacuating
everyone, you had to show up.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、住民の避難を 終わらせたと思った矢先に……
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、住民の避難を
終わらせたと思った矢先に……

engChrName: If it isn't our little punk of a tenant. Good to see ya hanging in there.
engSearchText:
If it isn't our little punk of a tenant. Good to see
ya hanging in there.
jpnChrName: 不良店子が…… よく戻って来やがったな。
jpnSearchText:
不良店子が……
よく戻って来やがったな。

engChrName: You really came!
engSearchText: You really came!
jpnChrName: お兄さん、 よく戻ってきてくれたね！
jpnSearchText:
お兄さん、
よく戻ってきてくれたね！

engChrName: You really came!
engSearchText: You really came!
jpnChrName: お兄さんたち、 よく戻ってきてくれたね！
jpnSearchText:
お兄さんたち、
よく戻ってきてくれたね！

engChrName: Aaron! Cao! *sniffle* You could've come a bit sooner...
engSearchText:
Aaron! Cao! *sniffle* You could've come a
bit sooner...
jpnChrName: アーロンにツァオまで……！ グスッ、遅いじゃないの！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンにツァオまで……！
グスッ、遅いじゃないの！

engChrName: You're here, Aaron! *sniffle* You could've come a bit sooner...
engSearchText:
You're here, Aaron! *sniffle* You could've come a
bit sooner...
jpnChrName: アーロンも……！ グスッ、遅いじゃないの！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンも……！
グスッ、遅いじゃないの！

engChrName: You're here, Cao! *sniffle* You could've come a bit sooner...
engSearchText:
You're here, Cao! *sniffle* You could've come a
bit sooner...
jpnChrName: ツァオまで……！ グスッ、遅いじゃないの！
jpnSearchText:
ツァオまで……！
グスッ、遅いじゃないの！

engChrName: *sniffle* You could've come a bit sooner...
engSearchText: *sniffle* You could've come a bit sooner...
jpnChrName: グスッ、遅いじゃないの！
jpnSearchText: グスッ、遅いじゃないの！

engChrName: Everyone entered the bistro and relayed what they knew of the situation.
engSearchText:
Everyone entered the bistro and relayed what they
knew of the situation.
jpnChrName: その後、モンマルトに入ったヴァンたちは ビクトルたちから異変時の状況を改めて聞かされた。
jpnSearchText:
その後、モンマルトに入ったヴァンたちは
ビクトルたちから異変時の状況を改めて聞かされた。

engChrName: Their experiences mirrored each other—a strange call followed by the city and sky changing ominously, and most people being frozen in time.
engSearchText:
Their experiences mirrored each other—a strange call
followed by the city and sky changing ominously, and
most people being frozen in time.
jpnChrName: やはり奇妙な通信が入った後、街と空に異変が発生し、 一部を除いた者たちは“停まって”しまったという。
jpnSearchText:
やはり奇妙な通信が入った後、街と空に異変が発生し、
一部を除いた者たちは“停まって”しまったという。

engChrName: Everyone entered the bistro and relayed what they knew of the situation.
engSearchText:
Everyone entered the bistro and relayed what they
knew of the situation.
jpnChrName: その後、モンマルトに入ったヴァンたちは ビクトルたちと異変時の情報を改めて共有した。
jpnSearchText:
その後、モンマルトに入ったヴァンたちは
ビクトルたちと異変時の情報を改めて共有した。

engChrName: As for Feri, who was with Ashen and Shaheena when the disaster struck...
engSearchText:
As for Feri, who was with Ashen and Shaheena when
the disaster struck...
jpnChrName: なお異変発生時、アシェンやシャヒーナと 一緒にいたフェリについてだったが──
jpnSearchText:
なお異変発生時、アシェンやシャヒーナと
一緒にいたフェリについてだったが──

engChrName: So she went off with Claussell, huh?
engSearchText: So she went off with Claussell, huh?
jpnChrName: そうか──クラウゼルと一緒に 出かけてくると言ってたんだな？
jpnSearchText:
そうか──クラウゼルと一緒に
出かけてくると言ってたんだな？

engChrName: That's right. They thought they might have found something to help turn the city back to normal.
engSearchText:
That's right. They thought they might have found
something to help turn the city back to normal.
jpnChrName: ええ、何か気になる 手がかりを見つけたみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、何か気になる
手がかりを見つけたみたいで……

engChrName: I think they're still somewhere in Old Town, though.
engSearchText: I think they're still somewhere in Old Town, though.
jpnChrName: 多分、旧市街からは まだ離れてないと思うんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
多分、旧市街からは
まだ離れてないと思うんだけど。

engChrName: They're after some kind of creepy orb.
engSearchText: They're after some kind of creepy orb.
jpnChrName: えっとね、何だか気持ち悪い “球”の行方を捜してたみたい。
jpnSearchText:
えっとね、何だか気持ち悪い
“球”の行方を捜してたみたい。

engChrName: It popped up in the sky after everything got messed up, but then it disappeared not long after.
engSearchText:
It popped up in the sky after everything got messed
up, but then it disappeared not long after.
jpnChrName: 異変が起きた直後に空に現れて いつの間にか消えちゃったんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
異変が起きた直後に空に現れて
いつの間にか消えちゃったんだけど。

engChrName: They think it's working to strengthen the creatures roaming around.
engSearchText:
They think it's working to strengthen the creatures
roaming around.
jpnChrName: 嬢ちゃんたちによれば、そいつが化物共を 強化してるんじゃないかって話だった。
jpnSearchText:
嬢ちゃんたちによれば、そいつが化物共を
強化してるんじゃないかって話だった。

engChrName: Feri went out saying she wanted to have something to help you once you came.
engSearchText:
Feri went out saying she wanted to have something to
help you once you came.
jpnChrName: ……あの子はお前に手がかりを 持ち帰るつもりみたいだったぞ。
jpnSearchText:
……あの子はお前に手がかりを
持ち帰るつもりみたいだったぞ。

engChrName: She did, huh?
engSearchText: She did, huh?
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Oh, Ms. Al-Fayed...
engSearchText: Oh, Ms. Al-Fayed...
jpnChrName: フェリ様……
jpnSearchText: フェリ様……

engChrName: Small fry's turned big fry now.
engSearchText: Small fry's turned big fry now.
jpnChrName: ハン…… チビが一丁前に。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
チビが一丁前に。

engChrName: She's the Kruga one, right? She's got some real potential.
engSearchText:
She's the Kruga one, right? She's got some
real potential.
jpnChrName: クルガの子だったか。 フフ、なかなか見込みがあるね。
jpnSearchText:
クルガの子だったか。
フフ、なかなか見込みがあるね。

engChrName: Thanks for the heads up. We're gonna head out, then.
engSearchText:
Thanks for the heads up. We're gonna head
out, then.
jpnChrName: 分かった、とりあえず 俺たちも様子を見てくる。
jpnSearchText:
分かった、とりあえず
俺たちも様子を見てくる。

engChrName: The rest of you stay holed up here and try to hang on, okay?
engSearchText:
The rest of you stay holed up here and try to hang
on, okay?
jpnChrName: あんたたちは外に出ないで 何とかここで凌いでいてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
あんたたちは外に出ないで
何とかここで凌いでいてくれ。

engChrName: Can we leave everyone in your care, Inspector?
engSearchText: Can we leave everyone in your care, Inspector?
jpnChrName: 警部──ここは頼めるか？
jpnSearchText: 警部──ここは頼めるか？

engChrName: Of course. Keeping people safe is my job at the best of times—that, and my family is here right now, too.
engSearchText:
Of course. Keeping people safe is my job at the best
of times—that, and my family is here right now, too.
jpnChrName: 当然だ、家族もいるしな。
jpnSearchText: 当然だ、家族もいるしな。

engChrName: I know you're tough, but take care all the same.
engSearchText: I know you're tough, but take care all the same.
jpnChrName: お前たちなら大丈夫だろうが くれぐれも気をつけろ！
jpnSearchText:
お前たちなら大丈夫だろうが
くれぐれも気をつけろ！

engChrName: Go find Feri and put her at ease!
engSearchText: Go find Feri and put her at ease!
jpnChrName: とっととフェリ坊と再会して 安心させてやれ！
jpnSearchText:
とっととフェリ坊と再会して
安心させてやれ！

engChrName: Will do.
engSearchText: Will do.
jpnChrName: ああ──もちろんだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──もちろんだ。

engChrName: Then let's get moving.
engSearchText: Then let's get moving.
jpnChrName: よし、それじゃあ行こうか。
jpnSearchText: よし、それじゃあ行こうか。

engChrName: Then let's get moving.
engSearchText: Then let's get moving.
jpnChrName: よし、それでは行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: よし、それでは行くぞ。

engChrName: Then let us depart. We will be back soon, my lady.
engSearchText: Then let us depart. We will be back soon, my lady.
jpnChrName: それでは行きましょう。 お嬢様もお待ち下さい。
jpnSearchText:
それでは行きましょう。
お嬢様もお待ち下さい。

engChrName: O-Okay... Just be safe, okay?
engSearchText: O-Okay... Just be safe, okay?
jpnChrName: う、うん…… 貴方も気をつけなさいよ！
jpnSearchText:
う、うん……
貴方も気をつけなさいよ！

engChrName: And I mean that for you, too, Aaron!
engSearchText: And I mean that for you, too, Aaron!
jpnChrName: それにアーロンもね！
jpnSearchText: それにアーロンもね！

engChrName: Heh. That just makes me sound like an afterthought.
engSearchText: Heh. That just makes me sound like an afterthought.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ついでみたいに 言うんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ついでみたいに
言うんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: おお……
jpnSearchText: おお……

engChrName: The fog's gotten less thick all of a sudden!
engSearchText: The fog's gotten less thick all of a sudden!
jpnChrName: 瘴気が……薄れた！？
jpnSearchText: 瘴気が……薄れた！？

engChrName: Then they must've been successful!
engSearchText: Then they must've been successful!
jpnChrName: お兄さんにフェリたちが やってくれたんじゃない！？
jpnSearchText:
お兄さんにフェリたちが
やってくれたんじゃない！？

engChrName: They returned to Montmart to report back to everyone and discuss their next move.
engSearchText:
They returned to Montmart to report back to
everyone and discuss their next move.
jpnChrName: ──その後、モンマルトに戻ったヴァンたちは ダスワニたちに報告しつつ今後について話し合った。
jpnSearchText:
──その後、モンマルトに戻ったヴァンたちは
ダスワニたちに報告しつつ今後について話し合った。

engChrName: So you plan to keep making your way around the other districts, then?
engSearchText:
So you plan to keep making your way around the
other districts, then?
jpnChrName: そうか、このまま他の街区も 回ってみるつもりなんだな？
jpnSearchText:
そうか、このまま他の街区も
回ってみるつもりなんだな？

engChrName: Yeah. It's gonna be between Riverside and Central Station, since both of those are fairly close.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's gonna be between Riverside and Central
Station, since both of those are fairly close.
jpnChrName: ああ、この近くだと リバーサイドか中央駅前だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この近くだと
リバーサイドか中央駅前だろう。

engChrName: One's where Aaron is, and the other's where Risette is... I'm sure they're both fine, though.
engSearchText:
One's where Aaron is, and the other's where
Risette is... I'm sure they're both fine, though.
jpnChrName: アーロンにせよリゼットにせよ、 必ず無事でいるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンにせよリゼットにせよ、
必ず無事でいるはずだ。

engChrName: Oh, without a doubt!
engSearchText: Oh, without a doubt!
jpnChrName: はいっ、間違いありません！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、間違いありません！

engChrName: Hmm... Maybe I'll tag along for a while, then.
engSearchText: Hmm... Maybe I'll tag along for a while, then.
jpnChrName: うーん、そうすると わたしも同行しようかな？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、そうすると
わたしも同行しようかな？

engChrName: Our local guild branch is in front of the station, and I wanna know what's going on by the river, too.
engSearchText:
Our local guild branch is in front of the station, and I
wanna know what's going on by the river, too.
jpnChrName: 駅前通りにはギルドもあるし、 リバーサイドも気になるから。
jpnSearchText:
駅前通りにはギルドもあるし、
リバーサイドも気になるから。

engChrName: Yeah. We've been around all the major districts in this part of the city now.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We've been around all the major districts in
this part of the city now.
jpnChrName: ああ、このあたりの街区は 一通り回った──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、このあたりの街区は
一通り回った──

engChrName: Think it's about time we made our way up north.
engSearchText: Think it's about time we made our way up north.
jpnChrName: そろそろ首都の中心部から 北の方に足を延ばすべきだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ首都の中心部から
北の方に足を延ばすべきだろう。

engChrName: Hmm... Maybe I'll tag along for a while, then.
engSearchText: Hmm... Maybe I'll tag along for a while, then.
jpnChrName: うーん、そうすると わたしも同行しようかな？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、そうすると
わたしも同行しようかな？

engChrName: I wanna know what's going on in the center and north of the city. I still need to get in touch with the guild, too.
engSearchText:
I wanna know what's going on in the center and
north of the city. I still need to get in touch with the
guild, too.
jpnChrName: ギルドには連絡するとして 中心部と北側はわたしも気になるし。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドには連絡するとして
中心部と北側はわたしも気になるし。

engChrName: Yeah. The area around Central Station is the only district in this part of town that we haven't visited yet.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The area around Central Station is the only
district in this part of town that we haven't visited yet.
jpnChrName: ああ、この近くだったら 残るは中央駅前だけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この近くだったら
残るは中央駅前だけだ。

engChrName: Risette was in charge of that area. I'm sure she's fine, though.
engSearchText:
Risette was in charge of that area. I'm sure she's
fine, though.
jpnChrName: 担当はリゼット── まあ、間違いなく無事だろう。
jpnSearchText:
担当はリゼット──
まあ、間違いなく無事だろう。

engChrName: Oh, without a doubt!
engSearchText: Oh, without a doubt!
jpnChrName: はい、リゼットさんなら！
jpnSearchText: はい、リゼットさんなら！

engChrName: Yeah. Chick's like a tank.
engSearchText: Yeah. Chick's like a tank.
jpnChrName: あのメイドなら余裕だろうな。
jpnSearchText: あのメイドなら余裕だろうな。

engChrName: Hmm... Maybe I'll tag along for a while, then.
engSearchText: Hmm... Maybe I'll tag along for a while, then.
jpnChrName: うーん、そうすると わたしも同行しようかな？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、そうすると
わたしも同行しようかな？

engChrName: It works out since that's where our local guild branch is.
engSearchText:
It works out since that's where our local guild
branch is.
jpnChrName: 駅前通りにはギルドもあるし。
jpnSearchText: 駅前通りにはギルドもあるし。

engChrName: Riverside is the only district in this part of town that we haven't visited yet.
engSearchText:
Riverside is the only district in this part of town that
we haven't visited yet.
jpnChrName: ああ、この近くだったら 残るはリバーサイドだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この近くだったら
残るはリバーサイドだけだ。

engChrName: Aaron was in charge of that area. I'm sure he's fine, though.
engSearchText:
Aaron was in charge of that area. I'm sure he's
fine, though.
jpnChrName: 担当はアーロン── ま、簡単にくたばりゃしねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
担当はアーロン──
ま、簡単にくたばりゃしねぇだろ。

engChrName: Oh, without a doubt!
engSearchText: Oh, without a doubt!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そうですね！
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、そうですね！

engChrName: I quite agree. It would take more than this to defeat him.
engSearchText:
I quite agree. It would take more than this to
defeat him.
jpnChrName: ええ、きっと無事でしょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ、きっと無事でしょう。

engChrName: Hmm... Maybe I'll tag along for a while, then.
engSearchText: Hmm... Maybe I'll tag along for a while, then.
jpnChrName: うーん、そうすると わたしも同行しようかな？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、そうすると
わたしも同行しようかな？

engChrName: I want to know what's going on in Riverside—plus I still need to get in touch with the guild.
engSearchText:
I want to know what's going on in Riverside—plus I
still need to get in touch with the guild.
jpnChrName: ギルドには連絡するとして リバーサイドも気になるから。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドには連絡するとして
リバーサイドも気になるから。

engChrName: If Sylphid's good to go with you, then I think it's time I headed off on my own.
engSearchText:
If Sylphid's good to go with you, then I think it's time
I headed off on my own.
jpnChrName: フフ、妖精が同行するなら 私はここまでとしておこうかな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、妖精が同行するなら
私はここまでとしておこうかな。

engChrName: Makes sense. Thanks for all the help you've given us.
engSearchText: Makes sense. Thanks for all the help you've given us.
jpnChrName: そうか……短い間だが 世話になっちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……短い間だが
世話になっちまったな。

engChrName: Not at all. Hanging out with you helped me get a better handle on the situation, so it worked out for both of us.
engSearchText:
Not at all. Hanging out with you helped me get a
better handle on the situation, so it worked out for
both of us.
jpnChrName: いや、こちらこそ 色々と状況が整理できたよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、こちらこそ
色々と状況が整理できたよ。

engChrName: I'm going to meet up with Kurogane and the others, so if we learn anything, we'll give you a heads up.
engSearchText:
I'm going to meet up with Kurogane and the others,
so if we learn anything, we'll give you a heads up.
jpnChrName: クロガネたちと合流するつもりだけど 何か分かったらお互い協力しよう。
jpnSearchText:
クロガネたちと合流するつもりだけど
何か分かったらお互い協力しよう。

engChrName: See you around.
engSearchText: See you around.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、お先に失礼するよ。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、お先に失礼するよ。

engChrName: If Fie will be accompanying you, then I suppose it's about time I took my leave.
engSearchText:
If Fie will be accompanying you, then I suppose it's
about time I took my leave.
jpnChrName: フフ、フィーさんが同行するなら 私はここまでとしておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、フィーさんが同行するなら
私はここまでとしておきましょうか。

engChrName: You probably got a lot of other stuff to take care of, huh? I get it.
engSearchText:
You probably got a lot of other stuff to take care
of, huh? I get it.
jpnChrName: ま、アンタは色々と 忙しい立場だろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アンタは色々と
忙しい立場だろうからな。

engChrName: Thank you for your understanding.
engSearchText: Thank you for your understanding.
jpnChrName: お察し頂き幸いです。
jpnSearchText: お察し頂き幸いです。

engChrName: I will send someone to escort you later, Lady Ashen. Please remain here in the meantime.
engSearchText:
I will send someone to escort you later, Lady Ashen.
Please remain here in the meantime.
jpnChrName: お嬢様はあとで迎えを送りますので こちらでどうかお待ちください。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様はあとで迎えを送りますので
こちらでどうかお待ちください。

engChrName: Well, excuse me, then—and do take care of yourself, Aaron.
engSearchText:
Well, excuse me, then—and do take care of
yourself, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロンも無茶はせぬように。 それでは。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンも無茶はせぬように。
それでは。

engChrName: Pfft. Same to you.
engSearchText: Pfft. Same to you.
jpnChrName: ハッ、アンタもな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、アンタもな。

engChrName: Farewell for now.
engSearchText: Farewell for now.
jpnChrName: それでは。
jpnSearchText: それでは。

engChrName: W-Wait! Cao!
engSearchText: W-Wait! Cao!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっとツァオ！
jpnSearchText: ちょ、ちょっとツァオ！

engChrName: If Sylphid is accompanying you, perhaps I ought to take my leave here.
engSearchText:
If Sylphid is accompanying you, perhaps I ought to
take my leave here.
jpnChrName: フフ、妖精が同行するなら 私はここまでとしておこうか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、妖精が同行するなら
私はここまでとしておこうか。

engChrName: Makes sense, considerin' your job. Just try not to die out there.
engSearchText:
Makes sense, considerin' your job. Just try not to die
out there.
jpnChrName: ま、お前の立場なら当然か。 せいぜいくたばるんじゃねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前の立場なら当然か。
せいぜいくたばるんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: Heh. I could say the same to you. Goodbye for now, then.
engSearchText:
Heh. I could say the same to you. Goodbye for
now, then.
jpnChrName: こちらの台詞だ──それではな。
jpnSearchText: こちらの台詞だ──それではな。

engChrName: I leave law enforcement in this area to you, Inspector.
engSearchText:
I leave law enforcement in this area to you,
Inspector.
jpnChrName: ダスワニ警部、このあたりの 治安維持はお任せします。
jpnSearchText:
ダスワニ警部、このあたりの
治安維持はお任せします。

engChrName: Understood.
engSearchText: Understood.
jpnChrName: ああ、任された。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任された。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: She's supposed to be really strong from all I've heard, but she wasn't at all what I was expecting.
engSearchText:
She's supposed to be really strong from all I've heard,
but she wasn't at all what I was expecting.
jpnChrName: ……噂によれば凄まじいほどの 使い手みたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
……噂によれば凄まじいほどの
使い手みたいだけど。

engChrName: I can't believe him! He can't even come back for me himself?!
engSearchText:
I can't believe him! He can't even come back for
me himself?!
jpnChrName: まったくツァオったら…… あたしを放っておくつもりっ！？
jpnSearchText:
まったくツァオったら……
あたしを放っておくつもりっ！？

engChrName: But that ice-cold demeanor is part of what I love about him. ㈱
engSearchText:
But that ice-cold demeanor is part of what I love
about him. ㈱
jpnChrName: でもそんなクールさもいいかも……㈱
jpnSearchText: でもそんなクールさもいいかも……㈱

engChrName: Ugh. There's no saving you.
engSearchText: Ugh. There's no saving you.
jpnChrName: ったく、処置ナシだな。
jpnSearchText: ったく、処置ナシだな。

engChrName: Another intellectual type with glasses, huh? He's not up to my main man's standards, but he's still not bad at aaall. ㈱
engSearchText:
Another intellectual type with glasses, huh? He's not
up to my main man's standards, but he's still not bad
at aaall. ㈱
jpnChrName: 知的な眼鏡──タイプは違うけど けっこう好みかも……㈱
jpnSearchText:
知的な眼鏡──タイプは違うけど
けっこう好みかも……㈱

engChrName: First Cao, now him... You've really got shit taste in guys.
engSearchText:
First Cao, now him... You've really got shit taste
in guys.
jpnChrName: ったく、ツァオといい お前の趣味がたまに心配になるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、ツァオといい
お前の趣味がたまに心配になるぜ。

engChrName: She's surprisingly chill.
engSearchText: She's surprisingly chill.
jpnChrName: な、なんだか随分 あっさりとした人だね～。
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだか随分
あっさりとした人だね～。

engChrName: Well, we'd better get on with our own business.
engSearchText: Well, we'd better get on with our own business.
jpnChrName: ま、らしいっちゃらしいだろ。 俺たちはやるべき事をこなすだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、らしいっちゃらしいだろ。
俺たちはやるべき事をこなすだけだ。

engChrName: Just make sure you do right by your employees, young man.
engSearchText:
Just make sure you do right by your employees,
young man.
jpnChrName: おお、フェリ坊もそうだが 雇用主の義務はきっちりと果たせよ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、フェリ坊もそうだが
雇用主の義務はきっちりと果たせよ。

engChrName: Sir...
engSearchText: Sir...
jpnChrName: ビクトルさん……
jpnSearchText: ビクトルさん……

engChrName: Oh, I will. Almost goes without sayin'.
engSearchText: Oh, I will. Almost goes without sayin'.
jpnChrName: ああ、もちろんだ。 ──ユメにポーレットもな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、もちろんだ。
──ユメにポーレットもな。

engChrName: And I'll bring Yumé and Paulette back safe, too—you can count on it.
engSearchText:
And I'll bring Yumé and Paulette back safe, too—you
can count on it.
jpnChrName: 必ずや手がかりを見つけて おやっさんの所に届けるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
必ずや手がかりを見つけて
おやっさんの所に届けるからよ。

engChrName: Heh... Thank you.
engSearchText: Heh... Thank you.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… ………ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
………ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: The guild will also support him however we can.
engSearchText: The guild will also support him however we can.
jpnChrName: ギルドも全面的に バックアップさせてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドも全面的に
バックアップさせてもらう。

engChrName: Feri rejoined the party.
engSearchText: Feri rejoined the party.
jpnChrName: フェリがパーティに合流しました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>フェリがパーティに合流しました。

engChrName: Fie joined as a guest in Shizuna's place.
engSearchText: Fie joined as a guest in Shizuna's place.
jpnChrName: シズナがゲストから抜け、 フィーが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
シズナがゲストから抜け、
フィーが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Fie joined as a guest in Kincaid's place.
engSearchText: Fie joined as a guest in Kincaid's place.
jpnChrName: キンケイドがゲストから抜け、 フィーが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
キンケイドがゲストから抜け、
フィーが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Fie joined as a guest in Cao's place.
engSearchText: Fie joined as a guest in Cao's place.
jpnChrName: ツァオがゲストから抜け、 フィーが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオがゲストから抜け、
フィーが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Fie joined as a guest in Kincaid's place.
engSearchText: Fie joined as a guest in Kincaid's place.
jpnChrName: キンケイドがゲストから抜け、 フィーが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
キンケイドがゲストから抜け、
フィーが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Fie joined as a guest in Cao's place.
engSearchText: Fie joined as a guest in Cao's place.
jpnChrName: ツァオがゲストから抜け、 フィーが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオがゲストから抜け、
フィーが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: To advance the main story, inspect the car and select the next destination.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, inspect the car and select
the next destination.
jpnChrName: ストーリーを進める場合、 車を調べて新たな行き先を選んで下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ストーリーを進める場合、
車を調べて新たな行き先を選んで下さい。

engChrName: So, about your plan to travel north through the center of the city...
engSearchText:
So, about your plan to travel north through the center
of the city...
jpnChrName: ──ちなみに首都の 中心部から北側だけど……
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみに首都の
中心部から北側だけど……

engChrName: There was heavy traffic on the capital expressway when the crisis struck, so it might be tough to get there by car.
engSearchText:
There was heavy traffic on the capital expressway
when the crisis struck, so it might be tough to get
there by car.
jpnChrName: 異変時に首都高が渋滞してたみたいで、 車で向かうのは難しいかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
異変時に首都高が渋滞してたみたいで、
車で向かうのは難しいかもしれない。

engChrName: Bah. Really?
engSearchText: Bah. Really?
jpnChrName: ……！　そうなのか。
jpnSearchText: ……！　そうなのか。

engChrName: Makes sense, but damn, that sucks.
engSearchText: Makes sense, but damn, that sucks.
jpnChrName: チッ……この状況だから 仕方ないっちゃ仕方ねえが。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……この状況だから
仕方ないっちゃ仕方ねえが。

engChrName: We could likely still make the journey if we used back roads and the like, but it would be much slower.
engSearchText:
We could likely still make the journey if we used back
roads and the like, but it would be much slower.
jpnChrName: 裏道なども調べれば 方法もありそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
裏道なども調べれば
方法もありそうですが……

engChrName: Isn't there another route that we could take?
engSearchText: Isn't there another route that we could take?
jpnChrName: な、何とか移動する方法は ないんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
な、何とか移動する方法は
ないんでしょうか？

engChrName: I've got one in mind. What do you think of taking a detour through the Blacklight District?
engSearchText:
I've got one in mind. What do you think of taking a
detour through the Blacklight District?
jpnChrName: そこで提案なんだけど 一度、《黒芒街》に行ってみない？
jpnSearchText:
そこで提案なんだけど
一度、《黒芒街》に行ってみない？

engChrName: I'm pretty sure Zin should be there now, and it'll be a good base of operations going forward.
engSearchText:
I'm pretty sure Zin should be there now, and it'll be a
good base of operations going forward.
jpnChrName: たしかジンさんが行ってた筈だし、 他の街区に向かう足場にもなると思う。
jpnSearchText:
たしかジンさんが行ってた筈だし、
他の街区に向かう足場にもなると思う。

engChrName: That's not a bad idea, actually.
engSearchText: That's not a bad idea, actually.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… 確かにそいつは手かもしれんな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
確かにそいつは手かもしれんな。

engChrName: I think my master was there, too. It'd be a huge help to have him with us.
engSearchText:
I think my master was there, too. It'd be a huge help
to have him with us.
jpnChrName: 師父（せんせい）もいた筈だし、 合流できたら言うことねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
師父（せんせい）もいた筈だし、
合流できたら言うことねえだろう。

engChrName: Yeah, he is one damn strong dude.
engSearchText: Yeah, he is one damn strong dude.
jpnChrName: ハッ、確かにあのジジイは心強いな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、確かにあのジジイは心強いな。

engChrName: We may be able to resupply there as well.
engSearchText: We may be able to resupply there as well.
jpnChrName: それにあの街区なら物資の補給も できるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
それにあの街区なら物資の補給も
できるかもしれません。

engChrName: All right. Best way to the Blacklight District from here is that secret entrance in Riverside.
engSearchText:
All right. Best way to the Blacklight District from
here is that secret entrance in Riverside.
jpnChrName: よし、黒芒街に行くなら リバーサイドの“裏口”に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
よし、黒芒街に行くなら
リバーサイドの“裏口”に向かうぞ。

engChrName: But there's no way to be sure the route there'll be safe, so better make sure we're prepared before headin' off.
engSearchText:
But there's no way to be sure the route there'll be safe,
so better make sure we're prepared before headin' off.
jpnChrName: 道中で何があるか分からねぇ。 準備も万全にしておくか。
jpnSearchText:
道中で何があるか分からねぇ。
準備も万全にしておくか。

engChrName: Roger that!
engSearchText: Roger that!
jpnChrName: はいっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！

engChrName: Okay, let's roll!
engSearchText: Okay, let's roll!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、レッツ・ゴーだね。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、レッツ・ゴーだね。

engChrName: To advance the main story, go to the underground entrance in the northern part of Riverside.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, go to the underground
entrance in the northern part of Riverside.
jpnChrName: ストーリーを進める場合、リバーサイド北の 一角にある地下道への入口へ向かって下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ストーリーを進める場合、リバーサイド北の
一角にある地下道への入口へ向かって下さい。

engChrName: (Hmm... Now where should we go next?)
engSearchText: (Hmm... Now where should we go next?)
jpnChrName: （さて、どこに向かうか……）
jpnSearchText: （さて、どこに向かうか……）

engChrName: Once a district has been selected, the others will be temporarily unavailable.
engSearchText:
Once a district has been selected, the others will be
temporarily unavailable.
jpnChrName: 一度行き先を選択するとしばらくの間、 他のエリアに行くことは出来ません。
jpnSearchText:
一度行き先を選択するとしばらくの間、
他のエリアに行くことは出来ません。

engChrName: (Aaron was the one stationed in this district. I'm guessin' he's still there, too.)
engSearchText:
(Aaron was the one stationed in this district.
I'm guessin' he's still there, too.)
jpnChrName: （ここの担当はアーロンだったか……   多分持ち場は離れていない筈だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここの担当はアーロンだったか……
多分持ち場は離れていない筈だ。）

engChrName: (Time to go find him!)
engSearchText: (Time to go find him!)
jpnChrName: （何としても見つけて合流するぞ！）
jpnSearchText: （何としても見つけて合流するぞ！）

engChrName: (Risette was the one stationed in this district. I'm guessin' she's still there, too.)
engSearchText:
(Risette was the one stationed in this district.
I'm guessin' she's still there, too.)
jpnChrName: （ここの担当はリゼットだったか……   多分持ち場は離れていない筈だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここの担当はリゼットだったか……
多分持ち場は離れていない筈だ。）

engChrName: (Time to go find her!)
engSearchText: (Time to go find her!)
jpnChrName: （何としても見つけて合流するぞ！）
jpnSearchText: （何としても見つけて合流するぞ！）

engChrName: I can't find him anywhere!
engSearchText: I can't find him anywhere!
jpnChrName: ど、どこにもいません……！
jpnSearchText: ど、どこにもいません……！

engChrName: But if he's not here, then where the hell could he be?
engSearchText: But if he's not here, then where the hell could he be?
jpnChrName: 色々あんだろうが ここじゃねえとすりゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
色々あんだろうが
ここじゃねえとすりゃ……！

engChrName: (Aramis? No, after all that's happened, I'm sure—)
engSearchText: (Aramis? No, after all that's happened, I'm sure—)
jpnChrName: （……アラミス……？   ううん、今の彼ならきっと──）
jpnSearchText:
（……アラミス……？
ううん、今の彼ならきっと──）

engChrName: Could he be on the rooftop, perhaps?
engSearchText: Could he be on the rooftop, perhaps?
jpnChrName: ……ひょっとしたら屋上とか？
jpnSearchText: ……ひょっとしたら屋上とか？

engChrName: I remember him talking up there during the party—is he partial to that spot at all?
engSearchText:
I remember him talking up there during the party—is
he partial to that spot at all?
jpnChrName: 打ち上げの時もお喋りしてたし、 よく出てたりするんじゃないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
打ち上げの時もお喋りしてたし、
よく出てたりするんじゃないかしら？

engChrName: That must be it!
engSearchText: That must be it!
jpnChrName: そこですっ……！
jpnSearchText: そこですっ……！

engChrName: Let's go, Agnès!
engSearchText: Let's go, Agnès!
jpnChrName: 行こう──アニエスさん！
jpnSearchText: 行こう──アニエスさん！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: The final battle awaits. Please ensure all party members are fully equipped.
engSearchText:
The final battle awaits. Please ensure all party
members are fully equipped.
jpnChrName: この先に最後の戦いが待っています。 全メンバーの装備や設定を整えてください。
jpnSearchText:
この先に最後の戦いが待っています。
全メンバーの装備や設定を整えてください。

engChrName: He really is up here!
engSearchText: He really is up here!
jpnChrName: ほ、本当にあった……！
jpnSearchText: ほ、本当にあった……！

engChrName: Thank you, Mare.
engSearchText: Thank you, Mare.
jpnChrName: ……ありがとう《メア》……
jpnSearchText: ……ありがとう《メア》……

engChrName: This must be a barrier that analyzes those who try to walk through it—and will only let people from Arkride Solutions pass.
engSearchText:
This must be a barrier that analyzes those who try to
walk through it—and will only let people from
Arkride Solutions pass.
jpnChrName: 個体識別の障壁…… 裏解決屋さんだけ、みたいね。
jpnSearchText:
個体識別の障壁……
裏解決屋さんだけ、みたいね。

engChrName: Aww. If I'd known this was going to happen, I'd have tried sneaking my way into a job, too.
engSearchText:
Aww. If I'd known this was going to happen, I'd have
tried sneaking my way into a job, too.
jpnChrName: うーん、こんな事なら私も バイトすれば良かったかしら？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、こんな事なら私も
バイトすれば良かったかしら？

engChrName: I'm so sorry, Elaine.
engSearchText: I'm so sorry, Elaine.
jpnChrName: すみません、エレインさん……
jpnSearchText: すみません、エレインさん……

engChrName: Don't worry about it. I'll leave this in your hands.
engSearchText: Don't worry about it. I'll leave this in your hands.
jpnChrName: ううん、貴女たちの役目でしょう。
jpnSearchText: ううん、貴女たちの役目でしょう。

engChrName: Just give him a big smack for us, all right?
engSearchText: Just give him a big smack for us, all right?
jpnChrName: 私たちの代わりにあの馬鹿に 一発お見舞いしてちょうだい……！
jpnSearchText:
私たちの代わりにあの馬鹿に
一発お見舞いしてちょうだい……！

engChrName: You got it!
engSearchText: You got it!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Then let's do this!
engSearchText: Then let's do this!
jpnChrName: ハッ、そんじゃあ行くぞ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そんじゃあ行くぞ！

engChrName: In the end, Van came back to us safe and sound.
engSearchText: In the end, Van came back to us safe and sound.
jpnChrName: こうして──ヴァンさんは無事、 私たちのもとに還ってきてくれました。
jpnSearchText:
こうして──ヴァンさんは無事、
私たちのもとに還ってきてくれました。

engChrName: That marked the beginning of a very busy three weeks that somehow flew by in an instant.
engSearchText:
That marked the beginning of a very busy three
weeks that somehow flew by in an instant.
jpnChrName: それからはとても、とても忙しい ３週間があっという間に過ぎて行き……
jpnSearchText:
それからはとても、とても忙しい
３週間があっという間に過ぎて行き……

engChrName: We all did what we could to help Van deal with the aftermath of what had happened while making preparations of our own.
engSearchText:
We all did what we could to help Van deal with the
aftermath of what had happened while making
preparations of our own.
jpnChrName: 私たちはそれぞれの準備も進めながら ヴァンさんと事件の後始末に追われました。
jpnSearchText:
私たちはそれぞれの準備も進めながら
ヴァンさんと事件の後始末に追われました。

engChrName: Then, on the day that the second term at Aramis ended and my winter vacation began...
engSearchText:
Then, on the day that the second term at Aramis
ended and my winter vacation began...
jpnChrName: そして、アラミス高等学校の二学期が終了し、 私がちょうど冬季休暇に入ったその日──
jpnSearchText:
そして、アラミス高等学校の二学期が終了し、
私がちょうど冬季休暇に入ったその日──

engChrName: *sigh* I posted the request, but will they really come?
engSearchText: *sigh* I posted the request, but will they really come?
jpnChrName: ふぅ……依頼は出してみたけど、 本当に来てくれるのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……依頼は出してみたけど、
本当に来てくれるのかな……？

engChrName: Hey, Van. Do you think that's our client?
engSearchText: Hey, Van. Do you think that's our client?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、この方はもしかして？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、この方はもしかして？

engChrName: Don't see who else it could be.
engSearchText: Don't see who else it could be.
jpnChrName: ああ、今回の依頼者だろうな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、今回の依頼者だろうな。

engChrName: Are you Lott? We're from Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: Are you Lott? We're from Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが、 アンタが依頼主のロットか？
jpnSearchText:
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが、
アンタが依頼主のロットか？

engChrName: Oh, nice to meet you! Yes, I'm Lott. I'm the one who made the request.
engSearchText:
Oh, nice to meet you! Yes, I'm Lott. I'm the one who
made the request.
jpnChrName: は、はい、初めまして……！ 依頼を出させてもらったロットです。
jpnSearchText:
は、はい、初めまして……！
依頼を出させてもらったロットです。

engChrName: I've heard stories about you, but I never thought I'd get to talk to you in person.
engSearchText:
I've heard stories about you, but I never thought I'd
get to talk to you in person.
jpnChrName: はは……まさか、噂でしか聞いた事がなかった 裏解決屋に相談できるだなんて。
jpnSearchText:
はは……まさか、噂でしか聞いた事がなかった
裏解決屋に相談できるだなんて。

engChrName: I wasn't too sure if asking a spriggan for help would get me anywhere, but I had to try.
engSearchText:
I wasn't too sure if asking a spriggan for help would
get me anywhere, but I had to try.
jpnChrName: 駄目で元々だと思ってましたけど、 すごくありがたいです。
jpnSearchText:
駄目で元々だと思ってましたけど、
すごくありがたいです。

engChrName: Thank you so much for coming. I need your help to save my friend!
engSearchText:
Thank you so much for coming. I need your help to
save my friend!
jpnChrName: 友人を救う為にも、 ぜひ力を貸して頂けると助かります……！
jpnSearchText:
友人を救う為にも、
ぜひ力を貸して頂けると助かります……！

engChrName: All right. We'll see what we can do, so don't worry. Name's Van. I'm the boss, and this here's Agnès. She's kinda like my assistant.
engSearchText:
All right. We'll see what we can do, so don't worry.
Name's Van. I'm the boss, and this here's Agnès.
She's kinda like my assistant.
jpnChrName: ああ、俺は所長のヴァン。 こっちは助手見習いのアニエスだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、俺は所長のヴァン。
こっちは助手見習いのアニエスだ。

engChrName: I still have a lot to learn, but I promise I'll do everything I can to help!
engSearchText:
I still have a lot to learn, but I promise I'll do
everything I can to help!
jpnChrName: 勉強中の身ですが、精一杯頑張ります！
jpnSearchText: 勉強中の身ですが、精一杯頑張ります！

engChrName: Oh, so you help out with problems, too? I wouldn't expect a girl like you to—
engSearchText:
Oh, so you help out with problems, too? I wouldn't
expect a girl like you to—
jpnChrName: 貴女も裏解決屋なんですね。 ちょっと意外だな……
jpnSearchText:
貴女も裏解決屋なんですね。
ちょっと意外だな……

engChrName: Ack! Sorry! No offense or anything. I know I shouldn't judge a book by its cover, but there I go, sticking my foot in my mouth.
engSearchText:
Ack! Sorry! No offense or anything. I know I
shouldn't judge a book by its cover, but there I go,
sticking my foot in my mouth.
jpnChrName: って、見た目で判断しちゃ駄目ですよね。 失礼しました……！
jpnSearchText:
って、見た目で判断しちゃ駄目ですよね。
失礼しました……！

engChrName: Heehee, that's okay. No offense was taken.
engSearchText: Heehee, that's okay. No offense was taken.
jpnChrName: あはは……お気になさらないでください。
jpnSearchText: あはは……お気になさらないでください。

engChrName: Enough chattin'. Let's get down to brass tacks.
engSearchText: Enough chattin'. Let's get down to brass tacks.
jpnChrName: さてと、早速だが依頼内容を 確認させてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、早速だが依頼内容を
確認させてもらおうか。

engChrName: Your request mentioned your friend swiping some cash from the till at work, right? And you wanted to figure out why.
engSearchText:
Your request mentioned your friend swiping some
cash from the till at work, right? And you wanted to
figure out why.
jpnChrName: アンタの友人がレジの金を盗んだ── その動機を探ってほしいっつう事だったな。
jpnSearchText:
アンタの友人がレジの金を盗んだ──
その動機を探ってほしいっつう事だったな。

engChrName: Mind giving us a rundown of the situation? What this friend's like, and anything else you can think of.
engSearchText:
Mind giving us a rundown of the situation? What this
friend's like, and anything else you can think of.
jpnChrName: 友人とやらの事も含めて 詳しい事情を聞かせてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
友人とやらの事も含めて
詳しい事情を聞かせてくれ。

engChrName: Not at all.
engSearchText: Not at all.
jpnChrName: は、はい……！
jpnSearchText: は、はい……！

engChrName: My friend's name is Daniel.
engSearchText: My friend's name is Daniel.
jpnChrName: ええと、まず友人の名前は ダニエルと言います。
jpnSearchText:
ええと、まず友人の名前は
ダニエルと言います。

engChrName: We've known each other since we went to Sunday School.
engSearchText:
We've known each other since we went to
Sunday School.
jpnChrName: 僕と彼は日曜学校以来の友人でして。
jpnSearchText: 僕と彼は日曜学校以来の友人でして。

engChrName: Nowadays, we're both working at the same café part time.
engSearchText:
Nowadays, we're both working at the same café
part time.
jpnChrName: 今は同じカフェで 一緒にバイトもしてるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
今は同じカフェで
一緒にバイトもしてるんですよ。

engChrName: It sounds like you two are close.
engSearchText: It sounds like you two are close.
jpnChrName: お二人はとても仲が良いんですね。
jpnSearchText: お二人はとても仲が良いんですね。

engChrName: Yeah, we are. Which is why something just doesn't add up for me.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we are. Which is why something just doesn't
add up for me.
jpnChrName: ええ……だから分かるんです。
jpnSearchText: ええ……だから分かるんです。

engChrName: He's such a good guy. I've never known him to do anything bad in my entire life.
engSearchText:
He's such a good guy. I've never known him to do
anything bad in my entire life.
jpnChrName: アイツは本当に気がいい性格で…… 悪事を働けるようなヤツじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
アイツは本当に気がいい性格で……
悪事を働けるようなヤツじゃない。

engChrName: It all happened right as we were closing up shop yesterday.
engSearchText:
It all happened right as we were closing up
shop yesterday.
jpnChrName: でも昨日……店を閉める時に 偶然見ちゃったんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
でも昨日……店を閉める時に
偶然見ちゃったんですよ。

engChrName: I just so happened to see him slip the money from the register into his pocket. I was honestly really shocked.
engSearchText:
I just so happened to see him slip the money from the
register into his pocket. I was honestly really shocked.
jpnChrName: ダニエルがレジの売上金を こっそり懐にしまう所を……
jpnSearchText:
ダニエルがレジの売上金を
こっそり懐にしまう所を……

engChrName: I can imagine why. It sounds really out of character for him to do that.
engSearchText:
I can imagine why. It sounds really out of character
for him to do that.
jpnChrName: なるほど……普段の彼なら ありえない行動という訳ですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……普段の彼なら
ありえない行動という訳ですね。

engChrName: What did you do after that?
engSearchText: What did you do after that?
jpnChrName: それで、その後アンタはどうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText: それで、その後アンタはどうしたんだ？

engChrName: Umm... Nothing, actually. I'm embarrassed to admit it, but I was too chicken to confront him.
engSearchText:
Umm... Nothing, actually. I'm embarrassed to admit
it, but I was too chicken to confront him.
jpnChrName: ううっ……その……情けない事に、 直接話を聞くのが怖くなってしまって。
jpnSearchText:
ううっ……その……情けない事に、
直接話を聞くのが怖くなってしまって。

engChrName: I just pretended like I didn't see anything...
engSearchText: I just pretended like I didn't see anything...
jpnChrName: つい、一度は見ていないフリを してしまったんです……
jpnSearchText:
つい、一度は見ていないフリを
してしまったんです……

engChrName: D-Don't get the wrong idea! I was worried, so I tried asking around without giving it away. Y'know, to see if anyone had any idea what was going on.
engSearchText:
D-Don't get the wrong idea! I was worried, so I tried
asking around without giving it away. Y'know, to see
if anyone had any idea what was going on.
jpnChrName: だ、だけど！　やっぱり放っておけないと思って。 お茶を濁しつつ事情を聞き出そうと頑張ったんです！
jpnSearchText:
だ、だけど！　やっぱり放っておけないと思って。
お茶を濁しつつ事情を聞き出そうと頑張ったんです！

engChrName: I finally got a lead this morning.
engSearchText: I finally got a lead this morning.
jpnChrName: そしたらなんと、明日──つまり今日の午前中。
jpnSearchText: そしたらなんと、明日──つまり今日の午前中。

engChrName: I learned that Daniel is going to do some shopping at the orbal store over on Station Street!
engSearchText:
I learned that Daniel is going to do some shopping at
the orbal store over on Station Street!
jpnChrName: ダニエルが駅前通りのオーバルストアへ 買い物をしに行くと聞き出せたんですよ……！
jpnSearchText:
ダニエルが駅前通りのオーバルストアへ
買い物をしに行くと聞き出せたんですよ……！

engChrName: And? People go to orbal stores all the time. Doesn't really mean anything by itself.
engSearchText:
And? People go to orbal stores all the time.
Doesn't really mean anything by itself.
jpnChrName: そうは言うけどな……オーバルストアに買い物って、 普通にありえる話じゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
そうは言うけどな……オーバルストアに買い物って、
普通にありえる話じゃねえのか？

engChrName: Maybe if you don't know Daniel. I don't know anyone with less interest in orbal devices than him. He must have a good reason to go looking for it.
engSearchText:
Maybe if you don't know Daniel. I don't know
anyone with less interest in orbal devices than him.
He must have a good reason to go looking for it.
jpnChrName: いやいや、導力機器に全く興味がないヤツなので よっぽどの事情がないと行かないはずですよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、導力機器に全く興味がないヤツなので
よっぽどの事情がないと行かないはずですよ。

engChrName: When you put it like that, I can see how it might look a little worrying.
engSearchText:
When you put it like that, I can see how it might look
a little worrying.
jpnChrName: ロットさんがそこまで言うなら 気にかける必要がありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ロットさんがそこまで言うなら
気にかける必要がありそうですね。

engChrName: Thanks for the rundown. I think we've got a good idea of what's goin' on.
engSearchText:
Thanks for the rundown. I think we've got a good
idea of what's goin' on.
jpnChrName: 泥棒行為をした翌日に、 珍しくオーバルストアへ買い物をしに行く、か……
jpnSearchText:
泥棒行為をした翌日に、
珍しくオーバルストアへ買い物をしに行く、か……

engChrName: First, I think we gotta figure out what he was planning on buyin' with the money he swiped.
engSearchText:
First, I think we gotta figure out what he was
planning on buyin' with the money he swiped.
jpnChrName: 盗んだ金で、なにか買おうとしてるのか何なのか、 確かに調べてみる価値はありそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
盗んだ金で、なにか買おうとしてるのか何なのか、
確かに調べてみる価値はありそうだな。

engChrName: (All right, then. Should we get to work?)
engSearchText: (All right, then. Should we get to work?)
jpnChrName: （さてと……今すぐ取りかかっちまうか？）
jpnSearchText: （さてと……今すぐ取りかかっちまうか？）

engChrName: Daniel's not the kind of guy who would steal from work, I swear.
engSearchText:
Daniel's not the kind of guy who would steal from
work, I swear.
jpnChrName: ダニエルがレジの金を盗むなんて、 なにか深い事情がある筈なんです。
jpnSearchText:
ダニエルがレジの金を盗むなんて、
なにか深い事情がある筈なんです。

engChrName: Maybe we can get to the bottom of this if we figure out why he's going to the orbal store in the first place.
engSearchText:
Maybe we can get to the bottom of this if we figure
out why he's going to the orbal store in the first place.
jpnChrName: 今日のオーバルストアでの買い物── そこで泥棒をした理由が分かるかもしれません！
jpnSearchText:
今日のオーバルストアでの買い物──
そこで泥棒をした理由が分かるかもしれません！

engChrName: Would you please look into it for me? I'd really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Would you please look into it for me? I'd really
appreciate it.
jpnChrName: どうか僕の代わりに調査をしてくれませんか！？
jpnSearchText: どうか僕の代わりに調査をしてくれませんか！？

engChrName: (All right, then. Should we get to work?)
engSearchText: (All right, then. Should we get to work?)
jpnChrName: （さてと……今すぐ取りかかっちまうか？）
jpnSearchText: （さてと……今すぐ取りかかっちまうか？）

engChrName: Sorry. Let me think about it first.
engSearchText: Sorry. Let me think about it first.
jpnChrName: 悪いが一旦考えさせてくれないか。
jpnSearchText: 悪いが一旦考えさせてくれないか。

engChrName: We've got some other errands to run, too. Get back to you when we're done.
engSearchText:
We've got some other errands to run, too. Get back
to you when we're done.
jpnChrName: 他にも野暮用があるんでな、 そいつを済ませたらまた連絡する。
jpnSearchText:
他にも野暮用があるんでな、
そいつを済ませたらまた連絡する。

engChrName: It's okay. I understand.
engSearchText: It's okay. I understand.
jpnChrName: あっ……分かりました！
jpnSearchText: あっ……分かりました！

engChrName: I'll be waiting here. Hope to see you again soon!
engSearchText: I'll be waiting here. Hope to see you again soon!
jpnChrName: お待ちしてるので、また話を聞いて 頂けるとありがたいです……！
jpnSearchText:
お待ちしてるので、また話を聞いて
頂けるとありがたいです……！

engChrName: All right. Ready to roll.
engSearchText: All right. Ready to roll.
jpnChrName: ああ、依頼内容は把握した。
jpnSearchText: ああ、依頼内容は把握した。

engChrName: We're gonna stake out your friend. Keep an eye on his movements for a little while and see if anything turns up. Sound good?
engSearchText:
We're gonna stake out your friend. Keep an eye on
his movements for a little while and see if anything
turns up. Sound good?
jpnChrName: ダニエルとやらを張り込んで、 動向を調べてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
ダニエルとやらを張り込んで、
動向を調べてみるか。

engChrName: Yes, that's fine. Thank you again for agreeing to help!
engSearchText: Yes, that's fine. Thank you again for agreeing to help!
jpnChrName: あ、ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: あ、ありがとうございます！

engChrName: Hold up. Before I go, I still got some questions for you.
engSearchText:
Hold up. Before I go, I still got some questions
for you.
jpnChrName: そこでなんだが……お前にも頼みたい事がある。
jpnSearchText: そこでなんだが……お前にも頼みたい事がある。

engChrName: First, what does Daniel actually look like?
engSearchText: First, what does Daniel actually look like?
jpnChrName: まずは調査対象の特徴を教えてくれねえか？
jpnSearchText: まずは調査対象の特徴を教えてくれねえか？

engChrName: Right. Daniel's got black hair and he usually wears a brown jacket.
engSearchText:
Right. Daniel's got black hair and he usually wears a
brown jacket.
jpnChrName: そうですね……ダニエルは黒髪で よく茶色のジャケットを着ています。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……ダニエルは黒髪で
よく茶色のジャケットを着ています。

engChrName: I should have a photo of him around somewhere. I can send it to you later.
engSearchText:
I should have a photo of him around somewhere.
I can send it to you later.
jpnChrName: 確か写真もあったと思うので、 後で端末に送っておきますね。
jpnSearchText:
確か写真もあったと思うので、
後で端末に送っておきますね。

engChrName: Black hair and a brown jacket... Got it. We'll keep an eye out for him.
engSearchText:
Black hair and a brown jacket... Got it. We'll keep an
eye out for him.
jpnChrName: 黒髪に茶色のジャケット…… 分かりました、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
黒髪に茶色のジャケット……
分かりました、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: You do that. In the meantime, think you can figure out exactly when he's gonna go to the store?
engSearchText:
You do that. In the meantime, think you can
figure out exactly when he's gonna go to the store?
jpnChrName: 後は、調査対象がいつオーバルストアに 来るのか探ってもらえねえか？
jpnSearchText:
後は、調査対象がいつオーバルストアに
来るのか探ってもらえねえか？

engChrName: You two are close, so you've got a better chance than anyone else of figurin' that out.
engSearchText:
You two are close, so you've got a better chance than
anyone else of figurin' that out.
jpnChrName: 下手に動くよりは、 そっちの方が効率がいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
下手に動くよりは、
そっちの方が効率がいいだろ。

engChrName: You've got a point. I'll see what I can do!
engSearchText: You've got a point. I'll see what I can do!
jpnChrName: そうですね……なんとかやってみます！
jpnSearchText: そうですね……なんとかやってみます！

engChrName: I'll let you two know what I find out after I get in contact with him.
engSearchText:
I'll let you two know what I find out after I get in
contact with him.
jpnChrName: ダニエルと連絡がつき次第、 お二人に連絡させて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
ダニエルと連絡がつき次第、
お二人に連絡させて頂きますね。

engChrName: Perfect. Time to get to work, then.
engSearchText: Perfect. Time to get to work, then.
jpnChrName: よし、そうと決まれば行動開始だな。
jpnSearchText: よし、そうと決まれば行動開始だな。

engChrName: But before anything else, we still need to pay the repair shop a visit.
engSearchText:
But before anything else, we still need to pay the
repair shop a visit.
jpnChrName: だが──その前に修理屋に寄っておくぞ。
jpnSearchText: だが──その前に修理屋に寄っておくぞ。

engChrName: Right. We shouldn't forget that.
engSearchText: Right. We shouldn't forget that.
jpnChrName: 分かりました……！
jpnSearchText: 分かりました……！

engChrName: Perfect. Time to get to work, then.
engSearchText: Perfect. Time to get to work, then.
jpnChrName: よし、そうと決まれば行動開始だ。
jpnSearchText: よし、そうと決まれば行動開始だ。

engChrName: It was nice to meet you, Lott! Don't worry, we'll take care of this.
engSearchText:
It was nice to meet you, Lott! Don't worry, we'll take
care of this.
jpnChrName: はい、よろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: はい、よろしくお願いします！

engChrName: Quest Friendly Felon started!
engSearchText: Quest Friendly Felon started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【盗みを働いた友人の調査】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>盗みを働いた友人の調査<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: That's all the second-hand stuff that we've got lately.
engSearchText: That's all the second-hand stuff that we've got lately.
jpnChrName: ……ということで、 最近入った中古品は以上になります。
jpnSearchText:
……ということで、
最近入った中古品は以上になります。

engChrName: Thank you for buying so much! We sincerely appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Thank you for buying so much! We sincerely
appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 沢山のお買い上げ、 ありがとうございました！
jpnSearchText:
沢山のお買い上げ、
ありがとうございました！

engChrName: Trust me. If anyone's thankful, it's me.
engSearchText: Trust me. If anyone's thankful, it's me.
jpnChrName: うむうむ、こちらこそありがとうな。
jpnSearchText: うむうむ、こちらこそありがとうな。

engChrName: I'm just happy I could find so much intriguing merchandise.
engSearchText:
I'm just happy I could find so much
intriguing merchandise.
jpnChrName: 今日も面白い商品をたくさん 買い取らせてもらえて嬉しいぞい。
jpnSearchText:
今日も面白い商品をたくさん
買い取らせてもらえて嬉しいぞい。

engChrName: Haha, today's my lucky day, truly!
engSearchText: Haha, today's my lucky day, truly!
jpnChrName: ほっほっほ！ やはり今日は大豊作の日じゃのう～！
jpnSearchText:
ほっほっほ！
やはり今日は大豊作の日じゃのう～！

engChrName: There's our guy. Hey, folks. Don't mind us.
engSearchText: There's our guy. Hey, folks. Don't mind us.
jpnChrName: お、いたいたっと……お邪魔するぜ。
jpnSearchText: お、いたいたっと……お邪魔するぜ。

engChrName: Oh, hey, Van! I didn't see you there.
engSearchText: Oh, hey, Van! I didn't see you there.
jpnChrName: あっ、ヴァンさん！ いらっしゃいませ！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、ヴァンさん！
いらっしゃいませ！

engChrName: 'Van'? You must be that spriggan everyone's been talking about.
engSearchText:
'Van'? You must be that spriggan everyone's been
talking about.
jpnChrName: むむ、おぬしは確か裏解決屋の……？
jpnSearchText: むむ、おぬしは確か裏解決屋の……？

engChrName: Maybe I am. Sorry to bug you. Care to answer a few questions?
engSearchText:
Maybe I am. Sorry to bug you. Care to answer a
few questions?
jpnChrName: 悪いな爺さん、 ちょいと顔を貸してもらえないか。
jpnSearchText:
悪いな爺さん、
ちょいと顔を貸してもらえないか。

engChrName: We wanted to talk about some of your merchandise.
engSearchText: We wanted to talk about some of your merchandise.
jpnChrName: アンタの取り扱ってる商品について 相談したい事があるんでな。
jpnSearchText:
アンタの取り扱ってる商品について
相談したい事があるんでな。

engChrName: Oh? I'm listening.
engSearchText: Oh? I'm listening.

engChrName: Van and Agnès explained their client's request to Yimai.
engSearchText:
Van and Agnès explained their client's request
to Yimai.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達はイーマイ老人に 依頼内容について説明した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達はイーマイ老人に
依頼内容について説明した。

engChrName: Hmm... So you're looking for a Pintilie wallet? I did recently come across one, yes.
engSearchText:
Hmm... So you're looking for a Pintilie wallet? I did
recently come across one, yes.
jpnChrName: ──成程、《ピンティリエ》の財布か。 それなら確かにワシが仕入れておるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──成程、《ピンティリエ》の財布か。
それなら確かにワシが仕入れておるぞ。

engChrName: Time-wise, it does line up with the one you're looking for.
engSearchText:
Time-wise, it does line up with the one you're
looking for.
jpnChrName: 仕入れた日付から考えても、お前さん達の 探し物である事は間違いないじゃろう。
jpnSearchText:
仕入れた日付から考えても、お前さん達の
探し物である事は間違いないじゃろう。

engChrName: Crafty lot, you two, managing to sniff your way to me.
engSearchText:
Crafty lot, you two, managing to sniff your way
to me.
jpnChrName: ほっほっほ、本当によく ワシに辿り着いたものじゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
ほっほっほ、本当によく
ワシに辿り着いたものじゃよ。

engChrName: We're just cleaning up after the bracers. They were havin' a rough time figurin' out the specific broker that got it.
engSearchText:
We're just cleaning up after the bracers. They were
havin' a rough time figurin' out the specific broker
that got it.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士の方では闇商人を 特定できなかったっつう話だからな。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士の方では闇商人を
特定できなかったっつう話だからな。

engChrName: But anyone with actual experience in the black market will know what tree to go bark up first. Yours, old man.
engSearchText:
But anyone with actual experience in the black
market will know what tree to go bark up first.
Yours, old man.
jpnChrName: 年季の入った闇商人のアンタを 疑うのも当然だろ。
jpnSearchText:
年季の入った闇商人のアンタを
疑うのも当然だろ。

engChrName: Haha, I guess I've built something of a reputation for myself over the years.
engSearchText:
Haha, I guess I've built something of a reputation for
myself over the years.
jpnChrName: ほっほっ、高く買われたものじゃな。
jpnSearchText: ほっほっ、高く買われたものじゃな。

engChrName: So...are you going to part with the wallet? We'll make sure it gets back to its rightful owner.
engSearchText:
So...are you going to part with the wallet? We'll make
sure it gets back to its rightful owner.
jpnChrName: それでは……例のお財布は 返してもらえるのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
それでは……例のお財布は
返してもらえるのでしょうか？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: What my merchandise goes through before it gets to me is really none of my business. It's in my hands now, and that's what matters to me.
engSearchText:
What my merchandise goes through before it gets to
me is really none of my business. It's in my hands
now, and that's what matters to me.
jpnChrName: ワシの手に渡った経緯はどうあれ 今では大事な商品のひとつじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ワシの手に渡った経緯はどうあれ
今では大事な商品のひとつじゃ。

engChrName: I can't give away my valuable merch to just anyone that comes asking for it. I'd go out of business.
engSearchText:
I can't give away my valuable merch to just anyone
that comes asking for it. I'd go out of business.
jpnChrName: 悪いがタダで渡す訳にはいかないのう？
jpnSearchText: 悪いがタダで渡す訳にはいかないのう？

engChrName: Now, if you were to come to me as a paying customer, it'd be a different story.
engSearchText:
Now, if you were to come to me as a paying
customer, it'd be a different story.
jpnChrName: お前さん達が客として 買い取ってくれるのなら構わんが。
jpnSearchText:
お前さん達が客として
買い取ってくれるのなら構わんが。

engChrName: You still intend to sell it even though you know it's stolen? That's...
engSearchText:
You still intend to sell it even though you know
it's stolen? That's...
jpnChrName: 盗品だと分かっていてもなお、ですか……
jpnSearchText: 盗品だと分かっていてもなお、ですか……

engChrName: Stolen? Why, I have no idea what you're talking about!
engSearchText:
Stolen? Why, I have no idea what you're talking
about!
jpnChrName: 盗品とな？　なんの事かサッパリじゃの～。
jpnSearchText: 盗品とな？　なんの事かサッパリじゃの～。

engChrName: I get how you feel, Agnès, but if we're gonna get that wallet back, we'll have to play by this guy's rules.
engSearchText:
I get how you feel, Agnès, but if we're gonna get that
wallet back, we'll have to play by this guy's rules.
jpnChrName: 納得いかねえ気持ちは分かるが、 ここは爺さんの流儀に従うしかねえな。
jpnSearchText:
納得いかねえ気持ちは分かるが、
ここは爺さんの流儀に従うしかねえな。

engChrName: I knew your boss would get it. In that case, why don't we start talking numbers, hmm?
engSearchText:
I knew your boss would get it. In that case, why don't
we start talking numbers, hmm?
jpnChrName: ほっほっほ、まあそういう事じゃ。 それでは商談に移らせてもらうぞい？
jpnSearchText:
ほっほっほ、まあそういう事じゃ。
それでは商談に移らせてもらうぞい？

engChrName: This wallet of yours is practically new. Whoever its old owner was must've taken good care of it.
engSearchText:
This wallet of yours is practically new. Whoever its
old owner was must've taken good care of it.
jpnChrName: まず、例の財布は丁寧に使われていたようでな。 基本的には新品同様の状態じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
まず、例の財布は丁寧に使われていたようでな。
基本的には新品同様の状態じゃ。

engChrName: With that in mind, I'm willing to offer you a discount. Ten percent off market price. Down from 10,000 mira to 9,000. Seems fair to me.
engSearchText:
With that in mind, I'm willing to offer you
a discount. Ten percent off market price. Down from
10,000 mira to 9,000. Seems fair to me.
jpnChrName: ゆえに、定価の１万ミラの９割の値段── ９千ミラで売らせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
ゆえに、定価の１万ミラの９割の値段──
９千ミラで売らせてもらおう。

engChrName: Nine thousand mira? I don't know...
engSearchText: Nine thousand mira? I don't know...
jpnChrName: ９千ミラですか…………
jpnSearchText: ９千ミラですか…………

engChrName: If you're not happy with the price, you don't gotta take it.
engSearchText:
If you're not happy with the price, you don't gotta
take it.
jpnChrName: ふむ……どうだアニエス。
jpnSearchText: ふむ……どうだアニエス。

engChrName: Try haggling with him. See if you can get him to bite for cheaper. Don't got much to lose.
engSearchText:
Try haggling with him. See if you can get him to bite
for cheaper. Don't got much to lose.
jpnChrName: 爺さんはこう言ってるが、 試しにお前が値段交渉してみるか？
jpnSearchText:
爺さんはこう言ってるが、
試しにお前が値段交渉してみるか？

engChrName: ...Okay, why not? It'll be a good learning experience as well.
engSearchText:
...Okay, why not? It'll be a good learning experience
as well.
jpnChrName: ……はい、新人として勉強させて頂く意味でも やらせて下さい！
jpnSearchText:
……はい、新人として勉強させて頂く意味でも
やらせて下さい！

engChrName: Oho! Going to try your hand at bargaining with me, young lady? Let's see what you bring to the table.
engSearchText:
Oho! Going to try your hand at bargaining with me,
young lady? Let's see what you bring to the table.
jpnChrName: ほっほっほ、可愛いお嬢さん、 一体何をどう交渉するというんじゃ？
jpnSearchText:
ほっほっほ、可愛いお嬢さん、
一体何をどう交渉するというんじゃ？

engChrName: (I know Alicia said she was willing to buy the wallet back if that's what it took.)
engSearchText:
(I know Alicia said she was willing to buy the wallet
back if that's what it took.)
jpnChrName: （アリシアさんは『買い取ってでも』と   言っていましたが……）
jpnSearchText:
（アリシアさんは『買い取ってでも』と
言っていましたが……）

engChrName: (But 9,000 mira for it isn't a fair price, considering everything we know.)
engSearchText:
(But 9,000 mira for it isn't a fair price, considering
everything we know.)
jpnChrName: （あの情報から想像するに これは妥当な金額じゃないはず。）
jpnSearchText:
（あの情報から想像するに
これは妥当な金額じゃないはず。）

engChrName: (I've got to give him a good reason to change his mind!)
engSearchText:
(I've got to give him a good reason to change
his mind!)
jpnChrName: （まずは納得のいかない   根拠を提示しないと……！）
jpnSearchText:
（まずは納得のいかない
根拠を提示しないと……！）

engChrName: That wallet is a precious birthday present our client received from her parents.
engSearchText:
That wallet is a precious birthday present our client
received from her parents.
jpnChrName: そのお財布はアリシアさんの誕生日に贈られた 大事なお財布なんです……！
jpnSearchText:
そのお財布はアリシアさんの誕生日に贈られた
大事なお財布なんです……！

engChrName: Just because we're willing to pay to get it back if we have to doesn't mean that 9,000 mira is a fair asking price!
engSearchText:
Just because we're willing to pay to get it back if we
have to doesn't mean that 9,000 mira is a fair
asking price!
jpnChrName: 百歩譲ってお金を支払うとしても、 定価の９割は高額すぎると思います！
jpnSearchText:
百歩譲ってお金を支払うとしても、
定価の９割は高額すぎると思います！

engChrName: *sigh* It's almost cute how you think that sob story's gonna work on me. I don't see why that's a reason for me to lower my asking price.
engSearchText:
*sigh* It's almost cute how you think that sob story's
gonna work on me. I don't see why that's a reason for
me to lower my asking price.
jpnChrName: はぁ～、情に訴えられても、 それは値引く理由にはならんのう～。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ～、情に訴えられても、
それは値引く理由にはならんのう～。

engChrName: This guy's ruthless, Agnès. If you wanna get anywhere with him, keep it about business. That's the only language he'll talk.
engSearchText:
This guy's ruthless, Agnès. If you wanna get
anywhere with him, keep it about business. That's the
only language he'll talk.
jpnChrName: 相手は血も涙もねえ 悪徳商人だと思った方がいいぞ。
jpnSearchText:
相手は血も涙もねえ
悪徳商人だと思った方がいいぞ。

engChrName: Ruthless, eh? I'll take that as a compliment.
engSearchText: Ruthless, eh? I'll take that as a compliment.
jpnChrName: ほっほっほ、 誉め言葉として受け取っておくわい。
jpnSearchText:
ほっほっほ、
誉め言葉として受け取っておくわい。

engChrName: (Argh, that didn't work. I'll have to come up with another argument...)
engSearchText:
(Argh, that didn't work. I'll have to come up with
another argument...)
jpnChrName: （ううっ……この方法じゃ駄目ですね。   別の切り口を考えないと……）
jpnSearchText:
（ううっ……この方法じゃ駄目ですね。
別の切り口を考えないと……）

engChrName: Knowingly selling stolen merchandise is a major crime.
engSearchText:
Knowingly selling stolen merchandise is a
major crime.
jpnChrName: そもそも盗品だと知りつつ 商売をするのは犯罪行為です。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも盗品だと知りつつ
商売をするのは犯罪行為です。

engChrName: We might be willing to look away and purchase it back, but just a ten percent discount won't cut it. You have to do better than that!
engSearchText:
We might be willing to look away and purchase it
back, but just a ten percent discount won't cut it.
You have to do better than that!
jpnChrName: それに目をつむって買い取るとしても、 定価の９割では納得できません！
jpnSearchText:
それに目をつむって買い取るとしても、
定価の９割では納得できません！

engChrName: Or else what? Are you threatening me, young lady?
engSearchText: Or else what? Are you threatening me, young lady?
jpnChrName: おや？　もしかしてワシ、 脅されてるのかのう？
jpnSearchText:
おや？　もしかしてワシ、
脅されてるのかのう？

engChrName: Being a client of mine is a privilege. I won't let you strong-arm me into a deal.
engSearchText:
Being a client of mine is a privilege. I won't let you
strong-arm me into a deal.
jpnChrName: そんな事を言うなら交渉決裂じゃなぁ～。
jpnSearchText: そんな事を言うなら交渉決裂じゃなぁ～。

engChrName: Hate to break it to you, but he calls the shots here. Better try a different tactic if you wanna get anywhere with this chat.
engSearchText:
Hate to break it to you, but he calls the shots here.
Better try a different tactic if you wanna get anywhere
with this chat.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら、この取引の主導権は爺さんにある。 交渉するなら別のやり方を考えねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら、この取引の主導権は爺さんにある。
交渉するなら別のやり方を考えねえとな。

engChrName: (Argh, that didn't work. I'll have to come up with another argument...)
engSearchText:
(Argh, that didn't work. I'll have to come up with
another argument...)
jpnChrName: （ううっ……この方法じゃ駄目ですね。   別の切り口を考えないと……）
jpnSearchText:
（ううっ……この方法じゃ駄目ですね。
別の切り口を考えないと……）

engChrName: We had a conversation with another vendor before we came here.
engSearchText:
We had a conversation with another vendor before
we came here.
jpnChrName: 例のお財布を取り扱っている 店員さんから聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
例のお財布を取り扱っている
店員さんから聞きました。

engChrName: He told us that specific wallet can be personalized with an engraving.
engSearchText:
He told us that specific wallet can be personalized
with an engraving.
jpnChrName: あれはメッセージを刻印できる 仕様のようですね。
jpnSearchText:
あれはメッセージを刻印できる
仕様のようですね。

engChrName: We know for a fact that our client received the wallet for her twentieth birthday.
engSearchText:
We know for a fact that our client received the wallet
for her twentieth birthday.
jpnChrName: そこで、依頼人のアリシアさんは、 ２０歳のお誕生日に貰ったと言っていました。
jpnSearchText:
そこで、依頼人のアリシアさんは、
２０歳のお誕生日に貰ったと言っていました。

engChrName: It's extremely likely that the wallet has some sort of birthday message engraved on it.
engSearchText:
It's extremely likely that the wallet has some sort of
birthday message engraved on it.
jpnChrName: つまり、お誕生日の記念に 刻印が行われている可能性が高いんです。
jpnSearchText:
つまり、お誕生日の記念に
刻印が行われている可能性が高いんです。

engChrName: Even if it looks new, the engraving alone would dock a lot of its value.
engSearchText:
Even if it looks new, the engraving alone would dock
a lot of its value.
jpnChrName: 新品同様とはいえ、個人的な刻印が されていれば商品価値は下がるはず……
jpnSearchText:
新品同様とはいえ、個人的な刻印が
されていれば商品価値は下がるはず……

engChrName: Before we agree on a price, could you confirm whether or not that's the case?
engSearchText:
Before we agree on a price, could you confirm
whether or not that's the case?
jpnChrName: 値段を決める前に、 実物を確認させてもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText:
値段を決める前に、
実物を確認させてもらえませんか？

engChrName: Ugh, you drive a hard bargain, young lady.
engSearchText: Ugh, you drive a hard bargain, young lady.
jpnChrName: うぐぐっ……痛い所を突くのう。
jpnSearchText: うぐぐっ……痛い所を突くのう。

engChrName: All right, I'll come clean. You're right. The wallet is, in fact, engraved.
engSearchText:
All right, I'll come clean. You're right. The wallet is,
in fact, engraved.
jpnChrName: ……仕方ない、明かしてやろう。 確かに例の財布には刻印がされておった。
jpnSearchText:
……仕方ない、明かしてやろう。
確かに例の財布には刻印がされておった。

engChrName: I don't know whose birthday it was, but the message on it is to that effect.
engSearchText:
I don't know whose birthday it was, but the message
on it is to that effect.
jpnChrName: 誰か知らんが、誕生日を祝うような文章が 施されておったわい。
jpnSearchText:
誰か知らんが、誕生日を祝うような文章が
施されておったわい。

engChrName: That aside, the wallet itself is in pristine condition.
engSearchText: That aside, the wallet itself is in pristine condition.
jpnChrName: しかしのう、財布の状態が良い事は確かじゃ。
jpnSearchText: しかしのう、財布の状態が良い事は確かじゃ。

engChrName: But you've made your point. I'm willing to offer you a thirty percent discount instead. That sounds reasonable, yes?
engSearchText:
But you've made your point. I'm willing to offer you a
thirty percent discount instead. That sounds
reasonable, yes?
jpnChrName: その分を足し引きして、定価の７割！ これが妥当な値段じゃな。
jpnSearchText:
その分を足し引きして、定価の７割！
これが妥当な値段じゃな。

engChrName: No, I don't think it does. I think you can still do better than that.
engSearchText:
No, I don't think it does. I think you can still do
better than that.
jpnChrName: ……いいえ、それでもまだ 正当な金額ではないと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……いいえ、それでもまだ
正当な金額ではないと思います。

engChrName: (We're getting closer to a fair price, but I know he's still trying to take me for a ride.)
engSearchText:
(We're getting closer to a fair price, but I know he's
still trying to take me for a ride.)
jpnChrName: （現実的な値段になって来たと思いますけど、   まだ釣り上げられているはず……）
jpnSearchText:
（現実的な値段になって来たと思いますけど、
まだ釣り上げられているはず……）

engChrName: (If I want to get a good deal on it, it's now or never!)
engSearchText: (If I want to get a good deal on it, it's now or never!)
jpnChrName: （ここは妥当な価格を提示しないと……！）
jpnSearchText: （ここは妥当な価格を提示しないと……！）

engChrName: (Maybe I should just settle for a 30 percent discount if it means Alicia will get her wallet back...)
engSearchText:
(Maybe I should just settle for a 30 percent discount
if it means Alicia will get her wallet back...)
jpnChrName: （やっぱり提示された７割に   応じた方が良いのかな……）
jpnSearchText:
（やっぱり提示された７割に
応じた方が良いのかな……）

engChrName: (No, no! I know that wallet can't be worth so much money!)
engSearchText:
(No, no! I know that wallet can't be worth so
much money!)
jpnChrName: （って、違いますよ……！   商品価値がもう少し下がるのは確かです！）
jpnSearchText:
（って、違いますよ……！
商品価値がもう少し下がるのは確かです！）

engChrName: (Just the engraving could dock its value to about a tenth of the retail price. Maybe I should go for that?)
engSearchText:
(Just the engraving could dock its value to about a
tenth of the retail price. Maybe I should go for that?)
jpnChrName: （刻印がされているなら価値は   定価の１割まで下がるんじゃ……？）
jpnSearchText:
（刻印がされているなら価値は
定価の１割まで下がるんじゃ……？）

engChrName: (No, that's probably too low. It's still in good condition, and it's from a very popular series. In that case...)
engSearchText:
(No, that's probably too low. It's still in good
condition, and it's from a very popular series. In
that case...)
jpnChrName: （って、さすがに安すぎますよね……   仮にも、状態が良い人気シリーズですし。）
jpnSearchText:
（って、さすがに安すぎますよね……
仮にも、状態が良い人気シリーズですし。）

engChrName: We'll give you fifty percent. I think that's a much fairer price.
engSearchText:
We'll give you fifty percent. I think that's a much
fairer price.
jpnChrName: 定価の５割──これが妥当だと思います。
jpnSearchText: 定価の５割──これが妥当だと思います。

engChrName: Oh, do you now? Mind illuminating me?
engSearchText: Oh, do you now? Mind illuminating me?
jpnChrName: ほう……その根拠は？
jpnSearchText: ほう……その根拠は？

engChrName: I can understand why you would insist on limiting the discount to thirty percent when the wallet is from such a popular brand.
engSearchText:
I can understand why you would insist on limiting the
discount to thirty percent when the wallet is from
such a popular brand.
jpnChrName: 仰った通り、定価の７割の値段というのは 人気商品として妥当だと思います。
jpnSearchText:
仰った通り、定価の７割の値段というのは
人気商品として妥当だと思います。

engChrName: But we really can't forget about the birthday message addressed to our client.
engSearchText:
But we really can't forget about the birthday message
addressed to our client.
jpnChrName: でも今回お財布に施されている刻印は アリシアさんの誕生日を祝うメッセージ……
jpnSearchText:
でも今回お財布に施されている刻印は
アリシアさんの誕生日を祝うメッセージ……

engChrName: It'll be hard to find a client willing to buy an item with an engraving addressed to someone else.
engSearchText:
It'll be hard to find a client willing to buy an item
with an engraving addressed to someone else.
jpnChrName: 第三者が財布を使うにあたって、 邪魔になるものです。
jpnSearchText:
第三者が財布を使うにあたって、
邪魔になるものです。

engChrName: If you want to make it an enticing purchase, you'd have to reduce the price one way or the other.
engSearchText:
If you want to make it an enticing purchase, you'd
have to reduce the price one way or the other.
jpnChrName: そんなお財布に付加価値を付ける為には より安価な価格で売る必要があると思います。
jpnSearchText:
そんなお財布に付加価値を付ける為には
より安価な価格で売る必要があると思います。

engChrName: I'm with her on this one.
engSearchText: I'm with her on this one.
jpnChrName: だな……そんな所だろう。
jpnSearchText: だな……そんな所だろう。

engChrName: I'd give it up if I were you. You're just going to make yourself look bad if you keep playing hardball in the face of the facts.
engSearchText:
I'd give it up if I were you. You're just going to make
yourself look bad if you keep playing hardball in the
face of the facts.
jpnChrName: この期に及んで粘ると 商人として見苦しいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
この期に及んで粘ると
商人として見苦しいぜ？

engChrName: Nrgh!
engSearchText: Nrgh!
jpnChrName: うぐぐぐ～～～～っ！
jpnSearchText: うぐぐぐ～～～～っ！

engChrName: *sigh* All right, all right. You win.
engSearchText: *sigh* All right, all right. You win.
jpnChrName: ……はぁ、やれやれ………… 確かにここが引き際か。
jpnSearchText:
……はぁ、やれやれ…………
確かにここが引き際か。

engChrName: A fifty percent discount it is. That'll be 5,000 mira, final offer. Do we have a deal?
engSearchText:
A fifty percent discount it is. That'll be 5,000 mira,
final offer. Do we have a deal?
jpnChrName: 仕方ない、その条件で飲んでやるとしよう。 ５千ミラで手打ちじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
仕方ない、その条件で飲んでやるとしよう。
５千ミラで手打ちじゃ。

engChrName: Yes! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Yes! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: ──！　ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: ──！　ありがとうございます！

engChrName: Damn, good work. Not bad for a rookie.
engSearchText: Damn, good work. Not bad for a rookie.
jpnChrName: へっ、助手見習いにしちゃあ よくやったじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
へっ、助手見習いにしちゃあ
よくやったじゃねえか。

engChrName: Here's your 5,000 mira.
engSearchText: Here's your 5,000 mira.
jpnChrName: ほらよ、５千ミラだ。
jpnSearchText: ほらよ、５千ミラだ。

engChrName: Van took the sum out of the money prepared for the request and handed it to Yimai.
engSearchText:
Van took the sum out of the money prepared for the
request and handed it to Yimai.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは依頼用に用意していた財布から ５千ミラを取り出し、イーマイに渡した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは依頼用に用意していた財布から
５千ミラを取り出し、イーマイに渡した。

engChrName: Looks good to me. Here's the wallet for you two.
engSearchText: Looks good to me. Here's the wallet for you two.
jpnChrName: うむ、確かに…… それでは商品の方を渡してやろう。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、確かに……
それでは商品の方を渡してやろう。

engChrName: A Pintilie memorial wallet! This is it! We did it!
engSearchText: A Pintilie memorial wallet! This is it! We did it!
jpnChrName: 《ピンティリエ》のメモリアルシリーズ…… 間違いなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
《ピンティリエ》のメモリアルシリーズ……
間違いなさそうですね。

engChrName: I was hoping to make more money off of that, but it is what it is.
engSearchText:
I was hoping to make more money off of that, but it
is what it is.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、儲けは少なくなったが致し方ないかのう。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、儲けは少なくなったが致し方ないかのう。

engChrName: With that, I'll be taking my leave. If any of your other clients need something from me, I'd be happy to do business again. Until then!
engSearchText:
With that, I'll be taking my leave. If any of your other
clients need something from me, I'd be happy to do
business again. Until then!
jpnChrName: さてと……それではワシは行かせてもらうぞ。 また入用があったらよろしく頼むぞい～。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……それではワシは行かせてもらうぞ。
また入用があったらよろしく頼むぞい～。

engChrName: Damn, that old man's one tough customer. Give him a rege and he'll take a selge.
engSearchText:
Damn, that old man's one tough customer. Give him
a rege and he'll take a selge.
jpnChrName: ったく……いい歳して食えない爺さんだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ったく……いい歳して食えない爺さんだぜ。

engChrName: Anyway, we got what we were after. Let's get that wallet back to its rightful owner.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we got what we were after. Let's get that
wallet back to its rightful owner.
jpnChrName: さて、それじゃあ早速 依頼人に連絡してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、それじゃあ早速
依頼人に連絡してみるか。

engChrName: Right! I'm just glad this all will have a happy ending.
engSearchText: Right! I'm just glad this all will have a happy ending.
jpnChrName: はい、いい報告が出来そうでよかったです！
jpnSearchText: はい、いい報告が出来そうでよかったです！

engChrName: C'mon, it's just 5,000 mira. You can lend me that much! Call it my wage for helping around the store.
engSearchText:
C'mon, it's just 5,000 mira. You can lend me
that much! Call it my wage for helping around
the store.
jpnChrName: なあ、５０００ミラだけでいいから貸してくれよ！ 少しだけ店手伝ってやっただろ！？
jpnSearchText:
なあ、５０００ミラだけでいいから貸してくれよ！
少しだけ店手伝ってやっただろ！？

engChrName: Ugh, again with that nonsense?
engSearchText: Ugh, again with that nonsense?
jpnChrName: またアンタはそうやって……！
jpnSearchText: またアンタはそうやって……！

engChrName: I wouldn't call 'doing something for a few minutes before flaking out' helping at all!
engSearchText:
I wouldn't call 'doing something for a few minutes
before flaking out' helping at all!
jpnChrName: 手伝ったって言ったって、 ほんの数分だけじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
手伝ったって言ったって、
ほんの数分だけじゃないか！

engChrName: Uhh, sorry to interrupt. I know you're in the middle of somethin', but do you think we could talk?
engSearchText:
Uhh, sorry to interrupt. I know you're in the middle
of somethin', but do you think we could talk?
jpnChrName: ……割り込んじまって悪いが、 少しいいか。
jpnSearchText:
……割り込んじまって悪いが、
少しいいか。

engChrName: Oh. Sorry, Van. Didn't mean for you to see that. What can I do you for?
engSearchText:
Oh. Sorry, Van. Didn't mean for you to see that.
What can I do you for?
jpnChrName: おっと……こっちこそすまないね、 買い物かい？
jpnSearchText:
おっと……こっちこそすまないね、
買い物かい？

engChrName: Back off, asshole! Can't you see me and the old lady are having an important conversation right now?
engSearchText:
Back off, asshole! Can't you see me and the old lady
are having an important conversation right now?
jpnChrName: あん？　今は大事な話をしてんだ！ 悪いけどお客はすっこんでな！
jpnSearchText:
あん？　今は大事な話をしてんだ！
悪いけどお客はすっこんでな！

engChrName: Hey! That's no way to talk to a customer!
engSearchText: Hey! That's no way to talk to a customer!
jpnChrName: こら！　お客さんになんてこと言うんだい！
jpnSearchText: こら！　お客さんになんてこと言うんだい！

engChrName: And what're you gonna do about that?
engSearchText: And what're you gonna do about that?
jpnChrName: ああ？　文句あるってのか！？
jpnSearchText: ああ？　文句あるってのか！？

engChrName: Er, maybe we should try again later?
engSearchText: Er, maybe we should try again later?
jpnChrName: ええと……出直してきた方がいいでしょうか。
jpnSearchText: ええと……出直してきた方がいいでしょうか。

engChrName: *sigh* Just like that, they're back at it.
engSearchText: *sigh* Just like that, they're back at it.
jpnChrName: ああっ、また喧嘩が始まっちゃいました……
jpnSearchText: ああっ、また喧嘩が始まっちゃいました……

engChrName: Sheesh. Give it a few more minutes and they'll rip each other's throat out.
engSearchText:
Sheesh. Give it a few more minutes and they'll rip
each other's throat out.
jpnChrName: また始まっちまったぞ……
jpnSearchText: また始まっちまったぞ……

engChrName: Whoa, chill out, folks. We wanted to talk to Eddy, actually. Can you give us a sec?
engSearchText:
Whoa, chill out, folks. We wanted to talk to
Eddy, actually. Can you give us a sec?
jpnChrName: 待った待った、実はエディに話があってな。 少しだけ話を聞かせてもらえねえか？
jpnSearchText:
待った待った、実はエディに話があってな。
少しだけ話を聞かせてもらえねえか？

engChrName: What? Me? What do you want?
engSearchText: What? Me? What do you want?
jpnChrName: えっ、オレ……？ 何の用だってんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
えっ、オレ……？
何の用だってんだよ。

engChrName: If it's him you're after, take your conversation outside. He'll scare away business if he's inside much longer.
engSearchText:
If it's him you're after, take your conversation outside.
He'll scare away business if he's inside much longer.
jpnChrName: それなら店の外に連れ出しておくれ。 仕事の邪魔ったらありゃしないからね！
jpnSearchText:
それなら店の外に連れ出しておくれ。
仕事の邪魔ったらありゃしないからね！

engChrName: I've seen you guys around the shop before. What do you want?
engSearchText:
I've seen you guys around the shop before. What do
you want?
jpnChrName: で？　話って何なんだよ。 アンタ達、たまにウチの店に買いにくる客だよな。
jpnSearchText:
で？　話って何なんだよ。
アンタ達、たまにウチの店に買いにくる客だよな。

engChrName: This is strictly business. We're investigating somethin' for a client.
engSearchText:
This is strictly business. We're investigating
somethin' for a client.
jpnChrName: ああ、雑貨店にはいつも世話になってるが、 今は仕事で聞き込みをして回ってる所なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、雑貨店にはいつも世話になってるが、
今は仕事で聞き込みをして回ってる所なんだ。

engChrName: What can you tell us about a guy named Mark? Rolls in the same gang as you, right? Desire.
engSearchText:
What can you tell us about a guy named Mark?
