Rolls in the same gang as you, right? Desire.
jpnChrName: アンタの所属してるチーム──《ディザイア》に 所属してるマルクについて聞かせてくれねえか。
jpnSearchText:
アンタの所属してるチーム──《ディザイア》に
所属してるマルクについて聞かせてくれねえか。

engChrName: That guy? Why should I tell you anything? I don't owe you people!
engSearchText:
That guy? Why should I tell you anything? I don't
owe you people!
jpnChrName: ああん？　どうしてオレが アンタ達に教えてやんなきゃならねえんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
ああん？　どうしてオレが
アンタ達に教えてやんなきゃならねえんだよ！

engChrName: Please, you should really reconsider.
engSearchText: Please, you should really reconsider.
jpnChrName: お願いします、そこを何とか……
jpnSearchText: お願いします、そこを何とか……

engChrName: We were hired by Mark's girlfriend.
engSearchText: We were hired by Mark's girlfriend.
jpnChrName: 私達の依頼主は マルクさんの彼女の方なんです。
jpnSearchText:
私達の依頼主は
マルクさんの彼女の方なんです。

engChrName: She was worried because she hasn't been able to contact him. We're looking into things for her.
engSearchText:
She was worried because she hasn't been able to
contact him. We're looking into things for her.
jpnChrName: 連絡がつかない彼の事を心配して、 情報収集を頼まれているんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
連絡がつかない彼の事を心配して、
情報収集を頼まれているんですよ。

engChrName: We're asking around for Mark's girlfriend.
engSearchText: We're asking around for Mark's girlfriend.
jpnChrName: わたし達の依頼主は マルクさんの彼女さんなんです。
jpnSearchText:
わたし達の依頼主は
マルクさんの彼女さんなんです。

engChrName: She hasn't heard from him in a while and she's really worried. Could you please help?
engSearchText:
She hasn't heard from him in a while and she's
really worried. Could you please help?
jpnChrName: 連絡が付かない事をとても心配しているので、 協力してもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText:
連絡が付かない事をとても心配しているので、
協力してもらえませんか？

engChrName: It's not just anyone asking. Dude's girlfriend wants to know.
engSearchText:
It's not just anyone asking. Dude's girlfriend wants
to know.
jpnChrName: オレ達の依頼主はマルクの彼女なんだよ。
jpnSearchText: オレ達の依頼主はマルクの彼女なんだよ。

engChrName: Lady's been real worried she can't get in touch with him, so she contacted us.
engSearchText:
Lady's been real worried she can't get in touch with
him, so she contacted us.
jpnChrName: 彼氏と連絡が付かねえモンだから 心配して依頼を出してきやがってな。
jpnSearchText:
彼氏と連絡が付かねえモンだから
心配して依頼を出してきやがってな。

engChrName: Oh, so that's what's going on? All right.
engSearchText: Oh, so that's what's going on? All right.
jpnChrName: そ、そうなのか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなのか……

engChrName: I can see why you'd wanna put her mind at ease. It'd suck if they bumped into each other one day and she had no idea what's been going on.
engSearchText:
I can see why you'd wanna put her mind at ease.
It'd suck if they bumped into each other one day and
she had no idea what's been going on.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ、そいつは安心させてやりてえよな…… ２人がすれ違っちまったら可哀想だしよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ、そいつは安心させてやりてえよな……
２人がすれ違っちまったら可哀想だしよ。

engChrName: ...You just wanna talk, yeah? Nothing more?
engSearchText: ...You just wanna talk, yeah? Nothing more?
jpnChrName: ……で？ マルクの話をすりゃいいんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
……で？
マルクの話をすりゃいいんだったか？

engChrName: (That wasn't hard.)
engSearchText: (That wasn't hard.)
jpnChrName: （チョロすぎんだろ……）
jpnSearchText: （チョロすぎんだろ……）

engChrName: Yeah, that's all we need. Whatever you know. Anything helps.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that's all we need. Whatever you know.
Anything helps.
jpnChrName: ああ、知ってる事があれば教えてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、知ってる事があれば教えてくれ。

engChrName: Well, I don't got much for ya.
engSearchText: Well, I don't got much for ya.
jpnChrName: おう……しかし、そうは言ってもなぁ。
jpnSearchText: おう……しかし、そうは言ってもなぁ。

engChrName: Mark asked to be cut loose from the gang a while back. They let him go.
engSearchText:
Mark asked to be cut loose from the gang a
while back. They let him go.
jpnChrName: マルクがチームの脱退を願い出た後……
jpnSearchText: マルクがチームの脱退を願い出た後……

engChrName: Haven't heard much from 'im since. Been quiet.
engSearchText: Haven't heard much from 'im since. Been quiet.
jpnChrName: それも無事に叶ってるし、 特に問題はなかったはずなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
それも無事に叶ってるし、
特に問題はなかったはずなんだが。

engChrName: Wait. You're saying he's already out of the gang?
engSearchText: Wait. You're saying he's already out of the gang?
jpnChrName: マルクさんは既に チームを抜けているんですか？
jpnSearchText:
マルクさんは既に
チームを抜けているんですか？

engChrName: Then, he's out of the gang already?
engSearchText: Then, he's out of the gang already?
jpnChrName: マルクさんは既に チームを抜けているんですか？
jpnSearchText:
マルクさんは既に
チームを抜けているんですか？

engChrName: So he's not running with you guys anymore?
engSearchText: So he's not running with you guys anymore?
jpnChrName: マルクはもうチームを抜けてんのかよ？
jpnSearchText: マルクはもうチームを抜けてんのかよ？

engChrName: That's right. And I don't think it was out of the blue or nothing. They'd apparently been thinkin' about it for a while.
engSearchText:
That's right. And I don't think it was out of the blue
or nothing. They'd apparently been thinkin' about it
for a while.
jpnChrName: ああ、脱退の話は結構前から 持ち上がってたみたいなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、脱退の話は結構前から
持ち上がってたみたいなんだが……

engChrName: About a month ago, our boss agreed to let him go. On one condition.
engSearchText:
About a month ago, our boss agreed to let him go.
On one condition.
jpnChrName: １か月ほど前に、ようやくリーダーから 交換条件付きでＯＫを貰えたみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
１か月ほど前に、ようやくリーダーから
交換条件付きでＯＫを貰えたみたいだな。

engChrName: All right, we're getting somewhere. What condition?
engSearchText: All right, we're getting somewhere. What condition?
jpnChrName: へえ、その交換条件ってのは何なんだ？
jpnSearchText: へえ、その交換条件ってのは何なんだ？

engChrName: As I hear it, we'd just gotten a big job from Almata.
engSearchText: As I hear it, we'd just gotten a big job from Almata.
jpnChrName: 確か……《アルマータ》から頼まれた デカい仕事を任されたとか聞いたぞ。
jpnSearchText:
確か……《アルマータ》から頼まれた
デカい仕事を任されたとか聞いたぞ。

engChrName: They had some beef with this other group that's been hiring jaegers or somethin'.
engSearchText:
They had some beef with this other group that's been
hiring jaegers or somethin'.
jpnChrName: なんでも、《Ａ》を鬱陶しく思ってる勢力が 猟兵を送り込んでるらしくてよ。
jpnSearchText:
なんでも、《Ａ》を鬱陶しく思ってる勢力が
猟兵を送り込んでるらしくてよ。

engChrName: Mark was supposed to infiltrate their base and get some intel on 'em.
engSearchText:
Mark was supposed to infiltrate their base and get
some intel on 'em.
jpnChrName: そいつらの先兵の情報を探るために、アジトに カチコミを仕掛けるっつうモンだったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
そいつらの先兵の情報を探るために、アジトに
カチコミを仕掛けるっつうモンだったらしい。

engChrName: That...sounds really dangerous. He could get caught by the jaegers.
engSearchText:
That...sounds really dangerous. He could get caught
by the jaegers.
jpnChrName: そんな……もし猟兵に見つかったら 無事ではいられませんよね……
jpnSearchText:
そんな……もし猟兵に見つかったら
無事ではいられませんよね……

engChrName: Did... Did they actually just send in a single scout on an infiltration and recon job?
engSearchText:
Did... Did they actually just send in a single scout on
an infiltration and recon job?
jpnChrName: えと……つまりは偵察兵が 単身で索敵に向かったようなものですか？
jpnSearchText:
えと……つまりは偵察兵が
単身で索敵に向かったようなものですか？

engChrName: Uh, yeah, I guess? Somethin' along those lines.
engSearchText: Uh, yeah, I guess? Somethin' along those lines.
jpnChrName: お、おう……？ 多分そんな感じだと思うぜ……
jpnSearchText:
お、おう……？
多分そんな感じだと思うぜ……

engChrName: Give me a break. That's not the sort of shit you put an amateur up to.
engSearchText:
Give me a break. That's not the sort of shit you put
an amateur up to.
jpnChrName: ……んな猟兵じみた芸当が 素人にできる訳ねえだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
……んな猟兵じみた芸当が
素人にできる訳ねえだろうが。

engChrName: Not the kinda gig you'd expect to make it back alive from, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Not the kinda gig you'd expect to make it back alive
from, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: 生きて返す気はねえって感じの仕事だが……
jpnSearchText: 生きて返す気はねえって感じの仕事だが……

engChrName: But he's out now, so somethin' must've gone right, yeah? That what you heard?
engSearchText:
But he's out now, so somethin' must've gone
right, yeah? That what you heard?
jpnChrName: だが、ヤツは無事に脱退したんだったよな。 その仕事をやり遂げたっていうのか。
jpnSearchText:
だが、ヤツは無事に脱退したんだったよな。
その仕事をやり遂げたっていうのか。

engChrName: Something like that. Looks like the crazy bastard pulled it off.
engSearchText:
Something like that. Looks like the crazy bastard
pulled it off.
jpnChrName: ああ、そう聞いてるぜ。 随分と大変そうだったけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そう聞いてるぜ。
随分と大変そうだったけどな。

engChrName: Can't imagine shit was easy, though. The jaegers are in Baume, and that's a long ways away.
engSearchText:
Can't imagine shit was easy, though. The jaegers are
in Baume, and that's a long ways away.
jpnChrName: 猟兵がいるボーメ市に向かうだけでも 結構な距離があるはずだしな。
jpnSearchText:
猟兵がいるボーメ市に向かうだけでも
結構な距離があるはずだしな。

engChrName: Baume?
engSearchText: Baume?
jpnChrName: ボーメ市だと？
jpnSearchText: ボーメ市だと？

engChrName: It also came up when we visited the gun shop earlier.
engSearchText: It also came up when we visited the gun shop earlier.
jpnChrName: ガンショップでも 似たような話を聞きましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
ガンショップでも
似たような話を聞きましたけど。

engChrName: Pieces keep clicking into place...
engSearchText: Pieces keep clicking into place...
jpnChrName: まさか、そう繋がってくるんでしょうか……
jpnSearchText: まさか、そう繋がってくるんでしょうか……

engChrName: I think I remember hearing that name back at the gun shop.
engSearchText:
I think I remember hearing that name back at the
gun shop.
jpnChrName: ガンショップでも 似たような話を聞きましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
ガンショップでも
似たような話を聞きましたけど……

engChrName: This is getting really complicated...
engSearchText: This is getting really complicated...
jpnChrName: むむ……何だか、 難しい話になって来ましたね。
jpnSearchText:
むむ……何だか、
難しい話になって来ましたね。

engChrName: That chick at the gun shop mentioned that place, too.
engSearchText: That chick at the gun shop mentioned that place, too.
jpnChrName: ガンショップでも 似たような話を聞いたが……
jpnSearchText:
ガンショップでも
似たような話を聞いたが……

engChrName: So this is all related?
engSearchText: So this is all related?
jpnChrName: まさか、そう繋がってきやがるのか？
jpnSearchText: まさか、そう繋がってきやがるのか？

engChrName: We ain't sure yet. We got no hard evidence on it.
engSearchText: We ain't sure yet. We got no hard evidence on it.
jpnChrName: ああ…… とはいえまだ確証は得られねえって所か。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
とはいえまだ確証は得られねえって所か。

engChrName: While you're here, can you think of anyone else that might know what's goin' on with Mark?
engSearchText:
While you're here, can you think of anyone else that
might know what's goin' on with Mark?
jpnChrName: ちなみに、他にマルクについて 知ってそうなヤツはいねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、他にマルクについて
知ってそうなヤツはいねえのか？

engChrName: Yeah, I know a guy. Mark always talked about this childhood friend of his. Name's Simon, I think.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I know a guy. Mark always talked about this
childhood friend of his. Name's Simon, I think.
jpnChrName: そうだな……確かサイモンっつう 幼馴染がいるとか言ってたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……確かサイモンっつう
幼馴染がいるとか言ってたぜ。

engChrName: If I'm remembering correctly, he said Simon's the basketball team captain over at Seiden.
engSearchText:
If I'm remembering correctly, he said Simon's the
basketball team captain over at Seiden.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区のバスケチームで リーダーをやってるヤツだとかなんとか。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区のバスケチームで
リーダーをやってるヤツだとかなんとか。

engChrName: (Must be nice having a cool friend like that.)
engSearchText: (Must be nice having a cool friend like that.)
jpnChrName: （いいよなぁ、格好いい仲間がいてさ……）
jpnSearchText: （いいよなぁ、格好いい仲間がいてさ……）

engChrName: (I'm gonna pull off something real badass one of these days and then all the senior members will finally want to hang out with me!)
engSearchText:
(I'm gonna pull off something real badass one of
these days and then all the senior members will finally
want to hang out with me!)
jpnChrName: （オレだっていつかチームの役に立って、   イケてる先輩たちと仲良くなるんだ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（オレだっていつかチームの役に立って、
イケてる先輩たちと仲良くなるんだ……！）

engChrName: Then our next stop's the Seiden District. Thanks for that. Owe you one.
engSearchText:
Then our next stop's the Seiden District. Thanks
for that. Owe you one.
jpnChrName: それじゃ俺達はサイデン地区に向かうか。 情報提供、助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ俺達はサイデン地区に向かうか。
情報提供、助かったぜ。

engChrName: Yeah, whatever. Don't go wastin' that info, okay?
engSearchText: Yeah, whatever. Don't go wastin' that info, okay?
jpnChrName: ああ、折角教えてやったんだから 無駄にすんなよな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、折角教えてやったんだから
無駄にすんなよな。

engChrName: Hey, there. You folks look pretty glum. What's going on?
engSearchText:
Hey, there. You folks look pretty glum. What's
going on?
jpnChrName: おや、揃いも揃って神妙な顔をしているが 一体どうしたんじゃ？
jpnSearchText:
おや、揃いも揃って神妙な顔をしているが
一体どうしたんじゃ？

engChrName: We're in the middle of investigatin' a politician for a job. You see...
engSearchText:
We're in the middle of investigatin' a politician for
a job. You see...
jpnChrName: ウチで請け負った依頼の事なんだが、 ある政治家の事を調べてる最中でな……
jpnSearchText:
ウチで請け負った依頼の事なんだが、
ある政治家の事を調べてる最中でな……

engChrName: Now I understand. You've left no stone unturned, eh? You've dug up a lot of stuff meant to stay buried.
engSearchText:
Now I understand. You've left no stone unturned, eh?
You've dug up a lot of stuff meant to stay buried.
jpnChrName: なるほどのう……世間には伏せられているのに よくそこまで調べが付いたものじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどのう……世間には伏せられているのに
よくそこまで調べが付いたものじゃ。

engChrName: Anyway, yes. Taylor and I were good friends.
engSearchText: Anyway, yes. Taylor and I were good friends.
jpnChrName: ああ、確かにワシはテイラー君とは 親しい仲じゃったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、確かにワシはテイラー君とは
親しい仲じゃったよ。

engChrName: We'd debate about all sorts of things over drinks. Like policies to diminish racial disparity and such.
engSearchText:
We'd debate about all sorts of things over drinks.
Like policies to diminish racial disparity and such.
jpnChrName: 民族融和に向けた政策についても 酒を飲みながら議論したもんじゃった。
jpnSearchText:
民族融和に向けた政策についても
酒を飲みながら議論したもんじゃった。

engChrName: (I've always wondered what this man gets up to here. Now I'm even more curious...)
engSearchText:
(I've always wondered what this man gets up to here.
Now I'm even more curious...)
jpnChrName: （前から気になってましたけど、   普段何をしてらっしゃる方なんでしょうか……）
jpnSearchText:
（前から気になってましたけど、
普段何をしてらっしゃる方なんでしょうか……）

engChrName: Wow. That's pretty surprising.
engSearchText: Wow. That's pretty surprising.
jpnChrName: ええっ！　なんだか意外です。
jpnSearchText: ええっ！　なんだか意外です。

engChrName: No kidding? Here I thought all you did was sweat it at the sauna.
engSearchText:
No kidding? Here I thought all you did was sweat
it at the sauna.
jpnChrName: へぇ、アンタもただの ロウリュ好きの爺さんって訳じゃなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、アンタもただの
ロウリュ好きの爺さんって訳じゃなさそうだな。

engChrName: That's 'cause Huck manages a well-established investment firm.
engSearchText:
That's 'cause Huck manages a well-established
investment firm.
jpnChrName: こう見えても老舗投資会社の経営者だからな、 ハック爺さんは。
jpnSearchText:
こう見えても老舗投資会社の経営者だからな、
ハック爺さんは。

engChrName: People like that always have connections with the top brass calling.
engSearchText:
People like that always have connections with the top
brass calling.
jpnChrName: 政治家とコネクションがあったとしても 何ら不思議はねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
政治家とコネクションがあったとしても
何ら不思議はねえよ。

engChrName: Oh, that makes sense!
engSearchText: Oh, that makes sense!
jpnChrName: なるほど、そうだったんですね……！
jpnSearchText: なるほど、そうだったんですね……！

engChrName: I just assumed you were some random sauna fan. That's amazing!
engSearchText:
I just assumed you were some random sauna fan.
That's amazing!
jpnChrName: ただのロウリュ好きの人かと思ってましたけど、 すごい人でした……！
jpnSearchText:
ただのロウリュ好きの人かと思ってましたけど、
すごい人でした……！

engChrName: Goes to show you really can't judge a book by its cover.
engSearchText:
Goes to show you really can't judge a book by
its cover.
jpnChrName: 人は見かけによらねえモンだな。
jpnSearchText: 人は見かけによらねえモンだな。

engChrName: Haha, that's okay. I'd rather it stay like that. I prefer how people treat me when they don't know.
engSearchText:
Haha, that's okay. I'd rather it stay like that. I prefer
how people treat me when they don't know.
jpnChrName: ほほ、だからといって かしこまる必要はないからのう？
jpnSearchText:
ほほ、だからといって
かしこまる必要はないからのう？

engChrName: Back on track. This guy's son is still alive, yeah? You got any idea where he went?
engSearchText:
Back on track. This guy's son is still alive, yeah?
You got any idea where he went?
jpnChrName: それで、生き延びた息子の行方については 何か知ってるか？
jpnSearchText:
それで、生き延びた息子の行方については
何か知ってるか？

engChrName: That I do. His name is Roderick.
engSearchText: That I do. His name is Roderick.
jpnChrName: ああ、名前はロデリック君というんじゃよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、名前はロデリック君というんじゃよ。

engChrName: After the attack, I believe he went to live with some relatives in Altair.
engSearchText:
After the attack, I believe he went to live with some
relatives in Altair.
jpnChrName: あの事件の後はアルタイル市の 親戚の元で暮らしておったはずじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
あの事件の後はアルタイル市の
親戚の元で暮らしておったはずじゃ。

engChrName: As for what he's up to these days, I have no clue.
engSearchText: As for what he's up to these days, I have no clue.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、今どこで何をしているのかまでは ワシも知らないんじゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、今どこで何をしているのかまでは
ワシも知らないんじゃよ。

engChrName: Got'cha. Back to lookin' for someone who does, then.
engSearchText: Got'cha. Back to lookin' for someone who does, then.
jpnChrName: そうか……その辺りに詳しいヤツを 探すしかねえって事か。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……その辺りに詳しいヤツを
探すしかねえって事か。

engChrName: Actually, one more question while I still got you here. Do you know what happened to the culprit?
engSearchText:
Actually, one more question while I still got you here.
Do you know what happened to the culprit?
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに聞きたいんだが、 その事件の犯人はどうなったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみに聞きたいんだが、
その事件の犯人はどうなったんだ？

engChrName: Culprits, actually, but I do. There were two of them. They went on the run after the fact but got caught sometime later.
engSearchText:
Culprits, actually, but I do. There were two of them.
They went on the run after the fact but got caught
sometime later.
jpnChrName: 犯人の二人組は逃亡したが、 のちに逮捕されておる。
jpnSearchText:
犯人の二人組は逃亡したが、
のちに逮捕されておる。

engChrName: Their testimony suggested that there had been some friction for a while.
engSearchText:
Their testimony suggested that there had been some
friction for a while.
jpnChrName: 『何者かの邪魔が入ったせいで子供を見逃した、 他の仲間が作戦を漏らしたのではないか』──
jpnSearchText:
『何者かの邪魔が入ったせいで子供を見逃した、
他の仲間が作戦を漏らしたのではないか』──

engChrName: They mentioned something about an intruder letting the kid get away, and that they thought someone was selling them out.
engSearchText:
They mentioned something about an intruder letting
the kid get away, and that they thought someone was
selling them out.
jpnChrName: などと、内輪揉めのような証言をしておったよ。
jpnSearchText: などと、内輪揉めのような証言をしておったよ。

engChrName: From what I understand, Roderick's own recollection of what happened is pretty hazy.
engSearchText:
From what I understand, Roderick's own recollection
of what happened is pretty hazy.
jpnChrName: ちなみにロデリックの方も記憶が混乱していて 当時の事はよく憶えていないようじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにロデリックの方も記憶が混乱していて
当時の事はよく憶えていないようじゃ。

engChrName: I'm curious about this intruder letting the kid escape.
engSearchText: I'm curious about this intruder letting the kid escape.
jpnChrName: 『何者かの邪魔が入ったせいで子供を見逃した』 ……ってのは気になる話だな。
jpnSearchText:
『何者かの邪魔が入ったせいで子供を見逃した』
……ってのは気になる話だな。

engChrName: If you're right, that's nothing short of a miracle.
engSearchText: If you're right, that's nothing short of a miracle.
jpnChrName: ですが、そのおかげでお子さんが 助かったのなら不幸中の幸いでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、そのおかげでお子さんが
助かったのなら不幸中の幸いでしたね。

engChrName: Then maybe...
engSearchText: Then maybe...
jpnChrName: というか、もしかして……？
jpnSearchText: というか、もしかして……？

engChrName: Wow. At least he made it out alive, so that's good.
engSearchText: Wow. At least he made it out alive, so that's good.
jpnChrName: でも、そのおかげでお子さんが 助かったのなら不幸中の幸いでしたね！
jpnSearchText:
でも、そのおかげでお子さんが
助かったのなら不幸中の幸いでしたね！

engChrName: If he did, then...
engSearchText: If he did, then...
jpnChrName: というか、もしかして……？
jpnSearchText: というか、もしかして……？

engChrName: An intruder? That's interesting. I think I can see the bigger picture now.
engSearchText:
An intruder? That's interesting. I think I can see the
bigger picture now.
jpnChrName: 何者かねえ……なんとなく 全容が見えて来そうなモンだが。
jpnSearchText:
何者かねえ……なんとなく
全容が見えて来そうなモンだが。

engChrName: Oh, now that I think about it, I might know somebody who'd have an idea about Roderick's whereabouts these days.
engSearchText:
Oh, now that I think about it, I might know
somebody who'd have an idea about Roderick's
whereabouts these days.
jpnChrName: ああそれと、今のロデリックの居場所を 知っていそうなヤツに心当たりがあるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああそれと、今のロデリックの居場所を
知っていそうなヤツに心当たりがあるぞ。

engChrName: You should talk to the editor-in-chief of the Tyrell Times. She was all over that whole case back in the day.
engSearchText:
You should talk to the editor-in-chief of the
Tyrell Times. She was all over that whole case back
in the day.
jpnChrName: タイレル通信の編集長でな。 あの事件をしつこく追っていたんじゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル通信の編集長でな。
あの事件をしつこく追っていたんじゃよ。

engChrName: With any luck, she might still be keeping up with it. Wouldn't hurt to ask, at the very least.
engSearchText:
With any luck, she might still be keeping up with it.
Wouldn't hurt to ask, at the very least.
jpnChrName: もしかしたら最近の事も知っているかもしれん。 話を聞きに行ってみるとよかろうて。
jpnSearchText:
もしかしたら最近の事も知っているかもしれん。
話を聞きに行ってみるとよかろうて。

engChrName: Good to know. Hopefully will save us the trouble of sniffin' out the info ourselves. Thanks, Huck. Owe you one.
engSearchText:
Good to know. Hopefully will save us the trouble of
sniffin' out the info ourselves. Thanks, Huck.
Owe you one.
jpnChrName: そいつは助かるぜ、教えてくれてありがとよ。
jpnSearchText: そいつは助かるぜ、教えてくれてありがとよ。

engChrName: Heh, I won't say no to gratuity! I think some milk gelato will do just fine as thanks after a long soak.
engSearchText:
Heh, I won't say no to gratuity! I think some milk
gelato will do just fine as thanks after a long soak.
jpnChrName: なに、お礼は風呂上がりの ミルクジェラート１個で構わんからのう！
jpnSearchText:
なに、お礼は風呂上がりの
ミルクジェラート１個で構わんからのう！

engChrName: Sure thing. I'll remember to hook you up with some later.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. I'll remember to hook you up with
some later.
jpnChrName: あいよ、憶えとくぜ。
jpnSearchText: あいよ、憶えとくぜ。

engChrName: I suppose our next destination is the Tyrell Times, then.
engSearchText:
I suppose our next destination is the Tyrell
Times, then.
jpnChrName: それではタイレル通信に向かいましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それではタイレル通信に向かいましょうか。

engChrName: Well, what're we waiting for? Let's head to the Tyrell Times!
engSearchText:
Well, what're we waiting for? Let's head to the
Tyrell Times!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ次はタイレル通信に向かいましょう！
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ次はタイレル通信に向かいましょう！

engChrName: Guess the next stop on this involuntary city tour is Tyrell Times, then. Ugh, this gig's been a big pain in the ass.
engSearchText:
Guess the next stop on this involuntary city tour is
Tyrell Times, then. Ugh, this gig's been a big pain in
the ass.
jpnChrName: それじゃ次はタイレル通信か。 聞き込みってのも骨が折れんな……
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ次はタイレル通信か。
聞き込みってのも骨が折れんな……

engChrName: Hey, Brenda. I'm dropping by 'cause of a job.
engSearchText: Hey, Brenda. I'm dropping by 'cause of a job.
jpnChrName: よう、今日は解決屋として ちょいと聞きてえ事があるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
よう、今日は解決屋として
ちょいと聞きてえ事があるんだが。

engChrName: I wanted to ask about your son. Mind telling us what your kid's been up to lately?
engSearchText:
I wanted to ask about your son. Mind telling us what
your kid's been up to lately?
jpnChrName: アンタの息子──エディの 最近の様子について教えてもらえねえか？
jpnSearchText:
アンタの息子──エディの
最近の様子について教えてもらえねえか？

engChrName: Oh, Aidios. Should I be worried? Did that boy of mine do something?!
engSearchText:
Oh, Aidios. Should I be worried? Did that boy of
mine do something?!
jpnChrName: もしかして…… エディが何かやらかしたのかい！？
jpnSearchText:
もしかして……
エディが何かやらかしたのかい！？

engChrName: No, no. Nothing to be alarmed about! We're looking into something and we thought to ask him a few questions.
engSearchText:
No, no. Nothing to be alarmed about! We're looking
into something and we thought to ask him a
few questions.
jpnChrName: いえ、そういう訳では…… ただ少し調べたい事があるんです。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、そういう訳では……
ただ少し調べたい事があるんです。

engChrName: How has he been doing lately? Feel free to go into as much detail as you can, please.
engSearchText:
How has he been doing lately? Feel free to go into as
much detail as you can, please.
jpnChrName: 何でもいいので、最近のエディさんの 様子について教えて頂けませんか？
jpnSearchText:
何でもいいので、最近のエディさんの
様子について教えて頂けませんか？

engChrName: That's a relief. Or as much as can be, really. I get no end of stress when it comes to that boy.
engSearchText:
That's a relief. Or as much as can be, really. I get no
end of stress when it comes to that boy.
jpnChrName: そうかい……とはいえ今のあの子の 様子じゃ安心はできないけどね。
jpnSearchText:
そうかい……とはいえ今のあの子の
様子じゃ安心はできないけどね。

engChrName: As for how he's been lately... Something does come to mind.
engSearchText:
As for how he's been lately... Something does come
to mind.
jpnChrName: あの子の最近の様子というと…… ああ、あれがあったか。
jpnSearchText:
あの子の最近の様子というと……
ああ、あれがあったか。

engChrName: He usually doesn't have a single mira to his name and will constantly demand I lend him some, but he looks like he's doing well lately.
engSearchText:
He usually doesn't have a single mira to his name and
will constantly demand I lend him some, but he looks
like he's doing well lately.
jpnChrName: 普段はミラをせびってくるくせに、 最近は羽振りが良くなったみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
普段はミラをせびってくるくせに、
最近は羽振りが良くなったみたいでね。

engChrName: Actually, he even said he'd finally pay me back all he owed.
engSearchText:
Actually, he even said he'd finally pay me back all
he owed.
jpnChrName: むしろ、近々まとまった金額を返せる かもしれない──なんて言って来たんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ、近々まとまった金額を返せる
かもしれない──なんて言って来たんだよ。

engChrName: That's good news, isn't it? You don't sound excited.
engSearchText: That's good news, isn't it? You don't sound excited.
jpnChrName: それだけ聞くと、 そんなに悪い話じゃなさそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
それだけ聞くと、
そんなに悪い話じゃなさそうですけど……

engChrName: Dude could be doing a whole lot worse, but you don't look too happy about it.
engSearchText:
Dude could be doing a whole lot worse, but you don't
look too happy about it.
jpnChrName: それだけ聞く分には 悪い話じゃなさそうだがな。
jpnSearchText:
それだけ聞く分には
悪い話じゃなさそうだがな。

engChrName: I know for a fact that boy doesn't have a job. Not even a part time one.
engSearchText:
I know for a fact that boy doesn't have a job.
Not even a part time one.
jpnChrName: 問題なのはあの子がバイトを してる訳じゃないって事さ。
jpnSearchText:
問題なのはあの子がバイトを
してる訳じゃないって事さ。

engChrName: The money he's been getting is coming from that gang he's a part of.
engSearchText:
The money he's been getting is coming from that
gang he's a part of.
jpnChrName: どうも、所属してるチームから 報酬としてミラを貰ってるみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
どうも、所属してるチームから
報酬としてミラを貰ってるみたいだね。

engChrName: And if that's not enough, they said they might promote him if he did good with his current job, if you can believe it.
engSearchText:
And if that's not enough, they said they might
promote him if he did good with his current job, if
you can believe it.
jpnChrName: それに、今抱えてる案件が上手くいけば 幹部になれるかも──とも言ってたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
それに、今抱えてる案件が上手くいけば
幹部になれるかも──とも言ってたんだよ。

engChrName: I think he mentioned it having to do with helping this girl he'd met, but I didn't really get it.
engSearchText:
I think he mentioned it having to do with helping
this girl he'd met, but I didn't really get it.
jpnChrName: しかもその案件で、女の子を救ってあげられる かもしれないとか何とか。
jpnSearchText:
しかもその案件で、女の子を救ってあげられる
かもしれないとか何とか。

engChrName: The plot thickens. Must be some big shit he's up to if they're offering him authority.
engSearchText:
The plot thickens. Must be some big shit he's up to if
they're offering him authority.
jpnChrName: ほう、幹部と来たか…… ヤツはそれだけデカい案件を抱えてる訳だな。
jpnSearchText:
ほう、幹部と来たか……
ヤツはそれだけデカい案件を抱えてる訳だな。

engChrName: There's also the matter of the girl in question.
engSearchText: There's also the matter of the girl in question.
jpnChrName: それに女の子というと……
jpnSearchText: それに女の子というと……

engChrName: At this point, I believe we can more or less piece together what his task entails.
engSearchText:
At this point, I believe we can more or less piece
together what his task entails.
jpnChrName: その案件というものの内容に 多少は想像が付きそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
その案件というものの内容に
多少は想像が付きそうですね。

engChrName: *sigh* So Eddy's really up to something dangerous, isn't he? That stupid son of mine...
engSearchText:
*sigh* So Eddy's really up to something dangerous,
isn't he? That stupid son of mine...
jpnChrName: もしもエディがまた馬鹿な事を やらかそうとしてるなら……
jpnSearchText:
もしもエディがまた馬鹿な事を
やらかそうとしてるなら……

engChrName: Could you please lend him a hand? Despite everything, I'm still his mother and would hate to see him hurt.
engSearchText:
Could you please lend him a hand?
Despite everything, I'm still his mother and would
hate to see him hurt.
jpnChrName: アンタ達が止めてやってくれないかい？ どうか息子を頼むよ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタ達が止めてやってくれないかい？
どうか息子を頼むよ。

engChrName: Don't even need to ask. Neighbors gotta look out for each other.
engSearchText:
Don't even need to ask. Neighbors gotta look out for
each other.
jpnChrName: ああ、任せとけ。 近所のよしみで気にかけといてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、任せとけ。
近所のよしみで気にかけといてやるよ。

engChrName: *sigh* I'm glad we're finally done talking to Brenda. That was a lot.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm glad we're finally done talking to Brenda.
That was a lot.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……これでブレンダさんへの 聞き込みも終わりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……これでブレンダさんへの
聞き込みも終わりましたね。

engChrName: We have everything we need to report back to Mr. Rumsfeld now, don't we?
engSearchText:
We have everything we need to report back to Mr.
Rumsfeld now, don't we?
jpnChrName: これで必要そうな情報は 一通り集まったんじゃないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
これで必要そうな情報は
一通り集まったんじゃないでしょうか。

engChrName: Correct. Considering when the two sides are supposed to meet, the timing couldn't be better.
engSearchText:
Correct. Considering when the two sides are
supposed to meet, the timing couldn't be better.
jpnChrName: ええ、取引開始までの時間的にも この辺りが丁度いいかと思われます。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、取引開始までの時間的にも
この辺りが丁度いいかと思われます。

engChrName: Which means we're headin' over to Dirke Memorial Park next.
engSearchText:
Which means we're headin' over to Dirke Memorial
Park next.
jpnChrName: だな、それじゃあぼちぼち ディルク記念公園の入り口に向かうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
だな、それじゃあぼちぼち
ディルク記念公園の入り口に向かうとするか。

engChrName: We'll take the time to go through all the info we gathered and come up with an action plan.
engSearchText:
We'll take the time to go through all the info we
gathered and come up with an action plan.
jpnChrName: あの執事への報告がてら、 集めた情報を整理するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
あの執事への報告がてら、
集めた情報を整理するぞ。

engChrName: Sounds good to me!
engSearchText: Sounds good to me!
jpnChrName: 了解ですっ！
jpnSearchText: 了解ですっ！

engChrName: Fine by me. You're the boss.
engSearchText: Fine by me. You're the boss.
jpnChrName: へいへいっと。
jpnSearchText: へいへいっと。

engChrName: That key we got from the driver probably goes to one of the coin lockers here.
engSearchText:
That key we got from the driver probably goes to one
of the coin lockers here.
jpnChrName: 多分、あの運転手から預かった鍵は この駅のコインロッカーのものだろう。
jpnSearchText:
多分、あの運転手から預かった鍵は
この駅のコインロッカーのものだろう。

engChrName: What do you say? Should we check what's inside?
engSearchText: What do you say? Should we check what's inside?
jpnChrName: どうする──確かめちまうか？
jpnSearchText: どうする──確かめちまうか？

engChrName: *gulp*
engSearchText: *gulp*
jpnChrName: ゴクッ……
jpnSearchText: ゴクッ……

engChrName: Absolutely! I'm ready!
engSearchText: Absolutely! I'm ready!
jpnChrName: はいっ──勿論です！
jpnSearchText: はいっ──勿論です！

engChrName: Okay. Let's head in.
engSearchText: Okay. Let's head in.
jpnChrName: それでは降りましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それでは降りましょうか。

engChrName: Marielle and the others found the coin lockers tucked away in a corner of the subway station.
engSearchText:
Marielle and the others found the coin lockers tucked
away in a corner of the subway station.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちとマリエルは地下鉄駅の 片隅にあるコインロッカーを確認し──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちとマリエルは地下鉄駅の
片隅にあるコインロッカーを確認し──

engChrName: They located the one that corresponded with the key they held, finding a black leather notebook inside.
engSearchText:
They located the one that corresponded with the key
they held, finding a black leather notebook inside.
jpnChrName: 鍵のナンバーと対応するボックスを開くと 予想通り黒革の手帳が入っていた。
jpnSearchText:
鍵のナンバーと対応するボックスを開くと
予想通り黒革の手帳が入っていた。

engChrName: The group then proceeded to move to a quiet location in order to inspect the contents of the notebook.
engSearchText:
The group then proceeded to move to a quiet location
in order to inspect the contents of the notebook.
jpnChrName: そして──手帳の内容を確認するため 改めて落ち着ける場所に移動するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
そして──手帳の内容を確認するため
改めて落ち着ける場所に移動するのだった。

engChrName: I-I need a little more time to prepare first. Do you mind?
engSearchText:
I-I need a little more time to prepare first. Do
you mind?
jpnChrName: ま、まだ心の準備が…… 少し待ってもらっていいですか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、まだ心の準備が……
少し待ってもらっていいですか？

engChrName: Take all the time you need. We won't start without you.
engSearchText:
Take all the time you need. We won't start
without you.
jpnChrName: 分かった、 こっちは何時でもいいぞ。
jpnSearchText:
分かった、
こっちは何時でもいいぞ。

engChrName: This is something, all right.
engSearchText: This is something, all right.
jpnChrName: ……こいつは………
jpnSearchText: ……こいつは………

engChrName: I didn't get to talk to Dingo much...
engSearchText: I didn't get to talk to Dingo much...
jpnChrName: 僕はディンゴさん本人とは あまり話したことが無かったけど……
jpnSearchText:
僕はディンゴさん本人とは
あまり話したことが無かったけど……

engChrName: ...but I know for a fact that he was an outstanding man.
engSearchText:
...but I know for a fact that he was an
outstanding man.
jpnChrName: 凄い人だったんだね、本当に。
jpnSearchText: 凄い人だったんだね、本当に。

engChrName: Indeed. Not just anyone could pursue Almata to the degree he did without backup.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Not just anyone could pursue Almata to the
degree he did without backup.
jpnChrName: ええ、まさかここまで独力で アルマータに迫っていたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、まさかここまで独力で
アルマータに迫っていたなんて……

engChrName: It was probably his way of making amends for the role he played in Dantès' rise to power.
engSearchText:
It was probably his way of making amends for the role
he played in Dantès' rise to power.
jpnChrName: 多分、ジェラールがボスになる流れに 協力した事への贖罪だったんでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
多分、ジェラールがボスになる流れに
協力した事への贖罪だったんでしょうね。

engChrName: These notes mention how the previous boss' family was murdered, too. Even they didn't get spared...
engSearchText:
These notes mention how the previous boss' family
was murdered, too. Even they didn't get spared...
jpnChrName: この手帳によると、先代ボスってのも 親類縁者まで皆殺しにされたみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
この手帳によると、先代ボスってのも
親類縁者まで皆殺しにされたみたいだし。

engChrName: That's... That's horrible.
engSearchText: That's... That's horrible.
jpnChrName: っ……酷すぎます……
jpnSearchText: っ……酷すぎます……

engChrName: Such a heavy burden for him to carry...
engSearchText: Such a heavy burden for him to carry...
jpnChrName: それがディンゴさんが抱えていた過去……
jpnSearchText: それがディンゴさんが抱えていた過去……

engChrName: But... But that wasn't his fault! He couldn't have known that's what would happen.
engSearchText:
But... But that wasn't his fault! He couldn't have
known that's what would happen.
jpnChrName: そんなの……そんなのディンゴさんの せいなんかじゃないじゃないですか……
jpnSearchText:
そんなの……そんなのディンゴさんの
せいなんかじゃないじゃないですか……

engChrName: I can't imagine he felt like he could be in the public eye anymore after that.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine he felt like he could be in the public
eye anymore after that.
jpnChrName: なのにもう表の世界には出られないって……
jpnSearchText: なのにもう表の世界には出られないって……

engChrName: And that's why he took me under his wing... A good-for-nothing rookie...
engSearchText:
And that's why he took me under his wing...
A good-for-nothing rookie...
jpnChrName: ……代わりにわたしみたいな…… 未熟者のポンコツに教えてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
……代わりにわたしみたいな……
未熟者のポンコツに教えてくれて……

engChrName: It appears he compiled quite a few notes about the ringleaders we took down in Oración as well.
engSearchText:
It appears he compiled quite a few notes about the
ringleaders we took down in Oración as well.
jpnChrName: ……どうやらオラシオンで降した 幹部たちの詳細も纏めてあるようだな。
jpnSearchText:
……どうやらオラシオンで降した
幹部たちの詳細も纏めてあるようだな。

engChrName: Yeah. Let's take a look.
engSearchText: Yeah. Let's take a look.
jpnChrName: ええ……見てみましょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ……見てみましょう。

engChrName: Viola     Gender: Female, Age: 26 Originally from a minor noble family in the Qadas region in the Central East. Her family fell into bankruptcy after Qadas' annexation by Valis, Viola herself being sold off to a wealthy merchant so they could make ends meet.
engSearchText:
Viola Gender: Female, Age: 26
Originally from a minor noble family in the Qadas region in
the Central East. Her family fell into bankruptcy after Qadas'
annexation by Valis, Viola herself being sold off to a
wealthy merchant so they could make ends meet.
jpnChrName: ヴィオーラ　Female(age:26)  大陸中東、カダス地方の小貴族の出身。 沿岸部のヴァリス市国の勢力拡大によりカダス地方が 併合された後に家は没落、とある豪商へと身売りされる。
jpnSearchText:
ヴィオーラ　Female(age:26)

大陸中東、カダス地方の小貴族の出身。
沿岸部のヴァリス市国の勢力拡大によりカダス地方が
併合された後に家は没落、とある豪商へと身売りされる。

engChrName: She soon fell into the hands of a criminal organization that was targeting the merchant. Though initially nothing more than a plaything and object of pleasure, she eventually managed to oust the boss and wrestle control into her own hands. Her brutal leadership reputation precedes her.
engSearchText:
She soon fell into the hands of a criminal
organization that was targeting the merchant.
Though initially nothing more than a plaything and
object of pleasure, she eventually managed to oust the
boss and wrestle control into her own hands.
Her brutal leadership reputation precedes her.
jpnChrName: その後、豪商を襲った犯罪組織の手に落ちてボスの 慰み者となったようだが、ある時にボスを追い落とし、 組織を掌握、残忍非道な女頭目として名を馳せることに。
jpnSearchText:
その後、豪商を襲った犯罪組織の手に落ちてボスの
慰み者となったようだが、ある時にボスを追い落とし、
組織を掌握、残忍非道な女頭目として名を馳せることに。

engChrName: When, two years later, the group tried to expand their influence into Calvard, they caught the attention of Almata. Conflict with them was brief, as they were quickly obliterated by Dantès, to whom Viola swore loyalty afterward.
engSearchText:
When, two years later, the group tried to expand their
influence into Calvard, they caught the attention
of Almata. Conflict with them was brief, as they were
quickly obliterated by Dantès, to whom Viola swore
loyalty afterward.
jpnChrName: しかし２年後、共和国に進出した折にアルマータと対立、 ジェラールに完膚無きまでに組織を壊滅させられた時に 絶対的な忠誠を誓ったと思われる。
jpnSearchText:
しかし２年後、共和国に進出した折にアルマータと対立、
ジェラールに完膚無きまでに組織を壊滅させられた時に
絶対的な忠誠を誓ったと思われる。

engChrName: As a consequence of her turbulent past, she's incredibly dependent on Dantès, which might be the reason she harbors a fierce rivalry with her fellow Melchior, their positions equivalent within the organization.
engSearchText:
As a consequence of her turbulent past, she's
incredibly dependent on Dantès, which might be the
reason she harbors a fierce rivalry with her fellow
Melchior, their positions equivalent within
the organization.
jpnChrName: その生い立ちと遍歴からジェラールへの依存度は高く、 彼が重用する同輩メルキオルへの対抗意識も相当強そうだ。
jpnSearchText:
その生い立ちと遍歴からジェラールへの依存度は高く、
彼が重用する同輩メルキオルへの対抗意識も相当強そうだ。

engChrName: Though the body of her needlegun was produced by Zecht Arms, the full piece is not a part of their official lineup. Further research regarding the origin of her weapon is needed.
engSearchText:
Though the body of her needlegun was produced by
Zecht Arms, the full piece is not a part of their
official lineup. Further research regarding the origin
of her weapon is needed.
jpnChrName: なお、彼女の得物であるニードルガンのベースは ゼクトアームズ製のようだが、同社のラインナップには 正式には入っておらず、背景については調査が必要だろう。
jpnSearchText:
なお、彼女の得物であるニードルガンのベースは
ゼクトアームズ製のようだが、同社のラインナップには
正式には入っておらず、背景については調査が必要だろう。

engChrName: Alexandre   Gender: Male, Age: 35 Born in the former Principality of North Ambria in northwestern Zemuria, he was five years old when the Salt Pale appeared, sowing chaos in his homeland. Him and his father, then protectors of the ruling family, fled alongside Prince Balmund when he fled the country. Spent most of his childhood and adolescent years in the free city of Taslem.
engSearchText:
Alexandre Gender: Male, Age: 35
Born in the former Principality of North Ambria in northwestern
Zemuria, he was five years old when the Salt Pale appeared,
sowing chaos in his homeland. Him and his father, then
protectors of the ruling family, fled alongside Prince Balmund
when he fled the country. Spent most of his childhood and adolescent
years in the free city of Taslem.
jpnChrName: アレクサンドル　Male(age:35)  大陸北西、旧ノーザンブリア大公国出身。 ５歳の頃に起きた《塩の杭》事件で大公国が崩壊した折、 大公家守護職の父と共にバルムント大公の国外脱出に同行、 自由都市圏タスレム市で幼少期から青年期を過ごしたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
アレクサンドル　Male(age:35)

大陸北西、旧ノーザンブリア大公国出身。
５歳の頃に起きた《塩の杭》事件で大公国が崩壊した折、
大公家守護職の父と共にバルムント大公の国外脱出に同行、
自由都市圏タスレム市で幼少期から青年期を過ごしたようだ。

engChrName: Trained by his father in the traditional military arts of their homeland, he served the former ruling family until the age of 25, though his life was soon thrown into chaos.
engSearchText:
Trained by his father in the traditional military arts of
their homeland, he served the former ruling family
until the age of 25, though his life was soon thrown
into chaos.
jpnChrName: 父から大公国伝統の軍用格闘術を仕込まれ、異郷の地で 故郷を捨てた大公家に仕えていたが２５歳の時に状況が一変。
jpnSearchText:
父から大公国伝統の軍用格闘術を仕込まれ、異郷の地で
故郷を捨てた大公家に仕えていたが２５歳の時に状況が一変。

engChrName: His father and he were both ordered to retake North Ambria following the death of the Northern Jaegers' figurehead—the current ruler since Prince Balmund's escape.
engSearchText:
His father and he were both ordered to retake
North Ambria following the death of the Northern
Jaegers' figurehead—the current ruler since Prince
Balmund's escape.
jpnChrName: 自治州化していたノーザンブリアを支えていた 《北の猟兵》の重鎮が亡くなった際、バルムント旧大公が 旧国土の奪還を守護職とアレクサンドルに命じたのである。
jpnSearchText:
自治州化していたノーザンブリアを支えていた
《北の猟兵》の重鎮が亡くなった際、バルムント旧大公が
旧国土の奪還を守護職とアレクサンドルに命じたのである。

engChrName: After their assault on North Ambria's capital, Haliask, they managed to seize and control the city for a time, acting as its effective government before being overthrown by the Northern Jaegers.
engSearchText:
After their assault on North Ambria's capital,
Haliask, they managed to seize and control the city
for a time, acting as its effective government before
being overthrown by the Northern Jaegers.
jpnChrName: そして彼らは旧公都ハリアスクを急襲、一時実効支配したが、 《北の猟兵》の反攻作戦によって呆気なく包囲されてしまう。
jpnSearchText:
そして彼らは旧公都ハリアスクを急襲、一時実効支配したが、
《北の猟兵》の反攻作戦によって呆気なく包囲されてしまう。

engChrName: This ensued a massacre of the remaining civilians in Haliask, mandated by the crazed former Prince Balmund. Standing in opposition with one another, Alexandre and his father dueled to the death, Alexandre emerging victorious before withdrawing from the battlefield. Though his current whereabouts are unknown, it is believed that Prince Balmund was swiftly—and secretly—executed by the Northern Jaegers following his capture.
engSearchText:
This ensued a massacre of the remaining civilians in
Haliask, mandated by the crazed former
Prince Balmund. Standing in opposition with one
another, Alexandre and his father dueled to the
death, Alexandre emerging victorious before
withdrawing from the battlefield. Though his current
whereabouts are unknown, it is believed that Prince
Balmund was swiftly—and secretly—executed by the
Northern Jaegers following his capture.
jpnChrName: 血迷ったバルムント旧大公は見せしめに住民虐殺を命じたが その際、守護職と息子アレクサンドルの間で決闘が行われた。 結果としてアレクサンドルが生き残り、一人戦線から離脱── バルムント大公は直後に捕まり、以後消息は不明となっている。 （おそらく北の猟兵により内々に処刑されたものと思われる）
jpnSearchText:
血迷ったバルムント旧大公は見せしめに住民虐殺を命じたが
その際、守護職と息子アレクサンドルの間で決闘が行われた。
結果としてアレクサンドルが生き残り、一人戦線から離脱──
バルムント大公は直後に捕まり、以後消息は不明となっている。
（おそらく北の猟兵により内々に処刑されたものと思われる）

engChrName: Wandering from one corps to another, Alexandre was eventually scouted out by Dantès himself, and brought into a leadership position within Almata.
engSearchText:
Wandering from one corps to another, Alexandre was
eventually scouted out by Dantès himself, and brought
into a leadership position within Almata.
jpnChrName: その後、各地の猟兵団などを転々とした後、ジェラールに スカウトされ、アルマータの幹部へと迎えられたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
その後、各地の猟兵団などを転々とした後、ジェラールに
スカウトされ、アルマータの幹部へと迎えられたようだ。

engChrName: Though outwardly austere and restrained, he's merciless in combat, sparing none who dare cross him.
engSearchText:
Though outwardly austere and restrained, he's
merciless in combat, sparing none who dare
cross him.
jpnChrName: 本人自身は質実剛健で抑制的な性格のようだが、 実戦となると一切の容赦せず、無慈悲に敵対者を殲滅する。
jpnSearchText:
本人自身は質実剛健で抑制的な性格のようだが、
実戦となると一切の容赦せず、無慈悲に敵対者を殲滅する。

engChrName: His ultimate goal being the search for his final resting place, he has rejected any attempt at persuading him to leave Almata.
engSearchText:
His ultimate goal being the search for his final resting
place, he has rejected any attempt at persuading him
to leave Almata.
jpnChrName: どこか死に場所を求めているような所がありそうなので、 組織からの離脱などの説得は恐らく難しいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
どこか死に場所を求めているような所がありそうなので、
組織からの離脱などの説得は恐らく難しいだろう。

engChrName: Despite the mechanized gauntlets he wields not being part of their official lineup, it does appear that they were developed by Zecht Arms.
engSearchText:
Despite the mechanized gauntlets he wields not being
part of their official lineup, it does appear that they
were developed by Zecht Arms.
jpnChrName: なお得物であるマシンガントレットもゼクトアームズ製の ようだが、やはり同社の正式なラインナップには存在しない。
jpnSearchText:
なお得物であるマシンガントレットもゼクトアームズ製の
ようだが、やはり同社の正式なラインナップには存在しない。

engChrName: Olympia     Gender: Female, Age: 19 Little is known about her, although she allegedly hails from a remote village hidden in eastern Zemuria.
engSearchText:
Olympia Gender: Female, Age: 19
Little is known about her, although she allegedly hails from
a remote village hidden in eastern Zemuria.
jpnChrName: オランピア　Female(age:19)  彼女について分かっていることは少ないが、どうやら 大陸東部の辺境に存在していた“隠れ里”の出身らしい。
jpnSearchText:
オランピア　Female(age:19)

彼女について分かっていることは少ないが、どうやら
大陸東部の辺境に存在していた“隠れ里”の出身らしい。

engChrName: Rumors say the entire village was comprised of heretical puppeteers who worshiped a doll made in the image of an angel.
engSearchText:
Rumors say the entire village was comprised of
heretical puppeteers who worshiped a doll made in
the image of an angel.
jpnChrName: 伝え聞いた話によれば、その里は“天使を象った人形”を “神”として崇めていた異端の傀儡師の集団だったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
伝え聞いた話によれば、その里は“天使を象った人形”を
“神”として崇めていた異端の傀儡師の集団だったようだ。

engChrName: Thought to be an artifact of some sort, the doll was looked after by a medium. The village's gruesome customs mandated that those close to the medium were to be offered as sacrifices.
engSearchText:
Thought to be an artifact of some sort, the doll was
looked after by a medium. The village's gruesome
customs mandated that those close to the medium
were to be offered as sacrifices.
jpnChrName: おそらく何らかの古代遺物と思われるが、その里では 天使の世話をする“巫子”に近しい者を“贄”として捧げる おぞましい慣習があり、友人や両親が犠牲となったという。
jpnSearchText:
おそらく何らかの古代遺物と思われるが、その里では
天使の世話をする“巫子”に近しい者を“贄”として捧げる
おぞましい慣習があり、友人や両親が犠牲となったという。

engChrName: These sacrifices spared no one. Not friends nor family. Though soon, tragedy befell the village, leaving Olympia and the doll alone to wander the continent after the demise of all they knew.
engSearchText:
These sacrifices spared no one. Not friends
nor family. Though soon, tragedy befell the village,
leaving Olympia and the doll alone to wander the
continent after the demise of all they knew.
jpnChrName: そしてその直後に“何か”が起きて隠れ里が壊滅── オランピアと天使人形は各地を彷徨うこととなったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
そしてその直後に“何か”が起きて隠れ里が壊滅──
オランピアと天使人形は各地を彷徨うこととなったらしい。

engChrName: Multiple records suggest instances of criminals being slaughtered when encroaching on the wandering pair.
engSearchText:
Multiple records suggest instances of criminals being
slaughtered when encroaching on the wandering pair.
jpnChrName: なおこの時期、彷徨う彼女たちに手を出そうとした ならず者たちが惨殺されたと思しき記録も幾つか残っている。
jpnSearchText:
なおこの時期、彷徨う彼女たちに手を出そうとした
ならず者たちが惨殺されたと思しき記録も幾つか残っている。

engChrName: She was later inducted into the Gardens—the assassin organization—and made overseer of the Garden of Aurum. Though it appears she's been mostly left to her own devices after being invited by the other overseers, these including Melchior and the Emperor.
engSearchText:
She was later inducted into the Gardens—the assassin
organization—and made overseer of the Garden
of Aurum. Though it appears she's been mostly left to
her own devices after being invited by the other
overseers, these including Melchior and the Emperor.
jpnChrName: その後、件の暗殺組織《庭園》に迎えられ“黄金”を冠する 管理人となったが、あくまで他の管理人たち（《皇帝》や メルキオル）に誘われただけで、流されるままだったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
その後、件の暗殺組織《庭園》に迎えられ“黄金”を冠する
管理人となったが、あくまで他の管理人たち（《皇帝》や
メルキオル）に誘われただけで、流されるままだったようだ。

engChrName: If I were to guess, the incident that took place in her village led to her and the angel developing a psychologically interdependent relationship, resulting in her autonomy and emotional expression diminishing.
engSearchText:
If I were to guess, the incident that took place in her
village led to her and the angel developing a
psychologically interdependent relationship, resulting
in her autonomy and emotional
expression diminishing.
jpnChrName: これは推測だが、故郷で起きた“事件”において、 彼女は何らかの形で天使人形と心的な相互依存関係となり、 主体的な意志や感情が希薄となってしまったのではないか？
jpnSearchText:
これは推測だが、故郷で起きた“事件”において、
彼女は何らかの形で天使人形と心的な相互依存関係となり、
主体的な意志や感情が希薄となってしまったのではないか？

engChrName: In light of the crisis that's made the Gardens join forces, she may have a chance to reclaim that lost capacity, albeit an incredibly slim one.
engSearchText:
In light of the crisis that's made the Gardens join
forces, she may have a chance to reclaim that lost
capacity, albeit an incredibly slim one.
jpnChrName: 《庭園》がアルマータに協力する危機的状況において、 失った感情と意志を取り戻させる機会はあるかもしれないが 残念ながら余りに微々たる可能性だろう。
jpnSearchText:
《庭園》がアルマータに協力する危機的状況において、
失った感情と意志を取り戻させる機会はあるかもしれないが
残念ながら余りに微々たる可能性だろう。

engChrName: Arioch     Gender: Male, Age: Over 150? In contrast to the known, confirmed leaders of Almata and Garden overseers, eyewitness reports of him are few. What we do know of him, the Garden of Rust's overseer, is that he's a very dangerous man, clad in heavy armor.
engSearchText:
Arioch Gender: Male, Age: Over 150?
In contrast to the known, confirmed leaders of Almata and
Garden overseers, eyewitness reports of him are few. What we
do know of him, the Garden of Rust's overseer, is that he's
a very dangerous man, clad in heavy armor.
jpnChrName: アリオッチ　Male(age:150over?)  現在、判明しているアルマータの幹部や《庭園》の管理人と 違って目撃者は余りに少ないが、どうやら巨大な甲冑に身を 包んだ“錆の管理人”と呼ばれる危険な存在がいるらしい。
jpnSearchText:
アリオッチ　Male(age:150over?)

現在、判明しているアルマータの幹部や《庭園》の管理人と
違って目撃者は余りに少ないが、どうやら巨大な甲冑に身を
包んだ“錆の管理人”と呼ばれる危険な存在がいるらしい。

engChrName: Much of the information about him stretches belief, including how he was supposedly born in a different time period altogether, over 150 years ago.
engSearchText:
Much of the information about him stretches belief,
including how he was supposedly born in a different
time period altogether, over 150 years ago.
jpnChrName: 彼については信じがたい情報も多いが、その最たるものは 現代ではなく１５０年以上前の生まれというものだろう。
jpnSearchText:
彼については信じがたい情報も多いが、その最たるものは
現代ではなく１５０年以上前の生まれというものだろう。

engChrName: If he was, he's said to proceed from the mythical Holy Iskan Empire, an enormous nation believed to have laid just across the Tianshan and Ishgal Mountains to Calvard's east. This empire is presumed to have vanished following a calamity 130 years ago.
engSearchText:
If he was, he's said to proceed from the mythical Holy
Iskan Empire, an enormous nation believed to have
laid just across the Tianshan and Ishgal Mountains to
Calvard's east. This empire is presumed to have
vanished following a calamity 130 years ago.
jpnChrName: カルバードの東、天山とイシュガルの向こうに存在した 《イスカ神聖皇国》──１３０年前に天変地異で崩壊した 伝説の巨大国家の出身なのだという。
jpnSearchText:
カルバードの東、天山とイシュガルの向こうに存在した
《イスカ神聖皇国》──１３０年前に天変地異で崩壊した
伝説の巨大国家の出身なのだという。

engChrName: In its heyday, nine groups served to protect the royal imperial line. Eastern sources indicate that he was a warrior who represented the Rahu, a tribe of white descent hailing from the West.
engSearchText:
In its heyday, nine groups served to protect the royal
imperial line. Eastern sources indicate that he was a
warrior who represented the Rahu, a tribe of white
descent hailing from the West.
jpnChrName: なお、神聖皇国には《皇》を護る九つの守護集団が存在し、 中でも西方からやって来た白人系の《羅睺（ラゴウ）衆》を代表する 守護戦士だったという噂も東部方面から入手した。
jpnSearchText:
なお、神聖皇国には《皇》を護る九つの守護集団が存在し、
中でも西方からやって来た白人系の《羅睺（ラゴウ）衆》を代表する
守護戦士だったという噂も東部方面から入手した。

engChrName: I'm inclined to believe it's all bullshit. But in an age where Immortals like the Lance Maiden can exist in Erebonia, I can't rule out the possibility of there being some truth to it, either.
engSearchText:
I'm inclined to believe it's all bullshit. But in an age
where Immortals like the Lance Maiden can exist in
Erebonia, I can't rule out the possibility of there being
some truth to it, either.
jpnChrName: どこの与太話かと思いもするが、エレボニア帝国の“聖女”や “不死者”の前例を考えると信憑性が無い話でもないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
どこの与太話かと思いもするが、エレボニア帝国の“聖女”や
“不死者”の前例を考えると信憑性が無い話でもないだろう。

engChrName: Whether it's true or not, evidence might suggest that his armor and his strangely shaped battle axe might be artifacts. Considering his joining the Gardens and the stories claiming his immortality, this might be highly likely.
engSearchText:
Whether it's true or not, evidence might suggest that
his armor and his strangely shaped battle axe might
be artifacts. Considering his joining the Gardens and
the stories claiming his immortality, this might be
highly likely.
jpnChrName: ちなみに得物は異様な形状の巨大な戦斧らしく、 不死とも思える逸話や、《庭園》に迎えられた事を考えると、 甲冑共々何らかの古代遺物である可能性は高い。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに得物は異様な形状の巨大な戦斧らしく、
不死とも思える逸話や、《庭園》に迎えられた事を考えると、
甲冑共々何らかの古代遺物である可能性は高い。

engChrName: On top of that, he's the primary suspect regarding the Eisenschild's annihilation in the outskirts of Creil, though I still can't state that for a fact. More information's needed.
engSearchText:
On top of that, he's the primary suspect regarding the
Eisenschild's annihilation in the outskirts of Creil,
though I still can't state that for a fact.
More information's needed.
jpnChrName: クレイユ郊外でアイゼンシルト中隊を全滅させた主力である 可能性も高く、今度の取材でそのあたりも探ってみよう。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ郊外でアイゼンシルト中隊を全滅させた主力である
可能性も高く、今度の取材でそのあたりも探ってみよう。

engChrName: Melchior     Gender: Male, Age: 21 One of Almata's three pillars, and quite possibly its most evil and sinister member. He doubles down as the Gardens' ringleader and overseer of the Garden of Thorns.
engSearchText:
Melchior Gender: Male, Age: 21
One of Almata's three pillars, and quite possibly its most
evil and sinister member. He doubles down as the Gardens'
ringleader and overseer of the Garden of Thorns.
jpnChrName: メルキオル　Male(age:21)  アルマータ三幹部の一人にして、《庭園》を束ねる“棘の 管理人”でもあるこの青年はおよそ最悪最凶と言っていい。
jpnSearchText:
メルキオル　Male(age:21)

アルマータ三幹部の一人にして、《庭園》を束ねる“棘の
管理人”でもあるこの青年はおよそ最悪最凶と言っていい。

engChrName: Melchior's skills don't fall behind any of his artifact-wielding peers, being highly skilled in the use of the orbal net and being capable of infinitely spawning and freely controlling explosives. Beyond that, he also acts as Almata's main strategist and Dantès' righthand man and confidant (and possibly his lover).
engSearchText:
Melchior's skills don't fall behind any of his
artifact-wielding peers, being highly skilled in the use
of the orbal net and being capable of infinitely
spawning and freely controlling explosives.
Beyond that, he also acts as Almata's main strategist
and Dantès' righthand man and confidant (and
possibly his lover).
jpnChrName: 古代遺物を使う他の管理人同様、無限に増やせる“爆弾”を 自在に使いこなす他、導力ネットの技術にも通じており、 ジェラールの右腕にして懐刀であると同時に（愛人も？）、 彼の野望を確実に実現するための“頭脳”でもあるようだ。
jpnSearchText:
古代遺物を使う他の管理人同様、無限に増やせる“爆弾”を
自在に使いこなす他、導力ネットの技術にも通じており、
ジェラールの右腕にして懐刀であると同時に（愛人も？）、
彼の野望を確実に実現するための“頭脳”でもあるようだ。

engChrName: Though his past is shrouded in mystery, his origins might trace back to the same organization the Oathbreaker, one of Ouroboros' Anguis, also comes from.
engSearchText:
Though his past is shrouded in mystery, his origins
might trace back to the same organization the
Oathbreaker, one of Ouroboros' Anguis, also
comes from.
jpnChrName: その来歴は定かではないが、どうやらかの結社── 《身喰らう蛇》の使徒の一人の“古巣”出身の可能性がある。
jpnSearchText:
その来歴は定かではないが、どうやらかの結社──
《身喰らう蛇》の使徒の一人の“古巣”出身の可能性がある。

engChrName: The Order of the Moonlight Horse existed since the Middle Ages, where the Oathbreaker sat among its top brass for the longest time before losing to Ouroboros and switching sides. He's an entirely different matter, and a major threat all of his own.
engSearchText:
The Order of the Moonlight Horse existed since the
Middle Ages, where the Oathbreaker sat among its
top brass for the longest time before losing to
Ouroboros and switching sides. He's an entirely
different matter, and a major threat all of his own.
jpnChrName: 《月光木馬團》──中世より続いてきたという暗殺組織の 元幹部にして、結社との暗闘に敗れ軍門に降ったという 《破戒》という男の脅威度はまた別に気になる所ではあるが。
jpnSearchText:
《月光木馬團》──中世より続いてきたという暗殺組織の
元幹部にして、結社との暗闘に敗れ軍門に降ったという
《破戒》という男の脅威度はまた別に気になる所ではあるが。

engChrName: Wrapping this back around, Melchior might've been a direct subordinate of the Oathbreaker before going on to take in the scattered remnants of that infamous cult.
engSearchText:
Wrapping this back around, Melchior might've been
a direct subordinate of the Oathbreaker before going
on to take in the scattered remnants of that
infamous cult.
jpnChrName: 幼き頃にその男の薫陶を受け、史上最悪の“教団”の 残党すら取り込んだという噂が仮に真実であるならば……
jpnSearchText:
幼き頃にその男の薫陶を受け、史上最悪の“教団”の
残党すら取り込んだという噂が仮に真実であるならば……

engChrName: If that's true, that would make him something of a prince of the underworld.
engSearchText:
If that's true, that would make him something of a
prince of the underworld.
jpnChrName: まさに“闇の世界”の寵児にしてプリンスとも呼べるだろう。
jpnSearchText: まさに“闇の世界”の寵児にしてプリンスとも呼べるだろう。

engChrName: For someone as powerful as him to idolize Dantès so much is nothing short of ominous and concerning, to say the least.
engSearchText:
For someone as powerful as him to idolize Dantès so
much is nothing short of ominous and concerning, to
say the least.
jpnChrName: そんな青年がジェラールに心酔し忠誠を誓っている── その事実こそが何より、自分には不吉に思えてならない。
jpnSearchText:
そんな青年がジェラールに心酔し忠誠を誓っている──
その事実こそが何より、自分には不吉に思えてならない。

engChrName: Another thing that concerns me is him staying in Creil's vicinity following the Eisenschild turning into ghouls.
engSearchText:
Another thing that concerns me is him staying in
Creil's vicinity following the Eisenschild turning
into ghouls.
jpnChrName: なお、かのアイゼンシルト中隊を屍鬼化した後で一人、 クレイユ周辺に残り続けていたことも改めて気になる所だ。
jpnSearchText:
なお、かのアイゼンシルト中隊を屍鬼化した後で一人、
クレイユ周辺に残り続けていたことも改めて気になる所だ。

engChrName: Creil's not just some sleepy village with beautiful vistas. More than a touristic spot, it lies stuck between several forces working from the shadows. It also happens to be one of the few places in northern Calvard with a sizable Eastern and Central Eastern population.
engSearchText:
Creil's not just some sleepy village with
beautiful vistas. More than a touristic spot, it lies
stuck between several forces working from
the shadows. It also happens to be one of the few
places in northern Calvard with a sizable Eastern and
Central Eastern population.
jpnChrName: クレイユは風光明媚だけでなく、各裏勢力の通過拠点であり、 更には共和国北部にしては珍しく東方・中東系の住民がいる。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユは風光明媚だけでなく、各裏勢力の通過拠点であり、
更には共和国北部にしては珍しく東方・中東系の住民がいる。

engChrName: Knowing the source of Almata's financing... Actually, I'd rather not speculate any further.
engSearchText:
Knowing the source of Almata's financing...
Actually, I'd rather not speculate any further.
jpnChrName: 彼らの資金源を考えると──いや、今は憶測は止めておこう。
jpnSearchText: 彼らの資金源を考えると──いや、今は憶測は止めておこう。

engChrName: Gerard Dantès     Gender: Male, Age: 34 If I let my feelings take way, Dantès could fill every single page in this notebook. There's not a night where I'm not overcome with regret, but this notebook is not meant for my personal thoughts.
engSearchText:
Gerard Dantès Gender: Male, Age: 34
If I let my feelings take way, Dantès could fill every single
page in this notebook. There's not a night where I'm not
overcome with regret, but this notebook is not meant for my
personal thoughts.
jpnChrName: ジェラール　Male(age:34)  彼については語ることが余りに多く、未だ悔恨の念に 苛まれる夜もあるくらいだが、今は自分の事はいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ジェラール　Male(age:34)

彼については語ることが余りに多く、未だ悔恨の念に
苛まれる夜もあるくらいだが、今は自分の事はいいだろう。

engChrName: Most things I've come to learn about him and his life are at least a little eyebrow-raising. Him being a member of the D∴G cult before joining Almata. Being related to Calvard's old royal family—perhaps even a direct descendant.
engSearchText:
Most things I've come to learn about him and his life
are at least a little eyebrow-raising. Him being a
member of the D∴G cult before joining Almata.
Being related to Calvard's old royal family—perhaps
even a direct descendant.
jpnChrName: アルマータ入りする前にＤ∴Ｇ教団に所属していたこと。 カルバード旧王家に連なる──いや直系の末裔である可能性。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ入りする前にＤ∴Ｇ教団に所属していたこと。
カルバード旧王家に連なる──いや直系の末裔である可能性。

engChrName: The tales of his sword are equally as hard to believe. A gigantic blade of black and silver, thought to be an artifact hidden by the royal family. This demon blade was the instrument with which he slew Enrique, Almata's previous head.
engSearchText:
The tales of his sword are equally as hard to believe.
A gigantic blade of black and silver, thought to be an
artifact hidden by the royal family. This demon blade
was the instrument with which he slew Enrique,
Almata's previous head.
jpnChrName: 先代エンリケを粛正する時に見せたあの黒銀の大剣が 旧王家が隠し持っていた“魔剣型”の古代遺物であること。
jpnSearchText:
先代エンリケを粛正する時に見せたあの黒銀の大剣が
旧王家が隠し持っていた“魔剣型”の古代遺物であること。

engChrName: Hard as these tales are to believe, their true purpose is to strike fear into the hearts of those who hear them. To make Dantès nothing short of the living manifestation of shadows and agony.
engSearchText:
Hard as these tales are to believe, their true purpose is
to strike fear into the hearts of those who hear them.
To make Dantès nothing short of the living
manifestation of shadows and agony.
jpnChrName: 信じられない経歴や情報ばかりが見えてきているが、 それらも彼という“恐怖の体現者”の一側面に過ぎない。
jpnSearchText:
信じられない経歴や情報ばかりが見えてきているが、
それらも彼という“恐怖の体現者”の一側面に過ぎない。

engChrName: Deep as the abyss and equally as alluring, his unquenchable thirst for fear is what draws many to him. Seductive and enchanting, it has earned him many loyal followers.
engSearchText:
Deep as the abyss and equally as alluring, his
unquenchable thirst for fear is what draws many
to him. Seductive and enchanting, it has earned him
many loyal followers.
jpnChrName: およそ飢（かつ）えることのない“恐怖”への渇望。 それこそが彼の本質であり、配下を引きつけてやまない “悪のカリスマ”としての源泉でもあるのだろう。
jpnSearchText:
およそ飢（かつ）えることのない“恐怖”への渇望。
それこそが彼の本質であり、配下を引きつけてやまない
“悪のカリスマ”としての源泉でもあるのだろう。

engChrName: But where does such unfathomable hunger come from?
engSearchText:
But where does such unfathomable hunger
come from?
jpnChrName: だが、それは一体どこから来ているのか──？
jpnSearchText: だが、それは一体どこから来ているのか──？

engChrName: A new hypothesis surfaced recently, which might finally explain things. Its source, however, is a little unusual, and I'm not particularly keen to take it at face value.
engSearchText:
A new hypothesis surfaced recently, which might
finally explain things. Its source, however, is a little
unusual, and I'm not particularly keen to take it at
face value.
jpnChrName: 最近になって、新たな一つの仮説が浮かび上がっている。 それも思わぬ方面から、自分を戸惑わせるような形で。
jpnSearchText:
最近になって、新たな一つの仮説が浮かび上がっている。
それも思わぬ方面から、自分を戸惑わせるような形で。

engChrName: But that's neither here nor there. The more pressing matter is his goal in Basel, and that him and the others might've been after something else.
engSearchText:
But that's neither here nor there. The more pressing
matter is his goal in Basel, and that him and the
others might've been after something else.
jpnChrName: いや、そちらについては一旦いいだろう。 今はバーゼルで彼らが狙っていたものの別の可能性──
jpnSearchText:
いや、そちらについては一旦いいだろう。
今はバーゼルで彼らが狙っていたものの別の可能性──

engChrName: His true goal, I imagine. Fear. The want and need to bring about true dread and terror to the masses. He wasn't able to achieve it even with the help of a genius, but that will not put a stop to him. He'll stop at nothing to achieve his mission. Looking into this matter should take priority.
engSearchText:
His true goal, I imagine. Fear. The want and need to
bring about true dread and terror to the masses.
He wasn't able to achieve it even with the help of a
genius, but that will not put a stop to him. He'll stop
at nothing to achieve his mission. Looking into this
matter should take priority.
jpnChrName: 不遇の天才が届かなかった領域にあの男があらゆる手段を 使って手を伸ばし、決定的な“恐怖”を実現しようとして いないか確かめることの方が優先だ。
jpnSearchText:
不遇の天才が届かなかった領域にあの男があらゆる手段を
使って手を伸ばし、決定的な“恐怖”を実現しようとして
いないか確かめることの方が優先だ。

engChrName: Regardless, he sure managed to pull a fast one on me in Tharbad. I was distracted by that call, but that's no excuse. I should've seen through him much sooner than I did. But try as he might to stay one step ahead, I'll forever be hot on his heels.
engSearchText:
Regardless, he sure managed to pull a fast one on me
in Tharbad. I was distracted by that call, but that's
no excuse. I should've seen through him much sooner
than I did. But try as he might to stay one step ahead,
I'll forever be hot on his heels.
jpnChrName: ──思えばサルバッドではしてやられた。 いかに伝言に気を取られたとはいえ彼を見紛うとは。 やはり一枚も二枚も上手だろうが退くことはできない。
jpnSearchText:
──思えばサルバッドではしてやられた。
いかに伝言に気を取られたとはいえ彼を見紛うとは。
やはり一枚も二枚も上手だろうが退くことはできない。

engChrName: At this point, I've worked out how I'm going to get everything recorded, as well as how to leave these notes behind.
engSearchText:
At this point, I've worked out how I'm going to get
everything recorded, as well as how to leave these
notes behind.
jpnChrName: 例の記録方法は確保し、この手帳を残す段取りも固めた。
jpnSearchText: 例の記録方法は確保し、この手帳を残す段取りも固めた。

engChrName: Now comes the real showdown with him. It's going to be the biggest gamble I make as both a reporter and an information dealer.
engSearchText:
Now comes the real showdown with him. It's going
to be the biggest gamble I make as both a reporter
and an information dealer.
jpnChrName: ここから先は彼との真剣勝負──情報屋として、 ルポライターとして一世一代の大博打に出るだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ここから先は彼との真剣勝負──情報屋として、
ルポライターとして一世一代の大博打に出るだけだ。

engChrName: If, by some sheer miracle, I make it back in one piece, I'll absolutely be following up on those theories I've written about.
engSearchText:
If, by some sheer miracle, I make it back in one piece,
I'll absolutely be following up on those theories I've
written about.
jpnChrName: そして──もし無事に戻れたら 先程の仮説についても改めて確かめてみるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
そして──もし無事に戻れたら
先程の仮説についても改めて確かめてみるとしよう。

engChrName: I can already imagine the hell I'm in for with that dope of a spriggan and that cub reporter—I really do worry about her—but you know what?
engSearchText:
I can already imagine the hell I'm in for with that
dope of a spriggan and that cub reporter—I really do
worry about her—but you know what?
jpnChrName: その前に、不器用な弟分のようなアイツや、 先行きが不安でもあり楽しみでもある後輩に どやされてしまいそうではあるが……
jpnSearchText:
その前に、不器用な弟分のようなアイツや、
先行きが不安でもあり楽しみでもある後輩に
どやされてしまいそうではあるが……

engChrName: At the end of the day, that's just part of the fun.
engSearchText: At the end of the day, that's just part of the fun.
jpnChrName: ──それもまた、楽しみの一つというものだ。
jpnSearchText: ──それもまた、楽しみの一つというものだ。

engChrName: Dingo... Dingo!
engSearchText: Dingo... Dingo!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん…… ……ディンゴさぁあん………！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん……
……ディンゴさぁあん………！

engChrName: You dumbass... Who's the real dope between us, huh?
engSearchText: You dumbass... Who's the real dope between us, huh?
jpnChrName: ………馬鹿野郎が…… ……不器用なのはどっちだ………
jpnSearchText:
………馬鹿野郎が……
……不器用なのはどっちだ………

engChrName: This dude was totally nuts. How the hell did he find it in him to go that far?
engSearchText:
This dude was totally nuts. How the hell did he find
it in him to go that far?
jpnChrName: つーかあり得ねえだろ…… マジでどこまで迫ってたんだっつの。
jpnSearchText:
つーかあり得ねえだろ……
マジでどこまで迫ってたんだっつの。

engChrName: I can only imagine his love and care for others spurring him on to gather this much information.
engSearchText:
I can only imagine his love and care for others
spurring him on to gather this much information.
jpnChrName: ……多くの方々との縁を大切にしないと とても得られないような情報でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……多くの方々との縁を大切にしないと
とても得られないような情報でしょう。

engChrName: He was both a clever and kind man.
engSearchText: He was both a clever and kind man.
jpnChrName: 本当にどこまでも鋭くて…… ……大切な人たちを思いやって……
jpnSearchText:
本当にどこまでも鋭くて……
……大切な人たちを思いやって……

engChrName: And he wasn't just trying to make amends or settle a score. I don't doubt he genuinely worried for everyone's future.
engSearchText:
And he wasn't just trying to make amends or settle
a score. I don't doubt he genuinely worried for
everyone's future.
jpnChrName: ええ、過去にケリを付けるだけじゃなく、 未来もちゃんと見据えてたのね……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、過去にケリを付けるだけじゃなく、
未来もちゃんと見据えてたのね……

engChrName: It goes without saying, but it's a true shame. He was taken from us far too young.
engSearchText:
It goes without saying, but it's a true shame. He was
taken from us far too young.
jpnChrName: ……改めてにはなるが 惜しい若者を亡くしたものだ。
jpnSearchText:
……改めてにはなるが
惜しい若者を亡くしたものだ。

engChrName: *sniffle* I'm so glad you two were able to find his notes.
engSearchText:
*sniffle* I'm so glad you two were able to find
his notes.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……でもよかったです。 この手帳がお二人の元にちゃんと届いて。
jpnSearchText:
ぐすっ……でもよかったです。
この手帳がお二人の元にちゃんと届いて。

engChrName: Likewise. It must've been the will of the Goddess.
engSearchText: Likewise. It must've been the will of the Goddess.
jpnChrName: うん…… 女神のせめてもの導き、かもね。
jpnSearchText:
うん……
女神のせめてもの導き、かもね。

engChrName: Once Marielle collected herself, the party drove her back to the Tyrell Times.
engSearchText:
Once Marielle collected herself, the party drove her
back to the Tyrell Times.
jpnChrName: その後、マリエルが落ち着くのを待ってから 車で彼女をタイレル通信へと送り届け──
jpnSearchText:
その後、マリエルが落ち着くのを待ってから
車で彼女をタイレル通信へと送り届け──

engChrName: After reporting their success to editor-in-chief Cunning, they got back to work.
engSearchText:
After reporting their success to editor-in-chief
Cunning, they got back to work.
jpnChrName: カニング編集長に依頼達成の報告をしてから ヴァンたちは再び解決業務を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
カニング編集長に依頼達成の報告をしてから
ヴァンたちは再び解決業務を再開するのだった。

engChrName: As for Dingo's notes, once the contents were copied, it was decided that Marielle would hold on to the originals for safekeeping.
engSearchText:
As for Dingo's notes, once the contents were copied,
it was decided that Marielle would hold on to the
originals for safekeeping.
jpnChrName: （なお発見した手帳は、内容をコピーした上で   手帳そのものはマリエルが預かることとなった。）
jpnSearchText:
（なお発見した手帳は、内容をコピーした上で
手帳そのものはマリエルが預かることとなった。）

engChrName: Quest Dingo's Legacy completed!
engSearchText: Quest Dingo's Legacy completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【ディンゴの遺した意志】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>ディンゴの遺した意志<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: You're Zora, right? The one who put the call out for us? We're with Arkride Solutions. Nice to meet you.
engSearchText:
You're Zora, right? The one who put the call out
for us? We're with Arkride Solutions. Nice to
meet you.
jpnChrName: アンタが依頼を出したゾーラだな？ 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。
jpnSearchText:
アンタが依頼を出したゾーラだな？
俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。

engChrName: Oh, wonderful! Thank you so much for coming!
engSearchText: Oh, wonderful! Thank you so much for coming!
jpnChrName: まあ！　来てくれてありがとう！
jpnSearchText: まあ！　来てくれてありがとう！

engChrName: Please, have a seat. I'll get some tea ready in just a minute.
engSearchText:
Please, have a seat. I'll get some tea ready in just
a minute.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、早速お茶の準備をしてくるから 座って待っていてもらえるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、早速お茶の準備をしてくるから
座って待っていてもらえるかしら？

engChrName: I was curious what a spriggan would be like, you know.
engSearchText:
I was curious what a spriggan would be like,
you know.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋というから、どんな人たちかと思えば。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋というから、どんな人たちかと思えば。

engChrName: But you look just like normal people. I might've even seen you around town before.
engSearchText:
But you look just like normal people. I might've even
seen you around town before.
jpnChrName: 皆さんどこかで、 見かけた事があるような方々ですわね。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんどこかで、
見かけた事があるような方々ですわね。

engChrName: You probably have. Our office is in Old Town.
engSearchText: You probably have. Our office is in Old Town.
jpnChrName: それもそうだろ、事務所が旧市街にあるからな。
jpnSearchText: それもそうだろ、事務所が旧市街にあるからな。

engChrName: I know some stuff about you and your son. He's studying for high school entrance exams, right?
engSearchText:
I know some stuff about you and your son.
He's studying for high school entrance exams, right?
jpnChrName: アンタと例の息子の事も知ってるぜ。 確か、高校受験に向けて頑張ってるんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
アンタと例の息子の事も知ってるぜ。
確か、高校受験に向けて頑張ってるんだったか？

engChrName: Wow, you weren't kidding! You really do know about us!
engSearchText:
Wow, you weren't kidding! You really do know
about us!
jpnChrName: あら、よくご存知ですわね！
jpnSearchText: あら、よくご存知ですわね！

engChrName: But you're right. We're hoping he'll be able to get into Aramis Academy, so I've been having him rigorously study every day.
engSearchText:
But you're right. We're hoping he'll be able to get
into Aramis Academy, so I've been having him
rigorously study every day.
jpnChrName: 今はアラミス高等学校に入学させる為に 毎日猛勉強をさせている所でして。
jpnSearchText:
今はアラミス高等学校に入学させる為に
毎日猛勉強をさせている所でして。

engChrName: His grades were in a bit of a rut for a while, but they have thankfully started improving.
engSearchText:
His grades were in a bit of a rut for a while, but they
have thankfully started improving.
jpnChrName: 一時期は成績が伸び悩んでいましたけど、 今は順調に成績を上げているみたいですの。
jpnSearchText:
一時期は成績が伸び悩んでいましたけど、
今は順調に成績を上げているみたいですの。

engChrName: Not that I ever doubted him, of course. He's my son, so of course he's capable!
engSearchText:
Not that I ever doubted him, of course. He's my son,
so of course he's capable!
jpnChrName: うふふ、わたくしの息子なら このくらい出来て当然ですけどね！
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、わたくしの息子なら
このくらい出来て当然ですけどね！

engChrName: If he keeps this up, he surely will nail a spot in the academy at the tippy top of his class! ♪
engSearchText:
If he keeps this up, he surely will nail a spot in the
academy at the tippy top of his class! ♪
jpnChrName: この調子なら、成績一位での入学も 夢じゃないかもしれませんわ～♪
jpnSearchText:
この調子なら、成績一位での入学も
夢じゃないかもしれませんわ～♪

engChrName: (Mom's real, er, passionate about her kid's education...)
engSearchText:
(Mom's real, er, passionate about her
kid's education...)
jpnChrName: （いかにも教育ママって感じね。）
jpnSearchText: （いかにも教育ママって感じね。）

engChrName: (I don't think it's inherently wrong to want your child to succeed, but she might be taking it a bit too far...)
engSearchText:
(I don't think it's inherently wrong to want your child
to succeed, but she might be taking it a bit too far...)
jpnChrName: （息子さんに期待をかけるのは   悪い事じゃないと思うんだけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（息子さんに期待をかけるのは
悪い事じゃないと思うんだけど……）

engChrName: But right as he's starting to show some promise, the situation turns dire. Curtis has been behaving really strange as of late.
engSearchText:
But right as he's starting to show some promise, the
situation turns dire. Curtis has been behaving really
strange as of late.
jpnChrName: でも、そんな矢先にカーチスの態度が 急におかしくなってしまったんですの。
jpnSearchText:
でも、そんな矢先にカーチスの態度が
急におかしくなってしまったんですの。

engChrName: He's become violent all of a sudden. Yelling really loudly, hitting things.
engSearchText:
He's become violent all of a sudden. Yelling really
loudly, hitting things.
jpnChrName: 大きな声で怒鳴るし、物に当たるし…… 言動が粗暴になってしまって。
jpnSearchText:
大きな声で怒鳴るし、物に当たるし……
言動が粗暴になってしまって。

engChrName: And he's never done that before?
engSearchText: And he's never done that before?
jpnChrName: 急に、ですか……
jpnSearchText: 急に、ですか……

engChrName: I can see why you would be concerned.
engSearchText: I can see why you would be concerned.
jpnChrName: それは心配にもなるな。
jpnSearchText: それは心配にもなるな。

engChrName: Never in his life! He's always been a good boy. He must be in some awful company if he's acting this way! That's the most logical explanation!
engSearchText:
Never in his life! He's always been a good boy.
He must be in some awful company if he's acting
this way! That's the most logical explanation!
jpnChrName: ええ、今までこんな事は無かったですし、 きっと悪い友達ができてしまったんですわ！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、今までこんな事は無かったですし、
きっと悪い友達ができてしまったんですわ！

engChrName: I take my eyes off him for a moment, and this happens... That's why I need you. Please, figure out what happened to my precious Curtis!
engSearchText:
I take my eyes off him for a moment, and
this happens... That's why I need you. Please, figure
out what happened to my precious Curtis!
jpnChrName: だから貴方達には、わたくしの知らない所で カーチスに何があったのか調べて欲しいんですの。
jpnSearchText:
だから貴方達には、わたくしの知らない所で
カーチスに何があったのか調べて欲しいんですの。

engChrName: (So what if he's gotten a little sassy? I'd wanna curse myself mute if I was getting choked like this 24/7.)
engSearchText:
(So what if he's gotten a little sassy? I'd wanna curse
myself mute if I was getting choked like this 24/7.)
jpnChrName: （少し態度がデカくなっただけで、   息子に対して干渉し過ぎじゃねえか？）
jpnSearchText:
（少し態度がデカくなっただけで、
息子に対して干渉し過ぎじゃねえか？）

engChrName: (Really? I don't think it would hurt to look around a little and make sure he isn't falling in with a bad crowd, just to be safe.)
engSearchText:
(Really? I don't think it would hurt to look around a
little and make sure he isn't falling in with a bad
crowd, just to be safe.)
jpnChrName: （でも、本当に悪いお付き合いをしているのか   確認だけでもしておいた方がいいのでは……？）
jpnSearchText:
（でも、本当に悪いお付き合いをしているのか
確認だけでもしておいた方がいいのでは……？）

engChrName: What do you think, Van? Should we help her?
engSearchText: What do you think, Van? Should we help her?
jpnChrName: どうしましょうか、ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: どうしましょうか、ヴァンさん？

engChrName: My son Curtis has started to act violently all of a sudden.
engSearchText:
My son Curtis has started to act violently all of
a sudden.
jpnChrName: カーチスときたら、 急に粗暴な態度をとるようになったんですの。
jpnSearchText:
カーチスときたら、
急に粗暴な態度をとるようになったんですの。

engChrName: I'm worried he's made some bad friends right as his grades have started to show real promise.
engSearchText:
I'm worried he's made some bad friends right as his
grades have started to show real promise.
jpnChrName: 成績が上がって来たこの大事な時期に、 悪い友達でも出来たのか、何なのか……
jpnSearchText:
成績が上がって来たこの大事な時期に、
悪い友達でも出来たのか、何なのか……

engChrName: I need you to find out what happened to him when I took my eyes off him.
engSearchText:
I need you to find out what happened to him when I
took my eyes off him.
jpnChrName: わたくしの知らない所でカーチスに 何があったのか調べて欲しいんですの。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしの知らない所でカーチスに
何があったのか調べて欲しいんですの。

engChrName: What do you think, Van? Should we help her?
engSearchText: What do you think, Van? Should we help her?
jpnChrName: どうしましょうか、ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: どうしましょうか、ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Maybe... Give me a minute to think about it.
engSearchText: Maybe... Give me a minute to think about it.
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: I'm willin' to help, but we need to get some stuff done beforehand.
engSearchText:
I'm willin' to help, but we need to get some stuff
done beforehand.
jpnChrName: 請け負っても構わねえが、 すぐには取りかかれねえ状況だ。
jpnSearchText:
請け負っても構わねえが、
すぐには取りかかれねえ状況だ。

engChrName: You okay waitin' a bit?
engSearchText: You okay waitin' a bit?
jpnChrName: それでもいいか？
jpnSearchText: それでもいいか？

engChrName: *sigh* I'd rather not, but I can if I must. Don't let me keep you.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'd rather not, but I can if I must. Don't let me
keep you.
jpnChrName: 仕方がないわね…… 分かったわ、待たせてもらうとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
仕方がないわね……
分かったわ、待たせてもらうとしましょう。

engChrName: All right, we'll take the case.
engSearchText: All right, we'll take the case.
jpnChrName: 分かった、ウチで請け負う事にしよう。
jpnSearchText: 分かった、ウチで請け負う事にしよう。

engChrName: Fantastic! Thank you so much.
engSearchText: Fantastic! Thank you so much.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: If you don't mind me asking, ma'am, where is Curtis right now?
engSearchText:
If you don't mind me asking, ma'am, where is Curtis
right now?
jpnChrName: ちなみに、そのカーチスさんは 今どちらにいらっしゃるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、そのカーチスさんは
今どちらにいらっしゃるんですか？

engChrName: He's out buying some reference material.
engSearchText: He's out buying some reference material.
jpnChrName: ああ、今は参考書を買う為に出かけていますわ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、今は参考書を買う為に出かけていますわ。

engChrName: There's a book store in the Tyrell District we like to shop at. I imagine he's there.
engSearchText:
There's a book store in the Tyrell District we like to
shop at. I imagine he's there.
jpnChrName: 行きつけのタイレル地区の 本屋に行っているんじゃないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
行きつけのタイレル地区の
本屋に行っているんじゃないかしら。

engChrName: Oh, so he's out right now. Perfect.
engSearchText: Oh, so he's out right now. Perfect.
jpnChrName: ほう、ソイツは好都合だな。
jpnSearchText: ほう、ソイツは好都合だな。

engChrName: Before we start with anything else, mind if we search his room?
engSearchText:
Before we start with anything else, mind if we search
his room?
jpnChrName: それならまずは、カーチスの部屋を 調べさせてもらってもいいか？
jpnSearchText:
それならまずは、カーチスの部屋を
調べさせてもらってもいいか？

engChrName: I ain't too hot on diggin' through a teen's room like that, but it's the most obvious place to start lookin'.
engSearchText:
I ain't too hot on diggin' through a teen's room like
that, but it's the most obvious place to start lookin'.
jpnChrName: 思春期の青年の部屋を漁るのはしのびねえが、 捜査の取っ掛かりにはなるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
思春期の青年の部屋を漁るのはしのびねえが、
捜査の取っ掛かりにはなるだろう。

engChrName: I understand. You can search his room. Follow me upstairs.
engSearchText:
I understand. You can search his room. Follow
me upstairs.
jpnChrName: ええ、そういう事なら構いませんわよ。 早速上の階に行きましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そういう事なら構いませんわよ。
早速上の階に行きましょうか。

engChrName: Bet you anything he's got all the good dirty mags hidden under his mattress.
engSearchText:
Bet you anything he's got all the good dirty mags
hidden under his mattress.
jpnChrName: どこにエロ本が隠してあんのか 探すのが楽しみだな。
jpnSearchText:
どこにエロ本が隠してあんのか
探すのが楽しみだな。

engChrName: How did I know you were gonna say that?
engSearchText: How did I know you were gonna say that?
jpnChrName: 言うと思ったぜ。
jpnSearchText: 言うと思ったぜ。

engChrName: Quest Problem Child started!
engSearchText: Quest Problem Child started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【乱暴になった息子】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>乱暴になった息子<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Here you are. This is Curtis' room.
engSearchText: Here you are. This is Curtis' room.
jpnChrName: ここがカーチスの部屋になりますわ。
jpnSearchText: ここがカーチスの部屋になりますわ。

engChrName: Thanks for showing us. All right, let's get this done before the kid's back home.
engSearchText:
Thanks for showing us. All right, let's get this done
before the kid's back home.
jpnChrName: それじゃカーチスが帰って来る前に 部屋を調べさせてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃカーチスが帰って来る前に
部屋を調べさせてもらうとするか。

engChrName: Van and the rest started combing through Curtis' bedroom.
engSearchText:
Van and the rest started combing through
Curtis' bedroom.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァン達は カーチスの部屋の捜索を開始した。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァン達は
カーチスの部屋の捜索を開始した。

engChrName: At first, they found nothing of note that could plausibly explain his violent turn in behavior.
engSearchText:
At first, they found nothing of note that could
plausibly explain his violent turn in behavior.
jpnChrName: 模試の赤点のテストなど、 彼が隠していた物はいくつか見つかったが……
jpnSearchText:
模試の赤点のテストなど、
彼が隠していた物はいくつか見つかったが……

engChrName: The only objects kept hidden were mock exams with failing scores.
engSearchText:
