The only objects kept hidden were mock exams with
failing scores.
jpnChrName: 粗暴な言動をとるようになった原因が 分かるような物は見つからなかった。
jpnSearchText:
粗暴な言動をとるようになった原因が
分かるような物は見つからなかった。

engChrName: But a few minutes later...
engSearchText: But a few minutes later...
jpnChrName: そして数分後……
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして数分後……

engChrName: Well, look at that.
engSearchText: Well, look at that.
jpnChrName: おっ……コイツは……
jpnSearchText: おっ……コイツは……

engChrName: Did you find something, Van?
engSearchText: Did you find something, Van?
jpnChrName: 何か見つけましたか？
jpnSearchText: 何か見つけましたか？

engChrName: You bet. Take a look at what I found tucked away inside the desk drawer.
engSearchText:
You bet. Take a look at what I found tucked away
inside the desk drawer.
jpnChrName: ああ、机の引き出しの奥から こんなモンが見つかったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、机の引き出しの奥から
こんなモンが見つかったぜ。

engChrName: A mint tin? It looks empty.
engSearchText: A mint tin? It looks empty.
jpnChrName: ミントタブレットのケースですか。 中身は空みたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ミントタブレットのケースですか。
中身は空みたいですね。

engChrName: I don't think I recognize the brand. Could you explain what it is?
engSearchText:
I don't think I recognize the brand. Could you
explain what it is?
jpnChrName: あまり見た事のないパッケージだけど……
jpnSearchText: あまり見た事のないパッケージだけど……

engChrName: They sell tobacco-flavored mints inside these suckers. You only get them if you're smoking or trying to quit.
engSearchText:
They sell tobacco-flavored mints inside these suckers.
You only get them if you're smoking or trying to quit.
jpnChrName: コイツはタバコの味がするタブレットだな。 喫煙者やら禁煙したいヤツが食べるような代物だ。
jpnSearchText:
コイツはタバコの味がするタブレットだな。
喫煙者やら禁煙したいヤツが食べるような代物だ。

engChrName: That would explain why it doesn't smell like cigs in here. He could've been chewing on those instead of lighting one up.
engSearchText:
That would explain why it doesn't smell like cigs
in here. He could've been chewing on those instead of
lighting one up.
jpnChrName: この部屋がヤニ臭くねえ所をみると、 本物のタバコの代わりにコイツを食べてたのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
この部屋がヤニ臭くねえ所をみると、
本物のタバコの代わりにコイツを食べてたのかもな。

engChrName: They taste like WHAT?!
engSearchText: They taste like WHAT?!
jpnChrName: な、なんですって！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>な、なんですって！？

engChrName: They might not be the real thing, but only delinquents even THINK about smoking at his age!
engSearchText:
They might not be the real thing, but only
delinquents even THINK about smoking at his age!
jpnChrName: 本物ではないとはいえ、 タバコを吸いたがるなんて不良そのものじゃないッ！
jpnSearchText:
本物ではないとはいえ、
タバコを吸いたがるなんて不良そのものじゃないッ！

engChrName: Oh, my poor Curtis. Where did I go wrong with you? I thought I raised you to be such a good boy...
engSearchText:
Oh, my poor Curtis. Where did I go wrong with you?
I thought I raised you to be such a good boy...
jpnChrName: ああ……あんなにまっ直ぐに育っていた カーチスがどうしてこんな事に……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ……あんなにまっ直ぐに育っていた
カーチスがどうしてこんな事に……！

engChrName: Let's not get ahead of ourselves. We might be missing something that explains why he had this tin.
engSearchText:
Let's not get ahead of ourselves. We might be missing
something that explains why he had this tin.
jpnChrName: 落ち着いて下さい、 なにか事情があるのかもしれませんし……
jpnSearchText:
落ち着いて下さい、
なにか事情があるのかもしれませんし……

engChrName: I know EXACTLY why he had it! It's all my husband's fault! Him and that scandal of his that got him demoted from the Bank of Edith.
engSearchText:
I know EXACTLY why he had it! It's all my
husband's fault! Him and that scandal of his that got
him demoted from the Bank of Edith.
jpnChrName: それもこれも……旦那が不祥事を起こして ＢＯＥ（バンク・オブ・イーディス）から左遷されたせいですわっ！
jpnSearchText:
それもこれも……旦那が不祥事を起こして
ＢＯＥ（バンク・オブ・イーディス）から左遷されたせいですわっ！

engChrName: We were forced to move into Old Town because of that. If we were living in a safer neighborhood, my son wouldn't be straying from the path!
engSearchText:
We were forced to move into Old Town because
of that. If we were living in a safer neighborhood, my
son wouldn't be straying from the path!
jpnChrName: そのせいで旧市街なんかに引っ越す羽目になって…… 環境が悪化したからカーチスも不良になったのよ！
jpnSearchText:
そのせいで旧市街なんかに引っ越す羽目になって……
環境が悪化したからカーチスも不良になったのよ！

engChrName: My husband was supposed to start working at a subsidiary once he was out of probation.
engSearchText:
My husband was supposed to start working at a
subsidiary once he was out of probation.
jpnChrName: しかもあの人ったら、謹慎が明けて 子会社で働きだしたのはいいのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
しかもあの人ったら、謹慎が明けて
子会社で働きだしたのはいいのだけど……

engChrName: But where do I end up finding him instead? Montmart! I caught him eating there AGAIN without a care in the world while I was out shopping.
engSearchText:
But where do I end up finding him instead?
Montmart! I caught him eating there AGAIN
without a care in the world while I was out shopping.
jpnChrName: 買い出しの途中にふと見てみたら、 またモンマルトで暢気に食事なんかして！
jpnSearchText:
買い出しの途中にふと見てみたら、
またモンマルトで暢気に食事なんかして！

engChrName: Absolutely ridiculous! Has he been working this whole time, or just pulling the wool over my eyes? I can't trust him anymore. Would you?
engSearchText:
Absolutely ridiculous! Has he been working this
whole time, or just pulling the wool over my eyes?
I can't trust him anymore. Would you?
jpnChrName: 本当に子会社で働いているのかしら！？ それすらも疑わしいくらいですわっ！
jpnSearchText:
本当に子会社で働いているのかしら！？
それすらも疑わしいくらいですわっ！

engChrName: Wow... She just keeps going.
engSearchText: Wow... She just keeps going.
jpnChrName: うーん……旦那さんへの文句が止まりませんね。
jpnSearchText: うーん……旦那さんへの文句が止まりませんね。

engChrName: *sigh* Anyway, this tin gives us a good jumping off point. We'll keep sniffin' around and see what we turn up.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Anyway, this tin gives us a good jumping
off point. We'll keep sniffin' around and see what we
turn up.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……とにかく、コイツをとっかかりに ヤツに何があったのか調べてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……とにかく、コイツをとっかかりに
ヤツに何があったのか調べてみるぞ。

engChrName: *ahem* Pardon my outburst. I'll leave you all to it. I'll be waiting for your report downstairs.
engSearchText:
*ahem* Pardon my outburst. I'll leave you all to it.
I'll be waiting for your report downstairs.
jpnChrName: コホン……それじゃあ後はよろしく頼みますわよ。 わたくしは下で報告を待たせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
コホン……それじゃあ後はよろしく頼みますわよ。
わたくしは下で報告を待たせてもらうわ。

engChrName: What's the matter, Van? Did you notice something else?
engSearchText:
What's the matter, Van? Did you notice
something else?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、もしかして他に気になる事でも？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、もしかして他に気になる事でも？

engChrName: Yeah. The tin still stinks. It's faint, but you can still get a whiff if you get real close to it.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The tin still stinks. It's faint, but you can still
get a whiff if you get real close to it.
jpnChrName: ああ……このケースに残ったミントの香り。 そいつに混じって“匂う”んだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……このケースに残ったミントの香り。
そいつに混じって“匂う”んだよ。

engChrName: It smells just like an orbal hookah. Feels like a lifetime ago, but I'd recognize that smell anywhere.
engSearchText:
It smells just like an orbal hookah. Feels like a
lifetime ago, but I'd recognize that smell anywhere.
jpnChrName: 今じゃ懐かしいくらいだが、 あの導力シーシャのフレーバーの香りがな。
jpnSearchText:
今じゃ懐かしいくらいだが、
あの導力シーシャのフレーバーの香りがな。

engChrName: What? Really?!
engSearchText: What? Really?!
jpnChrName: 本当ですか……！
jpnSearchText: 本当ですか……！

engChrName: And here I thought we were finally done with that bullshit.
engSearchText:
And here I thought we were finally done with
that bullshit.
jpnChrName: ここに来てその名前を聞くとはな……
jpnSearchText: ここに来てその名前を聞くとはな……

engChrName: I remember you telling me about that case. Hmm...
engSearchText: I remember you telling me about that case. Hmm...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん達から話は聞いてたけど……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん達から話は聞いてたけど……

engChrName: I don't know if I'm more surprised by the orbal hookahs coming back OR that hound's nose of yours picking up the smell.
engSearchText:
I don't know if I'm more surprised by the orbal
hookahs coming back OR that hound's nose of yours
picking up the smell.
jpnChrName: 残り香だけで本当に分かるの？ って普通なら言いたい所だけど……
jpnSearchText:
残り香だけで本当に分かるの？
って普通なら言いたい所だけど……

engChrName: I don't doubt Mr. Arkride's right about it, but the CID and the police were supposed to have confiscated all of them.
engSearchText:
I don't doubt Mr. Arkride's right about it, but the
CID and the police were supposed to have
confiscated all of them.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤと警察が全て回収したはずですが…… ヴァン様がそう仰るのなら間違いないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤと警察が全て回収したはずですが……
ヴァン様がそう仰るのなら間違いないでしょう。

engChrName: You mean the drug that A developed and peddled through Vegas Films?
engSearchText:
You mean the drug that A developed and peddled
through Vegas Films?
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムを利用して 《Ａ》が開発し広めていたドラッグだったか。
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルムを利用して
《Ａ》が開発し広めていたドラッグだったか。

engChrName: I don't remember hearing about that stuff coming in tablets.
engSearchText:
I don't remember hearing about that stuff coming
in tablets.
jpnChrName: しかも、タブレット状のものなんて 聞いた事がありませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
しかも、タブレット状のものなんて
聞いた事がありませんよ。

engChrName: Where did he get something like that?
engSearchText: Where did he get something like that?
jpnChrName: 一体どこで手に入れたんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: 一体どこで手に入れたんでしょうか？

engChrName: I worry for how his health might be affected...
engSearchText: I worry for how his health might be affected...
jpnChrName: カーチスさんの身体への影響も心配ですね……
jpnSearchText: カーチスさんの身体への影響も心配ですね……

engChrName: All right, chief. What's the plan? Do we go straight to the kid and get him to spill?
engSearchText:
All right, chief. What's the plan? Do we go straight
to the kid and get him to spill?
jpnChrName: どうすんだ？　本人に話を聞いてみんのかよ。
jpnSearchText: どうすんだ？　本人に話を聞いてみんのかよ。

engChrName: No. We need to figure out where these things came from in the first place.
engSearchText:
No. We need to figure out where these things came
from in the first place.
jpnChrName: いや……まずはこのタブレットの出所を調べてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: いや……まずはこのタブレットの出所を調べてみるぞ。

engChrName: Right now, this stays between us. Nothing good can come of his mom catching wind of this.
engSearchText:
Right now, this stays between us. Nothing good can
come of his mom catching wind of this.
jpnChrName: 話がややこしくなっちまうから、 とりあえずドラッグの件は隠していこう。
jpnSearchText:
話がややこしくなっちまうから、
とりあえずドラッグの件は隠していこう。

engChrName: With a firecracker of a mom like that, I can only imagine.
engSearchText:
With a firecracker of a mom like that, I can
only imagine.
jpnChrName: ハッ、なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、なるほどな。

engChrName: Since we're talking about tobacco-flavored mints, maybe a cigarette seller would know something.
engSearchText:
Since we're talking about tobacco-flavored mints,
maybe a cigarette seller would know something.
jpnChrName: タバコのフレーバーのタブレットとなると、 タバコ屋さんなら何か知ってるでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
タバコのフレーバーのタブレットとなると、
タバコ屋さんなら何か知ってるでしょうか？

engChrName: If his father smokes, too, that could also lead somewhere.
engSearchText:
If his father smokes, too, that could also
lead somewhere.
jpnChrName: 父親が喫煙者だった場合は そちらの線も考えられますよね。
jpnSearchText:
父親が喫煙者だった場合は
そちらの線も考えられますよね。

engChrName: Agreed. Might as well look into both of those.
engSearchText: Agreed. Might as well look into both of those.
jpnChrName: ああ、両方に聞き込みをしてみるか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、両方に聞き込みをしてみるか。

engChrName: The mom said something about her husband eating at Montmart.
engSearchText:
The mom said something about her husband eating
at Montmart.
jpnChrName: 確か父親の方はモンマルトで 食事をしてるとか言ってたか……？
jpnSearchText:
確か父親の方はモンマルトで
食事をしてるとか言ってたか……？

engChrName: Got a minute? We want to ask something about your son.
engSearchText:
Got a minute? We want to ask something about
your son.
jpnChrName: ちょっといいか？ アンタの息子について聞きてえんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ちょっといいか？
アンタの息子について聞きてえんだが……

engChrName: Van explained the request from Roman's wife and summarized the team's findings thus far.
engSearchText:
Van explained the request from Roman's wife and
summarized the team's findings thus far.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達は母親から依頼を受けた旨を伝え、 調査の現状についてかいつまんで説明した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達は母親から依頼を受けた旨を伝え、
調査の現状についてかいつまんで説明した。

engChrName: What?! My son is chewing on tobacco-flavored mints?!
engSearchText:
What?! My son is chewing on
tobacco-flavored mints?!
jpnChrName: なにぃ！　息子がタバコのフレーバーの タブレットを食べていただと！？
jpnSearchText:
なにぃ！　息子がタバコのフレーバーの
タブレットを食べていただと！？

engChrName: I can't believe it. He's never been the brightest at school, but I didn't think he'd be THAT stupid!
engSearchText:
I can't believe it. He's never been the brightest at
school, but I didn't think he'd be THAT stupid!
jpnChrName: 信じられん……成績が安定しないとは思っていたが そこまでバカ息子だったとはな！
jpnSearchText:
信じられん……成績が安定しないとは思っていたが
そこまでバカ息子だったとはな！

engChrName: S-Sir, please, calm down.
engSearchText: S-Sir, please, calm down.
jpnChrName: お、落ち着いて下さい……！
jpnSearchText: お、落ち着いて下さい……！

engChrName: As an aside, do you smoke at all yourself?
engSearchText: As an aside, do you smoke at all yourself?
jpnChrName: ちなみに聞きてえんだが、 アンタ自身はタバコは吸わねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに聞きてえんだが、
アンタ自身はタバコは吸わねえのか？

engChrName: Goddess, no.
engSearchText: Goddess, no.
jpnChrName: いいや、俺は吸わんぞ。
jpnSearchText: いいや、俺は吸わんぞ。

engChrName: Why would I? The smell would only make our clients uncomfortable.
engSearchText:
Why would I? The smell would only make our
clients uncomfortable.
jpnChrName: 商談の時にタバコの匂いを 嫌がる客もいるからな。
jpnSearchText:
商談の時にタバコの匂いを
嫌がる客もいるからな。

engChrName: Then do you have any idea why Curtis would be taking those tablets? Any idea at all?
engSearchText:
Then do you have any idea why Curtis would be
taking those tablets? Any idea at all?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、カーチスさんがそのタブレットに 手を出した原因に心当たりはありますか？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、カーチスさんがそのタブレットに
手を出した原因に心当たりはありますか？

engChrName: Oh, I know what's going on with him!
engSearchText: Oh, I know what's going on with him!
jpnChrName: ハッ、そんなの決まっているだろう！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そんなの決まっているだろう！

engChrName: Boy must be getting lazy. Tired of studying for entrance exams, so he must be taking them as a distraction.
engSearchText:
Boy must be getting lazy. Tired of studying for
entrance exams, so he must be taking them as
a distraction.
jpnChrName: どうせアラミスへの受験に嫌気が差して、 現実逃避するために手を出したんだろうよ。
jpnSearchText:
どうせアラミスへの受験に嫌気が差して、
現実逃避するために手を出したんだろうよ。

engChrName: What an embarrassment. He's getting real spoiled if he thinks he can get away with all of this nonsense.
engSearchText:
What an embarrassment. He's getting real spoiled if
he thinks he can get away with all of this nonsense.
jpnChrName: 全く……俺が若い頃は、寝食も忘れて 勉強に打ち込んでいたというのに！
jpnSearchText:
全く……俺が若い頃は、寝食も忘れて
勉強に打ち込んでいたというのに！

engChrName: When I was his age, I was so focused on my studies, I didn't even eat or sleep!
engSearchText:
When I was his age, I was so focused on my studies, I
didn't even eat or sleep!
jpnChrName: 現実逃避をするような 甘ったれた精神からしていかんのだ！
jpnSearchText:
現実逃避をするような
甘ったれた精神からしていかんのだ！

engChrName: Just what in Gehenna is Zora doing raising our son for him to turn out like that?!
engSearchText:
Just what in Gehenna is Zora doing raising our son
for him to turn out like that?!
jpnChrName: ゾーラの教育方針はどうなっているんだ、全く……！
jpnSearchText: ゾーラの教育方針はどうなっているんだ、全く……！

engChrName: (What's his problem?! I get that he's mad, but he's still the kid's dad!)
engSearchText:
(What's his problem?! I get that he's mad, but he's
still the kid's dad!)
jpnChrName: （なんなのコイツ！   勝手な事ばっかり言って、それでも父親！？）
jpnSearchText:
（なんなのコイツ！
勝手な事ばっかり言って、それでも父親！？）

engChrName: (Hmm... It sounds like the parents themselves have some issues to work through.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... It sounds like the parents themselves have
some issues to work through.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ……両親にも問題がありそうだな。）
jpnSearchText: （ふむ……両親にも問題がありそうだな。）

engChrName: (With parents like these, kid was gonna start acting out sooner or later.)
engSearchText:
(With parents like these, kid was gonna start acting
out sooner or later.)
jpnChrName: （まあこんな親父とあんな母親じゃ、   息子がグレるのも時間の問題だったろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあこんな親父とあんな母親じゃ、
息子がグレるのも時間の問題だったろ。）

engChrName: Thanks for the info. We'll get outta your hair now.
engSearchText: Thanks for the info. We'll get outta your hair now.
jpnChrName: 情報提供ありがとよ。
jpnSearchText: 情報提供ありがとよ。

engChrName: Well, that's both people on our list.
engSearchText: Well, that's both people on our list.
jpnChrName: とりあえずこれで聞き込みは終わりましたね。
jpnSearchText: とりあえずこれで聞き込みは終わりましたね。

engChrName: And none of it helped. Dad didn't really tell us anything new about the kid, and we got no info to go on about those mints.
engSearchText:
And none of it helped. Dad didn't really tell us
anything new about the kid, and we got no info to go
on about those mints.
jpnChrName: タブレットの出所も、カーチス本人についても 特に新しい情報は無かったな。
jpnSearchText:
タブレットの出所も、カーチス本人についても
特に新しい情報は無かったな。

engChrName: Guess the last stop's that bookstore his mom mentioned.
engSearchText:
Guess the last stop's that bookstore his
mom mentioned.
jpnChrName: こうなったら、カーチスの行きつけっつう タイレルの本屋にでも行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら、カーチスの行きつけっつう
タイレルの本屋にでも行ってみるか。

engChrName: He might not even be there, but it can't hurt to talk to him if he is.
engSearchText:
He might not even be there, but it can't hurt to talk
to him if he is.
jpnChrName: 本人と会えるかどうかは分からねえが、 いたら話も聞いてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
本人と会えるかどうかは分からねえが、
いたら話も聞いてみるぞ。

engChrName: If he's not, we can always ask the staff. They might know something!
engSearchText:
If he's not, we can always ask the staff. They might
know something!
jpnChrName: そうですね、行きつけなら 店員さんから話を聞けるかもしれませんし！
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、行きつけなら
店員さんから話を聞けるかもしれませんし！

engChrName: Sorry to interrupt your class. Can we have a quick chat?
engSearchText:
Sorry to interrupt your class. Can we have a
quick chat?
jpnChrName: 授業中のとこすまねえが、 ちょっといいか？
jpnSearchText:
授業中のとこすまねえが、
ちょっといいか？

engChrName: We wanted to ask about a kid we've been hired to look into. Name's Curtis.
engSearchText:
We wanted to ask about a kid we've been hired to
look into. Name's Curtis.
jpnChrName: カーチスっつう子供について 聞きてえことがあるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
カーチスっつう子供について
聞きてえことがあるんだが……

engChrName: *sigh* Of all the times... I guess we can if it really can't wait.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Of all the times... I guess we can if it really
can't wait.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… 急ぎってんなら仕方ないが。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
急ぎってんなら仕方ないが。

engChrName: Let's go somewhere else.
engSearchText: Let's go somewhere else.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、場所を移すよ。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず、場所を移すよ。

engChrName: Van explained the request he and the others received from Curtis' mother.
engSearchText:
Van explained the request he and the others received
from Curtis' mother.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達はカーチスの母親から 依頼を受けた旨を伝え……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達はカーチスの母親から
依頼を受けた旨を伝え……

engChrName: They also explained his stark change in personality.
engSearchText: They also explained his stark change in personality.
jpnChrName: カーチスの変化についてかいつまんで説明した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>カーチスの変化についてかいつまんで説明した。

engChrName: Right, okay.
engSearchText: Right, okay.
jpnChrName: フン、成程ね。
jpnSearchText: フン、成程ね。

engChrName: Not gonna lie, I think his parents are making a storm in a teacup. Kid's not gonna turn into some hardened criminal because of this.
engSearchText:
Not gonna lie, I think his parents are making a storm
in a teacup. Kid's not gonna turn into some hardened
criminal because of this.
jpnChrName: アタシからすれば、それしきの事で 不良だなんて騒いでる親の方が馬鹿らしいが。
jpnSearchText:
アタシからすれば、それしきの事で
不良だなんて騒いでる親の方が馬鹿らしいが。

engChrName: But to answer your question, I do know who you're talking about. He came to my tobacco kiosk about an hour ago.
engSearchText:
But to answer your question, I do know who you're
talking about. He came to my tobacco kiosk about
an hour ago.
jpnChrName: ……カーチスの事なら知ってるよ。 つい１時間くらい前にタバコ屋に来たからね。
jpnSearchText:
……カーチスの事なら知ってるよ。
つい１時間くらい前にタバコ屋に来たからね。

engChrName: He did?!
engSearchText: He did?!
jpnChrName: 本当ですか！
jpnSearchText: 本当ですか！

engChrName: Yeah. He asked if I had any tobacco-flavored mints for sale.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He asked if I had any tobacco-flavored mints
for sale.
jpnChrName: ああ、まさに『タバコ味のミントタブレットは 売ってないのか』って聞いてきたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、まさに『タバコ味のミントタブレットは
売ってないのか』って聞いてきたよ。

engChrName: I told him I don't sell them and that, even if I did, a kid like him shouldn't go anywhere near them.
engSearchText:
I told him I don't sell them and that, even if I did, a
kid like him shouldn't go anywhere near them.
jpnChrName: ウチじゃ取り扱ってないし、そもそも未成年が そんなモンに手を出すなって言ったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ウチじゃ取り扱ってないし、そもそも未成年が
そんなモンに手を出すなって言ったんだが。

engChrName: He got all huffy and started yelling. Called me an old hag, which was nice of him.
engSearchText:
He got all huffy and started yelling. Called me an old
hag, which was nice of him.
jpnChrName: そしたら逆にアタシが怒鳴られちまったよ。 『ババアは黙ってろ！』ってね。
jpnSearchText:
そしたら逆にアタシが怒鳴られちまったよ。
『ババアは黙ってろ！』ってね。

engChrName: Wow... I'm so sorry you had to deal with that.
engSearchText: Wow... I'm so sorry you had to deal with that.
jpnChrName: そんな事が……
jpnSearchText: そんな事が……

engChrName: Damn, kid's got balls to say that to your face. What'd he do after that?
engSearchText:
Damn, kid's got balls to say that to your face.
What'd he do after that?
jpnChrName: 怖いもの知らずだな…… で、その後ヤツはどうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
怖いもの知らずだな……
で、その後ヤツはどうしたんだ？

engChrName: Beats me. My guess is he went looking for some other place he could sucker into selling him those mints.
engSearchText:
Beats me. My guess is he went looking for some other
place he could sucker into selling him those mints.
jpnChrName: さてね……だがあの様子だと 他の店に探しに行ったんじゃないかい？
jpnSearchText:
さてね……だがあの様子だと
他の店に探しに行ったんじゃないかい？

engChrName: Makes sense. Thanks for the info.
engSearchText: Makes sense. Thanks for the info.
jpnChrName: そうか……情報提供ありがとよ。
jpnSearchText: そうか……情報提供ありがとよ。

engChrName: Well, that's both people on our list.
engSearchText: Well, that's both people on our list.
jpnChrName: とりあえずこれで聞き込みは終わりましたね。
jpnSearchText: とりあえずこれで聞き込みは終わりましたね。

engChrName: And none of it helped. Dad didn't really tell us anything new about the kid, and we got no info to go on about those mints.
engSearchText:
And none of it helped. Dad didn't really tell us
anything new about the kid, and we got no info to go
on about those mints.
jpnChrName: タブレットの出所も、カーチス本人についても 特に新しい情報は無かったな。
jpnSearchText:
タブレットの出所も、カーチス本人についても
特に新しい情報は無かったな。

engChrName: Guess the last stop's that bookstore his mom mentioned.
engSearchText:
Guess the last stop's that bookstore his
mom mentioned.
jpnChrName: こうなったら、カーチスの行きつけっつう タイレルの本屋にでも行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら、カーチスの行きつけっつう
タイレルの本屋にでも行ってみるか。

engChrName: He might not even be there, but it can't hurt to talk to him if he is.
engSearchText:
He might not even be there, but it can't hurt to talk
to him if he is.
jpnChrName: 本人と会えるかどうかは分からねえが、 いたら話も聞いてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
本人と会えるかどうかは分からねえが、
いたら話も聞いてみるぞ。

engChrName: If he's not, we can always ask the staff. They might know something!
engSearchText:
If he's not, we can always ask the staff. They might
know something!
jpnChrName: そうですね、行きつけなら 店員さんから話を聞けるかもしれませんし！
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、行きつけなら
店員さんから話を聞けるかもしれませんし！

engChrName: Okay. Now that everyone's here, we can get started.
engSearchText: Okay. Now that everyone's here, we can get started.
jpnChrName: さてと……これで必要な面子は揃ったな。
jpnSearchText: さてと……これで必要な面子は揃ったな。

engChrName: Well, what did you find? Was I right? Has Curtis made some bad friends?
engSearchText:
Well, what did you find? Was I right? Has Curtis
made some bad friends?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ説明してもらえるかしら？ やっぱりカーチスは悪い友達でも作っていたの？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ説明してもらえるかしら？
やっぱりカーチスは悪い友達でも作っていたの？

engChrName: Bah, I'm sure it's just a typical rebellious teen phase.
engSearchText: Bah, I'm sure it's just a typical rebellious teen phase.
jpnChrName: ハッ、どうせただの反抗期だろうに。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、どうせただの反抗期だろうに。

engChrName: Let's go over what we found and then we can take things from there.
engSearchText:
Let's go over what we found and then we can take
things from there.
jpnChrName: とりあえずこれまでの調査の 経緯を説明させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえずこれまでの調査の
経緯を説明させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Van began by discussing how Curtis bought the tobacco-flavored mints from a dealer on a whim.
engSearchText:
Van began by discussing how Curtis bought the
tobacco-flavored mints from a dealer on a whim.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは、カーチスが出来心で売人から タバコのフレーバーのタブレットを購入した事と……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは、カーチスが出来心で売人から
タバコのフレーバーのタブレットを購入した事と……

engChrName: Curtis soon had developed a dependency on them, since his academics improved when he used them.
engSearchText:
Curtis soon had developed a dependency on them,
since his academics improved when he used them.
jpnChrName: 食べると勉強が捗る事から、 タブレットに依存していった事を明かした。
jpnSearchText:
食べると勉強が捗る事から、
タブレットに依存していった事を明かした。

engChrName: Van also brought up how the mints were laced with drugs.
engSearchText:
Van also brought up how the mints were laced
with drugs.
jpnChrName: また、そのタブレットには薬物が混入しており、 軽い副作用が現れている事……
jpnSearchText:
また、そのタブレットには薬物が混入しており、
軽い副作用が現れている事……

engChrName: Though the side effects were light, Curtis soon started taking prescription medicine, thinking it would cure him.
engSearchText:
Though the side effects were light, Curtis soon
started taking prescription medicine, thinking it
would cure him.
jpnChrName: 処方薬を飲んでいれば 回復していくだろうという旨を説明した。
jpnSearchText:
処方薬を飲んでいれば
回復していくだろうという旨を説明した。

engChrName: *sigh* This is all so much to take in. I feel so dizzy simply thinking about it...
engSearchText:
*sigh* This is all so much to take in. I feel so dizzy
simply thinking about it...
jpnChrName: ああっ……眩暈がするわ……
jpnSearchText: ああっ……眩暈がするわ……

engChrName: To think my own son would be taking prescription drugs! He's even worse than I could've imagined.
engSearchText:
To think my own son would be taking
prescription drugs! He's even worse than I
could've imagined.
jpnChrName: まさかカーチスが薬物にまで 手を出すほどの不良になっていただなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
まさかカーチスが薬物にまで
手を出すほどの不良になっていただなんて……！

engChrName: I'm very disappointed in you! Is this the thanks I get? After supporting you and your studies unconditionally?!
engSearchText:
I'm very disappointed in you! Is this the
thanks I get? After supporting you and
your studies unconditionally?!
jpnChrName: お母さんはガッカリしたわ！ 何のために勉強を応援して来たと思ってるの！
jpnSearchText:
お母さんはガッカリしたわ！
何のために勉強を応援して来たと思ってるの！

engChrName: What do you have to say for yourself, young man?!
engSearchText:
What do you have to say for yourself,
young man?!
jpnChrName: 弁解する事があるなら言ってみなさい！
jpnSearchText: <S5>弁解する事があるなら言ってみなさい！

engChrName: Keep it down, will you? Or do you want the neighbors to hear you?
engSearchText:
Keep it down, will you? Or do you want the
neighbors to hear you?
jpnChrName: 少しは静かにしないか、 近所の連中に聞かれたらどうするんだ！
jpnSearchText:
少しは静かにしないか、
近所の連中に聞かれたらどうするんだ！

engChrName: As for you... Did you forget that your father just started working again?
engSearchText:
As for you... Did you forget that your father just
started working again?
jpnChrName: 全く……俺はようやく子会社への 出社が始まったばかりなんだぞ？
jpnSearchText:
全く……俺はようやく子会社への
出社が始まったばかりなんだぞ？

engChrName: I don't have time for this nonsense, and yet here you are! Causing me nothing but problems, as if I don't have enough on my plate already!
engSearchText:
I don't have time for this nonsense, and yet here
you are! Causing me nothing but problems, as if I
don't have enough on my plate already!
jpnChrName: それなのにお前は問題ばかり増やして……
jpnSearchText: それなのにお前は問題ばかり増やして……

engChrName: I practically had to beg for some time off work to come have this conversation with you. Are you even aware of what I'm going through?!
engSearchText:
I practically had to beg for some time off work to
come have this conversation with you. Are you even
aware of what I'm going through?!
jpnChrName: 今だって、この俺が頭を下げて 休憩時間を伸ばしてもらって来ているのだぞ？
jpnSearchText:
今だって、この俺が頭を下げて
休憩時間を伸ばしてもらって来ているのだぞ？

engChrName: ...I'm sorry.
engSearchText: ...I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: ……ごめんなさい…………
jpnSearchText: ……ごめんなさい…………

engChrName: *sigh* I'm honestly surprised at the total lack of shame here.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm honestly surprised at the total lack of
shame here.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……やれやれだな。 反省の色も見えねえとは呆れたモンだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……やれやれだな。
反省の色も見えねえとは呆れたモンだぜ。

engChrName: So am I! Are you actually sorry for what you've put us through, young man?!
engSearchText:
So am I! Are you actually sorry for what you've put us
through, young man?!
jpnChrName: ええ、全くですわ！ 本当に反省しているのカーチス！？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、全くですわ！
本当に反省しているのカーチス！？

engChrName: I trust the police aren't going to have to get involved at this point?
engSearchText:
I trust the police aren't going to have to get involved
at this point?
jpnChrName: はぁ……これって警察沙汰にはならないよな？
jpnSearchText: はぁ……これって警察沙汰にはならないよな？

engChrName: The last thing I need is for my son to get arrested. Now THAT will really get me fired.
engSearchText:
The last thing I need is for my son to get arrested.
Now THAT will really get me fired.
jpnChrName: 息子が逮捕されたとなれば 今度こそ会社をクビになってしまう……
jpnSearchText:
息子が逮捕されたとなれば
今度こそ会社をクビになってしまう……

engChrName: No, you two got it all wrong. He's not the one that should be ashamed—it's you two. You should be mortified.
engSearchText:
No, you two got it all wrong. He's not the one that
should be ashamed—it's you two. You should
be mortified.
jpnChrName: 違う違う、反省の色が見えねえのは アンタ達２人だよ。
jpnSearchText:
違う違う、反省の色が見えねえのは
アンタ達２人だよ。

engChrName: Though I guess that's up to you. Can't force either of you to feel guilty.
engSearchText:
Though I guess that's up to you. Can't force either of
you to feel guilty.
jpnChrName: 反省するもしねえも、 そっちの勝手なんだけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
反省するもしねえも、
そっちの勝手なんだけどよ。

engChrName: G-GUILTY?! What should I even feel guilty for?!
engSearchText:
G-GUILTY?! What should I even feel
guilty for?!
jpnChrName: わっ、わたくしですってぇ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>わっ、わたくしですってぇ！？

engChrName: Don't try to change the subject! Curtis is the one that's acting like a delinquent! This isn't about us!
engSearchText:
Don't try to change the subject! Curtis is the one
that's acting like a delinquent! This isn't about us!
jpnChrName: あ、悪事を働いたのはカーチスだろうが！ 話をすり替えるんじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
あ、悪事を働いたのはカーチスだろうが！
話をすり替えるんじゃない！

engChrName: Heh, on the contrary. This is all about you folks.
engSearchText: Heh, on the contrary. This is all about you folks.
jpnChrName: ハッ、どこもすり替わってねえだろ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、どこもすり替わってねえだろ。

engChrName: Or did you forget already? You asked us to figure out why your kid changed. We're serving you the answer on a silver platter.
engSearchText:
Or did you forget already? You asked us to figure out
why your kid changed. We're serving you the answer
on a silver platter.
jpnChrName: 依頼内容は『どうして息子が変わったのか』 原因を知りたいっつう事だったよな？
jpnSearchText:
依頼内容は『どうして息子が変わったのか』
原因を知りたいっつう事だったよな？

engChrName: Curtis was hitting a dead-end with his studies and felt like he was being driven into a corner.
engSearchText:
Curtis was hitting a dead-end with his studies and felt
like he was being driven into a corner.
jpnChrName: カーチスさんは勉強に行き詰って、 追い詰められていたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
カーチスさんは勉強に行き詰って、
追い詰められていたんですよ。

engChrName: ...That may be true. But I fail to see what that has to do with either of us.
engSearchText:
...That may be true. But I fail to see what that has to
do with either of us.
jpnChrName: ……確かにそういう話だったわね。 でもそれがどうしたというの？
jpnSearchText:
……確かにそういう話だったわね。
でもそれがどうしたというの？

engChrName: Since you're not gettin' it, I'll spell it out for you. Your son didn't fall in with a bad crowd or change because of some damned mints.
engSearchText:
Since you're not gettin' it, I'll spell it out for you.
Your son didn't fall in with a bad crowd or change
because of some damned mints.
jpnChrName: つまり、お宅の息子が変わっちまった 根本的な原因は悪い友達でもタブレットでもねえ。
jpnSearchText:
つまり、お宅の息子が変わっちまった
根本的な原因は悪い友達でもタブレットでもねえ。

engChrName: It's all his parents' fault. A neglectful pair that failed to notice what he was going through. Or maybe you just didn't want to.
engSearchText:
It's all his parents' fault. A neglectful pair that failed
to notice what he was going through. Or maybe you
just didn't want to.
jpnChrName: 息子が追い詰められてる事に気付きもしなかった ──父親と母親が原因だったっつう事だ。
jpnSearchText:
息子が追い詰められてる事に気付きもしなかった
──父親と母親が原因だったっつう事だ。

engChrName: I knew I wouldn't like where this conversation was headed. Where did I fail as a father, huh?!
engSearchText:
I knew I wouldn't like where this conversation
was headed. Where did I fail as a father, huh?!
jpnChrName: な、何を言うかと思えば……！ 俺のどこが悪かったというのだ！？
jpnSearchText:
な、何を言うかと思えば……！
俺のどこが悪かったというのだ！？

engChrName: Have you two ever stopped to think about how Curtis feels?
engSearchText:
Have you two ever stopped to think about how
Curtis feels?
jpnChrName: お二人とも、カーチスさんの気持ちを 考えた事がありますか？
jpnSearchText:
お二人とも、カーチスさんの気持ちを
考えた事がありますか？

engChrName: I don't know everything about your family, but it looks like you two only worry about what you want for him, and not what he wants.
engSearchText:
I don't know everything about your family, but it
looks like you two only worry about what you want
for him, and not what he wants.
jpnChrName: 他の家庭の事情にとやかく言えませんけど、 自分の都合ばっかり考えてるようにしか見えません。
jpnSearchText:
他の家庭の事情にとやかく言えませんけど、
自分の都合ばっかり考えてるようにしか見えません。

engChrName: And who are you, thinking you can tell us how to run our family?!
engSearchText:
And who are you, thinking you can tell us how to run
our family?!
jpnChrName: 貴女たちにウチの何がわかるというの！？
jpnSearchText: 貴女たちにウチの何がわかるというの！？

engChrName: You don't have the slightest idea of how hard I've worked for this! All so Curtis could get into a prestigious high school. His future would be set!
engSearchText:
You don't have the slightest idea of how hard I've
worked for this! All so Curtis could get into a
prestigious high school. His future would be set!
jpnChrName: カーチスが将来困らないように、 アラミスに入れる為どれだけ苦労してる事か！
jpnSearchText:
カーチスが将来困らないように、
アラミスに入れる為どれだけ苦労してる事か！

engChrName: Exactly! Do you know how much money I've spent on his textbooks and mock tests?! I've done all that, despite my work situation!
engSearchText:
Exactly! Do you know how much money I've spent
on his textbooks and mock tests?! I've done all that,
despite my work situation!
jpnChrName: そ、そうだ！　俺の仕事も不安定だというのに やれ参考書代だ、模試の受験費だのと……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうだ！　俺の仕事も不安定だというのに
やれ参考書代だ、模試の受験費だのと……！

engChrName: (This conversation's gettin' nowhere, and fast. Should've known they wouldn't listen.)
engSearchText:
(This conversation's gettin' nowhere, and fast.
Should've known they wouldn't listen.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ……やっぱり   大人しく納得はしてもらえねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ……やっぱり
大人しく納得はしてもらえねえな。）

engChrName: (It'd feel wrong bailing out and leavin' the kid out to dry, though.)
engSearchText:
(It'd feel wrong bailing out and leavin' the kid out to
dry, though.)
jpnChrName: （かと言って、このままコイツ（カーチス）を放置して   引き上げちまうのもなんだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（かと言って、このままコイツ（カーチス）を放置して
引き上げちまうのもなんだろう。）

engChrName: (Not really my style, but I guess it's time for a little marriage counseling.)
engSearchText:
(Not really my style, but I guess it's time for a little
marriage counseling.)
jpnChrName: （柄じゃねえが、少し檄（げき）を飛ばしてやるとするか。）
jpnSearchText: （柄じゃねえが、少し檄（げき）を飛ばしてやるとするか。）

engChrName: (Maybe talking about their family bonds will get these two to snap out of it.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe talking about their family bonds will get
these two to snap out of it.)
jpnChrName: （ここは家族の絆に訴えかけつつ、   説得してみるか……）
jpnSearchText:
（ここは家族の絆に訴えかけつつ、
説得してみるか……）

engChrName: Has it even crossed your mind just WHY your son was so desperate with his studies?
engSearchText:
Has it even crossed your mind just WHY your son
was so desperate with his studies?
jpnChrName: あのな……コイツがどうして 勉強に必死になってるのか分かるか？
jpnSearchText:
あのな……コイツがどうして
勉強に必死になってるのか分かるか？

engChrName: Who knows, maybe I'm talking out of my ass, but shit looks like he was just trying to live up to those lofty expectations of yours.
engSearchText:
Who knows, maybe I'm talking out of my ass, but
shit looks like he was just trying to live up to those
lofty expectations of yours.
jpnChrName: なんだかんだ言ってるかもしれねえが── ひとえに、アンタ達の期待に応える為だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
なんだかんだ言ってるかもしれねえが──
ひとえに、アンタ達の期待に応える為だろうが。

engChrName: Th-That's not why!
engSearchText: Th-That's not why!
jpnChrName: ……！　そっ、そんなんじゃないぞ！
jpnSearchText: ……！　そっ、そんなんじゃないぞ！

engChrName: I... I just thought...a good student should go to a prestigious school...
engSearchText:
I... I just thought...a good student should go to a
prestigious school...
jpnChrName: ただ、優秀な僕が名門校に 入学するのは当然の事で……
jpnSearchText:
ただ、優秀な僕が名門校に
入学するのは当然の事で……

engChrName: And then you hit a brick wall.
engSearchText: And then you hit a brick wall.
jpnChrName: だが勉強に行き詰ってたんだろ？
jpnSearchText: だが勉強に行き詰ってたんだろ？

engChrName: So that's when you started turning to those mints to get into Aramis.
engSearchText:
So that's when you started turning to those mints to
get into Aramis.
jpnChrName: それでも、タブレットに依存してまで アラミスを目指してんのは……
jpnSearchText:
それでも、タブレットに依存してまで
アラミスを目指してんのは……

engChrName: At the end of the day, is that what you wanted?
engSearchText: At the end of the day, is that what you wanted?
jpnChrName: 本当にお前の意志だったのかよ？
jpnSearchText: 本当にお前の意志だったのかよ？

engChrName: I mean...
engSearchText: I mean...

engChrName: Sounds to me like what you really wanted was to not let your folks down. You put in all the effort so they would finally acknowledge you.
engSearchText:
Sounds to me like what you really wanted was to not
let your folks down. You put in all the effort so they
would finally acknowledge you.
jpnChrName: 親の期待に応えたかった…… 自分は優秀だって認めさせたかった訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
親の期待に応えたかった……
自分は優秀だって認めさせたかった訳だ。

engChrName: I... I don't know what to say...
engSearchText: I... I don't know what to say...
jpnChrName: カーチス……
jpnSearchText: カーチス……

engChrName: And while your son's bustin' his back to succeed, what support did he have?
engSearchText:
And while your son's bustin' his back to succeed,
what support did he have?
jpnChrName: それなのに、アンタ達の態度はなんだ？
jpnSearchText: それなのに、アンタ達の態度はなんだ？

engChrName: He had a mother that twisted her love and affection for her child into a leash.
engSearchText:
He had a mother that twisted her love and affection
for her child into a leash.
jpnChrName: そんな健気なコイツの気持ちも考えずに、 母親は歪んだ愛情を押し付けて……
jpnSearchText:
そんな健気なコイツの気持ちも考えずに、
母親は歪んだ愛情を押し付けて……

engChrName: And a father acting only for his own self-righteousness, without ever stoppin' to look back at his family. Honestly, none of you ever did.
engSearchText:
And a father acting only for his own
self-righteousness, without ever stoppin' to look back
at his family. Honestly, none of you ever did.
jpnChrName: 父親は自分の事ばっかで、家庭を省みないと来た。
jpnSearchText: 父親は自分の事ばっかで、家庭を省みないと来た。

engChrName: You two don't know the first thing about takin' care of a kid if you think this sad excuse for parenting's the best way to raise him.
engSearchText:
You two don't know the first thing about takin' care
of a kid if you think this sad excuse for parenting's the
best way to raise him.
jpnChrName: これで立派に人の親をやれてると 思ってんならお笑い草だな。
jpnSearchText:
これで立派に人の親をやれてると
思ってんならお笑い草だな。

engChrName: *sniffle* I'm so sorry.
engSearchText: *sniffle* I'm so sorry.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……ごめんなさい……
jpnSearchText: ぐすっ……ごめんなさい……

engChrName: I wanted to support you, but it turns out all I was doing was burdening you even more.
engSearchText:
I wanted to support you, but it turns out all I was
doing was burdening you even more.
jpnChrName: わたくし、貴方の事を応援するつもりが あれこれ煩く言ってしまって……
jpnSearchText:
わたくし、貴方の事を応援するつもりが
あれこれ煩く言ってしまって……

engChrName: I might've let it get to my head, having so much power over managing your life.
engSearchText:
I might've let it get to my head, having so much
power over managing your life.
jpnChrName: きっと貴方の事を信じ切れていなかった……
jpnSearchText: きっと貴方の事を信じ切れていなかった……

engChrName: I failed you as a mother. I should've believed in you, and I didn't.
engSearchText:
I failed you as a mother. I should've believed in you,
and I didn't.
jpnChrName: いえ、息子を管理している自分に 酔っていたんですのね……
jpnSearchText:
いえ、息子を管理している自分に
酔っていたんですのね……

engChrName: I'm also sorry, son. I thought it was my job as the man of the house to provide for my family, and that it was your mother's job to raise you instead.
engSearchText:
I'm also sorry, son. I thought it was my job as the man
of the house to provide for my family, and that it was
your mother's job to raise you instead.
jpnChrName: 俺も……息子の教育は母親の仕事。 父親は稼いでくる事が仕事だと思っていた。
jpnSearchText:
俺も……息子の教育は母親の仕事。
父親は稼いでくる事が仕事だと思っていた。

engChrName: When I was demoted at work, I thought I'd failed you all.
engSearchText:
When I was demoted at work, I thought I'd failed
you all.
jpnChrName: 左遷されて、家での立場が 無くなって焦っていたが……
jpnSearchText:
左遷されて、家での立場が
無くなって焦っていたが……

engChrName: But that's not when this all started. It began with me neglecting you, and what really should've been my role within this family.
engSearchText:
But that's not when this all started. It began with me
neglecting you, and what really should've been my
role within this family.
jpnChrName: それ以前の問題だったという事か…… 息子であるお前の事を全く考えられていなかった。
jpnSearchText:
それ以前の問題だったという事か……
息子であるお前の事を全く考えられていなかった。

engChrName: Dad... Mom...
engSearchText: Dad... Mom...
jpnChrName: 父さん、母さん……
jpnSearchText: 父さん、母さん……

engChrName: I think it's time for us three to sit down and talk, as a family. Talk and figure out where we went wrong, and how to fix things.
engSearchText:
I think it's time for us three to sit down and talk, as
a family. Talk and figure out where we went wrong,
and how to fix things.
jpnChrName: なあ……家族３人でちゃんと話あってみないか？ これからどうしていけばいいのかを……
jpnSearchText:
なあ……家族３人でちゃんと話あってみないか？
これからどうしていけばいいのかを……

engChrName: *sniffle* You're right. It's time we stopped running from reality and started trying to work together.
engSearchText:
*sniffle* You're right. It's time we stopped running
from reality and started trying to work together.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……そうね、 ちゃんと向き合わないと駄目よね。
jpnSearchText:
ぐすっ……そうね、
ちゃんと向き合わないと駄目よね。

engChrName: Yeah, I guess so... We really do need to talk.
engSearchText: Yeah, I guess so... We really do need to talk.
jpnChrName: 仕方ないな……分かったよ……
jpnSearchText: 仕方ないな……分かったよ……

engChrName: (Maybe a little shock therapy's in order. Let's see what they think if I tell them they oughta split.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe a little shock therapy's in order. Let's see
what they think if I tell them they oughta split.)
jpnChrName: （ここはあえて突き放して、   離婚でも勧めてみるか……）
jpnSearchText:
（ここはあえて突き放して、
離婚でも勧めてみるか……）

engChrName: Dunno if this is the best time to bring it up, but from where I'm sitting, things look kinda hopeless for this family.
engSearchText:
Dunno if this is the best time to bring it up, but from
where I'm sitting, things look kinda hopeless for
this family.
jpnChrName: この際言わせてもらうが、 傍から見てるとこの家庭は崩壊してるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
この際言わせてもらうが、
傍から見てるとこの家庭は崩壊してるぜ。

engChrName: If this is how things will keep on goin' between you two, the one that's gonna come out losing the most is your son.
engSearchText:
If this is how things will keep on goin' between you
two, the one that's gonna come out losing the most is
your son.
jpnChrName: アンタ達２人がその調子でいると 息子に悪影響だろう。
jpnSearchText:
アンタ達２人がその調子でいると
息子に悪影響だろう。

engChrName: I'll be frank. At this point, everyone might be better off if you get divorced.
engSearchText:
I'll be frank. At this point, everyone might be better
off if you get divorced.
jpnChrName: いっその事、離婚しちまった方が お互いの為なんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
いっその事、離婚しちまった方が
お互いの為なんじゃねえか？

engChrName: What?! No! I don't want Mom and Dad to get a divorce because of me! That's going too far!
engSearchText:
What?! No! I don't want Mom and Dad to get a
divorce because of me! That's going too far!
jpnChrName: ええっ！？　そんな、僕の事で離婚だなんて 流石に話が大袈裟すぎるよ……！
jpnSearchText:
ええっ！？　そんな、僕の事で離婚だなんて
流石に話が大袈裟すぎるよ……！

engChrName: Right, Mom? Dad?!
engSearchText: Right, Mom? Dad?!
jpnChrName: ねえ、母さん、父さん……？
jpnSearchText: ねえ、母さん、父さん……？

engChrName: I won't deny our home life isn't exactly happy.
engSearchText: I won't deny our home life isn't exactly happy.
jpnChrName: ……確かに、円満な家庭とは言い難いだろうな。
jpnSearchText: ……確かに、円満な家庭とは言い難いだろうな。

engChrName: Tell us the truth, son. You're fed up with me and your mother, aren't you?
engSearchText:
Tell us the truth, son. You're fed up with me and your
mother, aren't you?
jpnChrName: カーチス、お前だって母さんに── 俺にも、うんざりしてるんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
カーチス、お前だって母さんに──
俺にも、うんざりしてるんだろう？

engChrName: ...! Th-That's... I...
engSearchText: ...! Th-That's... I...
jpnChrName: ……！　それは、だけど…………
jpnSearchText: ……！　それは、だけど…………

engChrName: *sigh* I didn't mean for things to turn out this way...
engSearchText: *sigh* I didn't mean for things to turn out this way...
jpnChrName: ……本当は、こんなはずじゃなかったのよ。
jpnSearchText: ……本当は、こんなはずじゃなかったのよ。

engChrName: I thought that, even if it took hard work, it would be smooth sailing after Curtis made it into Aramis. That his future would be set.
engSearchText:
I thought that, even if it took hard work, it would be
smooth sailing after Curtis made it into Aramis.
That his future would be set.
jpnChrName: 今は大変でも、いい学校に入学できれば 将来は楽ができて幸せに繋がるだろうって。
jpnSearchText:
今は大変でも、いい学校に入学できれば
将来は楽ができて幸せに繋がるだろうって。

engChrName: But the more I think about it, I was just forcing him to do what I wanted and what would make ME happy, not him...
engSearchText:
But the more I think about it, I was just forcing him
to do what I wanted and what would make ME
happy, not him...
jpnChrName: でもそれは……よく考えたら、わたくしが 勝手に思い描いた幸せでしかなかったんですのね。
jpnSearchText:
でもそれは……よく考えたら、わたくしが
勝手に思い描いた幸せでしかなかったんですのね。

engChrName: Mom...
engSearchText: Mom...
jpnChrName: 母さん……
jpnSearchText: 母さん……

engChrName: It's my fault, too. I left your mother alone to deal with everything regarding the household.
engSearchText:
It's my fault, too. I left your mother alone to deal with
everything regarding the household.
jpnChrName: 俺も……今まで家の事は ゾーラに任せきりでいたからな。
jpnSearchText:
俺も……今まで家の事は
ゾーラに任せきりでいたからな。

engChrName: I didn't realize that you felt so trapped, son.
engSearchText: I didn't realize that you felt so trapped, son.
jpnChrName: カーチスがそこまで追い詰められて いたなんて気付きもしなかった。
jpnSearchText:
カーチスがそこまで追い詰められて
いたなんて気付きもしなかった。

engChrName: No... That's not it. I didn't even make the effort to understand how you felt.
engSearchText:
No... That's not it. I didn't even make the effort to
understand how you felt.
jpnChrName: いや……お前の気持ちを 知ろうともしていなかったんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
いや……お前の気持ちを
知ろうともしていなかったんだよな。

engChrName: I failed as your father.
engSearchText: I failed as your father.
jpnChrName: 父親失格、かもしれないな。
jpnSearchText: 父親失格、かもしれないな。

engChrName: Dad...
engSearchText: Dad...
jpnChrName: 父さん……
jpnSearchText: 父さん……

engChrName: So, what'll it be? You gonna give up? Cut your marriage loose?
engSearchText:
So, what'll it be? You gonna give up? Cut your
marriage loose?
jpnChrName: それじゃ、やっぱり離婚するつもりか？
jpnSearchText: それじゃ、やっぱり離婚するつもりか？

engChrName: *sniffle* No, I don't want to!
engSearchText: *sniffle* No, I don't want to!
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……それは嫌ですわっ……！
jpnSearchText: ぐすっ……それは嫌ですわっ……！

engChrName: Yes, we've not seen each other eye to eye for a while, but that's no reason to throw it all away. We've come so far as a family!
engSearchText:
Yes, we've not seen each other eye to eye for a while,
but that's no reason to throw it all away. We've come
so far as a family!
jpnChrName: ここまで３人で頑張って生きて来たのに、 少しすれ違ったらサヨナラだなんて！
jpnSearchText:
ここまで３人で頑張って生きて来たのに、
少しすれ違ったらサヨナラだなんて！

engChrName: Not sure it's just been 'a while'...
engSearchText: Not sure it's just been 'a while'...
jpnChrName: 本当に“少しのすれ違い”かどうかは 分からないけどな……
jpnSearchText:
本当に“少しのすれ違い”かどうかは
分からないけどな……

engChrName: But I'm not ready to throw in the towel, either. I want to make amends, even if I still have a lot to think about.
engSearchText:
But I'm not ready to throw in the towel, either.
I want to make amends, even if I still have a lot to
think about.
jpnChrName: 俺も色々と思う所はあるが…… これで離婚というのは納得いかない気がする。
jpnSearchText:
俺も色々と思う所はあるが……
これで離婚というのは納得いかない気がする。

engChrName: You're my family, after all. I think it's time for us three to sit down and talk. Talk and figure out where we went wrong, and how to fix things.
engSearchText:
You're my family, after all. I think it's time for us
three to sit down and talk. Talk and figure out where
we went wrong, and how to fix things.
jpnChrName: そのなんだ……３人で少し話し合ってみないか？ これからどうすればいいのかを。
jpnSearchText:
そのなんだ……３人で少し話し合ってみないか？
これからどうすればいいのかを。

engChrName: *sniffle* Yes, I think that's what we need.
engSearchText: *sniffle* Yes, I think that's what we need.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……そうですわね……
jpnSearchText: ぐすっ……そうですわね……

engChrName: Okay...
engSearchText: Okay...

engChrName: (Phew. Glad things have finally calmed down.)
engSearchText: (Phew. Glad things have finally calmed down.)
jpnChrName: （ふぅ……これで一安心ですね。）
jpnSearchText: （ふぅ……これで一安心ですね。）

engChrName: (You sure didn't pull your punches, Van.)
engSearchText: (You sure didn't pull your punches, Van.)
jpnChrName: （随分と荒療治だったけどね。）
jpnSearchText: （随分と荒療治だったけどね。）

engChrName: (You had me on the edge of my seat the whole time!)
engSearchText: (You had me on the edge of my seat the whole time!)
jpnChrName: （ヒヤヒヤさせるんだから。）
jpnSearchText: （ヒヤヒヤさせるんだから。）

engChrName: (I sincerely hope the conversation they'll have once we leave proves to be a fruitful one.)
engSearchText:
(I sincerely hope the conversation they'll have once
we leave proves to be a fruitful one.)
jpnChrName: （後は家族３人で良い話し合いが   できるといいのですが。）
jpnSearchText:
（後は家族３人で良い話し合いが
できるといいのですが。）

engChrName: (That was some fine work defusing the situation. No one does it quite like you, Van.)
engSearchText:
(That was some fine work defusing the situation.
No one does it quite like you, Van.)
jpnChrName: （ここに落ち着くまでの流れを作るとは。   お主らしいやり方だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここに落ち着くまでの流れを作るとは。
お主らしいやり方だな。）

engChrName: (Nah, it wasn't anything special. Just did what I felt was needed to turn things around.)
engSearchText:
(Nah, it wasn't anything special. Just did what I felt
was needed to turn things around.)
jpnChrName: （そんな大層なモンじゃないですよ。）
jpnSearchText: （そんな大層なモンじゃないですよ。）

engChrName: I don't got anything else to add here. The rest is up to you.
engSearchText:
I don't got anything else to add here. The rest is up
to you.
jpnChrName: ま、これ以上の口出しはしねえよ。 後はお宅らで解決してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、これ以上の口出しはしねえよ。
後はお宅らで解決してくれ。

engChrName: And don't worry about the whole drug deal. We'll take care of it discreetly so it doesn't become public.
engSearchText:
And don't worry about the whole drug deal.
We'll take care of it discreetly so it doesn't
become public.
jpnChrName: ああそれと、タブレットの件は裏で処理させてもらう。 表沙汰にはしねえから安心しろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああそれと、タブレットの件は裏で処理させてもらう。
表沙汰にはしねえから安心しろ。

engChrName: We'll get out of your hair now. Good luck y'all.
engSearchText: We'll get out of your hair now. Good luck y'all.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、俺達はこれで失礼させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ、俺達はこれで失礼させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Quest Problem Child completed!
engSearchText: Quest Problem Child completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【乱暴になった息子】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>乱暴になった息子<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: The hell's this? 'Dear spriggan'?
engSearchText: The hell's this? 'Dear spriggan'?
jpnChrName: なんだこりゃ。 『拝啓、裏解決屋殿』……？
jpnSearchText:
なんだこりゃ。
『拝啓、裏解決屋殿』……？

engChrName: Hmm... Doesn't look suspicious, at least. All right— my interest is piqued.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Doesn't look suspicious, at least. All right—
my interest is piqued.
jpnChrName: 妙な“匂い”はしねえが気になる依頼だな。
jpnSearchText: 妙な“匂い”はしねえが気になる依頼だな。

engChrName: I guess this message here must be the code it was tellin' me to look into.
engSearchText:
I guess this message here must be the code it was
tellin' me to look into.
jpnChrName: 暗号ってのは、一緒に張り付けてあった このメモの事か……？
jpnSearchText:
暗号ってのは、一緒に張り付けてあった
このメモの事か……？

engChrName: 'First task: Go to the stable along the river upon which the injured iron steeds descend.'
engSearchText:
'First task: Go to the stable along the river upon
which the injured iron steeds descend.'
jpnChrName: 『一問目　負傷した鉄の馬が行きつく、   川沿いの厩舎へ行ってみて下さい。』
jpnSearchText:
『一問目　負傷した鉄の馬が行きつく、
川沿いの厩舎へ行ってみて下さい。』

engChrName: Hmm... Seems innocent enough.
engSearchText: Hmm... Seems innocent enough.
jpnChrName: ふむ……やっぱりコイツから 悪意は感じられねえが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……やっぱりコイツから
悪意は感じられねえが……

engChrName: Dunno what they're after, but I'll play along for a bit and see what's up.
engSearchText:
Dunno what they're after, but I'll play along for a bit
and see what's up.
jpnChrName: 目的が分からない点が引っかかるな。 少し付き合ってみるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
目的が分からない点が引っかかるな。
少し付き合ってみるとするか。

engChrName: Hey, Van. Thanks for coming.
engSearchText: Hey, Van. Thanks for coming.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、来てくれたんですね。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、来てくれたんですね。

engChrName: Sure thing. Figured I'd hear you out at least.
engSearchText: Sure thing. Figured I'd hear you out at least.
jpnChrName: ま、話だけでも 聞かせて貰おうと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、話だけでも
聞かせて貰おうと思ってな。

engChrName: You wrote that Jess has disappeared, right?
engSearchText: You wrote that Jess has disappeared, right?
jpnChrName: ここで一緒に暮らしてる ジェスが居なくなったんだって？
jpnSearchText:
ここで一緒に暮らしてる
ジェスが居なくなったんだって？

engChrName: Uh, yeah.
engSearchText: Uh, yeah.
jpnChrName: ええ……
jpnSearchText: ええ……

engChrName: You know who he is, don't you?
engSearchText: You know who he is, don't you?
jpnChrName: そもそもヴァンさんは 彼をご存じでしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
そもそもヴァンさんは
彼をご存じでしたっけ。

engChrName: Yeah. We cross paths at the station from time to time.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We cross paths at the station from time
to time.
jpnChrName: ま、拠点（ホーム）が同じってことで 何度か顔は合わせてるからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、拠点（ホーム）が同じってことで
何度か顔は合わせてるからな。

engChrName: Did a small job for him a while back, too.
engSearchText: Did a small job for him a while back, too.
jpnChrName: 以前、ちょっとした 頼みを聞いてやったこともある。
jpnSearchText:
以前、ちょっとした
頼みを聞いてやったこともある。

engChrName: Oh, interesting. I didn't know that.
engSearchText: Oh, interesting. I didn't know that.
jpnChrName: そうだったんですね。
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですね。

engChrName: Yeah. We cross paths at the station from time to time.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We cross paths at the station from time
to time.
jpnChrName: ま、拠点（ホーム）が同じってことで 何度か顔は合わせてるからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、拠点（ホーム）が同じってことで
何度か顔は合わせてるからな。

engChrName: Just like you and I, really.
engSearchText: Just like you and I, really.
jpnChrName: お前さんも同じだろ。
jpnSearchText: お前さんも同じだろ。

engChrName: Haha, I guess we do, now that you mention it.
engSearchText: Haha, I guess we do, now that you mention it.
jpnChrName: はは、それもそうですね。
jpnSearchText: はは、それもそうですね。

engChrName: Anyway, when did he go missing?
engSearchText: Anyway, when did he go missing?
jpnChrName: で、ジェスはいつ姿を消したんだ？
jpnSearchText: で、ジェスはいつ姿を消したんだ？

engChrName: He was already gone when I woke up this morning.
engSearchText: He was already gone when I woke up this morning.
jpnChrName: 今朝起きたら姿が見えなくて……
jpnSearchText: 今朝起きたら姿が見えなくて……

engChrName: I went into his room to check in on him, but found this note there instead.
engSearchText:
I went into his room to check in on him, but found
this note there instead.
jpnChrName: 彼の部屋の机の上に、 こんな書置きが残されていたんです。
jpnSearchText:
彼の部屋の机の上に、
こんな書置きが残されていたんです。

engChrName: I know this is sudden, but I have to leave. The longer things go on, the harder it is for me to bear it.
engSearchText:
I know this is sudden, but I have to leave. The longer
things go on, the harder it is for me to bear it.
jpnChrName: 突然だけどこの家を出て行くよ。 ２人と一緒にいると、僕は甘えてしまうから。 今までありがとう──そしてさようなら。
jpnSearchText:
突然だけどこの家を出て行くよ。
２人と一緒にいると、僕は甘えてしまうから。
今までありがとう──そしてさようなら。

engChrName: And don't worry about holding on to my things. You can go ahead and get rid of them. Thanks for everything, and sorry for all the trouble. Goodbye.
engSearchText:
And don't worry about holding on to my things.
You can go ahead and get rid of them. Thanks for
everything, and sorry for all the trouble. Goodbye.
jpnChrName: 荷物は好きに処分してくれて構わない。 手間をかけるけどよろしく頼むよ。
jpnSearchText:
荷物は好きに処分してくれて構わない。
手間をかけるけどよろしく頼むよ。

engChrName: All right.
engSearchText: All right.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほど。

engChrName: From the looks of it, none of y'all were expectin' this?
engSearchText: From the looks of it, none of y'all were expectin' this?
jpnChrName: しかし本人も書いている通り マジで突然な話だったみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
しかし本人も書いている通り
マジで突然な話だったみたいだな？

engChrName: No. He'd never said anything about leaving.
engSearchText: No. He'd never said anything about leaving.
jpnChrName: はい……今まで家を出て行くなんて 言ったこともありませんでしたし。
jpnSearchText:
はい……今まで家を出て行くなんて
言ったこともありませんでしたし。

engChrName: We were having dinner just fine with my sister just last night.
engSearchText:
We were having dinner just fine with my sister just
last night.
jpnChrName: 昨夜は僕とジェス、そして姉さんの ３人で一緒に食卓も囲んだんですが……
jpnSearchText:
昨夜は僕とジェス、そして姉さんの
３人で一緒に食卓も囲んだんですが……

engChrName: Has anything unusual happened when you've all been together?
engSearchText:
Has anything unusual happened when you've all
been together?
jpnChrName: その時に、何か変わったことは ありませんでしたか？
jpnSearchText:
その時に、何か変わったことは
ありませんでしたか？

engChrName: Did anything weird happen to you guys?
engSearchText: Did anything weird happen to you guys?
jpnChrName: その時に、何か 変わりはありませんでしたか？
jpnSearchText:
その時に、何か
変わりはありませんでしたか？

engChrName: Anything weird happen while you guys were chilling?
engSearchText: Anything weird happen while you guys were chilling?
jpnChrName: そん時に、なんか 変わったことはなかったのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
そん時に、なんか
変わったことはなかったのかよ？

engChrName: Has anything strange occurred while you were together?
engSearchText:
Has anything strange occurred while you
were together?
jpnChrName: その時に、何かいつもと 違うことはなかったのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
その時に、何かいつもと
違うことはなかったのでしょうか？

engChrName: Anything odd stick out to you lately?
engSearchText: Anything odd stick out to you lately?
jpnChrName: その時に、何か 変わったことはなかったの？
jpnSearchText:
その時に、何か
変わったことはなかったの？

engChrName: You guys spend a lot of time together, yeah? Did something weird happen?
engSearchText:
You guys spend a lot of time together, yeah?
Did something weird happen?
jpnChrName: その時に、何か 変わったことはなかった？
jpnSearchText:
その時に、何か
変わったことはなかった？

engChrName: Has anything unusual happen to you lately?
engSearchText: Has anything unusual happen to you lately?
jpnChrName: その時に何か変わりはなかったか？
jpnSearchText: その時に何か変わりはなかったか？

engChrName: Let me think...
engSearchText: Let me think...
jpnChrName: 変わったこと……
jpnSearchText: 変わったこと……

engChrName: You know, things did feel a little awkward between him and my sister.
engSearchText:
You know, things did feel a little awkward between
him and my sister.
jpnChrName: そう言われると、ジェスと姉さんの会話が 心なしかぎこちなかった気もします。
jpnSearchText:
そう言われると、ジェスと姉さんの会話が
心なしかぎこちなかった気もします。

engChrName: Something else happened that stuck out to me, yeah.
engSearchText: Something else happened that stuck out to me, yeah.
jpnChrName: それともう一つ、 心当たりとなる出来事はありまして。
jpnSearchText:
それともう一つ、
心当たりとなる出来事はありまして。

engChrName: Mind sharin'?
engSearchText: Mind sharin'?
jpnChrName: 聞かせてくれるか？
jpnSearchText: 聞かせてくれるか？

engChrName: Sure. It was three days ago.
engSearchText: Sure. It was three days ago.
jpnChrName: その、３日前のことなんですが……
jpnSearchText: その、３日前のことなんですが……

engChrName: Jess was gonna have a nighttime show over at Riverside, so I went to check it out.
engSearchText:
Jess was gonna have a nighttime show over at
Riverside, so I went to check it out.
jpnChrName: リバーサイドでジェスのナイトライブが 開かれる予定で、僕も観に行ったんです。
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイドでジェスのナイトライブが
開かれる予定で、僕も観に行ったんです。

engChrName: But he never showed up to it. They had to cancel.
engSearchText: But he never showed up to it. They had to cancel.
jpnChrName: ですが彼は、開演時間になっても来ず そのままライブが中止になってしまったんです。
jpnSearchText:
ですが彼は、開演時間になっても来ず
そのままライブが中止になってしまったんです。

engChrName: He bailed out on a gig at the last minute? That ain't normal.
engSearchText:
He bailed out on a gig at the last minute? That
ain't normal.
jpnChrName: ライブをドタキャンか…… そりゃあ普通じゃあねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ライブをドタキャンか……
そりゃあ普通じゃあねえな。

engChrName: Yeah, he'd never done that before.
engSearchText: Yeah, he'd never done that before.
jpnChrName: ええ……こんなことは初めてで。
jpnSearchText: ええ……こんなことは初めてで。

engChrName: I asked him what happened the next day, but he wouldn't answer me.
engSearchText:
I asked him what happened the next day, but he
wouldn't answer me.
jpnChrName: 次の日になって、本人に 理由を聞いても答えてはくれず……
jpnSearchText:
次の日になって、本人に
理由を聞いても答えてはくれず……

engChrName: Everything else was fine so I didn't bring it up again.
engSearchText: Everything else was fine so I didn't bring it up again.
jpnChrName: その後は普通に過ごしていたので、 それ以上は触れないようにしていたんです。
jpnSearchText:
その後は普通に過ごしていたので、
それ以上は触れないようにしていたんです。

engChrName: Then he disappeared this morning.
engSearchText: Then he disappeared this morning.
jpnChrName: それで、今朝になって 姿を消したわけですか……
jpnSearchText:
それで、今朝になって
姿を消したわけですか……

engChrName: But you woke up today and he was gone.
engSearchText: But you woke up today and he was gone.
jpnChrName: それで、今朝になって 居なくなったわけですか……
jpnSearchText:
それで、今朝になって
居なくなったわけですか……

engChrName: But he up and vanished this morning, eh?
engSearchText: But he up and vanished this morning, eh?
jpnChrName: で、今朝になって失踪かよ。
jpnSearchText: で、今朝になって失踪かよ。

engChrName: Then you woke up this morning and he'd vanished.
engSearchText: Then you woke up this morning and he'd vanished.
jpnChrName: それで今朝になって 行方が分からくなった、と……
jpnSearchText:
それで今朝になって
行方が分からくなった、と……

engChrName: And when you tried checking in on him this morning, he was already gone.
engSearchText:
And when you tried checking in on him this
morning, he was already gone.
jpnChrName: それで、今朝になって 姿を消したわけか……
jpnSearchText:
それで、今朝になって
姿を消したわけか……

engChrName: But he bailed out on you, too, this morning.
engSearchText: But he bailed out on you, too, this morning.
jpnChrName: それで、今朝になって 居なくなっちゃったのね……
jpnSearchText:
それで、今朝になって
居なくなっちゃったのね……

engChrName: And by this morning, he had already departed.
engSearchText: And by this morning, he had already departed.
jpnChrName: それで、今朝になって 行方知れずというわけか……
jpnSearchText:
それで、今朝になって
行方知れずというわけか……

engChrName: Well, at least it doesn't look like anything illegal happened.
engSearchText:
Well, at least it doesn't look like anything
illegal happened.
jpnChrName: 聞いてる限り、事件性は薄そうだがな。
jpnSearchText: 聞いてる限り、事件性は薄そうだがな。

engChrName: Yeah. And I didn't think it was worth bothering the guild over it.
engSearchText:
Yeah. And I didn't think it was worth bothering the
guild over it.
jpnChrName: はい、それで ギルドに頼むのも違うかなって。
jpnSearchText:
はい、それで
ギルドに頼むのも違うかなって。

engChrName: Instead, I took some time off work today to look for him.
engSearchText:
Instead, I took some time off work today to look
for him.
jpnChrName: バイトを休ませてもらって、 朝から一人で探し始めたんです。
jpnSearchText:
バイトを休ませてもらって、
朝から一人で探し始めたんです。

engChrName: I've been everywhere I thought he might've gone to, but no luck.
engSearchText:
I've been everywhere I thought he might've gone to,
but no luck.
jpnChrName: ジェスの行きそうな場所は 一通り回ったつもりなんですが……
jpnSearchText:
ジェスの行きそうな場所は
一通り回ったつもりなんですが……

engChrName: I don't think I can do this by myself.
engSearchText: I don't think I can do this by myself.
jpnChrName: 僕一人の力じゃ、 全く見つかる気配がなくって。
jpnSearchText:
僕一人の力じゃ、
全く見つかる気配がなくって。

engChrName: That's why I decided to ask you guys for help. You've got a good rep of doing good by your clients.
engSearchText:
That's why I decided to ask you guys for help.
You've got a good rep of doing good by your clients.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋として評判高い ヴァンさんを頼らせて貰った次第です。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋として評判高い
ヴァンさんを頼らせて貰った次第です。

engChrName: Yeah, makes sense. I think I got a good grasp on this whole shtick now.
engSearchText:
Yeah, makes sense. I think I got a good grasp on this
whole shtick now.
jpnChrName: ま、経緯は分かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、経緯は分かったぜ。

engChrName: In that case, will you help look for him? I'm not trying to pressure you.
engSearchText:
In that case, will you help look for him? I'm not
trying to pressure you.
jpnChrName: もしよければ…… 依頼を引き受けて貰えますか？
jpnSearchText:
もしよければ……
依頼を引き受けて貰えますか？

engChrName: *sigh* Jess... Where are you?
engSearchText: *sigh* Jess... Where are you?
jpnChrName: ジェス……一体どこに……
jpnSearchText: ジェス……一体どこに……

engChrName: I'm not trying to pressure you Van, but...could you help look for him? You'd be doing me a big favor.
engSearchText:
I'm not trying to pressure you Van, but...could you
help look for him? You'd be doing me a big favor.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……もしよければ 僕の依頼を引き受けて貰えますか？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……もしよければ
僕の依頼を引き受けて貰えますか？

engChrName: Sure, we can pitch in.
engSearchText: Sure, we can pitch in.
jpnChrName: 分かった、引き受けよう。
jpnSearchText: 分かった、引き受けよう。

engChrName: Oh, I'm so glad. Thank you!
engSearchText: Oh, I'm so glad. Thank you!
jpnChrName: よかった…… ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText:
よかった……
ありがとうございます！

engChrName: I hate to ask, but can you give me some time to think it over?
engSearchText:
I hate to ask, but can you give me some time to think
it over?
jpnChrName: すまないが、 ちょっと考えさせてくれるか。
jpnSearchText:
すまないが、
ちょっと考えさせてくれるか。

engChrName: That's fine. I imagine you're really busy. Don't feel obligated to if you can't.
engSearchText:
That's fine. I imagine you're really busy. Don't feel
obligated to if you can't.
jpnChrName: ええ、ヴァンさんもお忙しいでしょうし 無理にとは言いません。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ヴァンさんもお忙しいでしょうし
無理にとは言いません。

engChrName: But if you do have time to help, you'd be doing me a big favor.
engSearchText:
But if you do have time to help, you'd be doing me a
big favor.
jpnChrName: もし時間ができたら、 引き受けてくれると助かります。
jpnSearchText:
もし時間ができたら、
引き受けてくれると助かります。

engChrName: Not to change the subject, but didn't you and Jess grow up together?
engSearchText:
Not to change the subject, but didn't you and Jess
grow up together?
jpnChrName: ちなみにジェスとお前さんは 同郷なんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにジェスとお前さんは
同郷なんだったか。

engChrName: Uh-huh. We're both from Anchorville. We've been friends since we were kids.
engSearchText:
Uh-huh. We're both from Anchorville. We've been
friends since we were kids.
jpnChrName: はい、アンカーヴィルの出身で 幼馴染です。
jpnSearchText:
はい、アンカーヴィルの出身で
幼馴染です。

engChrName: My sister and I decided to move to Edith after he made his big break.
engSearchText:
My sister and I decided to move to Edith after he
made his big break.
jpnChrName: ジェスのプロデビューを機に、 僕と姉さんも首都にやって来て……
jpnSearchText:
ジェスのプロデビューを機に、
僕と姉さんも首都にやって来て……

engChrName: I thought things were back to how they used to be when we were kids. But now... Now I don't know what to think.
engSearchText:
I thought things were back to how they used to be
when we were kids. But now... Now I don't know
what to think.
jpnChrName: 故郷にいた時と同じように 仲良くやって来たつもりだったんですが。
jpnSearchText:
故郷にいた時と同じように
仲良くやって来たつもりだったんですが。

engChrName: Your sister's name is Carol, right?
engSearchText: Your sister's name is Carol, right?
jpnChrName: 姉の──キャロルだったか。
jpnSearchText: 姉の──キャロルだったか。

engChrName: And she's not looking for him?
engSearchText: And she's not looking for him?
jpnChrName: 彼女はジェスのことを探していないのか？
jpnSearchText: 彼女はジェスのことを探していないのか？

engChrName: I don't know. Don't think so. I told her about it, obviously, but she didn't want to help me.
engSearchText:
I don't know. Don't think so. I told her about it,
obviously, but she didn't want to help me.
jpnChrName: そうですね……もちろん声は かけたんですが、なぜか非協力的で。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……もちろん声は
かけたんですが、なぜか非協力的で。

engChrName: She should be at her job, like usual. Works in the boutique over in the Seiden District.
engSearchText:
She should be at her job, like usual. Works in the
boutique over in the Seiden District.
jpnChrName: 今日もサイデン地区のブティックで いつも通り仕事をしています。
jpnSearchText:
今日もサイデン地区のブティックで
いつも通り仕事をしています。

engChrName: Something must've happened between her and Jess for her to be acting like that.
engSearchText:
Something must've happened between her and Jess
for her to be acting like that.
jpnChrName: その……ジェスと姉さんの間に 何かあったのは間違いないと思います。
jpnSearchText:
その……ジェスと姉さんの間に
何かあったのは間違いないと思います。

engChrName: I feel a little guilty not having a clue what it is, though...
engSearchText:
I feel a little guilty not having a clue what it
is, though...
jpnChrName: ただ、恥ずかしいことに 心当たりが全くなくて……
jpnSearchText:
ただ、恥ずかしいことに
心当たりが全くなくて……

engChrName: Sometimes stuff just happens. All we can do now is look for him.
engSearchText:
Sometimes stuff just happens. All we can do now is
look for him.
jpnChrName: とにかく探ってみるしかねえな。
jpnSearchText: とにかく探ってみるしかねえな。

engChrName: Do you know who else was friends with Jess aside from Carol?
engSearchText:
Do you know who else was friends with Jess aside
from Carol?
jpnChrName: お前さんとジェスの 共通の知り合いは姉以外にいるのか？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんとジェスの
共通の知り合いは姉以外にいるのか？

engChrName: The only other person I can think of off the top of my head is his manager.
engSearchText:
The only other person I can think of off the top of
my head is his manager.
jpnChrName: 姉さんの他だと、ジェスの マネージャーさんくらいですかね。
jpnSearchText:
姉さんの他だと、ジェスの
マネージャーさんくらいですかね。

engChrName: I don't how to reach her, but Carol probably does.
engSearchText: I don't how to reach her, but Carol probably does.
jpnChrName: ただ僕は連絡先を知らなくて。 姉さんなら知っていると思うんですが。
jpnSearchText:
ただ僕は連絡先を知らなくて。
姉さんなら知っていると思うんですが。

engChrName: Got it. Thanks for sharin'.
engSearchText: Got it. Thanks for sharin'.
jpnChrName: 了解だ。
jpnSearchText: 了解だ。

engChrName: Don't worry about lookin' for him anymore. We'll take it from here.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about lookin' for him anymore.
We'll take it from here.
jpnChrName: ま、後は俺たちに任せておきな。
jpnSearchText: ま、後は俺たちに任せておきな。

engChrName: We'd appreciate it if you waited here.
engSearchText: We'd appreciate it if you waited here.
jpnChrName: レイモンドさんは こちらで待っていて下さい。
jpnSearchText:
レイモンドさんは
こちらで待っていて下さい。

engChrName: You can wait here while we look!
engSearchText: You can wait here while we look!
jpnChrName: 貴方はここで待機していて下さい。
jpnSearchText: 貴方はここで待機していて下さい。

engChrName: Keep yourself comfy and we'll be back with news before you know it.
engSearchText:
Keep yourself comfy and we'll be back with news
before you know it.
jpnChrName: アンタはここで朗報を待ってな。
jpnSearchText: アンタはここで朗報を待ってな。

engChrName: In the meantime, if you could please wait here, we'd sincerely appreciate it.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, if you could please wait here, we'd
sincerely appreciate it.
jpnChrName: どうか安心してお待ち下さい。
jpnSearchText: どうか安心してお待ち下さい。

engChrName: It'd be good if you could wait here while we looked.
engSearchText: It'd be good if you could wait here while we looked.
jpnChrName: 貴方はここで待っていて下さい。
jpnSearchText: 貴方はここで待っていて下さい。

engChrName: Hang in there! Wait here, and we'll do our best to find him!
engSearchText:
Hang in there! Wait here, and we'll do our best to
find him!
jpnChrName: 必ず期待に応えてみせるから。 ここで待っていてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
必ず期待に応えてみせるから。
ここで待っていてちょうだい。

engChrName: Wait here. We'll be sure to bring back good news.
engSearchText: Wait here. We'll be sure to bring back good news.
jpnChrName: ここで善き報せを待っているがいい。
jpnSearchText: ここで善き報せを待っているがいい。

engChrName: Okay, I'll do that. Thanks again, you guys.
engSearchText: Okay, I'll do that. Thanks again, you guys.
jpnChrName: すみません、よろしく頼みます。
jpnSearchText: すみません、よろしく頼みます。

engChrName: All right. First stop: Raymond's sister, Carol. Let's see what she's got to say 'bout all this.
engSearchText:
All right. First stop: Raymond's sister, Carol.
Let's see what she's got to say 'bout all this.
jpnChrName: さてと、まずは依頼者の姉の キャロルに話を聞きに行くとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、まずは依頼者の姉の
キャロルに話を聞きに行くとしましょうか。

engChrName: All right. First stop: Raymond's sister, Carol. Let's see what she's got to say 'bout all this.
engSearchText:
All right. First stop: Raymond's sister, Carol.
Let's see what she's got to say 'bout all this.
jpnChrName: さてと、まずは依頼者の姉の キャロルに話を聞きに行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、まずは依頼者の姉の
キャロルに話を聞きに行くとするか。

engChrName: He mentioned she was in the boutique in the Seiden District. I think it's called Erland.
engSearchText:
He mentioned she was in the boutique in the
Seiden District. I think it's called Erland.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区のブティック── 《エルラント》ですね。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区のブティック──
《エルラント》ですね。

engChrName: I think he said something about a boutique in Seiden? Erland, maybe?
engSearchText:
I think he said something about a boutique in Seiden?
Erland, maybe?
jpnChrName: サイデン地区のブティック── 《エルラント》ですね。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区のブティック──
《エルラント》ですね。

engChrName: Dude said she was at her boutique job, over in Seiden. I think that place is called Erland.
engSearchText:
Dude said she was at her boutique job, over in Seiden.
I think that place is called Erland.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区のブティック── 《エルラント》だな。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区のブティック──
《エルラント》だな。

engChrName: I believe he mentioned his sister working in Erland. That's the boutique in the Seiden District.
engSearchText:
I believe he mentioned his sister working in Erland.
That's the boutique in the Seiden District.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区のブティック── 《エルラント》ですね。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区のブティック──
《エルラント》ですね。

engChrName: Maybe we should start by going to that boutique in the Seiden District he talked about. Erland, I believe.
engSearchText:
Maybe we should start by going to that boutique in
the Seiden District he talked about. Erland, I believe.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区のブティック── 《エルラント》だね。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区のブティック──
《エルラント》だね。

engChrName: He said she was working in a boutique in the Seiden District. Only one I know of is Erland.
engSearchText:
He said she was working in a boutique in the
Seiden District. Only one I know of is Erland.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区のブティック── 《エルラント》ね。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区のブティック──
《エルラント》ね。

engChrName: He said she's at her job in the boutique in the Seiden District. It must be Erland.
engSearchText:
He said she's at her job in the boutique in the
Seiden District. It must be Erland.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区のブティック── 《エルラント》だな。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区のブティック──
《エルラント》だな。

engChrName: Quest Missing Friend started!
engSearchText: Quest Missing Friend started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【行方をくらました親友】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>行方をくらました親友<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: He said he was going out of town to see his favorite flower?
engSearchText:
He said he was going out of town to see his
favorite flower?
jpnChrName: 大好きな花を見に郊外に…… ジェスがそう言ってたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
大好きな花を見に郊外に……
ジェスがそう言ってたんですね。

engChrName: That's what we heard. Any idea what that might be?
engSearchText: That's what we heard. Any idea what that might be?
jpnChrName: ああ、そう聞いて心当たりはあるか？
jpnSearchText: ああ、そう聞いて心当たりはあるか？

engChrName: Yeah, think so.
engSearchText: Yeah, think so.
jpnChrName: ええ……あります。
jpnSearchText: ええ……あります。

engChrName: He was probably talking about white daisies.
engSearchText: He was probably talking about white daisies.
jpnChrName: おそらくその花は “白いマーガレット”だと思います。
jpnSearchText:
おそらくその花は
“白いマーガレット”だと思います。

engChrName: Huh. Not really that rare a flower.
engSearchText: Huh. Not really that rare a flower.
jpnChrName: マーガレットか…… そこまで珍しい花でもないが。
jpnSearchText:
マーガレットか……
そこまで珍しい花でもないが。

engChrName: They're really common in our hometown. Anchorville is full of them.
engSearchText:
They're really common in our hometown.
Anchorville is full of them.
jpnChrName: はい、故郷のアンカーヴィルでは それこそよく見かけました。
jpnSearchText:
はい、故郷のアンカーヴィルでは
それこそよく見かけました。

engChrName: Jess, Carol, and I would go out to the fields and look at them all the time.
engSearchText:
Jess, Carol, and I would go out to the fields and look
at them all the time.
jpnChrName: 僕も姉さんも大好きで、３人でよく 群生している場所に見に行きましたね。
jpnSearchText:
僕も姉さんも大好きで、３人でよく
群生している場所に見に行きましたね。

engChrName: Though you can't really find any natural fields like that out here in Edith. The only ones here are cultivated.
engSearchText:
Though you can't really find any natural fields like
that out here in Edith. The only ones here
are cultivated.
jpnChrName: 流石にこの首都では、人工的に 植えられたものしか見かけませんが。
jpnSearchText:
流石にこの首都では、人工的に
植えられたものしか見かけませんが。

engChrName: Huh. Who knew?
engSearchText: Huh. Who knew?
jpnChrName: ま、そりゃそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ま、そりゃそうだな。

engChrName: Why do the three of you like white daisies in particular?
engSearchText:
Why do the three of you like white daisies
in particular?
jpnChrName: それにしても、花にも 色々な種類がありますが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、花にも
色々な種類がありますが……

engChrName: Maybe something specific about them appealed to you all?
engSearchText:
Maybe something specific about them appealed to
you all?
jpnChrName: 白いマーガレットが 特に好きな理由はあるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
白いマーガレットが
特に好きな理由はあるんですか？

engChrName: Why do you like white daisies so much?
engSearchText: Why do you like white daisies so much?
jpnChrName: しかし、花と言っても 色んな種類がありますが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、花と言っても
色んな種類がありますが……

engChrName: Is there a reason why you like white daisies so much?
engSearchText: Is there a reason why you like white daisies so much?
jpnChrName: 白いマーガレットが 特に好きな理由はあるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
白いマーガレットが
特に好きな理由はあるんですか？

engChrName: Why are you all so big on white daisies?
engSearchText: Why are you all so big on white daisies?
jpnChrName: しかしよ、花っつっても いくらでも種類があんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしよ、花っつっても
いくらでも種類があんだろ。

engChrName: There something special about them?
engSearchText: There something special about them?
jpnChrName: 白いマーガレットが 特に好きな理由はあるのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
白いマーガレットが
特に好きな理由はあるのかよ？

engChrName: If I may, what's so fascinating about white daisies?
engSearchText: If I may, what's so fascinating about white daisies?
jpnChrName: ですが、花と言いましても 様々な種類があります。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、花と言いましても
様々な種類があります。

engChrName: I wondered if there was a particular reason you liked them.
engSearchText:
I wondered if there was a particular reason you
liked them.
jpnChrName: 中でも白いマーガレットが お好きな理由はあるのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
中でも白いマーガレットが
お好きな理由はあるのでしょうか？

engChrName: Why white daisies?
engSearchText: Why white daisies?
jpnChrName: それにしても、花にも 色んな種類があるけど……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、花にも
色んな種類があるけど……

engChrName: Is there something special about them that stands out to you three?
engSearchText:
Is there something special about them that stands out
to you three?
jpnChrName: その中でも白いマーガレットが 好きな理由があったりするの？
jpnSearchText:
その中でも白いマーガレットが
好きな理由があったりするの？

engChrName: What's the fascination with white daisies?
engSearchText: What's the fascination with white daisies?
jpnChrName: けど、花と言ったって 色んな種類があるわよね。
jpnSearchText:
けど、花と言ったって
色んな種類があるわよね。

engChrName: Why not something else? How come you like them so much?
engSearchText:
Why not something else? How come you like them
so much?
jpnChrName: 白いマーガレットが 特に好きな理由はあるの？
jpnSearchText:
白いマーガレットが
特に好きな理由はあるの？

engChrName: What is the fascination with white daisies?
engSearchText: What is the fascination with white daisies?
jpnChrName: しかし、花にも 様々な種類があるが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、花にも
様々な種類があるが……

engChrName: What makes them so special compared to other flowers?
engSearchText:
What makes them so special compared to
other flowers?
jpnChrName: 白いマーガレットが 特に好きな理由はあるのか？
jpnSearchText:
白いマーガレットが
特に好きな理由はあるのか？

engChrName: I mean, they're easy on the eyes and smell nice, for one.
engSearchText:
I mean, they're easy on the eyes and smell nice,
for one.
jpnChrName: そうですね、 見た目や香りも好きなんですが……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、
見た目や香りも好きなんですが……

engChrName: But I guess their true meaning spoke to us. Do you know what white daisies mean in the language of flowers?
engSearchText:
But I guess their true meaning spoke to us. Do you
know what white daisies mean in the language
of flowers?
jpnChrName: なぜか３人とも、 その花言葉が気に入っていまして。
jpnSearchText:
なぜか３人とも、
その花言葉が気に入っていまして。

engChrName: Hidden love. It's pretty poetic, don't you think?
engSearchText: Hidden love. It's pretty poetic, don't you think?
jpnChrName: 『秘めた愛』…… 何だか詩的で美しくないですか？
jpnSearchText:
『秘めた愛』……
何だか詩的で美しくないですか？

engChrName: Yeah, I feel you.
engSearchText: Yeah, I feel you.
jpnChrName: ま、言わんとするのは分かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、言わんとするのは分かるぜ。

engChrName: But if that's what they stand for, then I wonder...
engSearchText: But if that's what they stand for, then I wonder...
jpnChrName: しかし、好きな理由が その花言葉なんだとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、好きな理由が
その花言葉なんだとしたら……

engChrName: Are y'all hiding some sort of hidden love?
engSearchText: Are y'all hiding some sort of hidden love?
jpnChrName: それぞれ具体的に 『秘めた愛』を抱えてるってことか？
jpnSearchText:
それぞれ具体的に
『秘めた愛』を抱えてるってことか？

engChrName: Haha, I don't know. That might be a stretch.
engSearchText: Haha, I don't know. That might be a stretch.
jpnChrName: はは、それはどうでしょうね。
jpnSearchText: はは、それはどうでしょうね。

engChrName: Maybe they appeal to Jess' artistic sensibilities, being a musician and all.
engSearchText:
Maybe they appeal to Jess' artistic sensibilities, being
a musician and all.
jpnChrName: ジェスはアーティストで 感受性が豊かというのもありますし。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスはアーティストで
感受性が豊かというのもありますし。

engChrName: Carol's more of an open book, though.
engSearchText: Carol's more of an open book, though.
jpnChrName: 姉さんは姉さんで分かりやすい性格で……
jpnSearchText: 姉さんは姉さんで分かりやすい性格で……

engChrName: But now that I think about it...
engSearchText: But now that I think about it...
jpnChrName: けどそうですね……
jpnSearchText: けどそうですね……

engChrName: She might actually be hiding her true feelings.
engSearchText: She might actually be hiding her true feelings.
jpnChrName: それでも姉さんは、確かに 自分の気持ちを隠していると思います。
jpnSearchText:
それでも姉さんは、確かに
自分の気持ちを隠していると思います。

engChrName: Well, you're the expert.
engSearchText: Well, you're the expert.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I don't think she told you about what happened.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I don't think she told you about
what happened.
jpnChrName: そういえば、お前さんは 聞かされていないんだったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、お前さんは
聞かされていないんだったな。

engChrName: Huh? Something happened?
engSearchText: Huh? Something happened?
jpnChrName: え、何をですか……
jpnSearchText: え、何をですか……

engChrName: Van told Raymond about Carol and Jess' confrontation, careful to omit some of the particulars.
engSearchText:
Van told Raymond about Carol and Jess'
confrontation, careful to omit some of the particulars.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは核心に触れることは避けつつ、 キャロルがジェスに言ったことを伝えた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは核心に触れることは避けつつ、
キャロルがジェスに言ったことを伝えた。

engChrName: 'Things can't keep going on like this forever'?
engSearchText: 'Things can't keep going on like this forever'?
jpnChrName: 『今のままの関係が続くのは苦しい』って。
jpnSearchText: 『今のままの関係が続くのは苦しい』って。

engChrName: She really said that?
engSearchText: She really said that?
jpnChrName: 姉さんがそんなことを……
jpnSearchText: 姉さんがそんなことを……

engChrName: She did. She really bore her heart out.
engSearchText: She did. She really bore her heart out.
jpnChrName: はい、思い切って 打ち明けられたみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、思い切って
打ち明けられたみたいですね。

engChrName: Yeah. I guess she really laid it out there.
engSearchText: Yeah. I guess she really laid it out there.
jpnChrName: はい、思い切って 伝えたみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、思い切って
伝えたみたいですね。
