engChrName: Sure did. Poor girl spilled her heart out to him.
engSearchText: Sure did. Poor girl spilled her heart out to him.
jpnChrName: ああ、思い切って 打ち明けたみたいだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、思い切って
打ち明けたみたいだぜ。

engChrName: That she did, and in no uncertain terms.
engSearchText: That she did, and in no uncertain terms.
jpnChrName: はい、意を決して 打ち明けたられたようです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、意を決して
打ち明けたられたようです。

engChrName: Yes. She didn't really suppress her emotions when talking to him.
engSearchText:
Yes. She didn't really suppress her emotions when
talking to him.
jpnChrName: うん、思い切って 打ち明けたみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、思い切って
打ち明けたみたいだね。

engChrName: Uh-huh. Basically spilled her whole heart out.
engSearchText: Uh-huh. Basically spilled her whole heart out.
jpnChrName: ええ、思い切って 打ち明けたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、思い切って
打ち明けたみたいね。

engChrName: She did. And didn't hold back, from what I gather.
engSearchText: She did. And didn't hold back, from what I gather.
jpnChrName: うむ、思い切って 打ち明けたようだな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、思い切って
打ち明けたようだな。

engChrName: Huh... And what did Jess say?
engSearchText: Huh... And what did Jess say?
jpnChrName: それで……ジェスはなんて？
jpnSearchText: それで……ジェスはなんて？

engChrName: That he didn't want to ruin his relationship with you two.
engSearchText:
That he didn't want to ruin his relationship with
you two.
jpnChrName: ジェスは『今の関係を崩したくない』 そう言ったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスは『今の関係を崩したくない』
そう言ったみたいだな。

engChrName: That's...a relief, at least?
engSearchText: That's...a relief, at least?
jpnChrName: そう……ですか。
jpnSearchText: そう……ですか。

engChrName: I feel bad for my sister.
engSearchText: I feel bad for my sister.
jpnChrName: はは、こういうのって ままならないものですね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、こういうのって
ままならないものですね。

engChrName: I want her happiness more than anything, but that's just not how things have shaken up.
engSearchText:
I want her happiness more than anything, but that's
just not how things have shaken up.
jpnChrName: 姉さんには幸せになって もらいたかったんですが……
jpnSearchText:
姉さんには幸せになって
もらいたかったんですが……

engChrName: To backpedal to the flower thing a little.
engSearchText: To backpedal to the flower thing a little.
jpnChrName: ……『秘めた愛』か。
jpnSearchText: ……『秘めた愛』か。

engChrName: You kinda sidestepped the whole hidden love discussion. What about you? Got any secrets of your own?
engSearchText:
You kinda sidestepped the whole hidden
love discussion. What about you? Got any secrets of
your own?
jpnChrName: そういやお前さん自身のことは 聞いてなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういやお前さん自身のことは
聞いてなかったな。

engChrName: Me?
engSearchText: Me?
jpnChrName: 僕……ですか？
jpnSearchText: 僕……ですか？

engChrName: You're not seriously springing that on me out of the blue and expecting an answer?
engSearchText:
You're not seriously springing that on me out of the
blue and expecting an answer?
jpnChrName: というかヴァンさんも人が悪いな。 あっても普通、言わないでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
というかヴァンさんも人が悪いな。
あっても普通、言わないでしょ。

engChrName: Yeah, that's fair.
engSearchText: Yeah, that's fair.
jpnChrName: ハッ、確かにそりゃあそうだ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、確かにそりゃあそうだ。

engChrName: I do understand where Jess is coming from...
engSearchText: I do understand where Jess is coming from...
jpnChrName: でも……ある意味で 僕もジェスと同じ気持ちなのかな。
jpnSearchText:
でも……ある意味で
僕もジェスと同じ気持ちなのかな。

engChrName: Not wanting to ruin how things are now and all.
engSearchText: Not wanting to ruin how things are now and all.
jpnChrName: 今の３人の関係を 崩したくないという点では……
jpnSearchText:
今の３人の関係を
崩したくないという点では……

engChrName: Anyway, don't mind me. Let's get back to the topic at hand.
engSearchText:
Anyway, don't mind me. Let's get back to the topic
at hand.
jpnChrName: まあいい、話を本題に戻すぜ。
jpnSearchText: まあいい、話を本題に戻すぜ。

engChrName: We know what he's lookin' for, but do you know where he might've gone to see those flowers?
engSearchText:
We know what he's lookin' for, but do you know
where he might've gone to see those flowers?
jpnChrName: ジェスの行き先について── 何か分かることはないか？
jpnSearchText:
ジェスの行き先について──
何か分かることはないか？

engChrName: I think so.
engSearchText: I think so.
jpnChrName: ええ、心当たりならあります。
jpnSearchText: ええ、心当たりならあります。

engChrName: He asked me once if I knew where daisies grew naturally.
engSearchText:
He asked me once if I knew where daisies
grew naturally.
jpnChrName: 実は以前、ジェスから白いマーガレットが 咲いている場所を聞かれたことがあって。
jpnSearchText:
実は以前、ジェスから白いマーガレットが
咲いている場所を聞かれたことがあって。

engChrName: I actually didn't have any idea at the time, but my boss did. Some bloom in the Dirke Memorial Park forest.
engSearchText:
I actually didn't have any idea at the time, but my
boss did. Some bloom in the Dirke Memorial
Park forest.
jpnChrName: ウチの店長に聞いて、 答えたことがあったんです。
jpnSearchText:
ウチの店長に聞いて、
答えたことがあったんです。

engChrName: Apparently there's a whole bunch of them near the entrance.
engSearchText:
Apparently there's a whole bunch of them near
the entrance.
jpnChrName: ディルク記念公園の森林区画── その入り口近くに固まって咲いてるって。
jpnSearchText:
ディルク記念公園の森林区画──
その入り口近くに固まって咲いてるって。

engChrName: The forest? You sure about that?
engSearchText: The forest? You sure about that?
jpnChrName: 記念公園の森林区画……
jpnSearchText: 記念公園の森林区画……

engChrName: That area's restricted, though.
engSearchText: That area's restricted, though.
jpnChrName: ですが、あそこは 封鎖されていますよね。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、あそこは
封鎖されていますよね。

engChrName: But that part's sealed off.
engSearchText: But that part's sealed off.
jpnChrName: ただ、あそこは 封鎖されているはずですが。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、あそこは
封鎖されているはずですが。

engChrName: That place is closed right now.
engSearchText: That place is closed right now.
jpnChrName: つっても、あそこは封鎖されてんだろ。
jpnSearchText: つっても、あそこは封鎖されてんだろ。

engChrName: However, that area is ostensibly closed to the public.
engSearchText: However, that area is ostensibly closed to the public.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、あそこは 封鎖されているはずですが。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、あそこは
封鎖されているはずですが。

engChrName: That section has been cordoned off from the public.
engSearchText: That section has been cordoned off from the public.
jpnChrName: けど、あそこは封鎖されてるよね。
jpnSearchText: けど、あそこは封鎖されてるよね。

engChrName: Isn't that area closed off though?
engSearchText: Isn't that area closed off though?
jpnChrName: けど、あそこって 封鎖されてなかったっけ？
jpnSearchText:
けど、あそこって
封鎖されてなかったっけ？

engChrName: That area is restricted, last I heard.
engSearchText: That area is restricted, last I heard.
jpnChrName: だが、あそこは 封鎖されていると聞いたが。
jpnSearchText:
だが、あそこは
封鎖されていると聞いたが。

engChrName: Believe me, I know.
engSearchText: Believe me, I know.
jpnChrName: ええ、それは知っています。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それは知っています。

engChrName: But you'd be surprised how far Jess could go on just stubbornness alone.
engSearchText:
But you'd be surprised how far Jess could go on just
stubbornness alone.
jpnChrName: ですがジェスは、妙に意固地で 冒険心が強い所もあって……
jpnSearchText:
ですがジェスは、妙に意固地で
冒険心が強い所もあって……

engChrName: I don't doubt he could sneak in there if he wanted to.
engSearchText: I don't doubt he could sneak in there if he wanted to.
jpnChrName: こっそり忍び込んだ可能性は 十分あり得るんじゃないかと思って。
jpnSearchText:
こっそり忍び込んだ可能性は
十分あり得るんじゃないかと思って。

engChrName: All right.
engSearchText: All right.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどな。

engChrName: He shouldn't get attacked by any monsters if he doesn't wander too far in, but I don't wanna risk it.
engSearchText:
He shouldn't get attacked by any monsters if he
doesn't wander too far in, but I don't wanna risk it.
jpnChrName: まあ、入り口近くなら魔獣に 襲われる危険性は低いだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、入り口近くなら魔獣に
襲われる危険性は低いだろうが……

engChrName: Are you going to the park, then? Can you take me with you?
engSearchText:
Are you going to the park, then? Can you take me
with you?
jpnChrName: その、公園に向かうなら 僕も連れて行ってもらえませんか。
jpnSearchText:
その、公園に向かうなら
僕も連れて行ってもらえませんか。

engChrName: I understand what happened between Jess and Carol.
engSearchText: I understand what happened between Jess and Carol.
jpnChrName: 姉さんとジェスの話は 聞かせてもらいましたが……
jpnSearchText:
姉さんとジェスの話は
聞かせてもらいましたが……

engChrName: But I don't see why that meant he had to leave us so out of nowhere.
engSearchText:
But I don't see why that meant he had to leave us so
out of nowhere.
jpnChrName: それでもなぜ、ジェスが僕たちの前から 姿を消すことを選んだのか……
jpnSearchText:
それでもなぜ、ジェスが僕たちの前から
姿を消すことを選んだのか……

engChrName: It just doesn't make sense to me.
engSearchText: It just doesn't make sense to me.
jpnChrName: 正直今でも分からなくて。
jpnSearchText: 正直今でも分からなくて。

engChrName: I want to talk to him. I need to hear the answers directly from his mouth.
engSearchText:
I want to talk to him. I need to hear the answers
directly from his mouth.
jpnChrName: だから直接──僕からジェスに聞きたいんです。
jpnSearchText: だから直接──僕からジェスに聞きたいんです。

engChrName: Sure, why not. If he's not coming back, might as well take you to him. Let you two smooth things out.
engSearchText:
Sure, why not. If he's not coming back, might as well
take you to him. Let you two smooth things out.
jpnChrName: ま、確かにやっこさんを強引に 連れ帰るわけにもいかなそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、確かにやっこさんを強引に
連れ帰るわけにもいかなそうだしな。

engChrName: I'll let you know once we're ready to roll. Sound good?
engSearchText:
I'll let you know once we're ready to roll.
Sound good?
jpnChrName: 分かったぜ、公園に向かう時は 必ずお前さんに声をかけさせてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
分かったぜ、公園に向かう時は
必ずお前さんに声をかけさせてもらう。

engChrName: Sounds great! Thanks, Van!
engSearchText: Sounds great! Thanks, Van!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます！

engChrName: You won't be able to explore the forest in Dirke Memorial Park until this request is completed.
engSearchText:
You won't be able to explore the forest in Dirke
Memorial Park until this request is completed.
jpnChrName: クエストを進める場合は、 レイモンドに話しかけてください。
jpnSearchText:
クエストを進める場合は、
レイモンドに話しかけてください。

engChrName: Talk to Raymond once you're ready to go.
engSearchText: Talk to Raymond once you're ready to go.
jpnChrName: なおクエストを達成するまで、 記念公園の森林区画は攻略できなくなります。
jpnSearchText:
なおクエストを達成するまで、
記念公園の森林区画は攻略できなくなります。

engChrName: Hey, Van. Are we going to the Memorial Park forest now?
engSearchText:
Hey, Van. Are we going to the Memorial Park
forest now?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、森林区画に向かうんですね。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、森林区画に向かうんですね。

engChrName: Yep. Let's roll.
engSearchText: Yep. Let's roll.
jpnChrName: ああ、それじゃあ向かうとするか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、それじゃあ向かうとするか。

engChrName: You gonna let your sis know?
engSearchText: You gonna let your sis know?
jpnChrName: 姉にも連絡するか？
jpnSearchText: 姉にも連絡するか？

engChrName: Yeah. I'll contact her just to let her know what's going on.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I'll contact her just to let her know what's
going on.
jpnChrName: はい、一応 連絡だけは入れておこうと思います。
jpnSearchText:
はい、一応
連絡だけは入れておこうと思います。

engChrName: Raymond reached out to Carol before they left to let her know of everything, but she was too busy to come immediately.
engSearchText:
Raymond reached out to Carol before they left to let
her know of everything, but she was too busy to
come immediately.
jpnChrName: レイモンドが姉のキャロルに連絡を入れると やはり仕事中ではあったが──
jpnSearchText:
レイモンドが姉のキャロルに連絡を入れると
やはり仕事中ではあったが──

engChrName: The group then ventured into the forest after promising to meet up when Carol had the chance.
engSearchText:
The group then ventured into the forest after
promising to meet up when Carol had the chance.
jpnChrName: 区切りを付けたら必ず合流するということで、 先に記念公園の森林区画へと向かうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
区切りを付けたら必ず合流するということで、
先に記念公園の森林区画へと向かうのだった。

engChrName: (Whoops. Can't forget to bring Agnès before I hit this place up.)
engSearchText:
(Whoops. Can't forget to bring Agnès before I hit
this place up.)
jpnChrName: （おっと、店を当たるなら 　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）
jpnSearchText:
（おっと、店を当たるなら
　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）

engChrName: Don't get me wrong, you've got good taste, coming to me for roasted chestnuts.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong, you've got good taste, coming to
me for roasted chestnuts.
jpnChrName: まぁウチの焼き栗に目ぇつけたセンスは 褒めてやるけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
まぁウチの焼き栗に目ぇつけたセンスは
褒めてやるけどよ。

engChrName: But are ya really sure those kids'll like these?
engSearchText: But are ya really sure those kids'll like these?
jpnChrName: 正直、子供ウケはビミョーじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText: 正直、子供ウケはビミョーじゃねぇか？

engChrName: I don't see why not. The kids around here love 'em.
engSearchText: I don't see why not. The kids around here love 'em.
jpnChrName: そうか？　旧市街の子らにはお馴染みだろ。
jpnSearchText: そうか？　旧市街の子らにはお馴染みだろ。

engChrName: I guess. But they're not, like, a special occasion kinda thing, y'know?
engSearchText:
I guess. But they're not, like, a special occasion kinda
thing, y'know?
jpnChrName: いや、なんつうかなぁ。 特別な時に食べるもんじゃないっつうか。
jpnSearchText:
いや、なんつうかなぁ。
特別な時に食べるもんじゃないっつうか。

engChrName: Give the chestnut glacé a try. Those might be more up your alley.
engSearchText:
Give the chestnut glacé a try. Those might be more
up your alley.
jpnChrName: だったらこっちの── マロングラッセがイイと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だったらこっちの──
マロングラッセがイイと思うぜ。

engChrName: Oh, wow. I didn't realize you were selling those, too!
engSearchText: Oh, wow. I didn't realize you were selling those, too!
jpnChrName: わぁ、洋菓子もあるんですね！
jpnSearchText: わぁ、洋菓子もあるんですね！

engChrName: We'll gladly take some for our taste-testing, then.
engSearchText: We'll gladly take some for our taste-testing, then.
jpnChrName: じゃあそちらを試食用に買わせてください。
jpnSearchText: じゃあそちらを試食用に買わせてください。

engChrName: Wow, look at you, Eddy. Playin' the part of professional salesman for once. I'm legit impressed.
engSearchText:
Wow, look at you, Eddy. Playin' the part of
professional salesman for once. I'm legit impressed.
jpnChrName: まともなこと言えるじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: まともなこと言えるじゃねぇか。

engChrName: Sh-Shut up! I wasn't asking you!
engSearchText: Sh-Shut up! I wasn't asking you!
jpnChrName: はぁ？　やかましいぞオッサン！
jpnSearchText: はぁ？　やかましいぞオッサン！

engChrName: Okay, we've visited all the stores we planned on.
engSearchText: Okay, we've visited all the stores we planned on.
jpnChrName: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。
jpnSearchText: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。

engChrName: We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head back to Odette?
engSearchText:
We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head
back to Odette?
jpnChrName: 試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！ オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！
オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。

engChrName: Vaaan! Good morning!
engSearchText: Vaaan! Good morning!
jpnChrName: おはよ～ヴァン！
jpnSearchText: おはよ～ヴァン！

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: わわっ……
jpnSearchText: わわっ……

engChrName: Hey, Yumes. Good to see you. You look ready to take on the world.
engSearchText:
Hey, Yumes. Good to see you. You look ready to take
on the world.
jpnChrName: おはようさん、ユメ坊。 今日も相変わらず元気だな。
jpnSearchText:
おはようさん、ユメ坊。
今日も相変わらず元気だな。

engChrName: Have you brushed your teeth? Washed your face? Had breakfast?
engSearchText:
Have you brushed your teeth? Washed your face?
Had breakfast?
jpnChrName: 歯みがいたー？ 顔洗ったー？　ご飯食べたー？
jpnSearchText:
歯みがいたー？
顔洗ったー？　ご飯食べたー？

engChrName: You better, or else you're in big trouble!
engSearchText: You better, or else you're in big trouble!
jpnChrName: ちゃんとやらないと ダメなんだからねー。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんとやらないと
ダメなんだからねー。

engChrName: I have, promise. Geez, who's the adult between us two?
engSearchText:
I have, promise. Geez, who's the adult between
us two?
jpnChrName: やってるやってる。 ったく、まるで保護者だな。
jpnSearchText:
やってるやってる。
ったく、まるで保護者だな。

engChrName: Not you! You're too messy! You don't take care of yourself!
engSearchText:
Not you! You're too messy! You don't take care
of yourself!
jpnChrName: ヴァンはだらしないからねー、 ユメがキョウセイしてあげないと！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはだらしないからねー、
ユメがキョウセイしてあげないと！

engChrName: Oh, did you make a new friend?
engSearchText: Oh, did you make a new friend?
jpnChrName: あれ、知らないお姉ちゃんー？
jpnSearchText: あれ、知らないお姉ちゃんー？

engChrName: Hello! Nice to meet you!
engSearchText: Hello! Nice to meet you!
jpnChrName: こんにちはー！
jpnSearchText: こんにちはー！

engChrName: Heehee. Nice to meet you, too. She's adorable.
engSearchText: Heehee. Nice to meet you, too. She's adorable.
jpnChrName: ふふ、こんにちは。 可愛い子ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、こんにちは。
可愛い子ですね。

engChrName: Her family are my neighbors. They run the bistro here.
engSearchText:
Her family are my neighbors. They run the
bistro here.
jpnChrName: このビストロの娘だ。 まあご近所さんって所だな。
jpnSearchText:
このビストロの娘だ。
まあご近所さんって所だな。

engChrName: Nice to see you again. Glad to see you got to talk to Van after all.
engSearchText:
Nice to see you again. Glad to see you got to talk to
Van after all.
jpnChrName: あら、無事に会えたみたいね。
jpnSearchText: あら、無事に会えたみたいね。

engChrName: Oh, I remember you! Yes, thank you for all your help earlier.
engSearchText:
Oh, I remember you! Yes, thank you for all your
help earlier.
jpnChrName: あ、さっきの…… ご親切にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
あ、さっきの……
ご親切にありがとうございました。

engChrName: You two know each other?
engSearchText: You two know each other?
jpnChrName: なんだ、ポーレットと 面識あったのか？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、ポーレットと
面識あったのか？

engChrName: Not really. She pointed me toward your office when I first came here. It was a big help.
engSearchText:
Not really. She pointed me toward your office when I
first came here. It was a big help.
jpnChrName: 建物の前で迷っていたところに 声をかけてもらいまして。
jpnSearchText:
建物の前で迷っていたところに
声をかけてもらいまして。

engChrName: Heehee, it was nothing. Van's office isn't exactly easy to find anyway.
engSearchText:
Heehee, it was nothing. Van's office isn't exactly easy
to find anyway.
jpnChrName: ふふ、気にしないで、時々あることだから。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、気にしないで、時々あることだから。

engChrName: You're not the first to come looking for directions.
engSearchText: You're not the first to come looking for directions.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの事務所は ただでさえ分かりにくいものね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんの事務所は
ただでさえ分かりにくいものね。

engChrName: I honestly didn't think to look for your office on top of a restaurant as cozy as this one. That caught me by surprise.
engSearchText:
I honestly didn't think to look for your office on top
of a restaurant as cozy as this one. That caught me
by surprise.
jpnChrName: はい、まさかこんな 雰囲気のいいお店の上にあるとは……
jpnSearchText:
はい、まさかこんな
雰囲気のいいお店の上にあるとは……

engChrName: I wasn't really plannin' on it, but things shook out like that. Friendly, normal neighbors like these make for a nice front.
engSearchText:
I wasn't really plannin' on it, but things shook out
like that. Friendly, normal neighbors like these make
for a nice front.
jpnChrName: ま、いいカムフラージュだろ？ 別に狙ったわけじゃねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、いいカムフラージュだろ？
別に狙ったわけじゃねえけどな。

engChrName: You could stand to be a better one, y'know! I still don't like that murky business of yours being right on top of mine.
engSearchText:
You could stand to be a better one, y'know! I still
don't like that murky business of yours being right on
top of mine.
jpnChrName: ったく、つくづく 胡散臭い商売を始めてくれたもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、つくづく
胡散臭い商売を始めてくれたもんだ。

engChrName: Good to see you, too, Victor.
engSearchText: Good to see you, too, Victor.
jpnChrName: よう、ビクトルのおやっさん。
jpnSearchText: よう、ビクトルのおやっさん。

engChrName: I'm not used to seeing you out during the day. When do you plan on coming—oh. I see you have a young lady with you today.
engSearchText:
I'm not used to seeing you out during the day.
When do you plan on coming—oh. I see you have a
young lady with you today.
jpnChrName: 珍しく昼間から出かけるみてえだな。 今日はいつ頃戻って──ってそっちのお嬢さんは。
jpnSearchText:
珍しく昼間から出かけるみてえだな。
今日はいつ頃戻って──ってそっちのお嬢さんは。

engChrName: I better not see you try any funny business with her, understood? Girl that young doesn't need a ruffian like you ruining her life.
engSearchText:
I better not see you try any funny business with
her, understood? Girl that young doesn't need a
ruffian like you ruining her life.
jpnChrName: ……おい不良店子、まさか良い所のお嬢さんを 誑かしてんじゃねえだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
……おい不良店子、まさか良い所のお嬢さんを
誑かしてんじゃねえだろうな？

engChrName: Come on, give me at least a LITTLE credit! I ain't that much of a degenerate. She's just a normal client, chill.
engSearchText:
Come on, give me at least a LITTLE credit! I ain't
that much of a degenerate. She's just a normal
client, chill.
jpnChrName: 人聞きの悪い事言うなっての…… 真っ当な俺の依頼人だ。
jpnSearchText:
人聞きの悪い事言うなっての……
真っ当な俺の依頼人だ。

engChrName: I don't know about, umm, 'normal,' but he's right. I came to him first because I have some business I need his help with.
engSearchText:
I don't know about, umm, 'normal,' but he's right.
I came to him first because I have some business I
need his help with.
jpnChrName: は、はい、真っ当かはともかく 正式に依頼させていただきました。
jpnSearchText:
は、はい、真っ当かはともかく
正式に依頼させていただきました。

engChrName: Hmm. Things must be complicated, if you're coming to this idiot for help.
engSearchText:
Hmm. Things must be complicated, if you're coming
to this idiot for help.
jpnChrName: ……ふむ、何やら事情がありそうだが。
jpnSearchText: ……ふむ、何やら事情がありそうだが。

engChrName: Van, if you go dragging this lady to any shady alleys or bad parts of town, I'll have your head on a nice platter before dinnertime. Are we clear?
engSearchText:
Van, if you go dragging this lady to any shady alleys
or bad parts of town, I'll have your head on a nice
platter before dinnertime. Are we clear?
jpnChrName: ──いいか、くれぐれも 怪しい界隈を連れ回すんじゃねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──いいか、くれぐれも
怪しい界隈を連れ回すんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: And don't eat too many sweets! Or you'll get cavities!
engSearchText: And don't eat too many sweets! Or you'll get cavities!
jpnChrName: 甘いモノも食べ過ぎないようにねー！ ムシバになっちゃうぞー！
jpnSearchText:
甘いモノも食べ過ぎないようにねー！
ムシバになっちゃうぞー！

engChrName: That's exactly right, my sweet little Yumé! We can't forget that! ❤ ...I said, are we clear? Answer me, punk!
engSearchText:
That's exactly right, my sweet little Yumé! We can't
forget that! ❤ ...I said, are we clear? Answer me, punk!
jpnChrName: うんうん、ユメの言う通りだなぁ～❤ ──分かったな、不良店子！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、ユメの言う通りだなぁ～❤
──分かったな、不良店子！

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, I'll be careful. Don't gotta grill me in front of a client.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah, I'll be careful. Don't gotta grill me in
front of a client.
jpnChrName: 分かった分かったっ。 ったく、依頼人の前でやめてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
分かった分かったっ。
ったく、依頼人の前でやめてくれや。

engChrName: Haha. You and your neighbors look close.
engSearchText: Haha. You and your neighbors look close.
jpnChrName: クスクス…… 随分親しくされてるんですね。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……
随分親しくされてるんですね。

engChrName: It's because we've known each other for a while now. Anyway, good luck out there! Stay safe!
engSearchText:
It's because we've known each other for a while now.
Anyway, good luck out there! Stay safe!
jpnChrName: ふふ、付き合いも長いから。 二人とも、気を付けていってらっしゃい。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、付き合いも長いから。
二人とも、気を付けていってらっしゃい。

engChrName: Let us know if you get hungry. We'll get something for you in no time.
engSearchText:
Let us know if you get hungry. We'll get something
for you in no time.
jpnChrName: 何か食べていくなら言ってちょうだい。 すぐに用意させてもらうから。
jpnSearchText:
何か食べていくなら言ってちょうだい。
すぐに用意させてもらうから。

engChrName: Oh, is this what you were talking about earlier?
engSearchText: Oh, is this what you were talking about earlier?
jpnChrName: これがさっき言っていた……
jpnSearchText: これがさっき言っていた……

engChrName: Yep. I usually get requests through bulletin boards like this one.
engSearchText:
Yep. I usually get requests through bulletin boards
like this one.
jpnChrName: ああ、裏解決業務は基本 掲示板から依頼を受け取る形になる。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、裏解決業務は基本
掲示板から依頼を受け取る形になる。

engChrName: They're all over the city, too. Not just in Old Town.
engSearchText: They're all over the city, too. Not just in Old Town.
jpnChrName: 旧市街に限らず 他のエリアのものも含めてな。
jpnSearchText:
旧市街に限らず
他のエリアのものも含めてな。

engChrName: Sure, I see advertisements and messages and other kinds of information posted on them all the time.
engSearchText:
Sure, I see advertisements and messages and other
kinds of information posted on them all the time.
jpnChrName: えっと、企業広告に誰かへの伝言、 お得情報なんかはよく見かけますけど……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、企業広告に誰かへの伝言、
お得情報なんかはよく見かけますけど……

engChrName: But do people really put in spriggan requests on them, too?
engSearchText:
But do people really put in spriggan requests on
them, too?
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋》への依頼なんてものが 貼りだされているんですか？
jpnSearchText:
《裏解決屋》への依頼なんてものが
貼りだされているんですか？

engChrName: Yep, but you gotta know where to look for them.
engSearchText: Yep, but you gotta know where to look for them.
jpnChrName: ま、さすがに一目で 分かるような形じゃねえがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、さすがに一目で
分かるような形じゃねえがな。

engChrName: Was that behind the bulletin board?
engSearchText: Was that behind the bulletin board?
jpnChrName: 掲示板の裏に……
jpnSearchText: 掲示板の裏に……

engChrName: Sure was. See how it says '4SPG'? That means 'for spriggan.'
engSearchText:
Sure was. See how it says '4SPG'? That means
'for spriggan.'
jpnChrName: for Spriggan（スプリガンへ）…… “４ｓｐｇ”っつう符丁でな。
jpnSearchText:
for Spriggan（スプリガンへ）……
“４ｓｐｇ”っつう符丁でな。

engChrName: Been going out of my way to spread rumors about it so people reach out this way.
engSearchText:
Been going out of my way to spread rumors about it
so people reach out this way.
jpnChrName: 基本的に《裏解決屋》への依頼は この形で受け取れるよう噂を流している。
jpnSearchText:
基本的に《裏解決屋》への依頼は
この形で受け取れるよう噂を流している。

engChrName: Partly for my own safety, but it also gives me some breathing room so I can pick and choose which jobs I take.
engSearchText:
Partly for my own safety, but it also gives me some
breathing room so I can pick and choose which jobs
I take.
jpnChrName: 俺自身の自衛と、引き受けるかどうかを 判断するための段取りってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺自身の自衛と、引き受けるかどうかを
判断するための段取りってわけだ。

engChrName: To be honest, I don't get clients like you often. Not many actually bother to track me down.
engSearchText:
To be honest, I don't get clients like you often.
Not many actually bother to track me down.
jpnChrName: この前のお前みたいに 直接押しかけてくる方が珍しいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
この前のお前みたいに
直接押しかけてくる方が珍しいぜ？

engChrName: Oh, I didn't know that. I'm sorry if I broke any rules.
engSearchText: Oh, I didn't know that. I'm sorry if I broke any rules.
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですね…… すみませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうなんですね……
すみませんでした。

engChrName: Nah, shit's not set in stone. Everyone's different, so you're fine.
engSearchText:
Nah, shit's not set in stone. Everyone's different, so
you're fine.
jpnChrName: ま、別に厳密なルールがあるわけじゃねえ。 事情が事情だったろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、別に厳密なルールがあるわけじゃねえ。
事情が事情だったろうしな。

engChrName: Anyway, let's see what kinda job this is.
engSearchText: Anyway, let's see what kinda job this is.
jpnChrName: とりあえずこの依頼の内容を確認するか。
jpnSearchText: とりあえずこの依頼の内容を確認するか。

engChrName: They want you to investigate a friend they caught stealing? So this is what people post about...
engSearchText:
They want you to investigate a friend they
caught stealing? So this is what people post about...
jpnChrName: “盗みを働いた友人の調査”…… こんな依頼が……
jpnSearchText:
“盗みを働いた友人の調査”……
こんな依頼が……

engChrName: This might just be the perfect gig to get your feet wet and see how work rolls.
engSearchText:
This might just be the perfect gig to get your feet wet
and see how work rolls.
jpnChrName: ハン、お前の“お試し”って意味じゃ ちょうどいい内容かもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、お前の“お試し”って意味じゃ
ちょうどいい内容かもしれねぇな。

engChrName: The meeting spot's not far from here at all. Let's go talk to 'em when we're ready.
engSearchText:
The meeting spot's not far from here at all. Let's go
talk to 'em when we're ready.
jpnChrName: 待ち合わせ場所も近い── タイミングを見て行ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
待ち合わせ場所も近い──
タイミングを見て行ってみるぞ。

engChrName: A-All right. If you're sure.
engSearchText: A-All right. If you're sure.
jpnChrName: わ、分かりました。
jpnSearchText: わ、分かりました。

engChrName: The To-Do List has now been unlocked.
engSearchText: The To-Do List has now been unlocked.
jpnChrName: ＴｏＤｏリストが使えるようになった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＴｏＤｏリストが使えるようになった。

engChrName: Hey, Van. Good to see you!
engSearchText: Hey, Van. Good to see you!
jpnChrName: やあヴァンさん、いらっしゃい。
jpnSearchText: やあヴァンさん、いらっしゃい。

engChrName: Those new muffins you asked me to put aside turned out great!
engSearchText:
Those new muffins you asked me to put aside turned
out great!
jpnChrName: 取り置きを頼まれてた新作マフィン、 美味しく焼きあがってますよ。
jpnSearchText:
取り置きを頼まれてた新作マフィン、
美味しく焼きあがってますよ。

engChrName: Awesome! I appreciate you doing that. Can I get two, then?
engSearchText:
Awesome! I appreciate you doing that. Can I get
two, then?
jpnChrName: おお、ありがたいぜ。 ２つ頼めるか？
jpnSearchText:
おお、ありがたいぜ。
２つ頼めるか？

engChrName: Sure thing. I'll have them ready in just a minute.
engSearchText: Sure thing. I'll have them ready in just a minute.
jpnChrName: ええ、今出してくるので 少し待っててください。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、今出してくるので
少し待っててください。

engChrName: Your timing couldn't be more perfect. I've got a new recipe I wanted you, specifically, to try out.
engSearchText:
Your timing couldn't be more perfect. I've got a new
recipe I wanted you, specifically, to try out.
jpnChrName: ちょうどよかった、是非ヴァンさんに 食べてもらいたい新作があるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうどよかった、是非ヴァンさんに
食べてもらいたい新作があるんですよ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah? Is this the one I've heard all those rumors about?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah? Is this the one I've heard all those
rumors about?
jpnChrName: 噂の“新作”ってやつだな？
jpnSearchText: 噂の“新作”ってやつだな？

engChrName: It's a sweet muffin made using flower nectar. I'll have them ready in just a sec.
engSearchText:
It's a sweet muffin made using flower nectar. I'll have
them ready in just a sec.
jpnChrName: 花の蜜を使った特製スイートマフィンです。 今出してくるので少し待っててください。
jpnSearchText:
花の蜜を使った特製スイートマフィンです。
今出してくるので少し待っててください。

engChrName: Awesome. I'll take two.
engSearchText: Awesome. I'll take two.
jpnChrName: ２つだ、よろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ２つだ、よろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: (Wait a minute. Van, you don't think...?)
engSearchText: (Wait a minute. Van, you don't think...?)
jpnChrName: （あの、ヴァンさん……   もしかして……）
jpnSearchText:
（あの、ヴァンさん……
もしかして……）

engChrName: (Heh. You caught on, did you?)
engSearchText: (Heh. You caught on, did you?)
jpnChrName: （……へえ、まさか気づいたのか？）
jpnSearchText: （……へえ、まさか気づいたのか？）

engChrName: (Then does that mean...?!)
engSearchText: (Then does that mean...?!)
jpnChrName: （！　そ、それじゃあ……）
jpnSearchText: （！　そ、それじゃあ……）

engChrName: (Let's not get ahead of ourselves. I don't sense anything suspicious, but we should still be careful.)
engSearchText:
(Let's not get ahead of ourselves. I don't sense
anything suspicious, but we should still be careful.)
jpnChrName: （嫌な“匂い”はしねえが   一応お前も注意しとけ。）
jpnSearchText:
（嫌な“匂い”はしねえが
一応お前も注意しとけ。）

engChrName: Thanks for waiting! I hope you enjoy them. I really like how they turned out.
engSearchText:
Thanks for waiting! I hope you enjoy them. I really
like how they turned out.
jpnChrName: お待たせしました、 自信作なので楽しんでくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
お待たせしました、
自信作なので楽しんでくださいね。

engChrName: Received muffins.
engSearchText: Received muffins.
jpnChrName: 商品を受け取った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>商品を受け取った。

engChrName: G-Good to know. Thank you for making them.
engSearchText: G-Good to know. Thank you for making them.
jpnChrName: あ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: あ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Let's make our way back to the office now. Best not to waste too much time out here.
engSearchText:
Let's make our way back to the office now. Best not
to waste too much time out here.
jpnChrName: さて、そんじゃ事務所に戻るか。 あまり待たせるのも悪いしな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、そんじゃ事務所に戻るか。
あまり待たせるのも悪いしな。

engChrName: Hey, Van. Do my eyes deceive me or do I see you've made yet another new friend?
engSearchText:
Hey, Van. Do my eyes deceive me or do I see you've
made yet another new friend?
jpnChrName: あれー、ヴァン。 また新しいヒト連れてるねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あれー、ヴァン。
また新しいヒト連れてるねぇ。

engChrName: And a pretty one at that! Say, since you're here, why don't you hop in for a little dip? Guaranteed you'll love it here!
engSearchText:
And a pretty one at that! Say, since you're here, why
don't you hop in for a little dip? Guaranteed you'll
love it here!
jpnChrName: しかも銀髪の美人さんだし！ せっかくだし一風呂浴びていく？
jpnSearchText:
しかも銀髪の美人さんだし！
せっかくだし一風呂浴びていく？

engChrName: A dip? In what? Oh, wait. This is—
engSearchText: A dip? In what? Oh, wait. This is—
jpnChrName: ひ、一風呂？ ああ、もしかしてここって。
jpnSearchText:
ひ、一風呂？
ああ、もしかしてここって。

engChrName: The local bathhouse. I take it they're not that common in Basel?
engSearchText:
The local bathhouse. I take it they're not that
common in Basel?
jpnChrName: ああ、公衆浴場だな。 バーゼルあたりじゃ珍しかったか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、公衆浴場だな。
バーゼルあたりじゃ珍しかったか？

engChrName: This one's real nice. Got a legit sauna and everything. I can show you how to get the most out of it, if you're game.
engSearchText:
This one's real nice. Got a legit sauna and everything.
I can show you how to get the most out of it, if
you're game.
jpnChrName: 本場のサウナなんかも付いてるし よかったら入り方を指南してもいいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
本場のサウナなんかも付いてるし
よかったら入り方を指南してもいいぜ？

engChrName: This place is real nice. Got a legit sauna and everything. I can show you how to get the most out of it, if you're game.
engSearchText:
This place is real nice. Got a legit sauna
and everything. I can show you how to get the most
out of it, if you're game.
jpnChrName: そうだな、本場のサウナも付いてるし よかったら入り方を指南してもいいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、本場のサウナも付いてるし
よかったら入り方を指南してもいいぜ？

engChrName: I'm... I'm good, thanks. I just had a shower this morning, so it's a bit soon to wash up again.
engSearchText:
I'm... I'm good, thanks. I just had a shower this
morning, so it's a bit soon to wash up again.
jpnChrName: いや、その……今朝シャワーを 浴びたばかりだし遠慮しておくよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、その……今朝シャワーを
浴びたばかりだし遠慮しておくよ。

engChrName: Don't let me stop you, though. If the rest of you want to take a bath, go ahead. I don't mind waiting.
engSearchText:
Don't let me stop you, though. If the rest of you want
to take a bath, go ahead. I don't mind waiting.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちが入りたいんだったら 僕に構わずに入ってくれば？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたちが入りたいんだったら
僕に構わずに入ってくれば？

engChrName: You sure? Shame. I was lookin' forward to inducting you as an honorary sauna sage.
engSearchText:
You sure? Shame. I was lookin' forward to inducting
you as an honorary sauna sage.
jpnChrName: そうか？　うーん、これを機会に “サ道”に引きずり込もうと思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
そうか？　うーん、これを機会に
“サ道”に引きずり込もうと思ったが。

engChrName: A what? I...don't know if I like the sound of that.
engSearchText: A what? I...don't know if I like the sound of that.
jpnChrName: ……えっと、何それ？ 何やら不穏そうな響きなんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
……えっと、何それ？
何やら不穏そうな響きなんだけど。

engChrName: According to him, a sauna sage is someone with an 'enlightened' appreciation for saunas. Or something like that...
engSearchText:
According to him, a sauna sage is someone with an
'enlightened' appreciation for saunas. Or something
like that...
jpnChrName: その、サウナ愛好家の方々が 目指すべき境地らしいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
その、サウナ愛好家の方々が
目指すべき境地らしいですけど……

engChrName: I think it involves some kinda hamam training? I dunno.
engSearchText:
I think it involves some kinda hamam training?
I dunno.
jpnChrName: えと、蒸し風呂（ハマム）を通じて 自らを高める修練と言いますか。
jpnSearchText:
えと、蒸し風呂（ハマム）を通じて
自らを高める修練と言いますか。

engChrName: Don't sweat it too much. You'll regret it if you let him yap your ears off about it. Trust me.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it too much. You'll regret it if you let him
yap your ears off about it. Trust me.
jpnChrName: ま、あんま気にすんな。 下手に踏み込んだら面倒臭えぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あんま気にすんな。
下手に踏み込んだら面倒臭えぞ。

engChrName: Heehee. It is supposedly a practice born in Remiferia, where saunas originate from.
engSearchText:
Heehee. It is supposedly a practice born in Remiferia,
where saunas originate from.
jpnChrName: ふふ、サウナ発祥のレミフェリアで 生まれたという習慣だそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、サウナ発祥のレミフェリアで
生まれたという習慣だそうですね。

engChrName: Van, knock it off! I know you mean well, but don't go making my potential future customers uncomfortable!
engSearchText:
Van, knock it off! I know you mean well, but don't go
making my potential future customers uncomfortable!
jpnChrName: も～、ヴァン。 “サウハラ”にならないよう注意しなよね。
jpnSearchText:
も～、ヴァン。
“サウハラ”にならないよう注意しなよね。

engChrName: Anyway, if you're ever interested in giving this place a try, new guy, you're more than welcome to come back anytime.
engSearchText:
Anyway, if you're ever interested in giving this place a
try, new guy, you're more than welcome to come
back anytime.
jpnChrName: お兄さんも、興味があったら またの機会にでも入りに来てよ。
jpnSearchText:
お兄さんも、興味があったら
またの機会にでも入りに来てよ。

engChrName: Uh, right. Thanks. Maybe I will sometime.
engSearchText: Uh, right. Thanks. Maybe I will sometime.
jpnChrName: ああ、うん…… ありがとう、そのうちにね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、うん……
ありがとう、そのうちにね。

engChrName: (Should I? I know what's supposed to happen in these sorts of places...)
engSearchText:
(Should I? I know what's supposed to happen in these
sorts of places...)
jpnChrName: （……どうしようかな。   入り方の作法は知ってるけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（……どうしようかな。
入り方の作法は知ってるけど……）

engChrName: I think I'll pass on it for now. I'll just relax out here, if that's okay.
engSearchText:
I think I'll pass on it for now. I'll just relax out here, if
that's okay.
jpnChrName: ……僕は遠慮しとこうかな。 ここで寛がせてもらうからさ。
jpnSearchText:
……僕は遠慮しとこうかな。
ここで寛がせてもらうからさ。

engChrName: If you're sure. Would've been nice to have you, but all right. See ya in a bit.
engSearchText:
If you're sure. Would've been nice to have you, but
all right. See ya in a bit.
jpnChrName: ま、残念だが仕方ねぇか。 そんじゃあちょいと待っててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、残念だが仕方ねぇか。
そんじゃあちょいと待っててくれ。

engChrName: Psst! Hey, I've got an idea. You wanna try our reserved private bath instead?
engSearchText:
Psst! Hey, I've got an idea. You wanna try our
reserved private bath instead?
jpnChrName: ねえねえ、お兄さん。 よかったら貸切風呂に入っていく？
jpnSearchText:
ねえねえ、お兄さん。
よかったら貸切風呂に入っていく？

engChrName: It's pretty small, but it still comes with a sauna. You interested?
engSearchText:
It's pretty small, but it still comes with a sauna.
You interested?
jpnChrName: 小さいけどサウナスペースもあるよ。
jpnSearchText: 小さいけどサウナスペースもあるよ。

engChrName: Huh? H-How did you know I—
engSearchText: Huh? H-How did you know I—
jpnChrName: え……！？ ど、どうして……
jpnSearchText:
え……！？
ど、どうして……

engChrName: Heehee, it's Edith. You meet all kinds of people here with different needs and comfort levels.
engSearchText:
Heehee, it's Edith. You meet all kinds of people here
with different needs and comfort levels.
jpnChrName: あはは、首都は 色んなヒトたちが集まるからね～。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、首都は
色んなヒトたちが集まるからね～。

engChrName: Grandpa and the others built it to cater to people who might prefer to soak alone, whether it's out of custom or whatever.
engSearchText:
Grandpa and the others built it to cater to people who
might prefer to soak alone, whether it's out of custom
or whatever.
jpnChrName: 慣習とかで一人で入りたいヒト向けに お祖父ちゃんたちが用意してるんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
慣習とかで一人で入りたいヒト向けに
お祖父ちゃんたちが用意してるんだよ。

engChrName: What do you say? You in?
engSearchText: What do you say? You in?
jpnChrName: それで──どうする？
jpnSearchText: それで──どうする？

engChrName: I...would actually like that, thank you. I'll take you up on that offer.
engSearchText:
I...would actually like that, thank you. I'll take you up
on that offer.
jpnChrName: ……………それじゃあ、 お言葉に甘えさせてもらおうかな。
jpnSearchText:
……………それじゃあ、
お言葉に甘えさせてもらおうかな。

engChrName: Hey, Paulette. You guys closing up shop for the day?
engSearchText: Hey, Paulette. You guys closing up shop for the day?
jpnChrName: よう、ポーレット。 今日はそろそろ終いみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
よう、ポーレット。
今日はそろそろ終いみたいだな？

engChrName: We are. We had a really good day today. Lots of customers.
engSearchText:
We are. We had a really good day today. Lots
of customers.
jpnChrName: ええ、おかげさまで今日も大繁盛だったわ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、おかげさまで今日も大繁盛だったわ。

engChrName: But if you want anything, just let me know. We'll still be open for a bit longer.
engSearchText:
But if you want anything, just let me know. We'll still
be open for a bit longer.
jpnChrName: あ、でも注文があるなら言ってね。 店はもう少し開けているから。
jpnSearchText:
あ、でも注文があるなら言ってね。
店はもう少し開けているから。

engChrName: Right. I'll let you know. Umm...
engSearchText: Right. I'll let you know. Umm...
jpnChrName: ああ……
jpnSearchText: ああ……

engChrName: No need to say anything, Van. It's okay. Thanks for looking out for me and Yumé. I really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
No need to say anything, Van. It's okay. Thanks for
looking out for me and Yumé. I really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ありがとうヴァンさん。 気を使ってくれて。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ありがとうヴァンさん。
気を使ってくれて。

engChrName: It...caught me off guard, seeing him. But I don't regret it. I'm glad we got to sit down and talk.
engSearchText:
It...caught me off guard, seeing him. But I don't
regret it. I'm glad we got to sit down and talk.
jpnChrName: 最初は確かに驚いたけど…… 今、話せて良かったと思ってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
最初は確かに驚いたけど……
今、話せて良かったと思ってるわ。

engChrName: All right, if you're sure.
engSearchText: All right, if you're sure.
jpnChrName: ……そうかい。
jpnSearchText: ……そうかい。

engChrName: If he starts giving you trouble, let me know and I'll deal with him.
engSearchText:
If he starts giving you trouble, let me know and I'll
deal with him.
jpnChrName: ま、あいつが迷惑掛けそうなら言ってくれ、 二度と来ねぇよう釘を刺しておくからよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あいつが迷惑掛けそうなら言ってくれ、
二度と来ねぇよう釘を刺しておくからよ。

engChrName: But it doesn't look like he'll be a nuisance. I think, anyway. Not from how he was actin', at least, so maybe I don't gotta worry after all.
engSearchText:
But it doesn't look like he'll be a nuisance. I
think, anyway. Not from how he was actin', at least,
so maybe I don't gotta worry after all.
jpnChrName: あの様子じゃそこまで心配なさそうだが。
jpnSearchText: あの様子じゃそこまで心配なさそうだが。

engChrName: Thank you, but I don't think you do. He's making sure to put my and Yumé's feelings first.
engSearchText:
Thank you, but I don't think you do. He's making
sure to put my and Yumé's feelings first.
jpnChrName: そうね……あくまで私やユメの気持ちを 優先してくれているみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……あくまで私やユメの気持ちを
優先してくれているみたいだし。

engChrName: Not to pry, but do she and your old man know anything?
engSearchText:
Not to pry, but do she and your old man
know anything?
jpnChrName: ……ちなみにこのことについて ビクトルのおやっさんとユメは？
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみにこのことについて
ビクトルのおやっさんとユメは？

engChrName: No, not yet. I plan to talk to them soon.
engSearchText: No, not yet. I plan to talk to them soon.
jpnChrName: 二人とも知らないわ。 そのうち改めて話すつもりだけど……
jpnSearchText:
二人とも知らないわ。
そのうち改めて話すつもりだけど……

engChrName: But it won't be an easy conversation to have with either of them. Especially Yumé. I'm a little worried about her.
engSearchText:
But it won't be an easy conversation to have with
either of them. Especially Yumé. I'm a little worried
about her.
jpnChrName: お父さんはともかく、 ユメはちょっと心配ね。
jpnSearchText:
お父さんはともかく、
ユメはちょっと心配ね。

engChrName: Got'cha. She might be too young for that kinda talk.
engSearchText: Got'cha. She might be too young for that kinda talk.
jpnChrName: あー、確かにユメには ちょっと早い話かもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、確かにユメには
ちょっと早い話かもしれねえな。

engChrName: That's what I'm thinking, too. I might speak with my dad about it first, but I don't know how to approach it yet.
engSearchText:
That's what I'm thinking, too. I might speak with my
dad about it first, but I don't know how to approach
it yet.
jpnChrName: まずはお父さんと二人で 話す機会があればいいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
まずはお父さんと二人で
話す機会があればいいんだけど……

engChrName: I might have an idea. Well, if you two are up for it...
engSearchText: I might have an idea. Well, if you two are up for it...
jpnChrName: だったらこういうのはどうだ？ お前さんとおやっさんが良ければだが──……
jpnSearchText:
だったらこういうのはどうだ？
お前さんとおやっさんが良ければだが──……

engChrName: Well, I've said what I think needs to be said. The rest is up to her. Back to patrollin' I go.
engSearchText:
Well, I've said what I think needs to be said. The rest
is up to her. Back to patrollin' I go.
jpnChrName: 話すべきことは話したし、 改めて夜回りを始めるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
話すべきことは話したし、
改めて夜回りを始めるとするか。

engChrName: Oh, hi, Van. We just wrapped up the breakfast menu for the day.
engSearchText:
Oh, hi, Van. We just wrapped up the breakfast menu
for the day.
jpnChrName: あらヴァンさん、朝食はさっき済ませてたけど。
jpnSearchText: あらヴァンさん、朝食はさっき済ませてたけど。

engChrName: What she said. No more from the morning menu for you. Don't care if you didn't get enough to eat. You lost your chance.
engSearchText:
What she said. No more from the morning menu
for you. Don't care if you didn't get enough to eat.
You lost your chance.
jpnChrName: 食い足りねぇってか？ 言っとくがモーニングはもう終わってるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
食い足りねぇってか？
言っとくがモーニングはもう終わってるぞ。

engChrName: I'm fine! I'm a grown-ass adult! I don't need to eat that much.
engSearchText:
I'm fine! I'm a grown-ass adult! I don't need to eat
that much.
jpnChrName: そんなんじゃねえよ、 育ち盛りのガキどもじゃあるまいし。
jpnSearchText:
そんなんじゃねえよ、
育ち盛りのガキどもじゃあるまいし。

engChrName: I just dropped by to kill time until I leave for work.
engSearchText: I just dropped by to kill time until I leave for work.
jpnChrName: 仕事に出るまでの時間つぶしだ。
jpnSearchText: 仕事に出るまでの時間つぶしだ。

engChrName: Also... I just wanted to say, I'm so glad you all made it back here safe and sound.
engSearchText:
Also... I just wanted to say, I'm so glad you all made it
back here safe and sound.
jpnChrName: ……何はともあれ、こうしてみんなが 無事に戻ってきて本当に良かったわ。
jpnSearchText:
……何はともあれ、こうしてみんなが
無事に戻ってきて本当に良かったわ。

engChrName: I second that. Sometimes you make for noisy neighbors, but lately it's hard to rest easy when things get too quiet.
engSearchText:
I second that. Sometimes you make for noisy
neighbors, but lately it's hard to rest easy when things
get too quiet.
jpnChrName: そうだな、たまに騒がしい時もあるが 今更静かになられても落ち着かねえもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、たまに騒がしい時もあるが
今更静かになられても落ち着かねえもんだ。

engChrName: ...Especially now that I won't be seeing my Creil regular anymore.
engSearchText:
...Especially now that I won't be seeing my Creil
regular anymore.
jpnChrName: ……クレイユの馴染みの顔は 見れなくなっちまったが……
jpnSearchText:
……クレイユの馴染みの顔は
見れなくなっちまったが……

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I guess you and that guy from Creil had some history, huh? I'm sorry.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I guess you and that guy from Creil had
some history, huh? I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: ……そういえばクレイユ村の連中とも 付き合いがあったんだったな。
jpnSearchText:
……そういえばクレイユ村の連中とも
付き合いがあったんだったな。

engChrName: Yeah. Since he helped with restaurant stock, we got to know him pretty well.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Since he helped with restaurant stock, we got
to know him pretty well.
jpnChrName: 仕入れの関係で、それなりにね……
jpnSearchText: 仕入れの関係で、それなりにね……

engChrName: We'll be going to his memorial service, as you can imagine. It's only fair we send him off after everything he did for us.
engSearchText:
We'll be going to his memorial service, as you
can imagine. It's only fair we send him off after
everything he did for us.
jpnChrName: 一応俺らも追悼式に参列するつもりだ。 せめてちゃんと弔ってやらねえとな……
jpnSearchText:
一応俺らも追悼式に参列するつもりだ。
せめてちゃんと弔ってやらねえとな……

engChrName: Right. Makes sense...
engSearchText: Right. Makes sense...
jpnChrName: そうか………
jpnSearchText: そうか………

engChrName: Well, I'm not going anywhere anytime soon, so things should still be lively around the office.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm not going anywhere anytime soon, so
things should still be lively around the office.
jpnChrName: まあしばらくは出張とかもねえし、 ここは賑やかなままだろ。
jpnSearchText:
まあしばらくは出張とかもねえし、
ここは賑やかなままだろ。

engChrName: But the source of the issue's gone now, so my assistants might split off soon.
engSearchText:
But the source of the issue's gone now, so my
assistants might split off soon.
jpnChrName: と言っても、元凶が消えたから、 助手たちもいずれ離れるかもしれねえが。
jpnSearchText:
と言っても、元凶が消えたから、
助手たちもいずれ離れるかもしれねえが。

engChrName: I'll believe it when I see it.
engSearchText: I'll believe it when I see it.
jpnChrName: ……ハン、どうだかな。
jpnSearchText: ……ハン、どうだかな。

engChrName: It's a little hard to imagine they would.
engSearchText: It's a little hard to imagine they would.
jpnChrName: ちょっと考えにくいけど……
jpnSearchText: ちょっと考えにくいけど……

engChrName: Oh. I was gonna ask earlier, but what about that racer? Did he stop by again?
engSearchText:
Oh. I was gonna ask earlier, but what about
that racer? Did he stop by again?
jpnChrName: そういえば……あのレーサー、 また店に来たか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……あのレーサー、
また店に来たか？

engChrName: He has. He actually stopped by yesterday. Thanks for asking.
engSearchText:
He has. He actually stopped by yesterday. Thanks
for asking.
jpnChrName: ええ、昨日も来てくれてたわね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、昨日も来てくれてたわね。

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: フン……
jpnSearchText: フン……

engChrName: That's good, I guess. He all right?
engSearchText: That's good, I guess. He all right?
jpnChrName: そうか、元気そうだったかよ？
jpnSearchText: そうか、元気そうだったかよ？

engChrName: Heehee, I suppose. He enjoyed his meal, at least.
engSearchText: Heehee, I suppose. He enjoyed his meal, at least.
jpnChrName: ふふ、どうかしら？ 美味しそうに食べてくれてたけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、どうかしら？
美味しそうに食べてくれてたけど。

engChrName: (What's the verdict? Anything between them or what?)
engSearchText:
(What's the verdict? Anything between them
or what?)
jpnChrName: （なあ、脈があんのか無いのか   どっちだよ？）
jpnSearchText:
（なあ、脈があんのか無いのか
どっちだよ？）

engChrName: (What?! You don't gotta glare at me like that!)
engSearchText: (What?! You don't gotta glare at me like that!)
jpnChrName: （……マジ睨みはやめてくれ。）
jpnSearchText: （……マジ睨みはやめてくれ。）

engChrName: Oh, are you talking about Maxim? He's funny, in a lame way. Heehee! ♪
engSearchText:
Oh, are you talking about Maxim? He's funny, in a
lame way. Heehee! ♪
jpnChrName: マクシムおじさんの話ー？ カッコ悪くて面白いよねー♪
jpnSearchText:
マクシムおじさんの話ー？
カッコ悪くて面白いよねー♪

engChrName: (Dude's got his work cut out for him before anyone respects him as a father. Good luck, pal.)
engSearchText:
(Dude's got his work cut out for him before anyone
respects him as a father. Good luck, pal.)
jpnChrName: （少なくとも父親としての威厳はゼロだな……）
jpnSearchText: （少なくとも父親としての威厳はゼロだな……）

engChrName: Mmm, this is yummy!
engSearchText: Mmm, this is yummy!
jpnChrName: わぁ～っ、おいしー！！
jpnSearchText: わぁ～っ、おいしー！！

engChrName: It's just as good as you said it was. It's lovely to get to sit down and enjoy this time as family.
engSearchText:
It's just as good as you said it was. It's lovely to get to
sit down and enjoy this time as family.
jpnChrName: ええ、あなたから聞いた通り。 それに私たちでも食べやすいわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、あなたから聞いた通り。
それに私たちでも食べやすいわ。

engChrName: Well, I'm glad you both like it.
engSearchText: Well, I'm glad you both like it.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハ、それは良かった。
jpnSearchText: ハッハッハ、それは良かった。

engChrName: When I came here the other day, I heard that they even serve some dishes with more Central Eastern flavors.
engSearchText:
When I came here the other day, I heard that they
even serve some dishes with more Central
Eastern flavors.
jpnChrName: いや、先日お邪魔した際に中東風の 味付けもあると聞いたものだから……
jpnSearchText:
いや、先日お邪魔した際に中東風の
味付けもあると聞いたものだから……

engChrName: Out for a meal with your family, Inspector? Good to see you're enjoying yourself for once.
engSearchText:
Out for a meal with your family, Inspector? Good to
see you're enjoying yourself for once.
jpnChrName: 警部殿はご家族で食事中か。 楽しんでるみたいで何よりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
警部殿はご家族で食事中か。
楽しんでるみたいで何よりだぜ。

engChrName: Hmph. Look at you, patrolling for the festival.
engSearchText: Hmph. Look at you, patrolling for the festival.
jpnChrName: フン……そちらも記念祭を 回っているようだな。
jpnSearchText:
フン……そちらも記念祭を
回っているようだな。

engChrName: *sigh* Listen, I'm off duty, so I'll cut you some slack. Some. Just make sure you know your place and don't cross any—
engSearchText:
*sigh* Listen, I'm off duty, so I'll cut you some slack.
Some. Just make sure you know your place and don't
cross any—
jpnChrName: 今は非番中だ、グダグダ言うつもりもないが せいぜい弁えて──
jpnSearchText:
今は非番中だ、グダグダ言うつもりもないが
せいぜい弁えて──

engChrName: Daddy! You just said you're off duty, right? Because you're not acting off duty right now!
engSearchText:
Daddy! You just said you're off duty, right?
Because you're not acting off duty right now!
jpnChrName: パパ、今日はホントに ヒバンなんだよね……？
jpnSearchText:
パパ、今日はホントに
ヒバンなんだよね……？

engChrName: O-Of course I am, sweetheart! I got all of my work done yesterday. You two have my undivided attention.
engSearchText:
O-Of course I am, sweetheart! I got all of my work
done yesterday. You two have my
undivided attention.
jpnChrName: あ、ああ勿論だよ、ジジ。 仕事は昨日までに済ませているし……
jpnSearchText:
あ、ああ勿論だよ、ジジ。
仕事は昨日までに済ませているし……

engChrName: Heehee, well, I'm glad to hear it.
engSearchText: Heehee, well, I'm glad to hear it.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、よかった。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、よかった。

engChrName: We don't get family time often. I think I see you walk out the door to handle a new case more than I actually see you at home.
engSearchText:
We don't get family time often. I think I see you walk
out the door to handle a new case more than I
actually see you at home.
jpnChrName: 貴方ったらいつも『事件だ』って 飛び出していってしまうんですもの。
jpnSearchText:
貴方ったらいつも『事件だ』って
飛び出していってしまうんですもの。

engChrName: Right?! Mommy misses you a lot.
engSearchText: Right?! Mommy misses you a lot.
jpnChrName: ね～。 ママもクロウしてるんだから。
jpnSearchText:
ね～。
ママもクロウしてるんだから。

engChrName: I-I... I know. I'm really, really sorry. You know it's really hard for me to get time off work...
engSearchText:
I-I... I know. I'm really, really sorry. You know it's
really hard for me to get time off work...
jpnChrName: す、すまん……だ、だがこうして たまの休みくらいは……
jpnSearchText:
す、すまん……だ、だがこうして
たまの休みくらいは……

engChrName: (I guess the guy's got it hard, too.)
engSearchText: (I guess the guy's got it hard, too.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、警部殿も不憫っつーか。）
jpnSearchText: （やれやれ、警部殿も不憫っつーか。）

engChrName: (I feel a little sorry for him.)
engSearchText: (I feel a little sorry for him.)
jpnChrName: （ちょっと可哀想になってきましたね……）
jpnSearchText: （ちょっと可哀想になってきましたね……）

engChrName: (Yeah, I kinda feel sorry for him.)
engSearchText: (Yeah, I kinda feel sorry for him.)
jpnChrName: （はい……ちょっと可哀想かもです……）
jpnSearchText: （はい……ちょっと可哀想かもです……）

engChrName: (Dude just needs to learn to play hooky a little and maybe then he'll relax.)
engSearchText:
(Dude just needs to learn to play hooky a little and
maybe then he'll relax.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、仕事なんざサボっちまえば   苦労もねえのによ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、仕事なんざサボっちまえば
苦労もねえのによ。）

engChrName: (Indeed. I can't help but feel a little pity for him.)
engSearchText: (Indeed. I can't help but feel a little pity for him.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……少しお可哀想ですが……）
jpnSearchText: （ええ……少しお可哀想ですが……）

engChrName: (I guess he doesn't have it too easy, yeah. I sympathize with him a little.)
engSearchText:
(I guess he doesn't have it too easy, yeah.
I sympathize with him a little.)
jpnChrName: （ま、少し可哀想ではあるかな……）
jpnSearchText: （ま、少し可哀想ではあるかな……）

engChrName: (Yeah, geez. I feel for him.)
engSearchText: (Yeah, geez. I feel for him.)
jpnChrName: （そ、そうね……   ちょっと可哀想かも……）
jpnSearchText:
（そ、そうね……
ちょっと可哀想かも……）

engChrName: (It isn't easy being so committed to one's job.)
engSearchText: (It isn't easy being so committed to one's job.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ、仕事人間なのであろうな。）
jpnSearchText: （ふむ、仕事人間なのであろうな。）

engChrName: Pardon the interruption.
engSearchText: Pardon the interruption.
jpnChrName: ご歓談中、失礼しますよ。
jpnSearchText: ご歓談中、失礼しますよ。

engChrName: I've brought you all some dessert.
engSearchText: I've brought you all some dessert.
jpnChrName: こちら、デザートです。
jpnSearchText: こちら、デザートです。

engChrName: It's on the house to celebrate the festival. Enjoy!
engSearchText: It's on the house to celebrate the festival. Enjoy!
jpnChrName: 記念祭の特別サービスになります。 どうぞお召し上がりください。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭の特別サービスになります。
どうぞお召し上がりください。

engChrName: Oooh! This also looks really yummy!
engSearchText: Oooh! This also looks really yummy!
jpnChrName: わぁっ！　おいしそーっ！！
jpnSearchText: わぁっ！　おいしそーっ！！

engChrName: You didn't have to, but thank you.
engSearchText: You didn't have to, but thank you.
jpnChrName: いいんですか？ ふふっ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
いいんですか？
ふふっ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: (They both look so happy right now... I definitely made the right call bringing them here today.)
engSearchText:
(They both look so happy right now... I definitely
made the right call bringing them here today.)
jpnChrName: （二人ともこんなに喜んで……   やはり来て正解だった……）
jpnSearchText:
（二人ともこんなに喜んで……
やはり来て正解だった……）

engChrName: (Heh, look at 'em. Got a pair of doting fathers over here.)
engSearchText:
(Heh, look at 'em. Got a pair of doting fathers
over here.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、親バカコンビか……）
jpnSearchText: （ああ、親バカコンビか……）

engChrName: (They're off to some good bonding time, it looks like.)
engSearchText:
(They're off to some good bonding time, it
looks like.)
jpnChrName: （気が合うのも納得、ですね。）
jpnSearchText: （気が合うのも納得、ですね。）

engChrName: (Heehee, birds of a feather!)
engSearchText: (Heehee, birds of a feather!)
jpnChrName: （えへへ……気が合ってるみたいです。）
jpnSearchText: （えへへ……気が合ってるみたいです。）

engChrName: (These two are pretty similar when you think about it, huh.)
engSearchText:
(These two are pretty similar when you think about
it, huh.)
jpnChrName: （なんつーか、納得しかねえな……）
jpnSearchText: （なんつーか、納得しかねえな……）

engChrName: (I don't doubt they're both wonderful fathers.)
engSearchText: (I don't doubt they're both wonderful fathers.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、これは納得ですね。）
jpnSearchText: （ふふっ、これは納得ですね。）

engChrName: (To say the least. They really do get along.)
engSearchText: (To say the least. They really do get along.)
jpnChrName: （うん、まあ納得しかないよね……）
jpnSearchText: （うん、まあ納得しかないよね……）

engChrName: (I hope he doesn't actually become a regular, though. Don't need him getting on our case even more than he already does...)
engSearchText:
(I hope he doesn't actually become a regular, though.
Don't need him getting on our case even more than
he already does...)
jpnChrName: （アハハ……常連になって   出入りされるのも困るんだけどね……）
jpnSearchText:
（アハハ……常連になって
出入りされるのも困るんだけどね……）

engChrName: (Heh. It looks like this place has found itself a new regular.)
engSearchText:
(Heh. It looks like this place has found itself a
new regular.)
jpnChrName: （フフ、見事常連客が増えたようだな。）
jpnSearchText: （フフ、見事常連客が増えたようだな。）

engChrName: Yes, yes, Mom! I get it! I promise I'll be back in time for New Year's!
engSearchText:
Yes, yes, Mom! I get it! I promise I'll be back in time
for New Year's!
jpnChrName: ああもう、分かってるってばママ！ 年末にはちゃんと戻るから！
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、分かってるってばママ！
年末にはちゃんと戻るから！

engChrName: I'll go ahead and talk to Grammy—what?! You already told her?!
engSearchText:
I'll go ahead and talk to Grammy—what?!
You already told her?!
jpnChrName: くれぐれもお祖母ちゃんには…… ──ってええ、もう話しちゃったの！？
jpnSearchText:
くれぐれもお祖母ちゃんには……
──ってええ、もう話しちゃったの！？

engChrName: Why wouldn't I? You already went off, gallivanting over to Oración without even telling us!
engSearchText:
Why wouldn't I? You already went off, gallivanting
over to Oración without even telling us!
jpnChrName: 当たり前でしょう…… 私たちに無断で古都に乗り込んで。
jpnSearchText:
当たり前でしょう……
私たちに無断で古都に乗り込んで。

engChrName: And not to mention what the tabloids have been saying about you! Do you have the slightest idea of how worried we've been over you?
engSearchText:
And not to mention what the tabloids have been
saying about you! Do you have the slightest idea of
how worried we've been over you?
jpnChrName: その前には例のゴシップ記事もあったし、 どれだけ心配を掛けてると思ってるの？
jpnSearchText:
その前には例のゴシップ記事もあったし、
どれだけ心配を掛けてると思ってるの？

engChrName: Uh... I can explain! Er...
engSearchText: Uh... I can explain! Er...
jpnChrName: う……それは………
jpnSearchText: う……それは………

engChrName: Just make sure you get all of your affairs in order and tidy yourself up before you come here. Understand?
engSearchText:
Just make sure you get all of your affairs in order and
tidy yourself up before you come here. Understand?
jpnChrName: とにかく表も裏もきっちりケリを付けて 身綺麗になってから戻ってきなさい。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく表も裏もきっちりケリを付けて
身綺麗になってから戻ってきなさい。

engChrName: By the by, if there's a special someone you're just getting serious with, you can totally bring them over with you if you want. Your mom won't mind!
engSearchText:
By the by, if there's a special someone you're just
getting serious with, you can totally bring them over
with you if you want. Your mom won't mind!
jpnChrName: ああ、これと決めた“相手”を連れて帰れば ちょっとはママの機嫌も良くなると思うわよ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、これと決めた“相手”を連れて帰れば
ちょっとはママの機嫌も良くなると思うわよ？

engChrName: Mom! Give me a break! You're asking the impossible!
engSearchText: Mom! Give me a break! You're asking the impossible!
jpnChrName: ってそれこそ無茶言わないでよ！？
jpnSearchText: ってそれこそ無茶言わないでよ！？

engChrName: (Sounds like an important family call. I won't butt in.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like an important family call. I won't
butt in.)
jpnChrName: （家族との通信か……   邪魔するのもアレだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（家族との通信か……
邪魔するのもアレだな。）

engChrName: (From the sound of it, she's talking to her mom. As far as I know, she was a theater actress. And the second Grimcat.)
engSearchText:
(From the sound of it, she's talking to her mom.
As far as I know, she was a theater actress. And the
second Grimcat.)
jpnChrName: （しかしどうやら舞台女優をやってた   “二代目”みたいだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（しかしどうやら舞台女優をやってた
“二代目”みたいだな。）

engChrName: (Tough nut to crack. Her grandma's probably worse, though. She was a chanson singer, and the first Grimcat. Wouldn't wanna mess with her.)
engSearchText:
(Tough nut to crack. Her grandma's probably
worse, though. She was a chanson singer, and the
first Grimcat. Wouldn't wanna mess with her.)
jpnChrName: （シャンソン歌手をやってた“一代目”には   更に頭が上がらねえみたいだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（シャンソン歌手をやってた“一代目”には
更に頭が上がらねえみたいだが……）

engChrName: You realize I have better things to do with my life, right? Like, I don't know, my career as the biggest movie act—
engSearchText:
You realize I have better things to do with my
life, right? Like, I don't know, my career as the
biggest movie act—
jpnChrName: あのねえ、アタシは“裏”以外にも 銀幕の世界でトップ女優を張ってて──
jpnSearchText:
あのねえ、アタシは“裏”以外にも
銀幕の世界でトップ女優を張ってて──

engChrName: Excuse me? What do you mean, 'Look for someone at work'?! You're not seriously expecting me to do that?!
engSearchText:
Excuse me? What do you mean, 'Look for someone
at work'?! You're not seriously expecting me to
do that?!
jpnChrName: だったら手近なところで済ませておけ？ ……そ、そんな事できるわけないでしょ！？
jpnSearchText:
だったら手近なところで済ませておけ？
……そ、そんな事できるわけないでしょ！？

engChrName: Oh. Hey, everyone!
engSearchText: Oh. Hey, everyone!
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさんたち……！
jpnSearchText: あ、ヴァンさんたち……！

engChrName: Hi, guys! Nice to see you!
engSearchText: Hi, guys! Nice to see you!
jpnChrName: お兄さんたちだ、ヤッホー！
jpnSearchText: お兄さんたちだ、ヤッホー！

engChrName: Nihao! Happy Revolution Festival!
engSearchText: Nihao! Happy Revolution Festival!
jpnChrName: 你好（ニイハオ）、ヴァンさんたち。 革命記念祭、おめでと～！
jpnSearchText:
你好（ニイハオ）、ヴァンさんたち。
革命記念祭、おめでと～！

engChrName: Shaheena! And Ashen and Fie! It's nice to see all of you.
engSearchText:
Shaheena! And Ashen and Fie! It's nice to see all
of you.
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさん！ アシェンさんに、フィーさんまで！
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナさん！
アシェンさんに、フィーさんまで！

engChrName: Y'all are awfully cheery.
engSearchText: Y'all are awfully cheery.
jpnChrName: ったく、テンション高ぇな。
jpnSearchText: ったく、テンション高ぇな。

engChrName: Oh, great. Ashen's here, too.
engSearchText: Oh, great. Ashen's here, too.
jpnChrName: なんだ、アシェンもこっちかよ。
jpnSearchText: なんだ、アシェンもこっちかよ。

engChrName: Y'all are awfully cheery. And Shaheena's here, too.
engSearchText: Y'all are awfully cheery. And Shaheena's here, too.
jpnChrName: それにシャヒーナもか。 ったく、テンション高ぇな。
jpnSearchText:
それにシャヒーナもか。
ったく、テンション高ぇな。

engChrName: Hi, Ashen. I didn't realize you were with Shaheena and Fie.
engSearchText:
Hi, Ashen. I didn't realize you were with Shaheena
and Fie.
jpnChrName: アシェンさん、シャヒーナさんに フィーさんもご一緒だったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
アシェンさん、シャヒーナさんに
フィーさんもご一緒だったんですね。

engChrName: Y'all are awfully cheery.
engSearchText: Y'all are awfully cheery.
jpnChrName: ったく、テンション高ぇな。
jpnSearchText: ったく、テンション高ぇな。

engChrName: Hello, Ms. Shaheena. Ms. Claussell. I didn't realize you both were together.
engSearchText:
Hello, Ms. Shaheena. Ms. Claussell. I didn't realize
you both were together.
jpnChrName: シャヒーナ様にフィー様も ご一緒だったのですね。
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナ様にフィー様も
ご一緒だったのですね。

engChrName: Not to mention Heiyue's own little princess. Y'all are awfully cheery.
engSearchText:
Not to mention Heiyue's own little princess. Y'all are
awfully cheery.
jpnChrName: それに黒月のお嬢様もか。 ったく、テンション高ぇな。
jpnSearchText:
それに黒月のお嬢様もか。
ったく、テンション高ぇな。

engChrName: Oh. I didn't know Shaheena was with you.
engSearchText: Oh. I didn't know Shaheena was with you.
jpnChrName: なんだ、シャヒーナちゃんも 一緒だったのね。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、シャヒーナちゃんも
一緒だったのね。

engChrName: Not to mention Heiyue's own little princess. Y'all are awfully cheery.
engSearchText:
Not to mention Heiyue's own little princess. Y'all are
awfully cheery.
jpnChrName: それに黒月のお嬢様もか。 ったく、テンション高ぇな。
jpnSearchText:
それに黒月のお嬢様もか。
ったく、テンション高ぇな。

engChrName: Y'all are awfully cheery. I see you've got Shaheena and Heiyue's own little princess with you.
engSearchText:
Y'all are awfully cheery. I see you've got Shaheena
and Heiyue's own little princess with you.
jpnChrName: テンション高ぇな…… シャヒーナに、黒月のお嬢様も一緒とは。
jpnSearchText:
テンション高ぇな……
シャヒーナに、黒月のお嬢様も一緒とは。

engChrName: Did you ladies go to the bathhouse together?
engSearchText: Did you ladies go to the bathhouse together?
jpnChrName: お前さんも含めて一緒に 一風呂浴びてきたってところか？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんも含めて一緒に
一風呂浴びてきたってところか？

engChrName: Yup. We'd made plans for it a little while back.
engSearchText: Yup. We'd made plans for it a little while back.
jpnChrName: ん、この前の打ち上げで そのうち一緒しようって話してて。
jpnSearchText:
ん、この前の打ち上げで
そのうち一緒しようって話してて。

engChrName: But right now, I'm on break. Just finished morning patrol.
engSearchText:
But right now, I'm on break. Just finished
morning patrol.
jpnChrName: わたしも午前の巡回が終わったから 一休みしてるとこ。
jpnSearchText:
わたしも午前の巡回が終わったから
一休みしてるとこ。

engChrName: Hey, Feri. Let's chat again once you're done with stuff on your end.
engSearchText:
Hey, Feri. Let's chat again once you're done with
stuff on your end.
jpnChrName: てなわけでフェリ、 一区切りついたら合流して。
jpnSearchText:
てなわけでフェリ、
一区切りついたら合流して。

engChrName: I plan on taking another bath later and it'd be a shame if you weren't there.
engSearchText:
I plan on taking another bath later and it'd be a
shame if you weren't there.
jpnChrName: あと一回くらいは浴びて行くから いっしょに流しっこしよう。
jpnSearchText:
あと一回くらいは浴びて行くから
いっしょに流しっこしよう。

engChrName: Oooh, count me in! I wanna come, too!
engSearchText: Oooh, count me in! I wanna come, too!
jpnChrName: あ、あたしもあたしも！
jpnSearchText: あ、あたしもあたしも！

engChrName: Let me teach you ladies a few of the skincare secrets that keep my own skin this beautiful. ♪
engSearchText:
Let me teach you ladies a few of the skincare secrets
that keep my own skin this beautiful. ♪
jpnChrName: フフン、あたしは取っておきの 肌ケアを教えちゃおうかしら♪
jpnSearchText:
フフン、あたしは取っておきの
肌ケアを教えちゃおうかしら♪

engChrName: Yeah! That sounds great! See you then!
engSearchText: Yeah! That sounds great! See you then!
jpnChrName: えへへ…… よろしくお願いしますっ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
よろしくお願いしますっ！

engChrName: (Might be a good idea to swap out who's coming with me when I get the chance.)
engSearchText:
(Might be a good idea to swap out who's coming with
me when I get the chance.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ……しばらくしたら   他のメンバーと交替させるかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ……しばらくしたら
他のメンバーと交替させるかね。）

engChrName: Oh. If anything comes up, just call me anytime!
engSearchText: Oh. If anything comes up, just call me anytime!
jpnChrName: あ、もちろん何かあれば いつでも呼んでくださいねっ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、もちろん何かあれば
いつでも呼んでくださいねっ！

engChrName: Be there in five minutes, tops!
engSearchText: Be there in five minutes, tops!
jpnChrName: ５分以内に駆け付けますのでっ。
jpnSearchText: ５分以内に駆け付けますのでっ。

engChrName: Ahaha, it's okay, Feri. You don't have to rush that much.
engSearchText:
Ahaha, it's okay, Feri. You don't have to rush
that much.
jpnChrName: あはは……そんなに 慌てなくっても大丈夫ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……そんなに
慌てなくっても大丈夫ですよ。

engChrName: Calm down with the overexcited puppy vibes there.
engSearchText: Calm down with the overexcited puppy vibes there.
jpnChrName: ったく、 相変わらずの仔犬っぷりだな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、
相変わらずの仔犬っぷりだな。

engChrName: Heehee, you don't need to hurry that much if that happens, Ms. Al-Fayed. We'll be okay.
engSearchText:
Heehee, you don't need to hurry that much if that
happens, Ms. Al-Fayed. We'll be okay.
jpnChrName: ふふ……そこまで 急がれなくても大丈夫ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……そこまで
急がれなくても大丈夫ですよ。

engChrName: Haha, I'm sure we'll be okay, even if you have to take a little more time.
engSearchText:
Haha, I'm sure we'll be okay, even if you have to take
a little more time.
jpnChrName: はは、まあそこまで 急がなくても大丈夫だってば。
jpnSearchText:
はは、まあそこまで
急がなくても大丈夫だってば。

engChrName: You're always so full of energy and raring to go. Not that it's a bad thing.
engSearchText:
You're always so full of energy and raring to go.
Not that it's a bad thing.
jpnChrName: あ、相変わらずねぇ。 まあ元気で大変よろしいっ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、相変わらずねぇ。
まあ元気で大変よろしいっ。

engChrName: Ha! No need to hurry. Just take your time and enjoy yourself.
engSearchText:
Ha! No need to hurry. Just take your time and
enjoy yourself.
jpnChrName: フフ、急くことはない。 今はゆるりとするがよかろう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、急くことはない。
今はゆるりとするがよかろう。

engChrName: Shoot! They called in demons!
engSearchText: Shoot! They called in demons!
jpnChrName: っ！　悪魔どもを呼んだか！
jpnSearchText: っ！　悪魔どもを呼んだか！

engChrName: They must be trying to protect it!
engSearchText: They must be trying to protect it!
jpnChrName: なるほど、これを守ろうと してるみたいだね！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、これを守ろうと
してるみたいだね！

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Unfortunately, time passed without them so much as finding a clue, let alone the book itself.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, time passed without them so much as
finding a clue, let alone the book itself.
jpnChrName: しかし、本どころか 手掛かりすら掴めないまま時が経ち……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、本どころか
手掛かりすら掴めないまま時が経ち……

engChrName: *sigh* I guess it's not going to turn up after all.
engSearchText: *sigh* I guess it's not going to turn up after all.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……やっぱり見つかりませんね。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……やっぱり見つかりませんね。

engChrName: I'm sorry, Van. I feel like I just wasted your time.
engSearchText: I'm sorry, Van. I feel like I just wasted your time.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい、ヴァンさん。 無駄に時間ばかり頂いてしまって……
jpnSearchText:
ごめんなさい、ヴァンさん。
無駄に時間ばかり頂いてしまって……

engChrName: Don't sweat it. I suggested doin' all of this in the first place.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. I suggested doin' all of this in the
first place.
jpnChrName: んな事は気にすんな、 俺が言い出した事でもあるしな。
jpnSearchText:
んな事は気にすんな、
俺が言い出した事でもあるしな。

engChrName: We already looked in all the obvious spots.
engSearchText: We already looked in all the obvious spots.
jpnChrName: しかし……これだけ探しても 目ぼしい場所に影も形も無いとはな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……これだけ探しても
目ぼしい場所に影も形も無いとはな。

engChrName: Might need to reconsider how we go about it.
engSearchText: Might need to reconsider how we go about it.
jpnChrName: ここまで来ると、別の可能性も考えるべきだろう。
jpnSearchText: ここまで来ると、別の可能性も考えるべきだろう。

engChrName: Do you think someone stole it?
engSearchText: Do you think someone stole it?
jpnChrName: それは…… 誰かに盗まれてしまった、という事ですか。
jpnSearchText:
それは……
誰かに盗まれてしまった、という事ですか。

engChrName: I've been trying to keep my mind off of that possibility...
engSearchText:
I've been trying to keep my mind off of
that possibility...
jpnChrName: ふう、あまり考えたくはありませんでしたけど。 ………………………
jpnSearchText:
ふう、あまり考えたくはありませんでしたけど。
………………………

engChrName: It might look a little beat up, but we are talkin' about a rare first edition here.
engSearchText:
It might look a little beat up, but we are talkin' about
a rare first edition here.
jpnChrName: なんせ年季が入っているとはいえ レアな初版本って話だからな。
jpnSearchText:
なんせ年季が入っているとはいえ
レアな初版本って話だからな。

engChrName: Maybe someone recognized it and just decided to snatch it.
engSearchText:
Maybe someone recognized it and just decided to
snatch it.
jpnChrName: 誰かが気付いて“魔が差した” 可能性はゼロじゃねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
誰かが気付いて“魔が差した”
可能性はゼロじゃねえだろう。

engChrName: Could just be like that stolen wallet we were trackin' down before.
engSearchText:
Could just be like that stolen wallet we were trackin'
down before.
jpnChrName: まさに、少し前に依頼を請け負った 財布の件しかりな。
jpnSearchText:
まさに、少し前に依頼を請け負った
財布の件しかりな。

engChrName: If that's the case, maybe we should talk to Mr. Yimai about it.
engSearchText:
If that's the case, maybe we should talk to Mr. Yimai
about it.
jpnChrName: ひとまず、警察に紛失届を出すとしても、 売られていた場合の事を考えると……
jpnSearchText:
ひとまず、警察に紛失届を出すとしても、
売られていた場合の事を考えると……

engChrName: I don't think contacting the police about it will help if it's been sold already...
engSearchText:
I don't think contacting the police about it will help if
it's been sold already...
jpnChrName: またイーマイさんを探して 相談した方がいいでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
またイーマイさんを探して
相談した方がいいでしょうか……

engChrName: True. There might not be much of a point reporting it to the police, if that's the case...
engSearchText:
True. There might not be much of a point reporting
it to the police, if that's the case...
jpnChrName: ひとまず警察に紛失届を出すとしても、 望み薄かもしれません……
jpnSearchText:
ひとまず警察に紛失届を出すとしても、
望み薄かもしれません……

engChrName: Don't go throwin' in the towel yet. I got one more idea, so let's have a crack at it.
engSearchText:
Don't go throwin' in the towel yet. I got one more
idea, so let's have a crack at it.
jpnChrName: いいや、そういう条件なら ちょっとした心当たりがあってな。
jpnSearchText:
いいや、そういう条件なら
ちょっとした心当たりがあってな。

engChrName: Hey. It's Van. Long time no talk.
engSearchText: Hey. It's Van. Long time no talk.
jpnChrName: よう、久しぶりだな、アークライドだ。
jpnSearchText: よう、久しぶりだな、アークライドだ。

engChrName: My assistant and I are tracking somethin' down, and you might just be the right person to ask.
engSearchText:
My assistant and I are tracking somethin' down, and
you might just be the right person to ask.
jpnChrName: 実は少し探し物をしててな。 お前さんに話を聞きたいんだが──
jpnSearchText:
実は少し探し物をしててな。
お前さんに話を聞きたいんだが──

engChrName: After Van returned, the boy barged into his office, demanding that Van hear him out.
engSearchText:
After Van returned, the boy barged into his office,
demanding that Van hear him out.
jpnChrName: その後、事務所に戻ると 不良少年が押しかけてきており──
jpnSearchText:
その後、事務所に戻ると
不良少年が押しかけてきており──

engChrName: Left with little choice, Van resigned himself to hearing the details of his request.
engSearchText:
Left with little choice, Van resigned himself to
hearing the details of his request.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは仕方なく 依頼についての話を聞くことにした。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは仕方なく
依頼についての話を聞くことにした。

engChrName: Come on, man! You're a spriggan, you HAVE to help us!
engSearchText:
Come on, man! You're a spriggan, you HAVE to
help us!
jpnChrName: マジで頼むぜ、裏解決屋さんよ！
jpnSearchText: マジで頼むぜ、裏解決屋さんよ！

engChrName: Keep beggin' all you want. I don't want anything to do with whatever shit you're up to.
engSearchText:
Keep beggin' all you want. I don't want anything to
do with whatever shit you're up to.
jpnChrName: 頼むも何も、お前らの依頼を 受ける気はねぇって言ったろ。
jpnSearchText:
頼むも何も、お前らの依頼を
受ける気はねぇって言ったろ。

engChrName: Way I see it, you're lookin' for someone to cover for your sorry asses just 'cause you can't man up and take the loss.
engSearchText:
Way I see it, you're lookin' for someone to cover for
your sorry asses just 'cause you can't man up and take
the loss.
jpnChrName: つまりはあれだろ？　チーム同士の抗争に 負けそうだから助けがほしいってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
つまりはあれだろ？　チーム同士の抗争に
負けそうだから助けがほしいってヤツだ。

engChrName: Please listen to me! It's both our gang and our Riverside turf that's at stake here!
engSearchText:
Please listen to me! It's both our gang and our
Riverside turf that's at stake here!
jpnChrName: これはリバーサイドを仕切ってる オレたちの存亡を賭けた戦い──
jpnSearchText:
これはリバーサイドを仕切ってる
オレたちの存亡を賭けた戦い──

engChrName: We can't lose to these guys! They're full of shit!
engSearchText: We can't lose to these guys! They're full of shit!
jpnChrName: 敵チームのイキったヤツらに 負けるわけにはいかねえんだ！！
jpnSearchText:
敵チームのイキったヤツらに
負けるわけにはいかねえんだ！！

engChrName: 'Your' turf, eh? News to me.
engSearchText: 'Your' turf, eh? News to me.
jpnChrName: 仕切ってるねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 仕切ってるねぇ。

engChrName: (I'm familiar with these guys. Just a bunch of smalltime gangs that stick to doing their own stuff in small pockets around the city.)
engSearchText:
(I'm familiar with these guys. Just a bunch of
smalltime gangs that stick to doing their own stuff in
small pockets around the city.)
jpnChrName: （各街区でポツポツいるっつう   粋がったガキどものチーム……）
jpnSearchText:
（各街区でポツポツいるっつう
粋がったガキどものチーム……）

engChrName: (They're too scared of the guild and cops to try to make any real noise, let alone catch the attention of actual gangsters.)
engSearchText:
(They're too scared of the guild and cops to try to
make any real noise, let alone catch the attention of
actual gangsters.)
jpnChrName: （ギルドに警察、半グレ共にビビってて   コスい悪事しかしちゃいねぇみたいだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ギルドに警察、半グレ共にビビってて
コスい悪事しかしちゃいねぇみたいだが。）

engChrName: Man, you're killing me here! I remember when one of our guys picked a fight with them and you kicked his ass like it was no big deal.
engSearchText:
Man, you're killing me here! I remember when one of
our guys picked a fight with them and you kicked his
ass like it was no big deal.
jpnChrName: なぁ頼むよ～！　以前うちのチームのモンが アンタにケンカ売って返り討ちにされただろ？
jpnSearchText:
なぁ頼むよ～！　以前うちのチームのモンが
アンタにケンカ売って返り討ちにされただろ？

engChrName: I've looked up to you since that! If we had you, we'd be ten times stronger! Or maybe even a hundred times stronger!
engSearchText:
I've looked up to you since that! If we had you, we'd
be ten times stronger! Or maybe even a hundred
times stronger!
jpnChrName: あれ以来アンタをソンケーしてんだ、 助けてくれたら百人力、いや千人力だぜ！
jpnSearchText:
あれ以来アンタをソンケーしてんだ、
助けてくれたら百人力、いや千人力だぜ！

engChrName: Dunno what you're talkin' about. Go bother literally anyone else.
engSearchText:
Dunno what you're talkin' about. Go bother literally
anyone else.
jpnChrName: 覚えてねえよ……他を当たれ。
jpnSearchText: 覚えてねえよ……他を当たれ。

engChrName: You really just gonna leave us out to dry? We're in deep shit here!
engSearchText:
You really just gonna leave us out to dry? We're in
deep shit here!
jpnChrName: そんな～、俺たちを見捨てないでくれ！ マジでピンチなんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
そんな～、俺たちを見捨てないでくれ！
マジでピンチなんだよ！

engChrName: That crew from Tyrell, they got some outsider to help them all of a sudden! It's crazy!
engSearchText:
That crew from Tyrell, they got some outsider to help
them all of a sudden! It's crazy!
jpnChrName: タイレルのヤツらに、 突然よそ者の助っ人が入りやがってさ～！
jpnSearchText:
タイレルのヤツらに、
突然よそ者の助っ人が入りやがってさ～！

engChrName: An outsider? What kinda guy we talkin' about?
engSearchText: An outsider? What kinda guy we talkin' about?
jpnChrName: よそ者の助っ人……
jpnSearchText: よそ者の助っ人……

engChrName: It's some crazy strong red-haired dude. Already kicked more asses than I can count!
engSearchText:
It's some crazy strong red-haired dude.
Already kicked more asses than I can count!
jpnChrName: デタラメみたいに強ぇ赤い野郎で、 もう何人もノされちまったんだ！
jpnSearchText:
デタラメみたいに強ぇ赤い野郎で、
もう何人もノされちまったんだ！

engChrName: We were on equal footing until he showed up, but now... Damn it!
engSearchText:
We were on equal footing until he showed up,
but now... Damn it!
jpnChrName: アイツが手を貸すまでは 互角の抗争だったのに、クソッ！
jpnSearchText:
アイツが手を貸すまでは
互角の抗争だったのに、クソッ！

engChrName: Please just think about it? You're the only one who can help us, bro!
engSearchText:
Please just think about it? You're the only one who
can help us, bro!
jpnChrName: 頼れるのはアンタしかいねぇんだよぉ～、 裏解決屋のアニキ！！
jpnSearchText:
頼れるのはアンタしかいねぇんだよぉ～、
裏解決屋のアニキ！！

engChrName: Let's start with that. Don't call me your 'bro.' Ever.
engSearchText: Let's start with that. Don't call me your 'bro.' Ever.
jpnChrName: 誰がアニキだっつの。
jpnSearchText: 誰がアニキだっつの。

engChrName: ...But I guess I can at least take a look for myself. Got some time to kill, anyway.
engSearchText:
...But I guess I can at least take a look for myself.
Got some time to kill, anyway.
jpnChrName: ……まあちょうど暇してたところだ。 ちょっくら様子くらいは見てみるか。
jpnSearchText:
……まあちょうど暇してたところだ。
ちょっくら様子くらいは見てみるか。

engChrName: For real?! Hell yeah! Thanks, man! This war's as good as won!
engSearchText:
For real?! Hell yeah! Thanks, man! This war's as good
as won!
jpnChrName: うおおっマジで！？　よっしゃ、 これで勝ったも同然だぜ～！
jpnSearchText:
うおおっマジで！？　よっしゃ、
これで勝ったも同然だぜ～！

engChrName: (I only said I'd look, kid. Ain't making any promises here.)
engSearchText:
(I only said I'd look, kid. Ain't making any
promises here.)
jpnChrName: （見るだけだがな。）
jpnSearchText: （見るだけだがな。）

engChrName: Van went back to the office, bringing Yumé upstairs with him.
engSearchText:
Van went back to the office, bringing Yumé upstairs
with him.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは事務所に戻り、 ユメを呼んで話を聞いた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは事務所に戻り、
ユメを呼んで話を聞いた。

engChrName: Come on, Yumes. Cheer up already. Don't gotta be so mad.
engSearchText:
Come on, Yumes. Cheer up already. Don't gotta be
so mad.
jpnChrName: ……あー、ユメ坊？ いい加減機嫌を直してくれや。
jpnSearchText:
……あー、ユメ坊？
いい加減機嫌を直してくれや。

engChrName: I'm not mad...
engSearchText: I'm not mad...
jpnChrName: ……べつに、 キゲン悪いわけじゃないよー。
jpnSearchText:
……べつに、
キゲン悪いわけじゃないよー。

engChrName: I was just...really looking forward to it...
engSearchText: I was just...really looking forward to it...
jpnChrName: でもユメ、楽しみにしてたんだけどなー……
jpnSearchText: でもユメ、楽しみにしてたんだけどなー……

engChrName: The night before the previous work trip...
engSearchText: The night before the previous work trip...
jpnChrName: それは前回の出張前夜のことだった──
jpnSearchText: <C1>それは前回の出張前夜のことだった──

engChrName: Van, are you going on another work trip?
engSearchText: Van, are you going on another work trip?
jpnChrName: ヴァン、またしゅっちょうなんだー？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、またしゅっちょうなんだー？

engChrName: Yep. Got some stuff in a city called Basel.
engSearchText: Yep. Got some stuff in a city called Basel.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちょっと バーゼルってところにな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ちょっと
バーゼルってところにな。

engChrName: Okay. You better behave for Agnès and Feri, all right?
engSearchText:
Okay. You better behave for Agnès and Feri,
all right?
jpnChrName: アニエスちゃんやフェリちゃんに メイワクかけちゃ、ダメだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスちゃんやフェリちゃんに
メイワクかけちゃ、ダメだぞ！

engChrName: I will. And you be a good girl while I'm gone, 'kay? If you behave, I'll bring you back some snacks.
engSearchText:
I will. And you be a good girl while I'm gone, 'kay?
If you behave, I'll bring you back some snacks.
jpnChrName: ユメ坊も、ちゃんといい子にして待ってろよ。 そしたらお土産のお菓子を買ってやる。
jpnSearchText:
ユメ坊も、ちゃんといい子にして待ってろよ。
そしたらお土産のお菓子を買ってやる。

engChrName: Yaaay! You promise me? If you do, I promise I'll be a good girl!
engSearchText:
Yaaay! You promise me? If you do, I promise I'll be a
good girl!
jpnChrName: ホントー？　やったー！ いい子でまってる、だからやくそくね！
jpnSearchText:
ホントー？　やったー！
いい子でまってる、だからやくそくね！

engChrName: Yup. It's a promise, Yumes.
engSearchText: Yup. It's a promise, Yumes.
jpnChrName: ああ、約束だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、約束だ。

engChrName: (It completely slipped my mind with everything that happened back in Basel. I feel awful...)
engSearchText:
(It completely slipped my mind with everything that
happened back in Basel. I feel awful...)
jpnChrName: （バーゼルでも色々あったし、   すっかり忘れちまってたな……）
jpnSearchText:
（バーゼルでも色々あったし、
すっかり忘れちまってたな……）

engChrName: Heehee, it's okay. You must've been really busy.
engSearchText: Heehee, it's okay. You must've been really busy.
jpnChrName: ……えへへ、ダイジョーブ。 ヴァンも忙しかったんだよねー？
jpnSearchText:
……えへへ、ダイジョーブ。
ヴァンも忙しかったんだよねー？

engChrName: I don't mind. And I can always ask Grandpa for snacks...
engSearchText:
I don't mind. And I can always ask Grandpa
for snacks...
jpnChrName: ユメ、ヘーキだから。 お菓子ならおじーちゃんに頼めばいーから……
jpnSearchText:
ユメ、ヘーキだから。
お菓子ならおじーちゃんに頼めばいーから……

engChrName: (Nope. She totally minds. If she goes back lookin' like that, Victor's gonna skin me alive.)
engSearchText:
(Nope. She totally minds. If she goes back lookin' like
that, Victor's gonna skin me alive.)
jpnChrName: （こんな顔で帰したら今度はマジで   おやっさんに殺されるかもしれねぇ……）
