jpnSearchText:
（こんな顔で帰したら今度はマジで
おやっさんに殺されるかもしれねぇ……）

engChrName: Heh, looks like you're getting sent to the dog house.
engSearchText: Heh, looks like you're getting sent to the dog house.
jpnChrName: クク、無様だなァ、オッサン。
jpnSearchText: クク、無様だなァ、オッサン。

engChrName: Aaron? Why are you here?
engSearchText: Aaron? Why are you here?
jpnChrName: んー、アーロン？
jpnSearchText: んー、アーロン？

engChrName: It's rude to listen in on people, you know.
engSearchText: It's rude to listen in on people, you know.
jpnChrName: 聞いてたのかよ……
jpnSearchText: 聞いてたのかよ……

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. You just need some snacks that are a little different, right?
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah. You just need some snacks that are a little
different, right?
jpnChrName: 要はここいらじゃ珍しい 菓子がありゃいいんだな？
jpnSearchText:
要はここいらじゃ珍しい
菓子がありゃいいんだな？

engChrName: Hold on a sec. I've got just the thing.
engSearchText: Hold on a sec. I've got just the thing.
jpnChrName: ちょっと待ってろや。
jpnSearchText: ちょっと待ってろや。

engChrName: Aaron left and came back soon after carrying some ingredients.
engSearchText:
Aaron left and came back soon after carrying
some ingredients.
jpnChrName: そう言って出て行ったアーロンは、 程なくして何やら食材を抱えて戻って来た。
jpnSearchText:
そう言って出て行ったアーロンは、
程なくして何やら食材を抱えて戻って来た。

engChrName: Wow, Aaron! You can cook?
engSearchText: Wow, Aaron! You can cook?
jpnChrName: アーロン、お料理できるのー？
jpnSearchText: アーロン、お料理できるのー？

engChrName: You gotta learn when you live alone for so long. I don't think I'm as good as your grandpa, but I'm not too shabby either.
engSearchText:
You gotta learn when you live alone for so long.
I don't think I'm as good as your grandpa, but I'm not
too shabby either.
jpnChrName: 一人暮らしが長いからな。 オメーの爺さんにはさすがに敵わねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
一人暮らしが長いからな。
オメーの爺さんにはさすがに敵わねぇが。

engChrName: What'cha gonna make?
engSearchText: What'cha gonna make?
jpnChrName: なにを作る気だ？
jpnSearchText: なにを作る気だ？

engChrName: Oh, you'll see.
engSearchText: Oh, you'll see.
jpnChrName: そこで待ってろって。
jpnSearchText: そこで待ってろって。

engChrName: Oooh! That looks yummy!
engSearchText: Oooh! That looks yummy!
jpnChrName: わぁ～！
jpnSearchText: わぁ～！

engChrName: These are mantou, right?
engSearchText: These are mantou, right?
jpnChrName: これは……饅頭か？
jpnSearchText: これは……饅頭か？

engChrName: Kinda. Similar, but not the same. Here you go, kiddo. Have a bite.
engSearchText:
Kinda. Similar, but not the same. Here you go, kiddo.
Have a bite.
jpnChrName: まあちょっと違うが似たようなもんだ。 ほらチビ、食ってみろ。
jpnSearchText:
まあちょっと違うが似たようなもんだ。
ほらチビ、食ってみろ。

engChrName: Thanks!
engSearchText: Thanks!
jpnChrName: うん！
jpnSearchText: うん！

engChrName: Mmm! It's so sweet! I love it!
engSearchText: Mmm! It's so sweet! I love it!
jpnChrName: んー、あまくておいしいー！
jpnSearchText: んー、あまくておいしいー！

engChrName: What's the matter? Sweet tooth aching for a bite?
engSearchText: What's the matter? Sweet tooth aching for a bite?
jpnChrName: なんだオッサン、気になるか？
jpnSearchText: なんだオッサン、気になるか？

engChrName: I mean, yeah, I'm a little interested. Not like I'm dying to have one or anything, though.
engSearchText:
I mean, yeah, I'm a little interested. Not like I'm
dying to have one or anything, though.
jpnChrName: まあ気になるっちゃあ気になるが、 これは別に俺が食べたいとか──
jpnSearchText:
まあ気になるっちゃあ気になるが、
これは別に俺が食べたいとか──

engChrName: Call it academic curiosity. Since I'm a professional sweets connoisseur and everything.
engSearchText:
Call it academic curiosity. Since I'm a professional
sweets connoisseur and everything.
jpnChrName: そういうのじゃなく、あくまで一人の スイーツの真理の探究者としてだな──
jpnSearchText:
そういうのじゃなく、あくまで一人の
スイーツの真理の探究者としてだな──

engChrName: All right, just shut up and try one. Your excuses are embarrassing.
engSearchText:
All right, just shut up and try one. Your excuses
are embarrassing.
jpnChrName: ああもうゴチャゴチャうるせぇ、 いいから食ってみろや。
jpnSearchText:
ああもうゴチャゴチャうるせぇ、
いいから食ってみろや。

engChrName: Don't mind if I do.
engSearchText: Don't mind if I do.
jpnChrName: んじゃ遠慮なく──
jpnSearchText: んじゃ遠慮なく──

engChrName: What the—?!
engSearchText: What the—?!
jpnChrName: こ、これはッ！！
jpnSearchText: こ、これはッ！！

engChrName: Such subtle sweetness inside this round package. And the buttery-smooth texture from the filling reminds me of red bean paste. And is that...egg?!
engSearchText:
Such subtle sweetness inside this round package.
And the buttery-smooth texture from the filling
reminds me of red bean paste. And is that...egg?!
jpnChrName: まろやかな皮にはほのかな甘み、それに包まれた このとろけるような餡の食感は……卵か！？
jpnSearchText:
まろやかな皮にはほのかな甘み、それに包まれた
このとろけるような餡の食感は……卵か！？

engChrName: It's sweetest at its center, yet it also has the slightest hint of sourness to balance it out, too!
engSearchText:
It's sweetest at its center, yet it also has the slightest
hint of sourness to balance it out, too!
jpnChrName: 中心に近づくに連れて甘味が増し、 さらにほんのりの酸味が舌を刺激してくる！
jpnSearchText:
中心に近づくに連れて甘味が増し、
さらにほんのりの酸味が舌を刺激してくる！

engChrName: So many flavors all compacted together. It's sublime. Eatin' this warms my very soul!
engSearchText:
So many flavors all compacted together. It's sublime.
Eatin' this warms my very soul!
jpnChrName: 様々な味わいを一つにまとめ、 心に沁みわたる温かみすら感じさせる一品だ！
jpnSearchText:
様々な味わいを一つにまとめ、
心に沁みわたる温かみすら感じさせる一品だ！

engChrName: I knew letting you have one was a bad idea.
engSearchText: I knew letting you have one was a bad idea.
jpnChrName: だからウザすぎんだよ……
jpnSearchText: だからウザすぎんだよ……

engChrName: It's so sweet! And smooth! And YUMMY!
engSearchText: It's so sweet! And smooth! And YUMMY!
jpnChrName: とろとろ～！　あまあま～！　超うまいー！
jpnSearchText: とろとろ～！　あまあま～！　超うまいー！

engChrName: ...The dough's kneaded with honey. And the eggs got their seasoning before getting mixed in.
engSearchText:
...The dough's kneaded with honey. And the eggs got
their seasoning before getting mixed in.
jpnChrName: ──皮には蜂蜜を練り込んでる、味に変化を つけるために中身の卵はわざと味付けをしてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
──皮には蜂蜜を練り込んでる、味に変化を
つけるために中身の卵はわざと味付けをしてねぇ。

engChrName: The filling's hawthorn mixed with crystal sugar.
engSearchText: The filling's hawthorn mixed with crystal sugar.
jpnChrName: そして真ん中は氷砂糖をつけたサンザシだ。
jpnSearchText: そして真ん中は氷砂糖をつけたサンザシだ。

engChrName: Gives it some nice variety, both in texture and sweetness. That's also what gives it the nice acidity.
engSearchText:
Gives it some nice variety, both in texture
and sweetness. That's also what gives it the
nice acidity.
jpnChrName: 甘味の濃淡の変化と食感を楽しむもんで、 ほんのりの酸味はアクセントってな。
jpnSearchText:
甘味の濃淡の変化と食感を楽しむもんで、
ほんのりの酸味はアクセントってな。

engChrName: Damn. Look at you, hiding these secret cooking talents behind the punk façade!
engSearchText:
Damn. Look at you, hiding these secret cooking
talents behind the punk façade!
jpnChrName: 普段のイメージに反して結構手が込んでる！？
jpnSearchText: 普段のイメージに反して結構手が込んでる！？

engChrName: I don't get what you guys are talking about, but you're amazing, Aaron!
engSearchText:
I don't get what you guys are talking about, but you're
amazing, Aaron!
jpnChrName: よくわからないけどアーロンすごい！
jpnSearchText: よくわからないけどアーロンすごい！

engChrName: Hell yeah, I am. That's all you need to know about me.
engSearchText:
Hell yeah, I am. That's all you need to know
about me.
jpnChrName: ハハン、オレがスゲーってことさえ分かればいい。
jpnSearchText: ハハン、オレがスゲーってことさえ分かればいい。

engChrName: Hey, can I share them with Mommy and Grandpa? I want them to try, too!
engSearchText:
Hey, can I share them with Mommy and Grandpa?
I want them to try, too!
jpnChrName: ねえねえ、すごくおいしいから、 ママたちにもおすそ分けしていい？
jpnSearchText:
ねえねえ、すごくおいしいから、
ママたちにもおすそ分けしていい？

engChrName: Sure. There's plenty to go around. Better eat them while they're still hot.
engSearchText:
Sure. There's plenty to go around. Better eat them
while they're still hot.
jpnChrName: いいぜ、いっぱい作ったからな。 まだ熱いから皿ごと持ってけや。
jpnSearchText:
いいぜ、いっぱい作ったからな。
まだ熱いから皿ごと持ってけや。

engChrName: Yaaay! Okay, I'll be back!
engSearchText: Yaaay! Okay, I'll be back!
jpnChrName: やったぁ～！ いってくるー！
jpnSearchText:
やったぁ～！
いってくるー！

engChrName: Yumé hoisted the plate of sweets up and took off, beaming.
engSearchText:
Yumé hoisted the plate of sweets up and took
off, beaming.
jpnChrName: ユメは点心を抱えて 満足そうに戻っていった。
jpnSearchText:
ユメは点心を抱えて
満足そうに戻っていった。

engChrName: Thanks for that, kid. You saved my hide.
engSearchText: Thanks for that, kid. You saved my hide.
jpnChrName: ……はあ、正直助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……はあ、正直助かったぜ。

engChrName: Damn straight, I did. You owe me for that, chief.
engSearchText: Damn straight, I did. You owe me for that, chief.
jpnChrName: ハッ、貸し一つだなァ？
jpnSearchText: ハッ、貸し一つだなァ？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. I know.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. I know.
jpnChrName: あー、分かってる。
jpnSearchText: あー、分かってる。

engChrName: But you seriously caught me off guard. Didn't think you'd know your way around a kitchen.
engSearchText:
But you seriously caught me off guard. Didn't think
you'd know your way around a kitchen.
jpnChrName: ったく、こんな隠し技を持ってるとは 大したもんだぜ……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、こんな隠し技を持ってるとは
大したもんだぜ……

engChrName: Well, I don't make sweet stuff all that often. Compared to how I was growing up, I like savory stuff better now.
engSearchText:
Well, I don't make sweet stuff all that often.
Compared to how I was growing up, I like savory
stuff better now.
jpnChrName: ハッ……甘い菓子なんざ滅多に作らねぇし、 昔はともかく今は刺激的な味が好みだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……甘い菓子なんざ滅多に作らねぇし、
昔はともかく今は刺激的な味が好みだしな。

engChrName: Where'd you pick this recipe up, then?
engSearchText: Where'd you pick this recipe up, then?
jpnChrName: っつうことは……
jpnSearchText: っつうことは……

engChrName: ...My mom used to make these all the time.
engSearchText: ...My mom used to make these all the time.
jpnChrName: ……オフクロが昔よく作ってくれてな。
jpnSearchText: ……オフクロが昔よく作ってくれてな。

engChrName: She was a theater actress, just like me. They were her way of celebrating plays going well.
engSearchText:
She was a theater actress, just like me. They were her
way of celebrating plays going well.
jpnChrName: 華劇場の役者だったんだが、 舞台が上手くいくたびに作ってやがった。
jpnSearchText:
華劇場の役者だったんだが、
舞台が上手くいくたびに作ってやがった。

engChrName: I liked them a lot. When I was a kid, at least.
engSearchText: I liked them a lot. When I was a kid, at least.
jpnChrName: まあまあ好みだったぜ、ガキの頃の話だが。
jpnSearchText: まあまあ好みだったぜ、ガキの頃の話だが。

engChrName: Huh. Guess acting runs in the family.
engSearchText: Huh. Guess acting runs in the family.
jpnChrName: へえ…… お袋さんも役者だったんだな。
jpnSearchText:
へえ……
お袋さんも役者だったんだな。

engChrName: You got it. She was pretty damn popular back in the day, too.
engSearchText:
You got it. She was pretty damn popular back in the
day, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、昔はかなりの人気だったぜ？
jpnSearchText: ああ、昔はかなりの人気だったぜ？

engChrName: Anybody who knew anything about theater knew who she was. But if they had the sort of technology that we do now, man, I'm telling you...
engSearchText:
Anybody who knew anything about theater knew
who she was. But if they had the sort of
technology that we do now, man, I'm telling you...
jpnChrName: 知る人ぞ知るって感じだったが、 今みたいに情報技術が発達していたら──
jpnSearchText:
知る人ぞ知るって感じだったが、
今みたいに情報技術が発達していたら──

engChrName: She'd easily be up there with that Phoenix Dancer chick from Arc en Ciel.
engSearchText:
She'd easily be up there with that Phoenix Dancer
chick from Arc en Ciel.
jpnChrName: 《アルカンシェル》のなんとか舞姫にも 引けを取らねえくらいにな。
jpnSearchText:
《アルカンシェル》のなんとか舞姫にも
引けを取らねえくらいにな。

engChrName: You're really proud of your mom, huh?
engSearchText: You're really proud of your mom, huh?
jpnChrName: 自慢の母親だったんだな。
jpnSearchText: 自慢の母親だったんだな。

engChrName: I mean...how can I not be? She raised my punk ass all by herself, for Aidios' sake.
engSearchText:
I mean...how can I not be? She raised my punk ass all
by herself, for Aidios' sake.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、女手一つで オレを育ててくれたからな。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、女手一つで
オレを育ててくれたからな。

engChrName: I didn't have a dad growing up. Mom was the only family I ever had.
engSearchText:
I didn't have a dad growing up. Mom was the only
family I ever had.
jpnChrName: オレには生まれた時から父親なんざいねぇ、 だからオフクロが唯一の家族だった。
jpnSearchText:
オレには生まれた時から父親なんざいねぇ、
だからオフクロが唯一の家族だった。

engChrName: She's the reason I'm into theater, you know.
engSearchText: She's the reason I'm into theater, you know.
jpnChrName: 華劇をやるようになったのも、 そんなオフクロを見てきたからこそだ。
jpnSearchText:
華劇をやるようになったのも、
そんなオフクロを見てきたからこそだ。

engChrName: But she died before I got any good at it...
engSearchText: But she died before I got any good at it...
jpnChrName: 結局上手くできるようになる前に ポックリ逝っちまったがな。
jpnSearchText:
結局上手くできるようになる前に
ポックリ逝っちまったがな。

engChrName: Did she teach you how to make those sweets?
engSearchText: Did she teach you how to make those sweets?
jpnChrName: ……さっきのあの点心の作り方も お袋さんから教わったものか？
jpnSearchText:
……さっきのあの点心の作り方も
お袋さんから教わったものか？

engChrName: Bingo. She taught me right as I started getting into theater.
engSearchText:
Bingo. She taught me right as I started getting
into theater.
jpnChrName: ああ、オレが華劇の練習を 始めた頃にな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、オレが華劇の練習を
始めた頃にな。

engChrName: Then I don't think you gotta worry about it.
engSearchText: Then I don't think you gotta worry about it.
jpnChrName: だったら心配することはねえだろ。
jpnSearchText: だったら心配することはねえだろ。

engChrName: Worry about what?
engSearchText: Worry about what?
jpnChrName: なにがだ？
jpnSearchText: なにがだ？

engChrName: You said they were her way of celebratin' her plays being a success, right?
engSearchText:
You said they were her way of celebratin' her plays
being a success, right?
jpnChrName: あれは舞台の成功を祝って よく作るもんなんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
あれは舞台の成功を祝って
よく作るもんなんだろ？

engChrName: Then she obviously taught you because she was already sure you'd succeed as an actor.
engSearchText:
Then she obviously taught you because she was
already sure you'd succeed as an actor.
jpnChrName: それをお前に教えたってことは、お前の舞台は 必ず成功するって信じていたからに違いねえ。
jpnSearchText:
それをお前に教えたってことは、お前の舞台は
必ず成功するって信じていたからに違いねえ。

engChrName: And you know what?
engSearchText: And you know what?
jpnChrName: もしかしたらその頃の お袋さんの目には──
jpnSearchText:
もしかしたらその頃の
お袋さんの目には──

engChrName: I'd bet you anything she could already see you performin' on stage, absolutely killing it. Probably knew from the start that you'd make it.
engSearchText:
I'd bet you anything she could already see you
performin' on stage, absolutely killing it.
Probably knew from the start that you'd make it.
jpnChrName: 既に華麗な演技で舞台の上で舞う 未来のお前の姿が見えていたのかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
既に華麗な演技で舞台の上で舞う
未来のお前の姿が見えていたのかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: It's what I think, anyway.
engSearchText: It's what I think, anyway.
jpnChrName: ──なんてな。
jpnSearchText: ──なんてな。

engChrName: ...Damn it. Where the hell did that come from?
engSearchText: ...Damn it. Where the hell did that come from?
jpnChrName: ………なんだそりゃ。
jpnSearchText: ………なんだそりゃ。

engChrName: Aaron, Aaron! I've got a package for you!
engSearchText: Aaron, Aaron! I've got a package for you!
jpnChrName: アーロン～、おとどけものー！
jpnSearchText: アーロン～、おとどけものー！

engChrName: For me? What gives?
engSearchText: For me? What gives?
jpnChrName: 届け物……オレにか？
jpnSearchText: 届け物……オレにか？

engChrName: I dunno! This lady on an orbal bike told me to give it to you. She said it was from Langport.
engSearchText:
I dunno! This lady on an orbal bike told me to give it
to you. She said it was from Langport.
jpnChrName: んー、バイクのおねえちゃんがもってきてね、 『コウトから』だってー。
jpnSearchText:
んー、バイクのおねえちゃんがもってきてね、
『コウトから』だってー。

engChrName: She did?
engSearchText: She did?
jpnChrName: ハン……？
jpnSearchText: ハン……？

engChrName: Hey, that's...
engSearchText: Hey, that's...
jpnChrName: こいつは……
jpnSearchText: こいつは……

engChrName: Didn't you just make these? That's weird!
engSearchText: Didn't you just make these? That's weird!
jpnChrName: あれー、さっきと同じお菓子ー？
jpnSearchText: あれー、さっきと同じお菓子ー？

engChrName: There's a few letters, too...
engSearchText: There's a few letters, too...
jpnChrName: ……手紙も添えられてやがる。
jpnSearchText: ……手紙も添えられてやがる。

engChrName: I figured you're probably getting lonely up in Edith right about now, so I tried to make these the way your mom's used to taste.
engSearchText:
I figured you're probably getting lonely up in Edith
right about now, so I tried to make these the way your
mom's used to taste.
jpnChrName: アーロンがそろそろ寂しがる頃だと思って おばさんの味を再現して作ってみたわ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンがそろそろ寂しがる頃だと思って
おばさんの味を再現して作ってみたわ。

engChrName: Make us proud up there. Yours Truly, Ashen PS: Try not to be a pain in the butt to Van and everyone else there, okay?
engSearchText:
Make us proud up there. Yours Truly, Ashen
PS: Try not to be a pain in the butt to Van and
everyone else there, okay?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちに迷惑かけてない？ せいぜい頑張りなさいよね。　　　　──アシェン
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたちに迷惑かけてない？
せいぜい頑張りなさいよね。　　　　──アシェン

engChrName: Hey, buddy. Ashen had me taste test these to make sure they'd be up to snuff for you.
engSearchText:
Hey, buddy. Ashen had me taste test these to make
sure they'd be up to snuff for you.
jpnChrName: お嬢さんに頼まれて俺も試食を手伝ったぜ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>お嬢さんに頼まれて俺も試食を手伝ったぜ。

engChrName: Keep your chin up and don't stop for nothing! It's what Sei and Huang would want. —Syd
engSearchText:
Keep your chin up and don't stop for nothing!
It's what Sei and Huang would want. —Syd
jpnChrName: セイやホアンたちの分まで、 元気でやっていけよな、アーロン！　　　──シド
jpnSearchText:
セイやホアンたちの分まで、
元気でやっていけよな、アーロン！　　　──シド

engChrName: Damn it, Ashen. Mind your own business.
engSearchText: Damn it, Ashen. Mind your own business.
jpnChrName: アシェンの奴、また余計なことを……
jpnSearchText: アシェンの奴、また余計なことを……

engChrName: And what the hell's Syd doing here, acting like he's doing me a favor just for playing taste tester?
engSearchText:
And what the hell's Syd doing here, acting like he's
doing me a favor just for playing taste tester?
jpnChrName: つーかシドの野郎は試食しただけで 偉ぶってんじゃねえっての。
jpnSearchText:
つーかシドの野郎は試食しただけで
偉ぶってんじゃねえっての。

engChrName: *sigh* Those guys, I swear...
engSearchText: *sigh* Those guys, I swear...
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: I think what they're tryin' to say is that you still got a family, even if you don't have any blood relatives left.
engSearchText:
I think what they're tryin' to say is that you still got a
family, even if you don't have any blood relatives left.
jpnChrName: もう血の繋がった家族がいないからって お前は天涯孤独の身なんかじゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
もう血の繋がった家族がいないからって
お前は天涯孤独の身なんかじゃねぇ。

engChrName: They still really care about you.
engSearchText: They still really care about you.
jpnChrName: そういうこった。
jpnSearchText: そういうこった。

engChrName: ...Yeah.
engSearchText: ...Yeah.

engChrName: Aww. Are you lonely, Aaron? Do you wanna play with me? I promise you'll feel all better if you do!
engSearchText:
Aww. Are you lonely, Aaron? Do you wanna play
with me? I promise you'll feel all better if you do!
jpnChrName: アーロンさびしいの？ だったらユメがあそんであげるー！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさびしいの？
だったらユメがあそんであげるー！

engChrName: Sure, sport. Sounds like fun.
engSearchText: Sure, sport. Sounds like fun.
jpnChrName: へいへい、そりゃどうも。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、そりゃどうも。

engChrName: What do I do with these, though? They're just gonna end up getting wasted.
engSearchText:
What do I do with these, though? They're just gonna
end up getting wasted.
jpnChrName: つーかどうすんだこれ？ さっき作ったのも結構残ってるしよ。
jpnSearchText:
つーかどうすんだこれ？
さっき作ったのも結構残ってるしよ。

engChrName: Ask Agnès and everyone else to come! Then we can eat them together!
engSearchText:
Ask Agnès and everyone else to come! Then we can
eat them together!
jpnChrName: アニエスちゃんたちもよんで、 みんなで食べよー！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスちゃんたちもよんで、
みんなで食べよー！

engChrName: Sounds perfect. We'll make a whole party of it!
engSearchText: Sounds perfect. We'll make a whole party of it!
jpnChrName: よっしゃ、パーティーだパーティー！
jpnSearchText: よっしゃ、パーティーだパーティー！

engChrName: Don't get too carried away, kid. Don't want the neighbors getting mad.
engSearchText:
Don't get too carried away, kid. Don't want the
neighbors getting mad.
jpnChrName: ったく、あんま騒ぐんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText: ったく、あんま騒ぐんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: Aaron did just as Yumé suggested and had the rest of the agency over for a tasty sweets party.
engSearchText:
Aaron did just as Yumé suggested and had the rest of
the agency over for a tasty sweets party.
jpnChrName: その後、アニエスたちも呼んで 点心パーティを楽しんだあと……
jpnSearchText:
その後、アニエスたちも呼んで
点心パーティを楽しんだあと……

engChrName: Once the impromptu party wrapped up, Van resumed his normal activities.
engSearchText:
Once the impromptu party wrapped up, Van resumed
his normal activities.
jpnChrName: 改めて活動を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>改めて活動を再開するのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Hey. You said you wanted to talk about some office paperwork?
engSearchText:
Hey. You said you wanted to talk about some
office paperwork?
jpnChrName: ──それで、事務所の書類についての 相談ってのはなんなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
──それで、事務所の書類についての
相談ってのはなんなんだ？

engChrName: Correct. In the course of organizing everything, I found some forms whose deadlines are quickly approaching.
engSearchText:
Correct. In the course of organizing everything, I
found some forms whose deadlines are
quickly approaching.
jpnChrName: ええ、書類整理をしている流れで 気づいたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、書類整理をしている流れで
気づいたのですが……

engChrName: I thought you should be made aware of them so that they aren't submitted late.
engSearchText:
I thought you should be made aware of them so that
they aren't submitted late.
jpnChrName: 提出期限が差し迫ったものを 見つけまして。
jpnSearchText:
提出期限が差し迫ったものを
見つけまして。

engChrName: Ah, shit. Yeah, don't wanna fall behind on those. Which forms are they?
engSearchText:
Ah, shit. Yeah, don't wanna fall behind on those.
Which forms are they?
jpnChrName: マジか…… そいつはやべえな、どの書類だ？
jpnSearchText:
マジか……
そいつはやべえな、どの書類だ？

engChrName: Actually, I went ahead and sorted them out for you already. All you have to do is fill them in.
engSearchText:
Actually, I went ahead and sorted them out for
you already. All you have to do is fill them in.
jpnChrName: すでに整理しております。 あとはご記入だけしていただければと。
jpnSearchText:
すでに整理しております。
あとはご記入だけしていただければと。

engChrName: Perfect. Thanks, Risette. Gonna take care of those right now so they're not hanging over our head.
engSearchText:
Perfect. Thanks, Risette. Gonna take care of those
right now so they're not hanging over our head.
jpnChrName: そいつはありがたい。 面倒事はとっとと済ませちまうか。
jpnSearchText:
そいつはありがたい。
面倒事はとっとと済ませちまうか。

engChrName: Van contacted Risette and returned to the office.
engSearchText: Van contacted Risette and returned to the office.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはリゼットに連絡し、 事務所の部屋を訪ねた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはリゼットに連絡し、
事務所の部屋を訪ねた。

engChrName: Thank you for coming in, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: Thank you for coming in, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様、お声をかけてくださって ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様、お声をかけてくださって
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: I hate to impose like this, especially so late, but I sincerely appreciate it.
engSearchText:
I hate to impose like this, especially so late, but I
sincerely appreciate it.
jpnChrName: お手数をおかけしますが、 ひとつよろしくお願い致しますね。
jpnSearchText:
お手数をおかけしますが、
ひとつよろしくお願い致しますね。

engChrName: Don't mention it. You said you were testing some features in development for the simulator, right?
engSearchText:
Don't mention it. You said you were testing some
features in development for the simulator, right?
jpnChrName: ああ、別にいいが 俺に手伝えることなんてあんのか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、別にいいが
俺に手伝えることなんてあんのか？

engChrName: Are you sure I'm the man you want for that? Sounds like it'd go way over my head.
engSearchText:
Are you sure I'm the man you want for that?
Sounds like it'd go way over my head.
jpnChrName: 例のシミュレーターってヤツの “開発中機能”のテストだったか。
jpnSearchText:
例のシミュレーターってヤツの
“開発中機能”のテストだったか。

engChrName: Certainly. As a matter of fact, there's something that only you can help me with.
engSearchText:
Certainly. As a matter of fact, there's something that
only you can help me with.
jpnChrName: ふふ、むしろヴァン様にしか 頼めないことでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、むしろヴァン様にしか
頼めないことでしょう。

engChrName: Could you please take your Xipha out for me?
engSearchText: Could you please take your Xipha out for me?
jpnChrName: それでは、ザイファを出して頂けますか？
jpnSearchText: それでは、ザイファを出して頂けますか？

engChrName: My Xipha? What do you want with that?
engSearchText: My Xipha? What do you want with that?
jpnChrName: ザイファ……？
jpnSearchText: ザイファ……？

engChrName: The holo core system gathers a wide variety of data through the Xipha, not just biological information.
engSearchText:
The holo core system gathers a wide variety of data
through the Xipha, not just biological information.
jpnChrName: ホロウコアシステムはザイファを通じて 生体情報以外も様々なデータを集積しています。
jpnSearchText:
ホロウコアシステムはザイファを通じて
生体情報以外も様々なデータを集積しています。

engChrName: This time, I'd like to test location information-based shard replication functionality to...
engSearchText:
This time, I'd like to test location information-based
shard replication functionality to...
jpnChrName: 今回テストするのは、その中でも ロケーション情報を元にしたシャード再現機能──
jpnSearchText:
今回テストするのは、その中でも
ロケーション情報を元にしたシャード再現機能──

engChrName: Heehee, perhaps it'd be faster if I just show you. Are you ready to begin?
engSearchText:
Heehee, perhaps it'd be faster if I just show you.
Are you ready to begin?
jpnChrName: ふふ、あとは体験していただくのが早いかと。 さっそく始めましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、あとは体験していただくのが早いかと。
さっそく始めましょう。

engChrName: I didn't really get all that, but sure. You just need me to connect my Xipha, right?
engSearchText:
I didn't really get all that, but sure. You just need me
to connect my Xipha, right?
jpnChrName: ハン、よく分からねえがとにかく 俺のザイファを連動すればいいんだな？
jpnSearchText:
ハン、よく分からねえがとにかく
俺のザイファを連動すればいいんだな？

engChrName: ...We're back.
engSearchText: ...We're back.
jpnChrName: ……戻ってきたのか。
jpnSearchText: ……戻ってきたのか。

engChrName: Strictly speaking, we never left this room in the first place.
engSearchText:
Strictly speaking, we never left this room in the
first place.
jpnChrName: ふふ、厳密にはこの部屋から 一歩も動いてはいないのですが。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、厳密にはこの部屋から
一歩も動いてはいないのですが。

engChrName: How do you feel about this new functionality test?
engSearchText: How do you feel about this new functionality test?
jpnChrName: テストした機能はいかがでしたか？
jpnSearchText: テストした機能はいかがでしたか？

engChrName: Good reminder of how crazy shard tech really is, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Good reminder of how crazy shard tech really is,
that's for sure.
jpnChrName: ああ、シャードってのが 改めてすさまじい技術だって実感したぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、シャードってのが
改めてすさまじい技術だって実感したぜ。

engChrName: Honestly, I'm even more excited to see this fully realized than I am the combat simulation portion.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I'm even more excited to see this fully
realized than I am the combat simulation portion.
jpnChrName: 正直戦闘シミュレーションよりも 実用化が楽しみになっちまうくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
正直戦闘シミュレーションよりも
実用化が楽しみになっちまうくらいだ。

engChrName: I agree with you.
engSearchText: I agree with you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、わたくしも同意見です。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、わたくしも同意見です。

engChrName: Thankfully, we managed to record some excellent data. Things will hopefully continue to progress smoothly.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, we managed to record some
excellent data. Things will hopefully continue to
progress smoothly.
jpnChrName: おかげさまでいいデータが取れましたし このまま前進させられればいいのですが。
jpnSearchText:
おかげさまでいいデータが取れましたし
このまま前進させられればいいのですが。

engChrName: But I gotta say, you looked pretty happy while we were doin' that test.
engSearchText:
But I gotta say, you looked pretty happy while we
were doin' that test.
jpnChrName: しかし、さっきの様子…… お前さんも結構はしゃいでたな？
jpnSearchText:
しかし、さっきの様子……
お前さんも結構はしゃいでたな？

engChrName: As embarrassed as I'd be to admit it, I can't claim otherwise.
engSearchText:
As embarrassed as I'd be to admit it, I can't
claim otherwise.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、お恥ずかしい限りです。 言われてみればそうかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、お恥ずかしい限りです。
言われてみればそうかもしれません。

engChrName: All I had until now were pictures and videos from other places. For a while, I thought they'd be all I'd have, and I was content just imagining them.
engSearchText:
All I had until now were pictures and videos from
other places. For a while, I thought they'd be all I'd
have, and I was content just imagining them.
jpnChrName: 今までは、写真や映像を観て 想像を膨らませるばかりでしたから。
jpnSearchText:
今までは、写真や映像を観て
想像を膨らませるばかりでしたから。

engChrName: But thanks to you, Mr. Arkride, I now get to experience such places for myself.
engSearchText:
But thanks to you, Mr. Arkride, I now get to
experience such places for myself.
jpnChrName: もう少し早くヴァン様のもとへ 駆け付ける事が出来ていれば……
jpnSearchText:
もう少し早くヴァン様のもとへ
駆け付ける事が出来ていれば……

engChrName: If I hadn't taken so long to join you, I might've even been able to see the places we just simulated. Honestly, I'm a little jealous of the others.
engSearchText:
If I hadn't taken so long to join you, I might've even
been able to see the places we just simulated.
Honestly, I'm a little jealous of the others.
jpnChrName: 皆様と先程の景色の中を歩けたのかと思うと、 少し羨ましく思ってしまいます。
jpnSearchText:
皆様と先程の景色の中を歩けたのかと思うと、
少し羨ましく思ってしまいます。

engChrName: ...You've been through a hell of a lot in your life, haven't you?
engSearchText:
...You've been through a hell of a lot in your life,
haven't you?
jpnChrName: ……お前さんの身体については 前の出張で知っちまったからな。
jpnSearchText:
……お前さんの身体については
前の出張で知っちまったからな。

engChrName: Don't mean to pry, but it's the impression I got after what happened last trip.
engSearchText:
Don't mean to pry, but it's the impression I got after
what happened last trip.
jpnChrName: 色々あったみたいだな？ 無理に聞き出すつもりはないが。
jpnSearchText:
色々あったみたいだな？
無理に聞き出すつもりはないが。

engChrName: That...would be a fair assessment, yes.
engSearchText: That...would be a fair assessment, yes.
jpnChrName: そうですね…… 本当に色々なことがありました。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……
本当に色々なことがありました。

engChrName: Regardless of that, I owe a great debt of gratitude toward the Marduk Company, and Mr. Thorndyke by extension.
engSearchText:
Regardless of that, I owe a great debt of gratitude
toward the Marduk Company, and Mr. Thorndyke
by extension.
jpnChrName: ですがマルドゥック社──ひいては ソーンダイクＧＭに協力していたおかげで。
jpnSearchText:
ですがマルドゥック社──ひいては
ソーンダイクＧＭに協力していたおかげで。

engChrName: I wouldn't be here, helping as your concierge, if it weren't for them. I'm incredibly grateful for the opportunity.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be here, helping as your concierge, if it
weren't for them. I'm incredibly grateful for
the opportunity.
jpnChrName: こうして“出向ＳＣ”としても 皆様のお役に立てている──
jpnSearchText:
こうして“出向ＳＣ”としても
皆様のお役に立てている──

engChrName: That, in and of itself, is a great privilege and more than enough for me to feel fulfilled and satisfied.
engSearchText:
That, in and of itself, is a great privilege and more
than enough for me to feel fulfilled and satisfied.
jpnChrName: それだけで十分贅沢を させて頂いているというものです。
jpnSearchText:
それだけで十分贅沢を
させて頂いているというものです。

engChrName: Don't gotta be so humble. We're happy to have you here, too, you know.
engSearchText:
Don't gotta be so humble. We're happy to have you
here, too, you know.
jpnChrName: ハッ……また随分と謙虚なもんだ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……また随分と謙虚なもんだ。

engChrName: And don't forget we've got our trip to Longlai comin' up, too.
engSearchText:
And don't forget we've got our trip to Longlai comin'
up, too.
jpnChrName: 急遽決まっちまったが、 龍來旅行も控えているしな。
jpnSearchText:
急遽決まっちまったが、
龍來旅行も控えているしな。

engChrName: I know it's all kinda last minute and not exactly meant for us, so we might not really have all that much time to relax.
engSearchText:
I know it's all kinda last minute and not exactly meant
for us, so we might not really have all that much time
to relax.
jpnChrName: 裏で思惑が絡んでるみてえだから、 暢気にはしてられねえかもしれないが……
jpnSearchText:
裏で思惑が絡んでるみてえだから、
暢気にはしてられねえかもしれないが……

engChrName: But I still hope you get to enjoy yourself while we're there. You deserve it just as much as anyone else.
engSearchText:
But I still hope you get to enjoy yourself while
we're there. You deserve it just as much as
anyone else.
jpnChrName: せいぜいお前さんも たっぷり楽しんでおけばいいさ。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜいお前さんも
たっぷり楽しんでおけばいいさ。

engChrName: Thank you, Mr. Arkride. Just the opportunity to join you all is exhilarating.
engSearchText:
Thank you, Mr. Arkride. Just the opportunity to join
you all is exhilarating.
jpnChrName: ええ、わたくしも胸が躍る心地です。
jpnSearchText: ええ、わたくしも胸が躍る心地です。

engChrName: Whether it's the local cuisine, the beautiful vistas, or the relaxing hot springs, I'm looking forward to it all.
engSearchText:
Whether it's the local cuisine, the beautiful vistas, or
the relaxing hot springs, I'm looking forward to it all.
jpnChrName: 風光明媚な景色に、料理に、温泉に…… 今から本当に楽しみですね。
jpnSearchText:
風光明媚な景色に、料理に、温泉に……
今から本当に楽しみですね。

engChrName: With the simulator test concluded, Van left the room.
engSearchText: With the simulator test concluded, Van left the room.
jpnChrName: こうして『仮想シミュレーション機器』の テストを終えたヴァンはリゼットの部屋を後にし──
jpnSearchText:
こうして『仮想シミュレーション機器』の
テストを終えたヴァンはリゼットの部屋を後にし──

engChrName: After that, he resumed his nighttime patrol.
engSearchText: After that, he resumed his nighttime patrol.
jpnChrName: 再び夜の街の散策へと戻るのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>再び夜の街の散策へと戻るのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: And...that's it! There! Your hands should be working a little bit more smoothly nooow.
engSearchText:
And...that's it! There! Your hands should be working
a little bit more smoothly nooow.
jpnChrName: よしっと…… もう手を動かしてもらっても大丈夫だよ～。
jpnSearchText:
よしっと……
もう手を動かしてもらっても大丈夫だよ～。

engChrName: Tell me if anything feels off. Or are you doing just peachy?
engSearchText:
Tell me if anything feels off. Or are you doing
just peachy?
jpnChrName: 今の段階で違和感とかはあるかな～？
jpnSearchText: 今の段階で違和感とかはあるかな～？

engChrName: More than 'just peachy.' I actually feel like I'll be able to perform even more precisely now, thanks to these adjustments.
engSearchText:
More than 'just peachy.' I actually feel like I'll be able
to perform even more precisely now, thanks to
these adjustments.
jpnChrName: いえ、むしろ以前よりも精密な動作が 可能になったような気がしますね。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、むしろ以前よりも精密な動作が
可能になったような気がしますね。

engChrName: Damn, I'm impressed. Can't even tell they're implants by just lookin' at 'em.
engSearchText:
Damn, I'm impressed. Can't even tell they're implants
by just lookin' at 'em.
jpnChrName: へえ……見た目も殆ど違和感ねぇな。
jpnSearchText: へえ……見た目も殆ど違和感ねぇな。

engChrName: Heehee. I know, riiight?
engSearchText: Heehee. I know, riiight?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そうでしょ～？
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、そうでしょ～？

engChrName: The updated frame was designed by Marduk's engineering and development department.
engSearchText:
The updated frame was designed by Marduk's
engineering and development department.
jpnChrName: アップデート版の素体はマルドゥックの 技術開発によるものだけど……
jpnSearchText:
アップデート版の素体はマルドゥックの
技術開発によるものだけど……

engChrName: But I took the receptors that handle her brain's electrical signals and tried to subdivide them to further refine their design.
engSearchText:
But I took the receptors that handle her brain's
electrical signals and tried to subdivide them to
further refine their design.
jpnChrName: 私の方で、脳から発信された 電気信号の受け取り方を細分化してみたんだ～。
jpnSearchText:
私の方で、脳から発信された
電気信号の受け取り方を細分化してみたんだ～。

engChrName: I also increased the precision of her skin's cutaneous sensors.
engSearchText:
I also increased the precision of her skin's
cutaneous sensors.
jpnChrName: それ以外にも、皮膚感覚受容器の精度を 上げたりしたから……
jpnSearchText:
それ以外にも、皮膚感覚受容器の精度を
上げたりしたから……

engChrName: Hopefully, it'll feel so natural, you won't even know it's not the real thing. It'll fit juuust like a glove!
engSearchText:
Hopefully, it'll feel so natural, you won't even know
it's not the real thing. It'll fit juuust like a glove!
jpnChrName: きっと以前よりも“生身”に 近い感覚で使えると思うよ～。
jpnSearchText:
きっと以前よりも“生身”に
近い感覚で使えると思うよ～。

engChrName: Er, all the jargon's going straight over my head, doc. But hopefully it means it's an improvement?
engSearchText:
Er, all the jargon's going straight over my head, doc.
But hopefully it means it's an improvement?
jpnChrName: はあ……専門的すぎる部分は分からねえが、 まさにアップデート版って訳だな。
jpnSearchText:
はあ……専門的すぎる部分は分からねえが、
まさにアップデート版って訳だな。

engChrName: That's right! Though this also puts more of a burden on the remaining organic parts, albeit faint.
engSearchText:
That's right! Though this also puts more of a burden
on the remaining organic parts, albeit faint.
jpnChrName: うん、でも極めて微弱だけど 生体への負担は増えてるし……
jpnSearchText:
うん、でも極めて微弱だけど
生体への負担は増えてるし……

engChrName: Since it's only a partial replacement, I'm a teensy bit concerned about the balance shift between the old and new parts.
engSearchText:
Since it's only a partial replacement, I'm a teensy bit
concerned about the balance shift between the old
and new parts.
jpnChrName: 部分的な換装だから他のパーツとの バランスも変わっちゃうのが少し心配で。
jpnSearchText:
部分的な換装だから他のパーツとの
バランスも変わっちゃうのが少し心配で。

engChrName: So be a sweetie and try testing everything with Van? Just to make sure all's dandy.
engSearchText:
So be a sweetie and try testing everything with Van?
Just to make sure all's dandy.
jpnChrName: だからヴァン君と一緒に 一通りテストしてみて欲しいんだ～。
jpnSearchText:
だからヴァン君と一緒に
一通りテストしてみて欲しいんだ～。

engChrName: Of course. I expected as much, having had adjustments of a similar ilk in the past.
engSearchText:
Of course. I expected as much, having had
adjustments of a similar ilk in the past.
jpnChrName: ええ、かしこまりました。 今回が初めてでもありませんし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、かしこまりました。
今回が初めてでもありませんし。

engChrName: Should probably keep the testin' to day-to-day activities and see if she can still perform 'em well, yeah?
engSearchText:
Should probably keep the testin' to day-to-day
activities and see if she can still perform 'em
well, yeah?
jpnChrName: 日常生活上で問題がないか、 いつも通りに生活して確かめるわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
日常生活上で問題がないか、
いつも通りに生活して確かめるわけだ。

engChrName: Yup! That kind of real world use case data is much more useful than anything a formal test would generate.
engSearchText:
Yup! That kind of real world use case data is much
more useful than anything a formal test
would generate.
jpnChrName: うん、形式的なテストよりも その方が実用的なデータがとれるしっ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、形式的なテストよりも
その方が実用的なデータがとれるしっ。

engChrName: What do you say, Van? Wanna help? Pretty pleaseeee?
engSearchText:
What do you say, Van? Wanna help?
Pretty pleaseeee?
jpnChrName: お願いしてもいいかな～？
jpnSearchText: お願いしてもいいかな～？

engChrName: Yeah, no prob. I'm her boss, you know. It's in my best interest to help out with these things.
engSearchText:
Yeah, no prob. I'm her boss, you know. It's in my best
interest to help out with these things.
jpnChrName: ああ、それこそ解決業務にも関わる話だろうしな。 所長として手伝わせてもらうさ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それこそ解決業務にも関わる話だろうしな。
所長として手伝わせてもらうさ。

engChrName: Well, what do you say we get started already?
engSearchText: Well, what do you say we get started already?
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、さっそくはじめるか？
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ、さっそくはじめるか？

engChrName: Heehee, I appreciate the support, Mr. Arkride. Thank you for offering your assistance.
engSearchText:
Heehee, I appreciate the support, Mr. Arkride.
Thank you for offering your assistance.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ご面倒をおかけしますが よろしくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ご面倒をおかけしますが
よろしくお願いしますね。

engChrName: From there, Van and Risette got straight to work testing out her prosthetic parts.
engSearchText:
From there, Van and Risette got straight to work
testing out her prosthetic parts.
jpnChrName: こうして、ヴァンとリゼットによる 擬体パーツのテストが開始された。
jpnSearchText:
こうして、ヴァンとリゼットによる
擬体パーツのテストが開始された。

engChrName: Hmm... Typing feels normal.
engSearchText: Hmm... Typing feels normal.
jpnChrName: ふむ……キーボード操作に関しては 問題無さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……キーボード操作に関しては
問題無さそうですね。

engChrName: Well, that might be inaccurate. The sensation's definitely changed. The key presses feel much more vivid.
engSearchText:
Well, that might be inaccurate. The sensation's
definitely changed. The key presses feel much
more vivid.
jpnChrName: むしろ、以前よりもキーを触った時の 感触がはっきり感じられて新鮮です。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ、以前よりもキーを触った時の
感触がはっきり感じられて新鮮です。

engChrName: Huh. I've never even given how typing feels a second thought, but I guess it's pretty important, too.
engSearchText:
Huh. I've never even given how typing feels a second
thought, but I guess it's pretty important, too.
jpnChrName: へぇ、触った時の感触か…… あんま意識した事は無かったが大事な事かもな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、触った時の感触か……
あんま意識した事は無かったが大事な事かもな。

engChrName: I didn't know you were keeping business records for Master, too.
engSearchText:
I didn't know you were keeping business records for
Master, too.
jpnChrName: ……って、おお。 師父の業務記録もしっかり付けてたんだな。
jpnSearchText:
……って、おお。
師父の業務記録もしっかり付けてたんだな。

engChrName: Not that I mind, of course. I always intended to pay him his due, unlike a certain celebrity in our ranks.
engSearchText:
Not that I mind, of course. I always intended to pay
him his due, unlike a certain celebrity in our ranks.
jpnChrName: あの女優はともかく、師父には最初から 払うつもりでいたから問題ねえんだが。
jpnSearchText:
あの女優はともかく、師父には最初から
払うつもりでいたから問題ねえんだが。

engChrName: Careful. I can't imagine Ms. Lanster will like hearing that.
engSearchText:
Careful. I can't imagine Ms. Lanster will like
hearing that.
jpnChrName: ふふ、いじけるジュディス様の顔が 目に浮かびますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いじけるジュディス様の顔が
目に浮かびますね。

engChrName: You could fool anyone, standin' in the kitchen like that. Could pass for a real maid.
engSearchText:
You could fool anyone, standin' in the kitchen
like that. Could pass for a real maid.
jpnChrName: しかし台所に立っていると 本物のメイドみたいな気がしてくるな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし台所に立っていると
本物のメイドみたいな気がしてくるな。

engChrName: I appreciate the flattery, but I can't quite claim to be as apt as proper maids in terms of housework. It's only appearances where I fit the part.
engSearchText:
I appreciate the flattery, but I can't quite claim to be
as apt as proper maids in terms of housework.
It's only appearances where I fit the part.
jpnChrName: ふふ、本職のように家事全般を完璧に こなせるというわけでもありませんが。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、本職のように家事全般を完璧に
こなせるというわけでもありませんが。

engChrName: However, I feel like I might be able to approximate my former cooking skills much more closely now.
engSearchText:
However, I feel like I might be able to approximate
my former cooking skills much more closely now.
jpnChrName: それでも随分と以前の感覚で 料理などをできるようにはなりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
それでも随分と以前の感覚で
料理などをできるようにはなりましたね。

engChrName: That's good, Risette. I'm glad to hear it.
engSearchText: That's good, Risette. I'm glad to hear it.
jpnChrName: ……そうか。
jpnSearchText: ……そうか。

engChrName: Since I'm already here, would you like me to prepare you some snacks for later tonight?
engSearchText:
Since I'm already here, would you like me to prepare
you some snacks for later tonight?
jpnChrName: 折角ですので、軽い夜食になるような物でも 作り置きましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
折角ですので、軽い夜食になるような物でも
作り置きましょうか。

engChrName: Oh, please and thanks. I'm usually hunting for a bite at night.
engSearchText:
Oh, please and thanks. I'm usually hunting for a bite
at night.
jpnChrName: ああ、助かるぜ。 夜に小腹が空いちまう時ってあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、助かるぜ。
夜に小腹が空いちまう時ってあるからな。

engChrName: Not like I can ever find anything, considering Aaron loves raidin' the fridge in the middle of the night, the little mooch.
engSearchText:
Not like I can ever find anything, considering Aaron
loves raidin' the fridge in the middle of the night, the
little mooch.
jpnChrName: 朝帰りの多い悪ガキが、 たまに夜中に冷蔵庫漁ってたりするしな。
jpnSearchText:
朝帰りの多い悪ガキが、
たまに夜中に冷蔵庫漁ってたりするしな。

engChrName: Heehee, all right. I'll prepare something light for you. Don't want to overburden your digestive system so late.
engSearchText:
Heehee, all right. I'll prepare something light for you.
Don't want to overburden your digestive system
so late.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでは、消化に良く 適度にお腹に溜まる物に致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それでは、消化に良く
適度にお腹に溜まる物に致しましょう。

engChrName: And done! No marks on sight for you.
engSearchText: And done! No marks on sight for you.
jpnChrName: よしっ…… マークは除去しておいたよ～。
jpnSearchText:
よしっ……
マークは除去しておいたよ～。

engChrName: I took a look-see at the data you two got for me and everything looks hunky dory. Your body's not straining to accommodate for the new parts.
engSearchText:
I took a look-see at the data you two got for me and
everything looks hunky dory. Your body's not
straining to accommodate for the new parts.
jpnChrName: データの方を確認させてもらったけど、 身体への負荷も全然問題なかったみたい。
jpnSearchText:
データの方を確認させてもらったけど、
身体への負荷も全然問題なかったみたい。

engChrName: So feel free to keep using them.
engSearchText: So feel free to keep using them.
jpnChrName: この擬体パーツは このまま使ってもらって大丈夫だよ～。
jpnSearchText:
この擬体パーツは
このまま使ってもらって大丈夫だよ～。

engChrName: Are you sure? I was certain that you'd be taking them back once we were done testing.
engSearchText:
Are you sure? I was certain that you'd be taking them
back once we were done testing.
jpnChrName: よろしいのですか？　今までのように てっきり回収されていくものかと。
jpnSearchText:
よろしいのですか？　今までのように
てっきり回収されていくものかと。

engChrName: That was the plan, buuut I changed my mind. Let's call it a gift to celebrate the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
That was the plan, buuut I changed my mind.
Let's call it a gift to celebrate the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: えへへ、元々そのつもりだったから～。 記念祭にかこつけてプレゼントっていうか。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、元々そのつもりだったから～。
記念祭にかこつけてプレゼントっていうか。

engChrName: And your data indicates that the parts are now reliable enough to put to practical use.
engSearchText:
And your data indicates that the parts are now
reliable enough to put to practical use.
jpnChrName: さっきのデータで実用レベルとして 問題ないのは分かったし。
jpnSearchText:
さっきのデータで実用レベルとして
問題ないのは分かったし。

engChrName: Our data quality has improved so much ever since you came here. My research has been progressing by leaps and bounds!
engSearchText:
Our data quality has improved so much ever since you
came here. My research has been progressing by leaps
and bounds!
jpnChrName: リゼットちゃんがこちらに出向してから データの質も上がってて研究が捗ってるんだよ～。
jpnSearchText:
リゼットちゃんがこちらに出向してから
データの質も上がってて研究が捗ってるんだよ～。

engChrName: Oh, that's great news to hear. Thank you for your generosity, Associate Professor.
engSearchText:
Oh, that's great news to hear. Thank you for your
generosity, Associate Professor.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうでしたか…… お心遣いありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうでしたか……
お心遣いありがとうございます。

engChrName: Well, my business here is done! I'm going to skedaddle now.
engSearchText:
Well, my business here is done! I'm going to
skedaddle now.
jpnChrName: さてと、それじゃあ 私はそろそろ帰らせてもらうね～。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、それじゃあ
私はそろそろ帰らせてもらうね～。

engChrName: I'm so eager to get my hands on that new data so I can look it over in more detail.
engSearchText:
I'm so eager to get my hands on that new data so I
can look it over in more detail.
jpnChrName: 早く帰って、今回貰ったデータも 細かく分析したい所だし。
jpnSearchText:
早く帰って、今回貰ったデータも
細かく分析したい所だし。

engChrName: Thanks for helping out today, Van!
engSearchText: Thanks for helping out today, Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァン君も、協力してくれて ありがとうね～！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン君も、協力してくれて
ありがとうね～！

engChrName: Don't mention it. You're the one putting in all the hard work.
engSearchText:
Don't mention it. You're the one putting in all the
hard work.
jpnChrName: ああ、アンタもお疲れさんだったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、アンタもお疲れさんだったな。

engChrName: All right. Let's take a small break and then it's back to patrolling. Sound good?
engSearchText:
All right. Let's take a small break and then it's back
to patrolling. Sound good?
jpnChrName: それじゃ、少し休憩したら 巡回に戻るとするか。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、少し休憩したら
巡回に戻るとするか。

engChrName: Of course. Thank you again for assisting with today's test—oh.
engSearchText:
Of course. Thank you again for assisting with today's
test—oh.
jpnChrName: ええ、そうですね。 ヴァン様もお疲れ様でした──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そうですね。
ヴァン様もお疲れ様でした──

engChrName: Actually, there's one last thing we didn't test. It almost slipped my mind.
engSearchText:
Actually, there's one last thing we didn't test.
It almost slipped my mind.
jpnChrName: あら、そういえば…… ひとつテストを忘れていましたね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、そういえば……
ひとつテストを忘れていましたね。

engChrName: It's not strictly required, so don't feel pressured to help with it.
engSearchText:
It's not strictly required, so don't feel pressured to
help with it.
jpnChrName: 必須項目という訳ではないので、 問題はないのですが……
jpnSearchText:
必須項目という訳ではないので、
問題はないのですが……

engChrName: That's fine. Don't mind goin' for another round. Better safe than sorry, right?
engSearchText:
That's fine. Don't mind goin' for another round.
Better safe than sorry, right?
jpnChrName: そうか？ このまま付き合ってもいいが。
jpnSearchText:
そうか？
このまま付き合ってもいいが。

engChrName: I suppose so.
engSearchText: I suppose so.
jpnChrName: ……そうですね。
jpnSearchText: ……そうですね。

engChrName: In that case, Mr. Arkride, could you please hold out your palm for me?
engSearchText:
In that case, Mr. Arkride, could you please hold out
your palm for me?
jpnChrName: それではヴァン様、 掌を出して頂けますか。
jpnSearchText:
それではヴァン様、
掌を出して頂けますか。

engChrName: Uh, I don't get it. What kinda test are we doin' here?
engSearchText: Uh, I don't get it. What kinda test are we doin' here?
jpnChrName: なんつうか…… これでテストになってんのか？
jpnSearchText:
なんつうか……
これでテストになってんのか？

engChrName: Checking skin to skin contact, in a sense.
engSearchText: Checking skin to skin contact, in a sense.
jpnChrName: ええ、人体への接触テストになります。
jpnSearchText: ええ、人体への接触テストになります。

engChrName: I'm checking for two different factors. First, skin sensitivity and grip to ensure no problems are present in either. As for the other one...
engSearchText:
I'm checking for two different factors. First, skin
sensitivity and grip to ensure no problems are present
in either. As for the other one...
jpnChrName: 相手側にとって、 感触や握力に違和感がないかどうか……
jpnSearchText:
相手側にとって、
感触や握力に違和感がないかどうか……

engChrName: We gauge how someone else feels when I touch them, and if anything feels wrong on their end.
engSearchText:
We gauge how someone else feels when I touch
them, and if anything feels wrong on their end.
jpnChrName: わたくしの方で、力加減や皮膚感覚に 問題ないかを調べるものですね。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしの方で、力加減や皮膚感覚に
問題ないかを調べるものですね。

engChrName: Got'cha. Well, for my mira, everything's normal.
engSearchText: Got'cha. Well, for my mira, everything's normal.
jpnChrName: なるほど……俺としては 特に違和感はねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……俺としては
特に違和感はねえけどな。

engChrName: I probably wouldn't be able to tell you've got prosthetics on if I didn't know already.
engSearchText:
I probably wouldn't be able to tell you've got
prosthetics on if I didn't know already.
jpnChrName: 事情を知らなければ、 擬体パーツなんて気付けねえほどだ。
jpnSearchText:
事情を知らなければ、
擬体パーツなんて気付けねえほどだ。

engChrName: It's reassuring, hearing that from you.
engSearchText: It's reassuring, hearing that from you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そう言って頂けると嬉しいです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そう言って頂けると嬉しいです。

engChrName: As for me... Hmm... The sensation's more lifelike than it was before. Definitely sharper.
engSearchText:
As for me... Hmm... The sensation's more lifelike
than it was before. Definitely sharper.
jpnChrName: わたくしの方は、そうですね…… やはり以前よりも感覚が冴えている気がします。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしの方は、そうですね……
やはり以前よりも感覚が冴えている気がします。

engChrName: Your hand's warm, Mr. Arkride. It feels just right.
engSearchText: Your hand's warm, Mr. Arkride. It feels just right.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様の手の温かさも ちゃんと感じ取れていますし。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様の手の温かさも
ちゃんと感じ取れていますし。

engChrName: I... This is getting a little awkward. No offense.
engSearchText: I... This is getting a little awkward. No offense.
jpnChrName: なんだかな…… さすがに気恥ずかしいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
なんだかな……
さすがに気恥ずかしいんだが。

engChrName: None taken. We can stop here. I sincerely appreciate your help.
engSearchText:
None taken. We can stop here. I sincerely appreciate
your help.
jpnChrName: ふふ……もう十分です。 ありがとうございました、ヴァン様。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……もう十分です。
ありがとうございました、ヴァン様。

engChrName: Maybe I just don't know what to look for, but your body doesn't feel any different to me than anyone else's.
engSearchText:
Maybe I just don't know what to look for, but your
body doesn't feel any different to me than
anyone else's.
jpnChrName: “再現”か……俺としては 生身とそう差があるようには思えねえが。
jpnSearchText:
“再現”か……俺としては
生身とそう差があるようには思えねえが。

engChrName: Oh, there most certainly is a difference.
engSearchText: Oh, there most certainly is a difference.
jpnChrName: ふふ、“差”ならありますよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、“差”ならありますよ。

engChrName: For all the technological progress being made, it's by no means easy to genuinely replicate how a human body feels.
engSearchText:
For all the technological progress being made, it's by
no means easy to genuinely replicate how a human
body feels.
jpnChrName: 日々技術が向上しているとはいえ 人体の完全再現は容易くないようです。
jpnSearchText:
日々技術が向上しているとはいえ
人体の完全再現は容易くないようです。

engChrName: Ms. Archette tells me that I can feel approximately seventy percent of what an organic body is capable of.
engSearchText:
Ms. Archette tells me that I can feel approximately
seventy percent of what an organic body is capable of.
jpnChrName: 現に、生身の人体と比較してわたくしが得られる “感触”は約７０％と言われています。
jpnSearchText:
現に、生身の人体と比較してわたくしが得られる
“感触”は約７０％と言われています。

engChrName: These new parts have perhaps raised the margin by about 0.67 percent, but there's still much work to be done.
engSearchText:
These new parts have perhaps raised the margin by
about 0.67 percent, but there's still much work to
be done.
jpnChrName: 今回の擬体パーツのおかげで ０.６７％ほどは向上しているかもしれませんが。
jpnSearchText:
今回の擬体パーツのおかげで
０.６７％ほどは向上しているかもしれませんが。

engChrName: Huh. I had no idea. Guess we'll just have to pin our hopes on her and Marduk closing the rest of the gap eventually.
engSearchText:
Huh. I had no idea. Guess we'll just have to pin our
hopes on her and Marduk closing the rest of the
gap eventually.
jpnChrName: そうか……残りの分は、それこそ マルドゥック社や准教授に期待って訳だな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……残りの分は、それこそ
マルドゥック社や准教授に期待って訳だな。

engChrName: More or less, yes. Though, to be frank, what Olympia said earlier still lingers in my mind.
engSearchText:
More or less, yes. Though, to be frank, what Olympia
said earlier still lingers in my mind.
jpnChrName: そうですね…… 人形使いの彼女にも言われましたが。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……
人形使いの彼女にも言われましたが。

engChrName: She described my body as artificial, incapable of feeling anything genuinely.
engSearchText:
She described my body as artificial, incapable of
feeling anything genuinely.
jpnChrName: わたくしの身体はあくまでも “本物”を知る事ができない作り物です。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしの身体はあくまでも
“本物”を知る事ができない作り物です。

engChrName: And that it might be the reason I endlessly aspire for the real thing, forever unable to attain it.
engSearchText:
And that it might be the reason I endlessly aspire for
the real thing, forever unable to attain it.
jpnChrName: だからこそ、どうしようもなく “本物”に憧れてしまう……
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ、どうしようもなく
“本物”に憧れてしまう……

engChrName: Although 'aspire' is perhaps a rather...noble way to describe it. More than I might deserve.
engSearchText:
Although 'aspire' is perhaps a rather...noble way to
describe it. More than I might deserve.
jpnChrName: 贅沢な考え方だとは思いますが。
jpnSearchText: 贅沢な考え方だとは思いますが。

engChrName: Hmm... I understand why havin' somethin' feeling real would be such a big deal for you.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I understand why havin' somethin' feeling
real would be such a big deal for you.
jpnChrName: “本物”か…… 拘っちまうのは仕方ないだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
“本物”か……
拘っちまうのは仕方ないだろうが。

engChrName: But she's trying to compare you to that doll of hers, and that's where she's wrong. What your body feels is just as real as what anybody else feels.
engSearchText:
But she's trying to compare you to that doll of hers,
and that's where she's wrong. What your body feels is
just as real as what anybody else feels.
jpnChrName: ──だがお前さんが感じ取ってるモンも、 間違いなく“本物”なんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
──だがお前さんが感じ取ってるモンも、
間違いなく“本物”なんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: How do you mean...?
engSearchText: How do you mean...?

engChrName: Let's see... You know how if you try to tickle someone, some people are fine with it, but others can't stand it?
engSearchText:
Let's see... You know how if you try to tickle
someone, some people are fine with it, but others
can't stand it?
jpnChrName: 例えばそうだな……くすぐられて 平気なヤツもいればダメなやつもいるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
例えばそうだな……くすぐられて
平気なヤツもいればダメなやつもいるだろ。

engChrName: And both of those responses are fine, yeah? Can't say either of them is right or wrong for feeling what they feel.
engSearchText:
And both of those responses are fine, yeah? Can't say
either of them is right or wrong for feeling what
they feel.
jpnChrName: だが、どっちの感覚に正しいも間違いもねえ。
jpnSearchText: だが、どっちの感覚に正しいも間違いもねえ。

engChrName: And it's not 'cause their bodies are fake or whatever. It's just each of them havin' a different perception of the same thing.
engSearchText:
And it's not 'cause their bodies are fake or whatever.
It's just each of them havin' a different perception of
the same thing.
jpnChrName: それは“生身”だからか？ ……本人が“そう感じた”からだろ。
jpnSearchText:
それは“生身”だからか？
……本人が“そう感じた”からだろ。

engChrName: Eh... Yeah, okay. Bad example. There's a reason I'm a spriggan and not a writer. I'm no good at this shit.
engSearchText:
Eh... Yeah, okay. Bad example. There's a reason I'm a
spriggan and not a writer. I'm no good at this shit.
jpnChrName: あー、上手く言えねえが、 つまり俺が言いたかったのはだな……
jpnSearchText:
あー、上手く言えねえが、
つまり俺が言いたかったのはだな……

engChrName: Point is, 'real' is what you make of it. If what you sense feels genuine to you, then it's real. Prosthetics or not.
engSearchText:
Point is, 'real' is what you make of it. If what you
sense feels genuine to you, then it's real.
Prosthetics or not.
jpnChrName: 例え“再現”されたものだったとしても、 お前さんがそう感じたなら“本物”っつう事さ。
jpnSearchText:
例え“再現”されたものだったとしても、
お前さんがそう感じたなら“本物”っつう事さ。

engChrName: You catch my drift?
engSearchText: You catch my drift?
jpnChrName: 分かったか？
jpnSearchText: 分かったか？

engChrName: That I do. Loud and clear.
engSearchText: That I do. Loud and clear.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……ええ、 それはもうしっかりと。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……ええ、
それはもうしっかりと。

engChrName: You're right. Perhaps I was too fixated on the difference between a 'real' body and mine. But my feelings are my own, and I shouldn't doubt them.
engSearchText:
You're right. Perhaps I was too fixated on the
difference between a 'real' body and mine. But my
feelings are my own, and I shouldn't doubt them.
jpnChrName: 生身と機械の身体…… そこに拘り過ぎていたのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
生身と機械の身体……
そこに拘り過ぎていたのかもしれません。

engChrName: If I might offer a few words, moments such as this remind me of something else that feels just as real to me.
engSearchText:
If I might offer a few words, moments such as this
remind me of something else that feels just as real
to me.
jpnChrName: では、わたくしからも一つ── どうかお忘れなきよう。
jpnSearchText:
では、わたくしからも一つ──
どうかお忘れなきよう。

engChrName: And it's the place that you occupy in my life, Van, as well as those of everyone else. It's genuine to me.
engSearchText:
And it's the place that you occupy in my life, Van, as
well as those of everyone else. It's genuine to me.
jpnChrName: わたくしにとっても、 もちろんアニエス様たちにとっても……
jpnSearchText:
わたくしにとっても、
もちろんアニエス様たちにとっても……

engChrName: To me, you're not just 'Mr. Arkride,' our boss. You're precious to me—to us. I'll forever be grateful to have you in my life. Never forget that.
engSearchText:
To me, you're not just 'Mr. Arkride,' our boss.
You're precious to me—to us. I'll forever be grateful
to have you in my life. Never forget that.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様が手放し難い “本物”であることは間違いありませんから。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様が手放し難い
“本物”であることは間違いありませんから。

engChrName: ...Heh, I don't even know what to say to that. You've changed—for the better. It's nice seein' you talk like that.
engSearchText:
...Heh, I don't even know what to say to that.
You've changed—for the better. It's nice seein' you
talk like that.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、ンなことを言い出すとは お前さんも変わったもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、ンなことを言い出すとは
お前さんも変わったもんだ。

engChrName: But thanks. I promise I'll always keep that in mind.
engSearchText: But thanks. I promise I'll always keep that in mind.
jpnChrName: だがまあ── ありがたく受け取っておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ──
ありがたく受け取っておくぜ。

engChrName: After that, Van and Risette continued to relax at the office for a short while longer.
engSearchText:
After that, Van and Risette continued to relax at the
office for a short while longer.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンとリゼットは 事務所でしばしの休憩を挟み……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンとリゼットは
事務所でしばしの休憩を挟み……

engChrName: Shortly after, they decided to return to patrolling the city.
engSearchText:
Shortly after, they decided to return to patrolling
the city.
jpnChrName: 再び首都の巡回へと戻るのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>再び首都の巡回へと戻るのだった。

engChrName: Hey. You're working late.
engSearchText: Hey. You're working late.
jpnChrName: よう、精が出るな。
jpnSearchText: よう、精が出るな。

engChrName: Oh. Hi, Van. Care for some stargazing tonight?
engSearchText: Oh. Hi, Van. Care for some stargazing tonight?
jpnChrName: あれ、ヴァンさん？ もしかして天体観測に興味ある？
jpnSearchText:
あれ、ヴァンさん？
もしかして天体観測に興味ある？

engChrName: Sure, why not? I heard you were up here, so I thought I'd come and watch with you.
engSearchText:
Sure, why not? I heard you were up here, so I thought
I'd come and watch with you.
jpnChrName: ああ、お前がやるって 聞いてたから見物がてらな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、お前がやるって
聞いてたから見物がてらな。

engChrName: Especially 'cause I didn't get the chance back in Basel, since we were so busy.
engSearchText:
Especially 'cause I didn't get the chance back in Basel,
since we were so busy.
jpnChrName: 理科大学にあったデカいのも タイミングを逃しちまったし。
jpnSearchText:
理科大学にあったデカいのも
タイミングを逃しちまったし。

engChrName: You could've just said something. No offense, but adults have such a strange habit of keeping those things to themselves sometimes.
engSearchText:
You could've just said something. No offense, but
adults have such a strange habit of keeping those
things to themselves sometimes.
jpnChrName: なんだ、その時から興味あったんだ？ 大人って変な所で恰好つけるよね。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、その時から興味あったんだ？
大人って変な所で恰好つけるよね。

engChrName: Anyway, your timing is perfect. I just finished setting up the telescope.
engSearchText:
Anyway, your timing is perfect. I just finished setting
up the telescope.
jpnChrName: まあいいけど──望遠鏡の準備も、 ちょうど今終わったところだよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいけど──望遠鏡の準備も、
ちょうど今終わったところだよ。

engChrName: That's the one you keep in your room, right? Looks pretty old. Had it for a while?
engSearchText:
That's the one you keep in your room, right?
Looks pretty old. Had it for a while?
jpnChrName: 部屋に置いてるヤツか。 昔から使ってるみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
部屋に置いてるヤツか。
昔から使ってるみたいだな？

engChrName: Yeah. I used it all the time when I was at the professor's house.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I used it all the time when I was at the
professor's house.
jpnChrName: うん、博士の家で 気軽に見たい時に使ってたかな。
jpnSearchText:
うん、博士の家で
気軽に見たい時に使ってたかな。

engChrName: It doesn't hold a candle to the one in the observatory in terms of how much you can see, of course.
engSearchText:
It doesn't hold a candle to the one in the observatory
in terms of how much you can see, of course.
jpnChrName: あの大望遠鏡に比べれば 頼りなく見えるかもしれないけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの大望遠鏡に比べれば
頼りなく見えるかもしれないけど……

engChrName: But it's good enough for some casual stargazing, which is why I still have it.
engSearchText:
But it's good enough for some casual stargazing,
which is why I still have it.
jpnChrName: 簡単な天体観測をするには 十分な性能があると思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
簡単な天体観測をするには
十分な性能があると思うよ。

engChrName: Want to check it out?
engSearchText: Want to check it out?
jpnChrName: さっそく使ってみる？
jpnSearchText: さっそく使ってみる？

engChrName: Sure. You'll have to teach me how to use it, though. Never used one of these guys.
engSearchText:
Sure. You'll have to teach me how to use it, though.
Never used one of these guys.
jpnChrName: ああ──でもどうやって操作すりゃいいんだ？
jpnSearchText: ああ──でもどうやって操作すりゃいいんだ？

engChrName: That's fine. I'll demonstrate for you. Stand right next to me.
engSearchText:
That's fine. I'll demonstrate for you. Stand right next
to me.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、まず手本を見せるよ。 こっちに来て。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、まず手本を見せるよ。
こっちに来て。

engChrName: Just have to bring it into focus and...there.
engSearchText: Just have to bring it into focus and...there.
jpnChrName: ──ピントを合わせて……と。
jpnSearchText: ──ピントを合わせて……と。

engChrName: I lined it up with the first star in the Great Schedar Triangle. Have a look.
engSearchText:
I lined it up with the first star in the Great
Schedar Triangle. Have a look.
jpnChrName: “シェダル大三角形”の一番星に 合わせてみたよ──どうぞ、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText:
“シェダル大三角形”の一番星に
合わせてみたよ──どうぞ、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Awesome. Let's check out that bad boy.
engSearchText: Awesome. Let's check out that bad boy.
jpnChrName: そうか、どれどれ──
jpnSearchText: そうか、どれどれ──

engChrName: (Oh. His face is...really close.)
engSearchText: (Oh. His face is...really close.)
jpnChrName: （この体勢だと顔が近いな……）
jpnSearchText: （この体勢だと顔が近いな……）

engChrName: Man, that's neat. You can barely see it with the naked eye.
engSearchText:
Man, that's neat. You can barely see it with the
naked eye.
jpnChrName: おお……なるほど。 たしかに肉眼で見るのとは違うな。
jpnSearchText:
おお……なるほど。
たしかに肉眼で見るのとは違うな。

engChrName: Still looks a little blurry to me, though. Should I try twisting the dial like you did?
engSearchText:
Still looks a little blurry to me, though. Should I try
twisting the dial like you did?
jpnChrName: だが、まだちょっとぼやけてるな。 こういう場合は、ダイヤルを調整するんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
だが、まだちょっとぼやけてるな。
こういう場合は、ダイヤルを調整するんだったか？

engChrName: ...Uh, Quatre?
engSearchText: ...Uh, Quatre?
jpnChrName: ……ってカトル？
jpnSearchText: ……ってカトル？

engChrName: Th-That's okay! You just keep looking! I'll turn the dial for you!
engSearchText:
Th-That's okay! You just keep looking! I'll turn the
dial for you!
jpnChrName: あ、ああもういいから覗いてて！ ダイヤルはこっちで調整するから！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ああもういいから覗いてて！
ダイヤルはこっちで調整するから！

engChrName: How is it now? Can you see it any better?
engSearchText: How is it now? Can you see it any better?
jpnChrName: どう、少しは良くなったんじゃない？
jpnSearchText: どう、少しは良くなったんじゃない？

engChrName: Oooh, now we're in business. You can see so much more detail like this.
engSearchText:
Oooh, now we're in business. You can see so much
more detail like this.
jpnChrName: おお、今度は良く見えるぜ。 なるほど、これがな……
jpnSearchText:
おお、今度は良く見えるぜ。
なるほど、これがな……

engChrName: All I could see before was it just twinklin' away in the sky.
engSearchText:
All I could see before was it just twinklin' away in
the sky.
jpnChrName: 普通じゃ瞬いてるのが辛うじて 判るくらいだが……
jpnSearchText:
普通じゃ瞬いてるのが辛うじて
判るくらいだが……

engChrName: You didn't make it sound like this telescope was anything special, but I can even see the star wobblin', kinda like a desert's heat haze.
engSearchText:
You didn't make it sound like this telescope was
anything special, but I can even see the star wobblin',
kinda like a desert's heat haze.
jpnChrName: こうして見ると陽炎みたいに 揺らいでいるってのもよくわかるな。
jpnSearchText:
こうして見ると陽炎みたいに
揺らいでいるってのもよくわかるな。

engChrName: You typically only observe that in constellation stars specifically.
engSearchText:
You typically only observe that in constellation
stars specifically.
jpnChrName: うん、それが星座を構成する星の特徴かな。
jpnSearchText: うん、それが星座を構成する星の特徴かな。

engChrName: Stars that don't form part of a constellation don't have that. Their shimmer is less pronounced, and they move more irregularly. And also...
engSearchText:
Stars that don't form part of a constellation don't
have that. Their shimmer is less pronounced, and
they move more irregularly. And also...
jpnChrName: 動きが不規則で星座にならない星には、 光ったり瞬いたりしないものもあるけど──
jpnSearchText:
動きが不規則で星座にならない星には、
光ったり瞬いたりしないものもあるけど──

engChrName: Van continued admiring different stars as he and Quatre talked about telescopes and other subjects in astronomy.
engSearchText:
Van continued admiring different stars as he and
Quatre talked about telescopes and other subjects
in astronomy.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンはカトルから望遠鏡や天文学の話を 聞きながら、いくつかの星を観察したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンはカトルから望遠鏡や天文学の話を
聞きながら、いくつかの星を観察したのだった。

engChrName: I'll admit, I hadn't ever really given much thought to this sort of thing until now.
engSearchText:
I'll admit, I hadn't ever really given much thought to
this sort of thing until now.
jpnChrName: こういうのには あまり縁がないと思っていたが……
jpnSearchText:
こういうのには
あまり縁がないと思っていたが……

engChrName: But stars are pretty cool to look at, aren't they?
engSearchText: But stars are pretty cool to look at, aren't they?
jpnChrName: いざやってみると、 なかなか見応えがあるもんだな。
jpnSearchText:
いざやってみると、
なかなか見応えがあるもんだな。

engChrName: Oh, absolutely!
engSearchText: Oh, absolutely!
jpnChrName: でしょ？
jpnSearchText: でしょ？

engChrName: If you're interested in learning more about astronomy, I've got some books I'd be happy to lend you.
engSearchText:
If you're interested in learning more about astronomy,
I've got some books I'd be happy to lend you.
jpnChrName: 天文学に興味が出てきたなら いくつか本を貸してあげようか？
jpnSearchText:
天文学に興味が出てきたなら
いくつか本を貸してあげようか？

engChrName: There's one that Gran wrote a long time ago that I'd definitely rec—
engSearchText:
There's one that Gran wrote a long time ago that I'd
definitely rec—
jpnChrName: やっぱりオススメは 昔グランマが書いた本で──
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりオススメは
昔グランマが書いた本で──

engChrName: Whoa, slow down, sport. How about I get the recommended reads some other time?
engSearchText:
Whoa, slow down, sport. How about I get the
recommended reads some other time?
jpnChrName: ストップ、その話はまた今度でいい。
jpnSearchText: ストップ、その話はまた今度でいい。

engChrName: I see the glimmer in those eyes. If we start right now, we're not gonna be done till we can't even see the stars anymore.
engSearchText:
I see the glimmer in those eyes. If we start right now,
we're not gonna be done till we can't even see the
stars anymore.
jpnChrName: 語り始めたら夜明けまで止まらなくなりそうな 気配がプンプンするしな。
jpnSearchText:
語り始めたら夜明けまで止まらなくなりそうな
気配がプンプンするしな。

engChrName: Hmph. Okay... Next time.
engSearchText: Hmph. Okay... Next time.
jpnChrName: むう……じゃあまた今度ね。
jpnSearchText: むう……じゃあまた今度ね。

engChrName: But I can see you're real passionate about stargazing. When did you start?
engSearchText:
But I can see you're real passionate about stargazing.
When did you start?
jpnChrName: ハッ、しかし本当に 星を見るのが好きなんだな？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、しかし本当に
星を見るのが好きなんだな？

engChrName: It's all thanks to Gran. She's the one that introduced me to engineering and academia in the first place.
engSearchText:
It's all thanks to Gran. She's the one that introduced
me to engineering and academia in the first place.
jpnChrName: 僕は……グランマの元で、 学問や技術の意義を学んで来たからね。
jpnSearchText:
僕は……グランマの元で、
学問や技術の意義を学んで来たからね。

engChrName: She taught me that an engineer's priority is the betterment of lives. And that we uncover the true ways of the world only through academia.
engSearchText:
She taught me that an engineer's priority is the
betterment of lives. And that we uncover the true
ways of the world only through academia.
jpnChrName: 技術を人のために使う事、女神が司る世界の 摂理を解き明かす学問の営み──
jpnSearchText:
技術を人のために使う事、女神が司る世界の
摂理を解き明かす学問の営み──

engChrName: And I've always believed in that. I always believed that I wanted to devote myself to them wholeheartedly, just like Gran has.
engSearchText:
And I've always believed in that. I always believed
that I wanted to devote myself to them
wholeheartedly, just like Gran has.
jpnChrName: 僕はそれを信じたいし、グランマと同じように 学問や技術と向き合っていきたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
僕はそれを信じたいし、グランマと同じように
学問や技術と向き合っていきたいんだ。

engChrName: With any luck, I hoped I could even come to terms with myself, and truly understand the meaning of my own existence.
engSearchText:
With any luck, I hoped I could even come to terms
with myself, and truly understand the meaning of my
own existence.
jpnChrName: それが、僕自身の実存を知る事にも 繋がるはずだから──
jpnSearchText:
それが、僕自身の実存を知る事にも
繋がるはずだから──

engChrName: But...I haven't felt as strongly recently. Seeing engineering be used to bring harm to other people is...disheartening, to say the least.
engSearchText:
But...I haven't felt as strongly recently.
Seeing engineering be used to bring harm to other
people is...disheartening, to say the least.
jpnChrName: ……最近、技術が人を傷つけうるという事を 目の当たりにしたのは、少しショックだったけど。
jpnSearchText:
……最近、技術が人を傷つけうるという事を
目の当たりにしたのは、少しショックだったけど。

engChrName: You mean those nuclear weapons? Or are you talkin' about the Geneses?
engSearchText:
You mean those nuclear weapons? Or are you
talkin' about the Geneses?
jpnChrName: 反応兵器──いや、ゲネシスもか。
jpnSearchText: 反応兵器──いや、ゲネシスもか。

engChrName: Both. The invention of something as terrible as nuclear weapons has called those beliefs into question in the first place.
engSearchText:
Both. The invention of something as terrible as
nuclear weapons has called those beliefs into question
in the first place.
jpnChrName: 反応兵器という悪魔の発明には、 改めて学問や技術の意義を考えさせられた。
jpnSearchText:
反応兵器という悪魔の発明には、
改めて学問や技術の意義を考えさせられた。

engChrName: But the Geneses... I can't help it. They bother me. They're prototype orbments, but they've gone from tools of observation to tools of destruction.
engSearchText:
But the Geneses... I can't help it. They bother me.
They're prototype orbments, but they've gone from
tools of observation to tools of destruction.
jpnChrName: でも──その悪夢に利用されていた《ゲネシス》は 元は世界を観測するための原型導力器な訳で……
jpnSearchText:
でも──その悪夢に利用されていた《ゲネシス》は
元は世界を観測するための原型導力器な訳で……

engChrName: It makes me wonder... What sort of world was it that Professor Epstein wanted to learn about?
engSearchText:
It makes me wonder... What sort of world was it that
Professor Epstein wanted to learn about?
jpnChrName: だったら、エプスタイン博士が観測しようとした “世界”って何だったのかなって。
jpnSearchText:
だったら、エプスタイン博士が観測しようとした
“世界”って何だったのかなって。

engChrName: I got this telescope from Gran a long while ago, but I never forgot what she told me when she gave it to me.
engSearchText:
I got this telescope from Gran a long while ago, but I
never forgot what she told me when she gave it to me.
jpnChrName: この望遠鏡、随分前にグランマが僕に 買ってくれたものなんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この望遠鏡、随分前にグランマが僕に
買ってくれたものなんだ。

engChrName: 'Astronomy is the foundation of all learning. Use this as your foundation, and start thinking and reflecting on such matters for yourself.'
engSearchText:
'Astronomy is the foundation of all learning. Use this
as your foundation, and start thinking and reflecting
on such matters for yourself.'
jpnChrName: 天文学が全ての学問の基礎になったように、 カトルもここから色々考えて始めると良いって。
jpnSearchText:
天文学が全ての学問の基礎になったように、
カトルもここから色々考えて始めると良いって。

engChrName: I think I get it. Astronomy's about examining Aidios' miracles through a scientific lens, the ultimate goal bein' to learn more about our world.
engSearchText:
I think I get it. Astronomy's about examining Aidios'
miracles through a scientific lens, the ultimate goal
bein' to learn more about our world.
jpnChrName: 天文学……女神の奇蹟を“科学的に”観測して 世界を知るってのが本質だったか。
jpnSearchText:
天文学……女神の奇蹟を“科学的に”観測して
世界を知るってのが本質だったか。

engChrName: Van... Can I ask how you felt tonight? Looking up at the stars through my telescope. What did you think of?
engSearchText:
Van... Can I ask how you felt tonight? Looking up at
the stars through my telescope. What did you
think of?
jpnChrName: それで……ヴァンさんはどう思った？ この望遠鏡で、天体観測をしてみて。
jpnSearchText:
それで……ヴァンさんはどう思った？
この望遠鏡で、天体観測をしてみて。

engChrName: Hmm... If I had to put it into words, then...
engSearchText: Hmm... If I had to put it into words, then...
jpnChrName: ……敢えて言えばそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……敢えて言えばそうだな。

engChrName: ...the sheer size of what's out there. It's so hard to wrap your head around, you can't describe it as anything short of a miracle.
engSearchText:
...the sheer size of what's out there. It's so hard to
wrap your head around, you can't describe it as
anything short of a miracle.
jpnChrName: あの壮大なスケール……奇蹟って言われんのも しっくり来ると思ったし……
jpnSearchText:
あの壮大なスケール……奇蹟って言われんのも
しっくり来ると思ったし……

engChrName: It just puts things to perspective. You can't help but feel tiny, lookin' up at the night sky. Like small change in the grand scale of things.
engSearchText:
It just puts things to perspective. You can't help but
feel tiny, lookin' up at the night sky. Like small
change in the grand scale of things.
jpnChrName: あんな星空の下で営みを続けている人間も、 こうして見ればちっぽけなモンだと感じたな。
jpnSearchText:
あんな星空の下で営みを続けている人間も、
こうして見ればちっぽけなモンだと感じたな。

engChrName: Pfft. Haha, ahahahahaha!
engSearchText: Pfft. Haha, ahahahahaha!
jpnChrName: ……ふふっ、はははは……
jpnSearchText: ……ふふっ、はははは……

engChrName: Well, sorry if it was too cliché for you or whatever. It's just how I felt. ...Okay, you can stop laughing now.
engSearchText:
Well, sorry if it was too cliché for you or whatever.
It's just how I felt. ...Okay, you can stop
laughing now.
jpnChrName: チッ、悪かったな……ありきたりな感想でよ。 てか、笑うほどかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
チッ、悪かったな……ありきたりな感想でよ。
てか、笑うほどかよ！？

engChrName: Ahaha, I'm sorry. I'm not making fun of you. You're just the only person I know who'd word it quite like that.
engSearchText:
Ahaha, I'm sorry. I'm not making fun of you.
You're just the only person I know who'd word it
quite like that.
jpnChrName: はは、ううん…… ヴァンさんらしいなって。
jpnSearchText:
はは、ううん……
ヴァンさんらしいなって。

engChrName: I've always looked at the world through a researcher's eyes, all while trying my best to follow in Gran's footsteps.
engSearchText:
I've always looked at the world through a researcher's
eyes, all while trying my best to follow in
Gran's footsteps.
jpnChrName: ……僕はこれまで、研究者としてグランマの 後を追いながら世界を見てきたけど……
jpnSearchText:
……僕はこれまで、研究者としてグランマの
後を追いながら世界を見てきたけど……

engChrName: Sometimes I worry if those ideals are holding me captive, if I'm missing the forest for the trees. Or the galaxy for the stars, in this case.
engSearchText:
Sometimes I worry if those ideals are holding me
captive, if I'm missing the forest for the trees. Or the
galaxy for the stars, in this case.
jpnChrName: どこか理想に囚われているというか…… 何か、目が曇っていないか不安になってね。
jpnSearchText:
どこか理想に囚われているというか……
何か、目が曇っていないか不安になってね。

engChrName: You know much more about the world than I do, Van. Not just the superficial stuff. I wanted to know what someone like you saw in those same stars.
engSearchText:
You know much more about the world than I
do, Van. Not just the superficial stuff. I wanted to
know what someone like you saw in those same stars.
jpnChrName: それで、“裏”と“表”を知っている ヴァンさんにはこの星空がどう見えるか──
jpnSearchText:
それで、“裏”と“表”を知っている
ヴァンさんにはこの星空がどう見えるか──

engChrName: Hearing you say that was a relief.
engSearchText: Hearing you say that was a relief.
jpnChrName: それが知れて、良かった気がする。
jpnSearchText: それが知れて、良かった気がする。

engChrName: What you and I see isn't so dissimilar.
engSearchText: What you and I see isn't so dissimilar.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんにも、 僕と同じ世界が確かに見えている。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんにも、
僕と同じ世界が確かに見えている。

engChrName: And if someone like you sees that, too, then I'm not as lost as I thought I was.
engSearchText:
And if someone like you sees that, too, then I'm not
as lost as I thought I was.
jpnChrName: ならきっと、僕の目は曇っていない── グランマと同じ世界に挑み続けても良いんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ならきっと、僕の目は曇っていない──
グランマと同じ世界に挑み続けても良いんだ。

engChrName: I can still try to follow in Gran's path. I haven't lost sight of it yet. What you said helped reassure me of that.
engSearchText:
I can still try to follow in Gran's path. I haven't lost
sight of it yet. What you said helped reassure me
of that.
jpnChrName: なんとなく、そう思えたから。
jpnSearchText: なんとなく、そう思えたから。

engChrName: Heh. That's a lot to take away from my dumb ass, but sure.
engSearchText:
Heh. That's a lot to take away from my dumb ass,
but sure.
jpnChrName: ハッ………
jpnSearchText: ハッ………

engChrName: Though whether you and I see things the same way or not, if you love and cherish what YOU see, even after everything you've studied...
engSearchText:
Though whether you and I see things the same way
or not, if you love and cherish what YOU see, even
after everything you've studied...
jpnChrName: 世界がどう見えようと、お前がその学問を 通して見えた世界が愛おしいと思うなら──
jpnSearchText:
世界がどう見えようと、お前がその学問を
通して見えた世界が愛おしいと思うなら──

engChrName: ...then that's your world, Quatre. And no one can take that away from you.
engSearchText:
...then that's your world, Quatre. And no one can
take that away from you.
jpnChrName: それが、お前が向き合う世界って事で 良いんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
それが、お前が向き合う世界って事で
良いんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: ...You know, Van?
engSearchText: ...You know, Van?

engChrName: I think you're right. I'm only who I am today thanks to Gran and everyone else in my life.
engSearchText:
I think you're right. I'm only who I am today thanks
to Gran and everyone else in my life.
jpnChrName: ……そうだね……今の僕には、 グランマも他の皆もいる。
jpnSearchText:
……そうだね……今の僕には、
グランマも他の皆もいる。

engChrName: With everyone's help, we can make sure technology's used to finally grasp the truths in the world all around us.
engSearchText:
With everyone's help, we can make sure technology's
used to finally grasp the truths in the world all
around us.
jpnChrName: その中で、皆と一緒に技術を役立てて、 摂理を追究する事が出来る……
jpnSearchText:
その中で、皆と一緒に技術を役立てて、
摂理を追究する事が出来る……

engChrName: That is the world I live in, and want to continue living in. I wouldn't have it any other way.
engSearchText:
That is the world I live in, and want to continue
living in. I wouldn't have it any other way.
jpnChrName: これ以外の世界なんて……考えられないな。
jpnSearchText: これ以外の世界なんて……考えられないな。

engChrName: Then it sounds to me like you've got nothin' to worry about. You're exactly right where you should be.
engSearchText:
Then it sounds to me like you've got nothin' to
worry about. You're exactly right where you
should be.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ならもう迷う事もねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ならもう迷う事もねぇだろ。

engChrName: Quatre, Van! There you two boys are!
engSearchText: Quatre, Van! There you two boys are!
jpnChrName: カトル君、ヴァン君も。 ここにいたんだ～。
jpnSearchText:
カトル君、ヴァン君も。
ここにいたんだ～。

engChrName: You must be AAAWFULLY close if you're spending time alone looking at the stars together, heehee.
engSearchText:
You must be AAAWFULLY close if you're spending
time alone looking at the stars together, heehee.
jpnChrName: えへへ、二人きりで天体観測なんて 仲が良くていいね～。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、二人きりで天体観測なんて
仲が良くていいね～。

engChrName: Umm, it's not like that! Really!
engSearchText: Umm, it's not like that! Really!
jpnChrName: べ、別にそんなんじゃないから！
jpnSearchText: べ、別にそんなんじゃないから！

engChrName: Haha. Sorry for hoggin' him all night.
engSearchText: Haha. Sorry for hoggin' him all night.
jpnChrName: ハハ、弟弟子を 独り占めしちまったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、弟弟子を
独り占めしちまったみたいだな。

engChrName: You definitely did, you little thief, you. What have you two been talking about, hmm?
engSearchText:
You definitely did, you little thief, you. What have
you two been talking about, hmm?
jpnChrName: 二人で何の話をしていたの～？
jpnSearchText: 二人で何の話をしていたの～？

engChrName: N-Nothing much, really. Just small talk. Nothing that would interest you, Essy.
engSearchText:
N-Nothing much, really. Just small talk. Nothing that
would interest you, Essy.
jpnChrName: ううん、大したことのない── 当たり前で他愛もない話だよ。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、大したことのない──
当たり前で他愛もない話だよ。

engChrName: Esmeray happily joined them and, together, the three of them kept chatting and looking at the stars, if only for a while longer.
engSearchText:
