Esmeray happily joined them and, together, the three
of them kept chatting and looking at the stars, if only
for a while longer.
jpnChrName: その後、エスメレーも加えて しばしの間天体観測を楽しんだのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、エスメレーも加えて
しばしの間天体観測を楽しんだのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Thanks for letting me borrow this. There's this movie I've been dying to watch again.
engSearchText:
Thanks for letting me borrow this. There's this movie
I've been dying to watch again.
jpnChrName: サンキュ、貸してくれて助かるわ。 ちょうど観たい映画があってね。
jpnSearchText:
サンキュ、貸してくれて助かるわ。
ちょうど観たい映画があってね。

engChrName: Don't mention it. I don't mind lending it to you while we don't have anything going on.
engSearchText:
Don't mention it. I don't mind lending it to you while
we don't have anything going on.
jpnChrName: ま、仕事用だが 休憩時間だし別にいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、仕事用だが
休憩時間だし別にいいだろ。

engChrName: Just don't break it or anything. I've got a lot of files on there I'd rather not lose.
engSearchText:
Just don't break it or anything. I've got a lot of files
on there I'd rather not lose.
jpnChrName: 大事な資料とかが入ってるから、 うっかり壊すなよ？
jpnSearchText:
大事な資料とかが入ってるから、
うっかり壊すなよ？

engChrName: I can handle electronics just fine. I'm not Feri, you know.
engSearchText:
I can handle electronics just fine. I'm not Feri,
you know.
jpnChrName: 別に機械音痴じゃないから 余計な心配はしなくていいわよ。
jpnSearchText:
別に機械音痴じゃないから
余計な心配はしなくていいわよ。

engChrName: And don't worry. I won't tell anyone if I find your search history by accident.
engSearchText:
And don't worry. I won't tell anyone if I find your
search history by accident.
jpnChrName: 人に言えないような検索履歴を見ても 誰にも言わないから安心してちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
人に言えないような検索履歴を見ても
誰にも言わないから安心してちょうだい。

engChrName: ...On second thought, give it back.
engSearchText: ...On second thought, give it back.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり返してもらおうか？
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱり返してもらおうか？

engChrName: I'm kidding, Van! Relax.
engSearchText: I'm kidding, Van! Relax.
jpnChrName: 冗談よ、冗談。
jpnSearchText: 冗談よ、冗談。

engChrName: Anyway, why don't you stay here and watch the movie with me?
engSearchText:
Anyway, why don't you stay here and watch the
movie with me?
jpnChrName: それより……良かったら ここでアンタも一緒に観ない？
jpnSearchText:
それより……良かったら
ここでアンタも一緒に観ない？

engChrName: You don't mind the company?
engSearchText: You don't mind the company?
jpnChrName: いいのか？
jpnSearchText: いいのか？

engChrName: Not at all. And it's a really good movie.
engSearchText: Not at all. And it's a really good movie.
jpnChrName: うん、すっごくいい映画でね。
jpnSearchText: うん、すっごくいい映画でね。

engChrName: But word of warning: It's kind of an oldie, so it might be a bit boring for you.
engSearchText:
But word of warning: It's kind of an oldie, so it might
be a bit boring for you.
jpnChrName: 結構古い作品だし、 もしかしたら退屈かもしれないけど。
jpnSearchText:
結構古い作品だし、
もしかしたら退屈かもしれないけど。

engChrName: Eh, I think I can trust Calvard's biggest actress' taste in movies.
engSearchText:
Eh, I think I can trust Calvard's biggest actress' taste
in movies.
jpnChrName: ……いや、他ならぬ トップ女優のオススメだ。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、他ならぬ
トップ女優のオススメだ。

engChrName: All right, move over. Let's see what you've got.
engSearchText: All right, move over. Let's see what you've got.
jpnChrName: せっかくだから同席させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: せっかくだから同席させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Huh. I think I recognize this.
engSearchText: Huh. I think I recognize this.
jpnChrName: こいつは……
jpnSearchText: こいつは……

engChrName: Oh, you do? We can watch something else if you want.
engSearchText:
Oh, you do? We can watch something else if
you want.
jpnChrName: なんだ、観たことがあるんだ。 なんなら他のにする？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、観たことがあるんだ。
なんなら他のにする？

engChrName: ...Nah. Today's a good day to watch this one.
engSearchText: ...Nah. Today's a good day to watch this one.
jpnChrName: ……いや、今日はこれがいい。
jpnSearchText: ……いや、今日はこれがいい。

engChrName: That's good, 'cause I'm really in the mood to see it today.
engSearchText:
That's good, 'cause I'm really in the mood to see
it today.
jpnChrName: そうね…… あたしも、今日はこれが観たい気分。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……
あたしも、今日はこれが観たい気分。

engChrName: The two of them settled in and started watching the movie together.
engSearchText:
The two of them settled in and started watching the
movie together.
jpnChrName: それから、二人はゆっくりと映画を鑑賞し……
jpnSearchText: <C1>それから、二人はゆっくりと映画を鑑賞し……

engChrName: Eventually, the last of the credits rolled on screen as music played quietly in the background.
engSearchText:
Eventually, the last of the credits rolled on screen as
music played quietly in the background.
jpnChrName: やがて静かに流れるＢＧＭと共に、 最後のクレジットが流れ終わった。
jpnSearchText:
やがて静かに流れるＢＧＭと共に、
最後のクレジットが流れ終わった。

engChrName: Yup. Still a good movie.
engSearchText: Yup. Still a good movie.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり、いい映画だな。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱり、いい映画だな。

engChrName: This one first came out 20 years ago, yeah? Man, it's been a while. Motion pictures were still new back then.
engSearchText:
This one first came out 20 years ago, yeah? Man, it's
been a while. Motion pictures were still new
back then.
jpnChrName: ２０年くらい前── 導力映画黎明期に公開されたんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
２０年くらい前──
導力映画黎明期に公開されたんだったか。

engChrName: Uh-huh. I was barely a toddler when it came out.
engSearchText: Uh-huh. I was barely a toddler when it came out.
jpnChrName: ええ、まだあたしも 物心ついてない時代の作品……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、まだあたしも
物心ついてない時代の作品……

engChrName: I watched one of its theatrical reruns with Mom back in the day, but even that was a while ago.
engSearchText:
I watched one of its theatrical reruns with Mom back
in the day, but even that was a while ago.
jpnChrName: 昔、リバイバル上映があって、 ママと観に行ったのが最初だった。
jpnSearchText:
昔、リバイバル上映があって、
ママと観に行ったのが最初だった。

engChrName: Watching it again, I'm pretty confident in it being one of my all time faves.
engSearchText:
Watching it again, I'm pretty confident in it being
one of my all time faves.
jpnChrName: 今じゃ、あたしが 最も好きな映画の一つだわ。
jpnSearchText:
今じゃ、あたしが
最も好きな映画の一つだわ。

engChrName: Not what I would've pinned for your favorite, but a masterpiece will always be a masterpiece.
engSearchText:
Not what I would've pinned for your favorite, but a
masterpiece will always be a masterpiece.
jpnChrName: はっ、ちょいと意外な気もするが…… 分かるぜ、名作中の名作だしな。
jpnSearchText:
はっ、ちょいと意外な気もするが……
分かるぜ、名作中の名作だしな。

engChrName: It's kind of a strange romance story, set in a quiet little country town.
engSearchText:
It's kind of a strange romance story, set in a quiet
little country town.
jpnChrName: のどかな田舎町を舞台とした ちょっとおかしなラブストーリー。
jpnSearchText:
のどかな田舎町を舞台とした
ちょっとおかしなラブストーリー。

engChrName: The cinematography's definitely dated and you can tell that they didn't have the biggest budget when it came to props and costumes.
engSearchText:
The cinematography's definitely dated and you can
tell that they didn't have the biggest budget when it
came to props and costumes.
jpnChrName: 撮影技術は今のものには遠く及ばないし、衣装や 道具もあまり予算を掛けるタイプじゃなかったけど──
jpnSearchText:
撮影技術は今のものには遠く及ばないし、衣装や
道具もあまり予算を掛けるタイプじゃなかったけど──

engChrName: But I still really love its atmosphere.
engSearchText: But I still really love its atmosphere.
jpnChrName: あの空気感が、本当に好きなのよね。
jpnSearchText: あの空気感が、本当に好きなのよね。

engChrName: Yeah, the cast's performances and the director's skill shine through despite that.
engSearchText:
Yeah, the cast's performances and the director's skill
shine through despite that.
jpnChrName: 役者の演技も 監督の手腕も大したもんだった。
jpnSearchText:
役者の演技も
監督の手腕も大したもんだった。

engChrName: And they filmed it in Creil.
engSearchText: And they filmed it in Creil.
jpnChrName: 撮影地は──クレイユ村。
jpnSearchText: 撮影地は──クレイユ村。

engChrName: Even if you've never been there, it's hard not to feel a certain...yearning for the place.
engSearchText:
Even if you've never been there, it's hard not to feel a
certain...yearning for the place.
jpnChrName: たとえ一度も行ったことがなくとも、あの 妙に郷愁を誘う空気にはついつい浸っちまう。
jpnSearchText:
たとえ一度も行ったことがなくとも、あの
妙に郷愁を誘う空気にはついつい浸っちまう。

engChrName: Is it weird to feel nostalgia for a place where you've never been before? 'Cause that's how it felt when I first went there.
engSearchText:
Is it weird to feel nostalgia for a place where you've
never been before? 'Cause that's how it felt when I
first went there.
jpnChrName: おかげで初めて現地に行った時は 懐かしさすら感じたもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
おかげで初めて現地に行った時は
懐かしさすら感じたもんだ。

engChrName: No, I get what you mean.
engSearchText: No, I get what you mean.
jpnChrName: ふふ、あたしも。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、あたしも。

engChrName: I filmed there once before. I was so excited when we finally arrived that I kept flubbing my lines. Had to do a looot of retakes.
engSearchText:
I filmed there once before. I was so excited when we
finally arrived that I kept flubbing my lines. Had to
do a looot of retakes.
jpnChrName: 以前ちょっとした撮影であっちに行った時、 興奮し過ぎていつもより多くリテイクをもらったわ。
jpnSearchText:
以前ちょっとした撮影であっちに行った時、
興奮し過ぎていつもより多くリテイクをもらったわ。

engChrName: Heh, our director wasn't happy with that.
engSearchText: Heh, our director wasn't happy with that.
jpnChrName: 監督には呆れられたけど。
jpnSearchText: 監督には呆れられたけど。

engChrName: But when I think about it, this is what drove me to become an actress in the first place.
engSearchText:
But when I think about it, this is what drove me to
become an actress in the first place.
jpnChrName: 思えばこの映画はあたしが映画女優に なろうとした原点の一つかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
思えばこの映画はあたしが映画女優に
なろうとした原点の一つかもしれない。

engChrName: I always wanted to film something there. Wanted the chance to make something that, one day, would mean as much to someone as this movie does to me.
engSearchText:
I always wanted to film something there. Wanted the
chance to make something that, one day, would mean
as much to someone as this movie does to me.
jpnChrName: いつかあの村で同じように、いつまでも誰かの心に残る 映画を撮りたいと、ずっと思っていたわ。
jpnSearchText:
いつかあの村で同じように、いつまでも誰かの心に残る
映画を撮りたいと、ずっと思っていたわ。

engChrName: So much for that dream, I guess...
engSearchText: So much for that dream, I guess...
jpnChrName: それがもう、永遠に叶わなくなってしまった、 なんてね……
jpnSearchText:
それがもう、永遠に叶わなくなってしまった、
なんてね……

engChrName: I'm sorry...
engSearchText: I'm sorry...

engChrName: It's fine! It just means I'm all the more determined now!
engSearchText:
It's fine! It just means I'm all the more
determined now!
jpnChrName: ──よしっ！ これで改めて腹が据わったわ！
jpnSearchText:
──よしっ！
これで改めて腹が据わったわ！

engChrName: Van, we've got to settle the score, whatever it takes.
engSearchText: Van, we've got to settle the score, whatever it takes.
jpnChrName: 絶対に落とし前をつけないとね── あたしたちの手で、なんとしても。
jpnSearchText:
絶対に落とし前をつけないとね──
あたしたちの手で、なんとしても。

engChrName: 'We,' eh? Finally decided you're part of the team? Can't take it back once you say yes.
engSearchText:
'We,' eh? Finally decided you're part of the team?
Can't take it back once you say yes.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、なるほどな。 これで名実ともに“部外者”じゃねぇってワケか。
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、なるほどな。
これで名実ともに“部外者”じゃねぇってワケか。

engChrName: Haha, I wouldn't. I'm part of the team now.
engSearchText: Haha, I wouldn't. I'm part of the team now.
jpnChrName: そういうこと。
jpnSearchText: そういうこと。

engChrName: We can't let ourselves lose to that fear nonsense that dumb mafioso was talking about.
engSearchText:
We can't let ourselves lose to that fear nonsense that
dumb mafioso was talking about.
jpnChrName: ──マフィアのボスが映像で言っていた “恐怖”なんかに、あたしたちは負けない。
jpnSearchText:
──マフィアのボスが映像で言っていた
“恐怖”なんかに、あたしたちは負けない。

engChrName: We'll make it up to everyone that's suffered because of them. They deserve to feel safe and happy again, and we'll make sure they do.
engSearchText:
We'll make it up to everyone that's suffered because
of them. They deserve to feel safe and happy again,
and we'll make sure they do.
jpnChrName: ヤツらが奪っていった笑顔や、 みんなの安心を必ず取り返してみせる──
jpnSearchText:
ヤツらが奪っていった笑顔や、
みんなの安心を必ず取り返してみせる──

engChrName: And that's not just Phantom Thief Grimcat talking. I mean it as Judith Lanster, too. The movie actress.
engSearchText:
And that's not just Phantom Thief Grimcat talking.
I mean it as Judith Lanster, too. The movie actress.
jpnChrName: 怪盗グリムキャッツとしても、 映画女優ジュディス・ランスターとしてもね。
jpnSearchText:
怪盗グリムキャッツとしても、
映画女優ジュディス・ランスターとしてもね。

engChrName: Okay, okay. You're gettin' a little sappy for my taste. Tone it down, Miss Intense.
engSearchText:
Okay, okay. You're gettin' a little sappy for my taste.
Tone it down, Miss Intense.
jpnChrName: ったく、聞いてて恥ずかしくなるくらいの 真っすぐさだが……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、聞いてて恥ずかしくなるくらいの
真っすぐさだが……

engChrName: Heh... It's kinda contagious, though. Maybe we need more of that energy 'round the office.
engSearchText:
Heh... It's kinda contagious, though. Maybe we need
more of that energy 'round the office.
jpnChrName: ある意味、裏解決屋には 足りてなかったものでもあるのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ある意味、裏解決屋には
足りてなかったものでもあるのかもな。

engChrName: Welcome to the team, Judith. Glad to have you here.
engSearchText: Welcome to the team, Judith. Glad to have you here.
jpnChrName: ──アンタの力にも期待してる。 改めてよろしく頼むぜ、ジュディス。
jpnSearchText:
──アンタの力にも期待してる。
改めてよろしく頼むぜ、ジュディス。

engChrName: Damn right you are! It feels good to be here, too!
engSearchText: Damn right you are! It feels good to be here, too!
jpnChrName: ええ──任せてちょうだい！
jpnSearchText: ええ──任せてちょうだい！

engChrName: Their hearts full of newfound determination, Van and Judith rejoined the team and resumed their patrol.
engSearchText:
Their hearts full of newfound determination, Van and
Judith rejoined the team and resumed their patrol.
jpnChrName: その後、決意を新たにしたヴァンたちは、 改めて巡回に戻ったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、決意を新たにしたヴァンたちは、
改めて巡回に戻ったのだった。

engChrName: Heh. Since when do you own that, Van?
engSearchText: Heh. Since when do you own that, Van?
jpnChrName: ……ハハ、おぬし、 そんなマシンを持っていたのか？
jpnSearchText:
……ハハ、おぬし、
そんなマシンを持っていたのか？

engChrName: I don't. Just borrowin' it from a friend who runs a repair joint.
engSearchText:
I don't. Just borrowin' it from a friend who runs a
repair joint.
jpnChrName: いや、知り合いの中古整備屋から 借りてきたものでね。
jpnSearchText:
いや、知り合いの中古整備屋から
借りてきたものでね。

engChrName: I'll say, tonight's too pretty a night to waste it riding alone, Master.
engSearchText:
I'll say, tonight's too pretty a night to waste it riding
alone, Master.
jpnChrName: こんな夜に一人でツーリングとか 渋すぎでしょう、師父（せんせい）？
jpnSearchText:
こんな夜に一人でツーリングとか
渋すぎでしょう、師父（せんせい）？

engChrName: Mind if I tag along? If your unworthy old student won't put a damper on your night, that is.
engSearchText:
Mind if I tag along? If your unworthy old student
won't put a damper on your night, that is.
jpnChrName: 良かったら不肖の弟子も お供させてもらえませんかね？
jpnSearchText:
良かったら不肖の弟子も
お供させてもらえませんかね？

engChrName: Haha! All right, you can come.
engSearchText: Haha! All right, you can come.
jpnChrName: フフ……よかろう。
jpnSearchText: フフ……よかろう。

engChrName: Nothing wrong with a master and his former student going out on an adventure here and there.
engSearchText:
Nothing wrong with a master and his former student
going out on an adventure here and there.
jpnChrName: たまには師弟揃ってというのも オツなものだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
たまには師弟揃ってというのも
オツなものだろうからな。

engChrName: I'm going to roll down Highway 12. Try to keep up with me.
engSearchText:
I'm going to roll down Highway 12. Try to keep up
with me.
jpnChrName: 国道１２号線を転がすつもりだ。 遅れぬようについてくるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
国道１２号線を転がすつもりだ。
遅れぬようについてくるがいい。

engChrName: Haha, you got it. Lead the way.
engSearchText: Haha, you got it. Lead the way.
jpnChrName: ハッ、了解です。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、了解です。

engChrName: And...here we are.
engSearchText: And...here we are.
jpnChrName: よっこらせっと。
jpnSearchText: よっこらせっと。

engChrName: Okay, you can open your eyes now.
engSearchText: Okay, you can open your eyes now.
jpnChrName: ──ほら、目を開けてみな。
jpnSearchText: ──ほら、目を開けてみな。

engChrName: What do you think? Pretty sweet view, huh? You can even see Trion Tower from here.
engSearchText:
What do you think? Pretty sweet view, huh? You can
even see Trion Tower from here.
jpnChrName: どうだ、なかなか悪くねえ眺めだろ。 トリオンタワーだって見えるしな。
jpnSearchText:
どうだ、なかなか悪くねえ眺めだろ。
トリオンタワーだって見えるしな。

engChrName: We're on the roof of where I live. Area's not the best tourist spot in town, but I like it just the same.
engSearchText:
We're on the roof of where I live. Area's not the best
tourist spot in town, but I like it just the same.
jpnChrName: ここは俺が住んでる建物の屋上だ。 観光名所じゃないが、まあ、お気に入りの場所だ。
jpnSearchText:
ここは俺が住んでる建物の屋上だ。
観光名所じゃないが、まあ、お気に入りの場所だ。

engChrName: Pretty roomy and bright, right? If any weirdos come knocking, you'll see 'em from a selge away.
engSearchText:
Pretty roomy and bright, right? If any weirdos come
knocking, you'll see 'em from a selge away.
jpnChrName: ここなら狭くも暗くもねえだろ？ どこから悪い奴が来ても一目瞭然だ。
jpnSearchText:
ここなら狭くも暗くもねえだろ？
どこから悪い奴が来ても一目瞭然だ。

engChrName: And if push comes to shove, I'm sure she'll be more than happy to cut anyone down to size.
engSearchText:
And if push comes to shove, I'm sure she'll be more
than happy to cut anyone down to size.
jpnChrName: そしたらそこのお姉ちゃんがバッサバッサ 全員真っ二つに斬り捨ててくれる。
jpnSearchText:
そしたらそこのお姉ちゃんがバッサバッサ
全員真っ二つに斬り捨ててくれる。

engChrName: You've got nothing to worry about here, I promise.
engSearchText: You've got nothing to worry about here, I promise.
jpnChrName: だからまあ、怖がることは何もねえさ。
jpnSearchText: だからまあ、怖がることは何もねえさ。

engChrName: *sigh* I'd appreciate it if you didn't make me look like a bloodthirsty savage...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'd appreciate it if you didn't make me look like
a bloodthirsty savage...
jpnChrName: そんな血生臭いことはしないわよ、 まったく……
jpnSearchText:
そんな血生臭いことはしないわよ、
まったく……

engChrName: It's really nice here.
engSearchText: It's really nice here.
jpnChrName: でも……いいところだね。
jpnSearchText: でも……いいところだね。

engChrName: Agreed. Might be a little old and musty, but other than that, it ain't too shabby.
engSearchText:
Agreed. Might be a little old and musty, but other
than that, it ain't too shabby.
jpnChrName: だろ？ ちょっと古臭い以外はな。
jpnSearchText:
だろ？
ちょっと古臭い以外はな。

engChrName: All right, now that you've seen this, let's head back down to the bistro on the ground floor.
engSearchText:
All right, now that you've seen this, let's head back
down to the bistro on the ground floor.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、順序が逆になったが このまま１Ｆにご案内だ。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃ、順序が逆になったが
このまま１Ｆにご案内だ。

engChrName: They make some pretty mean desserts I'm sure you'll love. I know I do!
engSearchText:
They make some pretty mean desserts I'm sure
you'll love. I know I do!
jpnChrName: 美味いデザートも出してるから きっと気に入ると思うぜ？
jpnSearchText:
美味いデザートも出してるから
きっと気に入ると思うぜ？

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Thanks for helping out, Van. You don't know how much I appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Thanks for helping out, Van. You don't know how
much I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい、ヴァンさん。 手伝ってもらっちゃって。
jpnSearchText:
ごめんなさい、ヴァンさん。
手伝ってもらっちゃって。

engChrName: Hey, no problem. That's what neighbors are for.
engSearchText: Hey, no problem. That's what neighbors are for.
jpnChrName: これくらい構わねぇさ。
jpnSearchText: これくらい構わねぇさ。

engChrName: I know you've got a lot to buy and could use a helping hand. I'm always happy to help.
engSearchText:
I know you've got a lot to buy and could use a
helping hand. I'm always happy to help.
jpnChrName: まとめ買いの日は人手が必要なんだろ？ 遠慮なく言ってくれや。
jpnSearchText:
まとめ買いの日は人手が必要なんだろ？
遠慮なく言ってくれや。

engChrName: Can I go with you guys? I wanna come, too!
engSearchText: Can I go with you guys? I wanna come, too!
jpnChrName: ユメもいくー！
jpnSearchText: ユメもいくー！

engChrName: All right, but you have to help us if you're going to come, okay?
engSearchText:
All right, but you have to help us if you're going to
come, okay?
jpnChrName: ふふ、いいわよ。 ユメにもしっかり手伝ってもらうわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いいわよ。
ユメにもしっかり手伝ってもらうわね。

engChrName: And don't go wandering off.
engSearchText: And don't go wandering off.
jpnChrName: はぐれないようにな。
jpnSearchText: はぐれないようにな。

engChrName: Okay! Yaaay, shopping! We're gonna go shopping! ♪
engSearchText: Okay! Yaaay, shopping! We're gonna go shopping! ♪
jpnChrName: うん！ お買いもの、お買いものー♪
jpnSearchText:
うん！
お買いもの、お買いものー♪

engChrName: We've got a few places to visit today. First...
engSearchText: We've got a few places to visit today. First...
jpnChrName: じゃあ行きましょうか。 何軒か回るんだけど──
jpnSearchText:
じゃあ行きましょうか。
何軒か回るんだけど──

engChrName: I gave you a bit of a loyal customer discount, Paulette. Thanks for always shopping here.
engSearchText:
I gave you a bit of a loyal customer discount, Paulette.
Thanks for always shopping here.
jpnChrName: いつもありがとねぇ、ポーレットちゃん。 ちょっと安くしといたから。
jpnSearchText:
いつもありがとねぇ、ポーレットちゃん。
ちょっと安くしといたから。

engChrName: Van, I trust you're not going to make her carry it all back to the restaurant, right? Be a gentleman.
engSearchText:
Van, I trust you're not going to make her carry it all
back to the restaurant, right? Be a gentleman.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、ちゃんと荷物を持ってあげるんだよ？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、ちゃんと荷物を持ってあげるんだよ？

engChrName: I am, I am. That's what I'm here for.
engSearchText: I am, I am. That's what I'm here for.
jpnChrName: わーってるよ。 その為に付き添ってるんだからな。
jpnSearchText:
わーってるよ。
その為に付き添ってるんだからな。

engChrName: Oh, you didn't have to do that, Brenda. You already gave Yumé that candy the last time we came here.
engSearchText:
Oh, you didn't have to do that, Brenda. You already
gave Yumé that candy the last time we came here.
jpnChrName: すみません、ありがとうございます。 この前はお菓子までおまけして頂いたのに……
jpnSearchText:
すみません、ありがとうございます。
この前はお菓子までおまけして頂いたのに……

engChrName: That was so yummy! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: That was so yummy! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: お菓子おいしかったよー！ ありがとーございますっ。
jpnSearchText:
お菓子おいしかったよー！
ありがとーございますっ。

engChrName: You're so polite for your age, Yumé. I'm impressed!
engSearchText: You're so polite for your age, Yumé. I'm impressed!
jpnChrName: ちゃんとお礼が言えて偉いねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ちゃんとお礼が言えて偉いねぇ。

engChrName: And don't you worry about it, Paulette. This is just my way of showing you thanks for making this neighborhood a better place to live in.
engSearchText:
And don't you worry about it, Paulette. This is just
my way of showing you thanks for making this
neighborhood a better place to live in.
jpnChrName: アタシにお節介させてちょうだい。 ご近所で楽しく過ごさせてもらってるお礼よ。
jpnSearchText:
アタシにお節介させてちょうだい。
ご近所で楽しく過ごさせてもらってるお礼よ。

engChrName: I mean, just think about how long you've been coming here. Since before you left home, really.
engSearchText:
I mean, just think about how long you've been
coming here. Since before you left home, really.
jpnChrName: それにしてももう何年の付き合いかねぇ。 ポーレットちゃんが家を出る前からだろう？
jpnSearchText:
それにしてももう何年の付き合いかねぇ。
ポーレットちゃんが家を出る前からだろう？

engChrName: Though I guess you've been working at Montmart for a while now. Hope you haven't gotten bored.
engSearchText:
Though I guess you've been working at Montmart for
a while now. Hope you haven't gotten bored.
jpnChrName: 昔から《モンマルト》を手伝ってたもんねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 昔から《モンマルト》を手伝ってたもんねぇ。

engChrName: Haha, I don't think I could. I grew up with just Dad around, so it's always been home for me.
engSearchText:
Haha, I don't think I could. I grew up with just Dad
around, so it's always been home for me.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。 父子家庭だったのもありますけど──
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうですね。
父子家庭だったのもありますけど──

engChrName: Him AND his cooking. Wouldn't give that up for anything.
engSearchText:
Him AND his cooking. Wouldn't give that up
for anything.
jpnChrName: 何より、父の料理が好きなので。
jpnSearchText: 何より、父の料理が好きなので。

engChrName: Grandpa! I'm back!
engSearchText: Grandpa! I'm back!
jpnChrName: おじーちゃん！　ただいまー！
jpnSearchText: おじーちゃん！　ただいまー！

engChrName: Hey! There's my little Yumé!
engSearchText: Hey! There's my little Yumé!
jpnChrName: おお～おかえりなぁユメ❤
jpnSearchText: おお～おかえりなぁユメ❤

engChrName: Aren't you going to ask? About her and me, I mean.
engSearchText: Aren't you going to ask? About her and me, I mean.
jpnChrName: いいの？　何も聞かなくて。
jpnSearchText: いいの？　何も聞かなくて。

engChrName: You must realize by now we're not the most ordinary family, right?
engSearchText:
You must realize by now we're not the most ordinary
family, right?
jpnChrName: さすがに気づいているんでしょう？ 私やユメのこと──
jpnSearchText:
さすがに気づいているんでしょう？
私やユメのこと──

engChrName: I can't imagine you of all people wouldn't have noticed.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine you of all people wouldn't
have noticed.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんにも言ってない話があるって。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんにも言ってない話があるって。

engChrName: Hey, what kind of guy do you take me for?
engSearchText: Hey, what kind of guy do you take me for?
jpnChrName: 聞き出さないのか、ってか？
jpnSearchText: 聞き出さないのか、ってか？

engChrName: I'm not that insensitive. I know better than to go sniffing around a woman's private business.
engSearchText:
I'm not that insensitive. I know better than to go
sniffing around a woman's private business.
jpnChrName: 悲しいねぇ、俺はそんなに デリカシーが無い男に見えんのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
悲しいねぇ、俺はそんなに
デリカシーが無い男に見えんのかよ。

engChrName: Heehee, I didn't mean it like that.
engSearchText: Heehee, I didn't mean it like that.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうじゃないけど。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうじゃないけど。

engChrName: We've just known each other for a long time now. I feel a little bad keeping things from you.
engSearchText:
We've just known each other for a long time now.
I feel a little bad keeping things from you.
jpnChrName: 何年も付き合いのあるヴァンさんだし 黙っているのも後ろめたいかな、って。
jpnSearchText:
何年も付き合いのあるヴァンさんだし
黙っているのも後ろめたいかな、って。

engChrName: Nah, don't be. There's nothing to feel sorry about.
engSearchText: Nah, don't be. There's nothing to feel sorry about.
jpnChrName: 気にすることじゃないさ。
jpnSearchText: 気にすることじゃないさ。

engChrName: If you want, you can just think of it as me repayin' the favor.
engSearchText:
If you want, you can just think of it as me repayin'
the favor.
jpnChrName: アンタらもそうしてくれただろ？
jpnSearchText: アンタらもそうしてくれただろ？

engChrName: You guys didn't grill me for details when I first rented out the floor above yours. It was no questions asked, and I really appreciated that.
engSearchText:
You guys didn't grill me for details when I first rented
out the floor above yours. It was no questions asked,
and I really appreciated that.
jpnChrName: 俺が事務所を構えることにした時、 何も聞かずに部屋を貸してくれた。
jpnSearchText:
俺が事務所を構えることにした時、
何も聞かずに部屋を貸してくれた。

engChrName: I'm not gonna go diggin' into someone's personal affairs if they don't offer the info up first. Call it a personal policy.
engSearchText:
I'm not gonna go diggin' into someone's personal
affairs if they don't offer the info up first. Call it a
personal policy.
jpnChrName: 言ってこねぇことをあえて聞き出してまで、 踏み込むのは流儀じゃねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
言ってこねぇことをあえて聞き出してまで、
踏み込むのは流儀じゃねえしな。

engChrName: Right. I've always known you to be a rather discreet and considerate man.
engSearchText:
Right. I've always known you to be a rather discreet
and considerate man.
jpnChrName: ……そうね、貴方はそういう人だったわ。
jpnSearchText: ……そうね、貴方はそういう人だったわ。

engChrName: Thank you so, so much, Van.
engSearchText: Thank you so, so much, Van.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: ありがとう、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Ehh, I'm just doing what any decent guy should.
engSearchText: Ehh, I'm just doing what any decent guy should.
jpnChrName: 大げさだっての。
jpnSearchText: 大げさだっての。

engChrName: But if it makes a pretty woman like you happy, I ain't gonna complain.
engSearchText:
But if it makes a pretty woman like you happy, I ain't
gonna complain.
jpnChrName: 美人に礼を言われて悪い気はしねぇがな。
jpnSearchText: 美人に礼を言われて悪い気はしねぇがな。

engChrName: Hmm? I was talking about our errand running just now.
engSearchText:
Hmm? I was talking about our errand running
just now.
jpnChrName: あら、今のは買い出しのお礼よ。
jpnSearchText: あら、今のは買い出しのお礼よ。

engChrName: Were you? Well, I'll take your word for it.
engSearchText: Were you? Well, I'll take your word for it.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そうかい。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そうかい。

engChrName: Mommy, Van! What are you doing? Come on!
engSearchText: Mommy, Van! What are you doing? Come on!
jpnChrName: ママもヴァンも、なにしてるのー？
jpnSearchText: ママもヴァンも、なにしてるのー？

engChrName: We're coming, sweetie!
engSearchText: We're coming, sweetie!
jpnChrName: 今、行くわ。
jpnSearchText: 今、行くわ。

engChrName: If you still have time before you have to return to work, then let me brew you some coffee. On the house.
engSearchText:
If you still have time before you have to return to
work, then let me brew you some coffee. On
the house.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、まだ時間はあるでしょう？ コーヒーをサービスするわね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、まだ時間はあるでしょう？
コーヒーをサービスするわね。

engChrName: Never gonna say no to that.
engSearchText: Never gonna say no to that.
jpnChrName: ありがたく頂くぜ。
jpnSearchText: ありがたく頂くぜ。

engChrName: After the brief coffee break, Van reunited with the others and resumed work.
engSearchText:
After the brief coffee break, Van reunited with the
others and resumed work.
jpnChrName: その後、小休憩を挟んでから仲間と合流し、 解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、小休憩を挟んでから仲間と合流し、
解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: I hope you're ready, Van! I'm not gonna go easy on you!
engSearchText:
I hope you're ready, Van! I'm not gonna go easy
on you!
jpnChrName: よーし、 いざ、ジンジョウにショウブだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
よーし、
いざ、ジンジョウにショウブだよ～！

engChrName: Haha, someone's eager to learn.
engSearchText: Haha, someone's eager to learn.
jpnChrName: やけに気合い入ってるな。
jpnSearchText: やけに気合い入ってるな。

engChrName: I'm impressed you want to try it. It's pretty tricky for a kid your age.
engSearchText:
I'm impressed you want to try it. It's pretty tricky for
a kid your age.
jpnChrName: だが、ユメの歳にはちと難しいゲームだぞ？
jpnSearchText: だが、ユメの歳にはちと難しいゲームだぞ？

engChrName: That's okay! I've watched Grandpa play before. It always looks fun!
engSearchText:
That's okay! I've watched Grandpa play before.
It always looks fun!
jpnChrName: えへへ、おじーちゃんがやってて おもしろそーだったから。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、おじーちゃんがやってて
おもしろそーだったから。

engChrName: I figured he might've had somethin' to do with it. I've seen him playing with his buddies before.
engSearchText:
I figured he might've had somethin' to do with it.
I've seen him playing with his buddies before.
jpnChrName: やっぱおやっさんの影響かよ。 たまに知り合いとやってるみたいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱおやっさんの影響かよ。
たまに知り合いとやってるみたいだしな。

engChrName: Why not ask him to teach you instead of me?
engSearchText: Why not ask him to teach you instead of me?
jpnChrName: それなら俺じゃなくて、 おじいちゃんに教えてもらったらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
それなら俺じゃなくて、
おじいちゃんに教えてもらったらどうだ？

engChrName: I'm sure he'd be really happy to do so.
engSearchText: I'm sure he'd be really happy to do so.
jpnChrName: 喜ぶぞ、確実に。
jpnSearchText: 喜ぶぞ、確実に。

engChrName: Heehee, don't worry about it!
engSearchText: Heehee, don't worry about it!
jpnChrName: いいの、ユメにもジジョーがあるんだから。
jpnSearchText: いいの、ユメにもジジョーがあるんだから。

engChrName: And I wanna play with you, Van!
engSearchText: And I wanna play with you, Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンともチェスやりたいしねー！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンともチェスやりたいしねー！

engChrName: *sigh* All right. If that's what you want, we can go a round.
engSearchText:
*sigh* All right. If that's what you want, we can go
a round.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、仕方ねぇな。 さっそくやってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、仕方ねぇな。
さっそくやってみるか。

engChrName: With that, Van and Yumé started playing.
engSearchText: With that, Van and Yumé started playing.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンとユメの対局が始まった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>こうしてヴァンとユメの対局が始まった。

engChrName: Just the act of teaching Yumé how to move the pieces was a struggle in and of itself, let alone all the other rules and complexities in chess.
engSearchText:
Just the act of teaching Yumé how to move the pieces
was a struggle in and of itself, let alone all the other
rules and complexities in chess.
jpnChrName: と言っても、まずは駒の動かし方を 教えるだけでも一苦労なのだった。
jpnSearchText:
と言っても、まずは駒の動かし方を
教えるだけでも一苦労なのだった。

engChrName: She'd flick her pieces at his to knock them down one moment, and the next she'd be trying to use already captured pieces as her own.
engSearchText:
She'd flick her pieces at his to knock them down one
moment, and the next she'd be trying to use already
captured pieces as her own.
jpnChrName: 駒をはじいて相手の駒を倒したり、 取った駒を持ち駒にするなどの一幕もあり……
jpnSearchText:
駒をはじいて相手の駒を倒したり、
取った駒を持ち駒にするなどの一幕もあり……

engChrName: But Van's patience never wavered. He gently, and slowly, continued teaching Yumé the rules behind chess in an easy to digest way.
engSearchText:
But Van's patience never wavered. He gently, and
slowly, continued teaching Yumé the rules behind
chess in an easy to digest way.
jpnChrName: そんなユメを優しくたしなめつつ、 なるべく分かりやすく教えていった。
jpnSearchText:
そんなユメを優しくたしなめつつ、
なるべく分かりやすく教えていった。

engChrName: Oh, is that how you're gonna play?
engSearchText: Oh, is that how you're gonna play?
jpnChrName: おっと、そういう手もアリなのか？
jpnSearchText: おっと、そういう手もアリなのか？

engChrName: Yup! My house, my rules!
engSearchText: Yup! My house, my rules!
jpnChrName: ユメがアリって言ったらアリだもーん。
jpnSearchText: ユメがアリって言ったらアリだもーん。

engChrName: My mistake, Your Highness.
engSearchText: My mistake, Your Highness.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、お姫様には敵わねえな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、お姫様には敵わねえな。

engChrName: (Well, as long as she's having fun.)
engSearchText: (Well, as long as she's having fun.)
jpnChrName: （ま、楽しそうで何よりだが。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、楽しそうで何よりだが。）

engChrName: Little by little, Yumé finally began to grasp the rules.
engSearchText: Little by little, Yumé finally began to grasp the rules.
jpnChrName: そうして、ユメは少しずつルールを学んでいった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>そうして、ユメは少しずつルールを学んでいった。

engChrName: Her tendency to make a move guided just by intuition made her very unpredictable.
engSearchText:
Her tendency to make a move guided just by intuition
made her very unpredictable.
jpnChrName: 好きな駒を感覚的に打つことが多いものの、 それが却って試合展開を読みづらくするようになった。
jpnSearchText:
好きな駒を感覚的に打つことが多いものの、
それが却って試合展開を読みづらくするようになった。

engChrName: Your turn, Yumes.
engSearchText: Your turn, Yumes.
jpnChrName: ユメの番だぜ。
jpnSearchText: ユメの番だぜ。

engChrName: Hmm... Who's next?
engSearchText: Hmm... Who's next?
jpnChrName: どの子にしようかな～。
jpnSearchText: どの子にしようかな～。

engChrName: (Haven't been playing for long, but her instincts are real sharp already.)
engSearchText:
(Haven't been playing for long, but her instincts are
real sharp already.)
jpnChrName: （しばらく遊んでみたが、   なかなかどうして勝負勘が良いな。）
jpnSearchText:
（しばらく遊んでみたが、
なかなかどうして勝負勘が良いな。）

engChrName: (No hesitation when makin' a play, either. Well, I guess she's still a kid.)
engSearchText:
(No hesitation when makin' a play, either. Well, I
guess she's still a kid.)
jpnChrName: （その歳らしい素直さと相まって   思考に迷いが無いっつうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（その歳らしい素直さと相まって
思考に迷いが無いっつうか。）

engChrName: (She's good at catchin' me off guard.)
engSearchText: (She's good at catchin' me off guard.)
jpnChrName: （俺が思いつかないような良い手を打つことも──）
jpnSearchText: （俺が思いつかないような良い手を打つことも──）

engChrName: I know! How about this?
engSearchText: I know! How about this?
jpnChrName: うん、この子にしよっ！
jpnSearchText: うん、この子にしよっ！

engChrName: Heehee, take that! Your turn, Van!
engSearchText: Heehee, take that! Your turn, Van!
jpnChrName: にひひ、どうだ～。 次はヴァンだよー。
jpnSearchText:
にひひ、どうだ～。
次はヴァンだよー。

engChrName: Whoa, that's a really good play there, kiddo.
engSearchText: Whoa, that's a really good play there, kiddo.
jpnChrName: おおっ、こりゃ凄まじい一手だな。 やるじゃねえか、ユメ。
jpnSearchText:
おおっ、こりゃ凄まじい一手だな。
やるじゃねえか、ユメ。

engChrName: Keep this up, and you might end up goin' pro when you're older.
engSearchText:
Keep this up, and you might end up goin' pro when
you're older.
jpnChrName: 将来はチェスプレイヤーになるか？
jpnSearchText: 将来はチェスプレイヤーになるか？

engChrName: Heehee, maybe! I'm just glad you're having fun!
engSearchText: Heehee, maybe! I'm just glad you're having fun!
jpnChrName: えへへ、ヴァンがたのしそーでよかった！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、ヴァンがたのしそーでよかった！

engChrName: Huh? Are you not having fun, too?
engSearchText: Huh? Are you not having fun, too?
jpnChrName: ん？　なんだ、ユメは楽しくないのか？
jpnSearchText: ん？　なんだ、ユメは楽しくないのか？

engChrName: I am! I'm having lots of fun!
engSearchText: I am! I'm having lots of fun!
jpnChrName: ううん、すっごくたのしーよ。
jpnSearchText: ううん、すっごくたのしーよ。

engChrName: And it's because you are, Van.
engSearchText: And it's because you are, Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァンがたのしそーだから、ユメもたのしーの。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンがたのしそーだから、ユメもたのしーの。

engChrName: You've been so happy lately.
engSearchText: You've been so happy lately.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、最近ずっとたのしそーだもんね。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、最近ずっとたのしそーだもんね。

engChrName: You're always smiling now that Agnès and Feri and Aaron and Risette are here!
engSearchText:
You're always smiling now that Agnès and Feri and
Aaron and Risette are here!
jpnChrName: アニエスちゃんが来て、フェリちゃんも来て、 アーロンとリゼットちゃん、みーんなが来てから。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスちゃんが来て、フェリちゃんも来て、
アーロンとリゼットちゃん、みーんなが来てから。

engChrName: What? Was I not happy before that?
engSearchText: What? Was I not happy before that?
jpnChrName: ハッ……ナマ言ってんじゃねーっつの。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……ナマ言ってんじゃねーっつの。

engChrName: (Heh. You ain't wrong, kid.)
engSearchText: (Heh. You ain't wrong, kid.)
jpnChrName: （……そういや、   事務所を立ち上げた頃だったな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……そういや、
事務所を立ち上げた頃だったな。）

engChrName: (Not a lot to be happy 'bout back when I'd just started. Just a bunch of shady jobs. I was just seeing the worst in people.)
engSearchText:
(Not a lot to be happy 'bout back when I'd
just started. Just a bunch of shady jobs. I was just
seeing the worst in people.)
jpnChrName: （駆け出しだった、あの頃──覚悟していたが、   人の穢れた部分に触れてばかりで……）
jpnSearchText:
（駆け出しだった、あの頃──覚悟していたが、
人の穢れた部分に触れてばかりで……）

engChrName: (I thought I knew what I was gettin' into, but spend too long surrounded by nothing but darkness and you eventually go blind.)
engSearchText:
(I thought I knew what I was gettin' into, but spend
too long surrounded by nothing but darkness and you
eventually go blind.)
jpnChrName: （いつの間にか、乾いた鈍色（にびいろ）の瞳で   世の中を見るようになっちまっていた。）
jpnSearchText:
（いつの間にか、乾いた鈍色（にびいろ）の瞳で
世の中を見るようになっちまっていた。）

engChrName: (I don't think I can thank you enough, kiddo. That bright smile of yours was like a lifeline for me, even when everything else in my life was grim.)
engSearchText:
(I don't think I can thank you enough, kiddo.
That bright smile of yours was like a lifeline for me,
even when everything else in my life was grim.)
jpnChrName: （……そんな俺にも、お前はいつだって   その笑顔を向けてくれたんだよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……そんな俺にも、お前はいつだって
その笑顔を向けてくれたんだよな。）

engChrName: (If only you knew how special you are. No wonder your granddad's so crazy about you.)
engSearchText:
(If only you knew how special you are. No wonder
your granddad's so crazy about you.)
jpnChrName: （ったく……   おやっさんが孫バカになるのも分かるぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ったく……
おやっさんが孫バカになるのも分かるぜ。）

engChrName: Hey! Are you listening to me?
engSearchText: Hey! Are you listening to me?
jpnChrName: ねぇ、ユメのおはなしきいてるー？
jpnSearchText: ねぇ、ユメのおはなしきいてるー？

engChrName: It's your turn, Van! Come on!
engSearchText: It's your turn, Van! Come on!
jpnChrName: ほら、ヴァンの番だよ、はやく～。
jpnSearchText: ほら、ヴァンの番だよ、はやく～。

engChrName: Oh, sorry, Yumes. Okay, my next move is...
engSearchText: Oh, sorry, Yumes. Okay, my next move is...
jpnChrName: ああ、すまんすまん。 そんじゃ、次の手は──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、すまんすまん。
そんじゃ、次の手は──

engChrName: Hey, you punk!
engSearchText: Hey, you punk!
jpnChrName: コラァ！　不良店子！
jpnSearchText: <S5>コラァ！　不良店子！

engChrName: Don't you think it's about time I had my granddaughter back? It's getting late!
engSearchText:
Don't you think it's about time I had my
granddaughter back? It's getting late!
jpnChrName: 今、何時だと思ってる！ とっととユメを帰しやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
今、何時だと思ってる！
とっととユメを帰しやがれ！

engChrName: Crap, I lost track of time. Sorry, kiddo. We'll have to finish our match another day.
engSearchText:
Crap, I lost track of time. Sorry, kiddo. We'll have to
finish our match another day.
jpnChrName: っと、もうそんな時間だったか。 悪いなユメ、続きはまた今度な。
jpnSearchText:
っと、もうそんな時間だったか。
悪いなユメ、続きはまた今度な。

engChrName: Aww, but I wanna keep playing!
engSearchText: Aww, but I wanna keep playing!
jpnChrName: えー、もっとやりたかったなー……
jpnSearchText: えー、もっとやりたかったなー……

engChrName: But okay... I had fun!
engSearchText: But okay... I had fun!
jpnChrName: でもいっかー、楽しかったし！
jpnSearchText: でもいっかー、楽しかったし！

engChrName: Look, Grandpa! Look! I learned how to play chess!
engSearchText: Look, Grandpa! Look! I learned how to play chess!
jpnChrName: 見てみて、おじーちゃん！ ユメ、チェスできるようになったんだー！
jpnSearchText:
見てみて、おじーちゃん！
ユメ、チェスできるようになったんだー！

engChrName: Now we can play together!
engSearchText: Now we can play together!
jpnChrName: これでいつでもおじーちゃんと遊べるね！
jpnSearchText: これでいつでもおじーちゃんと遊べるね！

engChrName: Y-Yumé!
engSearchText: Y-Yumé!
jpnChrName: ユ、ユメ……！
jpnSearchText: ユ、ユメ……！

engChrName: (Ah. That's why she wanted me to teach her.)
engSearchText: (Ah. That's why she wanted me to teach her.)
jpnChrName: （なるほど、“ジジョー”はそういうことか。）
jpnSearchText: （なるほど、“ジジョー”はそういうことか。）

engChrName: Ahem! On second thought, I may have been too strict.
engSearchText:
Ahem! On second thought, I may have been
too strict.
jpnChrName: コホン、おじーちゃん ちょっと細かいこと言いすぎたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、おじーちゃん
ちょっと細かいこと言いすぎたようだ。

engChrName: You can keep playing with our good-for-nothing neighbor. Just make sure you don't go to bed too late.
engSearchText:
You can keep playing with our good-for-nothing
neighbor. Just make sure you don't go to bed
too late.
jpnChrName: 夜更かしもちょっとくらいなら良いだろう。
jpnSearchText: 夜更かしもちょっとくらいなら良いだろう。

engChrName: Really?!
engSearchText: Really?!
jpnChrName: いいの～！？
jpnSearchText: いいの～！？

engChrName: Yep. You earned it for making your old grandpa so proud! ❤ Just promise to not keep your mom waiting or she might get mad.
engSearchText:
Yep. You earned it for making your old grandpa
so proud! ❤ Just promise to not keep your mom
waiting or she might get mad.
jpnChrName: ユメが頑張ってチェスを覚えたからな～❤ ただしママに怒られない程度だぞ？
jpnSearchText:
ユメが頑張ってチェスを覚えたからな～❤
ただしママに怒られない程度だぞ？

engChrName: Yaaay! I promise!
engSearchText: Yaaay! I promise!
jpnChrName: やったー！
jpnSearchText: やったー！

engChrName: Heh. You are such a sucker for Yumes. Can't imagine there's much you wouldn't do for her.
engSearchText:
Heh. You are such a sucker for Yumes. Can't imagine
there's much you wouldn't do for her.
jpnChrName: ったく、とことん孫バカなことで。
jpnSearchText: ったく、とことん孫バカなことで。

engChrName: No one asked you.
engSearchText: No one asked you.
jpnChrName: そこ、うるさいぞ。
jpnSearchText: そこ、うるさいぞ。

engChrName: Let's split into teams! Me and Grandpa against you, Van!
engSearchText:
Let's split into teams! Me and Grandpa against
you, Van!
jpnChrName: よーし、じゃあ次はチーム戦だー！ ユメとおじーちゃん 対 ヴァンね！
jpnSearchText:
よーし、じゃあ次はチーム戦だー！
ユメとおじーちゃん 対 ヴァンね！

engChrName: Two on one? Well, that ain't fair, but I'm in.
engSearchText: Two on one? Well, that ain't fair, but I'm in.
jpnChrName: チーム戦って……仕方ねえ、 もう少し付き合ってやるか。
jpnSearchText:
チーム戦って……仕方ねえ、
もう少し付き合ってやるか。

engChrName: If I get to play your granddad, then that means I don't have to hold back and—
engSearchText:
If I get to play your granddad, then that means I don't
have to hold back and—
jpnChrName: おやっさんとやる良い機会だしな。 本気で行かせて──
jpnSearchText:
おやっさんとやる良い機会だしな。
本気で行かせて──

engChrName: I don't think so. Only one of us gets to look good in front of Yumé, and I'm certain you understand who it'll be.
engSearchText:
I don't think so. Only one of us gets to look good in
front of Yumé, and I'm certain you understand who
it'll be.
jpnChrName: ……当然分かってるな、不良店子？ ユメに格好いいところを見せるべきなのはどっちか。
jpnSearchText:
……当然分かってるな、不良店子？
ユメに格好いいところを見せるべきなのはどっちか。

engChrName: The three of them kept playing deep into the night until an exasperated Paulette finally came to check on them.
engSearchText:
The three of them kept playing deep into the night
until an exasperated Paulette finally came to check
on them.
jpnChrName: それから、ポーレットが呆れ顔で様子を見に来るまで ３人でしばしの夜更かしを楽しんだのだった。
jpnSearchText:
それから、ポーレットが呆れ顔で様子を見に来るまで
３人でしばしの夜更かしを楽しんだのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Graaaaaah!
engSearchText: Graaaaaah!
jpnChrName: ぬぐおおおっ……！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ぬぐおおおっ……！！

engChrName: Yeesh. Sounds pretty serious. Must be tough gettin' old.
engSearchText:
Yeesh. Sounds pretty serious. Must be tough
gettin' old.
jpnChrName: 思ったより重症だな…… いやだねえ、歳ってのは。
jpnSearchText:
思ったより重症だな……
いやだねえ、歳ってのは。

engChrName: Careful you don't throw out your back, Victor. Think about all the piggyback rides you'll be depriving your granddaughter of.
engSearchText:
Careful you don't throw out your back, Victor.
Think about all the piggyback rides you'll be
depriving your granddaughter of.
jpnChrName: あんまり無理すると ユメを抱っこできなくなるぜ？
jpnSearchText:
あんまり無理すると
ユメを抱っこできなくなるぜ？

engChrName: Urgh! Not happening.
engSearchText: Urgh! Not happening.
jpnChrName: くっ、俺はそんなヤワじゃ……
jpnSearchText: くっ、俺はそんなヤワじゃ……

engChrName: Grandpa, are you okay?
engSearchText: Grandpa, are you okay?
jpnChrName: おじーちゃん、大丈夫ー？
jpnSearchText: おじーちゃん、大丈夫ー？

engChrName: I think you'd better take the day off, man.
engSearchText: I think you'd better take the day off, man.
jpnChrName: １日くらい休めないのかよ？
jpnSearchText: １日くらい休めないのかよ？

engChrName: Are you nuts? I can't take time off over a few aches and pains.
engSearchText:
Are you nuts? I can't take time off over a few aches
and pains.
jpnChrName: バカ言え、この程度で休めるか。
jpnSearchText: バカ言え、この程度で休めるか。

engChrName: Not only do I have our regulars and reservations to handle, but today and tomorrow are inventory stocking days. Those are crucial.
engSearchText:
Not only do I have our regulars and reservations to
handle, but today and tomorrow are inventory
stocking days. Those are crucial.
jpnChrName: いつもの常連・予約に加えて、 今日明日は貴重な仕込み期間──
jpnSearchText:
いつもの常連・予約に加えて、
今日明日は貴重な仕込み期間──

engChrName: We also need to start making test batches for the Revolution Festival menu.
engSearchText:
We also need to start making test batches for the
Revolution Festival menu.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭用の特別メニューの試作やらを しなくちゃならねぇからな。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭用の特別メニューの試作やらを
しなくちゃならねぇからな。

engChrName: Grandpa, you can rest! It's okay! Mommy and I can handle it!
engSearchText:
Grandpa, you can rest! It's okay! Mommy and I can
handle it!
jpnChrName: おじーちゃん、休んでていいんだよー？ ユメ、ママとがんばるからー！
jpnSearchText:
おじーちゃん、休んでていいんだよー？
ユメ、ママとがんばるからー！

engChrName: Aww, thank you, Yumé. Just hearing those words makes your grandpa feel stron—aaargh!
engSearchText:
Aww, thank you, Yumé. Just hearing those words
makes your grandpa feel stron—aaargh!
jpnChrName: ありがとなぁユメ❤ その気持ちだけで百人力──いでで！
jpnSearchText:
ありがとなぁユメ❤
その気持ちだけで百人力──いでで！

engChrName: I think that settles it. You need help in the kitchen today, period.
engSearchText:
I think that settles it. You need help in the kitchen
today, period.
jpnChrName: ったく……仕方ねえ。 やっぱり俺も厨房に立つぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……仕方ねえ。
やっぱり俺も厨房に立つぜ。

engChrName: Tell you what: If you think I'm up to the task, I'll take over the kitchen for a while.
engSearchText:
Tell you what: If you think I'm up to the task, I'll take
over the kitchen for a while.
jpnChrName: ずっとは居られねぇし、 俺の料理の腕で大丈夫ならな。
jpnSearchText:
ずっとは居られねぇし、
俺の料理の腕で大丈夫ならな。

engChrName: I can't do it all day, but it's the least I can do. You've been cookin' a lot for me throughout the years.
engSearchText:
I can't do it all day, but it's the least I can do.
You've been cookin' a lot for me throughout
the years.
jpnChrName: 今までの賄いの借りの分っていうには 全然足りねえだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
今までの賄いの借りの分っていうには
全然足りねえだろうが。

engChrName: Hmph. I don't recall you owing me for any of it, you punk.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I don't recall you owing me for any of it,
you punk.
jpnChrName: フン、お前と貸し借りした覚えはねえぞ。
jpnSearchText: フン、お前と貸し借りした覚えはねえぞ。

engChrName: ...Very well. But I'm not going to abandon the kitchen. I don't like it, but you can help out during rush hour.
engSearchText:
...Very well. But I'm not going to abandon
the kitchen. I don't like it, but you can help out
during rush hour.
jpnChrName: ……ええい、不安しかねぇがいないよりマシか。 昼の忙しい時間だけでも人手は欲しい。
jpnSearchText:
……ええい、不安しかねぇがいないよりマシか。
昼の忙しい時間だけでも人手は欲しい。

engChrName: I'm going to supervise your cooking. And don't expect me to go easy on you just because you're doing me a favor, either. Understand?
engSearchText:
I'm going to supervise your cooking. And don't
expect me to go easy on you just because you're doing
me a favor, either. Understand?
jpnChrName: 当然、監督はする。 助っ人だからって容赦しねぇからな？
jpnSearchText:
当然、監督はする。
助っ人だからって容赦しねぇからな？

engChrName: Fair enough. Your joint, your rules. Just tell me what to do, boss.
engSearchText:
Fair enough. Your joint, your rules. Just tell me what
to do, boss.
jpnChrName: へいへい、覚悟しておくぜ。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、覚悟しておくぜ。

engChrName: Yaaay, thanks, Van! I'll help with the customers!
engSearchText: Yaaay, thanks, Van! I'll help with the customers!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、おじーちゃんのことお願いねー！ ユメも接客、ガンバルからー！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、おじーちゃんのことお願いねー！
ユメも接客、ガンバルからー！

engChrName: With that, Van took his post in the Montmart kitchen and got to cooking.
engSearchText:
With that, Van took his post in the Montmart
kitchen and got to cooking.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンは初めて、 《モンマルト》の厨房に立ったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァンは初めて、
《モンマルト》の厨房に立ったのだった。

engChrName: You're cutting the cabbage wrong. Slice it more finely.
engSearchText:
You're cutting the cabbage wrong. Slice it
more finely.
jpnChrName: 違う、キャベツはもっと細かくだ。
jpnSearchText: 違う、キャベツはもっと細かくだ。

engChrName: Like this?
engSearchText: Like this?
jpnChrName: こうか？
jpnSearchText: こうか？

engChrName: No, even more.
engSearchText: No, even more.
jpnChrName: 違う、もっとだ。
jpnSearchText: 違う、もっとだ。

engChrName: Like...this?
engSearchText: Like...this?
jpnChrName: ……こうか？
jpnSearchText: ……こうか？

engChrName: Now that's too fine.
engSearchText: Now that's too fine.
jpnChrName: 細かすぎる。
jpnSearchText: 細かすぎる。

engChrName: No, no! Don't stir so fast!
engSearchText: No, no! Don't stir so fast!
jpnChrName: コラ、もっとゆっくりかき混ぜろ。
jpnSearchText: コラ、もっとゆっくりかき混ぜろ。

engChrName: I thought you said you didn't want it to burn. Which is it?
engSearchText:
I thought you said you didn't want it to burn.
Which is it?
jpnChrName: 焦がさないように、って言ってたじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: 焦がさないように、って言ってたじゃねえか？

engChrName: Both. Keep stirring so it doesn't burn, but don't do it too fast.
engSearchText:
Both. Keep stirring so it doesn't burn, but don't do it
too fast.
jpnChrName: 焦がさず、かつゆっくりだ。
jpnSearchText: 焦がさず、かつゆっくりだ。

engChrName: Once that's ready, go grab a bag of flour and a can of milk from the pantry.
engSearchText:
Once that's ready, go grab a bag of flour and a can of
milk from the pantry.
jpnChrName: それが終わったら、倉庫から小麦１袋と ミルク缶を１つ持ってこい。
jpnSearchText:
それが終わったら、倉庫から小麦１袋と
ミルク缶を１つ持ってこい。

engChrName: Hang in there, Van! You can do it!
engSearchText: Hang in there, Van! You can do it!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、がんばって～！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、がんばって～！

engChrName: Heh, it's clear as day whose dish looks more appetizing.
engSearchText:
Heh, it's clear as day whose dish looks
more appetizing.
jpnChrName: フフン、どう見ても俺のが旨そうだな。
jpnSearchText: フフン、どう見ても俺のが旨そうだな。

engChrName: Sheesh, when did this become a competition, huh? You're the pro, of course yours is better.
engSearchText:
Sheesh, when did this become a competition, huh?
You're the pro, of course yours is better.
jpnChrName: プロが素人と張り合ってんじゃねえよ……
jpnSearchText: プロが素人と張り合ってんじゃねえよ……

engChrName: But I think my stuff holds its own just fine. The presentation's not too shabby, at least.
engSearchText:
But I think my stuff holds its own just fine.
The presentation's not too shabby, at least.
jpnChrName: こっちも意外と負けてねぇぜ？ おやっさんのと比べて形もきれいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
こっちも意外と負けてねぇぜ？
おやっさんのと比べて形もきれいだしな。

engChrName: You think so, huh? Don't get cocky, punk. You've still got a lot to learn.
engSearchText:
You think so, huh? Don't get cocky, punk.
You've still got a lot to learn.
jpnChrName: あぁん？ 生意気言ってんじゃあねえぞ小僧。
jpnSearchText:
あぁん？
生意気言ってんじゃあねえぞ小僧。

engChrName: We'll see about that. Let's taste 'em and find out.
engSearchText: We'll see about that. Let's taste 'em and find out.
jpnChrName: じゃあ実食といこうじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: じゃあ実食といこうじゃねぇか。

engChrName: Haha, good to see your back hasn't put a damper on your spirit, Victor.
engSearchText:
Haha, good to see your back hasn't put a damper on
your spirit, Victor.
jpnChrName: はは、腰を痛めたって聞いてたけど イキイキしてるねマスター。
jpnSearchText:
はは、腰を痛めたって聞いてたけど
イキイキしてるねマスター。

engChrName: If I didn't know any better, I'd almost think you two were having some nice father and son bonding time.
engSearchText:
If I didn't know any better, I'd almost think you two
were having some nice father and son bonding time.
jpnChrName: こうして見ると本当の親子みたいだな。
jpnSearchText: こうして見ると本当の親子みたいだな。

engChrName: I'll have to take your word for it. Don't really know how that's supposed to look.
engSearchText:
I'll have to take your word for it. Don't really know
how that's supposed to look.
jpnChrName: 親子……ねぇ。 よく分からねえがこういうモンなのか？
jpnSearchText:
親子……ねぇ。
よく分からねえがこういうモンなのか？

engChrName: Good thing he isn't my actual son, or I would've disowned him after all the trouble he's caused around here.
engSearchText:
Good thing he isn't my actual son, or I would've
disowned him after all the trouble he's caused
around here.
jpnChrName: ハッ、こんな不良は即勘当だっつうの。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、こんな不良は即勘当だっつうの。

engChrName: The rush hour continued apace with Van and Victor yelling at one another in the kitchen, their hands full with customer orders.
engSearchText:
The rush hour continued apace with Van and Victor
yelling at one another in the kitchen, their hands full
with customer orders.
jpnChrName: その後も、どやしどやされながら賑やかに、 ヴァンとビクトルは忙しい時間帯を駆け抜けた。
jpnSearchText:
その後も、どやしどやされながら賑やかに、
ヴァンとビクトルは忙しい時間帯を駆け抜けた。

engChrName: Aidios, your old man really likes crackin' the whip.
engSearchText: Aidios, your old man really likes crackin' the whip.
jpnChrName: ったく、おやっさんは人使いが荒いぜ。
jpnSearchText: ったく、おやっさんは人使いが荒いぜ。

engChrName: My arms are so sore, I ain't gonna be liftin' anything heavier than my Xipha today.
engSearchText:
My arms are so sore, I ain't gonna be liftin' anything
heavier than my Xipha today.
jpnChrName: 今日はもうザイファより重い物は持てねぇな。
jpnSearchText: 今日はもうザイファより重い物は持てねぇな。

engChrName: Heehee. You'll survive, Van. You're too young to be that worn out.
engSearchText:
Heehee. You'll survive, Van. You're too young to be
that worn out.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、若いのにそんなこと言って。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、若いのにそんなこと言って。

engChrName: Still, thanks for helping my dad today. It means a lot. It's not much, but here's a little something on the house.
engSearchText:
Still, thanks for helping my dad today. It means a lot.
It's not much, but here's a little something on
the house.
jpnChrName: でも、本当にお疲れ様。 お礼と言ってはなんだけどサービスよ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、本当にお疲れ様。
お礼と言ってはなんだけどサービスよ。

engChrName: Oh, damn. You didn't have to, but thanks, Paulette.
engSearchText: Oh, damn. You didn't have to, but thanks, Paulette.
jpnChrName: おっ、賄い飯か。 ありがたく頂くぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、賄い飯か。
ありがたく頂くぜ。

engChrName: My dad's really fired up after all that. He put extra effort into it, just for you.
engSearchText:
My dad's really fired up after all that. He put extra
effort into it, just for you.
jpnChrName: お父さん、今日はいつもより 気合を入れて用意してたのよ。
jpnSearchText:
お父さん、今日はいつもより
気合を入れて用意してたのよ。

engChrName: You didn't have to tell him that...
engSearchText: You didn't have to tell him that...
jpnChrName: ……余計なことは言わんでいい。
jpnSearchText: ……余計なことは言わんでいい。

engChrName: Oh, really now? Well, I appreciate it. This'll hit the spot after an afternoon of backbreaking work in that kitchen.
engSearchText:
Oh, really now? Well, I appreciate it. This'll hit the
spot after an afternoon of backbreaking work in
that kitchen.
jpnChrName: いや～、しごかれた身体に しみわたりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、しごかれた身体に
しみわたりそうだ。

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: ふん……
jpnSearchText: ふん……

engChrName: Even I have to admit when a good-for-nothing son has earned his keep.
engSearchText:
Even I have to admit when a good-for-nothing son
has earned his keep.
jpnChrName: 出来の悪い息子には、 こんくらいでちょうどいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
出来の悪い息子には、
こんくらいでちょうどいいだろう。

engChrName: I speak from experience when I say this: a family can take on many forms.
engSearchText:
I speak from experience when I say this: a family can
take on many forms.
jpnChrName: 家族の形に、ただ１つの正解なんざねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 家族の形に、ただ１つの正解なんざねぇ。

engChrName: Maybe it only has one parent, or maybe no one in it is even related by blood.
engSearchText:
Maybe it only has one parent, or maybe no one in it is
even related by blood.
jpnChrName: 片親でもいい、 血の繋がりがあっても無くてもいい。
jpnSearchText:
片親でもいい、
血の繋がりがあっても無くてもいい。

engChrName: Point is, there's no 'right' way to be a family. You get to define what your family is, and which bonds you cherish.
engSearchText:
Point is, there's no 'right' way to be a family. You get
to define what your family is, and which bonds
you cherish.
jpnChrName: 人の“縁”の在り方はそれぞれだろ。
jpnSearchText: 人の“縁”の在り方はそれぞれだろ。

engChrName: Couldn't have said it better myself. Careful, though. I don't think I'm the only potential son in the picture.
engSearchText:
Couldn't have said it better myself. Careful, though.
I don't think I'm the only potential son in the picture.
jpnChrName: ま、おやっさんには、 別の息子候補もいるしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、おやっさんには、
別の息子候補もいるしな。

engChrName: Like hell! Gehenna will freeze over before I'll count that two-timing scumbag as one of my own!
engSearchText:
Like hell! Gehenna will freeze over before I'll count
that two-timing scumbag as one of my own!
jpnChrName: 候補じゃねぇ！　俺は認めんぞ！
jpnSearchText: 候補じゃねぇ！　俺は認めんぞ！

engChrName: I never named any names.
engSearchText: I never named any names.
jpnChrName: おや、誰とは言ってねぇが。
jpnSearchText: おや、誰とは言ってねぇが。

engChrName: I can only imagine who you two might be talking about.
engSearchText:
I can only imagine who you two might be
talking about.
jpnChrName: 誰のことかしら……
jpnSearchText: 誰のことかしら……

engChrName: Heehee, Grandpa's right. You and me are family.
engSearchText: Heehee, Grandpa's right. You and me are family.
jpnChrName: えへへ…… ユメもヴァンのカゾクだからっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
ユメもヴァンのカゾクだからっ。

engChrName: I'll ALWAYS be with you, Van! I promise!
engSearchText: I'll ALWAYS be with you, Van! I promise!
jpnChrName: ユメはずーっと、 ヴァンのそばにいてあげるからね～。
jpnSearchText:
ユメはずーっと、
ヴァンのそばにいてあげるからね～。

engChrName: *sigh* You sure can melt a grown-up's heart. But you should be real careful making promises like that at that age.
engSearchText:
*sigh* You sure can melt a grown-up's heart. But you
should be real careful making promises like that at
that age.
jpnChrName: ったく、そんな約束は 簡単にするもんじゃねぇっての。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、そんな約束は
簡単にするもんじゃねぇっての。

engChrName: But thank you, Yumes. It means a lot.
engSearchText: But thank you, Yumes. It means a lot.
jpnChrName: だが──あんがとな、ユメ。
jpnSearchText: だが──あんがとな、ユメ。

engChrName: Don't care what you think. If you disappoint my sweet, innocent granddaughter, you're going to be in for a world of pain, you brat.
engSearchText:
Don't care what you think. If you disappoint my
sweet, innocent granddaughter, you're going to be in
for a world of pain, you brat.
jpnChrName: ……フン、可愛いユメを悲しませたら タダじゃおかねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
……フン、可愛いユメを悲しませたら
タダじゃおかねえからな。

engChrName: What he really means to say is take care of yourself, Van. He worries you might be overdoing it at your job sometimes.
engSearchText:
What he really means to say is take care of
yourself, Van. He worries you might be overdoing it
at your job sometimes.
jpnChrName: ふふ、『心配だからあまり無茶しすぎるな』ですって。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、『心配だからあまり無茶しすぎるな』ですって。

engChrName: Paulette! You could've kept that part to yourself!
engSearchText: Paulette! You could've kept that part to yourself!
jpnChrName: コラ、ポーレット！ だから余計なことは……！
jpnSearchText:
コラ、ポーレット！
だから余計なことは……！

engChrName: Haha, I hear you. I'll be careful out there.
engSearchText: Haha, I hear you. I'll be careful out there.
jpnChrName: ハッ……わーったよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……わーったよ。

engChrName: After the short break, Van reunited with the others and resumed work.
engSearchText:
After the short break, Van reunited with the others
and resumed work.
jpnChrName: ──その後、小休憩を挟んだヴァンは仲間と合流し、 解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
──その後、小休憩を挟んだヴァンは仲間と合流し、
解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: There's an actress I've been working with whose work I'd like your opinion on, if that's okay.
engSearchText:
There's an actress I've been working with whose work
I'd like your opinion on, if that's okay.
jpnChrName: ……次の新作映画に出演オファーしてから 怖いくらい役にのめりこんでしまってね。
jpnSearchText:
……次の新作映画に出演オファーしてから
怖いくらい役にのめりこんでしまってね。

engChrName: Ever since I offered her the part, she's been immersed in the role, almost to a scary degree. I was originally gonna ask Judith for help here...
engSearchText:
Ever since I offered her the part, she's been immersed
in the role, almost to a scary degree. I was originally
gonna ask Judith for help here...
jpnChrName: もしよければ様子を見て来てほしいんだ。 本当はジュディス君にと思ったが……
jpnSearchText:
もしよければ様子を見て来てほしいんだ。
本当はジュディス君にと思ったが……

engChrName: But it might be a bad idea if I did it, since I'm not involved with the film's production at all.
engSearchText:
But it might be a bad idea if I did it, since I'm not
involved with the film's production at all.
jpnChrName: 発表前の映画……参加してないあたしが 万が一内容を知ったら色々問題だろうしね。
jpnSearchText:
発表前の映画……参加してないあたしが
万が一内容を知ったら色々問題だろうしね。

engChrName: I know you're pretty tight-lipped, so I said why not? So, you gonna help?
engSearchText:
I know you're pretty tight-lipped, so I said why not?
So, you gonna help?
jpnChrName: その点アンタの口の堅さなら大丈夫── お願いしてもいいかしら？
jpnSearchText:
その点アンタの口の堅さなら大丈夫──
お願いしてもいいかしら？

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: (Looks like it's raining out. Bit of a shame for this time of year.)
engSearchText:
(Looks like it's raining out. Bit of a shame for this
time of year.)
jpnChrName: （通り雨か……こんな日くらい、   晴れてくれりゃあいいものを。）
jpnSearchText:
（通り雨か……こんな日くらい、
晴れてくれりゃあいいものを。）

engChrName: (Wonder if the Goddess is crying somewhere out there, too...)
engSearchText:
(Wonder if the Goddess is crying somewhere out
there, too...)
jpnChrName: （女神も泣いてるのかね……）
jpnSearchText: （女神も泣いてるのかね……）

engChrName: (Heh, what am I doing, getting all sappy? I should just get up and grab a bite.)
engSearchText:
(Heh, what am I doing, getting all sappy? I should
just get up and grab a bite.)
jpnChrName: （らしくねぇな。   ……何か腹に入れるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（らしくねぇな。
……何か腹に入れるか。）

engChrName: (I was so busy this morning, I didn't even have time for breakfast.)
engSearchText:
(I was so busy this morning, I didn't even have time
for breakfast.)
jpnChrName: （そういや今朝は慌ただしくて   飯もロクに食ってなかった。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや今朝は慌ただしくて
飯もロクに食ってなかった。）

engChrName: (Don't wanna keep everyone else waitin', though. Better make it something light and quick.)
engSearchText:
(Don't wanna keep everyone else waitin', though.
Better make it something light and quick.)
jpnChrName: （あいつらを待たせても悪いし   軽く食えるモンでも……）
jpnSearchText:
（あいつらを待たせても悪いし
軽く食えるモンでも……）

engChrName: Here's your delivery.
engSearchText: Here's your delivery.
jpnChrName: ハイ、お届け物よ。
jpnSearchText: ハイ、お届け物よ。

engChrName: Thanks. I appreciate you being so quick.
engSearchText: Thanks. I appreciate you being so quick.
jpnChrName: ご苦労さん、相変わらず早くて助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ご苦労さん、相変わらず早くて助かるぜ。

engChrName: Don't mention it. I get my customers what they need ASAP, rain or shine.
engSearchText:
Don't mention it. I get my customers what they need
ASAP, rain or shine.
jpnChrName: どんな時でも迅速に 届けるのがモットーだからね。
jpnSearchText:
どんな時でも迅速に
届けるのがモットーだからね。

engChrName: Why order food, though? You could've just gone downstairs and eaten with everyone else.
engSearchText:
Why order food, though? You could've just gone
downstairs and eaten with everyone else.
jpnChrName: でもせっかく食事なら下のビストロで みんなで食べればいいのに。
jpnSearchText:
でもせっかく食事なら下のビストロで
みんなで食べればいいのに。

engChrName: But anyway... It's just you right now?
engSearchText: But anyway... It's just you right now?
jpnChrName: ……今、１人なの？
jpnSearchText: ……今、１人なの？

engChrName: Yeah, I just got back a little bit ago.
engSearchText: Yeah, I just got back a little bit ago.
jpnChrName: ああ、まぁな。 俺だけちょいと戻ってきた。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、まぁな。
俺だけちょいと戻ってきた。

engChrName: Got'cha.
engSearchText: Got'cha.
jpnChrName: そう……
jpnSearchText: そう……

engChrName: Could we talk outside once you're done eating? Only if you feel like it, of course. No pressure.
engSearchText:
Could we talk outside once you're done eating?
Only if you feel like it, of course. No pressure.
jpnChrName: 食べ終わったら、少し外で話さない？ もちろん気が乗ればでいいわ。
jpnSearchText:
食べ終わったら、少し外で話さない？
もちろん気が乗ればでいいわ。

engChrName: I know it's raining and all, but we can work around that.
engSearchText:
I know it's raining and all, but we can work
around that.
jpnChrName: 雨は降ってるけど…… 私たちには便利な足があるでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
雨は降ってるけど……
私たちには便利な足があるでしょう？

engChrName: Well, this is a surprise. Wasn't expecting you of all people to ask me out today.
engSearchText:
Well, this is a surprise. Wasn't expecting you of all
people to ask me out today.
jpnChrName: ハハ、珍しいな。 お前さんからの誘いなんて。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、珍しいな。
お前さんからの誘いなんて。

engChrName: Come in and have a seat on the couch. I'll get you a drink. I'll be done with the food real quick.
engSearchText:
Come in and have a seat on the couch. I'll get you
a drink. I'll be done with the food real quick.
jpnChrName: ……ソファで茶でも飲んで待っててくれ。 すぐに食べ終わるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ソファで茶でも飲んで待っててくれ。
すぐに食べ終わるからよ。

engChrName: Whoa, this is awesome!
engSearchText: Whoa, this is awesome!
jpnChrName: わあああっ、いいぞー！
jpnSearchText: わあああっ、いいぞー！

engChrName: I can't believe we get to see something like this here in Old Town!
engSearchText:
I can't believe we get to see something like this here
in Old Town!
jpnChrName: 旧市街でこんなのが 見られるなんてねえ……！
jpnSearchText:
旧市街でこんなのが
見られるなんてねえ……！

engChrName: Those two are so amazing!
engSearchText: Those two are so amazing!
jpnChrName: はああ、凄いです、お二人とも……！
jpnSearchText: はああ、凄いです、お二人とも……！

engChrName: Yeah, they're even better than I expected.
engSearchText: Yeah, they're even better than I expected.
jpnChrName: うん、聞いていた以上の……
jpnSearchText: うん、聞いていた以上の……

engChrName: Heehee, they've clearly honed their dance routine.
engSearchText: Heehee, they've clearly honed their dance routine.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… さらに踊りに磨きがかかってましたね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
さらに踊りに磨きがかかってましたね！

engChrName: I know they just wanted somewhere to practice before the big event, but I feel kinda rude not tippin' them for such a damn good performance.
engSearchText:
I know they just wanted somewhere to practice before
the big event, but I feel kinda rude not tippin' them
for such a damn good performance.
jpnChrName: 興行前のお試しとか言ってたが、 ミラを払わねえと申し訳ないレベルだな。
jpnSearchText:
興行前のお試しとか言ってたが、
ミラを払わねえと申し訳ないレベルだな。

engChrName: *sigh* There's nothing like a good bath after dancing.
engSearchText: *sigh* There's nothing like a good bath after dancing.
jpnChrName: うーん、やっぱり踊った後の お風呂はサイッコーだね……！
jpnSearchText:
うーん、やっぱり踊った後の
お風呂はサイッコーだね……！

engChrName: I like this place! It's different from the hamam we have back home, but in a good way.
engSearchText:
I like this place! It's different from the hamam we
have back home, but in a good way.
jpnChrName: サルバッドのハマムとは違うけど こういうのもいいかも！
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドのハマムとは違うけど
こういうのもいいかも！

engChrName: Right? It's our favorite place around here.
engSearchText: Right? It's our favorite place around here.
jpnChrName: えへへ、ですよね！ わたしたちも今じゃお気に入りです。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、ですよね！
わたしたちも今じゃお気に入りです。

engChrName: Oh, and before I forget! I brought you all some shea butter from Tharbad. I hope you like it.
engSearchText:
Oh, and before I forget! I brought you all some shea
butter from Tharbad. I hope you like it.
jpnChrName: あ、そういえば前に話したサルバッド産の シアバターをお土産に持って来ていて……
jpnSearchText:
あ、そういえば前に話したサルバッド産の
シアバターをお土産に持って来ていて……

engChrName: Really? Aww, you didn't have to. Thank you!
engSearchText: Really? Aww, you didn't have to. Thank you!
jpnChrName: わっ、いいんですか……！？
jpnSearchText: わっ、いいんですか……！？

engChrName: What a lovely gift, Ms. Saara. I'd be honored to have some.
engSearchText:
What a lovely gift, Ms. Saara. I'd be honored to
have some.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがたく使わせていただきます。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがたく使わせていただきます。

engChrName: Man, chicks love chatting. They're not getting out of there anytime soon, huh?
engSearchText:
Man, chicks love chatting. They're not getting out of
there anytime soon, huh?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、女どもは長引きそうだな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、女どもは長引きそうだな。

engChrName: Eh, it's fine. Let 'em catch up. Why don't we grab some sherbet and kill some time with Quatre, since he's waiting outside?
engSearchText:
Eh, it's fine. Let 'em catch up. Why don't we grab
some sherbet and kill some time with Quatre, since
he's waiting outside?
jpnChrName: まあ、カトルも入らず待ってるし 俺らは先に上がってシャーベットでも食ってるか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、カトルも入らず待ってるし
俺らは先に上がってシャーベットでも食ってるか。

engChrName: I'm so happy for you guys! I'm so glad your performance with Arc en Ciel went great!
engSearchText:
I'm so happy for you guys! I'm so glad your
performance with Arc en Ciel went great!
jpnChrName: そういえば《アルカンシェル》とのコラボ公演も 大成功だったみたいですね！
jpnSearchText:
そういえば《アルカンシェル》とのコラボ公演も
大成功だったみたいですね！

engChrName: Yes, we received your letter about it right after the show concluded.
engSearchText:
Yes, we received your letter about it right after the
show concluded.
jpnChrName: 公演が終わってすぐに 報告のお手紙は頂きましたが。
jpnSearchText:
公演が終わってすぐに
報告のお手紙は頂きましたが。

engChrName: Heehee, I hope you guys didn't mind. We were both so jazzed up about it, I had to tell someone while it was all fresh!
engSearchText:
Heehee, I hope you guys didn't mind. We were both
so jazzed up about it, I had to tell someone while it
was all fresh!
jpnChrName: あたしたちも大興奮だったから！ ちょっとでも醒めないうちに伝えたくて！
jpnSearchText:
あたしたちも大興奮だったから！
ちょっとでも醒めないうちに伝えたくて！

engChrName: I mean, how often do a couple of street dancers like us get to be directed by the Fervent Dancer, Ilya Platiere herself?
engSearchText:
I mean, how often do a couple of street dancers like
us get to be directed by the Fervent Dancer, Ilya
Platiere herself?
jpnChrName: あの“炎の舞姫”に指導してもらって 同じ舞台に立ったんだもん。
jpnSearchText:
あの“炎の舞姫”に指導してもらって
同じ舞台に立ったんだもん。

engChrName: Not that we were intimidated by them or anything. They might be famous, but we kept up with 'em and their routine just fine!
engSearchText:
Not that we were intimidated by them or anything.
They might be famous, but we kept up with 'em and
their routine just fine!
jpnChrName: もちろん共演した以上 あたしたちも本気でついていったけどね！
jpnSearchText:
もちろん共演した以上
あたしたちも本気でついていったけどね！

engChrName: Haha, you never get tired of telling everyone all that, do you? It's all you've talked about ever since we got home.
engSearchText:
Haha, you never get tired of telling everyone all that,
do you? It's all you've talked about ever since we
got home.
jpnChrName: ふふ、シャヒーナったら。 帰ってからずっとその話をしてたものね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、シャヒーナったら。
帰ってからずっとその話をしてたものね。

engChrName: Honestly, I don't actually remember the performance much.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I don't actually remember the
performance much.
jpnChrName: ……でも正直なところ、 私は本番中のことをあまり覚えてなくて。
jpnSearchText:
……でも正直なところ、
私は本番中のことをあまり覚えてなくて。

engChrName: All I remember is the exhilaration once it was all over. It was kind of like I was in a trance.
engSearchText:
All I remember is the exhilaration once it was all over.
It was kind of like I was in a trance.
jpnChrName: 気づいたら高揚感に包まれて終わっていた、 というくらいです。
jpnSearchText:
気づいたら高揚感に包まれて終わっていた、
というくらいです。

engChrName: Yeah, I totally get what you're talking about. When you get so absorbed in a performance everything else vanishes. You could call it a dancer's high.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I totally get what you're talking about. When
you get so absorbed in a performance everything
else vanishes. You could call it a dancer's high.
jpnChrName: ダンサーズハイってヤツだな。 オレも演技に没入するとそんな感じになるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ダンサーズハイってヤツだな。
オレも演技に没入するとそんな感じになるぜ。

engChrName: It sounds like it was a really stimulating and fruitful time, overall.
engSearchText:
It sounds like it was a really stimulating and fruitful
time, overall.
jpnChrName: それだけ刺激的な、濃い時間だったんだね。
jpnSearchText: それだけ刺激的な、濃い時間だったんだね。

engChrName: Absolutely. I wish we could watch you two up on stage, now that you've improved so much.
engSearchText:
Absolutely. I wish we could watch you two up on
stage, now that you've improved so much.
jpnChrName: パワーアップしたお二人の公演、 なおさら生で見たかったですね……
jpnSearchText:
パワーアップしたお二人の公演、
なおさら生で見たかったですね……

engChrName: Unfortunately, it doesn't look like our schedules are going to line up to see your show today. I'm really sorry.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, it doesn't look like our schedules are
going to line up to see your show today. I'm
really sorry.
jpnChrName: 今日の興行も、タイミング的に 私たちは見に行けなさそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
今日の興行も、タイミング的に
私たちは見に行けなさそうですし。

engChrName: Speaking of which, how're we doin' on time?
engSearchText: Speaking of which, how're we doin' on time?
jpnChrName: そういえば、時間は大丈夫なのか？
jpnSearchText: そういえば、時間は大丈夫なのか？

engChrName: You've still got your rehearsal, don't you? You sure it's okay for you to just be hangin' around with us?
engSearchText:
You've still got your rehearsal, don't you? You sure it's
okay for you to just be hangin' around with us?
jpnChrName: リハーサルがあると考えると 結構のんびりしすぎてる気がすんだが。
jpnSearchText:
リハーサルがあると考えると
結構のんびりしすぎてる気がすんだが。

engChrName: It's fine! I double checked everything earlier, so we should still be on time.
engSearchText:
It's fine! I double checked everything earlier, so we
should still be on time.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫大丈夫、 しっかり確認してきてるから。
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫大丈夫、
しっかり確認してきてるから。

engChrName: I'm the one managing our schedule this time, so we've got nothing to...
engSearchText:
I'm the one managing our schedule this time, so we've
got nothing to...
jpnChrName: 今回はきちんとあたしが管理して──
jpnSearchText: 今回はきちんとあたしが管理して──

engChrName: Oh. Oh, NOOOOOO!
engSearchText: Oh. Oh, NOOOOOO!
jpnChrName: ──あああああああっ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>──あああああああっ！？

engChrName: Shaheena? What's the matter?
engSearchText: Shaheena? What's the matter?
jpnChrName: ……シャヒーナ？
jpnSearchText: ……シャヒーナ？

engChrName: We, uh, got a problem.
engSearchText: We, uh, got a problem.
jpnChrName: ……ど、どうしよう、お姉。
jpnSearchText: ……ど、どうしよう、お姉。

engChrName: I totally screwed up our schedule!
engSearchText: I totally screwed up our schedule!
jpnChrName: あたし、時間を 盛大に勘違いしてたみたい……！！
jpnSearchText:
あたし、時間を
盛大に勘違いしてたみたい……！！

engChrName: We've only got a half hour before the rehearsal starts!
engSearchText: We've only got a half hour before the rehearsal starts!
jpnChrName: リハの入り時間まで あと３０分くらいしかないよぉっ！！
jpnSearchText:
リハの入り時間まで
あと３０分くらいしかないよぉっ！！

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: はあっ！？
jpnSearchText: はあっ！？

engChrName: Well, that's not good.
engSearchText: Well, that's not good.
jpnChrName: それってマズいんじゃ……
jpnSearchText: それってマズいんじゃ……

engChrName: I'm SO sorry, Saara! Please don't be mad...
engSearchText: I'm SO sorry, Saara! Please don't be mad...
jpnChrName: ごめん、お姉ぇえ……！
jpnSearchText: ごめん、お姉ぇえ……！

engChrName: It's okay, Shaheena. Time flies when you're with friends. I should've been on top of things, too.
engSearchText:
It's okay, Shaheena. Time flies when you're
with friends. I should've been on top of things, too.
jpnChrName: ううん、確認を怠ってしまった 私も悪かったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、確認を怠ってしまった
私も悪かったわ。

engChrName: But we should get going. Gotta get to the venue soon.
engSearchText:
But we should get going. Gotta get to the
venue soon.
jpnChrName: 皆さんと過ごすのが楽しすぎて…… 今はとにかく会場に向かいましょう！
jpnSearchText:
皆さんと過ごすのが楽しすぎて……
今はとにかく会場に向かいましょう！

engChrName: All right. Let's go. I'll bring the truck around.
engSearchText: All right. Let's go. I'll bring the truck around.
jpnChrName: ついてきな、すぐ車を出す。
jpnSearchText: ついてきな、すぐ車を出す。

engChrName: You don't have to, Van. It's okay.
engSearchText: You don't have to, Van. It's okay.

engChrName: It'll be faster that way.
engSearchText: It'll be faster that way.
jpnChrName: うん、それが良いと思う。
jpnSearchText: うん、それが良いと思う。

engChrName: Knowing the time tables and how long it'll take to get there on foot, you won't make it in time by taking the subway.
engSearchText:
Knowing the time tables and how long it'll take to get
there on foot, you won't make it in time by taking
the subway.
jpnChrName: 時刻表と歩きの時間を考えると 地下鉄じゃもう間に合わない。
jpnSearchText:
時刻表と歩きの時間を考えると
地下鉄じゃもう間に合わない。

engChrName: That is indeed correct. But if you allow Mr. Arkride to drive you, you'll arrive with even a few moments to spare as long as you take the highway.
engSearchText:
That is indeed correct. But if you allow Mr. Arkride
to drive you, you'll arrive with even a few moments to
spare as long as you take the highway.
jpnChrName: その点、ヴァン様のピックアップなら 首都高経由でギリギリ間に合うはずです。
jpnSearchText:
その点、ヴァン様のピックアップなら
首都高経由でギリギリ間に合うはずです。

engChrName: You should go. I'll keep him informed on the current traffic conditions while he's on the road.
engSearchText:
You should go. I'll keep him informed on the current
traffic conditions while he's on the road.
jpnChrName: 随時、交通情報を送りますので すぐにでも出発してください。
jpnSearchText:
随時、交通情報を送りますので
すぐにでも出発してください。

engChrName: What they said. Just go ahead and get your things together. I'll be back in a flash.
engSearchText:
What they said. Just go ahead and get your
things together. I'll be back in a flash.
jpnChrName: そういうこった、 ほら、出してくるから支度しろ！
jpnSearchText:
そういうこった、
ほら、出してくるから支度しろ！

engChrName: All right! Thanks a ton, Van!
engSearchText: All right! Thanks a ton, Van!
jpnChrName: う、うんっ……！
jpnSearchText: う、うんっ……！

engChrName: I'm so sorry we have to take off like this, you guys.
engSearchText: I'm so sorry we have to take off like this, you guys.
jpnChrName: ごめんねみんな、 慌ただしくなっちゃって……！
jpnSearchText:
ごめんねみんな、
慌ただしくなっちゃって……！

engChrName: That's okay! We'll see you two again soon!
engSearchText: That's okay! We'll see you two again soon!
jpnChrName: 気にしないでください……！ また近い内に会いましょう！
jpnSearchText:
気にしないでください……！
また近い内に会いましょう！

engChrName: Van's a great driver. He'll make sure you make it in time! Good luck, you two!
engSearchText:
Van's a great driver. He'll make sure you make it
in time! Good luck, you two!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんならきっと間に合わせてくれます！ どうかお気をつけて……！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんならきっと間に合わせてくれます！
どうかお気をつけて……！

engChrName: Thanks, Agnès! We owe you all one!
engSearchText: Thanks, Agnès! We owe you all one!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Saara and Shaheena climbed into Van's pickup truck and made a beeline for the highway.
engSearchText:
Saara and Shaheena climbed into Van's pickup truck
and made a beeline for the highway.
jpnChrName: サァラ、シャヒーナを乗せたＰＵトラックは そのまま首都高に向かった。
jpnSearchText:
サァラ、シャヒーナを乗せたＰＵトラックは
そのまま首都高に向かった。

engChrName: Unfortunately...
engSearchText: Unfortunately...
jpnChrName: だが──

engChrName: *sigh* This is great. These baths have a different feel to them compared to your average hamam.
engSearchText:
*sigh* This is great. These baths have a different feel
to them compared to your average hamam.
jpnChrName: ああ………いいね。 ハマムとはまた違った趣を感じるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ………いいね。
ハマムとはまた違った趣を感じるよ。

engChrName: They're the best place I know for when you need a pick-me-up.
engSearchText:
They're the best place I know for when you need
a pick-me-up.
jpnChrName: 疲れにはやっぱこれが一番ってね。
jpnSearchText: 疲れにはやっぱこれが一番ってね。

engChrName: Can only imagine what it must be like, talkin' with the big boss.
engSearchText:
Can only imagine what it must be like, talkin' with
the big boss.
jpnChrName: 昼にはあの大統領との会談まで こなしてきたみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
昼にはあの大統領との会談まで
こなしてきたみたいですし。

engChrName: Indeed. I can't go into detail about what we discussed, of course, but one might certainly describe our meeting as...taxing, to say the least.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I can't go into detail about what we discussed,
of course, but one might certainly describe our
meeting as...taxing, to say the least.
jpnChrName: ハハ、内容は話せないが まあ確かに気疲れはしたかもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、内容は話せないが
まあ確かに気疲れはしたかもしれないな。

engChrName: I will say, for a man so powerful, he was fairly candid. Somewhat anticlimactic, really.
engSearchText:
I will say, for a man so powerful, he was fairly candid.
Somewhat anticlimactic, really.
jpnChrName: グラムハート大統領──オーラがありながらも なかなかのフランクぶりで拍子抜けしたくらいだが。
jpnSearchText:
グラムハート大統領──オーラがありながらも
なかなかのフランクぶりで拍子抜けしたくらいだが。

engChrName: But I suppose that's what it takes to win such broad support amongst the public after the distrust garnered following the war and economic crisis.
engSearchText:
But I suppose that's what it takes to win such broad
support amongst the public after the distrust garnered
following the war and economic crisis.
jpnChrName: さすが、大戦や経済危機での政治不信を完全に払拭して 老若男女問わず支持されるだけはある。
jpnSearchText:
さすが、大戦や経済危機での政治不信を完全に払拭して
老若男女問わず支持されるだけはある。

engChrName: He's a force to be reckoned with, that's for damn sure. I know he's up to something with René.
engSearchText:
He's a force to be reckoned with, that's for
damn sure. I know he's up to something with René.
jpnChrName: まあ、相当なやり手なのは確かでしょうね。 ルネと裏で進めている何かといい。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、相当なやり手なのは確かでしょうね。
ルネと裏で進めている何かといい。

engChrName: Between you and me, I believe my sister would've done a far better job navigating that conversation than I did.
engSearchText:
Between you and me, I believe my sister would've
done a far better job navigating that conversation
than I did.
jpnChrName: ハハ、もしかすると私ではなく妹だったら もっと器用に立ち回っていたかもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、もしかすると私ではなく妹だったら
もっと器用に立ち回っていたかもしれないな。

engChrName: I forgot you had a sister. Isn't she a fair bit younger than you?
engSearchText:
I forgot you had a sister. Isn't she a fair bit younger
than you?
