jpnChrName: ああ、妹君がいらっしゃるんでしたね。 だいぶ歳が離れた。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、妹君がいらっしゃるんでしたね。
だいぶ歳が離れた。

engChrName: That's right—though her age belies her intellect. Her mind is quite sharp, but unfortunately, her tongue is far sharper.
engSearchText:
That's right—though her age belies her intellect.
Her mind is quite sharp, but unfortunately, her
tongue is far sharper.
jpnChrName: これがまた、私の立つ瀬が無くなるくらい 頭の切れる娘でね。
jpnSearchText:
これがまた、私の立つ瀬が無くなるくらい
頭の切れる娘でね。

engChrName: She always feels the need to get a word in edgewise— under the pretext of supporting me as the heir to Elsaim's throne.
engSearchText:
She always feels the need to get a word in edgewise—
under the pretext of supporting me as the heir to
Elsaim's throne.
jpnChrName: 王位継承予定ながら不甲斐ない兄を支えようと、 何かと口を出してくる始末さ。
jpnSearchText:
王位継承予定ながら不甲斐ない兄を支えようと、
何かと口を出してくる始末さ。

engChrName: She and my father, the grand prince, both have lofty expectations for me. I hope that, when the time comes, I'll be able to meet them.
engSearchText:
She and my father, the grand prince, both have lofty
expectations for me. I hope that, when the time
comes, I'll be able to meet them.
jpnChrName: そんな妹や、偉大な父── サルマン公王の期待に応えられればと思っている。
jpnSearchText:
そんな妹や、偉大な父──
サルマン公王の期待に応えられればと思っている。

engChrName: Sounds pretty rough. You've got a lot ridin' on your shoulders.
engSearchText:
Sounds pretty rough. You've got a lot ridin' on
your shoulders.
jpnChrName: へえ……
jpnSearchText: へえ……

engChrName: You're not wrong. I wish to broaden my horizons, all so I can make Elsaim a nation capable of standing on par with Zemuria's great powers.
engSearchText:
You're not wrong. I wish to broaden my horizons, all
so I can make Elsaim a nation capable of standing on
par with Zemuria's great powers.
jpnChrName: 大国に劣らぬ国作りをするためなら、 学べることはすべて学びたい。
jpnSearchText:
大国に劣らぬ国作りをするためなら、
学べることはすべて学びたい。

engChrName: That's why I decided to come to the Republic. I wanted to study it and take in as much as I could.
engSearchText:
That's why I decided to come to the Republic.
I wanted to study it and take in as much as I could.
jpnChrName: だから今の共和国を 隅々まで見て回ろうと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
だから今の共和国を
隅々まで見て回ろうと思ってね。

engChrName: That was the plan, anyway. Despite that, all I did at first was indulge, night after night. Not that I didn't enjoy that, mind you.
engSearchText:
That was the plan, anyway. Despite that, all I did at
first was indulge, night after night. Not that I didn't
enjoy that, mind you.
jpnChrName: という具合に意気揚々と まずは夜遊びへ繰り出したものの──
jpnSearchText:
という具合に意気揚々と
まずは夜遊びへ繰り出したものの──

engChrName: But that free time just left me thinking...
engSearchText: But that free time just left me thinking...
jpnChrName: 気づけば同じことばかり考えてしまっていた。
jpnSearchText: 気づけば同じことばかり考えてしまっていた。

engChrName: 'What would he say, if he were here? What would he do, if he was in my shoes?'
engSearchText:
'What would he say, if he were here? What would he
do, if he was in my shoes?'
jpnChrName: 『彼ならここで何と言うだろう？』 『どう振る舞うだろう？』とね。
jpnSearchText:
『彼ならここで何と言うだろう？』
『どう振る舞うだろう？』とね。

engChrName: 'He'? Who're you...? Oh, you mean that wandering bard, yeah?
engSearchText:
'He'? Who're you...? Oh, you mean that wandering
bard, yeah?
jpnChrName: 彼…… ああ──“漂泊の演奏家”ですか？
jpnSearchText:
彼……
ああ──“漂泊の演奏家”ですか？

engChrName: Claussell knows him. She told me a little about him while we were in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Claussell knows him. She told me a little about him
while we were in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: サルバッドで、クラウゼルから そんな繋がりをチラッと聞きましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドで、クラウゼルから
そんな繋がりをチラッと聞きましたよ。

engChrName: He's quite the guy. I caught wind of a lot of what he got up to through work two years ago.
engSearchText:
He's quite the guy. I caught wind of a lot of what he
got up to through work two years ago.
jpnChrName: だいぶ突き抜けたお人らしいですね。 ２年前の仕事で色々と耳にしましたが。
jpnSearchText:
だいぶ突き抜けたお人らしいですね。
２年前の仕事で色々と耳にしましたが。

engChrName: The very same. He traveled the continent from a young age, advocating for harmony between nations.
engSearchText:
The very same. He traveled the continent from a
young age, advocating for harmony between nations.
jpnChrName: そう──彼は若い頃から諸国を渡り歩き、 “国際協調”を唱えていた。
jpnSearchText:
そう──彼は若い頃から諸国を渡り歩き、
“国際協調”を唱えていた。

engChrName: I had the pleasure of meeting him once before. He'd come to visit Elsaim, and I saw first-hand what kind of man he really was.
engSearchText:
I had the pleasure of meeting him once before.
He'd come to visit Elsaim, and I saw first-hand what
kind of man he really was.
jpnChrName: かつてエルザイムを訪れた時に知った、 彼の信念と生き様に……
jpnSearchText:
かつてエルザイムを訪れた時に知った、
彼の信念と生き様に……

engChrName: Quite the charmer, he is. It wasn't long before I held him in the highest esteem.
engSearchText:
Quite the charmer, he is. It wasn't long before I held
him in the highest esteem.
jpnChrName: いつしか尊敬と敬意を抱くようになった。
jpnSearchText: いつしか尊敬と敬意を抱くようになった。

engChrName: And that's what I've been chasing this whole time. Following his example, growing and bettering myself for that goal.
engSearchText:
And that's what I've been chasing this whole time.
Following his example, growing and bettering myself
for that goal.
jpnChrName: 私もかく在りたい── そう願い己を磨いているつもりだが……
jpnSearchText:
私もかく在りたい──
そう願い己を磨いているつもりだが……

engChrName: I fear, however, that I can never measure up to him. He's special in his own right, and I worry I'll never reach the pedestal I've put him on.
engSearchText:
I fear, however, that I can never measure up to him.
He's special in his own right, and I worry I'll never
reach the pedestal I've put him on.
jpnChrName: 事あるごとに、彼には届かないのだと 器の違いを自覚するばかりでね。
jpnSearchText:
事あるごとに、彼には届かないのだと
器の違いを自覚するばかりでね。

engChrName: It feels as though I'm following after a mirage in the desert, so tantalizing, yet forever just out of my reach.
engSearchText:
It feels as though I'm following after a mirage in the
desert, so tantalizing, yet forever just out of my reach.
jpnChrName: まるで砂漠の蜃気楼を 目指しているかのような心地さ。
jpnSearchText:
まるで砂漠の蜃気楼を
目指しているかのような心地さ。

engChrName: ...Huh. No offense, but that kinda caught me off guard. Didn't realize you had such deep thoughts.
engSearchText:
...Huh. No offense, but that kinda caught me off
guard. Didn't realize you had such deep thoughts.
jpnChrName: ……ちょっと意外ですね。 殿下がそんな殊勝なことを考えていたとは。
jpnSearchText:
……ちょっと意外ですね。
殿下がそんな殊勝なことを考えていたとは。

engChrName: Not like I wanna tell you what to do or anything, but it looks to me like you gotta start livin' your own life.
engSearchText:
Not like I wanna tell you what to do or anything, but
it looks to me like you gotta start livin' your
own life.
jpnChrName: ま、失礼を承知で１つ言えるとしたら── すべては自分自身が何をしたいか、でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、失礼を承知で１つ言えるとしたら──
すべては自分自身が何をしたいか、でしょう。

engChrName: My own life? Elaborate.
engSearchText: My own life? Elaborate.
jpnChrName: 自分自身……？
jpnSearchText: 自分自身……？

engChrName: At the end of the day, you gotta strive for somethin' more than just being a copycat. Can't always live in his shadow.
engSearchText:
At the end of the day, you gotta strive for somethin'
more than just being a copycat. Can't always live in
his shadow.
jpnChrName: 殿下はその“演奏家”の模造品（レプリカ）に なりたいわけじゃあないんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
殿下はその“演奏家”の模造品（レプリカ）に
なりたいわけじゃあないんでしょう？

engChrName: You're the only one that can choose how to live your life.
engSearchText:
You're the only one that can choose how to live
your life.
jpnChrName: 進むべき道を選ぶのは、あくまで自分──
jpnSearchText: 進むべき道を選ぶのは、あくまで自分──

engChrName: So what if you get a little lost in that desert? It's not all sand. An oasis will pop up here and there, for you to rest when you're weary.
engSearchText:
So what if you get a little lost in that desert? It's not
all sand. An oasis will pop up here and there, for you
to rest when you're weary.
jpnChrName: その上で砂漠を進むなら結構。 途中、オアシスに寄り道したっていい。
jpnSearchText:
その上で砂漠を進むなら結構。
途中、オアシスに寄り道したっていい。

engChrName: And you know how I'm so sure? 'Cause there are suckers like me who choose to be a spriggan. Now that's a dark and uncertain path.
engSearchText:
And you know how I'm so sure? 'Cause there are
suckers like me who choose to be a spriggan.
Now that's a dark and uncertain path.
jpnChrName: わざわざ胡散臭い裏解決屋なんて稼業を 選ぶ奴もいるくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
わざわざ胡散臭い裏解決屋なんて稼業を
選ぶ奴もいるくらいだ。

engChrName: But what I'm tryin' to get at is that there's not just one way to live a life, or achieve a goal. Everyone has their own compass.
engSearchText:
But what I'm tryin' to get at is that there's not just
one way to live a life, or achieve a goal. Everyone has
their own compass.
jpnChrName: 目的地への辿り着き方なんざ、人それぞれですよ。
jpnSearchText: 目的地への辿り着き方なんざ、人それぞれですよ。

engChrName: But what do I know, really. I'm just an outcast, so maybe don't put so much stock in what I say.
engSearchText:
But what do I know, really. I'm just an outcast, so
maybe don't put so much stock in what I say.
jpnChrName: ……ま、俺みたいな外れ者が おこがましいかもしれませんがね。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、俺みたいな外れ者が
おこがましいかもしれませんがね。

engChrName: On the contrary, my friend. What you've said has done a lot to put my mind and heart at ease.
engSearchText:
On the contrary, my friend. What you've said has
done a lot to put my mind and heart at ease.
jpnChrName: ハハ……いや、胸に落ちた気分さ。 まさか君に諭されるとはね。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……いや、胸に落ちた気分さ。
まさか君に諭されるとはね。

engChrName: I never thought I'd be taking life lessons from the likes of you. It seems you've perhaps lived a richer life than I first thought.
engSearchText:
I never thought I'd be taking life lessons from the
likes of you. It seems you've perhaps lived a richer life
than I first thought.
jpnChrName: 君は私が思っている以上に 人生経験が豊富なのかもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
君は私が思っている以上に
人生経験が豊富なのかもしれないな。

engChrName: 'Richer' is one way of puttin' it. Dunno if I agree, though. I'm just a handyman who's been in the business for a while now.
engSearchText:
'Richer' is one way of puttin' it. Dunno if I
agree, though. I'm just a handyman who's been in the
business for a while now.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… あくまでしがない便利屋風情ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
あくまでしがない便利屋風情ですよ。

engChrName: Did you have a nice bath, Your Highness? I've come to pick you up.
engSearchText:
Did you have a nice bath, Your Highness? I've come
to pick you up.
jpnChrName: ──お疲れ様です。 お迎えにあがりました、殿下。
jpnSearchText:
──お疲れ様です。
お迎えにあがりました、殿下。

engChrName: Well, you finally found me, Naje. Or, knowing you, you probably didn't even lose me in the first place.
engSearchText:
Well, you finally found me, Naje. Or, knowing you,
you probably didn't even lose me in the first place.
jpnChrName: おっと、ついに見つかったか。 いや、あえて見逃していてくれたのかな？
jpnSearchText:
おっと、ついに見つかったか。
いや、あえて見逃していてくれたのかな？

engChrName: I'm leanin' towards the latter. I definitely found it strange you somehow managed to shake off Zemuria's most fearsome bodyguard.
engSearchText:
I'm leanin' towards the latter. I definitely found it
strange you somehow managed to shake off
Zemuria's most fearsome bodyguard.
jpnChrName: あの護衛官殿が殿下に逃げられたってのは 最初から違和感がありましたけどね。
jpnSearchText:
あの護衛官殿が殿下に逃げられたってのは
最初から違和感がありましたけどね。

engChrName: I'll take that as a compliment. Had it been anyone else but you, I wouldn't have allowed him to remain alone.
engSearchText:
I'll take that as a compliment. Had it been anyone
else but you, I wouldn't have allowed him to
remain alone.
jpnChrName: 恐れ入ります──アークライド殿が ご一緒なのが最低条件ではありましたが。
jpnSearchText:
恐れ入ります──アークライド殿が
ご一緒なのが最低条件ではありましたが。

engChrName: So long as His Highness had a fruitful night out, I suppose it was worth the trouble.
engSearchText:
So long as His Highness had a fruitful night out, I
suppose it was worth the trouble.
jpnChrName: ……多少なりとも 収穫があったならば何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
……多少なりとも
収穫があったならば何よりです。

engChrName: Haha. There you go, always a step ahead of me.
engSearchText: Haha. There you go, always a step ahead of me.
jpnChrName: フフ、本当に敵わないな、ナージェには。
jpnSearchText: フフ、本当に敵わないな、ナージェには。

engChrName: Thank you, Van. I learned a lot during our rendezvous this evening.
engSearchText:
Thank you, Van. I learned a lot during our
rendezvous this evening.
jpnChrName: 礼を言うよ、ヴァン君。 今宵は良い社会勉強になった。
jpnSearchText:
礼を言うよ、ヴァン君。
今宵は良い社会勉強になった。

engChrName: I feel as though I've peered a little more into those unknowable depths of yours.
engSearchText:
I feel as though I've peered a little more into those
unknowable depths of yours.
jpnChrName: 底の見えない君という人を また少し知れた気がする。
jpnSearchText:
底の見えない君という人を
また少し知れた気がする。

engChrName: I pray you find great success with your assignment in Basel, not only as a client who's retained your services...
engSearchText:
I pray you find great success with your assignment in
Basel, not only as a client who's retained
your services...
jpnChrName: バーゼル市の件、成果に期待している。 依頼者としてはもちろん──
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル市の件、成果に期待している。
依頼者としてはもちろん──

engChrName: ...but as a friend who has bared much to you now, literally and figuratively.
engSearchText:
...but as a friend who has bared much to you now,
literally and figuratively.
jpnChrName: 裸の付き合いをした仲としてもね。
jpnSearchText: 裸の付き合いをした仲としてもね。

engChrName: Thanks, Your Highness. I promise we'll do what we can to deliver you results.
engSearchText:
Thanks, Your Highness. I promise we'll do what we
can to deliver you results.
jpnChrName: まあ、依頼は依頼だ。 せいぜい頑張らせてもらいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、依頼は依頼だ。
せいぜい頑張らせてもらいますよ。

engChrName: This hasn't been such a bad night after all.
engSearchText: This hasn't been such a bad night after all.
jpnChrName: ま、こんな夜も悪くないな。
jpnSearchText: ま、こんな夜も悪くないな。

engChrName: Oh, damn. I just remembered Paulette's old man wanted to see me.
engSearchText:
Oh, damn. I just remembered Paulette's old man
wanted to see me.
jpnChrName: おっと、そういやおやっさんに 顔だせって言われてたんだったな。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、そういやおやっさんに
顔だせって言われてたんだったな。

engChrName: There you are, you buffoon.
engSearchText: There you are, you buffoon.
jpnChrName: おう、来たか。
jpnSearchText: おう、来たか。

engChrName: Yep, that's me. What's up? Somethin' urgent?
engSearchText: Yep, that's me. What's up? Somethin' urgent?
jpnChrName: それで、何か急ぎの要件かい？
jpnSearchText: それで、何か急ぎの要件かい？

engChrName: Hold on a sec. You'll find out soon enough.
engSearchText: Hold on a sec. You'll find out soon enough.
jpnChrName: ま、ちょっと待ってろ。
jpnSearchText: ま、ちょっと待ってろ。

engChrName: Here we go. Take a look at this.
engSearchText: Here we go. Take a look at this.
jpnChrName: ほら、こいつなんだがな。
jpnSearchText: ほら、こいつなんだがな。

engChrName: Oh, that's...
engSearchText: Oh, that's...
jpnChrName: あっ、これって……
jpnSearchText: あっ、これって……

engChrName: Wow! They're like the galettes we had back in Creil!
engSearchText: Wow! They're like the galettes we had back in Creil!
jpnChrName: わぁ…… クレイユ村で食べたガレットです！
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……
クレイユ村で食べたガレットです！

engChrName: From your reactions, I take it mine's a good match for the real thing. Good, good.
engSearchText:
From your reactions, I take it mine's a good match for
the real thing. Good, good.
jpnChrName: よしよし、 その反応だと出来は悪くないみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
よしよし、
その反応だと出来は悪くないみたいだな。

engChrName: More than good. It looks perfect to me. You did great as always, Victor.
engSearchText:
More than good. It looks perfect to me. You did great
as always, Victor.
jpnChrName: ああ、流石おやっさんだな、 見た目は完璧だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、流石おやっさんだな、
見た目は完璧だ。

engChrName: Looks perfect? It TASTES perfect, punk! Try one for yourself and you'll see.
engSearchText:
Looks perfect? It TASTES perfect, punk! Try one for
yourself and you'll see.
jpnChrName: 馬鹿野郎、味も完璧だ！ ほら、くれてやるからじっくり味わえ。
jpnSearchText:
馬鹿野郎、味も完璧だ！
ほら、くれてやるからじっくり味わえ。

engChrName: Received a large helping of  .
engSearchText:
Received a large helping of
.
jpnChrName: 大皿料理{CC_ITEM=ITEM_COOK_01}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: 大皿料理{CC_ITEM=ITEM_COOK_01}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Thank you so much for that! That was wonderful! How did you manage to figure out the recipe?
engSearchText:
Thank you so much for that! That was wonderful!
How did you manage to figure out the recipe?
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます！ でも、こちらの料理はどうされたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます！
でも、こちらの料理はどうされたんですか？

engChrName: You kids told me about the food you had in that village, remember?
engSearchText:
You kids told me about the food you had in that
village, remember?
jpnChrName: ああ、この前お前たちから クレイユ村の料理の話を聞いただろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この前お前たちから
クレイユ村の料理の話を聞いただろ。

engChrName: Well, I gleaned some more insight from an expert and decided to take a stab at recreating it, myself.
engSearchText:
Well, I gleaned some more insight from an expert
and decided to take a stab at recreating it, myself.
jpnChrName: で、今日ちょうど詳しいやつから 話を聞けたんで再現してみたってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
で、今日ちょうど詳しいやつから
話を聞けたんで再現してみたってわけだ。

engChrName: An expert? Who was it?
engSearchText: An expert? Who was it?
jpnChrName: この料理に詳しい人ですか？
jpnSearchText: この料理に詳しい人ですか？

engChrName: My vegetable supplier from Creil. He's in the back right now, but he'll be out on the main floor later.
engSearchText:
My vegetable supplier from Creil. He's in the back
right now, but he'll be out on the main floor later.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村から野菜を卸しに来てもらっててな。 今は奥にいってるが、あとで店の方に出てくるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村から野菜を卸しに来てもらっててな。
今は奥にいってるが、あとで店の方に出てくるだろ。

engChrName: I'm surprised you of all people wanted to recreate a recipe rather than come up with your own. That doesn't happen very often.
engSearchText:
I'm surprised you of all people wanted to recreate a
recipe rather than come up with your own.
That doesn't happen very often.
jpnChrName: しかし、他の料理の再現って 頑固なおやっさんにしては珍しいな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、他の料理の再現って
頑固なおやっさんにしては珍しいな。

engChrName: Well, after hearing your story, Yumé said she wanted to try it and...you know...
engSearchText:
Well, after hearing your story, Yumé said she wanted
to try it and...you know...
jpnChrName: いや、お前らの話を聞いたユメが 食べたいって言うからよ……
jpnSearchText:
いや、お前らの話を聞いたユメが
食べたいって言うからよ……

engChrName: Granddad can't say no to his precious little granddaughter. Of course.
engSearchText:
Granddad can't say no to his precious
little granddaughter. Of course.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、相変わらず溺愛だな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、相変わらず溺愛だな。

engChrName: I'll admit, it's been refreshing trying my hand at making something different.
engSearchText:
I'll admit, it's been refreshing trying my hand at
making something different.
jpnChrName: だが、こうやって他の料理を作ってみると なかなか刺激があって悪く無いと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、こうやって他の料理を作ってみると
なかなか刺激があって悪く無いと思ってな。

engChrName: That's where you all come in. If you find more interesting dishes, I want to know. I won't put them on the menu, but I'll make them for free.
engSearchText:
That's where you all come in. If you find more
interesting dishes, I want to know. I won't put them
on the menu, but I'll make them for free.
jpnChrName: でだ、お前ら面白い料理を食ったら俺に聞かせろ。 店では出せねーが、料金はロハで再現してやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
でだ、お前ら面白い料理を食ったら俺に聞かせろ。
店では出せねーが、料金はロハで再現してやるよ。

engChrName: Really? Are you sure? I feel like we'd be imposing if we didn't give you anything in return.
engSearchText:
Really? Are you sure? I feel like we'd be imposing if
we didn't give you anything in return.
jpnChrName: ロハって……無料って事ですよね。 そんなの悪いです。
jpnSearchText:
ロハって……無料って事ですよね。
そんなの悪いです。

engChrName: It's fine. It'll help me flex my cooking muscles. Just get me the necessary ingredients and we'll call it even.
engSearchText:
It's fine. It'll help me flex my cooking muscles.
Just get me the necessary ingredients and we'll call
it even.
jpnChrName: いや、俺もいい腕試しになるからな。 その代わり、材料はそっちで用意してこいよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、俺もいい腕試しになるからな。
その代わり、材料はそっちで用意してこいよ。

engChrName: Sounds fair to me, especially since we'll get to take the dishes.
engSearchText:
Sounds fair to me, especially since we'll get to take
the dishes.
jpnChrName: そういう条件かよ。 ま、こっちも助かりそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
そういう条件かよ。
ま、こっちも助かりそうだな。

engChrName: We'll be sure to tell you about any good eats we find along the way, and you can work your magic.
engSearchText:
We'll be sure to tell you about any good eats we find
along the way, and you can work your magic.
jpnChrName: わかった、これから面白い料理を食ったら たまに報告させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
わかった、これから面白い料理を食ったら
たまに報告させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Perfect. Looking forward to hearing what you kids find.
engSearchText:
Perfect. Looking forward to hearing what you
kids find.
jpnChrName: おう、たのんだぞ。
jpnSearchText: おう、たのんだぞ。

engChrName: Well, we'd better get moving now. Gang, let's roll.
engSearchText: Well, we'd better get moving now. Gang, let's roll.
jpnChrName: んじゃ、行くとすっか。
jpnSearchText: んじゃ、行くとすっか。

engChrName: Oh, I just remembered something. Aida dropped this when we fought. Here.
engSearchText:
Oh, I just remembered something. Aida dropped this
when we fought. Here.
jpnChrName: そういえば……アイーダさんと戦った時に こんなものを拾っていたんでした。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……アイーダさんと戦った時に
こんなものを拾っていたんでした。

engChrName: Is that what I think it is?
engSearchText: Is that what I think it is?
jpnChrName: そいつはもしかして……
jpnSearchText: そいつはもしかして……

engChrName: That's...the holo core she used to use?
engSearchText: That's...the holo core she used to use?
jpnChrName: ……アイーダさんが 使っておられたホロウコアですか？
jpnSearchText:
……アイーダさんが
使っておられたホロウコアですか？

engChrName: Yup. It is.
engSearchText: Yup. It is.
jpnChrName: ええ……間違いありません。
jpnSearchText: ええ……間違いありません。

engChrName: You'd normally return this sort of thing to Eisenschild.
engSearchText:
You'd normally return this sort of thing
to Eisenschild.
jpnChrName: 本来ならアイゼンシルトの方たちに お返しすべきだったかもしれませんが……
jpnSearchText:
本来ならアイゼンシルトの方たちに
お返しすべきだったかもしれませんが……

engChrName: But when I asked Commander Geraint if they wanted it back, he said they didn't need it.
engSearchText:
But when I asked Commander Geraint if they
wanted it back, he said they didn't need it.
jpnChrName: ゲラントさんに言ったら、 その必要はないって言われたんです。
jpnSearchText:
ゲラントさんに言ったら、
その必要はないって言われたんです。

engChrName: Well, of course they don't. That's 'cause you should hold on to it, sport.
engSearchText:
Well, of course they don't. That's 'cause you should
hold on to it, sport.
jpnChrName: ああ、そいつはお前が 持っているべきものだと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そいつはお前が
持っているべきものだと思うぜ。

engChrName: I think so, too. It's only right you keep it.
engSearchText: I think so, too. It's only right you keep it.
jpnChrName: ……私もそう思います。
jpnSearchText: ……私もそう思います。

engChrName: Yeah, maybe you guys are right... And it's probably what Aida wanted, too.
engSearchText:
Yeah, maybe you guys are right... And it's probably
what Aida wanted, too.
jpnChrName: そうですね……アイーダさんもきっと そう言ってくれる気がします。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……アイーダさんもきっと
そう言ってくれる気がします。

engChrName: But she probably didn't want just me to have it. I think we can all make good use of it.
engSearchText:
But she probably didn't want just me to have it.
I think we can all make good use of it.
jpnChrName: それもわたしだけじゃなく、 事務所で有効活用しろと言われそうです。
jpnSearchText:
それもわたしだけじゃなく、
事務所で有効活用しろと言われそうです。

engChrName: It's your call, since you knew her better than we did. Let's keep a hold of it. I'm sure it'll come in handy for all of us.
engSearchText:
It's your call, since you knew her better than we did.
Let's keep a hold of it. I'm sure it'll come in handy for
all of us.
jpnChrName: ま、そいつを戦術的に使うってんなら 状況に応じて使い分けた方がいいのは確かだな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そいつを戦術的に使うってんなら
状況に応じて使い分けた方がいいのは確かだな。

engChrName: That sound good to you?
engSearchText: That sound good to you?
jpnChrName: そういうことなら、 俺たちでせいぜい活用させてもらおうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そういうことなら、
俺たちでせいぜい活用させてもらおうぜ。

engChrName: Yeah, that sounds perfect!
engSearchText: Yeah, that sounds perfect!
jpnChrName: はい、そうしましょう……！
jpnSearchText: はい、そうしましょう……！

engChrName: Received a large helping of  .
engSearchText:
Received a large helping of
.
jpnChrName: 大皿料理{CC_ITEM=ITEM_COOK_01}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: 大皿料理{CC_ITEM=ITEM_COOK_01}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Received the Sallos holo core.
engSearchText: Received the Sallos holo core.
jpnChrName: ホロウコア『Sallos -サロス-』を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ホロウコア『Sallos -サロス-』を手に入れた。

engChrName: You can now change each party member's holo core.
engSearchText: You can now change each party member's holo core.
jpnChrName: ホロウコアを切り替えられるようになった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ホロウコアを切り替えられるようになった。

engChrName: I recognize that bike.
engSearchText: I recognize that bike.
jpnChrName: このバイクは……
jpnSearchText: このバイクは……

engChrName: Sorry to bother you while you're out—but still, I'm glad I caught you.
engSearchText:
Sorry to bother you while you're out—but still, I'm
glad I caught you.
jpnChrName: フフ、お出かけの所悪いわね。 けど丁度よかった。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、お出かけの所悪いわね。
けど丁度よかった。

engChrName: I only know one woman that looks and sounds like that. Good to see you, Hermès.
engSearchText:
I only know one woman that looks and sounds
like that. Good to see you, Hermès.
jpnChrName: その出で立ちに声── やっぱバイク便のエルメスかよ。
jpnSearchText:
その出で立ちに声──
やっぱバイク便のエルメスかよ。

engChrName: Evening, Arkride.
engSearchText: Evening, Arkride.
jpnChrName: こんばんは、アークライド。
jpnSearchText: こんばんは、アークライド。

engChrName: Don't think I've seen you since I took on that little delivery job earlier.
engSearchText:
Don't think I've seen you since I took on that little
delivery job earlier.
jpnChrName: 前にちょっとした 運びの仕事を引き受けて以来かしら。
jpnSearchText:
前にちょっとした
運びの仕事を引き受けて以来かしら。

engChrName: Guess so. Thanks for that. You were a big help.
engSearchText: Guess so. Thanks for that. You were a big help.
jpnChrName: ああ、その節は世話んなったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その節は世話んなったな。

engChrName: I don't think I asked you to come pick anything up tonight, though. I can't be goin' senile this young. So what's up?
engSearchText:
I don't think I asked you to come pick anything up
tonight, though. I can't be goin' senile this young.
So what's up?
jpnChrName: だが今夜はデリバリーを頼んだ覚えはねえぜ？
jpnSearchText: だが今夜はデリバリーを頼んだ覚えはねえぜ？

engChrName: Your CID buddy had something he wanted to give you.
engSearchText:
Your CID buddy had something he wanted to
give you.
jpnChrName: 貴方の知り合いの ＣＩＤの分析官からの依頼でね。
jpnSearchText:
貴方の知り合いの
ＣＩＤの分析官からの依頼でね。

engChrName: Said it was thanks for taking care of some wanted monster. And that he was throwing in a little something extra, like you asked.
engSearchText:
Said it was thanks for taking care of some
wanted monster. And that he was throwing in a little
something extra, like you asked.
jpnChrName: 『手配魔獣の討伐、ご苦労だった。   お望み通り初回限定で特別に色を付けてやる』
jpnSearchText:
『手配魔獣の討伐、ご苦労だった。
お望み通り初回限定で特別に色を付けてやる』

engChrName: Here you go. All yours.
engSearchText: Here you go. All yours.
jpnChrName: ──だそうよ。どうぞ受け取って頂戴。
jpnSearchText: ──だそうよ。どうぞ受け取って頂戴。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_ARTSDRIVER_006}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_ARTSDRIVER_006}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_CP_100}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_CP_100}を手に入れた。

engChrName: An arts driver? Nice. That'll come in handy.
engSearchText: An arts driver? Nice. That'll come in handy.
jpnChrName: ハッ、それなりに使えそうな アーツドライバじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、それなりに使えそうな
アーツドライバじゃねえか。

engChrName: Guess he was feeling pretty generous.
engSearchText: Guess he was feeling pretty generous.
jpnChrName: ハッ、わざわざご丁寧なこって。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、わざわざご丁寧なこって。

engChrName: Hell, I'm surprised he took me seriously. Not that I'm complainin'.
engSearchText:
Hell, I'm surprised he took me seriously. Not that
I'm complainin'.
jpnChrName: つうかルネの奴、 俺の言ったことを真に受けんのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
つうかルネの奴、
俺の言ったことを真に受けんのかよ。

engChrName: I don't know what the deal is between the two of you, but it's probably a sign that he trusts you enough to rely on you.
engSearchText:
I don't know what the deal is between the two of you,
but it's probably a sign that he trusts you enough to
rely on you.
jpnChrName: フフ、事情は知らないけど それだけ頼られてるってことじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、事情は知らないけど
それだけ頼られてるってことじゃない？

engChrName: Anyway, my job here is done.
engSearchText: Anyway, my job here is done.
jpnChrName: とにかく荷物は渡したわよ。
jpnSearchText: とにかく荷物は渡したわよ。

engChrName: Thanks for getting it to me. I appreciate you doing that on a night like this.
engSearchText:
Thanks for getting it to me. I appreciate you doing
that on a night like this.
jpnChrName: ああ、確かに受け取った。 こんな夜にわざわざあんがとな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、確かに受け取った。
こんな夜にわざわざあんがとな。

engChrName: All in a day's work.
engSearchText: All in a day's work.
jpnChrName: フフ、どういたしまして。
jpnSearchText: フフ、どういたしまして。

engChrName: Actually, there's something else I wanted to tell you since you're here, Arkride.
engSearchText:
Actually, there's something else I wanted to tell you
since you're here, Arkride.
jpnChrName: そうそう、ついでにアークライドに 伝えておきたいことがあってね。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、ついでにアークライドに
伝えておきたいことがあってね。

engChrName: I just started a new special delivery service I'm offering only to my most loyal customers.
engSearchText:
I just started a new special delivery service I'm
offering only to my most loyal customers.
jpnChrName: 実は最近、お得意様向けに 特別なバイク便サービスを始めたの。
jpnSearchText:
実は最近、お得意様向けに
特別なバイク便サービスを始めたの。

engChrName: If you need food, meds, weapons, whatever, just ask and I'll run out and grab it for you. Sweet deal, right?
engSearchText:
If you need food, meds, weapons, whatever, just ask
and I'll run out and grab it for you. Sweet deal, right?
jpnChrName: 食べ物に薬、武器でも何でも 代行で買い物して配達するっていう、ね。
jpnSearchText:
食べ物に薬、武器でも何でも
代行で買い物して配達するっていう、ね。

engChrName: Yeah. That's real convenient.
engSearchText: Yeah. That's real convenient.
jpnChrName: へえ、そいつは便利そうだな。
jpnSearchText: へえ、そいつは便利そうだな。

engChrName: Of course, nothing's free. I still expect a commission for my trouble, and it can only be stuff that's available here in Edith.
engSearchText:
Of course, nothing's free. I still expect a commission
for my trouble, and it can only be stuff that's available
here in Edith.
jpnChrName: もちろん手数料はいただくし、 首都のお店で買えるものに限るけどね。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん手数料はいただくし、
首都のお店で買えるものに限るけどね。

engChrName: But if that works for you, just hit me up whenever you need something and I'll get it straight to you as soon as humanly possible.
engSearchText:
But if that works for you, just hit me up whenever you
need something and I'll get it straight to you as soon
as humanly possible.
jpnChrName: 一声かけてくれれば、この事務所まで 速攻で届けさせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
一声かけてくれれば、この事務所まで
速攻で届けさせてもらうわ。

engChrName: Got any questions?
engSearchText: Got any questions?
jpnChrName: 気が向いたら遠慮なく連絡して頂戴。
jpnSearchText: 気が向いたら遠慮なく連絡して頂戴。

engChrName: Nah. All's clear. Expect me to take advantage of it in the future.
engSearchText:
Nah. All's clear. Expect me to take advantage of it in
the future.
jpnChrName: 了解だ、ぜひとも利用させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: 了解だ、ぜひとも利用させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Looking forward to it. Well, I don't want to keep my next customer waiting, so I'll get going. Good night.
engSearchText:
Looking forward to it. Well, I don't want to keep my
next customer waiting, so I'll get going. Good night.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、私は次の仕事があるから。 ──よい夜を。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、私は次の仕事があるから。
──よい夜を。

engChrName: Is that the new device?
engSearchText: Is that the new device?
jpnChrName: えっと、これがその端末ですか？
jpnSearchText: えっと、これがその端末ですか？

engChrName: Yes. This is a beta version of the Virtual Combat Simulator the Marduk Company is currently testing.
engSearchText:
Yes. This is a beta version of the Virtual Combat
Simulator the Marduk Company is currently testing.
jpnChrName: はい、ＭＫ社の方で試験運用中の 『仮想戦闘シミュレーターβ版』となります。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ＭＫ社の方で試験運用中の
『仮想戦闘シミュレーターβ版』となります。

engChrName: Virtual, huh? That sounds pretty neat.
engSearchText: Virtual, huh? That sounds pretty neat.
jpnChrName: 仮想戦闘シミュレーター、ねえ。
jpnSearchText: 仮想戦闘シミュレーター、ねえ。

engChrName: Can we really use it for combat training?
engSearchText: Can we really use it for combat training?
jpnChrName: 本当にこれで戦闘訓練ができるんですか？
jpnSearchText: 本当にこれで戦闘訓練ができるんですか？

engChrName: Can you seriously use that thing for combat training?
engSearchText: Can you seriously use that thing for combat training?
jpnChrName: マジでこいつで戦闘訓練ができんのかよ？
jpnSearchText: マジでこいつで戦闘訓練ができんのかよ？

engChrName: Indeed. It connects to each of your Xiphas in order to facilitate it.
engSearchText:
Indeed. It connects to each of your Xiphas in order to
facilitate it.
jpnChrName: はい、実際にはそれぞれのザイファを介して 訓練して頂くことになりますが。
jpnSearchText:
はい、実際にはそれぞれのザイファを介して
訓練して頂くことになりますが。

engChrName: However, please bear in mind that the simulator interfaces with the user's neurotransmitters. Damage received will be felt, so do be careful.
engSearchText:
However, please bear in mind that the simulator
interfaces with the user's neurotransmitters.
Damage received will be felt, so do be careful.
jpnChrName: 各種神経伝達に作用するため、 痛みなども再現されますので注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
各種神経伝達に作用するため、
痛みなども再現されますので注意して下さい。

engChrName: It's impressive it can do so much. It would make things easier to actually be in the situation, even if it's just a simulation.
engSearchText:
It's impressive it can do so much. It would make
things easier to actually be in the situation, even if it's
just a simulation.
jpnChrName: なるほど……より先進的な イメージトレーニングといった感じですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……より先進的な
イメージトレーニングといった感じですね。

engChrName: The nuts and bolts of how it all works go way above my head, but it's gonna come in handy so we can be on the top of our game.
engSearchText:
The nuts and bolts of how it all works go way above
my head, but it's gonna come in handy so we can be
on the top of our game.
jpnChrName: 正直、詳しい仕組みはサッパリだが。 とにかく使えるモンは使うとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
正直、詳しい仕組みはサッパリだが。
とにかく使えるモンは使うとしようぜ。

engChrName: Arkride Solutions Office Complicated Matters Only
engSearchText:
Arkride Solutions Office
Complicated Matters Only
jpnChrName: アークライド解決事務所 訳アリ客以外はお断り
jpnSearchText:
アークライド解決事務所
訳アリ客以外はお断り

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: (Well, it doesn't get more complicated than mine.)
engSearchText: (Well, it doesn't get more complicated than mine.)
jpnChrName: （…………うん、十分すぎるかな。）
jpnSearchText: （…………うん、十分すぎるかな。）

engChrName: *yaaawn*
engSearchText: *yaaawn*
jpnChrName: ふわああっ……
jpnSearchText: ふわああっ……

engChrName: First thing in the morning...?
engSearchText: First thing in the morning...?
jpnChrName: 朝っぱらから客かよ……？
jpnSearchText: 朝っぱらから客かよ……？

engChrName: Uhh...
engSearchText: Uhh...
jpnSearchText: ………えっと………

engChrName: You're, uh, not really here with a job, right?
engSearchText: You're, uh, not really here with a job, right?
jpnChrName: まさかとは思うが、客か？
jpnSearchText: まさかとは思うが、客か？

engChrName: I-I am!
engSearchText: I-I am!
jpnChrName: は、はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: は、はいっ……！

engChrName: I have something I'd really like your help with, so if you don't mind, sir...
engSearchText:
I have something I'd really like your help with, so if
you don't mind, sir...
jpnChrName: こちらのアークライド解決事務所に お願いしたいことがあって伺いました！
jpnSearchText:
こちらのアークライド解決事務所に
お願いしたいことがあって伺いました！

engChrName: Ugh. Where'd they go?
engSearchText: Ugh. Where'd they go?
jpnChrName: くっ、どこに……！？
jpnSearchText: くっ、どこに……！？

engChrName: They're just...gone. How?
engSearchText: They're just...gone. How?
jpnChrName: いない──……ど、どうして……？
jpnSearchText: いない──……ど、どうして……？

engChrName: Hah. Got some speed on you.
engSearchText: Hah. Got some speed on you.
jpnChrName: ハッ、大した身のこなしだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、大した身のこなしだな。

engChrName: Got'cha!
engSearchText: Got'cha!
jpnChrName: 甘いぜ───！
jpnSearchText: 甘いぜ───！

engChrName: Ack!
engSearchText: Ack!
jpnChrName: あうっ……！
jpnSearchText: あうっ……！

engChrName: Is everything okay, Van? ...Huh?
engSearchText: Is everything okay, Van? ...Huh?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、大丈夫ですか──え。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、大丈夫ですか──え。

engChrName: This door leads to the men's bath.
engSearchText: This door leads to the men's bath.
jpnChrName: 男湯へ続く扉がある。
jpnSearchText: 男湯へ続く扉がある。

engChrName: This door leads to the women's bath.
engSearchText: This door leads to the women's bath.
jpnChrName: 女湯へ続く扉がある。
jpnSearchText: 女湯へ続く扉がある。

engChrName: This is the garage where Van parks his pickup truck. The shutter is closed.
engSearchText:
This is the garage where Van parks his pickup truck.
The shutter is closed.
jpnChrName: ヴァンが借りているガレージだ。 シャッターは閉まっている。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンが借りているガレージだ。
シャッターは閉まっている。

engChrName: It's an old jukebox.
engSearchText: It's an old jukebox.
jpnChrName: 古いジュークボックスが置かれている。
jpnSearchText: 古いジュークボックスが置かれている。

engChrName: It's Bergard's orbal bike.
engSearchText: It's Bergard's orbal bike.
jpnChrName: ベルガルドのバイクが停められている。
jpnSearchText: ベルガルドのバイクが停められている。

engChrName: You realize I have better things to do with my life, right? Like, I don't know, my career as the biggest movie act—
engSearchText:
You realize I have better things to do with my
life, right? Like, I don't know, my career as the
biggest movie act—
jpnChrName: あのねえ、アタシは“裏”以外にも 銀幕の世界でトップ女優を張ってて──
jpnSearchText:
あのねえ、アタシは“裏”以外にも
銀幕の世界でトップ女優を張ってて──

engChrName: Excuse me? What do you mean, 'Look for someone at work'?! You're not seriously expecting me to do that?!
engSearchText:
Excuse me? What do you mean, 'Look for someone
at work'?! You're not seriously expecting me to
do that?!
jpnChrName: だったら手近なところで済ませておけ？ ……そ、そんな事できるわけないでしょ！？
jpnSearchText:
だったら手近なところで済ませておけ？
……そ、そんな事できるわけないでしょ！？

engChrName: Guess I'll order a little somethin' from Hermès.
engSearchText: Guess I'll order a little somethin' from Hermès.
jpnChrName: ちょいとエルメスに配達を頼むかね。
jpnSearchText: ちょいとエルメスに配達を頼むかね。

engChrName: HP and EP were fully restored!
engSearchText: HP and EP were fully restored!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！

engChrName: And now, a news break.
engSearchText: And now, a news break.
jpnChrName: ここで、ニュースをお伝えします。
jpnSearchText: ここで、ニュースをお伝えします。

engChrName: Hope you're having a good one, listeners. Today's news briefing comes to us straight from the Tyrell Times.
engSearchText:
Hope you're having a good one, listeners.
Today's news briefing comes to us straight from the
Tyrell Times.
jpnChrName: こんにちは、タイレル通信がお送りする ニューストピックです。
jpnSearchText:
こんにちは、タイレル通信がお送りする
ニューストピックです。

engChrName: President Gramheart revealed two events for this year's Revolution Festival: a memorial service, and a showcase of next-generation military equipment.
engSearchText:
President Gramheart revealed two events for this
year's Revolution Festival: a memorial service, and a
showcase of next-generation military equipment.
jpnChrName: 先日グラムハート大統領自らが発表した、 革命記念祭での追悼式と軍の次世代兵装のお披露目について
jpnSearchText:
先日グラムハート大統領自らが発表した、
革命記念祭での追悼式と軍の次世代兵装のお披露目について

engChrName: The announcement has made waves not only within Calvard, but across Zemuria—a sign that this is set to be a boisterous one even by its standards.
engSearchText:
The announcement has made waves not only within
Calvard, but across Zemuria—a sign that this is set to
be a boisterous one even by its standards.
jpnChrName: 共和国全土だけでなく国外でも大きな反響があり、 今年の記念祭は例年以上の盛り上がりが予想されます。
jpnSearchText:
共和国全土だけでなく国外でも大きな反響があり、
今年の記念祭は例年以上の盛り上がりが予想されます。

engSearchText:
And now, we bring you the weather. How's it looking

engSearchText:

festive spirit, as clear skies are once again predicted
throughout the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: まもなく迎える革命記念祭を祝福するように、 今年も期間中は快晴が見込まれています。
jpnSearchText:
まもなく迎える革命記念祭を祝福するように、
今年も期間中は快晴が見込まれています。

engChrName: I'm sure we'll see scores of citizens out enjoying the day well worth celebrating when the time comes.
engSearchText:
I'm sure we'll see scores of citizens out enjoying the
day well worth celebrating when the time comes.
jpnChrName: この記念すべき日を、多くの国民の皆様が 楽しまれます事をお祈りいたします。
jpnSearchText:
この記念すべき日を、多くの国民の皆様が
楽しまれます事をお祈りいたします。

engChrName: Thanks for the update.
engSearchText: Thanks for the update.

throughout the country make their way to Edith to
take part in the Revolution Festival.

jpnSearchText:
なお本日よりヴァンタイユ地区では、式典の準備のための

by the Presidential Office.

everyone is being extra mindful of the rules of the

engSearchText:

any of Edith's roads or the expressway. Rail lines and
flights are also operating as normal.

jpnSearchText:
今週は、秋の交通安全週間となっております。

ceremony, the successful Tharbad Film Festival's
parade concluded without further incident.
jpnChrName: 受賞式当日に一部混乱がみられたサルバッド映画祭ですが、 パレードも無事に終わり大盛況の内に終幕しました。

engChrName: The dance numbers and tag-team performances with popular actors was well received both at home and abroad. Another festival is planned for next year.
engSearchText:
The dance numbers and tag-team performances with
popular actors was well received both at home
and abroad. Another festival is planned for next year.
jpnChrName: 人気俳優の夢の共演や踊りのパフォーマンスなど、 国内外での反響も大きく、早くも来年の開催が 決定したそうです。

as temperatures begin to fall over the next few days.

jpnSearchText:
ここ数日で気温も下がり、
秋らしい過ごしやすい季節になってきました。

engSearchText:
Clear skies are expected today for Edith and the rest
of the country in what's shaping up to be a mild—but

国民の皆様は大統領府および各自治体の指示に従い、
冷静な行動を心がけて下さい。

engChrName: (Doesn't seem like they're doing the usual broadcasts right now.)
engSearchText:
(Doesn't seem like they're doing the usual broadcasts
right now.)
jpnChrName: （今は通常の放送はやってないみたいだな。）
jpnSearchText: （今は通常の放送はやってないみたいだな。）

engChrName: To celebrate the Revolution Festival, this station is playing the hottest hits nonstop all through the day. Here's a favorite right now.
engSearchText:
To celebrate the Revolution Festival, this station is
playing the hottest hits nonstop all through the day.
Here's a favorite right now.
jpnChrName: 記念すべき革命記念祭の本日は、フルタイムで 人気の音楽をお送りしております。続いてはこちら。
jpnSearchText:
記念すべき革命記念祭の本日は、フルタイムで
人気の音楽をお送りしております。続いてはこちら。

engChrName: (Doesn't seem like they're doing the usual broadcasts right now.)
engSearchText:
(Doesn't seem like they're doing the usual broadcasts
right now.)
jpnChrName: （今日は通常の放送はやってないみたいだな。）
jpnSearchText: （今日は通常の放送はやってないみたいだな。）

engChrName: I don't see the clerk anywhere. Are they open today?
engSearchText: I don't see the clerk anywhere. Are they open today?
jpnChrName: 番頭さん、いらっしゃらないですね…… 営業時間外なんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
番頭さん、いらっしゃらないですね……
営業時間外なんでしょうか。

engChrName: They should be—this place opens at 5:30AM. But huh, looks like she's away. That's rare.
engSearchText:
They should be—this place opens at 5:30AM.
But huh, looks like she's away. That's rare.
jpnChrName: いや、ここは朝５時半からやってるんだが…… 珍しく席を外してるようだな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、ここは朝５時半からやってるんだが……
珍しく席を外してるようだな。

engChrName: Heeey, Anya! You got customers!
engSearchText: Heeey, Anya! You got customers!
jpnChrName: ──おいアーニャ！　お客サンだぞ！
jpnSearchText: ──おいアーニャ！　お客サンだぞ！

engChrName: Sorry, sorry! Welcome!
engSearchText: Sorry, sorry! Welcome!
jpnChrName: はいはい、いらっしゃいませー！
jpnSearchText: はいはい、いらっしゃいませー！

engChrName: Oh, it's just you, Van. You never get bored of this place, huh?
engSearchText:
Oh, it's just you, Van. You never get bored of this
place, huh?
jpnChrName: ってまたヴァンかぁ。 毎日飽きないねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ってまたヴァンかぁ。
毎日飽きないねぇ。

engChrName: A-A young girl?
engSearchText: A-A young girl?
jpnChrName: お、女の子……？
jpnSearchText: お、女の子……？

engChrName: Yup! My folks are busy, so I'm handling things.
engSearchText: Yup! My folks are busy, so I'm handling things.
jpnChrName: うんうん、ウチは両親が忙しいから わたしが店番してるんだよ～。
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、ウチは両親が忙しいから
わたしが店番してるんだよ～。

engChrName: Our baths specialize in northern saunas called löylys! They originate from Remiferia.
engSearchText:
Our baths specialize in northern saunas called löylys!
They originate from Remiferia.
jpnChrName: ちなみに北国レミフェリア由来の 《ロウリュ（蒸気サウナ）》も楽しめる浴場でね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに北国レミフェリア由来の
《ロウリュ（蒸気サウナ）》も楽しめる浴場でね。

engChrName: My grandparents are both from there, so it's the real deal.
engSearchText:
My grandparents are both from there, so it's the
real deal.
jpnChrName: お祖父ちゃんとお祖母ちゃんが レミフェリア出身だから、本格的だよ～！
jpnSearchText:
お祖父ちゃんとお祖母ちゃんが
レミフェリア出身だから、本格的だよ～！

engChrName: Th-That sounds amazing. (I'd like to give it a try...)
engSearchText:
Th-That sounds amazing.
(I'd like to give it a try...)
jpnChrName: そ、それは凄そうですね…… （ちょっと興味あるかも……）
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは凄そうですね……
（ちょっと興味あるかも……）

engChrName: I was surprised to see you away from the counter. Don't tell me...
engSearchText:
I was surprised to see you away from the counter.
Don't tell me...
jpnChrName: だがお前が番頭を外してるなんてな。 ……まさかとは思うが……
jpnSearchText:
だがお前が番頭を外してるなんてな。
……まさかとは思うが……

engChrName: Ahahah, I knew you'd notice. We had a water leak this morning.
engSearchText:
Ahahah, I knew you'd notice. We had a water leak
this morning.
jpnChrName: あはは、さすがヴァン～。 実は今朝、水道管の水漏れが見つかってね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、さすがヴァン～。
実は今朝、水道管の水漏れが見つかってね。

engChrName: We already got someone repairing the pipes, but that unfortunately means we're closed for today.
engSearchText:
We already got someone repairing the pipes, but that
unfortunately means we're closed for today.
jpnChrName: いま業者さんに直してもらってるんだ～。 悪いんだけど、今日は臨時休業かなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
いま業者さんに直してもらってるんだ～。
悪いんだけど、今日は臨時休業かなぁ？

engChrName: Damn... It is what it is. We'll leave for today.
engSearchText: Damn... It is what it is. We'll leave for today.
jpnChrName: クソ、仕方ねえな…… 今日の所は引き上げるしかねえか。
jpnSearchText:
クソ、仕方ねえな……
今日の所は引き上げるしかねえか。

engChrName: Right, of course. (Wait, was Van planning to...?)
engSearchText:
Right, of course.
(Wait, was Van planning to...?)
jpnChrName: ええ、そうですね。 （というかヴァンさん、もしかして……）
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そうですね。
（というかヴァンさん、もしかして……）

engChrName: Sorry about the inconvenience. Hope to see you two soon!
engSearchText:
Sorry about the inconvenience. Hope to see you
two soon!
jpnChrName: あはは、二人ともまたご贔屓に～！
jpnSearchText: あはは、二人ともまたご贔屓に～！

engChrName: Th-That's...
engSearchText: Th-That's...
jpnChrName: あっ、あれって……
jpnSearchText: あっ、あれって……

engChrName: Myaaa!
engSearchText: Myaaa!
jpnChrName: ニャーッ！！
jpnSearchText: ニャーッ！！

engChrName: Is he talking to the other cats?
engSearchText: Is he talking to the other cats?
jpnChrName: なんでしょう、猫たちに 何かを話しているような……？
jpnSearchText:
なんでしょう、猫たちに
何かを話しているような……？

engChrName: Maybe he's mediating or somethin'? Little guy looks like the head honcho around here.
engSearchText:
Maybe he's mediating or somethin'? Little guy looks
like the head honcho around here.
jpnChrName: ケンカの仲裁でもしてんのかねぇ。 ふむ、あの灰猫が“顔役”みてえだが……
jpnSearchText:
ケンカの仲裁でもしてんのかねぇ。
ふむ、あの灰猫が“顔役”みてえだが……

engChrName: Meowmeow!
engSearchText: Meowmeow!
jpnChrName: ニャンニャン……！
jpnSearchText: ニャンニャン……！

engChrName: Huh? They're all gathered together—
engSearchText: Huh? They're all gathered together—
jpnChrName: ん！？　あそこに集まってやがんのは──
jpnSearchText: ん！？　あそこに集まってやがんのは──

engChrName: Meow! Mreow!
engSearchText: Meow! Mreow!
jpnChrName: ニャオ！　ニャオンッ！！
jpnSearchText: ニャオ！　ニャオンッ！！

engChrName: Meooow!
engSearchText: Meooow!
jpnChrName: ……フニャ～ンッ！！
jpnSearchText: ……フニャ～ンッ！！

engChrName: A-A cat meeting?! I've never seen anything like this before.
engSearchText:
A-A cat meeting?! I've never seen anything like
this before.
jpnChrName: ね、猫の集会……！？ こんなの初めて見るわね……
jpnSearchText:
ね、猫の集会……！？
こんなの初めて見るわね……

engChrName: They all look pretty on edge. Perhaps they've sensed something.
engSearchText:
They all look pretty on edge. Perhaps they've
sensed something.
jpnChrName: なんだか注意してるみたいです…… 猫たちも何か感じ取ってるんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
なんだか注意してるみたいです……
猫たちも何か感じ取ってるんでしょうか。

engChrName: I mean, all of us humans are freakin' out. They no doubt picked up on that at least, the clever little bastards.
engSearchText:
I mean, all of us humans are freakin' out. They no
doubt picked up on that at least, the clever
little bastards.
jpnChrName: 人間がこれだけ騒いでりゃな。 ……しかし想像以上に利口な連中だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
人間がこれだけ騒いでりゃな。
……しかし想像以上に利口な連中だぜ。

engChrName: Meooow! Mreow!
engSearchText: Meooow! Mreow!
jpnChrName: フニャッ！　ニャオンッ！！
jpnSearchText: フニャッ！　ニャオンッ！！

engChrName: Meooow!
engSearchText: Meooow!
jpnChrName: ……フニャ～ンッ！！
jpnSearchText: ……フニャ～ンッ！！

engChrName: I'm away from the booth \\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000  Please come back later Don't try anything funny! I WILL catch you!
engSearchText:
I'm away from the booth
\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000\\u3000 Please come back later
Don't try anything funny! I WILL catch you!
jpnChrName: 離席中  	  ※留守にしてるからって 	    ズルは許さないよ！！
jpnSearchText:
離席中

※留守にしてるからって
ズルは許さないよ！！

engChrName: That's weird. She's not here.
engSearchText: That's weird. She's not here.
jpnChrName: あれっ、お婆さんは……
jpnSearchText: あれっ、お婆さんは……

engChrName: Oh, I guess it is that time of the week. She might be hanging around the church.
engSearchText:
Oh, I guess it is that time of the week. She might be
hanging around the church.
jpnChrName: あー、今日は確か…… 教会あたりにいけば会えるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、今日は確か……
教会あたりにいけば会えるかもな。

engChrName: Gin is away at the moment. She may be at the church today.
engSearchText:
Gin is away at the moment. She may be at the
church today.
jpnChrName: ギン婆さんは出かけているようだ。 教会にいるようだが……
jpnSearchText:
ギン婆さんは出かけているようだ。
教会にいるようだが……

engChrName: We need to ask her about the tablet. Let's hurry up and find her!
engSearchText:
We need to ask her about the tablet. Let's hurry up
and find her!
jpnChrName: 例のタブレットについて聞いてみたいですし 会いに行ってみましょう！
jpnSearchText:
例のタブレットについて聞いてみたいですし
会いに行ってみましょう！

engChrName: HP, EP, and CP were fully restored, and S-Boost Gauge increased 3 points!
engSearchText:
HP, EP, and CP were fully restored, and S-Boost
Gauge increased 3 points!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復、 Ｓブーストゲージが３上昇、 ＣＰが２００上昇した！
jpnSearchText:
ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復、
Ｓブーストゲージが３上昇、
ＣＰが２００上昇した！

engChrName: You wish to train on the simulator? Very well.
engSearchText: You wish to train on the simulator? Very well.
jpnChrName: シミュレーターの利用ですね。 かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText:
シミュレーターの利用ですね。
かしこまりました。

engChrName: Think I'll grab Risette and get her to turn on the simulator to get some training in.
engSearchText:
Think I'll grab Risette and get her to turn on the
simulator to get some training in.
jpnChrName: よし、リゼットを呼んで シミュレーターを使わせてもらうか。
jpnSearchText:
よし、リゼットを呼んで
シミュレーターを使わせてもらうか。

engChrName: Activating Virtual Combat Simulator, beta version.
engSearchText: Activating Virtual Combat Simulator, beta version.
jpnChrName: 仮想戦闘シミュレーターβ版、起動します。
jpnSearchText: 仮想戦闘シミュレーターβ版、起動します。

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Van! Pleasure doing business with you again.
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't Van! Pleasure doing business with
you again.
jpnChrName: あら、ヴァンじゃない。 毎度ご利用どうも。
jpnSearchText:
あら、ヴァンじゃない。
毎度ご利用どうも。

engChrName: Here's your delivery.
engSearchText: Here's your delivery.
jpnChrName: ハイ、お届け物よ。
jpnSearchText: ハイ、お届け物よ。

engChrName: Thanks for always shopping with me.
engSearchText: Thanks for always shopping with me.
jpnChrName: ご贔屓ありがとね。
jpnSearchText: ご贔屓ありがとね。

engChrName: Hope to see you again real soon.
engSearchText: Hope to see you again real soon.
jpnChrName: じゃ、また連絡待ってるわね。
jpnSearchText: じゃ、また連絡待ってるわね。

engChrName: Select [Open Slot], then find an unopened slot and unlock it.
engSearchText:
Select [Open Slot], then find an unopened slot and
unlock it.
jpnChrName: 「スロット開封」から未開封スロットを１箇所開封してください。
jpnSearchText: <C1>「スロット開封」から未開封スロットを１箇所開封してください。
